ro snyoms chos nyid dang :_'khor 'das spang blang bral ba yi:_gang shar chos nyid rol pa la:_ma rig 'dzin pas ma bslad bsrung :_'das na 'khor bar ldog go na ra kan:_slob mas dam tshig khas ni blang :_de nas ye shes dbab bya ste:_slob ma rnam snang chos bdun bca':_smin phrag g.yung drung dmar po zhig:_g.yon du myur du 'khor ba la:_ma yengs gtod du gzhug byas la:_byin rlabs chen pos ye shes dbab:_de yis ye shes phebs pa na: de yi ngang du klod pa ni:_bcas bcos med par klod cig bya:_de yi ngang la dar cig bzhag:_bde gsal mi rtog so ma la:_'bol le shig ge lhan ne ba: sprin bral nam mkha' lta bu 'byung :_gshis kyi gnas lugs 'di yin pas: de ni chos skur ngo yang sprad:_de nas bla ma'i mdun dag tu:_slob ma langs te thal mo sbyar:_de nas bla mas 'di skad brjodaH:_kye ma kye ma rigs kyi bu: mig rtse nam mkha'i shar du ltos:_shar gyi bar snang dag la ni:_thogs pa med par 'gro bar sgoms:_lho nub byang phyogs des 'gre 'o:_'gro bar bsam na 'gro mkhan med:_gang du 'gro sar phyin pa med:_'gro bar bsam pa rang gi sems:_sems ni mtha' bral stong pa yin:_de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod:_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyi:_sems ni dang po gang nas byung :_rgyu rkyen ci las byung zhes dri:_de yang byung sa med shes na:_de nyid don du ngo yang sprad:_de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod:_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis:_rgyal ba'i sku gzugs 'di la ltos:_rgyan dang cha lugs du maRa snang :_snang baRa 'dzin pa rang gi sems:_de la ltos dang gzhi rtsa bral:_de bzhin yid yul snang ba'i gzugs:_yul nyid gsal ba mkhan po stong :_de ni gsal stong chos sku yin:_de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod:_cang te'u dril bu 'khar rnga 'am:_se gol g.yer kha'i sgra sgrog la:_'di yi sgra ni snyan mi snyan:_sgra 'dug mi 'dug brtag tu gzhug:_de yi ngo bo ma rnyed na:_de ni grag stong bya ba yin: grags pa sgra ru gyur tshad kun:_gsal bar grags kyang rang bzhin stong : skyon yon shar dus gzhi med rtsa bral yin:_de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod: kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis:_spos dang sman sogs dri zhim dang :_mi sdug dri ma bsnam du gzhug:_de yi dri don brtag tu gzhug:_de la chags sdang skyes pa na:_de yi mkhan po rtsad kyang bcad:_des ni rkyen snang shes pa 'dres:_gnyis 'dzin shes pa glo bur yin:_rkyen phyir snang yang ngo bo stong :_de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod:_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis:_bza' btang ro mchog myong bar gyis:_mngar skyur lan tshwa tsha kha bska:_ro drug myong ba'i mkhan po ltos: bltas pas mi rnyed skye ba med:_mtha' bral dbu ma spros bral dang :_Rang grol chos skur shes par mdzod:_de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod:_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis:_lus 'di gcer bur phyung gyis la:_reg bya 'jam rtsub gang yang brten:_de la chags sdang 'dug gam dri:_de la gnyis 'dzin gang skyes kyang :_rnam pa gsal la rang bzhin stong :_rang gi sems su ngo yang sprad:_de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod:_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis:_skyid sdug sdug bsngal mtha' dag sgoms:_de la dga' dang mi dga' dri:_gang ltar 'dug kyang sems las byung :_bde dang sdug bsngal gang byung yang :_gsal la ngo bo rig stong yin:_dper na chu zla ji bzhin no:_de sogs dug lnga dug gsum yang :_rkyen gyis skyer gzhug ngo yang sprad:_sems kyi ngo bo stong pa la:_stong pa'i gsal cha rtog par 'khrul:_lung las:_sems la dran bsam 'char ba'i phyir:_ngo bo nyid kyang rtog pas spang :_ces so:_nyon mongs pa yi mtshang rtogs na:_gnyen po spang blang med par grol:_de ltar ngo sprod rgyas par gdab:_des ni dag bya gang dag na:_lus ngag yid gsum 'dzin sgrib dag: gsum ka'i nus pa tshad du phyin:_brten bya bde sdug spang blang bral:_rjes su dbyer med bsgom par gnad:_sa ni bcu gcig kun tu 'od:_'phrin las bzhi po mngon du gyur:_'bras bu sku lnga lhun grub thob:_tshig dbang ngo sprod Rin chen phreng :_kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa:_thugs kyis sras dang 'phrad par shog:_rgya rgya rgya:_de rjes tshogs rol glu gar bya:_thod rgal nyams kyang sprad par bya'o:_e ma ho:_phyi rabs las can skal bar ldan:_tshe gcig 'di la sangs rgya ba'i:_dbang bzhi gnad kyi phreng ba 'di:_o rgyan pad+ma bdag 'dra yis:_gzhan du bstan pa'i gnas med nas:_phyi rabs don du gter du sbed: o rgyan thugs kyi sras dang 'phrad par shog:_lha dang klu dang btsan gsum gyis:_rgyal ba'i bka' 'di dam du srungs:_dus med len la de yi dbang po snubs:_dus kyi tha mar las can cig la gtod:_des kyang gter du sbed pa'i smon lam 'tshal:_dbang khrid nor bu'i sgron gsal zhes bya ba rdzogs so: zab rgya:_g+hu ya rgya:_sa ma yA:_kha tham:_rgya rgya rgya: @#:_gsang dbang lus dkyil ngo sprod bzhugs so: gsang dbang las:_ye nas rang lus da la ru:_gnas pa ngo yang sprad par bya:_zhes pas:_'o rigs kyi bu khyod gson cig:_phyi bum pa'i dbang gi dus su:_rdul tshon gyi dal la brten nas dpe'i mtshon byed du ngo sprad pa yin gyi:_don dam par song na:_rang gi lus 'di rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bzhugs pa yin te:_klong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud las:_'byung ba'i dngas las grub pa yi:_lus 'di bde gshegs pho brang nyid:_rigs lnga yab yum lnga yi gnas:_phung khams skye mched lha yi sku:_zhes pas:_rang gi rim pa 'di thog mar 'khor 'das gang du 'ang ma grub pa'i sngon rol nas 'od gsal bde ba chen por bzhugs te:_de nyid rang ngo rang gis ma shes pas rang rig 'byung bzhi'i sbubs su tshud pa'i lus 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas yin te:_spyi bo bde chen gyi tsakra na:_rdo rje mkha' 'gro yab yum bzhugs:_mgrin pa longs spyod kyi tsakra na:_rin chen mkha' 'gro yab yum bzhugs:_snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo na:_sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yab yum bzhugs:_lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na:_pad+ma DAk+ki yab yum bzhugs:_gsang gnas bde skyong tsakra na:_las kyi DAk+ki yab yum bzhugs pa yin no:[ · ]phung po thams cad dpa' bo:_khams thams cad DAk+ki'i rang bzhin yin no:_tha ma ba spu'i bu ga yan chod lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa yin no:_de yang klong gsal las:_'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas zhing :_'khor lo lnga ni rigs lnga'i gnas:_phung khams thams cad lha tshogs nyid:_sems ni ye shes chen po nyid:_ces so:_de la sogs pa rgyas par ni rgyud gzhan nas kyang spro bar bya'o:_gsang dbang gi lhan thabs so:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_I:_dge'o: @#:_:shes rab yum gyi mkha' ngo sprod bzhugs so: shes rab ye shes dbang las:_yul mkha' rgyal ba thams cad kyi: gsang ba zab mo'i don yin par:_lung dang mthun par ngo yang sprad:_ces pas:_de'i don lung gis sprad pa ni:_klong gsal le'u brgyad pa las:_dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang :_b+ha ga dbyings las rang byung ste:_chos rnams kun gyi 'byung gnas yin:_ces pa dang :_yang de nyid las:_b+ha ga gsang sngags kun gyi gnas:_bde chen ye shes 'byung ba yin:_'di nyid ma brten thabs gzhan med:_thabs kyi rgyud kyis grol ba yin:_bde chen 'di brten bde ba thob:_yang dag sangs rgyas 'di las byung :_zhes pas:_gsang sngags kyi chos thams cad 'dir gsungs:_lam sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di la brten nas sangs rgyas:_'phral gyi bde skyid thams cad kyang 'di la brten nas byung bas yum gyi b+ha ga 'di la rtag tu khyod mchod par gyis shig: bud med tsam la khro ba spongs shig:_mtshan ldan yum la rtag tu gus par gyis shig:_tshe gcig la sangs rgya ba'i bde ba ni 'dis ster bar nus kyi gzhan gyis ma yin no:_zhes bya'o:_klong gsal las:_bud med brnyas shing mkha' la gshe:_bde dang bral na na raka spyod:_ces so:_de la sogs pa rgyud dang chos gzhan nas kyang che ba brjod par bya'o:_shes rab ye shes kyi lhan thabs su bkod pa rdzogs so:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_s+thaH:_dge'o: @#:_:dbang gi rgyab yig lag len bzhugs so: o rgyan pad+ma bdag 'dra yis:_dbang gi rgyab yig bstan par bya:_de la dang po bdag nyid skad cig dran rdzogs su:_dpal rta mgrin sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas pa gri gug g.yon thod khrag bsnams pa:_gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan can cig bskyed:_de bskyed pa'i spyi bor yi ge ra las badzra dpa' bo:_mgrin par tsa las rat+na dpa' ba'o:_snying khar hrIHlas pad+ma dpa' bo'o:_lte bar ya las las kyi dpa' bo'o:_phyag mtshan gtso bo dang mthun pa sku mdog rigs dang mthun pa gsal bar bskyed do: bdag de ltar bskyed pa'i pang du yum rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan drug gsol ba:_phyag mtshan g.yas gri gug bsnams shing yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud pa:_g.yon thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba thogs pa 'khril zhing sbyor ba zhal dang ljags sprad de dgyes pa'i 'dzum mdangs can: mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba cig tu rang dang yab yum gnyis bskyed do:_de ltar bskyed pa'i yab yum gyi spyi bor ha las rdo rje DAk+ki bskyed:_mgrin par ri las rin chen DAk+ki bskyed:_snying khar ni las pad+ma DAk+ki bskyed:_lte bar sa las las kyi DAk+ki bskyed:_phyag mtshan yum dang mthun pa sku mdog phyogs dang mthun pa mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba bcu drug lon pa'i lang tsho lta bur bskyed do:_de ltar bskyed pa'i spyi bor nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la o rgyan pad+ma sku mdog mthing nag rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs yab yum zhal sbyor du bskyed do:_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du bde stong lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rtogs par bya snyam pa byas la de nas yum dang 'khril te:_yab kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje hA~MhUM las rdo rjer bskyed pa'i nang du phaT ser pos rdo rje'i bu ga bkag go:_mu tra yum du bskyed pa'i b+ha ga paM las pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i dbus su phaT sngon pos bu ga bkag pa'o:_de nas rdo rje pad+mar sbyar te gong gi bskyed pa'i lha dang bla ma yab yum kyang sbyor ba mdzad par bsgom:_rtsa'i khams thams cad du dpa' bo DAk+ki grangs las 'das pa thams cad sbyor ba byed par bsam:_de nas 'o dang dam du 'khyud pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis dal bus bskyod do:_bde ba skyes pa ltar gong gi lha yab yum yang bde ba rgyas shing bskyod pas sbyor mtshams nas dngas ma babs pas:_rang lus bdud rtsis gang bas bde ba rgyas shing lus thams cad dngas mas ltem gyis gang bar bsgom:_bde ba rdzogs nas mi zin pa'i 'go ma g.yo ba nas bzung :_bskyod kyin mi bzung :_bskyod 'phro bcad nas bzung :_las dang po pas lus bde mer byung ba dang :_gcan gzan lta bu'i snom gyis rlung gnyis nang du 'then: gling bzhi ri rab ngos su bsdu:_sprul tshang brag la bskyal:_'brang ze kha gzengs bstodaH:_lho sprin dbyings su sgril:_bde chen 'khor lo bla ma yab yum gyi bde ba la sems gtad:_steng 'og gi rlung bsdams te bde ba la sems ltem me re bzhag:_de nas bde ba chung ngu song ba dang :_yang skyod kyin de ka tsug bzung bas:_spyi bo nas dwangs ma g.yos pas:_bde me re ba de dga' ba'i ye shes:_des rnam rtog rags rim rnams spang ngo :_dwangs ma snying khar sleb pas mchog dga'i ye shes:_des bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rtog pa spang ngo :_dngas ma lte bar sleb ste:_bde ba rgyas pas dga' bral gyi ye shes: des phyag rgyar 'dzin pa'i rtog pa spang ngo :_dngas ma gsang bar sleb pas lus ngag yid gsum bde la rtog pa med pa 'byung bas lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes des dga' ba gsum du 'dzin pa'i rtog pa thams cad spang ste:_bde ba stong pa gsal ba ngos bzung med pa'i nyams skye bas de ngos bzung la dus thams cad du nyams bskyangs pas bde stong gi rtogs pa mngon du 'gyur ro: snying rus kyis dngas ma mi gtong ba'i dam bca' brtan pos bzung la gong gi ye shes ma zin tsher skyod:_de nas dngas ma zin pa drang ba ni:_gsang ba'i rdo rje'i bu ga'i hUM sngon po de dngas ma dang 'dres nas dngas ma hU~M gi rnam par skar mda' bzhin du lte ba nas yar rgyangs kyi byung ba dang :_dus mnyam du ngag tu hig ces sgra dang bcas pas drag po bar ma chad par bgrang bar bya'o/ de nas rtsa la dgram zhing rlung dang bsre ba ni:_phyag rgya ma dang bral la rang khyi'i 'dug stangs kyis ming med kyi rtsar mtheb chen btsugs te:_khu tshur bcangs la sa la btsugs la:_ngag tu ha sig:_ces g.yas nas lan gsum drag tu 'then la rlung bzung te g.yas su lan gsum sprug:_g.yon du yang de bzhin du bya:_rlung bzung ste lus sprug shar shar ba lan gsum bya:_de nas klod la bzhag go:_de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu bsngo bar bya'o:_las dang po pas gal te ma 'drongs na rtags ni:_rdo rje'i rtsa bar chu bsri ba snyam byed du yong bas yang yang sbyor bas drang zhing dgram:_des kyang ma 'drongs na:_las rgya 'am:_lag gi 'du byed kyis gtong ngo:_de ma btang na nad du 'gro'o:_de nas phyis mi 'drongs mi srid do:_'drongs shing khrems kyang bud med bu mi 'ong ba'i dus su en re ma btang na:_phyis rdo rje las su rung du mi btub pas gtong ngo :_gtong ba'i dus su yang pad+ma'i nang du yi dam gyi lha tshogs bskyed la mchod par bsam mo:_dngas ma'i lhag ma bag tsam zhig bzung la rang gis myong ngo :_des byang sems spang pa'i ltung ba mi 'phog pa yin no:_dang po bde ba 'go ma skye ba dang bzung :_de la goms pa dang rdo rje'i rtsa ba nas bzung de la goms pa dang rked pa nas bzung :_de la goms pa dang :_b+ha ga rang nas kyang 'drongs par the tshom med do:_snying rus dang ldan pa'i skyes bus mi 'drongs mi srid do:_chags can lam du 'jug pa yi:_dbang bzhi gnad kyi gdams pa 'di:_ma 'ongs las can don du ni:_o rgyan pad+ma bdag 'dras bkod:_thugs kyi sras dang 'phrad par shog:_dbang gi rgyab yig gsang ba'i dum bur bkod pa'o:_rgya rgya rgya:_zab rgya:_gter rgya:_sbas rgya:_DAk+ki'i rgya'o: mdor na o rgyan yab yum gyi dwangs ma de ma 'dzom na:_bdud rtsi a mr-i ta lce thog tu bzhag ste cho ga ngo sprod rgyas pa gal che'o:_s+thaH:_:

[5.11 dbang gong ma gsum gyi sa ma 'grel]

@#/_/dbang gong ma gsum gyi sa ma 'grel bzhugs pa lags so:_: dang po gsang dbang gi sa ma 'grel bzhugs so: skrakaH_o rgyan pad+ma bdag 'dra yis:_phyi rabs rnams kyi don ched duH: gsum pa'i dbang gi lag len las:_'khrugs sdeb sa bcad bstan par bya: dang po gsang ba'i dbang bskur 'di la don gsum ste:_mdor bstan pa dang : rgyas par bshad pa'o:_dang po la gsum ste:_klad kyi chags can 'jug phyir don dang : gzhung gi don dang :_mjug gi don no:_dang po klad kyi don rgyas par bshad pa la drug ste:_phyag 'tshal rigs kyi DAk+ki ba dang :_snod rigs ldan bstan pa dang : mtshan Dik+ki snying tig bstan pa dang :_don ched chags can 'jug phyir bstan pa dang : bstan bcos mdzad pa po o rgyan pad+mas bstan pa dang :_smon lam gyis mjug las can gcig bsdu ba'o: gzhung gi don la gsang dbang gnyis te:_mdor bstan pa dang :_rgyas par bshad pa'o:_dang po la gsum:_klad dang :_gzhung :_mjug go:_dang po klad kyi don rgyas par bshad pa la brgyad de:_dang po bum dbang tshar rjes skabs bstan pa dang :_lho'i phyogs dang :_dus srod kyi dang :_rdzas bsags pa bdud rtsi lnga dang phyag rgya dang_ :_slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pa_bsten pa dang :_gser gyi maN+Dal dang : rig ma dbul bla ma la dbang zhu ba'i phyir zhing gsol ba gdab pa'o: gzhung dngos la gnyis te:_mdoRa bstan pa dang :_rgyas par bshad pa'o:_dang po mdor bstan pa la bdun te:_sgom pa mchod bstod rim pa dang :_slob mas bya ba'i rim pa dang :_slob ma la dam tshig dbog pa dang : ye shes dbab pa dang :_lus rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du ngo sprad pa dang :_yum gyi byang sems dbab pa dang :_dbang bskur ba'o:_gzhung rgyas par bshad pa dang po la gsum ste:_mngon rtogs DAk+ki'i bsgoms pa dang :_gsol ba bla ma la gdab pa dang :_mchod pa bya ba'o:_bla ma yi dam DAk+ki la gnyis pa slob mas bya ba'i rim pa la gsum ste:_me tog bla ma yab yum la dor ba dang :_phyag 'tshal ba la bla ma yab yum dang :_bskor ba bla ma khab yum la bya ba'o: gsum pa la dam tshig phog pa gnyis te:_bla masadabog pa dang :_slob mas dam tshig bsrung ba'o:_bzhi pa ye shes dbab pa la lnga ste:_gdong ras kyis bcings pa dang :_dmigs pa kye ma bslab pa dang :_dbab pha gsol ba gdab dngos dang :_phebs pa'i bde stong rtags ngos bzung ba'o:_ye shes lnga pa la gsum ste:_dpe don lam dbang dus ngo sprad pa dang :_ye nas 'khor \u0f8b lnga dang gnas pa bstan pa dang : pa dang :_lha ngo bstan pa'o:_drug pa yum gyi byang semasal bzhi ste:_yum dang mkha' baM las pad+ma gsang byin gyis brlab pa dang :_yab hUM las dang rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa dang :_mchod cing bde bas dngas ma dbab pa dang :_byang sems b+ha ga nas me long gis blang ba'o:_bdun pa la'ang bzhi ste:_bdud rtsi mngar gsum daT+Thulce la bzhag pa dang :_rdo rje'i tshig ce gis bskul ba dang :_ting nge 'dzin dbu ma bsgom pa dang :_don ngos bde stong gi bzung ste bsgom pa'o: mjug gi don la gnyis te:_don mdor bstan pa dang :_rgyas par bshad pa'o:_bsdus pa'i don la gnyis te:_yon tan dang mdor bstazha 'bras bu'o:_rgyas par bshad pa la dgu ste:_sgrib pa gang gagi dag pa dang :_ngag gi sngagasanus pa dang ldan pa dang :_brten bya sha lnga bdud rtsi wa gang brten pa dang :_gang rjes su bskyed rdzogs gnang ba dang :_sa gang dgu gnon pa dang :_phrin las dbang gi gang 'grub pa dang :_'bras bu gang longs spyod rdzogs spu thob pa dang :_smon lam las can la gdab pa'o:_gsang dbang gnad kyi sa ma 'grel:_bdag 'dra o rgyan pad+ma yis:_ma 'ongs go ba sla phyir bkod:_las can cig dang 'phrad par shog:_sa ya ya: rgya_rgya_rgya @#/_/shes rab ye shes kyi sa ma 'grel bzhugs so: _gnyis pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba 'di la gnyis te:_mdor bstan pa dang :_rgyas par bshad pa'o:_mdor bstan pa la gsum ste:_klad kyi don dang :_gzhung gi don dang :_mjug gi don no:_dang po klad kyi don rgyas par bshad pa la bcu ste:_snod dang las ldan mtshan shes rab ye shes dang :_lung dang klong gsal dgos sdig sgrib ched dang :_nub+hU phyogs dang :_dus rbod dang :_rdza sa phyag rgya dang :_bskur bla mas bya dang :_maN+Dal slob mas dang : gsol ba kye kye bcom ldan 'das gdab pa'o: gzhung dngos la gnyis te:_mdor bstan pa dang :_rgyas par bshad pa'o:_mdor bstan pa la bdun te:_bla mas dam tshig dbog pa dang :_slob mas khas blang ba dang :_ye shes dbab pa dang :_yum gyi b+ha ga rgyal ba'i ye shes 'byung gnas su bstan pa dang :_phyag rgya slob ma la gtad pa dang :_ting nge 'dzin sgom du gzhug pa dang :_ye shes ngos bzung ba'o:_rgyas par bshad pa dang po dam tshig la don gnyis te:_dam tshig dbog pa dngos shes rab ye shes dang : bsrung bar shi'am srog la bab kyang khas blang pa'o: gnyis pa la bzhi leshes dbab pa ste:_gdong g.yogs daRa Ram Ras bcings dang :_lus gnad langasate bstan pa dang :_bla mas ga mor bsgom pa dang :_slob ma la phag mor dbog pa'o:_gsum pa la yum gyi b+ha ga rgyal ba'i gnas su ngo sprad pa bzhi ste: yum la bskor ba'i phyag 'tshal ba dang :_b+ha ga lung gis gsang ba zab mo gtan la dbab pa dang :_de la gus pa phyag dang bya ba dang :_yum gyis hU~M yi brjod par bya ba'o:_bzhi pa la phyag rgya ma dang slol malnga ste:_rig ma bzung rdordzeslobaste dam tshig gtad pa dang :_yum lhar bskyed phag mo khyod nyid med pa dang :_phung khams dpa' bo DAk+kir byin gyis brlab pa dang :_mkha' gsang rdordze byin gyis brlab pa dang :_dbang po sbyar nas bde ba aHma gyi pad+ma bskyed pa'o:_lnga pa la ting 'dzin bsgom pa gsum ste:_bde ba bzung zhing cho snyam bsrung ba dang :_bde ba spaRa ba stong paRalal sadang :_bde nga gi der 'dzin bdon lta ba'o:_drug pa la sems dang ye shes ngos gsum ste:_ye shes kyi gnyis shor dus bzung ba dang :_ye shes de nyid dngos su lhan cigaskyes pa'i myong ba dang : ma zin bar yang yang du bsrar ba'o: da mjug gi don la gnyis te:_mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bshad pa'o:_bsdus pa'i don la gnyis te:_yon tan dang 'bras bu bu'o:_rgyas par bshad pa la bdun te:_sgrib nga da ci gang dag pa dang :_gang nus pa yid dang ldan pa dang :_brten bya gang phyag rgya brten pa dang :_sa ca gang non pa dang :_phrin las rgyas pa'i gang 'grub pa dang :_'bras bu skyemed gang thob pa dang :_smon lam gang gis thugs kyi mjug bsdu ba'o:_shes rab ye shes sa ma 'grel:_rjes 'jug go ba gsal ba'i phyir:_o rgyan pad+ma bdag 'dras bkod:_las can cig dang 'phrad par shog:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_rdzogs so:_: @#/_/tshig dbang gi sa ma 'grel bzhugs so: gsum pa tshig dbang rin po che 'di la gnyis te:_mdor bstan pa dang :_rgyas par bshad pa'o:_mdor bstan pa la gsum ste:_klad kyi don dang :_gzhung gi don dang :_mjug gi don no:_dang po klad kyi don rgyas par bshad pa la bcu ste:_snod de nasadang :_mtshan bzhi pa'i dang :_lung dang klongagasal las dus tho rangs dang :_spyod lam slob dbon yab um dang :_phyogs nub dang :_rdzas dang me long tshang gi rig ma cho ga mchod bstod dang :_bla ma yi dam bskyed pa nas gsol ba gdab pa lan maN+Dal gser rtsi dang :_me tog dbul ba dang :_kye bla ma gsol ba gdab pa'o:_gzhung dngos la gnyis te:_mdor bstan pa dang :_rgyas par bshad pa'o:_mdor bstan pa la lnga ste:_bla mas dam tshig dbog pa dang :_ye shes dbab pa dang :_gnas sa: 'gro sa:_byung sa btsal ba dang :_tshogs drug ngo boRa sdud pa dang :_dug tshogs chos skur ngo sprad pa'o: rgyas par bshad pa dang po la gnyis te dam tshig 'bogs pa te:_dam tshig dbog pa dngos zung du med dang :_bsrung bar khas slob mablang pa'o: gnyis pa la ye shes dbab bzhi ste:_lus rnam snang gnad bca' ba dang : dmigs pa g.yung drung bslab pa dang :_ye shes byin rlabs dbab pa dngos dang : phebs pa de'i ngang la dang :_don ngo sprad pa'o:_gsum pa la tshogs drug ngo bor sdud pa la brgyad de:_dang po sems kyi gnas sa la de'i khang du klod ngo sprad pa dang :_'gro sa la dmigs rtse shar gyi ngo sprad pa dang :_byung sa la sems 'di dang po ngo sprad pa dang : gzugs la rgyal ba'i sku ngo sprad pa dang :_sgra la Dakhrilango sprad pa dang :_dri la spos dang ngo sprad pa dang :_ro la charar ngo sprad pa dang :_reg bya 'jam rtsubal ngo sprad pa dang : bde sdug la:dgango sprad pa'o:_bzhi pa la gsum ste:_dang po dug lnga rang sems rang grol du ngo sprad pa dang :_dug gsum rang sems sku gsum:_lung mu tig phreng ba gis gtan la dbab pa'o: da mjug gi don la gnyis te:_mdoRa bstan pa dang :_rgyas par bshad pa'o:_dang po la gnyis te:_yon tan dang 'bras bu'o:_rgyas par bshad pa la brgyad de:_sgrib pa lus ngag yid kyi gang 'dags pa dang :_gang nus pa gsumaka dang ldan pa dang :_brten bya gang brten gang R+kang pa dang :_rjes su gang thabs shes snang ba dang :_sa gang bcu gciganon pa dang :_phrin las zhi kaHgang 'grub pa dang :_smon lam lasacan gang gis mjug bsdu ba'o:_tshig dbang rin chen sa ma 'grel:_ma 'ongs blo dman don gsal phyir:_bdag 'dra o rgyan pad+mas bkod:_las can cig dang 'phrad par shog:_sku gsung thugs kyi rgya yod do: sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_a~M:_(pa)_med gzhung du tshang yod/

[5.12 bde gshegs rigs lnga'i mchod 'bum]

@#/_/bde gshegs rigs lnga'i mchod 'bum bzhugs so:_: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo:_bsod nams tshogs chen myur rdzogs phyir:_bde gshegs rigs lnga'i mchod 'bum bri:_de yang klong gsal rgyud dag las:_sangs rgyas rigs lnga kun 'dus gtso:_rang rig bla ma kun tu bzang :_phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod 'bum ni:_de yi bsod nams brjod mi lang :_mchod 'bum 'di la spyi don bcu:_dang po bka' bsgo ba dang gcig:_mtshams bcad pa dang gnyis:_phyag rgya bzung ba dang gsum: byin gyis rlob pa dang bzhi:_spyan drang ba dang lnga:_bzhugs su gsol ba dang drug:_phyag 'tshal ba dang bdun:_mchod pa 'bul ba dang brgyad:_bstod pa bya ba dang dgu:_bshags pa bya ba dang bcu'o:_rgya rgya rgya: dang po bgegs la bka' bsgo ni:_'di skad do:_hUM nga ni kun bzang rigs lnga'i gtso:_dus gsum sangs rgyas kun mchod kyi:_mchod pa'i mdangs 'phrog bar gcod bgegs:_'di ru ma gnas gzhan du dengs:_hUM hA~M u tsa ta ya hA~M phaT:_ces brjod:_bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o:_de nas bgegs mtshams bcad pa ni:_rab 'jigs khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis:_hUM nga ni khro rgyal 'dus pa'i sku:_dpal chen bdud 'dul rdo rje 'chang :_sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur nas:_gdug pa 'dul bar rab bsngags pa:_me ri mtshon cha rdo rje'i rwa:_khro tshogs 'bar bas mtshams bcad do:_raM hU~M hU~M ng+hi ha raM badzra rak+Sha phaT:_ces mtshams bcad do:_de nas phyag rgya bzung ba ni:_lag tu rdo rje dril bu bzung la:_hU~M thabs shes zung 'jug chos nyid mtshon:_'das dus 'gro rnams sad pa'i phyir:_rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu gsil:_badzra d+harmA hU~M AAH_de nas mchod pa byin gyis rlob pa ni:_swa b+ha wa'i sngags kyis rdzas rnams bsangs:_oM AHbadzra puSh+pahU~M:_o~M AHbadzra d+huSh+pa hU~M:_A lo ke g+han+te ne be te oM AHbadzra shab+ta hUM:_zhes brjod cing byin gyis brlab par bya:_de nas gzhal yas khang bskyed pa ni:_mngon rtogs bzhin du bskyed la:_spyan drang ba 'di skad do:_hUM dus gsum bla ma kun bzang chos kyi sku:_nyon mongs lta dag phung po gnas gyur pa'i:_sku gsum lnga ldan rigs lnga yab yum tshogs:_'gro ba'i don du gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol:_oM gu ru huM traM hrI A:_badzra aM gu sha dza:_zhes pas thibs kyis byon par bsam:_de nas bzhugs su gsol ba ni:_hUM sgyu ma chu zla ye shes gzhal yas khang :_skyon bral pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs:_oM ma pad+ma sUr+ya tsan+d+ra ka ma le hUM:_de nas phyag 'tshal ba ni:_hU~M sku gsum mi 'gyur kun tu bzang :_bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo:_chos nyid don la g.yo ba mi mnga' yang :_longs sku 'ja' tshon lta bus 'gro don mdzad:_thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes paH: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo:_de nas mchod pa 'bul ba ni:_hUM srid par gtogs pa'i me tog sna tshogs rigs:_dkar ser dmar ljang mthing kha'i mdangs ldan pa'i:_mdzes ldan dri zhim me tog ji snyed rnams: bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul:_snang stong 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol:_oM a badzra puSh+pa hU~M:_hU~M srid paRa gtogs pa'i bdug spos ji snyed rnams:_tsan+dan du ru ka dang a ka ru la sogs:_dri zhim bsung ldan bdug spos ji snyed rnams:_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul:_rig stong 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol:_o~M A badzra d+ha pe hU~M:_hA~M srid par gtogs pa'i snang gsal ji snyed rnams:_'bru maRa rtsi maRa la sogs rtswa shing 'od kyi mdangs:_dkar gsal mdangs chen snang gsal ji snyed rnams:_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul:_gsal stong 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol:_oM A badzra A lo ke hA~M:_hUM srid par gtogs pa'i dri chab bde ba'i mchog:_tsan+dan gurgum si la lde gu sogs:_rang byung sbyar ba'i byug pa bde byed rnams:_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul:_bde stong 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol:_oM A badzra g+haN+The huM:_hUM srid par gtogs pa'i zhal zas ji snyed pa:[·]rang byung lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba'i zas:_g.yos mchog gtsang ma'i zhal zas sna tshogs rnams:_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul:_bde stong 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol:_oM A badzra ni be te hU~M hUM srid par gtogs pa'i rol mo sna tshogs rigs:_rnga dung d+ha ting g.yer kha dril bu rdza rnga sogs:_'byung ba'i rang sgra glu gar rol mo'i dbyangs:_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khoRa lha la 'bul:_grags stong 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol:_oM A badzra shab+ta hU~M:_de nas nang mchod 'bul ba ni:_hUM snod bcud snang srid sna tshogs yid 'ong gzugs:_rdo rje gzugs ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te:_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul:_thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol:_oM A badzra rU pa pra ti dza hUM:_hUM snod bcud snang srid yid du 'ong ba'i sgra:_rdo rje sgra ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te:_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul:_thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol:_oM A badzra shab+ta hU~M:_hUM snod bcud snang srid yid 'ong dri zhim spos:_rdo rje dri ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te:_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khoRa lha la 'bul:_thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol:_o~M A badzra g+haN+Ne hUM:_hUM snod bcud snang srid ro brgya ldan pa'i zas:_rdo rje ro ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te:_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul:_thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol:_oM A badzra nai be te hA~M:_hUM snod bcud snang srid dbang du bde ba'i reg:_rdo rje reg ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te:_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul:_thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol:_oM A badzra spar she hUM:_de nas gsang mchod 'bul ba ni:_hwa gsang mchod sku yi bde chen rig ma ni:_sku mdog dkar mdzes me long pad+ma bsnams:_gsang mchod bde ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol:[ \u0f00] A badzra a daRa she hA~M:_hU~M gsang mchod gsung gi bde chen rig ma ni:_sku mdog dmar mdzes rnga zlum sgra sgrog maH: gsang mchod bde ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol:_oM A badzra mu ra dze hUM:_hU~M gsang mchod thugs kyi bde chen rig ma ni:_sku mdog mthing mdzes pi wang sgra sgrog ma:_gsang mchod bde ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol:_oM A badzra byi ni hU~M:_hU~M gsang mchod yon tan bde chen rig ma ni:_sku mdog ser mdzes gling bu'i sgra sgrog ma:gsang mchod bde ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol:_oM A badzra waM se hU~M:_hU~M gsang mchod phrin las bde chen rig ma ni:_sku mdog ljang mdzes rdza rnga'i sgra sgrog ma:_gsang mchod bde ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol:_o~M A badzra mi d+he ke hU~M:_zhes gsang mchod 'bul lo:_de nas bstod pa bya ba ni:_hUM bla ma kun bzang thig le'i sku:_nyag gcig mtha' bral lu gu rgyud:_cir mi dgongs la phyag 'tshal bstod:_hUM zhe sdang rnam shes rang grol dbyings:_me long ye shes dkaRa gsal sku:_chu khams rnam dag yab yum rol:_mi bskyod yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod:_hUM 'dod chags 'du shes rnam dag dbyings:_sor rtogs ye shes dmaRa gsal sku:_me khams rnam dag yab yum rol:_snang mtha' yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod:_hUM gti mug gzugs khams rang grol dbyings:_chos dbyings ye shes mthing gsal sku:_nam mkha' rnam dag yab yum rol:_rnam snang yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod:_hwa nga rgyal tshor ba rnam dag dbyings:_mnyam nyid ye shes ser gsal sku:_sa khams rnam dag yab yum rol:_rin 'byung yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod:_hUM phrag dog 'du byed rnam dbyings:_bya grub ye shes ljang gsal sku:_rlung khams rnam dag yab yum rol:_don grub yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod:_hUM ma 'gags rig rtsal sgo ma bzhi:_dkaRa seRa dmar ljang rigs kyi mdog:_lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu 'dzin: phrin las mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod:_ces pa dang :_hUM bla ma kun bzang rigs lnga ni:_gsal 'tsheRa lhun sdug gzi brjid 'phro:_mnyen lcugs 'khril ldem sgeg bzhad ldan:_ye shes rang mdangs phyi nang med:_rigs lnga yab yum sku la bstod:_snyan ting 'ur chom rang byung sgra:_grags stong dbyer med kun la khyab:_rigs lnga yab yum gsung la bstod:_ye shes thig le lu gu rgyud:_rig stong mtha' bral rang byung gsal:_rigs lnga yab yum thugs la bstod:_bde stong ye shes kun khyab dbyings:_sdug bsngal rang grol bde ba rgyas:_rigs lnga yab yum yon tan phyag 'tshal bstod:_rig mdangs stong gsal kun la shar:_ma 'gags rtsal rdzogs phrin las mdzad:_rigs lnga yab yum phrin las phyag 'tshal bstod:_ces pa dang :_bstod pa gzhan bya'o:_de nas bshags pa bya ba ni:_gnong 'gyod sems kyis thal mo sbyar: hUM bla ma kun bzang Rigs lnga sogs:_yi dam Dak+ki chos skyong dgongs: bdag cag ma rig dbang gis su:_sku gsung thugs dang yan lag sogs: dam tshig nyams par gyur pa kun:_mi 'chab mi sbed mthol lo bshags: klong yangs ngang du bzod par bzhes:_zhes pas yi ge brgya pa brjod do:_de nas skabs la bab na lha gshegs:_bsngo ba dang smon lam:_bkra shis la sogs pa bya'o:_bde gshegs rigs lnga'i mchod 'bul 'di:_phyi rabs bsod nams bsags phyiRa bkod:_las can cig dang 'phrad par shog:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_hrIH: @#/_/rigs lnga'i gtor ma'i lag len bzhugs so: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro chos skyong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo:_gtor ma 'bul ba'i rim pa ni:_snod thod pa'am rat+nar gtor ma 'bru lnga la sogs pa las byas te:_rgyan du dkar dmaRa dang spod sna tshogs pas bran la:_ci 'byor du bshams te:_swa b+hA was stong par sbyangs:_gtor ma'i 'og du yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor:_de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor:_de'i steng du kaM las mi mgo'i skyed po gsum:_de'i steng du a las thod pa dkar po yangs shing rgya che ba'i nang du:_gtor ma sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin de'i steng du a las zla ba'i kha bkab:_dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa la oM A hU~M oM hU~M traM hrIHA:_sngags de rnams kyis mtshan pa zhig bsam:_de nas bdag yi dam lha'i thugs ka nas sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas yaM la phog pas rlung g.yos:_rlung gis me sbar:_mes thod pa'i bdud rtsi khol nas rlangs pa sku gsung thugs dang rigs lnga'i sa bon la phog pas rigs lnga yab yum du gyur nas snyoms 'jug mdzad pa'i byang sems dkar dmar:_zla ba'i kha bkab rdo rje dang bcas pa bdud rtsir zhu nas thod pa'i bdud rtsi dang gnyis su med par bsam:_de nas ngag tu yi ge gsum dang lnga pa brjod pas:de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang bla ma yi dam DAk+ki chos skyong rnams:_snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang sems dkar dmar babs pas:_ye shes kyi bdud rtsi ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa stong gsum 'jig rte gyi khams thams cad gang bar bsam:_de dag las 'od zer 'phros pas sems can gyi don byas:_slar mgron thams cad mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs nas mchod par bsam zhing :_ngag tu \u0f00 AHhU~M: kun bzang yab yum chos kyi sku:_longs sku zhi khro rab 'byams tshogs:_sprul sku pad+ma thod phreng rtsal:_bka' brgyud bla ma gshegs su gsol:_sku gsum dbyer med rigs lnga'i tshogs:_yab yum 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol: yi dam lha tshogs ma lus dang :_dpa' bo DAk+ki chos skyong bcas:_dam can bka' yi srung ma rnams:_ma lus 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol:_b+ha li brgyan gyi mchod pa 'bul:_bzhes shig rol cig kha raM khA hi:_bla ma'i tshogs rnams mchod pa bzhes:_yi dam tshogs rnams mchod pa bzhes:_DAk+ki'i tshogs rnams mchod pa bzhes:_chos skyong tshogs rnams mchod pa bzhes: dam can srung ma'i tshogs rnams mchod pa bzhes:_lha srin sde brgyad tshogs rnams mchod pa bzhes:_yul lha gter bdag tshogs rnams mchod pa bzhes: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub zhu:_rkyen ngan bar chad bzlog tu gsol:_zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag:_dgug bskrad mnan gzir phrin las mdzod: oM AHhU~M oM hU~M traM hrIHAH_oM gu ru d+he wa DAk+ki ni:_pad+ma DAk+ki ni:_i daM b+ha wiM ta hU~M h+'a kha kha khA hi khA hi:_e yaM raM baM laM:_ha ri ni sa:_rA tsa hrIH ya:_mahA kA*la:_ma mar ka mo:_ya ma ra tsa:_du tri phu tri i daM b+ha lid+ha kha kha khA hi khA hi:_zhes pa dang :_rang rang gang byed thams cad la:_rtsa sngags kyis lan gsum mam bdun gyis 'bul lo:_phyi gtor thams cad gzhan dang mthun no:_gtor ma'i lag len rdzogs so:_ai:_rigs lnga'i tshogs mchod bzhugs so: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo:_bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen bags pa dang :_bar chod bsal dang dngos grub 'byung phyir du:_tshogs kyi mchod pa'i cho ga bstan par bya:_de yag klong gsal rgyud dag las: tshogs med gang yang 'grub mi 'gyur:_ces pas:_cho ga'i bye brag la spyi don bzhi ste:_dang po tshogs kyi bye brag sha chang la sogs pa'i zas sna dang yo byad dpag tu med pa bshams la swa b+hA wa'i chus bsangs te:_tshogs kyi dngos po'i dri ma sbyang ba ni:_hU~M rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyi:_chos rnams sgyu mar rig pa'i phyir:_dngos dang dngos 'dzin bag chags rnams:_'byung ba me chu rlung gsum gyis:_bag chags bsreg sbyang gtor ba'i phyir:_raM yaM khaM las 'od 'phros pasaH:_me yis bsreg dang chu yis bshal:_rlung gis gtor bas thams cad dag:_raM yaM khaM:_zhes lan gsum brjod pas thams cad dag par bsam mo:_de nas byin gyis brlab pa ni:[ \u0f00] AHhU~M:[ \u0f00] hU~M traM hrIHAH:_yi ge gsum dang lnga pa tshogs kyi nang du 'phros pas tshogs ye shes kyi bdud rtsiRa zhu bar bsam zhing :[ \u0f00] AHhU~MhUM chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin las: zhal zas tshogs kyi dngos po yi ge au:_oM dkar sgra dang bcas pa yis: tshogs kyang ye shes bdud rtsiRa zhu:_chos dbyings ye shes dkyil 'khor 'dir:_rnam snang yab yum 'khor bcas gshegs:_me long ye shes rang bzhin las:_zhal zas tshogs kyi dngos po yi ge hU~M:_hU~M sngon sgra dang bcas pa yis:_tshogs kyang ye shes bdud rtsiRa zhu:_me long ye shes dkyil 'khor 'dir:_mi bskyod yab yum 'khor bcas gshegs:_mnyam nyid ye shes rang bzhin las:_zhal zas tshogs kyi dngos po yi ge traM:_tAM ser sgra dang bcas pa yis:_tshogs kyang ye shes bdud rtsir zhu:_mnyam nyid ye shes dkyil 'khor 'dir:_rin 'byung yab yum 'khor bcas gshegs:_sor rtogs ye shes rang bzhin las:_zhal zas tshogs kyi dngos po yi ge hrIH:_hrI dmar sgra dang bcas pa yis:_tshogs kyang ye shes bdud rtsir zhu:_soRa rtogs ye shes dkyil 'khor 'dir:_snang mtha' yab yum 'khor bcas gshegs:_nan tan ye shes rang bzhin las:_zhal zas tshogs kyi dngos po yi ge AH:_A ljang sgra dang bcas pa yis:_tshogs kyang ye shes bdud rtsir zhu:_bya grub ye shes dkyil 'khor 'dir:_don grub yab yum 'khor bcas gshegs:_bla ma kun bzang yab yum dang :_rig 'dzin yab yum brgyud par bcas:_o rgyan pad+ma yab yum dang :_sangs rgyas byang sems yi dam lha:_zhi khro khrag 'thung DAk+ki'i tshogs:_chos skyong lha srin 'khor dang bcas:_gzhi bdag dkaRa phyogs theg chen rigs:_thams cad yab yum 'khor dang bcas:_longs spyod tshogs la spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol:_ces tshogs byin gyis brlabs shing yul spyan drangs pa'o:_de nas tshogs mchod cing bstab pa dang bshags shing dngos grub zhu ba ni:_oM AHhU~M:[ \u0f00] hU~M traM hrIHAH:_kun bzang yab yum chos kyi sku:_longs sku zhi khro rab 'byams tshogs:_sprul sku rig 'dzin mkha' spyod bzhugs:_tshogs kyi mchod 'bul dngos grub zhu:_thugs dam gnyan skong nyams pa bshags:_mchog dang thun mong dngos grub zhu:_rkyen ngan bar chad bzlog tu gsol:_rigs lnga yab yum yi dam tshogs:_DAk+ki da pa' bo dam can rnams:_rgyal chen rigs bzhi phyogs skyong bcu:_snang srid lha srin bstan mar bcas:_yul lha gzhi bdag dkar phyogs rnams:_tshogs kyi mchod 'bul dngos grub zhu:_thugs dam gnyan skong nyams chag bshags: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub zhu:_rkyen ngan bar chad bzlog tu gsol: ces brjod cing tshogs mchod tshar ba'i rjes la:_oM AHhU~M_gu ru d+hak+ki ni oM hU~M traM hrIHhrI:_AH_baM laM raM yaM:_e ha ri ni sa ra tsa hrIH ya shrI ma hA kA la ma ma rak+mo ya ma ra tsa du tri phu tri ga Na tsakra pu tsa kha la bA hi khA hi:_ma hwa su ra khA hi_ma hA maM sa khA hi:_ma hA rak+ta khA hi:_ma hA tsit+ta khA hi_ma hA go ro tsa na khA hi:_ma hA ki ni ri ti khA hi:_ma hA ba su ta khA hi:_ma hA ba liM ta khA hi:_si ti h+'u~M:_zhes rol mo dang bcas pas 'bul lo:_de nas tshogs gtor phul la rnal 'byor pho mo dgongs pa dang ldan pas tshogs la rol bar bya'o:_lhag chog gzhan dang mthun no:_rgya rgya rgya:_rang bzhin lha yi dkyil 'khor la:_mchod phyiRa tshogs kyi las rim 'di:_bsod nams tshogs chen bsags phyir bkod: las can cig dang 'phrad par shog:_kun kyang bsod nams tshogs rdzogs nas:_theg chen sa la 'khod par shog:_tshogs kyi lag len bsdus pa'o:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_s+thau

[5.13 mkha' 'gro'i las byang tshogs mchod rtsar phreng]

@#/_/mkha' 'gro'i las byang tshogs mchod rtsar phreng bzhugs so: 'di legs pa rang gcig gda'o: thayaa_rigs kyi DAk+ki lnga la phyag 'tshal lo:_bdag 'dra pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis:_rigs kyi ma mo mkha' 'gro yi:_las byang tshogs mchod rim pa bri: 'di la spyi don bcu bzhi ste:_dang po bgegs gtor sbyin nas ni: bka' bsgo mtshams gcod rim pa ni:_rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis:_hUM nyon cig bgegs dang logs 'dren tshogs:_lus ngag yid la gnod pa'i bgegs:_bar chad 'byung po thams cad kun:_'di ru ma gnas gzhan du dengs:_hA~M nga ni dpal chen rta mgrin rgyal:_rdo rje 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i sku:_sku gsum nyid kyang 'joms par byed:_nga yi bka' las 'das gyur na: thal ba'i rdul bzhin brlag par 'gyur:_oM shrI badzra h+ya g+hi wa ra tsa hrI ya ha ri ni sa rak+Sha u tsa ta ya hU~M phaT:_de nas mtshams bcad pa ni:_hUM rab 'jigs phra men khro mo'i skas+k+'a:_badzra sing ha seng ge'i gdong :_badzra bya kri stag gdong ma: mthing nag mtshon cha me 'od 'phro:_gti mug dbang bsgyur las mkhan ma: steng 'og dgra bgegs mtshams tshod cig:_hUM rab 'jigs phra men khro mo'i sku:_ka ka mu kha bya rog gdong :_dkar gsal mtshon cha me 'od 'phro:_zhe sdang dbang bsgyur las mkhan ma:_shar sgo'i dgra bgegs mtshams chod cig:_hUM rab 'jigs phra men khro mo'i ska_hu lu mu kha 'ug gdong ma:_ljang nag mtshon cha me 'od 'phro:_phrag dog dbang bsgyur las mkhan ma:_byang sgo'i dgra bgegs mtshams chod cig:_hUM rab 'jigs phra men khro mo'i sku:_shwa na mu kha khyi gdong maH:_dmar nag mtshon cha me 'od 'phro:_'dod chags dbang bsgyur las mkhan ma:_nub sgo'i dgra bgegs mtshams chod cig:_hUM rab 'jigs phra men khro mo'i sku:_su ra ke seng phag gdong ma:_ser nag mtshon cha me 'od 'phro:_nga rgyal dbang bsgyur las mkhan ma:_lho sgo'i dgra bgegs mtshams chod cig:_ces mtshams bcad:_sum b+ha ni bzlas so:_de nas spyan drang pa ni:_hU~M chos dbyings gsal mdangs klong dkyil nas:_rig 'dzin brgyud pa gshegs su gsol:_sku dang zhing khams gzhal yas nas:_yi dam lha tshogs gshegs su gsol:_snang stong thig le'i gzhal yas nas:_rta mgrin yab yum gshegs su gsol:_rtse mo rnam bkod bde ba'i zhing :_sum brgya drug cu'i gzhal yas nas:_rdo rje DAk+ki yab yum rnams:_sum brgya drug cu gshegs su gsol:_mgrin pa ro 'dus longs spyod zhing :_bcu drug bkod pa'i gzhal yas nas:_rin chen DAk+ki yab yum rnams:_bcu drug ma lus gshegs su gsol:_dran pa rnam bkod chos kyi zhing :_sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhal yas nas:_sangs rgyas DAk+ki yab yum rnams:_sum cu rtsa gnyis gshegs su gsol:_skyed byed drug cu sprul pa'i zhing :_drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gzhal yas nas:_pad+ma DAk+ki yab yum rnams:_drug cu rtsa bzhi gshegs su gsol:_myong byed rnam bkod bde ba'i zhing :_nyi shu rtsa brgyad gzhal nas:_las kyi DAk+ki yab yum ni:_nyi shu rtsa brgyad gshegs su gsol:_rtsa khams rang bzhin gnas pa'i zhing :_bkod pa lus kyi gzhal yas nas: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro bye ba stong :_ma lus 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol: de dag kun gyi bka' 'khor na:_phyogs skyong zhing skyong klu chen brgyad:_stong gsum 'jig rten khams dag na:_gnas bzhugs rigs bsdus ma sring tshogs:_'khor dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol:[ \u0f00] AHhU~M gu ru d+he wa DAk+ki ni ha ri ni sa ra tsa hrIH_ya sa ma ya bi shwa lo ka DAk+ki ni sa ma ya dzaHhU~M baM ho:_pho pho hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swAhA:_zhes spyan drang ngo :_de nas bzhugs su gsol ba ni: hri_ gnas lnga ye shes lhun grub dkyil 'khor du:_thabs shes nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su:_bla ma bde gshegs DAk+ki'i tshogs rnams bzhugs:_sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan:_de nas phyag btsal ba ni:_hUM dus gsum bla ma yi dam DAk+ki ma: chos nyid rnam dag gtso 'khor bcas pa la:_lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo:_zhes phyag bya'o: de nas mchod pa 'bul ba ni:_dang po phyi yi mchod pa la:_oM AHhU~M hrIH bla ma bde gshegs DAk+ki la:_phyi yi mchod pa 'bul ba ni:_mdzes pa'i me tog spyan la 'bul:_dri zhim bdug spos shangs la 'bul:_snang gsal mar me spyan la 'bul:_yid 'ong chab bsil thugs khaRa 'bul:_zhal zas mchog ljags la 'bul:_rol mo sna tshogs snyan la 'bul:_'gro ba'i don du mchod do bzhes:_de nas nang mchod 'bul ba ni:[ \u0f00] AHhU~M hrI:_bla ma bde gshegs DAk+ki la:_nang gi mchod pa 'bul ba ni:_dbang po rnam lnga'i me tog mchod:bsur chen dri yi bdug spos mchod:_zhun chen snang gsal mar me mchod:_rdo rje dri chu'i byug pas mchod:_bdud rtsi dri chen zhal zas mchod: rkang gling thod rnga dril bus mchod:_byang sems dkaRa dmaRa bdud rtsis mchod:_dug lnga ye shes lnga ru mchod:_dug gsum sku gsung thugs su mchod: snang srid phyag rgya bzhi ru mchod:_'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol:_de nas gsang mchod 'bul ba ni:[ \u0f00] AHhU~M hrIH:_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro la:_gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni:_yab yum gnyis med mkha' gsang las: 'khril sbyoRa byang chub sems kyis mchod:_bde ba'i ro snyoms mchod par bzhes:_sku lus rgyas phyir bzhes su gsol:_de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa ni: \u0f00 AHahA~M hrIH:_bla ma bde gshegs Dak+ki la:_ye shes mchod pa 'bul ba ni: bde gsal rig pa mi rtog snang :_snang ba sna tshogs thams cad kun:_bde stong gsal stong rig pa stong :_mi rtog snang ba rang bzhin stong :_ye shes lnga ldan ngang du bzhes:_de nas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa ni:_oM AHhUM hrI:_bla ma bde gshegs DAk+ki la:_bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni:_rtsa brgyad stong sbyaRa bdud rtsi a mr-i taH:_dug lnga gnas bskyur ye shes bsgrub pa'i rdzas:_ro mchog yon tan kun dang ldan pa 'di:_gsol lo mchod do 'gro ba'i don la bzhes: sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha raM khA hi:_de nas gtor ma'i mchod pa ni:_oM AHhU~M:_bla ma bde gshegs DAk+ki la:_gtor ma'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni:_zhal zas sna tshogs gtor chen la:_sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rgyan ldan:_dri mchog ro brgya ldan pa yi:_b+ha li rgyan can gtor ma 'bul:_'gro ba'i don phyir bzhes su gsol: de nas tshogs kyi mchod pa ni:ye shes mkha' 'gro yab yum gyi tshogs mchod 'di la bcur gnas pa las:_dang po phrin gdags pa ni:_ho gsan cing dgongs su gsol:_chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong dkyil nas:_'gro ba 'dul ba'i bcom ldan 'das dpal chen rta mgrin yab yum mkha' 'gro 'bu tsho yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa ma lus gsan cing dgongs su gsol: ces bya'o: de nas gnyis pa tshogs kyi dri ma sbyang ba ni:_tshogs la bsang chu gtor la:_swa b+hA wa'i sngags brjod:_hUM rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis:_chos rnams sgyu mar rig bya'i phyir:_dngos dang dngos 'dzin bag chags kun:_yi ge raM yaM khaM gsum gyis:_bsreg cing bkrus te gtor bar bya:_dag par ma gyur gang yang med:_raM khaM yaM:_swA hwa:_zhes brjod pas dag par bsam mo: oM AH hA~M hrIH:traM:_ye shes rnam lnga'i rang bzhin las:_zhal zas dngos po yi ge lnga:_yi ge sgra dang bcas pa yis:_tshogs kyang 'od du ltem gyis zhu:_'od phung 'bar ba'i byin rlabs kyis:_rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig:_ces byin gyis brlab bo: gsum pa yul spyan drang ba ni:_las byang gi spyan 'dren la:_longs spyod tshogs la spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol:_ces btags:_dbyangs rta snyan pos spyan drangs so: bzhi pa mchod cing bstab pa ni:_hU~M dus gsum bde gshegs yi dam lha:_dngos grub stsol ba'i dus la bab:_tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol:_rta mgrin yab yum gtso 'khor bcas:_dngos grub 'byung ba'i dus la bab:_tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol:_mkha' 'gro sde lnga yab yum gtso 'khor bcas:_dngos grub 'byung ba'i dus la bab:_tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol:_de sogs DAk+ki'i rigs gyur ma lus kun:_dngos grub stsol ba'i dus la bab:_tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol:_dam tshig sha za 'jig rten mkha' 'gro'i tshogasaH:_dngos grub 'byung ba'i dus la bab: tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol:_chos skyong pho rgyud mo rgyud thams cad kyang :_dngos grub stsol ba'i dus la bab:_tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol:_'jig rten snang srid lha 'dre thams cad kyang :_dngos grub stsol ba'i dus la bab:_tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol:_oM AHhU~M hrIHma hA ri ni sa ra tsa hI ya ma hA kA la ma ma rag mo ru tri ya ma ra tsa ga Na tsakra pu tsa khA hi:_ma hA tsit+ta khA hi:_ma hA rak+ta khA hi:_ma hA go ro tsa na khA hi:_ma hA ba su ta khA hi:_ma hwa ki ni ri ti khA hi:_ma hwa palcaa mr-i ta khA hi:_zhes lan bdun gyis 'bul lo: lnga pa tshogs kyis bskang ba ni:_hUM bskang ngo bskal ba'i thugs dam bskang :_tshogs gtor mchod pas thugs dam bskang :_dus gsum bla ma yi dam yang :_zhal zas tshogs gtoRa mchod pas thugs dam bskang :_lta spyod ting nge 'dzin gyis thugs dam bskang :_bdud rtsi Rak+ta dza gad thugs dam bskang :_glu gar sgrub pa dam tshig thugs dam bskang : kas dam bskang :_mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang gyur cig:_dpal chen khro rgyal rta mgrin yab yum yang : zhal zas tshogs gtor mchod pas thugs dam bskang :_lta spyod ting nge 'dzin gyi thugs dam bskang :_bdud rtsi Rak+ta dza gad thugs dam bskang :_glu gar sgrub pa dam tshig thugs dang bskang :_mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang gyur cig:_Dak+ki sde lnga yab yum 'khor bcas kyang :_zhal zas tshogs gtor mchod pas thugs dam bskang :_lta spyod ting nge 'dzin gyis thugs dam bskang : bdud rtsi rak+ta dza gad thugs dam bskang :_glu gar sgrub pa dam tshig thugs dang bskang :_mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang gyur cig:_snang srid mkha' 'gro ma lus thams cad kyang :_zhal zas tshogs gtoRa mchod pas thugs dam bskang :_lta spyod ting nge 'dzin gyis thugs dam bskang :_bdud rtsi rak+ta dza gad thugs dam bskang :_glu gar sgrub pa dam tshig thugs dam bskang : mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang gyur cig:_chos skyong srung ma ma lus 'khor bcas kyang :_zhal zas tshogs gtor mchod pas thugs dam bskang : lta spyod ting nge 'dzin gyis thugs dam bskang :_bdud rtsi rak+ta dza gad thugs dam bskang :_glu gar sgrub pa dam tshig thugs dam bskang :_mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang gyur cig:_snang srid lha 'dre ma lus 'khor bcas kyang :_zhal zas tshogs gtor mchod pas thugs dam bskang :_lta spyod ting nge 'dzin gyis thugs dam bskang :_bdud rtsi rak+ta dza gad thugs dam bskang : glu gar sgrub pa dam tshig thugs dam bskang :_mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang gyur cig:_ces bskang ngo : drug pa tshogs kyi bshags pa bya ba ni:_gong gi bshags bshags la la: bdag cag ma rig lus dang ngag sems kyis:_bag med tshul gyis dam las 'gal gyur pa:_zhal zas tshogs gtoRa mchod pas so soRa bshags:_zhes btags la bshags pa bya'o: bdun pa ling+ga bsgral ba ni:_tshogs phud tha ma la dgra bgegs kyi ling ga bcas la lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas:_a mu ka nr-i aM gu sha dzaH:_zhes pas yul gang yin gyi rnam par shes pa bkug la:_badzra pA sha hUM:_zhes zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bcings:_badzra spro Ta baM:_zhes pa lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas bsdams:_badzra g+han+Di ho:_zhes dril bu'i phyag rgyas gzugs dang rnam shes dbyer med du bsre'o:_de nas ngag tu:_hri ma ha ri ni sa ra tsa hrI ya badzra ki li kI la ya hUM phaT:_ces brjod pas bdag rta mgrin yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa stod gzhung dang mthun pa:_smad phur pa lcags sol mal nas bton pa lta bur bsam la 'di skad do:_hUM nga ni rta mgrin yab yum ste:_'khor du mkha' 'gro 'bum gyis bskor:_kun kyang mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs: dmar nag me yi mtshon cha 'phro:_khro bo'i gzugs kyis nam mkha' gang : stod ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa:_gnam lcags ngar ma'i phur pa 'dril: smad ni ye shes phur pa ste:_nam mkha'i mthongs nas 'dril zhing 'debs: drag por bsgyur ba'i phur pa ste:_btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyuraH:_gnod byed dgra bgegs smos ci dgos:_gzir ba tsam gyis rdul du rlog:_hUM nga ni dpal chen rta mgrin rgyal:_khro rgyal yab yum 'khoRa bcas rnams:_phyag gnyis gnam lcags phur pa 'dril:_rgya mdud rtse nas 'brug stong ldir:_chang bzung mtshams nas glog stong 'khyugs:_chu srin kha nas tsha tsha 'phro:_rtse mo mtshon cha 'od zer 'gyed:_dgra bgegs steng du mA ra ya:_a mu ka u tsa ta ya hU~M phaT:_ces chu srin rnam grol gyi phyag rgyas blang ngo : de nas brgyad pa bsgral ba dngos la drug las:_dang po lha dang dbye ba ni:_b+tso rna nyan chen po phra ma mkhan:_dngos grub 'phrog pa'i dgra dang bgegs:_gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams:_'go ba'i lha dang bral bar gyis:_rgye trag rU tra mA ra ya phaT: gnyis pa gzugs la dbab pa ni:_b+tso las mkhan chen mo'i dus la bab:_dngos grub 'phrog pa'i dgra dang bgegs:_gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams:_rnam shes srog la rnam par phob:_a mu ka a be sha ya hU~M phaT: gsum pa byad du gzhug pa ni:_b+h+yoH 'ching byed chen mo'i dus la bab: dngos grub 'phrog pa'i dgra dang bgegs:_gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams:_zung zhig sdoms shig rnam par chings:_a mu ka shri kri a na ya hUM phaT:_bzhi pa smyo ru gzhug pa ni:_b+h+yoH smyo byed chen mo'i dus la bab:_dngos grub 'phrog pa'i dgra dang bgegs:_gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams: lus ngag yid gsum smyos par gyis:_a mu ka dza la sa ma ya hU~M phaT:_lnga pa gtun du brdung pa ni:_b+h+yoH rdung byed chen mo'i dus la bab:_dngos grub 'phrog pa'i dgra dang bgegs:_gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams:_lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rdungs:_a mu ka b+hi na d+ha ya hU~M phaT: drug pa zhal phye ba ni:_b+h+yoH gdug pa sgrol mkhas DAk+ki yum gyi tshogasaH dgra bgegs sha ni zan bas zhim:_dgra bgegs khrag ni chang bas zhim: dgra bgegs rus pa mar bas bzhun:_dug gsum mchod pa 'bul ba'i phyir:_ma lus 'khor bcas zhal phyes shig: de nas bdun pa zhal du bstab pa ni:_b+ho dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i dus gsum mchod pa 'di:_dpal chen rta mgrin yab yum zhal du bstab: gsol cig rol cig kha raM khwa hi:_mkha' 'gro sde bzhi yab yum zhal du bstab:_gsol cig rol cig kha raM khA hi:_'khor gyi mkha' 'gro las mkhan zhal du bstab:_gsol cig rol cig kha raM khA hi:_chos skyong srung ma sde brgyad zhal du bstab:_gsol cig rol cig kha raM khA hi:_bsgral ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la:_sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub zhu:_rkyen dang bar chad bzlog tu gsol:_ma hA rU tra u tsa ta khwa hi:_ma hA maM sa khA hi:_rak+ta khA hi:_tsit+ta khA hi: go ro tsa na khA hi:_kiM ni ri ti khA hi:_ba su ta khA hi:_ma hA pany+dzu khA hi:_a mr-i ta khA hi:_b+ha liM ta khA hi:_zhes lan bdun gyis 'bul lo: bcu pa tshogs la rol cing lhag ma'i cho ga bya'o:_bstod pa bya ba ni mngon rtogs bzhin no:_de nas bshags pa bya ba ni:_hU~M dus gsum bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs:_dbang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol:_ye shes mkha' 'gro yab yum chos kyi ska:_ye nas bdag dang dbye ba med pa la: ma rig dbang gis snang stong gnyis su 'thas:_gnyis 'dzin the tshom log lta ci bgyis pa:_rang mdangs rig pa'i klong du mthol lo bshags:_bzod par bzhes nas tshangs pa'i dngos grub stsol:_hUM rdo rje DAk+ki yab yum gtso 'khor bcas:_sum brgya drug cu gsan cing dgongs su gsol:_lta ba ma rtogs log dang rtogs rdzus bta_kha lta bdud dbang song dang log par bltas: yid dpyod mtha' bral klong du mthol lo bshags:_bzod par bzhes nas tshangs pa'i dngos grub stsol:_hUM rin chen mkha' 'gro yab yum gtso 'khor bcas:_yab yum bcu drug gsan cing dgongs su gsol:_mnyam bzhag ting 'dzin don las g.yel gyur te:_ma gsal ma rig bskyed rdzogs don ma bsgoms:_gsal stong bde chen ngang du mthol lo bshags:_bzod par bzhes nas tshangs ba'i dngos grub stsol:_hUM pad+ma DAk+ki yab yum gtso 'khor bcas:_drug cu rtsa bzhi gsan cing dgongs su gsol:_dus la ma bab spyod pa chos dang 'gal:_ma rig dbang gi brtsog par ci spyad pa:_dmigs med shar grol klong du mthol lo bshags:_bzod par bzhes nas tshangs pa'i dngos grub stsol:_hUM sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yab yum gtso 'khor bcas: sum cu rtsa gnyis gsan cing dgongs su gsol:_yang dag don gyi gnas lugs ma shes te:_the tshom dbang gis 'bras bu'i don dang 'gal:_re dogs mtha' bral klong du mthol lo bshags:_bzod par bzhes nas tshangs pa'i dngos grub stsol:_hUM las kyi mkha' 'gro yab yum gtso 'khor bcas: nyi shu rtsa brgyad gsan cing dgongs su gsol:_phrin las rnam bzhi'i srung sdom don ma shes:_bya ba kun nas log pa ci bgyis pa:_kun mkhyen gsal ba'i klong du mthol lo bshags:_bzod par bzhes nas tshangs pa'i dngos grub stsol:_hUM kai rI ma brgyad seng ha phra men brgyad:_sgo ma bzhi dang dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad:_lang ka brgyad dang ma bdun sring mo bzhi:_ging chen bco brgyad pho nya drug cu bzhi:_bstan ma lo ka las la grub pa sogs:_kun gyi thugs dang 'gal gyur ci mchisapa:_phyi nang gsang ba bdud rtsi gtor tshogs dang :_lta sgom spyod pa ting 'dzin thugs dam bskang :_thugs dam gnyan skong nyams bshags dngos grub zhu:_bdag gis bcol ba'i phrin las bsgrub tu gsol:_ces yi ge brgya pa bzlas so:_de nas phyi nang gi mkha' 'gro ma la phrin las bskul ba ni:_b+tso chos dbyings 'gyur med bde chen klong :_sna tshogs sprul pa 'gro ba'i zhing :_stong gsal longs spyod DAk+ki ma:_lcang lo dung khang gzhal yas na:_sum brgya drug cu'i dkyil 'khor ni:_'dab bzhi chos 'byung dkaRa gsal dbus:_thabs shes pad+ma nyi zla la:_rdo rje mkha' 'gro yab yum ni:_gtso 'khor sum brgya drug cu ste:_sku mdog dkar gsal me long sku:_zhe sdang 'joms phyir thod khrag dkrugs:_spyan gsum sdang mig dgra la lta_zhal nas drag sngags bgegs la 'bod:_shangs nas nad kyi 'tshub ma 'thor:_tshogs gtor mchod pa 'di gsol la:_dgra bgegs zhing bcu bsgral du gsol:_khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab:_drag po'i phrin las myur du mdzod:_sngags kyi bstan pa bsrung du gsol:_tAM mgrin pa longs spyod gzhal yas na:_bcu drug bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni:_'dab bzhi chos 'byung ge sar dbus:_thabs shes pad+ma nyi zla la:_rin chen mkha' 'gro yab yum ni:_gtso 'khor brgyad gnyis bcu drug ste:_sku mdog ser gsal mnyam nyid sku:_nga rgyal 'joms phyir thod khrag dkrugasaH:_spyan gsum sdang mig dgra la lta:_zhal nas drag sngags bgegs la 'bod:_shangs nas nad kyi 'tshub ma 'thor:_tshogs gtor mchod pa 'di gsol la:_dgra bgegs zhing bcu bsgral du gsol:_khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab:_drag po'i phrin las myur du mdzod:_sngags kyi bstan pa bsrung du gsol:_b+tso dran pa rnam bkod gzhal yas na:_sum cu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor ni:_'dab bzhi chos 'byung mthing gsal dbus:_thabs shes pad+ma nyi zla la:_sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yab yum ni:_gtso 'khor sum cu rtsa gnyis te:_sku mdog mthing gsal chos dbyings sku:_gti mug 'joms phyir thod khrag dkrugs:_spyan gsum dgra la sdang mig lta_zhal nas drag sngags bgegs la 'bod:_shangs nas nad kyi 'tshub ma 'thor:_tshogs gtor mchod pa 'di gsol la:_dgra bgegs zhing bcu bsgral du gsol:_khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab:_drag po'i phrin las myur du mdzod:_sngags kyi bstan pa bsrung du gsol:_b+ho skyed byed sprul pa'i gzhal yas na:_drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni:_'dab bzhi chos 'byung dmar gsal dbus:_thabs shes pad+ma nyi zla la:_pad+ma DAk+ki yab yum ni: gtso 'khoRa drug cu rtsa bzhi ste:_sku mdog dmaRa gsal soRa rtogs sku: 'dod chags 'joms phyir thod khrag dkrugs:_spyan gsum dgra la sdang mig lta:_zhal nas drag sngags bgegs la 'bod:_shangs nas nad kyi 'tshub ma 'thor:_tshogs gtoRa mchod pa 'di gsol la:_dgra bgegs zhing bcu bsgral du gsol:_khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab:_drag po'i phrin las myur du mdzod:_sngags kyi bstan pa bsrung du gsol:_b+tso myong byed bde chen gzhal yas na:_nyi shu rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor ni:_'dab bzhi chos 'byung ljang gsal dbus:_thabs shes pad+ma nyi zla la:_las kyi DAk+ki yab yum ni:_gtso 'khoRa nyi shu rtsa brgyad de:_sku mdog ljang gsal bya grub sku:_phrag dog 'joms phyir thod khrag dkrugs:_spyan gsum dgra la sdang mig lta:_zhal nas drag sngags bgegs la 'bod:_shangs nas nad kyi 'tshub ma 'thor: tshogs gtoRa mchod pa 'di gsol la:_dgra bgegs zhing bcu bsgral du gsol:_khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab:_drag po'i phrin las myur du mdzodaH: sngags kyi bstan pa bsrung du gsol:_de ni nang rig pa'i lha lnga brgya dang bdun cu rtsa gnyis phrin las la bskul ba yin no:_da ni yab yum sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro 'bum tsho nyi shu bskul ba ni:_b+h+yoH dur khrod rab 'jigs nags ma'i gling :_rtsub 'gyur lcang lo can gyi gnas:_rus dang rnag khrag mtshon cha'i tshal:[ ·]sha zan bya spyang mang po'i gnas:_khro bcu rgyu bar mi nus shing :_phyag na rdo rje skyi g.ya'i gnas:_de lta bu yi gnas mchog na:_dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i yum:_rdo rje phag mo yab yum bzhugs:_yab yum 'khril ba'i spyi gtsug na:_phag zhal rta gdong ljang nag las:_dgra la khrag nad gtong ba'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_yab yum khro zhal gnyis med sbyor ba las:_bde gshegs las la bskul ba'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_yab yum dbu la thod lngas brgyan pa las:_rigs lngas 'gro don mdzad pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di gsol la:_do nub sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yoH:_do nub gnod pa'i bgegs la b+h+yoH:_yab yum dbu yi thor gtsug 'khyil ba las:_bde gshegs dgongs pa bskul ba'i mkha' 'gro 'bum: yab yum phyag g.yas gri gug bsnams pa las:_srog gcod bdud len byed pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_g.yon gnyis b+han d+ha khrag can bsnams mas pa las khrag nad gzer thabs gtong ba'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di gsol la:_do nub sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yoH:_do nub gnod pa'i bgegs la b+h+yoH:_kha TAM rtse gsum mchan khung bcug pa las:_khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_de la rdo rje rtse lngas brgyan pa las: don dam stong nyid rtogs pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_thod pa sum brtsegs rab tu brgyan pa las:_srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum: dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di gsol la:_do nub sdang ba'i dgra la b+ho:_do nub gnod pa'i bgegs la b+tso:_dar gyi 'phur lce rab tu mdzes pa las: bdud kyi dmag dpung 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_gser gyi dril bu rnga dung 'phyang ba las:_snyan brgyud gdams pa 'dzin pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum: yu ba dkar po drang zhing 'dril ba las:_lha min g.yul ngo bzlog pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di gsol la:_do nub sdang ba'i dgra la b+tso:_do nub gnod pa'i bgegs la b+ho:_mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal 'phyang ba las:_'du byed lnga bcu zad pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_rus pa'i rgyan drug sku la gsol ba las:_phar phyin 'gro don mdzad pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum: yab yum gnyis med 'khril bar sbyor ba las:_rtog med bde chen rtogs pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di gsol la:_do nub sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yoH:_do nub gnod pa'i bgegs la b+h+yoH:_gcer bu skra grol 'gying zhing brjid pa las:_stong nyid ye shes rtogs pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum rtse gcig bzhugs pa las:_pha rol sa bcu gnon pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di gsol la:_do nub sdang ba'i dgra la b+tso:_do nub gnod pa'i bgegs la b+h+yoH: ro yi gdan la rab tu bzhugs pa las:_dur khrod sha la rol ba'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa las:_thabs shes mthar phyin mun sel mkha' 'gro 'bum:_sku yi rgyan rnams rab tu rdzogs pa las: che btsan 'gran zla bral ba'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_bskal ba'i me ri rab tu 'khrugs pa las:_ma rig rtog mtha' sreg pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_'khor du DAk+ki mang pos bskor ba las:_sna tshogs phrin las mdzad pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bum:_dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di gsol la:_do nub sdang ba'i dgra la b+tso:_do nub gnod pa'i bgegs la b+h+yoH:_bcol ba'i phrin las grub par mdzod:_ces sku gsung thugs yon tun phrin las kyi mkha' 'gro 'bum tsho nyi shu bskul ba'o:_'di gnyan pas tshogs dang gtor ma'i dus min par bya mi nyan no:_de nas sna tshogs kyi DAk+ki bskul ba ni:_b+h+yoH mkha' dbyings bde ba chen po nas:_ye shes DAk+ki bye ba 'bum:_rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdud 'dul ma: rin chen mkha' 'gro sa ma ti:_pad+ma mkha' 'gro bde chen ma:_las kyi mkha' 'gro phrin las bdag:_kun kyang cha lugs 'di 'dra ste:_sku mdog gcig tu ma nges te:_dkar ser dmar ljang mthing mun mdog:_sngo skya khra mo bral ba'i mdog:_phyag mtshan gcig tu ma nges te:_gri gug kha TAM thod pa 'dzin:_rnga chung rtog 'joms mtshon cha thogs:_rol mo'i sgra dang rgyan cha thogs:_bdud rtsi mchod pa rol zhing stob:_dur khrod rgyan la mdzes pa'i gzugs:_sked pa dril bu g.yeRa khas brgyan:_dar dpyangs rus pa'i rgyan drug gsol:_snyan pa'i sgra sgrog si li li:_dbu rgyan dar gyi cod pan can:_rlung gis bskyod cing pu ru ru:_rkang pa rdo rje'i sgeg 'gros can:_mkha' la thogs med bun nu nu: lag pa gser gyi gdu bu can:_sna tshogs gar byed khyugs se khyug:_phrin las gcig tu ma nges te:_rnam bzhi sna tshogs nyid mdzad ma:_rgyan gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la:_'dod pa'i phrin las myur du sgrubs:_de nas yul nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i zhing skyes ma bskul ba ni:_hU~M gnas mchog nyi shu rtsa bzhi na:_mkha' 'gro'i gtso mo nyi shu bzhi:_mkha' 'gro bye ba 'khor dang bcas:_gtso mo mi mngon dbyings na bzhugs:_'khor gyi mkha' 'gro bye ba 'bum:_kun kyang mi bzad 'di 'dra ste:_la la bud med rgan mo la:_ro shun rnying pa'i na bza' gsol:_snum dang khrag gi thig les brgyan:_zhal nas ha hi hU~M phaT sgrogs: rkang pa 'khor lo bzhi yi 'gros:_lag pa ber ka sa la gtsugs:_sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la:_rkyen bzlog dgra thul dngos grus stsol:_bcol ba'i phrin las grub par mdzod:_la la bud med gzhon nu la:_bcu drug gzugs mdzes lang tsho rgyas:_sna tshogs rgyan ldan yid 'ong ma:_rigs spyod kha dog so so la:_khro gnyeRa mdzes 'dzum ldan pa'i gzugs:_phrin las rnams la bskul ma 'debs:_kun kyang cha lugs 'di 'dra ste:_mdzes pa'i zhal 'dzum gzi mdangs can:_gzhon nu'i sku la 'gying bag ldan:_dbu la rin chen cod pan 'phur:_rang gi dpa' bo'i zhabs la 'dud:_sked pa ga yeRa kha'i dra ba can:_sil sil sgra sgrog sku la sbyor:_lag pa mnyen lcugs gdu bu can:_rang gi dpa' bo'i mgul nas 'khyudaH:_sor mo gser gyi sor gdub can:_brda dang brda yi lan la mkhas:_zhal ni pad+ma'i dung so can: 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis snyan par smra:_skad snyan tshangs pa rdo rje'i gsung : snyan pa'i glu len yid 'phrog maH_rgyan gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la:_rkyen bzlog dgra thul dngos grub stsol:_bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod: la la bud med tha mal gzugs:_lo ka'i spyod pa sna tshogs byed:_khyed ni mi spyod gang yang med:_la la sgyur byed tshos mkhan mo:_log par lta ba'i rnam rtog sgyur:_la la myos byed chang 'tshong ma:_log lta'i shes pa myos par gyis: la la sbyor byed smad 'tshong ma:_thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba gyis:_la la dag byed khrus mkhan mo:_bag chags dri ma dag par gyis:_la la gsod byed shan pa mo:_rtog pa skye med dbyings su sod:_la la dka' thub bram ze mo:_'khor ba'i skyon dang bral bar gyis:_la la len byed chom rkun mo:_gzhan sems rang dbang med par gyis:_de la sogs te mtha' yas pa:_ri rab lho yi 'dzam gling na:_yul gru nyi shu rtsa bzhi na:_sems can don la bzhugs pa rnams:_mos pa du ma'i sems can la:_spyod pa sna tshogs thabs kyis 'dul: rak+ta'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la:_rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor bcas kyi:_mi mthun phyogs kyi nyes pa bzlog:_mchog dang thun mong dngos grub zhu:_bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod:_ces bskul lo:_de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma 'di skad do:_b+h+yoH:_las kyi mkha' 'gro mi srun ma:_shin tu 'jigs pa'i keng rus gzugs:_yan lag rus pa'i 'khor los brgyan:_snying khrag 'thung zhing skan sgra rdeb:_rkang mgyogs brtul zhugs gdugs rtsub can:_dam tshig can gyi las mkhan mo:_dam nyams rU tra'i srog gcod yin:_lhag ma'i gtor ma 'di long la:_dgra bgegs zhing bcu bsgral du gsol:_drag po'i las mdzod bstan pa srungs:_khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab:_bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod:_b+ho 'jig rten mkha' 'gro rdzu 'phrul can:_srin mo'i lus la lce spyang gdong :_sbrul nag lce la spyan mig ldog:_kha rlangs dug la nga ro 'brug:_khros pas sme khrag ser chen 'bebs:_mi lpags g.yang gzhi phyogs bcur rdeb:_rgyu zhags 'dom dgu dgra la chings:_ba spu mtshon cha me ltar 'bar:_byi ba dung phyur 'khor dang bcas:_dam tshig can gyi las mkhan mo:_dam nyams rU tra'i srog gcod ma:_lhag ma'i gtor ma 'di long la: dgra bgegs zhing bcu bsgral du gsol:_drag po'i las mdzod bstan pa srungs:_khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab:_bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod:_b+tso sha za mkha' 'gro yang sprul tshogs:_yi dwags lus la dur bya'i gdong :_duRa khrod sked la thod pas brgyan:_lus las khrag rul chu seRa 'bebs:_smre sngags tshig la ngud mo'i dbyangs:_phyi na 'dre 'tshub sprin ltar lding :_ro langs rkang la dur khrod lus:_phung 'dre'i lag pa gza' srin mig: dam tshig can gyi las mkhan mo:_dam nyams rU tra'i srog gcod yin:_lhag ma'i gtor ma 'di long la:_dgra bgegs zhing bcu bsgral du gsol:_drag po'i las mdzad bstan pa srungs:_khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab:_bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod:_b+tso gzhan yang mkha' 'gro pho nya'i tshogs: la la myur mgyogs bstan pa srung :_bu chung lus la bya rog mgo:_dbyug gu'i dbyangs la thi bya'i tshig:_ri gsum 'grim zhing lung gsum bskor:_chu la zhon nas grib so 'grim:_lce sprang pho nya dri ro snom:_da la'i tha ma bskor zhing nyul:_las byed mi sdug 'khor dang bcas:_dam tshig can gyi las mkhan yin:_dam nyams rU tra'i srog gcod ma:_lhag ma'i gtor ma 'di long la: dgra bgegs zhing bcu bsgral du gsol:_drag po'i las mdzod bstan pa srungs:_khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab:_bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod:_ces lhag gtor btang ngo :_de nas zor lam dbye ba gzhan dang mthun no:_zor 'phen pa ni:_b+tso nga ni rnal 'byor sngags 'chang bdag:_dgra bgegs steng du zor cig 'phen:_dgra bgegs gdug pa zoRa kha long : dreg pa rta mgrin yab yum ste:_mkha' 'gro'i dmag dpung sde brgyad tshogs: kun kyang drag po'i zor thogs la:_dgra bgegs steng du zor kha ya:_zor mA ra ya zor yA:_zhes 'phang ngo :_de nas gtor ma bskyang ba ni:_b+ho dpal chen yab yum bka' nyan ma:_shar nas gshegs pa'i mkha' 'gro bdun:_drug ni ye shes dbyings na bzhugs:_gcig ni thabs kyi sgo ma mdzad:_rdo rje rigs kyi Daki bdun:_dam rdzas gtor ma 'di bzhes la:_khyed kyis zhi ba'i phrin las mdzod:_de bzhin du:_lho nas gshegs pa'i mkha' 'gro bdun:_drug ni ye shes dbyings na bzhugs:_gcig ni thabs kyi sgo ma mdzad:_rin chen rigs kyi DAk+ki bdun:_dam rdzas gtor ma 'di bzhes la:_khyed kyis rgyal pa'i phrin las mdzod:_nub nas gshegs pa'i mkha' 'gro bdun:_drug ni ye shes dbyings na bzhugs:_gcig ni thabs kyi sgo ma mdzad:_pad+ma rigs kyi DAk+ki bdun:_dam rdzas gtor ma 'di bzhes la:_khyed kyis dbang gi phrin las mdzod:_byang nas gshegs pa'i mkha' 'gro bdun:_drug ni ye shes dbyings na bzhugs:_gcig ni thabs kyi sgo ma mdzad:_las kyi rigs kyi DAk+ki bdun:_dam rdzas gtoRa ma 'di bzhes la:_khyed kyis drag po'i phrin las mdzod:_dpal chen yab yum bka' sdod bka' nyan tshogs:_dbang phyug nyer brgyad DAk+ki sum cu gnyis:_ging chen bco brgyad lang ka dur khrod bdag:_ma bdun sring bzhi 'bar ma lnga bcu brgyad:_drug cu bzhi dang 'bum phrag mkha' 'gror bcas:_bshes gnyen klong rdzogs pad+ma'i spyan snga ru:_khas blangs dam bcas bka' li gtor ma long :_zhi rgyas dbang drag dgug bskrad mnan gzir sogs:_bcol ba'i phrin las ma lus 'grub par mdzod:_ces bstan ma skyong ngo :_de nas rta bro brdung ba ni:_gtor gzhong 'og tu ling+ga bcug la:_b+tso dmar nag gru gsum me yi dkyil 'khor nas:_'jigs byed khro rgyal rta mgrin khros pa'i sku:_gnyis med 'khril sbyor rdo rje phag mo yumaH: thod sbrul rgyan ldan g.yas gnyis gri gug bsnams:_g.yon gnyis thod khrag tri shul rus pas brgyan:_rta mgo phag zhal dur mtsher phyogs bcur sgrogs: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dam la 'dus:_sdug bsngal nad kyi tshom bu la:_rol pa'i rta bro chems se chem:_rta bro 'khor gcig dang po la:_bdud 'dul 'joms pa chen po'i bro:_nga rgyal 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro ma:_zhing bcu'i tshogs la da rdungs shig:_rta bro 'khor gcig bar ma la:_srin po sha za longs spyod bro:_zhe sdang 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro ma:_'byung po'i tshogs la da rdungs shig:_rta bro 'khor gcig tha ma la:_khams gsum khrag 'thung nad kyi bro:_gti mug 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro ma:_'khor ba'i gcong nad skran la rdungs:_rdul du rlog cig dgra dang bgegs:_rgya mtsho'i gting spa Ri rab mnan:_'khor bskyon chu srin kha ru bor:_oM AHhUM stam b+ha ya nan:_ces rta bro brdung ngo :_de nas bkra shis brjod pa ni:_oM AH hUM:_ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje mngon du gyur:_chos dbyings rnam dag klong la mnga' brnyes pa'i:_bla ma yi dam rnams kyi bkra shis gang lags pa:_bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog:_dkar mo zhi mdzad gar skyur sgeg pa mo:_me long ye shes rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma:_'gro ba'i lus la dbang sgyur mkha' 'gro 'bum: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog:_ser mo rgyas mdzad gar skyar sgeg pa mo:_mnyam nyid ye shes rin chen mkha' 'gro ma:_'gro ba'i yon tan dbang sgyur gter gyi DAk+ki 'bum:_bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog:_dmar mo dbang mdzad gar sgyur sgeg pa mo:_sor rtogs ye shes pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma:_'gro ba'i ngag la dbang sgyur gsung gi mkha' 'gro 'bum:_bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog: mthing kha chos mdzad gar sgyur sgeg pa mo:_chos dbyings ye shes sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma:_'gro ba'i yid la dbang sgyur thugs kyi mkha' 'gro 'bum: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog:_ljang gu las mdzad gar sgyur sgeg pa mo:_nan tan ye shes las kyi mkha' 'gro ma:_'gro ba'i las la dbang sgyur phrin las mkha' 'gro 'bum:_bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog:_sna tshogs mkha' 'gro duRa khrod brgyad kyi bdag:_tshogs brgyad dbang sgyur 'jig rten mkha' 'gro ma:_bka' srung mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bkra shis gang lags pa:_bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog:_ces bkra shis brjod:_lha gshegs:_bsngo ba smon lam bya:_dbang gi dus yin na sbyin sreg bya:_dal bsdu:_yig brgyas lhag chad kha bskang :_bsod nams tshogs chen rdzogs pa dang :_ma sring las la bskul ba yi:_las byang tshogs mchod rtsaRa phreng 'di:_ye shes mtsho rgyal khyod la gtad:_las can cig dang 'phrad par shog:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya: rdzogs so:_dge'o:

[5.14 dbang sgrub dang bum pa sgrub thabs]

@#/_/dbang sgrub dang bum pa sgrub thabs bzhugs so: gdams pa 'di'i phyi sgrub ni:_rigs lnga yab yum phyi ltar bsgrubs nas: bsnyen pa bya ba ni phyi sgrub:_nang sgrub ni bdag kun tu bzang por bskyed pa'i sku la rigs lnga yab yum bkod de bsgrub pa ni nang sgrub:_phyi sgrub dang nang sgrub gang mos kyi sgrub pa tshad du bskul te slob ma la bum dbang bskur ba ni: gang zag thun mong du smin par 'gyur ba'o:_gsang sgrub mkha' 'gro yab yum mngon rtogs ltar bsgom zhing sgrub pa nas dbang gsum nor bu'i lugs su bskur bar bya'o:_yang gsang bla na med pa'i sgrub pa ni mngon sum rang thog tu phab ste rig pa'i rtsal dbang rang byung du bskur ba'o:_de la phyi ltar na rigs lnga yab yum du bsgrub pa phyir sgrub:_rang kun bzang yab yum du gsal te:_rigs lnga lus la bkod pa nang sgrub:_rang mkha' 'gro yab yum du bskyed nas 'khor lo lngar mkha' 'gro yab yum bskyed de sgrub pa ni gsang sgrub bo:_rang rig gcer mthong du ngo sprad nas nyams su len pa yang gsang ba sgrub pa'o:_bum dbang gi phyi sgrub rigs lngar bskur ro:_gsang dbang man tshad gsang sgrub bo:_mkha' 'gro lngar bskur ba yin te de ni shin tu zab bo: phyi ltar na rigs lnga yab yum:_nang ltar na mkha' 'gro yab yum yin te: don gyi ngo bo la gcig pa'i phyir ro:_rin chen dbang gi phreng ba 'di:_shin tu zab phyir gter du sbas:_las can cig dang 'phrad par shog:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis chu mo glang gi ston zla tha chung gi nyer bdun la dwags lung khra mo brag nas gter nas gdan drangs pa'o:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro la na mo:_de yang gong du bsnyen pa byas nas: dbang bskur ba'i dus su:_'bri ba'i dkyil 'khor ram tshom bu gang 'grub la dkyil 'khor dang lha tshogs phyi sgrub ltar gsal bar bskyed do:_pho brang gi phyi dur khrod la sogs pa rnams su bla ma dang yi dam dpa' bo DAk+ki chos skyong la sogs pa sprin gtibs pa ltar bskyed do:_de nas bum pa'i bzlas pa bya rang kun tu bzang ba ni so so'i bum par yab yum gsal bar bskyed do: poRa bskyed pa'i thugs ka nas hUM las 'od zer 'phros pas 'od zer gzungs thag la 'khril nas song ste lha so so'i thugs ka phogs pas yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pa'i byang sems dkar dmar du bab pas bum pa gang bar bsam zhing bzlas pa bya'o:_mjug tu yab yum 'od du zhu nas bdud rtsi dang gnyis su med par 'dres par bsam:_de ltar bum pa la dmigs pa'i bzlas pa ci 'grub tu bya'o:_de yang bum pa re re la lha so so'i dmigs pa dang bzlas pa byed dam:_bum pa gcig tu bsdus te bzlas pa byas kyang btub bo:_bum pa sgrub pa'i rim pa 'o:[ \u0f72\u0f72 ]dge'o:_khathaM: @#/_/dkyil 'khor rnam dag bzhugs so: da dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa bshad pa ni:_'o rigs kyi bu dkyil 'khor 'di la ltos shig:_de yang sems can thams cad dang sangs rgyas rgyu gcig pa'i rtags su dkyil 'khor 'jam zhing srub med pa'o:_phyin ci log gi bdud rnams sreg pa'i rtags su me 'od kyi phreng ba'o:_zab mo'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags su rdo rje'i phreng ba'o:_'gro ba kun gyi yid bzhin du 'gro don byed pa'i rtags su pad+ma'i phreng ba'o:_rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad dag pa'i rtags su dur khrod brgyad do:_rigs lnga'i dgongs pa lam du 'khyer ba'i rtags su pany+tsa rA ga'o:_rnam par thar pa'i sa nas skye ba med pa'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i rtags su sgo bzhi ru bstan pa'o:_'dod yon lnga mi spang pa'i rtags su 'dod yon gyi lha mo dang snum bu'o:_che ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i rtags su rin po che'i pha gu'o:_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rtags su dra ba dra phyed do:_tshad med pa bzhi sgom pa'i rtags su rta babs so:_sems can la chos ston pa'i rtags su chos kyi 'khor lo'o:_rnam rtog gis dben pa'i rtags su ri dwags so:_byams pa chen po mnga' ba'i rtags su gdugs phub pa'o:_mu khyud gsum du byung ba ni sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'o:shar rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar por yod pa'i rtags su shar gyi pad+ma dkar po'o:_lho rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser por yod pa'i rtags su lho'i pad+ma ser por 'dug pa'o:_nub snang ba mtha' yas dmar por yod pa'i rtags su nub kyi pad+ma dmar po'o:_byang don yod grub pa ljang gur yod pa'i rtags su byang gi pad+ma ljang gu'o:_dbus rnam par snang mdzad mthing khar yod pa'i rtags su dbus mthing khar 'dug pa'o:_yab yum gnyis su med pa'i rtags su mtshams bzhi mdzes tshon du 'dug pa'o:_bum pa lnga zlum por byung ba 'di yang chos sku mtha' dang bral ba'i rtags so:_bum pa kha dog lnga ru byung pa 'di yang ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags so:_bum pa kha rgyan dang ldan pa 'di ni zhi khro 'od zer tshul du yod pa'i rtags so:_de'i gseb na rdo rje yod pa 'di yang rang rig la 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags so:_mgul chings lnga dang ldan pa 'di yang nyon mongs pa lnga snang yul du dag pa'i rtags so:_shel dkar dang me long gnyis ni rig pa la dri ma med cing stong gsal ma 'gags par yod pa'i rtags so:_rma bya'i gdugs 'di ni sgron ma bzhi dbyings su gsal ba'i rtags so:_gzungs thag lnga sgril btags pa 'di yang sngags kyi 'od zer ye shes lnga'i tshul gyis thugs rje kun khyab tu yodapa'i rtags so:_rgyal mtshan dang 'phan dar 'di rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa mi nub cing snyan pa'i ba dan phyogs bcud sgrogs pa'i rtags so:_mchod gtor dang tshogs rgyas par bshams pa 'di ni bla ma yi dam dpa' bo mkha' 'gro chos skyong rnams mnyes par byed dgos pa'i rtags so:_gzhan yang mchod pa bkod pa'i bye brag rgyan dang ldan pa 'di yang dbang bskur ba lnga phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan dgos pa'i rtags so: rdo rje slob dpon rgyan cha dang ldan pa 'di yang :_dbang bskur ba'i byin rlabs 'phel ba'i rtags so:_zhes gser gyi thur mas slob bu rnams la ngo bstan par bya'o:_lha'i rnam dag brda'i dbang du shes par bya'o:_'di ni dkyil 'khor rnam dag bstan pa yin no:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_sgri_dge'o:

[5.15 snying thig gsang ba bla med kyi dbang don gsal ba'i rgyab yig gsang ba]

@#/_/snying thig gsang ba bla med kyi dbang don gsal ba'i rgyab yig gsang ba'o: 'dzaHdzaH_rigs kyi DAk+ki lnga la phyag 'tshal lo:_mkha' 'gro snying gi ti ka yi:_dbang bskur lam du 'jug pa ni:_zhag bdun nam yang na gsum du bya bar gsungs:_nub dang po yul bdag la gtor ma byin te sa bslangs la:_stegs bu brtsigs te sta gon gyi cho ga bya'o:_nub bar ma la dkyil 'khor bri'o:_nub phyi ma la dkyil 'khor sgrub par bya'o:_nub bzhi pa la slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug ste:_bum dbang bskur:_me mang po yang bcug pas chog:_des gang zag thun mong du smin par byed pa yin no:_de nas skal ldan gnyis gsum bzhi yan chad la dbang gsum pa bskur te:_bum dbang gi dkyil 'khor nyid ma bsdus par tshogs rgya chen po bshams nas:_nam phyed na da la'i lhor gsang dbang bskur:_nub phyi ma la srod la dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs su shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ro:_nub gsum pa la dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs su tho rang rtse shar la tshig dbang gi ngo sprod rgyas par bya'o:_dbang de dag gsum ka la tshogs gtor rgyas par bya'o:_yang na nub gsum du byas te:_nub dang po la dkyil 'khor bri:_gnyis pa la bum dbang bskur:_gsum pa la dbang gsum pa bskur ba'o:_nang par tshogs la rol:_glu gar dang rol mo bya:_de nas bkra shis dang bsngo ba smon lam bya: dkyil 'khor bsdu'o:_bdag 'dra pad+mas dbang bzhi tho yig tu bkod pa'o: las can cig dang 'phrad par shog:_dbang gi tho yig rdzogs so:_rgya rgya rgya: @#/_/__rigs kyi DAk+ki lnga la na mo:_u rgyan pad+ma bdag 'dra yis:_dbang gi rgyab yig bstan par bya:_tshad med bzhi po sngon du song bas:_bdag nyid skad cig dran rdzogs su dpal rta mgrin sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis:_g.yas gri gug g.yon thod pa bsnams pa: gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan cha can cig tu bskyed:_de'i spyi bor yi ge ra las badzra dpa' bo:_mgrin par tsa las rat+na dpa' bo:_snying khar hrIHlas pad+ma dpa' bo:_lte bar ya las las kyi dpa' bo:_sku mdog phyag mtshan rigs dang mthun par bskyed:_bdag de ltar bskyed pa'i pang du:_yum rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan drug gsol ba:_phyag g.yas gri gug yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud pa:_g.yon thod pa'i bdud rtsi yab la stob pa: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'khril sbyor du bskyed:_de ltar bskyed pa'i yum gyi spyi bor ha las rdo rje DAk+ki bskyed:_mgrin par ri las rin chen Dak+ki bskyed:_snying khar ni las pad+ma DAk+ki bskyed:_lte bar sa las las kyi DAk+ki bskyed:_sku mdog phyag mtshan rigs dang mthun par bskyed:_de dag kyang 'khril sbyor la mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba lang tsho bcu drug lon pa lta bu la rgyan dang ldan par bskyed do:_de ltar bskyed pa'i spyi bor:_o rgyan pad+ma bdag nyid mthing nag rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs yum dang 'khril sbyor du bskyed do:_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du:_bde stong lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rtogs par bya snyam du sems bskyed la:_de nas yum dang 'khril te:_yab kyi rdo rje hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga par bskyed pa'i bu ga phaT ser pos dgag:mu tra yum du bskyed pa'i ba ga paM las pad+ma 'dab bzhi bskyed pa'i bu ga phaT sngon pos dgag go:de nas rdo rje dang pad+ma sbyar te gong du bskyed pa'i lha thams cad kyang sbyor ba mdzad bsgom:_rtsa khams thams cad du dpa' bo DAk+ki thams cad kyis gang bar bsam:_de dag thams cad kyang sbyor ba mdzad par bsgom:_de nas 'o dang 'khyud pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis dal bus bskyod:_bde ba bskyed pa dang gong gi lha yab yum bde bas dgyes shing bskyod pas:_sbyor mtshams nas dngas ma bab pas:_lus bdud rtsis gang bas bde ba rgyas par bsams shing bskyod pa la gzab:_bde ba rdzogs mi zin 'go g.yo ba la bzung :_bskyod kyin mi bzung 'phro 'thud la bzung : las dang po pas lus bde mer gyis byung ba dang :_gcan gzan snom gyis rlung nang du 'then:_gling bzhi ri rab ngos la sbyar:_sbrul tshang brag la bca': 'brang ze kha la bstod:_lho sprin dbyings la sgril:_dar chen gnam yol bca':_bde chen 'khor lo bla ma yab yum gyi bde ba la sems gtad:_rlung gnyis bsdams te bde ba la sems me re bzhag:_bde ba yal nas de ka ltar bskyod cing bzung bas:_spyi bo nas dngas ma g.yos pas mgrin par bab pas:_lus bde mer ba de dga' ba'i ye shes:_des rnam rtog rags rim rnams spang :_de nas dngas ma snying khar sleb pa mchog dga'i ye shes: des bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rtog pa spong :_dngas ma lte bar sleb ste bde ba rgyas pas dga' bral:_des phyag rgyar 'dzin pa'i rtog pa spong :_dngas ma gsang bar sleb pas bde la rtog pa med pa 'byung :_de lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes: des 'dzin pa'i rtog pa mtha' dag grol te:_bde gsal stong pa ngos bzung med pa'i nyams skye bas de ngos bzung ste:_rjes kyi shes pa bskyangs pas: bde stong gi rtog pa mngon du 'gyur ro:_snying rus kyis dngas ma mi gtong ba'i dam bca' dam por bzung la:_dga' bzhi'i ye shes ngos ma zin tsher bskyod:_de ltar bzung ba'i dngas ma drang ba ni:_gsang ba rdo rje'i bu gar dngas ma hUM gi rnam par gyur te:_bde ba skar mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du spyi gtsug tu rgyang gis song bar bsam pa dang dus mnyam du:_ngag tu hig ces sgra dang bcas pa drag po bdun brjod de:_spyi bo dang :_mgrin pa dang :_snying ga dang :_lte bar tshir gyis song bar bsam zhing :_de lta bu lan gsum bya'o: de nas rtsa la bkram zhing rlung dang bsre ba ni:_rang khyi'i 'dug stangs kyis: ming med kyi rtsa bar mthe bong btsugs te:_khu tshur bcangs te sa la btsugs la:_ngag tu ha sib ces g.yas nas lan gsum drag tu 'then la:_rlung bzung ste g.yas su lan gsum sprug:_g.yon du'ang de'i 'gre'o:_de nas lus sprug shar shar ba rlung bzung la lan gsum bya:_de nas glod la bya bral ngang du dar gcig bzhag go:_de nas de'i dge
