dum bu 'di:_'di min gter du sbas pa med:_rgya rgya rgya:_las tshogs gsum gyi dang po:_o rgyan nyid la na mo:_gnad sgrub 'phrul gyi man ngag gi bcud yin dum bu las:_re ma ti thugs kyi sgrub pa yin:_o rgyan pad+ma bdag gis su:_ma ning mtsho yi 'gram du ni:_zhag bdun gcod kyi dmigs pa bskor:_bud med dmar nag gcig gis ni:_nad kyi rkyal pa thogs nas su:_o rgyan bdag la 'thor du byung :_o rgyan bdag gis sa ma ti yis zil gyis mnan:_skad cig mi sdug gzugs zhi nas:_na chung lha'i bu mo mdzes ma stong du sprul:_o rgyan bdag la srog snying phul:_e ma ma tri dza:_ma ma rag mo raM ma ga ma dza:_rag mo sing ha dza:_rag mo ru ru dza:_ma ma duM du dza:_ma mo ma mo:_sa ma ya trig trig rbad rbad dza:_zhes phul nas:_o rgyan gyi bka' ci bsgo nyan par dam bcas so:_de nas o rgyan gyis zhus pa:_khyod kyi ming dang :_rigs dang :_drag rtsal rnams shod cig:_ces brjod pas khong na re:_nged las kyi rigs kyi gnod drag rtsal can sbyin mo yin:_ming gnod sbyin mo nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes kyang zeraH: ma mo nyi ma rlung gi gshog pa can yang zer:_las mkhan dbang mo che zhes kyang zer roH:_drag rtsal ni skad cig ma la gling bzhi bskor nus:_skad cig la srid gsum dbang du sdud nus pa yin zer ro:_de nas o rgyan gyis bdud rtsi mchod nas zhus pa:_snyigs ma'i dus su rang ma smin par gzhan la dbang bskur:_'gro ba ma thul par dad gus ma skyes pa'i chos zab lto ru nor 'dod byed cing 'tshong ba'i dus su 'byung :_de dus o rgyan nga'i chos zab 'debs pa la: mos gus kyi sngon du dgos pas:_'gro ba dbang du sdud pa'i thabs shig ston cig gsungs pa dang :_khong na re nged kyis bstan kyang dam tshig thub par dka':_bod kyi mi la snying rus med zer ro:_dam tshig dka' ba ci dang ci bsrung dgos zhus pas:_khong na re:_nged gnod sbyin mo yin pas dam tshig ma thub na log lta che bas srog la 'ong :_dam tshig thub na rdzu 'phrul sprul pa'i sku bas che'o:_nged la sgrub pa byas nas su:_rgyun gyi gtor ma ma chag dgos: mdze yugs shan pa mi thong dang :_bye ba la sogs grib can rnams la 'dzem gnod sbyin mo sgrub pa'i dus su de rnams la ma 'dzem na dam nyam pas mi 'grub bo:_de ltar dam tshig thub bam gsung :_o rgyan bdag gis thugs dgongs nas: sgrub thabs ston cig dam tshig bsrung ngo zhus pas:_de nas bstan pa phag mo khong rang gis:_yang gsang gter gyi sgrub pa phyi nang gsang gsum dril nas gsungs so:_rgya rgya rgya:_de nas bca' thabs 'di ltar bya:_ro ras zhing chen dag la ni:_ri bong khrag ra khrag khyi dmar po'i khrag rta khrag tsan dan dmar po'i chu nya mkhris de rnams 'khor lo bri ba'i rdzas yin no 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug bri:_lte bar gnod sbyin mo nag mo:_zhal gcig phyag bzhi yod pa phyag g.yas na 'phrul gyi zhags pa bsnam pa:_'og ma na dbang sdud kyi 'khor lo bsnams pa:_g.yon na gsal byed kyi me long bsnams pa:_'og ma na lcags kyu bsnams pa bri:_de'i tha ma gong ma'i srog sngags kyis bskor:_rtsibs bcu drug gi rtse mo nang du bstan:_de la bri ba'i sngags 'di'o:_yig mgo nang du bstan la:_ma ma rag mo rag mo: sing da sing da :_rag mo thaM rag mo thaM:_rag mo rgyugs rag mo rgyugs:_ru lu rgyugs ru lu rgyugs:_e ru lu rgyugs:_e ru lu rgyugs:_dza tri dza dza tri dza dzaH: zhes rtsibs la bri'o:_drag sngags mtha' dag gis bskor:_de'i tha ma rang gi yi dam sngags kyis bskoraH:_dgug gnod sbyin mo 'dren byas nas mdzo mo nag mo'i rwa nang gzhug mgo mjug zlog lakha bal nag gis bcad la rang gi gdan 'og gru gsum nang du mgo gzhug bzlog gzhug:_de'i steng du seng ldeng phur pa sor bcu gnyis pa gzug go:_de'i steng du g.yam pa la rdo rje rgya gram bris pas dgab:_de'i steng du rang nyal bar bskyed rim gsal bas bya'o:_bsnyen sgrub las sbyor gcig tu dril ba'i sngags yang gsang bla na med pa e ma ma tri dza:_ma ma rag mo rag mo dza:_rag mo sing nga dza:_rag mo ru ru dza:_rag mo du du dza:_ma mo ma mo: sa ma ya:_trig trig rbad rbad dzaH:_bag rnir khug bag rnir khug:_ma dung ma dung rnir khug:_rnir dkrugs rnir dkrugs:_rnir chog rnir chog:_gnod sbyin nag mos dbang du sdus dbang du sdus:_lha 'dre mi gsum dbang du sdus shig:_dza dza:_hring hring longs spyod thams cad dbang du sdus shig:_ces bzlas pa sngags 'di bzlas pa'i dus su ni :_brtul zhugs dag dang mi ldan na:_rang srog chad de nyes pa che:_de tshe shin tu gtsang bar bya'o:_drag tu bya'o:_rtags ni rab 'bring tha ma gsum:_rab ni mngon sum dag tu 'byung :_'bring ni rmi lam dag tu 'byung :_tha ma'ang phyad phyod du shes pa 'gyur tsam 'byung :_de la rtags rtags rnams ma byung na:_sngags dkrugs rtsa gsum zhal phye la:_zhag bdun thun thun sngags gzhan nas gyis dus bzhir brabaH: de yis rtags rnams nub re la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon gsum ston:_de las zhag bdun las mang na rang srog 'chad:_de nas tsakra sman chus bkru:_de nas gnod sbyin bud med phyag mtshan gong dang 'dra'o kyi gzugs bse'i skra bshal nas rgyug pa'i gzugs bris la:_snying khar srog sngags bris la mdun du bzhag:_drag po nyung kar la dug khrag sbol la thun gyis mo'i rgyab nas gzir:_dam tshig gnad kyi bskul tshig bdun pa 'dis bskul lo:_kyai gnod sbyin nag mo bse yi ral pa can: mu men mtsho yi 'gram shed du:_o rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas la:_mdongs gsol srog gi snying po phul:_khas blangs dam bcas da rgyugs shig:_gnod sbyin chen mo da rgyugs shig:_lha 'dre mi gsum dbang du bsdus la shog:_ces drag tu bskul rgyun gtor sbyin la drag tu dus bzhir lo:_de ltar bsgrubs na ma dang bu mo pha la sogs pa mos lugasarnam bzhi'i sgo nas 'gro ba rnams sha la sbrang bzhin khyad paRa bud med 'du'o:_rgya rgya rgya:_dbang sdud las kyi 'khor lo 'di:_mkhas pa'i tshig la ma brten paraH:_gnod sbyin nyid kyis dngos su bstan:_'gro ba dbang du sdud pa la:_'di nyid yod na mi 'dus med:_des na 'di nyid zab par bshad:_rgya rgya rgya:_masaHga_las tshogs gnyis pa:_de ltar sgrub pa thon nas ni:_rgyal khams dbang du sdud 'dod na:_rten 'brel 'di ltar shes par bya:_rigs mi gcig pa'i mtshan brtags pa gal che bud med ni:_rgyal rigs rje'u dar ma rigs kyi bu mo rigs bra_ma ze'i rigs:_dmangs rigs gdol ba'i rigs dang lnga:_brgya dang bcu gnyis man chad bar:_skyes pas ma spyad chu shul zhag du ma lon pa sa blangs la:_byang sems dkaRa dmaRa gnyis dang bsre: g.yang kha'i sa dang sba yi rtsi:_mi mang 'dus pa'i sa dang lnga:_rtsi bzhin snur la thod pa ni:_dum bu gcig pa'i nang du blug:_de ni maN+Dal dbus su bzhag: sngags 'di zhag bdun bar du bsgrub:_e ma dung dung :_ding ding :_hring hring : sha sho sha sho:_g.yeRa ya g.yeRa ya:_dza na dza na:_rniRa dza rniRa dza:_shul chu ma shul chu ma:_g.yos:_g.yos:_khams gsum g.yos:_dkrugs dkrugs srid gsum dkrugs:_sdus sdus srid gsum dbang du sdus:_g.yos khams gsum g.yo ru chug:_dung rniRa dza dung rniRa dzaH:_e dung e dung swAhA:_zhes dus bzhir sngags chus rdzas la kha phru gdab:_de ltar zhag bdun bsgrub_sa pa yisaH rtags ni rang nyid rlung gis khyer ba rmi:_dngos su mig rtsa 'gul du 'ong : lus kyi sha yang 'gul du 'ong :_de ltar rtags rnams byung nas ni:_rdzas phyed snyug rgod nang du ni:_blugs la rang gi spyi bor bcang :_rdzas phyed lung gsum mdo na nyi ma dmar thag chad pa'i dus su rlung la phyar:_des ni rgyal khams pha ma bzhin du dbang du 'dus:_thams cad dbang du sdud pa la:_o rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi:_tsit+ta rin chen kha phye yang :_'di las zab pa yod re kan:_ldang lhas bka' yi bya ra gyis:_rgya rgya rgya: @#:_las tshogs gsum pa:[ y3]thAH:o rgyan nyid la na mo: dam tshig can gyi rnal 'byor pas:_'gro ba dbang du 'dus nas ni:_gsang sngags bde ba sbyor 'dod na:_DAk+ki mtshan ldan brtags nas ni:_rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pa yis:_gsang spyod ri khrod 'gugs 'dod na:_rten 'brel gnad ni gsum du bshad:_bdag nyid rdo rje phag mo ni:_sku mdog ljang gu dag tu bsgom:_phyag mtshan cha lugs gong dang 'dra:_spro dmigs yul gang yin bsdu dgug gzhug drag tu bya:[ · ]rgya rgya rgya:_rdzas kyi gnad ni 'di ru 'dus:_gang 'gugs chu shul sa dang gcig:_byang sems dkar dmar gnyis te gsum: sbrang rgod chang gi nur rtsi lnga:_khyim bya'i rdo rje mtshan dang rdo rje mi mtshan dang :_de rnams rtsi bzhin btags nas ni:_ba ru gson po la bud pa'i nang du blug:_gong gi maN+Dal mkha' 'gro'i zla gam steng bzhag bsgrub:_che ge 'dra ba'i ling ga rgyan dang ldan pa gcig:_byang sems snag tsha dang bsres la dkar dmar gnyis kyis bri:_de yang ba_ Ru'i nang du kh+k+ra sbra tshil bcad gzhug:_dkar dmar b.latshon skud pas gzungs thag bya: gzungs thag rang gi mtshan ma rdo rje'i rked pa la:_btags la sngags 'dis zhag gsum bsgrub:_karma DAk+ki ni karma dpa' bo hA~M hU~M dza dza:_ha ri ni sa che ge chum chum:_dung dung breng breng :_'dur 'dur khol g.ya' khol:_bram shig bram shig:_klong shog slog shugs:_ma ri khur ma ri khur:_nyong nyong ha Da ni khugaH rgye khug shog khug shog:_rnam par shes pa chos bzhin bdag gi dbang du sdus shig:_ces bzlas so:_rgya rgya rgya:_rtags ni 'di ltar shes par bya:_gsang ba'i rdo rje za 'gul 'byung :_rmi lam bud med tshogs 'dus nas:_bdag la mna' ni bsgag tu 'ong :_de ltar byung na 'grub pa yin:_rabakhong du gtong dang 'bring lus la byug dang gdab tha ma spyi boRa gsum bya:_'di ni shin tu zab pa'o:_rgya rgya rgya:_o rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas la:_mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs mang bzhugs kyang :_srog snying gnad kyi dril sgrub 'di:_'di min gter du sbas pa med: bskal ba snyigs ma byung ba'i tshe:_las can gcig gis rnyed par shog:_ldang lhas bka' yi bya ra gyis:_gcig las spel na snying khrag thang la phos shig: gter srung rnams:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_ai:_mtshan ldan gyi phyag rgya ma rig ma'i brtag pa lam 'bras na lod 'gugs pa gong gi 'di:_rgyal ba dang lung bzhin o rgyan gyis spyad pas dngos grub mchog dang thun mong thob 'phral du tshe 'di la:_phal pa 'di med rnams la ci cha yod:_DAk+ki lam 'bras nas bshad pa bzhin du nyams su long la ni gzhung ngu tshul bzhin gyis shig:_mad+galaM/_/

[6.19 dakki’i lus dkyil chen mo]

@#/_/DAk+ki'i lus dkyil chen mo bzhugs so ang : o rgyan skad duH:_ma N+ThaH_bod skad du:_mkha' 'gro gsang ba snying gi sgrub pa:_rigs kyi DAk+ki lnga la phyag 'tshal lo:_rnal 'byor 'khor ba blos btang ba:_ri khrod dgon pa 'grim nus pa zhig gis:_yang gsang mkha' 'gro snying thig bsgom zhing :_mkha' 'gro lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs par 'dod pas:_mkha' 'gro ma thod rgal du bsgrub par bya ste:_de la gsum ste rnal 'byor bzhi ldan gyi sgo nas nyams su blang ngo :_de la dang po lha'i rnal 'byor dang gcig:_sngags kyi rnal 'byor dang gnyis:_rdzogs rim gyi rnal 'byor dang gsum:_las mtha'i rnal 'byor dang bzhi'o:_rgya rgya rgya:_de la dang po lha'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pa la gsum ste:_dang po de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ni:_chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom:_de nas kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni:_sems can thams cad la khyab pa'i tshad med pa bzhi bsgom:_de nas rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin ni:_bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags kyis sku gsal gdab pa ni:_ngag tu \u0f00 AHhU~M:_d+hI ma ha ri ni sa:_ra tsa hrI ya:_zhes brjod pas:_bdag rdo rje phag moRa bsgom ste:_sku mdog dmaRa mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma:_khro zhal dmar mo spyan gsum ma g.yas na gri gug bsnams pa:_g.yon na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa:_kha TAM mchan khung g.yon na bcug nas 'dzin zhing dbu skra thur la 'phyang ba:_me long dril bu'i sgra 'khrol ba:_zhabs g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum pa:_rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa me ri 'bar ba'i klong na ro'i gdan la phyed skyil du bzhugs par bsgom:_de ltar bsgoms pa'i spyi gtsug klad pa dung khang gi gzhal yas khang :_rtse mo rnam par bkod pa:_rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu'i lte ba'i rtsa mdud kyi dbus na 'byung ba chu'i dngas ma:_pha ma'i rgyu'i thig le dkar po la: ye shes kyi rang 'od kha dog lnga ldan du gsal ba yi ge ha dang ri'i ngo bor gnas te rdo rje mkha' 'gro yab yum dngos yin pas der gsal gdab pa ni: sku mdog dkaRa mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis maH:_g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams pa:_g.yon pa ka pA la bsnams pa:_ro'i gdan la yab yum gnyis su med par 'khril ba:_phyag mtshan mthun pa gsal gdab:_rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu la mkha' 'gro yab yum sum brgya drug cu:_sku mdog phyag mtshan gtso bo yab yum dang mthun pa:_yab yum 'khril sbyor du bde ba'i ngang la bzhugs pa gsal gdab:_de yang ye shes lnga'i rtsal gyi rnam pa khro bo dang khro mo'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa:_de yang gdod ma nas ye shes kyi rang rtsal 'byung bzhi'i dngas ma yi ge dang sku ru rang byung du lhun gyis grub cing :_dam tshig dang ye shes gnyis su med pas 'dir gsal gdab pa'o:_mgrin par ro 'dus rtsa 'dab bcu drug gi lte ba'i rtsa mdud du 'byung bzhi'i dwangs ma pha ma'i khu khrag la yi ge ri dang tsa rnams ser po la ye shes kyi kha dog lnga ldan du gnas te:_rat+na DAk+ki yab yum dngos yin pas der gsal gdab pa ni: yab yum gnyis ka'i phyag g.yas na rin chen 'bar ba bsnams pa:_g.yon thod pa bsnams pa:_zhabs g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa:_rat+na'i gdan la 'khril sbyor du gsal gdab:_rtsa 'dab bcu drug la yab yum gnyis 'dra ba'i 'khor gsal gdab:_de yang dam tshig dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'o: snying kha na dran pa rnam par bkod pa rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lte ba la tsit+ta rin chen zur brgyad kyi nang na ye shes kyi dngas ma rgyu ba'i thig le snang la rang bzhin med pa mthing kha la ye shes kyi rang 'od kha dog lnga ldan dngas pa:_yi ge ma dang hU~M gi rang bzhin du gnas te:_sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yab yum dngos yin pas der gsal gdab pa ni kun tu bzang mo yab yum sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa:_phyag mtshan med pa yab yum 'khril sbyor du bzhugs pa:_rus pa'i rgyan drug dang ldan pa zhabs brkyang bskum nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs pa gsal gdab:_rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis la gtso bo yab yum dang 'dra ba'i 'khor gsal gdab:_de yang dam tshig dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'o:_lte ba na skyed byed drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rtsa 'dab kyi dbus kyi lte ba na:_'byung bzhi'i dngas ma pha ma'i rgyu'i thig le kha dog dmar po la:_ye shes kyi rang 'od kha dog lnga ldan du gsal ba yi ge ni dang hri'i ngo bor gnas pa:_pad ma mkha' 'gro yab yum dngos yin te der gsal gdab pa ni pad ma mkha' 'gro yab yum dmar po:_phyag g.yas gnyis na pad ma bsnams pa:_g.yon gnyis na thod khrag bsnams paH: zhabs g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa gsal gdab:_de yang dam tshig dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'o:_'khor gtso bo yab yum dang 'dra ba rtsa 'dab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa gsal gdab bo: gsang gnas bde ba myong byed rnam par bkod pa'i rtsa gdab nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi lte ba'i rtsa mdud la:_'byung bzhi'i dngas ma pha ma'i khu khrag kha dog ljang gu la ye shes kyi rang 'od kha dog lnga ldan du gsal ba:_yi ge sa dang ya'i ngo bor gnas pa de las kyi mkha' 'gro yab yum dngos yin te:_der gsal gdab pa ni las kyi mkha' 'gro yab yum sku mdog ljang khu phyag g.yas ral gri g.yon thod pa bsnams pa zhabs g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa:_rdo rje rgya gram gyi gdan la yab yum 'khril sbyor du gsal gdab bo:_rtsa 'dab nyi shu rtsa brgyad la gtso bo yab yum 'dra ba'i 'khor gsal gdab:_de yang dam tshig dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'o:_de ni grangs can gyi rtsa las rang byung gi lha lnga:_bzhi brgya dang bdun cu rtsa lnga gnas pa gsal gdab pa'o:_grangs med ni spyi bo'i gtsug nas rkang pa'i mthil yan chad la rtsa grangs las 'das pa'i nang na mkha' 'gro yab yum grangs las 'das pa til gyi gong bu kha phye ba tsam gnas pa yin pas de yang gsal gdab bo:_lha'i de kho na nyid kyi don yang rang lus rdo rje phag mor bsgom pa ni:_phyi ltar na yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin ma yin la:_nang ltar na rdo rje phag mo yin:_gsang ba ltar na yum e ka tsa ti yin no:_snying kha'i yum kun tu bzang mo yang phyi ltar na 'byung ba nam mkha'i ngo bo yin:_nang ltar na kun tu bzang mo:_gsang ba ltar na chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so:_mkha' 'gro ma bzhi yang phyi ltar na 'byung bzhi:_nang ltar na lha mo bzhi:_gsang ba ltar na yi ge bzhi'i ngo bo yin no:_rdo rje phag mo'i yab rta mgrin bskyed pa yang phyi ltar na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug:_nang ltar na rta mgrin:_gsang ba ltar na yi ge hrIH'i ngo bo yin no: dpa' bo bzhi yang :_phyi ltar na nyon mongs pa bzhi:_nang ltar na dpa' bo ging bzhi:_gsang ba ltar na yi ge bzhi'i ngo bo yin no:_rang gi lus yab yum gnyis su med par thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'o: sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyang 'khor lo lnga'i rtsa'i dbus su bskyed pa'i mkha' 'gro yab yum de dag gi snying gi dkyil na rang rang gi sa bon rnams gsal ba las 'khor lo bkod pa'i 'phrin las 'og tu gsal lo:_gnyis pa sngags kyi rnal 'byor ni:_rang gi snying gi dkyil gyi sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yab yum gyi snying khar pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i dkyil du:_yab yum gnyis kyi sa bon la ha ri ni sa ra tsa hrIH_ya brgyad kyis so sor bskor bar bsams la:_de dag rnams chos skor du sga ra ra 'khor bar bsams la:_ha ri ni sa:_ra tsa hrIH_yaH_tsit+ta hring hring dza dza:_zhes bzlas:_mkha' 'gro yab yum rnams kyang rang rang gi snying po'i ri ri bzlas par bsam:_de yang snying mi 'khor bar yig 'bru rnams 'khor bar bsam:_snying 'khor bar bsam na smyo ba'i nyen yod do:_de ltar zhag bdun bzlas pas:_dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gros dngos su byin gyis rlob par 'gyur te:_rtags ni:_rang gi shes pa 'gyur ba dang :_'phar ba dang:_ldeg pa dang :_'khrab pa dang :_glu len pa dang :_gar byed pa la sogs pa 'byung ngo :_sems bde bar shar nas 'khrab snying 'dod pa dang 'khrab pa dngos 'byung ngo :_de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi thun 'jog tsa na:_'khor 'phro bcad pas nyams bde lhan gyis 'gro'o:_gsum pa rdzogs rim gyi rnal 'byor ni:_mkha' 'gro lnga po de yang phyi ltar na sku lnga:_nang ltar na mkha' 'gro yab yum lnga:_gsang ba ltar na yi ge lnga:_rdzogs rim gyi de kho na nyid kyi don yang phyi ltar na sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yab yum chos kyi sku:_rdo rje mkha' 'gro yab yum longs sku:_rin chen mkha' 'gro yab yum sprul sku:_pad ma mkha' 'gro yab yum ngo bo nyid kyi sku:_las kyi mkha' 'gro yab yum mngon par byang chub pa'i sku'o:_nang ltar na sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yab yum gti mug rnam pa dag pa:_rdo rje mkha' 'gro yab yum zhe sdang rnam par dag paH: Rin chen mkha' 'gro yab yum nga rgyal rnam par dag pa:_pad+ma mkha' 'gro yab yum 'dod chags rnam par dag pa:_las kyi mkha' 'gro yab yum phrag dog rnam par dag pa'o:_gsang ba ltar na ye shes lnga ni:_sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yab yum chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes:_rdo rje mkha' 'gro yab yum me long lta bu'i ye shes:_rin chen mkha' 'gro yab yum mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes:_pad ma mkha' 'gro yab yum so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes:_las kyi DAk+ki yab yum bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so:_de ltar mkha' 'gro yab yum lnga bsgoms nas yig 'bru lnga bzlas pas:_mkha' 'gro yab yum rnams zhal mngon sum du mthong :_sku lnga lhun gyis grub:_dug lnga gnas su dag:_ye shes lnga rang bzhin gyis 'char:_'gro ba rang bzhin gyis skye rgyud 'chad:_skye shi la nyam mi nga bar 'byung ste:_lta ba sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yab yum yin te:_ci yang ma grub rang bzhin yin:_bsgom pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro yab yum yin te: mi 'gyur mi shigs sgom dang bral:_spyod pa rin chen mkha' 'gro yab yum yin te:_kun dang mthun par rang byung rang shar:_'bras bu pad+ma mkha' 'gro yab yum yin te:_'khor ba ma spangs rang sar grol:_dam tshig las kyi mkha' 'gro yab yum yin te:_'gro don thabs mkhas phrin las mdzad:_de ltar phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul du nyams su blang ngo :_las mtha'i rnal 'byor ni: rtogs pa khyad par can rgyud la skyer ma btub na:_rdo rje mkha' 'gro yab yum dbang du ma 'dus pa yin pas:_spyi gtsug tu rtsa mdud kyi yi ge las rdo rje mkha' 'gro yab yum gsal gdab ste:_yab yum gnyis kyi thugs khar rang rang gi sa bon bsam:_'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dang pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi'i dbus su bsam:_de la badzra DAk+ki ni hUM dza:_zhes pa dang :_badzra dpa' bo hA~M dzaH:_zhes pa gnyis kyis so sor bskor ba g.yas skor g.yon skor drag tu 'khor bar bsams la:_ha ri ni sa:_ra tsa hrIH ya:_badzra DAk+ki ni hU~M dza:_badzra dpa' bo hU~M dza: tsit+ta hring hring dza dza:_zhes bzlas:_bdud rtsi lnga la longs spyod gcer bu bya: smon spyod bya'o:_snang ba dkrug go:_de ltar byas pas dbang du 'dus te: rtogs pa khyad par can rgyud la skye:_des lta ba phyogs med du grol 'gro'o: zas nor dang bsod nams 'phel du ma btub na:_rin chen mkha' 'gro yab yum dbang du ma 'dus pa yin pas:_mgrin pa'i rtsa mdud rin chen mkha' 'gro gyi thugs 'khor lo gong du 'dra ba'i dbus su yab yum gyi sa bon la: rat+na DAk+ki ni hUM dza:_rat+na dpa' bo hU~M dza:_tsit+ta hring hring dza dza:_zhes bzlas shing :_me tshogs dang :_gos tshogs bya:_gtor tshogs bya:_chags zhen bcad:_des dbang du 'dus te bsod nams khyad par can skye:_zas nor gter rdol ba bzhin 'bul du 'ong ngo :_lus la drod mi skye:_bud med mi 'du na:_pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma dbang du ma 'dus pa yin pas:_lte bar rtsa mdud kyi nang du:_pad ma mkha' 'gro yab yum gyi snying khar:_pad+ma dang 'khor lo'i dbus su srog snying la:_pad+ma DAk+ki ni hUM dzaH_pad+ma dpa' bo hA~M dza:_tsit+ta hring hring dza dzaH:_zhes bzlas:_dka' thub bya:_gtum mo sbar:_gos gdab:_ri khrod 'grim:_bdud rtsi za'o:_des lus la drod skye:_bud med kun gyi yid 'phrog snang ba'i dngos po ci la yang chags zhen mi skye'o:_rten 'brel sna tshogs 'char du ma btub na las kyi mkha' 'gro dbang du ma 'dus pa yin pas: gsang gnas mkha' 'gro gsal gdab:_de'i thugs kar rang rang gi sa bon la:_karma DAk+ki ni hA~M dza:_karma dpa' bo hA~M dza:_tsit+ta hring hring dza dza:_zhes pas so sor bskor bar bsams la de gnyis myur du 'khor bar bsam zhing :_ha ri ni sa:_ra tsa hi ya:_karma DAk+ki ni hU~M dza:_karma dpa' bo hUM dza:_tsit+ta hring hring dza dza:_zhes bzlas shing :_rig pa gcun:_dka' thub bya:_snang ba dkrug:_ri khrod 'grim:_mthol bshags bya:_rten 'brel brtsi:_des rig pa dngas shing rten 'brel sna tshogs 'char ba:_yid la ci bsam 'grub:_dgra bgegs thul lo:_snang ba dbang du ma 'dus shing 'du ba gang yang med na:_'jig rten mkha' 'gro dbang du ma 'dus pa yin pas ri khrod 'grim:_zas tshogs bya: skra sen breg:_snod tshogs bya:_lcags gdab:_zhe 'dod med pa'i sgo nas ci byung yang mi bsdu bar phaT kyis gdab bo:_me tshogs bya:_phye mar dang :_rat+na bsreg:_ha ri ni sa:_'gul 'gul ma ma hring hring :_ma ma kha shi:_mi snying sgul sgul:_mi 'gram chog chog:_hring hring :_sdus sdus:_ma ma kha shi ba ma swA hA:_mi nor zas gsum dbang du sdus sdus:_zhes bzlas pas:_khrom 'du:_mi 'du:_zas 'du:_nor 'du:_de ltar bsgom bzlas byas na shes pa bzhi 'byung ngo :_sdug bsngal chos nyid du shes:_rkyen ngan dngos grub tu shes:_bar chad dge bskul du shes:_bdud lha ru shes pa 'byung ngo :_yang lta sgom spyod pa gsum 'byung ngo :_rtogs pa nang nas nyams su myong ba'i lta ba:_rig pa khong nas shar ba'i sgom pa:_rkyen ngan dang bar chad grogs su chod pa'i spyod pa gsum 'byung ngo :_de la mi gtong ba bzhi shes dgos:_gzhi myong ba yul thog tu mi gtong :_dbang po kha yan tu mo gtong:_yid dpyod lto phyir mi gtong : 'byung ba'i lus la ches cher mi bzung ngo :_mi phod pa brdzi ba bzhi lam du khyer te:_phyi yul gyi mi phod pa brdzi:nang lus kyi mi phod pa brdzi:_gsang ba dug lnga mi phod pa brdzi:de kho na nyid bu nor gyi mi phod pa brdzi:_de ltar nyams su blangs pas 'khri ba chod pa bzhi 'byung ste:_phyi yul la 'khri ba chod:_nang lus kyi 'khri ba chod:_gsang ba dug lnga'i 'khri ba chod:_de kho na nyid du sems kyi 'khri ba chod par 'gyur ro:_rkyen ngos bzung ba ni:_chos dang mi mthun pa ngos bzung la mtshang yul nas 'don:_rig pa la dri ma mi gnas par bzhag go:_rang rig bla mar shes nas rtogs pa nang nas 'char ro:_rig pa phyogs med du grol nas snang ba dbang du 'du'o:_rang nyid phag moRa gsal gdab:_rtsa mdud lngaRa mkha' 'gro yab yum bcu gsal gdab:_tsakra bcu bskor zhing mi sdod pa gsum lam du khyer:_lus mi sdod sgul bskyod bya:_ngag mi sdod ha ri ni sa bzla:_yid mi sdod ting nge 'dzin gsal gdab:_de la rtags ni 'du ba gsum 'byung ste:_'khor dang bud med zas nor 'du:_mkha' 'gro dang chos skyong 'dra:_sngags btsun dang skye bo 'du: rgyal dmangs dang khrom 'du:_'bar ba gsum 'byung ste:_lus la bde ba 'bar nas na tsha zhi:_ngag la nus pa 'bar nas 'dre gdon zhi:_sems la rtogs pa 'bar nas nyon mongs pa chos nyid du 'char ro:_rtags gsum 'char te:_lus byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtags gar dang ldeg pa'o:_ngag byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtags ci smras chos su 'ong :_yid byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtags chos nyid la brtan pa thob pa'o:_drod bzhi 'byung ste:_phyi'i drod lus yod du mi tshor ba dang :_nang gi drod dbugs phyi nang 'gyu ba mi tshor ba dang : gsang ba'i drod lus shing bal ltar yang ba'o:_tshud pa rnam pa gsum 'byung ste:_gdams ngag la rang byan tshud:_nyams myong la mjal ka tshud:_sems la sdug bsran tshud pa'o:_mngon shes gsum 'byung ste:_khyad par gyi mngon shes sems chos skur shes pa dang :_thun mong gi mngon shes legs nyes ci yong shes pa dang :_gsang ba'i mngon shes yi dam lha'i zhal mthong gsung thos pa'o:_thob pa gsum 'byung ste:_chos sku skye ba med pa thob:_longs sku 'gags pa med pa thob:_sprul sku gang la gang 'dul thob bo:_de ltar nyams su blangs na:_'khri ba btsan thabs su chod:_'jig rten pa'i mi dang blo mi mthun:_ri khrod la 'gro snying 'dod:_mkha' 'gro yab yum rnams kyis lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs:_lung ston:_chos 'chad:_legs nyes thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro:_zab rgya:_gtad rgya:_mkha' 'gro ma'i rgya:_rgya rgya rgya:

[6.20 pad+ma las ’brel rtsal gyi skyes rabs dang lung bstan]

@#/_/pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyi skyes rabs dang :_lung bstan bzhugs lags pas gzigs par zhu'o:_: slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo:_rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan gyis:_glang gi lo la bsam yas bzhengs pa'i sems skyes te:_g.ya' ri gong gi brag phug nas slob dpon pad+ma spyan drangs te sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs te:_'brug lo la 'byongs te slob dpon dang rgyal po yab yum sras dang bcas pas mchims phur tshogs 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad mdzad pa'i dus su:_rgyal po'i sras mo lha gcig pad+ma gsal bya ba:_dgung lo brgyad lon pa zhig mchims phur shi bas:_rgyal po shin tu thugs ma bde ste lha gcig gi ro la spyan gzigs shing bshums so:_dog sa la 'gyel te brgyal lo:_der mtsho rgyal gyis rgyal po'i dbu dar dkar gyi spre'us bslangs te:_thugs gsos so: der rgyal po brgyal sangs pa dang :_slob dpon gyis rgyal po la bka' stsal pa:_kye ma mnga' bdag rje:_spyir 'jig rten gyi bya ba rmi lam 'dra:_'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid sgyu ma yinaH_rgyal srid mdang gi rmi lam 'dra:_nor 'bangs rtsa kha'i zil pa 'dra:_tshe 'di mi rtag chu yi sbu ba 'dra:_'dus byas rkyen gyis 'jig pa yin:_'dus byas thams cad 'di dang 'dra:_rtag cing gnas pa gcig kyang med:_mi rtag rtag par ma bzung zhig:_skye med chos sku'i don la sbyongs:_zhes gsung so:_der rgyal po bzhengs te phyag dbu thod bud bud du btsal lo:_gser skyogs g.yu yis bkang ba slob dpon la phul nas:_kye slob dpon chen po lags:_'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid mi rtag na: nga'i gtsug lag khang 'di ji tsam na 'jig:_sangs rgyas bstan pa nam 'jig:_dam chos gang gis snub:_rkyen gang gis byed:_nga'i bu mo 'di tshe'i dus byed pa'i rgyu ci lags:_'dir pha ma las kyi 'brel pa ci las byung :_phyi ma skye ba gang du len:_mthar byang chub pa'i skal ba mchis sam zhes zhus pas:_slob dpon gyis bka' stsal pa:_kye+e rgyal po gson cig:_rgyal po'i gtsug lag khang 'di la 'jig ral mang du 'byung :_drug cu rtsa gcig glang gi lo la rgyal po mi rtag mya ngan 'da':_rgyal khrims hor gyi dmag gis 'jig: tha ma du ru ka yis 'dzin:_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun du gnas te dar gud mang du 'byung :_rgyal po'i gdung rgyud bco lnga song tsa na:_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nyams dma' bar 'gyur:_bsam yas mnga' thang nyams:_btsun pas khrims mi thub:_sngags pas dam tshig mi thub:_sde 'khrug nang dme byed: skye bos mna' za:_khrel med pha ma gsod:_bud med kyis lus mi thub:_lan chags byis pa gsod:_chos pa rnams kyis chos gzhung bzhin mi byed:_bka' la ras chod byed cing mchan tig la sogs pas bka' 'chal du 'jug: slob dpon dmod cing rang gi che ba 'don cing dam tshig chu la pho nas chos la thod byas nas nor dang yig sna gsogs:_'dul khrims me la bsreg: sems bskyed rlung la bskur:_mi tsher chos su rlom nas nga rgyal lam khyer byed: ting 'dzin du phrag dog bsgoms nas 'bad pa nor la byed:_chos log dang bsad bcad la dga':_grub thob tshong dus 'grims:_sgom chen gri 'khrug byed:_btsun pas lus srung mtshon la byed:_mi dpon sprang pos byed:_dge bshes kyis yul gtso byed:_lhar 'gong po dar:_'dre srin mchod:_smyon pas bsod nams sdud:_gtso boRa mo dang bon la 'dun ma gtod:_byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dkrug cing dkon mchog dgrar len:_nor dum re la mna' za:_sdig pa la sus thob byed:_rje'i bka' la 'bangs mi nyan:_dpon la g.yog mi nyan:_pha*la*bu*mi nyan:_ma la bu mo mi nyan:_blo rkun dang ngan shom dang dug sbyor dar:_rgyal rigs dmangs su 'bab:_brku gsod brdeg phrog sna tshogs byed:_mgo mtho thabs kyis smad:_las ka sdig la byed:_khrel med pha ma gsod:_log 'tsho sna tshogs dar:_rigs ngan gyis kha drag rlom: chang phor re la bltas nas gsang sngags khrom du klog:_gser ya ma re la bltas nas mgron po la yang dbang bskur:_nor la bltas nas lung med kyi rdzun dbang bskur:_lta ba nyams gtam:_bud med kyis cho ga 'don:_phas bu la yang blo mi khel ba'i dus shig 'byung :_de'i dus su bdud kyi rgyal po gcig gis chos pa'i lus blangs nas blon 'bangs rgyas par 'gyur ro:_de'i dus su hor dmag bod na 'byung ngo :_de 'byung ba'i snga ltas ni sad ser:_mu ge dang :_nad dang mtshon dang :_sa g.yos dang :_mi bde ba sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal te:_de'i dus su phal cher bdud dbang du song ste ngan song du ltung*:_chos byed rnams bsod nams chung :_sku tshe thung la bdud kyi dbang gis kun gyis gshe ba 'byung :_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nyams dma' zhing bod 'bangs bod khrims hor gyis 'jig:_lung pa khrag mtshor 'gro'o:_sa gzhi keng rus su 'gro:_las can chos byed thams cad mthar 'bros pas rgyal po nyid kyang gter chos rnams mthar sbas na 'gro don che:_de tsa na dus ngan pas bka' ma rnams bka' 'chal nas byin rlabs kyang chung du 'gro: grub pa thob pa yang nyung :_de dus su gter ma 'di bka' ma 'phyugs pas byin rlabs che:_las can cig gis gter sgo phye nas mthar dar bar 'gyur ro gsungs so:_rgyal pos yang slob dpon la zhus pa:_de lta bu de 'ong ba'i rgyu de ci:_lo gang la yong :_de rnams bzlog pa'i thabs zhu 'tshal zhes zhus pas:_slob dpon gyis gsungs pa:_kyai rgyal po de yong ba ni:_sngon bcom ldan 'das dang bdud nus pa 'gran pa'i dus su:_bdud pham pas bdud kyis shAkya'i bstan pa'i tha ma la ngas thams cad dbang du bsgyur bar shog cig*ces*smon*lam*btab*pas:_da lta dus kyi tha ma'i tshe:_phal cher bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis chos dang nor rdzas la che 'gran byed:_pha spun dang yul 'khrug byed:_btsun pas 'dus khrims mi bsrung rgyan cha la dga': sngags pas dam tshig mi bsrung bsnyen sgrub dor:_bud med kyis lus mi thub: skye bo ngo tsha bral:_btsan pos rgyal khrims mi skyong mi dge skyong :_chos med chos dkor skyong zhing rdo rje nang dme byed:_zhe sdang me 'bar 'dod chags chu ltar khol:_chos skyong 'drer ljang smyo 'dri dar ba'i dus:_bdud kyis byin gyis sngags btsun sri'u gso:_mkhas btsun 'dre brdung lta ba chad lta ston:_gsang sngags kha tshig khrom du klog pa'i dus:_bdud kyi bstan pa dar ba'i dus tshod der:_hor dmag lcags pho khyi'i lo la g.yul 'go 'tshol:_chu pho rta la rta bzhin rgyug:_me mo glang la gdug rtsub byed:_shing mo glang la thang cig zlog: de ni bzlog thabs yul khrims bzang po dang :_ri rgya klung rgya chos khrims dang : srog bslu mi dge tha dag spang :_dge bcu spyod cing tshul khrims sngags khrims bya:_gsung rab 'don cing gtsug lag gso:_mchod rten gso zhing sa dgra mnan:_nor gter mi 'don sa la gser mi brko:_khro rgyal sgrub pa bya zhing ma sring las la bkol:_tshogs dang mchod gtor bya zhing lha 'dre mdos kyis bskang :_chos khrims yul khrims mna' khrims bya:_rmang nas bzlog pa ma yin te:_thang cig bzlog par 'gyur pa yin:_lar lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la: spyod ngan byas nas dus ngan zer:_yul la zhag med 'jams skya 'phyo:_tshe la longs med skar mda' 'dra:_legs pa'i len ni nyes pas blan:_de tshe phyi dmag bod yul 'joms:_mi rnams ma lus gsod las che:_sdug bsngal khrag mtsho rdol las che:_rang sdug rang gis nyo las che:_snying re rje ste bya thabs med:_ces so:_slob dpon gyis yang gsungs pa:_kye rgyal po chen po khyed kyi lha lcam 'di tshe'i dus byed pa ni:_skye ba 'di'i gong du rgya gar gyi yul du ka ma kri ti'i grong khyer du:_rgyal po 'bo la ku tra'i btsun mor skyes te: btsun mo gnyis yod pa las mo la bu med gzhan de la bu yod pas:_phrag dog byas nas bsad pa'i rnam smin gyis 'dir tshe mthar ma phyin par tshe'i dus byas pa yin no:_'dir las kyi 'brel pa ni skye ba 'di'i yang snga la pad+ma bdag dang mnga' bdag rgyal po dang :_bo d+hi sa twa dang 'o skol gsum gyis ma gu ta'i yul du mchod rten bzhengs te smon lam btab pa de sbrang bu tre ma'i lus su yod pa des thos pa las byung ba'o:_phyi ma ni lo stong du duHkha spyod de bshad na rgyal po thugs khrel du 'gro gsung :_rgyal po dges pa'i don du bshad na lha lcam 'di ni skye ba bdun kyi gong du rgya gar gyi yul ko ta'i gtsug lag khang du bram ze'i bu bya ta la zhes bya bar skyes te dge slong byas pas: gtsug lag khang de'i me tog gi ldum rar ku ku gnyis kyis chags pa spyad pa mthong bas chags pa skyes nas:_rigs ngan gyi bu mo la spyad pas bslab pa nyams:_bslab pa nyams pas ku ku ra la zhe sdang skyes te:_rigs ngan mo'i 'bras rdung ba'i tho bas ku ku'i rdo rje brdungs pas ku ku shi'o:_de'i nyes pas byol song gi skye ba mo lus lo brgya len cing duHkha spyod par 'gyur ro:_yang de'i gtsug lag khang de'i A lo ki rgyu'i til mar bdun zos:_de'i nyes pas yi dwags kyi skye ba lo brgya len no:_ku ku de'i srog bcad pas dmyal ba'i skye ba lo brgya len no:_yang ko ta'i gtsug lag khang gi dge 'dun la ta la'i tshig rtsub gcig brjod pa'i nyes pas lha ma yin gyi skye ba lo brgya len no:_de nas gtsug lag khang de'i lha la me tog gtor ba'i las kyis lha'i skye ba lo brgya len no:_de nas bsam yas su khyi mo long ma'i skye ba bdun len no: duHkha la spyod par 'gyur ro:_de nas yar lung gi stod du bud med mi sdug pa'i gzugs can bsod nams chung ba sprang mo'i rigs kyi skye ba bcu len cing lo lnga brgya dang bcu bdun du duHkha spyod par 'gyur ro:_mthar ni pad+ma bdag dang phrad cing byin gyis rlob cing mi lus thob cing sangs rgya'o:_zhes gsungs so:_yang rgyal pos zhus pa:_mi lus nam thob:_chos gang la spyod: skye ba du la sangs rgya zhing gang du 'dug ces zhus pas:_slob dpon gyis bka' stsal pa:_las ngan de rnams byang nas:_sgrags grong gsar du bud med gcig gi lus thob nas dbang po tshang bar skye:_nga'i gdams pa 'brel pa thogs pa tsam 'byung :_de nas 'phos nas lho brag gi la yag tu skye:_bu mo sprel lo ma shes rab che ba cig skye:_nga'i sprul pa gcig gis zin te lam sna zin par 'gyur ro:_de nas 'phos nas g.yas ru grong dmar bya bar skyes pa'i lus thob ste sngar gyi ko ta'i gtsug lag tu rab tu byung ba'i bag chags kyis rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro:_de nas nga'i sprul pa gcig dang 'phrad nas gdams pa byin pas rig pa'i ngo bo mthong ste:_DAk+kis rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro:_skye ba de'i 'og tu rdo dang bod kyi mtshams su 'bri ldang zhes bya bar skye ste:_snga ma'i bag chags kyis rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro:_DAk+ki ma thams cad kyis bar chad bsrungs te nga'i zab gter dang 'phrad de gter sgo gsum 'byed par 'gyur ro:_de'i dus su 'gro don mi 'byung ste sbas pa'i tshul du nyams su len pa'i dus yin:_nga'i zab chos kyi bdag por 'gyur ro:_'on kyang chos kyi 'brel bdun cu 'byung ngo :_Dak+kis yid bskul zab mo'i gnad kyi 'brel pa bdun gsum 'byung ngo :_zab gter 'di'i bdag po sgrags zur khang du bu mo sprel lo ma lus phra la rnam bzhag che ba shes rab che ba chos la mos pa yid du 'ong zhing so zho yod pa smin mtshams su sme ba pad+ma 'dra ba yod pa mtsho rgyal gyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhig 'byung :_de la gdams pa byin na kha rag gi phur lhag med la sangs rgya'o:_dar cha yang 'ga' tsam 'byung ngo : de min 'gro don mi 'byung zhing thams cad bdud kyis bsam pa bsgyur de la mos pa shin tu nyung ngo :_de dang 'phrad pa yang don chen du 'gyur ro:_de ni lo lnga bcu nga dgu la skye ba 'phos te de'i gong du 'da' ba'ang srid:_tshe sgrub byas na bag cig bzhugs so:_de nas 'phos nas bum thang du skye bar 'gyur roH:_bum thang smad kyi brag seng ge 'dra ba la klong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud dang : snying tig gi rgyud bcu bdun man ngag dang bcas pa thon par 'gyur ro:_lho brag mkhar chu la rdzogs chen gyi bstan pa dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro:_zab mo gnad kyis theb pa brgya rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo :_chos kyi 'brel pa stong rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo :_'gro don nus pa sum cu 'byung ngo :_lho brag gi brag seng ge'i gdong pa can nas sems phyogs kyi chos sde thams cad thon par 'gyur ro:_mon mkhar steng nas bdag gi ngan sngags zab mo thon par 'gyur roH: mchims phu 'di nyid du sbas pa'i lha lcam mo rang gi zab dor zab ber srub med dang g.yu gung ri kha dmar 'di dang :_gzi mchong gser g.yu'i lan tshar 'di dang :_dadul dkar gyi me long rgyangs gsal 'di dang :_o rgyan bdag gi chos gos gser gyi ha ris can 'di dang :_thod pa smug 'khrigs pa 'od kha 'di'i nang du tshe gcig la sangs rgya ba'i dbang bzhi'i gdams pa rgyud dang bcas pa sbed pas 'di rnams mor skye ba 'phos te pho lus blangs nas thon par 'gyur ro:_'gro don dpag med byas te skye ba der mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te zangs mdog dpal rir rgyal po dang mtsho rgyal dang lha lcam dang :_pad+ma 'o skol zhal mjal lo gsungs:_der rgyal po dgyes te phyag dang bskor ba yang byas:_slob dpon gyis rgyal po la gdams pa dpag tu med pa gsungs:_der lha lcam gyi lus gos gdams pa dang bcas pa bswe sgrom smug por bcug ste gter du sbas te:_lha lcam nyid dang 'phrad par smon lam btab bo:_de nas slob dpon gyis lha lcam gyi snying khar shes rab mtshal gyis yi ge nra:_gcig bris te rnam par shes pa bkug pas dbugs byung ste lab shes pa byung ngo :_der dbang bskur te gsang mtshan pad+ma las 'brel rtsal du btags so:_tshe sngon gyi las ngan zad pa dang sangs rgyas te yab sras dpon slob dang bcas pa mjal lo:_zhes mo la lung yang bstan no: de nas pur de bsreg pa'i tshul bstan pa dang slob dpon gyis skad cig la o rgyan yul du tshogs 'khor mdzad do:_slob dpon gyis gsungs pa:_mtsho rgyal gyis 'di rnam dkar chag la thob cig:_nga'i zab gter la sbed de phyi mar lha lcam skye ba 'phos pa'i dus su nga'i zab gter dang 'phrad pas yid ches pa'i don du:_de'i zla la sbed do gsungs te mtsho rgyal gyis yi ger btab bo:_phyi ma la lha lcam mo rang dang 'phrad pa'i dus su yang kha byang 'di nyid su la yang bstan:_gdams pa ni smos kyang ci 'tshal te rang nyams su longs shig: tshe'i dus ma byas pa'i gong du gdams pa rnams dang kha byang gi shog ser 'di rnams bum thang smad kyi brag seng ge 'dra ba'i steng na shing be rkang gcig yod do:_thag pa btags nas dpyangs la phyin pa na phyi nas mi gsal ba'i phug pa gcig yod pas de'i phug na klong gsal gyi rgyud dang bcu bdun rgyud gdams pa dang bcas pa yod pas de'i zla la skyol:_skye ba de'i phyi ma la de dang 'phrad par the tshom med par yid ches pa 'byung :_gdams pa 'di mtsho rgyal gyis byin gyis brlabs pa de min pa su la yang tshig tsam yang ma zag par gter du sbos so:_skye ba 'dir spel yang mi 'phel te yid mi ches shing gshe skur gyi gnas su 'gro:_las can gdul bya dus la ma bab pas zog tu mthong yong :_DAk+ki ma'i bka' chad kyang 'byung nges pas rlung phyogs tsam du yang ma brjod:_nyams su blangs te sba bar bya'o:_zhes yi ger btab bo:_sa ma yA:_rgya rgya rgya:_spr-i:_bdag 'dra pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis:_yang cig gter gyi kha byang bstan:_byar zhes bya ba'i lung phu na:_lha ri gzigs po zhes bya'i ri: 'bru phung spungs pa lta bu'i rtse:_yid tsam lho ru nye ba na:_man shel dag las grub pa yi:_rdo rje sems dpa'i sku ni khru gang ba:_de yi nang du bltas pa yis: zhi khro longs sku'i lha tshogs ni:_yul khams tsam du 'char ba yod:_de yi zla la rdo rje sems dpa' yi:_ngo sprod gnad kyi man ngag bcu drug yod:_gser g.yu rin chen bre gang yod:_rgya rgya:_tsA ri dag gi la so na:_rta gdong 'dra ba'i brag gcig yod:_de yi rtse mo bas ni dma' sa na:_rta mgrin dbang gi sgrub rgyud ni:_zangs kyi rta mgo gang yod do:_rgya rgya:_bos na rdo ba mtshan ma 'dra ba yi:_pha 'ong 'og na tsA ri'i gter yig dang :_DAk+ki'i sgrub skor brgya dang rtsa brgyad yod:_dbang sdud man ngag khrid dang bdun gsum yod:_tsA ri dag gi rnam dag dang :_rngam pa sgra sgrog bsil ba tshal gyi lam yig yod:_rgya rgya: byar gyi phu na sham mda' zhes bya'i yul:_brag ni stag mo gnam du mchongs 'dra la:_bka' brgyad phur pa gshin rje'i ngan sngags skor:_grangs las 'das te shog ser khur cig yod:_rgya rgya:_dwags kyi yul gyi sgam po zangs lung zhes bya la:_brag ri ral pa gnam du brdzes pa 'dra ba la:_bram ze skye ba bdun pa'i keng rus sha rnams dang :_de yi mgo la phag mo lha lnga byon pa yod: rgya rgya:_de yi shar gyi kong po nga la na:_pha 'ong dmar po snying gi gzugs 'dra la:_de yi 'og na dar zab rin chen sna lnga'i gter yod do:_rgya rgya:_bu chu lha khang zhes bya'i gtsug lag la:_ma them dag gi g.yas na ni:_res bzhi dag la brus pa na:_gser phye phul gang yod do:_rgya rgya:_kong po ba yo zhes pa'i la gcig brgal ba na:_mtsho yi dkyil na bo do gcig la ni:_'chi med tshe chu'i gter yod do:_rgya rgya:_yang byar smad a shu brag mdun na:_mchod rten dag gi bum pa na:_tshe sgrub sman gyi bcos kha mang du yod:_rgya rgya:_'di rnams kyi lde mig zangs yag brag la yod:_kun la mi bstan gsang ba gces:_rdzogs so:_dang lung ldang lha'i brag mdun nas/_/sprul sku nyang ban tshul blo yis/ khyad par mkha' 'gro snying tig skor/_/gdan drangs sho ban legs ldan la/_/ thugs kyi sras su gzigs nas gnang*/_/sku drin che 'o brjed pa med/_/chos rje byang sems legs ldan pas/_/bya bral dgon rin bdag la gnang /_/ye shes mtsho rgyal gyi phyag bris shog ser sngo skya las bshus so/_/dge'o//_//

[6.21 gter gyi kha byang]

@#/_/gter gyi kha byang bzhugs pa'o:_mang+ga laM:_: bdag 'dra pad ma 'byung gnas kyis:_yang cig gter gyi kha byang bstan: byar zhes bya ba'i lung phu na:_lha ri bzis po zhes bya'i ri:_'bru phung spungs pa lta bu'i rtse:_yid tsam lho ru nye ba na:_man shel dag las grub pa yi:_rdor sems sku ni khru gang la:_de yi nang du bltas pa yis:_zhi khro longs sku'i lha tshogs ni:_yul khams tsam du 'char ba yod:_de yi zla la rdo rje sems dpa' yi:_ngo sprod gnad kyi man ngag bcu drug yod:_gser g.yu rin chen bre gang yod:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_tsA ri dag gi la so na:_rta gdong*'dra*_ba'i brag cig yod:_de yi rtse bas dma' ba na:_rta mgrin dbang gi sgrub rgyud ni: zangs kyi rta mgo gang tsam yod:_rgya rgya rgya:_bos kyi rdo mtshan 'dra ba'i 'og: DAk+ki dag gi sgrub skor ni:_rigs mi 'dra ba brgya rtsa yod:_dbang sdud man ngag khri dang bdun gsum yod:_rtswa ri'i lam yig rnam bdun dang :_rngam pa sgra sgrogs lam yig dang :_bsil ba tshal gyi lam yig yod:_rgya rgya rgya:_byar phu sham mda' zhes bya'i yul:_brag ni stag mo gnam du mchongs 'dra la: bka' brgyad phur pa gshin rje'i man ngag skor:_grangs las 'das te shog ser khur cig yod:_rgya rgya rgya:_dwags kyi sgam po zangs lung na:_brag ni ral pa gnam du brdzes 'dra la:_bram ze skye bdun rkang rus sha rnams dang :_de'i dbu la phag mo lha lnga byon pa yod:_rgya rgya rgya:_de'i shar gyi kong po da la na:_pha bong dmar po snying gi gzugs 'dra la:_de'i 'og na dar zab rin chen sna lnga'i gter yod:_rgya rgya rgya :_kong po'i bu chu lha khang zhes bya'i gtsug lag na:_ma them dag gi g.yas dag na:_res bzhi dag la brus pa naH:_gser gyi phye ma phul gang yod:_rgya rgya rgya:_:kong po ba yo zhes bya'i la brgal ba na:_mtsho dkyil bo do gcig la ni:_'chi med tshe chu'i gter yod do:_rgya rgya rgya:_gzhan yang :_byar smad a shu'i mdun na ni:_mchod rten dag gi bum pa na:_tshe sgrub sman gyi bcos ka mang du yod:_'di rnams kyi lde mig zang yag brag la yod: kun la mi bstan gsang zhing sba bar bya'o:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_kha tham:_rgya rgya rgya: @#/_/rgyal sras legs pa'i lung bstan no: dri med shel dkaRa mgon skyid khyod:_'khrul nas bzang ngan rtog dpyod kyang :_theg chen lam la gus pas zhugs:_'di nas skye ba bcu bdun na:_tshe lo lnga bcu kha ral dus:_kha ba can gyi dbus kyi cha:_dkar po gling phran gnyal gyi yul:_gser gyi sdig pa gab 'dra yi:_lung pa chu dkar shar lhor blta:_gsad gso sngags kyi rgyud 'dzin bu:_rdo rje'i rigs ldan yum la bltams:_pad+ma'i rigs yin don blo ldan:_'khor ba'i cha 'dzin des ma gos: o rgyan chos kyis rang rgyud grol:_de phyir 'khor ba cig chod sogs:_sems can kun don de la gtod:_gsang sngags snying po'i mthar thug 'di:_bkrag chung rdo rje brag la sbed:_gter srung mkha' 'gro nag mo gyis:_gter 'di klu btsan khyod la gtad:_las ldan snying gi bu la gtod:_las med byung na ma sbyin cig:_ces pa 'di rdzogs chen 'khor ba chig chod kyi gsham na 'dug go: @#/_/yang zab mkha' 'gro snying thig 'di:_kun la ma spel nyams su longs:_spel drags snod min dam sel byed:_de yi sku tshe tshad mi phyin: brgyud 'dzin nyer cig lnga bshad pa:_gcig gis tshul dang ldan pas spel: shel dkar skye ba bcu bdun na:_sham po gangs kyi shar lho ngos:_rigs ldan chu khams stag lo pa:_sbas tshul 'khor ba'i cha 'dzin cing :_zhen pa chung zhing ngang rgyud ring :_snying sdar tshe ring longs spyod chung :_snying thig thabs kyi cha yin pas:_brla g.yas pa yi nang logs la:_sha sme 'kha' 'gro'i spyan 'dra yod:_skyes bu dam ldan legs pa zhes:_zab mo chos kyi bstan pa spel:_skyes mtha'i byang sems min re kan:_'di yis 'gro don spel ba yod:_sa la gnas pa'i byang sems kyis:_rgya gar rgya nag sing ga dang :_bod yul kun tu 'phel ba 'gyur:_gzhan yang bshes gnyen dam pa dang :_lam bsgom theg chen rigs rnams mos:_phal ba'i 'gro ba mos 'dud nyung :_'di dang 'phrad tshad don chen 'gyur:_ces pa mkha' 'gro snying thig gi nang na 'dug go:_m+biH

[6.22 mkha’ ’gro snying tig gi lag ’grig]

@#/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gi lag 'grig bzhugs pa lags so ang*/ bla ma yi dam Dak+ki la na mo/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gi lag 'grig la/ dang po dal 'byoRa rnyed dka' bsgom/_las rgyu 'bras/_'khor ba'i nyes dmigs/_thar pa'i phan yon bsam/_'chi ba mi rtag pa bsgoms pa dang / sngon 'gro'i chos bzhi tshang bar bya/_de nas skyabs 'gro sems bskyed bya/ yig brgya bsgom bzlas/_maN+Dal 'bul ba/_bla ma'i rnal 'byor rnams rim par bya'o/_/bskyed rim gyi skor la/_skyabs 'gro sems bskyed spyi mthun byas/ rigs lnga mchod 'bum gyi bka' bsgo nas mchod pa byin brlab yan byas/ rigs lnga phyi sgrub ltar gzhal yas khang bskyed nas bdag bskyed rigs lnga nang sgrub la bya/_mdun bskyed rigs lnga phyi sgrub la byed/_spyan 'dren nas nang mchod 'bul ba yan dkyus bzhin bya/_de nas sman rag gtor gsum 'bul/ gsang mchod bya/_/_bstod pa dang bshags pa bya/_tshogs mchod bya/_lhag ma mkha' 'gro'i las byang nas btang /_gtor lhag chad mdo bstan skyong dang bcas pa bya'o/_/mkha' 'gro'i las byang yang /_skyabs 'gro nas mchod pa byin brlab yan dkyus bzhin no/_/gzhal yas khang rigs lnga phyi sgrub ltar ro/_/rta mgrin lus dkyil la bdag bskyed bya/_DAk+ki mngon rtogs la mdun bskyed bya/_spyan 'dren nas nang mchod yan dkyus bzhin no/_/sman raka gtor gsum gsang mchod bya/_bstod pa gzhung ltar bya'o/_/tshogs mchod rgyas par byed pa la/_gong ma ltar spyan 'dren cig tshogs la spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol ces pa sbyar ro/_/tshogs 'bul/_bskang ba bya/_las byang ltar bshags pa bya/_bsgral btab bya/_lhag chog bya/_shin tu gal che mkha' 'gro'i bskul yang bya/_gtor lhag bskyang ngo /_/da dbang gi skor la slob dpon dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid brtags pa ni dang po'i dus su bya'o/_/sa chog bya/_dkyil 'khor stegs bu legs par byas te dris byugs/_me tog tshom phun gzhung ltar bkod/_bum pa bca'/_mngon rtogs rigs lnga phyi nang gis bsgom zhing tshogs yan tshang bar bya/_gsol ba gdab/_sta gon gyi cho ga rnams bya/_bum pa bsgrub/_slob bu sta gon bya/_dam tshig phog_/thun mong gi rdzas bzhi gtad/_chos bshad/_de nas theg chog dang tshon chog bya/_de nas dal sgrub/_dal bstan pa'i skabs su dkyil 'khor gyi rnam dag bshad/_lha ngo bstan pa'i dus su lha'i rnam dag bshad/_de nas dbang bskur ba nas rjes chog yan dkyus ltar bya'o/_/rtsod pa'i skyon bsal/_de nas gsang dbang gi skabs su nub gcig la dbang rdzogs par byed na dbang rnams dkyus su bskur/_nub gsum ltar byed na gsang dbang gi dus su dkyil 'khor gong ma bzhag_/gzhung ltar rdzas bsags la dbang bskur/_lha'i dkyil 'khor ngo yang sprad/_ces pa'i rjes su gsang dbang gi lhan thabs bshad sa bcad kyi lung bya/[ · ]shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bya ba'i skabs su gsol ba gdab/_dam tshig bsrung sdom bshad/_de nas mngon rtogs dran rdzogs bsgom/_gdong g.yogs ye shes dbab/_lhan thabs bshad/_nga'i b+ha ga gsang chen zhes pa nas/_de nas rdo rje tshig 'di brjod ces pa yan bya/_dbang gi rgyab yig bshad/_kye ma las ldan rigs kyi bu/_zhes sogs brjod/_de nas sa bcad bshad/_de nas tshig dbang bskur/_sa bcad bshad/_dbang bsgrigs su byed na rig pa yang rtsal gyi dbang byed/_dbang gi don khrid bya'o/_/de nas khrid kyi skabs su/_sngon 'gro dang bla ma'i rnal 'byor rnams gong du song nas/_dngos gzhi ni/_btags grol don khrid dang thod rgal don khrid nor bu'i snying po gnyis kyis khog phub/_thog rgal don khrid gsal sgron la gzhung bya/_khrid rgyab lung phreng gis spro ba bskyed/_rnal dbab yan chad tshang bar bya/_rab 'byams rig pa'i rtsal dbang rig pa sgron ma'i ti ka bshad/_khregs gcod ngo sprad/_rig pa yang rtsal gyi dbang bskur/_thod rgal gyi khrid bya'o/_/de rnams la brtags yig gis brtag_/tshad yig gis tshad du skyol ma skyol brtag_/lag khrid kyis zhag grangs gtan la phab po/_/bar do ngo sprod byed pa la/_dang po nyin mo'i ngo sprod la stegs bu dang yo byad thams cad bsags/ bsgom bzlas mchod bstod tshang bar bya/_gsol ba gdab/_gnang ba spyin/ bum dbang bskur/[ · ]shel la chos sku ngo sprad/_gsang dbang bskur/_me long dang rma bya'i mdangs kyi longs stungo sprad/_shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur/_me long g.ya' dag pa'i chos sku rang la gnas tshul nang du gzugs brnyan shaRa ba la ngo sprad/ tshig dbang rin po che bskur/_don rang rig gsal stong chos skur ngo sprad pa ni/_shel mig la ma reg tsam la bltas nas bla ma la bltas te rim gyis brtags nas de la ngo sprad/_de nas chos nyid bar do ngo sprod bya'o/_/de nas mtshan mo ngo sprod bya ba ni rdzas yo byad thams cad bsags te/_gtor ma'i dbang bskur/_rgyal thabs spyi blugs kyi dbang bskur/_de nas ngo sprod dngos la gsum ste/_sde skor sa la bkod pa ni bca' gzhi rnams so/_/brda skor mkha' la 'char ba ni/_'ja' 'od la sogs pa'o/_/don skor rang la gnas pa ni rang gi sems nyid la'o/_/zhes ngo spyad do/_/des gzhan rnams tshig gis 'grel dang bstun nas bshad do/_/dpal ldan bla ma'i gsung las byung ba'i snying tig gi lag 'grig 'di/_bla ma'i gsung las byung ba bzhin du ma nor bar brjed tho yi ger btab pa ni/_bdag brjed ngas tshes bas bris pa la bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gros bzod par gnang du gsol lo/_/mang+ga laM/_shu b+haM/_b+ha wan+tu//_//

[6.23 lo rgyus rgyal ba g.yung gis mdzad pa]

@#/_/lo rgyus rgyal ba g.yung gis mdzad pa bzhugs so/_/ na mo gu ru/_chos sku kun bzang longs sku zhi khro'i tshogs/_/sprul sku rdo rje 'chang chen dgongs pa brgyud/_/rig 'dzin brda brgyud dga' rab rdo rje dang /_/shrI sing ha o rgyan yab yum dang*/_/chos kyi rgyal po rang byung rdo rje la/_/bdag cag gang zag gus pas gsol ba 'debs/_/'dir theg pa thams cad kyi yangs rtse/_man ngag thams cad gyi nying khu/_mngon sum rang thog tu gtan la 'bebs pa'i gnad/_zab pa las ches zab pa/_mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying khrag gcig tu dril ba mkha' 'gro snying thig ces bya ba/ thun mong ma yin pa'i man ngag khyad par can gyi chos 'di'i lo rgyus ni/ mkha' klong rnam par dag pa 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po yab yum chos kyi sku dri ma dang bral ba/ ci'i ngo bor yang ma grub pa las/_sku zhal phyag gi rnam par bzhengs nas/ chos sku spros pa dang bral ba'i ngang nas 'og min gyi gnas su dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la rang bzhin gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis bshad do/_/longs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dur khrod me ri 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang du/_bzhugs pa de mi'i yul du bzhugs kyang dgongs pa sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa po dga' rab rdo rje la tshig tsam du bshad/_des slob dpon shrI sing ha la rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi dur khrod chen por mngon sum rang thog tu phab nas bstan/_des rig 'dzin chen po pad+ma thod 'phreng rtsal zhes bya ba rdo rje lta bu'i sku 'das grongs dang bral ba de la dur khrod chen po so sa'i gling du gnas lugs yid dpyod dang bral bar bstan/_de yang kun tu bzang mo klong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud dang /_rig pa rang shar gyi rgyud dang /_snying gi me long gi rgyud/_yi ge med pa'i rgyud/_sgrol ma 'bar ba'i rgyud/_nor bu phra bkod kyi rgyud/_nyi zla kha sbyor gyi rgyud/_ngo sprod spras pa'i rgyud/_mu tig phreng ba'i rgyud/_rig pa rang grol gyi rgyud/_rdzogs pa rang byung gi rgyud/_klong chen drug pa'i rgyud/_sku gdung 'bar ba'i rgyud/_rin chen spungs pa'i rgyud dang bcu bdun dang*/_gzhan yang stong gsal dri med rgyud/_gcig shes kun grol gyi rgyud/_yang ti gser 'bru gcig pa'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas sras gcig gi rgyud/_rang byung rig pa'i rgyud/_yongs rdzogs chen po'i rgyud/_de ltar btags pas grol ba'i rgyud drug_/sangs rgyas dang rig 'dzin gyi 'das rjes/_btags grol snying po'i don khrid dang bcas pa rnams gtad nas mngon sum rang thog tu gtan la phab bo/_/slob dpon chen po pad+ma byung gnas kyis g.ya' ri gong gi brag phug tu gnang ba bzhin mngon du gyur nas rgyud kyi dgongs pa phyi rabs kyi don du man ngag tu bkod pa 'di rnams ni/_dbang po tha ma'i rten gyi gang zag kyang lo bdun dang zla ba bcu gcig la phung po lhag ma med par 'tshang rgya ba'i gdams pa yin no/_/de nas slob dpon chen po de 'pho ba chen po'i lus kyis bod yul du byon nas/_lha srin gdug pa can thams cad btul zhing dam la btags/_rgyal po khri srong lde btsan la sogs pa las can gyi slob ma dpag tu med pa smin par mdzad/ ma 'ongs pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi don du thugs gter bsam gyis mi khyab pa sbas yod kyi/_rdzogs pa chen po snying tig gi gdul bya rnams bi ma la mi tra byon nas 'dul bar dgongs te dar bar ma mdzad do/_/gzho stod ti sgro'i brag la bzhugs pa'i dus su jo mo mtsho rgyal gyis zhabs tog bgyis shing dbang dang gdams ngag thams cad rdzogs shing yi ger btab nas gu ru la zhus pa/_chos 'di rnams spel lam sbed/_gdul bya la phan ji ltar thogs gang gis spyod zhus pas/_gu ru'i zhal nas/_da lta spel ba'i dus la ma bab gter du sbed dgos/_mnga' bdag gi sras mo lha lcam pad+ma gsal gyis snying tig gi dpe sgrom spyi bor blangs nas smon lam btab pas mo'i chos skal yin/_mo tshe'i dus byas nas skye ba 'ga' zhig brgyud pa'i tha ma la chos 'di dang 'phrad/_de'i phyir sbed dgos/_snying tig gi bstan pa bi ma las skyong / khong gi gdul bya dus la babs pa yin/_bdag gi snying tig gi bstan pa ni/ snying tig snga 'gyur 'chal te nub tu nye ba'i dus na bstan pa nub khar gsal te/_rgyas la dar drags pa yun thung bar 'gyur/_dus kyi tha ma mi lo lnga bcu kha ral gyi dus su lha lcam 'di mi lus len/_de mnga' bdag gi sprul pas rjes su 'dzin/_mnga' bdag skye ba mtha' ma'i dus su chos 'brel thogs pa tsam yin/_skye ba de'i phyi ma la snying tig man ngag gi gter dang 'phrad/_de'i dus su 'gro don mi 'byung nyams su len pa'i dus yin/_tshe tshad lnga bcu nga dgu bzhugs/_las dag ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i 'brel pa kha yar 'ong /_/_de rnams la la bde ba can du 'gro ste khong gi gdul byar 'gyur/_la la ngan song du skye/_de nas dam sel gyis gshegs tshul ston te/_lnga bcu'i gong du 'da' yang srid/_dam sel la 'dzem la bshags pa la 'bungs/_de ltar byas na dgung lo tshad du bzhugs so/_/de'i dus su Dak+ki sde lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'i bud med cig 'byung srid de/_de'i gdul bya yin no/_/de byung na des phyag rgya ma byas nas tshe la gsos thebs na lnga bcu las mi tshad pa yang bzhugs srid do/_//gdul bya las ldan gyi bu de sha sme'i rtags can zhig 'ongs bas/_de la gdams pa ma lus pa byin na 'gro don yang bag tsam zhig nus so/_de la ma byung na phyi ma'i gdul byar 'ong nges te kha rag gi phur lhag med 'tshang rgya'o/_/gdams pa 'di rnams bum thang smad du ma 'khyol na sngar gyi gter shul lam lha 'dre mi 'pho ba'i brag la sbas na skye ba phyi ma la thon par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba 'di 'das nas longs sku'i zhing khams dar gcig nyul lo/_/de nas bum thang thar pa gling du skye/_bco lnga lon nas 'gro don byed/_gter sgo mang bar 'byed/_rdzu 'phrul ya ma zung ston te dgung lo bcu bdun bzhugs/_bud med kyi lus bzung ba'i DAk+ki sde lngas yum byas te 'gro don 'ur ba 'byung /_sras zla ba grags pa bya ba rta mgrin gyi sprul pa gcig 'khrungs/_des kyang 'gro don byed de bstan pa mi lo dgu bcu skyong ngo*/_/de'i chos skal yin pas gter du sbed/_ces gsungs nas bum thang seng ge'i brag phug tu rgyud bco brgyad kyi glegs bam sbas te bzhugs so/_/rgyud de rnams kyi dgongs pa gcig tu gnad kyi man ngag tu dril ba/_ku su la'i skor zab pa las ches zab pa 'di rnams dwags po dang lung gi khra mo brag la gter tu sbas nas ldang lha la gter bdag bcol te/_'di'i chos skor gyi grangs la/_btags grol gyi rgyud drug dang /_de'i 'grel pa drug pa dang /_lo rgyus dang /_rtsal dbang dang /_rgyud kyi bcang thabs dang /_gzhan don rtags bstan dang /_yon tan dang 'byung tshul lam che ba/_'das rjes gsum dang*/ btag grol don khrid dang nyi shu rtsa gsum po de btags grol gyi skor ro/_/ yang rigs lnga phyi sgrub dang nang sgrub dang /_spros bcas bum dbang dang /_DAk+ki mngon rtogs dang /_dbang gsum pa dang /_gsum pa'i lag len dang / dbang gi rgyab yig dang /_khyad par gyi dbang lnga dang*/_phyi sgrub nang sgrub kyi las byang thun mong dang /_gsang sgrub kyi las byang rtsar 'phreng dang*/_dbang sgrub dang /_bum sgrub dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi rnam dag dang*/_phyi nang gi tshogs mchod dang /_gtor ma'i cho ga dang /_gsang sgrub kyi tshogs mchod dang / dbang gsum tho yig dang /_gsang dbang gi lhan thabs dang /_shes rab ye shes kyi lhan thabs dang /_mkha' 'gro snying tig gi man ngag dang /_spyi gnad dang /_bla rdo dang /_DAk+ki'i nor sgrub dang*/_nyi shu rtsa gsum po de dbang dang / lag len gyi chos skor ro/_/yang thod rgal don khrid nor bu'i snying po dang / de'i ti ka gsal byed sgron ma dang /_khrid rgyab lung gi phreng ba dang /_brtags yig dang /_tshad yig dang /_lnga po de khrid kyi skor ro/_/de dag gi rgyab chos su/ snying tig chen mo dang /_don gsal me long dang /_ngo sprod lam 'bras dang*/ zhal gdams gnad thigs dang /_rdo rje chu 'thung dang /_dgu po de rgyab chos kyi skor ro/_/yang zhi ba bar do lam gyi mtshan nyid dang /_khro bo dang /_khro bo bar do dang /_bar do'i zhal gdams gnyis dang*/_bar do bzhi'i bskul rkyen gyi man ngag dang /_lnga po de bar do'i gdams skor ro/_/yang lto gos kyi zhen pa gcod pa la rdel 'cha' dang*/_gtum mo gnyis dang /_lam gyi bar chad bsrung ba la bka' srung srog sgrub nag mo'i rgyud dang /_gdams pa dang rgyu dus thun drug_/bla rdo/_cho 'phrul/_man ngag la sogs te cha lag gi skor ro/_/de yang btags grol rgyud drug la ni/_kun tu bzang po nas o rgyan pad+ma'i bar du dgongs par brgyud nas/_slob dpon gyis gsungs shing mtsho rgyal gyis bsdus nas 'grel pa drug po mkhar chen mas mdzad do/_/btags grol snying po'i don khrid ni 'ga' rab rdo rjes mdzad nas shrI sing has 'das rjes dang bcas pa slob dpon pad+ma la gsungs so/_/de las gzhan pa'i man ngag rgyud bco brgyad kyi dgongs pa bzhin du g.ya' ri gong gi brag phug tu slob dpon pad+mas mdzad la/_khrid kyi lag len ti ka don khrid ni mkhar chen mas mdzad do/_/mkha' 'gro zhus len ni gol sa dang the tshom bcad pa'i phyir mtsho rgyal gyis slob dpon la zhus nas yi ger btab bo/_/bstan srung srog sgrub nag mo'i rgyud gdams pa dang bcas pa ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro rnams kyis rdo rje gdan gyi byang du dbang phyug chen po'i rten gyi nang du sbas pa mu stegs gu ya shrIs bton no/_/de la slob dpon pad+mas gser srang stong phul nas zhus te/_mkha' 'gro snying tig gi bka' srung du bskos so/_/dkar chag them du ma thebs pa'i gter kha lhan cig nas byung ba ni/_tshe sgrub gcig_/ dzam nag_lha lcam pad+ma gsal gyi lo rgyus dang them yig rnams byung ngo /_/ chos skor 'di rnams slob dpon pad+ma yab yum gyis khra mo brag tu sbas pa la/ dus phyis 'bri la ldang chos 'byung du sku 'khrungs pa'i lha lcam pad+ma gsal sku skye bzhes pa/_brla g.yas pa'i nang na sha mtshan mkha' 'gro ma'i spyan 'dra ba yod pa/_khams chu/_dgung snying yos bu/_mtshan tshul rdor zhes bya ba/_sbyangs pa'i las sad pa/_'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad sems su rtogs pa des/ gzhi bdag dang mkha' 'gros lung bstan pa dang /_kha byang lde mig kyang lag tu byon nas chu mo glang gi lo/_ston zla tha chung gi nyi shu bdun gyi nyin/_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro chos skyong gter bdag rnams la tshogs mchod phul nas gsol ba btab ste gter nas gdan drangs so/_/gter g.yog rnams lo ston rdo rje 'bum gyis byas so/_/de nas rin po che tshul rdor ni/_gu ru rin po ches lung bstan pa las/_chos 'di rnams gsang zhing nyams su blangs te gter dpe rnams sngar gyi gter shul lam/_bum thang ngam/_lha 'dre mi 'pho ba'i brag la sbas na skye ba phyi ma la thon nas 'gro don dpag tu med pa 'byung*/ de ltar ma byas na dam sel gyis sku tshe'i bar chad du 'gyur zhes lung bstan pa las/_lung bstan phyi ma'i dbang du gyur nas gshegs so/_/shog ser rnams lo ston rdo rje 'bum gyi phyag na yod pas/_chos rje rang byung rdo rjes zhus so/_/lcags mo lug gi lo bre'i zla ba'i tshes brgyad la kong po tsA ri gsar rnying gi mtshams/_la rgyab kyi ri khrod du kha rag pa grags pa dbang phyug la sogs pas shog ser las zhal bshus so/_/mkha' 'gro zhus len gyi shog ser rtse sor gsum la yig phreng nyi shu rtsa gnyis re byas pa cig gzhan yid ches pa'i phyir chos rje pas bsnams nas byon no/_/rmongs pa la la dag gter ma la dbang bka' chad par 'gyur ro snyam du dogs na/_slob dpon pad+mas bzhed pa 'di ltar gsungs so/_/shog ser mthong bas slob dpon pad+ma'i sku dang mjal/_brda 'phrad pas gsung dang mjal/_don 'phrad pas thugs dang mjal lo/_/mdor na chos rnams la brgyud tshul drug yod pa 'di gang rung cig dang ldan na brgyud pa ma chad par 'gyur te/_drug gang zhe na/_rgyal ba dgongs pas brgyud pa dang /_rig 'dzin brda'i brgyud pa dang /_gang zag snyan khung brgyud pa dang /_thugs rje byin rlabs brgyud pa dang /_mkha' 'gro gtad rgya'i brgyud pa dang /_smon lam dbang gi brgyud pa'o/_/de dag las/ 'di la drug kha tshang ste/_rgyal ba dgongs pa'i brgyud pa ni/_rgyal ba rigs lngas rang bzhin du snod la dgongs*pa*tsam*gyis*rig*pa'i rtsal dbang thob/ de bzhin du bdag 'dra pad+mas kyang ma 'ongs par 'gro ba la dgongs nas zab gter dbang bka' dang bcas pa sbas pas/_su yis thon pa la dgongs brgyud kyi dbang bka' yod do zhes bzhed do/_/rig 'dzin brda brgyud kyang 'di*la*tshang*ste/_kun tu bzang po nas rigs lnga'i bar du brgyud pa thams cad brda'i phyag rgya bstan pa tsam gyis dbang thob la/_bdag 'dra pad+mas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i snod ldan la dbang bskur ba 'di ltar gyis shig ces pa'i gter dpe bzhag ste/_slob bus de bzhin du dbang bskur bas byin rlabs dang dngos grub thob pa'i phyir dbang bka' yod do zhes bzhed do/_/rig pa bdun pa'i rgyud las/_brda dang brdas mtshon go ba ni/_/dbang gi nang nas dbang bka' 'o/_/zhes so/_/snyan khung du brgyud tshul yang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sprul sku yi ge'i gzugs su 'byung bar mdo du ma nas gsungs la/ snying rje pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las/_ri dang rde 'u shing bu dang /_/rnga bo che dang dpag bsam shing /_/de dag las ni sgra 'byung ba/_/rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_/'di dag bka' zhes bya bar 'dod/_/ces gsungs shing / slob dpon pad+mas bzhed pa'i/_gter dpe bzhin ma nor bar nyams su blangs bas/_bla ma dag sangs rgyas dang /_rang sems dbyer med du gyur pa'i snyan brgyud dam par bzhed de/_gter lung las/_chos sku kun tu bzang po la/_/bla ma bya ba yod min te/_/dbang bskur chos bshad byed mkhan med/_/ rang sems chos skur shes tsa na/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i dbang lung thob/_/ brgyud par 'dzin pa rtog pa yin/_/zhes so/_/thugs rje byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa yang 'di la tshang ste/[ · ]kun tu bzang po nas rim pa bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa tsam la/_rig pa'i rtsal dbang thob la/_bdag 'dra pad+mas kyang / ma 'ongs pa'i don du zab gter sbas pa de sus thon pa dang mthong ba la byin rlabs zhugs te/_rig pa'i rtsal dbang thob po zhes bshad do/_/mkha' 'gro gtad rgya'i brgyud pa yang 'di la tshang ste/_kun tu bzang po nas rim bzhin du skal ldan dang ma phrad kyi bar du mkha' 'gro ma la gtad nas/_gter srung rnams kyis snod ldan la gtod pa'i lung thob pa yin no/_/zhes bshad do/_/ smon lam dbang bskur gyi brgyud pa yang 'di la tshang ste/_thams cad smon lam gyis mtha' sgyur ba las smon lam ni sangs rgyas kyi bden pa'i bka' yin la/_bka' ni mi bslu ba'i mchog dam pa yin te/_bdag 'dra pad+mas kyang ma 'ongs las can cig dang phrad par shog ces smon lam btab pas/_de'i mthu yis las can cig dang 'phrad pa yin te/_dbang thams cad kyi dam pa smon lam yin no zhes bzhed do/_/mdor na slob dpon pad+mas bzhed pa'i shog ser mthong ba tsam zhal mthong gi 'khor yin la dgongs pa phyin ci ma log par longs pa ni thugs kyi sras te/_dbang thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bzhed do/_/de ltar brgyud pa drug dang ldan par dbang lung dpe rnams rje rin po che'i drung du byon pa yin la/_thun mong ma yin pa'i brgyud pa ni chos rje rang byung rdo rje nyid sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mang po dang dngos su mjal zhing byin gyis brlabs tshul dang chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i tshul du ma rnam thar tshigs bcad mar lta'o/_/chos 'di'i khyad par gyi brgyud pa ni/_chos rje rin po ches jo mo gangs la dben pa mdzad pa'i tshe/_o rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas mdun gyi nam mkha' la gsal bar snang zhing /_dngos su dbang bskur/_byin gyis brlabs pa'i snang ba dang /_jo mo kha rag gi shar phyogs kyi ri khrod du dben pa mdzad pa'i ston zla ra ba'i nya'i dus tshigs la mnal lam du gu rus byin brlabs dbang bskur mdzad do/_/yang snying pad+ma phug tu tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dus mkha' 'gro mas dbang bskur byin gyis brlabs pa'i dag snang la mgur mang po gsungs shing /_slob dpon pad+ma'i gdams pa sngar mjal ba rnams kyi mthar thug tu gyur pa zab pa las kyang ches zab pa zhig dang myur du mjal lo snyam thugs kyis dgongs pa las/_ring por ma thogs par slob dpon pad+ma yab yum gyis rdzogs pa chen po yang gsang bla na med pa ku su li'i skor rnams dwags po dang lung khra mo brag la sbas pa'i gter/_lha lcam pad+ma gsal gyi skye ba sbas pa'i rnal 'byor tshul rdor gyis bton nas khong gi gter g.yog pa lo ston rdo rje 'bum la gnang ba de lo ston gyis chos rje'i drung du dbul lo/_/rin po che dgyes shing*/_sngar gu ru dang mkha' 'gros dbang bskur byin gyis brlabs pa'i don mngon du gyur te/_chos rje rin po ches rjes su bzung nas chu pho spre'u'i lo zla ba dang po la mtshur phu bde chen gyi dben gnas su nye gnas chen po slob dpon ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol ba btab pa la brten nas/_'brong ru ba mkhan po rgyal mtshan/_rtogs ldan ye rgyal/_sprul sku dbon po sman lung pa/ bdag g.yung ston smyon pa dang lnga la bka'i gnyer gtad cing /_gzhan yang mchod g.yog pa dang /_gsol ja ba la sogs pa bdun tsam dang bcas pa la dbang lnga yongs su rdzogs par bskur nas gdams pa thams cad lhag ma med par gnang ngo /_/lo rgyus 'di dang dbang lnga'i dbang byang phyag len lhan thabs su bsgrigs pa 'di dang /_mkha' 'gro phyi nang gi las byang dang / gsang sgrub rta phag zhal sbyor gyi las byang bstod pa dang bcas pa 'di rnams slob dpon pad+ma'i yig cha rnams dang /_chos rje pa'i gsung bzhin lag tu blang bde bar khrigs su bkod pa 'di shAkya'i dge slong rdo rje dpal bzang pos bkod pa yin mod kyi/_slob dpon pad+mas mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs/_mchod 'bul/_tshogs mchod kyi yig cha rnams su gung sgrig na 'gal ba cung zad kyang med do/_/rgyal ba'i gsung rab mkha' klong yangs pa nas/_/yang gsang snying tig nyin mor byed par byas/_/mngon sum rang gnad tsha zer phyogs bcur rgyas/_/brgyud pa gsum gyis ma rig mun pas sangs/_/bdag blo chu skyes zum pa cung zad bye/_/nyams myong rtogs pa'i ge sar rab 'phel nas/_/ yang zab gnad kyi man ngag dri bsung gis/_/rjes 'jug las can bung ba'i tshogs tshim zhing*/_/yid dpyod 'dzin pa'i gar sbyin dang bral ngang /_/mngon sum rig pa'i 'dab gshog rab 'phel te/_/chos nyid zad pa'i nam mkhar gar byed cing /_/bdag med chos kyi sgra skad kun sgrogs shog_/bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling rgyan du shog_/dge'o/_/mang+ga lam//_//

[6.24 g.yung ston pas gsungs pa’i phyag ’tshal]

@#/_/g.yung ston pas gsungs pa'i phyag 'tshal bzhugs so/_/ bla ma dam pa g.yung ston pa la gu ru kun mkhyen shAkya mgon pos zhus pa/ de yang dang por chos rje'i drung nas sprul sku sman lung pa la gnang /_des rin po che myur sdings pa la gnang /_des bla ma shAkya mgon po la zhus pas dbang rdzogs lung dang bcas par zhus te/_khrid la nyan khrid du zhus pas the tshom cung ma chod nas bla ma g.yung ston pa la yongs su rdzogs par myong khrid nyams myong rang thog tu khel bar bskyangs te rtsa rlung thig le'i gegs 'phrang las thar te myong ba rdzogs par gsungs so/_/me pho khyi'i lo la gter nas byon nas lo so gsum lon pa'i tshe na zhus nas lo sgrub kyi me tog dang gser zho gang gi maN+Dal phul nas zhus/_bla ma shAkya mgon po'i drung du sprang 'khyams badzra rat+nas zhus te sa mo glang gi lor dgun po gro ma bstod pa dkar po chu mig rdzong kha'i dgon par dpyid zla ra ba rta pa zla ba'i tshes gsum la dbang lnga yongs su rdzogs par zhus nas nyams khrid lag khrid du rdzogs par zhus te rtags tshad kyi yi ges gtan la phab nas nyams gong 'phel gyi snang ba rdzogs par bskyangs shing /_rtsa rlung thig le la sogs pa rdzogs par lag khrid du zhus te gsang dbang /_shes rab ye shes/_tshig dbang /_khyad par dbang lnga rtsal dbang rnams bskyar zhing zhus te dbang rdzogs bka' rdzogs/ dpe rdzogs lung yongs su rdzogs par zhus te/_dgyes bzhin du gnang nas gzhan don gyis shig pa'i rjes gnang yang thob cing /_sa gas nya ba'i tshes bco lnga yar bcad zla ba phyed dang bzhir gdams pa rdzogs nas dbyar ra ba'i nyin snga dro brgyud yig dang btags grol 'dogs bka' gtad pa'i dus su chos skor 'di'i bdag por gtad do/_/sprang ban rdo rje rin chen gyis ji ltar zhus pa'i tshul gyi brgyud yig bkod pa'o/_spyi/ @#/_/e ma ho/_/rgyal ba sku gsum sar gnas rig 'dzin dang /_/ngo mtshar rmad byung o rgyan yab yum gnyis/_/lung bstan gter ston thugs sras sprul pa'i sku/_/mtshungs med chos kyi rgyal po karma pa/_/chos rje'i thugs sras mnyam med bya bral ba/_brgyud pa'i bcud 'dus mkhyen ldan shAkya mgon/_/rtsa brgyud bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thog med dus nas 'khor ba'i rgyun grol du/_/las rlung shugs kyis dus mthar skyes pa yi/_/ dbul rmongs glen stong blo chung ku su lu/_/bas mtha'i gnas na yid brel snyam chung ba/_/rig pa col chung rkang 'khyams spyang po bdag_/bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i thugs rje yis/_/dam pas rjes su bzung zhing rgyud bkrol nas/_/rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa'i mthar thug nyid/_/theg pa'i yang rtse rdzogs chen snying po 'di/_/grub thob rim par brgyud nas bdag la smin/_/zab lam 'di dang mjal ba bdag skal bzang /_/o rgyan thugs rjes ma 'ongs 'gro don du/_/ mkha' 'gro snying tig zab mo gter du sbas/_/lung bstan sprul sku mkhas btsun tshul rdor gyis/_/chu mo glang la zab mo'i gter sgo phyes/_/de nas so bdun lon pa'i sa mo glang gi lo/_/lo gsar rta pa nya yi grub nyi tshes gsum la/_/spros bcas spros med khyad par dbang lnga rig pa'i rtsal dbang dang /_/ btags grol rgyud 'grel man ngag lag len bcas/_/don khrid khregs chod thod rgal ngo sprod gnang /_/rgyab chos lung bstan man ngag gnad dang bcas/_/rtsa rlung thig le gtum mo dka' thub dang /_/'da' kha'i lam khyer 'chi brod bar do'i gnad/_/dbang sgrub mchod gzhung las byang sgom khrid dang /_/thun mong las mde'u kha tshar bstan srung dang*/_/yid ches lo rgyus 'phyugs med them yig bcas/_/dbang rdzogs bka' rdzogs dpe rdzogs lung rdzogs su/_/yongs rdzogs bka' gtad gnang ba de sku drin/_/snod ldan snod med kun la gnang bkag mdzod/_/bka' gtad gnyer gtad thob pa bdag skal bzang /_/cho 'phrul rta pa'i tshes gsum nas brtsams te/_/dbyar ra sa gas nya ba'i zla rgyas par/_/dgung zla phyed dang bzhi la don chen 'grub/_/som nyi med pa'i gding rnyed de sku drin/_/rtogs pa'i ngang du goms pa'i stobs brtan nas/_/rig pa rang grol phyogs lhung med pa yi/_/mtha' bral rtsol med lhun grub gnas lugs gshis/_/snying po rnam dag mngon du 'gyur bar shog_//_//

[6.25 g.yung gi lo rgyus]

@#/_/g.yung gi lo rgyus bzhugs so/_/ e ma ho/_/rab dkar las dang smon lam bzang pos 'phangs/_/kun mkhyen rje yis ma nor lam bstan pa'i/_/zab lam snying po 'di la bsgrod tshul ni/_/bla med bla ma mchog la rab gus te/_/bdag gzhan thar lam chen por 'dun pa 'phangs/_/spyi mthun grub pa'i lam du mngon sum nas/_/snang zhing srid par 'dzin pa 'khor ba'i chos/_/ma spangs gnas su dag pa ru shan phyed/_/stong nyid phu thag chod pa rtsa bral gshis/_/ji bzhin mngon du gyur par rnal du dbab/_rig pa gcer bu lhings la rten med du/_/gzo med zhen bral gsal stong rang sor bzhag_/gang shar gzo med rang grol khregs chod kyi/_/ don khrid mnyam nyid ro gcig de ltar bskyangs/_/rang rig gsal stong mngon sum rjen pa la/_/yengs med blo bral thog rgal don khrid bskyangs/_/skye med stong pa gshis kyi phu thag chod/_/rang rig gsal stong mngon sum thil du phebs/_/gang shar spros bral rjen pa'i rang zhal bltas/_/'bral med chos nyid rol par dran pas mchog_/gzung 'dzin rtsis gdab zhen yul mtha' dang bral/_/bar snang nang du nam mkha' bsgom pa la/_/yang dag dran pas rang sor so mar bzhag_/n+thi/ @#/_/rdo rje theg pa'i dgongs pa yis/_/rin chen sems nyid mngon du bstan/_/yang dag ye shes bde ba'i mchog_/lhun grub ngang du gus pas 'dud/_/mkha' dbyings phyogs med mtha' bral du/_/'gro ba rang rtsal 'gag med pa/_/snying po rnams la mngon gyur ni/_/thig le spros med ngang du rtogs/_/de'i lung bla ma dam pa las/_/bdag cag sprang po ri pa yis/_/ dben gnas brag nag pho brang du/_/lcags byi zla ba gsum pa ste/_/gter nas byon lo zhe brgyad la/_/dbang khrid lung dpe man ngag rdzogs/_/btags sgom dran pas grol ba'i chos/_/yongs rdzogs zhus nas rang gzhan don/_/ gnyis ka gyis kyi rjes gnang thob/_/gzhan yang gnas mchog tsA ri yi/_/ yon bdag rgyal po smon lam gyis/_/sngar 'das lo ni bco lnga'i gong /_/ gter ston zhal slob sho ban gyi/_/phyag dpe dad pa'i shugs kyis phul/_/o rgyan rje dang gdams pa la/_/sngon gyi las 'brel bzang po yi/_/nus pa yod nges snyam pa yis/_/dga' dang spro ba tshad med skyes/_/deng sang bdag por nges pa na/_/dad brtson 'dun pa cher bskyed de/_/ka dag lhun grub 'dus ma byas/_/rang bzhin stong gsal 'gag pa med/_/kun khyab dbye ba med pa'i don/_/rtsol bral theg mchog rdzo gas chen dang /_khregs chod thod rgal zung 'jug dang /_/btags grol thabs cha la sogs pas/_/'di phyi 'chi kha bar do ru/_/rang blo nus pa'i rim stobs kyis/_/'phyugs med sku gsum rang chas su/_/thob pa lung rig myong ba gsal/_/e ma de yang rje yi drin/_/drin lan bsab pa'i mchod pa 'bul/_/phul ba'i 'bras bu 'gro rnams sems/_/ sems nyid rnal ma blo bral don/_/don dam ji bzhin rtogs pa la/_/la bzla ba 'di 'da' ba med/_/shes bya'i gnas lugs ji bzhin snang ba la/_/'gag med rang grol rtogs pa rje yi drin/_/ston 'khor gcig tu 'dres pa'i yul las 'das/_ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa gnyug ma'i ngang /_rtsol bral bya byed med pa so ma'i don/_cis kyang chog pa 'dug pas blo re bde'o/_/dpal ldan bla ma dam pa shes rab tshul khrims de nyid la dben gnas brag nag tu dam pa chos nyid shes rab kyis dbang dang chos skor thams cad yongs su rdzogs par thugs nyams su bzhes shing khyad par khrid kyi dom khregs chod kyis yin lugs mngon du gyur par mdzad nas/_thod rgal gyis 'phyugs med gnad kyis mngon sum rang thog tu gtan la phab nas dus de nyid du kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa mngon du mdzad pa'o/_/dam pa pra dz+nyA shrI de nyid las dben gnas brag nag gi pho brang du bdag nam mkha' grags kyis dbang dang lung rnams yongs su rdzogs par zhus kyang /_khrid kyi nges pa ma rnyed pa la/_dus phyis sprul sku rig 'dzin rgod gyi ldem 'phru can dang mjal dus chos kyi che ba dang /_khrid kyi zab pa'i gnad lung bstan pa'i bka' drin la brten nas/ dpal ldan bla ma chos nyid mtshan can de nyid dben gnas brag nag pho brang du spyan drangs shing shing mo bya lo'i ston zla 'bring po dang ra ba gnyis la dbang lnga yongs su rdzogs pa lung rnams dang bcas pa bskyangs nas zhus te/_khyad par khrid kyi skor khregs chod thod rgal rnams nyams khrid lag khrid du rdzogs par zhus shing /_nyams gong 'phel gyi snang ba cung zad skyed pa dang /_snang bzhi'i 'char tshul rnams go yul du gsal zhing /_zab mo'i chos la nges pa'i shes pa dang /_brgyud pa gsum gyi bla ma la mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob dus/ dbang rdzogs/_bka' rdzogs dpe rdzogs lung rnams yongs su rdzogs par gnang ste rang gzhan gyi don gnyis ka gyis shig pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob ste sa dang po'i dga' ba lta bur gyur to//_//

[6.26 ’pho ba]

@#/_/'pho ba bzhugs so: h+yakathabya:nyab:_bdag 'dra pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis:_rnal 'byoRa le lo can don du:_'pho ba'i gdams pa bstan par bya:_tshe 'dir lhag med ma grub na:_tshe 'phos mkha' spyod bsgrub 'dod pas:_sbyong dang las la sbyar ba 'o: thog mar sbyang bar bya ba ni:_shin tu dben pa'i gnas song ste:_mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i yo byad bsham:_phyi nang mtshams bcad gtsang dag bya:_bde ba'i stan la skyil krung bsdad:_skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sngon 'gro gtong :_stong pa'i ngang las chos 'byung dbus:_pad+ma ro dang nyi steng duH:_bdag nyid mkha' 'gro dmar mo ni:_zhal gcig phyag gnyis gri thod 'dzin:_mkha' 'gro sde bzhis skor bar bskyed:_mdun du mkha' 'gro phag mor bcas:_rang bzhin gnas dang dbyer med par:_dur khrod pho brang lta bu la:_spyan drangs mchod bstod rgyas par bya:_gsol ba btab la mos gus bskyed:_'byung po tshogs la gtor ma sbyin:_de ni sngon du 'gro ba 'o:_de nas spyod pa dngos gzhi ni: tsog bu skyil krung khru khyud bya:_rlung ro dbyung la bar chad sbrang :_skad cig chos 'byung dmar po'i nang :_pad nyi ro yi gdan steng du:_hrIHlas rdo rje phag mor bskyed:_gri gug thog khrag skyil krung byas:_rin chen rgyan gyis spras par bsam:_de dbus dbu ma sngon po ni:_drang bshan zangs dung lta bu yi:_mar sna sum mdo'i nyi steng du:_rdo rje phag mo rgya gram la:_lte bar a thung dmar po ste:_'od zer ldan pa bskyed paRa bya:_yar sna tshangs par zla steng du:_kun bzang dmaRa po gzi brjid ldan:_rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa la:_rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan par bskyed:_zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung bcas:_thugs khar hUM bsam 'od dang ldan:_shes pa rtse gcig la gtad de:_de nas rlung gi sbyor ba ni:_steng mnan 'og 'then bar du bya:_sbyor ba 'di dang ldan pa'i tshe:_lte ba'i a*las*thig*le*ni:_dmar po yungs kar 'tsher ba tsam:_rgyun ma chad par 'phros pa ni:_bar mtshams med par 'gro byas nas:_bla ma'i thugs kar hU~M la thim:_rim rim nyid ni bstim par bya:_thig le 'bar 'phro bcad par bya: yang ni slar yang rlung bzung*bstim:_'di la drag tu goms pa na:_spyi bo za dang chu bur dang :_tshag tshag byung na tshad yin te:_tshangs pa'i sgo ni byang bar 'gyur:_de tshe bla ma a la bstim:_gnyis su med par mnyam par bzhag: mthar thug las la sbyar ba ni:_'byung ba 'du 'bral thim sdud dang :_dus kyi tha ma 'chi ba'i tshe:_dkon mchog mchod bshams gsol ba btab:_rang lus tsog pu skyil krung ngam:_yang na seng ge'i nyal stabs su:_mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khoRa gsal bar bskyed:_dbu ma sum mdoRa rgya gram bca':_a las thig le 'phros byas te:_spyi bor kun bzang sngar ltar bstim:_'od zer lnga dang ldan pa bskyed:_shes pa de la ma yengs gtad:_mchod pas mchod la mos gus bskyed:_gsol ba snying gi dkyil nas btab:_nyer gcig bar du thig le bstim:_de nas sum mdor mkha' 'gro ma:_'od phung tha ma'i lam la bstim:_spyi bor kun bzang dbyer med bzhugs:_bla ma 'od zer lnga'i rang bzhin:_mkha' la 'dom gang tsam du 'phar:_rab kyis 'od gsal chos skur bstim:_'bring gis 'ja' lus longs skur bstim:_tha mas sna tshogs sprul skur bstim:_rab kyis 'od gsal bstim pa ni:_mtha' bral rnam dag kun bzang klong :_mi g.yo mnyam nyid chen por bstim:_'bring gis longs skur bstim pa ni:_rnal 'byor rtsal dang ldan pa yis:_sku gsum rim bzhin bsre bas bsre:_zhi khro'i sku dang zhing khams la:_ye shes ro gcig rol par bsre: tha mas sprul skur bstim pa ni:_snang yul sku la 'jug par bya:_rnal 'byor rtsal dang ldan pa yis:_sku gsum rim gyis bsre ba ste:_chos sku skye med zhag bdun la:_longs sku'i zhi khror zhag bdun gnas:_sprul pa'i sku la zhag bdun gnas:_bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig rdzogs pa na:_'dod pa'i lus la rab tu 'jug:_shin tu tha mar gyur pa rnams:_bla ma kun bzang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs:_mkhar bstim 'ja' lus chos nyid dbyings:_dbye ba med par mos gus bya:_de yang bar do dag par 'gyur:_sgyu lus 'pho tshe 'dun pa gces:_goms shugs drag rtsal gyis 'phang ngo :_man ngag gnad kyi gdams pa yin:_grong khyer 'pho ba'i gdams pa 'di:_ye shes mtsho rgyal nyid la gtad:_las can cig dang 'phrad par shog:_sku gsung thugs kyi rgya yod do: sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_:

[6.27 gter srung ldang lha’i sgrub thabs]

@#/_/gter srung ldang lha'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo:_bdag 'dra pad+ma 'byung gnas ngas:_rgyal po'i bka' 'byung bod 'dir 'ongs:_lha srin gdug pa thams cad btul:_gter bdag bka' yi srung maRa bskos:_mchims yul stod 'dir gter phran sbas:_gter bdag btsan gyi ldang lha yi:_srog snying 'phrog ste dam la btags:_phyi rabs don du gter du sbas:_las can cig dang 'phrad par shogaH:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_sa/rgya/tha/k+Sha_'di la srog dang cho 'phrul gnyis:_srog tu sgrub pa byed 'dod na:_g.ya' ri gangs brag dben pa'i sar:_stegs bu raHkhrag gis byugs khru gang gru bzhi'i dbus:_zangs gzhong nang du bshos bu bsham:_mtha' ma mtheb skyu rakhrag gis lcags bdun gyis bskor: shing la dgra bo'i ming rus bris:_gang 'dod khrag gis byugs nas bya: gtor ma'i nang du spyi tshugs mgo mjug ldog gzhug:_gtor ma ra yi sha khrag bsham:_las khung gcig tu ling ga gcig:_gong ltar spyi tshugs dag tu gzhug:_yungs kaRa sngags la ming rus brab:_srog gi snying po 'di yis 'bod pa ri ba ri ging ka ra dzaHdzaH:_che ge mo'i sha la baM baM:_zhes pa zhag gsum bzlas pa yi:_sgra dang 'od ni dngos su 'ong :_de nas rbad bsad las bya ba:_dgra bo khrag skyugs nad kyis gsod 'dod na:_tsa mun rag mun:_thaM ba d+hu rag:_mtshon gyis gsod na sngags 'di 'o:_rang phyi g+ha d+ha ri sA d+hu shig: sbos gris gsod na sngags 'di 'o:_phud mang chod:_phus gsod:_ru dam pa yar gtor shig:_ces pa'i las sngags zhag gsum bzlas:_so so'i gnad khrag thun gyis brab:_zhe sdang bskyed la las la bskul:_hUM:_lha yi dge bsnyen chen po drag po rtsal:_sku la dar dkar ral kha gsol:_btsan rgod bya ra
