stong gis bskor:_khyod kyi thugs dam dus la babs:_bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo 'di:_khrag skyugs nad kyis sod la shog:_mtshon gri sbos gri glang thabs sod:_da lta myur du sod la shog:_na ge na'u kyin bu hUM:_shod shod sti ta rbad thu ri li li sa ma ya rbad:_ces pas drag tu rbad par bya:_bud med zhag gsum dag gis sod:_skye bo drug gis sod par nges:_bsod nams can la zhag bdun no:_nang 'gras byed na bcu bzhi 'o:_rbad rtags bsad rtags spyi dang 'dra:_las sbyor gtor ma ling gar bcas:_btsan rgod rgyu ba'i srong la mnan:_las khung ling+ga 'gug gdab sreg:_klu yod sa ru mnan par bya:_rtsa dum ya dum mod la khrag sha rbad:_ces pas:_klu dang btsan la bcol gtad bya'o:_las 'gyangs na lan gsum bskyar ro:_gang yin dgra bo mod la 'chi: gnod sbyin lha yi reg chod 'di:[ ·]cog rdung lha yi spu gri yin:_gter bdag srog rtsa'i snying 'byin yin:_las can cig dang 'phrad par shog:_sa ma ya: rgya rgya rgya:_s+thaH:_bdag 'dra pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis:_lha srin srog gi shan pa las:_cho 'phrul gtang ba'i las bshad pa:_stegs bu khru gang gru bzhi'i steng : 'dre can gnas pa'i lder bzo'i sa:_klu gnas sa dang sa 'gyu'i sa:_sa nag gsum po spar re dang /_zhib btsags phug ron sgo nga gang :_kham sa cig po dag dang bsres:_a tsa ra gnyis sprel sbelaspu tshom gcig gzugs gcig:_sprel la thi gu dkar nag gdags:_dkar po atsa[‘]g.yas la nag po g.yon:_dbus su spre 'u bzhag par bya:_thi gu a tsa ra dkar nag yis bzung :_rang la mdun bstan sngags 'dis 'bod:_tri'u tri'u 'bod pa ma ma shod dza:_ma ru ma ru rbad pa yin rgyugs rgyugs:_kha phuRa kha phur che ge la b+tso b+h+yoH:_zhag lnga bzlas pas nang rtags ni:_a tsa ra dang mi rengs dang :_spre 'u'i dmag 'ong so sgra dang :_smra snying 'dod dang shes pa 'khrugs:_de ltar rmi lam dag tu 'ong :_spre'u dngos su ma byung bar du bsgrub:_de nas gong gi rdzas gsum po:_dgra bo'i phyogs su kha bstan te:_a tsar nag pos sngon ma bya:_dkar po phyi la bzhag par bya:_gong ma'i sngags sham 'di btags la:_he tsa du na phab yA:_zhes zhag bdun bzlas te:_dkar po thig gur bcas pa bzhag:_de min gnyis po dgra yi khang par bskyal:_spre 'u dngos su sa gtor 'ong :_dkar po dpon la nag po g.yog:_spre 'u las mkhan dag yin no:_lha btsan ging gi cho 'phrul lo:_shin tu zab phyir gter du sbas:_las can cig dang 'phrad par shog:_sa ma ya: rgya rgya rgya:_ldang lung khra mo brag nas sprul sku rin chen tshul rdor gyis chu mo glang gi lo la bton pa'o:_:

[6.28 zab gsang mkha’ ’gro snying thig gi gsol ’debs]

@#/_/zab gsang mkha' 'gro snying thig gi gsol 'debs bzhugs so/_/ na mo gu ru dngos med mtha' bral ka dag chos kyi sku/_/rang rig gsal dngas lhun grub longs spyod rdzogs/_/kun khyab sna tshogs shar grol sprul pa'i sku/_/dus gsum rang rig bla ma rnams la 'dud/_/dmigs med chos dbyings dag pa'i pho brang du/_/kun bzang yab yum gnyis la gsol ba 'debs/_/ngo bo ka nas dag par byin gyis rlobs/_/lhun grub chos dbyings dag pa'i pho brang du/_/longs sku'i zhi khro'i tshogs la gsol ba 'debs/_/ rig pa sku ru smin par byin gyis rlobs/_/thugs rje phyogs ris bral ba'i pho brang du/_/sprul sku rdo rje 'chang la gsol ba 'debs/_/snang sems 'dzin pa stongs par byin gyis rlobs/_/dur khrod me ri 'bar ba'i pho brang du/_/dga' rab rdo rje nyid la gsol ba 'debs/_/chos nyid don dang mjal bar byin gyis rlobs/_/dur khrod so sa gling gi pho brang du/_/shrI sing ha nyid la gsol ba 'debs/_/bde chen 'du 'bral med par byin gyis rlobs/_/pad+ma 'od kyi pho brang gzhal yas su/_/o rgyan pad+ma yab yum la gsol ba 'debs/_/'bral med gzhan don 'byung bar byin gyis rlobs/_/rig 'dzin mkha' spyod dag pa'i pho brang du/_/pad+ma las 'brel rtsal la gsol ba 'debs/_/chos bka' ma lus tshang bar byin gyis rlobs/_/byar smad gro sa dpal gyi pho brang du/_/ sprul sku legs pa'i dpal la gsol ba 'debs/_/rig 'dzin gdung sob nus par byin gyis rlobs/_/bsam yas mchims phu ngo mtshar pho brang du/_/ chos rje klong chen rab 'byams la gsol ba 'debs/_/bka' babs bstan pa'i bdag por byin gyis rlobs/_/bsam gtan gling gi dben gnas pho brang du/_/'jam dbyangs khyab brdal lhun grub la gsol ba 'debs/_/phyi nang 'khrul pa zhig par byin gyis rlobs/_/phyogs med ri khrod dben gnas pho brang du/_/sprul sku grags pa 'od zer la gsol ba 'debs/_/rlabs chen don gnyis 'grub par byin gyis rlobs//_//

[6.29 brgyud ’dzin gyi slob bu’i lung bstan]

@#/_/brgyud 'dzin gyi slob bu'i lung bstan no: [8]thazha[4; ]e ma shes rab snying rje can:_khyod nyid nga yi gter sgo phye nas tshe'i dus ma byas kyi bar du brgyud 'dzin gyi slob bu rigs mi 'dra ba bdun gsum 'byung ste:_skyes pa'i slob bu bcu bzhi 'byung :_bud med DAk+ki'i rigs chos sam lus kyi 'brel pa bdun 'byung ste:_dang po rigs gcig ni:_skye ba bzang ba:_dad pa che ba:_yon tan en re shes pa:_theg pa chen po la mos pa:_shes rab che ba:_blo srab pa:_tsha rus che ba:_rang 'dod che:_gzhan yang blo mi mthun pa:_kun gyis gshe ba zhig 'ong :_de karma DAk+ki'i rigs te:_de la byin rlabs 'jug rkyen tshe lo 'bring thub:_gdams pa gnad du tshud:_bar do dang por grol lo:_rigs gcig ni:_dam tshig bsrung : brgyud 'dzin zhen:_shes rab chung :_snying rus 'bring :_blo mi rgod:_dad pa mi 'gyur ba cig yong ste:_tshe 'bring thub:_skye ba phyi ma la lhag med du 'tshang rgya: rigs gcig ni snying rus che:_shes rab che:_'khri ba chod:_ri khrod 'grim nus:_bla ma'i ci gsung sgrub:_dag snang chung ba zhig 'ong :_de rat+na dpa' bo'i rigs te:_de yang tshe lo 'bring thub:_tshe 'dir sa zin te skye ba bdun gyis 'jug mi srid do:_gcig ni blo rgod gtong chod che:_rgyu 'bras phra mo la mi 'dzem:_chos phyogs su gtong nus:_rang 'dod che:_tshe 'di pa gcig 'ong : des chos 'brel thogs pa tsam ste:_skye ba bcu bzhi na longs spyod dang ldan par 'tshang rgya'o:_tshe yang 'bring thub:_rigs gcig ni:_nga rgyal che:_khyod la mos gus med par chos thob nas gdod mi rtag:_rang cher 'gying zhing phyag la skrag:_byin rlabs mi thob ste:_chos kyi las med pas de'i rigs kyi rtsa ba chod:_gcig ni kha gsod:_snying sdar:_g.yo sgyu chung :_shes rab can zhig 'ong ste gsol lam dpa' bo'i rigs te:_tshe ring :_nad nyung :_'byor pa chung : skye ba 'di la 'tshang rgya'o:_gcig ni 'dod pa chung :_bka' drang :_blo brtanaH: kha nyung :_sgom bsran che:_sha mdog dmar:_chags pa che:_de pad+ma dpa' bo'i rigs te:_tshe ring skye ba la 'di la 'tshang rgya'o:_gcig ni 'tshang che:_dad pa chung :_chos la mi mos:_sdig la dga':_de ni skye ba bcu bzhi na 'tshang rgya ba tsam mo:_gcig ni:_chos mkhas:_phrag dog che:_bsod nams che:_'khor skyong ba la*lta ba mtho:_rab tu byung na bshes gnyen gcig gis gsang nas nyams su len:_de rat+na dpa' bo'i rigs te:_skye ba 'di la 'tshang rgya'o: gcig ni:_snying rje dang byang sems che:_nor sgrub sman gyi las 'phro yod de: gzhan la phan thogs:_lo ka dpa' bo'i rigs te bar do gnyis la grol lo: gcig ni:_chos zhu ba rem:_nyams su mi len 'khor en re skyong :_shes rab che bas chos rnams la co lta mang du byed:_de ni dam tshig mi gtsang ste:_dam pas 'gal te skye ba phyi ma la duH kha spyod:_lo bdun na grol:_karma DAk+ki shugs 'gro dpa' bo'i rigs yin:_tshe thung :_gcig ni:_sdod mi tshugs:_blo sna mang :_dge sbyor remaH:_tshe thung phyi ma la 'tshang rgya:_gcig ni kha 'jam:_zhe ngan:_kha gsag che:_snying sdaraH:_dam la mi gnas:_des ni gdams ngag gtong :_slob dpon dang 'khon nyen yod pas spang bar bya'o:_rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa skyes pa la bzhi 'byung ngo :_bud med kyi slob ma bdun ni: dang po rigs gcig ni:_lus phra:_rnam gzhag tsha:_yid du 'ong :_lus dmar:_dad pa mi 'gyur:_blo brtan pa cig 'ong ste:_rigs kyang pad+ma Dak+ki'i rigs:_tshe ring skye ba 'di la lhag med du 'tshang rgya'o:_gcig ni chags pa che: spro thung :_shes rab chung :_lus sngo:_gzugs 'bring :_de ni las kyi DAk+ki'i rigs te:_khyed la sems pas chags pa spyod:_bde stong gi ting 'dzin ster bar byed:_zab mo gnad kyi 'brel med de:_skye ba gnyis na khyod kyi gdul byar gyur nas 'tshang rgya'o:_tshe 'bring thub:_gcig ni blo brtan chos la mos: snying rje che:_de yang zab mo gnad kyis 'brel nas 'tshang rgya'o:_tshe yang ring : pad+ma shugs 'gro'i rigs so:_gcig ni:_chos la mi mos bde ba che:_lus rgyas:_bzhin sdug:_blo sho rgodaH:_skad snyan:_de ni sngon gyi 'brel pas gus shing 'dud:_gzugs tha mal 'dzin te:_chags pa spyod:_rtsa sgo 'byed:_thun mong gi sid+d+hi ster:_rdo rje shugs 'gro'i rigs te lus kyi 'brel pa las:_chos kyi 'brel pa med:_skye ba phyi ma la sprod:_las rgya byas te 'tshang rgya'o:_gcig ni dad pa che:_sha mdog ser la yid du 'ong :_kha nyung :_blo brtan:_bya ba 'ol che:_lus thung la rgyas:_des kyang khyed la dad cing lus 'brel byed do: bsod nams spel:_:rigs kyang rin chen rigs:_tshe ring ngo :_gcig ni: kha mang :_mdog nag:_rtsab rtsub mang :_blo rgod:_ngas byas che:_'gro sa drag: blo steb:_ngu dad che:_dbugs thung :_spro thung :_snying chung ngo :_gal te 'brel pa rnams ma rdzogs par 'da' mi srid de:_skye ba phyi ma'i gdul byar 'ong nges so:_khyod tshad du bzhugs na tshe 'di nyid kyi gdul bya yin no:_ai_brgyud 'dzin slob bu'i lung bstan ni:_tshe sgrub 'od phreng gi gter kha nas byung ba yin no:_sprul sku nyid lo gro sar mgon rin gyis zhus zer ba'i phyi mo las bshus so:_:

[6.30 mkha’ ’gro snying thig gi cha rkyen lha mo lnga’i tshe sgrub]

@#/_/mkha' 'gro snying thig gi cha rkyen:_lha mo lnga'i tshe sgrub bzhugs so: [g]tha[q]'al[ \u0f7f ]rigs kyi ma mo mkha' 'gro tshe yi bdag:_lha mo bde ba 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo:_klong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud dag las:_'byung ba 'dus pa'i phung po la:_pha ma'i dngas ma rnam shes rtenaH:_las dang rkyen gyis 'gyur ba yin:_'byung 'khrugs dngas ma'i gnad 'phyugs pas:_lus dang sems gnyis 'bral bar 'gyur:_de la lha mo'i tshe sgrub bya:_zhes pas:_de la dam chos sgrub pa pos:_tshe yi bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir:_'chi ba brtag cing bslu ba ni:_brtag pa gzhan du shes par bya:_bslu thabs mang du bshad na yang :_lha mo'i tshe sgrub khyad par 'phags:_'di la sbyor dngos rjes dang gsum:_sbyor ba sngon du 'gro ba ni: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sngon song bas:_gtsang ma'i gnas su stegs bu bya:_dri bzang bdud rtsi chag chag gdab:_nas kyi tshom bu lnga bkod de:_bum pa'i nang du chang blugs la:_maRa gyi ril bu lnga yang gzhug:_'bru sna sman sna Rat+na blug: 'bras bu can gyi kha rgyan gzugs:_dar sna'i mgul chings gzungs thag btags:_bgegs gtor byin la mtshams kyang bcad:_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro la:_spyan drang mchod gtor gtor tshogs dbul:_de nas dngos gzhi'i rim pa ni:_spyi gtsug nyi zla'i gdan steng du:_tshe yi lha mo sku mdog dkar:_rin po che yi rgyan gyis mdzes:_phyag na tshe yi bum pa bsnams:_sku gsung thugs nas 'od 'phros pas:_bdag gi lus ngag yid la phog:_sgrib pa gsum po dag nas kyang :_lus ni shel sgong bzhin du bsam:_de nas lha mo bdag la thim:_gong gi lha mor bdag bskyed la:_sngags bzlas 'od zer bum par 'phros:_bum pa'i nang nas phyogs bcu yi:_bla ma yid dam mkha' 'gro dang :_sangs rgyas byang sems DAk+ki'i tshogs:_chos skyong la sogs mthu chen gyi:_tshe dang bsod nams kun bsdus te:_bum pa'i nang du thim zhing 'khyil:_de las mkha' 'gro lngar gyur te:_sku gsung thugs kyi bdud rtsi yi:_rgyun bab bsam la sngags 'di bzlas: oM gu ru de wa DAk+ki ni ha ri ni sa:_oM A yuHshe sid+d+hi hUM:_oM su pa te na te_su pa te na te ye swAhA:_rdzogs rim bdag dang lha mo gnyis:_dbyeRa med ngang la bzhag par bya:_de nas mjug gi rim pa ni:_rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa 'bum dang khri: stong la sogs pa bzlas byas nas:_grub pa'i rtags ni 'di ltar 'byung :_lus la go cha gon pa dang :_chu las brgal ba rmi ba dang :_nyi ma shar dang gyen la 'dzeg:_'bru dang longs spyod rmi ba dang :_bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'thung ba rmi:_de ltar rtags rnams byung ba dang :_bum pa rang gi spyi gtsug bzhag:_bum pa'i nang nas snying dkyil bab:_snying pad 'dab bzhi dbus dang lngar:_mi 'gyur rtag tu bzhugs par bsgom:_de nas bum chu btung zhing bkru:_bum pa'i mar rnams rang nyid bza':_lce yi dkyil yang rkan la zer ba'ang 'dug du hUM bsgoms te: kA ya sid+d+hi oM:wAk+ka sid+d+hi AH_tsit+ta sid+d+hi h+'u~M:_bzlas pas sku gsung thugs thob bsam:_'chi med ye shes bdud rtsi 'di:_bzhag pa lce yi dkyil du bzhag: bab*pa*tsit+ta'i dkyil du babs:_dkar zhing 'tsher la snum zhing 'dril:_bdud rtsi 'chi med dngos grub mchog:_ye shes lha mo a la la ho:_nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi:_rkyen nyi khri chig stong :_ye 'drog sum brgya drug cu:_bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu:_byang zhing dag par gyur cig:_ces dngos grub blang bar bya'o: tshe sgrub 'di yi yon tan ni:_tshe zad pa yi rnal 'byor yang :_tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan par 'gyur:_las 'phro ldan na nyi zla'i tshe:_'chi med rdo rje lta bu 'o:_'di la sgom sgrub sus byas pa:_dus min 'chi ba brgyad mi 'byung :_glo bur nad dang gdon rnams kyis:_de la tshugs par mi 'gyur ro:_tshe 'phos mkha' spyod gnas su 'gro:_'chi ba brtag dang bslu ba la:_bslu thabs mang du bshad na yang :_lha mo lnga yi tshe sgrub 'di:_pad+ma 'byung gnas bdag nyid kyis:_zab phyir klong gsal rgyud las btus:_gzhan la ma spel gter du sbas:_las 'phro can dang 'phrad par shog:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_dpal ldan tshur pa'i dpe las bshus:

[6.31 sprul sku legs pa lung bstan pa]

@#/_/sprul sku legs pa lung bstan pa: e ma ho:_yang zab mkha' 'gro snying thig 'di:_kun la ma spel nyams su longs:_spel drags snod min dam sel byed:_de yi sku tshe tshad mi phyin:_brgyud 'dzin nyeRa gcig lnga bshad pa:_gcig gis tshul dang mthun paRa spel:[ ·]shel dkaRa skye ba bcu bdun pa:_sham po gangs kyi shar lho phyogs:_rigs ldan chu khams stag lo pa:_sbas tshul 'khor ba'i cha 'dzin cing :_skye ba rgyun khyer don blo ldan:_zhen pa chung zhing ngang rgyud ring :_snying sdaRa tshe ring longs spyod chung :_snying tig thabs kyi cha yin pas:_brla g.yas pa yi nang logs la:_sha sme mkha' 'gro'i spyan 'dra yod:_skyes bu dam ldan legs pa zhes:_zab mo chos kyi bstan pa spel:_skye mtha'i byang sems min re kan: 'di yis 'gro don spel ba yong :_sa la gnas pa'i byang sems kyis:_rgya gar rgya nag sing ga dang :_bod kyi yul du 'phel bar 'gyur:_gzhan yang bshes gnyen dam pa dang :_lam sgom theg chen rigs rnams mos:_phal pa'i 'gro ba mos 'dud nyung :_'di dang 'phrad tshad don chen 'gyur:_sa ma ya: rgya rgya rgya:

[6.32 mkha’ ’gro snying thig las srog sgrub nag mo’i gtor dbang]

@#/_/mkha' 'gro snying thig las srog sgrub nag mo'i gtor dbang bzhugs so: rigs kyi DAk+ki yab yum lnga la phyag 'tshal lo:_dpon slob bar chad mi 'byung phyir:_da la sa chog grub pa yi:_shan pa nag mo'i srog dbang bskuraH: de nas dpon slob thams cad kyis:_mdun gyi nam mkha'i dkyil dag tu: 'od phung 'bar ba mtha' yas dkyil:_bla ma yi dam DAk+ki dam can tshogs: sprin phung bzhin du btibs par bsgoms pa'i mdun:_shan pa nag mo 'khor bcas bskyed:_rgyal ba rig 'dzin bsgom bzhin du:_de ring las rnams sgrub par bsam:_tshogs gtor mchod pa rgya chen 'bul:_gtso bo bzhi yi gtor dbang bskur:_b+h+yoH:_mkha' 'gro nag mo mi bsrun ma:_sha za khrag mig srin po'i gdong :_'jigs pa'i gzugs can mkha' 'gro'i gtso:_nag mo srid pa'i mtshon cha thogs:_ba spu mtshon cha bskal pa'i me:_rlung nag zhon nas ral pa sprug:_srid pa'i shu lta mi lpags gyon:_stong gsum sgrol byed zhalad+d+ha snying dmar 'dzud:_zhal nas khrag 'dzag kyu ru ru:_spyan gsum khro gnyer mche ba gtsigs:_ag tshom me 'bar 'tshub ma'i mtshon cha 'gyed:_mi mgo'i do shal gsod byed rgya mtshos bskor:_o rgyan bka' dang rig 'dzin bla ma'i bka':_khyad par mkha' 'gro dam btags rjes 'breng la:_dbang dang bka' lung bka' yi bstan pa bsrungs:_o khyi kha le nag mos sod:_srog ma tri sodaH:_snying kha kha tham ya ya sod:_rtsa ba bi ri mu sodaH:_g+ha ya sodaH:_nra ya sod:_rag mo tsit+ta rbud:_dam tshig ma bsrungs na chad pa chod cig:_bsrungs na stong grogs mdzod cig_/g.yas kyi gsod byed kyi gtor ma bzhag la:_b+h+yoH: sha za dmar mo ce spyang gdong :_ro zhon snying khrag zhal du gsol:_g.yas kyi sha za las mdzod cig_/ g.yon gyi gtoRa ma bzhag la:_b+tso:_nag mo wa gdong rngams pa'i gzugs:_ba spu mtshon cha spu gris gtams:_reg pas stong gsum sgrol byed zhags pa spu gris glo mchin gcodaH:_sha za khrag 'thung keng rus muraH: bka' lung rjes 'brangs las mdzod cig:_mdun gyi gtor ma bzhag la: b+tso:_mdun gyi srog gcod sha za mo:_nag mo 'ug gdong gnam lcags sderaH: khrag Ral mtshon stong dgra snying 'debs:_gnam lcags mchu sdeRa srog rtsa gcod:_skad cig stong gsum nyul byed ma:_rkan rdeb stong gsum snying khrag 'bru:_stong gsum zas za srid gsum skom du 'thung :_gsod byed lha mo 'khor bcas la:_sha za khrag 'thung 'bum gyis bskor:_dpon g.yog 'khor bcas las mdzod cig:_dbang dang bka' lung gdams pa'i sgo phyes la: dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor bka' chad srungs:_zhes dbang dang rjes gnang bya:_rol mo sgrog:_dus nyi shar ram:_phyed yol:_sa sros:_nam phyed la: shis:_de dus tshogs gtor bzang ba gal che'o:_o rgyan bka' lung :_ye shes mtsho rgyal zhal gdams:_phyag len med thabs med pa rdzogs so:_shan pa 'khor bcas bka'i bya ra mdzod la lung 'di khrol:_'di yi chos skyong kho la gtad do:_rang bzo ma byed gnang bzhin mdzod:_sa ma ya:_zab rgya:_sbas rgya: gtad rgya:_pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyi gter ma'o:_:

[6.33 mkha’ ’gro yang tig gi dbang bskur ba’i lag len mkha’ ’gro snying thig gi dkyil ’khor bri tshul]

@#/_/mkha' 'gro yang tig gi dbang bskur ba'i lag len/ mkha' 'gro snying thig gi dkyil 'khor bri tshul rnams bzhugs so/_/ na mo gu ru/_mkhyen stobs baiDUr gsar pa'i bum bzang nas/_/smin byed dbang bzhi'i 'chi med bdud rtsi'i rgyun/_/bdag blo'i za ma tog tu stsal mkhas pa/_/rdo rje 'chang dbang bla ma'i zhabs la 'dud/_/rdzogs pa chen po mkha' 'gro snying thig gi dbang bskur ba'i tshul la/_snying thig rtsa ba'i dbang chog ma bu dum bur bcad pa rnams go rim rgyu ru lugs su bkod pa dang / der ma tshang ba 'ga' zhig o rgyan yab yum gyis gdams pa'i gnad bkrol te mngon sum stsal ba la brten nas chos rje kun mkhyen chen pos rtsa ba gter byon gyi dgongs pa zab cing brlings pa rnams gsal por bkral ba mkha' 'gro yang tig tu grags pa'i gzhung gzhan dang ma 'dres shing rang rkang tshugs pa mdzad pa'i de nyid kyi nang tshan rin po che dbang gi phreng ba nyid bklag chog nag 'gros su bkod pa yin 'dug na'ang rdul tshon bzhengs pa gzhir bzhag sgrub chen dang 'dres pas cung zad dbye dka' bas/_da lta yul dus dang 'tshams pa'i phyag len phal che ba zhig ras bris la brten pa mang bas de'i tshul ni/_thog mar sa chog ni grub na legs kyang ras bris kyi phyogs la mi dgos pas gong du dkyil 'khor bshams pa'i sa gzhi khod snyoms pa'i maN+Dal la dri'i thig le la me tog gi tshom bu slob dpon gyis lha so so'i sngags brjod bzhin du bkod/_/rnal rgyal bum pa bcu'am lnga/_ma 'byor na gcig gis kyang rung ste/_las bum bcas pa rnams so so'i chas su byas pa rgyun 'bab kyi chus sum gnyis bkang ba la rdzas nyer lngas sbags pa gtsang ma'i stegs la bkod/_mtha' bskor gyi mdun du mchod gtor sman raka can dang /_chu gnyis sngon 'gro'i nyer spyod lnga g.yas bskor du bsham/_rdor dril/ ku sha_srung skud/_khyor chu/_bdud rtsi lnga'i ril bu/_so shing rnams 'du bya/_de nas sta gon gyi cho ga byed tshul dbang chog ltar las phyag bzhes spyi tsam la sbyin sreg ma grub kyang chog_/gsol gdab kyi gong du slob ma khrus dang phyag byas gral la 'khod cing bgegs bskrad/_sta gon gyi sngon du bshad pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor/_nyams chag skong ba gsol gdab kyi le tshan rnams skabs 'dir bya/_de nas slob ma'i blo bcos pa'i chos bshad ci rigs skabs sbyar gyi sngon du btang nas/_sta gon dngos gzhi rmi lam brtags pa'i bar dkyus bzhin byas te de nas slob ma rang gnas su btang dkyil 'khor gyi ltar gsol gdab dang rjes chog bya/_nyin dang po'i cho ga'o//_// !_de nas dbang chog dngos gzhi la yo byad bsham pa ni/_ras bris kyi khar many+dzi so so'i steng du rnam rgyal bum pa rnams kyi kha rgyan gyi gseb tu shel dang rma bya me long rnams btsugs pa bkod/_phyogs ci bder rigs lnga'i sku 'bag_/dbu rgyan/_rdo rje/_dril bu/_mdun g.yas su rta mgrin gyi gtor ma/ bar du mchod gtor sman raka can g.yon du srog sgrub dang /_phyogs ci bder rig 'dzin gyi gtor ma/_gza' bdud/_shan pa dmar nag_/g.yu sgron ma rnams so so'i gtor ma sku 'bag can/_g.yas su gsang dbang gi dkyil 'khor phyag len bzhin bris pa'i khar thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba/_rgyab tu rig ma'i tsaka li/_g.yon du dbang bzhi pa'i bcas shom/_phyogs ci bder ka dag rtsal dbang /_thod rgal rtsal dbang /_mkha' 'gro'i don dbang gsum pad 'dab 'dor thod pa bcud ldan gyi bcas gcig gis 'thus/_slob ma mchog la bka' gtad byed par spro yang shom zur pa med/_dkyil 'khor rgyan bkod zhib par dbang chog ltar dang /_bsdu na de dag gi mtha' skor du chu gnyis sngon 'gro'i nyer spyod/_spos/_mar me/_lha bshos/_tshogs mchod rnams gzab rgyas su bshams/_phyag len rgyas pa'i lugs su dbang rnams dum bur zhag grangs kyis chod par bskur na bsham bkod 'dor len gyi skabs phyed par bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa ni/_dbang chog las/ sta gon du bya ba'i skabs bzhin byas la mchod bstod bkra shis brjod/_ces gsungs shing /_de'i don ni rang nyid gzhi'i kun bzang du gsal btab/ mdun gyi bum pa bskyed bzlas 'od zhu ba'i bar bya/_ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor lha bskyed nas bstod pa'i bar dkyus bzhin bya/_bdag mdun la bzlas pa byed dgos pa'i gsal kha ma byung zhing /_rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po ltar na bden gnyis dbyer med snod bcud dag mnyam chen por ye nas gnas pa'i gzhi rgyud bde gshegs snying po skye 'gags gnas gsum dang bral ba'i rtsal snang lha skur shar ba las slob gsar du sgro btags pa ma yin pa'i nges shes rnyed cing rlung 'gro 'ong gzhom med sngags kyi rang bzhin du gnas par shes pa ni don dam gyi bzlas pa yin pas bar bkab ma byas kyang chog_/yang dkyil 'khor sgrub pa las/_bzlas pa'i rim pa skabs ltar bya/_zhes pas/_rigs lnga'i sgrub thabs ltar bzlas pa byas kyang legs so/_/ yang dbang gi byed las bum pa gtso bas bum bzlas byas pas khyab ces bla mas gsungs/_tshul 'di ni snying thig rtsa ba'i dbang chog las/_rigs lnga nang sgrub bdag bskyed/_phyi sgrub mdun bskyed/_ces gsungs pas gong gi bdag bskyed gzhi'i kun bzang nyid rigs lnga nang sgrub lus dkyil gyi sgom gzhi yin pa dang /_phyi sgrub mdun bskyed dang lha grangs rgyas bsdus las 'od zer 'phros pa'i bskyed pa la sogs mngon rtogs ltar bya'o/_/zhes sogs gsungs pas gsal bar bstan no/_/des ni bum dbang gi sgrub mchod song nas/_dbang chog las/_bdag 'jug dgos par gsungs pa grub na legs shing /_/pad+ma klong yangs ltar bya/[·]da lta'i phyag len du/_dam ye dbyer med du rtogs pa bdag 'jug gi ngo bo yin pa gsal 'debs su rig pa'i me tog dor bas go bcad pa gzhan la bskur thabs rgyas bsdus 'tshams pas shin tu legs so/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la slob ma bcug pa'i gnang ba zhus nas/_khrus dang bgegs bskrad nas bsrung 'khor gsal btab/_chos bshad rgyas bsdus skabs sbyaRa gyi mthar/_'di nyid kyi lo rgyus rgyas par bshad nas/_bum dbang nas gtad rgya'i bar dbang chog gzhung nyid las 'phri bsnan bya rgyu med kyang /_dbang gong ma gsum dus bdag bskyed rta mgrin yab yum du bsgom dgos pa dbang bzhi stan thog gcig tu bskur ba yin na/_slob dpon gyis chog la ma ltos par dmigs pa 'phral du bsgyur ba gnas bsgyur gyi lugs dbang chog gzhung du yod pa de ka ltar byas pas khyab/ dbang rnams dus so sor bskur na/_dbang gi 'grel pa las/_gsang dbang man chad gsang sgrub d+hAk+ki lngas bskur ba yin te:_zhes gsungs pas rigs lnga gsang sgrub rta phag gi lus dkyil la brten pa'i sgom bzlas byas kyang legs so/_/dbang bzhi pa rig pa cer mthong du ngo sprad pa lha bskyed ched du bcos mi dgos te/_rgyal ba zhi khro thams cad bzhi cha gsum bral gyi rig pa chos sku'i ngo bo las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang snga ma las rang rig cer mthong du ngo sprod pa ni yang gsang gi sgrub pa'o/_/zhes pas shes so/_/dbang chog las mchog dbang gi bdag bskyed kha bsgyur skad cig krong bskyed kyis go mi chod snyam pa'i rtog ge'i ngan rtog gis bslad par mi bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang 'dul gyi mos ngor 'char ba sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam 'phrul la mnga' brnyes pa yin la/_rnam pa lam byed kyi dus su yang rten 'brel gyi rol pa ma 'gags pa'i tshul du gang dgos skabs dang sbyar nas gnas 'gyur ba ni/_gnyug ma'i sems nyid lhan skyes nyid lam dang 'bras bu'i chos thams cad kyi 'char gzhi yin pas gzhi 'bras gnyis su med pa'i gnad gal po che'o/_/gsar ma ba kha cig ltar lha sku mtshan 'dzin gyi rtog par a 'thas par ni rdzogs pa chen po'i lugs las gzhan du gyur pa'o/_/ tshogs mchod las byang zur bkol ltar dbang grol nas btang na bde zhing de skabs kyang lha bskyed dgos pa yang gcig shugs gcig 'gags kyi chu las nya ldang ba'i tshul du bsgom zhing /_srung ma'i gtor chog dang dbang gi rjes chog bzod gshegs/_nyer bsdu bsngo smon shis brjod rnams tshogs mchod las 'byung ba bzhin byas pas 'thus so/_/de skad bshes gnyen mchog de'i bzhed skong du/_rje btsun bla mas bka' stsal ji bzhin du/_'gyur med bstan 'phel bdag gis bkod pa'i dges/_mkha' mnyam 'gro rnams smin cing grol bar shog_/mkha' 'gro snying thig gi dkyil 'khor bri tshul ni/_phyi nas me rim bzhin ri rdo ra dur khrod pad phreng rnams ni spyi dang 'dra/_dur khrod kyi bkod pa gzhan spyi dang 'dra zhing rnying ma la rU tra'i rdzas brgyad bkod legs thang rnying phal cher na lho'i dur khrod kyi dbus su ru tra'i mgo song bar 'dug kyang deng song phyag len la lho'i dur khrod kyi zur du bkod/_lho nub phyogs su/ gzhan rnams kyang dur khrod so so'i zur du bri/_g.yas skor du/_'di ltar lho nub tu lag g.yon/_nub tu snying /_nub byang du rkang g.yon/_byang du gsang rdor/_byang shar du rkang g.yas/[ · ]shar du glo ba/_shar lhor lag g.yas te thams cad 'phrul shes dgos/_pad 'dab mdzes tshon mtshan so gnyis kyi brdar 'dab ma so gnyis so/_/ze'u 'bru ser/_lte ba ljang gu pa tra ris/_dkyil 'khor dngos gzhi la rta babs snam bu bzhi la snam bu bzhi po 'og nas rim bzhin dmar sngo ljang ser bya/_rtsig pa la nang nas rim bzhin sngo dkar ser dmar ljang ba'o/_/lha gnas dang sgo'i bar gyi khyams rnams ni phyogs mdog pa tra ris/_lha gnas la lte ba la li khri/_de'i phyir cha phran gcig tsam mu khyud sngo skya/_de'i phyi mu khyud de las nyis 'gyur ser po/_de'i phyir pad 'dab bzhi phyogs mdog/_de'i phyir rdo ra/_de'i phyir pad phreng dmar po/_de'i phyir 'khor lo'i gzhi dkar po la rgya skyegs kyi ri mos 'di ltar bcad 'dug rtsibs 'di ltar dkar po/_lha bkod tshul ni lte bar rnam snang mthing ga_/'khor dril 'khor lo'i yu ba cana'adzin pa/_yum sngo skya/_'dab ma bzhi la shar nas rim pa bzhin/_rigs bzhi yab yum phyogs mdog yab rnams g.yas rang rtags phyag rgya dang g.yon des yu ba byas pa'i dril bu yum rnams rdo dril 'dzin nas yab mgul 'khyud pa/ yang tig tu yum rnams gri thod 'dzin pa byas 'dug_/sgo bzhi'i nang du sgo ba yab yum rnams byang sgo'i g.yas rgya gram g.yon dril bu 'dug phyogs mdog yang rnams g.yas rang rtags phyag rgya yum rnams kyang g.yas rang rtags yab dang mtshungs so/ khro bo'i chas can no/_/ras gzhi'i phyi'i sa stong lus pa rnams sngon po'am ljang gu la pa tra ris la mu ran dmar po byas pa sogs/_gzhan rnams spyi dang 'dra'o/_/gsang dbang la phyi rol me ri/_de'i nang sa stong dang mtshams su mu ran nag po lte ba'i gzhi ljang gu pa tra ris/_de'i nang chos 'byung phyi ma logs mdun bstan nang ma zur mdun bsnol ma phyi dmaRa skya nang dmar po/_de'i nang me long sin d+hu ras byugs pa mtshon byed zlum po mdog rang sa de lte bar gri thod kyis mtshan pa'o/_/ !_srog sgrub ma la phyi rol me ri/_de'i nang thod skam kha phyir bstan gyi phreng ba/_de'i nang khrag mtsho/_de'i nang chos 'byung zur mdun bstan gyi dbus su chu gri dang zur gsum du chu grigasum rgyab yol nang dmar phyi pa tra ris su bris pa/_zur gsum du'ang 'di 'dra ba gsum bri'o/_/'di rnams ni rab rdul tshon/_/_'bring ras bris la bri dgos rgyu yin/_gter chen bla ma'i dkyil thang la ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin yin/_kun mkhyen chen po'i phyag len ma 'phyugs pa yin gsungs/_/dge'o//_//

[6.34 mkha’ ’gro snying thig gi lo rgyus rin po che’i phreng ba]

@#/_/mkha' 'gro snying thig gi lo rgyus rin po che'i phreng ba bzhugs so/_/ mkha' 'gro snying thig gi lo rgyus rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos sku'i mkha' la longs sku'i dkyil 'khor rgyas/_/sprul sku'i zer gyis 'gro blo'i mun pa sel/_/rim gsum bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_/lo rgyus rin chen phreng ba 'bri bar bya/_/ 'dir bka' thams cad kyi rgyal po/_man ngag thams cad kyi snying po/_lung thams cad kyi phyi mo/_theg pa thams cad kyi yang rtse/_'od gsal rdo rje snyingapo/ mkha' 'gro snying thig gi lo rgyus la gsum ste/_rgyal ba dgongs pa'i brgyud pa/_rig 'dzin brda'i brgyud pa/_gang zag snyan khung du brgyud pa'o/_/dang po ni bdag cag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid gzhi gdod ma'i gnas lugs su mngon par byang chub ste sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs pa las mi g.yo bar bzhugs pa'i tshul la/_nang 'od gsal chos kyi ska'i gnas skabs ni/_ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum gnas pas rnam pa yul la mi spyod pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ngang gis 'od gsal ba'o/_/de'i tshe gnas phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi sku zhing na/_ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dpal kun tu bzang po/_'khor phun sum tshogs pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshogs la/_dus phun sum tshogs pa chos nyid 'pho 'gyur med pa'i tshe/_chos phun sum tshogs pa rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po rang chas lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang du 'od gsal ba'o/_/de nas de nyid kyi ngang las ma g.yos bzhin du rang snang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rang byung ba ni/ rang bzhin gyi snang cha las rnam dag stug po bkod pa bde ba'i zhing thams cad kyang ye shes lnga'i rang mdangs las byung ba/_steng dang 'og dang phyogs mtshams ma yin zhing 'od khyim rin po che'i khang bu bkod legs pa na/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshom bu 'bum phrag brjod las 'das pas bskor ba rnams kyang /_gdul bya dang 'dul byed ma yin zhing rang snang lhun gyis grub pa'i mnga' dbang du rang byung ba'o/_/de nyid kyi snang cha las rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phro zhing snang ba thams cad kyang /_za 'og gi ber khyim bkram pa ltar bkod legs shing kha dog lngar 'od 'bar ba ni/_zhal dang ljags kyi dkyil 'khor las yi ge drug gi 'od zer mu med pa 'phros pa las rang byung ba'o/_/de'i tshe gnas phun sum tshogs pa rang snang stug po bkod par/_ston pa phun sum tshogs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas/_'khor phun sum tshogs pa sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pas bskor ba la/_chos phun sum tshogs pa ye shes 'od gsal ba'i dgongs pa/_dus phun sum tshogs pa chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshe rang chas su rang gis 'od gsal ba'i dgongs pa brjod nga med par ston to/_/de nyid kyi ngang las sprul pa mngon par 'phro ba ni/_gdul bya'i dbang las rang snang ba chu'i zla ba lta bus te/_'di'i dus su steng 'og phyogs mtshams kyi 'gro ba rigs drug so so'i 'khrul pa'i dbang gis rang rang gi gnas dang bde sdug gi snang ba du ma la spyod pa'i sems kyi 'khrul pa la zhen pa'i tshe/_/_sa dang po nas bcu pa'i bar gyi sems dpa' rnams la phyogs bcu'i zhing du/_rang bzhin sprul pa'i rigs lnga so sor snang bas don mdzad cing 'gro ba drug gi gnas su thub pa bcom ldan 'das grangs med pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing don mdzad pa las/_re zhig mi mjed 'dir sprul pa'i 'phro tshul ni/_de ltar rang snang stug po bkod pa'i zhing nas sprul pa chen po gnyis snang ba las/_byin rlabs mchog gi sprul pa ni gsum ste/_rin po che brgya rtsa gcig gi rgyu las byung bar rang snang ba'i sku gzugs 'gro ba gang gi tshe lo'i lus bongs dang mnyam pa las/_cho 'phrul du ma 'byung bas 'gro ba grol bar byed pa dang /_rin po che las rang byung bar snang ba'i yi ge chen po bstan pa bu gcig las chos kyi rnam grangs brjod du med pa rang sgrogs pas don byed pa dang /_chos nyid rdo rje tshe lo de pa'i mi rnams kyi chag gang ba las gang la gang 'dod kyi chos dang yo byad kyi char 'bab nyid grol bar byed pa gsum ste/_yi ge yang skad rigs mi gcig pa gang gi sgra skad der grags pa'o/_/de dag gi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer 'gyed cing 'gro ba dpag tu med pa rang bzhin gyis 'bad pa med par grol ba'i phrin las mdzad de/_sku gsung thugs las rang byung ba'i sprul pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/ye shes dam pa'i sprul pa ni 'gro ba gang dang gang gi gtso bo la sogs par snang bas don mdzad pa ste/_de yang rang snang lhun grub stug po bkod pa'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo las rang byung ba/_sprul pa'i sku rdo rje 'chang chen pos longs spyod rdzogs pa'i cha byad du zhing 'di'i bskal pa dang po dga' ldan brtsegs pa zhes bya bar pad+ma'i steng du rang byon nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang phyag na rdo rje la rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i chos tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa dgongs pas rang snang du go bar mdzad do/_/de'i tshe rdo rje 'chang nyid khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ston pa phun sum tshogs par rang byon nas 'khor tshogs pa bskal ba bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong la/_chos phun sum tshogs pa sgra thal 'gyur rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa yang gsang 'od gsal gyi rgyud bcu bdun/_klong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud dang bco brgyad/_dus phun sum tshogs pa ye shes rang snang ba'i tshe rang shar du gsungs so/_/de'ang ston pa dang /_'khor tha dad med kyang 'gro ba 'dul ba la dgongs nas so sor snang ba'o/_/ji ltar zhe na/_bskal pa 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mtshan tha dad/_dus tha dad/_chos tha dad pas 'dul bar dgongs nas rim pa dang tha dad par byon pa'o/_/skabs 'dir rdo rje 'chang gis rdo rje sems dpa' dang phyag na rdo rje la phun sum tshogs pa nas brgyud par bgrang ngo*/_/de nas sprul sku mched tshul bskal pa dang por dga' ldan brtsegs par ston pa khye'u snang ba dam pa byon pa'i 'og tu gnas 'jig rten mi mjed du ston pa khye'u 'od mi 'khrugs pa byon no/_/de nas gnas 'od kyi phung por ston pa 'jigs pa skyob pa dang /_gnas chags 'byung mngal du snang bar ston pa gzhon nu rol pas rnam par rtse ba dang / gnas ri rab kyi lho phyogs 'tsho byed gzhon nu'i ldum rar ston pa rdo rje dang /_gsang chen rol pa'i dur khrod du ston pa gzhon nu dpa' bo stobs ldan dang /_gnas srin po ru lu'i sgra dang ldan par ston pa drang srong khros pa'i rgyal po dang /_bya rgod phung po la ston pa gser 'od dam pa dang /_sog po g.yu'i smin ma can gyi gnas su ston pa brtse bas rol pa'i blo gros dang /bya rgod phung poRa ston pa 'od srung bgres po dang /_rdo rje gdan du ston pa mngon rdzogs rgyal po dang /_ser skya'i gnas su ston pa shAkya thub pa'i bar du byon te/_tshe lo dpag tu med pa nas brgya pa'i bar du 'gro ba rnams kyi ded dpon dam par byon pa'o/_/_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa na byams pa 'byung ba nas bzung ste/_tha ma sangs rgyas mos pa'i bar du 'gro ba rnams kyi kha lo sgyur ba rim par 'byung ba yin no/_/_/de ltar byon pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyang kun tu bzang po gcig gi ngo bo las/_dus de dang de dag tu rang 'byung ba'i phyir dgongs pa chos nyid las mi g.yo bar rim par byung ba ltar snang bas rgyal ba dgongs pa'i brgyud pa zhes bya'o//_// !_don gnyis pa rig 'dzin brda'i brgyud pa ni/_bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes ri rab kyi byang phyogs dur khrod me ri 'bar ba'i gnas na/_mkha' 'gro ma dang grub pa dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa rnams la chos ston pa na/_rdo rje gdan gyi nub phyogs o rgyan thor cog can gyi yul na rgyal po u pa rA tsa dang / btsun mo snang ba gsal ba'i 'od ldan ma gnyis kyi sras mo su d+harma zhes bya ba'i dge slong ma zhig rgya mtsho'i gling du dka' thub la bzhugs pa'i rmi lam du shel gyi mi dkar po zhig gis rin po che'i bum pa spyi bor bzhag pa rmis te/ zla ba bcu nas khye'u zhig btsas pa las yum bred de/_pha med bu 'di 'jig rten 'dre las gzhan pa su/_/gal te lha dang lha min sna tshogs gzugs/_/ 'di ltar byung ba'i dpe ni sus mthong med/_/'di ni log sred 'gro bas dpyas gyur sdig re che/_/zhes smras te thal ba'i khung du sbas pa dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /lha dang klu thams cad kyis mchod pa byed par mthong ste slar bzod par gsol nas ro langs bde ba zhes mtshan gsol pa las/_lo bdun nas sangs rgyas kyi chos mang po thugs la rang shar te yum la zhus nas/_u rgyan gyi yul du rgyal po'i mchod gnas paN+Di ta lnga brgya dang rtsod pa las/_slob dpon rgyal nas pad nya b+ha bar mtshan gsol dus/_rgyal po dgyes nas dga' rab rdo rje zhes mtshan gsol/_mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis ro langs thal mdog ces mtshan gsol lo/_/de nas ri bo nyi ma snang byed la sku mnyam par bzhag nas/_slar yang dur khrod me ri 'bar bar phyag na rdo rje las rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i chos thams cad gsan nas ma la ya bstan pa'i las rgyas pa'i rtser byon te/_/_rgyud lung rnams glegs bam du bkod nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gtad nas/_slob dpon nyid dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du bzhugs so//_// !_de'i tshe rgya nag po'i yul grong khyer sho 'khyams nag po zhes bya ba na/ khyim bdag dge ba dang ldan pa'i yid can dang /_yum snang ba rab tu mkhyen ldan ma zhes bya ba'i sras/_slob dpon chen po shrI sing ha zhes bya ba sbrangs pa'i yon tan du ma dang ldan pa zhig grong khyer de nas nub phyogs kyi grong khyer gser gling zhes bya bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi thang stong zhig gi nam mkha' las/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang pos lung bstan pa/_/_kye skal ldan 'bras bu tshe gcig gis nges par thob par 'dod na/_rgya gar gyi rdo rje gdan gyi nub phyogs na dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal zhes bya ba yod kyi der song zhig ces pa dang /_ri bo rtse lnga'i shar phyogs kyi khrus kyi rdzing bu'i nang du'ang de kho na bzhin du lung bstan pa la brten nas/rkang mgyogs kyi rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs nas byon pa zhag dgu na dur khrod bsil tshal du phyin te/ slob dpon chen po dga' rab rdo rje dang zhal mjal nas rjes su gzung bar zhus pas gnang ste/_gsang ba bla na med pa mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dbang khrid rgyud man ngag dang bcas pa rdzogs par gnang zhing sgrub pa mdzad pas/ 'od gsal chu'i zla ba lta bu'i lus thob nas mchog thun mong gi dngos grub brnyes so/_/de'i tshe ma mo dang mkha' 'gro rnams kyis rang rang gi snying po phul zhing bstan pa skyong bar khas blangs te mchod pa'i sprin phung chen po gtibs so/_/de nas slob dpon chen po shrI sing ha nyid/_dur khrod de las dpag tshad gsum 'das pa na/_dur khrod chen po rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba/_nyin bzhin du rlung 'tshubs shing /_mtshan bzhan du me 'bar ba na/_ma mo dang /_mkha' 'gro ma mang po rgyu ba/_dag byed kyi mtsho dang /_bde byed kyi mchod rten dang / 'jig rten pa'i lha dga' byed dbang phyug gnas par byon te/_brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa mdzad cing ma mo mkha' 'gro ma rnams la chos ston pa'i phyir bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dpal u rgyan gyi yul du/_rin po che 'bar ba'i grong khyer na/bai DUr+ya'i pho brang phyi nang thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa nor bu sgron me'i snang bas khyab pa na rgyal po in+d+ra b+hu d+hi btsun ma brgya rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig phyi nang gi blon pos bskor nas bzhugs pa las/_sras rgyal bu mi mnga' nas/_dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes bco lnga nas dkon mchog mchod de/chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba'i mdo sde bton nas/_/_sbyin gtong gi khang pa chen po brtsegs te skye dgu mang po la sbyin pa rlabs po che btang nas lo mang zhig song ba na/_dkor mdzod thams cad zad cing stongs su nye yang slong mo ba'i 'phro ma chad nas/las su bskos pa'i mis da ni bang mdzod thams cad zad cing stong pas khyed cag la sbyin rgyu med do smras pa dang /_glo bur du lhag pa kha cig na re/_bdag cag la ma byin na sngar sbyin pa thams cad don med do/_/ zhes smras pa gsan nas/_rgyal pos longs spyod zad mi shes pa'i thabs dris pas/_rgya mtsho'i gling na klu yi bu mo mdzes ldan ma'i lag na yid bzhin nor bu dgos 'dod kun 'byung yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can la snying rjes lhags pas bslad na ster bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsol bas/_rgya mtsho'i gling las nor bu lan mang du blangs pa'i ded dpon zhig yod pa la bka' bsgo ba/_kho bo ni rgya mtsho'i gling las nor bu len par 'dod kyi khyed kyis lam bstan par rigs so/_/zhes gsungs pas/_des kyang de ltar bgyi'o legs so zhes gsol nas rgya mtshor dgos pa'i yo byad rnams sta gon du byas so/_/de'i tshe blon po rnams kyis mi bzhud par gsol kyang ma gnang ste/_legs par grub pa'i nyi ma la/_gzings kyi nang du tshong pa lnga brgya'i 'khor dang lhan cig gshegs so/_/de nas gzings kyi phyogs bzhir dar po che bzhi phyar te mthun pa'i rlung gi tshe 'gro ba dang /_mtshams bzhir zha ne'i pha wang chen po bzhi 'phyang du bcug ste mi mthun pa'i rlung gi tshe sdod pa dang /_bya rog dang dung dang phug ron rnams ni/_ri dang chu srin brtags nas bsad pa dang /_rang gi yul phyogs ngos bzung ba'i phyir khyer te/_mthun pa'i rlung dang sbyar nas gzings kyi nyal thag bcad de/_ngang pa'i rgyal po nam mkha' la 'gro ba bzhin du song song ba las/_nyin zhag mang zhig na/_rin po che'i gling nor bu sna tshogs kyi bye ma brdal ba zhig tu phyin pa dang*/_'khor rnams de nyid du bzhag nas/_rgyal po dang ded dpon gnyis gru chung ngu zhig tu zhugs te de las kyang 'das te song ba na/_nyin zhag 'ga' zhig na ri dkar po zhig mthong nas rgyal pos dris pas dngul gyi ri yin zer ro/_/yang de las kyang 'das te song ba na/_ri sngon po zhig mthong nas dris pas bai DUr+ya'i ri yin zer ro/_/yang de las kyang las te song ba na/_ri ser po zhig mthong nas dris pas gser gyi ri yin te bdag cag deng ba'i gnas lags so zhes smras te song ba na/_ri de'i 'dabs gser gyi bye ma brdal ba'i sa gzhi'i mtshams su slebs pa dang*/_ded dpon gyis rgyal po la bsgo ba/_ri 'di'i steng na rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu zhig yod de/_de'i mdun na rdo rje'i gtun bu zhig yod kyi des sgo rdungs la sems can la phan pa'i don du nor bu rin po che 'dod do zhes brda sbyor la ci yang ma smra bar bzhugs shig dang /_klu'i bu mo mang pos nor bu 'bul du 'ong gi de dag la ci yang ma smra zhig_/der klu'i bu mo mdzes ldan mas nor bu rin po che 'bul du yong gi myur du longs la gos kyis gril spyi bor bsnams la byon cig ces legs par gdams pa bzhin/ rin po che'i khang bu'i sgo brdungs pas thog mar klu'i bu mo brgyas nor bu phul yang ma blangs par da dung sgo brdungs pas/_rting la klu'i bu mo mdzes ldan ma sngon mo shin tu mdzes shing lta bas mi ngoms pa zhig phyir byung nas spyi gtsug gi nor bu phul ba dang /_myur bar logs te ded dpon dang lhan cig rang gi 'khor rnams gnas pa'i gling der nor bu'i byin rlabs kyis nam mkha' las byon pa na/_thams cad ya mtshan skyes te phyag byas so/_/de nas ded dpon gyis legs par brtags pas rin po che sna bdun gzings su yang lji ran par brdzong ste/_gzings kyi kha lo sgyur nas 'ongs pa na/_rgya mtsho'i gling gcig na/_pad+ma'i sdong po shin ta mdzes pa'i steng na/_khye'u lo brgyad lon pa'i na tshod can/_shin tu mdzes shi_nga lta bas mi ngoms pa mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa zhig mthong nas/_de'i drung du song ste rgyal pos smras pa/_khye'u khyod kyi pha ni gang /_ma ni gang /_rigs ni gang /_ming ni gang /_yul ni gang / zas ni gang /_'dir don ci byed dris pas/_khye'us gsungs pa/_/_pha ni rang rig kun tu bzang /_/ma ni chos dbyings kun bzang mo/_/rigs ni dbyings rig gnyis su med/_/ming ni pad+ma 'byung gnas dpal/_/yul ni chos dbyings skye ba med/_/zas ni gnyis snang rtog pa za/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i spyod pa byed/_/ces gsungs pas rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes te/_sprul pa'i sku zhig 'khrungs 'dug pas bdag gi bur gsol ba gdab snyam nas smras pa/_bdag gi mchod gnas dang sras su gshegs par ci gnang zhes zhus pas/_de ltar bgyi'o gsungs nas gnang ba dang /_pad+ma'i sdong po bcad de/_khye'u de nyid dang nor bu dang bcas pa rang gi 'khor rnams kyis bskor te/_u rgyan gyi yul tu phyin pa na/_/_pho brang 'khor gyi mi thams cad kyis bsu ba chen po byas te/ bai DUr+ya'i pho brang du gshegs pa las/_rgyal pos smon pa/_ngas rnyed pa'i nor bu 'di yang dag pa yin na/_khye'u 'di bzhugs pa'i rin po che'i khri dang gdugs rang byung bar gyur cig ces brjod ma thag tu byung ngo /_/de la khye'u bzhugs te rgyal srid la mnga' gsol nas mtshan pad+ma rgyal po zhes grags so/_/yang rgyal pos smon pa/_nga'i pho brang 'khor du zhag bdun du rin po che'i char bab cing bang mdzod stongs pa rnams sngon pas gang bar gyur cig_/ ces brjod ma thag tu de bzhin du byung ngo*/_/de'i tshe rnga bo che brdungs nas phyogs thams cad du bsgrags pa/_rgyal po in+da b+ho d+hi'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu las dgos 'dod kyi char 'bebs pas su ci 'dod pa gang la gang 'dod pa longs shig ces brjod nas/_nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags shing mchod nas khrus chab gsol te/_rgyal pos smon lam btab pa/ ngas rnyed pa'i nor bu rin po che 'di yang dag pa yin nges na/_sems can thams cad la ci 'dod pa'i char phob cig ces brjod ma thag kha zas dang / gos dang longs spyod kyi char chen po bab cing /_rgyal 'bangs thams cad dbul phongs dang bral bar byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos bka' bsgo ba/_da ni khyed thams cad theg pa chen po'i chos la spyod cig ces gsungs te/_byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed du bcug pas/_/thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/de nas slob dpon chen po nyid rgyal srid ni chos dang mi mthun zhing sems can gyi don yang mi 'ong bar dgongs nas/_rgyal po dang blon po rnams sun 'byung ba'i phyir/_brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa mdzad de/_sku gcer bu la rus pa'i rgyan gsol/_kha TAM ga phyag na bsnams te gar mdzad pas/_pho brang gi rtser gar la lta ba'i mi mang po tshogs pa las/_kha TAM ga phyag nas shor ba ltar mdzad de/_blon po dbang po che ka ma ta'i bu'i mgo la bsnun nas shi'o/_/rgyal khrims la gang gis 'das kyang chad pa'i las gcod pas/_blon po kun tshogs te/_rgyal po la zhus pas/ rgyal bur mnga' gsol yang tshul ma yin pa spyod pas/_blon po'i bu nyes pa med par bsad pas/_da ni gsal shing gi rtse la bskyon nas chad pa gcad 'tshal zhes zhus pas/_rgyal pos gal gyis gcus kyang ma nyan par/_'o na spyugs par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pas legs so zhes brjod de/_de nas rgyal po thugs ma bde bzhin du slob_dpon la gsungs pa/_rin chen mtsho dkyil pad+ma'i sdong po las/_khye'u pha dang ma med sprul pa'i sku/_/brtul zhugs spyod pas blon po'i phrug gu bkums/_/blon pa rnams kyis rgyal khrims chad pa gcod/_/gsod las spyugs par snang bas gang dgar bzhud/_/ces smras pa dang /_slob dpon gyis gsungs pa/_'jig rten 'di na pha dang ma dkon yang*/_/yab dang yum du bgyis nas rgyal sar phyung /_/las kyi lan chags blon po'i phrug gu bsad/_/yul la zhen pa med pas spyugs kyang 'jigs pa med/_/skye 'chi gnyis su med pas bsad kyang 'jigs pa med/_/rgyal khrims gnyan pas spyugs pa shin tu legs/_/yab yum dag kyang yun du bde bar bzhugs/_/las kyi 'brel pas phyi nas mjal bar nges/_/zhes gsungs te phyag mdzad nas byon pa na/_blon po rnams kyis dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal zhes bya ba shin tu 'jigs shing skyi bung ba'i gnas su bskyal lo/_/der ro zas dang ro gos la longs spyod cing bzhugs pas mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du 'dus te mtshan yang pad+ma thod phreng rtsal zhes grags so/_/de nas dur khrod chen po dga' ba tshal dang /_so sa gling dang /_rgya mtsho'i gling la sogs pa rnams su byon te/_brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa mdzad pas/_gsang chen rdo rje phag mo la sogs ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma mang pos dbang bskur zhing mngon par bstod do/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pa grub cing /_dbang du 'dus pas mtshan mtsho skyes rdo rje drag po rtsal zhes grags shing /_mchog thun mong gi dngos grub rnyed do/_/de ltar chos thams cad la mnga' brnyes shing rang bzhin sprul pa'i sku chen por bzhugs kyang 'gro ba'i khams dang mos pa sna tshogs pas de dag gi mi dad pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_rgya gar gyi bla ma mkhas grub rnams las thos bsam mdzad de/_slob dpon pra b+ha hasti'i drung du rab tu byung nas shAkya seng ge zhes mtshan gsol/_slob dpon klu sgrub snying po dang /_'jam dpal bshes gnyen dang /_dge slong ma kun dga' mo la sogs pa las/_rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa dang /_'bras bu rdo rje theg pa mtha' dag gsan nas mkhyen par mdzad cing /_yi dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha dpag tu med pas zhal gzigs so/_/_/mu stegs pa dang rtsod pa mdzad pas mu stegs pham par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la btsud pas mtshan seng ge sgra sgrog ces grags so//de nas slob dpon chen po shrI seng ha'i drung du/nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud la sogs pa rdzogs pa chen po sems klong man ngag gi skor rnams rdzogs par zhus shing /_khyad par du thig le phyi nang gsang ba'i skor rnams gsan dus/_yang zhus pa/_slob dpon chen po lags/_tshe 'di nyid la zag bcas kyi phung po mi snang bar longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i zhing khams mthong zhing /chos kyi sku'i zhing du sangs rgya ba'i gdams pa zhig gnang 'tshal zhes zhus pas/slob dpon chen po shrI sing ha'i gsung gis/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis zhus pa de shin tu legs kyi/_theg pa thams cad kyi yang rtse/_/_lta ba thams cad kyi zhe phugs/_mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi snying thig_/_/gsang ba bas kyang ches shin tu gsang ba'i don/_tshe 'di nyid la gdos bcas sha phrag gi phung po 'od gsal longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur grol nas myur du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'grub pa'i gdams pa zhig yod kyi bstan par bya'o gsungs nas/_gsang ba mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dbang khrid man ngag dang bcas pa gnang nas lo gsum bsgrubs pas/_skye shi gnyis spangs rdo rje'i sku thob ste sprul pas yul sna tshogs su mi dang mi ma yin pa mang po la phan pa mdzad cing /_khyad par du rgya gar gyi rgyal po d+harmA pa la'i mchod gnas su nyin par bzhugs shing /_mtshan mo dur khrod chen po brgyad la sogs par/_mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i sprin phung dang lhan cig gsang sngags kyi kun tu spyod pas gnas par mdzad do/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa bod kyi rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan gyis bsam yas kyi sa gzhi 'dul ba'i don du spyan drong pas/_sngon gyi smon lam dang thugs rje'i dbang gis bod kyi yul du byon te/_sa gzhi btul zhing lha srin gdug pa can thams cad dam la btags nas/_gtsug lag khang bzhengs su gsol bas/_dpal bsam yas mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po nyi 'og gi rgyal khams nas 'gran zla dang bral bar grub cing /_rab tu gnas pa/_dga' ston chen po dang bcas pa mdzad do/_/de nas slob dpon chen po pho brang rim khang du spyan drangs te gsol zas sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod de/ 'jig rten gyi spyan gzigs mang po dang /_dgyes pa'i btsun mo phul nas gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i chos bsgyur bar zhus pas gnang ste/_sgra bsgyur rgya gar gyi gling du slob dpon nyid dang /_sprul pa'i lo tsA ba be+e ro tsa na dang / gnyags ku ma ra la sogs pas rgyud dpag tu med pa bsgyur zhing /_de dag gi sgrub thabs kyi rim pa mdzad de/_so sor bsgrubs pas/_grub thob nyi shu rtsa lnga*la*sogs*pa grub pa thob pa mang du byung zhing /_bod 'bangs thams cad bde ba la bkod do/_/de nas slob dpon gyis phyi rabs kyi 'gro ba la phan gdags pa'i phyir/_rgyud lung man ngag rnams yi ger bris te so sor smon lam gyi rgya dang bcas nas gter du sbas so/_/de ltar 'gro ba mi rnams kyi don mdzad tshe/_bod dang lho mon gyi mi ma yin rnams kyis bdag cag rnams la yang dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_/zhes zhus pas ste/_de dag gis spyan drangs byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas ni/_pa gro stag tshang seng ge phug_/lho brag mkhar chu/_kha rag rin chen phug_/shangs kyi zab bu lung /_ti sgro brag dkar/_tsA ri tsA khang /_rngams pa sgra sgrog la sogs pa rnams so/_/gzhan yang lo dang /_zla ba dang /_zhag dang /_dros skad Re tsam bzhugs pa'i gnas ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo//_// !_de'i tshe cog ro 'bring mtshams kyi yul na/_mang rje thog dkar legs dang /_ru bza'i rgyal mo mtsho 'dus te khyim 'dzin pa las/_rgyal mo mtsho'i rmi lam na/_nam mkha'i dkyil nas bud med sngon mo zhig gis 'od kyi skar ma zhig 'phangs pa khong pa'i nang du song ba rmis nas/_zla ba dgu ngo bcu na/_bu mo shin tu mdzes pa/_dpral ba la rdo rje rgya gram gyi ri mo yod pa ut+pala'i dri dang ldan pa zhig btsas pa las/_mtsho rgyal zhes btags te cher skyes pa las/ rgyal po'i btsun mor blangs pa na/_slob dpon la shin tu dad cing /_'khor ba'i chos la shin tu skyo nas/_rgyal po la chos byed par zhus pas/_gnang ste slob dpon la phul lo/_/de nas slob dpon gyis las rgya bgyis te gang du byon pa thams cad du byon nas/_bsnyen bkur dang zhabs tog mdzad cing sgrub pa rtse gcig tu mdzad pas grub pa thob ste mchog thun mong gi dngos grub brnyes so/_/_/de nas slob dpon yab yum gzho stod ti sgro brag la sgrub pa mdzad pa'i dus su/_ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma mang pos jo mo la bskul ba/ slob dpon sprul pa'i sku'i thugs la tshe 'di nyid la gdos bcas kyi phung po dag nas sangs rgya ba'i gdams pa/_mngon sum snying tig gi man ngag zab mo bzhugs pas gsol ba thob cig ces bskul ba dang /de'i tshe jo mos tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod cing phyag dang bskor ba byas te zhus pa/slob dpon chen po lags/_tshe 'di nyid la gdos bcas kyi phung po dag nas sangs rgya ba'i gdams pa mngon sum snying thig gi man ngag gnang 'tshal/ zhes zhus pas/_slob dpon chen po'i zhal nas/_mtsho rgyal khyod kyis zhus pa de shin tu legs shing /_tshe 'di nyid la gdos bcas sha khrag gi phung po 'od gsal longs spyod rdzogs sku'i zhing khams su dag nas/_chos sku lhun grub tu rin po che'i sbubs su gtan srid zin par byed pa'i gdams pa zab mo zhig yod kyi bstan par bya'o/_/gsungs nas/_tshogs khang chen mor zhi khro don gyi dkyil 'khor zhal phyes nas/_jo mo mkhar che bzas thog drangs ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma 'bum phrag gcig la dbang bskur nas khrid du mdzad de/_rgyu bcu bdun/_klong gsal dang bco brgyad/_de dag gi man ngag yi ge rab tu mang po dang bcas pa rnams gsungs so/_/de nas de rnams las rgyud rab tu rgyas pa'i man ngag rnams phyogs gcig tu phyes/_slob dpon nyid kyis mdzad pa'i zab 'dus ku su lu'i skor rnams phyogs gcig tu phyes te/_slob dpon dang mtsho rgyal gyis so so'i yi ge bris te dkar chag la mnan no/_/de'i tshe rgyal pos gdan drangs te/_'chims phur slob dpon dang /_rgyal po yab sras gshegs te tshogs kyi 'khor lo brgya rtsa mdzad pa las/_btsun mo dam pa 'brom bza' byang chub sman las 'khrungs pa'i sras mo lha lcam pad ma gsal zhes bya ba dgung lo brgyad lon pa cig shi bas/_lha sras bu mo'i ro la gzigs shing bshums te mya ngan mdzad pas/_slob dpon chen pos bka' stsal pa/_kye mnga' bdag rje/_spyir 'jig rten gyi snang ba rmi lam dang 'dra/ 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid sgyu ma yin/_rgyal srid mdang gi rmi lam dang 'dra/ tshe mi rtag chu'i lbu ba dang 'dra/_'dus pa thams cad bral ba yin/_/'dus byas thams cad 'di dang 'dra/_/mi rtag rtag par ma 'dzin par/_/skye med chos sku'i don la sbyongs/_/zhes gsungs shing /_yang rgyal pos zhus pa'i don du/_gtsug lag khang dang bstan pa'i dar gud 'byung tshul/_lha lcam gyi skyes rabs dang bcas pa rgyas par gsungs nas/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su zangs mdog dpal rir rgyal po dang*/_/mtsho rgyal lha lcam pad ma gsal dang 'o skol zhal mjal lo gsungs pas/_rgyal po dgyes pas phyag dang bskor ba mang du mdzad do/_/de nas lha lcam gyi ro'i snying khar shes rab mtshal gyi yi ge nra gcig bris te rnam shes bkug pas dbugs byung ste smra shes pa byung ngo /_/ de'i tshe gsang ba mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dbang bskur nas gsang mtshan pad+ma las 'brel rtsal du btags shing /_bu mo'i spyi bor dpe sgrom bzhag nas/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos 'di dang 'phrad nas sems can la phan thog par shog cig_/ces smon lam btab bo/_/de nas slar rnam shes don pa dang /_ro de nyid sreg pa'i tshul bstan zhing mo'i sgrib pa sbyong ba'i don du/slob dpon gyis rdzu 'phrul mdzad de skad cig la u rgyan du tshogs kyi 'khor lo mdzad do/_/yang slob dpon gyis gsungs pa/_ji ltar byung ba 'di dag yi ger thob cig_/lha lcam mo rang gi skye ba dang 'phrad pa'i dus su yid ches pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/zhes gsung yi ger btab bo/_/de nas jo mos zhus pa/_snying thig zab mo'i gdams pa spel lam sba bar bya/_zhes zhus pas/_slob dpon chen pos gsungs pa/_'di da lta spel ba'i dus la ma bab pas gter du sbed dgos/_lha lcam gyis smon lam btab pas mo'i chos skal yin zhing /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su snying tig snga 'gyur 'chal te cung zad nub tu nye ba na/ chos 'dis phan thogs par 'gyur bas gter du sbed dgos gsungs nas/ rgyud rab tu rgyas pa'i man ngag dang bcas pa rnams bum thang smad kyi brag seng ge 'dra ba la gter du sbas shing /_zab 'dus ku su lu'i skor rnams dgas po dang lung khra mo brag la gter du sbas nas/_gza' dang ma mo dang gter bdag gi mkha' 'gro mang po la gnyer du gtad nas/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su skal ldan las can de la gtod cig ces bka' bsgo bar mdzad do/_/ gzhan yang sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las dang bcas pa'i gter kha mang du sbas so/_/de ltar rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan gyis/_dpal bsam yas kyi gtsug lag khang chen po bzhengs/_slob dpon chen po pad ma 'byung gnas la sogs pa paN+Di ta mang po spyan drangs/_dam pa'i chos mang po bsgyur nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dar rgyas su mdzad do/_/de nas drug cu rtsa gcig glang gi lo la rgyal po dgung la gshegs te/_slob dpon nyid kyang dngos kyi gdul bya de las med par dgongs nas lha sras mu ne btsan pos bzhugs par zhus kyang ma gnang ste gshegs pa'i tshe/_mang yul bye ma'i la so la thug par bskyal nas/_phyag dbu thod bud bud du 'tshal zhing bskor ba mdzad de/_nged bod la thugs rjes gzigs par zhu gsungs nas spyan chab mang po bton pas/slob dpon chen po'i zhal nas/_lha sras btsan po/_'jig rten gyi snang ba sgyu ma dang 'dra bas skye med chos sku'i rtsal sbyong mdzod cig_/'dus byas chu'i lbu ba dang 'dra bas 'jig med thar pa'i lam sna zung zhig_/mi rtag rtswa kha'i zil pa dang 'dra bas sems nyid gnyug ma'i gtan srid zung zhig 'dus pa tshong khang gi mgron po dang 'dra bas 'bral med bde chen gyi grogs dang 'grogs shig_/'di phyir phan pa dam pa'i chos las med pas rje 'bangs thams cad dam pa'i lha chos mdzod cig_/spre'u lo spre'u zla ba'i tshes bcu la nga yang bod kyi yul du lan re 'ong zhing /_las can rnams la rgyun du snang bas thugs ngal mi mdzad par ci bder bzhugs 'tshal lo/_/zhes gsung nas/_slob dpon pad ma 'byung gnas dang /_jo mo mkhar che mtsho rgyal gnyis/_nam mkha'i dbyings na phar 'od zer gyi phung po dang bcas te lho nub rnga yab kyi gling du bun gyis gshegs so/_/de ltar rim gyis byon pa'i bla ma bzhi po de yang /_kun tu bzang po yab yum dang*/_rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa las/ 'gro ba rang rgyud pa 'gas bsgrubs pas grub pa thob pa ni ma yin no/_/de'i phyir gdul bya'i snang ba dang bstun nas de ltar byon pa'o/_// !_don gsum pa gang zag snyan khung du brgyud pa ni/_de ltar u rgyan chen pos lung bstan pa bzhin/_lha lcam pad ma gsal skye ba rim gyis brgyud pa las/_tshe lo lnga bcu kha ral gyi tshe/_gsal rje gong gi shar phyogs 'bri thang zhes bya ba'i sa char sku 'khrungs te/_chung ngu'i dus na chos la mos pas rab tu byung ste mtshan tshul khrims rdo rje zhes grags so/_/de'i tshe gter gyi kha byang dang lde mig phyag tu byung zhing /_gter bdag gi mkha' 'gro rnams kyis yang yang bskul ba la brten nas dgung lo nyi shu rtsa gsum gyi steng du/_zab mo mkha' 'gro snying tig gi gter kha dwags po dang lung khra mo brag nas gdan drangs nas cung zad spel bar mdzad cing khyad par du las can gyi slob ma sprul sku legs ldan la bka' lung shog ser dang bcas pa gtad nas 'dzin zhen med pa'i spyod pas gnas nges med du 'byon pa las/_byar smad phying dkar zhes bya ba'i sa char sku gshegs te pur sbyangs pa las/_gdung rus la rdo rje phag mo tshon gang ba'i sku dang /_ring bsrel mang du byon cing zhag bdun du lung pa 'ja' 'od kyis gang bas 'gro ba rnams ngo mtshar gyi sa la bkod do/_/ de lta bu'i bla ma zab gter gyi bdag po de nyid las/_sprul sku legs ldan pas bka' lung man ngag rdzogs par zhus te/_de'ang dpal ldan bla ma dam pa sprul sku legs ldan gyi 'khrungs yul ni/_dmyal smad chos gro se ba lung zhes bya ba'i gnas su/_sngags brgyud khyad par can gyi rigs slob dpon dbang phyug rgyal dang /_gru mo rdo rje dgos gnyis kyi sras su 'khrungs te/_sku chung ngu'i dus nas sngon gyi skye ba mang po dran pa dang yi ge 'bri klog bslab ma dgos par mkhyen pa dang /_thugs rab chen po mnga' 'o/_/grub thob u rgyan pa dang rtogs ldan mgon po ye shes kyis kyang sems can la phan thogs pa'i skyes bu zhig 'ong bar 'dug gsungs nas lung bstan/_dgung lo brgyad lon dus ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro mas dngos su lung bstan zhing yab mes kyi zab chos rnams kyi bdag por byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas gsung rab kyi gnas la thos bsam mdzad pa'i tshul ni/_yab las rig pa bklag pa sgra'i bstan bcos/_rnam gzhag zhib mo gang+ga'i chu rgyun/_skye bo gso ba'i thig pa rtsa 'grel dang bcas pa dang /_rta mgrin dang thugs rje chen po dang /_sgrol ma'i rgyud sgrub thabs dang bcas pa dang*/_ma mgon gyi rgyud man ngag dang bcas pa rnams gsan nas mkhyen par mdzad cing /_bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba las/_zhi byed brgyud pa phyi ma'i dbang dang gdams pa rnams gsan no/ khu bo bla ma rgyal sras brtson dbang pa'i drung du slob gnyer la byon dus bla ma'i gsung gi rmis ltas shin tu bzang sems can la phan legs par thogs pa cig 'ong bar 'dug pas/_khyed kyi ming rgyal sras legs ldan thogs shig gsungs so/_/de'i tshe dpal gsang ba snying po'i rgyud dang /_brtag gnyis gsan nas nan chags mdzad de/_bshad pa mdzad cing /_gzhan yang 'jam dpal kha thun gyi rgyud dang*/_'jam dpal tshe bdag khro bo 'dus pa'i skor dang /_bde mchog man ngag dang bcas pa dang*/_khro phu'i lo tsA nas brgyud pa'i chos skor rnams dang /_'jig rten mgon po chos rje 'bri gung pa'i chos skor la sogs pa gdams pa mang du zhus so/_/_slob dpon sangs rgyas dbon gzhon las/_ro snyoms skor drug la sogs pa 'brug pa'i chos skor rnams gsan zhing /_bla ma chos rgyal rdza ma pa las/_phar phyin shes rab sgron me dang / dpal gsang ba 'dus pa dang /_dgyes rdor rngog lugs dang /_sangs rgyas thod pa dang /_phag mo dpyal gyi chos drug la sogs pa zhus so//bon sgom snang ba rgyal yan las/_do ha skor gsum 'grel pa bal lugs par lugs dang bcas pa zhus shing /_slob dpon glan las mnga' bdag nyang ral gyi gter kha bde gshegs 'dus pa'i bka' lung /_rta mgrin gyi rgyud lnga sgrub thabs dang bcas pa dang /_thugs rje chen po 'gro 'dul gyi chos skor dang / mkha' 'gro yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub skor la sogs pa zhus so/_/gu ru'i brgyud 'dzin nyi ma 'od zer las/_bla ma gsang 'dus sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor/_thugs rje chen po yang snying 'dus pa la sogs pa zhus shing ri khrod ras pa las/_gzer lnga dang lam mchog mthar thug la sogs pa zhang tshal ba'i gdams skor rnams gsan no/_/zhig po'i 'jigs med sbas pa las/_bi ma la'i snying tig gi dbang khrid zab pa pod bzhi/_rgyud bcu bdun dang bcas pa zhus shing /_rnal 'byor pa A hU~M rdo rje las sgrags yang rdzong ma'i gter kha'i chosaskor rnams gsan no/_/_/'jam dbyangs shes rab rin chen las lnga bsdus kyi rtsis dang /_gso ba sman dpyad kyi skor dang phan byed kyi las tshogs mang du zhus te mkhyen par mdzad do/_khyad par du gter ston pad+ma ma las 'brel rtsal las zab mo mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas pa rdzogs par zhu dus/_bla ma'i gsung gis chos 'di'i bdag po khyod yin par lung bstan na 'dug pas rang gzhan gyi don rgya chen po mdzod cig_/ gsungs nas shog ser rnams kyang phyag tu gtad do/_/de nas zab gter 'di nyid lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du gang la yang ma spel bar sgrub pa rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'i tshe mnal lam du/_zangs mdog dpal rir u rgyan pad ma dang zhal 'jal ba dang /_gnubs nam mkha'i snying pos sing lding gi rnga gtad nas las can gyi slob mar lung bstan pa la sogs mtshan ltas bzang po mang du byung zhing /_nyams rtogs kyi nus pa phun sum tshogs pa mnga' bas smin grol gyi nus pa dang ldan par bzhugs pa las/_chos rje karma pa rang byung rdo rjes kong por gdan drangs te zab gter mkha' 'gro snying tig gi khrid gdams pa dang bcas pa rdzogs par gsan te/_dgyes tshor chen po mdzad cing chos bka' bkrol nas rgya cher spel bar mdzad do/_/de'i tshe chos rje pa las kyang /_dus 'khor gyi rgyud 'grel pa dri med 'od dang /_mdo sde skyes rabs kyi lung dang /_sbyor drug chos drug_/yang dgon pa'i ri chos skor gsum la sogs pa gdams pa mang du gsan no/_/de ltar ngo mtshar mchog gis brgyan pa'i bla ma dam pa de nyid ni/_o rgyan chen pos zab gter 'di nyid tshul dang mthun par spel ba'i las can gyi slob mar lung bstan zhing*/_zhi rgyas dbang drag gi nus pa chen po mnga' ba dang*/_gter yig nas lung bstan pa ltar sku tshe mthar phyin zhing gdul bya phrin las rnams smin grol la bkod de/_/dgung lo bdun cu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzhugs nas/_sbrul lo rgyal gyi zla ba'i tshes bcu la 'gro ba rnams ngo mtshar gyi sa la bkod nas/_gshegs pa'i tshul bstan pa'i tshe lha sku ring bsrel la sogs mang du byon zhing /_lung pa 'ja' yis khengs pa la sogs ngo mtshar ba'i ltas dpag tu med pa dang bcas te 'da' tshul bstan no/_/bla ma dam pa de nyid las/_bdag gis zab gter gyi gdams pa legs par zhus te/_de'ang bdag cag gi pha yul khams kyi sa cha la gong zhes bya ba yin cing /_ldong klu 'phel zhes bya ba dang*/ mar tsha bza' a 'do gnyis kyi bur skyes te/_byis pa lo bdun brgyad kyi dus nas/_chos kyi bag chags dum pa yod pa 'dra bas/_chos byed par mos pa dang /_bla ma dge 'dun gyi rigs dang /_lha rten gsung rab la sogs mthong dus dga' tshor chen po skye ba zhig yod la/_sprang po la sogs ma nus pa mthong dus/_rang gi gos rnying dang /_bza' btung cung zad ster par nus pa dang /_byams pa zhig yod cing lo bco lnga lon dus 'bri gung du spyan snga badzra rA tsa bzhugs dus dge tshul byas nas yig brgya'i khrid lnga ldan gyi ngo sprod thob cing*/_de nas nang sor lo shas bsdad dus kyang /_sdig pa cher ma 'bags shing /_sprang long la byams pas bza' btung ster ba dang ma Ni bskul/_rang yang ma Ni mang po 'dren pa las/_lo nyi shu rtsa gcig lon pa'i skabs su/ mtshan gcig gi rmi lam na/_bud med rgyan mang pos brgyan pa 'khor mang rabs kyis bskor ba cig phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'gro ba'i lam zhor la bdag la 'di skad zer te khyod chos ma byas na lo nyi shu rtsa lnga'i steng du 'chi bas chos rang gyis shig thos so/_/de nas bzung ste/_myur du 'chi dogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_'jig rten gyi bya ba la dgos pa ci yang mi 'dug_/'di ltar mi thams cad tshe yud tsam 'di la chags sdang rmongs gsum sdig pa mi byed thang pa la/_da ni gang gis kyang dgos pa mi gda' chos rang bsam pa'i skyo shas dang mi rtag pa gzhan bskul ma dgos pa dung dung 'byung ba la/_yang lo shas dge sbyor la ma tshud/_de nas lo nyi shu rtsa lnga'i steng du bsnyen rdzogs byas te/ dpal kun tu bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa drin chen rin po che rgyal sras dri med 'od zer gyi drung du mjal bas thugs rjes bzung ste/_gsang ba snying tig dbang khrid/_zab pa pod bzhi rgyab yig dang bcas pa/_man ngag skor mang rabs dang /_rgyud bcu bdun/_de'i don 'grel theg mchog mdzod/_zab mo yang tig_/ngal gso skor gsum gyi rtsa 'grel/_yid bzhin rin po che'i mdzod la sogs pa dang /_mkha' 'gro snying tig gi khrid/_yang tig dang bcas pa dang /_gsang skor gyi dbang khrid rgyud man ngag dang bcas pa dang /_kun byed rgyal po bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde mig_/_/bai ro tsa na'i 'dra 'bag la sogs pa dang /_gu ru zhi drag gi sgrub skor dbang byin rlabs dang bcas pa dang /_mkha' 'gro yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub skor dang bcas pa zhus shing shin tu thugs mnyes par mdzad do/_/gtsug gi rgyan gcig mdzad pas bka' drin che bar bdog go_/gzhan yang bla ma blo bzang ba las/sems bskyed dbu ma lugs dang phyag rgya chen po thog bab dang /_yi ge bzhi pa'i ngo sprod dang sgrol ma dkar sngon gyi rjes gnang sgrub thabs la sogs pa zhus so/_/bla ma rgyal rong ba las lhan cig skyes sbyor gyi gdams pa la sogs zhus shing /_bla ma tsA ri ba las thugs rje chen po'i dmar khrid dang mal gcod la sogs zhus so/_/ bla ma yon tan rgya mtsho las sbyor drug gi khrid dang ro snyoms sgang dril la sogs gdams phran mang du zhus so/_/chos rje kun mkhyen pa las/_sbyor drug gi ngo sprod/_khong rang gis mdzad pa'i man ngag ngo sprod dang 'pho ba khyad 'phags la sogs pa dang /_'jam dpal phan yon dang bcas pa'i lung zhus so/_/chos rje paN chen pa las/_dus 'khor gyi rgyud 'grel pa dri med 'od dang /_mdo sde skyes rabs brgya rtsa dang*/_do ha skor gsum par bu'i 'grel pa dang bcas pa la sogs gdams pa mang du zhus so/_/bla ma lha khang pa las dbang rdor phreng dang sgrub thabs kyi skor 'ga' re zhus shing /_chos rgyal rin chen gling pa las/_mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dbang khrid dang /_rdzogs chen chig chod kun grol/_phyag rgyan chen po ma rig mun sel/_bla ma yid bzhin nor bu'i skor/_gu ru zhi drag_/tshe dpag med la sogs gdams pa mang du zhus/ khyad par du tsA rir lo gcig gnyis sgrub pa byed pa'i zhar la/_bla ma dam pa sprul sku legs ldan pa byar gyi lung chung tsA ri nas nyin gcig slebs pa'i rtsa nas gro sa dgon pa zhes bya bar bzhugs pa la mjal te/_gsang ba bla na med pa mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas pa lan gsum gyi bar la zhus te zhun thar bcad cing /_gzhan yang khro phu lo tsA'i chos skor dang /_paN chen shAkya shrI'i gdams pa dang chos rje 'bri gung pa'i zab chos la sogs pa gdams pa mang du gnang zhing /thugs dgyes pa chen po dang bcas pas gzhan don gyis shig pa'i rjes gnang dang bcas pa mdzad do/_/_/de ltar bla ma dam pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rnams las zab mo'i gdams pa mang du thos pa dang /_khyad par du snying tig zab mo'i gdams pa nyid la/_yid ches dang ldan pas sgrub pa ci nus su byed pas bla ma la gsol ba 'debs shing bsam pa bzang pos snod ldan re re gnyis gnyis la zab mo'i gdams pa cung zad spel bar byed pa lags so/_/bdag ma gtogs pa'i bla ma gong ma rnams ni 'phags pa'i bla ma ngo mtshar can sha stag byon zhing /_deng sang gi bar du dam tshig shin tu gtsang bas/_dbang gi chu bo yi zam ma chad/_byin rlabs kyi na bun drod ma yal/_bshad pa'i sgron me'i 'od ma nub pa'i tshul du yod pas/_/_phyi rabs rjes 'jug 'di nas brgyud pa rnams kyang chos dang mthun zhing dam tshig gtsang bas tshe 'di'i rnam g.yeng bskyungs te rang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par mdzod cig_/de ltar ngo mtshar mchog tshogs bla ma yi/_lo rgyus gsal bar bkod pa'i dge ba des/_/nam mkha'i mtha' klas gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun/_/kun bzang chos rje bla ma'i sa thob shog_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gi bla ma brgyud pa'i lo rgyus/_rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba bya bral ba bzod pas/_dad ldan slob mas bskul ba'i ngor/_nyung bsdus yi ger bkod pa rdzogs so/_/mang+ga laM/_b+ha wan+tu//_//

[6.35 rdzogs pa chen po mkha’ ’gro snying tig gi khrid yig zab lam gsal byed]

@#/_/gam+b+hiramargapramahAnishrabyutinAman+naDAkinihr-idaya_bin+dornayat+yak+Sharabiharatis+sa/ rdzogs pa chen po mkha' 'gro snying tig gi khrid yig zab lam gsal byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/ oM swa sti/_rdzogs pa chen po mkha' 'gro snying thig gi khrid yig zab lam gsal byed ces bya ba/_dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/_/dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i khyab bdag kun tu bzang /_/thun mong 'gro ngor mi yi tshul bzung nas/_/rnam mang gdul dka' 'dul ba'i phrin las can/_bka' drin mnyam med rtsa ba'i bla mar 'dud/_/ zab mo'i lam gyi smin grol bdud rtsi'i rgyun/_/rim par brgyud nas skal bzang gdul bya la/_/stsol mdzad drug ldan brgyud pa'i khyad par sogs/_/ sangs rgyas nyag gcig phreng bar byon rnams rgyal/_/sems nyid ka nas dag pa'i gzhi dbyings su/_/rang bzhin yon tan lhun gyis grub pa'i rtsal/_/ dbyer med zung 'jug spros bral 'dus ma byas/_/rang rig gdod ma'i mgon po rgyal gyur cig_/theg dgu'i rtse rgyal bka' gsang rdzogs pa che/_/mkha' 'gro'i snying thig yang zab snying po'i lam/_/grub mchog bye ba'i gshegs shul do zla med/_/skal bzang mgron po rnams la 'dir gsal bya/_/ 'dir dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gyi mthar thug_/theg pa thams cad kyi yang snying bla na med pa a ti rdzogs chen po man ngag gi sde'i yang rtse/_tshe gcig lus gcig la sku bzhi'i 'bras bu thob par nus pa'i myur lam khyad par can dpal mkha' 'gro snying thig ces yongs su grags pa'i gdams ngag ston pa la gnyis te/_'chad yul slob ma brtag cing mthun rkyen gyi gzhi bzung ba dang /_'chad bya gdams ngag gis khrid tshul ston pa gnyis/_dang po ni/_rgyud dang man ngag gi gzhung thams cad nas gsungs kyang mdor bsdu na/_rang shar las/_dad pa'i stobs dang brtson 'grus che/_/shes rab che zhing 'dzin chags med/_/phu dud che zhing gsang sngags spyod/_/rtog med sems la g.yeng ba med/_/dam tshig ldan zhing sgrub la brtson/_/zhes gsungs pas/_bla ma dang gdams ngag la yid rab tu spro zhing don du gnyer ba dang ba'i dad pa/_bsgrub bya'i 'bras bu la ches dungs pa 'dod pa'i dad pa/_de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu la the tshom med pa yid ches kyi dad pa/_nyi tshe'i rkyen gyis mi 'phrog pas mthar thug pa'i dad pa ste byin rlabs myur du 'jug pa'i rgyu tshang ba bla na med pa'i byang chub sgrub pa la zhum pa med pa'i blo stobs che zhing /_phyi bshol dang thang lhod med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi dam bca' brtan pas nyams rtogs skye sla ba/_gnas lugs zab mo'i don la dpyod pa'i shes rab gsal bas gol sa chod pa/_zas gos sogs srid pa'i bde ba la 'dzin chags kyi zhen pa log pas tshe 'di'i 'khri ba chod pa/_bla ma dang lha la blo rtse gcig pa'i phu dud che bas byin rlabs ngang gis 'jug pa/_gsang sngags kyi lam la the tshom gyi sgro 'dogs chod pas zab mo'i da pa la 'jug pa/_chags sdang sogs tha mal gyi rnam par rtog pa la mi 'jug pas sems g.yeng ba med par brtan pa/_rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig gnyer du blangs pa las mi 'da' ba'i sdom pa dang ldan pa/_/_gnas lugs kyi don sgom zhing sgrub pa la skyo dub med pa'i brtson pa dang ldan pa ste/ yon tan de dag dang ldan pa ni zab mo'i lam 'di'i snod du gsungs pa'i phyir/_/_de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa nyid/_'chad yul du bzung ngo /_/ mtshan nyid de ldan gyi slob ma des gang du sgrub pa'i gnas ni/_klong gsal las/_gangs khrod lung stong ri rtse dur khrod dam/_/_/shin tu dben pa dwangs shing mtho ba'i sar/_/skal ldan skyes bu nyams len bya ba'i gnas//zhes gsungs pas gnas rang bzhin gyis shis shing skye bo'i rgyu 'grul dang ca co nyung ba/_dgra rkun gyi 'jigs pa sogs med cing sa chu 'phrod pas bsam gtan ngang gis 'phel ba bsten par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bya ba'i dus ni/_de nyid las/_dbyar ma ston dang dgun chung dpyid kyi dus/_/zer gnyis dus ni mchog tu bshad pa yin/_/zhes gsungs pas dus der bsil drod snyoms pas bying rmugs kyi rkyen nyung zhing mngon sum gyi ye shes 'char sla ba dang ngo sprod bde ba'i dbang du byas pa'o/_/brten pa'i grogs ni/_de nyid las/_dam tshig gtsang ldan dag pa'i snang ba che/_dug lnga'i shugs chung blo brtan khog yangs pa/_ngang rgyud ring zhing brtse ba'i grogs dang 'grogs/_/zhes gsungs pas zab lam gyi sgom nyams can nam/_min na'ang zhi dul ldan zhing dam tshig gtsang ba/_dag snang 'byongs shing nyon mongs pa shas chung ba/_brtse sems dang ldan pas mthun pa'i rkyen sbyor ba la skyo ngal med pa brten no//yo byad kyi khyad par ni/_de nyid las/_me tog dbang yon tshogs 'khor gtor tshogs rgyu/_/nyams len dus su khams kyi rten so btsal/_/mthun pa'i yo byad kun dang ldan par bya/_/_zhes gsungs pas/_bla ma la 'bul rgyu'i dbang yon/_mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i gtor tshogs kyi rgyu khams dang mthun pa'i bza' btung gi rdzas sogs kha na ma tho ba med cing de dag ni ched du brel mi dgos pa tshogs par bya'o/_/ !_gnyis pa 'chad par bya ba gdams ngag gis khrid tshul bstan pa la bzhi ste/_lo rgyus kyi sgo nas nges shes bskyed pa/_dbang gi sgo nas smin par bya ba/_gdams ngag gi sgo nas nyams len bstan pa/_rtsis che ba bka' rgyas btab pa'o/_/_/dang po ni/[ · ]nyi zla kha sbyor las/_lo rgyus don gyis ma bshad na/_/gsang chen nges pa'i bka' 'di la/_yid mi ches pa'i skyon du 'gyur/_/ zhes dang /_klong gsal las/_skal ldan nges shes bskyed pa'i phyir/_/brgyud pa'i lo rgyus bshad par bya/_/zhes gsungs shing /_ji ltar 'chad na/ btags grol snying po las/_ston pa kun bzang yab yum gyis/_/nyid las mi gzhan sems dpa'i snod/_/byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag nyid la//btags pas gcig shes kun grol lo/_/bcings dang grol ba'i mtha' las 'das//rdo rje sems dpa'i byin rlabs kyis/_/rang byung dga' rab thugs la shar/_/_sid+ha nyid las rgyud gtad pa/_/'bras bu yongs rdzogs btags grol rgyud/_/o rgyan pad+ma nyid la gtad/_/lnga ldan bu la 'di ston cig/ces gsungs pas/_de yang gdod ma'i dbyings su chos thams cad kyi chos nyid ka dag spros pa dang bral ba'i ngang nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang nge lhun grub ye shes kyi skur bzhengs te/_rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rang rtsal zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor grangs med pa la rdzogs pa chen po sgra tshig bya rtsol las 'das pa dus gsum mnyam nyid chen por gsungs so//de nas rdo rje sems dpas 'og min gyi zhing mtha' dbus med par rig pa 'dzin pa dang mkha' 'gro rang gi rnam par 'phrul pa las rang snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i don 'gag med rang shar sgra brnyan lta bur gsungs pa ni rgyal ba nyid kyis nyid la brgyud pa'i dbang du byas pas dgongs brgyud de/_de ltar rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis dur khrod chen po me ri 'bar bar sprul pa'i sku dga' rab rdo rje la chos nyid bya rtsol las 'das pa tshig sdeb sbyor legs pas bshad cing bka'i bsdu ba po yang de'o/_/de nas rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi dur khrod du rig 'dzin shrI siM ha la mngon sum rang thog tu phab nas bshad/_des dur khrod chen po so sa gling du slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas la gnas lugs yid dpyod dang bral ba brda dang brda'i sgo nas bstan pa ni brda' brgyud do/_/de nyid kyi gzho stod ti sgro'i brag dkar du mkhar chen bza' mtsho rgyal la lnga ldan ye shes snying po rang gsal mngon sum du gtan la phab nas gsungs shing slob dpon yab yum gyi thugs kyi dgongs pa zab gsal mtshon bya don gyi ye shes skal ldan chos kyi bdag po la byin rlabs 'pho ba smon lam dbang bskur gyis rgyas btab/_mtshon byed brda'i tshig brgyud yi ger bkod de mkha' 'gro gter bdag rnams la gnyer du gtad nas dwags lung khra mo'i brag la gter du sbas pa/dus phyis lnga bcu kha ral gyi tshe smon lam las kyi 'phro sad pa skal ldan pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis gter nas bton pa mkha' 'gro snying thig rtsa ba'i skor rnams sho'i rgyal sras legs pa dang chos rgyal rin chen gling pa sogs la bka' babs pa dang*/ gter lung ltar gter ston nyid bar chad rkyen dbang gis dngos kyi 'gro don 'phro can du gyur pa las/_de'i phyi ma longs sku'i zhing nyul bar lung bstan pa ltar ye shes kyi sku can kun mkhyen dri med 'od zer la 'chims phu ri mo can du o rgyan yab yum gyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs nas gsungs pa'i don yang thig yid bzhin nor bu zhes snying thig rtsa ba'i zab gnad gsal byed man ngag tu sdebs pa gu ru ye shes rab 'byams dang bde legs rgya mtsho sogs la bka' babs pa ste/_brgyud pa'i khyad par drug las 'ongs pa'i chos tshul 'di ni/_spyir rdo rje theg pa'i rgyud sde gzhan rnams su rdo rje'i tshig gis sbas pa'i don/_rgyud bcu bdun dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa rnams kyis gsal por bstan cing /_khyad par btags grol snying po'i rgyud drug dang sangs rgyas kyi 'das rjes gsum/_de'i man ngag o rgyan chen po yab yum gyis mdzad pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i zhe phugs tshig gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis bstan pa'i lam mchog phul du gyur pa rdzogs pa chen po zab gsang mkha' 'gro snying thig ces bya ba mtshon byed kyi brda' la brten nas mtshon bya don gyi gnas lugs bde blag tu rtogs par byed pa skal bzang las 'phro can rnams kyi mjug ngogs bla na med pa'o/_/de ltar yang sgron ma rnam par bkod pa'i rgyud las/_dgongs pa brda dang snyan brgyud nas/_/gsang sngags don gyi tshad ma 'byung /_/dpe la brten nas don ngo shes/_/rtags la brten nas yid ches 'gyur/_/don gyi snying po thag chod pas/_/gzhi la grub pa'i shes rab gsum/_/sa bon tshul du gnas pa de/_/ rkyen las byung ba'i shes rab kyis/_/'bru yi tshul du smin pa yis/_/ma rig pa yi mun pa sangs/_/shes bya'i sgrib pa rang dag pas/_/ma btsal 'bras bu rang gis mthong /_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/ gnyis pa dbang gi sgo nas smin par byed pa la dbang dngos dang dam tshig bstan pa'o/_/dang po ni/_thal 'gyur las/_dbang ni rnam pa bzhi yis kyang /_/skal ba ldan par smin par bya/_/spros bcas nyid dang spros pa med/_/ shin tu spros pa med pa dang /_/de bzhin rab tu spros pa med/_/dbye ba bzhi yi tshul gyis ni/_/dad ldan rang rgyud smin par bya/_/zhes dang /_de nas rig pa'i rtsal dbang bskur/_/zhes gsungs pas sems can gyi khams bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po la rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi chos gzugs kyi sku dang ye shes sgrub pa la/_rgyu'i theg par dka' spyad sogs thabs bul zhing tshigs che ba brtson pa chen pos sgrub dgos pa de nyid/_'dir dus dang dka' spyad la ma ltos par thabs myur zhing tshegs chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_de yang rnam smin 'khor ba'i sgo gsum ye shes kyi khams bzhi la rdo rje bzhi'i rigs gnas pa de sku bzhi'i bdag nyid du sgrub pa la dbang bskur ba'i byed pas/_tshe 'di nyid la sogs par rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang slob ma'i lus sogs rgyu rnam smin gyi khams bzhi po de nyid la/_'bras bu rdo rje'i bzhir dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pas gnyug ma'i khams bzhi'i yon tan sad par byas pa las rgyu'i rigs 'dra ma bor bar sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje bzhir mngon du byed par 'gyur ste/ 'bras bu nyid kyi rgyu la rgyas btab pas 'bras bur byas pa dang*/rgyu nyid kyang rgyu'i ngo bo ma gtang par 'bras bu sad par byed pa'i phyir smin byed ces bya'o/ khyad par 'dir ni snang srid ye dag chos nyid byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khoRa rang rig spros bral rdzogs pa chen por dbang bskur bas de'i don gcer mthong rang grol du ngo 'phrod pas rig pa'i rtsal dbang zhes bya'o/_/de yang rdo rje slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i gnas la gnas pas slob ma skal ba dang dbang po dang lam gyi 'jug pa dang 'tshams par thun mong min pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug nas lam 'bras bu'i go 'phang gi chos rgyud la 'jog pa'i las kyi byang chub kyi myu gu mngon du bskyed pa'am skye ba nus rung du smin par byed pa ni smin byed kyi dbang ngam rgyu'i dbang du grags pa'o/_/de thob nas sa dang lam gyis mtshon pa'i yon tan rnams gong nas gong du na 'phar bar byed pa'i ched du dbang bskur ba ni lam gyi dbang ngam grol byed kyi thabs su 'jog pa yin no/_/ gnyis pa ni/_thal 'gyur las/_dbang brten pa yi dam tshig bshad/_bye brag brjod kyis mi lang yang*/_mdor bsdus sku gsung thugs nyid bsrung / zhes pas bsrung bya'i don las mi 'da' bar sdom pa'i sems pa sa bon dang bcas pa ste dbye na rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig ji snyed pa rnams dang / khyad par sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig las 'da' bar mi spyod pa nyid yin cing /mdor na bsrung bya'i grangs dang dmigs su ma grub pa ye bsrung bcing sdom med pa ni dam tshig gi dam pa ste/_ye nas bsrung med chen po la/_/ bsrung mtshams rim par bkod pa med/_/ces dang /_bsrung mtshams kun las rgyal bas
