na/_/dam tshig kun gyi rtse mor bshad/_/ces gsungs pa bzhin no/_/ gsum pa gdams ngag gi sgo nas nyams su len pa la/_brtson 'grus rab tshe 'dir 'tshang rgya ba/_'bring bar dor 'tshang rgya ba/_tha ma rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing du 'tshang rgya bar bstan pa dang gsum las/_dang po la zab lam bsgom pa'i snod rung du sgrub pa sngon 'gro'i khrid/_zab lam bsgom pa dngos la 'jug pa dngos gzhi'i khrid gnyis kyi/_dang po la yang thun mong gi sngon 'gros rgyud sbyang ba dang /_thun mong ma yin pa'i sngon 'gros gnas lugs gtan la dbab pa'o/_/dang po la'ang sngon 'gro'i chings spyir bshad pa dang /_dmigs rim sgom tshul bye brag tu bshad pa'o/_/dang po ni/_'das rjes las/_mi rtag snying rje byang sems sbyang /_/zhes dang /_rgyud las/_mi rtag snying rje byang sems kyis/_/chos 'jug theg chen lam du 'gro_/zhes gsungs pas/_/_mi rtag pa dang snying rje byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa gsum dngos bstan du gsungs pa ni gtso che ba'i dbang du dgongs kyi/_de yang theg chen gyi 'jug sgo ni byang chub kyi sems nyid yin cing /_de rgyud la skyes na theg chen pa rnal mar 'gyur bas de'i mi mthun phyogs bsal nas mthun phyogs sgrub pa la thog mar tshe 'di'i mngon zhen 'gog pa gal che bas/tshe ring du mi gnas pa'i 'chi ba dran pa dang /_shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gror skye ba'i nyes dmigs bsams nas srid pa'i phun tshogs la sred pa'i blo yang 'khor ba mtha' dag gi nyes dmigs shes pas spangs te thar pa la yid phyogs par bya zhing /_de nas rang nyid zhi bde don gnyer gyi blo yang spangs nas byams snying rje byang chub kyi sems sbyang ba la rim pa bzhin bslab par bya dgos te theg chen thun mong gi lam yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ de yang bla ma so so'i phyag bzhes khrid tshul mi 'dra ba'i dbang gis/_mi rtag pa bsgom pa nas mgo bzung ste dngos bstan ltar rkang grangs gsum du bsdu ba dang /_'ga' zhig dal 'byor rnyed dka' nas mgo 'dzin pa sogs yod kyang don gyi gnad gcig ste/_de kha mi rtag pa bsgom pa'i gzhi yin pa dang /_mi rtag pa bsgoms pas 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs shes pa dang*/_de shes pas las 'bras kyi blang dor la mkhas pa dang /_rgyu de dag las skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed yang dag pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir las dang po pa rnams la 'khrid tshul de ltar byas na lam gyi go rim rnam pa gsal ba dang theg chen gyi khrid tshul spyi khyab dang mthun cing rtsa ba'i dgongs pa las kyang mi 'da' ba'i phyir legs par yang 'gyur mod/_de ltar byed na khrid yig nang mthun gzhan nas len pa'am spyi khyab sngon 'gro'i chos bshad zur du bkod pa las kyang shes par bya'o/_/ gnyis pa/_dmigs rim bye brag tu bsgom pa'i tshul la drug las/_dang po thun gyi sngon 'gro ni/_dben pa'i gnas su bde ba'i stan la lus gnad drang por bsrang zhing sems rnal du phab nas/_ngag gnad rlung ro lan gsum phyir bsal bas nad gdon sdig sgrib thams cad sbyangs par bsam/sems gnad sems can thams cad kyi don du lam zab mo nyams su blang bar bya snyam pas spyi bor bla ma bsgoms nas mos gus tshad med pas/_dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma la gsol ba 'debs so/_/bdag gi rgyud byin gyis brlab du gsol/_zhes 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba rtse gcig tu gdab/_de ni thun thams cad kyi mgor bya ste/_gzhung gi rtsis mgos ma bsdus kyang bla ma rnams kyi phyag len yin no/_/ gnyis pa mi rtag pa sgom tshul ni/_de yang 'o skol rnams kyis thog ma med pa nas da lta'i bar du spyir 'khor ba dang khyad par ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal bsam gyi mi khyab pa zhig myong du zin kyang /_da dung sdug bsngal gyi mtha' rtogs pa dka' bar 'dug_/des na da res dal 'byor bco brgyad tshang ba'i mi lus shin tu rnyed par dka' zhing rnyed na don che ba'i rten khyad par can thob pa'i dus 'dir gtan gyi 'dun ma 'grub pa zhig ci nas bya dgos/ de yang sang bya gnang bya snyam pa'i le los phyi bshol du 'jogs mi khom mi lus thob kyang mi rtag par myur du 'jig ste/_nges par 'chi ba la the tshom med pa mngon sum gyis grub/_nam 'chi'i cha med de 'chi ba glo bur bcar 'phog tu 'ong /_'chi ba'i rkyen mang nad gdon 'dis mi 'chi bya ba med/_'chi ba la phan pa dam pa'i chos ma gtogs gzhan med/_des na brtsegs pa'i khang khyim/_bsags pa'i longs spyod/_mdza' ba'i gnyen grogs sogs gang gis kyang mi stongs par las kho na bdag gir byas nas 'gro dgos/_de'i phyir phyi nam zla dus bzhi'i 'gyur ba dbyar dgun ston dpyid lo zla zhag dang za ma skad cig yud tsam gyis kyang mi rtag par 'gyur ba bzhin du rang nyid kyang 'chi ba la je nyer song zhing nges par 'chi bar thag chod/_nang skye 'gro'i 'gyur ba yang dgra gnyen bar ma'i 'gro ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de tsam zhig shi ba mthong zhing thos pas kyang rang nyid nam 'chi'i cha med par gtan la phebs/ gsang ba rang nyid skyes nas da lta'i bar gyi lus kyi 'gyur ba sems kyi 'char sgo bya byed spyod lam thams cad kyang skad cig skad cig gis mi rtag par 'gyur ba'i rnam 'gyur thams cad dran par bya ste/_rgya cher rol pa las/_srid gsum mi rtag ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra/_/nye bar len pa'i dus 'di 'jig cing bral/_/dus bzhi mi rtag 'gyur zhing snying po med/_/rgas shing rgud la 'chi ba'i chos can te/_/thang gcig yud tsam skad cig gnas pa med/_/sgres bu'i tshe 'gro ri gzar 'bab chu 'dra/_/zhes pa'i tshul bsams nas sang gi bya ba dang tshe phyi ma gang snga mi shes par 'dug_/des na da lta rang dbang yod dus phyi bshol med par chos la 'bad par bya dgos te/_klu sgrub kyis/_mgo'am gos la glo bur me shor na/_/de dag ldog slad bgyi ba btang nas kyang /_/ yang srid med par bgyid slad 'bad 'tshal te/_/de las ches mchog dgos pa gzhan ma mchis/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar tshe 'di'i phun tshogs thams cad gnyid thun gcig gi rmi lam gyi bde ba ltar shes pas yid phyungs te/_de ring nyid nas 'chi tshis tshags su chug pa bya dgos/_shi nas skye ba mi len na der zad de/_skye ba len dgos/_de yang ngan 'gro dang bde 'gro gnyis las ma 'das/_gal te ngan 'gror skyes na ngan song gsum ni bzod dka'i sdug bsngal dos drag cing gnyug ring /_bde 'gror skyes na sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /_'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_'du byed gyi sdug bsngal rnams kyis bar med du mnar bas 'khor ba'i gnas mtho dma' gang du skyes kyang sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin las ma 'das te/_dran pa nyer gzhag las/ sems can dmyal ba dmyal mes nyams/_/yi dwags bkres shing phongs pas nyams/_/dud 'gro gcig la gcig zas nyams/_/mi rnams 'tsho ba thung bas nyams/_/lha rnams bag med pa yis nyams/_/'khor ba khab kyi rtse tsam la/_/ bde ba nam yang yod ma yin/_/zhes gsungs pas sdug bsngal can gyi 'khor ba de las nag can btson dong nas 'bros pa ltar byed dgos/_/de las thar bar byed pa'i thabs kyang las 'bras kyi blang dor ma nor ba la rag lus te/ rgyu dge sdig gnyis las 'bras bu bde ba dang sdug bsngal so sor smin par nges pas mi dge ba bcu sogs mi dge ba phra mo tsam yang srog dang bdos nas slong zhing /_dge ba bcu sogs dge ba'i las phra mo yang ci nus su sgrub pa*dang*/_lung*ma*bstan*gyi bya ba thams cad kyang dge ba'i lam srol du ci chug la 'bad par bya ste/_rin chen phreng ba las/_mi dge ba las sdug bsngal kun/_/de bzhin ngan 'gro thams cad do/_/dge las bde ba thams cad dang /_/rnam pa kun tu dge ba dag_/ces gsungs pa ltar shes par bya'o/_/ gsum pa de dang rjes 'brel skyabs 'gro ni/_dper na nag can btson dong du chug pa chad las sna tshogs kyis bar med du bcad pas nyam thag cing mthar gsod par yang nyin re bzhin je nye je nyer song bas 'jigs skrag gi sdug bsngal bzod dka' bas nyen pa na/_de las skyob nus pa'i ram zla ci rnyed pha 'bod ma 'bod byed pa bzhin du/_rang cag rnams kyang mi dge bcu spong gi tshul khrims sogs dge ba'i las 'bras kyis re zhig bde 'gror skyes kyang sdug bsngal thams cad spangs pa'i thar ba'i go 'phang ma thob na sngar byas kyi dge ba'i 'phen pa zad nas slar yang ngan song du lhungs te yun ring la dos drag pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa sna tshogs myong dgos par 'dug_/sdug bsngal de las skyob nus pa ni dkon mchog rin po che rnam pa gsum ma gtogs gzhan su yang med cing /_de yang rang la dngos su snang ba'i sangs rgyas ni bla ma yin te/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dang dbyer med pa'i phyir/_des na skyabs gnas dkon mchog rin po che rnam pa gsum kho na la skyabs dang ram zla zhu snyam du zhe thag pa nas bas lus sems rnal du phab nas rang nyid gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs 'di nyid rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i zhing khams mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba'i dbus su dpag bsam gyi sdong po yal ga lnga pa lo 'dab dang me tog 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pas nam mkha'i dbyings khyab pa'i dbus su seng ges bteg pa'i rin po che'i khri sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan la rtsa ba'i bla ma rdo rje 'chang yum dang bcas pa'i rnam pa can la brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams dang yi dam zhi khro'i tshogs kyis bskor ba/_mdun gyi ya ga'i dbus su sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mchog gi sprul pa'i sku rnams dang /_g.yas kyi yal gar 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams dang*/_g.yon gyi yal gar shA ri'i bu la sogs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams dang /_rgyab kyi yal gar chos dkon mchog rnams glegs bam brtsegs pa'i rnam pa can dang /_de rnams kyi bar mtshams thams cad mkha' 'gro chos skyong srung ma'i tshogs dang bcas pas bar med du gang ba thams cad kyang rang nyid la dgyes shing brtse ba'i tshul du bzhugs par bsam zhing /_de nas rang dang lhan cig tu mkha' mnyam gyi sems can thams cad skyabs yul rnams kyi yon tan dang thugs rje dran pa'i mos gus kyi gdung shugs drag pos ma gyur sems can thams cad 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa drag po las bskyab tu gsol snyam pa'i bsam pa rtse gcig pas ngag tu/ nam mkha'i gnas su nam mkha' gang ba yi/_/bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dang /_/sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la/_/bdag dang 'gro drug gus pas skyabs su mchi/_/zhes skyabs 'gro ci nus su byas nas thun 'jog khar skyabs yul rnams kyi sku las 'od zer byung bas sems can thams cad dag pa'i zhing du drangs/_mthar skyabs yul rnams 'od kyi rnam par bsdus nas rang la thim par bsam zhing /rang bzhin dag pa'i dge ba 'dis/_/_/'khor ba ngan song dong sprugs nas/_/_/srid na 'ga' yang mi gnas pa/_/thams cad sangs rgyas myur thob shog_/ces dge ba bsngo/_nyal ba'i tshe skyabs yul ma bsdus pa de nyid la mgo phyogs nas mos gus rtse gcig pa gnyid dang bsre bar bya zhing /_skyabs 'gro'i phan yon dang bslab bya go don rnams kyang nyan pa po'i blo dang 'tshams par ci rigs pa bshad do/_/ bzhi pa snying rje byang sems bsgom pa ni/_rten snying rje dang /_brten pa byang chub kyi sems las/_dang po ni/_phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' ji ltar gzhal yang mtha' med pa ltar 'jig rten gyi khams la'ang mtha' med/_de thams cad rigs drug gi sems can gyis go mtshams med par khyab/_sems can de rnams kyis bdag gi ma ma byas pa ni gcig kyang med de/_bdag gi skye ba la grangs med pa bzhin du sems can rnams kyis bdag gi ma byas pa la yang grangs dang mtha' med/_ma byas res bzhin tshe 'di'i mas ji ltar bskyangs pa bzhin du gnod pa thams cad las bskyabs/_brtse ba'i sems kyis ni bzung /_byams pa'i spyod lam gyis bskyangs nas mtha' dang tshad med pa'i phan pa sgo du ma nas btags pa'i drin can gyi ma sha stag yin pa la/_da lta'i ma dang skye ba gzhan gyi ma zhes nye ring rigs su gcod pa ci la rigs/ de thams cad 'dod pa bde ba 'dod kyang rmongs shing thabs la mi mkhas pa sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu ci rigs pa la rtag tu spyod cing mnar bas nyam thag par gyur pa'i rnam 'gyur yid la dran pas bzod du med pa'i snying rje mchi ma 'khrug pa tsam gyis blo bskul nas/ gnyis pa ni/_thog ma med la nas drin gyis bskangs pa'i ma 'di dag ma rig pa'i mun pas ni 'thoms/_nyon mongs pas yid dkrugs pas smyo/_blang dor la lta ba'i mig dang bral/_dge ba'i bshes kyi long 'khrid ni med/_nyes spyod kyis rdeg 'chos pas 'khor ba dang ngan song gi g.yang sar lhungs pa 'di rnams yal bar bor na de las khrel chung ba su zhig yod/_des na 'di dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bsgral nas thar ba'i bde ba la 'god dgos/_de'i nus pa da lta bdag la mi 'dug pas bdag gis 'gro kun sgrol nus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang myur du thob par bya/_de'i ched du zab mo'i lam 'di nyid nyams su blang bar bgyi'o/_snyam pa'i lhag bsam rtse gcig pas/_bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams/_/ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa la/_/yin par shes pa'i bdag nyid du/_/byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/_/zhes brjod cing don bsam pa nan tan du byas pa'i mthar/_don dam byang sems kyi mtshan nyid sems bskyed yul skyed pa po bskyed pa'i kun slong gsum ka 'khor gsum mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyis rgyas btab nas dge ba bsngo zhing /_'dir yang bslab bya phan yon go don sogs skabs dang sbyar te bshad do/_/ lnga pa rdor sems sgom bzlas ni/_zab mo'i lam gyi nyams rtogs khyad par can skye ba la bar du gcod pa'i 'gal rkyen sdig sgrib yin pas de nyid sbyong dgos/_de sbyong ba'i mchog ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sgom bzlas la rnal 'byor du bya ba yin te/_de yang byang chub kyi sems gnyis sngar bzhin dran pa'i ngang las rang gi spyi bor pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM yig dkar po gsal zhing 'tsher ba/_de yongs su gyur pa las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkaRa po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa zhi zhing 'dzum pa'i nyams can rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa dar dang rin po che'i rgyan can yum rdo rje snyems ma dkar dmar gri thod 'dzin pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa/_yab kyi thugs kar zla ba'i steng du hUM yig dkar po yi ge brgya pa'i phreng bas bskor bar bsams la/_dkon mchog skyabs su bzung nas byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa rten gyi stobs/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad la 'gyod sems byed pa sun 'byin pa'i stobs/_phyin chad srog la babs kyang mi bgyid snyam pa'i sdom sems nyes pa las ldog pa'i stobs/_sngar byas kyi gnyen por rdo rje sems dpa'i sgom bzlas byed pa gnyen po kun tu spyod pa'i stobs te/_stobs bzhi po tshang ba'i bsam sbyor dang ldan pa'i ngang nas thugs ka'i sngags phreng la dmigs pa gtad de/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mkhyen snyam pa'i mos gus mchi ma 'khrug pa tsam du bskyed nas yi ge brgya pa dang /_oM badzra sa twa hUM/_zhes bzlas pas thugs ka'i hUM yig sngags phreng dang bcas pa las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi 'o rgyun lta bu babs/_sku'i dbyibs brgyud sbyor mtshams nas/_bdag gi tshangs bug tu zhugs pas sdig sgrib thams cad rnag khrag dang dud khu la sogs pa'i rnam pas dbang po'i sgo dang /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas thon par bsam zhing sngags brgya stong la sogs pa ci nus su bzlas pa'i mthar/_mgon po bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa yis/_/dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams/_/bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod cig_/gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/_/thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can/_/'gro ba'i gtso la bdag skyabs mchi/_/sku gsung thugs rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams chag thams cad mthol zhing bshags so/_/sdig sgrib nyes ltung dri ma'i tshogs thams cad byang zhing dag par mdzad du gsol/_zhes gsol ba btab pas lus kyi nang 'khor lo bzhi'i gnas rnams byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsis skya mer gyis khengs/_sdig sgrib thams cad sangs kyis dag lus sems zag med kyi bde bas myos par bsam zhing /_rdo rje sems dpa' dgyes shing 'dzum par mdzad de/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sdig sgrib nyes ltung thams cad dag pa yin no/_/zhes gnang ba byin te 'od du zhu ba rang la bstim/_rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' snang stong me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar gsal ba la blo bzhag nas/_mthar bde stong brjod bral gyi ngang la mnyam par bzhag_/de yang sbyang bya'i sdig sgrib/_sbyong byed thabs/_sbyong mkhan sgrub pa po ma grub pa ste 'khor gsum mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyis rgyas 'debs pa ni sdig sbyong gi mchog go_/mthar dge ba bsngo/_'di nyid sdig pa dag pa'i mtshan ma ma mthong gi bar du bya'o/_/ drug pa bla ma'i rnal 'byor ni/_zab mo'i lam gyi mthun rkyen bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs stobs su bya ba'i thabs mchog tu gyur pa yin te/_lam 'di'i rten 'brel gyi gnad thams cad 'di nas sgrig dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/de la tshogs bsags pa dang gsol ba gdab pa gnyis las/_dang po ni/_mdun gyi nam mkha' seng ges btegs pa'i rin po che'i khri sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi zla'i gdan la rtsa ba'i bla ma brgyud pa'i bla ma kun 'dus kyi ngo bo de nyid rnam pa rdo rje 'chang chen po sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa/_yum phag mo dmar mo gri thod 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba/_gnyis ka'ang dar gyi na bza' dang rin po che dang rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yab rdo rje'i skyil krung dang yum pad+ma'i skyil krung gis rol pa sku la bde gshegs zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs shing mkha' 'gro'i sprin phung 'phro ba/_'od zer rnam lnga rab tu 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs pa'i spyi bor \u0f00/_/mgrin par AH_thugs kar hUM hUM las 'od zer 'phros/_bla ma dang sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan drangs nas gnyis su med par thim ste sngar bas kyang gzi mdangs 'bar bar bsams te/_bla ma bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sku/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid/_/ ces dang /_sdom 'byung las/_bla ma sangs rgyas bla ma chos/_/de bzhin bla ma dge 'dun nyid/_/ces gsungs pa ltar skyabs gnas kun 'dus kyi ngo bor nges shes bskyed nas de nyid tshogs zhing du byas te sku gsum gyi maN+Dal 'bul ba las/_dang po ni/_rin po che la sogs pa'i maN+Dal bzung ste/_ba byung dang dri bzang gi chus byug cing /_me tog dang bcas pas g.yon du bskor la/[ \u0f00] badzra b+hU mi AHhU~M/_zhes brjod pas gser gyi sa gzhir bsam/_oM badzra re khe AHhUM/_zhes pas lcags ri mu khyud/_me tog gi tshom bu rim bzhin dgod pas/ dbus su ri rab/_/_shar lus 'phags po/_lho 'dzam bu gling /_nub ba lang spyod/_byang sgra mi snyan/[ · ]shar gyi g.yas g.yon du lus dang lus 'phags sogs gling phran rnams dang /_gling rnams kyi nang gi shar sogs phyogs bzhir/_glang po/_blon po/_rta mchog_/btsun mo rnams dang /_me sogs mtshams bzhir/_dmag dpon/_'khor lo/_nor bu/_gter chen po rnams dang /_ri rab kyi shar du nyi ma/_nub tu zla ba rnams kyi tshom bu bkod pa so so'i rnam pa gsal ba lha mi'i 'dod yon ma tshang ba med pas gang ba dang / bdag gi lus longs spyod dus gsum bsags yod kyi dge tshogs thams cad phul bar bsam zhing /_/_rin chen maN+Dal yid 'ong mchod pa'i sprin/_/ 'dod dgu'i 'byor tshogs dpag med dang ldan pa/_/dpag yas nam mkha'i rgyan gyur 'di phul bas/_/'gro kun rnam dag zhing la spyod par shog_/_ces brjod cing tshom bu gso ba dang sems kyis gsal 'debs pa rnams sum phrugs su bya'o/_/de ltar tshom bu nyer gsum ma'i lugs su byas pa ni maN+Dal ston byed kyi rtsa ba'i gzhung rnams kyi rjes su 'brangs pa yin la/_tshom bu so bdun ma deng sang yongs grags kyi lag len ltar byas kyang 'gal bar mi sem mo/_/ gnyis pa ni/_tshom bu dgu bkod la/_'og min rnam dag stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams ye shes rin po che'i gzhal yas khang sgeg sogs 'dod yon gyi lha mo mchod pa'i sprin phung nam mkha' gang bar spro bar dmigs te/_'og min bde chen rin chen gzhal yas khang*/_/sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin gyi bla re can/_/nam mkha' gang bar dmigs te phul ba yis/_/'gro kun longs sku'i zhing la spyod par shog_/ces sngar bzhin sum phrugs su 'bul lo/_/ gsum pa ni/_tshom bu lnga bkod la/_chos nyid 'od gsal gyi zhing khams rang bzhin rnam par dag cing lhun gyis grub pa'i yon tan gyi snang cha ye shes kyi rang 'od du 'tsher ba 'khor 'das ro mnyam chos kyi dbyings su 'byams klas pa'i dgongs pa bskyang zhing /_'od gsal lhun grub ye shes rigs lnga'i zhing /_/sku dang thig les ye nas brgyan pa 'di/_/rang snang dag pas legs par phul ba yis/_/kun bzang chos sku'i zhing la spyod par shog_/ces 'khor gsum dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab kyis zin par byas te 'bul lo/_/spro zhing nus na phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par ji snyed pas kyang mchod par bya'o/_/ gnyis pa gsol ba gdab pa ni/_bla ma de nyid dkon mchog kun 'dus kyi ngo bor nges shes bskyed nas/_skyon rtog gi blo ngan spangs te yon tan rjes su dran pas dad pa'i blo sna drangs te tshad med pa'i dad pa dang mos gus mchi ma 'khrug pa tsam du bskyed nas bla brgyud kyi gsol 'debs logs na yod pa ltar bya zhing /bsdu na bla ma sku bzhi'i gsol 'debs tsam dang /_khyad par oM badzra gu ru pad+ma sid+d+hi hri ma ha ri ni sa ra tsa hri ya sid+d+hi pha la AHhU~MhUM/_zhes ci nus su bzla zhing /_/_phyi snod zhal yas khang /_nang bcud bla ma'i rang bzhin/_sgra grag sngags kyi rang sgra/_dran rtog chos nyid kyi 'khor lo las mi 'da' bar byas nas mthar dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo sku bzhi'i bdag nyid dpal ldan bla ma dam pa la gsol ba 'debs so/_/bdag la dbang bskur byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_zab lam gyi rtogs pa khyad par can rgyud la skye bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_ka dag gnas lugs kyi lta ba rtogs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_lhun grub snang bzhi'i ye shes mthar phyin par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_zhes gsol ba btab pas bla mar dgyes shing 'dzum pa'i gnas gsum gyi yi ge gsum las 'od zer dkar dmar mthing gsum 'phros/_rang gi gnas gsum du rim par zhugs shing thim pas lus kyi nang thams cad gang sgo gsum gyi dri ma sbyangs/_dbang bzhi thob/_sku bzhi mngon du byas par bsam zhing /_slar yang mos gus gdung shugs drag pos gsol ba btab pas bla ma spyi bor byon tshad med pa'i thugs rjes 'od du zhu nas rang gi spyi bo nas thim pas/_/_rang gi sgo gsum dang bla ma'i rdo rje gsum dbyer mi phyed pa bde stong zung 'jug gi ngang la ci nus su mnyam bzhag bya zhing dge ba bsngo/_de ltar byin rlabs kyi nus pa thob pa'i rtags ma byung gi bar du 'bad par bya'o/_/de dag ni mdo dang sngags gnyis ka'i sngon 'gro thun mong pa'i dbang du byas pa'o/_/ gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa'i sngon 'gros gnas lugs gtan la dbab pa la gsum ste/_'khor 'das ru shan dbye ba/_sgo gsum gyi sngon 'gro/ rnal du dbab pa'o/_/dang po la ru shan dbye bar bstan pa dang /_ji ltar dbye ba'i tshul lo/_/dang po ni/_thal gyur las/_'khor 'das ru shan ma phye na/ khams gsum lus ngag yid kyis kyang /_/'brel pa chod par mi 'gyur bas/_/'khor 'das ru shan dbye bar bya/_/zhes gsungs pas/_sems can rnams kyi lus ngag yid gsum gyi chos nyid ye nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag kyang gnas skabs glo bur 'khrul pa'i snang zhen gyis bsgribs pas thog ma med pa nas da lta yan chad rigs drug gi gnas su bar med du 'khor zhing rigs drug so so'i lus kyi rnam 'gyur ngag gi smra brjod/_sems kyi rtog dpyod/_sdug bsngal gyi myong tshul grangs kyis mi chod pa zhig byas kyang don med pa 'ba' zhig tu song mod/_da dung zin med kyi las la zhen cing chags pas ci zhig bya/_des na da res 'khor 'das ru shan phyed par byas te phyin chad 'khor bar skye ba'i gzhi rtsa chod pa zhig bya dgos te/_ji ltar dbye na/ 'khor ba'i las snang dang rnam pa mthun par lam du byas pas las ngan gyi mtshang rtogs nas phyin chad 'dzin zhen las grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags thun mong ba las kyang /_/_rnam rtog las ni rnam rtog dang /_/ srid pa nyid kyis srid pa dag_/_/ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa/_/chu gzhan gyis ni dgug par bya/_/de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang /_/rnam par nges par sbyang bar bya/_/zhes sogs gsungs pa dang gnad gcig go_/ gnyis pa la phyi nang gnyis las/_/_/dang po phyi ltar dbye ba ni/_'das rjes las/_lus kyi sngon 'gro bya ba'i phyir/_/rigs drug spyod pa sna tshogs sbyang /_/dkon mchog gsum gyi spyod pa'ang spyad/_/ces sogs gsungs pa ltar/ri ngogs lung stong sogs mi'i 'gro 'ong med pa'i gnas dben par song te/_/_gzhi bdag la gtor ma byin nas/_da ni sems can gyi don du 'khoRa 'das ru shan phye la phyin chad 'khor bar mi ldog par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed nas/_/_dmyal ba la tsha grang /_yi dwags la bkres skom/dud 'gro la bkol spyod/_mi la skye rga na 'chi/_lha min la 'thab rtsod/_lha la 'pho ltung sogs rigs drug gi bde sdug spyod tshul thams cad sems kyis rang rgyud la myong bar bsam zhing /_lus kyis 'phyong rgyug 'gro 'dug sogs rnam 'gyur thams cad bya/_ngag gis de dang de'i sgra skad sna tshogs brjod pa sogs shugs 'byung 'gag med du spyod pas ngal dub 'gyu ba spun dag tu ma gyur gyi bar du byas nas rjes shes kyi rang ngo la lta zhing ngal bso/yang lus kyis bde bar gshegs pa zhi khro'i sku'i rnam 'gyur dang*/_ngag gsang sngags kyi sgra skad yid de dag gi rnam pa gsal ba dang 'dzin ci nus byas la rjes shes kyi rang ngo bskyang ngo /_/ de ltar byas pas lus la tsha grang bkres skom chags zhen dgag sgrub med pa dang ngag bla ma'i gdams ngag gi tshig don la sgom byung gi shes rab 'char ba dang*/_sems gsal stong 'gag med bde ba'i nyams rtsol med du 'char ba rnams ma byung gi bar du sbyang ngo*/_/de dag gi dgos pa ni/_lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig pa dag_/_/bar chad zhi/_mngon zhen ldog_/_/sku gsung thugs rdo rjer 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'o/_/gzhung rtsa bar lus ngag yid gsum ru shan so sor dbye ba dang sgo gsum gyi sngon 'gro spel nas byed par gsungs kyang ru shan dbye ba kho na sum phrugs su byas na nyams len gnad 'dril zhing chun che bar dgongs nas bshad ma thag pa nyid bla ma rnams kyi phyag len la mdzad do/_/ gnyis pa nang ltar ru shan dbye ba la dbyer bar bstan pa dang /_ji ltar dbye ba'i tshul lo/_/dang po ni/_klong gsal las/_nang gi 'khrul rgyu zad pa'i phyir/_/'khor 'das ru shan nang ltar byed/_/zhes gsungs pas/_phyi ltar ru shan dbye bas phyi 'khrul pa'i rkyen snang zad kyang /_nang 'khrul pa'i rgyu dang sa bon ma zad na zhe sdang sogs nyon mongs pa'i kun slong gis mi dge ba'i bag chags sa bon so so la bzhag pas de dang de'i nus pa sad par byas te 'bras bu rigs drug gi 'khor rgyud chod par mi 'gyur bas de chod par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/ gnyis pa ni/_'das rjes las/_/_lus 'di ma rig rgyus bskyed phyir/_/ rigs drug sa bon nyid du gnas/_/rig pa sku gsum dngos yin phyir/_/sku gsum yi ge 'bru gsum shar/_/yi ge rtsal sbyang ru shan dbye/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_sa bon gnas tshul ni/_klong gsal las/_spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga dang /_/lte ba gsang gnas rkang mthil du/_/a su mri tri pre du gnas/_/zhes pas sbyang gzhi 'gro ba rnams kyi lus kyi gnas drug tu/_sbyang bya spyi bor lha'i sa bon a dkar po/_/mgrin par lha min gyi sa bon su ljang ser/_snying gar mi'i sa bon ni:sngo skya/_lte bar dud 'gro'i sa bon tri dmar nag_/gsang bar yi dwags kyi sa bon pre dmar nag_/rkang mthil du dmyal ba'i sa bon du dud kha rnams la 'gro ba drug gi bag chags rnams lhan skyes su gnas pa rnam pa sol dong du du ba 'phyur ba ltar bsam zhing /_sbyong byed rig pa'i ye shes rdo rje gsum rnam pa spyi bor oM dkar po/_mgrin par AHdmar po/_snying gar hUM mthing ga rnams bkrag mdangs 'od zer 'bar bar bsams la/_/_yi ge gsum bzlas pa'i rkyen gyis de las ye shes kyi me rang 'od du 'bar bas yi ge drug bag chags dang bcas pa thams cad dngos med du bsregs/'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyu 'bras thams cad sbyangs nas rang lus dwangs gsal shel gong phyis pa ltar bsam zhing /_oM AHhU~M 'bum tsho bdun dbyangs snyan pos bzla'o/_/des sdig pa dag pa'i rtags dngos sam rmi lam ci rigs par 'byung zhing lus ngag yid gsum tha mal gyi 'dzin zhen dag_/lus bde ngag dag sems gsal stong mi rtog pa'i nyams ma shar gyi bar du 'bad par bya ste/_klong gsal las/_ru shan nang ltar sus phye ba/_/'khrul rgyu 'khor ba'i sa bon stongs/_/gsum po 'khor bar ldog pa med/_/ces dang /_de ltar sa bon ma zad na/_/'khor ba'i 'brel thag chod mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pas rgyu sa bon zad na des bskyed kyi 'bras bu mi 'byung ba bzhin no/_/ gnyis pa sgo gsum gyi sngon 'gro la gsum las/_dang po lus kyi sngon 'gro ni/_thal 'gyur las/_/rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas te/_/lus sbyangs sems la phan pa 'o/_/zhes gsungs pas/_de yang lus la gnad du bsnun na sems kyi dwangs snyigs phyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir/_rkang mthil gnyis sbyar sor mo bcu sa la btsugs pus mo phyir brgyangs rgal tshigs drang por bsrang / lag pa gnyis spyi bor ma reg par thal mo sbyar/_gru mo gnyis thad sor phyir brgyang /_mgrin pa ol mdud non par byas/_nya bzhi shugs phyungs nas bsgrims te rdo rje'i 'dug stangs byas pa bzhin du rdo rje sngon po rtse gsum pa me 'bar ba zhig tu bsgom/_des lus khol bur na zhing tshugs mi thub pa dang drod skye zhing sems rtog med du gnas par 'gyur ro//de'i tshe lus rang babs su khres se bskyar la sems rtog med kyi rang ngo bskyang ngo*//de yang rdo rje'i yar rtse gsum gyis ngo bor rang bzhin thugs rje gsum dang mar rtse sku gsum/_sked pa gcig tu 'dril ba lam dbyer mi phyed pa mtshon pa'o/_/de'i dgos pa ni gsum ste/thun mong du lus kyi sdig pa 'dag cing bar chad zhi/ khyad par lus kyi mngon zhen ldog pas 'khor bar mi ltung /mthar thug sku rdo rje sprul pa'i skur gnyis su med par 'gyur ro/_/ gnyis pa ngag gi sngon 'gro la bzhi ste/_thal 'gyur las/_ngag ni hUM zhes gnas pa la/_/rgyas gdab pa dang rtsal sbrang nyid/_/gnyen btsal lam du gzhug pa yis/_/zhes gsungs pa'i dang po la gnyis kyi phyi snang ba la rgyas gdab pa ni/_dben par lus gnad chos bdun bcas te/_snying gar hUM sngon po zhig bsgoms pa gsal snang thon par byas nas so dang mchu ma reg tsam du rlung dang shes pa hU~M gsum gcig tu bsres nas hUM gi glu snyan la ring bar blangs bas snying ga'i hUM las hU~M yig mang po thol thol byung /_sna bug g.yas nas thon/_phyi'i snang ba thams cad hUM gis me re re khengs pas snang ba thams cad hUM gi rang bzhin du 'char ba ni rgyas thebs pa'o/_/des ni snang bar rang bzhin med par grol ba'i dgos pa yod do/_yang /_nang phung po la rgyas gdab pa ni/_yang hUM sngar ltar brjod pas phyi rol gyi hUM rnams rna bug g.yon nas thogs pa med par zhugs lus kyi nang thams cad me re re gang bar bsam zhing rlung bzung /_lus hUM gis gang bar rtsol med du 'char zhing mi bde ba snyam byed pa ni rgyas thebs pa'o/_/des ni phung po rang bzhin med par grol ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gnyis pa la gnyis kyi phyi snang ba la rtsal sbyang ba ni/_snying ga'i hUM yig sngar ltar gsal ba las hUM drag po ngar dang ldan par brjod pas snying ga'i hU~M las hUM mthing nag drag la rtsub pa rno zhing myur ba'i shugs dang ldan pa yul che chung gang la spro ba de dang 'tshams pa mang po thol thol byung bas phyi rol gyi snang ba thams cad thal byung du phug nas khral khrol du song bar bsam zhing / snang ba thams cad hUM gi rang bzhin las sang seng dngos med du dag par 'char ba ni rtsal 'byongs pa'o/_/des ni snang ba bden med 'od gsal du grol ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/nang phung po la rtsal sbyang ba ni/_sngar ltar hU~M brjod pas hUM yig mtshan nyid bzhi ldan des rang gi lus rgyab mdun stod smad thams cad nas thogs pa med par thal byung du phug pas sang seng khral khrol du song bar bsam zhing /_lus kyi sha khol bur 'phar zhing na ba dang / lus chu zla ltar rang bzhin med pa'i nyams 'char na 'byongs pa'o/_/des ni phung po 'jal lus 'od gsal du grol ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gsum pa mnyen btsal ba ni/_mdun du shing bu lta bu'i dmigs rten gtsug te/_ngag gi hU~M snyan cing ring por brjod pas snying ga'i hU~M las hU~M gi phreng ba bar ma chad du byung dmigs rten gyi rtsa ba nas rim par dkris te rtse mor sleb pa dang dar cig glod la ngal gso/_/yang rim bzhin bshig nas nang du bsdus te snying ga'i hUM la rdzogs par bstim nas ngal gso/_/de ltar rlung sems hU~M gsum gcig tu byas nas phyi nang du 'gro ldog la sbyangs pa bzhin lam du longs pas rnam rtog gi ngar zhi nas sems shin sbyangs thob ste dmigs pa gang du'ang bsgyur thub pa ni mnyen btsal ba'i don no/_/ bzhi pa lam du 'jug pa ni/_rang gi lus dang rlung sems gcig dril hUM yig sngon po'i rnam pa can du byas la mdun na phar srin 'gros lta bu'i lam la zhugs nas song ste 'khyog mtshams su cung zad ngal bso zhing /_rgyang ring po'i mtha' tshad med pa'i pha rol du song par bsam zhing hUM ring por brjod la rang babs su ngal gso/_/yang sngar bzhin tshur log nas rang sor gnas pa la ngal gso/_des thog mar dga' ba dang skyo ba la sogs pa'i nyams mtho dman can du skye zhing /_mthar lus sems zag med kyi bde bas khyab pa 'char ro/_/des ni lus ngag yid gsum yang dag pa'i lam srol du chug pas rnam rtog rang shugs su chod cing bde gsal mi rtog pa'i nyams bogs ched du ske bas de'i rang ngo bskyang /_de dag gi dgos pa ni gsum ste/_thun mong du ngag gi sdig pa 'dag cing bar chad zhi/_khyad par ngag gi mngon zhen ldog pas 'khor bar mi ltung /_mthar thug gsung rdo rje longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skar gnyis su med par 'gyar ro/ gsum pa sems kyi sngon 'gro la gsum ste/_thal 'gyur las/_sems ni dang po byung sa dang /_bar du gnas dang tha mar 'gro_/de ltar gsum la brtag dpyad na/_/sems sbyangs sems kyi gnas lugs shes/_/zhes gsungs pas/_dang po byung sa la brtag pa ni/_sems zhes bde sdug thams cad myong ba po rig rig 'gyur 'gyur ba 'di phyi nang snod bcud sogs gang las byung /_phyi 'byung bzhi'i dngos po gang rung las byung ngam snyam na/_de re re nas rdul phran du bshig nas btsal bas e rnyed/_nang rang lus las byung ngam snyam na/_de yang cha shas nas btsal nas rnyed dam/_gal te stong pa las byung ngam snyam na byung ba'i yul e grub/_snang ba las byung ngam snyam na de'i dmigs sa e rnyed/_mdor na btsal bya'i sems la phar dpyad/_tshol mkhan gyi sems la tshur bltas pas ngo bo ngos bzung thams cad dang bral ba'i rang ngo mthong gi bar du brtsad bcad cing bskyar ro/_/ gnyis pa gnas sa la brtag pa ni/_sngar bzhin phyi nang snod bcud lus kyi cha shas sogs gang la gnas/_dbyibs dang kha dog byed las ngo bo gang gi mtshon brtags shing dpyad pas de dag gang du yang ma grub na/_rtogs byed kyi shes pa la tshur bltas pas shes pa gsal zhing snang yang rang bzhin ma grub pas gzhi med rtsa bral du gtan la ma phebs kyi bar du bskyar ro/_/ gsum pa 'gro sa la brtag pa ni/_sems wal gyis shar nas yal gyi song snyam byed pa 'di gang du 'gro brtags pas phyi nang snod bcud snang stong yod med sogs gang du yang 'gro ba'i yul med/_yul can gyi sems nyid kyang 'di zhes ngo bo ngos bzung thams cad dang bral bas 'gro ba'i yul dang 'gro mkhan gyi sems zhes ma grub pas rig stong 'gro 'ong dang bral bar gtan la ma phebs kyi bar du bskyar ro/_/de dag gi dgos pa ni gsum ste/ thun mong du yid kyi sdig pa 'dag cing bar chad zhi/_khyad par yid kyi mngon zhen ldog pas 'khor bar mi ltung /_mthar thug thugs rdo rje chos kyi skur gnyis su med par 'gyur ba'o/_/de ltar yang klong gsal las/_lus ngag yid gsum sngon 'gro ni/_/_/thun mong khyad par mthar thug gi_/dgos pa gsum du shes par bya/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar dang /_yang bshad ma thag pa'i dgos pa snga ma gnyis thun mong dang /_phyi ma mchog tu byas nas gnyis su yang bshad de/_thal 'gyur las/_/_'di la dgos pa rnam pa gnyis/_/thun mong mchog gi dbye bas brtag_/ces gsungs pa bzhin no/_/ gsum pa rnal du dbab pa la gnyis/_rnal dbab dngos dang /_sor 'jug pa'o/_/_/dang po la rnal du dbab dgos par bstan pa dang /_ji ltar dbab pa'i tshul lo/_/dang po ni/_klong gsal las/_lus ngag yid kyi 'byung 'khrugs pa/_de dag grol phyir rnal du dbab/_/ces gsungs pas/_de yang 'khor ba'i chos spang bya'i rnam rtog dang /_gnyen po'i chos dge ba'i rnam rtog gang shar yang rnam pa gang gsal ba de la shes pa rtse gcig tu gtad nas bsgoms pas rnam par rtog pa gnas 'gyur nas rnam par mi rtog par 'gyur te/_dper na chu rnyog ma can de nyid g.yo med du bzhag pas dwangs par 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/de yang thog mar rtog pa nan gyis bkag na sems mi gnas pa'i khar slar gegs su 'gro zhing ting nge 'dzin skyed dka' bar dgongs nas/ mdo sde'i rgyan las kyang /_gang phyir chags sogs de nyid la/_/tshul bzhin 'jug pa de yi phyir/_/de yis rnam grol 'gyur des na/_/de yis de dag las nges 'byung /_/zhes dang /_brtag gnyis las/_chags pas 'jig rten 'ching gyur na/_/'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur/_/zhes thabs la mkhas par gsungs pa dang /_dmigs pa la ni brten nas su/_/mi dmigs pa ni rab tu skye/_/mi dmigs pa la brten nas su/_/mi dmigs pa ni rab tu skye/_/ de yi phyir na dmigs pa ni/_/mi dmigs ngo bo nyid du 'grub/_/de lta bas na dmigs pa dang /_/mi dmigs mnyam par shes par bya/_/zhes dbus mtha' las kyang gsungs pa bzhin te/_de ltar sngar bshad pa'i 'khor 'das ru shan dbye ba sogs tha mal gyi snang ba bag chags kyi zhen snang Rags pa blo la 'char bde ba rnams dang /_de nas nang gi shan 'byed dang rgyas gdab rtsal sbyong sogs phra ba rnams la rim gyis bsdus pas dbang shes gzhan du mi g.yeng bar 'ching zhing /_des yid shes tshogs drug gcig tu 'du zhing yul gzhan la 'phro ba'i sems nye bar zhi bar byed/_de nas chos 'dus ma byas pa dang 'brel ba yul drug dmigs pa'i rten de yang yid la mi byed par rang lugs su snang ba dang stong pa dang spang bya dang gnyen po'i mtshan ma gang la yang mi rtog par 'jog pa ste/_rnal ma ni ma bcos pa'i don dang /_dbab pa ni de la rang babs su 'jog pa'i phyir rnal du dbab pa'o/_/ gnyis pa ni/_thal 'gyur las/_'di dus lus ngag sems kyi gnad/_/ rnal 'byor ldan pas rnal dbab bya/_/zhes dang /_'das rjes las/_de nas lus ngag yid gsum po/_/rnal du dbab la mkhas par bya/_/zhes gsungs pas bde ba'i mal du lus sems skyil lam/_tsog pu sogs gang bde rang babs su bsgul bskyod med par bzhag_/ngag smra brjod lta ci rlung la yang bzo bcos med par bzhag_/sems mi dge ba dang lung ma bstan du ma zad dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa tsam yang btang nas rang babs su 'jog ste chu ma rnyogs na dwangs pa ltar sgo gsum gzhi thog tu dwangs par 'gyur pas bsam gtan dang zhi gnas kyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa 'grub pa yin no//de ltar yang sher phyin las/[ · ]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa ni nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed pa'o/_/zhes gsungs pa dang yang gnad gcig go_/des ni gnas skabs su sgo gsum rnal du phebs pas 'byung ba mi 'khrug cing nad rkyen mi 'byung ba dang rang bzhin gyi bsam gtan la gnas/ mthar thug sgo gsum gyi 'dzin pa rang dag tu grol bar 'gyur ro/_/ gnyis pa la sor gzhug par bstan pa dang /_gzhug pa'i tshul lo/_/dang po ni/_klong gsal las/_ka dag don ni rtogs bya'i phyir/_rnal du phab nas sor ni 'jug_/ces gsungs pas/_sngar rnal du phab pa'i sems nyid gsal la mi rtog par gnas pa de nyid spyod lam zhi ba dang bar ma dang rtsub mo'i rkyen gyis rim bzhin khrid nas goms pa la bslab par bya ba yin te/_ral gri'i 'khrul 'khor shes par 'dod pas dang por shing gi ral gri la bslab pa bzhin no/_/ gnyis pa ni/_'das rjes las/_nyan thos byang sems khro bo yi/_/lta stangs nyid kyis sor yang gzhug_/ces gsungs pas/_dang po nyan thos kyi lta stangs lus gnad chos bdun ldan gyis mi g.yo/_/ngag mi smra bas rlung gi 'gro 'ong rang shugs su dal bar bzhag_/mig sna rtse'i nam mkha' la hrig ge gtad nas/_tshogs drug gi shes pa ji ltar shar ba las mi spro mi sdud par rang sor bzhag pas rkyen snang rang gi ngo bos gsal yang mi rtog pa'i ngang ma shor ba nyid la bslab par bya ste/_klong gsal las/_nyan thos zhi ba'i lta stangs kyis/_/lus ngag yid gsum rnal du phebs/_/zhes gsung pa ltar ro// gnyis pa byang sems kyi lta stangs ni/_gzhan sngar ltar las mig bar snang la hrig gis bsgyur nas dang por bltas pas rkyen des bskyed pa'i shes pa skad cig ma de yang gsal la ma 'gags par shar/_shar tsam nyid nas rang nyid rang bzhin gyis ma grub pa snang stong dbyer med chu zla ltar rtogs par bya ste/_bo d+hi sa twa'i lta stangs kyis/_/rnal phebs bde ba nyid thob 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar ro/_/ gsum pa khro bo'i lta stangs ni/_bsam gtan gyi ngang ma shor ba nyid las langs te gom pa gya tshoms su dor/_mig g.yo zhing blta/_ngag tu ha ha hi hi zhes sogs brjod cing rig pa hur phyungs te rtsal sbyangs pas rang shar spros bral bsal bzhag med pa chu rlabs rgya mtshor thim pa ltar rtogs bslab par bya ste/_des ni snang rkyen ji tsam mang ba stong nyid kyi ye shes kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te bud shing mang na me lce mang ba bzhin no/_/de ltar yang / khro bo nyid kyi lta stangs kyis/_/rnal phebs yon tan gsum yang 'grub/_/ ces gsungs pas/_nyan thos kyis sgo gsum rang bzhin du gnas par byed/ byang sems kyis gnas pa brtan par byed/khro bos brtan pa mthar phyin nas grol bar byed cing /de dag las gnas skabs su bde gsal mi rtog pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i zhi gnas khyad par can skye bas sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs rags pa gnon/_mthar thug lhag mthong ka dag gi don rtogs pas nyon mongs Rags pa rnams 'joms shing yang dag pa'i lam la srol du 'jug pa yin no/_/'das rjes don khrid las sngon 'gro gzhan rnams sngar ltar byas nas/_rnal dbab soRa gzhug dngos gzhi'i khongs su bsdus te gsungs pa ni sems bzhag thabs kyi rtsa ba lta bu yin pas skabs su babs par 'gyur mod/_'dir ni khrid gzhung gzhan rnams dang mtshungs par byas so/_/de ltar sgom pa'i tshe yid spro zhing 'jug na gegs chung la bogs che bas bsgom/_sun cing mi spro na bsgoms kyang gegs su 'gyur te/_rta ga_dong 'grogs can bzhin phyis sgom gyis sna sun nas ngan lang du 'gro nas*cung zad ngal bsos nas rim gyis goms pa la 'jug par bya'o/_/ don gnyis pa zab lam sgom pa dngos gzhi'i khrid la/_ka dag gi gnas lugs spros bral du ston pa khregs chod kyi lam dang /_lhun grub kyi ye shes mngon sum du ston pa thod rgal gyi lam gnyis/_dang po gnas lugs gtan la 'bebs pa dang*/_rig pa'i rang ngo sprad pa'o/_/_/dang po la gsum ste/ 'das rjes don khrid las/_dang por rtog pa rtsad bcad/_de nas sems kyi mtshang btsal/_de nas byung gnas 'gro gsum la brtag_/ces gsungs pas/ dang po rtsad bcad pa ni/_bya byed thams cad kyi gzhi lus ngag yid gsum po las 'khor bar 'khyams mkhan dang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba po de gang*/ bde sdug gi rten dang dgag sgrub byed pa po de su/_skye ba snga phyi rgyud 'phen dang 'khor mkhan de lus ngag yid gsum so so bas sam/_tshogs pa gcig pas byed brtags shing dpyad pas/_de thams cad kyi rtsa ba sems su thag chod pa ni rkun po ngos zin pa lta bu ste/_klong gsal las/_nyag gcig 'khor 'das kun gyi gzhi/_/zhes dang /_gsang ba'i snying po las/_/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/_/chos rnams kun kyi rtsa ba yin/_/zhes dang /_do ha las kyang / sems nyid gcig pu kun gyi sa bon te/_/gang las srid dang mya ngan 'das 'gro ba/_/zhes sogs gsungs pa'ang don 'di la dgongs pa'o/_/ gnyis pa mtshang btsal ba ni/_de ltar 'khor 'das thams cad kyi rtsa ba sems 'dis yul thams cad la bdag tu 'dzin cing*/_nga zhes zhen par byed na/_de dang 'brel ba can gyis lus dang ngag gnyis po'ang gcig gam/_tha dad/_gcig na lus ngag mthong thos su grub pa bzhin sems kyang mthong thos su cir mi 'gyur/_sems mthong thos su ma dmigs pa bzhin lus ngag kyang mthong thos su mi rung mod/_de dag so sor tha dad na/_lus rdul phran cha med/ ngag rjes med rang yal/_sems bya lam rjes med du song rjes/_gcig dang tha dad gang du yang grub pa med pa'i mtshang rig pa ste/_de yang yul dang yul can skye 'gag dang rtag chad la sogs pa gang gi yang phyogs su ma lhung ba/_ci yang ma yin pa'i rig pa gsal dwangs hrig ge ba/_ji lta ba bzhin brjod pa'i yul las 'das pa nyid 'khrul ma 'khrul gyi mtshan ma las gdod nas grol ba'i phyir/_mu tig phreng ba las/_thog ma nyid kyi ka dag la/_/'khrul zhes tsam du brjod du med/_/de bzhin ma 'khrul ba yang ci/_/de phyir 'khrul ba gdod nas dag_/ces gsungs pa ltar ro/_/ gsum pa gnas lugs la brtag pa ni/_de ltar gzhi'i mtshang ma rnyed kyang bdag med pa la bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyi ngo bo 'di dang po gang nas byung /_bar du gang na gnas/_mthar gang du 'gro_/de yang ji ltar byung*/ ji ltar gnas/_ji ltar 'gag sogs la brtags shing dpyad pas/_de dag gang du yang ma grub pas lta byed kyi gnyen pos sleb tshe blta bya'i yul nyid rang bzhin stong pa rtsa bral du dag pas sdong po rtsa ba bcad na lo 'dab ngang gis bskam pa bzhin/_lta byed kyi rig pa nyid kyang 'di zhes mi mtshon pa so sor rang rig gi ngo bo gdod nas dag cing lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes su rang shar/_de'i tshe gnas na gnas pa'i ngo bo la blta zhing /_'phro na 'phro ba'i ngo bo la bltas pas rig bya rig byed dang bral ba'i rang rtsal 'gag med kyi rig pa rang babs bskyangs pas ye stong ka dag gi gnas lugs mngon du gyur pa ste/_/btags grol las/_phyi nang kun brtags ye stong grol/_/zhes dang /_gzhan yang /_kun gzhi rnam par dag shes na/_/gzhi don mngon gyur rang sar grol/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/'o na byung gnas 'gro gsum la brtag pa sngar yang byung bas so snyam na/_snga ma ni/_yul la brtags nas ma grub par gtan la 'bebs byed yin la/_'di ni yul can la brtags nas ngo bo'i thog tu 'bebs pa yin no zhes chos rje kun mkhyen chen pos gsungs pa ltar snga ma ni sems gzhi med rtsa bral du gtan la 'bebs pa dang /phyi ma ni phab pa'i don la mnyam par 'jog pa'i gnas lugs ston pa yin no/ gnyis pa rig pa'i rang ngo sprad pa la/_byin rlabs 'pho ba'i thabs kyis ngo sprod pa/_gnas lugs lta ba'i thog tu ngo sprod pa/_nyams myong sgom pa'i thog tu ngo sprod pa dang gsum mo/_/dang po ni/_tshogs gtor rgya cher bshams pas mchod cing gsol ba btab/_slob ma rnams kyis maN+Dal phul la lus gnad bcas te/_ngo sprod 'debs pa po bsgom gzhi byas nas/_sngar bla ma'i rnal 'byoRa du bshad pa'i dmigs rim phog la/_de yang /_skyon kun zad/ yonatan kun rdzogs/_dgos 'dod kun stsol/_dkon mchog kun 'dus kyi ngo bor nges shes bskyed nas ci mdzad khyed shes kyi blo gtad lings bskyur te/ rtsa brgyud kyi bla ma dam pa rnams kyis tshad med pa'i thugs rjes dgongs nas bdag gi rgyud byin gyis rlobs shig_/zab lam gyi rtogs pa khyad par can rgyud la skye bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol snyam du bzod med mos gus kyi gdung shugs mchi ma 'khrug pa tsam du bskyed cig byas la bla mas/_chos sku kun tu bzang po la gsol ba 'debs so/_/zab lam gyi nyams rtogs rgyud la skye bar byin gyis rlobs shig_/ces sogs brgyud pa'i bar shar 'debs kyis byin phab pa'i rjes la/_bla ma nyid tshad med pa'i thugs rjes 'od du zhu/ slob ma'i spyi bo nas thim pas slob ma'i sgo gsum dang bla ma'i rdo rje gsum dbyer med spros bral gyi ngang la shes pa glod nas 'jog tu bcug pas byin rlabs kyi 'ur langs/_sgo gsum gyi snang ba bla mar 'dres/_rnam rtog mos gus su shar/_de'i ngang la lhod kyis glod pas rig mdangs mos gus su lam me/_gshis 'dzin med du khrol ler shar bas mos gus rang rig tu grol/ rang rig skye med ka dag gi dbyings su grol ba zhes bya ste/_de'i ngang la bsal bzhag med par rang babs su bskyang du gzhug go_/'di ni rtsa ba'i dngos bstan la med kyang bla ma rnams kyi phyag bzhes nyams myong bogs chod du skye ba byin rlabs shin tu che ba yin no/_/ gnyis pa gnas lugs lta ba'i thog tu ngo sprad pa ni/_don khrid las/_de nas rnam rtog sems su ngo sprad/_sems stong par/_stong pa snang bar/_snang stong gnyis med du/_gnyis med rang grol du/_dug lnga rang grol du/_tshogs drug rang grol du ngo sprod do/_/zhes rnam grangs bdun du gsungs pa las/ dang po ni/_sgo gsum rang babs su bzhag pa las/_snang grag gi chos gang yang rung ba zhig yid la wal gyis 'char du bcug nas 'di ltar sna tshogs su snang ba'i chos thams cad rmi lam gyi snang ba ltar rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i 'khrul ngo tsam las phyi rol na bden par grub pa rdul tsam yang med de/_gzhi gcig la'ang rigs drug sogs las mi mthun pa'i 'gro ba so so la snang ba ris med tha dad du snang ba dang /_skyes bu gcig nyid kyang rnam rtog tha dad pas dgra gnyen du mar nges pa'i phyir sems las rnam rtog ji ltar shar yang sems nyid las mi g.yo zhing yul dang yul can gnyis su med pa'i phyir rnam rtog sems su thag chod pa ste/_de yang sems kyi ngo bo ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs mi gzigs/_gzigs par mi 'gyur na mtshan nyid mtshon par byed pa rnam rtog lam mer 'char ba 'di las ci zhig_/klong gsal las/ sems kyi dran bsam rig pa'i rtsal/_/snang shes dag tu gyur pa kun/_/rig pa dag las logs pa med/_/ces dang /_gur las/_rin chen sems las phyir gyur pa'i/_/sangs rgyas med cing sems can med/_/ces gsungs pa ltar ro/_/ gnyis pa ni/_sems de yang*/_yod med skye 'gag rtag chad la sogs pa gang du yang ma grub cing /_spros pa thams cad dang bral bas 'di zhes mtshon du med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid du thag chod pa ste/_rgyud las/_'gyu byed nyid la tshur bltas pas/_/ma spangs rang grol bsir bu 'dra/_/zhes dang /_bde ba rab 'byams las/_rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni/_/btsal bas mi rnyed ngos bzung med/_/ji bzhin ye bzhin stong pa'i ngang /_brjod bral rang byung ye shes so/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar ro/_/ gsum pa ni/_ngo bo stong pa nyid las 'gyur ba med kyang /_rang rtsal ma 'gags pa'i 'char sgo cir yang snang ba'i phyir/_rgyud las/_'gag med rtsal ni cir yang 'char/_/stong gsal rig cing 'gyur ba med ces dang /_stong pa'i rang bzhin cir yang snang /_/snang ba'i mtshan nyid skye ba med/_/ces gsungs pa ltar ro/_/ bzhi pa ni/_de ltar snang ba yang rgyu rkyen gzhan med de/_stong nyid kyi rang rtsal chu nang zla gzugs bzhin snang stong gnyis med so so rang rig gi ngo bor gnas pa ste/_nyi zla kha sbyor las/_dmigs pas snang ba'i yul rnams la/_/ rang bzhin med par sus rtogs pa/_/'di la snang stong gnyis su med/_/ces gsungs pa ltar ro/_/lnga pa ni/_de ltar snang stong gnyis med rang byung gi rig pa rang gsal hrig ge ba spros bral 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub pas na sku gsum gyi dbyings su rang grol ba ste/_phra bkod las/_rdzogs sangs rgyas ni rang rig nyid/_/ngo bo dus gsum 'gyur ba med/_/ces gsungs pa ltar ro/_/ drug pa ni/_zhe sdang la sogs pa dug lnga'i rnam par rtog pa gang shar yang de nyid kyi ngo bo cher gyis bltas nas cham gyis bzhag pa zhe sdang ma spangs gsal stong ye shes su rang grol/_de bzhin du 'dod chags bde stong dang / gti mug mi rtog pa/_nga rgyal dang phrag dog rang gsal gnyug ma'i ngo bo rnams su 'chaRa zhing ye shes lnga'i ngang du grol/_des mtshon nas/_rtsa nyon dang /_nye nyon nyi shu sogs mi dge ba'i rtog pa gang skyes kyang thams cad rang shar rang grol du shes par bya ste/_klong gsal las/_nyag gcig 'khor 'das kun gyi gzhi/_/rang byung ye shes rang las byung /_/de shes ye shes tsam du brjod/_/ces gsungs pa ltar ro/_/bdun pa ni/_de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa tshogs drug gis bsdus pa'i yul dang yul can gyi snang ba dang rtog pa phra rags gang shar la bltas pas rang bzhin med pa ye stong rtsa bral chen por rang grol ba ste/_nyi zla kha sbyor las/_dmigs pas snang ba'i yul rnams la/_rang bzhin med par sus rtogs pa/_'di la snang stong gnyis su med/ ces gsungs pa ltar ro/_/mdor na gang shar gyi rig pa bcing grol las 'das pa'i rang bzhin spros bral ka dag gi dbyings su rang grol bas/ bsgom bya sgom byed las 'das pa'i gnas lugs mthar phyin pa ste/_thal 'gyur las/_rang rig rtog pa kun bral bas/_/grol lugs chen po bzhi dang bcas/_/ye nas grol bas bskyar gzhi med/_/rang gis grol bas gnyen po med/_/_/cer gyis grol bas mthong sar yal/_/yongs su grol bas 'bad rtsol med/_/ces gsungs pa bzhin no/_/de yang skye med du rtsad bcad nas ngo rang thog tu sprod pa dang /_'gag med du gtan la phab nas thag gcig thog tu bcad pa/_gnyis med du thag bcad nas rtsal grol thog tu sbyang ba zhes gsungs pa rnams kyang bshad ma thag pa'i don las gzhan med do/_/ gsum pa nyams myong sgom pa'i thog tu ngo sprad pa la/_rang gnas bsam gtan gyi ngang la ngo sprad pa dang /_rang mdangs ye shes kyi rol ba la ngo sprad pa'o/_/dang po ni/_rin chen sgron ma las/_cog gzhag gsum gyi rang bzhin las/_/_/ka dag don nyid mngon du 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs las/_ri bo cog gzhag lus rnam snang gi chos bdun mi g.yo bar 'ching /_rgya mtsho cog gzhag mig mda' gang tsam gyi thad kar mig 'bras mi 'gul bar hrig ge blta/ rig pa cog gzhag sems dus gsum gyi rnam par rtog pa gang gis kyang ma bslad pa da lta'i shes pa gsal la ngos gzung med pa rang babs chos nyid kyi ngang la bsal bzhag med par 'jog tu bcug la/_kyai skal ldan rnams da lta'i rig pa rang gsal rjen pa 'di la ma yengs par ltos shig_/dri med dag pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_/rang rig chos sku 'gyur ba med/_/sal le sing nge wal le ba/_/sprin med ston ka'i nam mkha' bzhin/_/mi 'gyur brtan pa ri bo bzhin du zhog_/mi g.yo dngas pa rgya mtsho bzhin du zhog_/yangs dog bral ba nam mkha' bzhin du zhog_/_/gang ltar gnas kyang rig pa'i ngang yin zhog_/ gang ltar shar yang rig pa'i mdangs yin zhog_/'phro gnas rang rig dwangs sangs phyed par zhog_/ji ltar bya rnams gang du 'phur na yang /_/mkha' las ma 'das de bzhin rig pa'i ngang /_/chos rnams rang gsal g.yo ba med par zhog_/ces pas sems gsal dwangs kyi ngang la gnas pa de nyid/_phaT ces yengs la bor ba'i rkyen gyis sngar gyi mi rtog pa'i dwangs de zhig kyang byung tshor gyi rtog pa dang der 'dzin gyi gnyen po med pa'i shes pa rang gsal rgya yan gzhi chal ba cig 'char te/_'di nyid rig pa rang gnas kyi bsam gtan yin pas ngo shes par gyis shig_/'di ngos zin phan chad shes pa gnas 'gyu dgag sgrub bzang rtog ngan rtog gi dus su yang rang rig rang babs la cer gyis bltas pas 'dzin med rang gnas kyi bsam gtan rjen sangs kyis 'char te 'di kho na rtsol med lhun grub kyi sgom pa chu bo lta bu yin no/_/de la cung zad brtan pa thob nas spyod lam 'jam rtsub bar ma rang nyams dang sbyar ba'i rkyen gyis bsam gtan dang bsres pas bya brjod dran rtog thams cad chos nyid kyi rol par shar te mnyam rjes kyi ris med/_nyin mtshan gyi bar med/_blang dor gyi chos med/_bsgom bya sgom byed kyi rtsis med par thams cad rig pa'i rang mdangs chos zad ka dag gi dgongs par la bzlas pa'o/_/de ltar yang thal 'gyur las/_ngo bo ka dag ye shes la/_/ma rig pa zhes srid med pas/_/gcig dang gnyis zhes grangs med de/_/ye shes tsam du'ang grub pa med/_/ces gsungs pa bzhin no/_/ gnyis pa rang mdangs ye shes kyi rol par ngo sprad pa la gsum las/ dang po gnas pa sems kyi rgyan du ngo sprod pa ni/_sgo gsum rang babs su lhug par bzhag la/_dgag sgrub kyi rtog pa sna tshogs spros nas cham gyis bzhag pas rnam rtog gi spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba gsal stong lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes gdod ma'i gnas lugs la rang soRa gnas pa rgya mtsho la rlabs zhi ba dwangs la mi g.yo bar gnas pa bzhin te/_rang shar las/_rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das/_/mtha' bzhi'i dri ma rang sangs nyid/_/ ces gsungs shing /_de'i tshe sems spros pa dang bral ba chos sku/_gsal la 'dzin pa med pa longs sku sna tshogs 'char gzhi ma 'gags pa sprul pa'i sku ste ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum dbyer med pa'i phyir/nor bu phra bkod las/_rdzogs sangs rgyas ni rang rig nyid/_/ngo bo dus gsum 'gyur ba med/_/rang bzhin rtag tu 'gag pa med/_/thugs rje kun la rab snang zhing /_/ zhes dang /_thal 'gyur las/_ye shes rang sor gnas pa la/_/gsum gyi tshul du dbyer med pa'o/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/ gnyis pa 'phro ba sems kyi rol par ngo sprad pa ni/_sems gsal la mi rtog pa'i ngang las ma 'gags pa'i rtsal gang shar gyi snang ba'i steng du dgag sgrub blang dor med par babs su bskyangs pas rgya mtshor rlabs ji ltar shar yang rgya mtsho'i ngang las ma g.yos pa ltar gang shar kyi rtog pa thams cad chos nyid kyi rol pa las mi g.yo ba ste/_phra bkod las/_'gag med rtsal ni cir yang 'char/_/shar ba nyid nas rang sar grol/_/grol zhes tsam du brjod du med/_/de phyir ma grol ba yang ci/_/_/zhes pa dang /_shar dus nyid nas gnyen po la ma ltos par rang grol ba sbrul mdud bzhin te/_thal 'gyur las/ ji ltar shar ba'i rig pa ni/_/sbrul mdud bzhin du rang grol lo/_/zhes gsungs bzhin no/_/ gsum pa 'phro gnas gnyis med du ngo sprad pa ni/_sems nyid mi rtog pa'i ngang las ma 'gags pa'i rnam rtog sna tshogs su shar yang dgag sgrub blang dor med par rang babs su bzhag pas chos nyid kyi ngang du mi g.yo bar gnas pa'i rang rtsal 'gag med du 'phro ba'i phyir 'phro ba dang gnas pa'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa rgya mtsho las rlabs ji ltar shar yang rgya mtsho'i ngang du zhi zhing dbyer mi phyed pa ltar/_rnam rtog ji ltar shar yang thol skyes thol nub chos nyid gyi ngang las mi 'da' ba'i phyir de ltar shes par bya ste/_rmad byung las/_ji ltar rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs ltar/_/sems kyi rba rlabs g.yo ba kun/_/ gdod ma gzhi yi rgya mtshor thim/_/zhes dang /_do ha las kyang /_ji srid sems las rnam 'phro ba/_/de nyid mgon po'i bdag nyid de/_/chu dang rlabs dag gzhan yin nam/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin te/_de ltar yang sems gnas na gdod ma'i ngang du gnas/_'phro na ye shes kyi rol par 'char/_mnyam na gnyis med kyi ngang du yan pas ji ltar byas kyang chos nyid kyi rol pa las mi 'da' ba'i phyir gnas pa mi bsang /_'phro ba mi dgag_/mnyam pa mi sgrub ste/ ji ltar shar yang de ltar mi 'dzin pas dgag sgrub blang dor las 'das pa chos nyid rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i dgongs pa la ngo sprad pa'o/_/zhes ngo 'phrod par gdab cing /_de yang /_sngar skabs de dang der bsgom bya'i don la rig thog tu nyams myong skyes pa de nyid ngo sprod btab pas gnas lugs kyi thog tu sgro 'dogs chod na de'i rgyun ma nyams par bskyangs pas rim gyis brtan pa thob par 'gyur shing /_yang dus der sgom don la myong ba ma skyes par go yul du song na skabs 'dir ngo sprod btab kyang bya shor du 'gro bas/ sngar bshad pa'i dmigs rim rnams slar yang 'bad pas sgom zhing /_phyis nyams myong skye tshul gyi thog tu ngo sprod sbyar nas bstan cing nyams su blangs pas rim gyis don la myong ba'i sne zin par 'gyur ro/_/ gzhan yang skabs 'dir shes par bya ba ni/_de ltar lam nyams su len pa'i tshe spyir bsam gtan gyi gegs ni/_ji skad du/_le lo dang ni gdams ngag rnams/_/brjed dang bying dang rgod pa dang /_/'du mi byed dang 'du byed de/_/_/de dag nyes pa lnga yin no/_/zhes dang /_de'i gnyen po ni/_de spong 'du byed rnam pa brgyad/_/_gnas dang de la gnas pa dang /_/rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'o/_/dmigs pa brjed par ma gyur dang /_/bying dang rgod dang rtog pa dang /_/de spang mngon par 'du byed dang /_/zhi tshe rnal du 'dug pa'o/_/zhes rje btsun byams pas gsungs pa nyid 'dir yang shes par bya ba yin/_de yang /_gang la mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe sngar las rnam rtog mang du song ba lta bu dang /_yang /_res 'ga' ha phyad de ba la gnas shing /_res mi gnas pa dang /_gnas kyang gting na yid byed phra mo mi khegs pa zhig 'byung bas/_de gsum ga yang gnas par rtsom pa yin zhing /_'on kyang rtog pa 'phro ba bkag pas mi khegs pas/_de la shes pa mtha' med du spros nas ar la gtad pas mthar rtog pa mthu rdugs nas gnas pa'i rang so zin pa zhig 'ong bas de'i ngang la 'jog pa ste/_ji ltar rdzings las 'phur ba'i bya rog bzhin/_/bskor zhing bskor zhing slar yang de ru 'bab/_/ces 'a ltar ro/_/de yang gnas 'gyu ltos bzhag can ma yin pa phyi tshogs drug dang nang shes pa gnyis ka'i phyogs su ma lhung zhing skye 'gag rtag chad las 'das pa'i shes pa rang rig rang gsal gyi ngo bo rtsal mdangs 'gag med kyi snang ba gu yangs phyad de ba/_gsal hrig smra brjod kyi yul las 'das pa de'i rang so yengs med du bskyangs pa las gnas lugs kyi rtogs pa je 'phel je brtan du 'gyur ro/_/yang bying ba shas che na rlung ro bsal/_lus gnad sgrim zhing lta stangs gtong /_shes pa la ngar btags/_rig pa hur bton pas ar la gtad/_'phro zhing rgod na lta stangs dmad/_lus gnad lhod cha 'tshol/_mig phab/_zhe gting nas glod la rang babs su 'jug go_/yang skabs rer nam mkha' dwangs shing sprin med pa'i tshe/_nyi ma la rgyab phyogs pas nam mkha'i mthongs su lta stangs bcun nas bltas pas/_/_dpe phyi'i nam mkha'i stong mdangs kyis go phye nas/_dpe can nang shes pa'i nam mkha' rnam par dag pa las/_gsang ba 'od gsal snying po nam mkha' gsal stong mtha' dbus thams cad las 'das pa'i chos nyid skad cig la 'char ro//de yang ltengs na zhi lhag so sor rtsal sbyang /_bying na gseng /_rgod na dbab/_spyod lam kun dang bsre rtsal sbyong bogs 'do gyi gnad yin no zhes chos rje kun mkhyen chen po'i gsung las so//_// !_don gnyis pa lhun grub kyi ye shes mngon sum du ston pa la gsum ste/_sngon 'gro sgo gsum gyi bya ba btang ba/_dngos gzhi zag med kyi ye shes rgyud la brten pa/_rjes snang nyams kyi 'char tshul bstan pa'o/_/dang po sgo gsum bya ba gtong ba ni/_klong gsal las/_mngon sum gnad du dbab pa'i phyir/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i bya ba ni/_/lus ngag yid kyis dgu phrugs btang /_/zhes gsungs pa las/_dang po lus kyi gsum ni/_phyi 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i bya byed dang rnam g.yeng thams cad/_nang phyag dang skor ba sogs dman pa'i dge ba rnams/_/_gsang ba rnam g.yeng sgul bskyod thams cad spangs te gcig pur 'dug pa'o/_/gnyis pa ngag gi gsum ni/_phyi 'jig rten gyi 'khrul gtam sna tshogs/_nang kha ton dang bzlas brjod la sogs pa/ gsang ba smra brjod thams cad spangs te mi smra bar gnas par bya'o/_/ gsum pa yid kyi gsum ni/_phyi 'jig rten gyi 'khrul rtog thams cad/ nang bskyed rdzogs kyi sems 'dzin sna tshogs/_gsang ba rnam rtog gi 'phro 'du thams cad spangs nas rtog med kyi ngag la gnas par bya zhing des ni sgo gsum gnas pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_grol bar 'gyur ba ste/_'das rjes las/_gnas brtan grol ba'i gdengs thob nas/_/phyi nang bya ba kun btang ste/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar ro/_/ gnyis pa dngos gzhi zag med kyi ye shes rgyud la brten pa la gsum ste/ sgo gsum gyi gnad gzir ba/_gnad bzhis mngon sum rang thog tu dbab pa/_dbab pa'i don ngo sprad pa'o/_/dang po sgo gsum gyi gnad gzir ba ni/ klong gsal las/_mngon sum gnad ni lus ngag sems/_/so so'i gnad rnams legs par bstun/_/zhes gsungs pas/_dang po lus kyi gsum ni/ snga ma las/_de yang lus ni sku gsum las/_/rgyun du 'da' bar mi bya 'o/_/ zhes gsungs shing /_de yang mu tig phreng ba las/_seng ge'i tshul dang glang chen dang /_/drang srong lta bur gnas par bya/_/zhes pas/_chos sku'i bzhugs stangs seng ge lta bu ni/_tsog pur rkang mthil sprad pus mo phyir gyed lag mthil sar btsugs nas ro stod bsrang mjing pa yid tsam gyen du gtod/ mig smin phrag gi steng gi nam mkha' la har por mi 'gul bar blta ba'o/_/ longs sku'i bzhugs stangs glang chen lta bu ni/_kha bub tu pus brang sbyar gru mo sa la btsugs te/_lag mthil gyis ol ko bsten pa'i sor mo 'gram pa la sbyar/_rgal tshigs drang por bsrangs nas thad ka'i nam mkha' la zur gyis hrig por blta ba'o/_/sprul sku'i bzhugs stangs drang srong lta bu ni/[ · ]tsog pur 'dug pa'i rkang pa'i long bu gshibs/_lag pa gnyis mkhal khung ngam pus mo la bskor/_rgal tshigs drang por bsrangs te mig cung zad phab la zim bur bar snang la gtad do/_/_/de ltar byas pas gnas skabs su bzhugs stangs dang pos 'byung bar rang sar dag_/gnyis pas g.yo byed kyi rlung zin/ gsum pas drod bskyed cing 'byung ba snyoms par byed/_mthar thug sku gsum du grol te mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/_thal 'gyur las/_chos sku'i gzigs stangs seng ge yis/_/'khrul pa'i 'jigs pa kun bral nas/rdo/ rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku'i bzhugs ni/_/glang chen nyal ba la brten nas/_/chos nyid don la longs spyod de/_/ pad+ma'i spyan gyis mthong bar 'gyur/_/sprul pa sku yi bzhugs stangs ni/_/drang srong tsog pu la brten nas/_/chos nyid snang ba rang sprul nas/_/chos kyi mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pas rig pa'i ye shes lus la gnas kyang /_thabs lus gnad kyis ma gzir na dbang po'i mngon sum du snang mi nus te/_sbrul la yan lag yod kyang ma gcus na mi gsal ba bzhin no/_/ gnyis pa ngag gi gsum ni/_'das rjes las/_ngag ni bslab bya'i rim pa dang /_/gnas pa brtan cing la yang bzla/_zhes gsungs pas/_dang po ni/ 'khrul pa'i gtam bkag nas smra bcad yun thung ba la bslab/_gnyis pa ni/ kha ton bzlas brjod cung zad tsam las gzhan mi smra bar gnas/_/ gsum pa ni/_/_lag gi brda' tsam las cung zad kyang mi smra bar bzla'o/_/de ltar byas pas gnas skabs su 'khrul pa'i gtam 'gags pas nyon mongs mi 'phel/_mthar thug brjod med kyi don la reg cing sangs rgyas kyi gsung rdo rje klong du mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/ gsum pa sems kyi gsum ni/_thal 'gyur las/_sems ni dbyings la la gtad pas 'grub/_/ces dang /_'das rjes las sems ni smin phrag mkha' la gtad/_/sku gsum rig pa stong par 'char/_/zhes gsungs pas rkyen dang bral ba'i phyi'i nam mkha' stong sang nge ba de la dbang po mi 'gyur pa mdung tshugs su gtad nas nam mkha'i dbus su sems thim 'gro ba lta bu'i shes pas drag tu bcun pas nang gi dbyings rnam dag sgron ma rig pa stong gsal du lhag gis 'char bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar yang /_klong gsal las/_de ltar sems kyi gnad gzir bas/_/sku gsum rig pa stong par 'char/_/zhes gsungs shing des ni gnas skabs su rig pa'i ye shes mngon sum du mthong zhing /_mthar thug lhag med du 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/ gnyis pa gnad bzhis mngon sum rang thog tu dbab pa ni/_thal 'gyur las//gnad gsum man ngag 'bral mi bya/_/de yang sgo dang yul nyid dang*/ rlung dang rig pa'i gnad nyid bstun/_/zhes dang /_'das rjes las/_sgo yul rlung gi gnad bstun pas/_/_/yul la ye shes mngon du snang /_/_/zhes pas gnad bzhi'am rlung rig gnyis dbyer med du byas pas gsum du yang bshad mod/sa bcad ni bshad pa'i dbye ba spu tsam las don gyi gnad gcig pa las/_dang po 'char byed sgo'i gnad ni/_thal 'gyur las/_sgo ni sku gsum mig gis blta/_zhes dang /_ji ltar na/_sgo gnad ldog phab zur gyis blta/_/zhes gsungs pas/_de yang rig pa'i ye shes snying dbus na bum nang gi mar me ltar gnas pa'i zer gdangs snying nas mig tu 'brel pa'i rtsa dar dkar gyi skud pa lta bu'i nang nas mig gi sgor 'od rtsa'i lam nas 'char bas chos sku'i gzigs stangs gyen du gtor gyi rnam par blta ba/longs sku'i gzigs stangs g.yas g.yon du zur 'khrid smyug ma bsrang ba lta bu/sprul sku'i gzigs stangs phyed pa tsam cung zad thuRa la phab pa drang srong bsam gtan bsgom pa lta bu bya ste/_de ltar yang /_tsak+Shu zim bus sUr+ya blta/_/shar gyi rgya dkar bzhin du gsal/_/zhes pas phyi'i nam mkha' la dbang po mdung tshugs su bltas pas phyi'i dbyings mthong /_g.yas g.yon gyi zur ram zim bus nyi ma la bltas na nang gi dbyings rig mthong /_des dbang po bar snang la 'khrid cing 'khrul snang zhing khams su 'char ro/_/de yang lta stangs gsum po gang rung gis blta ba la bslabs pas/_mig yul la ji tsam gtad kyang tshugs nus par 'gyur ro/_/ gnyis pa 'char gzhi yul gyi gnad ni/_yul sprin dang bsir bu'i rkyen dang bral ba'i nam mkha' dwangs shing gsal ba nyid la/_snga dro nub dang phyi dro shar du blta ba'am/_'od gsal 'char sla ba'i ched du zer gnyis dang sbyar nas snga dro shar dang phyi dro nub tu blta zhing /_de yang /_nyi ma las 'og tu khru gang tsam gyi nam mkha' stong sang nge ba der blta'o/_/de ltar yang /_thal 'gyur las/_yul ni sgrib byed bral ba la/_zhes dang /_'das rjes las/ yul gnad nam mkha' rkyen bral la/_/zhes dang /_klong gsal las/_rkyen bral gsum la gsal bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pas/_yul rkyen bral nam mkha' stong pa/_dbang po rkyen bral chu'i sgron ma/_gnas rkyen bral dwangs shing mtho ba'i dben pa'o/_/ gsum pa rlung gi gnad ni/_'das rjes las/_rlung gnad shin tu dal la bslab/_/ces gsungs pas/_rlung dal ba ma brten na/_rlung gis rig pa spur nas mi zin pas/_rlung sna nas mi gtong bar mchu so gnyis ma reg tsam du kha nas dal bus phyi nang du rgyu ba snyoms pa las phyir 'dzin cung zad tsam bya ste/_phyi nang rlung ni dal zhing mnyam/_/yid tsam phyi ru 'dur ba yis/_/rlang gi 'gro 'ong chad par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pas/_rlung gi 'gro 'ong zad pas rtog pa'i 'phro 'du zad de dbyings rig g.yo 'gul med par sdod pa'o/_/ bzhi pa rig pa'i gnad ni/_klong gsal las/_rig gnad lug rgyud btson du bzung*/_/dngos snang dal ba nyid kyis brten/_/zhes dang /_'das rjes las/_/_lug rgyud rig pa btson du bzung /_/zhes gsungs pas/_phyi'i dbyings nam mkha' stong pa me long dang 'dra bas snang ba'i go phye nas/_nang gi dbyings rnam dag sgron ma bdag po'i byad dang 'dra ba de nyid/_thog mar smin mtshams nas mthing ga khyab pa chen po'i 'od las rim gyis mched nas nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon lta bu 'od lnga'i mu khyud thig phran dang bcas pa'i nang du thig le stong pa'i sgron ma rdzing bur rdo bor ba'i ri mo ltar 'al 'ol las mthar thig le dmar zlum gsal dwangs can du 'char te/_sgron ma 'bar ba las/_mthing ga mi 'gyur snang ba las/_kha dog gsal ba'i 'od lngar yang /_/ 'di nyid rab tu gsal 'gyur zhing /_/zhes gsungs pa ltar dang /_de'i nang du rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud bdag po'i sems dang 'dra ba de lhag gis 'char zhing /_de yang /_thog mar rta rnga la mdud pa btab pa lta bu'am/_gser skud dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_me tog gi chun po lta bu ste/_thog mar smig rgyu ltar 'al 'ol mi gsal ba 'gul 'phrig can du 'char bas/_de nyid lta stangs kyis khrid nas dbyings kyi ra bar bcug pa la ce re gtad nas yin min gyi dpyad pa sogs rnam rtog gis ma bslad par lta mkhan gyi rig pa des/_rig pa rang gi ngo bo blta shes tsam las mi g.yo bar bya zhing /_ci ste 'od gsal gyis snang ba'am/g.yas g.yon steng 'og sogs su yal yol byed na de'i rjes su mig dang sems bcad phog tu mi 'brang bar lta stangs kyis mi gzur nas dal bur khrid pas sngar bzhin shar ba la sems g.yo med du che re gtad/_blos byas kyi bcos bsgyur mi bya bar dbyings rig gi rang ngo la bltas pas phyi snang ba ma 'gags shing /_nang 'dzin pas ma bslad pa/_brjod med spros pa dang bral ba'i rang so bzung bas yul dang yul can dbyer med du 'dres pas 'od gsal gyi snang ba smin mtshams nas bral ste gsal 'gri_ba med par 'char ba sogs snang bzhi'i snang shes kyi nyams rnams rim gyis skye bar 'gyur ro/_/des ni gnas skabs su rig pa'i ye shes mngon sum du gsal bas ma rig pa dang bral/_tshe'i dus byas kyang sprul pa'i skur grol/_mthar thug snang bzhi mthar phyin nas lhag med du grub pa'o/_/ gsum pa de nyid ngo sprad pa la/_ngo sprod dngos dang /_spro ba bskyed pa/ rnal 'byor bzhis nyams su blang ba dang gsum las/_dang po ni/_ngo sprod kyi khang pa phyogs phyed par snga dro nyi ma'i zer dang ldan pa'i dus su/_tshogs gtor bshams pas/_/_mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa dang byin 'bebs rnams sngar ltar byas nas/_slob ma sgo gsum gyi gnad 'ching du bcug_/sngar bzhin 'od gsal gyi snang ba rnams mtshon par byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i me long bstan la/_/_kyai skal ldan rnams 'di ltar shes par gyis shig_/de yang /_sngar chos thams cad kyi chos nyid ka nas dag cing spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes khregs chod kyi lam gyis mtshon par byas pa de yin/_'dir ni lhun grub kyi ye shes mngon sum gyi lam gyis mtshon par byed pa yin la/_de yang /_ngo sprad bya ni/_chos gzhan nas bde gshegs snying po dang /_rgyu'i rgyud sogs su bshad pa de/_'dir ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang dbyer med pa'i rig pa'i ye shes 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub pa/_gzhon nu bum pa sku'i bdag nyid can du ye nas 'grib med par bzhugs pa de nyid sgo gsum gyi gnad kyis gzhi bzung /_gnad rnam pa bzhis mtshon par byas pas/_snying nang gi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgron ma 'od lnga lhun grub tu yod pa de nyid/ mig ni nam mkha'i khams su blta/_zhes yi ge med pa las gsungs pa ltar/ rgyang zhags chu'i sgron ma'i lam nas gsal ba'i snang ba/phyi'i dbyings nam mkha' stong pa me long lta bu la/_/_nang gi nam mkha' rnam dag sgron ma'i gdangs byad bzhin du shar ba ni nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon lta bu'i 'od khyim du snang ba 'di'o//de'i nang du thig le stong pa'i sgron ma'i rtags 'od kyi 'khor lor gsal zhing dwangs par snang ba 'di'o/_/de'i nang du rig pa'i sgra yod pa'i rtags su rdo rje lu gu rgyud du snang ba 'di'o/_/de yang dbyings rig 'du 'bral med pa ni nyi ma dang 'od zer gyi tshul du gnas pa'o/_/thugs rje rang byung gi ye shes rang gsal chen po shes rab rang byung gi sgron ma'i rtags su 'od gsal gyi snang ba 'di dag ltos la mnyam par zhog cig_/de ni shes pa rang gsal snang stong 'dzin med du snang ba 'di rang yin no/_/de yang /_ngo bo'i rtags su skye med spros pa dang bral ba/_rang bzhin gyi rtags su 'od sna tshogs su gsal ba/_thugs rje'i rtags su shes pa gsal stong du 'char ba 'di kho na gdod ma'i mgon po kun bzang 'od mi 'gyur ba nyid snying dbus na sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs pa la bzhugs pa shes par gyis shig_/de yang /_klong gsal las/_rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud/_/mthong ba tsam gyis shes pa dang /_/shes pa tsam gyis rtogs pa dang*/_/rtogs pa tsam gyis grol bar 'gyur/_/zhes dang /_thal 'gyur las/_rang gi rang bzhin gshis kyi gnad/_/brjod pa'i tshig gis ma yin par/_/dbang po'i yul la gsal snang bas/_/gcer mthong grol ba'i bdag nyid do/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/'dir rig pa'i ye shes lnga tshan bdun gyi ngo sprod byed par spro na gser phreng las byung ba bzhin shes par bya'o/_/mdor na dbyings stong gsal 'dus ma byas pa ni shes rab kyi ngo bo ka nas dag pa khregs chod kyi don no/_/rig pa'i rang bzhin 'od gsal gyi snang ba ni thabs lhun grub kyi ngo bo snang stong 'du 'bral med pa yin te/_nor bu phra bkod las/_dbyings kyi rang bzhin shes rab sku/_/rig pa'i rang bzhin thabs kyi ska/_/'du 'bral med pa'i tshul du gnas/_/zhes pa dang /_de ltar snang ba de yang /_kun rdzob snang tshul 'jig pa'i chos su med de/_don dam 'dus ma byas pa chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i gnas lugs nyid yin te/_thal 'gyur las/_rig pa'i ngo bo lu gu rgyud/_/ 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar la/_/sus kyang byas pa ma yin pas/_/des na 'dus ma byas pa nyid/_/lu gu rgyud kyi rang bzhin no/_/rnam par rtog pa kun dag pas/_/ma 'khrul gzhi yi sangs rgyas so/_/mngon sum brten pa'i skal ldan la/_khams gsum 'khor ba'i ming med pas/_/srid gsum brdar chod pa 'o/_/zhes dang /_sgron ma snang byed las/_/_de ltar sna tshogs shar ba de/_/byas shing bsgoms pas byung ba min/_/ye nyid nas ni gzhir gnas pa'o/_/zhes gsungs pas/_ye nas ma byas shing rang byung rang shar sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa 'od gsal gyi dkyil 'khor zhal mthong ba yin pas sgom pa la brtson par gyis shig_/ces brjod do/_/ gnyis pa spro ba bsked pa ni/_'o_/rigs kyi bu/_'di ltar mthong ba 'di rang byung gi rig pa thig le nyag gcig chos nyid mngon sum gyi snang ba zhes bya ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bla ma yi dam DAk+ki thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du mjal ba zhes bya'o/_/sku gsum ye shes lnga mngon du gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/las dang bag chags sdig sgrib ma rig pa thams cad dag pa zhes bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa chos nyid du shar ba zhes bya'o/_/las dang skal ba ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/_/bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang dus gcig la thob pa zhes bya'o/_/ rig pa rtsal gyi dbang thob pa zhes bya'o/_/dus de ring nas sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang khyod la khyad par rdul tsam yang med do/_/_/zhes bsngags pa brjod la spro ba bskyed do/_/_/gsum pa rnal 'byoRa bzhis nyams su blang ba la/_lta sgom spyod 'bras bzhi las/_dang po ni/_'od gsal gyi ngo bo stong nyid/_rang bzhin gsal ba/_thugs rje 'gag med du 'char ba ni mnyam gzhag gi lta ba/_snang srid sna tshogs su snang ba 'di dag snang la rang bzhin med pa chu zla ltar rtogs pa ni rjes thob kyi lta ba'o/_/ gnyis pa ni/_lta ba de las ma g.yos pas mnyam gzhag tu gsal stong 'dzin pa med pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_rjes thob rmi lam sgyu ma lta bur nyams su len pa ni sgom pa'o/_/_/gsum pa ni/_bde sdug ci shar yang rang shar rang grol du shes shing /_dbang po'i rim pa dang 'tshams pa'i spyod pas lta sgom gyi bogs 'don pa ni spyod pa'o/_/bzhi pa ni/_goms pa klong du gyur pas snang stong 'od gsal gyi 'char tshul la dgag sgrub re dogs dang bral ba'i gnas lugs gdings su gyur pa ni 'bras bu'o/_/de dag gi don yang /_sgron ma snang byed las/_ri bo cog gzhag lta ba'i tshad/_/rgya mtsho cog gzhag sgom pa'i tshad/_/snang ba cog bzhag spyod pa'i tshad/_/rig pa cog gzhag 'bras bu'i tshad//tshad bzhi ldan pa'i rnal 'byor de/_/nges pa'i don la blo 'dres pa'o/_/ zhes gsungs pa'o/_/de ltar ngo sprad pas gnas skabs su chos nyid yid dpyod du ma lus par mngon sum du mthong zhing /_mthar thug mngon sum mthong ba'i gnad kyis tshe'i bar chod kyang rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing du 'tshang rgya bar 'gar ro/_/ gsum pa rjes snang nyams kyi 'char tshul bstan pa la gsum ste/_snang bzhi'i 'char sgo ngos bzung /_mtha' brten bzhi'i goms tshul bshad/ 'bras bu'i grol tshul bstan pa'o/_/dang po la bzhi ste/_klong gsal las/ snang bzhi'i 'char tshul ma shes na/_/sa zin med pa'i skyon nyid 'byung /_/snang ba bzhi ru shes par bya/_/zhes gsungs pas/_dang po chos nyid mngon sum gyi snang ba ni/_gong du bstan pa bzhin lus ngag yid kyi 'khrul 'khor dang /_sgo yul rlung rig gi gnad bzhis bcun pas/_rgyang zhags chu'i sgron ma las/ dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgron ma 'ja' gur ram/_rma bya'i mdongs lta bu'i nang du/_thig le stong pa'i sgron ma 'od zlum thig phran can shar ba'i dbus su rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud gsal la ma yengs par bcings te bltas pas gsal stong rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes lhag gis skyes pa'i ngang la mi g.yo bar bzhag pa'i shes pa gsal la dwangs pa ka dag lhun grub dbyer med kyi ngo bo shes rab rang byung gi sgron ma zhes bya ste gdod ma'i gzhi la da ltar gyi snang sems grol bar byed pa ste/_rig pa dbyings kyi ra bar tshud pas thig le sum 'brel gyi snang ba dbang po'i mngon sum du mthong ba tshun chad chos nyid mngon sum gyi snang ba'o/_/de yang cit+ta rin po che'i sbubs 'od lnga 'dus pa'i pho brang na/_gdod ma'i mgon po 'od mi 'gyur ba/_ngo bo stong pa/_rang bzhin gsal ba/[ · ]thugs rje rig pa'i snying po can nang gsal du bzhugs pa'i gdangs sku dang zhing khams tshad med pa'i snang ba la dbang 'byor pas 'og min chen por sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ste/_de yang /_dbyings kyi rtags su 'od khyim/_ye shes kyi rtags su thig le/_sku'i rtags su lu gu rgyud/_thugs rje'i rtags rang gsal/_/_ngo bo'i rtags mi rtog pa'i ye shes dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dgongs pa mnyam nyid gzhi rdzogs su gyur pa ste/_'das rjes las/_mngon sum gnad 'di sus mthong pa/_khams gsum ldog pa ma yin no/_zhes so/_/de ltar mthong bas gnas skabs chos nyid yid dpyod dang bral/_mthar thug gdod ma'i zad sar grol bar 'gyur ro/_/ gnyis pa nyams gong 'phel gyi snang ba ni/_shes nyams ni blo'i 'dzin cha yin pas mi brtan te/_klong gsal las/_blo ni kun rdzob yin par bshad/_/ces gsungs/_nang du rig pa grol ba'i lam rtags kyi snang nyams shar ba ni brtan cing mi bslu ba ste/_de yang gong bzhin nyams su blangs pas dbyings rig res gsal res mi gsal ba las/_rim gyi goms pas dbyings rig smin mtshams dang bral te dbang po'i mngon sum du gsal zhing /_dbyings snang 'od kyi rang bzhin de yang /_gyen sgreng /_rtsibs shar/_dra ba/_dra phyed/_pad+ma dang*/_mig mang ris/_nyi zla mkhar thabs lta bu sogs zhing khams thams cad gang ba'i bar du 'char zhing /_thig le yang /_sran ma tsam dang /_me long dang /_kham phor dang /_bse phub tsam gyi bar je che je che dang*/ rig pa lu gu rgyud kyang skar mda' 'phro ba tsam dang*/_'dab chags 'phur skyen pa dang /_ri dwags rtsibs la rgyug pa dang /_sha ra Na dal gyis rgyug pa dang /_bung ba bcud la 'khor ba lta bu'i bar je 'phel je gsal je brtan du gyur pa las/_thig le nang du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyed sku'am/ sku rkyang pa re tsam shar nas 'gul 'phrig med par shar ba ni/_nyams gong 'phel gyi snang ba ste/_klong gsal las/_sku shar nyams kyi 'phel rdzogs na/ bar do'i snang ba 'dir chod pas/_/longs spyod ngos zin bar do stongs/_/ zhes gsungs so/_/de la slob dpon bi ma la mi tra ni/_dbyings snang zlum 'khregs kyi nang du pad 'dab bzhi bzhis bskor ba lta bu'i tshom bu 'char ba tshun chad nyams gong 'phel gyi mthong snang du mdzad nas/_lha sku shar ba phan chad rig pa tshad phebs su bzhed na'ang /_'di ni slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i dgongs pa ste/_/_btags grol don khrid las/_dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgron ma rang gi smin mtshams las bral ba'i dus nas thig le'i nang du sems dpa'i sku rkyang pa re smin pa tshun chad nyams gong 'phel gyi snang ba'o/_/zhes gsungs so//de yang 'dir 'od snang gyen sgreng gi tshe mig thur dang /gru bzhi la g.yas/_zlum po la g.yon/_zla gam la steng dang /_gru gsum thur du bcun par yang bshad do/_/_/de ltar gong 'phel gyi snang ba mthong bas/_gnas skabs nyams snang gi yon tan rnams thob/_mthar thug bar do'i snang ba rang sar grol ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gsum pa rig pa tshad phebs kyi snang ba ni/_dbyings kyi snang bas thams cad la rgyas thebs pas sa chu me rlung gi snang ba rang dag ste/_'od gsal chen po'i snang ba 'byams klas pa'i dbyings/_thig le re re'i nang du yang rnam snang la sogs pa rigs kyi yab lnga dang /_dbyings phyug ma sogs rigs kyi yul lnga ste rigs lnga'i tshom bu lnga tshan gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa nam mkha' gang bar 'char zhing /_de dag las 'od zer gyi snang ba rang lus dang 'brel bar snang bas/_de nas ma bsgoms kyang tshad la phebs pas 'gyur ba med cing /_phyi'i snang ba 'od gsal du grol bas gdos bcas kyi snang ba nub/ nang sgyu lus 'od gsal du grol bas zag bcas kyi 'dzin pa dag_/gsang ba sems nyid 'od gsal du thim pas 'khrul pa'i snang ba nub pas las dang bag chags kyi 'brel chad pa ste/_klong gsal las/_rig pa tshad phebs snang ba yis/_/phyi nang bzung 'dzin gdos bcas grol/_/zhes so/_/de ltar tshad la phebs par gnas skabs su ma bsgoms kyang chog la/_mthar thug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ngos zin pas longs sku'i zhing na spyod par 'gyur ro/_/ bzhi pa chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba ni/_phyi nyams snang gi 'phel zad/ nang sgyu lus kyi chos zad/_gsang ba rtog tshogs kyi sems zad pas 'khrul pa'i snang ba thams cad rang dag pas snang dang mi snang du 'dzin pa'i blo zad nas 'od kyi nang na sor mo tsam snang ba las 'khor 'das kyi 'du shes bral/ snang ba ci'i ngo bor yang ma grub pas 'byung ba'i dgras mi tshugs/_'gro 'dug gi snang ba dag_/mngon shes la thogs pa med/_thugs rje'i cha las ye shes kyi snang ba ma 'gags par gsal zin pa'o/_/ gnyis pa nyams gong 'phel gyi rtags gsum ni/_lus skyes bu nad kyis gdungs ba ltar byi dor dang rgyan gyi sgeg chos bral/_ngag smyon pa ltar zungs med cal col du smra/_sems skyes bu rtsi dug gis thebs pa ltar 'khor bar mi lngog par thag chod pa'o/_/ gsum pa rig pa tshad phebs kyi rtags gsum ni/_lus glang po che 'dam du tshud pa skad cig la thon pa ltar 'byung ba lnga la thogs pa med par 'gro_/ ngag grul bum gyi phru gu ltar ci smras gzhan la phan cing dad par byed/sems skyes bu 'brum nad byang ba ltar khams gsum du mi ldog par gdengs thob pa'o/_/ bzhi pa chos nyid zad pa'i rtags gsum ni/_lus dur khrod kyi ro ltar gshed ma brgyas bskor kyang ya nga ba dang bag tsha ba med/_ngag brag cha ltar gtam gyi zungs zad de gzhan gyi rjes su zlo/_sems bar snang gi na bun skad cig la yal 'gro ba ltar bag chags kyi phung po mi snang bar 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/ gsum pa thob pa gsum gyi gzer gdab pa ni/_klong gsal las/_thob pa gsum gyi gzer btab pas/_zag bcas phung po mi snang ba'o/_/zhes pas/ dang po skye ba la rang dbang thob pa ni phung po'i snang ba 'gags nas gdos bcas su mi snang bas/_sems can gyi don byed na rang gi lag sor la rig pa gtad pas snang ba de kun rang log ste/_snang byed chu zla lta bus sems can gyi don byed pas mi sogs sems can la rig pa bcug na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'di nyid la 'byung ba rang sar dag nas 'tshang rgya ste/_de yang rig pa rang byung gi ye shes gzhi la gnas pa'i gnad kyis so/_/de'i tshe bems po la rig pa bcug kyang 'gul zhing skad 'byin nus pa 'ong ngo / gnyis pa 'jug pa la rang dbang thob pa ni/_sor mo la rig pa gtad nas rang lugs su bzhag pas de nyid la ni mi snang bar 'tshang rgya'o/_/ gsum pa rlung sems la rang dbang thob pa ni/_rlung sems las su rung bas rlung gi yon tan thams cad 'byung /_sems can gzhan tshe 'pho ba'i tshe de la rig pa bcug pas mtshams med lnga byas pa yang rang dang mnyam du 'tshang rgya ste las la bzang ngan med pa'i gnad kyis
