so/_/bems po la'ang thogs med zang thal du 'gro zhing mngon par shes pa thogs med du 'char ro/_/_/ bzhi pa gdings bzhis grol tshad bstan pa ni/_/_mu tig phreng ba las/ tshad ni gdings bzhi'i rnal 'byor nyid/_/ces pa dang /_rin chen spungs pa las mi 'gyur lta ba'i gdings chen bzhis/_/mi ldog ye shes tshad kyang bzung /_/zhes pas/_yar gyi gdengs gnyis ni/_dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan thos kyang thob tu re ba dang /_ma thob kyi dogs pa med de rang rig las gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas med par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/mar gyi gdings gnyis ni/_'gro drug gi sdug bsngal dang tshe tshad thos kyang 'khor bar mi lhung du re ba dang /_ltung gis dogs pa med de/_rang rig ye nas 'khrul pa med par shes pas 'khor bar 'khyams mkhan ma grub par thag chod pa'i phyir ro/_/de dag gi dgos pa ni/_gnas skabs su thad so'i don rnams 'grub cing /_mthar thug gong ma'i rtogs pa mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'o/_/de ltar yang /_klong gsal las/_mtha' rten dag gi man ngag gis/_/gong gi yon tan mtha' ru phyin/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar ro/_/ gsum pa 'bras bu'i grol tshul bstan pa la gnyis te/_thun mong dang khyad par gyi grol tshul lo/_/_/dang po ni/_ klong gsal las/_bden pa mthong ba'i gang zag gis/_/dang po'i sa nas bcu drug bar/_/rim par nyams su blangs pas 'byung /_/gzhan dang sgo bstun gnas skabs kyi/_/yon tan 'bras bu'i thob tshul lo/_/zhes pa ltar/_sa rnams rim gyis bgrod nas gdos bcas kyi phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa bor nas 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_snying gi me long las/_mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa ni 'od dang sgra dang sku dang gdung dang sa g.yo ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo /_/zhes gsungs pa ltar ro/_/ gnyis pa ni/_de nyid las/_yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni/ phung po lhag ma med par sangs rgyas pa'o/_/zhes pas/_nyon mongs pa phra rags dang*/_'byung lus kyi gdos pa thams cad dag nas ngo bo sku ru rgyas pas sku gsum 'du 'bral med/_rang bzhin mkhyen pa'i ye shes su rgyas pas ye shes 'du 'bral med/_thugs rje mdzad pa'i phrin las su rgyas pas thugs rje la rgyun chad med pa ste/_/_klong gsal las/_ngo bo stong gsal ye shes sku/_/rang bzhin thugs rje phyogs ris med/_/dbyer med chen por ye sangs rgyas/_/zhes dang /_mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i 'khor ba sangs/_/ye shes sku nyid don la rgyas/_/sangs rgyas zhes kyang de la bya/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar ro/_/sgyu 'phrul lam rim las/_lhag bcas lhag med ldog tu bshad pa ni/_rnam smin gyi lus rten bor nas zag med kyi sku 'grub pas 'byung lus kyi lhag ma med pa lhag med dang /_lhag bcas ni/_'byung lus zag med ye shes kyi sku gnas gyur pas 'byung lus kyi lhag ma dang bcas pas na de skad du grags pa'o/_/ don gnyis pa brtson 'grus 'bring bar dor 'tshang rgya ba'i man ngag la bzhi ste/_dang po bar do'i ngo bo ni/_gzhi dbyings ka dag las gzhan du snang thams cad bar do'i gnas skabs yin te/_gzhi snang ye shes su shar ba'i snang cha ni dag pa chos nyid kyi bar do dang /_'khrul snang 'gro drug gis bsdus pa'i chos so cog ni ma dag pa 'khrul pa'i bar do yin te/_de yang dbyings ka dag las shar zhing 'char gzhi'i dbyings su ma rdzogs bar gyi sems dpa' sa bon dang bcas pa ni bar do 'o/_/ gnyis pa dbye ba ni thal 'gyur las/_dbye na rnam pa bzhi dag las/_/ zhes gsungs pas/_skye 'chi 'am rang bzhin gyi bar do dang /_'chi kha'i bar do dang /_chos nyid gyi bar do dang /_srid pa'i bar do dang bzhi'o/_/_dang po ni/ ma'i mngal du skye ba grub pa nas 'chi nad kyis btab pa tshun chad do/_/gnyis pa ni/_'chi ba la phyogs pa nas nang dbugs chad pa tshun chad do/_/ gsum pa ni/_nang dbugs chad de 'od gsal gyi snang ba shar nas lhun grub kyi snang ba thim pa tshun chad do/_bzhi pa ni/_lhun grub kyi snang ba thim nas phyi ma'i skye srid grub pa tshun chad do/_/ gsum pa so so'i lam khyer ni/_dpe don gnyis kyis ston pa ste/dpe skye gnas kyi bar do la sgro 'dogs chod pa rgya khra tshang du 'jug pa lta bu/don bla ma dam pa la bsten nas/_/_des bstan pa'i gdams ngag gi don thos bsam sgom pas nan tan lhur byas te sgro 'dogs chod par bya'o//de bzhin du/_'chi kha'i bar do la gsal gdab pa sgeg mo me long la lta ba lta bu ni sngar goms pa'i gdams pa rnams skabs 'dir blo la gsal thebs pa'o/_/ chos nyid kyi bar dor rang snang la yid ches pa ma pang du bu 'jug pa lta bu ni/ gdams ngag gi don nyams 'og tu chud pas chos nyid kyi snang cha ji ltar shar yang 'jigs pa med par rang snang ye shes kyi rol par gdings chud pa'o/_/ srid pa'i bar do la las kyi 'phro mthud pa yur ba rkong chad pa la wa 'dzugs pa lta bu ni/_'khrul snang 'jigs skrag ji ltar shar yang sngar goms pa dang 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gdams pa'i gnad kyis dag pa'i skye srid lam du 'jug pa'o/_/de dag kyang dbang po'i rim pas grol tshad kyang mu gsum du gsungs pa ste rgyas par gzhan du bshad pa las shes par bya'o/ don gsum pa brtson 'grus tha ma rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing du dbugs dbyung ste 'tshang rgya ba'i man ngag ni/_rang shar las/_bden pa mthong ba'i gang zag ni/_/rtogs pa rgyud la ma skyes kyang /_/phyogs bcu sprul pa'i zhing rnams su/_/gnas nas mthar phyin grol bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pas/ 'dir mngon sum gyi don mthong yang brtan pa ma thob par sgom pa 'phro can du gyur te bar do'i grol tshad dang mi ldan pa rnams chos nyid kyi bar do shar yang ngos ma zin par srid pa'i bar do rmi lam gyi 'khrul ngo tsam du shar ba las/_chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs dang /_rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i thugs rjes rmi lam sad pa'i cha tsam la mngon par dga' ba la sogs pa dag pa'i zhing du skye ba blangs nas/_/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhal mthong / gsung thos dbang bskur ba dang lung nod/_dbugs 'byung ba thob pas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol te gdod ma'i zhing la skad cig gis grol ba thob/_/_nang gsal sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs pa dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin du phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rgya mtshor longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i zla ba la chu zla ltar 'gro ba'i don 'khor ba ji srid pa de srid du mdzad pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang dpag bsam gyi shing ltar 'bad med lhun grub tu 'byung zhing rgyun mi chad pa yin no/_/ bzhi pa smon lam gyi 'jug bsdu la brten nas rtsis che ba'i bka' rgyas btab pa ni/_/_'das rjes don khrid las/yang gsang snying thig mngon sum man ngag 'di/_/gang gis reg pa myang 'das dngos la sbyor/_/theg brgyad a ti thig le skor gsum gyis/_/'di nyid don la reg pa ma yin no/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar 'di lta bu'i gdams pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu dbang gi rgyal po bas kyang ches shin tu dkon pas/_skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma thun mong ma yin pa dag la shin tu gsang ba'i bka' rgya dang bcas te spel zhing /_des kyang nyams len la goms 'dris gdings su gyur nas gzhan phan gyi phrin las skyo ngal med cing spro bas sgrub par gyis shig_/ces dam tshig gi bka' rgya dang srung ma la gnyer du bcol nas rtsis kyi rgyas gdab par bya'o/_/bskyed rdzogs kyi lam yongs rdzogs smin slob tu 'khrid par 'dod na/_thog mar sngon 'gro rnams kyis rgyud sbyangs nas/_bum dbang bskur te rigs lnga phyi nang gi sgrub pa'i bskyed rim rnams ston/_de nas gsang dbang bskur te gtum mo'i lam rnams ston/_de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur te pho nya'i de nas tshig dbang bskur te ka dag khregs chod kyi lam rnams ston/ rnams ston/_de nas rig pa'i rtsal dbang bskur te thod rgal gyi lam rnams rim bzhin ston/_yang na dbang lnga ka gcig tu rdzogs par bskur nas bskyed rdzogs kyi khrid rnams sngar gyi rim pa bzhin 'chad/_gang gi tshe yang lam de dang 'brel ba'i gzhung phran rgyab chos dang bcas pa rnams so so'i skabs su 'brel sdebs te bskyed rdzogs kyi 'gros gcig tu dril nas 'chad par 'dod na gter gzhung gi man ngag rtsa ba rnams dang /_dgongs 'grel yang thig yid bzhin nor bu'i legs par bshad pa rnams kyi zab don rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i phyag bzhes smar khrid kyi dbye bsdu'i gnas rnams la 'dris par bya'o/_/rgyal ba kun gyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam/_/zab rgyas chos kyi snying po a ti zhes/_/grub mchog bye ba'i gshegs shul man ngag gi_/mchog gsang rtse mo mkha' 'gro snying thig nyid/_/dgongs pa brda dang snyan brgyud zab mo'i lam/_/_/mtshon byed yi ges mtshon bya rang byung gi_/_/ye shes byin rlabs gtad rgyas skad cig la/_/'grub byed zab gter gsang ba bla na med/_/gang gis zab don rtogs dka' gsang ba'i gnas/_/'phags mchog kho na'i ye shes spyod yul las/_/blo rmongs so skye'i rtog pas mtshon min yang /_/skal mnyam 'gro la phan par srid na snyam/_/de phyir rig 'dzin DAk+ki'i thugs kyi mtshor/_/sbas pa'i zab don yid bzhin dbang gi rgyal/_/cha tsam mtshon pa'i snang ba phra mos kyang*/_/thar 'dod yid kyi re ba skong min nam/_khyad par gsang mchog mkha' 'gro'i snying thig gi_/zab lam gsal byed rin chen sgron me 'dis/_/rnam grol sku gsum zhing khams mtshon nas der/_/'gro kun myur bder 'khrid pa nyid gyur cig_/de las 'gro 'di'i rang rgyud ka*dag*gi_/gnas lugs nang gsal gzhon nu bum sku'i gdangs/_/ lhun grub snang bzhi chos zad 'bras bu'i rtser/_khams gsum 'od sku grol ba'i bkra shis shog_/ces rdzogs pa chen po mkha' 'gro snying thig gi khrid yig zab lam gsal byed ces bya ba 'di ni/_gsang chen rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa me rag chos rje pad+ma phrin las dbang phyug gis gser gyi me tog dang bcas pa'i gsung gis ring mo nas bskul ba dang*/_nye bar lam 'di la smon lam gyi mthu grub pa'i dad 'dun blo gros kyi nor ldan rin chen bkra shis kyis phul du byung ba'i skyes kyi maN+Dal dang bcas te nan tan chen po'i gsung gis bskul ba don yod par bya ba'i ched du/_bka' gsang rdzogs pa chen po la mos pa lam du byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'gyur med rdo rjes o rgyan smin gling gi dge gnas su sbyar ba'o//_// !_ngo bo ka dag chos sku'i gshis/_/rang bzhin lhun grub longs sku'i gdangs/_/thugs rje ma 'gags sprul sku'i rtsal/_/gzhi rgyud snying po'i gnas lugs nyid/_1_khregs chod rig stong rjen pa'i mkhar/_/thod rgal snang bzhi'i sprin chen gtibs/_/zung 'jug mchog gsang rdzogs pa che/_/lam rgyud yongs kyi mthar thug phyir/_2_/kun bzang pad+ma byung gnas kyi/_/zhal lung mi shigs nA da'i dbyangs/_/'ja' lus rdo rjer myur 'gro'i lam/_/skal ldan skyes bu'i nyams len dpyid/_3_/bla med mkha' 'gro snying tig gi_khrid yig zab lam gsal byed gzhung /_/gdams ngag rgya mtsho'i spyi phud 'di/ khyad 'phags srid na 'gran zla bral/_4_/gzhi la lam gyis mtshams sbyar nas/_/_/stong chen dag pa gnyis ldan dbyings/_/sku dang ye shes mnga' thang can/_/'bras rgyud go 'phang mngon du byed/_5_/de phyir bla ma'i zhal lung ltar/_/rgyal yum rnal 'byor sems ma che/_/chos dbyings bzang mo'i thugs bskyed las/_/_/chos sbyin 'phel ba'i 'phrul 'di byung /_6_/rab dkaRa dge 'dis 'brel bcas kyi/_/mkha' mnyam yid can ma lus kun/_/myur du kun bzang rgyal khab cher/_/gtan srid zin pa'i rgyur gyur cig_7_/ces pa'ang sa skyong dbang mo mchog gi chab 'bangs su skyes shing /_theg pa chen po'i lam zhugs rgyal sras 'jam dbyangs chos kyi nyi ma blo gros rgyas pa'i sde'am/_grub dbang rig pa 'dzin pa'i rjes 'jug theg rtse shin tu rnal 'byor gyi sngags 'chang rdo rje mchog rab rtsal gyis smras pa sarba dA ka l+yA NaM b+ha ba tu//_// @#/_/kashuras+yab+hAd+hAkinitsit+tatilakasarngetAMbyany+dzanAsti//_//

[6.36 mkha’ ’gro snying thig par du sgrubs tshul gyi dkar chag nyin mo’i snang ba]

@#/_/mkha' 'gro snying thig par du bsgrubs tshul gyi dkar chag nyin mo'i snang ba bzhugs so/_/ @#/_/na mo pad+ma_ka_rA_ya/_yas+yasA_b+ha_wA_tsA_kU_Ta_sgra_sat+thu_khA_k+Sha_ra_d+ha rmA_NAM_kAya/_/ gang gi rang bzhin mkha' ltar rnam dag 'gyur ba kun spangs gtsang rtag bde dam chos kyi sku//_// @#/_/bai_kA_ra_sa_p+tAH_ng+ga_no_ru_d+d+ha_bI_pra_kA_ma_ni_rA_b+ho_gaM_kA_ya/_/ 'gags med rnam 'gyur nyi dang zer bzhin kha sbyor yan lag bdun ldan longs spyod rdzogs sku'i dpal//_// @#/_/shre_Ni_rdza_nU_d+d+he_na_lo_kA_hi_te_rba_hwa_sti_hi_ni_rmA_NaM_kA_ya/_/ 'gro blo'i rdzing bur brgya phrag gzugs brnyan bzo skye mchog gi sprul sku'i rol pa mtha' klas can//_// @#/_/dzi_k+sa_rba_sA_d+ha_twa_pad+hA_ka_re_:_shu_b+ha_n+tu_sha_ra_N+yaM_d+hA_re_Shu_/ rgyal kun spyi gzugs pad+ma 'byung gnas tshe rabs gtan gyi skyabs su bsten no shis par skyongs//_// 'gro kun ye nas bde gshegs snying po khyab par gdal gzhi kun brtags 'khor ba'i rnam pa can/_/bag chags stug po'i gzhan dbang la 'chel kun rdzob bden don brtan g.yor snang kun rim gnyis kyi/_/lam la rab goms yongs grub don dam bden dngos lha yi phyag rgyar 'bras bu'i tshul shar ba/_/kun bzang yab yum rdo rje sems dpa' zhi khro rab 'byams yi dam dkyil 'khor tshogs la gus/_/gsang chen theg mchog sprin gyi bla re ni/_/snang bzhi'i lam gyi chu khur lci ba'i 'dzum/_/sku bzhi'i gru char 'jo ba'i glu dbang gzugs/_/dga' rab rdo rje bstan 'gro'i dpal du shar/_/gdos bcas sgyu lus zag med dwangs ma'i skur/_/yongs smin shrI seng dz+nya na sU tra dang*/_/bi ma la sogs dgongs brda' snyan brgyud kyi/_/drug ldan rgya bod rig 'dzin tshogs kun rgyal/_/gangs can mun ljongs phan bde'i zla snang gis/_/ dkar por bsgyur mdzad mkhan slob chos gsum dang*/_/lo paN skye 'phags byang sems grub rigs tshogs/_/sku drin dran pas dad spro'i gus phyag brtsegs/_khyad par theg rtse'i chos kyi nyin mor byed/_/yid dpyod nam mkha'i glang pos sma dbab pa/_/_/nyams myong rtogs pa'i rlung gzhon gyis bskrad pas/_/grub pa'i nyi gzhon gsar ngoms klong chen pa/_/gzhan yang tshe gcig grol byed bsam 'phel nor/_/yid bzhin mching bur 'gram chu mi ldang bar/_/pha rjes bus slebs snga 'gyur bstan pa'i srol/_/'dzin kun rgyal bstan mdzes pa'i rgyan tu bsngags/_/rgyal bstan nor 'dzin bu mo snying stobs can/_/rnam dpyod phrag par khyer ba'i lhag ma can/_/gna' bo'i chos rgyal mes dbon spyod tshul la/_/'gran nus sa skyong sde dge las gzhan su/_/ de phyir rgyal rabs nyin mor byed pa'i gzis/_/mdo sngags bstan pa'i pad tshal par gyi 'phrul/_/du mar phyes pa'i chos char gshin po yis/_/'gro rgyud sku bzhi'i sa bon smin 'di mtshar/_/de ltar mchod par brjod pa cung zad sngon du btang nas 'dir gleng bar bya ba ni/_spyir rgyal bas gdul 'gro'i khams dbang bsam pa dang mthun pa'i chos ji snyed cig gsungs pa de kun lung rtogs kyi bstan pa gnyis su 'dus pa las rtogs pa dam pa'i chos ni brjod bya yin/_de rjod byed lung gi chos la dbye sgo mang yang rgya ma las kyi lung dang /_ye shes lha yi lung /_bya bral rdzogs pa'i lung gsum du phyes na dang po blo dman rnams la dgongs/_phyi ma gnyis dbang po 'bring dang / mchog gi don tu gsungs pa'i mchog de la yang bskyed rdzogs gnyis med gsum las 'dir phyi ma ste/_spyir rgya gar 'phags pa'i yul du bdag cag gi ston pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams kyi sde snod gsum la nyams len gtso bor mdzad pas mdo ltar grags che zhing /_sngags ni skal ldan dbang po yang rab rnams kyis gsang nas nyams su len pas slar grub pa thob nas gdul bya rjes su 'dzin nus pa 'di sngags 'chang rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhig gi zhes yongs grags su brjod pa zhig yin/_khyad par rdzogs pa chen po'i chos skor rnams*ni*shin tu*bka'*gnyan*pas skal ba ldan pa re zung las phal cher gyis spyod yul du ma gyur/_bod gangs can ljongs 'dir mkhan slob chos gsum gdan 'dzom pas mdo sngags gnyis ka rgyas che zhing /_khyad par rje 'bangs nyer lnga sogs sngags la grub rtags thon pa yang mang /_de tshul rgyun ma chad pa la gsang sngags gsar rnying zhes lo tsA bas 'gyur snga phyi'i ming tsam gyi dbye gzhi mang po byung zhing /_rnying ma la'ang bka' gter dag snang sogs kyi brgyud pa'i zam ma chad pa'i snyan brgyud tshad ma bzhi ldan stsal yod pa las/ paN+Di ta chen po bi ma mi tra dang /_lo tsA ba ska ba dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur zhing /_/_phyi rabs kyi don du dbu ru zhwa'i lha khang du gter du sbas pa gnas brtan ldang ma lhun rgyal gyis bton pa'i bi ma snying thig dang*/_o rgyan gyi slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis rdzogs pa chen po'i gnad rnams mkha' 'gro snying thig tu dril nas brag dkar te sgro mkha' 'gro'i tshogs khang du DAk+ki'i gtso mo ye shes mtsho rgyal la gnang ba dang mchims phur lha lcam pad+ma gsal la smon lam gtad rgya dang bcas gter du sbas par lha lcam gyi rnam sprul pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis dwags po dang lung khra mo brag nas gton pa gnyis snying thig ma gnyis su grags pa dang /_snga ma'i don snying por dril ba bla ma yang tig dang /_rjes ma rgyas par bkral ba mkha' 'gro yang tig dang /_bi ma snying thig ma bu zung gi don gsal bar bkod pa zab mo yang tig bcas glegs bam che ba lngar longs par bzhugs pa ni mdo sngags chos tshul kun gyi snying po'i bcud dam pa spyir theg pa thams cad lam bden kho na yin yang / rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga ni de thams cad kyi rtse mor phyin pas ye shes bcar phog tu ngos 'phrod phyir lam bden gyi re dogs sangs pa'i 'bras bu dngos yin phyir 'jam mgon sa skya paN chen gyis kyang /_a ti yo ga'i lta ba ni/_/ye shes yin gyi theg pa min/_zhes gsungs/_spyir sngags phyogs thams cad mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs la gnyer du gtad pa shas che zhing rgyas pa'i mthun 'gyur yang zhing sngags lhan skyes kyi mkha' 'gro mas mdzad phyir rgyal khab 'di'i mnga' 'og tu yang dar rgyas che zhing nyams su len pas snga phyir grub pa thob pa yang rgyun ma chad tsam deng sang gi bar du byung ba bcas/_snga ma sa skyong chos kyi rgyal po sde dge bla ma mkhas dang grub pa'i bdag nyid shes bya'i rtsal chen rdzogs pa byams pa kun dga' sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan srid skyong gi khrir phebs pa'i skabs bstan 'gro'i phan bde spel ba dang chab srid mnga' thang rgyas shing /_sku tshe gdung brgyud bcas gong 'phel 'byung ba'i ched du/_tshe dbang lha mos snying thig ma bu gser bris mdzad pa dang /_par du bskrun pa'i bla ma yang tig dang mkha' 'gro yang tig bcas grub 'dug shing /_de'i 'phro mthud ni/_ji skad du/_skyes rabs dpag bsam 'khri shing las/_gang phyir srog chags thams cad kyi/_/skye ba sngar goms bag chags ni/_/rgyun du dga' ba'i skud pa yis/_/rtags par brtsems 'di med mi 'gyur/_zhes gsungs pa bzhin sa skyong chos kyi rgyal po'i lha sras dam tshig rdo rje 'am 'jigs med kun dga' che mchog phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes grags pas skye bar rgyal bstan rin po cher skyes sbyangs kyi shes rab la mthu phul byung thob pa'i rang rtags 'dir yang gsal bas mkha' 'gro snying thig 'di nyid par du bsgrubs par gnang ba ste/_de yang spyir gong smos ltar chos rgyal khri srong gi thugs bskyed dang sngon smon dus su babs pas o Di yA na'i slob dpon chen po ljongs 'dir gdan phebs shing bstan pa snga daRa la gsang sngags bod 'dir rgyas pa tsam rgya gar 'phags pa'i yul du'ang ma byung zhes jo bo rje dpal ldan a ti shas gsungs bzhin la/_khyad par rdzogs pa chen po ni/_pad 'byung dang bi ma la/_lo chen be+e ro chos rgyal sogs kyi thugs kyi nying khu khyad par du 'phags pas 'phags yul du ma zad bod ljongs 'dir yang phung po 'od skur yal ba mang zhing /_sa dge dkar 'brug sogs kyi skyes chen grub pa'i sar bzhugs pa du ma zhig gis kyang ming gi khyad par tsam las dngos dang brgyud nas nyams bzhes mdzad so'i rnam thar du 'byung gshis mkhyen rab kyi bdag nyid rnams nas dgongs mnga' ltar lags shing /_chos 'di rgyas pa'i mthun rkyen chos bdag gter ston pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyi skye ba de ma thag pa rgyal ba'i dbang po klong chen rab 'byams bzang pos mdzad de/_de rgyun ma nyams pa/_byang ba yab sras dang*/_kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i dbang po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho/_rdo rje brag zhabs drung gong 'og smin gling gter chen sku mched/_bai ro'i rnam 'phrul kun mkhyen shes rab 'od zer sogs kyis grub mtha' rkang tshugs kyi nyams bzhes dang 'chad spel rgya cheRa gnang zhing /_khams phyogs 'dir yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag kaHthog pa dam gtsang byams gsum sogs nas deng gi bar gdan rab slob rgyun bcas dang /_khyad par grub pa'i dbang phyug khams rdzogs chen pa zhes chos ming gang zag la thogs pa skye phreng rim byon/_thugs sras nyi zla skar gsum sogs kyis rdzogs pa chen po'i ring lugs rgya cher spel zhing rgyun mi nyams par dbang lung man ngag thams cad bum pa gang byo'i tshul du bla mas slob ma rjes su 'dzin nus par bzhugs bzhin pa 'di'o/_/de lta bu'i gdams pa khyad par du 'phags pa mkha' 'gro snying thig tu grags pa 'dir spyir them byang la ji ltar 'khod pa de las ma 'das kyang 'dir par yig so soRa 'tshol bde ba dang chos tshan ji ltar bzhugs tshul shes sla ba sogs kyi ched du dpe tshan ka thor bsgrigs na bkod pa la/_ka par mkha' 'gro snying thig gi kha byang /_kha par bla ma brgyud pa'i lo rgyus/_ga par btags grol rgyud drug_/nga par btags grol rgyud drug gi ti ka la/_/_ca bar mkha' 'gro snying thig gi lo rgyus/_cha par btags grol snying po'i rgyud dri med snying po'i Tika gsal ba'i sgron me/_ja par sangs rgyas kyi 'das rjes gsum pa/_nya par btags grol don khrid/ ta par bde gshegs rigs lnga'i phyi sgrub dang nang sgrub/_tha par smin byed don gsal sgron me/_da par dbang khrid nor bu sgron gsal/_na par dbang gong ma gsum gyi sa ma 'grel/_pa par Dak+ki lnga'i mngon rtogs dbang gi rgyab yig_/ pha par rigs lnga'i mchod 'bul/_ba par mkha' 'gro'i las byang rtsar phreng / ma par dbang sgrub dang bum sgrub dkyil 'khor rnam dag bcas/_tsa par dbang don gsal ba'i rgyab yig_/tsha par dbang bzhi'i go rim dang khrid du bskur lugs/_dza par ti ka rig pa'i sgron ma/_wa par thod rgal dbang lnga/ zha par DAk+ki'i gtor ma'i rim pa/_za par DAk+ki'i tshogs mchod/_'a par dbang gi rgyab yig_/ya par dbang gi tho yig_/ra par gsang dbang lhan thabs/_la par sher dbang lhan thabs/_sha par DAk+ki'i srog tig_/sa par DAk+ki'i dus gnad dang gnad 'bebs shis bla rdo bcas/_ha par nor sgrub gter gyi bum pa/_a par thog rgal don khrid/_ki par snying po gsal ba'i me long khrid/[ · ]ku par khrid rgyab lung phreng /_ke par lag khrid gnad kyi man ngag_/ko par rtags yig tshad yig_khi par snying thig chen mo'i rtsa ba/_khu par snying thig gsang ba'i yang bcud me long /_khe par lta ba'i rnal 'byor/_kho par sgom pa'i rnal 'byor/_gi par spyod pa'i dang 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor/_gu par zhus len bdud rtsi gser phreng /_ge par zhal gdams gsang dam/_go par gnad gdams lnga pa/_ngi par DAk+ki'i lam 'bras skor/_ngu par zhal gdams gnad 'phreng /_nge par DAk+ki'i gnad thig_/ngo par rdo rje chu 'thung / ci par zhi ba bar do/_lam gyi mtshan nyid/_cu par khro bo bar do gnad sgron/ ce par bar do 'byung 'dus rtags rim/_co par 'chi kha bar do'i gnad du ma dang chos nyid bar do'i yon tan/_chi par gtum mo khyad par can/_chu par rdo'i bcud len/_che par srog len spu gri'i rgyud/_cho par srog sgrub nag mo'i sgrub thabs/_ji par bla ma'i rnal 'byor/_ju par bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi phyi nang gsang gsum/_je par khregs chod ngo sprod mtha' grol klong yangs/_jo par rtsal dbang /_nyi par thig le dwangs snyigs 'byed pa dang rigs brgyud bzhag thabs/_nyu par bar do'i ngo sprod dang mngon gsum ngo sprod/_nye par bar do'i mtshan nyid bshad pa dang skye gnas rnams kyi rgyu bstan pa/_nyo par btags grol phran drug gi ti ka_/ti par rta mgrin lus dkyil/_tu par DAk+ki'i rkyang sgrub/_te par mkha' 'gro sngags kyi lde mig_/to par bdud rtsi phyag mchod/_thi par rtags tshad yi ge_/thu par DAk+ki'i dril sgrub gsang ba snying dum/_the par DAk+ki'i lus dkyil chen mo/_/tho par pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyi skyes rabs dang lung bstan/_di par gter gyi kha byang dang lung bstan/_du par snying gi lag 'grig_/de ngar lo rgyus rgyal ba g.yung gis mdzad pa/_do par g.yung ston gsung phyag 'tshal sogs/_ni par g.yung gi lo rgyus/_nu par 'pho ba/_ne par ldang lha'i sgrub thabs/_no par gsol 'debs/_pi par brgyud 'dzin slob bu lung bstan/_pu par lha mo lnga'i tshe sgrub/_pe par sprul sku legs pa'i lung bstan/_po par srog sgrub nag mo'i gtor dbang /_phi par mkha' 'gro yang tig gi dbang bskur ba'i lag len dang mkha' 'gro snying gi dkyil 'khor bri tshul/_phu par lo rgyus rin po che'i phreng ba/_de lta bu'i chos tshul yid bzhin nor bu 'di dag par du bzhengs pa'i bya ba la brtson pa ni phan yon che ste/_ston pas/_dam chos 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi nan tan tu/_/bskal pa bye bar brjod mod kyang /_/mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur ma lags/_/zhes gsungs/_de lta bu'i dge ba rdzogs byang du bsngo ba ni/_swa sti shri yAm sid+d+hin+d+ha ba tu/_gdod nas byang chub snying por mdza' ba'i gtam/_/srid zhi'i bla na grags pa'i dbyar gyi dus/_/thar pa'i gru char bskul ba'i sprin phung ni/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi klu dbang kho nar ba'i/_1_/ the tshom mun pas rab btang shes rab spyan/_/chos kun gnas lugs rtogs pa'i thabs la mkhas/_/sngon byon rgya bod paN grub gshegs pa'i shul/_/ lam bzang 'di la gces spras cis mi byed/_2_/srid 'dir snang ba ster ba mang mod kyis/_/snang ba'i mdzod la 'gran min theg tshul kun/_/ma hA san+nir gzhal tshe gnas skabs kyi/_/grol ba tsam las dngos la reg pa nyung /_3_/ de phyir 'gro rgyud lcags khams man ngag sde'i/_/'gyur rtsis sa le sbram gyi rang gzugs ngom/_/gzhi 'bras lto 'byor grub pa'i ming snyan tsam/_/ma yin rang lus dwangs mar 'gyur 'di dran/_4_/da lta'i lam bzang bsam 'phel dbang gi rgyal/_/_/par gyi 'du byed rgyal mtshan tog tu bkur/_/dbang rnon chos rjes 'brang la don gnyis kyi/_/dngos grub char du 'bebs la som nyi ci/_5_/lung rtogs chos tshul rin chen brtsegs pa'i ngos/_/_/snying po 'bod sgrogs mkhyen pa'i shes pa can/_/ha nu man+tha sa ma ya badzra/_/gzur gnas dga' bskyed dpal du dus 'dir byung /_6_/rgyu 'dis 'gro sems rmu rgod ma dul rta/_/zhi gnas bres su rab bcug lhag mthong 'gros/_/thar pa'i grong du myur bar phyin pa'i stobs/_/sa lam bsgrod pa'i grogs su khug par shog_7/ sgyu 'phrul sras po'i chos kyi nyi ma'i 'od/_/so so'i blo gros bug par drangs po kun/_/tha dad ming gis phyes pa'i grub mtha'i s+dzong /_/zhig gnas snang ba rgya chen thob par shog_8_/srid pa'i stobs 'byor nyi tsher mi zhen par/_/ lugs brgya'i rnam dpyod mkha' ltar rab tu yangs/_khyad par theg mchog snying po bla nas blar/_/'degs byed sa skyong chos srid 'phel gyur cig_9_/ mdo sngags bstan pa'i pad tshal 'byed pa la/_/'chad rtsod rtsom pa'i 'od brgya sbyin pa'i nyi/_/bstan 'dzin skyes bu bstan 'gro'i lha lam la/_/ji srid bskal brgyar mi nub 'char gyur cig_10_/bri brko mthun sbyor chos 'dir 'brel thob dang /_/dpyad pa gsum gyis zhus dag bgyis pa sogs/_/lam mkha' 'gro snying thig par du sgrubs tshul gyi dkar chag nyin mo'i snang ba/ bzang 'di 'bras yid smon ma yin par/_/lag tu thob pa'i rtse dgas dus 'das shog_11_/'jig rten khams 'dir lnga brgya'i rgud pa zhi/_/bde skyid rdzogs ldan gsar pa'i ya mtshan ngom/_/chos rgyal yab sras thugs bzhed bsam dgu 'grub/_/bkra shis dge mtshan g.yang du 'bod par shog_12_/ mdor na dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang*/_/chos dbyings rang bzhin 'gyur med don dam pa'i/_/gnas lugs bslu ba med dges smon pa bzhin/_/rab tu grub ste bstan 'gro'i gsos su shog_13_/ces rdzogs pa chen po mkha' 'gro snying thig 'di nyid sa chen chos bzhin skyong ba'i mnga' bdag lha sras rin po che nas thugs bskyed rgya ches par du bzhengs par gnang ba'i tshe/_zhus dag dang dkar chag zhabs phyi sgrub dgos bka' stsal gser gyi cod pan spyi bor phebs bzhin snga 'gyur bstan pa'i rjes su zhugs lo tsam gyi gyi na ba 'jigs med blo gsal 'od zer du bod pas rang gnas zhe chen bstan gnyis dar rgyas gling gi chos sde'i gral gyi gshag chung du spel ba sarba mang+ga lam//_//

[6.37 zab chos mkha’ ’gro yang tig gi pusta ka par du bsgrubs tshul dkar chag nyung ngu Utpal’i phreng ba]

@#/_/zab chos mkha' 'gro yang tig gi pusta ka par du bsgrubs tshul dkar chag nyung ngu ut+pala'i phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs/ oM swa sti sin+naM/_bgrang yas sras bcas rgyal kun mkhyen nus brtse/_/ gsang gsum yon tan phung po cig car du/_/mtsho dbus pad sbubs snying por smin pa'i dpyid/_/mtsho skyes rdo rje 'gro ba'i bla mar 'dud/_/rgyal sras bye bas bsdu bar ma nus pa'i/_/sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i gsang chen bka'i bsdu mdzad/_/mkha' spyod bde chen DAk+ki yongs kyi gtso/_/ma gcig ye shes mtsho rgyal der phyag 'tshal/_/gzhung lugs 'bum phrag yangs pa'i nam mkha' la/_/thog med spyod pa'i blo gros 'od stong can/_/snying tig bstan pa'i pad tshal bzhad pa'i gnyen/_/kun mkhyen dri med 'od zer bsam gyin gus/_/ gang gi mkhyen dpyod yangs pa'i gru gzings kyis/_/rgyal ba'i chos tshul rgya mtsho brgal ba las/_/nye bar thob pa'i yang tig yid bzhin nor/_/_zab chos rin chen 'di mtshungs gzhan yod min/_/de phyir chos kyi ded dpon klong chen pas/_/legs bshad byi dor gyis gtsang pusta kar/_/chos tshan bzhugs grangs dkar chag ut+pal phreng /_/_/dpyod ldan mgrin pa'i rgyan du 'di na spel/_/ces mchod par brjod pa cung zad kyis mdun bsus nas/_'dir rgyal ba gnyis pa o rgyan dus gsum mkhyen pa'i thugs bcud zab chos mkha' 'gro snying tig las 'jam mgon klong chen pas zab mo'i gnad rnams legs par bkral ba'i dgongs gter bstan bcos mkha' 'gro yang tig tu grags pa'i zab chos kyi pustakaH_'di nyid par du bsgrubs pa'i tshul las brtsam ste lo rgyus gleng ba cung zad gcig brjod na/_'di la gsum te gang las byung ba'i lo rgyus/_bar du bsgrubs pa'i tshul/_chos tshan bzhugs byang yongs bsngo dang bcas pa las/_dang po ni/_rgyal ba kun gyi 'phrin las pa o rgyan dus gsum mkhyen pa de nyid kyis 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu bstan 'gro'i phan bde spel ba'i 'phrin las ni mtha' yas la/_khyad par du gangs can bod kyi yul 'dir lha 'dre gdug pa can thams cad dam la btags shing bsam yas la sogs pa'i gtsug lag khang mang poRa rab tu gnas par mdzad pa dang*/_mdo sngags kyi chos mang po bsgyur nas rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che nyi ma shar ba ltar mdzad pas/_bod yul 'dir rgyal ba'i phrin las 'dren pa'i shing rta gcig pu pa ste ljongs 'dir thub bstan thog mar snang bar gyur pa ni slob dpon rin po che 'di kho na'i bka' drin las gzhan du ma dmigs so/_/gzhan yang bod yul mtha' dbus med par sa gzhi rta mig gang yan chad zhabs kyis bcags shing bkra shis par mdzad/_ri brag mang po sgrub pa'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs nas zab mo'i gter kha bsam gyis mi khyab pa sba bar mdzad de/_de lta bu'i o rgyan dus gsum mkhyen pa de nyid gzhu stod gter sgrom brag na bzhugs pa'i dus su mkha' 'gro snying tig gi chos skor rnams bka' rgya bkrol nas ye shes mtsho rgyal dang mkha' 'gro ma 'bum phrag gcig la dbang bskur nas rgya chen spel ba'i tshe/_rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan gyis mchims phur spyan drangs nas tshogs 'khor brgya rtsa mdzad pa'i dus su rgyal po'i sras mo lha lcam pad+ma gsal grong pas/_mo'i ro la slob dpon gyis rnam shes bkugs pas smra zhing 'gro nus par byung ba'i tshe dbang bskur zhing gdams pa'i be bum spyi bor bzhag nas bka' gtad mdzad cing mo rang gi chos skal du dwags po'i dang lung khra mo brag la gter du sbas so//de nas lnga bcu kha ral gyi dus su sba sgang_ pa sprul sku rin chen tshul khrims rdo rje zhes par sku 'khrungs shing /_khra mo brag nas mkha' 'gro snying tig gi chos skor rnams spyan drangs kyang /_/_gter ston nyid rten 'brel gzhan dbang du gyur pas sku gshegs/_sku 'phos ma thag gi skye ba ni kun mkhyen chen po 'di yin te/_de yang g.yo ru grwa yi phur rgyal ba mchog dbyangs kyi gdung rab nyer lnga par sku 'khrungs/_nam gru re ma ti lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grog cing bsrung ba kun gyis mthong*/_lo lnga nas 'bri klog par mkhyen/ bcu gsum pa la rab tu byung ba'i mtshan tshul khrims blo gros su 'bod/_shes bya rig pa'i gnas bzo gso/_sgra tshad/_snyan ngag_/mngon brjod/_sdebs sbyor/_/_skar rtsis sogs mi mkhyen pa med cing /_khyad par du dbu ma/_/_phar phyin/_'dul mngon thams cad mkhas par mkhyen/_gzhan yang gsang 'dus/ bde mchog_/lam 'bras/_sbyor drug_/zhi byed gcod yul rdzogs chen sems phyogs sogs gsan cing /_mdor na mdo rgyud lung rigs man ngag rgya mtsho'i pha rol du gshegs pa'i mkhas pa chen por gyur/_khyad par du bla ma ku ma rA dza la rdzogs pa chen po gsang ba snying tig gi chos skor ma lus pa gsan pas bla mas kyang chos kyi bdag por lung bstan cing mnga' gsol nas bstan pa gtad/_gzhan yang yi dam gyi lha du ma'i zhal gzigs shing /_khyad par du dbyangs can mas phyag mthil du bzhag nas gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas bzhag bdun du gzigs/_rje btsun sgrol mas rin po che'i prog zhu dbu la bcings nas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnang ba byin/_mgon po byams pas skye ba gnyis nas rgyal ba ri rab mar me'i rgyal mtshan du sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'i lung bstan gnang*/mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang chos kyi bgro ba mi dang mi lab pa ltar mdzad cing /_sngags bdag gza' dang dam can rnams mi dang mi 'grogs pa bzhin du bran dang g.yog tu 'khol ba sogs mnga' la/ gzhan yang mdo sngags rig lam dang bcas pa'i bstan bcos mang po dang / khyad par du rdzogs pa chen po'i lam srol ji lta ba bzhin ston pa'i bstan bcos mang du mdzad/_sa skya pa bla ma dam pa dang gsang phu ba grags bzang sogs mkhas pa mang pos dngos dang phreng yig gi lam nas rdzogs pa chen po'i lta grub la dri ba byung ba rnams la the tshom sel ba'i lan dgyes par phul/ mkhas par rloms pa'i rgol ngan gnyis 'thung gi klad pa lung rigs gnam lcags sder mos 'gems par ma bzod nas kun gyis zhabs la btud cing / dus de tsa na lung rigs smra ba'i khyu mchog tu gyur te sus kyang 'gran du ma bzod pas/_don dang mthun pa'i mtshan kun mkhyen bsam yas pa ngag gi dbang po lung mang par grags so/_/de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa bsam brjod kyi yul las 'das pa'i kun mkhyen chen po de nyid mchims phur gsang ba snying tig gi khrid 'chad pa'i skabs su mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang bka' srung rnams kyis yang yang bskul bas/_mkha' 'gro snying tig gi chos bka' 'byed par mdzad pas/_de'i tshe mkha' 'gro'i 'du ba mang po dang /_byin rlabs kyi rang sgra dang /_nam mkha' 'jas khengs pa dang /_rnal 'byor pa pho mo rnams la bde gsal mi rtog pa'i nyams dang 'od gsal gyi ngang la nyin mtshan 'khor yug tu 'byams pa zla ba gcig gi bar du byung zhing /_khyad par du o rgyan chen po'i zhal yang yang gzigs shing byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_ye shes kyi mkha' 'gros snying tig gi zab gnad rnams mngon sum du bka' bkrol nas gnang ste/_gcig pur bsgom na 'od lus 'grub kyang / gzhan la phan phyir 'gro don la brtson dgos par rjes su bskul ba'i tshul dang bcas gnang zhing /_de nas gangs ri thod dkar du mkha' 'gro yang tig gi chos bka' rnams yi ge bkod pa'i dus su'ang byin rlabs kyi mtshan ma rgyun mi chad pa snga ma ltar byung zhing*/_de lta bu'i mkha' 'gro yang tig yid bzhin nor bu'i chos sde 'di snying tig gi zab gnad rnams ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro'i mngon sum du bkral ba'i dgongs gter zab mo gzhan gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa'i zab khyad du mas khyad par du 'phags tshul gyi sngags brjod rgya cher mdzad pa'i chos tshul 'di nyid deng song gi bar du nyams pa med par rgya cher 'phel zhing chos rgyud 'dzin pa'ang mang du byon par snang zhing /_khyad par du phyogs 'dir dar ba'i bdag rkyen gyi grub pa'i dbang phyug rdzogs chen pa chen po'i bka' drin te/_grub dbang rin po che nyid la mkha' 'gro snying tig yang yig dang bcas pa'i bka' babs shing chos kyi bdag por gyur te/ grub dbang rin po che nyid kyis chos 'di la brten nas 'od gsal snang bzhi'i rtogs pa mthar phyin nas grub pa'i sa la gshegs shing rjes 'jug slob tshogs rnams kyang chos 'di'i sgo nas smin grol la bkod cing dar rgyas su mdzad pa yin la/_de nas gdan rab rim byon zhal slob chos rgyud dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang mkha' 'gro snying tig gi khrid dang kun mkhyen chen po'i gsung rab la 'chad nyan rtsal du 'don zhing thos bsam bsgom sgrub kyi sgo nas bstan pa la bya ba rgya cher mdzad pa sha stag byon pa 'di yin no/_/ gnyis pa ji ltar par du bsgrub pa'i tshul ni/_spyir rgyal bstan rin po che'i bstan pa'i rtsa lag ni sa chen chos bzhin du skyong ba'i rgyal po chen po rnams yin la/_khyad par bod chen po'i ljongs 'dir las shug btsan po'i stobs kyi dpung pas sa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rang gis mdzad cing*/ ris su ma chad pa'i rgyal bstan rin po che sri zhus mchod pa dang /_chos dang mthun pa'i mdzad pas yangs pa'i mnga' ris byams brtses skyongs shing / bstan pa'i btsas su gtsug lag khang du ma dang rten gsum spyi dang bye brag chos sbyin par gyi rgyun bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'dzad pa med par spel bas/ sngon gyi chos rgyal mes dpon rnams kyi mdzad pa'ang phra mor byed pa'i chos kyi rgyal po rim par byon pa'i rgyal khab chen po 'di nyid du/_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba mi dbang yum sras kyis sngon gyi gdung rabs gong ma rnams la co 'dri bar nus pa'i chos sbyin rgya cher spel zhing /_khyad par du sa skyong ma yum chen mo tshe dbang lha mo nyid kyis thugs kyi lhag bsam ston zla ltar dkar bas bstan 'gro'i phan bde spel ba dang /_chab srid mnga' thang rgyas shing*/ sku tshe gdung brgyud bcas gong 'phel 'byung ba'i ched dang /_khyad par du chos tshul 'di nyid mi nub cing gsang chen snying po'i bstan pa'i btsas su dgongs nas par du bkod par gnang ste/_de yang 'chad nyan sgom gsum gang la'ang yi ge la mi brten pa'i thabs med cing /_de nyid kyang dag ma dag la shin tu ltos dgos par mkhyen dpyod rnam par yangs pas legs par gzigs nas chos sbyin rlabs po che'i rgyun spel ba'i tshe kho bo la zhus dag byed dgos tshul gyi bka' stsal gtsug gi cod pan du gus pas mchod nas yi ge phyi mo dag pa 'ga' zhig sgo bstun nas dag par byas pa las/_slar yang sdebs nor bcos bslad lta bu'i rigs rnams rang blos gang dpog dpyad pas dag par bgyis shing /_brda rnying re zung snang ba dang sngags rnams legs sbyar kho nar ma nges pas 'ga' zhig brda sprod pa'i lugs dang bstun par dka' bar snang yang legs sbyar dang mthun pa rnams legs sbyar dang bstun zhing mi mthun pa rnams yig rnying sor bzhag las 'ol tshod ma spobs pas dpyad 'os ma mchis shing /_gzhan bab bcol med par dpyad gzhir 'os pa rnams btang snyoms su ma song bar yang yang zhus dag grub pa yin la/_de'i tshe sngon gyi chos rgyal chen po'i chos sbyin gyi lugs srol nyams pa med pa'i rgyun bzhin gyi bris brkos so so'i yon sbyoRa phun sum tshogs pa dang bcas/_rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i thog mar sleb pa'i me mo yos kyi lo mdzes sdug dbyar gyi dpal mos rnam bkra me tog sna tshogs kyis rgyan phreng dang lo 'dab sar pa'i gos bzang gis klubs pa'i phun tshogs lang tsho'i mdzes pa ngom pa'i dus tshes dge ba nas dbu brtsams te/_rnam byung zhes pa sa pho 'brug gi lo'i ston gsum dus kyi rgyal mos 'bras bu dang lo tog du ma bcud du smin pa'i khur gyis lce ba'i 'dod dgu'i 'byor ba ngom pa'i dus bzang por legs par grub pa yin no/_/ gsum pa chos tshan bzhugs grangs smos shing dge ba byang chub tu bsngo ba la/_ka pa la them byang rin chen ljon shing /_kha pa la gter 'byung rin po che'i lo rgyus/_ga pa la rin po che dbang gi phreng ba/_nga pa la bdag 'jug pad+ma klong yangs/[ · ]ca pa la tshogs mchod rgya mtsho'i sprin/_cha pa la phyag 'tshal dri med zla rgyas/_ja pa la gsol 'debs bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun/_nya pa la khrid yig nor bu lugs/_ta pa la khrid yig nyi zla gza' skar/_tha pa la zab mo rab 'byed/_da pa la khrid yig rin po che gser gyi phreng ba/_na pa la nam mkha' rab 'byams/_pa pa la nam mkha' klong yangs/_pha pa la nam mkha' dri med/ ba pa la man ngag rin po che gser gyi sgrom bu/_/ma pa la tshig don rin po che'i bang mdzod/_/tsa pa la zab don rgya mtsho'i sprin dang de'i sa bcad bsdus don/_tsha pa la gsang spyod rdo rje'i lam bstan/_dza pa la nges don snying po/_wa pa la byin rlabs thugs sgrub/_zha pa la rig 'dzin mchog sgrub/_za pa la mkha' 'gro bde chen rgya mtsho/_/'a pa la rlung sbyor ye shes dra ba/_ya pa la zab lam bde chen rgya mtsho/_/ra pa la 'od gsal 'khor lo/_/la pa la gzhi snang ngo sprod/_/sha pa la 'od gsal sbub 'jug_/sa pa la sgrol ma bzhi skor/_/ha pa la 'khrul snang gzhi grol/_/a pa la rmi lam sgrub 'jug_/ki pa la dbyings snang ngo sprod/_khi pa la zab don gnad kyi lde mig_/gi pa la 'od gsal pra khrid/_ngi pa la gsang lam rin po che'i ngo sprod/_ci pa la zab don snying po/_/chi pa la kun 'dus rin po che'i ngo sprod/_ji pa la bar do sbubs 'jug_/nyi pa la bar do gnad kyi sgron me/_/ti pa la gnad gsum sgron me/_/thi pa la mthong snang rin po che 'od kyi dra ba/_/di pa la zhal chem dri ma med pa'i 'od/_/ni pa la zhal chem mthar thug gcig ma dang gnad kyi me long /_/bi pa la bde gshegs rigs lnga'i sgrub thabs pad+ma stong ldan/_/phi pa la rigs lnga'i bcud len bdud rtsi thigs pa/_bi pa la bdud rtsi sprin phung /_mi pa la 'chi ba brtag bslu'i man ngag nyi zla gza' bral/_tsi pa la btags grol brgyud kyi man ngag rin chen snying po/_tshi pa la sreg sbyor 'od kyi snye ma/_dzi pa la gzhan phan 'od kyi 'khor lo/_wi pa la phyag rgya bzhi mchod 'od kyi 'khor lo'i gnad yig_/ zhi pa la mchod rten rab gnas rin chen dra ba/_zi pa la rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ye shes dri med/_'i pa la mthong snang rin chen gser gyi dra ba/_yi pa la rdo rje g.yu sgron ma'i sgrub thabs zla ba 'dod 'jo/_ri pa la gza' bdud gsang sgrub/[ · ]li pa la gnod sbyin dmar nag gi sgrub pa me rlung 'khyil ba/[ ·]shi pa la shan pa srog sgrub nag mo'i gsang sgrub/_si pa la them byang dpag bsam ljon shing ste/_de ltar gzhung gi kha byang la ji ltar bzhugs pa'i chos tshan ma tshang ba med pa par du bzhugs pa yin la/_dge ba rdzogs byang du bsngo ba yang /_/de lta'i legs byas rlabs chen spyod pa'i dge_/rmongs dang tha ba'i sems kyis ma bkag par/_/rgyal sras thu bo kun tu bzang po yi/_/yongs bsngo ji bzhin byang chen mchog rgyur bsngo/_/zhes so/_/slar yang smras pa/_mgon khyod rang snang longs sku'i zhing nyul yang /_/tha mal snang ngor mtha' yas chos kun gyi/_/shes bya kun gzigs 'jam dbyangs paN+Di ta/_/kun mkhyen che de slar yang snying nas dran/_/_/gang blo rnam dpyod yangs pa'i grwa gcig na/_/mtha' yas shes bya'i gzhung lugs srid do 'tshal/_/dog pa med par chud pa'i mkhyen rab mtha'/_/kun gsal yangs pa'i pha mthas ga la 'ching /_/longs spyod 'khor lo'i chu skyes 'dab stong la/_/dga' bas rjes chags tshangs pa'i bu mo de/_/rnam par rtsen pas mtha' yas chos so cog/legs bshad glu ru len la rings pa bzhin/_/de phyir mos pa'i yol go dang 'tshams pa'i/_/chos tshul ci 'dod 'jo las skal bzang 'gro'i/_/legs spyad rin chen gyis thor rnyed dka'i nor/_/lag rtser son 'di'ang mgon khyod kho na'i drin/_/de lta'i chos tshul 'chi med rtag pa'i dbyangs/_/srid mtha'i bar du nub med glur 'jo phyir/_/yi ge'i sku 'phrul 'gog med zla gzugs stong*/_/cig char 'char ba'i chos sbyin par gyi rdzing /_/tshul 'di bod chen nor 'dzin mdzes pa'i rgyan/_/ byams ldan lha sras lcam dral rgyal yum bcas/_/'gro 'di'i legs byas dpung pas tshogs gnyis mtsho/_/bsrubs las bsod nams mgron du skyes pa bzhin/_khyad par dad pa'i lang tsho gtong phod kyi/_/rgyan phreng gis mdzes sa skyong chen mo yis/_/snying po'i bstan la ri mor bgyi ba'i slad/_/chos sbyin skal ldan shing rta'i mched por bskrun/_/gang+gA'i bye snyed gser gyis yongs bskangs nas//sbyin pa bas kyang tshig bcad gcig brjod pa'i//phan 'dog lhag ces gsungs na 'dzad med kyi/_/chos sbyin 'di lta'i bsod nams gzhal du ci/_/'dis mtshon bskal mang legs spyod 'dzam bu'i 'bras/_/ dmigs pa'i dug bral byang chen chu gter du/_/lhung byas sku gsum grub pa'i kAny+tsA na'i/_/don gnyis phun tshogs 'byor pas phyug par shog_/snyigs ma'i brlang spyod rtsub mos bos pa'i mgron/_/dus min 'tsho bral skal ngan 'thib bu'i smag_/dkon mchog thugs rje'i nyi gzhon gyis gzhil nas/_/phan bde'i legs lam snang bas rtag bsrung shog_/lha mi'i dbang phyug yum sras sku'i 'tsho gzhes/_/gzhom gzhig dang bral mnga' thang gdung rgyud 'phel/_/chab 'bang byams pa'i spyan ras kyis 'tsho zhing /_/lus can bde skyid dpal gyis 'byor par shog_/rgyal bstan dri med 'od dkar srid pa'i blar/_/nub med 'char ba'i dge legs zil mngar gyis/_/'khor ba'i nyes spyod tsha gdung yongs bcil zhing /_/de 'dzin tshogs kyang bskal brgyar 'tsho gzhes shog_/mdor na gnas skabs mthar thug bzhed dgu kun/_/bsam bzhin 'grub pa bslu med mchog gsum gyis/_/byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i chab kyi bran pa yis/_/_/'dod don 'dab brgya bzhad pa'i bkra shis stsol/_/ces dkar chag nyung ngu 'di ni mi'i dbang po yum sras kyis chos tshul 'di nyid par du bzhengs pa'i tshe sa skyong ma yum chen mo nyid kyi bkas bskul ba gus pa'i zab chos mkha' 'gro yang tig gi pusta ka par d+'a ra chag nyung ngu ut+pala'i phreng ba/ gtsug tu mchod nas gus zhabs rmongs rtul dA ri tra pa ngag dbang blo gros kyis lhun grub steng gi rgyal khab chen po nas spel ba bi dza yan+tu//_// [309]

[6.38 them byang rinchen ljon shing]

@#/_/them byang rin chen ljon shing bzhugs so/_/ mkha' 'gro yang tig gi kha byang rin chen ljon shing zhes bya ba dpal don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zab cing rgya che'i mkhyen rab dpag bsam shing /_/phan bde'i rang bzhin me tog 'bras mang ldan/_/thugs rje'i grib bsil shin tu rgya che bas/_/'gro blo'i gdung skyobs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dag pa'i mkha' la bdud rtsi'i sprin 'khrigs pas/_/byams pa'i 'brug sgra snying rje'i glog phreng can/_/zhi bde'i chos char shin tu rmad byung bas/_/dge legs bsam 'phel mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpag med dus nas srid pa'i sems can la/_/zhi ba'i don ston thar pa 'dren pa'i lha/_/bde gshegs rig 'dzin pad+ma thod phreng stsal/_/ye shes mtsho rgyal zhabs la gus phyag 'tshal/_/bdag blo'i pad mtsho shin tu rgya che bar/_/mkha' 'gro snying thig 'od stong shar ba'i mthus/_/sngon med chos tshul bdud rtsis rab gang ste/_/ snying po'i 'dab stong phyogs bcur rab tu rgyas/_/dpal ldan gangs ri'i tshal na dga' ba'i blo/_/shin tu rmad byung gtsug gi nor bu'i gdugs/_/srid las rnam grol lha yi dpag bsam shing /_/yid mkha'i tshal du legs 'ongs bzang dgus brgyan/_/'dir ni skal ldan srid mtsho brgal 'dod rnams/_/nges don snying po'i chos tshul rin chen gru/_/tshe gcig thar gling bsgrod 'dir brten mdzod la/_/ji skad gsungs bzhin brtson pas gnas par rigs/_/gang gi byin rlabs ri bong 'dzin gzugs can/_/tshig don rnam bkra'i rgyu skar phreng ba 'di/_/bdag blo'i yid mkhar deng sang shar ba'i tshe/_/srid pa'i mtshan mo'i ma rig mun bsal nas/_/ye shes snang bas bde chen thob bya'i phyir/_/zab mo'i gnad bsdus snying po'i bcud phyung nas/_/skal bzang blo yi kun+da rgyas bya'i phyir/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gsal bar rab phye nas/_/dum dang ma bus dkar chag chig dril te/_/lus su grub pa'i rang bzhin brtsams pa ni/_/ dbang gi sdong po khrid kyis yal gas brjid/_/rgyab chos 'dab ma me tog 'bras mang ldan/_/rin chen ljon shing bzang por grub pa 'di/_/skal ldan skye bo'i bya tshogs dga' bar mdzod/_/gsang sngags dbang gi chu bo rgya mtsho yis/_/rang gzhan rgyud rnams legs par sbyangs pa 'di/_/tha ba sra ba rlan gyis dngas pa bzhin/_/dbang gis sbrang phyir ma bu'i grangs bstan pa/_/dbang gi sngon 'gro gter 'byung lo rgyus dang /_/dam tshig skong dang mkha' 'gro'i brda dbang dang /_/dbang bzhi'i rim pa byin rlabs bla ma'i dbang /_/rig pa'i rtsal dbang mkha' 'gro'i don dbang dang /_/gzhan bka' gtad rgya bka' bsrung bkar bsgo ste/_/ma dgu bu bzhis rin chen dbang phreng 'grub// de dag rnams ni zab cing rgya che bas/_/rin chen dkar shog ngos la legs par mnan/_/smin cing grol bar byed pa'i gdams pa ste/_/de yi lag len ma bu'i grangs bstan pa/_/bla ma'i gsol 'debs dri med zla rgyas dang /_/ bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun khrid yig nor bu lugs/_/nyi zla gza' skar zab mo 'byed dang /_/rin chen gser phreng ma bu rnam pa drug_/yang zab gnad de rab tu dkon pas na/_/rin chen shog 'dra'i ngos la legs par bkod/_/de dag rnams kyi rgyab chos bstan pa ni/_khregs chod thod rgal zab don sna tshogs gsum/_/_/so so phye nas go rim nges pa'i don/_/dum dang ma bu'i grangs ni 'di dag go_khregs chod rgyab yig nam mkha' skor gsum la/_/ nam mkha' rab 'byams lta ba bya rtsol med/_/nam mkha' klong yangs sgom pa blo las 'das/_/nam mkha' dri med spyod pa blang dor med/_/gdod ma'i ngang du gnyis med la zla 'o/_/thod rgal rgyab yig 'od gsal skor gsum la/ man ngag rin chen gser gyi sgrom bu yis/_/zab mo'i gnad rnams mdor bsdus gcig tu dril/_/tshig don rin chen bang mdzod bzang po yis/_/de dag don rnams so sor phye ste bshad/_/zab don rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi snying po yis/_/shin tu rgya che'i rnam grangs dpag med bkod/_/gnyis ka'i don bsdu bogs 'byin chig dril ba/_/gsang spyod rdo rje lam bstan snying por bstan/_/de dag rnams ni rin chen shog skyar bkod/_/zab don sna tshogs gab pa'i bcud phyung ba/_/bdud rtsi'i thigs pa snying gi snying po ni/_/gang dang mi 'dra bstan par phangs na yang /_/phyi rabs skal ldan brtse ba'i sems bzung ste/_/snying phyug lag mthil dag tu bkod pa 'di/_/shin tu zab pa'i yang zab shog ser can/_/snying dang 'dra bas ma spel sems la spos/_/de yi dum dang ma bus grangs bstan pa/_/rig 'dzin mchog sgrub tshe gcig rig 'dzin 'grub/_/yang gsang mkha' 'gro bde chen rgya mtsho la/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa yid bzhin nor bu dang /_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa ye shes 'khor lo dang /_/rlung drug rdo rje'i chings te gsum gyis tshad/_/de yis dngos grub gang 'dod lhun gyis grub/_/rlung sbyor ye shes dra bas de nyid mthong /_/zab lam bde chen rgya mtshos ting 'dzin 'grub/_/'od gsal 'khor los tshe 'dir 'od lus 'grub/_/gzhi snang ngo sprod grol bzhi'i snang ba shes/_/'od gsal sbubs 'jug mtshan mo'i 'od gsal 'grub/_/sgron ma bzhi skor ye shes rang gnas shes/_/de ltar ma bu rnam grangs rnam dgu yang /_/chos sde'i rang bzhin rnam bdun dag tu bsdus/_/de dag rnams ni yang zab bla na med/_/mkha' 'gro'i zhal gdams shog ser ngos la bkod/_/rigs lnga'i gsang sgrub pad+ma stong ldan la/_/phyi nang gsang ba yang gsang rnam bzhis tshang /_/de yis gtso bor rang bzhin sprul sku thob/_/rigs lnga'i bcud len bdud rtsi thigs pa la/_/sa yi bcud len bdud rtsi yang zhun dang /_/chu yi bcud len bde chen rgya mtsho dang /_/me yi bcud len bde drod rang 'bar dang /_/rlung gi bcud len dpag bsam ljon shing dang*/_/nam mkha'i bcud len ye shes gsang skor te/_/mchog dang thun mong dngos grub myur du 'grub/_/gegs sel nad 'don bdud rtsi sprin phung la/_/'khor lo lnga ste phyi nang bar chad sel/_/'chi ba brtag bslu nyi zla gza' bral la/_/dum bu gnyis te rnal 'byor don chen 'grub/_/btags grol man ngag rin chen snying po yis/_/de nyid don shes rang gzhan phan pa 'grub/_/'di dag rin chen shog 'dra'i ngos la bkod/_/ sreg sbyong cho ga 'od kyi snye ma yis/_/_/tshe 'das sku gdung ji ltar bzhu ba bstan/_/gzhan phan 'od kyi 'khor lo bzang po yis/_/bar do'i 'gro ba rnams la phan btags bshad/_/mchod rten rab gnas rin chen drwa ba yis/_/tshwa tsha'i sgo nas tshogs bsags sgrib sbyong bstan/_/rab gnas cho ga ye shes dri med kyis/_/sku gsung thugs rten rab tu gnas par bshad/_/ mthong snang rin chen gser gyi drwa ba yis/_/nyams su blangs pa'i rtags tshad 'bras bu bstan/_/'di dag rnams kyang zab cing rgya che bas/_/rin chen dkaRa shog bzang po'i ngos la mnan/_/de ltar zab chos bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/_/bka' srung sgrub sde rgya mtsho'i snying po las/_/shin tu yang zab rin chen rnam gsum las/_/g.yu sgron sgrub thabs zla ba 'dod 'jo yis/_/ci bsam 'grub cing rkyen ngan bar chad sel/_/yid bzhin nor bu dbang gi rgyal po 'dra/_/gza' bdud gsang sgrub dug gi spu gri yis/_/gnod byed srog rtsa skad cig gcod pas na/_/'jigs pa'i gnam lcags 'khor lo bskor ba 'dra/_/srog sgrub gsang sgrub dug mda' nag po yis/_/dgra bgegs thal ba'i rdul du rlog pas na/_/'jigs pa'i ser sprin me ltar 'bar ba 'dra/_/ 'di dag mkha' 'gro snying tig rnal 'byor pa'i/_/nyams len gsar ba'i rgyab brten yang gsang du/_/ji ltar gsungs bzhin bdag gis shog 'drar bkod/_/zab mo'i gnad bsdus bdag gis tshad phab pas/_/shin tu gsang ste snying gi tshul du bcangs/_/phyi rabs dad brtson snying gi bu gcig la/_/ lhag chad med par byin nas bka' rgyas thob/_/des kyang bstan pa'i btsas su byed par shog_/de ltar gsang ba'i man ngag snying po'i grangs/_/don rnams bsdus te gcig tu dril ba ni/_/dbang gi ma bu'i skor la ma bcu gsum/_/khrid kyi skor la ma bu rnam pa drugasing+hi_/rgyab chos skor la ma bu lnga bcu gcig_/de ltar dril bas bdun cu tham pa ni/[(<]a[>]rgyab chos skor la ma bu sum cu brgyad/_/de ltar dril bas lnga bcu rtsa bdun ni/[)]cha shas dbye bas rgya cher bkod pa yin/_/sde tshan dbye bas grangs su mdor bsdu na/_/rin chen shog skya shog ser shog 'dra gsum/_/shog skya'i sde tshan la ni bcu bzhi dang /_/shog ser bco lnga rin chen shog 'dra la/_/sde tshan bcu bzhis legs par gtan la phab/_/sde tshan dbye na bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyis/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gsang ba'i snying po tshang /_/de las mang nyung byung na gdams pa 'chal/_/de yi phyir na gsang ba'i kha byang gces/_/e ma ho/_gangs ri'i khrod 'dir rgyal sras pad+ma yis/_/phyogs bzhir zab gter sbas pa'i rim pa la/_/ lho ru bskyed rdzogs dril ba sdong po'i skor/_/nub tu gsal ba me tog kha bye 'dra/_/byang du rgyas pa yal 'dab chen po la/_/shar du legs smin 'bras bu bcud du 'dril/_/de yi nang nas yang zab 'bras bu'i skor/_/rdo rje snying po'i theg pa mthar thug 'di/_/kun gyi yang rtse yang rab 'ga' yi phul/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gsang ba'i mdzod du sbas/_/deng sang tshe lo lnga bcu kha ral la/_/zab mo'i dgongs gter mi yul snang ba ni/_/chu mo glang la shog ser sgo phye nas/_/rjod byed tshig la dbang ba'i cha tsam las/_/zab mo'i de nyid rtogs pa'i mthu med do/_/_/deng sang shing yos dpyid zla gsum dag la/_/_/bla ma mkha' 'gro'i byin rlabs lung bstan las/_/brjod bya'i don rnams bdag gi snying la babs/_/mngon sum nyid du mkha' 'gros gnad bstan nas/_/tshig don ma lus rtogs pa'i nyi shar bas/_/bdag blo'i pad kha rab tu rgyas par byas/_/de don man ngag yang zab snying po'i don/_/ji ltar rtogs bzhin 'khrul pa med pa'i blos/_/gab cing gcus te sbas pa'i gnad rnams kun/_/ phyi rabs don du ma sbas gsal bar bkod/_/don 'dir bdag blo 'khrul pa med pas na/_/rig 'dzin gong ma'i man ngag rnams dang 'dra/_/the tshom mi dgos nor ba'i dri ma med/_/phyi rabs skal ldan rab tu dga' bar mdzod/_/ zab mo'i gnad rnams 'dir bkod dge ba des/_/'gro kun theg mchog rin chen 'dir zhugs te/_/tshe gcig sangs rgyas 'od lus 'dir 'grub nas/_/ srid pa'i zhing 'dir 'gro ba'i don byed shog_/ma lus bde gshegs snying po 'gro ba kun/_/med snang 'khrul pa'i 'khor ba las brgal te/_/thams cad phyam gcig gdod ma'i sar phyin nas/_/skra lnga ye shes 'du 'bral med par shog_/mkha' 'gro snying tig lha yi dpag bsam shing /_/bdag blo'i skyed tshal rwa bar legs 'khrungs pas/_/de don man ngag me tog 'bras mang des/_/ 'gro kun bya tshogs rab tu dga' bar shog_/chos tshul 'di ni dri med 'od zer gyis/_/ston gsum me tog 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe/_/gangs ri thod dkar rin chen snying po'i mgul/_/o rgyan rdzong zhes bya ba'i gnas su bkod/_/snying tig rgyud don man ngag rgya mtsho las/_/zab don rin chen snying po 'di blangs te/_/tshig don sna tshogs 'dod dgu'i char phab pas/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis lhun gyis 'grub par shog_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gi them byang rin chen ljon shing zhes bya ba/_dpal o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi thugs kyi 'od zer gyis blo'i pad+mo rab tu rgyas pa'i rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis/_/rang gi rtogs pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin phyi rabs kyi skye bo dpag tu med pas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir skal bzang gi slob ma 'od zer go chas gsol ba btab pa'i ngor/_ston gsum me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe/ gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul du mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/dge legs su gyur cig_/_/'di nyid phyi rabs kyi tshe skal bzang gi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas pa rim pas btab nas/_snod legs par brtags te rang gzhan gyi don grub ngo shes pa'i slob ma gcig la them byang gtad pas 'gro don 'grub cing phan thogs pas de ltar bya'o/_/gzhan dag la them byang rab tu sba zhing gsang bar bya'o/_/gza' bdud chen po rA hu la dang /_bshan pa srog sgrub nag mo dang /_rdo rje g.yu sgron ma gsum la bka' 'di gtad pa yin pas thub par srungs shig_/las med kyi lag tu 'grim du ma 'jug cig_/las can gyi lag tu sprod cig_/'dra min dang bcos bslad byed pa byung na snying khrag gting nas drongs shig_/sa ma ya/_sa ma ya/_sa ma ya/ kha thaM_dge'o//_//

[6.39 gter ’byung rin po che’i lo rgyus]

@#/_/gter 'byung rin po che'i lo rgyus zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog skya'i skor las lo rgyus bzhugs/ rgya gar skad du/_rat+na ma d+hu ra b+ha sa li nA ma/_bod skad du/_gter 'byung rin po che'i lo rgyus zhes bya ba/_o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal ldan tshogs gnyis sna tshogs khams can ye shes du ma'i gang chen mtsho/_/mkhyen brtse'i rang bzhin gting mtha' dpag yas rnam grol yid bzhin mchog gi gter/_/thugs rje'i dus rlabs rgya che dang ldan sngon med chu srin 'dzin khri'i gnas/_/sku gsum 'phrin las lhun gyis grub de kun nas dga' ba'i gtsug gis mchod/_/rang bzhin sngon nas goms pa'i thugs rje dang /_/sna tshogs thabs tshul dpag med stobs mnga' bas/_/nam mkha'i mtha' klas gyur pa'i sems can la/_/mtha' yas phan pa mdzad de kun tu rgyal/_/gang zhig thos nas dad pa'i stobs g.yo bas/_/las dang nyon mongs 'khor ba phyir bsnyil zhing /_/mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu zhir 'gro ba'i/_/rin chen lo rgyus rna ba'i bdud rtsi nyon/_/de la gdod ma'i gzhi 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gang du'ang rgya chad phyogs lhung med pa'i sngon rol na/_yul chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa stong la go 'byed pa/_nam mkha' yangs pa'i dkyil lta bu/_dwangs la mi g.yo ba rgya mtsho dwangs pa'i gting lta bu/_gsal la sgrib pa med pa me long g.ya' dag pa'i ngos lta bu/_ngo bo stong /_rang bzhin gsal/_thugs rje'i gdangs 'gags pa med par bzhugs pa ni gdod ma'i gnas lugs so/_/de'i ngang la shes rab srog tu gyur pa'i rlung yan lag bzhis rta byas te/_thugs rje rig pa'i snying po phyir gsal du g.yos pa las ngo bo'i cha las go 'byed pa'i yul la/_rang bzhin gyi chas lhun grub ye shes kyi snang ba shar dus/_thugs rje'i chas yul 'byed pa'i shes rab dpyod byed du skyes pa'i skad cig la rang shar du shes pas rang ngo shes te gdod ma'i gzhi thog de nyid du rang grol du grol ba ni kun tu bzang po gzhi thog nas mngon par byang chub pa'o/_/'di'i dus na nang gsal thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral ba chos kyi sku'i zhing khams lhun grub rin po che'i sbubs na rang rig pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pas mtshan ma ris can gyi rnam pa'i zhal phyag grub pa ni med de 'char ba'i gzhi'i gdangs ma 'gags pa las rang bzhin dang thugs rje'i snang ba 'du 'bral med pa tsam du gnas so/_/de'i tshe ston pa phun sum tshogs pa rang shes rig pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po dang /_chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dus bzhi'i 'pho 'gyur med pa'i rang bzhin kun tu bzang mo'i bdag nyid gnyis su med pa nyid gzhon nu bum pa sku'i zhing khams chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang chen po na 'khor ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshogs la sku gsung thugs byas pa med pa'i bstan pa rin po che 'pho 'gyur med pa'i ngang las mi g.yo/_mi 'byung /_mi gnas/_mi len/ mi 'dor/_mi bskyod pa nyid du bzhugs so/_/'di'i dus na sku phyi'i mdzad pa bzhi ni/_mi 'gyur ba dang /_mi 'ongs pa dang /_mi 'gro ba dang*/_/mi gnas pa nyid do/_/nang gi bzhi ni/_mi snang ba dang*/_mi mdzad pa dang*/_mi 'phro ba dang*/ mi 'du ba'o/_/_/gsang ba'i bzhi ni/_ma byas pa dang /_mi byed pa dang /_nam mkha' lta bu dang /_mnyam rdzogs chen po'o/_/_/ gsung gi phyi'i mdzad pa bzhi ni/_brjod du med pa dang /_bstan du med pa dang /_bltar med pa dang /_cung zad med pa'o/_/nang gi bzhi ni/_rang bzhin dang /_gyin 'da' dang /_yul can ma yin pa dang /_du ma med pa'o/_/gsang ba'i bzhi ni/_so ma dang /_gnyug ma dang /_rnal ma dang /_ma bcos pa'o/_/thugs kyi phyi'i mdzad pa bzhi ni/_dri ma med pa dang /_seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang /_dpa' bar 'gro ba dang*/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i tog gi ting nge 'dzin no/_/nang gi bzhi ni/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo rnam par rol pa dang /_glog gi phreng ba dang /_'khor lo chen po dang /_/'od 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/_/gsang ba bzhi ni/_phyag rgya zil gyis gnon pa dang /_'bar chen mnyam pa dang /_chos nyid sna tshogs pa dang*/_rnam par bkod pa rang snang rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/_de dag kyang sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang yang bral la/_ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi 'dor ba ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/de dag kyang ngo bo'i gnas pa tsam las sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo 'char gzhi me long lta bu'i dbyings su gnas pas mdzad pa zhes brjod do/_/ de nas bskal pa chen po gcig na yang snga ma lta bu'i gzhi las lhun grub yul shar ba rang ngo ma shes pas/_dpyod byed yul la shar ba'i shes pa 'phro mthud de gzung 'dzin gyi rtog par 'khrul pas thog mar srid pa'i rtse mo nas bzung ste gzugs med nas shes pa rags su song bas gzugs dang /_'dod pa'i bar du 'khrul ba'i sems can rnams byung ngo*/_/de nas lhun grub kyi ngang chos kyi spros gzhi mtha' gang du'ang ma lhung ba las/_thugs rang byung gi ye shes chen po nyid rnam par g.yos te/_phyir gsal du bzhengs pa nyid chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo dang /_yid byed pa po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ste gdul bya'i yul du 'dul byed kyi thugs g.yos pa'o/_/de'i tshe ston pa kun tu bzang po yab yum chos sku spros pa dang bral ba'i ngang nas zhal phyag gi rnam par bzhengs te/_rnam dag stug po bkod pa bde ba'i zhing 'od khyim rnam par dag pa shin tu bkod legs pa'i khang bu brtsegs par gdul bya ma yin 'dul byed rin po che mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa zhi ba dang*/_/_khro bo'i dkyil 'khor tshom bu 'bum phrag grangs med pa la/ bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po sus kyang byas pa med pa'i rang bzhin mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i dgongs pa la/mi g.yo mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis rang bshad do/_/'di'i dus na thugs rang byung gi ye shes su rang byung bas 'od zer gyi 'phro 'du las mdzad pa sum cu rtsa drug gi rgyud rang byung /_gnas pa 'od kyi thig le las gnas phun sum tshogs pa drug cu tham par rang gnas/_de nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs dang snang cha las sangs rgyas kyi sku 'bum phrag khrag khrig dpag tu med cing brjod kyis mi lang ba rnams mthong ba rnam par dag pa'i spyan gyis dkyil 'khor la rang snang /_de'i tshe longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnams kyi ljags kyi dbang po las 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros pa'i rtse mo las yi ge drug gi sgra rang byung ste 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu ma lus par khyab par byas te sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'god par bya'o zhes lan gsum du byung ba nyid kyis rang byung gi ye shes kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin 'dzad pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po phyogs bcur 'phros so/_/'di dag bsod nams rnam par dag pas sku snang la rang bzhin med pa/_zhal phyogs kun tu thal le ba/_'od zer mtha' yas pas nam mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par snang zhing /_las kyi bsags pa rnam par dag pas thugs kyi shes rab chen po klong rdol nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la longs spyod pa'o/_/'di'i dus na sku phyi mdzad pa bzhi ni/_sku snang la rang bzhin med pa dang /_'od kyi zhal phyag rdzogs pa dang /_mtshan ma'i dngos po las 'das pa dang /_ye shes kyi rnam par snang ba'o/_/nang gi bzhi ni/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_'od zer mtha' yas pa dang / zhal phyogs kun tu thal le ba'o/_gsang ba'i bzhi ni/_sku mdun dang rgyab med pa dang /_phyi nang kun tu zang thal ba dang /_rtse mo phyogs kun tu 'khyil ba dang /_gsal la ma 'dres pa snang ba'o/_/gsung gi phyi'i mdzad pa bzhi ni/_/ yi ge drug gi 'khor lo 'phro ba dang*/_de nyid yab kyi zhal du zhugs pa dang / yum gyi mkha' las thon pa dang /_'phro zhing 'du bar byed pa'o/_/nang gi bzhi ni/_rang gi ngo bos bshad pa dang /_tshig gi brjod pa las 'das pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /_kha dog dpag tu med pa'i 'od zer zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la 'phros pas mtshan ma nye bar zhi ba'i chos go bar mdzad pa'o/_/gsang ba'i bzhi ni/_sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs dang /_zhal gyi sbyor ba rnam par dag pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos la longs spyod pa'o/_thugs kyi phyi'i mdzad pa bzhi ni/_mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /_ye shes kyi mthong ba rnam par dag pa dang /_chos nyid rnam par snang ba dang /_zag pa zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/nang gi bzhi ni/_me long lta bu dang /_mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtogs pa dang /_/_bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes la longs spyod pa'o/_/ gsang ba'i bzhi ni/_/_/gsal stong dang /_yul shes dang /_snang stong dang / 'khor 'das dbyer mi phyed pa'i chos nyid la 'pho 'gyur med par bzhugs pa'o/_/'di dag kyang yul dang yul can gyi mdzad pa ltar ni ma yin la/rang snang rnam par dag pa'i zhing na snang cha'i mdzad pa rdzogs pa'i cha tsam du gnas par brjod do/_/de nas rgyal ba rdo rje sems dpa' yis 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med par longs sku'i gzhir gnas thugs rje rang byung gi ye shes sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs pa la bzhugs rig 'dzin dang mkha' 'gro ma dang 'khor gyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs 'jig rten las 'das pa dang*/_mchog gi 'khor rang gi rnam par 'phrul pa las bskyed pa rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la/_bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i don tshig sdeb sbyor legs pa'i sgo nas sgra brnyan bzhin du rang gi snang ba la ston gsung bar snang ngo /_'di'i dus na sku'i phyi'i mdzad pa bzhi ni/_kun tu snang ba dang /_blta bas mi ngoms pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa'o/_/nang gi bzhi ni/_gsal ba dang /_'tsher ba dang /_lhun stug pa dang /_'od zer 'phro ba'o/_/gsang ba'i bzhi ni/_lhan ne ba dang /_lhag ge ba dang /_thal le ba dang /_zang thal ba'o/_/gsung gi phyi'i mdzad pa bzhi ni/ dbyangs mtha' yas pa dang /_mos pa 'tshams par 'byung ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_'tsher ba'o/_/nang gi bzhi ni/_yid du 'ong ba dang /_zad mi shes pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/gsang ba'i bzhi ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_dus thams cad pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang /_dpe las 'das pa'o/_/thugs kyi phyi'i mdzad pa bzhi ni/_mi g.yo ba dang /_mi bsam pa dang /_ji bzhin pa dang /_ngang gi 'od gsal ba'o/_/_nang gi bzhi ni/_/ma byas pa dang /_mi byed pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_bya ba'i yul las 'das pa'o/_/gsang ba'i bzhi ni/_thams cad gzigs pa dang / gang du'ang mi dmigs pa dang /_lhun gyis grub pa dang /_mnyam rdzogs chen po'i ngang las dus thams cad du mi g.yo zhing 'pho 'gyur med pa'o/_/_'di dag ni thugs rje mtha' yas pas rnam par dag pa'i 'gro ba la sku mngon par snang ba sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la me long lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi chos snang ba 'jig rten las 'das pa'i spyod yul rnam par dag pa'o/_/de ltar snang ba'i ston pa dang 'khor ni rgyal ba nyid kyis rgyal ba nyid la ched du gleng pa bzhin du dgongs pas brgyud de gsungs kyi/_gang zag tha dad pa'i rim pa ltar dpon slob so sor snang ba ni ma yin no/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nas 'gro khwa la mngon par snang ba'i thog ma yin pas mos pa dang blo yi rim pas chos kyang tha dad pa'o/_/'on kyang rig 'dzin gyi brgyud pa ni rang gi sprul pa nyid las gzhan ma yin no/_/mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i 'khor gzhan rnams ni ci rigs su snang ba'o/_/rgyal ba dgongs pas brgyud pa'i lo rgyus bshad zin to//_// de nas rig 'dzin brda'i brgyud pa ni/_rgya gar chos kyi 'byung gnas rdo rje gdan gyi nub byang o rgyan thor tshugs can gyi yul d+ha na ko sha'i gling zhes bya ba nas bkra shis bde byed brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang la gtsug lag khang phra mo stong phrag drug brgya dang brgyad kyis bskor ba'i bar na/ gser gyi thag pa la dril bu g.yer kha'i drwa bas spras shing mi khyim 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa na rgyal po u pa rA dza dang btsun mo 'od ldan ma gnyis kyi sras mo su d+harma zhes bya ba'i dge slong ma zhig de las dpag tshad gcig 'das pa'i nub phyogs gser gyi bye ma brdal ba'i rgya mtsho'i gling na gdan la bzhugs pa'i rmi lam na shel las grub pa'i mi dkar po zhig gis shel gyi bum pa bdud rtsis gang ba zhig spyi bor bzhag nas dbang bskur bas stong gsum gyi 'jig rten 'od du gsal ba dus gcig la mthong ba rmis so/_/ de nyid g.yog mo la gsungs pas nyid la sangs rgyas kyi sras shig 'khrungs pa'i lhas lags zer ro/_/de nas zla ba dgu ngo dang bcu na rtsibs ma g.yas pa'i go bar nas khye'u mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa zhig bltams pa dang /_yum gyis smras pa/_pha med bu 'di 'jig rten 'dre las gzhan pa su/_/ gal te lha dang lha min sna tshogs gzugs/_/'di ltar byung ba'i dpe ni sus mthong med/_/'di ni log sred 'gro bas dpyas gyur sdig re che/_/zhes brjod nas thal ba'i khung bur bor ba las bar snang nas lha rnams kyis sku khrus gsol zhing /_mgon po chen po bcom ldan 'das/_/rang bzhin snang mdzad 'jig rten mgon/_/bdag kyang rab tu skyabs pa dang /_/nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag gsol/_/zhes bkra shis brjod cing mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis mchod pa'i sprin gtibs te lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas tsan+dan dang gur gum gyi char 'bebs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs pa dang /_dung 'bud pa dang /_rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dang / ba dan slong ba dang /_drang srong gi rgyal po rnams kyis kyang sman dang spos sna tshogs kyi sprin phung gtibs pa mthong nas slar blangs nas bzod par gsol te spos chu dang 'o mas bkrus te gsos pas mtsho chen po la gnas pa'i pad+ma ltar cher bskyed do/_/de nas lo bdun na chos thams cad kyi tshig don ma bslabs par thugs su 'khrungs te/_yum la paN+Di ta'i gnas su chos kyi gtam gleng du 'gro ba'i skabs dbye bar zhus pas gnang ste/_rgyal po u pa rA dza'i drung du byon nas paN+Di ta rnams dang mjal bar zhus te byon dus phan tshun phyi nang gi chos thams cad gtan la phab pas paN+Di ta rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te zhabs spyi bor blangs nas slob dpon chen po pra dz+nyA b+ha wa zhes bya bar mtshan gsol to/_/rgyal po yang shin tu dgyes te slob dpon chen po dga' rab rdo rjer mtshan gsol to/_/yum gyis thal ba'i khung bur bor yang ma gshegs pas slob dpon chen po ro langs thal mdog ces mtshan gsol to/_/yul mi rnams kyis yum gyis bkrongs kyang ma gshegs pas ngo mtshar che zhes brjod nas slob dpon [’]na po ro langs bde bar mtshan gsol to/_/ de nas byang phyogs ri bo nyi ma rang tu snang byed la lo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa'i tshul bstan nas 'og min du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' las rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i dbang yang gsang bla na med pa'i gdams pa dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par zhus te gnas pa las/ ri bo de nyid la me tog gi char 'bebs shing mu stegs kyi bstan pa nyams par byas so/_/zhes pa'i sgra skabs su byung bar de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na mu stegs kyi rgyal pos 'di'i rgyu ci yin grong khyer kun tu dris pas ba glang rdzi zhig na re/_brag ri'i drung nas drang srong zhig mnyam par bzhag pa'i 'khor yug tu me tog gi char 'bab cing rna bar rwa dung bus kyang mi sad*pa zhig 'dug_/de yin las che zer ro/_/de'i tshe rgyal pos gshed ma la bsgos nas slob dpon gyi drung du 'ongs pa dang rengs te/_slob dpon yang ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas sprin pa'i gseb la lam phyung ste gshegs pa mthong nas thams cad dang de rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bzod par gsol/_lta ba log pa dor nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bkod do/_/de nas sngar gyi sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i sde snod dang khyad par du rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi thugs la bzhugs pa rnams ri bo ma la ya rin po che rnam par spungs pa'i rtse mor rdo rje dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i ro ldan ma dang /_bde byed ser mo yon tan mtha' yas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gnyis kyis zhus te lo gsum du yi ger bkod nas mkha' 'gro ma rnam par 'du ba'i phug tu bzhugs so/_/de nas rdo rje gdan gyi byang shar dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal 'jig rten dang las las grub pa'i mkha' 'gro mi bsrun pa sna tshogs kyis gang zhing /_gser gyi mchod rten khri 'phang lnga pa dril bu 'phyar sna'i sgra sgrogs shing dbus na dag byed kyi mtsho yod sar slob dpon chen po dga' rab rdo rje nyid dgongs pa mdzad cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgya nag po'i yul grong khyer sho 'khyams nag po na khyim bdag dge ldan bzang po dang yum snang gsal ldan ma'i sras shrI seng+g+ha zhes bya ba 'khrungs te/_lo bco lnga na slob dpon ha sti b+ha la'i drung du sgra dang tshad ma dang rtsis la sogs pa rig pa'i gnas lnga la shin tu mkhas par bslabs nas grong khyer gser ldan du 'gro ba'i lam khar nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs byon nas lung bstan pa/_/_kye skal ldan tshe gcig gis 'bras bu nges par 'dod na dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du song zhig ces gsungs nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas 'bras bu gsang sngags nyid myur du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir lo bdun du sngags phyi nang gi don la thos pa bya'o snyam nas ri bo rtse lnga'i shar phyogs na gdol pa'i slob dpon b+he la rkirti las sngags phyi nang gi rgyud lung man ngag thams cad rdzogs par bslabs te re zhig snga dro'i tshe khrus kyi rdzing bur zhugs pa na thugs rje chen pos yang snga ma bzhin du lung bstan nas mi snang ba na rgya gar ni shin tu bgrod par dka'/_rkang mgyogs bsgrub la 'gro snyam nas lo gsum bsgrubs pas grub pa'i 'og tu rkang mgyogs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sa la khru gang gis ma reg par byon te nyin mtshan dgu na dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du slob dpon chen po dga' rab rdo rje dang mjal nas phyag 'tshal te zhabs spyi bor blangs shing bdag rjes su 'dzin par zhus pas gnang ste lo nyi shu rtsa lngar thig le mchog gi rgyud lung man ngag dang bcas pa'i dbang khrid zhus nas nyams su blangs pas 'od gsal chu yi zla ba lta bu'i lus thob nas mchog gi dngos grub brnyes par gyur to/_/de'i tshe dur khrod na gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang zhing skyong ba'i lang ka chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi srog gi snying po phul zhing bstan pa skyong bar khas blangs nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin phung chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pas gtibs so/_/de nas slob dpon chen po dpal gyi seng+ge nyid dur khrod de las nub byang du dpag tshad gsum 'das pa na dur khrod chen po rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal zhes bya ba nyin bzhin du rlung 'tshubs la mtshan bzhin du me 'bar ba 'jig rten gyi ma mo dang mkha' 'gro mang po rnam par rgyu ba dag byed kyi mtsho dang bde byed kyi mchod rten dang /_'jig rten pa'i lha dga' byed dbang phyug gi gnas yod sar byon te brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa mdzad cing mkha' 'gro ma rnams la chos ston pa'i phyir bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dpal o rgyan gyi yul rin po che 'bar ba'i grong khyer na bai DUr+ya'i pho brang phyi nang shin tu rnam par dag pa nor bu sgron me'i snang bas khyab pa na/_rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi de btsun mo brgya rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig phyi nang gi blon pos bskor te bzhugs pa la/_sras mi mnga' nas dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes bco lnga la dkon mchog mchod de chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba'i mdo sde bton nas sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs te skye bo thams cad la sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong nas lo mang zhig lon pa na dkor mdzod thams cad zad kyang slong mo ba rgyun ma chad nas las su bskos pa'i mis da ni mdzod khang thams cad zad pas khyed cag la sbyin du med do zhes smras pa dang /_glo bur lhags pa kha cig gis smras pa/_bdag cag rnams la ma sbyin na sngar byin pa thams cad don med do zhes brjod pa gsan nas rgyal pos longs spyod zad mi shes pa'i thabs dris pas phyi yi rgya mtsho'i gling na klu'i bu mo mdzes ldan ma'i gtsug na nor bu rin po che dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung ba yod de byang chub sems dpa' sems can la snying rje ldan pas bslang na ster bar 'gyur ro zhes thos nas phyi yi rgya mtsho las nor bu lan mang du blangs pa'i ded dpon zhig yod pa la bka' bsgo ba/_kho bo ni rgya mtsho'i gling las nor bu len par 'dod kyis lam bstan par rigs so zhes gsungs pas des kyang legs so zhes gsol te rgya mtshor dgos pa'i yo byad sta gon du byas so/_/blon po rnams kyis mi bzhud par gsol kyang ma gnang ste legs par grub pa'i nyi ma la gzings kyi nang du tshong pa lnga brgya'i 'khor dang lhan cig gshegs so/_/ de'i tshe phyogs bzhir dar po che bzhi phyar bas mthun pa'i rlung gis bskyod pa'i tshe 'gro/_mtshams bzhir zha nye'i pha wang bzhi 'phyangs pas mi mthun pa'i rlung gi tshe sdod/_dung dang phug ron dang bya rog rnams ni ri dang chu srin brtags nas bsad pa dang /_rang gi yul phyogs ngos gzung ba'i phyir khyer te gzings kyi nyag thag bcad nas dus dang mthun pa'i rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan mdzes pas ngang pa'i rgyal po mkha' la 'gro ba bzhin du song song ba las nyin zhag 'ga' na rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang nor bu sna tshogs kyi bye ma brdal bar phyin to/_de nyid du 'khor gzhan rnams bzhag ste rgyal po dang ded dpon gnyis po gru chung ngur zhugs nas nyin zhag 'gar song ba las/_ri dkar po gcig snang nas dris pa dang dngul gyi ri yin zer ro/_/yang de las kyang 'das te song ba las ri sngon po nam mkha' dngas pa'i mdog 'dra ba zhig mthong nas dris pas baiDUr+ya'i ri yin zer ro/_/de las kyang 'das te song ba'i mtshams na ri ser po zhig snang nas dris pas 'di ni gser gyi ri yin te bdag cag dong ba'i gnas lags so zhes smras te song ba las/_ri de'i drung na gser gyi bye ma brdal ba'i sa gzhi'i mtshams su slebs pa dang ded dpon gyis smras pa/_ri'i steng na rin po che sna bdun gyi khang bu brtsegs pa zhig yod do/_/de'i sgo drung na rdo rje'i gtun cig yod kyis de yis sgo de brdung la sems can la phan pa'i phyir nor bu 'dod do zhes brda sbyar nas ci yang mi smra bar bzhugs shig dang klu'i bu mo brgyas nor bu 'bul du 'ong gis de dag la ci yang ma smra zhig_/_/de nas klu'i bu mo mdzes ldan mas nor bu 'bul du 'ong gis de nyid myur du long la ma shor bar gos kyis gril te spyi bor bsnams la byon cig ces legs par gdams pa bzhin rin po che'i sgo drung du phyin nas sgo brdungs pas thog mar klu mo brgyas rin po che phul yang ma blangs par da dung sgo brdungs pas klu'i bu mo mdzes ldan ma sngon mo shin tu mdzes shing lta bas mi ngoms pa zhig phyir byung nas spyi gtsug gi nor bu phul ba dang /_myur bar log ste ded dpon dang lhan cig rang gi 'khor gyi gling der nor bu'i byin rlabs kyis nam mkha' la phyin pas na thams cad ya mtshan skyes te phyag byas pa dang ded dpon gyis legs par brtags pas rin po che sna bdun gzings su yang lci ran par brdzangs te kha lo bsgyur nas 'ongs pa dang /_rgya mtsho'i gling zhig na pad+ma'i sdong po shin tu mdzes pa'i steng na/_khye'u lo brgyad lon pa'i na tshod can shin tu mdzes shing lta bas mi ngoms pa mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa zhig mthong nas de'i drung du song nas rgyal pos smras pa/_khye'u khyod kyi pha ni gang /_ma ni gang /_rigs ni gang /_ming ni gang /_yul ni gang /_zas ni gang*/'dir don ci spyod dris pas/_khye'u des smras pa/_pha ni rang rig kun tu bzang /_ma ni chos dbyings kun bzang mo/_/ rigs ni dbyings rig gnyis su med/_/ming ni pad+ma 'byung gnas dpal/_/ yul ni chos dbyings ske ba med/_/zas ni gnyis snang rtog pa za/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i spyod pa byed/_/ces gsungs pas rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes nas sprul pa'i sku zhig 'khrungs pas bdag gi bur gsol ba gdab bo snyam nas smras pa/_bdag gi mchod gnas dang sras su gshegs par ci gnang zhus pas de ltar bgyi'o zhes gnang ba dang pad+ma'i sdong po bcad de khye'u de nyid nor bu rin po che dang bcas par rang gi 'khor gyis bskor te o rgyan gyi yul du phyin pa dang*/_pho brang 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad kyis bsu ba rgya chen po byas te bai DUr+ya'i pho brang du gshegs nas rgyal pos smon lam btab pa/_ngas rnyed pa'i nor bu 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsam 'phel chen po yin na pho brang 'dir khye'u 'di bzhugs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khri dang gdugs kyang yod par shog cig_/ces brjod ma thag tu de nyid byung bar 'gyur to/_/de la rgyal bu bzhugs te rgyal srid la mnga' gsol bas pad+ma rgyal po zhes grags so/_/de'ang 'di nyid rgya mtsho'i gling gi pad+ma las 'khrungs shing rgyal srid la mnga' gsol ba'i slad kyis so/_de nas rgyal pos smon lam btab pa nga'i pho brang 'khor du zhag bdun du rin po che'i char 'bab cing bang mdzod rnams kyang sngon pas gang bar shog cig ces brjod ma thag tu de bzhin du gyur to/_/ de'i tshe rnga bo che brdungs nas phyogs thams cad du bsgrags pa/_rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi des nor bu las dgos 'dod kyi char chen po 'bebs kyis su ci 'dod pa gang la gang 'dod pa thams cad longs shig ces brjod nas nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtser btags te mchod pas mchod nas rgyal pos khrus byas phyag btsal thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo/_ngas rnyed pa'i nor bu 'di yang dag pa yin nges na sems can rnams la gang 'dod pa de'i char phob cig ces brjod ma thag tu phyogs bzhi nas rlung langs te yul 'khor gyi mi gtsang ba thams cad phyag te char zim bur babs pas rdul phran thams cad mi ldang par mnan te dang por kha zas ro brgya pa'i char babs pas bkres shing skom pa thams cad tshims par byas/_de nas gos kyi char babs pas 'khyags shing sbrebs pa thams cad bgo ba dang ldan/ de nas nor gyi char babs pas gang la ci 'dod pa'i re ba thams cad yid bzhin du grub nas rgyal 'bangs thams cad dbul phongs dang bral ba na rgyal pos bka' bsgo ba/_khyed rnams mi dge ba thams cad spongs la rtag tu dam pa'i chos la spyod cig ces gsungs nas byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed du bcug pas thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/de nas slob dpon gyis rgyal srid ni thar pa'i chos dang mi mthun zhing sems can gyi don yang mi 'byung bar dgongs nas rgyal po dang blon po rnams sun dbyung ba'i phyiRa brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa mdzad de gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa kha TAM ka rtse gsum pa zhig bzung nas gar mdzad pas pho brang gi rtser gar la blta ba'i mi mang po tshogs pa la kha TaM ka phyag nas shor ba ltar mdzad nas/_de nang blon chen po ka ma ta'i bu'i mgo la bsnun nas shi bar gyur pa dang /_rgyal po'i khrims las sus 'das kyang chad pa'i las la spyod pas blon po kun tshogs te rgyal po la gsol ba/ lha rgyal buRa mnga' gsol yang blon po'i bu nyes pa med par bsad pas gsal shing gi rtse la bzhag nas chad pas bcad 'tshal zhus pas/_rgyal pos gal gyis gcus kyang ma nyan nas 'o na spyugs par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pas legs so zhes bstod do/_/_/de nas rgyal po thugs ma bde bzhin du slob dpon la gsungs pa/_rin chen mtsho dkyil pad+ma'i sdong po las/_/pha dang ma med rang byung sprul pa'i sku/_/brtul zhugs spyod pas blon po'i phrug gu bkums/_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal khrims chad pas gcod/_/gsod las spyug par gnang bas gang dgar bzhud/_ces brjod pa dang slob dpon gyis gsungs pa/_'jig rten 'di na pha dang ma dkon par/_/yab dang yum gyis rgyal srid nyid la bkod/_/yul la zhen med skyugs kyang 'jigs pa med/_/ ske shi gnyis med bsad kyang 'jigs pa med/_/rgyal srid gnyan pas spyugs kyang shin tu legs/_/yab yum dag kyang yun du bde bar bzhugs/_/las kyis 'brel pas phyis nas mjal bar nges/_/zhes brjod nas phyag 'tshal te song ba las/_blon po rnams kyis o rgyan yul gyi lho phyogs dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal mi ma yin dang gcan gzan ma rungs pa rnams kyis gang ba 'jigs shing skyi bung ba'i nang du bskyal lo/_/yul de'i mi shi tshad de ru skyel bas ro zas dang ro gos la longs spyod cing brtul zhugs mdzad pas mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du 'dus te pad+ma thod phreng rtsal zhes mtshan gsol to/_/de nas
