dur khrod chen po dga' ba'i tshal du spyod pa mdzad pas ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma bdud 'dul mas dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs/_so sa'i gling du zhi ba 'tshos dbang bskur zhing mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis bstod do/_/de nas sngar pad+ma las 'khrungs pa'i gling der byon nas rgya mtsho'i gling gi mkha' 'gro ma bzhi dbang du mdzad/_rdo rje phag mos dbang bskur zhing rgyud dang gdams pa mtha' dag gsungs/_rgya mtsho'i klu dang /_bar snang gi gza' dang /_lha ma srin sde brgyad dang /_zhing skyong dang /_las byed dang / shugs 'gro ma la sogs pa 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i mkha' 'gro thams cad grub cing dbang du mdzad nas rdo rje drag po rtsal te mtsho skyes rdo rje zhes mtshan gsol zhing mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub chen po brnyes so/_/de ltar grub pa thob cing chos thams cad la mnga' brnyes te rang bzhin sprul pa'i sku chen por bzhugs kyang 'gro ba'i khams dang mos pa sna tshogs pas de dag slob dpon med pas mi dad pa bzlog pa'i phyir rgya gar gyi mkhas grub rnams la thos bsam mdzad pa'i tshul ni/_de nas za hor gyi slob dpon chen po bra b+ha ha sti'i drung du rab tu byung ste shAkya'i seng+ger mtshan gsol nas phyi nang gi chos mtha' dag dang /_khyad par du rnal 'byor gyi rgyud yo ga dza mun ta yA dang /_ta thA saM kra ha dang /_yo ga tsar+ya la sogs pa ma lus par mkhyen par mdzad cing rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor zhal gzigs te yo ga tshe yi rig 'dzin la mnga' brnyes so/_/de nas rgya gar lho phyogs kyi rgyud du slob dpon chen po klu sgrub snying po las sgra dang /_tshad ma dang /_nang gi de kho na nyid nges pa'i grub pa'i mtha' dbu ma chen po la sogs pa rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa mtha' dag dang*/_'bras bu rdo rje theg pa ma lus pa gsan nas mkhyen pa mdzad cing rnal 'byor chen po'i dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa'i zhal gzigs so/_/de nas mu stegs pa dang rtsod pa mdzad pas grub pa'i mtha' dang rdzu 'phrul 'gran pas mu stegs pa pham nas nags tshal du mthu byas pas rdzu 'phrul gyis nags la me sbar te sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bkod pas slob dpon chen po seng+ge sgra sgrogs zhes mtshan gsol to/_/de nas dge slong ma kun dga' mo'i drung du thugs rje chen po yid bzhin 'khor lo la sogs pa pad+ma gsung gi sgrub sde gsan cing grub pa brnyes/_slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyi spyan sngar 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba la sogs pa gsang sngags bla na med pa'i rgyud lung man ngag thams cad gsan cing 'jam dpal zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor zhal gzigs/_slob dpon hUM ka ra'i spyan sngar he ru ka gal po'i rgyud la sogs pa yang dag thugs kyi rgyud lung mtha' dag gsan cing dngos grub brnyes/_slob dpon pra b+ha ha sti'i drung du kI la ya mngon 'byung gi rgyud la sogs pa rdo rje phur pa'i chos sde mtha' dag gsan nas rdo rje gzhon nu'i zhal gzigs/_slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba'i drung du gsang ba'i snying po la sogs pa zhi khro sgyu 'phrul gyi rgyud sde mtha' dag gsan cing /_slob dpon rdo rje mi 'gyur las bdud rtsi yon tan gyi rgyud sde thams cad gsan/_slob dpon d+ha na saM skr-i ta las srid pa ma mo'i rgyud sde mtha' dag gsan/_slob dpon ram+bu gu ya d+he ba'i spyan sngar dmod pa drag sngags kyi rgyud dang /_'jig rten mchod bstod kyi rim pa mtha' dag mkhyen par mdzad pas slob dpon chen po blo ldan mchog sred du mtshan gsol te/ 'dzam bu gling na ji snyed bzhugs pa'i chos so cog ma lus pa mkhyen par mdzad nas sa'i steng na 'gran pa'i zla med cing rgyan du gyur te mkhas shing grub pa brnyes par grags so/_/rgya gar shar nub la sogs pa'i phyogs gang dang gang du bzhugs pa thams cad du nyi ma'i zer la chibs nas gshegs pas slob dpon chen po nyi ma 'od zer zhes mtshan gsol zhing /_za hor rgyal po gtsug lag 'dzin gyi bu mo me tog man+d+ha ra ba dbang du mdzad nas nags la bzhugs pa las 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dus la babs nas yab yum gnyis grong khyer du bsod snyoms la gshegs pas mi rnams ma dad de dge sbyong gi gzugs can 'dis rgyal po'i rigs bslad cing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rma phyung bas dur khrod du sregs shig zer nas thams cad kyis tsan dan gyi shing khur re dang til mar khal re/_ro ras yug res dril nas bsregs pas zhag dgur du ba ma chad nas bltas pas me lce phyir 'bar nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams tshig cing*/_til mar rgya mtshor 'khyil ba'i dbus na pad+ma'i sdong po la yab yum gnyis bzhugs pa mthong nas 'gyod de bshags pa byas nas rjes su gzung bar zhus pas grong khyer gyi me zhi zhing chos gsungs pas thams cad kyis chos kyi mig rdul dang bral ba rnyed nas pad+ma 'byung gnas zhes bstod cing 'dun to/_/de nas o rgyan gyi yul du byon pa na sngar gyi mi kun gyis ngo shes te blon po'i bu gsod pa de gnod pa skyel du byung gis sregs shig ces bsgrags te snga ma bzhin bsregs pas zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dud pa ma chad nas bltas pas snga ma ltar 'dug pa mthong nas bzod par gsol nas pad+ma thod phreng rtsal zhes bstod cing rjes su gzung bar zhus pas lo brgyad bzhugs te gsang sngags kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur zhing chos gsungs pas o rgyan gyi yul khams thams cad chos la bkod/_rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi 'khor tshom bu dang bcas pas grub pa thob nas mkha' spyod du gshegs so/_/de nas rdo rje phag mos lung bstan pa/_skal ldan 'bras bu tshe gcig nges pa'i lung /_/gang dang mi 'dra kun gyis ma rtogs pa/_shr-i sid+ha rdo rje'i thugs la gnas/_/rtsub 'gyur tshal du dgongs pa rnyed par 'gyur/_/ zhes gsungs pa dang skad cig gis rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi dur khrod chen por rdzu 'phrul gyis byon te slob dpon chen po shrI sid+ha la phyag dang bskor ba mdzad nas rjes su gzung bar zhus pas gnang ste/_rdzogs pa chen po nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud la sogs pa sems klong man ngag gi skor mtha' dag gsungs shing /_khyad par du thig le phyi nang gsang ba'i skor ma lus pa gsan dus yang zhus pa/_slob dpon chen po lags/_tshe 'di nyid la zag bcas kyi phung po mi snang bar longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i zhing khams mthong zhing /_chos kyi sku'i zhing khams su sangs rgyas pa'i gdams ngag cig gnang bar zhu 'tshal zhes gsol ba dang /_shrI sid+has gsungs pa/_rigs kyi bu shin tu legs kyis chos thams cad kyi yang rtse/_lta ba thams cad kyi zhe phugs/_theg pa thams cad las 'das shing*/mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi snying tig_/gsang ba bas kyang ches shin tu gsang ba'i don/_'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i theg pa chen po/_sems las 'das pa/_yid dang bral ba/_rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa/_yin min gyi mtha' la mi gnas shing lta sgom bskyed rdzogs kyi yul las 'das pa/_dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi yum/_rig 'dzin chen po rnams kyi nye lam/_mthar thug pa'i man ngag bla na med pa/_lo gsum gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'grub pa'i gdams pa zhig yod kyis bstan par bya'o gsungs nas/_rdzogs pa chen po mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dbang dang /_de'i nyams len man ngag yi ger rab tu mang po dang / de'i rgyab brten du sgra thal 'gyur rtsa ba'i rgyud/_yi ge med pa gzhi'i rgyud/_sku gdung 'bar ba rtags kyi rgyud/_/rdzogs pa rang byung dbang gi rgyud/_/do sprod spras pa'i rgyud/_sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud/_rig pa rang shar gyi rgyud/_rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long gi rgyud/_rin po che spungs pa'i rgyud/_nyi zla kha sbyor gyi rgyud/_nor bu phra bkod kyi rgyud/_rig pa rang grol gyi rgyud/_mu tig phreng ba'i rgyud/_kun tu bzang po thugs kyi me long gi rgyud/_bkra shis mdzes ldan gyi rgyud/_seng ge rtsal rdzogs kyi rgyud/_klong drug pa'i rgyud/_kun tu bzang mo klong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud dang bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par gsungs shing bstan pa gtad de lo nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du gdams pa'i thos bsam mdzad cing bzhugs so/_/de nas dur khrod chen po so sa'i gling du byon/_lo gsum nyams su blangs pas skye shi gnyis spangs chu'i zla ba lta bu'i sku grub nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyis gnas rnam pa sna tshogs su mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba rab tu mang po la phan pa mdzad cing /_khyad par rgya gar gyi rgyal po d+harmA pa la'i mchod gnas su nyin par bzhugs shing /_mtshan mo dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal dang /_so sa gling dang /_rab tu snang byed dang /_dga' byed dang /_b+ha sing dang /_tha chung dang /_'jigs byed la sogs par byon te/ mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i sprin phung dang lhan cig gsang sngags kyi kun tu spyod pas gnas par mdzad do//_// !_de'i tshe bod kyi yul gangs ri'i ra bas brgyan pa'i nang brag dmar mtsho mo'i mgul dang nye ba na/_bsil khang gi pho brang 'og gzhi pad+ma'i drwa ba ltar bkod legs pa'i steng tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang*/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i lding khang na/_rgyal po khri lde gtsug brtan dang btsun mo gyim shing kong jo gnyis rin po che'i khri la gzims pa'i rmi lam du rgya nag po'i ri bo rtse lnga nas 'od nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i rtse las khye'u zhig byung nas btsun mo'i lhums su zhugs pa rmis te rgyal po la bshad pas hwa shang mngon shes mkhan zhig bzhugs pa la dris pas/_sras byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa zhig 'khrungs pa'i ltas legs pas rim gro cher bskyed cig ces zer ro/_/de nas zla ba dgu ngo dang bcu na khye'u shin tu mdzes pa mi'i bu mi 'dra ba lha'i sras 'dra ba gcig bltams so/_/de'i tshe pho brang gi byang shar du tshe dpag tu med pa'i mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad bzhengs pa'i 'jim pa lhag ma las mchod rten gcig brtsegs pas gzug ma thub nas bres thag gis bsdams pas gled por shor zhes thams cad bzhad gad dir dir byung bas de'i ming mchod rten gled po bres thag can zhes grags shing rgyal po sku tshe ring bar rtogs so/_/rta'i lo'i dpyid zla ra ba'i skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par sku bltams pa'i btsas ston rgya chen po mdzad nas mtsho chen po'i pad+ma ltar cher bskyed pa las lo dus su zhabs 'dzugs pa dang mtshan gsol ba'i dga' ston gyi tshe ming ci gdags bka' bgros pa las rgyal bu nyid bzhengs nas gnam lha babs kyi rgyal po/_sa lhun grub kyi mnga' bdag_/mgo nag yongs kyi spyi rje/_sprul pa'i rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan lags so zhes gsungs pas/ bod 'bangs thams cad ya mtshan skyes nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'dun no/_/de nas dgung lo bcu gsum la yab dgung du gshegs nas rgyal sras mnga' gsol zhing bzhugs pa las/_blon po chen po ma zhang grom pa skyes dbang che nas chos dar du ni ma btub/_thams cad bon la bkod nas chab srid 'dzin pa'i tshe rgyal po thugs ma bde nas/_blon po chen po 'gos la bod thams cad dam pa'i chos la dgod pa'i thabs dris pas/_'gos kyi mchid nas de shin tu legs pas rgyal po sku chag che ba'i glud du blon po chen po gnyis lo gsum ma chod par bcug na phan zhes sgrog tu gzhug gis/_de dus de ltar mdzad par zhu zhes gleng nas mo rtsis pa rnams la brngan pa byin nas sgrog tu bcug pas rgyal khams thams cad du bsgrags pa'i tshe rgyal pos blon 'khor kun bsags nas nga'i glud la 'gro nus su yod dris pas/_'gos rgan po langs te ngas gcig 'gro bar zhu zer ba dang /_ma zhang yang 'gran pas langs te ngas kyang 'gro bar zhu zer ro/_/de nas stod lung brang mdar ma chod pa brtsigs te lo gsum gyi yo byad dang blon chen po gnyis bcug dus/_gyad kyi sku blon ta ra klu gong la rgyal pos 'gos rgan thon cig gsungs pas/_ta ra kla gong gis ma chod pa'i sgo pha wang chen pos gcod dus/_'gos kyis bya rgod kyi lham dang thul pa gyon nas/_phab gol gol thogs te bug sgor 'ongs pa'i phyi bzhin ma zhang gis kyang 'brangs pas/_thal mo brdabs nas phan zhes lags pa deng byas pas/_/_ta ra klu gong gis yar then pa la ma zhang gis 'jus pas rgod spu spar gang thob nas lus so/_/de nas klu gong gi sgo bcad de mchad pa srung mi bzhag nas tshur 'ongs te/_rgya tsha lhas snang byang mi med lung stong du gnag rta 'tshol ba snyad btags nas spyugs/_sbal rgyal to ri 'dzum ltag dgyed kyis shi bas chos la mi dga' ba'i blon po cig kyang med pa'i tshe/_sba sangs shi la gser phye bre gang rdzongs nas paN+Di ta gdan 'dren par mngags so/_/de nas 'gos kyi rgyal po la gsol pa/_/_bod kyi blon 'khor ni chos la dad pa nyung bas dang po nas gtsug lag khang bzhengs par byas na mi dga' bas thabs byed dgos so/_/thams cad tshogs pa na sngon gyi yab mes rnams kyi phyug ris dang mnga' thang rgya cher mdzad pa'i rjes su 'jug dgos pas/_shangs ri mi 'gyur rin po che'i rtse la shel gyi mkhar thog stong dang ldan pa shar phyogs su zhang po rgya yi yul mthong ba gcig brtseg gam/_khas pu ri zangs kyi sbubs su 'thum mam/_wa lung grog po gser phyes 'gengs sam/_ka chu'i thang la khron pa 'dom dgu brgya dang dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod pa zhig 'bru'am/_gtsug lag khang bre'i zhabs tsam zhig bzhengs/_gang byed dris shig ces zhus nas/_lo gsar rgyal gyi zla ba la thams cad tshogs pa'i tshe rgyal pos de skad bka' stsal pa dang /_thams cad lan ma thebs par kha rog lus pa las 'gos kyis langs te/_rje gcig lags shangs ri'i steng du shel gyi mkhar zhang po rgya yi yul mthong ba sus kyang mi 'gyongs/_'gyongs kyang de la dgos pa chung /_bod kyi phru ba dang gzar bu yan chod zangs su song yang khas pu ri mi thum/_wa lung grog po tsang 'gram gyi bye mas kyang mi khengs na gser phyes ga na khengs/_ka chu'i thang la khron pa 'dom gang 'drus pa dang chus khengs nas 'dra sa med na dgu brgya dang dgu bcu rtsa dgu ji ltar 'dru/_/ de bas kyang gtsug lag khang bre zhabs tsam zhig bzheng na tshe 'di phyi gnyis kar bde zhing mthar thugs sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob pa zhig 'byung bas de mi 'thad lags sam zhes zhus pas/_bod 'bangs kyi blon 'khor thams cad dga' ste 'thad di rir byung ngo /_/de'i tshe sangs shis bal yul du phyin te paN+Di ta su mkhas dris pas/_shAn+ta rak+Shi ta mkhas par thos nas btsal bas bal po lha mangs kyi gtsug lag khang na bzhugs pa'i drung du gser phye phul nas zhus pas/_mkhan po zhi ba 'tsho'i zhal nas ngas lo dgu brgya sgug pa las khyed kyi rgyal po de da dung ma byung /_re 'phyi rgyal po btsas dus nga'i so med pa las gcig po 'di phyis skyes so zhes gsungs te bod yul du byon nas rje blon kun gyis bsu ba mdzad de gtsug lag khang brtsig pa'i bka' bgros pa las rgyal po'i zhal nas sngar gyi yab mes kyis bzhengs pa'i lha khang las ches lhag pa 'dzam bu'i gling na 'gran gyis do zla dang bral ba zhig bzheng* pas bkod pa mdzad par zhu gsungs pa dang /_mkhan po bo d+hi sa twa'i zhal nas 'o na sngon rnal 'byor pa zhig gis mi ro gser du bsgrubs pa'i lce las mkha' spyod du 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul phal cher grub nas/_dge tshul gcig ro'i lce gcod du bcug pa'i ral gri bzung bas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi yul nas gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa'i bkod pa mthong ste/_phyir log nas ral gri rnal 'byor pa la gtad pa'i brngan par ro nyid ji ltar bcad kyang gser du song ba las gzhi blangs nas/_rgya gar shar phyogs na o tan ta gtsug gi nor bu'i gtsug lag khang zhes bya ba yod pas de la dpe blangs te bzheng par bya'o gsungs nas sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs te rgyal pos gser gyi 'jor bsnams nas brkos pas 'bras phul bdun dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi sil ma phul gang byung dus mkhan po'i zhal nas/_si ti si ti/_pha la pha la gsungs pas ci gsung dris pa na/_lo tsA ba na re 'grub bo 'grub bo bzang bzang zhes gsungs pa yin zer ro/_/de nas rmang bting nas brtsig pas brag dmar gyi bu'i ri rnga mo 'dra ba'i rtse la bod kyi lha 'dre kun tshogs nas lha 'dre'i dmag gis nyin brtsegs pa kun mtshan bshig nas brtsig tu ma ster ro/_/de'i tshe rgyal po dang blon po chen po 'gos pad+ma gung btsan gnyis kyis paN+Di ta la zhus pa/_sngar mi rnams kyis bar chad byas/_da ni mi ma yin rnams kyis bar chad byas pas ji ltar byas kyang dam pa'i chos dar du mi ster ba lags sam ji ltar bgyi zhes brjod dus mkhan pos gsungs pa/_bod kyi yul lha ma srin ma bye ba'i sa 'di gdul shin tu dka' yang thabs mchis te/ sngon rgya gar gyi yul ma ga ta'i grong khyer na bya rdzi mo bde mchog ces bya ba la bu gsum yod pa las/_ma tshe'i dus byas pa na bu rnams kyi de'i dge rtsar mchod rten bya rung kha shor shes bya shin tu che ba gcig bzhengs nas phu bos smon lam btab pa/_ma 'ongs pa'i tshe mtha' 'khob chos med pa mun pa'i smag rum dang 'dra bar bdag gis dam pa'i chos dar zhing rgyas par byed pa'i rgyal por gyur cig ces brjod pa dang /_/_gnyis pa de'i smon pa/_/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dgos pas rab tu byung ba'i mkhan por gyur cig ces brjod pa dang /_tha chung des smon pa/_de'i tshe chos la bar du gcod pa thams cad bsrung ba'i sngags mkhan mthu stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod pa dang /_sa rdo bskyel ba'i bong bu des smon pa/_de'i tshe chos la mi dga' ba'i blon po dbang po che zhig tu gyur cig ces brjod pa dang /_bran g.yog *cig*gis*thos*nas*de nyid las bzlog par sems bskyed do//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi phu bo ni rgyal po'o/_/bar ma ni kho bo'o/_/gsum pa ni rgya gar gyi yul na rgyal po d+harmA pha la'i mchod gnas su o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas zhes bya ba mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa/_mthu dang rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med pa zhig bzhugs pa de yin no/_/bong bu ni zhang grom pa skyes so/_/bran g.yog ni 'gos pad+ma gung btsan no/_/de bas na slob dpon chen po pad+ma saM b+ha wa spyan drongs shig gsungs so/_/de nas sbas mang po rje gsal snang dang /_seng mgo klu dpal gnyis la gseRa phye bre gsum dang g.yog gsum rdzongs te mi lnga rgya gar du chas pa slob dpon gyis mkhyen te/ rgya gar yul nas rdzu 'phrul gyis mang yul rdza yi ra bar g.ya' ri gong gi brag phug tu byon te zla ba gsum du bzhugs pa'i 'og tu bang chen pa mi lnga dang mjal te mkhyen bzhin du gar 'gro gsungs was/_de rnams kyi nged bod kyi rgyal pos slob dpon chen po pad+ma gdan 'dren du gtong bas rgya gar du 'gro zhes zhus pa dang*/_slob dpon zhabs sa la ma reg par bzhugs te de ni nga yin te khyed rnams re 'phyi/_zla ba gsum du 'dir bsdad pa yin gsungs pas thams cad dad pa skyes te thugs rje re che zer nas phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas gser rnams phul bas da dung phul cig gsungs pa'i tshe rang rang gi gos lham yang phul dus da dung phul cig gsungs pas rang rang brkyang phyag 'tshal te lus phul bas shin tu mnyes te gsungs pa/_bod kyi dad pa la g.yo zog e 'dug bltas pa yin gyis gser gyis ci byed/'dod na snang srid thams cad gser du yod gsungs nas phul ba'i gser rnams gtor bas/_bang chen pa rnams sems phongs cung zad skyes pa la thu bar bye ma blugs te dar cig na gser du song bas ngo mtshar skyes so/_/de nas mang yul gyi g.yas kyi ri rnams g.yon du spos/_g.yon gyi ri rnams g.yas su bzhag pas dad pa lhag par skyes nas brkyang phyag byas te gshegs par zhus nas byon dus/_zhang zhung gi bstan ma mu dza med kyis ri gnyis su brdzus nas de'i bar du dpon slob kun btsir ba na/_kha TAM ka'i yu bas gcig phar bsgyel/_gcig tshur bsgrel nas sdigs mdzub mdzad pas mo dngangs shing bred nas srog snying phul te srung mar khas blangs pas gsang mtshan gangs kyi yum chen rdo rje g.yu bun mar btags so/_/de nas byang gnam thang la byon pas gnam sman dkar mos thog phab pa slob dpon gyi phyag gi mthil du chu me long gang bsnams par babs pas khrag sran ma'i ga'u tsam bdun du song bas ngo mtshar skyes te phyag 'tshal te dpal mo dpal mtshor bras pa las slob dpon gyis rdo rje gcig brgyab pas mtsho khol zhing mig ya gcig zhar nas sha rus bye ste keng rus kyi rnam par byas nas bzod par gsol te srog snying phul bas/_ming yang sha med gangs dkar rdo rje spyan gcig mar btags so/_/de nas 'o yug na mar byon dus bod kyi bstan ma bcu gnyis kyis ri yi bar du btsir ba'i rdzu 'phrul bstan pas phyag 'khar gyis so sor bor te/_g.ya' ri gangs ri sman ri la sogs pa bstan ma'i gnas phal cher ba shig_kha rag tshal pa gnyis su mdzad pas shin tu bred de srog snying phul nas bka' yi bsrung ma dang bod du mu stegs mi 'jug pa'i dam tshig khas blangs so/_/de nas lce yul sha bo lung du chags phebs dus sham pos g.yag chen po ri dang / mnyam par brdzus nas bar chad brtsams pas/_sdigs mdzub cig mdzad dus byis pa zur phud lnga pa cig tu song te srog snying phul nas dam la btags so/_/de nas sku lha thang lha'i rtsar byon pa na thang lhas gnod sbyin stobs po cher sprul te za byed kyi mche ba gtsigs pa na sdigs mdzub mdzad pa tsam gyis byis pa lo brgyad pa'i tshul tsam du song nas bzod par gsol te srog gi snying po phul nas slob dpon dpon slob la dro drangs te/_kha zas dang spyan gzigs dpag tu med pas mchod do/_/de nas byang lam las 'phan yul du gshegs pa'i lam du byang gi ting ting ting lo sman dang /_stag sman gyi sdong dang /_byang phug gnam sman gsum gyis byang thun gsum gyi lhags pa thams cad dus gcig tu bsdus nas slob dpon 'khor dang bcas pa la brgyab pas/_thams cad me phung gcig tu sgom dus sman gyi gnas thams cad tshig cing bzod par gsol te gnod sbyin ming sring ma lus pa dam la btags so/_/de'i tshe 'phan yul lung pa gzigs pas rta ro dmar po kha phye ba 'dra ba'i lung pa la mi 'gro gsungs nas stod lung du byon te/_gram bu tshal du gung cig bzhugs te btsan thams cad dam la btags nas lam bar byon dus bdud thams cad dam la btags shing /_g.ya' ri gong du rgyal po thams cad dam la btags nas/_gzhong par chags phebs dus dro la babs nas chu med pa la kha TAM ga'i yu ba lan bdun sa la brdungs pa'i shul nas yar la chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rka bdun byung ba la gzhong pa'i lha chu rka bdun zhes grags so/_/de nas zur mkhar la byon dus rgyal blon kun gyis bsu ba chen po mdzad dus/_rgyal po'i thugs dgongs la nga chos skyong ba'i rgyal po yin pas thog mar nga la phyag byed dam snyam pa slob dpon gyis mkhyen nas chibs lcag brag khar tshugs shig gsungs te/_phyag ya gcig dengs mdzad pas brag 'byung po'i snying dang 'dra ba tshal pa gsum du gas shing /_'jol ber gyi mtha' chag la me ram ram byung bas 'jigs shing ngo mtshar skyes nas phyag dbu thod bud bud btsal bskor ba byas nas pho brang du spyan drangs pas thog mar ri 'di'i steng du 'gro gsung nas khas pu ri'i rtse la gshegs te rdo la sbyin sreg mdzad pas rang bzhin gyis me 'bar te bod kyi lha 'dre thams cad dam la btags nas pho brang du spyan drangs te gser gyi seng+ge'i khri sum brtsegs la bzhugs dus/_zhal zas dang 'jig rten gyi spyan gzigs sna tshogs bshams/_gser gyi maN+Dal la g.yu yi tshom bu bkram pa phul nas sa gzhi 'dul bar zhus pas slob dpon gyi zhal nas/_bod kyi yul 'di lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis bdag byas shing /_khyad par klu yi dbang byas par 'dug pas lam du yang mang po btul nas mchis/_byang shar gyi yul pha gi na bod yul dbus la dbang byed pa'i klu zhig 'dug pas/_der klu gter gzhug par bya'o gsungs nas mal gror byon te klu'i rgyal po mal gro gzi byin las sa bslangs shing klu gter rin po che sna tshogs bcug nas/_mal gro'i mdar byon dus skam 'phrang na nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba mang po gzigs nas/ de dag gi don du thugs rje chen po 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi cho ga dang /yo ga ngan song sbyong ba'i cho ga mdzad pas/_nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba pa rnams sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes nas me tog gi char babs so//deng sang ni mal gro skam 'phrang gi rdo ba rnams mig tshags ltar snang zhing*/_sa phyogs de zabs ring ba'i rtags su sding sding zhes grags so/_/de nas has po rir byon nas klu sman dang sa bdag la chu gtor byin nas dam la btags dus/_khams kyi rma chen pom ra 'ong du ma btub nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas bkug pas/_rkang pa ya gcig g.yer mo thang la bzhag_/ya gcig has po ri la bzhag nas bdag ni btsan zhing che ba zhig lags na ci bgyi zer dus/_rgyal po'i dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs par sgrubs shig ces bka' bsgo'o/_/de'i tshe snang srid kyi lha ma srin sde brgyad dbang du bsdus shing dam la btags nas gtsug lag khang rtseg pa'i grogs dang /_chos dar ba'i dam tshig khas len du bcug ste/ sa 'dul bar dgongs nas ji tsam zhig gi rgya khyon dang mnyam pa'i lha khang bzheng dris pas/_rgyal po nyid kyi mda' rgyang dang mnyam pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsig par dam bcas pas/_blon po 'phrul gyi dgongs pa mnga' ba rnams kyi bgros pa/_rgyal po'i mda' rgyang ni phal pa'i rtsal po che gsum las ring bas de tsam ni bzheng yang mi zin/_zin kyang phyi rabs kyi tshe bskyang bar dka' bas/_mda' blon po'i mda' la mdzad par gsol nas 'phen du 'jug dgos/_bka' stsal pa las 'gal na'ang mi rung ngo zer nas rgyal po gsol bas de ltar bgyi 'o gsungs pa'i tshe/_mda'i smyug mar dngul chus bkang nas mi mngon par byas te phul pa nyid 'phangs pas/_sngon las phyed tsam gyis rgyang thung bar lus pas 'di bas ring bar 'gro snyam nas mda' la gzigs pas blon po'i 'phrul du shes te bod 'bangs kyi bsod nams la de las ma shong /_rgyal po smra ba lan cig yin pas sa 'di tsam zhig la brtsig pas 'dul bar zhu gsungs so/_/_/da lta ni phal pa'i mda' rgyang phyed dang gnyis lcags ri mu khyud kyi shar nub dang lho byang gi tshad du snang ngo /_/de nas slob dpon gyis he ru ka'i gar dang rdo rje'i 'gros kyis sa btul ba'i phyi bzhin rmang bting bas/_phyi lcags ri mu khyud rdo rje'i 'gros zur mig mangs ris su byung ngo /_/de'i tshe las dpon chen po bzhi bskos te phyogs bgos nas rgya dkar nag_/zhang zhung /_sum pa/_lho bal gar log_/li mang yul la sogs pa'i bzo bo mkhas pa mang pos nyin par bzhengs shing /_mtshan mo lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis las dpon byas te mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bzhengs pas/_nyin brtsigs pa bas nub brtsigs pas mtho zhing /_ri mo dang /_shing bzo dang /_lder tsho yang mtshan mos legs pa byung ngo /_/de ltar bzhengs pa'i tshe dbu rtse chen por shar phyogs mchod rten sngon po dang shar gyi gling gsum lcags ri dang bcas pa'i las dpon ni mchims rdo rje spre'u chung gis byas te shar bya bkras brtsigs so/_/rigs gsum gyi lho ngos mchod rten dkar po lho'i gling gsum lcags ri dang bcas pa'i las dpon shud pu dpal gyi seng+ges byas nas lho shud pus brtsegs so/_/dbu rtse nub ngos mchod rten dam ra po nub kyi gling gsum lcags ri dang bcas pa'i las dpon zhang rgya tsha lhas snang byang nas bos te bcol bas/_nub sna nam pas brtsegs pas cung zad mi legs par mngon pa de yin no/_/byang ngos mchod rten nag po byang gi gling gsum lcags ri dang bcas pa'i las dpon sbas mang po rjes byas nas byang sbas non gyis brtsigs so/_/de'i tshe nyin mtshan du mi dang mi ma yin gyis sa rdo dang 'jim gzugs byed pa'i bswo sgra dang 'ur sgra dpag tu med pa byung ngo /_/_/de'i tshe slob dpon gyis mi ma yin rnams dam la 'dus ma 'dus dgongs pa la bzhugs te gzigs pas klu'i rgyal po las gzhan rnams bka' nyan cing 'dus la klu de'i lus dam la thogs pas rtsigs grogs byed/ ngag dam la thogs pas bka' nyan zer gyin 'dug kyang yid dam la ma thogs pas gnod sems 'chang ba gzigs nas mchims phur gshegs te klu gzir ba'i cho ga zhag bdun mdzad par bzhed nas zhag lnga song dus klus shing thams cad mi snang bar sbas pas shing bzo ba kun sti'u klad la bskor zhing shing ga na yod zer dus rgyal po'i spyan sngar khye'u lo brgyad lon pa'i na tshod cig byung nas sa'i steng na mi'i rgyal po khyed las che ba med/_sa'i 'og na klu'i rgyal po nga las che ba med pas grogs po bya'o/_khyed kyi gtsug lag khang gi shing thams cad ngas klu'i yul nas dbul lo/_/nga la zhu ba cig yod pas thugs la 'dogs par zhu zer ba la rab tu dgyes ches nas de bzhin bgyi 'o gsungs pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po mal gro rgyu dal gyis rgya mtsho'i gling las tsan+dan sna tshogs dang /_gla ba dang /_gsom dang thang shing la sogs pa la rdo rje'i 'dam byugs nas 'dzig 'khrul med par byas te/_me yar gyi mtsho la drangs pa mi rnams kyis blangs so/_/de nas klus rgyal po la da nga'i zhu ba de thugs la 'dogs par zhu zhes brjod pas ci yin dris pa'i lan du/_mchims phu na slob dpon pad+ma la dgongs pa glod par zhus shig zer ro/_/der rgyal pos slob dpon la cis kyang dgongs pa glod par zhus pas/_slob dpon gyi zhal nas shing la mi thegs pa yin te bka' nan che bas de ltar bgyi'o/_/slad ma'i tshe bod kyi yul du sa bdag klu gnyan gyi nad mi 'byung ba zhig bya snyam pa yin te phan med/_phyi ma'i dus na mdze rigs bco brgyad dar bas sems can la gnod cing mi yul kha cig chus gang nas 'jig pa 'ong gsungs so/_/ de ltar glang gi lo la rmang bting nas 'brug gi lo la 'byongs te/_dbus su ri rgyal lhun po la dpe blangs te dbu rtse rig gsum yang khang lcogs bzhi dang*/ gser gyi ri dang rol pa'i mtshos bskor ba ltar 'khor sa rim pa gsum las zur du yak+sha ltag 'og nyi zla'i lha khang dang bcas pa bzhengs/_shar gyi gling gsum ltar mkhyen rab 'jam dpal gyi gling la rnam dag khrims khang gling dang tshang mang ke ru'i gling gnyis kyis brten pa/_lho'i gling gsum ltar Ar+ya pa lo'i gling la bdud 'dul sngags pa'i gling dang sgra bsgyur rgya gar gyi gling gis brten pa/_nub kyi gling gsum ltar dga' ldan byams pa'i gling la bai ro tsa na'i gling dang mi g.yo bsam gtan gyi gling gis brten pa/_byang gi gling gsum ltar byang chub sems bskyed kyi gling la rin chen sna tshogs gling dang dkoRa mdzod dpe dkaRa gyi gling gis brten pa/_zur bzhir 'byung ba bzhi'i kha non la me btsa' chen por bzhi'i mchod rten bzhi/_phyogs mtshams brgyad du phyi nang gi gnod pa zhi ba'i don du gter kha brgyad kyi khron pa tsan dan gyi snying po can brgyad/_mthu rtsal klu'i gling du gtsug lag khang yun ring du gnas pa'i phyir klu chen po brgyad kyi khang pa rin po che sprin gyi snying po can/ de thams cad kyi logs dang mthil rgya mtsho chu gnyer gyi zhal bas byugs pa'i mthar lcags ri mu khyud la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten bye bas brgyan pa'i phyogs bzhir sgo bzhi dang g.yas g.yon du mgon khang gnyis gnyis te brgyad kyis mdzes pa ni nyi 'og gi rgyal khams na 'gran zla dang bral bar grub bo/_/de dang mnyam du rgyal po'i btsun mo tshe spong bza' me tog sgron gyis khams gsum zang khang gling me tog sgron gyi lha khang dang /_pho gyong bza' rgyal mo btsun gyis dbu tshal gser khang gling dga' ldan byams sgrol gyi lha khang dang /_'bro bza' byang chub sman gyis dge rgyas bye ma'i gling dge ba mtha' rgyas kyi lha khang so phag khro chus sbyar ba tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i shing gis thog phub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyis rab tu gnas pa bzhugs pa'i snang ba mtha' yas gtso 'khor bdun gyi smin mtshams na nor bu nyi ma'i snying po las 'od byung bas sgron me'i bya ba byed pa/ tsan+dan gyi chus gang ba'i khron pa yon chab kyi tshul du phul ba bu mo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la bzhengs su gsol lo/_/de nas slob dpon gyis rab tu gnas pa mdzad dus gtsug lag khang rnams nas lha thams cad phyir rang byon pa la lha'i bu rnams kyi sprin gyi gseb nas me tog gi char 'bebs pa thams cad kyis mthong zhing /_Ar+ya pa lo'i gling gi rta mgrin gyis rta skad thengs gsum bton pas 'dzam bu'i gling sum gnyis su thos pa dang /_'od zer gyi drwa bas brag dmar kyi nam mkha' khyab pa la sogs pa ltas bzang po mang po bod 'bangs kun gyis mthong ba byung ngo /_/rab tu gnas pa'i ltad mo lo bcu gsum du bgyis te sgya ma mkhan gyi rol mo dang /_thag rtsed dang /_shing rtsed dang /_gri rtsed dang*/_bro dang shon la sogs pa rnam grangs du ma yul tha dad pa na lhags pa'i mi rnams kyis bgyis te bde skyid kyi nyi ma shar/_/_de nas gtsug lag khang gi srung ma bsko bar zhus pas/_slob dpon gyi zhal nas da ste dus kyi tha ma la/_bod yul thams cad hor gyis 'dzin pas na de dus gtsug lag khang la mchod pa dang bod 'bangs la bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir dpe dkar rgyal po bsko bar bgyi'o gsungs nas/_bod kyi dmag gis b+ha ta hor gyis sgom grwa bcom ste/_'ba' ti dang rnga bo ches bsu ba byas nas dkor mdzod dpe dkar gling du mnga' gsol/_dam la btags te chos 'khor ma bu stod smad kyi srung mar bskos so/_/de nas slob dpon chen po pho brang gi rim khang du spyan drangs te 'jig rten spyan gzigs sna tshogs kyis mchod/_dgyes pa'i btsun mo phul te 'bras bu gsang sngags kyi chos bsgyur bar zhus pas gnang ste sgra bsgyur rgya gar gyi gling du u rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang /_sprul pa'i lo tsA bai ro tsa na dang /_gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ra/_rma rin chen mchog_/A tsar+ya ye shes dbyangs/_/li byi kyi chung rnams kyis bsgyur zhing / ldan ma rtse mang /_'gos 'um gru byin pad+ma rtse mo la sogs pas yi ge pa bgyis te gtan la phab pa la thog mar thub pa rgyud kyi theg pa rnams bsgyur te/_grwa ya spyi'i rgyud drug la rig sngags thams cad kyi khog dbub pa dpung pa bzang po'i rgyud/rig sngags thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba lag na rdo rje dbang gi rgyud/_rig sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba rig pa mchog gi rgyud/_rig sngags thams cad kyi 'dul ba su sid+d+hi kar legs par grub pa'i rgyud/rig sngags thams cad kyi 'phrin las khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dgongs pa bsam gtan phyi ma'i rgyud do/_/bye brag gi rgyud rigs gsum spyi/_spyan ras gzigs kyi skor la/_pad+ma rtse mo sngags kyi rgyud/_pad+ma cod pan gyi rgyud/_cho ga sngags kyi rgyud/_yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyud/_a mo g+ha pA sha'i rgyud la sogs pa dang /_'jam dpal gyi skor la/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i rgyud/_'jam dpal rnon po sgrib pa med pa'i rgyud/_'jam dpal dra ba spyod pa'i rgyud/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i gla'i rgyud la sogs pa dang /_phyag na rdo rje'i skor la/_phyag na rdo rje dbang gi rgyud/_rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud/_rdo rje be con gyi rgyud/_rdo rje rnon po'i rgyud la sogs pa dang /_gzungs grwa lnga la sogs pa bya ba'i rgyud kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i gzugs phran brgya drug cu bsgyur ro/_/u pa ya'i rgyud la/_rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud/_me long 'bar ba'i rgyud/_dbang bskur ba'i rgyud/_rnam par mi rtog pa'i rgyud la sogs pa'o/_yo ga'i rgyud la/_rdo rje dbyings rtsa ba'i rgyud/_pa sha pa ka ya rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud/ pad+ma ka ra dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud/_sa mun dza rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud de gzhung chen po bzhi dang /_ngan song sbyong ba dkyil 'khor chen po bcu gnyis kyi rgyud/_dpal mchog bsdus pa de kho na nyid kyi rgyud la sogs pa bsgyur ro/_/nang pa sngags kyi theg pa la sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang gdams pa man ngag gi rgyud las/_rtsa ba'i rgyud la bskyed pa ma hA yo ga thabs gtso bor ston pa gsang ba 'dus pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud/_ri rab zom rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa'i rgyud/_ye shes rgyas pa sa gzhi dang mnyam pa'i rgyud la sogs pa'o/_/lung a nu yo ga shes rab gtso bor ston pa la theg le 'dus pa'i rgyud/ sgyu ma chen po'i rgyud/_zla gsang thig le'i rgyud/_rdo rje gdan bzhi'i rgyud la sogs pa'o/_/a ti yo ga'i rgyud la kun 'dus rin po che'i mdo/_rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo/_/dur khrod khu byug rol ba'i mdo/_/sems lung chen mo'i mdo/_/dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo la sogs pa'o/_/gdams pa man ngag gi rgyud la/_bskyed rdzogs thun mong du bstan pa dang /_rdzogs pa chen po bye brag tu bstan pa gnyis las/_bskyed pa ma hA yo ga thabs kyi rim pa dang /_de dang 'brel ba'i rdzogs rim lung a nu yo ga dril nas gcig tu bstan pa'i rgyud la/_sgrub pa'i bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir gzi ldan 'bar ba mtshams kyi rgyud dang /_phung po lhar gsal ba zhi ba lha'i rgyud dang /_gdug pa tshar bcad pa drag po sngags kyi rgyud la/_sku'i rgyud me ltar 'bar ba/_gsung gi rgyud dbang chen 'dus pa/_thugs kyi rgyud puN+Da rI ka_/yon tan gyi rgyud lha mo gsang ba/_'phrin las kyi rgyud rig 'dzin 'dus pa/_rigs sngags spyi'i sgrub pa/_he ru ka'i tan+d+ra/_bye brag gi sgrub pa la/_'jam dpal sku'i rgyud zla gsang nag po/_pad+ma gsung gi rgyud rta mchog rol pa/_yang dag thugs kyi rgyud he ru ka gal po che/_phur pa 'phrin las kyi rgyud byi to ta ma la 'bum ste/ bdud rtsi yon tan gyi rgyud bdud rtsi rol pa che chung /_ma mo rbod gtong gi rgyud ma mo kun 'dus rnams so/_/sgrub pa sde drug las kha tshar bstan pa'i rgyud la/ 'phrin las kha skong ba chos nyid gtor ma'i rgyud/_las rgya mtsho ji ltar bya ba karma mA le 'phrin las kyi rgyud/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa tshogs rgyud che chung /_mchod pa mi zad pa'i gter du byin gyis brlabs pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi rgyud/_sgrol ba gnas su dag pa stobs po che yongs su sgrol ba'i rgyud/_sbyor ba gnas su dag pa thig le klong gi rgyud/_brtul zhugs drag po'i kun tu spyod pa glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud/_las bzhi mthar phyin zhing bkra shis pa za byed rol pa sbyin sreg gi rgyud/_las thams cad gyi sngon du 'gro ba gtor rgyud che chung /_bka'i 'khor lhag mas bskangs nas las la bskul ba dpal 'bar khro mo'i rgyud/_gdug pa can gzir mnan gyis tshar bcad pa zhing bcu rol pa'i rgyud rnams bsgyur ro/_/dbang po yang rab la shin tu spros pa dang bral ba rdzogs pa chen po bye brag tu bstan pa'i rgyud la sems nyid bya rtsol las 'das pa nam mkha' che rtsa ba'i rgyud/_de nyid nyams su blang pa nam mkha' che phyi ma'i rgyud/_de nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'bras bus nam mkha' che phyi ma'i phyi ma'i rgyud yongs su grol ba/_sems nyid 'pho 'gyur med pa chos nyid rgyal po'i rgyud/_sems nyid thig le nyag gcig byang chub kyi sems thig le'i rgyud/_sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes su bstan pa ye shes thig le'i rgyud/_sems nyid thams cad kyi rtsa ba rab bstan pa man ngag phreng ba'i rgyud/_sems nyid kun khyab chen por bstan pa gsang ba rgyal po'i rgyud/_sems nyid rang gi rig par bstan pa ye shes thig le'i rgyud/ sems nyid kun tu bzang po'i rol par bstan pa mkha' dbyings rnam dag gi rgyud/_sems nyid kun gyi snying por bstan pa man ngag snying po'i rgyud/sems nyid rang gi rig pas yid ches pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud/sems nyid don gyi rtsa ba nam mkha' che rtsa ba can gyi rgyud/_sems nyid gcig tu 'dus pa nyag gcig dgongs pa'i rgyud/_sems nyid ji bzhin par bzhag pa bsam gtan gcig pu'i rgyud/_sems nyid rgyun chags su goms pa bsam gtan rgyud chags kyi rgyud/_sems nyid thams cad las gsungs pa sgo mang mdo'i rgyud/ sems nyid dbang dang sbyar ba nam mkha' che dbang gi rgyud/_sems nyid sgra tshig las 'das pa nam mkha' che yi ge med pa'i rgyud/_sems nyid gdod ma'i gnas lugs su bstan pa nam mkha' che gzhi'i rgyud/_sems nyid 'od gsal bar bstan pa rin po che 'bar ba'i rgyud/_sems nyid yon tan lhun grub tu bstan pa rin po che phreng ba'i rgyud/_sems nyid khams gsum du gsal ba khams gsum sgron me'i rgyud/_sems nyid spang blang las 'das pa nges pa snying po'i rgyud/_sems nyid mi 'gyur ba rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud/_sems nyid dus thams cad du sangs rgyas su bstan pa ye shes rgyas pa'i rgyud de nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /_lung bam po bco brgyad la thams cad byang chub sems las byung ba rig pa'i khu byug_/rtsol sgrub thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rtsal chen sprugs pa/_sems nyid dbyings su rdzogs pa khyung chen rdzogs pa/_chos nyid ye gnas kyi sgom pa rdo la gser zhun/_sems nyid lhun gyis grub pa mi nub rgyal mtshan nam mkha' che/_sems nyid ye nas stong pa rmad byung rgyal po/ sems nyid chos skur bstan pa ye shes dam pa/_sems nyid thig le nyag cig tu*bstan*pa*yang*ti*rgyal po/_sems nyid skye shi med pa srog gi 'khor lo/ sems nyid 'dod dgu 'byung ba yid bzhin nor bu/_/_sems nyid mnyam rdzogs chen po thig le kun 'dus/_sems nyid theg pa kun rdzogs pa nam mkha' che rgyal po/_sems nyid kun gyi yang rtseRa bstan pa rtse mo byung rgyal/ sems nyid spros pa dang bral bas ye gnas bde ba rab 'byams/_sems nyid nyon mongs pa las 'das shing zag pa med pas bde ba phra bkod/ sems nyid du 'khor 'das thams cad rdzogs pas gter chen yongs rdzogs/ sems nyid theg pa kun gyi chings su bstan pa rdzogs pa chen po lhun rdzogs pa spyi chings/_sems nyid rgya chad phyogs lhung dang bral baRa bstan pa nam mkha' mtha' dbus rnams rgya gar gyi skad las bod kyi skad du bsgyur zhing bris te/_bod dpe'i steng nas rgya'i skad du phar zhus shing ma dag pa rnams bcos te/_yang rgya dpe la bsgyur ba/_bod dpe'i steng du gtan la phab nas tshig don phyin ci ma log par mdzad do/_/de nas slob dpon mchims phur gshigs te brag dge 'ur dgongs pa la bzhugs dus rje blon kun gyis tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshams te/_rgyud rnams la nyams su blang bde ba'i sgrub thabs zhus*pas*gnang ste mdzad pa la/_gshin rje rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang / gshin rje dmar nag gi rgyud la brten nas 'jam dpal sku'i sgrub thabs rnams mdzad/_rta mchog rol ba rtsa ba'i rgyud dang pad+ma dbang chen gyi rgyud la brten nas pad+ma gsung gi sgrub thabs rnams mdzad/_he ru ka gal po'i rgyud dang ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud la brten nas yang dag thugs kyi sgrub thabs rnams mdzad/_phur pa rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi rgyud la brten nas phur pa 'phrin las kyi sgrub thabs rnams mdzad/_ma mo rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang ma mo kun 'dus kyi rgyud la brten nas ma mo rbod gtong gi sgrub thabs rnams mdzad/_bdud rtsi rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud che chung la brten nas bdud rtsi yon tan gyi sgrub thabs rnams mdzad/_rig 'dzin rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud la brten nas rig 'dzin slob dpon gyi sgrub thabs rnams mdzad/ dregs pa 'dul byed kyi rgyud la brten nas 'jig rten mchod bstod kyi sgrub thabs rnams mdzad/_drag po sngags kyi rgyud la brten nas dmod pa drag sngags kyi sgrub thabs rnams mdzad/_de dag gi nang nas gshin rje'i 'khor lo shes dka' bas 'khrul 'khor lde mig gi yi ge bsdu ba dang*/_/_phur pa 'grub dka' bas kI la ya gzhi yang snying gcig tu dril ba dang /_ma mo grub kyang las 'gyangs pas shis bstan pa'i 'khor lo dang*/_pho rgyud 'khu ldog che bas chings dang log non gyi 'khor lo rnams mdzad do/_/yang bde gshegs 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/_de la phan pa phyi ma'i rgyud/_phyi ma'i phyi ma sngags kyi rgyud/_ma tshang ba kha skong ba'i rgyud/_'byed par byed pa lde mig gi rgyud dang lnga la brten nas zhi ba rigs brgya dang /_bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_de nyid rigs lnga dang /_gsang chen rigs gcig dang /_'jigs byed chen po dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs rnams mdzad de/_/zhi khro kun 'dus kyi dkyil 'khor zhal phye nas rgyal po nyid dang /_bai ro tsa na dang /_gnubs nam mkha'i snying po dang /_ngan lam rgyal ba mchog dbyangs dang /_gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes rin po che dang /_jo mo ye shes mtsho rgyal dang*/_'brog mi dpal gyi ye shes dang /_rlangs dpal gyi seng ge dang*/_nyang ting 'dzin bzang po la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa lnga la dbang bskur nas sgrub thabs so so'i lung mdzad de bsgrubs pas rgyal po'i sku tshe lo bcu gsum gyis phyir bsnur/_bai ro tsa na lhag med du sangs rgyas/_nam mkha'i snying pos nyi ma brtod la non/_sangs rgyas ye shes rig 'dzin gyi sa thob/_rgyal ba mchog dbyangs rta mgrin gyi grub pa thob/_dpal gyi ye shes lha srin bran du 'khor ba la sogs pa grub rtags thon pa re byung bas mchims phu'i grub thob nyi shu rtsa lngar grags so/_/de nas slob dpon gyis phyi rabs kyi 'gro ba la phan gdags pa'i phyir rgyud lung man ngag rnams yi ge mkhas pa'i mchog legs sbyin nyi ma dang /_skyen pa'i phul phyin ldan ma rtse mang dang /_dag pa'i rab A tsar ya ye shes dbyangs la sogs pas shog ser dang shog skya dag shog sngon dang shog smug rnams su bkod de so sor sbas pa la chos gter brgya dang rtsa brgyad/_'tsho byed sman gyi gter dang /_'phung byed ngan sngags kyi gter dang /_'byor byed nor gyi gter la sogs pa gter phran bye ba gcig yod do/_/las can res thon par smon lam dang bka' bsgo mdzad nas bzhag pa ni/_mchims phu'i dge 'us la sogs par chos kyi gter mdzod chen po lnga/_yang mdzod sum cu rtsa gnyis sbas/lho brag skyer chu'i lha khang du sde snod kun 'dus la sogs pa'i rgyud bdun man ngag dang bcas pa sbas/mon kha seng+ge rdzong du pad+ma dbang chen la sogs pa sgrub pa sde drug sbas/_bum thang dge gnas su ma mo kun 'dus la sogs pa dregs pa mo rgyud rnams sbas/_bum thang rtsi lung du sems phyogs rgyud lung rnams sbas/_gtsang 'gram lnga khang dang /_pra dun rtse dang skyo dun rtser dbang phyug chen po'i sgrub thabs dang ngan sngags brgya rtsa brgyad sbas/_nyang ro rtsis kyi lha khang du sman dang rin po che la sogs pa sbas/_khams kyi klong thang sgrol ma lha mo'i rgyud bcu gsum spu gri mched gsum dang bcas pa sbas/_shar kong po bu chu mthar legs kyi lha khang du mthu dang rdzu 'phrul mang po sbas/_bu chu rdzong khar phyi nang gi sgrub thabs rin chen bzo'i skor rnams sbas/_g.yu ru khra 'brug tu drag sngags bcu gsum sbas/_lho brag mkho mthing du bde gshegs 'dus pa rgyud lung man ngag dang bcas pa sbas/_spa gro stag tshang seng+ge phug tu tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas pa'i chos mang po sbas/_mon kha ne ring du spyi ti yo ga dang reg chod bzhi sbas/_sgrags yang rdzogs shel gyi phug pa phur pa dang gshin rje rnams sbas/_/_spa gro phug rdzong dang seng+ge phug tu ngan sngags zab dgu rnams sbas/_pho ma'i rdzong du bse yi lha mo'i sgrub thabs rnams sbas/_la kha phug mo cher thugs rje chen po 'khor ba dong sprugs dang yid bzhin nor bu sbas/_lha ring brag dang zangs yag brag la chos dang nor dang sman la sogs pa'i gter kha brgya rtsa brgyad sbas/_drag dmar nam mkha'i rdzong la bod du 'gyur tshad kyi phyi mo dang sgrub thabs rnams sbas/_bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang gling phran mchod rten dang bcas par chos dang sman dang drag sngags dang nor bu la sogs pa brgya rtsa brgyad sbas/ gzhan yang brag ri g.ya' ri rdza ri la sogs par rdzu 'phrul gyis byon nas chos dang nor dang sman la sogs pa phyi rabs kyi 'gro ba rnams la gang la gang phan gyi tshul gyis gter kha dpag tu med pa sbas so/_/gter 'byung po'i dus ni/_zas ngan lci ba za/_gos ngan re ba gon/_gtam ngan khrel med smra/ bka' la nyo tshong byed/_chos 'khor 'thab ra byed/_sngags pa mthu rgyas byed/ las su sdig pa spyod/_btsun pas khrims mi thub/_bud med kyis lus mi thub/ sngags pas dam tshig mi thub/_sad ser dang lo nyes 'ong /_nad dang mu ges nyen pa'i tshe/_thams cad kyi snying du rgyal bsen zhugs te chos ma yin pa sna tshogs su spyod pa na sas gter mi thub ste gser dngul rin po che'i gter rnams rang brdol/_chos kyi gter rnams mkha' 'gro dang gter bdag gis lung bstan te skal ldan res bton nas mi yul du dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de dus pad+ma nga'i gter chos la spyod pa thams cad bde ba can gyi zhing du skyes nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar mi rnams kyi don mdzad dus bod dang lho mon la sogs pa'i mi ma yin rnams kyis bdag cag rnams la yang dbang bskur byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes zhus pas gnang ste mi ma yin pa rnams kyis so so'i gnas su spyan drangs shing mchod nas dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas la mon pa ming srid bdun gyis thog drangs lho mon gyi mi ma yin gyis spyan drangs shing bzhugs pa'i gnas mon bum thang seng+ge rdzong dang /_mon kha rin chen rdzong dang /_spa gro seng+ge phug dang /_lho brag mkhar chu la sogs pa'i brag phug dang nags rong rnams so/_/bstan ma bcu gnyis kyis gdan drangs shing bzhugs pa la kha rag rin chen phug dang /_jo mo nags rgyal dang /_shangs kyi zam bu lung la sogs pa'o/_/ma mo dang phra men ma rnams kyis spyan drangs pa la te sgro brag dkar dang /_rngam pa sgra sgrogs dang /_lha ri zil ba dang /_bu chu rdzong kha dang /_tswa ri tsA gong dang /_gsal rje gangs bzang la sogs pa'o/_/gzhan yang gnam sman dang mtsho sman dang gza' btsan la sogs pas spyan drangs te lo dang zla ba dang zhag dang dro skad re bzhugs pa la bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/ de'i tshe lcog ro 'bri 'tshams na mang rje thod dkar legs dang /ru bza' rgyal mo mtsho 'dus te khyim 'dzin pa las rgyal mo mtsho'i rmi lam na nam mkha'i dkyil na bud med sngon mo gcig gis 'od kyi skar ma gcig 'phangs pa khang pa'i nang du song ba rmis nas zla ba dgu ngo dang bcu nas bu mo shin tu mdzes pa dpral ba na rdo rje rgya gram gyi ri mo can u pal la'i dri ngad dang ldan pa gcig btsas te mtsho rgyal du btags nas cher skyes pa las rgyal po'i btsun mor blangs pa na slob dpon la shin tu dad cing 'khor ba'i chos la sgo nas rgyal po la chos byed par zhus pas gnang ste slob dpon la phul lo/_/de nas slob dpon gyis las rgya bgyis te gang du gshegs pa thams cad du byon nas bsnyen bkur dang /_zhabs tog mdzad cing sgrub pa rtse gcig tu byas pas grub pa thob ste mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub brnyes so/_/de nas slob dpon yab yum gzho stod te sgra'i brag tu sgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshe/_ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro rnams kyis jo mo la bskal ba/_slob dpon chen po sprul pa'i sku'i thugs la tshe 'di nyid la rdos bcas kyi phung po mi snang bar lo gsum gyis 'tshang rgya ba'i gdams pa mngon sum snying tig gi man ngag zab mo bzhugs pas*gsol*ba*thob*cig*ces*lung bstan to/_/de'i tshe tshogs kyi 'khor lo rgya chen pos mchod de zhus pa/_slob dpon chen po lags tshe 'di nyid la phung po mi snang bar 'tshang rgya ba'i gdams pa mngon sum snying tig gi man ngag dam pa gnang bar zhu 'tshal zhes gsol ba btab ste phyag dang bskor ba grangs med pa mdzad dus slob dpon chen pos gsungs pa mtsho rgyal khyod kyis zhus pa de shin tu legs sngar dang mi 'dra ba'i gdams pa theg pa rim dgu kun la 'das pa'i rtse mo/_/_gnad mthong bas blos byas kyi lta sgom 'jig pa/ 'bad mi dgos par sa lam rdzogs pa/_bcos bsgyur dang gnyen po mi dgos par nyon mongs par rang sar grol ba/_rgyus ma bskyed par 'bras bu rang la rdzogs pa/_lhun gyis grub pa'i dgongs pa skad cig la 'char ba/ rdos bcas sha khrag gi phung po tshe 'di nyid la 'od gsal longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur grol ba/_'og min gyi gnas su lo gsum gyis bgrod nas chos sku lhun grub rin po che'i zhing du gtan srid zin par byed pa'i gdams pa yod kyis bstan par bya'o gsungs nas tshogs khang chen mor zhi khro don gyi dkyil 'khor zhal phyes nas jo mo mkhar chen bzas thog drangs ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro 'bum phrag gcig la dbang bskur nas khrid rdzogs par mdzad nas rgyud bcu bdun klong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud dang bco brgyad/_de'i man ngag rab tu mang po dang bcas pa rnams gsungs so/_/de nas de rnams las rgyud rab tu rgyas pa'i man ngag rnams gcig tu phye/_slob dpon nyid kyis mdzad pa ku su la'i skor rnams gcig tu phyes te so sor slob dpon dang mtsho rgyal gnyis kyis yi ger bris te dkar chag la mnan no/_/de'i tshe rgyal pos spyan drangs nas slob dpon dang rgyal po yab yum sras rnams mchims phur gshegs te tshogs kyi 'khor lo brgya rtsa brgyad mdzad pa'i dus su btsun mo dam pa 'bro bza' byang chub sman las 'khrungs pa'i sras mo lha gcig pad+ma gsal zhes bya ba dgung lo brgyad lon pa zhig shi bas lha sras bu mo'i ro la gzigs shing bshums te dog sa la 'gyel ba dang /_mtsho rgyal gyis dar dkar gyi sle'us bslangs te tsan dan gyi chus gtor ba dang brgyal sangs te slob dpon gyis bka' stsal pa/_kye mnga' bdag rje spyir 'jig rten gyi bya ba rmi lam dang 'dra/ 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid sgyu ma yin/_rgyal srid mdang gi rmi lam 'dra/_/nor 'bangs rtsa kha'i zil pa 'dra/_/tshe mi rtag chu yi lbu ba 'dra/_/'dus byas thams cad 'jig pa yin/_/'dus pa'i tha ma 'bral bas na/_/'dus byas thams cad 'di dang 'dra/_/rtag cing brtan pa gcig kyang med/_/mi rtag rtag par ma 'dzin par/_/skye med chos sku'i don la sbyongs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/ der rgyal po bzhengs te phyag dbu thod bud bud btsal nas gser skyogs g.yus bkang ba slob dpon la phul te zhus pa/_kye slob dpon chen po lags/ 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid mi rtag na nga'i gtsug lag khang 'di ji tsam na 'jig_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nam 'jig_/dam chos gang gis nub pa'i rkyen byed/_bu mo 'di tshe'i dus byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ci lags/_'dir las kyis 'brel ba ci las byung /_phyi ma skye ba gang du len/_mthar byang chub pa'i skal ba mchis sam zhes zhus pas slob dpon gyis bka' stsal pa/_kye rgyal po gson cig_/rgyal po'i gtsug lag khang 'di la zhig ral mang du 'byung ngo /_/drug cu rtsa gcig glang gi lor/_/rgyal po mi rtag mya ngan 'da'/_/rgyal khrims hor gyi dmag gis 'jig_/tha ma du ru ka yis 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas te dar gud mang du 'byung ngo /_/de'ang rgyal po nyid nas gdung rabs lnga na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nyams dmas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bod yul mnga' thang nyams te btsun pas 'dul khrims mi thub/_sngags pas dam tshig mi thub/_sde 'khrugs dang nang dme byed/_skye bos mna' za khrel med pha ma gsod/_bud med kyis lus mi thub lan chags byis pa gsod/_chos pa rnams kyang chos gzhung bzhin mi byed/_bka' la ras chod byed cing mchan tig la sogs pas bka' 'chal du 'jug_/slob dpon smod cing rang gi che ba 'don/_dam tshig chu la pho nas dngos grub sprin bzhin dengs/_/chos la lto zong byed nas nor dang yig sna gsog_/'dul khrims me la bsregs nas sems bskyed rlung la bskur/_/mi tsher chos la bslab nas lam du nga rgyal 'khyer//rtag tu bsgoms bsgrubs byas nas sems nyid don ma mthong /_/lta bar chad lta bzung nas dge sdig 'chol bar spyod/_/ting 'dzin phrag dog bsgoms nas*'bad pa nor*la byed/_/[( <]a[>]chos log[ ) ]chas log dang gsar nges la dga'/_/btsun pa'i lus srung mtshon la byed/_grub thob tshong 'dus 'grim/_sgom med ri 'khrugs byed/_mi dpon sprang pos byed/_dge bshes dbu gtso byed/_smyon pas bsod nams sdud/_lha ru 'dre srin dang 'gong po mchod/_gtso bor mo dang bon la 'dun ma gtad/_byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dkrugs shing dkon mchog dgrar len/_nor dum re la mna' za/_sdig pa la sus thob byed/_rje la 'bangs mi nyan/_dpon la g.yog mi nyan/_/_pha la bu mi nyan/_ma la bu mo mi nyan/_/_blo brku dang nang ngan gshom/ mthu ser dang dug sbyor dar/_rgyal rigs dmangs su 'bebs/_mgo mtho thabs kyis smod/_brku gsod dang brdeg phrog byed/_log 'tsho sna tshogs dar/ rigs ngan gyis kha drag rlom/_chang phor re la bltas nas gsang sngags khrom du klog_/gser ya ma brla re la bltas nas bgron po la yang dbang bskur/ nor la bltas nas lung med kyi rdzun dbang byed/_lta ba nyams gtong /_bud med kyis skyes pa 'ded/_phas bu la yang blos mi khel ba'i dus shig 'byung / de'i dus su bdud kyi chos pa'i lus blangs nas chos log dang slob 'bangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i dus su hor dmag bod du 'byung ngo /_/de'i tshe sad ser dang mu ge dang nad dang mtshon dang sa g.yo ba dang mi bde ba sna tshogs 'byung zhing /_mi rnams phal cher bdud kyi dbang du song bas ngan song du skye'o/_/chos byed rnams bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung ste bdud kyi dbang gis kun gyi gshe skur 'debs so/_/de dus sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nyams dma' zhing bod khrims hor gyis 'jig_/lung pa khrag mtshor 'gro/_sa gzhi keng rus kyis khyab/_las can dang chos byed thams cad sa mthar 'bros pas rgyal po nyid kyang phyag dpe rnams sbas na mthar 'gro don che/_de dus bka' ma rnams bka' 'chal te byin rlabs chung bas grub pa thob pa yang nyung ngo*/_/dus der gter ma 'di bka' ma 'chal bas byin rlabs che/_las can rnams kyis gter sgo phye nas dar bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang rgyal pos zhus pa/_slob dpon chen po lags de lta bu de 'ongs pa'i rgyu gang lags/_lo gang la 'byung /_de nam bzlog par 'gyur/_bzlog pa'i thabs zhu 'tshal zhes zhus pas/_slob dpon gyis gsungs pa/_kye rgyal po de 'byung ba'i rgyu ni sngon bcom ldan 'das dang bdud nus pa 'gran pas bdud pham nas de'i tshe bdud kyis shAkya'i bstan pa mtha' ma la thams cad bdag gi dbang du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas dus kyi mtha' ma la phal cher bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pas chos dang nor la che 'gran byed/_pha spad dang spun du mi 'chams yul 'khrugs byed/_btsun pas rgyan 'dogs/_sngags pas bsnyen sgrub dor/_skye bo ngo tsha bral/_btsad po sdig byed/_chos med chos 'khor skyong / zhe sdang me ltar 'bar/_'dod chags chu bzhin khol/_chos skyong 'drer ldang smo 'dre dar ba'i dus/_bdud kyis byin rlabs sngags btsun sri'u gso/_mkhas btsun 'drer brdung lta ba chad lta ston/_gsang sngags kyi kha tshig khrom du klog pa'i dus/bdud kyi bstan pa dar ba'i dus tshod der/_/hor dmag bod kyi yul du lhags/_/lcags pho khyi la g.yul mgo 'tshol/_/chu bo rta la rta bzhin rgyug_/me mo glang la gdug rtsub che/_/shing mo lugs la thebs gcig bzlog_/de yi bzlog thabs yul khrims bzang po dang /_/ri rgya klung rgya chos khrims rgyal khrims dang*/_/'chi nges srog bslu mi dge mtha' dag spang /_/ dge bcu spyad cing btsun khrims sngags khrims bya/_/gsung rab 'don zhing gtsug lag nyams pa gso/_/mchod rten gso zhing sa dgra mnan pa dang /_/ nor gter mi 'don sa gter brko mi bya/_/khro rgyal bsgrub cing ma sring las la bkol/_/tshogs gtor mchod cing lha 'dre mdos kyis bskang /_/de ltar byas na thebs gcig bzlog par nges/_/kun gyi las yin rmang nas bzlog pa med/_/lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la/_/spyod ngan byas nas dus ngan zer/_/yul la zhag med 'jag skya 'phyo/_/tshe la long med skar mda' 'dra/_/legs pa'i lan ni nyes kyis glon/_/de tshe phyi dmag bod yul 'joms/_/mi rnams ma lus gsod las che/_/sdug bsngal khrag gi mtsho rdol tshe/_/rang sdug rang gis shom pa la/_/snying re rje ste bya thabs med/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang gsungs pa/ kye rgyal po khyod kyi lha lcam 'di tshe dus byed pa'i rgyu ni/_skye ba 'di'i gong rol du rgya gar gyi yul ka la ki tra'i grong khyer du rgyal po b+he la ku tra'i btsun mor skyes te/_btsun mo gnyis yod pa las mo la bu med/_gzhan de la bu yod pas phrag dog gis bu brkus nas bsad pa'i rnam smin gyis 'dir tshe mthar ma phyin par shi ba yin no/_/'dir las kyis 'brel ba ni skye ba 'di'i yang snga la pad+ma bdag dang rgyal po dang b+ho d+hi sa twa gsum gyis ma ga ta'i yul du ma'i dge bar mchod rten bzhengs dus smon lam btab pa na bu mo 'di sbrang bu tre ma bu ga'i lus su yod pa des thos pa las byung ba'o/_/phyi ma ni lo mang du sdug bsngal spyod par 'dug ste/_bshad na rgyal po'i thugs khral du 'gro gsungs pa dang /_yang zhus pas/_slob dpon gyi zhal nas/_rgyal po dgyes pa'i don du bshad na lha lcam 'di skye ba 'di nyid kyi gong rol du rgya gar gyi yul ko ta la'i gtsug lag khang du bram ze'i bu bA ya ta la zhes bya bar skyes nas dge slong byed do/_/gtsug lag khang de'i me tog ldum rar ku ku ra chags pa spyod pa mthong bas nyon mongs pa skyes te rigs ngan gyi bu mo la spyad pas bslab pa nyams pas 'gyod de ku ku ra la zhe sdang skyes nas 'bras spru ba'i tho bas ku ku ra'i mtshan ma brdungs te shi'o/_/de'i tshe mar me'i rgyu til mar srang bdun zos shing dge slong gu pa tA la tshig rtsub kyang brjod do/_/ yang lha me tog gis mchod nas tshe'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu ku ku ra'i rdo rje brdungs pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas dud 'gro mo'i lus brtsegs mar len cing srog bcad pas nyi tshe ba'i dmyal bar skye'o/_/de nas til mar zos pa'i las kyis yi dwags su skye'o/_/de nas tshig rtsub brjod pa'i las kyis lha ma yin du skyes pa'i 'og tu me tog phul ba'i las kyis lha'i skye ba bzung nas/ yang las snga ma'i lhag mas bsam yas 'di nyid du khyi'i skye ba bdun len no/_/de nas yar lung stod du bud med gzugs mi sdug cing bsod nams chung ba gsum du brgyud pa'i mthar/_pad+ma bdag dang 'phrad cing byin gyis brlabs pas las zad de mi lus khyad par can blangs nas sangs rgya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang rgyal pos zhus pa slob dpon chen po lags/_mi lus nam thob/_chos gang la spyod/_de nas skye ba du na 'tshang rgya/ 'gro don gang du spyod ces zhus so/_/slob dpon gyis gsungs pa/_yang rgyal po gson cig_/las ngan de rnams byang nas sgrags grong gsar du bud med dbang po tshang la dad pa dang ldan par skyes nas nga'i gdams pa dang las 'brel thogs pa tsam 'byung ngo*/_/de nas lho la yag tu bu mo spre'u lo ma shes rab che ba zhig tu skyes nas mnga' bdag gsung gi sprul pa nyang ral gyis rjes su bzung nas lam sna zin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas g.yas ru grong dmar du skyes pa'i lus thob ste sngar rab tu byung ba'i bag chags kyis der yang rab tu 'byung ste nga'i sprul pa chos dbang dang 'phrad nas gdams pa byin pas rig pa'i ngo bo mthong ste mkha' 'gros rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba de'i 'og tu rdo dang mon bod kyi mtshams 'brin thang zhes bya bar skyes te snga ma'i bag chags kyis rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bar chad bsrung zhing lung bstan nas nga'i zab gter dang 'phrad de gter sgo gsum 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i dus su snying tig ma'i gdams ngag dang 'phrad kyang 'gro don mi 'byung ste sbas pa'i tshul gyis nyams su len pa'i dus yin no/_/de'i tshe nga'i zab chos kyi bdag por gyur nas las dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i slob ma bdun cu 'byung ste de rnams las gdul bya las can rnams bde ba can du skye zhing las med la la ngan song du skye'o/_/de dus mkha' 'gros lung bstan zhing mtshan dang ldan pa'i slob ma nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung /_khyad par du zab mo snying tig gsang ba'i gter 'di'i bdag po sgrags zur mkhar gyi bu mo spre'u lo ma lus phra la rnam gzhag tshang ba/_shes rab che la chos la mos pa/_yid du 'ong zhing so zho yod pa/_smin mtshams na sme ba pad+ma 'dra ba yod pa/_mtsho rgyal gyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhig 'byung bas de la gdams pa rnams byin na kha rag gi phur lhag med la 'tshang rgya zhing dar cha yang bag tsam 'byung ngo*/_/de min 'gro don mi 'byung zhing thams cad bdud kyis bsam pa bsgyur bas de la mos pa shin tu nyung ngo*/_/de dang 'brel tshad don dang ldan pas thar pa'i lam sna zin par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe tshad dgung lo lnga bcu rtsa dgu ste tshe'i sgrub pa byas na dar cig phyir bsnar zhing gzhan du bar chad kyis lnga bcu rtsa dgu'i gong du 'da' bar yang srid/_de nas dam sel gyis 'da' ba'i tshul ston pas dam sel bshags pa la 'bungs/ de ltar byas na dgung lo tshad du bzhugs pas de'i dus su mkha' 'gro sde lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'i bud med cig 'byung ste des phyag rgya byas pas tshe la gsos thebs te tshe tshad las lhag par bzhugs so/_/de dus zab gter rnams bum thang smad du bskyal lo/_/gal te ma 'khyol na sngar gyi gter shul lam lha 'dre mi 'pho ba'i brag la sbas na phyi ma la thon par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba de 'das nas longs sku'i zhing khams dar cig nyul lo/_/de nas bum thag thar pa gling du skyes nas lo bco lnga na bum thang smad kyi brag seng ge dang 'dra ba la snying tig gi rgyud man ngag dang bcas pa thon nas 'gro don byed do/_/de nas gter sgo mang bar 'byed cing rdzu 'phrul ya ma zung ston te bud med kyi lus bzung ba'i mkha' 'gro lngas yum byas nas 'gro don 'ur bar 'gyur ro/_/dri med 'od zer zhes grags te rta mgrin gyi sprul pa'i sras zla ba grags pa zhes bya ba zhig kyang 'khrungs shing /_slob ma'ang zab mo gnad kyis thebs pa brgya rtsa brgyad/_chos kyis 'brel pa stong rtsa brgyad/_'gro don nus pa sum cu 'byung ngo /_/sbyin bdag la sogs pa zas nor gyis 'brel ba ni shin tu mang ngo /_/de'ang lho brag dang mkhar chu la rdzogs chen gyi bstan pa dar zhing rgyas par byed do/_/de dus lho brag gi brag seng+ge'i gdong pa can nas sems phyogs kyi chos sde thams cad thon par 'gyur ro/_/mon mkhar steng nas bdag gi ngan sngags zab mo tsho thon zhing /_mchims phu 'di nyid du sbas pa'i lha lcam mo rang gi zab ber srubs med dang*/_g.yu gung ri kha dmar dang gzi mchong spel ma'i lan tshar dang dngul dkar gyi me long rgyang gsal dang /_u rgyan bdag gi chos gos gser gyi ha ris can dang*/_thod pa smug mkhregs le kha ba'i nang du tshe gcig gis 'tshang rgya ba'i chos dbang bzhi'i gdams pa rgyud dang bcas pa sbed pas 'di rnams lha lcam skye ba 'phos te bum thang du skyes pa'i dus su thon nas 'gro don dpag tu med pa byas te skye ba de la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas nas longs sku'i zhing du 'gro don byed cing skye ba mi len no/_/zangs mdog dpal rir rgyal po nyid dang mtsho rgyal dang / lha lcam dang /_pad+ma'o skol zhal mjal lo/_/gsungs so/_/der rgyal po dgyes te phyag dang bskor ba mang po mdzad nas slob dpon chen po lags/ 'khor ba'i chos la snying po mi gda' bas tshe 'dir bde zhing phyi mar skyid la nam phugs sangs rgya ba'i gdams ngag cig zhu 'tshal zhus pas/_slob dpon gyis rgyal po la yang gsungs pa/_e ma ho/_mnga' bdag rgyal po chen po yang gson cig_/'jig rten chos la snying po med pas na/_/mu mthar 'khor zhing yang yang sdug bsngal bas/_/chos sku rgyal po'i gtan srid zin par mdzod/_/yul gyi snying po chos dbyings skye med zung*/_/gnas kyi snying po nags khrod dben pa brten/_/dgon pa'i snying po chos nyid stong gsal ltos/_khang pa'i snying po sems nyid gnyug mar zhog_/tshang mar snying po shes bzhin dran pas zung /_/mdzod gyi snying po byang chub sems gnyis bskyed/_/nor gyi snying po tshogs gnyis brten par mdzod/_/so nams snying po chos spyod dge bcur 'bod/_/pha yi snying po snying rjes 'gro ba zung /_/ma yi snying po stong ba'i gnas lugs skyong /_/bu yi snying po bskyed rdzogs dbyer med brten/_/chung ma'i snying po bde gsal mi rtog sgoms/_/grogs kyi snying po bde gshegs bka' lung ltos/_/zhing gi snying po mi phyed dad pa bskyed/_/zas kyi snying po skye med bdud rtsi zo/_/skom gyi snying po gdams ngag bdud rtsi 'thung /_/gos kyi snying po ngo tsha khrel yod gyon/_/'khor gyi snying po ma sring dam can brten/_/longs spyod snying po chos spyod sgrub pa mdzod/_/ltad mo'i snying po rang gi sems la ltos/_/'du 'dzi'i snying po spros bcas dge ba mdzod/_/rnam g.yengs snying po bskyed rim 'phro 'du sgoms/_/mdza' bshes snying po dbang dang dam tshig brten/_/chags sdang snying po dug lnga'i rtsal sbyong gyis/_/rgyan gyi snying po thos bsam phyogs med brten/_/las kyi snying po zab mo'i dpe cha bris/_/mgron gyi snying po sbyin pa phyogs med thong /_/'dun ma'i snying po blo phugs chos la gtod/_/mchod gnas snying po dkon mchog gsum po mchod/_/sri zhu'i snying po pha ma gus pas mchod/_/bkur sti'i snying po rdo rje slob dpon bsten/_/dam tshig snying po rang sems zol med gyis/_/sdom pa'i snying po sdig pa mtha' dag spong /_/lha khang snying po sdom gsum gtsang ma brten/_/dkyil 'khor snying po 'od gsal 'gyur med ltos/_/gdams pa'i snying po rang rgyud 'dul bar mdzod/_/lta ba'i snying po stong gsal 'gyur med ltos/_/sgom pa'i snying po sems nyid ji bzhin zhog_/_/spyod pa'i snying po gnyis 'dzin 'khrul pa gzhig_/'bras bu'i snying po ma btsal lhun gyis grub/_/de ltar mdzad na 'dir bde phyi mar skyid/_/ myur du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'thob par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pas rgyal po dgyes te phyag dang bskor ba mang du mdzad do/_/de nas lha lcam gyi zab ber gdams ngag dang bcas pa bse sgrom ba gam smug por bcug ste gter du sbas nas lha lcam nyid*dang*'phrad par smon lam btab nas slob dpon gyis lha lcam gyi ro'i snying khar shes rab mtshal gyi nr-i cig bris te rnam shes bkug pas dbugs phyung ste smra shes pa byung ngo*/_/de nas mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dbang bskur te gsang mtshan pad+ma las 'brel rtsal du btags shing bu mos dpe sgrom spyi bor bzung nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos 'di dang 'phrad de sems can la phan par shog cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/de nas slob dpon gyis lha lcam la tshe sngon gyi las sad pa dang yab sras slob dpon dang bcas te 'phrad do zhes gsungs nas slar rnam shes don pa dang ro de nyid du bsregs pa'i tshul bstan zhing mo'i sgrib pa sbrang ba'i phyir slob dpon gyis bsnams te skad cig la o rgyan du gshegs nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo mdzad do/_/_/yang skad cig la byon te gsungs pa/_mtsho rgyal ji ltar byung ba 'di rnams dkar chag la thob cing /_zab gter gyi zla la sbas pas phyis mo rang dang 'phrad dus yid ches pa'i dgos pa yod do gsungs dus jo mos yi ger btab bo/_/_/de nas jo mos slob dpon la zhus pa/_snying tig gsang ba'i gdams pa 'di rnams spel lam sbed par bya zhus pas slob dpon gyi zhal nas 'di rnams da lta spel ba'i dus la ma babs pas gter du sbed dgos/ lha lcam gyi dpe sgrom spyi bor bzhag nas smon lam btab pas mo'i chos skal yin mod/_da ste lo 'ga' na slob dpon chen po bi ma la mi tra 'byon pas khong gi gdul bya dus la babs te snying tig gi bstan pa rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/ bdag gi mkha' 'gro snying tig gi bstan pa 'di snying tig snga 'gyur 'chal te nub tu nye ba'i dus su bstan pa nub khar gsal te rgyas la drag pa yun thung ba mar me 'chi khar gsal ba lta bu 'byung ngo /_/de'ang spyir rnying ma'i bstan pa rgyas la yun thung /_de'i nang nas gter gyi bstan pa lhag par gter sgo phyed pa dang rgyas pa mnyam zhing /_skal ldan gter gyi bdag po mi bzhugs pa na phal cher 'grib pa yin no/_/de'i phyir sba bar bya'o gsungs nas ku su la'i skor rnams dwags po dang lung khra mo brag gi brag bya skyibs can la sbas shing / rgyud dang man ngag rgya che ba mkhas pa paN+Di ta'i skor rnams bum thang smad kyi brag seng+ge 'dra ba la sbas nas gza' dang ma mo dang bdud dang gter bdag gi mkha' 'gro mang po la gtad nas mi lo lnga bcu kha ral na skal ldan las can de la gtod cig ces bka' bsgos so/_/de'i dus su shin tu zab pa'i yang gter chen po lnga sbas pa la dbus su zug pa rtsa ba'i skor la zhi khro bskyed rdzogs su 'brel ba mchims phuRar sbas te sku yi gter ro//lho phyogs su 'dril ba sdong po'i skor la bde gshegs 'dus pa la sogs pa rgyas pa'i las gtso bor gyur pa mkhar chur sbas te yon tan gyi gter ro//sman la sogs pa yon tan du grags pa ni phal pa ste mchog gi yon tan gyi gter la ma reg go_/_/nub phyogs su gsal ba me tog gi skor la rig 'dzin dang mkha' 'gro'i chos sde zab mo gtso bor dbang dang 'brel pa lha ring brag tu sbas te gsung gi gter ro/_/byang phyogs su gyes pa yal ga'i skor la yang phur rta phag dang bcas pa drag sngags phrin sgrub dang 'brel ba 'phrin las gtso bor gyur pa zangs yag nam mkha' rdzong dang ti sgro brag la sbas te 'phrin las kyi gter ro/_/shar phyogs su smin pa 'bras bu'i skor la zhi ba mchog gi sgrub pa mngon sum 'od gsal gyi gdams pa ye shes gtso bor gyur pa mkha' 'gro snying tig de'i le lag dang bcas pa dang lung khra mo brag dang bum thang la sbas te zhi ba thugs gter chen po'o/_/de nas drug cu rtsa gcig glang gi lo la rgyal po dgung du gshegs dus slob dpon nyid kyang dngos kyis gdul bya de las med par dgongs nas rgyal sras mu tig btsan pos bzhugs par zhus kyang ma gnang bar gshegs pa'i tshe mang yul bye ma'i la so la thug bar bskyal nas phyag dbu thod bud bud btsal bskor ba mang po byas te/_nged bod la thugs rjes gzung bar zhus nas spyan chab mang po bton pas/_slob dpon chen po'i zhal nas/_lha sras btsan po 'jig rten gyi snang ba sgyu ma dang 'dra bas rtag tu chos sku'i rtsal sbyong mdzod cig_/'dus byas chu'i lbu ba dang 'dra bas 'jigs med thar pa'i lam sna zung zhig_/mi rtag pa rtsa kha'i zil pa dang 'dra bas/_sems nyid gnyug ma'i gtan srid zung zhig_/ 'dus byas tshong khang gi 'gron po dang 'dra bas/_'bral med bde chen gyi grogs dang 'grogs shig_/'di phyir phan pa dam pa'i chos las med pas/ rje 'bangs thams cad dam pa'i lha chos mdzod cig_/sprel lo sprel zla ba'i tshes bcu la nga yang bod kyi yul du lan re 'ong zhing /_las can rnams la rgyun tu snang bas thugs ngal ma mdzad par yun ring du ci bder bzhugs 'tshal lo/_/zhes gsungs nas slob dpon chen po dang /_jo mo mkhar chen bza' mtsho rgyal gnyis nam mkha'i dkyil na phar 'od zer dang bcas te lho nub rnga yab kyi gling phran du bun gyis bzhud do/_/de ltar rim gyis byon pa'i bla ma bzhi po yang dpal kun tu bzang po yab yum dang /_rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa nyid las/_'gro ba rang rgyud pa 'gas bsgrubs pas grub pa thob pa ni ma yin no/_/de'i phyir gdul bya'i snang ba dang bstun nas de ltar byon pa'o/_/rig 'dzin brdas brgyud pa'i lo rgyus bshad zin to/_/ de nas gang zag snyan khung brgyud pa ni/_de ltar slob dpon chen pos lung bstan pa bzhin lha lcam pad+ma gsal nyid rim gyis skye ba brgyud pa las/ tshe lo lnga bcu kha ral te mi rnams phal gyis bzhi bcu rtsa shas las mi thub pa'i dus na/_gsal rje gangs kyi shar phyogs lcags sgrom 'bar ba lta bu'i yul du spa sgang pa rin chen rdo rje zhes bya bar skyes te dwags po dang lung khra mo brag nas zab gter rnams glang gi lo la gdan drangs te gnas pa las de dus nyams su ma blangs par 'khyams pas mkha' 'gro'i bka' chad kyis tshe'i tshad mthar ma 'khyol bar gshegs so/_/de'ang zhus len gser phreng las/_skye ba de 'das nas longs sku'i zhing khams dar cig nyul zhes gsungs pa'i don thog tu babs te mngon sum 'od gsal gyi snang ba lnga ldan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams lam snang ba'i 'og min du gnas pa'o/_/de nas g.yo ru grwa'i phu stod grong zhes bya bar yab slob dpon bstan bsrung ba dang /_yum 'bro bza' mo bsod nams rgyan gnyis kyi sras su 'khrungs te/_lo bdun nas klog byang bar shes te/_bde gshegs 'dus pa dang phur pa dang /_gu ru'i las byang phrin sgrub dang bcas pa la sbyangs pas lo bcu na shes par gyur cing rtsis dang mdos la sogs pa yang bslabs so/_/de nas lo bcu gsum na rab tu byung te/_mkhan po bsam 'grub rin chen gyi drung du dam pa'i chos 'dul ba la sbyangs shing /_'dul ba lung dang /_so so thar pa'i mdo dang 'od ldan la sogs pa phran tshegs rnams la gsan par mdzad do/_/de nas dpal gsang phu ne'u thog tu slob dpon chen po bla brang pa la sogs pa las byams pa'i chos dang rtog ge'i tshul la sogs pa la thos pa mdzad do/_/de nas slob dpon gzhon nu rgyal po la sogs pa las dbu ma tshig gsal dang /_'jug pa la sogs pa dbu ma'i gzhung dang man ngag rnams la legs par sbyangs so/_/de nas slob dpon gzhon nu don 'grub la sogs pa las gsang ba 'dus pa dang /_gsang ldan dang /_gtsug dgu dang / spyod rgyud la sogs pa dang /_mdo rgyud lung sems phyogs kyi rgyud lung man ngag dang bcas pa legs par gsan no/_/de nas slob dpon bkra shis rin chen la sogs pa las bde mchog dang /_lam 'bras dang /_sbyor drug dang / zhi byed dang /_rdzogs chen sems phyogs la sogs pa man ngag du ma dang rgyud lung la sbyangs so/_/de nas slob dpon gzhon nu rdo rje la sogs pa las spyod 'jug dang bslab btus dang /_bstan rim dang /_lam rim la sogs pa jo bo'i chos skor bka' gdams lugs rnams dang /_do ha dang /_phyag chen dang*/ gcod yul la sogs pa'i man ngag du ma gsan no/_/slob dpon du ma las thun mong gi sgrub sde sna tshogs pa gsan zhing mkhyen par mdzad do/_/de nas bla ma dam pa ku ma rA dza'i drung du rdzogs pa chen po gsang ba snying tig gi dbang khrid rgyud lung man ngag dang bcas pa du ma dang /_gu ru'i gter lung phran tshegs mang po'i don gsan cing thugs nyams su bzhes so/_/de nas shing mo yos kyi lo'i dgun gcig mchims phu'i ri la sgrub pa mdzad cing ri mo can gyi gnas su skal ldan pho mo brgyad la gsang ba snying tig gi dbang khrid byed dus glo bur du mkha' 'gro dang*/_bka' srung mang po babs te mkha' 'gro snying tig gi chos bka' 'byed par bskul nas/_rnal 'byor pa 'od zer go cha dpe len du btang ste 'khor dus/_mkha' 'gro'i 'du ba dpag tu med pa de na yod pa'i rnal 'byor pa kun gyis mthong zhing /_mtshan mo phyogs kun tu mkha' 'gro'i rang sgra di ri ri dang /_rol mo'i sgra mang po yang thos shing /_rnal 'byor pho mo kun gnyid du song byas pas rmi lam med cing /_ma song byas pas sad rgyu yang byung ste/_bde gsal rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la nyin mtshan 'khor mor gnas pa zla ba gcig tu byung zhing /_ngo sprod kyi dus su mthing ga khyab pa chen po'i 'od dang /_lnga ldan ye shes kyi 'od kyang kun gyis mthong zhing /_khrid dus dang rgyab chos thams cad kyi tshe na nam mkha' 'jas khengs pa zla ba gcig tu byung ngo /_/de nas gangs ri thod dkar du 'ongs dus kyang mkha' 'gro'i 'du ba mang po dang /_rang sgra dang sil snyan sgrogs pa skabs su byung zhing*/_khyad par du ston sor 'di'i yig cha 'jog par 'od zer go chas bskul te/_bstan bcos lus grub kyi 'go brtsams pa nas yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du mkha' 'gro'i gnang ba dang /_byin rlabs dang /_rang sgra dang /_byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshan ma bzang po sna tshogs su byung ngo /_/de'i phyir chos 'di ni shin tu gnyan zhing byin rlabs kyi sprin phung 'du bas/tshe 'di nyid la grol ba'i gnad dpag tu med pa yod do/_/'di'i ngo mtshar dang ltas kyi rim pa byung ba de lta bu gter kha gzhan la byung ba ma thos shing /_mi snang ste chos kyi gnad dang zab don mi gcig pa'i phyir ro/_/ngo mtshar ba'i lo rgyus zhib tu bshad na dpag tu med de/_deng sang dus snyigs pa dang /_mi rnams phal cher bdud kyi phyogs la dad pas/_skur pa 'debs shing zog tu mthong ba tsam las med pas mi spro zhing /_ye shes dang las las grub pa'i mi ma yin pa nyid bdag gi dpang por bzhugs pas des chog go_/da ni phyi rabs kyi dad ldan rnams la rjes su gdams pa/_las smon dag pas 'brel ba'i slob ma dang /_/dad ldan skye bo rnams la bskul ba'i tshig_/rna ba'i bdud rtsi sems kyi sman 'di nyid/_/snyan pa'i bka' mchid lags kyis gsan par mdzod/_/tshe 'di mi rtag ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra/_/_/lang tsho mi rtag sos ka'i me tog 'dra/_/lus ni mi rtag gzhan gyi g.yar po 'dra/_/nor rnams mi rtag rtsa ba'i zil pa 'dra/_/mdza' bshes mi rtag tshong khang mgron po 'dra/_/'dus kyang 'bras bas lam mthun grogs dang 'dra/_/'chi bdag mi sdod nub ri'i grib ma 'dra/_/'jig rten phyi ma so kha'i nywa rngos 'dra/_/tshe 'di'i snang ba mdang sum rmi lam 'dra/_/'dod yon rnams ni sgeg mo g.yon can 'dra/_/nam yang mi ngoms sred pas chang 'thung 'dra/_/don med bya ba chu bo'i gnyer ma 'dra/_/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs 'dra/_/gcig las gcig brgyud me tog phreng brgyus 'dra/_/'gro drug 'khor ba shing rta'i 'phang lo 'dra/_/ gcig nas gcig brgyud zo chu'i 'khyud mo 'dra/_/dal 'byor rnyed dka' rin chen gru bo 'dra/_/nam 'jig mi shes chu yi lbu ba 'dra/_/ngan song gnas gsum them rtswa'i gad g.yang 'dra/_/lhungs nas mi thar 'chi bdag kha nang 'dra/_/las dang nyon mongs mtshan mo'i mun rum 'dra/_/gar 'gro cha med 'gron po lam 'khyams 'dra/_/rang sems dge ba sprin rum glog dang 'dra/_/thar lam snang ba rin chen sgron me 'dra/_/dam pa'i bla ma ded dpon sman pa 'dra/_/gcig tu phan brtson bde gshegs dbang po 'dra/_/gdams pa sman 'dra legs par mkhyen mdzod la/_/da res tshe 'di'i thar lam zin par mdzod/_/_/'di phyir phan pa dam pa'i chos yin la/_/de nyid spyad pas 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro/_/'chi ba bas kyang skye ba nyam nga zhing /_/gang du skyes kyang srid na bde ba med/_/me chen 'obs dang 'dra bar rgyal bas gsungs/_/ dam pa'i bla ma rnams dang 'phrad gyur cing /_/zab mo'i gdams pa legs par thob bzhin du/_/brtson pa'i stobs kyis sgrub par mi byed na/_/de las bslus pa bdag la gang zhig yod/_/thos pa tsam gyis sdug bsngal mi grol te/_/sman dpyad thos pas nad las grol nus sam/_/dang por thos pas ma nor thag bcad nas/_/bsams pas the tshom sgro 'dogs kun bcad de/_/ bsgoms shing*nyams su blangs pas sdug bsngal grol/_/de phyir ma nor zab mo'i don shes nas/_/gcig pur nags su sgrub pa mchog tu gces/_/deng sang tshe lo lnga bcu kha ral te/_/tshad du thub kyang phyed tsam gti mug gnyid/_/phyed la'ang sum gnyis rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi ste/_/sum cha gcig la'ang dbang po'i chom rkun mang /_/de ltar dpyad nas chos la ngas sbyangs shes/_/yun du sgom zhing sgrub pa'ang yi mug skye/_/'gro ba gzhan rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos/_/nyon mongs rnams ni thog ma med dus nas/_/sems la goms shing bag chags rgyun mi 'chad/_/de yi dbang gis 'khrul snang 'khor bar 'khyams/_/'di tsam dus na thar zhes tshad gzung med/_/'chi ba'i dus na dran yang rab tu 'phyis/_/_/mgo bo bcad la gsos sman phan ci yod/_/ 'khor ba'i grong na 'gro kun nyam re thag_/rgyal po'i btson ras bcings pa'i mi bzhin du/_/nam yang bde med sdug bsngal rgyun re ring /_/srid nas thar pa'i thabs la brtson par mdzod/_/_/ston pa 'jig rten sgron me byon gyur cing /_/dam chos nyi ma dam pa'ang ma nub la/_/thar pa'i lam bzang phyogs ni shes dus 'dir/_/snying nas chos kyi lam la 'bad par mdzod/_/dal zhing 'byor pas brgyan pa'i lus 'di yang /_/nam 'jigs mi shes 'jim pa'i bum pa 'dra/_/_/sang dang 'jig rten phyi ma'i snang ba gnyis/_/_/sngon la gang 'byung nges pa med pas na/_/de ring nyid nas dam pa'i chos mdzod cig_/tshe 'di'i bya ba shi shir zin pa med/_/nam gzhag tshe na zin pa chos nyid yin/_/ chos la dad pa'i bsam pa 'byung dka' bas/_/nam dran tshe na chos la sgrub par mdzod/_/'khor dang longs spyod bsod nams rnam g.yeng rnams/_/ bdud kyi chos la bar chad sprul bas na/_/rnyed dang bkur stis blo brid shes byas te/_/chog shes ldan pas dben pa'i nags su song /_/mdor na skyes pa'i tha ma 'chi ba ste/_/'dus pa'i tha ma de bzhin 'bral ba yin/_/bsags pa 'dzad cing 'byor pa rgud pas na/_/'khor ba'i chos la sdug bsngal shes byas la/_/zhi ba'i lam la yang dag 'dzegs pa dang*/_/byams dang snying rje'i 'gro ba'i don byed cing /_/stong nyid snying rjes nyin mtshan 'da' bar mdzod/_/ dman sar 'gro ba dam pa'i lam min zhing /_/gzhan dag 'dren pa shing rta chen po'i srol/_/byang chub sems kyis chos kun zin par mdzod/_/lta ba'i rgyal por rang byung ye shes ltos/_/sgom pa'i rgyal por 'od gsal lhun grub bsgoms/_/spyod pa'i rgyal por snang srid sgyu mar sbyongs/_/'bras bu'i rgyal por gdod ma'i zad sar skyol/_/lhun grub sa la kun tu bzang por 'gyur/_/'di ni gzhi rdzogs rang bzhin gnyug ma'i don/_/phan pa'i gdams ngag lags kyis thugs la zhog_/phyi dus mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i zhing khams su/_/bdag dang dad ldan 'gro kun mjal bar smon/_/zhes legs par gsungs so/_/de dag kyang rang gi che ba'i yon tan mngon par rlom pa ma yin gyis/_ji ltar gnas pa'i don brjod pas phyi rabs kyi dad ldan rjes su 'dzin pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/gang zag snyan khung du brgyud pa'i lo rgyus bshad zin to/_/ji ltar legs bshad sprin gyi gzhon pa'i bla re las/_/tshig don rnam bkra'i char gyi snang ba rab bsil bas/_/ma lus 'gro kun dad brgya'i lo thog legs bskrun te/_/kun kyang bde chen kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin shog_/deng nas lus can thar pa'i lam la bdag gis ma lus rab bkod de/_/srid pa'i grong las thams cad zhi dbyings bde gshegs dbang po'i sar gzhol nas/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' dag yongs stong phyam cig mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/rgyal ba'i pho brang ma lus yongs gang mkha' dbyings pad+mo'i 'khyil bar shog_/rig dang grol ba'i rta bdun gyis bskyod blo gros yangs pa'i nam mkha' la/_/dri med 'od zer kun nas rgyas pa'i nyi ma'i snying po shar ba yis/_/gti mug mun pa rmad byung sel zhing nyes pa'i chu gter yongs bskams te/_/'gro kun thar pa'i lam bzang snang zhing skal bzang pad+ma 'dzum par shog_/ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen mchog gcig pu/_/ji lta ji snyed ji bzhin gzigs pas 'gro kun 'dren pa'i gnyen gcig pu/_/srid nas srid 'gro srid las rnam grol ded dpon bla na med gcig pu/_/chos dbyings chos nyid chos sku mngon gyur rang byung pad+mas 'dzin par shog_/rin chen gru bo kun nas mdzes 'dra srid pa'i mtsho chen sgrol ba'i gru/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig chos tshul zab mo snying gi pad+ma la reg cing /_/dri med lha yi dpag bsam shing 'dra 'dod dgu'i re ba yongs skong ba/_/rdo rje phag mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas sprin bzhin 'du bas bskyang bar shog_/_/chos tshul 'di yang nam mkha' ji bzhin sems can dbyings mtha' kun khyab cing /_/rgya mtsho ji bzhin gting mtha' dpag yas skal ldan skye bos rtogs pa dang /_/lhun po ji bzhin 'pho 'gyur med pas mi nub rgyal mtshan yongs bzung ste/_/nyi zla ji bzhin kun tu snang bas phyogs bcur 'phro zhing rgyas par shog_/gter 'byung rin po che'i lo rgyus zhes bya ba/_dpal o rgyan gyi mkhas grub chen po mtsho skyes rdo rje'i sras dri med 'od zer gyis/_/ gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul du sbyar ba rdzogs so//_//dge legs/_/ shub+haM/_/b+ha wan+tu//_//

[6.40 rin po che dbang gi phreng ba]

##/_/rin po che dbang gi phreng ba bzhugs pa legs so/_/ rin chen shog skya'i skor/ rgya gar skad du/_rat+na ab+hi Shiny+tsa ma le nA ma/_bod skad du/_rin po che dbang gi phreng ba zhes bya ba/_dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/che ba'i che mchog lha yi lhar gyur pa/_/kun bzang he ru ka dpal rigs lnga'i gtso/_/dga' rab rdo rje shrI sid+ha dang /_o rgyan yab yum gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gsang ba'i snying po las/_/gzhi nyid 'bras bur smin byed zab mo'i lam/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan ma lus sgrub byed pa/_/rin chen dbang gi phreng ba bshad par bya/_/de la bcud
