khyad par can sgrub pa la snod dri ma med pa dgos pas/_AH:_thog mar de bsgrub pa'i phyir dben zhing yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su zhi khro'i thang ka la sogs pa dkon mchog gi rten bkram pa'i mdun du/_maN+Dal kyi dbus mar me che ba gcig gi mthar snang gsal gyi phreng ba ci tsam 'byor pas bskor ba'i mthar phyi nang gi mchod pa tshogs dang bcas pa legs par bshams la/_thams cad khrus byas te gral la 'khod pa na/_bla mas rnal 'byor pa rnams la/_rdo rje sems dpa'i sgom bzlas phog nas yi ge brgya pa brjod pa'i tshe/_bla ma nyid skad cig gis slob dpon pad+ma thod phreng rtsal mthing nag rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i pang du mkhar chen bza' mtsho rgyal dmar mo gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas yab la 'khyud pa/ gnyis ka rin po che dang rus pas brgyan pa/_rdo rje'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa la/_mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pas bskor bar bsam pa'i 'od kyis/_nub phyogs o rgyan nas de kho na 'dra ba'i ye shes pa spyan drangs la mchod pas mchod de/_bdag la thim par bsam/_O~M badzra gu ru pad+ma thod phreng rtsal AHhU~M/ zhes ci 'grub bzlas te/_snang srid thams cad stong pa'i ngang las 'og min gyi zhing khams 'od zer lnga'i rang bzhin du gsal ba'i dbus na/_gzhal yas khang sgo rta babs drwa ba dang drwa ba phyed pa la sogs pas mdzes pa/'og zhi ba la steng khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du gsal btab la/_rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas dbyangs dang bcas te/_hUM ma lus sems can kun gyi mgon gyur cing /_/ bdud sde dpung bcas mi bzad 'joms mdzad lha/_/dngos rnams ma lus ji bzhin gzigs gyur pa'i/_/zhi khro rab 'byams 'khor bcas gnas 'dir gshegs zhes pas/_steng gi nam mkhar byon pa la mchod cing bstod nas/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dam tshig pa dang gnyis su med par bsam la/_nyams chag bskang ba snang gsal gyi mchod pa thog mar dbul te/_sprin med mkha' la nyi shar ji bzhin du/_/dri med 'od gsal gdod nas dag pa'i chos/_/shes rab gzi ldan dpal gyi sgron me 'di/_/zhi khro rab 'byams dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/nyams dang sgrib pa'i rang bzhin ci mchis pa/_/ma lus sbyang phyiRa thugs rje bzhes mdzod la/_/gnyis med don gyi ye shes chen po yis/_/tshangs pa chen po'i dngos grub stsal du gsol/_/oM badzra bA rA hI A lo ke pU tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_zhes brjod nas/_dam tshig skong ba phyi'i mchod pa ni/_/_/'jig rten 'di 'am gzhan dag na/_/me tog ji snyed yod pa dang /_/ bdag gis gus par bshams pa 'di/_/zhi khro rab 'byams tshogs la 'bul/_/[ \u0f00] badzra bA rA hI puSh+pa/_de bzhin du/_bdug spos/_snang gsal/_dri chab/_zhal zas/_rol mo rnams kyang so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dbul lo/_/de nas sor chud pa nang gi mchod pa ni/_dung chen ye shes lnga yi gzhal yas su/_/rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i a mr-i ta/_/dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho mnyes mdzad 'dis/_/zhi khro rab 'byams dkyil 'khor mnyes gyur cig_/oM badzra bA rA hI a mri ta AHhU~M/_ye nas rnam dag rgyal ba mnyes mdzad ma/_/me tog bdug spos snang gsal sna tshogs dri/_/sgeg mo phreng thogs glu gar yid 'ong ma/_/zhi khro rab 'byams dkyil 'khor mnyes gyur cig_/oM badzra bA rA hi hU~M traM hrI aHhU~M/_zhes pas mchod nas/_sku gsung thugs nyid mi 'gyur kun tu bzang /_/bde gshegs bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/chos sku nam mkha' bzhin du dbyer med kyang /_/longs sku 'ja' tshon bzhin du so sor gsal/_/thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes pa'i/_/rigs lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ma skyes chos nyid dag pa'i pho brang nas/_/zhi dang khro tshul thabs mkhas thugs rje'i lha/_/thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/_/zhi khro rab 'byams tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ces pas bstod de/_ngang nyid ye nas spros dang bral ba la/_/bshags dang bshags par bya ba mi dmigs kyang /_/kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du bshags par bgyi/_/tshangs pa chen po'i dngos grub stsal du gsol/_/ces pa dang /_ye shes sku mchog tshar gcig gnyis gsum brjod pa'i rjes la/_rnal 'byor pa rnams langs te lus ngag yid gsum gyi 'gyod tshangs thams cad 'phral dag par bsam zhing /_brkyangs phyag 'tshal bas/_na rag gi skong ba rgyas pa tshar gcig_/'bring bdun/_chung ba yin na nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du brjod nas bshags par byas pas/_sgrib pa dang nyams chag ma bskang ba'i phyogs nas mar me mi gsal zhing ngan la/_bskangs pa dang dam tshig gtsang ba'i ngos kyi mar me gsal bas thams cad ma bskangs kyi bar du 'gyod tshangs kyi bshags pa bya'o/_/de nas thams cad kyis ye shes sku mchog tshar gsum brjod la/_phyi nang gi mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te/_tshogs kyi dga' ston cher bya'o/_/des ni dam tshig gi nyams chag dang sdig sgrib thams cad dag par byed pa'i spyi khrus chen mo yin pas phan yon dpag tu med do/_/rjes la bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rgya cher brjod pa ste snod khyad par can du sgrub pa'o/_/AH_gnyis pa bcud khyad par can du bsgrub pa'i phyir/_dbang dngos bstan pa la brgyad las/_dang po byin rlabs kyi sgo dbye ba mkha' 'gro brda'i dbang la gsum las/_sngon 'gro ni/_tshogs gtor rgya cher bshams te/ bdud rtsi'i chus khrus byas te gral du 'khod pa la bgegs bskrad de dri'i thig le gnas gsum du bkod nas/_dngos gzhi ni bla mas rang nyid bla ma yab yum du gsal btab ste/_slob ma rnams pad zla'i steng na g.yung drung 'khyil ba'i steng na hrIH las rdo rje phag mo gcig pu gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa g.yon brkyangs g.yas bskums pa'i rting pa ba ga la gtad pa nam mkha'i dkyil na yod par sgom du bcug pa'i rjes la/_bla mas steng gi nam mkha' nas rdo rje phag mo mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pas bskor ba spyan drangs la/ dmigs pa dpod de slob ma'i snying gar thim par bsam zhing /__g.yung drung 'khyil ba 'khor ba la dmigs pa 'dzin du gzhug go_/yang shar dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang /_rin chen mkha' 'gro dang*/ pad+ma mkha' 'gro dang*/las kyi mkha' 'gro rnams byon pa/_spyi bo dang /_mgrin pa dang /_lte ba dang /_gsang bar thim par bsam zhing /_g.yung drung 'khyil ba 'khor bas nam mkha' na phar bun bun yod pa la dmigs pa 'dzin du 'jug_/O~M b+hud+d+ha DA ki ni ha ri ni sa sa ma ya dza dza/_badzra pra we sha hoH_de bzhin du/_badzra rat+na pad+ma karma sa ma yA DA ki ni ha ri ni sa ma ya dza dzaHpra we sha ho:_pra we sha hoH_zhes drag tu brjod cing rol mo'i sgra cher bsgrag cing tshil chen gyi dud pas bdug go_/des ni 'khrab pa dang /_ngu ba dang /_'dar ba la sogs pa ye shes phebs pa'i rtags 'ong nges so/_/de rjes tshogs la rol zhing dga' ston dang bkra shis bya'o/_/des ni mkha' 'gro'i byin rlabs 'jug cing dbang gi sgo phye bas bar chad med cing dngos grub phun sum tshogs par 'byung ngo /_/ gnyis pa lus kyi sgrib pa sbyang zhing sprul pa'i skur grol bar byed pa spros bcas bum pa'i dbang la gsum las/_sngon 'gro thun mong pa dang /_thun mong ma yin pa gnyis las/_dang po ni mkha' 'gro brda dbang gi rjes nyid la gsol ba gdab pa ni/_slob mas me tog dor la phyag 'tshal te mgrin gcig tu/_kye kun bzang rdo rje 'dzin pa che/_/ye shes lnga ni thob bya'i phyir/_/rigs lnga'i dbang mchog bshad du gsol/_/ces pa gsum gyi rjes la bla mas/_kye rigs kyi bu mchog khyed rnams kyis/_/bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang /_/chos skyong dang ni rdo rje'i spun/_/tshogs mchod yon gyis mnyes nus sam/_/zhes dris pa'i lan du slob mas/_kye ji ltar thugs kyis dgongs mdzad pa/_/ bdag gis ma lus bsgrub lags pas/_/_/dpa' bos bdag la gnang du gsol/_/zhes zhu'o/_/de nas slob ma rnams yi ge brgya pa'i sgom bzlas cung zad re byed du bcug nas/_bla ma'i thugs ka'i hU~M las 'od 'phros pas slob ma'i snying gar phog pas lus thams cad rdo rje'i go khrab kyis g.yogs par bsgom du bcug la/_dpon slob kun hUM gi sgra skad di ri ri bzlas pas/_steng 'og thams cad rdo rje'i rwa ba gur bla re mda'i ra ba ye shes kyi me ri me dpung 'bar ba'i srung 'khor dar cig bsgoms nas/_dam tshig sbyin pa ni bla mas/ kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/dam tshig rgyud la gnas 'dod na/_/thabs shes gnyis kyi dam tshig tu/_/mtshan ma la ni mi 'gongs dang /_/rdo rje slob dpon mal cha dang*/_/rdo rje spun la rtsod mi bya/_/de ltar bsrung bar nus gyur tam/_/zhes pa'i lan du slob mas/_kye sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi/_/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du/_/bdag cag rnams ni bsrung bar 'tshal/_/zhes brjod do/_/de nas dga' ston bya'o/_/ gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa'i sngon 'gro la sa'i cho ga_/legs par bsham pa/_sta gon bya ba dang gsum las/_dang po ni gzhi bdag la gtor ma sbyin la sa bslangs te/_maN+Dal pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa la dri'i thig le dang me tog*gi*tshom*bu*br-i thi wi de wI hrIH_zhes pa bkod la/_chu gnyis sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma gsum bshams te/_rang nyid sa gnon byas pa'i srin lag las 'od zer 'phros pa sa 'og tu song bas sa'i lha mo brtan ma ser mo rin po che'i bum pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/_phag rgod la chibs pa la sa bdag klu gnyan gyis bskor ba spyan drangs te bzhugs par bsams la/ lha mo chen mo sa bdag 'jig rten yum/_/rin chen rdzogs dbang mchog gi rgyan gyis brgyan/_/do shal rkang gdub sgra sgrogs sems dpas mchod/_/ mchod yon 'di bzhes 'di ru byin brlab mdzad/_/O~M pri thiM wi de wI sa ma ya dzaHhA~MhUM baM hoH:_/dri med yid du 'ong ba yi/_/lha rdzas dam pa'i mchod yon 'di/_/ lha mo la ni 'bul bar bgyi/_/sa 'di bdag la gnang du gsol/_/O~M pr-i thi wi de wI any+nyaM pra ti tsA ye swAhA/_zhes pa nas/_me tog_/bdug spos/_snang gsal/_dri chab/_zhal zas/_rol mo rnams/_puSh+pa/_d+ha pe/_A lo ke_/g+han+te/ nai wi*te/_shab+ta*pra tIts+tsha ye swA hAs*mchod la/_skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang /_/sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/_/lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/_/shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yis/_/ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/_/de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las/_/rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/_/bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa che ge mo/_zhes bya bas sa'i phyogs 'dir sems can gyi don du dkyil 'khor chen po bzheng gis/_lha mo khyod kyis sa'i phyogs 'di bdag la gnang bar mdzod cig_/ces brjod pas/_des kyang rig pa 'dzin pa khyod ci dga' bar spyod cig_/ces gsungs par bsams la/ gtor ma gcig a kA ros lha mo la 'bul/_gcig dkar po'i phyogs la byin nas/_gang dag 'dir gnas lha dang klu/_/gnod sbyin srin po gzhan dag la/_/_/sa 'di bdag gis bslang bar bgyi/_/dkyil 'khor don du stsal du gsol/_/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i bya ba mthar phyin pa'i grogs rgya chen po mdzad du gsol/_zhes brjod do/_/gcig nag po'i phyogs la byin nas/_sa phyogs 'dir ni slob dpon bdag_/dkyil 'khor rgyal po sgyu 'phrul ni/_/ bzheng gis sa 'dir gnas pa'i bgegs/_/'di ru ma 'dug gzhan du dengs/ O~M su b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/_g+hi h+na g+hi h+na hU~M/_g+hi h+'a pa ya g+hi h+'a pa ya hU~M/_oM A na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAn/_bId+ya rA dza hUM phaT ces brjod la/_O~M badzra mus/_lha mo 'khor bcas gshegs/_bgegs bskrad nas/_gyo mo dang rus pa la sogs pa bsal nas sa mnyen bzang po'i stegs bu 'dom gang pa la sogs pa ji ltar 'os pa me long gi ngos ltar snyoms pa la shar dang byang cung zad gzhol ba'i steng dang 'khor yug tu/_lag mthil g.yas pas bskor zhing /[ \u0f00] ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_ces brjod pas/_lag pa las 'od zer byung nas ma dag pa sbyangs/ O~M b+hu khaM zhes brjod pas phyogs thams cad nam mkhar gyur/_oM me d+hi ni badzI b+ha wa b+han+d+ha hU~M hU~M phaT kyis sa phyogs thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur/_O~M badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M gis bsrung zhing brtan par bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas/_hUM gi glu blang zhing /_rdo rje'i gar bsgyur bas rkang pa g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba dang dor stabs su dkyil 'khor la bskor zhing khro bo'i dmigs pa gsal/_rdo rje dril bu dpung mgor thod dbyug gdengs pa ltar bya ba dang /_'khor lo ltar bskor ba dang /_mda' ltar 'phangs pa dang / lcags kyu ltar bkur pa dang /_zhags pa ltar 'phangs pa dang /_gtso bo lnga dang sgo ma bzhi'i sngags sum b+ha ni dang bcas pa brjod do/_/sa'i cho ga'o/_/de yang ba glang lhas dang khang pa dang /_gtsug lag khang la sogs pa sngar nas sa dul ba rnams su ni mi dgos la/_ma dul ba rnams su bya'o/_/ gnyis pa legs par bshams pa ni maN+Dal gyi steng du dri'i thig le dang me tog gi tshom bu lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa dgod cing lha so so'i sa bon nam rtsa sngags brjod/_bla bre yol ba la sogs pas brgyan cing /_rin po che'am/_rdza'i bum pa yin na lnga ni dbang bskur ba rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa yin pas rigs lnga'i kha dog tu bsgyur ba la so so'i phyag mtshan nam/_sa bon gyi yi ge'i mtshan ma gdab las bum dkar po bya/_de rnams kyi bgegs bskrad/_gu gul gyis bdug cing*nyung*kar*gyis*brab la*chu*gtsang*mas sum gnyis tsam bkang la/_'bru lnga/_bdud rtsi lnga/_rin po che lnga/_sman lnga/_dri lnga ste lnga lnga nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bum rdzas blugs/_dar ram ras dmar pos mgul bcings/_dpag bsam gyi shing gis kha brgyan/_rdo rje gzungs thag dang bcas pas brgyan pa stegs mtho ba'i steng du bzhag_/stegs bu'i mtha' skor du phyi nang gi mchod pa rnams rgya cher bshams/_gzhan yang rdo rje dang*/_dril bu dang /[ · ]ku sha dang /_srung skud dang /_bdud rtsi lnga'i ril bu dang so shing la sogs pa 'dir dgos pa'i yo byad rnams tshogs par bya'o/_/ gsum pa sta gon du bya ba la gsum las/_dang po bum pa sta gon ni/ rang nyid skad cig gis rang bzhin gzhi yi kun tu bzang po yab yum mthing ga rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin par bsams la/_ku shas thod pa nas bdud rtsi'i bsang chu gtor la/_O~M badzra a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_ces lan gsum brjod nas/_O~M swa b+ha wa shud+d+hasarba d+harmA sA b+ha wa shud+d+hi&haM/_phyi dang nang gis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad stong pa chen po/_stong pa'i ngang las paM las pad+ma dang raM las nyi ma dang a las zla ba'i steng du/_b+haM yongs su gyur pa las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa lnga/_las thams cad pa'-i bum pa dang bcas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin yangs shing rgya che ba/_lto ba ldir ba/_zhabs zhum pa/_mchu 'phyangs pa/_mgrin pa phra ba/_lha'i gos pany+tsa li kas mgrin pa dkris shing dpag bsam gyi shing gis kha brgyan pa/_mthing ga dang /_dkar po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_ljang gu dang /_dkar po'i rang bzhin thams cad kyang phyi bum pa'i dbyibs can la nang lha'i gzhal yas khang chen po/_'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'i nang rnams na/_seng ge dang /_glang po dang /_rta mchog dang /_rma bya dang /_shang shang dang rin po che'i khri stegs rnams su/_paM las pad+ma/_a las zla ba/_raM las nyi ma'i steng du/_O~M hU~M traM hrIHaHhU~M/_e baM l-i raM yaM baM las/_rnam par snang mdzad dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/_/mi bskyod pa dang sangs rgyas spyan ma dang /_/rin chen 'byung ldan rdo rje mA ma kI_/'od dpag med dang rdo rje gos dkar mo/_/don yod grub pa dam tshig sgrol ma dang /_/rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje snyems ma ste/_/kun kyang zhal sbyor skyil krung rin chen brgyan/_/yab rnams phyag g.yas 'khor lo rdo rje dang*/_/rin chen pad+ma rgya gram rdo rje dang /_/g.yon rnams dril bu yum la 'khyud pa ste/_/yum rnams gri gug thod pas yab la 'khyud/_/snang la rang bzhin med pa'i chu zla 'dra/_/steng gi nam mkha' las de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa yab yum byon pa la/_any+nyaM pa t+yaM puSh+pa d+hU pe A lo ke g+han+ne ni wi t+ya shab+ta AHhU~M dzaHhU~M baM hoH_lha so so'i bum pa'i lha dang gnyis su med par thim/_de thams cad kyi spyi bor \u0f00 mgrin par AHthugs kar hUM gis mtshan par gyur/_/_hUM hUM gis rdo rje'i go zhubs dang ldan/_oM hUM traM hrI AH:_de bzhin gshegs pa lnga steng gi nam mkha' las rang byon te rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur bar gyur/_rang gi snying ga nas 'od zer byung bas gzungs thag la 'khril te song bas/_bum nang gi lha so so'i sku la phog/ thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul/_sbyor mtshams nas bdud rtsi dkar dmar gyi rgyun babs pas bum pa'i nang khengs par gyur/_oM dzI na dzi ka laM de shwa ra ti hUM/_hU~M badzra nr-i ka muM d+hartu shwa ri ti stAM/_swA rat+na traM ka maM mo ha ra ti stAM/_O~M a ro li ga bAM ra ga ra ti hU~M/_hA pra dz+nyA d+hi ka taM badzra ra ti stAM/_zhes rnam rgyal dang /_oM badzra sa twa hU~M baM zhes las bum la dmigs te ci 'grub bzlas te/_'jig rten 'di 'am gzhan dag na/_/mchod yon me tog bdug spos dang /_/snang gsal dri chab zhal zas rnams/_/rigs lnga yab yum rnams la 'bul/_/oM sarba ta ShA ga ta/_ar+tha pat+yaM puSh+pa d+hupe A lo kai g+han+te nai wi te/_shab+ta A hUM/_phung po gnas 'gyur nyon mongs lnga dag cing /_/sku lnga ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i sku/_/bdag nyid chen po rigs lnga yab yum dang /_/rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso/_/ye shes yum gyur rdo rje snyems ma la/_/rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pas phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ces bstod nas/_badzra mus ye shes pa gshegs/_O~M AHhUM gis dam tshig pa chur zhu ba las byung ba'i bdud rtsis bum pa khengs par bsam mo/_/ gnyis pa lha sta gon ni/_las bum nas me tog tshom bu la bsang chu gtong zhing /_a mr-i ta lan gsum brjod nas/_O~M yo ga shud+d+he sarba d+harma yo ga shum+b+ho swa b+hA wa badzra Ad+ma ko&haM/_phyi dang nang gi chos thams cad stong pa/[ \u0f00] swa b+hA was stong pa'i ngang las 'byung ba bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa yongs su gyur pa las/_paM las pad+ma a las zla ba/_ri las nyi ma'i steng du b+haM las thar pa chen po'i gzhal yas khang pa/_sgo bzhi/_gru bzhi rtsig pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyang nang nas rim pa bzhin mthing ga_/dkar po/_dmar po/_ser po/_ljang gu rnams kyi steng na rin po che'i pha gu ser po la drwa ba dang drwa ba phyed pa 'phyangs pa/_de'i steng na rdo karma shi sha las grub pa'i mda' yab dang*/rin po che'i dra mig gseng mas bskor ba'i pu shus mdzes pa'i steng gtsang khang phyur bu'i rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che'i tog gis mdzes shing /_phyogs bzhi'i rta babs bang rim bzhi bzhi dang ldan pa rnams la rin po che'i gdugs/_shin tu mdzes pa'i ri dwags/_lha'i gos/_rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan/_yid du 'ong ba'i 'phan/_zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa/_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can la sogs pa gzhal yas khang mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan pa/_phyi rol na 'dod yon gyi snam bu la lha mo bcu drug gis mchod rdzas du ma thogs gzhal yas pa'i lha rnams la mchod par byed pa'i phyi rol du dur khrod chen po brgyad dang /_srung ba'i 'khor los brgyan pa/_nang ka ba chen po brgyad kyis bteg cing rdo rje'i gdung bzhis mig mangs ris su mdzes par phub pa'i/_dbus su seng ge'i khri/_shar du glang po che/_lhor rta mchog_/nub tu rma bya/_byang du shang shang*/_rin po che'i khri rnams kyi steng du pad+ma dang zla ba dang / nyi ma'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa rigs rnam pa lnga ste/_oM e las rnam par snang mdzad dang /_kun tu bzang mo mthing ga rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas spras shing /_hA~M baM las mdun du mi bskod pa dang mA ma kI dkar mo/_traM laM las g.yas su rin chen 'byung ldan dang /_sangs rgyas spyan ma ser mo/_hrIHraM las rgyab tu 'od dpag med dang gos dkar mo/_a yaM las g.yon du don yod grub pa dang dam tshig sgrol ma ljang gu mnyam par sbyor ba/_yab rnams kyi phyag g.yas pa rnams na/_'khor lo dang /_rdo rje dang /_rin po che dang /_pad+ma dang /_rgya gram rnams bsnams shing de rnams kyis yu ba byas pa'i g.yon pa rnams na dril bu 'dzin pas yum la 'khyud pa/_yum rnams gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas yab la 'khril ba de thams cad rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing /_longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i cha lugs can no/_/de'i phyi rol dang nang gi mtshams kyi grwa bzhir pad+ma dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor re re'i steng du hU~M traM hrIH_aH_gnyis gnyis yongs su gyur pa las/_mer nam mkha'i snying po dkar po g.yas g.yon ral gri dang dril bu 'dzin pas sgeg mo dkar mo me long bsnams pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba/_srin por sa yi snying po ser po g.yas g.yon rin po che'i myu gu dang dril bu 'dzin pas phreng ba ma ser mo rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba/_rlung du spyan ras gzigs dmar po pad+ma dang dril bu 'dzin pas glu ma dmar ser pi wang 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba/_dbang ldan du kun tu bzang po ljang skya g.yas g.yon rin po che'i snye ma dang dril bu 'dzin pas gar ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o/_/yang phyi rim gyi grwa bzhir pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du hU~M traM hrIHaH_gnyis gnyis yongs su gyur pa las/_shar lhor byams pa dkar po g.yas g.yon klu shing dang dril bu 'dzin pas bdug spos ma dkar ser bdug spos kyi ga'u 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba/_lho nub tu sgrib pa rnam sel dmar ser g.yas g.yon pu ti dang dril bu 'dzin pas me tog ma ser mo me tog 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba/_nub byang du 'jam dpal dmar po g.yas g.yon ral gri dang dril bu 'dzin pas snang gsal ma dmar mo snang gsal 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba/_byang shar du lag na rdo rje ljang skya g.yas g.yon rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas dri chab ma ljang gu dri'i dung phor bsnams pa dang sbyor ba'o/_/de thams cad kyang sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'i sku la dar dang rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa'o/_/de thams cad kyi sgo bzhir pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du dzaHhU~M baM ho gnyis gnyis yongs su gyur pa las/_shar sgor khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dkar po lcags kyu dang dril bu 'dzin pas sgo ma lcags kyu ma dkar mo dang sbyor ba/_lho sgor khro bo gshin rje gshed ser po dbyug to dang zhags pa 'dzin pas sgo ma zhags pa ma ser mo dang sbyor ba dang*/_nub sgor khro bo rta mgrin rgyal po dmar po lcags sgrog dang sdigs mdzub mdzad pas sgo ma lcags sgrog ma dmar mo dang sbyor ba/_byang sgor khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ljang gu rgya gram dang dril bu 'dzin pas sgo ma dril bu ma ljang gu dang mnyam par sbyor ba/_de thams cad kyang me ri 'bar ba'i klong na khro bo'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pas g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang du bzhugs pa'o/_/de dag gi gdangs las thub pa drug la steng na brgya byin dkar po pi wang bsnams pa/_shar du thags bzang ris mthing ga go cha 'dzin pa/_lhor shAkya thub pa ser po lhung bzed dang mkhar gsil bsnams pa/_nub tu seng ge rab brtan mthing ga pu ti 'dzin pa/_byang du kha 'bar de ba dmar po rin po che'i sgrom bu bsnams pa/_'og na a ba glang mgo me chu bsnams pa'o/_/de dag gi sku'i gdangs las khrag 'thung gi lha tshogs rnams kyi steng gi nam mkha' la me ri me dpung gi nang na bzhugs pa ni/_dbus na he ru ka rigs lnga la gnas kyi ke'u ri ma brgyad kyis bskor ba'i phyi rol na yul gyi phra men ma brgyad dang /_sgo ma bzhi dang /_dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad de khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brgyad rang rang gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs shing /_pho brang gi phyi yi dur khrod rnams su/_bla ma dang /_yi dam dang /_mkha' 'gro chos skyong rnams sprin phung gtibs pa tsam du mos pa byas la/_rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgyas se gol gnyis bsnol te dpung par brdab la spyan drangs ba ni/_hUM dus gsum bla ma kun bzang chos kyi sku/_/nyon mongs lnga dag phung po gnas 'gyur pa'i/_/sku gsum lnga ldan rigs lnga yab yum tshogs/_/'gro ba'i don phyir gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol/_/oM gu ru badzra hU~M hU~M hrIHaHbadzra aM gu sha sa ma ya dza dzaH zhes pas bla ma dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad thibs kyis byon par bsam la/_hUM sgyu ma chu zla ye shes gzhal yas khang /_/skyon bral pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs/_/O~M pad+ma sUr+ya tsan+d+ra ka ma la ya stAM/_O~M badzra puN+ye d+hu pe A lo ke g+han+te nai wi t+ya shab+ta AHhUM/_sku gsung thugs nyid ye nas kun tu bzang /_/sku lnga ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i lha/_/thabs mkhas thugs rje 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/_/bla ma kun bzang rigs lnga'i tshogs la bstod/_/ dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa dam tshig pa dang gnyis su med pa'i spyi bor oM/_mgrin par AH: thugs kar hUM gis mtshan par gyur/[ \u0f00] hUM traM hrIHaH_sa de bzhin gshegs pa lngas dbang bskur ba'i chu lhag ma yar lud pa las dbus phyogs pa la rnam par snang mdzad/_shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi la mi bskyod pa la sogs pas dbu brgyan/_mchod pa bsang sbyangs byas la/_hUM srid par gtogs pa'i me tog sna tshogs rigs/_/dkar ser dmar ljang mthing ga'i mdangs ldan pa'i/_/mdzes ldan dri zhim me tog ji snyed rnams/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/O~M badzra puSh+pa AHhUM/_srid par gtogs pa'i bdug spos sna tshogs rigs/_/du ru ka dang*a ka ru la sogs/_/dri zhim bsung ldan spos mchog ji snyed rnams/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_o~M badzra dz+nyA pe AHhUM/_srid par gtogs pa'i snang gsal sna tshogs rigs/_/'bru mar rtsi dang rtswa shing 'od kyi gdangs/_/dmar gsal mdangs chen snang gsal ji snyed rnams/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/oM badzra A lo ke AHhU~M/ srid par gtogs pa'i dri chab sna tshogs rigs/_/tsan+dan gur gum sihA'i lde gu sogs/_/rang byung sbyar ba'i byug pa bde byed rnams/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_oM badzra g+han+te aHhUM/_srid par gtogs pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs rigs/_/rang byung lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba'i zas/_/sna tshogs g.yos mchog gtsang ma'i zhal zas rnams/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/\u0f00 badzra ni wi d+ya AHhU~M/_srid par gtogs pa'i rol mo sna tshogs rigs/_/rnga ting g.yer kha dril bu rdza rnga dang /_/'byung ba'i rang sgra glu gar rol mo'i dbyangs/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/oM badzra shab+ta AHhU~M/ de nas nang mchod ni/_hA~M snod bcud snang srid sna tshogs yid 'ong gzugs/_/ rdo rje gzugs ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM badzra rU pa pra tIts+tsha AHhU~MhUM/_snod bcud snang srid sna tshogs yid 'ong sgra/_/_/rdo rje sgron ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM badzra shab+ta AHhUM/_snod bcud snang srid sna tshogs dri zhim spos/_/rdo rje dri ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM badzra g+han+te AHhUM/_snod bcud snang srid sna tshogs ro ldan zas/_/ rdo rje ro ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM badzra ni wi d+ya AHhUM/_snod bcud snang srid sna tshogs bde ba'i reg_/rdo rje reg ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/_/O~M badzra par she AHhUM/_de nas gsang mchod ni/_hUM gsang mchod bde chen sku yi rig ma ni/_/sku mdog dkar mdzes me long pad+ma bsnams// shin tu yid 'ong bde gshegs mnyes mdzad ma/_/gsang mchog bde ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol/_/O~M badz+wa dang she AHhUM/_hUM/_gsang mchog gsung gi bde chen rig ma ni/_/sku mdog dmar mdzes rnga zlum sgra sgrogs ma/_/shin tu yid 'ong bde gshegs mnyes mdzad ma/_/gsang mchog bde ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol/_/O~M badzra mur rdza AHhUM/_hUM/_gsang mchog thugs kyi bde chen rig ma ni/_/sku mdog mthing mdzes pi waM sgra sgrogs ma/_/shin tu yid 'ong bde gshegs mnyes mdzad ma/_/gsang mchog bde ba'i mtshon pa bzhes su gsol/_/O~M badzra wi ni aHhUM/_hUM/_gsang mchog yon tan bde chen rig ma ni/_/sku mdog ser mdzes gling bu'i sgra sgrogs ma/_/_shin tu yid 'ong bde gshegs mnyes mdzad ma/_/gsang mchog bde ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol/_/\u0f00 badzra baM se AHhUM/_hU~M/_gsang mchog phrin las bde chen rig ma ni/_/sku mdog ljang mdzes rdza rnga'i sgra sgrogs ma/_/shin tu yid 'ong bde gshegs mnyes mdzad ma/_/gsang mchog bde ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol/_/O~M badzra me d+he AHhUM/_zhes pas mchod la/_bstod pa ni/_bla ma kun bzang thig le'i sku/_/nyag cig mtha' bral lu gu rgyud/_/dbyings rig 'du 'bral med pa yi/_/cir mi dgongs la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/hUM/_zhe sdang rnam shes rang grol dbyings/_/me long ye shes dkar gsal sku/_/chu khams rnam dag yab yum rol/_/mi bskyod yab yum phyag 'tshal bstod/_/hUM/ 'dod chags 'du shes rnam dag dbyings/_/sor rtogs ye shes dmar gsal sku/_/me khams rnam dag yab yum rol/_/snang mtha' yab yum phyag 'tshal bstod/_/hUM/_gti mug gzugs khams rang grol dbyings/_/chos dbyings ye shes mthing gsal sku/_/nam mkha' rnam dag yab yum rol/_/rnam snang yab yum phyag 'tshal bstod/_/hUM/_nga rgyal tshor ba rnam dag dbyings/_/gnyam nyid ye shes ser gsal sku/_/sa khams rnam dag yab yum rol/_/rin 'byung yab yum phyag 'tshal bstod/_/hUM/_phrag dog 'du byed rnam dag dbyings/_/bya grub ye shes ljang gsal sku/_/rlung khams rnam dag yab yum rol/_/don grub yab yum phyag 'tshal bstod/_/hUM/_rnam shes tshogs brgyad sems dpa' brgyad/_/nyon mongs drug dag thub pa drug_/ma 'gag rig rtsal sgo ba bzhi/_/ 'phrin las mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/hUM/_rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi gdangs/_/dug lnga rnam dag khro bo'i sku/_/lnga bcu rtsa brgyad 'bar ba'i tshul/_/ 'jigs gzugs ston la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ces pa'i 'og tu gsol ba gdab pa ni thal mo sbyar la/_ho dgongs su gsol/_rgyal ba rigs lnga yab yum 'khor dang bcas/_/sems dpa' sems ma ma lus bdag la dgongs/_/rgyal ba sras bcas mchod pa dang /_/slob bu khyed kyi rjes gzhugs phyir/_/bdag nyid che ge zhes bgyi bas/_/nangs par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bri/_khyed kyi thugs rjes dgongs mdzod la/_/byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/_/zhes brjod nas/_maN+Dal gyi shar phyogs su stegs bu mda' gang ba'i steng du zlum bskor bzhi'i nang ma la pad 'dab bzhi/_gnyis pa la sems dpa' yab yum brgyad kyi mtshan ma dang thub pa drug_/gsum pa la sgo ma bzhi'i phyag mtshan nam brda/ bzhi pa la bla ma dang dpa' bo chos skyong dang bcas pa'i mtshan ma bkod la/_dkar po byas te zhi ba'i shing zlum por brtsegs la me spar ba'i nang du me lha dkar po ra skyes kyi steng na/_zhal gcig phyag gnyis g+han+te dang me thab bsnams pa bskyed la/_hUM/_gzi brjid chen po me yi lha/_/'dod pa thams cad sbyin mdzad cing /_/gegs sel dngos grub stsol ba'i lha/_/'dir gshegs mchod yon bzhes su gsol/_O~M asne ya sa ma ya dza dza/_zhes pas me lha'i phyag rgya rna drung du g.yab pas/_shar lho nas me lha de 'dra ba byon te thab kyi dam tshig pa la thim par bsam la/_oM ag+ni ye che ge mo 'khor dang bcas pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa bgegs dang bar du gcod pa thams cad shin+taM ku ru ye swAhA/_mar khu dgang blugs bdun gyis byon zan phul/_ahU~M pat+yaM puSh+pa d+hU pe A lo ke g+han+te nai wi t+ya shap+ta A hUM gis mchod la/_sngar gyi sngags de nyid kyis/_yam shing dang /_mar dang /_'bras dang /_so ba dang /_til dang /_nas dang /_gro dang /_sran ma dang /_zho zan dang /_dri dang /_bdug pa dang /_dUr ba rnams so so'am/_snod gcig tu bsres la 'bul lo/_/de ltar nyi shu rtsa gcig song ba dang /_me lha'i steng gi cha la bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum spyan drangs te/_byon zan dang mchod pa phul nas/_na mo gu ru b+h+ya/_na mo bud+d+ha ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na mo sang g+ha ya/_a mr-i ta dz+wa la raM/_zhes sreg rdzas phul te/_sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa dang*/_mgon po thugs rje cher ldan gyis bstod nas/_gu ru spyan drangs te/_O~M mahA gu ru pad+ma sid+d+hi hos sreg rdzas phul la mchod bstod bya'o/_/me lha'i lto bar dkyil 'khor bskyed cing bstim la/_byon zan bdun dang /_mchod bstod mdor bsdus byas nas/_O~M hU~M traM hrIHaH_dzaHhU~M baM hoH_bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa'i nad gdon sdig sgrib bgegs dang bar du gcod pa thams cad shan+tiM ku ru ye swAhA/_zhes pas sreg rdzas rnams brgya'am stong la sogs pa phul la/_slar yang mchod cing bstod nas/_gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas/_/legs spyad 'di la nyes gyur gang*/_/gang phyir lus can skyabs gyur pa/_/de kun mgon pos bzod par mdzod/_/O~M badzra maHsa ye shes pa gshegs/_/dam tshig pa bdag la bsdus la/_nor lha dang / chos skyong dang /_gzhi bdag dang /_'byung po thams cad pa'i bgron rnams skad cig mas yid kyis spyan drangs la/_rang rang gi sngags sam/_na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yoH/_bi shwa mu khe b+h+yoH/_sarba tad khaM ung+ga te/_s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM gis phul la/_rang rang gi gnas su song ba'i rjes la/_me lha gsal btab nas sngar gyi sngags de nyid kyis brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa phul la/_/'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbang mchog gi sas/_/me lha'i rgyal po DA kis dbang bskur bas/_/dngos grub ma lus stsol bar mdzad pa yi/_/me lha'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas la 'dud/_/ces pas btud de bzod par gsol la/_me lha'i phyag rgya slar bkrol te/_O~M asne ye gats+tsha zhes brjod pas ye shes pa gshegs par bsam la/_bsngo ba dang bkra shis brjod par bya'o/_/ gsum pa slob ma sta gon ni/_de nas bla mas 'di skad ces bshad/ 'dir theg pa chen po'i chos la 'jug pa shin tu legs/_de yang skye bar dka' ba 'dzam bu gling du skyes/_thob par dka' ba dal 'byor gyi mi lus rin po che thob pa'i rten 'di la 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi chu bo las thar pa'i thabs la ma 'bad na/_tshe mi rtag pa ri gzar gyi 'bab chu dang 'dra ba 'di nam 'dor mi shes pas brtson dgos/_de'ang theg pa che chung gnyis las 'dir theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi lam zab mo nyams su len pa la 'jug pa'i spro dga' dang bcas pas dbang zhu snyam pa'i rjes zlos mdzod cig_/kye ma dus gsum rgyal ba kun tu bzang /_/rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dgongs su gsol/_/bdag cag khyed kyi rjes su 'jug/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro dang /_/so thar byang sems dam tshig rnams/_/thar pa'i grong du 'jug bya'i phyir/_/mgon pos bdag la gnang du gsol/_/zhes lan gsum brjod nas/_bla mas/_kye ma snod dang ldan pa'i bu/_/gsang sngags cho ga khyed la bstan/_/'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/_/sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kyang /_/gsang sngags cho ga 'di mkhyen pas/_/kun kyang sangs rgyas thob pa yin/_/kun bzang rgyal ba rigs lnga yis/_/bdud kyi dpung yang 'di yis bcom/_/de ltar khyed kyis thob bya'i phyir/_/'di yi rjes su kun zhugs mdzod/_/ces gnang ba byin/_me tog dor te thal mo sbyar la/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnam dgongs/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang /_/zhi ba chags bral dam pa'i chos rnams dang /_/tshogs mchog 'phags pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la/_/bdag ni gus pas skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/zhes pa gsum dang yang /_kun bzang rigs lnga'i lha tshogs la/_/'dir zung bla med byang chub bar/_/gus pa yis ni skyabs su mchi/_/zhes pa gsum dang yang / dpa' bo dpa' mo chos skyong bcas/_/byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la/_/ bdag ni gus pas skyabs su mchi/_/zhes pa gsum dang yang*/_bla ma kun bzang spyan snga ru/_/_/lus ngag yid kyis gzhan rnams la/_/gnod pa las bzlog bde ba bsgrub/_/dge tshul dge slong byang chub sems/_/so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la/_bdag ni rgyun du gnas shing bsrung*/_/zhes pa gsum dang yang /_ho bla ma kun bzang dgongs su gsol/_/'di bzung byang chub ma thob bar/_/'gro drug sems can thams cad la/_/ma dang bu yi 'du shes kyis/_/ ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang /_/ma grol dgrol dang dbugs dbyung phyir/_/smon pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do/_/zhes pa gsum dang yang /_/sngon gyi rgyal ba thams cad kyang /_/sdom pa la ni gnas pa ltar/_/'di bzung 'khor ba ma stongs bar/_/bla med 'jug pa'i byang chub sems/_/bdag cag rnams kyis bskyed par bgyi/_/_/pha rol phyin drug slob cing bsgrub/_/brtson 'grus dag gis thams cad bsgral/_/kun don tshul khrims gsum dag gzung /_/bdag gis sems bskyed sdom bzung nas/_/ma grol dgrol dang ma bsgral bsgral/_/dbugs dbyung mya ngan 'das la 'god/_/ces pa gsum dang yang /_dkon mchog gsum ni mi gtang ngo*/_/rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig tu/_/rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang /_/byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/_/rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig yin/_/rin chen rigs kyi dam tshig tu/_/sbyin pa dus rnam rtag tu gtang /_/rin chen rigs kyi dam tshig yin/_/pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig tu/_/ theg pa gsum dang chos rnams bshad/_/pad+ma rigs kyi sdom pa yin/_/las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig tu/_/'gro ba'i don la brtson par bya/_/las kyi rigs kyi sdom pa yin/_/zhes sdom pa byin nas yang*/_/yar mchod gus shing mar la brtse/_/rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig bsrung /_/rtsa ba bzhi las 'da' mi bya/_/zhes pa gsum gyis dam tshig sbyin la/_slob ma rnams rdo rje sems dpar bskyed pa'i gnas gsum du dri'i thig les byug cing /_O~M AHhU~M bzlas la/_O~M badzra pra we sh+ya hoH:_zhes pa grangs med pa brjod cing /_rol mo dkrol la/_rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang bla ma yi dam char bzhin babs pas slob ma'i spyi bo nas mar thim zhing O~M hU~M traM hrIH_aH_dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa byon nas dbang bskur bar bsam la dar cig rol mo dkrol nas/ bdud rtsi lce thog tu bzhag go_/de nas dkyil 'khor de'i lho shar du rdo rje rgya gram gyi lte bar me tog gi tshom bu bkod la/_so shing mtho gang ba'i rtse la dar gyi cod pan yod pa slob ma'i lag pa gnyis kyi snyims pa'i rtses kha'i thad du bzung la/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang /_srung ma thams cad kyis bdag la dngos grub bstan du gsol/ zhes sos bzung la mig btsum nas/_tshom bu'i steng du bsgyur ro/_/phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngaRa byung na rigs de'i dngos grub thob cing /_mtshams bzhir dngos grub phran tshegs 'grub/_steng du byung na mchog gi dngos grub 'grub/_rtsa ba rang la bstan na skal ba zhan pas bldab la bskyur ro/_/de nas chos bshad pa ni/_kye rigs kyi bu rnams gson cig_/'di lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba ni u dum wA ra'i me tog dang 'dra bar dkon zhing /_theg pa chen po gsang sngags la dad pas 'jug pa yang shin tu dkon la/_sngags la spyod pa yang dkon na do nub dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug cing gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa la spyod pa ni skal pa bzang ste/_rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud las/_'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag_/u dum wA ra'i me tog bzhin/_/brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig_/'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo /_/gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/_/de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/_/ gang gis sems can mnyam med don/_/_/bla med byed par nus pa yin/_/ bskal pa bye ba du ma ru/_/sngon du sdig pa gang byas pa/_/dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong ma thag_/de dag zad par 'gyur yin na/_/grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i/_/tshul la gnas na smos ci dgos/_/skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni/_/'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/_/go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur/_/gang gi spyod pa mchog 'di la/_/blo gros shin tu mi g.yo na/_/gang zhig sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'i/_/ngan 'gro de yis gcod par 'gyur/_/de phyir khyed rnams theg chen du/_/sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/_/theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/_/lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/_khyed rnams der ni dong bas na/_/rang byung skal pa chen po pa/_/'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/_/_/go 'phang bla med 'thob par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas srung skud dmaRa po lnga sgril la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te skyes pa la dpung pa g.yon/_/bud med la g.yas su bcings nas/_ku sha tshan pa gnyis \u0f00 AHhU~M gis sngas*dang*stan du byin la seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis/_rmi lam brtag tu gzhug go_/bla ma dang rigs lnga'i lha tshogs kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rmi lam bstan du gsol/_zhes gsol ba btab la/_tshogs gtor rgya cher btang nas nyal lo/_/nangs par slob dpon la rmi lam brjod de ngan na tshogs gtor gyis bzlog par bya'o/_/dbang gi sngon 'gro bstan zin to/_/ gnyis pa dngos gzhi la/_dkyil 'khor bri zhing rgyan bkram pa/ dkyil 'khor bsgrub cing bdag 'jug blang ba cho ga dngos gzhi ji ltar bya ba dang*gsum*las/_dang*po*thig*dang tshon gyis bri ba gnyis las/dang po la gnyis las/_ye shes kyi thig gdab pa ni/_thig skad lnga sgril dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur yod pa/_/oM AHhU~M traM hrIHlas rigs lnga yab yum du bsams la ye shes pa yid kyis bstims nas mchod bstod mdor bsdus byas la/_rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas dbyangs dang bcas te/_sum b+ha ni dang /_hUM gis phyogs mtshams brgyad bskor zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs shing*/_o~M badzra lA s+ya mA le girti nIrti puSh+pa jA pi A lo ke g+han+te ni wi t+ya shap+ta AHhU~M gis gla dbyangs phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i gar dang*/_o~M badzra sa ma ye hUM/[ \u0f00] hU~M traM hrIHaHsa rigs lnga'i phyag rgya dang*/_oM su pra tiSh+Tha hU~M gis bkra shis kyi byin phab la/_slob dpon shar du gzigs shing slob mas nub tu blta bas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du thig skud bzung la/_e ma rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas gtso/_/ 'gro don dus ni 'di lags pas/_/kun tu bzang po'i thig gdab mdzod/_/ ces brjod nas/_yi ge lnga'am rtsa sngags bzlas shing ye shes kyi tshangs thig bzhi'am brgyad dam bcu drug btab pa'i sgras bskul nas rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor skad cig gis bskyed pa las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i bla ma dang yi dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs byon te steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsams la/_mchod bstod ci rigs su byas te/_dam dkyil 'khor mi gshegs par bzhugs/_tshig gi thig mthong ba brgyud pa ltar cha chen bcu drug btab la/_dang po phyed gdab phyi ma gdab/_/gnyis pa cha bzhir bgo bar bya/_/_/gsum pa bzhi pa mi gdab bzhag_/lnga pa dbus dor mtha' gnyis gdab/_/drug pa phyed gdab phyi ma gdab/_/bdun pa cha bzhir bgo bya ste/_/ brgyad pa dbus dor mtha' gnyis gdab/_/de nas tshon gyi cho ga ni/_phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar/_rigs lnga'i kha dog bzhin bkod la/_so so'i sa bon bris te dam tshig pa bskyed/_ye shes pa bstim/_mchod bstod byas nas/_O~M hU~M traM hrIHaH_bdun brjod pas/_lha rnams 'od du zhu ba las byung ba'i tshon du bsam la/_/_rdo rje slob dpon gyis shar nas tshon thogs te/_/sangs rgyas rigs lnga ye shes gtso/_/kun gyi don rig bya ba'i phyir/_/ye shes lnga yi tshon bkye 'o/_/zhes brjod la re khwa sbom phra snyoms la gzhi tshon srab mthug snyoms par bkye 'o/_/de yang dbus nas phyogs bzhi'i cha chen re re'i sar lte ba bskor/_de nas cha chen gnyis su bskor ba'i nang du pad+ma 'dab bzhi zur gyi pad+ma khye'u bzhi dang bcas pa bris pa'i mthar mu khyud bskor la rigs lnga'i phyogs mtshon bkye/_de nas zur chod bzhir nang sgegs bzhi sems dpa' bzhi dang bcas pa'i mtshan ma gnyis gnyis/_de'i phyi rim lha snam gyi grwa bzhir phyi sgeg bzhi dang sems dpa' bzhi phyogs bzhir thub pa drug dang / gzhi'i kun bzang yab yum gyi brda mtshon gnyis gnyis bya/sgo bzhir sgo ba yab yum gyi brda bya/[ · ]rtsig pa lnga nang nas mthing*ga dkar dmar ser ljang gis bris la/_'dod yon dmar/_pha gu ser/_dra phyed sngo/_mda' yab dmar/ pu shu mdzes tshon/_rta babs de dang 'dra/_rdo rje'i rwa phyogs mdog can/_zhing khams ljang /_dur khrod brgyad kyi phyogs bzhi phyogs mdog mtshams bzhi mdzes tshon/_nyi ma dmar/_zla ba dkar/_pad+ma'i ra ba sna tshogs mdog_/rdo rje'i rwa ba de dang 'dra/_/mi re ye shes lnga yi mdog_/gsal zhing snyoms par bri bar bya/_/de nas rgyan bkram pa ni/_dkyil 'khor de'i dbus dang phyogs bzhir many+dzi'i steng du sngar ltar gyi rnam rgyal bum pa lnga ma nor bar bzhag la/ gzungs thag phyogs bzhi'i phur pa bzhi la sbrel/_phyogs bzhi dang mtshams bzhir sgo ma bzhi'i phur pa mtho do do yod pa re btsugs la ye shes lnga'i gru gus drwa ba ris su sbrel/_mtha' chag gi me ri la me ri'i shog bskor gtang / mtha' skor du phyi nang gi mchod pa legs par bshams/_de'ang g.yas su phyi mchod la/_g.yon nas nang mchod bshams pa'am/_sbrag mar bshams/_steng du rma bya'i gdugs dang /_zur bzhir rgyal mtshan bzhi/_phyogs bzhir 'phan bzhi/_bum pa'i kha rgyan gseb tu shel dang rma bya me long gzug_/de'i steng du bla bres phug cing dkyil 'khor la yol ba gru bzhir bre/_sa gzhi mchod rdzas kyis brgyan zhing gtor tshogs shin tu bzang bar bsham mo/_/ gnyis pa la gnyis las/_dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni/_sta gon du bya ba'i skabs bzhin byas la/_mchod bstod dang bkra shis brjod/_bdag 'jug blang ba ni/_/_'di man chad kyi cho ga 'don pa bsgyur la/_slob ma'i gnas su rang gi ming gzhug ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bos dbang bskur bar bsams la/_dbang bzhi rim pas blang ngo*/_/'di nyid slob dpon gyis dgos pa ste gal po che'i gnad yod do/_/ gsum pa cho ga dngos ji ltar bya ba ni/_las kyi slob dpon gyis las bum thogs te/_slob ma rnams khrus byas la gdong g.yogs bcings te/ thams cad lags pa sbrel nas las kyi slob dpon gyi phyag gi rdo rje la snga ma des bzung nas/_dkyil 'khor yol bas bres pa de yi phyi rol nas bskor ba lan gsum byas te/_phyi sgo bcad pa'i drung nas gsol ba gdab pa ni/_kye khro bo mi bzad 'jigs pa'i sku/_/mtshon cha sna tshogs phyag na bsnams/_/bdag cag 'khor ba las bsgral phyir/_khyed kyis gnang ste gtad du gsol/_/zhes pa gsum gyis zhus pa dang /_/_/nang nas bla mas/_khyed su yin ci byed ces lan gsum dris pa'i lan du/_phyi nas bdag ni skal ldan rigs kyi bu yin/ dpal rigs kyi bdag po dbang zhu zhes pa gsum gyi lan gdab bo/_/de nas gu gul gyis bdug cing rol mo'i sgra dang sum b+ha nis/_slob ma'i bgegs bskrad la yi ge brgya pa re zlos su bcug la bla mas phyogs mtshams steng 'og thams cad rdo rje'i rwa ba gur zla bre ye shes kyi me ri 'bar bas mtshams bcad la bgegs kyis bskal ba'i bar du mi thar bar bsams la/_slob mas phyi nas maN+Dal lan lnga phul nas me tog bzung ste gsol ba gdab pa ni/ kye ma rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa dang /_bla ma yi dam DA ki dgongs/_/sgo ba chen po khyed rnams kyis/_/sgo phye thar pa'i grong bstan 'tshal/_zhes lan gsum gyis/_yol ba'i sgo phye nas nang*du*btang*bas/_dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis gzigs par bsams la/_phyag 'tshal te me tog gtor nas/_yang gtso bo la phyag dang thal mo sbyar te/_kye bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / dkyil 'khor lha tshogs spang na ni/_/skyob pa gzhan na mi mnga' bas/_khyed kyi thugs rjes bdag la stsol/_zhes pa gsum gyis me tog gtor nas bla mas/ kye ma khyed ni snod mchog dam pa ste/_khyod 'dod pa ni bdag gis sbyin/_zhes pa dang /_slob mas/_bdag ni 'bras bu gsang sngags kyi/_/dngos grub bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis/_/smin cing grol bar 'dod pas na/_/thugs rjes bdag la gnang bar mdzod/_/_/ces pa gsum brjod pa dang /_bla mas/_e ma e ma rigs kyi bu/_khyod ni las zad 'khrul pa zhig_/rigs kyi bu mchog khyed yin pas/_/ngas khyed kun bzang rigs lnga yi/_/dkyil 'khor 'jug cing ye shes dbab/_/dngos grub thams cad khyod kyis thob/_/dngos grub dkyil 'khor 'di dag ni/_/ma mthong pa la smras pas na/_dam tshig nyams te dmyal bar ltung /_/rigs lnga ye shes rnam pa lnga/_khyed kyi thugs la zhugs pa ste/_'di smras ye shes lha dang bral/_/zhes pa dang /_bdud rtsi lce la bzhag nas/_'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig chu/_/dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed/_/bsrungs na dngos grub thams cad thob/_/dam tshig bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung /_/oM a mr-i ta dam las ma 'da' swAhA/_/'o khyod kyi ston pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas nga yin pas/_/ngas bka' bsgo ba las ma 'da' zhig_/'das na myur du rdo rje dmyal bar skyes nas thon pa'i dus med do zhes bsgrag go_/ye shes dbab pa ni slob ma rnam snang gi chos bdun dang ldan pa'i snying gi nang du g.yung drung 'khyil pa dmar po gcig gi nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig la yaM gcig bsam/ g.yung drung gi yan lag bzhi la ha ri ni sa bsams la/_yaM las rlung byung bas g.yung drung 'khyil ba snying*dang*bcas pa g.yon du 'khor ba la dmigs pa 'dzin du bcug la/_byi la'i brun/_rak+ta/_sha chen/_gu gul nag po/_glang chen/ bdud rtsi lnga/_ra'i rkang lag bzhi'i nya sha_/rang rang gi skra rnams sbyar ba sol me la bsreg cing /_rol mo'i sgra dang rtsa sngags drag tu bzlas shing thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /[ · ]rig 'dzin chen po rnams dang /_mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pa sprin phung gtibs pa bzhin byon nas slob ma'i snying nang du sib sib thim nas 'khrab cing gar byed par bsams pas ye shes pa phebs pa'i rtags su lus 'phar 'khrab 'dar spu zing zing pa dang /_ngag smra brjod du glu len pa dang /_/_sems bde gsal mi rtog pa khyad par can skye'o/_/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor slob ma khrid de phyag 'tshal la/_/kye shar sgo srung ba'i sgo ma lcags kyu ma/_/_/shar gyi sgo 'di phyes la ni/_/bdag cag yi dam lha dang sprod/_/ces pa dang /_lho sgor phyin la/_kye lho sgo bsrung pa'i sgo ma zhags pa ma/_/_/lho yi sgo 'di phyes la ni/_/bdag cag yi dam lha dang sprod/_/ces pa dang /_nub sgor/_kye nub sgo bsrung ba'i sgo ma lcags sgrog ma/_/nub kyi sgo 'di phyes la ni/_/bdag cag yi dam lha dang sprod/_/ces pa dang /_byang sgor/_kye byang sgo bsrung ba'i sgo ma dril bu ma/_/byang gi sgo 'di phyes la ni/_/bdag cag yi dam lha dang spyod/_/ces brjod nas me tog thogs la/_kye bde gshegs rigs lnga'i pho brang du/_/'brel ba'i me tog 'di bor bas/_/'brel ba gang yod lha dang bdag 'phrad shog_/puSh+pa si ti stAM zhes pas me tog dor bas/_me tog gang la phog pa'i lha dang rang ngo sprad de lha de'i rigs tsam zhig bshad do/_/gdong g.yogs bkrol ba ni/_/_/ston pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis/ khyed kyi ma rig 'khor ba'i mig_/ye shes spyan du dbye bar bya/_/de bzhin khyod kyis 'gro ba rnams/_/ye shes spyan du dbye bar shog_/\u0f00 tsak+Shu swAhA/_oM zhes pas dkrol lo/_/yang bla mas/_kye ma rigs kyi bu rnams kun/_khyed rnams sdig pa kun las grol/_/dkyil 'khor chen po 'di la ltos/_/lus ngag yid kyi dad pa bskyed/_/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/_/dngos grub thams cad khyed kyis thog_/dam tshig sngags la brtson par gyis/_/zhes brjod nas/_dkyil 'khor dang lha'i rnam dag bshad pa ni/_'o rigs kyi bu dkyil 'khor 'di la ltos shig_/de yang sems can dang sangs rgyas gzhi gcig pa'i rtags su dkyil 'khor 'jam zhing srub med pa'o/_/phyin ci log gi bdud rnams sreg pa'i rtags su me'i 'od kyi phreng ba'o/_/zab mo'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags su rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/_/'gro ba'i yid bzhin du don byed pa'i rtags su pad+ma'i phreng ba'o/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rtags su nyi zla'i gdan no/_/rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad rang sar dag pa'i rtags su dur khrod brgyad do/_/gdod ma nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i byams pa chen po mnga' ba'i rtags su gdugs kyis phub pa'o/_/sems can la theg pa gsum gyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags su chos kyi 'khor lo'o/_/phyir rgol ba dang rnam rtog gis dben pa'i rtags su ri dwags so/_/_/tshad med pa bzhi sgom pa'i rtags su rta babs bang rim bzhi'o/_/mthar phyin pa'i yon tan brnyes pa'i rtags su rtse mo'i rim pa'o/_/ chags pa med pa'i thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i rtags su mda' yab bo/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rtags su drwa ba dang drwa phyed do/_/che ba'i yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i rtags su rin po che'i pha gu'o/_/'dod yon lnga mi spangs pa'i rtags su 'dod yon gyi lha mo bcu drug go_/rigs lnga'i dgongs pa lam du khyer ba'i rtags su pany+tsA ra ga'i rtsigs pa lnga'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sa nas skye ba med pa'i sar 'gro ba'i rtags su sgo bzhi'o/_/'phags pa'i yon tan mchog la mnga' brnyes pa'i rtags su lha'i snam bu'o/_/_/phrin las bzhi mthar phyin pa'i rtags su gru chad bzhi'o/_/sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i rtags su mu khyud gsum mo/_/rigs lnga'i kha dog so sor mtshon pa'i rtags su pad+ma bzhi'o/_/_/yab yum gnyis su med pa'i rtags su mtshams bzhi mdzes tshon no/_/rnam par snang mdzad dang /_mi bskyod pa dang /_rin chen 'byung ldan dang /_snang ba mtha' yas dang /_don yod grub pa dang lngar byung ba 'di yang /_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po lnga gnas gyur nas sku lnga dang ye shes lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i rtags yin no/_/yum bzhir byung ba 'di 'byung ba bzhi rnam par dag cing 'phrin las bzhis 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i rtags so/_/sems dpa' yab yum du snang ba 'di yang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyi yul rnam par dag pa'i rtags so/_/thub pa drug kyang nyon mongs pa drug rnam par dag cing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag pa'i rtags so/_/kun bzang yab yum gnyis su snang ba yang ka dag dang lhun grub gnyis su med pas thabs dang shes rab snang stong rnam par dag pa'i rtags yin no/_/_/sgo ba bzhi yang tshad med pa bzhis 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i rtags so/_/bum pa lnga zlum por byung ba 'di yang gdod ma'i chos sku ka dag chen po mtha' dbus dang bral ba gzhon nu bum pa'i skur bzhugs pa'i rtags so/_kha dog lngar byung ba 'di yang ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags so/_kha rgyan phun sum tshogs pa 'di zhi khro 'od zer gyi tshul du yod pa'i rtags so//de'i gseb kyi rdo rje 'di rang rig las 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags so/__/mgul chings lnga dang ldan pa 'di yang nyon mongs pa lnga snang yul du dag pa'i rtags so/_/ gzungs thag lnga sbrel btags pa 'di yang thugs rje kun tu yod pa'i rtags so/_/shel dkar dang me long gnyis ni rig pa la dri ma med cing stong gsal ma 'gag par yod pa'i rtags so/_/rma bya'i gdugs 'di ni sgron ma bzhi dbyings su 'khyil ba gsal ba'i rtags so/_/rgyal mtshan bzhi zur bzhir mdzes pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa mi nub par byed pa'i rtags so/_/ 'phan dar bzhi phyogs bzhir mdzes pa 'di ni snyan pa'i ba dan phyogs bcur sgrogs pa'i rtags so/_/mchod tshogs dang gtor tshogs rgya cher bshams pa 'di yang bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro mnyes par byed dgos pa'i rtags so/_/ gzhan yang bkod pa'i bye brag rgyan dang bcas pa 'di yang dbang bskur ba la phun sum tshogs pa lnga ldan tshangs dgos pa'i rtags so/_/rdo rje slob dpon rgyan dang ldan pa 'di yang dbang bskur ba'i tshe byin rlabs chen po rang bzhin gyis 'bebs pa'i rtags so/_/zhes gser gyi thur mas slob ma la lha ngo bstan no/_/de dag ni dngos gzhi'i sbyor ba'o/_/da ni dbang bskur ba dngos la/_slob mas maN+Dal phul nas/_kun bzang yab yum ye shes dbang /_bdag cag rnams la bskur du gsol/_zhes pa gsum gyis 'grengs te thal mo re sbrar zhing phyag re btsal nas/_shar sgor seng ge'i khri brtsigs pa 'am bris pa 'am bsgoms pa la slob ma rnams bzhag nas me tog gang la phog pa'i lha de bsgom du bcug la/_dkyil 'khor gyi steng nas me tog blang nas mgo 'am mthongs kha g.yon la btags te/_slob dpon gyis me tog gang la phog pa 'di/_sngon nas khyed kyi yi dam lha/_/rtag tu bsgom dang bsgrub pa gyis/_/\u0f00 badzra puSh+pa si ti stAM/_'o khyod kyis yi dam lha 'di yin pas dus rgyun du sgoms la bskyed rdzogs kyi don la gnas par gyis shig_/rigs lnga'i bskyed rdzogs kyi lung gang mkho ba slob ma re re la dbog go_/de ni dbang la snga ba lha dang 'brel ba'i dbang ngo /_/de nas rigs lnga'i sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las lnga'i dbang bskur te/_dang po sku yi dbang ni slob ma rnams rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga pa rtod de thugs kar 'dzin cing /g.yon des yu ba byas pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa'i spyi bor pad zla'i steng du O~M dkar po gcig bsgom du gzhug cing /_bla ma'i thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo mkha' 'gro sprin gtibs pa tsam rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du byon nas bkra shis brjod cing /_bla ma dang rdo rje sems dpa' dbyer med du slob ma'i spyi bor zhugs pa la dmigs pa 'dzin du bcug la/_bla mas dbus kyi bum pa de blangs nas thogs te/_slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la dbyangs dang bcas pas/ hUM gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag cing /_/nyon mongs zhe sdang sbyong byed pa'i/_/me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/_/dpal ldan sku yi dbang bskur ro/_/oM badzra ab+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/_zhes brjod nas/_bum chu de 'thung ba dang khrus byed du bcug la/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chu 'di 'thungs shing khrus byas pa tsam gyis lus kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang nas 'di nyid du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i dbang thob pa yin no/_khyod kyi gzugs kyi phung po 'di rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du sangs rgyas te/_/chu'i khams mA ma kI'i rang bzhin du gnas 'gyur/_zhe sdang me long lta bu'i ye shes su grol te/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rigs kyi sku 'gyur ba med pa thob nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi don phyi mar 'gyur ro/_/zhes brjod do/_/de nas gsung gi dbang ni/_/slob ma'i mgrin par pad+ma dmar po dang zla ba'i steng du AHdmar po bsam zhing /_de nyid snang ba mtha' yas dmar po g.yas pad+ma dang g.yon des yu ba byas pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dmigs pa snga ma bzhin bsams te/_rdo rje mgrin par bzung nas/_hUM 'du shes phung po rnam dag cing /_nyon mongs 'dod chags sbyong byed pa'i/_/so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis/_/dpal ldan gsung gi dbang bskur ro/_/O~M pad+ma ab+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH:_zhes pas rdo rje lag tu gtad la/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lag tu rdo rje 'di gtad pa tsam gyis 'dir ngag gi sgrib pa dag nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang thob pa yin no/_/'du shes kyi phung po snang ba mtha' yas nyid du sangs rgyas te me'i khams kyang gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin nyid du dag nas/_/'dod chags so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes nyid du grol te/ sangs rgyas pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsung 'gag pa med pa'i chos kyi sgra dbyangs thob nas 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes brjod do/_/de nas thugs kyi dbang bskur ba ni/_slob ma rnam snang mthing ga phyag na 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du hUM mthing ga las dmigs pa gong dang 'dra bas/_hUM rnam shes phung po rnam dag cing /_nyon mongs gti mug skyong byed pa'i/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/_/dpal ldan thugs kyi dbang bskur ro/_/O~M bud+d+ha a b+hi ShaM& O~M/_zhes brjod nas/_me tog gang la phog pa'i lha'i ming btags te/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod la ming che ge mo zhes btags pa tsam gyis 'dir yid kyi sgrib pa thams cad dag nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi dbang thob pa yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang rnam par snang mdzad du sangs rgyas te/_nam mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug mar dag nas/_gti mug chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su grol te/ sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi thugs 'khrul pa med pa chos kyi sku thob nas 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes brjod do/_/de'ang skyes pa rnams la me tog shar du bab pa la/_rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_rdo rje legs pa dang /_rdo rje rgyal po dang /_rdo rje chags pa la sogs pa'i ming btags shing /_bud med la rdo rje mA ma kI dang /_dbyings phyug ma la sogs pa'o/_/lhor rdo rje rin chen dang /_rdo rje gzi brjid dang /_rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang /_rdo rje bzhad pa la sogs pa dang*/_/_bud med la sangs rgyas spyan dang /_rin chen dbyings phyug ma la sogs pa'o/_/nub tu skyes pa la/_rdo rje chos dang /_rdo rje rnon po dang*/_rdo rje rgyu dang*/_rdo rje smra ba la sogs pa dang /_bud med la rdo rje gos dkar mo dang*/_pad+ma dbyings phyug ma la sogs pa'o/_/byang du skyes pa la rdo rje las dang /_rdo rje srung ba dang /_rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /_rdo rje khu tshur la sogs pa dang /_bud med la rdo rje sgrol ma dang /_las kyi dbyings phyug ma la sogs pa'o/_/de nas yon tan gyi dbang bskur ba ni/_slob ma rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum ser po phyag na rin po che bsnams pa'i lte bar pad zla'i steng du twaM ser po la sogs pa'i dmigs pa snga ma bzhin bsgoms la dbu rgyan bskon te/_hUM tshor ba'i phung po rnam dag cing /_nyon mongs nga rgyal sbyong byed pa'i/_/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/_/dpal ldan yon tan dbang bskur ro/_/\u0f00 rat+na a b+hi Shi'u tAM/_rigs kyi bu khyod la dbu rgyan 'di bskon pa tsam gyis 'dir lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa dag nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dbang thob pa yin no/_/tshor ba'i phung po rin chen 'byung ldan du sangs rgyas te/_sa'i khams kyang sangs rgyas spyan du dag nas nga rgyal mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su grol te/_sangs rgyas rin chen rigs kyi yon tan thams cad mkhyen pa thob nas 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes brjod do/_/_/de nas 'phrin las kyi dbang ni/_slob ma don yod grub pa ral gri bsnams pa'i gsang bar pad pad zla'i steng du AHljang gu las dmigs pa snga ma bzhin bsgoms te/_dril bu spyi bor bzhag la/_hUM 'du byed phung po rnam dag cing /_/nyon mongs phrag dog sbyong byed pa'i/_/bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis/_/ dpal ldan 'phrin las dbang bskur ro/_/\u0f00 karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa AH_zhes brjod de/_dril bu'am/_ral gri lag tu gtad de/_rigs kyi bu khyod la dril bu 'di lag tu gtad pa tsam gyis 'dir lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa ma lus pa dag nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbang thob pa yin no/_/ 'du byed kyi phung po yang don yod grub par sangs rgyas te/_rlung gi khams kyang dam tshig sgrol mar dag nas/_phrag dog bya ba grub pa'i ye shes su grol te/ sangs rgyas don yod grub pa'i phrin las thogs pa med par 'grub nas 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes brjod do/_/bdag po'i dbang lnga'o/_/de nas kun tu bzang po'i dbang ni/_slob ma kun tu bzang po rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin par bsams la/_/_bla ma'i rtogs pa slob ma'i rgyud la 'pho bar dmigs pa 'dzin du bcug nas/_lag tu rdo rje dang dril bu gtad la/_O~M AHhUM/_thabs dang shes rab dbyer med cing*/_snang stong dbyer med 'di zung la/_/stong nyid snying rje'i snying po yis/_/kun bzang rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis/_/ 'gro kun rjes su gzung bar gyis/_/rigs kyi bu khyod la rdo rje dang dril bu 'di gtad pa tsam gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa bon thebs nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin kun tu bzang po rig pa'i rtsal dbang thob pa yin no/_/rang gi sems skye ba med pa chos kyi skur sangs rgyas te/_'di ltar snang ba thams cad gnas su dag nas/_sku gsum 'du 'bral med pas 'gro ba'i don dpag tu med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/zhes brjod do/_/de nas chu'i dbang ni bum pa lnga'i chu gtso bo'i bum par bsdus pa'am/_bum pa lnga re re bzhin ma nor bar slob ma'i spyi bor dbang bskur bas/_lha thams cad 'od du zhu ba las byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i chu spyi bo nas babs pas lus thams cad bdud rtsis gang nas rgyal ba rigs lnga'i ngo bor gyur/_nang gi khams dang skye mched thams cad lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du gsal ba'i dmigs pa dang /_yang 'od zer phyir 'phros pas phyi snod lha'i gzhal yas khang /_nang bcud kyi sems can lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du sgoms shig byas la/_hUM rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das/_/mA ma kI yi phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/\u0f00 AHhU~M gu ru DA ki ni si ti a[> (]sid+d+hi[)]hU~M/_O~M hU~M traM hrIHaH_ha ri ni sa a b+hi Shiny+tsA b+haM si ti [(]a[>]sid+d+hi[)]pha la hU~M a:_hU~M snang ba mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das/_/gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/ gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/oM AHhU~M gu ru DA ki ni si ti [((]a[)]sid+d+hi[)]hUM/[ \u0f00] hU~M hrIH_aH_ha ri ni sa a b+hi Shiny+tsa b+haM si ti [(]a[>]sid+d+hi[) ]pha la hU~M a/_hUM snang ba mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das/_/gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/\u0f00 AHhU~M gu ru DA ki ni si ti hUM/ \u0f00 hU~M hU~M hrIHaH/_ha ri ni sa a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M si ti [(]a[>]sid+d+hi[)]pha la hU~M aH/_hU~M rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/_/kun tu bzang mo'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro// \u0f00 AHhU~M gu ru DA ki ni si ti hU~M/[ \u0f00] hU~M traM hrIHaH_ha ri ni sa a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M si ti [(]a[)]sid+d+hi[) ]pha la hU~M aH_hU~M rin chen 'byung ldan bcom ldan 'das/_/ sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/oM AHhU~M gu ru DA ki ni si ti hUM/_O~M hU~M traM hrIHaH_ha ri ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa b+haM si ti [(]a[>]sid+d+hi[)]pha la hU~M aH_hU~M don yod grub pa bcom ldan 'das/_/dam tshig sgrol ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/ gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/\u0f00 AHhU~M gu ru DA ki ni si ti [(]a[)]sid+d+hi[) ]hU~M/_O~M hU~M traM hrIH_aH_ha ri ni sa sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa b+haM si ti [(]a[>]sid+d+hi[) ]pha la hU~M a:_zhes brjod/_rigs kyi bu khyod la dbang thams cad brtan par byed pa bum pa'i dbang 'di bskur ba tsam gyis snod bcud thams cad lha dang gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin/_phung po khams dang skye mched thams cad lha dang lha mor gyur pa yin pas/_phyi nang thams cad la brnyas pa byas na ltung bar 'gyur bas dag snang dang mos pa gyis la/_mchod pa dang bstod pa la dga' ba dang ngo shes par gyis shig_/ ces brjod la/_bum chu khong du btang bas zag med kyi ye shes skyes par bsam zhing lhag mas khrus bya'o/_/_/de nas brda'i dbang ni rigs lnga'i sku bstan la/_rigs kyi bu khyod la rigs lnga'i sku 'di bstan pa tsam gyis ye shes lnga'i ngo bor sangs rgyas pa yin gyis/_/de yang rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar por byung ba 'di yang nyon mongs pa zhe sdang mi mnga' zhing me long ye shes dkar po yod pa'i brda yin no/_/snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar por byung ba 'di yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dgongs pa 'dus shing nyon mongs pa 'dod chags mi mnga' zhing so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes 'od dmar por yod pa'i brda yin no/_/rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog mthing gar byung ba 'di yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa 'dus shing nyon mongs pa gti mug mi mnga' zhing chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes 'od mthing ga yod pa'i brda yin no/_/rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser por byung ba 'di yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dgongs pa 'dus shing nyon mongs pa nga rgyal mi mnga' zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes 'od ser por yod pa'i brda yin no/_/_/don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gur byung ba 'di yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dgongs pa 'dus shing nyon mongs pa phrag dog mi mnga' zhing bya ba grub pa'i ye shes 'od ljang gur yod pa'i brda yin no/_/so so'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa 'di yang 'khor ba thams cad zil gyis non cing skyon gyis ma gos pa'i brda yin no/_/zhabs thams cad rdo rje'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa 'di yang bdud kyi dmag thams cad kyis mi g.yos shing yang dag par sangs rgyas pa'i brda yin no/_/rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ni dgos 'dod thams cad rang las 'byung zhing sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i brda yin no/_/de yang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag mtshan rdo rje dang rdo rjes yu ba byas pa'i dril bu bsnams pa 'di yang gsal stong gnyis su med pa'i brda yin no/_/snang ba mtha' yas kyi phyag mtshan pad+ma dang des yu ba byas pa'i dril bu bsnums pa 'di yang bde stong gnyis su med pa'i brda yin no/_/rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag mtshan 'khor lo dang des yu ba byas pa'i dril bu bsnams pa 'di yang rig stong gnyis su med pa'i brda yin no/_/rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag mtshan rin po che dang des yu ba byas pa'i dril bu bsnams pa 'di yang shar stong gnyis su med pa'i brda yin no/_/ don yod grub pa'i phyag mtshan ral gri dang des yu ba byas pa'i dril bu bsnams pa 'di yang snang stong gnyis su med pa'i brda yin no/_/rigs lnga yab yum du snang ba 'di yang thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i brda yin no/_/sems dpa' sems ma brgyad du snang ba 'di yang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad rang sar dag pa'i brda yin no/_/thub pa drug tu snang ba 'di yang nyon mongs pa drug dag nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs pa'i brda yin no/_/sgo ba bzhir snang ba 'di yang tshad med pa bzhis sems can gyi don byed pa'i brda yin no/_/_/zhes bshad do/_/don gyi dbang ni/_rigs kyi bu 'das ma 'ongs da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rigs lngar ma 'dus pa med cing /_mtho srid pa'i rtse mo nas dma' dmyal ba'i gnas yan chad du 'khor 'das su snang ba thams cad rigs lnga las ma gyes shing ma 'dus pa rdul phra rab tsam yang med la/_rigs lnga ye shes lnga rang rang gi lus sems las logs na yod pa ma yin te/_lus 'byung ba lnga las grub pa 'di nyid rigs lnga yab yum ye shes lnga'i rang gdangs yin te/_gdod ma nas ye shes kyi rang rtsal 'byung ba lngar grub dus na sa las sha byung bas sangs rgyas spyan yin/_chu las khrag byung bas mA ma kI yin/_me las drod byung bas gos dkar mo yin/[ · ]rlung las dbugs byung bas dam tshig sgrol ma yin/_nam mkha' las sems byung bas kun tu bzang mo chos kyi sku yin no/_/de ltar 'byung ba bzhi las lus grub dus phung po lnga byung ste/_gzugs kyi phung po rdo rje sems dpa' ste zhe sdang gsal la rang bzhin med pa me long lta bu'i ye shes so/_/'du shes kyi phung po snang ba mtha' yas te/_'dod chags bde stong so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes so/_/rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam par snang mdzad de gti mug rnam par mi rtog pa dri med chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/_/tshor ba'i phung po rin chen 'byung ldan te nga rgyal snang stong mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so/_/'du byed kyi phung po don yod grub pa ste phrag dog rig stong bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so/_/gzhan yang rang rig thig le nyag gcig gi rang rtsal las thugs rjes 'gyu cha bsam pa thams cad rang byung rig pa'i rang rtsal las ma 'das kyang /_re zhig bsdus na rig pa'i ye shes lnga tshan du bstan pa las de'i don bkrol nas rang gi sems thog tu ngo sprad pa ni/_rang rig pa'i ye shes ma rig pa'i lus la gnas pa'i rtsal las sems can gyi rang rgyud la rtog tshogs bzhi bcu byung ba ste/_rang rig pa'i ye shes las ma 'das te/_lus kyi phung po lnga po 'di rigs kyi yab lnga yin no/_/de'ang gzugs ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_/'du shes snang ba mtha' las nyid/_/rnam shes rnam par snang mdzad de/_/ tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan dang*/_/'du byed don yod grub pa'o/_/'byung ba lnga yang yum lnga ste/_khrag ni rdo rje mA ma kI_/drod ni pad+ma gos dkar mo/_/sha ni rin chen sangs rgyas spyan/_/dbugs ni las kyi dam tshig sgrol/_/sems ni chos dbyings dbang phyug ma/_/rang rig rtsal las thub pa drug_/nga rgyal lha yi thub pa ste/_/_/phrag dog lha min thub pa'o/_/'dod chags mi yi thub pa ste/_/ gti mug byol song thub pa'o/_/ser sna yi dwags thub pa ste/_/zhe sdang dmyal ba'i thub pa'o/_/rnam shes tshogs brgyad yul yul can/_/sems dpa' sems ma brgyad yin te/_/mig gzugs lA se yab yum ste/_/rna sgra glu ma yab yum nyid/_/sna dri bdug spos yab yum la/_/lce ro puSh+pa yab yum nyid/_/lus reg mA le yab yum ste/_/yid chos gar ma yab yum nyid/_/nyon yid gan+the yab yum ste/_/kun gzhi'i rnam shes snang gsal nyid/_/sgo bzhi sgo ba bzhi yin te/_/chu sgo lcags kyu yab yum la/_/sa sgo zhags pa yab yum yin/_/me sgo lcags sgrog yab yum ste/_/rlung sgo dril bu yab yum mo/_/thig le dkar dmar nyi zla gnyis/_/gzhi yi kun bzang yab yum ste/_/snang stong thabs shes zung 'jug go_/_/yang rig pa'i rtsal las sku lngar yang shar te/_rig pa'i ye shes 'di cir yang snang bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku yin no/_/rig pa'i ye shes 'di 'gyur ba med pas mi bskyod rdo rje'i sku yin no/_/rig pa'i ye shes 'di nor bu rin po che dang 'dra bas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sku yin no/_/_rig pa'i ye shes 'di la mtha' med pas snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku yin no/__/rig pa'i ye shes 'dis don thams cad 'grib pas don yod grub pa'i sku yin no/_/rig pa'i rtsal las ye shes lngar yang shar te/_rig pa'i ngo bo ma 'gags par mngon sum du gsal bas me long lta bu'i ye shes so/_/rig pa'i ye shes 'dis kun la khyab pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so/_/rig pa'i ye shes rtsal sna tshogs su shaRa bas so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes so/_/rig pa'i ye shes 'di yon tan thams cad kyi sa bon yin pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so/_/de thams cad kyang ngo bo ka dag tu 'dus pas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/_/rig pa'i rtsal las rigs lngar yang shar te/_sangs rgyas thams cad rig pa rtogs nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so/_/rig pa de rtogs nas mi 'gyur zhing mi ldog pas rdo rje'i rigs so/_/rig pa nyid las yon tan thams cad 'byung bas rin po che'i rigs so/_/rig pa la skyon gyis ma gos pas pad+ma'i rigs so/_/rig pa ma rtogs na sangs mi rgya bas las kyi rigs so/_/rig pa'i rtsal las 'od lngar yang shar te/_rig pa la dri ma gang yang med pas 'od dkar po ltar yang byung / yon tan rdzogs pas ser po/_/_ma btsal rdzogs pas dmar po/_bya rtsal rdzogs pas ljang gu_/mi 'gyur khyab pas mthing ga ltar yang shar ro/_/rig pa'i rtsal las shes rab lnga ste/_rig pas 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad mkhyen pas 'byed pa'i shes rab/_de yang rig pa las ma 'das pas sdud pa'i shes rab/_rig pa nyid kyi rtsal sna tshogs su shar bas dpyod pa'i shes rab/_rig pas 'khor ba'i srog bcad nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sar phyin pas sgrol ba'i shes rab/_thams cad rig par ma 'dus pa med pas rang byung gi shes rab bo/_/yang rig pa'i rtsal las rlung lngar yang shar te/_/rig pa las ye shes kyi drod 'char bas me dang mnyam pa'i rlung ngo /_/rig pa des 'khor 'das kyi srog 'dzin pas srog gi rlung ngo /_/rig pa des 'khor 'das la sogs pa 'byed par byed pas 'byed pa'i rlang ngo /_/rig pa des 'khor 'das thams cad la khyab pas khyab byed kyi rlung ngo /_/rig pa des 'khor ba dang ma rig pa'i srog bcad nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sar skyel bas snying rje med pa'i bskal pa las kyi rlung ngo /_/de ltar na snang srid 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang gi rig pa yin la/_rig pa gsal stong 'dzin med chen po yin no/_/gsal stong 'dzin med kyang mthar klong yangs chen po'i dgongs pa yin no/_/zhes ngo sprad do/_/de nas dam tshig gi dbang ni/_/bdud rtsi lce la bzhag nas spyi bor rdo rje bzung ste/_/kye rigs kyi bu dag nyon cig_/thun mong skyabs 'gro nas brtsams pa'i/_/so thar byang sems bslab bya dang /_/rig 'dzin sngags kyi dam tshig kun/_/byang chub ma thob bar du ni/_/srog gi phyir yang ma gtang zhig_/dam tshig nyams na bskal pa ru/_/ngan song gsum nas thar mi srid/_/de phyir srungs shig rigs kyi bu/_khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi dbang thob pa yin pas/_dad pa dang dam tshig la gnas dgos/_dam tshig sa ma ya 'bum sde bshad kyang /_klong gsal las/_sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig tu/_/dam tshig thams cad 'dus par bshad/_/ces pas/_sku'i dam tshig tu rdo rje'i slob dpon dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang yi dam mkha' 'gro mched lcam rdo rje spun dang /_sems can thams cad dang 'byung ba lnga la sogs pa thams cad dang rang gi lus la ma gus pa dang /_srog gcod rku 'phrog rdeg btsog ngan smras la sogs pa dang*/_dag snang log cing mi dge ba'i las sdig par gyur pa thams cad mi bya bar/_phyi nang snod bcud rang lus thams cad yi dam lhar ma gyur pa med par/_sku'i rigs su gyur pa thams cad la phyag mchod/_mchod bstod la sogs pa'i dag snang phyogs med du bya'o/_/gsung gi dam tshig tu rdo rje slob dpon gyis ci gsungs pa las mi 'da' zhing /_sangs rgyas nas gang zag phal pa'i gsung rab yan chod la brnyas par mi bya/_'byung ba dang 'gro ba'i sgra skad thams cad la zhe sdang dang khong khro mi bya bar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung du dag snang dang mos gus bya'o/_/thugs kyi dam tshig tu mi dge ba'i rtog pa skad cig ma yan spangs la dge ba byang chub kyi sems dus rgyun chad med par 'gro ba thams cad la ci phan du bya'o/_/sku'i dam tshig tu yi dam lha'i bskyed rim sgom zhing /_gsung gi dam tshig tu bzlas brjod dang ma bral bar/_thugs kyi dam tshig tu rdzogs rim gyi 'khor lo las mi 'da' bar bya'o/_/de ltar sku'i dam tshig bsrungs pas gnas skabs su lus kyi nad med cing /_sems can la phan thogs pas mthong na yid du 'ong zhing mthong reg thams cad dge ba la 'khod la/_mthar thug lus la rdo rje'i rten 'byon zhing gang na bzhugs pa der gzhan la phan la skye ba 'phos nas sprul pa dpag tu med pas sems can gyi don byed cing*/ mtshan dang dpe byed du 'bar ba'i skus 'gro ba'i don du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po la mnga' brnyes par 'gyur ro/_/sku'i dam tshig nyams na gnas skabs su tshe thung zhing nad mang la/_mi 'dod pa thams cad 'byung zhing mthong reg thams cad ngan song du skye la/_mthar thugs rdo rje dmyal bar lus kyi sdug bsngal las thar dus med do/_/gsung gi dam tshig bsrungs na gnas skabs su ngag snyan zhing thams cad kyis bden par 'dzin pas lha 'dre mi gsum gyis bkar nyan pa/_rgyud lung man ngag thams cad shes shing chos kyi tshig sna tshogs rang rdol nas snyan ngag bstan bcos brtsam par nus shing / gsung thos pa thams cad kyi gnod 'tshe zhi nas bsam pa thams cad 'grub cing ske ba gcig gis grol la/_mthar thug gsung gi sprul pas 'gro ba'i don byed cing chos kyi 'khor lo dri ma med par bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/gsung gi dam tshig nyams na gnas skabs su lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pas mi kha sdang zhing gtam gyi nyes pas rang gzhan thams cad la gnod la/_de'i tshig thos pa thams cad kyang bkra mi shes shing ngan song du skye/_mthar thug lce la rmon dor lnga brgya btsugs nas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/thugs kyi dam tshig bsrungs pas gnas skabs su thugs kyi sprul pas 'gro ba 'dul zhing*/_ting nge 'dzin rgyud la skye bas 'gro ba'i bsam pa la rang bzhin gyis bsam gtan la gnas par 'byung zhing de bzhugs pa'i gnas der yang ting nge 'dzin skye zhing yul phyogs de'i sems can thams cad bde ba can du skye'o/_/mthar thug sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la 'khod cing thugs rdo rje dang gnyis su med pa'i ngang du mya ngan las 'da'o/_/thugs kyi dam tshig nyams na gnas skabs su rgyud mi dge bas rang gzhan kun la gnod cing des gang yin la byas pa de'i bsam pa mi 'grub la bkra mi shis shing nad gdon dang snying rlung la sogs pa 'byung /_mthar thug ngan song las thar ba'i skabs med do/_/ mdor na smin byed dbang gi sdom pa rgyud la gnas pa la/_dam tshig bsrung dgos pas mi dge ba mtha' dag las log nas dge ba 'ba' zhig bsgrub par bya'o/_/zhes brjod do/_/ gsum pa rjes kyi rim pa la dga' ston zas la/_rdo rje slob dpon la gus pas bka' bzhin bsgrub cing sdom pa dang dam tshig la gnas par bya'o/_/tshogs kyi 'khor los mnyes shing rdo rje'i gla dang bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rgya cher brjod do/_/ gsum pa ngag gi sgrib pa sbyong zhing ngag longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur grol ba'i gsang dbang la yang gsum las/_sngon 'gro ni/_thod par bur sbrang chang dang a mr-i ta sbyar ba bshams/_nam gyi srod la dkyil 'khor de'i lho phyogs su slob ma 'dug ste/_maN+Dal phul nas/_dngos sam yid kyis rig ma bla ma la 'bul ba na/_e ma khyod ni bde ba che/_bde chen pad+ma he ru ka_/bde gshegs rnams kyi bde chen yab/_/bde ba'i 'byung gnas bde stsol mdzod/_/_/ byang chub sems ni yang dag don/_/rnam dag mchog ni yang dag pa'i/_/dri med bdud rtsi dam pa yis/_/bla med mchog gi dbang bskur ltar/_/de bzhin rigs kyi bu dag la/_/'khor ba sdug bsngal kun bsal mdzod/_/dri med bde chen bdud rtsi yis/_/ma rig nyes pa'i dri ma 'joms/_/bla med byang chub bde chen nyid/_/deng 'dir bdag gis thob mdzod cig_/ces pas phul ba'i rjes su/_bla mas gzhi'i kun bzang bsgoms la/_dkyil 'khor gyi lha la mchod pa dang bstod pa ci 'grub byas te/_slob ma'i gdong g.yogs shing me tog thogs te bskor ba gsum dang phyag gsum byed du bcug la/_ye shes dbab pa'i phyir slob ma rnams langs te/_rkang pa'i long bu gnyis gshibs la snying gar thal mo sbyar la/_bla mas/_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod nyon/_rang nyid sangs rgyas DA ki ma/_/rdo rje phag mor gsal bar sgoms/_/de ltar gsal ba'i lte ba ru/_/chos 'byung dmar po sum brtsegs sgoms/_/de yi lte bar phag mo ni/_/ shin tu chung la gsal bar sgoms/_/kye rigs kyi bu khyed rang skad cig gis rdo rje phag mo dmar mo gcer bu skra grol ba rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis phag zhal mthing nag ngur ba/_g.yas g.yon gri gug dang thod pa khrag gis bkang ba thugs kar 'dzin pa'i lte bar chos 'byung sum brtsegs kyi nang du/_de 'dra'i phag mo tshon gang pa gcig sgoms shig_/ces brjod la/_bla mas byin dbab cing rol mo dkrol bas/_slob ma la bde stong gi nyams skye'o/_/_/de'i ngang la ma yengs par sgom du gzhug cing /_gdong g.yogs bkrol la 'o rigs kyi bu khyod gson cing /_phyi bum pa'i dbang gi dus su rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas dpe'i mtshon byar ngo sprod pa yin gyis/_don dam par na rang gi lus 'di rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bzhugs pa yin te/_klong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud las/_'byung ba'i gdangs las grub pa yis/_/lus ni bde gshegs pho brang nyid/_/rigs lnga yab yum lnga yi gnas/_/phung khams skye mched lha yi sku/_/zhes pas rang gi rig pa 'di thog mar 'khor 'das gang du yang ma grub pa'i sngon rol na 'od gsal bde ba chen por bzhugs te/_de nyid rang ngo rang gis ma shes pas rang rig 'byung bzhi'i sbubs su tshud pa'i lus 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas yin te/_spyi bo bde chen gyi 'khor lo na rdo rje mkha' 'gro yab yum bzhugs/ mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo na rin chen mkha' 'gro yab yum bzhugs/ snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yab yum bzhugs/_lte ba sprul ba'i 'khor lo na pad+ma mkha' 'gro yab yum bzhugs/_gsang gnas bde skyong 'khor lo na las kyi mkha' 'gro yab yum bzhugs pas/_phung po thams cad dpa' bo/_khams thams cad dpa' mo'i rang bzhin/_ba spu'i khu bu re re na yang lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du bzhugs te/_yang klong gsal las/ 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas zhing /_/'khor lo lnga ni rigs lnga'i gnas/_/phung khams thams cad lha tshogs nyid/_/sems ni ye shes chen po nyid/_/ces gsungs pas/_rang lus rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor te/_khyed kyis me tog dor ba'i lha yang lus kyi rang gnas kyi lha rnam par snang mdzad yin te snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na gsal ba 'di yin no/_/zhes rigs gang la me tog phog pa'i lha'i ngo sprad la/_bla ma'i mdun du dar gyi yol bas bres pa'i nang du/_bla ma yab yum stan la 'khod la/_bskyed rim gsal btab ste yab dpa' bo rta mgrin du gsal ba'i gnas lngar mkha' 'gro yab lnga spyi bor o rgyan pad+ma thod phreng dang /_yum rdo rje phag mo'i 'khor lo lngar dpa' mo lnga/_spyi bor mkhar chen bza' 'tsho rgyal/_/phung khams skye mched thams cad lha dang lha mor gsal ba'i yum gyi mkha' gsang la pad+ma 'dab bzhi dmar po/_yab kyi gsang ba hU~M las rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga par bskyed la/_snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde bas 'khor lo lnga dang phung po khams dang skye mched kyi lha thams cad sbyor ba'i brdas bskul te mnyes pas dwangs ma yum gyi b+ha gar phab pa/_me long gis blangs pa'am/_blangs par bsam la thod pa nas bdud rtsi slob ma'i lce thog tu bzhag la/_kye ma kye ma rigs kyi bu/_dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis ni/_/byang chub sras po dam pa la/_/_/ji ltar dbang ni bskur ba ltar/_/de bzhin gsang ba'i byang sems kyis/_/da lta khyed la dbang bskur ro/_/\u0f00 gu ru DA ki ni ha ri ni sa ra tsa hri ya b+ho ng+hi tsit+ta a mr-i te sarba pany+tsa a b+hi ShaMSh+Na hUM/_zhes lan gsum brjod la/_dwangs ma'i lam rtsa dbu ma mthing la dmar ba spu gu can na mar song bas bde stong gi ye shes skyes par sgom du bcug cing /_'og rlung drag tu 'then cing steng rlung cung zad mnan la dar cig sgom du bcug pa'i ngang la ngo sprad de/_e ma skal ldan rigs kyi bu/_/bde dang stong pa dbyer med pa/_/de nyid ltos dang ngos gzung med/_/rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i ngang /_/thams cad ro mnyam bde chen no/_/kye rigs kyi bu sems kyi rnam rtog mthing kha nam mkha' rnam par dag pa'i dkyil lta bu tha ma 'od lnga'i mu khyud zlum pos bskor ba:_dper na nyi ma la 'ja' 'khyil ba lta bu dbang pos khyab tshad du snang ngo :_de'i steng du 'od zlum po shin tu gsal ba zhig gdugs ltar 'char ro:_zhes gsungs so:_de'i dus na 'char lugs rnam pa brgyad 'char te:_de yang rig pa 'di thugs rje ltar 'char bas 'khor 'das rgya ma chad: 'od ltar 'char bas snang ba thams cad nang gsal:_sku ltar 'char bas shes pa kha phyir ma shor:_ye shes ltar shar bas snang ba thams cad zang thal: gnyis med ltar shar bas rang gi shes pa rtse gcig tu gnas:_mtha' grol ltar shar bas mtha' gang la yang mi gnas:_ma dag pa 'khor ba'i sgo ltar shar bas srid pa'i byung khungs mi 'gags:_dag pa ye shes kyi sgo ltar shar bas chos nyid ma bu 'brel ba'o:_rin chen spungs pa'i rgyud las:_thugs rje lta bur 'char tshul las:_sems can kun gyi skyob pa'i gnas:_snang ba rang gsal 'gags med las:_'od lnga'i gsal byed tshul du gnas:_mkhyen pa'i snang cha ma 'gags pas:_ye shes dag pa'i sgo nyid du:_snang ba 'gags med lam ltar shar:_rang snang lus kun mtha' rdzogs phyir:_chos rnams kun gyi sku ltar snang :_shes pa ngo bo gcig yin pas:_gnyis su med pa ltar yang shar:_de nyid rang sar gnas
