med pas:_mtha' grol chen po'i snang ba ni: nges med lhun grub gzhi la snang :_rig pa zang thal gcig rdzogs phyir:_dag pa ye shes nyid kyi sgo:_ngo bo nyid dang 'brel ba 'o:_byung tshul 'gag pa med pa'i phyir:_sems can rnams kyi byung khungs so:_ma dag 'khor ba'i sgo ltar yang :_khyab byed snang ba'i cha las shar:_ces so:_de'i skad cig ma dang po la mngon par shes pa drug phrag drug 'char:_dbang po'i mngon par shes pa drug: sems las su rung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug:_shes rab la dbang thob pa'i mngon par shes pa drug:_ye shes kyi mthong ba rnam par dag pa'i mngon par shes pa drug:_chos nyid phyin ci ma log par mthong ba'i mngon par shes pa drug:_sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa drug 'char te:_de skad du yang rgyud las:_de tshe rigs kyi bu de la: mngon par shes pa drug 'char te:_zhes gsungs so:_gnyis pa thad kar rigs lnga'i gtso 'khor gyi tshom bur gsal:_mar 'gro ba rigs drug gi skyes gnas dang :_las dang sdug bsngal dang :_tshe tshad la sogs pa gsal: gzhi'i dngos po 'dug tshul gsal bar 'byung ba ni:_rjes su dran pa drug po las 'byung ba'o:_lha rjes su dran pas yi dam lha zhal mthong ba dang :_lam rjes su dran pas bar do'i chos nyid la dbang bsgyur ba dang :_skye gnas rjes su dran pas dbang po tha ma rnams rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing khams su dbugs 'byin pa dang :_bsam gtan rjes su dran pas zhag lngar bsam la gnas pa dang :_bla ma'i gdams ngag rjes su dran pas rang gi snang ba mthong ba dang :_gnyis su med par spyod pa dang :_lta ba rjes su dran pas sngar 'dris pa'i mi phyis phrad pa tsam gyis ngo shes pa lta bu:_de tshe mi brjed pa'i gzungs rnams kyang rang gi rgyud la skyes te:_sngon gyi chos rnams kyang rgyud la dus gcig la 'char ro:_de bzhin sngar ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang gsang sngags kun gyi gnas/_/bde chen ye shes 'byung gnas yin/_/'di nyid ma brten thabs gzhan med/_/thabs kyi rgyud kyis grol ba yin/_/bde chen 'di brten bde ba thob/_/_/yang dag sangs rgyas 'di las byung /_/zhes pas gsang sngags kyi chos thams cad 'dir 'dus par gsungs shing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyang lam 'di la brten nas sangs rgyas/_'phral gyi bde skyid thams cad kyang 'di las 'byung bas yum gyi b+ha ga 'di la khyod kyis mchod par gyis shig_/bud med tsam la khro ba spongs/_/mtshan ldan yum la gus par gyis/_/_/tshe gcig sangs rgyas bde ba ni/_/'dis ster nus kyis gzhan gyis min/_/bud med brnyas shing mkha' la gshe/_/bde dang bral nas na rag spyod/_/de bas rtag tu gus par gyis/_/zhes brjod la/_phyag 'tshal me tog gtor nas/_yum des 'di skad brjod do/_/hUM nga yi b+ha ga gsang chen 'di/_/gang zhig mos pas sus brten pa/_/yon tan dngos grub thams cad 'byung /_/bde stong mchog gi dngos grub thob/_/\u0f00 gu ru DA ki ni ha ri ni sa ra tsa hri ya any+dza li hoHsa b+ha ga cung zad bstan nas/_bla mas phyag rgya'i srin lag g.yon pa bzung nas slob ma la gtad pa ni/_hUM ye shes lha mo bde ba'i sku/_/ kun tu bde ba'i gnas sbyin ma/_/dga' bas gzugs mdzes yid 'ong ma/_/ rtag tu gus pas mchod par gyis/_/\u0f00 ma hA su ka hoH_zhes pas slob ma'i lag tu gtad nas/ gnyis pa dngos gzhi ni/_yang brjod pa/_kye ma las ldan rigs kyi bu/ khyod nyid pad+ma he ru ka_/_/rta mgrin dbang gi sku ru sgoms/_/yum ni rdo rje phag mor bskyed/_/gnyis ka'i phung khams skye mched rnams/_/_/dpa' bo mkha' 'gror gsol btab nas/_/bdag dang yum gyi mkha' gsang ni/_/rdo rje pad+mar byin gyis rlobs/_/de'ang skad cig dran rdzogs su rigs kyi bu nyid rta mgrin dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas gri gug g.yon thod pa gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa'i spyi bor pad+ma dang nyi zla'i steng du/_pad+ma thod phreng mthing nag rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa bde chen 'khor lor ra las rdo rje mkha' 'gro dkar po/_mgrin par tsa las rin chen mkha' 'gro ser po/_snying gar AHlas chos dbyings mkha' 'gro mthing ga/_lte bar hri las pad+ma mkha' 'gro dmar po/_gsang bar ya las las kyi mkha' 'gro ljang gur gsal ba'i lha thams cad gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i gsang bar rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa khong seng can hA~M gis mtshan pa'o/_/lha mo nyid rdo rje phag mo dmar mo/_gcer bu gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i spyi bor pad zla dang nyi ma'i steng du mkhar chen bza' 'tsho rgyal dmar po/_/_gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa/_bde chen 'khor lor ha las rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo/_mgrin par ri las rin chen mkha' 'gro ma ser mo/_/snying gar ma las chos dbyings mkha' 'gro ma mthing ga_/lte bar ni las pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma dmar mo/_gsang bar sa las las kyi mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu_/_/thams cad kyang gtso mo dang phyag mtshan mthun pa'i b+ha ga pad+ma dmar po 'dab bzhi'i dbus su zla gam la phaT ser po bsgoms la phan tshun snyoms par zhugs shing /_kye skal ldan/_yum gyir pad+mar dal gyis bcings/_/'o bya lus sems bde ba bskyed/_/bde la sems bzung dal bus bsrubs/_/byang sems 'chor ba snyam byed na/_/me tog stong pa'i rgya yis gdab/_/stong par yal dus bsrubs pa yis/_/yang yang bde ba spar bar bya/_/_/bde stong gnyis med don de la/_/der 'dzin ma byed ngo la ltos/_/gnyis shor gnyis mnyam dus 'di ru/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'char/_/de ni ngo yis zin par bya/_/de ltar lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba spyi bo nas g.yo ba la ltos shig_/bde stong spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes 'di nyid dga' ba'i ye shes so/_/mgrin par dngas ma cher babs pa'i ye shes la bltas pas rnam par mi rtog pa ni mchog dga'i ye shes so/_/snying gar babs pa ni dga' bral gyi ye shes so/_/gsang bar babs dus phra rags kyi rnam rtog kun 'gags nas snang srid bde ba chen por shar la gnyis 'dzin gyi rnam rtog phra rags mtha' dag dang bral ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gnyug ma'i ye shes so/_/'di nyid kyi ngang la 'og rlung drag tu 'then la dar cig mnyam par zhog cig_/yang bskyod pa dang bsrubs pas bde ba spar ba'i ngang la der 'dzin gyi rnam rtog dang bral bas cher gyis ltos la mnyam par zhog cig_/da ni gsang ba nas lte bar bzlog la de nyid kyi ngang la zhog cig_/de bzhin du snying ga dang mgrin pa dang spyi bor byang sems skya nar gyis bzlog la gang yang yid la mi byed pa gdod ma'i ka dag gi ngang du lhod kyis mnyam par zhog cig_/ces ngos ma zin gyi bar bskyar zhing ngo sprad la mthong ba brgyud pa'i rim pas dbab bzlog dgram pa'i lta stangs dang 'khrul 'khor la slob cing sbyong ngo /_/ gsum pa rjes ni/_bla mas yang brjod pa/_kye ma skal ldan rigs kyi bu/_/des ni dag bya gang dag na/_/nyon mongs yid kyi sgrib pa dag_/yid ni mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/_/las kyi phyag rgya brtan par dbang /_/skal ba sa bcu dag dang mnyam/_/phrin las dbang gi las rnams 'grub/_/'bras bu skye med chos sku thob/_/ces brjod la/_tshogs kyi dga' ba rgya chen po bya'o/_/shes rab ye shes kyi dbang rgya cher bshad pa'o/_/lnga pa lus ngag yid gsum du 'dzin pa'i sgrib pa kun sbyong zhing chos sku rdzogs pa chen po'i zab don mthar thug pa tshig dbang rin po che la/_sngon 'gro dang dngos gzhi rjes gsum las/ dang po ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/_thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba'i steng du me long la chos 'byung gnyis brtsegs kyi dbus su mkha' 'gro yab yum gyi rtsa sngags dang /_mtha' skor la rig 'dzin gyi mtshan bris la/_kha dgab/_phyi nang gi tshogs mchod rgya cher bshams la bzhag_/yang na dkyil 'khor gyi byang du me tog tshom bu bkod la/_/der bzhag cing*/_bde ba'i phyag rgya ma de nyid dang slob ma kun byang du 'khod la/_maN+Dal phul te gsol ba gdab pa ni/_/kye kye dus gsum bla ma rje/_/yang dag ye shes ngo bo nyid/_/rig pa'i ngo bo ye shes la/_/bdag nyid nges pa'i shes pa skyes/_/gnyis med ye shes mchog 'di nyid/_/'gro gzhan dag la yod pa min/_/dam chos bdud rtsi'i mchog 'di nyid/_/'thung phyir bdag nyid bla ma la/_/gus pa'i yid kyis gsol ba 'debs/_/gal te don thal bdag gis 'tshal/_/rnam pa kun tu mchog gyur pa'i/_/bzhi pa'i dbang bskur bdag la stsol/_/zhes pa gsum gyi rjes la bla ma yi dam du gsal ba'i ngang nas dkyil 'khor ram tshom bu'i dbus su dkyil 'khor gyi lha bskyed/_mtshams su yab yum bskyed do/_/de'ang dbus su rdo rje phag mo yab yum la/_/mtshams bzhir rigs bzhi'i mkha' 'gro yab yum bskyed nas ye shes pa dgug la yi ge gsum gyis rgyas gdab cing /_bla ma yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba'i sgras phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bla ma yi dam gyi lha tshogs rnams bdud rtsi'i rnam par byon nas thod pa'i bdud rtsi la thim par bsam zhing /_tshom bu'i lha tshogs la mchod bstod byas pas 'od du zhu nas rang gi snying gar thim/_thugs ka nas 'od zer kha dog lnga 'phros pas thams cad las mchod pa'i lha mo lngar gyur te/_nam mkha' khyab paRa gang nas mchod sprin sna tshogs thogs te/_me long gi chos 'byung gi dbus su rdo rje phag mo yab yum dang /_mtha' bskor du bla ma brgyud pa bskyed pa la mchod nas/_dgyes te snyoms par zhugs pa'i bdud rtsi babs pas thod pa gang zhing bdud rtsis bla ma yi dam la mchod la/_tshogs dbul zhing brgyud pa'i bla ma la gsol ba btab nas/_dam tshig sbyin pa ni/[ \u0f00] AHhU~M hrIH bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig ni/_/thams cad ro mnyam chos nyid dang /_/ 'khor 'das spang blang bral ba yi/_/gang shar chos nyid rol pa la/_/ma rig 'dzin pas ma bslad srungs/_/'das na 'khor ldog na ra kan/_/zhes brjod nas/_slob ma rnam snang gi chos bdun dang ldan pa'i smin phrag tu g.yung drung dmar po zhig g.yon du myur bar 'khor bar dmigs te/_/_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro sprin phung gtibs pa tsam spyan drangs la bstim zhing rol mo'i sgra bsgrags pa'i rjes la/_dngos gzhi ni/_'o rigs kyi bu dar cig glod la bcos bslad med pa'i shes pa rang sar zhog cig_/shes pa bde gsal mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'bol le/_/shig ge_/lhod de ba/_skye med spros pa dang bral ba ston ka'i nam mkha' rnam par dag pa'i dkyil lta bu 'di nyid gnyug ma lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po ye ji bzhin pa'i gnas lugs yin pas ngo shes par gyis shig_/ces brjod la/_slob ma rnams langs te phyogs bzhi'i nam mkha' la rim gyis blta bcug nas bla mas brjod pa/_kye ma kye ma rigs kyi bu/_mig rtse nam mkha'i shar du ltos/_/shar gyi bar snang dag la ni/_/thogs pa med par 'gro bar sgoms/_/ kye ma kye ma rigs kyi bu/_/mig rtse nam mkha'i lho ru ltos/_/lho yi bar snang dag la ni/_/_/thogs pa med par 'gro bar sgoms/_/kye ma kye ma rigs kyi bu/_/mig rtse nam mkha'i nub tu ltos/_/nub kyi bar snang dag la ni/_/thogs pa med par 'gro bar sgoms/_/kye ma kye ma rigs kyi bu/_/mig rtse nam mkha'i byang*du*ltos/_/byang gi bar snang dag la ni/_/thogs pa med par 'gro bar sgoms/_/'gro bar bsams na 'gro mkhan med/_/gang du 'gro bsam phyin pa med/_/'gro bar bsam pa rang gi sems/_/sems ni mtha' bral stong pa yin/_/zhes brjod nas yang /_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/sems ni dang po gang nas byung /_/rgyu rkyen ci las byung bar ltos/_/zhes pas ma rnyed pa'i tshe/ yang brjod pa/_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod nyon/_/rtsa ba bral ba'i sems nyid la/_/_/gdod nas ma skyes dngos po med/_kha dog dbyibs med ngos gzung med/_/gang nas ma byung song ba med/_/da lta mi gnas rgyu rkyen med/_/'di nyid sems kyi gnas lugs te/_/brjod du med par shes par gyis/_/zhes brjod pa'i don bshad la/_/_/yang nam mkha'i dkyil na rigs lnga'i sku gzugs bsgom du bcug la bla mas brjod pa/_/kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyi/_/rgyal ba'i sku gzugs 'di la ltos/_/rgyan dang cha lugs du mar snang /_/snang bar 'dzin pa rang gi sems/_/de la ltos dang gzhi rtsa bral/_/de bzhin yid yul snang ba'i gzugs/_/yul nyid gsal la mkhan pos stong /_/de ni gsal stong chos sku yin/_/zhes brjod nas/_dbyug pa ring po la dril bu'i phreng ba brgyus la/_sa la dbyug pa'i rtsa ba brdung zhing brjod pa/_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/'di yi sgra ni snyan mi snyan/_/legs par thos sam ngo bor ltos/_/sgra ru 'dzin pa rang gi sems/_/sems ni grags stong chos kyi sgra/_/de la ltos dang gzhi rtsa bral/_/de bzhin sgra ru grags pa kun/_/sna tshogs thos kyang ngo bos stong /_/gsal por grags kyang rang bzhin stong /_/shar dus gzhi med rtsa ba bral/_/ngo bo ngos gzung ma rnyed pa/_/de ni grags stong bya ba yin/_/zhes pa dang yang /_spos dang sman la sogs pa'i dri snom du bcug la/_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/spos dang sman sogs dri zhim dang /_/de bzhin mi zhim dri rnams la/_/dga' dang mi dga' skyes pa'i tshe/_/rang gi sems la tshur ltos dang /_/ gang las byung zhing gang du song /_/de yi ngo bo ci 'dra zhig_/dgag sgrub sems kyi ngo bor ltos/_/de ni rkyen snang shes pa ste/_/gnyis 'dzin shes pa glo bur yin/_/rkyen phyir snang yang ngo bos stong /_/zhes brjod nas/_yang ro mngar skyur myong du bcug la/_/kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/bza' btung ro mchog myong bar gyis/_/mngar skyur lan tshwa tsha kha bska/_/ro drug myong ba'i mkhan por ltos/_/bltas pas mi rnyed skye ba med/_/mtha' bral dbu ma spros bral dang*/_/ rang grol chos skur shes par mdzod/_/yang phrag pa'i gos phud la reg bya 'jam rtsub reg tu bcug nas brjod pa/_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod la/_/reg la dgag sgrub skyes pa'i sems/_/de la gnyis 'dzin gang skyes kyang /_/rnam pa gsal la rang bzhin stong /_/rang gi sems su shes par gyis/_/sems ni stong gsal chos sku'i ngang*/_/gdod nas rtsa ba bral ba yin/_/zhes brjod nas yang /_skyid sdug dga' mi dga' chags sdang la sogs pa sgoms shig byas la/ brjod pa/_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/rang gi sems la phar ltos dang /_/ skyid sdug dgag sgrub cir snang yang /_/snang mkhan sems la tshur ltos dang /_/ dga' dang mi dga' sems las byung /_/bde dang sdug bsngal gang byung yang /_/gsal la ngo bo rig stong yin/_/dper na chu zla ji bzhin no/_/zhes pa dang /_yang dug lnga dug gsum rang ga ma'i sems skyer bcug la/_brjod pa/ kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod la/_/dug lnga dug gsum ci skyes kyang /_/me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/sems la snang yang ngos gzung med/_/nyon mongs gzhi med rtsa ba bral/_kha dog dbyibs med ngos gzung med/_/gdod nas ma skyes chos sku yin/_/nyon mongs rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/sems las shar zhing sems la nub/_/skyes dang grol mnyam rba rlabs bzhin/_/rags dang phra ba'i rnam rtog kun/_/der 'dzin med par rang sar zhi/_/de ltar rang bzhin ma grub pa/_/nyon mongs rtog pa'i mtshams rtogs na/_/gnyen po spang blang med par grol/_/ces ngo sprad do/_/ gsum pa rjes ni bla mas/_e ma skal ldan rigs kyi bus/_/_/stong gsal chos sku'i dbang thob pa/_/des ni dag bya gang dag na/_/lus ngag yid gsum 'dzin sgrib dag_/gsum ka nus pa tshad du phyin/_/brten bya bde sdug spang blang bral/_/rjes su dbyer med bsgom par dbang /_/sa ni bcu gcig kun tu 'od/_/'phrin las bzhi po mngon du gyur/_/'bras bu sku lnga lhun gyis grub/_/ces brjod la tshogs kyi dga' ba bya'o/_/drug pa sems nyid kyi ngo sprad pa bla ma'i dbang ka dag rtsal dbang la sngon 'gro snod sbyong zhing byin gyis brlabs pa/_dngos gzhi bcud blugs te smin grol la dgod pa/_rjes spro dga' bskyed de gzengs bstod pa gsum las/_dang po ni khregs chod kyi sngon 'gror bskur ba ste/_pad 'dab brgyad 'od ra dang rdo ra me ri bris la/_de'i steng du thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba bzhag_/phyi nang gi mchod pas bskor la/ thod pa'i dbus su pad+ma'i sdong po la/_o rgyan yab yum rtsa ba'i bla ma dang tha dad med pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku za 'og gi 'jol ber sha ba'i snyan zhwa thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba dang gri gug 'dzin pa'i sku dkar ser zhal sbyor du bsgoms pa'i/_mdun du rdo rje mkha' 'gro/_g.yas su rin chen mkha' 'gro/ rgyab tu pad+ma mkha' 'gro/_g.yon du las kyi mkha' 'gro/_steng du chos sku kun bzang yab yum la sogs pa brgyud pa'i bla ma dang /_zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor/ de dag gi mtha' skor rnams su dpa' bo dpa' mo/_bka' srung dam can rnams bskyed nas ye shes pa bstim/_mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la/_phyag dang bskangs kyi rjes la/_bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams zhes pa la sogs pas sems bskyed nas/_gsol ba gdab pa ni/_kye kye bla ma rnams kyis bdag smin par mdzad du gsol/_rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bka' rab 'byams bskur du gsol/_bdag grol bar mdzad du gsol/_mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub bstsal du gsol/_zhes pa lan gsum brjod do/_/ gnyis pa dngos gzhi la kun 'dus spyir bskur ba dang /_mtshan brgyad bye brag tu bskur ba gnyis las/_dang po ni bla ma rnams byon nas rang la thim par bsgom du bcug la/_O~M gu ru kun bzang yab yum/_rigs lnga yab yum/ rdo rje 'chang /_rdo rje sems dpa'/_dga' rab rdo rje/_shrI sid+ha/_pad+ma mtshan brgyad/_ye shes 'tsho rgyal/_pad+ma las 'brel rtsal/_sa ma ya dzaHzhes brjod do/_/slob ma rnams langs te thal mo spyi bor sbyar la rlung kha sbyor bzung zhing bla mas/_'o khyod rnams ma yengs par nyon cig_/rang gi lus 'di tha mal pa shin tu mdzes shing lang tsho rgyas pa/_lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i snying nang du O~M dkar po zla ba'i steng na yod pa 'khor ba la sems zung zhig_/yang 'og min dang phyogs bcu'i zhing nas sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa sprin phung gtibs pa bzhin byon nas snying nang gi O~M la thim par bsgoms shig_/ces brjod nas rol mo'i sgra cher byas la/_yang snying nang nas nyi ma'i steng du AHdmar po 'khor bar dmigs la/_nam mkha' nas mar rdo rje phag mo la rigs bzhi'i mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pas bskor ba byon nas AHla thim par sgoms shig_/ces brjod la rol mo bsgrag go_/yang snying gi nang du nyi zla'i steng du hUM mthing ga yod pa drag tu 'khor bar dmigs la/_rtsa ba'i bla ma chos sku kun bzang yab yum dang gnyis su med pa la brgyud pa'i bla mas bskor ba spyan drangs pa byon nas hUM la thim par sgoms shig_/ces brjod la spos dang tshil chen gyis bdug cing rol mo'i sgra cher bya'o/_/ gnyis pa la sku lnga lhun grub tu dbang bskur ba/_/sku gsum bde chen du dbang bskur ba/_thig le nyag gcig tu dbang bskur ba gsum las/_dang po ni/_yang slob ma rnams langs te thal mo sbyar ba'i tshe/_bla mas/_kye rigs kyi bu rnams skad cig gis stong pa'i ngang las pad+ma zla ba dang /_nyi ma'i steng du rang nyid pad+ma mkha' 'gro dmar mo gcer bu gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo lngar/_O~M hU~M traM hrIHaHrnams pad+ma dang zla nyi'i steng na rang bzhin gyis bskor bar bsams la/_yang chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i pho brang nas bla ma seng+ge sgra sgrogs yab yum gnyis med chos sku'i rang bzhin mthing ga rgyan drug dang bcas pa la bla ma rnams kyis bskor ba byon nas snying ga'i hUM la thim par sgoms shig_/ces brjod la rol mo bsgrag go_/de bzhin du 'og min nas pad+ma rgyal po yab yum longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku brgyud pa'i bla mas bskor ba seRa po mgrin pa'i tAM la thim par sgoms shig_/ces rol mo bsgrag_/o rgyan nas blo ldan mchog sred yab yum cir yang sprul pa'i sku brgyud pa'i bla ma dang bcas pa lte ba'i hrIHla thim par sgoms shig_/_ces dang rol mo bsgrag_/lho nub rnga yab kyi gling na pad+ma sam b+ha wa mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku yum dang bcas pa ljang gu brgyud pa'i bla mas bskor ba bde skyong 'khor Al thim par sgoms shig_/ces dang rol mo bsgrag_/rdo rje gdan nas shAkya seng+ge mngon par byang chub pa'i sku yum dang bcas pa dkar ser brgyud pa'i bla mas bskor ba byon nas spyi bo'i O~M la thim par sgoms shig_/ces rol mo cher bsgrag go_/ gnyis pa ni yang /_pad+ma mkha' 'gro bsams pa'i spyi bo/_mgrin pa/ snying ga gsum du pad zla nyi ma'i steng du/_O~M AHhU~M bsam pa 'khor zhing /_sku'i bla ma pad+ma 'byung gnas dkar po yum dang bcas pa la brgyud pa'i bla mas bskor ba spyi bo'i steng gi nam mkha' la byon nas bzhugs pa'i sbyor mtshams nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun babs pas lus thams cad gang /_zag med kyi bde ba rgyas shing slar spyi bo'i O~M la thim/_gsung gi bla ma nyi ma'i 'od zer dmar po yum dang bcas pa la brgyud pa'i bla mas bskor ba byon nas sbyor mtshams nas bdud rtsi babs pas gsung gi dngos grub thob cing lus gang*/_slar mgrin pa'i AH la thim/_thugs kyi bla ma pad+ma thod phreng mthing nag yum dang bcas pa la brgyud pa'i bla mas bskor bar byon nas sbyor mtshams nas bdud rtsi babs pas thugs kyi dngos grub thob cing lus thams cad gang nas bde ba rgyas pa'i mthar snying ga'i hUM las thim par bsam zhing /gu gul dang spos dang tshil chen gyi dud pa rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pa cher bya'o/_/ gsum pa ni/_thams cad gral la 'khod pa rnam snang gi chos bdun dang ldan pas lus sems khong glod de thod pa nas dngos grub kyi rten bdud rtsi re blud la/_bla mas/_e ma skal ldan rigs kyi bu/_/ngang dngas rang bzhin bdag nyid che/_/rab 'byams rig pa'i dbang bskur nyon/_/da lta shes pa rang sor zhog_/bcos bslad ma byed lhod kyis glod/_/sems kyi 'phro 'du lings kyis bsgyur/_/rbad kyis tshod la phyam gyis zhog_/sems nyid ma skyes gnyug ma'i don/_/rang bzhag yongs grol nam mkha' 'dra/_/ye nas ma skyes gdod ma'i ngang /_/bsam med ye nas rdzogs pa che/_/'du 'bral med pa'i chos nyid do/_/zhes ngo sprad la/_sems nyid stong pa chos kyi sku/_/thig le nyag gcig tu gting thag bcad do/_/ gsum pa rjes spro dga' bskyed cing gzengs bstod pa ni/_'o rigs kyi bu khyed rnams la bla ma thams cad kyi byin rlabs zhugs pas gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi bde ba phun sum tshogs shing yid la bsam pa thams cad rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa yin no/_/zhes brjod nas tshogs kyi dga' ba rgya cher bya'o/_/bdun pa ye shes kyi gsang sgo dbye ba rig pa rtsal gyi dbang ni/ thod rgal gyi sngon 'gror bskur ba las 'di la yang /_sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes*dang*gsum*las/_dang po ni shom ra bla ma'i dbang ltar bshams la/ slob ma rnams gral la 'khod nas sems bskyed do/_/ gnyis pa ni rang gi spyi bor pad+ma 'dab bzhi dkar po'i dbus su/O~M dkar po las 'od 'phros rang lus O~M du gyur pa las 'od 'phros snang srid thams cad O~M du gyur nas bdag gzhan thams cad kyi lus kyi sgrib pa dag_/ sku'i dbang dang dngos grub thob par bsam la/_O~M O~M O~M/_zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/_/yang mgrin par pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi'i dbus su/ AHdmar po las 'od 'phros rang lus Ar gyur pa las 'od 'phros snang srid thams cad A'i rang bzhin du gyur bdag gzhan thams cad kyi ngag gi sgrib pa dag_/gsung gi dbang dang dngos grub thob bar bsam la/_A A A zhes dbyangs dang bcas pas brgya rtsa gcig brjod do/_/yang snying gar pad+ma sngon po 'dab bzhi'i dbus su hUM mthing ga las 'od 'phros rang lus hUM du gyur pa las 'od 'phros snang srid thams cad hUM du gyur nas bdag gzhan thams cad kyi yid kyi sgrib pa dag_/thugs kyi dbang dang dngos grub thob par bsam la/ hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brgya rtsa gcig brjod do/_/yang lte bar pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa'i dbus su tAM ser po las 'od 'phros rang gi lus traM du gyur pa las snang srid thams cad la 'od zer phog pas tAM du gyur nas/_bdag gzhan thams cad kyi nga rgyal gyi sgrib pa dag_/yon tan gyi dbang dang dngos grub thob par bsams la tAM tAM tAM zhes brgya rtsa gcig brjod do/_/yang gsang bar pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i dbus su phaT ljang gu las 'od 'phros rang gi lus phaT du gyur pa las 'od 'phros snang srid thams cad phaT du gyur pas bdag gzhan thams cad kyi phrag dog gi sgrib pa dag_/phrin las kyi dbang dang dngos grub thob par bsams la phaT phaT phaT ces brgya rtsa gcig brjod do/_/de ni yi ge 'khor lo'i dbang ste rtsa lam byang nas 'od gsal 'char sla ba'o/_/de nas thod pa nas bdud rtsi byin nas sems spro bsdu med par bzhag pas/_rig pa rang dngas la rtsal mi 'gag pa ni rang byung gi rig pa'i don gyi rtsal dbang yin no zhes ngo sprad do/_/de ni rang byung rig pa'i rtsal dbang ngo*/_/de nas lhun grub rig pa'i rtsal dbang ni mngon sum ngo sprad la theb par gdab bo/_/ gsum pa rjes ni tshogs kyi dga' ba bkra shis dang bcas pa bya'o/_/ brgyad pa byin rlabs mthar phyin pa mkha' 'gro don gyi dbang la gsum las/ sngon 'gro ni dbang khrid rgyab chos dang bcas pa tshar la khad pa'i zhag tha ma'i sngar nub shom ra snga mar ltar bshams la/_don dam pa'i sems bskyed nas langs te thal mo sbyar ba la bla mas/_pad+ma rak+ta dang sin+d+hu ra'i thig le'i smin mtshams su bkod la/_'o do nub mkha' 'gro don gyi dbang bgyid pas ma yengs par nyon cig ces brjod do/_/dngos gzhi khyad par can du sgrub pa ste/ 'dir rang gi lus dpa' bo rta mgrin dang /_/rdo rje phag mo 'khril sbyoRa gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i spyi bo bde chen gyi 'khor lor rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro yab yum sum brgya drug cu 'khrab pa las 'od 'phros pas/_shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'i dkyil na tshur rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pas phe pho hri yom yom zhes brjod cing byon nas spyi bor thim par sgoms shig_/O~M AHhU~M hrIHma*ha*ri*ni*sa*ra*tsa hri ya*badzA DA ki ni sa ma ya dza babs pas lus kyi phyi nang dang ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du sib sib thim par sgoms shig_/O~M AHhU~M hri maM l-i l-i yo ma ha ho hU~M hU~M sa ma ya dza dzaH/_dzaHhU~M baM hoH zhes brjod la tshil chen gyi dud pa 'thul zhing /_thod rnga dang rkang gling dang*/ rol mo'i sgra skad cher bya'o/_/de dag ni bskyed rim gyi don dbang ngo /_/rdzogs rim gyi don dbang ni/_bdud rtsi byin nas/_rang rig dngas phyin par glod pa'i ngang la ngo sprad de/_rang rig stong pa dang /_gsal ba dang /_ris mnyam pa dang /_so sor ma 'dres la mi rtog pa dang /_rang grol ba rnams chos dbyings mkha' 'gro/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro_/rin chen mkha' 'gro/_pad+ma mkha' 'gro/ las kyi mkha' 'gro dang lngar ngo sprad do/_/rjes ni tshogs kyi dga' ba rgya cher ba'o/_/ gsum pa rjes gzhan don bka' rgya dang bcas pa la/_/_gzhan ba' / gtad rgya/_bka' bsgo dang gsum las/_dang po ni/_dbang khrid rgyab chos dang bcas pa tshar ba'i nub mo gzhan don 'grub pa rnams la gnang ba sbyin pa ni/ tshogs mchod la sogs sngaRa ltar bshams la bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol ba btab nas/[ · ]rig 'dzin gyi gtor ma mgo thog tu bzhag la/__'o rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'gro ba dpag tu med pa la zab mo'i dbang bskur chos shod/ byams pa dang snying rjes 'gro ba'i don rgya cher mdzod cig ces lan gsum bya'o/_/rjes tshogs kyi 'khor los dga' bar bya'o/_/ gnyis pa ni slob ma mchog gi bka' srol rnams chig brgyud du bzung nas 'jig rten na yun du gnas pas 'gro ba'i don rgya cher 'byung bas/ de'ang bla ma la sangs rgyas su mthong zhing gdams pa la yid ches skyes nas shes rab dang snying rjer ldan zhing gzhan don 'grub pa la bya ste/bdud rtsi'i thig le gnas gsum du byas la/_'khor lo lngar rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang / mkha' 'gro lnga bskyed la steng dang phyogs bzhi nas bla ma thams cad dang rnam snang sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la spyi bor thim pas sku'i 'gro don phyogs med du 'grub bar bsam zhing /[ \u0f00] AHhU~M gu ru [(]a[)]sid+d+hi[)]si ti pha la ha ri ni sa a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/_zhes brjod/_de bzhin du bla ma dang snang mtha' pad+ma mkha' 'gro mgrin par thim pas gsung gi 'gro don 'grub/_bla ma dang mi bskyod pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro snying gar thim thugs kyi 'gro don 'grub/_bla ma dang rin 'byung rin chen mkha' 'gro lte bar thim/ yon tan gyi 'gro don 'grub/_bla ma dang don grub las kyi mkha' 'gro gsang bar thim phrin las kyi 'gro don 'grub/_bla ma dang dpa' bo mkha' 'gro zhi khro rab 'byams kyi dkyil 'khor char bzhin babs pas lus kyi phyi nang kun tu thim/_'gro don mthar rgyas par bsam la/_sku rten zhi khro'i thang ka_/gsung gi rten snying tig gi glegs bam/_/thugs kyi rten rdo rje sems dpa'i me long rnams gnas gsum du bzhag cing /_'o rigs kyi bu khyod la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba chen po mkha' 'gro snying tig gi bstan pa gtad pa yin pas/_khyod kyis tshe 'di'i 'dod pa dang grags pa la ma blta bar rang don gyi 'khri ba dang dbral bas/_skal ldan gzhan la zab mo'i gdams pa ci nus su ston la/_bka' rgyas btab nas phyi ma'i tshe skal pa dang ldan pa gcig la bstan pa rgya cher gtod cig_/rang yang nyams su longs la gzhan don phun sum tshogs par mdzod cig_/\u0f00 AHhU~M gu ru [(]a[)] sing+g+ha[) ]si ti pha la ha ri ni sa puSh+Ti ku ru ye swAhA/_zhes brjod la maN+Dal steng gi bdud rtsi byin nas/_bkra shis rgyas par brjod do/_/rjes gser gyi maN+Dal phul la tshogs kyi 'khor los dka' ba rgya cher bya'o/_/ hU~M:_gsum pa ni gzhan don la spro ba'i snying rje can de'i bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir bka' bsgo bya ba ni/_bka' srung gi dpal gtor mgo thog tu bzhag la/_rtsa ba dang brgyud par bcas pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyis ji ltar bka' bsgos shing dam la gnas pas bar chad dang dngos grub phrog par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ma rungs pa rnams mngon spyod kyi las mdzad pa'i dpal mgon dam pa chos skyong ba'i bsrungs ma thams cad dang /_khyad par du dpal sngags kyi bdag mo srog sgrub ma/_gza'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa/_mkha' 'gro snying tig gi gter srung dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas pa khyed rnams kyis/_rigs kyi bu skal ba bzang po 'di la 'go zhing stongs grogs rgya chen po mdzad pas bcol ba'i 'phrin las thams cad lhun gyis grub par mdzod cig_/ces lan gsum brjod la tshogs kyi dga' ba dang /_glu gar bzang po dang /_bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rgya cher brjod do/_/'di ni shin tu gnyan pas legs par brtags la bka' bsgo byed pa yin no/_/dpe 'di nyid chig brgyud ma gtogs pa las tshang bar mi sbyin zhing dbang chog rnams la'ang bum pa gsang ba shes rab ye shes tshig dbang rtsal dbang rnams phyogs cig tu bris te spel zhing /_/gzhan rnams phyogs gcig tu byas te gsang zhing sbas la skal ldan gcig la tshang bar byin no/_/dge ba 'di yis srid pa'i sems can kun/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu rab zhugs te/_/ma lus phyam cig thams cad byang chub nas/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis lhun gyis grub par shog_/gangs ri thod dkar rin chen snying po'i mgul/_/o rgyan rdzong zhes bya ba'i gnas mchog tu/_/rin chen dbang gi phreng ba 'dir bkod pas/_/phyi rabs skal ldan tshogs rnams dga' bar mdzod/_/rin chen dbang gi phreng ba zhes bya ba/_/gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul du me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i ston ka'i tshe pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis bkod pa rdzogs so/_/mang+galaM/_/ba wan+tu//

[6.41 bdag ’jug pad+ma klong yangs]

[·]@#/_/bdag 'jug pad+ma klong yangs bzhugs pa lags so/_/ rin chen shog skya'i skor/ bdag 'jug pad+ma klong yangs zhes bya ba/rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal ldan bde chen gar gyis dgyes mdzad cing /_/gnyis med ye shes du ma'i gang chen mtsho/_/srid zhi'i bde 'byung bde gshegs pad+ma la/_/bdag gzhan dus rnams kun tu phyag 'tshal lo/_/rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rang gzhan don gnyis phun sum tshogs bya'i phyir/_/rang byung pad+ma'i gzhung lugs la brten nas/_/bdag nyid 'jug pa'i rim pa gsal bar bya/_/de la mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dkyil 'khor du dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor las dbang blangs te byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir dben pa'i gnas su rten gyi drung du phyi nang gi mchod pa dang*/_gtor ma gsum dang*/ bum pa gnyis dang /_rdo rje dril bu la sogs pa 'dir dgos pa rnams tshogs par byas la/_bgegs gtor byin nas rnal 'byor la gnas par gsol ba btab nas/_yi ge brgya pas rgyud sbyangs te/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_srung 'khor bsgom pa dang /_bdag nyid bskyed de mchod pa dang /_bstod pa'i bar byas la/_dkyil 'khor gyi drung ngam mtha' bskor gyi mchod pa rnams bdud rtsi'i chus bsang zhing sbyangs te/_nam mkha' gang bar sprul/_rol mo'i sgras byin phab nas/_skad cig gis srung 'khor gyi nang 'byung bzhi rim brtsegs ri rab dang bcas pa yongs su gyur pa las/_gzhal yas khang bskyed pa dang /_ye shes pa gzhug cing mchod bstod byas la/_gtor ma dang po de bla ma dang /_dkyil 'khor lha tshogs gnyis pa gter bdag dam can/_gsum pa mkha' 'gro spyi la phul nas/_rnam rgyal gyi bum par rigs lnga dang /_las thams cad par rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed nas/_bzlas pa tshul bzhin du byas la mchod bstod la sogs pa bya'o/_/de nas rang nyid kun bzang yab yum du gsal btab nas bla ma dang gtso bo tha mi dad pa'i mdun du dbang blangs te/_bla mas mdzad rgyu de rnams des mdzad la/_las kyi bya ba rnams de'i thugs ka nas sprul pa'i kun tu bzang pos mdzad cing /_slob ma'i bya ba rnams rang gis dngos su bya'o/_/de nas maN+Dal phul thal mo sbyar la/_e ma dus gsum rgyal ba kun tu bzang /_/rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dgongs su gsol/_/bdag cag khyed kyi rjes su 'jug_/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro dang /_/so thar byang sems dam tshig rnams/_/thar pa'i grong du 'jug bya'i phyir/_/mgon pos bdag la gnang du gsol/_/zhes pa gsum gyis gsol ba btab pas bla mas/_e ma snod dang ldan pa'i bu//gsang sngags cho ga khyed la bstan/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kyang /_/gsang sngags cho ga 'di mkhyen pas// kun kyang sangs rgyas 'thob pa yin/_/kun bzang rgyal ba rigs lnga yis// bdud kyi dpung yang 'di yis bcom/_/de ltar khyod kyis 'thob bya'i phyir// 'di yi rjes su kun zhugs mdzod/_/ces gnang ba byin nas/_thal mo sbyar te/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dgongs/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang /_/zhi ba chags bral dam pa'i chos rnams dang /_/tshogs mchog 'phags pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la/_/bdag ni gus pas skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/zhes pa gsum dang yang /_kun bzang rigs lnga'i lha tshogs la/_/_/'di bzung bla med byang chub bar/_/gus pa yis ni skyabs su mchi// zhes pa gsum dang yang /_dpa' bo dpa' mo chos skyong bcas/_/byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la/_/bdag ni gus pas skyabs su mchi//_zhes pa gsum dang yang /_bla ma kun bzang spyan snga ru/_/lus ngag yid kyis gzhan rnams la/_/gnod pa las ldog dge ba bsgrub/_/dge tshul dge slong byang chub sems/_/so sor thar ba'i sdom pa la/_/bdag ni rgyun du gnas shing bsrung /_/zhes pa gsum dang yang /_ho bla ma kun bzang dgongs su gsol// 'di bzung byang chub ma thob bar/_/'gro drug sems can thams cad la/_/ma dang bu yi 'du shes kyis/_/_/ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang /_/ma grol dgrol dang dbugs dbyung phyir/_/smon pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do/_/zhes pa gsum dang yang*/_sngon gyi rgyal ba thams cad kyang /_/sdom pa la ni gnas pa ltar/_/'di bzung 'khor ba ma stongs par/_/bla med 'jug pa'i byang chub sems/_/bdag cag rnams kyis bskyed par bgyi/_/pha rol phyin drug slob cing bsgrub/_/brtson 'grus dag gis thams cad bsgral/_/kun don tshul khrims rtag tu bsrung /_/bdag gis sems bskyed sdom bzung nas/_/ma grol dgrol dang ma bsgral bsgral/_/dbugs dbyung mya ngan 'das la 'god// ces pa gsum dang yang /_/'di bzung byang chub snying po'i bar/_/dkon mchog gsum ni mi gtong ngo*/_/rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig tu/_/rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang /_/byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/_/rin chen rigs kyi dam tshig tu/_/sbyin pa rnams bzhi rtag tu gtong /_/pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig tu/_/theg pa gsum gyi chos rnams bshad/_/las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig tu/_/'gro ba'i don la brtson par bya/_/zhes sdom pa byin nas yang*/_/yar mchod gus shing mar la brtse/_/rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig bsrung /_/rtsa ba bzhi las 'da' mi bya/_/_zhes brjod nas slob ma rdo rje sems dpar gsal ba'i gnas gsum dri'i thig le byas la/_o~M badzra pra we sha ho/_zhes dril bu'i sgra res 'jog gis bla ma yi dam char bzhin du babs pas spyi bo nas mar thim par bsam zhing / oM hU~M traM hrIH_aH_dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa rigs lnga'i lhas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing bdud rtsi lce thog tu bzhag go_/_/de nas chos bshad pa ni/_'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag_/u dum wA ra'i me tog bzhin/_/brgya lam na ni re 'ga' zhig_/'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/_/de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/_/gang gis sems can mnyam med don/_/bla med byed par nus pa yin/_/bskal pa bye ba du ma ru/_/sngon du sdig pa gang byas pa/_/dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong ma thag_/de dag zad par 'gyur yin na/_/grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i/_/tshul la gnas na smos ci dgos/_/skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni/_/'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/_/go 'phang bla na med pa 'gyur/_/gang zhig spyod pa mchog 'di la/_/blo gros shin tu mi g.yo na/_/sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung ba yi/_/ ngan 'gro de yis gcod par 'gyur/_/de phyir khyed rnams theg chen du/_/sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/_/theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/_/lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/_khyed rnams der ni dong bas ni/_rang byung skal ba chen po pa/_/'jig rten dag ni mkhyen pa yi/_/go 'phang bla med thob par 'gyur/_/ zhes brjod nas/_yang bla mas/_/_chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/_/ gsal zhing dngas la rnyog pa med/_/gzung du med cing brjod du med/_/rgyu dang las las yang dag byung /_/de bzhin de nyid nges par 'byung /_/bden pa de ni dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma rnams/_/ kun gyis dri med mthong bar shog_/ces lan gsum gyis bden pa'i stobs brjod nas gdong g.yogs bcings te phyi sgo bcad pa'i drung nas gsol ba gdab pa ni/_kye kye khro bo mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/mtshon cha sna tshogs phyag na bsnams/_/bdag cag 'khor ba las bsgral phyir/_khyod kyis gnang ste btang du gsol/_/zhes pa gsum gyis zhus pas/_/nang nas bla mas/_khyed su yin ci byed ces dris pa'i lan du/_bdag ni skal ldan rigs kyi bu lags/_dpal rigs kyi bdag po la dbang zhu/_zhes lan btab nas/ bgegs bskrad de maN+Dal phul la gsol ba gdab pa ni/_kye rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa dang /_/bla ma yi dam DA ki dgongs/_/sgo ba chen po khyed rnams kyis/_/sgo phyi thar pa'i grong bstan 'tshal/_/zhes gsum brjod pas nang du phyin par bsams la/_thal mo sbyar te/_kye bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // dkyil 'khor lha tshogs spangs na ni/_/skyob pa gzhan ni mi mnga' bas/_khyed kyi thugs rjes bdag la stsol/_/zhes brjod pa dang /_bla mas/_e ma khyod ni snod mchog dam pa ste/_khyod 'dod pa ni bdag gis sbyin/_/_zhes pa dang / slob mas/_bdag ni 'bras bu gsang sngags kyi/_/dngos grub bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis/_/_/smin cing grol bar 'dod pas na/_/thugs rjes bdag la gnang bar mdzod/_/ces pa gsum brjod dus/_/bla mas/_e ma e ma rigs kyi bu/_khyed ni las zad 'khrul pa zhig_/rigs kyi bu mchog khyed yin pas/_/ngas khyod kun bzang rigs lnga yi/_/dkyil 'khor 'jug cing ye shes dbab/_/dngos grub thams cad khyod kyis 'thob/_/dngos grub dkyil 'khor 'di dag ni/_/ma mthong ba la smras pa na/_/dam tshig nyams te dmyal bar ltung /_/bsrungs na dngos grub khyed kyis thob/_/dam tshig bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thungs/_/O~M a mr-i ta dam las ma 'da' swA hA/_'o khyod kyi ston pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas nga yin pas/_/ngas bsgo ba las ma 'da' zhig_/ 'das na myur du rdo rje dmyal bar skyes nas thon pa'i dus med do/_/zhes dam tshig bsgrag go_/ye shes pa dbab pa ni/_snying nang du g.yung drung dmar po'i nang du zla ba'i steng du y-i/_yan lag bzhi la/_ha ri ni sa bzhi bsams la/ yaM las rlung byung bas g.yung drung g.yon du 'khor bar bsams la/_gu gul nag po/_bdud rtsi lnga/_byi la'i brun/_zla mtshan/_ra'i nya sha rnams sbyar ba bsregs la/_rol mo'i sgra dang rtsa sngags brjod cing /_/_bla ma dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rang la sib sib thim par bsam mo/_/de nas sgo bzhir rim gyis phyin par mos la/_kye shar sgo srung ba'i sgo ba lcags kyu ma/_/shar gyi sgo 'di phye la ni/_/bdag cag yi dam lha dang spyod/_/kye lho sgo srung ba'i sgo ba zhags pa ma/_/lho yi sgo 'di phye la ni/_/bdag cag yi dam lha dang sprod/ kye nub sgo srung ba'i sgo ba lcags sgrog ma/_/nub kyi sgo 'di phye la ni/_/bdag cag yi dam lha dang sprod/_/kye byang sgo srung ba'i sgo ba dril bu ma/_/_byang gi sgo 'di phye la ni/_/bdag cag yi dam lha dang spyod/_/ces brjod nas me tog thogs la/_kye bde gshegs rigs lnga'i pho brang du/_/'brel ba'i me tog 'di dor bas/_/sngon nas 'brel pa gang yod pa'i/_/yi dam lha dang bdag 'phrad shog_/O~M badzra puSh+pa [(]a[)]sing+g+ha[) ]si ti ste/_zhes me tog dong nas/ bla mas/_ston pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis/_khyed kyi ma rig 'khor ba'i mig_/ye shes spyan du dbye bar bya/_/de bzhin khyod kyis 'gro ba rnams/_/ye shes spyan du 'byed par shog_/\u0f00 tsak+khu swAhA/_zhes pas gdong g.yogs bkrol lo/_/yang /_kye ma rigs kyi bu rnams kun/_khyed rnams sdig pa kun las grol/_/dkyil 'khor chen po 'di la ltos/_/lus ngag yid kyis dad pa bskyed/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/_/dngos grub thams cad khyod kyis 'thob/_/dam tshig sngags la brtson par gyis/_/zhes pas dkyil 'khor bltas te/_bum dbang gi don du/_/maN+Dal phul nas gsol ba gdab pa ni/_/kun bzang yab yum ye shes dbang /_/bdag cag rnams la bskur du gsol/_/zhes pa gsum brjod nas/_shar sgo seng ge'i khri la 'dug par gyur pa la/_me tog gang la phag pa 'di/_/sngon nas khyod kyi yi dam lha/_/rtag tu bsgom dang bsgrub par gyis/_/O~M badzra puSh+pa [(]a[)]sid+d+hi[)]si ti stAM/_zhes pas me tog blangs te gang la phog pa'i lhar bsgom nas/_yang rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa yab yum du bsam pa'i spyi bor oM dkar po las 'od 'phros/_phyogs bcu'i bla ma dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i dngos grub thob par bsam zhing /_bla mas rnam rgyal bum pa bzung bar bsam la/_hUM gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag cing /_/nyon mongs zhe sdang sbyong byed pa'i/_/me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/_/dpal ldan sku yi dbang bskur ro/_/\u0f00 badzra a b+hi Shi'u hA~M/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chu 'di 'thungs shing bkrus pa tsam gyis lus kyi sgrib pa thams cad dag nas 'di nyid du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i dbang thob pa yin no/_khyod kyi gzugs kyi phung po 'di rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du sangs rgyas te/_chu yi khams mA ma kI yi rang bzhin du gnas 'gyur/_zhe sdang me long lta bu'i ye shes su grol te/_sangs rgyas rdo rje rigs kyi sku 'gyur ba med pa thob nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed par gyur cig_/ces brjod do/_/gsung gi dbang ni/_slob ma snang ba mtha' yas dmar por bsam pa'i mgrin par AHlas snga ma bzhin bsam zhing /_bla mas rdo rje bzung nas/_hwa 'du shes phung po rnam dag cing /_/nyon mongs 'dod chags sbyong byed pa'i/_/so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis/_/ dpal ldan gsung gi dbang bskur ro/_/\u0f00 pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsA hrI/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lag tu rdo rje 'di gtad pa tsam gyis ngag gi sgrib pa dag nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang thob pa yin no/_/'du shes kyi phung po snang ba mtha' yas nyid du sangs rgyas te/_me'i khams kyang gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin nyid du gnas/_'dod chags so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes su grol te/_sangs rgyas pad+ma rigs kyi gsung 'gags pa med pa'i chos kyi sgra dbyangs thob nas 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes brjod do/_/ thugs kyi dbang ni/_slob ma rnam snang mthing ga'i thugs kar hUM gis mtshan pa las snga ma bzhin dmigs te bla mas/_hUM rnams shes phung po rnam dag cing /[ · ]nyon mongs gti mug sbyong byed pa'i/_/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/_/dpal ldan thugs kyi dbang bskar ro/_/O~M b+had+h+ya a b+hi Shi& O~M/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod la pad+ma las 'brel rtsal zhes ming btags pa tsam gyis/ 'dir yid kyi sgrib pa dag nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi dbang thob pa yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang rnam par snang mdzad nyid du sangs rgyas te/_nam mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phug mar dag nas/_gti mug chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su grol te/_sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi thugs 'khrul pa med pa chos kyi sku thob nas 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes brjod do/_yon tan gyi dbang ni/ slob ma rin chen 'byung ldan du bsam pa'i lte bar traM las 'od 'phros phyogs bcu'i bla ma dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i dngos grub thob par bsam la/_dbu rgyan bskon par bsam zhing /_hUM tshor ba'i phung po rnam dag cing /_nyon mongs nga rgyal sbyong byed pa'i/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/_dpal ldan yon tan dbang bskur ro//oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa tAM/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod la dbu rgyan 'di bskon pa tsam gyis 'dir lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa dag nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dbang thob pa yin no/_/tshor ba'i phung po rin chen 'byung ldan du sangs rgyas te/_sa'i khams kyang sangs rgyas spyan du dag nas nga rgyal mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su grol te/_sangs rgyas Rin chen rigs kyi yon tan thams cad mkhyen pa thob nas 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes brjod do/_/phrin las kyi dbang ni/_slob ma don grub tu dmigs pa'i gsang bar AHlas 'od 'phros phyogs bcu'i bla ma dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i dngos grub thob par bsam zhing /_bla mas dril bu bzung ste/ hUM 'du byed phung po rnam dag cing /_/nyon mongs phrag dog sbyong byed pa'i/_/bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis/_/dpal ldan phrin las dbang bskur ro/_/\u0f00 karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa A:_'o rigs kyi bu khyod la dril bu 'di gtad pa tsam gyis 'dir lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa ma lus pa dag nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbang thob pa yin no/_/'du byed kyi phung po yang don yod grub par sangs rgyas te/_rlung gi khams dam tshig sgrol mar dag nas/_phrag dog bya ba grub pa'i ye shes su grol te/_sangs rgyas don yod grub pa'i phrin las thogs pa med pa grub nas 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes brjod do/_/kun tu bzang po'i dbang ni/_slob ma kun tu bzang po mthing ga rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin par bsam la/_bla mas rdo rje dril bu bzung ste/_O~M AHhUM/_thabs dang shes rab dbyer med cing*/_/snang stong dbyer med 'di zung la/_/stong nyid snying rje'i snying po yi/_/kun bzang rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis/_/'gro kun rjes su gzung bar gyis/_/'o rigs kyi bu khyod la rdo rje dang dril bu 'di gtad pa tsam gyis/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa bon thebs nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin kun tu bzang po rig pa'i rtsal dbang thob pa yin no/_/rang gi sems skye ba med pa chos kyi skur sangs rgyas te/_'di ltar snang ba thams cad ma spangs gnas su dag nas sku gsum 'du 'bral med pas 'gro ba'i don dpag tu med par 'grub par 'gyur ro//_zhes brjod do/_/chus dbang ni/_bla mas bum pa rang gi spyi bor bzung bar bsam la/_hUM rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das/_/mA ma kI yi phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/_/hUM snang ba mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das/_/gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/ rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/hUM rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/_/kun tu bzang mo'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/hUM rin chen 'byung ldan bcom ldan 'das/_/sangs rgyas spyan ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyis chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/hUM don yod grub pa bcom ldan 'das/_/dam tshig sgrol ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/\u0f00 aHhUM gu ru d+he wa d+hAk+ki ni sid+d+hi pha la hUM/_O~M hU~M traM hrIHaHha ri ni sa a b+hi Shiny+tsa b+haM si ti [((]a[)]sid+d+hi[)] pha la hU~M AH/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod la dbang thams cad brtan par byed pa bum pa'i dbang 'di bskur ba tsam gyis/_snod bcud lha dang gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin phung po khams dang skye mched thams cad lha dang lha mor gyur pa yin pas/_/_phyi nang snod bcud thams cad la brnyas pa byas na ltung bar 'gyur bas dag snang dang mos gus gyis la mchod pa dang bstod pa la dga' bas lha'i rang bzhin du ngo shes par gyis shig_/ces brjod la bum chu cung zad 'thungs pa dang khrus bya'o/_/de nas brda'i dbang ni/_bla mas 'o rigs kyi bu khyod la rigs lnga'i sku bstan pa tsam gyis ye shes lnga'i ngo bor sangs rgyas pa yin gyis/_rigs lnga'i sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las lhun gyis grub pa'i dgongs pa rtogs nas sems can gyi don rlabs po che byed par 'gyur ro//_zhes brda bstan par bya'o/_/don gyi dbang ni bla mas/[ · ]'o rigs kyi bu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang sems can gnyis kyang rang gi rig pa'i don las logs na ma grub pas/_lus sems gnyis kyi 'byung ba dang /_khams dang skye mched thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rigs lnga yab yum du lhun gyis grub pas sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs par yid ches par gyis shig_/ces ngo shes shing dran par bya'o/_/de nas dam tshig gi dbang ni/_/_bdud rtsi lce la bzhag nas/_bla mas e ma rigs kyi bu nyon cig_/thun mong skyabs 'gro nas brtsams pa'i/_so thar byang sems bslab bya dang /_/rig 'dzin sngags kyi dam tshig kun/_/byang chub ma thob bar du ni/_/srog gi phyir yang ma gtong zhig_/dam tshig nyam na bskal pa ru/_/ngan song gsum nas thar mi srid/_/_/de phyir srungs shig rigs kyi bu/_/zhes brjod pas don dran par bya'o/_/des ni lam bskyed rim bsgom pa la dbang ba dang /_lus kyi sdig pa dag nas sangs rgyas kyi sku'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje dril bu la sogs pa dam tshig gi rdzas rnams brten zhing byams pa dang snying rjes 'gro ba la phan par bya'o/_/zhes bla mas gdams par bsam mo/_/de nas gsang dbang gi don du/_dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs su 'dug par bsams nas maN+Dal phul te/_yid kyis bla ma la rig ma phul la/_e ma ho lha mo bde ba che/_/bde chen pad+ma he ru ka_/bde gshegs rnams kyi bde chen yab/_/bde ba'i dbang phyug bde stsol mdzod/_/byang chub sems ni yang dag don/_/rnam dag mchog ni yang dag pa'i/_/dri med bdud rtsi [(<]a[> ]gang ba[)]dam pa yis/_/bla med mchog gi dbang bskur ltar/_/de bzhin rigs kyi bu dag la/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun bsal mdzod/_/ dri med ye shes bdud rtsi yis/_/ma rig nyes pa'i dri ma 'joms/_/bla med byang chub bde chen nyid/_/dus 'dir bdag gis thob mdzod cig_/ces phul ba'i rjes la/_gdong g.yogs bcings la rdo rje phag moRa skad cig gis gsal ba'i lte bar chos 'byung sum brtsegs kyi dbus su phag mo tshon gang ba gcig bsgoms te rol mo'i sgras rtsa sngags zlos shing ye shes phab nas/ gdang g.yogs phye la bla mas/_'byung ba'i gdang las grub pa yi/_/lus 'di bde gshegs pho brang nyid/_/rigs lnga yab yum lnga yi gnas/_/phung khams skye mched lha yi sku/_/_zhes pas lhar nges shes bskyed nas/_/me tog phog pa'i lha lus la ngo sprad la/_bdud rtsi'i ril bu lce thog tu bzhag nas/_dbang dngos bskur ba/_kye ma kye ma rigs kyi bu/_/dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi ni/_/byang chub sras po dam pa la/_/ji ltar dbang ni bskur ba ltar/_/de bzhin gsang ba'i byang sems kyis/_/da lta khyod la dbang bskur ro/_/\u0f00 gu ru d+he wa DA ki ni ha ri ni sa tsa hri ya b+ho ng+hi tsit+ta a mr-i te sarba pany+tsa a b+hi Shi'u maM/ zhes pa gsum gyis lus thams cad bde stong du gsal btab nas bla mas/ e ma skal ldan rigs kyi bu/_/bde dang stong pa dbyer med pa/_/de nyid ltos dang ngos bzung bral/_/rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i ngang /_/thams cad ro mnyams bde chen nyid/_/ces pa gsum gyis ngo sprad la/_rjes su/_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/gsang ba'i dam tshig gnyan po 'di/_/ye shes sgrub rdzas bdud rtsi lnga/_/dmar chen ga pur tsan+dan sbyar/_/rdo rje chu yis kun tu bsre/_/dus gsum rgyal ba kun mthun mtshungs/_/'di dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga/_/_rgyun du yang dang yang du brten/_/'di ni dam tshig bla na med/_/ma nyams skal ldan khyod kyis srungs/_/zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi don du maN+Dal phul nas/_nub phyogs su 'dug par mos la gsol ba gdab pa/_kye kye bcom ldan bde chen chos kyi dbyings/_/ rnal 'byor rdo rje mi phyed bdag_/yang dag phyag rgya sgrub pa po/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor las ni byung /_/bdag nyid chen po kun bdag nyid/_/mnga' dbang bdag la'ang de nyid stsol/_/_/nyon mongs 'khor ba'i 'dam du ni/_/bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs/_/zhes pa gsum brjod nas bla mas/_e ma gsang ba shes rab ye shes kyi/_/dam tshig bsrung bya sems la chongs//bud med mi spang dang du blang /_/tshangs spyod don la gnas par bya/_/_/yon tan thams cad 'di las 'byung /_/'di spangs bde ba'i dngos grub med/_/ nyams pa mkha' 'gro'i chad pa yis/_/tshe 'phos dmyal ba dag tu ltung / zhes pa gsum gyis dam tshig byin nas/_slob mas/_shi'am srog la bab gyur tam/_bya dga' chen po nyid byung yang /_/dam tshig bka' las 'da' mi byed/_/sa ma ya na ra kan/_zhes pa gsum brjod nas/_ye shes dbab pa ni/ thams cad rdo rje phag mor bsgoms la/_bla ma'i thugs ka nas rdo rje phag mo phra mo mang po byung ba slob ma'i snying nang du thim par bsam zhing rol mo dkrol nas/_gdong g.yogs phye la bla mas/_dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /_/b+ha ga'i dbyings nas rang byung ste/_/chos rnams kun gyi 'byung gnas nyid/_/b+ha ga gsang sngags kun gyi gnas/_/bde chen ye shes 'byung ba yin/_/'di nyid ma brten thabs gzhan med/_/thabs kyi rgyud kyis grol ba yin/_/bde chen 'di brten bde ba thob/_/yang dag sangs rgyas 'di las byung /_/bud med tsam la khro ba spangs/_/mtshan ldan yum la gus par gyis/_/ zhes brjod pas/_yum gyis/_hUM nga yi b+ha ga gsang chen 'di/_/gang zhig mos pas sus brten pa/_/_/yon tan dngos grub thams cad 'byung /_/bde stong mchog gi dngos grub thob/_/O~M gu ru d+he wa DA ki ni ha ri ni sa ra tsa hri ya any+dza li hoH_zhes brjod par bsams nas/_bla mas slob ma la gtad pa/_hU~M ye shes lha mo bde ba'i sku/_/kun tu bde ba'i gnas sbyin ma/_/dga' bas gzugs mdzes yid 'ong ma/_/'di khyed dpa' bo sems dpa' che/_/rtag tu gus pas mchod par gyis/_/\u0f00 mahA su kha hoH_zhes brjod nas/_snyoms par zhugs par bsams te bla mas/_e ma skal ldan rigs kyi bu/_/bde stong gnyis med don de la/_/_der 'dzin ma byed ngo la ltos/_/gnyis shor gnyis mnyam dus 'di ru/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'char/_/de ni de yis zin par mdzod/_/ces brjod nas yang*/_/e ma skal ldan rigs kyi bu/_/des ni dag phyag gang dag na/_/_nyon mongs yid kyi sgrib pa dag_/las kyi phyag rgya brten par dbang /_/skal pa sa bcu dag dang mnyam/_/'phrin las dbang gi las rnams 'grub/_/_'bras bu skye med chos sku thob/_/ces brjod do/_/de nas tshig dbang rin po che'i don du byang nas maN+Dal phul bar bsams la gsol ba gdab pa ni/_kye kye dus gsum bla ma rje/_/yang dag ye shes ngo bo nyid/_/rig pa'i ngo bo ye shes la/_/bdag nyid nges pa'i shes pa skye/_/gnyis med ye shes mchog de nyid/_/'gro gzhan dag la yod pa min/_/dam chos bdud rtsi'i mchog 'di nyid/_/'thung phyir bdag gi bla ma la/_/gus pa'i yid kyis gsol ba 'debs/_/gal te don thal bdag gis 'tshal/_/rnam pa kun tu mchog gyur pa'i/_/bzhi pa'i dbang bskur bdag la stsal/_/zhes pa gsum brjod pa dang /_bla mas/[ \u0f00] AHhUM hrIHma/_bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig ni/_/thams cad ro snyoms chos nyid ngang /_/'khor 'das spang blang bral ba yi/_/gang shar chos nyid rol pa la/_/ma rig 'dzin pas ma bslad srungs/ 'das na 'khor ldog na ra kan/_/zhes brjod nas/_slob ma'i smin phrag tu g.yung drung dmar po 'khor ba la dmigs shing /_/bla ma yi dam sprin phung gtibs pa tsam thim par bsams nas/_dar cig mnyam par gzhag go_/de nas nam mkha'i phyogs bzhir slob mas rim par blta zhing bla mas/_e ma e ma rigs kyi bu/_/mig rtse nam mkha'i shar du ltos/_/shar gyi bar snang dag la ni/_/thogs pa med pa 'gro bar sgoms/_/kye ma kye ma rigs kyi bu/_/ mig rtse nam mkha'i lho dang nub/_/byang du bltas te 'gro bar sgoms/_/'gro bar bsams na 'gro mkhan med/_/gang du 'gro bsam phyin pa med/_/'gro bar bsam pa rang gi sems/_/sems ni mtha' bral stong pa yin/_/zhes pa dang yang /_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/sems ni dang po gang nas byung /_/ rgyu rkyen ci las byung ba ltos/_/zhes pa dang yang /_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod nyon/_/rtsa ba bral ba'i sems nyid la/_/gdod nas ma skyes dngos po med/ kha dog dbyibs med ngos gzung med/_/gang nas ma byung song ba med/_/da ltar mi gnas rgyu rkyen med/_/'di nyid sems kyi gnas lugs te/_/brjod du med par shes par gyis/_/zhes pa dang /_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/ rgyal ba'i sku gzugs 'di la ltos/_/rgyan dang cha lugs du mar snang /_/snang bar 'dzin pa rang gi sems/_/de la ltos dang gzhi rtsa bral/_/de bzhin yid yul snang ba'i gzugs/_/yul nyid gsal la mkhan pos stong /_/de ni gsal stong chos sku yin/_/zhes pa dang yang /_e ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/ 'di yi sgra ni snyan mi snyan/_/legs par thos sam ngo bor ltos/_/sgra ru 'dzin pa rang gi sems/_/sems ni grags stong chos kyi sku/_/de la ltos dang gzhi rtsa bral/_/_de bzhin sgra ru grags pa kun/_/sna tshogs thos kyang ngo bos stong /_/gsal por grags kyang rang bzhin stong /_/ngos gzung ma rnyed gzhi rtsa bral/_/de ni grags stong chos sku yin/_/zhes pa dang yang /_e ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/_spos dang sman sogs dri zhim dang /_/de bzhin dri mi zhim snom la/_/dga' dang mi dga' skyes pa'i sems/_/de nyid ngo la tshur ltos dang /_/de yi ngo bo ci 'dra zhig_/brtags pas ma rnyed rgyu mtshan med/_/gnyis 'dzin shes pa glo bur yin/_/rkyen phyir snang yang ngo bos stong /_/zhes pa dang yang /_e ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/bza' btung ro mchog myong bar gyis/_/mngar skyur lan tshwa tsha kha bska/_/ro drug myong ba'i mkhan por ltos/_/ bltas pas me rnyed skye ba med/_/mtha' bral dbu ma spros bral dang*/_/rang grol chos skur shes par mdzod/_/ces pa dang yang /_e ma rigs kyi bu khyod la/_/reg la dgag sgrub bskyed pa'i sems/_/de la gnyis 'dzin gang byung yang /_/rnam pa gsal la rang bzhin stong /_/ngo bo med la gzhi rtsa bral/_/ye nas stong gsal chos sku yin/_/zhes pa dang yang /_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/rang gi sems la tshur ltos dang /_/dgag sgrub bde sdug cig shar yang /_/gsal la ngo bo rig stong yin/_/dper na chu zla ji bzhin no/_/zhes pa dang yang /_/_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod la/_/nyon mongs sna tshogs ci skyis kyang /_/me long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/sems la snang yang ngos gzung med/_/nyon mongs gzhi med rtsa ba bral/_kha dog dbyibs med ngos gzung med/_/gdod nas ma skyes chos sku yin/_/nyon mongs rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/sems las byung zhing sems su nub/_/skyes dang grol mnyam rba rlabs bzhin/_/phra rags sems dang rnam rtog kun/_/_/ye stong gzhi med rtsa bral yin/_/_/de ltar rtog pa'i mtshang rtogs na/_/_/gnyen po spang blang med par grol/_/ces brjod cing /_chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo gsal gdab bo/_/rjes ni yang bla mas/_e ma skal ldan rigs kyi bu/_/stong gsal chos sku'i dbang thob pa/_/_/des ni dag bya gang dag na/_/lus ngag yid gsum sdig sgrib dag_/gsum ka'i nus pa tshad du phyin/_/brtan bya bde sdug spang blang bral/_/rjes su dbyer med bsgom par gnad/_/sa ni bcu gcig kun tu 'od/_/'phrin las bzhi pa mngon du gyur/_/'bras bu sku lnga lhun grub thob/_/ ces brjod pa dang /_/_maN+Dal phul la/_deng nas brtsams te bdag gis ni/_/lus dang longs spyod dngos kun gyis/_/dpal ldan bla ma khyed mchod kyis/_/khyed kyi rjes su gzung bar mdzod/_/ces pas gtang rag phul nas/ des 'dus pa rnams la tshogs kyi dga' bas mnyes par byas te/_ma 'byor pa dang nyams pa dang /_/gang yang bdag rmongs blo yis ni/_/bgyis pa dang ni bgyid stsal ba/_/de kun mgon pos bzod par mdzod/_/bdag dang sems can thams cad ma lus kun/_/kun tu bzang po rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/ma lus phyam cig thams cad lhun grub nas/_/bde gshegs rnams dang skal pa mnyam par shog_/ces dngos dang ras bris la sogs pa brtan par gyur pa mi gshegs par/_/tshom bu la sogs pa'i lha dang mgron rnams ni/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzod/_/rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/_/sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang /_/slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/_O~M badzra mus ye shes pa gshegs/_dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa dam tshig pa bdag la thim par bsams la/_O~M AHhU~M gis sku gsung thugs bsrungs te/ lhag ma'i gtor ma dang /_rdo rje'i glu dang /_bkra shis brjod par bya'o/_/chos tshul 'di ni zab yangs rgya mtsho'i sprin/_/skal ldan skye bo'i phun tshogs sgrub byed yin/_/gang 'dir snying ga 'od kyi pad+ma la/_/bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer phog pa yis/_/byams dang snying rje'i 'dab ma rab rgyas te/_/dad ldan rkang drug nyer 'tsho'i longs spyod du/_/pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis legs par bkod/_/dge ba 'di yis bdag dang 'gro ba kun/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu rab bzhugs te/_/sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa yis/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis lhun gyis grub par shog_/ston gsum me tog 'bras bur smin pa'i tshe/_/gangs ri thod dkar rin chen snying po'i mgul/_/'phags pa'i ri ngogs dben zhing nyams dga' bar/_/pad+ma klong yangs rab tu rgyas pa yis/_/lha dang drang srong mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dang /_/blo gsal sbrang rtsir spyod rnams dga' bar mdzod/_/bdag 'jug pad+ma klong yangs zhes bya ba/_/ o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma yab yum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis/_gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul o rgyan rdzong gi gnas mchog dam par ston gyi tshe me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i dus su bkod pa'o/_/phyogs dus kun tu bde chen gyi char bskal pa rdzogs ldan gyi dus su nye bar gnas pa bzhin 'bab par shog cig_/shub+haM//_// bka' drin rjes dran/ skabs 'dir yang ring mo nas rnam dkar gyi bya ba la ches goms pa'i dad ldan/_sgang mkhar a gnam tshang khyim mi rnam pa'i bdag rkyen la brten nas/ kun mkhyen chen po'i gsung rab ji rnyed kun phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs te/_ngo mtshar par gyi phyi mor bskrun pa'i legs byas la rjes su yi rang drags pos thugs rje che zhu ba dang chabs cig_/'di las thob pa'i dge ba'i mthus sbyin bdag 'khor bcas gnas skabs nyer 'tshe zhi zhing mthar thug rnam byang bla med 'thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig_/ dge bsngo dang smon lam/ bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/_/ thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/_/ skye rga na 'chi'i rba rlabs 'khrugs pa yi/_/ srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba sgrol bar shog_/ ces dge bsngo'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa 'di/_ston pa'i skyes rabs las btus so/_/ dpe skrun pa/_rgyal mo 'brug pa/ dpe sgrig 'gan 'khur pa/_tshangs po/ mdun shog mdzes 'god pa/_'gro 'dul rdo rje/ mes po'i shul bzhag las/ deb brgya dang bcu gcig pa/ @#/_/kun mkhyen klong chen rab 'byams kyi gsung 'bum bzhugs so/_/ [(]6[/]26[)] dpal brtsegs bod yig dpe rnying zhib 'jug khang gis bsgrigs/ krung go'i bod rig pa dpe skrun khang gis bskrun te bkram/ pe cin kong dbyi par 'debs tshad yod kung sis dpar btab/ spyi lo 2009_lo'i zla 12par par gzhi dang po bsgrigs/ spyi lo 2009lo'i zla 12par par thengs dang po btab/ dpar grangs/_0001[— ]1500 [ISBN978—7—80253—210—6/B75] gsung 'bum cha tshang [( ]deb 1[ – ]26yod [) ]la rin sgor/_66 0 @#/_/kun mkhyen klong chen rab 'byams kyi gsung 'bum bzhugs so/_/ [(]7[/]26[)] dpal brtsegs bod yig dpe rnying zhib 'jug khang nas bsgrigs/ krung go'i bod rig pa dpe skrun khang*/

[7.1 tshogs mchod rgya mtsho’i sprin]

@#/_/shog skya'i skor las/_tshogs mchod rgya mtsho'i sprin bzhugs so/_/ tshogs mchod rgya mtsho'i sprin zhes bya ba/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho'i snying po las/_/rgyal ba'i sprin tshogs thugs rje'i glog phreng can/_/phan bde'i char gyis 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa/_/dngos grub mtha' yas rnyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dus gsum rgyal ba 'khor bcas mchod pa dang*/_/bgegs dang log 'dren bar chad zhi ba dang*/_/tshe ring nad med 'dod dgu bsgrub bya'i phyir/_/tshogs mchod rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis mnyes par bgyi/_/de'ang dben zhing yid shin tu dwangs pa'i gnas su/_bris sku'am me tog gi tshom bu la sogs pa bkod pa'i drung du/_phyi nang gi mchod pa dang /_tshogs dang gtor ma'i yo byad rgya cher bshams la/_las kyi slob mas tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs dang bcas pa la/_maN+Dal dang me tog phul nas phyag 'tshal te/_ho dgongs su gsol/_rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa kun tu bzang po'i pho brang /_lha dang lha mo'i sprin phung gis gang ba 'dir/_bla ma rdo rje slob dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas par zhu 'tshal/_zhes gsol ba gdab bo/_/de nas bgegs la gtor ma byin nas skad cig gis khro bo rta mgrin 'jigs par bsams te/_hUM nyon cig bgegs dang logs 'dren tshogs/_/'di ru ma 'dug gzhan du dengs/_/nga yi bka' las 'das gyur na/_/thal ba'i rdul bzhin brlag par 'gyur/_/O~M badzra kro ta h+ya g+hi ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ces brjod cing gu gul gyi dud pa dang rol mo'i sgra cher bsgrags pas/bgegs thams cad phyi'i rgya mtsho'i mthar byer ste/_me ri 'bar bas mtshams bcad nas bskal ba'i bar mi thar bar bsam mo/_/de nas skad cig gis steng 'og phyogs mtshams thams cad rdo rje'i rwa ba gur bla bre ye shes kyi me ri me phung gis 'khrigs par bsams la/_hUM ye nas ma skyes rdzogs pa che/_/_khyab gdal mi dmigs chos sku dag pa las/_/_/rdo rje ra ba bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar/_/rab 'jigs khro bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir/_/rdo rje phra men sgo skyong chen mo bzhis/_/rang bzhin gdod nas dag pa'i mtshams chod cig_/oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/_g+hi h+'a g+hi cA hUM/_g+hi t+na pa ya g+hi t+na pa ya hU~M/_a na ya ho/_b+ha ga wAn/_b+hid+ya ra tsa ya hUM phaT/_ces brjod la dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor ba'i gzhal yas khang /_khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por skad cig gis wal gyis gsal ba'i ngang las skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_sems bskyed la/_/\u0f00 swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha sarba d+harmaswa b+hA wa shud+ho&haM_chos sku ma skyes mnyam pa chen po las/_/'byung bzhi rim brtsegs nyi zla pad+ma'i steng /_/b+haM las bde gshegs zhi ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/sgo bzhi gru bzhi rtsigs pa lnga dang ldan/_/rta babs bzhi dang 'khor lo rgyal mtshan gdugs/_/rgyan rnams yongs rdzogs mchod pa'i lha mos mdzes/_/de dbus bde gshegs rigs lnga yab yum dang /_sems dpa' sems ma sgo ma yab yum bzhi/_/thub pa drug rnams snang la rang bzhin med/_/nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/de steng khro bo'i zhing khams snang ba ni/_/'jigs gzugs mi bzad bskal ba'i me dpung khro/_/kun kyang yab yum rgyan rnams rdzogs pa la/_/mtshan dang dpe byad 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro/_/O~M badzra sa ma ya dzaH_nam mkha'i dkyil nas zhi khro'i gzhal med khang /_/rang bzhin lhun gyis grub par rab byon te/_/bdag la gnyis su med par thim par gyur/_dzaHhUM bo hoH_phyi dang nang kun 'og min dag pa'i zhing /_/_/thams cad rnam dag lha dang lha mo'i ngang /_/skye med lhun rdzogs 'od gsal chen po la/_/bdag gzhan ma lus ngang gis gnas par gyur/_/ces bdag dang snod bcud thams cad lha dang lha mor gsal gdab bo/_/de nas skad cig gis mdun gyi nam mkhar bla ma dang zhi khro dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/_bsod nams kyi zhing spyan drang pa ni/_hU~M chos sku mnyam pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang /_/gzugs sku rang snang 'od gsal thugs rje'i lha/_/kun bzang yab yum rigs lnga rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje sems dpa' dga' rab rdo rje dang /_/shr-i sid+ha pad+ma thod phreng rtsal/_/mkhar chen mtsho rgyal rigs bzhi mkha' 'gro dang*/_/rdo rje phag mo 'khor dang bcas dgongs gter zab mo'i srung mar bka' bsgos pa/_srog sgrub la pa dang / sogs dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs/_/ma lus 'khor bcas gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol/_/gzhan yang snang srid 'khoRa 'das 'jig rten na/_/ gang bzhugs sangs rgyas sems can ji snyed pa/_/bsod nams zhing la dus 'dir spyan 'dren gyi/_/dgyes pa chen pos gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol/_/zhes pas/_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad skad cig gis byon nas/_sngar gyi dam tshig pa dang gnyis su med pa la gdan dbul zhing bzhugs su gsol ba ni/ hUM/_gnas lnga ye shes lhun grub dkyil 'khor du/_/thabs dang shes rab pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan/_/seng ge glang chen rta mchog rma bya sogs/_/mdzes shing yid 'ong bshams pa'i gdan steng du/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dang*/_/mkha' 'gro dam can rgya mtshos bzhugs su gsol/_/oM pad+ma tsan+d+ra sur+ya ma d+ha la ka ma la ye stAM/_zhes pas bzhugs par bsams la phyag 'tshal ba ni/_hUM/_dus gsum bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/_/ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la/_/nam mkha'i mtha' khyab bdag gi lus sprul te// lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes yid kyis phyag byas te/ so so'i mtshan nas brjod cing /_sarba pany+tsa a mr-i tas bdud rtsir mchod pa tsam phul/_tshogs mchod byin gyis brlab pa ni/_bdud rtsi'i bsang chu yo byad kun la gtor la/_swa b+hA was stong par sbyangs pa'i ngang las/_yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/_raM las me'i phung po 'bar ba'i mthar/_kai las thod pa'i sgyed po ri rab dang mnyam pa gsum gyi steng du/_a las tshogs gtor gyi snod thod pa dum bu gcig pa/_phyi dkar ba/_nang dmar ba/_dpral ba rang la bsten pa'i nang du tshogs kyi yo byad rnams sha lnga bdud rtsi lngar gyur te/_snod stong gsum dang mnyam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i nang khengs par gyur pa'i steng du/_a las zla ba'i kha gcod kyi dbus su/_rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i yu ba/[ \u0f00] AHhU~M gi lte ba dang /[ \u0f00] hA~M traM hrIH_aHsa rwa rnams mtshan par gyur/_rang gi thugs ka'i hUM las 'od zer 'phros/_yaM la phog_/yaM las rlung g.yos/_me sbar te/_thod pa'i bdud rtsi khol ba'i rlangs pa'i yi ge lnga la phog pas rigs lnga yab yum du gyur te/_snyoms par zhugs pa'i sbyor mtshams nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'babs pa'i rdo rje'i khong seng na mar song ste thod pa'i nang ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang /_lte ba'i O~M AHhUM las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i bla ma dang yi dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pa snyoms par zhugs pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun thod pa'i nang na mar babs pas ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis khengs/_zla ba'i kha chod rdo rje dang bcas pa yang 'od du zhu nas thod pa'i bdud rtsi dang gnyis su med par 'dres par bsam mo//de nas mchod pa la bdun las/_dang po phyi'i mchod pa rnams rgyas pa'am re zhig bsdus pas/_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro la/_/mdzes pa'i me tog rgyan gyis mchod/_/dri zhim bdug spos shangs la mchod/_/snang gsal mar me spyan la mchod/_/zhal zas ro mchog ljags la mchod/_/_yid 'ong dri mchog thugs kar mchod/_/rol mo sil snyan snyan la mchod/_/_'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/_/O~M badzra puSh+pa d+ha pe A lo ke g+han+te nai wi d+ya shab+ta AHhU~M/ gnyis pa nang gi mchod pa ni/_/bla ma bde gshegs mkha' 'gro ma/_/ dbang po rnam lnga'i me tog mchod/_/gsur chen dri yi bdug spos mchod/_/ zhun chen snang gsal mar mes mchod/_/rdo rje dri chu'i byug pas mchod/_/rdo rje dri chen zhal zas mchod/_/rkang gling thod pa'i rol mos mchod/_/byang sems dkar dmar bdud rtsis mchod/_/dug lnga ye shes lnga ru mchod/_/dug gsum sku gsung thugs su mchod/_/snang srid phyag rgya bzhi ru mchod/_/'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU~M hrIHthA/_gsum pa gsang ba'i mchod pa ni/_/_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro la/_/yab yum gnyis med mkha' gsang las/_/'khril sbyor byang chub sems kyis mchod/_/bde ba'i ro mnyam mchod par bzhes/_/\u0f00 AHhU~M hrIHthA/_bzhi pa de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa ni/_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro la/_/bde gsal rig pa ye shes dang /_/snang ba sna tshogs thams cad kun/_/bde stong gsal stong rig pa stong /_/mi rtogs rang bzhin snang bas stong /_/ye shes lnga ldan ngang du bzhes/_/\u0f00 AHhU~M hrI:thA/_lnga pa bdud rtsi'i mchod pa ni/_bla ma bde gshegs mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams la//rtsa brgyad stong sbyar bdud rtsi a mr-i ta/_/dug lnga gnas gyur ye shes sgrub pa'i rdzas//ro mchog yon tan kun dang ldan pas mchod//oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/_/_drug pa gtor ma'i mchod pa ni/_/_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro la/_/gtor ma'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni/_/zhal zas sna tshogs gtor chen la/_/sha lnga bdud rtsis rgyan dang ldan/_/dri dang ro mchog ldan pas mchod/_/\u0f00 gu ru d+he ba DA ki ni ha ri ni sa ra tsa hri ya e daM g+hi na b+ha li ta/_kha kha khA hi khA hi/_zhes pas spyir phul nas/_bla ma yi dam bka' srung so so'i mtshan re re nas brjod cing*/_b+ha liM ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/_zhes pa lnga'am/ bdun gyis mchod pas dgyes shing rol bar bsam/_/_bdun pa tshogs kyi mchod pa ni/_tshogs phud gtor mar bran la/_kun bzang yab yum zhi khro rab 'byams tshogs/_/dus gsum bde gshegs rig 'dzin bla ma dang /_/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma yab yum la/_/bde chen tshogs kyi mchod pa dam pa 'bul/_/mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsal du gsol/_/sku gsung thugs kyi nyams chag bskang gyur cig_/_/rdo rje phag mo bde gshegs rigs kyi yum/_/mkha' 'gro sde lnga so so'i sprin tshogs dang /_/srog sgrub la sogs dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs/_/sngon tshe slob dpon pad+ma'i spyan snga ru/_/snying tig bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa/_/'jig rten las grub ye shes tshogs bcas dang*/_/rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong lha srid brgyad/_/yul lha gzhi bdag 'dir 'dus mgron rnams la/_/_/zhal zas tshogs kyi mchod pas thugs dam bskang /_/dgyes mdzad sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol/_/mi mthun rkyen rnams ma lus bzlog pa dang /_rnal 'byor bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub par mdzod/_/\u0f00 AHhU~M gu ru d+he wa DA ki ni \u0f00 hU~M traM hrIHaH_/baM laM raM yaM e ha ri ni sa ra tsa hri ya shr-i ma hA ka li ma ma rag mo/_ya ma ra tsa du tri phu tri/ g+ha na tsakra pUtsA kha kha khA hi/_ma hA su ra ta khA hi/_ma hA maM sa khA hi/_ma hA rak+ta khA hi/_ma hA tsit+ta khA hi/_ma hA go ro tsan khA hi/_ma hA ba su ta khA hi/_ma hA ba liM ta khA hi/_si ta pha la AH hUM/_zhes rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pas mchod do/_/de nas bstod pa ni/_hUM/ngang nyid ma skyes chos sku dag pa las/_skye ba'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston mdzad pa/_/bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dang /_/dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ces brjod la/ bshags pa bya ba ni/_hUM dus gsum bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/_/ dbang gyur dam can rgya mtsho dgongs su gsol/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro yab yum chos kyi sku/_/ye nas bdag dang dbye ba med pa las/_/ma rig dbang gis bdag gzhan gnyis su snang /_/gnyis 'dzin the tshom log lta ci bgyis pa/_/ngang dang rig pa'i klong du mthol lo bshags/_/bzod par bzhes nas tshangs pa'i dngos grub stsol/_/_hUM/rdo rje DAk+ki gtso 'khor yab yum bcas/ /sum brgya drug cu gsan cing dgongs su gsol/_/lta ba ma rtogs log dang rtogs brdzus dang /_kha lta bdud dbang song dang log par bltas/ /yid dpyod mtha' bral klong du mthol lo bshags/_/_hUM/rin chen DA ki yab yum gtso 'khor bcas/_/yab yum bcu drug gsan cing dgongs su gsol/_/mnyam gzhag ting 'dzin don las g.yel gyur te/_/_ma gsal ma rig bskyed rdzogs don ma bsgoms/_/gsal stong bde chen ngang du mthol lo bshags/_/_hU~M/pad+ma DA ki yab yum gtso 'khor bcas/_/yab yum drug cu rtsa bzhi gsan cing dgongs su gsol/_/dus la ma babs spyod pa chos dang 'gal/_/ma rig dbang gis log par ci spyad pa/_/dmigs med shar grol klong du mthol lo bshags/_/_hUM/_sangs rgyas DA ki yab yum gtso 'khor bcas/_/yab yum sum cu rtsa gnyis gsan cing dgongs su gsol/_/yang dag don gyi gnas lugs ma shes te/_/the tshom dbang gis 'bras bu'i don dang 'gal/_/re dogs mtha' bral klong du mthol lo bshags/_/hUM las kyi DA ki yab yum gtso 'khor bcas/_/yab yum nyi shu rtsa brgyad gsan cing dgongs su gsol/_'phrin las rnam bzhi'i bsrung don ma shes pas/_/bya ba kun la log pa ci bgyis pa/_/kun mkhyen gsal ba'i klong du mthol lo bshags/_/hUM ke'u ri ma brgyad sid+ha phra men brgyad/_sgo ma bzhi dang dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad/_/lang ka brgyad dang ma bdun sring mo bzhi/_/ging chen bcos brgyad pho nya drug cu bzhi/_/bstan ma bcu gnyis 'jig rten pa la sogs/_/kun gyi thugs dang 'gal bar ci gyur pa/_/phyi nang gsang mchod bdud rtsi gtor tshogs dang /_/lta sgom spyod pa'i ting 'dzin thugs dam bskang /_/thugs dam bskang zhing nyams bshags dngos grub zhu/_/bdag cag ma rig lus ngag yid sems kyis/_/bag med tshul gyis dam las 'gal gyur pa/_/_/zhal zas tshogs gtoRa mchod pas so soRa bshags/_/ bdag gis bcol ba'i 'phrin las grub par mdzod/_/ces pa dang /_yi ge brgya pa brjod nas/_'phrin las bskul ba ni/_b+tso gnas lnga ye shes gzhal yas nas/_/rigs lnga'i mkha' 'gro dpag med tshogs/_/ye shes lnga ldan dug lnga 'joms/_/spyan gsum gdangs mig dgra la lta/_/_/zhal nas ngan sngags dgra la sgrogs/_/shangs nas nad kyi 'tshubs ma 'thor/_/gtor tshogs mchod pa 'di bzhes la/_/_dgra bgegs rang bzhin dbyings su sgrol/_/b+h+yoH rab 'jigs dur khrod nag mo'i gling /_/rdo rje phag mo yab yum bzhugs/_/dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'di gsol la/_/rnam rtog dgra bgegs dbyings su sgrol/_/mkha' dbyings bde ba chen po nas/_/rigs lnga'i mkha' 'gro dpag med tshogs/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan sna tshogs te/_/rgyan cha mang po pu ru ru/_/sil snyan mang po si li li/_/rkang pa rdo rje'i sgeg 'gros can/_/ mkha' la thogs med bun nu nu/_/lag pa gser gyi gdu bu can/_/glu len gar byed khyugs se khyug_/phrin las sna tshogs las mdzad ma/_/gtor tshogs mchod pa 'di bzhes la/_/'dod dgu'i 'phrin las thogs med sgrubs/_/hUM yul gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi nas/_/dpa' bo dpa' mo nyi shu bzhi/_/mkha' 'gro bye ba'i 'khor dang bcas/_/gtso mo mi mngon dbyings na bzhugs/_/'khor gyi mkha' 'gro bye ba 'bum/_/la la bud med rgan mo la/_/ro shun rnyings pa'i na bza' gsol/_khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan/_/la la bud med gzhon nu ma/_/bcu drug gzugs mdzes lang tsho rgyas/_/snyan pa'i gla len yid 'phrog ma/_/la la bud med tha mal gzugs/_/'jig rten spyod pa sna tshogs byed// la la sgyur byed tshos mkhan mo/_/la la myos byed chang 'tshong ma/_/la la sbyor byed smad 'tshong ma/_/la la dag byed khrus mkhan mo/_/la la gsod byed shan pa mo/_/la la dka' thub bram ze mo/_/la la phrog byed chom rkun mo/_/de la sogs te mtha' yas rnams/_/gtor tshogs mchod pa 'di bzhes la/_/nad gdon gnod pa bzlog pa dang /_/bsam pa'i don rnams 'grub par mdzod/_/ces pas 'phrin las bcol nas/_las kyi slob mas phyag 'tshal te/ rnam lnga 'dod pa'i phyag rgya bskor la/_/_ho dpa' bo chen po dgongs su gsol/_/'dir ni chos rnams bzang por ltos/_/'dus pa rnams la the tshom med/_/bram zer khyi dang gdol pa gsum/_/rang bzhin gcig tu dgongs te rol/_/_a hU~M su ka hoH:_zhes thabs shes gnyis kyi rdzas lag pa gnyis kyis bzung ba bsnol la drang ngo /_/len pa pos kyang phyag rgya bya zhing mnyam du/_bde gshegs chos la rin thang med/_/'dod chags la sogs dri ma spangs// gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba/_/de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/a la la ho/_zhes pas blangs la/_lag pa'i sor mo g.yas pa lnga la dpa' bo snga dang mthil du rta mgrin/_g.yon dpa' mo lnga dang rdo rje phag mo bsams te/ sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro 'phro bas phud kyis bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro so so'i mtshan nas brjod cing g.yon pa'i mtheb srin gyis mchod la/_lag pa'i dpa' bo yab yum bza' btung bcud kyis mnyes te mchod pas tshim par bsam zhing /_'khor lo lngar mkha' 'gro dang /_/_lus phyi nang du dpa' bo mkha' 'gro til gyi gang bu kha phye ba tsam dang*/_zhi khro dang bla ma brgyud pa rnams nang du gsal btab la/_bza' btung rol bas mnyes pa dang /_ya rkan ma rkan la mkha' 'gro yab yum lnga gsal btab la/_lce mchod pa'i lha mos mchod rdzas phul bas shin tu mnyes par bsams la rol phyin pa dang*/ dgyes shing tshim pas longs spyod do/_/tshogs khang lha yi gzhal yas khang // 'gro kun lha yi dkyil 'khor te/_/bza' btung bde chen mchod pa'i rdzas// thams cad ye shes chen po'i ngang /_/dgyes shing rol pas longs spyod pa// bsod nams phung po dpag tu med/_/kun tu bzang po'i rnam 'phrul yin// shin tu bza' bar mi bya zhing /_/rtsod dang ku co bya ba min/_/rdo rje'i glu dang bkra shis brjod/_/tshe 'dir bsam pa kun 'grub cing /_/phyi ma mngon par sangs rgyas zhing /_/bde chen mkha' spyod gnas su 'gro/_/de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma bsdus te//tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis kha phru btab la mdo phyogs bzhag la/_b+tso las kyi mkha' 'gro mi bsrun ma/_/'jig rten mkha' 'gro rdzu 'phrul can/_/sha za mkha' 'gro yang sprul dang /_/gzhan yang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs mang po/_/lhag ma'i gtor ma 'di khyer la/_/bgegs dang bar chad zhi ba dang /_/yid la bsam pa kun 'grub mdzod/_/\u0f00 sna tshogs DA ki ni/_sha za DA ki ni/_'jig rten DA ki ni ha ri ni sa kha kha khA hi khA hi/_zhes pas gtong ngo /_/de nas gtor ma gshegs la/_dmigs bsal yod na zor 'phangs pa ste/bgegs steng du zor cig 'phen/_/mkha' 'gro dam can rgya mtsho dang // 'jig rten dregs byed sde brgyad tshogs/_/kun kyang drag po'i zor thogs nas/_/dgra bgegs steng du mA ra ya/_/nyon mongs dug lnga'i dgra bgegs la//ye shes rnam lnga'i zer 'phangs pas/_/srid gsum 'khor ba rab stongs te/_/thams cad bde chen sangs rgyas shog_/ces brjod nas/_bstan ma skyong ba ni/_/_b+tso dpal chen yab yum bka' nyan ma/_/_/shar nas gshegs pa'i mkha' 'gro bdun/_/drug ni ye shes dbyings na bzhugs/_/gcig ni thabs kyi sgo ba mdzad/_/_/rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bdun/_/dam rdzas gtor ma 'di bzhes la/_khyod kyis zhi ba'i las mdzod cig_/b+h+yoH dpal chen yab yum bka' nyan pa/_/lho nas gshegs pa'i mkha' 'gro bdun/_/drug ni ye shes dbyings na bzhugs/_/gcig ni thabs kyi sgo ba mdzad/_/rin chen rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bdun/_/dam rdzas gtor ma 'di bzhes pa/_khyod kyis rgyas pa'i las mdzod cig_/_/b+h+yoH dpal chen yab yum bka' nyan ma/_/nub nas gshegs pa'i mkha' 'gro bdun/_/_drug ni ye shes dbyings na bzhugs/_/ gcig ni thabs kyi sgo ba mdzad/_/pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bdun/_/dam rdzas gtor ma 'di bzhes la/_/_khyod kyis dbang gi las mdzod cig_/_/b+h+yoH dpal chen yab yum bka' nyan ma/_/byang nas gshegs pa'i mkha' 'gro bdun/_/drug ni ye shes dbyings na bzhugs/_/gcig ni thabs kyi sgo ba mdzad/_/las kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bdun/_/dam rdzas gtor ma 'di bzhes la/_khyod kyis drag po'i las mdzod cig_/b+h+yoH dpal chen yab yum bde gshegs bka' nyan tshogs/_/dbang phyug nyer brgyad mkha' 'gro sum cu gnyis/_/ging chen bco brgyad lang ka dur khrod bdag_/ma bdun sring bzhi 'bar brgyad drug cu bzhi/_/bstan pa bcu gnyis so so'i g.yag 'khor bcas/_/bshes gnyen klong rdzogs pad+ma'i spyan snga ru/_khas blangs dam bcas bka' yi gtor ma longs/_/zhi rgyas dbang drag dgug bcing mnan gzir sogs/_/bcol ba'i 'phrin las ma lus 'grub par mdzod/_/ces rol mo'i sgras gtor ma btang la/_phyir log pa dang gtor gzhong sbubs la/_dgra bgegs yod na de'i 'og tu ling+ga bcug nas/_bro brdung ba ni/_hri dmar nag gru gsum me yi dkyil 'khor nas/_/'jigs byed khro rgyal rta mgrin khros pa'i sku/_/gnyis med 'khril sbyor rdo rje phag mo yum/_/mkha' 'gro dpa' bo dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs/_/gnyis 'dzin 'khor ba'i bag chags la// gnyis med rta bro chems se chem/_/rta bro 'khor gcig dang po la/_/bdud 'dul 'joms pa chen po'i bro/_/nga rgyal 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/zhing bcu'i tshogs la da rdungs shig_/rta bro 'khor gnyis bar ma la/_/srin po sha za'i longs spyod bro/_/_/zhe sdang 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/'byung po'i tshogs la da rdungs shig_/rta bro 'khor gsum tha ma la/_khams gsum khrag nad nad kyi bro/_/gti mug 'joms pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/'khor ba'i gcong nad skran la rdungs/_/_/rdul du rlogs shig dgra dang bgegs/_/_/rgya mtsho'i gting sba ri rab mnan/_/'khor bskyon chu srin kha ru bor/_/\u0f00 AHhA~M hU~M b+ha ya nan/_zhes bro brdung ngo /_/de nas me tog thogs la/_ma 'byor ba dang nyams pa dang /_/gang yang bdag rmongs blo yis ni/_/bgyis pa dang ni bgyid stsal ba/_/de kun mgon pos bzod par mdzod/_/ces brjod la/_yi ge brgya pa bzlas nas thal mo sbyar te/_/ye shes rnam dag lhun gyis grub pa'i lha/_/bla ma bde gshegs ye shes mkha' 'gro dang /_/dus rnams kun tu 'du 'bral med pa yi/_/bde chen sa la rtag tu rol bar shog_/he ru ka dpal grong khyer du/_/tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod pa yis/_/bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus kun/_/dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'grub par shog_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yis ni/_/phan bde'i 'byung gnas bstan pa 'phel ba dang*/_/phyogs rnams bkra shis bde legs phun sum tshogs/_/gnas skabs mthar thug bsam pa 'grub par shog_/\u0f00 khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzod/_/rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/_/sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang /_/ slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/_/\u0f00 badzra mus ye shes pa gshegs nas/_/dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdag la bsdus te/_/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par mos par byas la/_/yang bkra shis kyi lha tshogs bsams te/_/me tog dang rol mo'i sgras mgrin gcig tu/_/ngo
