bo rang bzhin thugs rje mngon du gyur/_/chos dbyings rnam dag klong la mnga' brnyes pa'i/_/bla ma yi dam rnams kyi bkra shis gang*/_/bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/dkar mo zhi mdzad gar sgyur sgeg pa mo/_/me long ye shes rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_/sku la dbang bsgyur bkra shis gang legs pa/_/bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/ser mo rgyas mdzad gar sgyur sgeg pa mo/_/mnyam nyid ye shes rin chen mkha' 'gro ma/_/yon tan dbang bsgyur bkra shis gang lags pa/_/_bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/dmar mo dbang mdzad gar skyur sgeg pa mo/_/kun rtog ye shes pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma/_/gsung la dbang bsgyur bkra shis gang lags pa// bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/ljang gu las mdzad gar sgyur sgeg pa mo/_/bya grub ye shes las kyi mkha' 'gro ma/_/phrin las dbang bsgyur bkra shis gang lags pa/_/bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/mthing gsal byang chub gar sgyur sgeg pa mo/_/chos dbyings ye shes sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma/_/thugs la dbang bsgyur bkra shis gang lags pa//bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/sna tshogs mkha' 'gro dur khrod brgyad kyi bdag_/tshogs la dbang bsgyur 'jig rten mkha' 'gro ma//bka' srung dam can rgya mtsho'i bkra shis gang*/_/bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/ces brjod do/_/rang bzhin dge ba'i phun tshogs chu gter las/_/stong pa'i 'dab stong snying rje'i snying po can/_/kun dga'i dus ston rgya cher 'phel byed 'dis/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par shog_/sku bzhi'i rgya mtsho bde chen chu bzhi'i gnas/_/ye shes klu dbang 'byor ba'i rang bzhin las/_/tshogs mchod rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi bla bre 'dis/_/rang gzhan don gnyis lhun gyis 'grub par shog_/tshogs mchod rgya mtsho'i sprin zhes bya ba/o rgyan rin po che pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul du/_ston rnams kyi zla ba dang po la bkod pa rdzogs so/_/shub+haM//_//

[7.2 phyag ’tshal dri med zla rgyas]

@#/_/phyag 'tshal dri med zla rgyas bzhugs/ rin chen shog 'dra/_/ oM badzra gu ru pad+ma [(]a[》]sid+d+ha[) ]si ti AHhUM/_phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs ye shes gang chen mtsho'i rgya mtsho las lhun gyis grub pa'i rang bzhin rgyal sras chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi zhabs kyi pad+mo dri ma med pa la dus thams cad du phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o/_/brtse ba chen pos rjes su gzung du gsol/_/mgon po gdod nas rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/bde chen yon tan 'byung ba'i mdzod/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma mchog_/kun bzang yab yum la phyag 'tshal/_/rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dngos/_/rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid/_/zhi dang khro tshul dpag med ston/_/rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal/_/rgyal po'i 'phrin las dpag med las/_/ rang byung rig 'dzin kun gyi gtso/_/lha mi'i ston pa bla na med/_/dga' rab rdo rje la phyag 'tshal/_/spangs dang ye shes phun tshogs shing /_/sku dang 'phrin las bsam yas kyi/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis rdzogs mdzad pa/_/shrI sid+ha la phyag 'tshal/_bde gshegs rgya mtsho'i rnam 'phrul las/_/rang byung ge sar pad+ma'i steng /_/mtshan rdzogs dpe byad 'bar ba'i sku/_/pad+ma 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal/_/ngo bo ye nas kun tu bzang /_/rang bzhin bde gshegs 'od dpag med/_/thugs rje pad+ma sku sprul pa/_/shAkya seng ge la phyag 'tshal/_/sku gsum mdzad pa'i 'phrin las kyis/_/gdul bya'i re ba rnam skong zhing /_/ mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i sprin 'phro ba/_/pad+ma rgyal po la phyag 'tshal/_/ji snyed ji bzhin thams cad mkhyen/_/sna tshogs chos kyi rnga sgra yis/_/bdud dang mu stegs tshar gcod pa'i/_/blo ldan mchog sred la phyag 'tshal/_/kun mkhyen ye shes gangs ri las/_/rnam grol mchog gi go 'phang brnyes/_/dpag med 'khor ba'i tshogs nang na/_/seng ge'i sgra sgrogs la phyag 'tshal/_/thugs rje'i char sprin rol pa las/_/phan bde'i glog phreng char 'bebs shing /_/'gro blo'i phun tshogs rgyas mdzad pa/_/pad+ma saM b+ha la phyag 'tshal/_/mkhyen brtse'i 'od stong dkyil 'khor gyis/_/gsung rab pad+ma rgyas mdzad cing /_/'gro ba'i lam yangs dkar por mdzad/_/nyi ma 'od zer la phyag 'tshal/_/rnam sprul drag pos 'dul ba la/_/'jigs rung gar dgu'i nyams ldan zhing /_/_/lha srin gdug pa tshar gcod pa'i/_/rdo rje gro lod la phyag 'tshal/_/mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i sprin phung las/_/dngos grub bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs shing /_/bde chen rgyal ba mnyes mdzad yum/_/mkhar chen mtsho rgyal la phyag 'tshal/_/shes bya'i dkyil 'khor rab rgyas shing /_/dam chos rin chen mdzod 'dzin pa/_/ zab mo'i dgongs gter rgyas mdzad pa'i/_/dri med 'od zer la phyag 'tshal/_/'di nas/_sku gsum snying po'i don rtogs shing /_/mkhyen brtse'i rol pa dpag yas kyis/_/'gro ba'i lam bzang ston mdzad pa/_/sprul sku legs ldan la phyag 'tshal/_/thugs rje'i mnga' bdag shAkya'i sras/_/bslab gsum rgyan gyis rab mdzes shing /_/theg gsum snying po'i don rtogs pa/_/shan+ta de ba la phyag 'tshal/_/mdo rgyud shes bya'i gnas la mkhas/_/bslab gsum rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes/_/a ti gsang mdzod 'dzin pa'i pha/_/chos kyi grags pa la phyag 'tshal/_/grub thob rje yi rgyud par 'khrungs/_/sna tshogs thabs kyis 'gro ba 'dul/_/gnas lnga rig pa'i paN+Di ta/_/nyi ma 'od zer la phyag 'tshal/_/byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/bskyed rdzogs gnyis la brtan pa thob/_/sku lnga yongs rdzogs 'gro ba'i mgon/_/byang sems chen po la phyag 'tshal/_/rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin cing /_/'gro ba'i gnyen mchog sangs rgyas mi gzugs can/_/gu ru'i sprul pa gtsug rgyan chos kyi rje/_/dpal ldan bla ma la phyag 'tshal/_/'di yan kha bskang /_/chos dbyings bde chen nam mkha'i klong /_/ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sprin 'phro ba/_/_rgyal ba sras bcas kun gyi yum/_/rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal/_/rang nyid chos dbyings rol pa las/_/sna tshogs thabs kyi rnam 'phrul gyis/_/'phrin las rnam bzhi'i las mdzad pa/_/dam can rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal/_/gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i rig 'dzin dang /_/bde gshegs tshogs dang 'phags pa'i tshogs/_/mkha' 'gro bde chen rgya mtsho dang /_/mchod 'os kun la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran gyis/_/grangs dang mnyam pa'i lus sprul te/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod sprin ni/_/nam mkha' rab 'byams yongs bkang ste/_/bla med bla ma'i tshogs rnams dang*/_/rgyal dang rgyal sras 'phags pa'i tshogs/_/mchod 'os rnams la mchod par bgyi/_/thog ma med nas lus dang ngag_/yid kyis sdig pa'i las bgyis pa/_/de kun rab tu 'gyod sems kyis/_/mchod 'os rnams kyi spyan sngar bshags/_/shes dang mi spang dang du blang /_/sgrub dang khas blangs la sogs pa/_/rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig las/_/'gal zhing nyams pa so sor bshags/_/bdag gzhan kun gyi dus gsum gyi/_/dge ba kun la yi rang zhing /_/'gro ba'i khams dang mos pa dang /_/blo yi rim pa ji bzhin du/_/theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/_/deng nas srid pa ma stongs bar/_/mya ngan mi 'da' rtag bzhugs nas/_/thugs rje'i rnam 'phrul dpag yas kyi/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis mdzad par gsol/_/bdag gzhan dus gsum dge ba kun/_/ma lus blo yis gcig bsdus nas/_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob par shog_/dus gsum srid pa'i sems can kun/_/rdo rje theg la rab bzhugs nas/_/gnyis med ye shes don rtogs nas/_/_/tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas shog_/rnam smin 'byung ba'i lus 'di yang /_/mngon sum 'od gsal bsgoms pa yis/_/rang dengs 'od kyi phung po ru/_/tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par shog_/phyogs mtha' gtug pa'i sems can kun/_/bde thob sdug bsngal kun bral te/_/dam pa rnams las chos thob nas/_/thar pa'i grong du phyin par shog_/_/bdag kyang deng nas dus kun tu/_/zab mo'i chos rnams 'dzin pa dang /_/rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bsgral ba'i/_/'gro kun ma lus sgrol par shog_/_/bdag gi bde ba'i cha shas kyis/_/semasaM can rnams ni nyer 'tsho zhing /_/sems can sdug bsngal ma lus kun/_/bdag la smin nas grol bar shog_/_/bdag gi brtsams pa thams cad kun/_/sems can don las ma gtogs pa/_/gzhan du rdul tsam mi dmigs pas/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis 'grub par shog_/bar do'i yul la 'jug pa'i tshe/_/'od gsal rang ngo shes pa yis/_/gdod ma'i gzhi la mthar phyin nas/_/_/sems can kun don 'grub par shog_/_/ye shes dag pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/srid pa'i bar do mi mthong zhing /_/phyogs bcu rang bzhin sprul pa'i zhing /_/bgrod nas 'gro ba sgrol bar shog_/pad+ma'i mtsho la bung ba ltar/_/'gro la las 'brel yongs stsal te/_/dri med ye shes 'od zer gyis/_/ skal ldan snang ba 'byed paRa shog_/_/bdag blo'i dge legs phun tshogs kyis/_/'gro ba'i bsam pa kun 'grub ste/_/srid na 'ga' yang mi gnas par//phyam cig sangs rgyas 'grub par shog_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gi phyag 'tshal dri med zla rgyas zhes bya ba/_o rgyan pad+ma'i thugs kyi 'od zer blo'i pad+mor reg pas 'dzum par byas pa'i rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis/ ston gsum gangs ri thod dkar du sbyar ba rdzogs so/_/dri med 'od zer gyi rjes su sku gsum snying po zhes pa nas dpal ldan bla ma la phyag 'tshal zhes pa'i bar kha bskang byas pa zhig yin 'dra bas nges par mdzod//_//

[7.3 gsol ’debs bdud rtsi’i chu rgyun]

@#/_/gsol 'debs bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun bzhugs/ rin chen shog 'dra/ oM AHhU~M/_byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i sprin 'khrigs shing*/_/dngos grub rgya mtsho'i char 'bebs pa'i/_/bla ma kun la gsol ba 'debs/_/ci bsam 'grub par byin gyis rlobs/_/rang bzhin gdod ma'i pho brang du/_/sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med/_/kun bzang yab yum gsol ba 'debs/_/gzhi thog grol bar byin gyis rlobs/_/bde chen 'og min pho brang du/_/rigs lnga bde gshegs rdo rje 'chang*/_/rdo rje sems dpar gsol ba 'debs/_/lhun grub rtogs par byin gyis rlobs/_/me ri 'bar ba'i pho brang du/_/thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sprin tshogs can/_/dga' rab rdo rjer gsol ba 'debs/_/rig 'dzin thob par byin gyis rlobs/_/rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi pho brang du/_/ye shes lnga lngar 'gro ba'i yab/_/shrI sid+har gsol ba 'debs/_/gnas lugs rtogs par byin gyis rlobs/_/so sa gling gi pho brang du/_/mchog dang thung mong dngos grub brnyes/_/pad+ma thod phreng gsol ba 'debs/_/sku gsum 'grub par byin gyis rlobs/_/o rgyan yul gyi pho brang du/_/mkha' 'gro dpag med kun gyi gtso/_/ye shes mtsho rgyal gsol ba 'debs/_/bdag rgyud grol bar byin gyis rlobs/_/rang byung ye shes pho brang du/_/snying po'i don rtogs byin rlabs ldan/_/dri med 'od zer gsol ba 'debs/_/'ja' lus 'grub par byin gyis rlobs/_/chos sdings dpal gyi pho brang du/_/theg mchog chos 'khor kun gyi bdag_/chos kyi grags par gsol ba 'debs/_/gzhan don 'grub par byin gyis rlobs/_/grog ri o rgyan yang dben du/_/bslab gsum nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin/_/nyi ma 'od zer gsol ba 'debs/_/dgos 'dod 'grub par byin gyis rlobs/_/dkar po chos lung dgon pa ru/_/rdo rje snying po'i dngos grub brnyes/_/kun dga' rgyal mtshan gsol ba 'debs/_/zab lam mthar phyin byin gyis rlobs/_/kun bzang gling gi pho brang du/_/zab don rgya mtsho'i bstan pa 'di/_/_/chos dbyings grags par gsol ba 'debs/_/ thams cad mkhyen par byin gyis rlobs/_/spyi gtsug nyi zla'i gdan steng du/_/ smin grol mchog gi dngos grub brnyes/_/rtsa ba'i bla mar gsol ba 'debs/_/_/sku lnga lhun grub byin gyis rlobs/_khra mo brag gi pho brang du/_/tshe gcig sangs rgyas 'grub pa'i mchog_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gsol ba 'debs/_/_/lhag med 'grub par byin gyis rlobs/_/las can 'du ba'i pho brang du/_/mthu stobs rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med/_/gter srung rnams la gsol ba 'debs/_/bar chad zhi bar byin gyis rlobs/_/gar bzhugs chos kyi pho brang du/_/bslab gsum sgrub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin/_/chos mdzad yongs la gsol ba 'debs/_/bstan pa gnas par byin gyis rlobs/_/rang lus lha yi pho brang du/_/stong gsal ye nas lhun gyis grub/_/zhi khro rab 'byams gsol ba 'debs/_/'od gsal 'byongs par byin gyis rlobs/_/grags stong gsum gi pho brang du/_/rtsa gnas yi ge'i 'khor lo nyid/_/rang byung ye nas gsol ba 'debs/_/tshangs dbyangs thob par byin gyis rlobs/_/sems nyid don gyi pho brang du/_/thams cad ma skyes mnyam pa nyid/_/rig stong chos skur gsol ba 'debs/_/rang shar rang grol byin gyis rlobs/_/snang srid snod bcud pho brang du/_/thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas zhing /_/srid gsum yongs la gsol ba 'debs/_/mnyam nyid rtogs par byin gyis rlobs/_/mtha' grol klong yangs pho brang du/_/mtha' bral gnyis med nam mkha'i don/_/lta ba mchog la gsol ba 'debs/_/phyogs lhung med par byin gyis rlobs/_/'od gsal don gyi pho brang du/_/gsal stong gnyis med gnyug ma'i don/_/sgom pa mchog la gsol ba 'debs/_/gsal 'grib med par byin gyis rlobs/_/ blang dor med pa'i pho brang du/_/thams cad ye shes sgyu ma'i ngang /_/spyod pa mchog la gsol ba 'debs/_/gnyis 'dzin zhig par byin gyis rlobs/_/re dogs med pa'i pho brang du/_/rang rig 'od gsal 'pho 'gyur med/_/'bras bu mchog la gsol ba 'debs/_/zad sar 'khyol bar byin gyis rlobs/_/ dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad dang /_/mchod 'os rnams la dus kun tu/_/snying nas gus pas gsol ba 'debs/_/'phrin las 'grub par byin gyis rlobs/_/byams dang snying rje 'byongs pa dang*/_/nges 'byung skyo shas skye ba dang /_/nyin mtshan chos kyi 'da' ba dang /_/blo sna thung bar byin gyis rlobs/_/snang srid bla mar rtogs pa dang /_/byin rlabs rgyun chad med pa dang /_/dag snang phyogs med 'char ba dang*/_/mos gus skye bar byin gyis rlobs/_/rtag tu dben par gnas pa dang*/_/rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi med pa dang /_/dngos 'dzin 'khrul pa zhig pa dang /_/lam sna zin par byin gyis rlobs/_/tshe 'di chos kyi 'da' ba dang /_/rtag tu bla ma mnyes pa dang /_/sgrub pa mtha' ru phyin pa dang /_/_/gzhan don 'grub par byin gyis rlobs/_/las dang nyon mongs zad pa dang /_/byang chub lam la brtson pa dang /_/sa dang lam rnams rdzogs pa dang*/_/sangs rgyas 'grub par byin gyis rlobs/_/tshe 'dir 'od lus 'grub pa dang /_/bar do rang ngo shes pa dang /_/rang bzhin sprul par skye ba dang /_/don gnyis 'grub par byin gyis rlobs/_/gsol 'debs bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyi/_/dge bas srid pa'i sems can kun/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rab brgal te/_/phyam cig sangs rgyas 'grub par shog_/gsol 'debs bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gi rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul du ston gsum me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i dus su sbyar ba dge'o/_/dri med 'od zer gyi rjes kyi sh+lo ka lnga kha skong yin pa 'dra'o//_//

[7.4 khrid yig nor bu lugs]

@#/_khrid yig nor bu lugs bzhugs pa legs so/_/ rin chen shog 'dra/ mkha' 'gro snying tig gi khrid yig nor bu lugs su gdab pa zhes bya ba/_dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gdod nas rnam dag chos sku'i mkha' dbyings las/_/nges pa lnga ldan gzugs sku'i dkyil 'khor rgyas/_/mdzad pa'i zer gyis gdul bya'i pad tshal 'dzum/_/'gro kun 'dren pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mtsho dbus ge sar pad+ma'i snying po la/_/ya mtshan mchog brnyes bde gshegs pad+ma ni/_/sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa yis/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis lhun gyis grub la 'dud/_/dpal gyi mchims phu pad+ma'i nags khrod du/_/mkha' dbyings rnam dag mkha' 'gros byin brlabs nas/_/gsang ba'i khrid yig rab gsang snying po'i don/_/nor bu'i dbang po nor bu'i lugs 'di rtsom/_/ 'dir rdzogs pa chen po mkha' 'gro snying tig gtan la 'bebs par byed de/_/_de la bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa dang /_de las byung ba'i man ngag gnyis las/_dang po ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang rnam dag stug po bkod pa bde ba'i zhing na/_ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dpal kun tu bzang po yab yum chos sku spros pa dang bral ba'i ngang las/ longs sku rigs lnga lhun rdzogs kyi rnam par bzhengs te/_/chos phun sum tshogs par rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po 'od lnga lhun grub kyis bstan pa/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa longs sku rdo rje sems dpa' la/_dus phun sum tshogs pa gzhir rdzogs 'pho 'gyur med pa'i tshe/_rang bzhin gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gsungs/_des dur khrod me ri 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su sprul pa'i sku dga' rab rdo rje la tshig sdeb sbyor legs pa'i sgo nas gsungs/_des rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi dur khrod du/_slob dpon chen po shrI sid+ha la gsungs/_ des dur khrod chen po so sa'i gling du/_o rgyan gyi slob dpon pad+ma thod phreng rtsal la gsungs/_des gzho stod te sgro brag dkar du rdo rje phag mo dang dbyer med pa'i mkha' 'gro ye shes mtsho rgyal la gsungs/_des mchims phu dpal gyi nags khrod ri mo can gyi dben gnas su pad+ma las 'brel rtsal la gsungs so/__/_ gnyis pa de las byung ba'i gdams pa ni chos kyi sku'e bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/_thun mong gi sngon 'gros sems sbyang ba dang /_thun mong ma yin pa'i sngon 'gros smin grol gyi lam la 'god pa gnyis las/_dang po la/_ snang srid bum pa'i lam khyer/_sgrib sbyong maN+Dal gyi lam khyer/_tshe mi rtag pa'i lam khyer/_'khor ba rgyu 'bras kyi lam khyer/_tshad med bzhi'i lam khyer/_byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i lam khyer/_sgrib sbyong yig brgya'i lam khyer dang*bdun*las/_dang po ni*chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i ngang las/_o rgyan gyi yul 'od lnga'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa na/_thod pa skam rlon gyi gzhal med khang sgo bzhi rta babs dang ldan pa dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbus na/_seng ge rin po che'i khri rkang gis bteg pa'i steng nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la hUM mthing nag las/_rang nyid pad+ma thod phreng sku mdog mthing nag gyad kyi dor stabs su bzhugs pa/_zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas yum dang mnyam par sbyor ba/_dbu skra dmar seRa sbrul nag dang thod skam gyi brgyan pa'i pang na yum mkhar chen bza' mtsho rgyal dang mkha' lding bza' gnyis mar me'i grib ma ltar gnyis su snang yang ngo bo gcig pas/_gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin cing yab la 'khyud pa/_dmar mo rin po che dang rus pas brgyan pa ste/_sgeg pa/_dpa' ba/_mi sdug pa/_rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs su rung ba/_snying rje rngam dang zhi ba ste/_ gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan pa'o/__/_phyogs bzhir ha ri ni sa las mkha' 'gro bzhi dang /_sgo ma bzhi'i mtshan pa'o/__/_gtso bo'i snying nang du rtsa ba'i bla ma he ru ka'i rnam par bzhugs pa/_smin mtshams su pad+ma thod phreng khro bo'i rnam pa la mtshan brgyad kyis bskor ba/_spyi bor kun bzang yab yum la brgyud pa'i bla mas bskor ba'i 'od zer kyis ye shes pa spyan drangs la bstim nas/_O~M badzra gu ru pad+ma sid+d+hi thod phreng rtsal AHhUM/_zhes bzlas pas/_snang srid thams cad lha dang lha mor gyur pa thams cad kyis de skad ces bzlas par bsams nas/_ mthar thugs ka'i bla ma la bsdus pa yang mi dmigs par bsams la bsngo ba bya'o/__/_ gnyis pa sgrib sbyong maN+Dal gyi lam khyer ni/_legs par bkod de gnyis kyis langs la/_phyogs bzhi thal mos skyor te phyi'i maN+Dal tshangs chen gyi bskal pa gcig bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro gter srung dang bcas pa la 'bul ba ni/_rigs lnga'i sku las chags pa 'jig rten nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa/_zlum po dang /_gru bzhi dang /_gru gsum dang /_sog kha dang /_gzhi phyal ba la sogs par bsams la/_oM AHhUM/_rin chen maN+Dal kun bzang mchod pa'i sprin/_rigs lnga'i zhing khams rgya mtshos brgyan pa 'di/__/_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la 'bul/__/_'gro kun rnam dag zhing la spyod par shog/_ces pa gsum dang /_gnyis pa bkod la/_tshangs pa rnga sgra'i 'jig rten 'og min gyi gnas/__/_rnam dag stug po bkod pa bde ba'i zhing /__/_dkyil 'khor gyi bkod pa phun sum tshogs par dmigs la/_ye shes maN+Dal Rin chen gzhal med khang /__/_sgo bzhi rta babs 'khor lo rgyal mtshan sogs/__/_ bkod pa'i sprin phung rgya mtsho legs phul bas/__/_'gro kun mkha' spyod bde chen bgrod par shog/_ces pa gsum dang /_gsum pa bkod la/_rdo rje snying po'i 'jig rten rang snang rnam par dag pa'i 'od gsal la dmigs la/_rang bzhin ma skyes gdod nas 'od gsal zhing /__/_sku dang thig les legs par brgyan pa 'di/_/_dngos po mtshan ma med par phul ba yis/__/_'gro kun gdod ma'i gnas su grol bar shog/_ces pa gsum gyis dbul lo/__/_ gsum pa tshe mi rtag pa'i lam khyer ni/_phyi dus bzhi'i 'gyur ba/_ nang 'byung bzhi'i 'gyur ba/_gsang ba 'byung bzhi thim tshul/_skad cig thang cig mi rtag pas kyang rang gi tshe mi rtag par 'chi bar nges par bsgoms pa'o/__/_ bzhi pa 'khor ba rgyu 'bras kyi lam khyer ni/_'khor ba'i bde sdug dge sdig gi las las gyur bar shes pas sngar byas kyi sdig pa bshags/_phyis bsdam zhing dge ba 'ba' zhig sgrub par dam bca'o/__/_ lnga pa tshad med bzhi'i lam khyer ni/_sems can bde ba dang mi ldan pa rnam bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang phrad/_sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa rnams de dang bral/_bde ba dang skyid pa sems can la mi 'bral bar gyur cig/_nye ring chags sdang can rnams sems snyoms par shog cig snyam du snying nas bsgom pa'o/__/_ drug pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i lam khyer ni/_'di ltar 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'god par bya snyam du kun rdzob dang /_rang gi sems don dam pa stong pa nyid ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin du gsal gdab pa don dam gyi byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa/_bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams/__/_ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa la/__/_yin par shes pa'i bdag nyid du/__/_byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/__/_zhes pa gsum brjod pa'o/__/_ bdun pa sgrib sbyong yig brgya'i lam khyer ni/__/_skad cig gis pad zla'i steng du rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po yab yum/_rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i thugs kar pad zla'i steng du hUM la yi ge brgya pa mthing dmar dkar gsum gyis bskor ba las 'od zer byung /_bdag dang sems can gyi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa dag par bsams la yi ge brgya pa ci 'grub bzlas te/_rjes mi dmigs pa'i ngang las/__/_rang bzhin dag pa'i dge ba 'dis/__/_'khor ba ngan song dong sprugs te/__/_srid na 'ga' yang mi gnas par/__/_thams cad sangs rgyas nyid thob shog/_ces bsngo ba bya'o/__/_ gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa la/_smin grol gyi lam la 'god pa'i man ngag la/__/_ma smin pa smin par byed pa'i dbang dang /_smin pa grol bar byed pa'i gdams pa gnyis las/_dang po ni skabs 'dir dbang bskur ro/__/_ gnyis pa la sngon 'gro rnam pa gsum gyis sems kyi ngo bo ngo sprad pa/_ dngos gzhi rnam pa gsum gyis ye shes kyi ngo bo ngo sprad pa/_rjes rgyab chos gsum gyis yid ches bskyed pa gsum las/_dang po la'ang phyi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sngon 'gros sgo gsum gyi 'khrul pa bshig pa/_nang lus ngag yid gsum gyi sngon 'gros sgo gsum gyi sgrib pa sbyang ba/_gsang ba lus ngag yid gsum gyi sngon 'gros sgo gsum gyi gnas lugs bstan pa dang gsum las/_ dang po la'ang gnyis las/_ru shan dbye ba ni mi med pa'i lung pa stong par song ste/_'gro drug lus kyi spyod pa sna tshogs byas pa'i mthar/_sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs stangs bya'o/__/_'dir zhag gsum byas pas phyis so sor ma byas kyang chog pa'o/__/_ gnyis pa sngon 'gro dngos ni/_lag pa spyi bor thal mo sbyar/_rgal tshigs bsrang /_rkang pa'i mthil sprad de nyin mtshan med par gnas pa'o/__/_ gnyis pa ngag la'ang gnyis las/_ru shan dbye ba ni dben par sgra skad sna tshogs pa brjod pa'i mthar/_chos kyi sgra dbyangs la bslab bo/__/_sngon 'gro dngos la/_rgyas gdab pa/_rtsal sbyang ba/_mnyen btsal zhing lam du 'jug pa gsum las/_dang po la phyi snang ba la rgyas gdab pa dang /_nang phung po la rgyas gdab pa gnyis las/_dang po ni phyi rol gyi snang ba thams cad hUM du shar shar gsal ba la/_hUM chung mang pos gang nas steng 'og phyogs mtshams thams cad 'od gsal gyi zhing khams hUM ye shes lnga'i rang 'od dang bcas pas me re re khengs par bsam mo/__/_de'ang ri hUM chen gyi rtsi shing nags tshal hU~M chung la lo 'dab hU~M phran du bsams te/_hU~M gi glu snyan la ring bar so dang /_mchu ma reg tsam du blang ngo /__/_ gnyis pa nang phung po la rgyas gdab pa ni/_phyi'i hUM de rnams rang gi khong pa'i nang du kha sna dang ba spu'i khung bu nas tshur la sib sib thims nas lus kyi nang khengs par bsam mo/__/_de'ang ri lta bu'i hUM che ba nang du 'jug dus rang gi lus kyang de dang 'tshams pa'i che ba'am/_yang na til 'bru tsam gyi nang du tshud par bsam pa ni/_snang ba nges med la rig pa gtad med shar nas grol ba'o/__/_ gnyis pa rtsal sbyang ba la'ang gnyis las/_phyi snang ba la rtsal sbyong ba ni/_hUM mthing nag ye shes lnga'i me 'od reg pa tsam gyis thal byung du 'bigs par nus pa/__/_gang 'bigs pa'i yul dang 'tshams par bsams la/_steng 'og phyogs mtshams med pa 'bigs par bsams zhing /_hUM gi glu drag la ngar che bar brjod do/__/_/_de yang snang ba thams cad sang sing /__/_khral khrol 'ja' tshon lta bur mos pa bya'o/__/_ gnyis pa nang phung po la rtsal sbyong ba ni/__/_rang gi lus che chung ci rigs par sprul la/_hUM des khe khol med par phug pas lus su snang la rags par ma grub par chu'i zla ba lta bur mos par bya'o/__/_ gsum pa mnyen btsal zhing lam du gzhugs pa la'ang gnyis las/_ mnyen btsal pa ni/_shing sdong dang ri la sogs pa la hA~M gis dru bu ltar dkris nas/_phyir phrol ba la shes pa gtad cing hwa gi gla ring bar blang ngo /__/_ gnyis pa lam du gzhug pa ni/_khru re'i sar ri mo srin 'gros su byas la/_mthong snang ma zad kyi bar lam gtod*pa*la hUM khru gang pa mthing nag gcig 'gron po 'gro ba ltar song nas/_mthong ba las 'das pa'i phyogs su'ang sngar bzhin song ste phyir mi ldog par hUM de song bar bsam zhing /_hUM gi glu ring po blang ngo /__/_ gsum pa sems kyi sngon 'gro la'ang gnyis las/_dang po ru shan dbye ba ni/_dben par 'gro drug gi bde sdug dang /_chos dang chos min dgag sgrub sna tshogs bsams pa'i mthar/_bskyed rdzogs kyi don la gzhag go/_ gnyis pa sngon 'gro dngos la gsum las/_dang po byung sa la brtag pa ni/_sems ni dang po gang nas byung /_phyi nang gi yul dang lus rdul phran du gzhig cing brtags pas/_ma rnyed pa ni ye stong rtsa ba dang bral ba'i don rtogs pa'o/__/_gnyis pa da lta gang na gnas brtags pas/_ma rnyed pa ni gzhi med ngos gzung dang bral bar rtogs pa'o/__/_/_gsum pa tha ma gar 'gro brtags pas ma rnyed pa ni sems 'gro 'ong med pa'i don rtogs pa'o/_ gnyis pa nang sgo gsum gyi sngon 'gros sgrib pa sbyang ba ni/_spyi bor a/_ mgrin par su/[ ·]snying gar shr-i/_lte bar tri/_gsang bar pre/_rkang mthil du du bsams la/_'gro drug gi las dang bag chags kyis gang ba sol dong gi du ba 'thul ba lta bu'i spyi bor \u0f00/_mgrin par AH:snying gar hU~M gsum las me 'bar bas yi ge drug dang bag chags kyi sdig sgrib thams cad bsregs nas lus shel gong ltar bsams la/_O~MoM AHhU~M gi glu snyan la ring ba 'bum tsho bdun bzla'o/__/_ gsum pa gsang ba lus ngag yid gsum gyi sngon 'gro sgo gsum gyi gnas lugs bstan pa la/_zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin rgyud la bskyed pa dang*/_ lhag mthong gi rang bzhin ngo sprad pa dang /_zung 'brel gyi rang bzhin la bzla ba gsum las/_dang po la'ang sngon 'gro rnal du dbab pas zhi gnas ma skyes par skyes par byed pa dang /_dngos gzhi sor 'jug pas skyes pa ngo sprad de nyams su blang tshul/_rjes lta stangs gsum gyis rkyen dang bsres te bogs dbyung zhing rtsal spyod pa gsum las/_dang po ni bde ba'i mal du nyal la lus 'gul bskyod dang bral ba/_ngag smra brjod dang bral ba/_sems dran bsam dang bral bas sad la/_khong slod bag phab la phyam gyis skye med bsam brjod dang bral ba'i ngang la 'jog pa'o/__/_des ni sems spros bral zhi gnas kyi don skye nges so/__/_ gnyis pa ni nyan thos kyi lta stangs rnam snang gi chos bdun bcas la/_ mnyam par gzhag nas cung zad brtan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lta stangs mig bar snang la mda' gang tsam du gtad pas shes pa gsal stong rnam par mi rtog pa'i zhi gnas nam mkha' rnam par dag pa'i dkyil lta bu spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes skye bas de nyid ngo sprad do/__/_ gsum pa ni 'di nyid cung zad brtan nas khro bo'i lta stangs/_dang po gyad kyi dor stabs ni langs te gom pa bgrad mig har por bltas la zhi gnas bsgom mo/__/_ gnyis pa 'jigs pa'i sgeg 'gros ni/_gom pa dal gyis 'dor zhing zhi gnas dang bsre'o/__/_gsum pa seng ge'i mchongs stangs ni/_mchongs rgyug rgod sems dgag sgrub tu 'phror bcug nas zhi gnas kyi don la rtsal sbyangs pas/_phyis spyod lam thams cad zhi gnas su 'char nges so/__/_ gnyis pa lhag mthong gi rang bzhin ngo sprad pa ni gsum te/_sngon 'gro gsum gyis ma skyes pa bskyed pa/_dngos gzhi gsum gyis skyes pa ngo sprad pa dang /_rjes rang grol gsum gyis bogs dbyung shing rtsal sbyang ba'o/__/_dang po la'ang gsum las/_dang po rtog pa rtsad gcod pa ni/_lus ngag yid gsum po 'di'i byed pa po gang du 'dug/_skye ba snga phyir gang la 'gro bar 'dug/_/_ dgag sgrub gang las 'byung bar 'dug brtags pas sems su shes pa'o/_ gnyis pa bar du sems kyi mtshang btsal ba ni/_de ltar sems dang lus ngag yid gsum gcig tu 'dug gam tha dad du 'dug/_dga' mi dga' snyan mi snyan skyid sdug tu byung dus sems dang de dag gcig tu 'dug gam/_ tha dad du 'dug/_gcig na sems la kha dog yod par gyur te lus dang gcig pa'i phyir ro/__/_/_tha dad na so sor gang na 'dug brtags shing dpyad pas/_gcig tha dad rtogs pas brtags pa ma rtogs par med par shes pas thams cad sgro btags glo bur bar gtan la phebs so/__/_ gsum pa tha ma byung gnas 'gro gsum la brtag pa ni/__/_de ltar sgro btags glo bur gi sems de phyi nang snod bcud gang las byung /_ rang las sems byung ngam snyam du sems la dpyad pas/_skye ba'i rgyus stong*/_ gnas sa gnas mkhan la brtags pas/_gnas pa'i ngo bos stong /_'gro sa sems kho 'gro mkhan la dpyad pas rang gi ngo bos stong par shes pas dus gsum rtsa ba dang bral ba'i sems su thag chod kyi rtog pa nyi ma shar ba ltar lhag gis skye nges so/__/_ gnyis pa skyes pa ngo sprad tshul la/_gnas pa sems kyi rgyun du shar ba/__/_'phro ba sems kyi rol par shar ba/__/_gnyis med mnyam pa'i ngang du gnas pa'i ngo sprad pa gsum las/_dang po ni/_'char tshul sna tshogs su shar yang /_grub pa gang du'ang ma grub pa'i sems 'di la legs par ltos dang*/_ dga' mi dga' la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams sems las gzhan du grub pa e 'dug/_dgag sgrub kyi shes pa dang /_de'i rang bzhin so sor e 'dug/_ gang snang gi shes pa der 'dzin dang bral ba'i ngang nas phaT gyis la/_cer gyis ltos la phyam gyis zhog dang*/_rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs zhi ba ltar rtog tshogs chos nyid kyi ngang du lhan gyis gnas pa ni/_rang gnas chos nyid kyi ngo bo ngos bzung phyin chad sems ji ltar gnas kyang de'i ngang la phyam gyis zhog cig/_ gnyis pa ni yang de'i ngang las rtog pa sna tshogs su spros dang /_spros pa'i sems de sna tshogs su shar yang /_ngo bor ma grub par rang grol chu'i rba rlabs dang 'dra ba 'di la/_'di yin gyi ched 'dzin ma byed par gang shar gyi rig pa gtad med kyi ngang la rang sar yan du chug dang /_ji ltar 'phros kyang 'phros pa dang grol ba dus mnyam du gnas pa ni ye nas sems kyi gnas lugs yin/_da phyin chad sna tshogs kyi rtog pa la dgag sgrub kyi skyel bsu ma byed par/_da ltar gyi shes pa rang grol gyi ra bar gnyer ga dang ched 'dzin ma byed par yan du chug mdzod/__/_ gsum pa ni de ltar 'phro bdo ba'i dus na mtshang shes pas gzhi las 'phags mi nus par gnas bdo/__/_gnas bdo ba'i dus na rang shar gyi rig pa 'gag med du 'phro bdo yang /_'phro gnas gnyis su med pa rgya mtsho la rlabs bu chung shar nas thim pa lta bu ste/_gang ltar shar zhing gnas kyang /_ der 'dzin gyi 'phro ma mthud na chos nyid kyi rol pa las mi 'da' bas/_da phyin chad 'phro gnas gnyis su med pa la re dogs dgag sgrub kyi 'dzin pas ma bslad par mtha' grol klong yangs chen por ngos zung zhig/_ gsum pa zung 'jug gnyis med du la bzla ba ni/_de ltar gnas pa'i cha nas zhi gnas/_gsal stong shar grol gyi cha nas lhag mthong du ngo sprad kyang /_'di yin gyi gza' gtad dang ngos gzung gi ngo bor grub pa gang yang med pas/__/_bzang ngan gyi nyam snang dang rtog tshogs kyi rol pa thams cad chos nyid kyi rba rlabs shar ba yin pas ye stong rtsa bral chen por la zlos gnyis pa dngos gzhi ye shes chen po la ngo sprad pa la/_rab tshe 'dir sangs rgyas pa'i gdams ngag/_'bring bar dor grol ba'i gdams ngag/_tha ma rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing du sangs rgya ba'i gdams ngag gsum las/_dang po la bzhugs stangs gsum la gzhi bca' ba/_gzigs stangs gsum gyis gnad bstan pa/_snang ba bzhi'i 'char lugs ngos gzung ba dang gsum las/_ dang po ni sku gsum gyi bzhugs stangs gsum ste/_chos sku'i bzhugs stangs seng ge ni/_khyi tshugs mor rkang mthil gnyis sprad pa'i stongs su/_lag pa'i khu tshur bzhag pa bsrang nas mjing pa yud tsam dgyed de mig smin phrag gi nam mkha' la har por blta ba'o/__/_longs sku'i bzhugs stangs glang po ni pus brang sbyar la/_lag pa'i gru mo sa la btsugs te sor mo 'gram pa la brten cing sbyar ba'o/__/_sprul sku'i drang srong tsog pu ni/__/_tsog pu'i lag pa mkhal khung du 'khyud pa'am/__/_pus mo'i steng du bsnol nas bkab pa'o/__/_ gnyis pa ni mig gyen du gzigs pa 'phred du blta ba/_mthur la phyed btsum rab tu zim pas nyi ma'i ngos nas khru gang gi sar ma yengs bar blta ba'o/__/_ gsum pa ni snang ba mi 'dra ba bzhi 'char te/_chos nyid mngon sum gyi snang ba/_nyams gong 'phel gyi snang ba/_rig pa tshad phebs kyi snang ba/_chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba dang bzhi las/_dang po ni de'i tshe nam mkha' stong pa la rig gdangs snang ba shar te/_dbyings 'od khyim/_thig le 'gro 'ong*/_rdo rje lu gu rgyud gsum dus gcig tu shar nas/_dbyings kyi nang du thig le stong pa'i sgron ma'i dbus su rdo rje lu gu rgyud bzhag nas bltas pas/_shes pa stong gnyis med kyi ye shes shes rab rang byung gi sgron ma shar te/_nyams su blangs pas thig le sum sbrel gyi snang ba mthong ba tshun chad chos nyid mngon sa pa gsal sum gyi snang ba'o/__/_de nas dbyings rig smin mtshams dang bral te/_dang po [(<]a[>]dbyings snang za 'og ris[)]dbyings snang ling tshe za 'og ris khru gang pa dang /_thig le sran ma tsam dang /_rig pa skar mda' rgyug pa tsam dang /_de nas yang goms pas rim gyis/_dbyings kyi snang ba re lde tsam dang /_yul gru tsam dang*/_stong gsum tsam du snang ba thams cad kyang /_rin po che 'dra ba dang /_drwa ba 'dra ba dang /_de bzhin du pad+ma stong ldan dang /_ye shes mkhar thabs dang /_nyi zla gza' bral dang /_mda' lta bu dang /_mdung rtse dang /_rdo rje dang /_dril bu dang /_'khor lo dang /_ral gri dang /_rtse gsum dang /_gri gug dang /_nya mig gi rnam pa 'dra ba la sogs pa'o/__/_thig le me long tsam dang /_ 'khar gzhong tsam dang*/_bse phub tsam du snang zhing /_rig pa 'dab chags lding ba tsam dang /_ri dwags rgyug pa tsam dang /_bung ba bcud la 'khor ba tsam dang /_mi 'gul bar sdod cing /_thig le dang rig pa'i bar du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku rkyang pa phra mo re snang ba tshun chad nyams gong 'phel gyi snang ba'o/__/_de nas sku lnga lnga zung 'brel du snang ba'i thugs ka dang /_ rang gi snying gar zer thag phra mos 'bral ba ni rig pa tshad phebs kyi snang ba'o/__/_de nas phyi nang gi rdos bcas nyon mongs dang rnam rtog/_'phel snang dang bcas pa zad de/_skabs su rang gi lag sor tsam 'od du snang ba ni chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba'o/__/_snang ba bzhi po de rdzogs nas nang gsal gdod ma'i gzhi la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la the tshom med pa yin no/__/_ gnyis pa 'bring bar dor 'tshang rgya ba la/_mtshon byed dpe'i ngo sprad kyis spyir bstan pa dang*/_mtshon bya don gyi ngo sprod kyis bye brag tu bshad pa gnyis las/_dang po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i me long bstan la/_'khor 'das gang du'ang ma phye ba'i sngon rol na/_rang gi rig pa'i ye shes dri ma med pa/_sku gsum ye shes dang bcas pa 'di bzhin du gnas te/_de yang man shel dri ma med pa ngo bo ka dag gi sbubs na/_sku lnga ye shes lnga dang bcas pa 'od gsal du gnas pa gzhon nu bum pa'i sku la thugs rje rig pa'i snying po can du bzhugs pa ni ye thog gzhi'i gnas lugs so/__/_de nas 'od phyir bstan la/_ gzhi stong pa ka dag gi ngang la lhun grub 'od lnga'i rang bzhin phyir gsal du shar dus/_'od lnga ye shes kyi rang gdangs las/_dkar po phra phro thugs rjer rig pas/_rang snang rang shar du shes pas gdod ma'i kun tu bzang po gzhi thog de nyid du grol ba'i dpe'o/__/_ma shes pas skad cig gnyis par 'dzin pa 'phro mthud pa las/_'od lngas yul dang lus kyi 'khrul gzhi byas/_phra phro ltar rig pa thugs rje'i rtsal sems su 'khrul te/_las dang bag chags sna tshogs su bsags pas khams gsum 'khor bar 'khyams so/__/_da lta rang gi snying dbus na gdod ma'i mgon po 'od mi 'gyur ba de mtshan nyid gsum ldan du bzhugs te/__/_ngo bo stong pa shel dri ma med pa ltar ka dag gi ngang nas/_rang bzhin gsal ba 'od lnga lhun grub tu gsal ba la/_thugs rje rig pa phra phro snang ba ltar sems su yod de/_ye shes ni snying na gnas te/_de'i gdangs glo bar song ba rlung gi rtas khur bas sems zhes bya bar song ste/_sna tshogs pa rtogs la ngo bo med par shar ba 'di rang yin no/__/_phyis bems rig bral dus rlung bar snang la yal bas gdangs nang du 'dus te/_rig pa lhun grub chen po'i sku nang gsal du dar cig gnas pa las/_rnam shes nam mkha' la thim/_nam mkha' 'od gsal la thim dus/_skad cig dang por stong gsal spros pa dang bral bar gdod ma'i ka dag gi snang ba dbyar ma ston gyi nam mkha' sprin dang bral ba lta bu 'char ro/__/_de rang ngo shes pas skad cig la gdod ma'i ngang du grol lo/__/_de nas 'od gsal zung 'jug la thim pas zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor snang zhing /_zung 'jug ye shes la thim pas ye shes bzhi sbyor snang zhing /_ye shes lhun grub rin po che la thim pas yar ka dag gi snang ba/_bar 'od gsal gyi 'jig rten/_mar 'gro drug gi snang ba mthong ste/_bla ma'i gdams ngag gis grol ba ni/_shel gyi phyi 'od nang du thim pa ltar snang ngo*/__/_de'i tshe shel dri ma med pa ni/_ngo bo ka dag gi snang ba'o/__/_phra phro dang 'od lnga sbubs su 'khyil ba ni/_sprul sku dang longs sku chos skur thim nas nang gsal bum pa'i skur thim la ma rmugs pa gzhon nu bum pa'i skur thugs rje rig pa'i snying por bzhugs pa'i dpe'o/__/_de'i dus na 'od phyir mi gsal yang nang na phra ba'i rnam par yod pa bzhin/_chos sku ka dag gi ngang na rang bzhin 'od dang /_thugs rje rig pa'i cha tsam du bzhugs pa ni shes rab mkha' la 'khyil ba'i bde ba'o/__/_ gnyis pa mtshon bya don gyi ngo sprod kyis bye brag tu bshad pa la/_'od gsal chos sku'i snang ba la gtso bor grol ba rdo rje sems dpa' khong seng gi lam gsang lam rgyud bu chung gi ngo sprod longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i snang ba la gtso bor grol ba zhi khro don gyi ngo sprod/_sprul pa sku'i snang ba la gtso bor grol ba lhun grub rin po che'i ngo sprod dang gsum las/_dang po la chos sku'i snang ba ngos gzung /_khong seng gi lam la rig pa 'pho tshul/_phyir mi ldog pa dpag chen gyi mda'i gdams pa/_grol nas sems can gyi don 'byung tshul dang lngar shes par bya'o/__/_ gnyis pa la klad pa dung khang nas khro bo'i 'char tshul/_tsit+ta rin po che nas zhi ba'i 'char tshul/_thun mong du snying tig gi dgongs pas rgyas par bstan tshul/__/_de rang ngo shes pa'i man ngag gi gdod mar grol tshul dang gsum las/_man ngag la zhi khro rang snang du shes pa me long la byad shar ba lta bu'i gdams ngag/_rang snang lhun grub tu shes pa nyi ma sprin las grol ba lta bu'i gdams ngag/_lhun grub rang ngo shes pa ma pang du bu 'jug pa lta bu'i gdams ngag/_de la btsan sa zin pa rgyal pos rgyal srid zin pa lta bu'i gdams ngag/_de nas gzhan don 'byung ba rgyal 'bangs bde ba la 'god pa lta bu'i gdams ngag gdul bya'i don mthar phyin nas sku gsum dbyings su 'khyil ba 'od khyim sbubs su tshud pa lta bu'i gdams ngag dang drug tu shes par byas la ngo sprod do/__/_ gsum pa ni lhun grub kyi 'char tshul/_rang snang du shes tshul bsam gtan la gnas tshul/_de nyid grol tshul dang bzhir ngo sprad do/__/_gsum pa brtson 'grus tha ma'i grol tshul ni/_chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs las/_ shaRa phyogs mngon dgaRa sprul sku'i zhal mthong nas chos thos/_lho phyogs dpal dang ldan par dbang bskur/_nub phyogs pad+ma brtsegs par lung bstan/_byang phyogs las rab rdzogs par dbugs dbyung /_dbus khro bo'i zhal mthong bas grol tshul dang lngar ngo sprad do/__/_gdams pa'i ngo sprod bshad zin to//__//_ gsum pa rjes rgyab chos gsum gyis yid ches bskyed pa la ma smin pa smin par byed pa dbang gi rgyab chos/_smin pa grol bar byed pa gdams pa'i rgyab chos/_thun mong gi mthun rkyen bsgrubs te rgya mtsho'i rgyab chos dang gsum las/_dang po la dbang bzhi rig pa'i rtsal dbang /_de nyams su blangs pa bde stong gtum mo dang bcas pa/_zhal gdams gnad yig dang bcas pa gsum mo/__/_ gnyis pa la khrid yig ngo sprod dang bcas pa/_rgyab chos rtags tshad dang bcas pa/_btags grol 'das rjes dang bcas pa gsum las/_dang po la 'das rjes don khrid dang /_nor bu'i snying po dang /_sku gsum lam gyi don khrid dang gsum gsum mo/__/_gnyis pa la don gsal me long dang /_snying po gsal ba dang /_rnal 'byor bzhi dang /_rtags tshad bstan pa ste bzhi'o/__/_ gsum pa la btags grol skor dang*/_'das rjes rnam pa gsum te gnyis so/__/_gsum pa la rigs lnga'i bskyed rdzogs/_mkha' 'gro'i gnad yig/_bka' srung gi gtad rgya ste gsum mo/__/_de dag ni rags rim phye ba ste/_ zhib tu bar do'i skor dang /_de'i bcud len la sogs pa chos sde brgyad cu rtsa lnga po yongs su rdzogs paRa skal ldan snying gi bu la bstan no/__/_des kyang nyams su blangs te 'od lus bsgrub par bya'o/__/_'dir ni man ngag snying po'i bcud bsdus nas/__/_mkha' 'gro snying tig gsang ba'i khrid du bsdebs/__/_phyi rabs skal ldan myur du thar 'dod rnams/__/_yi ge 'di la rtag tu nan tan gyis/__/_bdag gis sngon rabs skye bar 'bad pa'i chos/__/_deng sang tshe 'dir yongs rdzogs don mthong nas/__/_gangs ri thod dkar mgul du lus gcig dril/__/_zab gter yongs gter dgongs gter snying la babs/__/_yi ge mi shes don rnams ma sbas par/__/_shog ser shog skya shog 'dra'i ngos la bkod/__/_phyi rabs skal ldan rnams dang 'phrad par shog/_'dir ni khrid yig yid bzhin nor bu'i lugs/__/_shing mo yos la mchims phur lung bstan dus/__/_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams la/__/_gsol ba btab nas rags rim yi ger bkod/__/_dpyid dus babs lugs zab don snying po rnams/__/_dngos dang rmi lam lung bstan la brten nas/__/_o rgyan rdzong zhes bya ba'i gnas mchog tu/__/_ston gsum me tog 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe/__/_'od zer go chas gsol ba btab pa'i ngor/__/_zhib mor bsdus te tshan pa gsum du phye/__/_rgya che rab zab shog skya'i ngos la bkod/__/_yang zab gnad rnams shog 'dra'i ngos la mnan/__/_zab mo'i yang zab shog ser ngos la btab/__/_'di ni shog 'dra'i khrid yig gsang ba'i don/__/_ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i yi ge yin/__/_dge ba 'di yis ma lus 'gro ba kun/__/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gting mtha' med brgal te/__/_mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu zhir 'gro ba'i/__/_rin chen gling du thams cad phyin par shog/__/_bdag kyang deng nas gangs kyi ri bo ltar/__/_ring du gsal bas 'gro ba'i don byed cing /__/_/_zab mo'i dgongs gter dpag med snang ba yin/__/_'dod dgu'i re ba yid bzhin 'grub par shog/_mkha' 'gro snying tig gi khrid yig nor bu lugs su gdab pa zhes bya ba o rgyan pad+ma'i thugs kyi 'od zer snying gi pad+mor shar bas rgyas par byas pa'i rnal 'byor pa pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul du bkod pa rdzogs so//___//

[7.5 khrid yig nyi zla gza’ skar]

@#/_khrid yig nyi zla gza' skar bzhugs pa lags so/__/_ rin chen shog 'dra'i skor/__/_ oM AHhU~M/_pad+ma thod phreng rtsal yab yum la phyag 'tshal lo/__/_las dang skal bar ldan pa zhig/_snang byed 'od kyi lus sgrub na/__/_de yi khrid kyi rim pa ni/__/_nyi zla gza' skar lugs su gdab/__/_'dir mkha' 'gro snying tig gi man ngag gi khrid tshar ba dang grol ba dus mtshungs par 'dod na/_dpon slob kun 'jig rten gyi bya ba snying nas thongs pas/_rab tu dben pa'i nags khrod dam/_ rgya mtsho chu gling ngam/_dur khrod dam/_mi med pa'i lung stong chen por phyin la/_ lto gos kyi zhen pa bcad/_rdo'i bcud len dang /_gtum mo'i lag khrid bslabs la/_bla mas slob bu la/__/_phyi nam zla dus bzhi/_nang 'byung bzhi'i 'gyur ldog/_gsang ba skad cig thangs gcig yud tsam 'gyur bas kyang rang gi tshe mi rtag par 'chi nges pa'i skyo shas drag po zla ba gcig tu bsgom du bcug nas/_mi nas bzung ste 'gro drug gi sdug bsngal dang 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs sems pa la zla ba gcig blo sbyong ngo /__/_de nas 'khor ba'i rgyu mi dge bar shes pas 'dor zhing bshags pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu dge bar shes pas 'dor len la zla ba gcig sbyong ngo /__/_de nas dal 'byor rnyed dka' bsam ste/_sgrib pa sbyong pa'i mchog yi ge brgya pa'i sgom bzlas la zla ba gcig sbyong ngo*/__/_de nas tshogs bsags pa'i yan lag phyi nang gsang ba'i maN+Dal zla ba gcig sbyong ngo /__/_de nas byin rlabs 'jug pa'i gtso bo pad+ma thod phreng gi thugs sgrub la zla ba gcig sbyong ngo /__/_de nas dbang dang gdams pa gnyis chun gcig gis rdzogs par byed de/_thog mar mkha' 'gro'i dbang bskur nas/_de'i sgrub pa la zla ba gsum sbyong ngo /__/_de nas spros bcas bum dbang bskur nas/_rigs lnga'i phyi nang gi sgrub pa la zla ba drug sbyong ngo /__/_de nas lus ru shan 'byed pa'i spyod pa la zhag nyi shu dang /_rdo rje skyil krung zhag bcur sbyang ngo*/__/_de nas spros med gsang dbang bskur la/_ngag ru shan 'byed pa'i spyod pa zhag nyi shu byas la/_phyi snang ba la rgyas gdab/_nang phung po la rgyas gdab/_rtsal sbyang gnyis/_mnyen btsal lam gzhug dang bcas pa rnams la/_ zhag nyi shu nyi shu byas nas/_nang gi sngon 'gro yi ge gsum gyi bzlas pa zla ba gcig dang zhag bcu byas la/_gtum mo zla ba gcig dang /_rlung zla ba gsum bsgom mo/__/_de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang rten can nam/_rten med du bskur la yum mkha' ngo sprod nas/_sems ru shan 'byed pa'i spyod pa la zhag nyi shu/_byung gnas 'gro gsum la zhag dgur brtags la/_rnal 'bebs zhag gsum dang /_sor 'jug zhag gsum gyis zhi gnas ngo sprad la/_ma ning gi rlang zla ba gcig bsgoms la/_rdo rje chu 'thung dang*/_chu 'dren zla ba gnyis sbyangs te/_rang lus sam gzhan lus la brten nas zla ba gsum dang zhag bcur bde stong la bslab bo/__/_de nas tshig dbang bla ma'i dbang bskur la/__/_ dang por rtog pa rtsad bcad pa la zhag gsum bar du sems kyi mtshang btsal ba la zhag gsum/_tha ma byung gnas 'gro gsum la zhag gsum gyi rjes la/_ lhag mthong gi ye shes khreg chod ngo sprad de/_bogs 'byin dang rtsal sbyong la lus ngag yid gsum dril ba'i spyod pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig bya'o/_/_de nas sgo gsum gyi bya ba btang ba la zhag gsum/_bzhugs stangs gsum la zhag gsum song nas/_rtsal dbang bskur te mngon sum ngo sprad nas/_nyin dus 'od gsal gyi snang ba dang /_mtshan dus bde stong gi 'od gsal nyi zla kha sbyor zla ba drug bsgoms pas/_nyams gong du 'phel te/_zla ba bcu gcig bsgoms pas rig pa tshad la phebs so/__/_de nas zla ba bcu gsum na chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba mthong ste ka dag gi grol gzhi la btsan sa lo phyed nas zin te 'od lus su yal te 'tshang rgya'o/__/_de yang chos nyid mngon sum gyi dus na bde stong 'od gsal du nub par byed do/__/_nyams gong 'phel gyi dus na 'od gsal 'dzin med du nub par byed do/__/_rig pa tshad phebs kyi dus na 'dzin med kyi shes pa'ang mtha' grol du nub par byed do/__/_chos nyid zad pa'i dus na mtha' grol gdod ma'i ka dag gi sar nub par byed do/__/_gdod ma'i ka dag bum pa'i skur nang gsal du gnas pas/_dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dgongs pa la lhun gyis grub bo/__/_de ltar mdor dril bas zla ba bdun cu rtsa gnyis te/_lo drug na zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po mi snang bar gdod ma'i sa la 'tshang rgya bar nges pa'o/__/_de ltar rab gsal bla med snying po'i don/__/_nyi zla gza' skar 'char nub tshul bzhin du/__/_'od gsal kha sbyor rin chen snying po'i khrid/__/_shing mo yos lo dpyid 'bring nag pas nya/__/_gza' tshes 'dzom par dpal gyi mchims phu der/__/_pad ma las 'brel rtsal la dgongs gter babs/__/_yang cig de yi snga lo ston 'bring la/__/_pad+ma dkar por bka' srung srog sgrub mas/__/_dgongs gter dpe rnams dngos su gtad pa rmis/_/_de nas bzung ste gter srung mkha' 'gro rnams/__/_lus dang grib ma ji bzhin yod par mngon/__/_'dir ni gangs ri thod dkar o rgyan rdzong*/__/_ dben zhing nyams dga' rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas/__/_ston gsum me tog 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe/__/_nyi zla gza' skar gsang ba'i khrid yig 'di/__/_shog 'dra'i ngos la phyi rabs don du bkod/__/_dge ba de yis srid pa'i 'gro ba kun/__/_tshe 'dir 'bras bu 'od gsal lus 'grub nas/__/_spangs dang rtogs pa'i yon tan mthar phyin te/__/_'pho ba chen pos gzhan don 'grub par shog/_ mkha' 'gro snying tig gi khrid yig nyi zla gza' skar lugs su gdab pa zhes bya ba pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis gangs ri thod dkar du bkod pa rdzogs so//__//

[7.6 zab mo rab ’byed]

@#/__/_zab mo rab 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/__/_ tshogs bsags pa yang yod/_rin chen shog 'dra'i skor/_ zab mo rab 'byed ces bya ba/_dpal rin chen 'byung ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/__/_/_ye shes 'od stong nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis/__/_bde chen gling bzhi'i 'jig rten snang byed cing /__/_kun gyi lam ston ye nas sangs rgyas pa/__/_ gdod ma'i mgon po de la phyag 'tshal lo/__/_mkha' 'gro snying tig bka' gsang rgya che las/__/_zab mo'i gnad rnams rab tu dbye bar bya/__/_ 'dir chos sku'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa 'chad pa la/_bla ma brgyud pa'i sgo nas yid ches bskyed pa dang /_man ngag gi sgo nas nyams su blang ba gnyis las/_dang po ni sku gsum bde ba chen po'i brgyud pa rnams so/__/_ gnyis pa la ma smin par byed pa'i dbang thob nas/_de nyid grol bar byed pa'i gdams pa la/_brtson 'grus rab tshe 'dir 'tshang rgya ba'i gdams ngag/_'bring bar dor grol ba'i gdams ngag/_tha ma rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing du dbugs 'byin par byed pa'i gdams ngag dang gsum las/_dang po la'ang sngon 'gros rnal la dbab/_dngos gzhi ngo sprod/_mjug nyams su blang tshul gsum las/_dang po la sngon 'gro gsum ji ltar bya ba dang /_des mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du dbab pa gnyis las/_dang po la lus ngag yid de rnam pa gsum mo/__/_gnyis pa lus ngag yid gsum chu chad pa'i rang thag ltar 'bad rtsol byar med kyi ngang la gnas pa'o/__/_ gnyis pa dngos gzhi ngo sprad pa la gnyis las/_gzhi khregs chod ni gang shar 'dzin med kyi shes pa gnyen po'i blo dang bral ba ste/_de'ang gnas pa sems kyi rgyan du shar ba/_'phro ba sems kyi rol par shar ba/_gnyis med mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas pa gsum las/_dang po ni rang sems ye nas spro bsdu dang bral ba'i ngang du/_gnas skabs sems kyi 'jug pa nub pa rgya mtsho la rlabs zhi pa lta bu'o/__/_gnyis pa ni sems nyid ma bcos rgya mtsho'i ngang las/_rtog tshogs dba' rlabs kyi rol par shar ba rang 'gros su grol ba'o/__/_gsum pa ni 'phro gnas gnyis su med pas dgag sgrub re dogs gzhi bral chen por gnas pa'o/__/_ gnyis pa la thod rgal sgom pa rnam dag gis rdos bcas 'od lus su dag par byed pa ni lhun grub lus kyi dkyil 'khor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sgo phye nas phyi yi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' la/_nang gi dbyings ye shes kyi sgron ma shar bas/_snang sems 'od gsal du grol bar byed pa ste/_mthong ba brda'i yul du dbang pos bltar yod pa'o/__/_ gsum pa mjug nyams su len tshul bstan pa la bzhugs stangs gsum la gzhi bca' ba/_gzigs stangs gsum gyis gnad bstan pa/_snang ba bzhi'i 'char lugs bstan pa dang gsum las/_dang po ni seng ge glang po drang srong gsum gyis sku gsum gzhi la bzhugs tshul bstan pa'o/__/_ gnyis pa ni chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum gyis 'char sgo gsum gyi gnad bstan pa'o/__/_/_'char sgo gsum ni/_ngo bo chos sku'i 'char sgo stong la ngos gzung dang bral ba/_rang bzhin longs sku'i 'char sgo 'od lnga lhun grub tu gsal ba/_thugs rje sprul sku'i 'chaRa sgo 'phel snang 'phro 'du dang bcas pa'o/__/_ gsum pa ni snang ba bzhi'i 'char sgos lam bzhi'i drod tshad bzung ba ste/_lam bzhi'i drod tshad ni/_chos nyid mngon sum gyi snang ba la thig le sum sbrel du mthong bas tshog lam gsum ji ltar rdzogs tshul/_nyams gong 'phel gyi snang ba dbyings rig rgya cheRa snang bas/_rmi lam 'od gsal du grol te/_ sbyor lam bzhi ji ltar skyel tshul/_rig pa tshad phebs kyi snang ba la sku dang ye shes su snang bas mthong lam rnam par mi rtog pa'i yon tan brgya phrag bcu gnyis su 'char tshul/_chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba la mthong zin gyi don las bsgom du med pas/_phyi nang gi rdos bcas rtog tshogs dang bcas pa che 'bring chung dgu zad pas/_sgom lam sa dgu ji ltar bgrod pa'i tshul bstan pa'o/__/_ gnyis pa ni/_bar do dang po zhi ba chos kyi sku'i snang ba la ka dag tu grol tshul/_gnyis pa lhun grub longs sku'i bar do la/_lhun grub tu grol tshul/_gsum pa lhun grub sprul sku'i snang ba la gnyis med ye shes su grol tshul dang gsum mo/__/_gsum pa rang bzhin sprul pa'i snang ba mthong tshul/_de nyid du nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sbyong tshul/_khro bo'i snang ba la gzhi thog ye shes su grol tshul gsum mo/__/_de dag tu grol ba'i tshe mthar phyin mi slob pa'i lam du sangs rgyas byang chub rig pa gsum brnyes nas/_sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pas/_sems can gyi don rang bzhin lhun grub tu mdzad pa'o/__/_ de ltar zab don snying po'i dbye ba yis/__/_snying tig rgya che'i don rnams bde blag tu/__/_/_rtogs par bya phyir dri med 'od zer gyis/__/_/_gangs ri thod dkar o rgyan rdzong zhes par/__/_rin chen shog 'dra'i ngos la legs par bkod/__/_dge ba 'di yis 'gro kun grol bar shog/_zab mo rab 'byed ces bya ba/_mkha' 'gro snying tig gi rnal 'byor pa pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis ston ka'i dus/_me tog dang 'bras bu legs par smin pa'i tshe bkod pa rdzogs so/__/_/__/_dge zhing bkra shis/_ @#/__/_tshogs bsags pa bzhugs/_ na mo pad+ma badzra ye/_mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dbang khrid ba gdams pa la 'jug pa'i sngon du kun tu bzang po'i rol pas rig pa khyad par can gyi tshogs bsag pa ni/_las kyi rdo rje gsum la sogs pa rnams gtso bo la phyag 'tshal te/_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad dbyings nas spyan 'dren zhing bzhugs pa la phyi nang gi mchod pa dang*/_khrus dang na bza' dbul zhing /_ mchod bstod gyi rim pa rnams dmigs pa sngags dang phyag rgya gcig pas mgrin gcig tu dbyangs snyan pos mchod pa ni/_hoHchos dbyings rnam dag lhun grub chen po nas/_dpag yas thugs rje'i rnam 'phrul 'gyed pa'i lha/__/_ kun bzang rigs lnga rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro bcas/__/_'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs shing byin gyis rlobs/__/_gdod nas byang chub rdo rje snying po'i gdung*/__/_dkon mchog gsum dngos dam chos rin chen mdzod/__/_dus gsum rgyal ba'i phrin las gcig bsdus pa/__/_/_da lta dngos bzhugs bla mas byin gyis rlobs/__/_oM badzra sa ma ya dzaHoM badzra sa ma ya ste/_rol mo dbyangs snyan yid 'ong bdud rtsi'i chus/__/_yon tan rgya mtsho'i tshogs la khrus gsol zhing*/_ /_na bza' rin chen rgyan mchog 'di phul bas/__/_'gro kun skyon bral yon tan rdzogs par shog/_oM sarba thA ga ta a b+hi Shi ka te sa ma ye shrI hU~M/_oM hU~M traM hrI aHkA ya b+hi sho d+ha na ye hUM/_oM badzra wasta a laM ka ra ya swA hwa/_snang srid rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing khams 'dir/__/_kun bzang mchod pa'i sprin phung 'di phul bas/__/_nam mkha'i mtha' klas gyur pa'i 'gro ba rnams/__/_bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par shog/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra puSh+pa d+hA pe A lo ke g+han+te nai wi t+ya shap+ta pU tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye AHhU~M/_ mngon par byang chub chos sku dag pa las/__/_mdzad pa'i rnam 'phrul sgyu ma'i skur bzhengs pa/__/_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dang /__/_dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs la gus phyag 'tshal/__/_rdo rje gdung 'tshob rnal 'byor tshogs rnams kyis/__/_'gal 'khrul nyams chag deng 'dir skong gyur cig/_mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsol ba dang /__/_bla med chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol/__/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsakra rat+na pU tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM/_ sid+d+hi pha la ho/_zhes brjod nas phyag 'tshal te/__/_maN+Dal rgyas bsdus ci rigs su 'bul lo/__/_tshul 'di ni theg pa mchog gi rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis gangs ri thod dkar du legs par bkod pa dge legs 'phel//___//

[7.7 khrid yig rin po che gser gyi phreng ba]

@#/_khrid yig rin po che gser gyi phreng ba bzhugs so/__/_ rin chen shog 'dra'i skor/_ rgya gar skad du/_rat+na so na mA le nA ma/_bod skad du/_rin chen gser phreng zhes bya ba/__/_dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/__/_dpal ldan 'dod dgu'i phun tshogs 'byung ba'i gzhi/__/_kun bzang rigs lnga rdo rje 'chang chen dang /__/_dga' rab rdo rje shrI sing+g+ha dang /__/_o rgyan yab yum gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/__/_rang bzhin zab yangs nges don snying po'i mkhar/__/_mkha' 'gro snying tig bdud rtsi'i sprin 'khrigs te/__/_yang gsang mthar thug zab mo'i char 'bab bas/__/_bdag blo'i pad mtsho ngang gis gang ba der/__/_mkhyen brtse'i chu lha gzhon nu gsal gyur pas/__/_ji snyed ji bzhin dga' ba'i blo mig gis/__/_ de nyid legs mthong 'dzam bu'i chu klung las/__/_rin chen gser phreng bzang po'i rgyan 'di spro/__/_de la 'dir rdo rje snying po'i theg pa'i rgyal po 'od gsal chos kyi sku'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa nyid 'chad pa la/__/_rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i bla ma brgyud pa/_de las byung ba'i gdams pa dngos/_ gtsigs che ba bka' rgyas gdab pa dang gsum las/_dang po ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang mkha' klong rnam par dag pa na/_ ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dpal kun tu bzang po yab yum/_chos sku dri ma dang bral ba ci'i ngo bor yang ma grub pa las/_lhun grub ye shes kyi rnam par bzhengs te/_rnam dag stug po bkod pa bde ba'i zhing du/_'khor phun sum tshogs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa la/_ chos phun sum tshogs pa rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po 'od lnga lhun grub kyi bstan pa/_dus phun sum tshogs pa rang bzhin mnyam pa chen po'i chos nyid la 'pho 'gyur med pa'i tshe/_thugs rig pa rang byung gi ye shes rang shes rig gi rgyal por dgongs pa klong rdol nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rje lhun grub ye shes rin po che'i sbubs nas byin gyis brlabs kyis rang bshad/_ de nyid kyi ngang las rdo rje 'chang yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i mnga' bdag tu rang byon nas/_'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la rang bzhin byin gyis brlabs kyis gsungs/_ las longs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dpal rdo rje sems dpas/_ dur khrod me ri 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang chen por/_sprul pa'i sku dga' rab rdo rje la tshig sdeb sbyor legs pa'i sgo nas gsungs/_de nyid kyis rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi dur khrod chen por mkhas pa shrI sid+ha la mngon sum rang thog tu de nyid kyi ngang phab nas gsungs/_de nyid kyis dur khrod chen po so sa'i gling du/_rig 'dzin gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma thod phreng rtsal skye shi 'das grongs mi mnga' ba rdo rje lta bu'i sku brnyes pa de la gnas lugs yid dpyod dang phral nas gsungs/_ de nyid kyis gzho stod te sgo brag gi tshogs khang chen mor rdo rje phag mo dang gnyis su med pa'i yum mkhar chen bza' mtsho rgyal la lnga ldan ye shes kyi snying po rang gsal mngon sum du gtan la phab nas gsungs/_de nyid kyis mchims phu dpal gyi nags khrod ri mo can gyi dben gnas dam par/_o rgyan yab yum gyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad+ma las 'brel rtsal la/_mngon sum 'od gsal gyi dgongs pa dbang bzhi ye shes kyi chu bo gzhi snang 'char tshul dang bcas pa ma lus shing yongs su rdzogs par gsungs pa'o/__/_ gnyis pa de las byung ba'i gdams pa dngos la/_brtson 'grus rab tshe 'di nyid la 'tshang rgya ba'i gdams ngag/_'bring bar dor 'tshang rgya ba'i gdams ngag/_tha ma rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing du 'tshang rgya ba'i gdams ngag dang*gsum*las/_dang*po*la*sngon*'gro sems kyi khang bu gshig pas rang bzhin ma bcos rnal du dbab pa/_dngos gzhi rig pa'i rang ngo sprad pas 'od gsal chos sku ceRa mthong la bstan pa/_rjes snang nyams kyi 'char tshul bstan pas de nyid nyams su len tshul bstan pa dang gsum las dang po la'ang*/_thun mong gi sngon 'gros 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba dang /_thun mong ma yin pa'i sngon 'gros sems kyi gnas lugs bstan pa gnyis las/_ dang po la'ang /_snang srid bla ma'i lam khyer/_sgrib sbyong maN+Dal gyi lam khyer/_ 'khor ba rgyu 'bras kyi lam khyer/_tshe mi rtag pa'i lam khyer/_byams snying rje'i lam khyer dang lnga las/_dang po ni stan bde ba la 'dug ste bla ma dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas/_sems can thams cad 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho chen po las bsgral bar bya/_de'i ched du bdag gis bla ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom snyam du kun rdzob byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_don dam byang chub kyi sems ni rang gi sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas par gsal gdab pa ni/_bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams/__/_ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa la/__/_yin par shes pa'i bdag nyid du/__/_byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/__/_zhes pa gsum brjod la/_oM yo ga shud+ho dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM gis/_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu'i ngang las/_hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas steng 'og phyogs mtshams thams cad rdo rje'i ra ba gur bla bre ye shes kyi me ri me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus su/_T+TI bi shud+d+he dz+nya na badzra hU~M gis/_pad+ma dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbus su thod pa brtsegs pa ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang /_sgo bzhi gru bzhi rtsig pa lnga dang ldan pa'i phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad dang /_nang ka ba brgyad kyis bteg pa'i dbus seng ge dang rin po che'i khri pad+ma dang nyi zlas brgyan pa'i steng du hUM las rang nyid rtsa ba'i bla ma la brgyud pa'i bla ma kun 'dus longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i rang bzhin dpal rdo rje 'chang gi rnam pa mthing ga rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_rdo rje dang dril bu thugs kar bsnol ba'i pang na/_yum rdo rje phag mo dmar mo gcer bu gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas yab la 'khyud pa/_ gnyis ka'ang rin po che dang rus pas brgyan cing rdo rje'i skyil mo krung mdzad pa'i snying gar zhi ba'i lha tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_thod par khro bo'i lha tshogs lnga bcu rtsa brgyad 'ja' tshon ltar 'od gsal ba'i shar phyogs su pad+ma nyi zla'i steng na/_pad+ma 'byung gnas dkar po yum dang bcas pa/_lho ru shAkya seng+ge ser po/_nub tu nyi ma 'od zer dmar po/_byang du pad+ma sam b+ha ljang gu/_ shar lhor blo ldan mchog sred dkar ser/_lho nub tu pad+ma rgyal po dmar ser/_ nub byang du seng ge sgra sgrogs dmar ljang /_byang shar du rdo rje gro lod mthing nag/_de thams cad kyang yum dang bcas pa rin po che dang rus pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing /_dar gyi na bza' dang rin po che'i pad zhwa rgod sgro'i rtse rgyan/_dar sna lngas brgyan pa/_yab rnams kyi phyag mtshan gtso bo dang mthun pa/_yum thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gtso mo dang mthun pa'i sgo bzhir shar nas rim pa bzhin/_lcags kyu ma dkar mo lcags kyu 'dzin pa/_zhags pa ma ser mo zhags pa 'dzin pa/_lcags sgrog ma dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa/_dril bu ma ljang gu dril bu 'dzin pa'i yab bzhi yang rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas yum dang mnyam par sbyor ba/_rin po che dang rus pas brgyan cing /_bzhengs pa'i tshul gyis bar gyi lha'i snam bu la ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro yab yum so so'i rigs dang mthun pa'i gri gug dang thod pa rigs lnga'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'i 'khor la/_gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol gyi sa dang nam mkha' gang bar 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pa sprin phung 'thibs pa ltar bsams la/_O~M badzra sa ma ya dzaH/_zhes pas 'og min dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten nas de kho na 'dra ba'i ye shes pa spyan drangs la/_mchod nas gnyis su med par dzaH hU~M baM hoHsa thim par bsams la/_gnas gsum du O~M AHhU~M gis rgyas gdab/_de bzhin gshegs pa lngas bdud rtsi'i bum pas dbang bskur ba'i chu lhag ma yar lud pa las/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gcig tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pas dbur brgyan par bsam la/_lha dang mi'i mchod pa nam mkha' gang bas mchod cing bkra shis kyi glu dbyangs snyan pos bstod par bsams la/_dar cig mnyam par bzhag pa'i sku las 'od 'phros pas snang srid snod bcud thams cad la phog_/las dang sdig sgrib thams cad sbyangs/_snod 'od gsal ye shes kyi o rgyan snang la rang bzhin med pa rang bzhin sprul pa sku'i zhing lta bu/__/_bcud kyi sems can thams cad mkha' 'gro dpa' bo dpa' mo'i rang bzhin lha dang lha mor gyur nas/_glu gar dang mchod pa byed pas rang snang gi gzhal yas khang la mchod par bsams la/_O~M badzra gu ru pad+ma sid+d+hi hrIHma ha ri ni sa ra tsa hriya sid+d+hi pha la AHhU~M/_zhes ci 'grub tu bzlas pas/_phyi nang gi lha thams cad kyang de bzhin du di ri ri bzlas par bsams la/_grags stong chos sku'i ngang nas lus lha ngag sngags sems chos nyid kyi 'khor lo gsum las mi 'da' bar bya'o/__/_/_rjes la snang srid phyi nang gi zhing khams thams cad snying ga'i hUM la bsdus la/_de yang rab tu mi dmigs pa chos kyi sku'i ngang nas/_rang bzhin dag pa'i dge ba 'dis/__/_'khor ba ngan song dong sprugs te/__/_srid par 'ga' yang mi gnas par/__/_thams cad sangs rgyas nyid thob shog/_ces pa gsum gyis bsngo ba bya'o/__/_ gnyis pa sgrib sbyong maN+Dal gyi lam khyer la gsum las/_dang po tshangs chen gyi bskal pa chen po maN+Dal du 'bul ba ni/_tshom bu sum cu so bdun bkod la/_gnyis kyis langs te thal mo gru bzhir sbyor la mgrin gcig tu/[ \u0f00] AHhUM/_dbang chen gser gyi sa gzhi/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab/_ shar lus 'phags po/_lho 'dzam bu gling /_nub ba glang spyod/_byang sgra mi snyan/_ lus dang lus 'phags/__/_rnga yab dang rnga yab gzhan/__/_g.yo ldan dang lam mchog 'gro/_sgra mi snyan dang sgra mi snyan gyi zla/_gser gyi ri bdun/_rol pa'i mtsho bdun/_bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad/_gter gyi bum pa/_dpag bsam gyi shing /_ma rmos pa'i lo tog/_yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod yon/_shin tu mdzes pa'i lha mo/_nyi ma zla ba dbus su lha dang mi'i 'dod pa'i yon tan ma tshang ba med pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho legs par bkod de/_bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga gang chen mtsho'i sku dang gsung dang thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo la brten pa'i zhing khams 'byam klas pa tshangs chen gyi bskal pa chen po/_ [（<]a[>]legs par brgyan pa 'di nyid[)]bla ma dang yi dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams la/_kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par dmigs te dbul lo/__/_phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rgya mtsho'i rdul rnyed ri rab gling bzhi'i 'jig rten khams/__/_lha dang mi yi 'dod yon phun tshogs bde gshegs mchod pa'i sprin phung can/__/_tshangs chen bskal pas legs par brgyan pa'i dge legs rgya mtsho'i bsod nams zhing /__/_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs la 'bul/__/_/_rin chen maN+Dal yid 'ong mchod pa'i sprin/__/_/_'dod dgu'i 'byor tshogs dpag med dang ldan pa/__/_ dpag yas nam mkha'i rgyan gyur 'di phul bas/__/_'gro kun rnam dag zhing la spyod par shog/_ces pa lan gsum phul bas lus kyi sgrib pa dag/_sku'i dngos grub thob rang bzhin sprul pa'i zhing khams dag par skyes nas rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar phyin pa'i dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/_ gnyis pa tshangs pa rnga sgra'i zhing khams maN+Dal du 'bul ba ni/_tshom bu dgu bkod la snga ma bzhin langs te thal mo gru bzhis mgrin gcig tu/_O~M A hUM/_'og min gyi gnas rnam dag stug po bkod pa bde ba'i zhing /_thams cad kyang snang la rang bzhin med pa'i zhing khams na/_shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i gzhal med khang chen po/_sgo bzhi gru bzhi rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i gdugs/_tshogs kyi 'khor lo/__/_shin tu mdzes pa'i ri dwags/_lha'i gos/_rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan/_yid du 'ong ba'i 'phan/_zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa/_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can/_gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i phreng ba/_rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che'i tog/_rtsig pa lnga dang ldan pa'i steng na rin po che'i pha gu/_nor bu sna tshogs kyi drwa phyed/_rdo karma shi sha'i mda' yab/_ rin po che'i drwa mig/_seng ma'i pu shu/_rab tu mtho ba'i phyur bu/_'dod yon gyi snam bu/_sgeg mo ma/_phreng ba ma/_glu ma/__/_gar ma/_me tog ma/_bdug spos ma/_snang gsal ma/_dri chab ma/_zhal zas ma/_sil snyan ma/_mchod pa'i sprin phung bsam gyis mi khyab pas phyi nang kun tu yang legs par bkod pa'i gnas/_tshangs pa rnga sgra'i zhing khams chen po ye shes rin po che'i sprin gyi dra bas brgyan pa 'di nyid/_bla ma dang yi dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams la/_ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du rtag pa rgyun gyi 'khor lor 'bul lo/__/_bde chen gnas 'dir shin tu mtha' yas bkod pa'i sprin gyi 'od zer can/__/_sgo bzhi gru bzhi rta babs bzhi ldan ye shes lnga yi rtsig pas brgyan/__/_sgeg mo phreng thogs rin chen glu gar mchod pa'i sprin gyi 'od 'phro ba/__/_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs la 'bul/__/_'og min bde chen rin chen gzhal yas khang /__/_sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin gyi bla bre can/__/_nam mkha' gang bar dmigs te phul ba yis/__/_'gro kun lhun grub zhing la spyod par shog/_ces pa gsum gyis ngag gi sgrib pa dag/_gsung gi dngos grub thob/_rang snang 'og min gyi zhing la longs spyod par 'gyur ro/__/_ gsum pa rdo rje snying po'i zhing khams maN+Dal du 'bul ba ni/_tshom bu lnga bkod la langs te thal mo gru bzhir sbyor nas mgrin gcig tu/_O~M AHhU~M/_ chos nyid 'od gsal gyi zhing khams/_gdod ma nas ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag cing /_nam mkha' ltar stong la mtha' dbus med pa/_nyi zla gza' skar ltar bkra zhing lhun gyis grub pa/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gang du'ang ma phye mi 'byed 'byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang 'gro ba drug gi rnam par 'phrul pa dpag tu med pa'i 'byung gnas chen po/_ lhun grub rin po che'i sbubs/_sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i klong /_dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/_gzhon nu bum pa sku'i zhing khams/__/_phyi dang nang med par kun tu yang nang du gyur pa/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_ljang gu'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro zhing /_nam mkha'i mtha' klas par sku dang ye shes kyi snang ba chen pos/_legs par brgyan pa'i bkod pa tshad med pa'i mnga' thang chen po la dbang 'byor pa/_ 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i zhing khams/_rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing lhun gyis grub pa 'di nyid/_bla ma dang yi dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams la/_dgongs klong rnam par dag pa'i ngang du ye shes kyi mchod pa dam pa 'bul lo/__/_gdod nas rnam dag 'od gsal zhing ni ma skyes lhun rdzogs 'dus ma byas/__/_sna tshogs mi dmigs spros kun nyer zhi ye shes rnam lnga'i gzhal yas khang /__/_sku gsum mdzad pa'i 'od zer dang bcas rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas/__/_bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs la 'bul/__/_'od gsal lhun grub ye shes rnam lnga'i zhing /__/_sku dang thig les ye nas brgyan pa 'di/__/_ rang snang dag pas legs par phul ba yis/__/_'gro kun rnam dag zhing la spyod par shog/_ces pa lan gsum gyis phul bas yid kyi sgrib pa dag/_thugs kyi dngos grub thob/_gdod ma'i gzhi la lhun gyis grub nas phyogs bcur sku dang ye shes kyi rol pas 'gro ba'i don lhun gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/__/_ gsum pa 'khor ba rgyu 'bras kyi lam khyer ni/_'di ltar phyi nang snod bcud 'khor ba'i rang bzhin bde sdug sna tshogs su snang ba thams cad/_rang rang gi las sna tshogs su bsags pa'i 'bras bu ste/_rgyu mi dge ba las kun 'byung dang de'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal gyi bden pa khams gsum dang rigs drug na rang rang gi sdug bsngal so sor myong ba zo chu'i 'khor lo ltar 'khor ba mtho dman du 'khor zhing /_bsod nams cha mthun gyi 'bras bu mtho Ris dang /_sdig pas ngan song du skye la/_rgyu thar pa cha mthun gyi dge bas lam dang de'i 'bras bu 'gog pa'i bden pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob pas/_ de'i phyir 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bdag dang 'gro ba thar bar bya dgos/_de'i ched du thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba 'ba' zhig la bslab cing bsgrub dgos/_de ltar ma byas na spyir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal/_bye brag tu ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar pa'i dus mi 'dug pas/_de ring nyid nas thar pa'i lam sna cis kyang zin par bya dgos/_mi lus rin po che rnyed par dka' ba dal 'byor gyi gru bo 'di don yod par bya dgos snyam du/_ snying nas 'khor 'das dge sdig la spang blang gi blo bsgom pa la 'bad do/_/_ bzhi pa tshe mi rtag pa'i lam khyer la gsum las/_dang po ni phyi dus bzhi 'gyur ba la bsams te tshe mi rtag par bsgom pa ni/_phyi nam zla'i bye brag dgun nas dpyid/_dpyid nas dbyar/_dbyar nas ston du so sor 'gyur zhing zhag dang zla bas mi rtag pa bzhin du/_rang gi tshe yang nges par zad pa'i rtags yin te/_nam 'chi 'am snyam du snying thag pa nas bsgom mo/__/_ gnyis pa nang 'byung bzhi 'gyur ba la brten nas rang gi tshe mi rtag par bsgom pa ni/_rang gzhan thams cad kyi na tshod dang lang tsho yang so ka'i me tog bzhin dar cig rgyas kyang nam zhig gud la rgas pa'i rang bzhin can nad dang sdug bsngal gyi 'byung gnas 'di yang /_so sor zhig cing rnam par 'thor ba dur khrod kyi chos can du nam zhig 'gyur na snyam du bsam pa'o/__/_ gsang ba 'byung bzhi thim tshul la bsams te tshe mi rtag par bsgom pa ni/_ thams cad skad cig gis mi rtag cing 'jig pa'i chos can/_rgan gzhon du rim gyis song ba rnams bsam zhing /_rang nyid kyang 'chi ba'i chos can las ma 'das te skyes pa'i tha ma nges par 'chi ba'i rang bzhin nam 'byung ngam snyam pa nas/_de ring ni 'jig rten 'di na 'dug pa'i tha ma yin la/_grogs dang zas gos dang mal stan gyi tha ma yin nges so snyam pa nas 'byung bzhi thim tshul rnams rang gi steng nas 'byung bar bsams te snying nas mi rtag pa thun mong ma yin pa bsgom mo/__/_ lnga pa byams snying rje'i lam khyer la gsum las/_dang po sems can bde ba dang mi ldan pa rnams la byams pa bsgom pa ni/_khams gsum rigs drug gi sems can 'di rnams rtag tu 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas bde ba dang mi ldan pa 'di rnams snying re rje/_bdag gi pha dang mar ma gyur pa gcig kyang med la/_pha ma nyam thag pa 'di rnams nam zhig na 'khor gnyis pa snying rje ni sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa rnams de dang bral ba las thar bar 'gyur na snyam du snying nas ba_sgom pa'o/__/_ bar shog cig snyam pa ste/_re zhig ngan song gi gnas na tsha grang bkres skom gyis nyam thag/_mi rnams skye rga na 'chi'i chu bo bzhis nyam thag/_lha ma yin 'thab rtsod 'khrugs long gis nyams thag/_lha rnams 'chi 'pho ltung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa rnams mig sngar du yod pa tsam la dmigs te/_ 'gro drug gi sems can drin can 'di rnams snying re rje na/_'khrul snang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las/_bdag gi lus longs spyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis da lta nyid du thar nas bde chen gyi sa la phyin par shog cig snyam du yun ring du bsgom pa'o/__/_ gsum pa byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par smon pa ste/_'di ltar 'khor ba na 'khyams pa'i sems can thams cad thog mtha' med pa'i dus nas gtan du sdug bsngal sna tshogs la spyod cing 'khor ba rnams/_bdag kho nas sems can gcig tsam yang ma lus par 'khor ba nas drangs te sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'god par gyur cig snyam zhing tshig tu yang brjod nas dge ba sems can gyi don du bsngo zhing*/_spyod lam thams cad du sems can gyi don las bya rgyu med par blo sbyong ngo /__/_de dag gi dgos pa yang gnyis te/_gnas skabs su bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyis byin rlabs kyi sgo 'byed/_maN+Dal gyi rim pas sgrib pa gnyis kyi las dag/_ rgyu 'bras bsam pas dge sdig gi mtshang shes/_mi rtag pa bsgoms pas nges 'byung dang skyo shas skye ste 'jig rten gyi bya ba las ldog/_byams snying rje byang chub kyi sems bsgom pas theg chen gyi lam du 'gyur ba dang /_mthar thug sangs rgyas thob pa'i dgos pa yod do/__/_ gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa'i sngon 'gros sems kyi gnas lugs bstan pa la bzhi ste/_ru shan dbye ba/_sgrib pa sbyang ba sngon du 'gro ba/_rnal du dbab pa'o/__/_dang po la gsum las ru shan dbye ba ni mi med pa'i lung pa stong par song ste/_gzhi bdag la gtor ma byin nas/_da ni sems can gyi don du 'khor 'das ru shan dbye snyam du sems bskyed nas/_lus rdo rje me 'bar ba'i spyi bor bla ma'i rnal 'byor bsgoms la/_'gro drug sna tshogs kyi spyod pa dran pas 'gro ba dang /_'dug pa dang mchongs pa dang rgyug pa la sogs pa dran dgu byas pa'i mthar zhi khro la sogs pa'i bzhugs stangs bya'o/__/_ngag ru shan 'byed pa ni/_'gro drug so so'i skad sna tshogs dang /_phaT dang hUM la sogs pa smra brjod dran dgu byas pa'i mthar chos kyi tshig brjod par bya'o/__/_sems ru shan 'byed pa ni/_'gro drug gi bde sdug dang tshong dang 'khrugs pa dang nyon mongs pa dang chos dang /_chos ma yin pa'i dran bsam sna tshogs spros pa'i mthar lha'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o/__/_spyod pa gsum po de chun gcig tu sems la dran pa dang*/_mthun par ngag tu brjod cing lus kyi spyod tshul de dang 'dra bar nyi ma gsum du byas nas/_mtshan mo lus mi g.yo/_ngag mi brjod/_sems mi rtog pa'i ngang la rnal du dbab par bya'o/__/_ dgos pa ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig pa 'dag/_bar chod zhi/_mngon zhen ldog/_sku gsung thugs rdo rjer 'tshang rgya ba'o/__/_ gnyis pa sgrib pa sbyong ba ni/_sbyang bya rang nyid tha mal pa'i spyi bo'i nang du a dkar nag la lha'i bag chags nga rgyal/_mgrin par su ser nag la lha ma yin gyi phrag dog/_snying gar n-i sngo nag*la*mi'i 'dod chags/_lte bar tri dmar nag la dud 'gro'i gti mug/_gsang bar pre ljang nag la yi dwags kyi ser sna/_rkang mthil du du dud kha la dmyal ba'i zhe sdang gi bag chags rnams yi ge'i kha dog dang mthun par yod pa la/_las dang nyon mongs pa 'khor dang bcas pa sol dong nas du ba 'phyur ba ltar bsams la/_sbyong byed sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge'ang /_spyi bor oM dkar po/_mgrin par AHdmar po/_ snying gar hUM mthing ga gsum las ye shes kyi me 'bar bas yi ge drug bag chags dang bcas pa thams cad bsregs nas 'khor ba ngan song gi rgyu 'bras thams cad dag ste/_lus shel gong phyis pa ltar bsam zhing /_O~M AHhU~M dbyangs dang bcas pas brjod do/__/_dgos pa gsum las/_thun mong du sgo gsum gyi sdig pa'i sa bon 'dag cing bar chad zhi nas zhen pa bzlog pa'o/_khyad par du zhen pa log pas phyis 'khor bar mi 'jug pa'o/__/_mthar thug tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs thob pa'o/__/_ gsum pa sngon du 'gro ba la gsum las/_dang po lus kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni/_rkang mthil gnyis sprad/_lag pa spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas/_rdo rje mthing ga me 'bar ba gcig tu bsgom mo/__/_lus khang rul zhig pa'i rnam pa lta bu dang /_khol bur na ba dang /_drod skye ba dang /_sems mi rtog pa'i ngang la gnas pa ni tshad do/__/_dgos pa gsum las/_thun mong du sdig pa dag/_bar chod zhi/_mngon zhen ldogakhyad par du lus 'khor bar ldog cing sprul skur grol ba'o/__/_mthar thug sku rdo rje'i klong du mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/__/_ngag gi sngon du 'gro ba la'ang /_rgyas gdab pa dang /_rtsal sbyong ba dang /_mnyen btsal ba dang /_lam du gzhug pa bzhi las/_dang po la gnyis las/_phyi snang ba la rgyas gdab pa ni/_so dang mchu ma reg tsam du rlung dang shes pa hU~M gsum gcig tu bsres la/_hUM gi glu snyan la ring bar blangs pas snang ba thams cad hUM du me re re khengs par bsam mo/__/_phyi snang ba'ang hUM du me re re byung ba ni tshad do/__/_nang phung po la rgyas gdab pa ni/_hUM brjod dus phyi'i hUM de dag kha sna'i sgo nas zhugs ste/_lus kyi nang du sib sib thim par bsgoms pas/_ lus mi bde ba snyam pa dang*/_hUM gis gang ba snyam pa ni tshad do/__/_dgos pa ni phyi nang gi snang ba thams cad rang bzhin med par 'gyur ba'o/__/_ gnyis pa rtsal sbyang ba la'ang gnyis las/_phyi snang ba la rtsal sbyang ba ni/_hUM mthing nag me 'bar ba zhig gis phyi rol gyi gzugs che chung thams cad phar thal tshur thal mar thal yar thal phug par bsam zhing hUM drag la ngar che bar brjod do/__/_snang ba sang seng khral khrol du song snyam pa ni tshad do/__/_nang phung po la rtsal sbrang ba ni/_dmigs pa de nyid kyis rang gi lus khe khol med par dbug go/_lus chu zla ltar snang la rang bzhin med pa'i nyams skyes pa ni 'byongs pa'i tshad do/__/_dgos pa ni phyi nang gi chos rdos bcas su snang ba rnams 'od gsal 'ja' tshon ltar grol bar 'gyur ro/__/_ gsum pa mnyen btsal ba ni/_mdun du dbyug pa btsugs pa la hUM gis ba thag dkris pas rtse mor slebs dus phyir grol ba lta bu la shes pa gtad nas hUM ring bar brjod pas/_shes pa gang gtad du lham mer sdod pa snyam pa ni tshad do/__/_/_des ni dmigs pa gang du'ang bsgyur du btub pa'i dgos pa yod do/__/_ bzhi pa lam du gzhug pa ni/_mdun na phar srin 'gros lta bu'i lam phar 'khyog tshur 'khyog rgyang ring po'i ri rtse zad mtshams la thug par bsams la/_hUM ring por brjod cing de'i pha rol tu'ang mtha' med par phyin pa la sems gtad pas dga' ba skyo ba la sogs pa'i nyams skyes pa ni tshad do/__/_des ni lus ngag gi lam srol du tshud pa'i dgos pa yod do/__/_de ltar ngag gi sngon 'gro byas pa la dgos pa gsum las/_thun mong du ngag gi sdig pa 'dag cing /_yon tan 'thob mngon zhen ldog pa'o/_khyad par du ngag phyis 'khor bar mi 'jug cing /_longs skur grol ba'o/__/_mthar thug gsung rdo rje'i klong du mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/__/_ gsum pa sems kyi sngon 'gro la'ang /_dang por rtsad bcad pa/_bar du mtshang btsal ba/_tha mar gnas lugs la brtag pa gsum las/_rtsad bcad pa ni/_lus ngag yid gsum po 'di gang 'khor bar 'khyams pa yin/_ bde sdug dang dgag sgrub thams cad kyi byed pa po gang yin/_tshe snga phyir yang gang 'phos shing brgyud pa yin/_gtso gang du 'dug snyam du brtags pas/_ sems gtso che bar shes pa ni rkun ma ngos zin pa lta bu'o/__/_mtshang btsal ba ni/_sems dang de'i yul snang gnyis gcig gam tha dad la brtag pa ste/__/_ de'ang lus ngag sems gsum po gcig gam tha dad/_gcig na lus ngag ltar sems kyang mthong thos su 'gyur la/_tha dad na lus rdul phran cha med/__/_ ngag rjes med gtad yal/_sems bya lam rjes med du song rjes/_tha dad bya dang /_dad byed 'dug gam/_dpyad na 'brel ba ma grub pa'i phyir gcig dang tha dad ma yin no/__/_de ltar na gnyis yin dang /_gcig ma yin gyi phung po gsum pa'ang zhar la khog pas gcig dang tha dad du grub pa ni cung zad kyang med do/__/_de bzhin du phyi gzugs sgra dri ro reg dang /_nang sems la sems kyi 'dzin dus na/_gzugs yul du snang ba dang /_'dzin byed shes pa gnyis gcig dang tha dad la brtags pas/_yul med rten 'brel gcig tu rtog te/_gzung 'dzin gyi rtsa ba chad/__/_gnyis 'dzin gyi mkhar po 'gyel/__/_bdag gzhan gyi snang ba nub/__/_/_dgra gnyen gyi 'khrul 'dzin zhig/_dgag sgrub kyi sprin tshogs dengs/__/_chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i dgongs pa la phyin to/__/_ gnas lugs la brtag pa gsum las/_dang po byung sa byung mkhan la brtag pa ni/_sems ni yul la 'char dus na/_yul las sems byung ngam/_sems las sems byung /_yul las sems byung na yul de rags pa yin na rdul phran cha med du bsil bas ma grub pas de'i chos byung ba'i yul med pas de las byung ba'i sems mi 'grub bo/__/_phra ba yin na kha dog dang dbyibs dang cha shas brtag pas mi rnyed do/__/_/_sems las sems byung na skad cig rang dus na sems cha gnyis su 'gyur te/_byung sa dang byung mkhan cha gnyis su yod pa'i phyir ro/__/_de ltar na sems skad cig la cha gnyis med pas kyang sems las sems byung sa ma grub bo/__/_'on kyang byung ngo snyam na/_sems des de skad zer ram/_yi ge bris pa 'dug gam/_khyod rang snyam pa yin nam/_de skad zer ba dang bris pa 'dug na ga re/_ci yang mi 'dug go snyam pas der 'gro na/_snang ba 'di mun pa'o/__/_snyam pa byas dus der 'gro'am/_des na blos bkod pa sgro btags pa yin pas kyang rang bzhin ma grub la/_de las gzhan du'ang skye sa dang skye mkhan med pas/_sems dang por skye ba med par gtan la phebs pas/_chos sku blo bral chen po thog ma'i zad sa shes so/__/_bar du gnas gnas mkhan la brtag pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_yul drug gi rang bzhin la dpyad pas gzhi med nam mkha' ltar dag ste gnas
