ste/_/re dogs gnyis med tshong zin skye bo 'dra/_/blang dang dor med dgag sgrub kun las 'das/_/dus rnams kun tu kun tu bzang po'i ngang /_/bde chen sa la bde klong gcig tu 'khyil/_/rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i blo bde 'o/_/e ma grogs dag 'khrul pa nang nas zhig_/sku gsum sa la ma phyin lhun gyis grub/_/mdzad pa'i phrin las nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/dus gsum rig 'dzin snga phyi dgongs pa gcig_/gdod ma'i gzhi la lhun rdzogs blo bde 'o/_/da ni bsam rdzogs ye klong yangs pa'i ngang /_/chos zad blo zad 'khor 'das 'dzin pa zad/_/rang bzhin lhun 'byams ma bcos gnyug ma'i don/_/rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid ni/_/ye grol sor bzhag kun bzang rol pa'i zhing /_/bzang ngan blang dor re dogs 'das pa ni/_/snang srid ma lus sku gsum 'du 'bral med/_/ye nas phyam cig thams cad chos zad do/_/med snang stong la phyogs ris 'das pa ni/_/ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje'i 'char tshul te/_/'di zhes ched 'dzin zhig na gdod ma'i ngang /_/gzhi rdzogs ye grol phyam cig sangs rgyas te/_/sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid do/_/de ltar rtogs na rang snang chos sku'i zhing*/_/ma lus 'gro kun sgyu ma'i sangs rgyas te/_/sna tshogs dran rig ting 'dzin yangs pa'i klong /_/mi 'gyur gzhi rtsa kun las 'das pa ni/_/'og min gnas su mngon par byang chub yin/_/'di zhes zhen 'dzin yod na 'khor ba ste/_/de la ched 'dzin zhig na mya ngan 'das/_/mi 'gyur mnyam pa'i ngang yin gnas lugs yin/_/'od gsal dag pa'i zhing yin sangs rgyas zhing /_/yangs so che 'o ma byas lhun mtho 'o/_/rang bzhin gdod nas stong pa'i chos nyid la/_/snang srid sna tshogs snang ba dgod re 'chor/_/ma spangs rang sar grol ba bzhad gad che/_/ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa blo re bde/_/kye ho grogs dag gnas lugs mthong 'dod na/_/bltas pas mi mthong lta ba'i tshol 'phro zhog_/bsgoms pas mi rnyed dran 'dzin dmigs gtad bshol/_/spyad pas mi grub sgyu mar 'dzin pa mthong /_/btsal bas mi rnyed 'bras bu'i zhen pa bor/_/da ltar shes pa bzo med lhug pa la/_/phyogs ris ma byed 'dzin pas ma slad cig_/gang babs shes pa rang shar rang grol la/_/snga phyi'i rtog pas ma bslad yan du chug_/ji ltar nam mkha'i bya lam mi mngon bzhin/_/dran bsam snga phyi da lta ma 'dzin par/_/gang ltar shar ba de ltar yan du chug_/de yi phan gnod shor god 'phung 'tshings med/_/gze re ma byed khong yangs sos rdol cig_/'di ltar rtogs na yin min gza' gtad med/_/skyu ma'i skye bo sna tshogs yul la spyod/_/rmi lam dri zi'i grong dang khyad ci yod/_/ji ltar shar ba de ltar rig pa'i rtsal/_/sna tshogs rtog pa'i rtsal sbyong me long ste/_/snang sems ro gcig 'dod yon sems kyi rgyan/_/_/las dang bag chags kun gyis mi gos so/_/'di ltar chos nyid sems nyid dbyer med pas/_/chos nyid don la bzang ngan blang dor med/_/dge sdig dgag sgrub blo las 'das pa yin/_/_/snga phyir 'dzin pa'i bag chags sems la brten/_/ sems ni gzhi med rtsa ba kun dang bral/_/las dang bag chags phyam cig ye nas zad/_/gdod ma'i gzhi la chos kun mthar byon no/_/tha mal rnams dang rnal 'byor shes pa la/_/dgag sgrub la sogs 'char bar khyad med kyang /_/ tha mal sems la gzung 'dzin a 'thas te/_/rnal 'byor sems la skad cig 'dzin pa med/_/des na dgag sgrub bzung dang ma bzung pas/_/'ching dang mi 'ching rnam pa gnyis su shar/_/thag pa dngos dang mer tshig gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/rnal 'byor dgag sgrub rtogs pa'i rtsal sbyong ste/_/ye grol sems nyid dag pa'i me long la/_/snang srid sems kyi gzugs brnyan ci shar yang /_/de yis mi gos rang snang spros dang bral/_/med bzhin snang ba'i gzugs brnyan stong pas grol/_/snang sems gdod nas chu zla'i rang bzhin la/_/mi mkhas bden par bzung bas rab 'khyams kyang /_/rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor sems kyi rtsal sbyong tshe/_/gang snang rang sar grol ba'i rang bzhin no/_/de ltar rtogs nas 'ching grol med pa'i ngang /_/ye nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor nam mkha' 'dra/_/yangs dog med pa'i ngang nas blo re bde/_/thams cad lhun 'byams gdod ma'i gnas lugs te/_/sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs par phyin/_/phyi nang snod bcud snang srid chos rnams kun/_/ma lus phyam gcig thams cad byang chub bo/_/ha ha 'khrul pa zhig pa'i snang ba la/_/_/'di yin gza' gtad med pa dgod re 'chor/_/ban bun phyad phyod 'al 'ol sgyu ma 'dra/_/sang seng khral khrol chu zla smig rgyu bzhin/_/snang bas stong ste 'di zhes ched 'dzin med/_/gang shar rtsis gdab med pa'i rig pa la/_/dmigs gtad zhen chags med pa'i snang ba shar/_/'di yin gza' gtad med pas nyams re dga'/_/snang sems ye nas grol bas blo re bde/_/ma btsal lhun gyis grub pas bag re dro/_/_/bde chen rgyun chad med pas byin re che/_/de ltar chos kun mthar thug snying po'i don/_/ye nas grol ba'i rang bzhin glur blangs pas/_/'gro kun phyam cig gdod ma'i khang bzang du//rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas shog_/rtogs pa'i 'od stong nyi zer gyis phye ba'i/_/me tog ma rnying yid 'ong pad+mo'i mtshos/_/'gro kun yid kyi bung ba dga' bskyed nas/_/lhun grub sa la kun tu bzang por shog_/tshul 'di blo gros yangs pa'i nam mkha' la/_/dri med 'od zer brgya stong rab 'phro bas/_/skal bzang dad brgya'i pad+mo 'dzum pa des/_/gangs ri thod dkar mgul du legs par bkod/_/dge ba de yis srid pa'i sems can kun/_/gzhi rdzogs gdod ma'i ngang du grol bar shog_/nam mkha' klong yangs zhes bya ba/_dpal o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma sam+b+ha wa'i slob ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul du mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//dge'o//

[7.10 nam mkha’ dri med]

@#/_/nam mkha' dri med bzhugs pa lags/ rin chen shog skya'i skor/ nam mkha' dri med ces bya ba/_dpal gnyug ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/snying po'i ye shes ye nas rdzogs pa che/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal sna tshogs spros kun zhi/_/rang byung thugs rje 'gag med rang shar la/_/'du 'bral med pa'i tshul gyis phyag 'tshal lo/_/ngo bo ma skyes ye nas dag pa la/_/rang bzhin lhun grub thugs rje phyogs ris med/_/sna tshogs mi gnyis sgre med snying po'i don/_/ji ltar bdag gis rtogs bzhin bshad kyis nyon/_/chos kun gzhi rdzogs bsam yul 'das pa la/_/'di zhes mi mtshon bsam bya'i dngos por med/_/rang bzhin mi dmigs yod med mtha' las 'das/_/btags pa tsam ste de kun grub pa med/_/yin min yod med dgag sgrub blang dor sogs/_/ji ltar snang yang de ltar rang bzhin med/_/ye grol lhun 'byams gzhi rtsa kun las 'das/_/nam mkha' bzhin te mtshon pa'i lus med do/_/mi mkhas byis pa rnams ni yul gyis bcings/_/smig rgyu'i chu la ri dwags rgyug pa bzhin/_/gzugs sogs yul lnga'i dngos la sred pas bslus/_/chags sogs nyon mongs chu bo lnga yis bcings/_/_/'khor ba'i gnas las thar ba'i skabs med do/_/bsgoms pa'i bsam gtan pa rnams blo yis bcings/_/srin bu'i kha chus rang nyid 'ching ba bzhin/_/bsgoms pa'i nyams kyis gnyug ma'i ye shes bslus/_/lta sgom spyod pa'i gzeb kyis rtogs pa 'ching /_/zhen 'dzin gnyen po'i ra bar rtag tu 'khor/_/gnyis med rnal 'byor pa rnams snyems kyis bcings/_/mig gi dbang pos rang nyid mi mthong bzhin/_/chos nyid gdeng gis gdod ma'i gnas lugs bsgribs// 'di zhes mi mtshon mtha' bral ngang du 'ching /_/gnyis med mtha' las grol ba'i dus med do/_/kye ho grogs dag legs par soms mdzod dang /_/rgyal po rang gi srid la chags pa dang /_blon po gnyen 'khor rdzas la chags pa dang /_/dbul po khab tsam zhen pas chags pa dag_/srid pa'i sems la khyad par 'ga' med pas/_/gang la zhen pa 'ching ba'i thag pa ste/_/bzang ngan blang dor phyogs 'dzin med par rol/_/sna tshogs gang shar yul la ma zhen na/_/nyon mongs dug lngas su la phan gnod yod/_/ye shes nyid ces rang rig gza' gtad bral/_/rtogs pa'i rtsal sbyong yin phyir gzigs mor che/_/ 'dod yon ma spangs sems kyi rgyan du rtogs/_/gdod nas ma skyes rang shar chen po'i ngang /_/gzhi bral stong pa'i nyams zhes 'dzin pa yod/_/gnas lugs ngang der gnas kyang 'ching byed nyid/_/shes bya'i sgrib des nam yang thar ba med/_/gang la ched 'dzin zhen pa'i sems med cing /_/tha mal shes pa rang 'gros zang ka ma/_/gang babs blang dor 'dzin pas mi 'ching na/_/ye grol nyid de de la bcos ci dgos/_/gzhi nas ma bcos lam du mi 'chos na/_/'bras bu gzhi thog ma bcos lhun gyis grub/_/gang gis bcos na 'jigs pa chos nyid de/_/stong nyid bsgrims kyang mi rtog blo yi nyams/_/rgyal ba'i chos sku 'jigs med 'grub mi 'gyur/_/gdod ma'i gnas lugs byar med ye grol la/_/lam du bya rtsol gang gis bsgoms pa'i mthar/_/byar med rgyal po chos sku 'pho 'gyur med/_/rang bzhin lhun grub thob par rlom pa ni/_/ rgyu 'bras 'gal la gnas lugs phyin ci log_/gzhi nyid nas su blo yis thag bcad nas/_/lam du bra bo'i sa bon btab la 'bad/_/'bras bu nas bzang thob ces rlom par zad/_/gzhi nas gshis kyi gnas lugs ma bcos la/_/lam du ma bcos 'bad rtsol byar med na/_/'bras bu gdod ma'i gnas lugs ci 'dra thob/_/kye ho grogs dag rang bzhin snying po'i sems/_/gtad med rgyal po 'dzin med shar ba'i tshe/_/rang grol rgyal po dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med/_/e ma da dung legs par soms dang kye/_/gzhi nas ma bcos don gyi ye shes la/_/lam du lta sgom spyod pas 'chos pa ni/_/phyin ci log ste gdod ma'i gnas lugs min/_/gzhi lam 'dzol bas 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/_/_/ha ha snying po'i don la sgom du med pa la/_/bltar med spyad med 'bras bu'i zhen pa zad/_/_/'di zhes mi mtshon ye yin rdzogs pa che/_/dag pa'i sems la 'dzin pas ma bslad cig_/gang la 'dzin med rtod phur spangs pa'i tshe/_/sku dang ye shes rang bzhin 'du 'bral med/_/gang shar spros bral ye stong chos kyi sku/_/sna tshogs 'char gzhi mi 'gag longs spyod rdzogs/_/ shar grol 'dzin med gang snang sprul pa'i sku/_/ye grol sor bzhag mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku/_/gnas lugs phyam cig mngon par byang chub sku/_/snang sems gnyis med gdod ma'i ngang du grol/_/ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje'i snying po can/_/gnyam pa'i rgyal po 'du 'bral 'pho 'gyur med/_/de tshe gzung 'dzin mi dmigs dang gcig pa/_/yin min mtha' las 'das pa chos kyi dbyings/_/sna tshogs 'char gzhi 'od gsal me long 'dra/_/dgag sgrub blang dor gnyis med mnyam nyid dang*/_/snang sems kun khyab phyogs bral so soRa rtogs/_/thog babs rang byung shar grol bya ba grub/_/ye shes lnga ldan ye nas rang shar bas/_/_/gzung 'dzin zhen pa ma byed rang gar zhog_/_/gang dga'i sems kyis tha mal rang sar grol/_/_/ngang yin ye yin rdzogs pa chen po yin/_/kye ho grogs dag dran rigs sna tshogs sems/_/gzung 'dzin gnyis snang 'di la soms dang kye/_kha dog dbyibs med ngo bo ngos gzung med/_/ bcos shing bsgyur med ye nas dag pa la/_/'di zhes dgag sgrub blang dor byed pa ni/_/'ga' yis mkha' la yid kyis mdud pa bor/_/dam lhod la sogs so sor zhen bya ste/_/phyi nas de grol nam mkha'i mdud pa zhig_/de la soms dang dgag sgrub cir 'ong gis/_/byis pa'i blo yis brtags pa'i chos rnams la/_/rgyu mtshan gza' gtad 'di yin don la med/_/med pa'i chos la so sor zhen pas 'khor/_/nam mkha'i rang bzhin ye nas dag pa la/_/bcos shing bsgyur med mdud pa ga la yod/_/rang gis bcings grol yid kyis byas par zad/_/de bzhin sems nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin la/_/dgag sgrub blang dor mdud pa brgya byas kyang /_/dgag cing sgrub med blang dor re dogs bral/_/'bad cing rtsol med 'ching ba'i gzeb las 'das/_/_/de kun rang yin nam mkha'i mdud pa tsam/_/don med tshig la dgag sgrub byed dang mtshungs/_/snang srid bde sdug 'gro drug 'khrul snang 'di/_/ngar 'dzin gzugs brnyan bden bden ltar snang yang /_/mi bden sgyu ma chu zla'i gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/med snang 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ma rtogs pas//don med dngos la byis pa a thang chad/_/'khor 'das gnyis med sgyu ma'i rtsed mo la/_/_/ma rtogs bden par bzung bas 'gro ba 'khrul/_/_/rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor 'khor 'das rang sar grol/_/dag pa'i sems nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la/_/gnyis 'dzin 'khrul rtog glo bur chab rom dag_/byung nas bshig ste chab rom chu ru grol/_/thog med dus nas goms pa'i bag chags kyang /_/ yun ring mun par sgron me btegs pa bzhin/_/skad cig rtogs pas rang grol mya ngan 'das/_/kye ho 'khor ba'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i tshe/_/'khor ba 'di zhes logs su spang mi dgos/_/so pa thag pa la kha'i tho yor rnams/_/ rang bzhin shes pas dgra sbrul 'jigs med tshe/_/de dag snang ba spang mi dgos pa bzhin/_/ji ltar gser min khungs su logs pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gzhan du bzlog pa med pa bzhin/_/'khrul pa'i byung khungs 'khor ba'i ngang bzlog pas/_/'khrul gzhi choms nas 'khrul mkhan rang sar grol/_/kye ho grogs dag 'khrul snang ltar snang yang /_/snang dus nyid nas de nyid yod ma myong /_/rags pa rdul phran de yang phyogs cha med/_/sems ni dngos med rang bzhin stong pa'i ngang /_/de la gang dang gang zhig 'khrul bar snang /_/'khrul snang gzhi med rang grol chos kyi sku/_/med bzhin snang bas me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/dag pa'i sems nyid me long ngos shar bas/_/sna tshogs rkyen gyi gzugs brnyan cir snang kun/_/sems las ma byung sems la snang ba tsam/_/ snang bas sems la gos pa cung zad med/_/me long gzugs brnyan rkyen snang shar ba tsam[ (<]a[>]shar bas na[)]/_/me long nang nas byung ba yin nam ci// de ltar ma yin de la snang ba tsam/_/de phyir sems la 'khrul snang yod ma myong /_/sems nyid me long gzhi yi sangs rgyas nyid/_/kun gyi 'char gzhi mi 'gag gzugs brnyan 'dzin/_/de nyid rang bzhin shes pas gzung 'dzin grol/_/de phyir sems las 'khrul pa ma byung la/_/'khrul par snang de sems las gzhan na med/_/de phyir 'khrul snang rang bzhin sems nyid de/_/'ching grol med bzhin 'ching grol snang ba mtshar/_/de ltar rtogs na 'ching grol kun las 'das/_/de skad smras kyang da dung ched 'dzin na/_/go ba'i yul de rtogs pa yod re kan/_/'di nyid thos nas gza' gtad kun bral na/_/dus gsum rig 'dzin gral la 'khod pa ste/_/kun bzang sa la btsan sa la btsan sa zin pa yin/_/kye ho grogs dag dus rnams thams cad du/_/rnal 'byor shes pa nam mkha'i bya lam 'dra/_/bya rjes 'das pa 'gags nas mi mthong ltar/_/dran bsam snga ma 'gags shing mthong ba med/_/de la rjes snyogs 'dzin pa ma mthud cig_/bya rjes phyi ma ma 'ongs dngos med ltar/_/dran bsam phyi ma'i bsun ma ma byed cig_/bya rjes da lta kha dog dbyibs med ltar/_/da lta'i dran bsam tha mal rang 'gros la/_/'di zhes gnyen pos bcos bslad ma byed cig_/gang yin yin gyis ched kar ma 'dzin cig_/_/'di yin med kyis phyogs ris ma gcad cig_/gza' gtad med kyis dgag sgrub ma byed cig/ji ltar shar yang de ltar ma 'dzin cig_/'di ni mthar thug snying po'i lam khyer yin/_/gang ltar shar yang de ltar ma bzung na/_/nyon mongs rang yan ye shes chen po yin/_/'di zhes ched 'dzin zhen pa'i sems yod na/_/ ye shes rang yan nyon mongs chen po yin/_/rtogs pa'i gnad 'di gang la yod gyur na/_/tha mal rang yan chu bo'i rnal 'byor yin/_/babs lugs 'di med chu bo'i rnal 'byor yang /_/tha mal gnas su nan gyis ltung ba yin/_/ gzhi yi don de lam du slong shes na/_/chu bo rgyun gyi rnal 'byor chen po yin/_/ dag pa'i sems la 'dzin pas ma bslad na/_/gnyis med rang grol kun tu bzang po yin/_/mthar 'dzin phyogs lhung khas len med pa na/_/rdo rje snying po'i theg pa mthar thug yin/_/rgya mtsho'i dbyings su chu bran 'du ba ltar/_/ snying po'i don rnams rtogs pa'i ngang 'dir 'dus/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su yangs dog med pa ltar /_/sems nyid rtogs nas thams cad phyam phyam mo/ thams cad gzhi rdzogs lhun grub mnyam pa nyid/_/ma skyed rgyal po 'pho 'gyur med pa'i ngang /_/_/ye grol lhun 'byams gzhi klong yangs pa'i ngang /_/rang bzhin bde chen spros kun nyer zhi la/_/kye ho grogs dag zhen 'dzin 'ching ba'i rgyu/_/sna tshogs rtog pa'i gzebs yin dgos pa med/_/ma byas shes pa rang grol tha mal ngang /_/'di yin gza' gtad med pa ye shes dngos/_/de yin kun yin ye yin rang babs yin/_/thams cad ma bcos rtsol sgrub 'apral ba yin/_/_/ha ha snang stong zang thal chen po la/_/rang grol shes pa gtad med zang thal bar/_/gang babs gzhi grol 'bad rtsol zhig pa ni/_/ smyon pa bu chung las zin skyes bu 'dra/_/gang shar 'dzin pa med na rang dgar rol/_/de la ched 'dzin ma byed ngos gzung med/_/yin min rtsis gdab med na blo 'das ngang /_/gzhi bral chos sku yin te gang bder thongs/_/gnyis med mnyam pa'i ngang ste khyab gdal ba/_/ma byas lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid do/_/kye ho gdod nas ma skyes mnyam pa'i ngang /_/skye bo'i cho 'phrul snang srid cir snang yang*/_/thams cad skye med rdzogs chen bya rtsol 'das/_/a ho ye nas grol ba'i sems nyid la/_/glo bur rkyen gyis grol ba dgod re 'chor/_/ don med byis pa'i rtsed mo 'dra ba la/_/gzung 'dzin gzeb tu 'ching ba ya re cha/_/_/ma skyes rtsa ba bral ba'i rig pa la/_/dgag sgrub gnyis snang Ri mo bkrag re che/_/_/med snang 'khrul pa'i gzugs brnyan rang shar la/_/bdag gzhan so sor 'byed pa nyon Re mongs/_/de ltar don med dngos la goms pa'i blo/_/'khrul phyir 'breng yang 'khrul pa gdod nas dag_/ma 'khrul rig ngo rig na de kar grol/_/_/'khrul pa'i sems la bag chags 'dir yod ces/_/spungs shing bsags med pa dag mthud pa tsam/_/gang du chad pa de ru rtsa ba stor/_/skad cig grol ba chos kyi sku zhes bya/_/rang ngo rigs pas 'khrul pa gzhi la sangs/_/_/mdor na sems ni skad cig nyid yin pas/_/gzung 'dzin gnyis med 'khrul dang 'khrul gzhi med/_/gang shar gcig de de nyid rang grol bas/_/snga phyi'i las dang bag chags skad cig la/_/de yang du ma cha shas nyid bral bas/_/gnyis med rang grol skad cig rig pas grol/_/rang bzhin byas pa med pa'i sems nyid la/_/sus kyang bcos su med de gang bder zhog_/'di yin gza' gtad med pa'i rig pa la/_/dran bsam mthud ma ma gdags rang 'gros thong /_/snang sems ye nas grol ba'i rang bzhin la/_/dgag sgrub blang dor ma byed rang babs zhog_/kye kye gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/bsam yul blo las 'das pas lta ba med/_/ngo bo gzhi nas bral bas sgom du med/_/rang grol mthang las 'das pas spyad du med/_/rtsol sgrub zhen pa 'das pas 'bras bu med/_/ngo bo stong nyid yin pas spangs thob med/_/_/rang bzhin gsal stong yin pas rtsol sgrub zhig thams cad 'gag med yin pas phyogs ris med/_/gang ltar shar yang de ltar ma 'dzin cig_/snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams btags pa tsam/_/ btags pa'i don la ngos gzung med pas na/_/gang la'ang ched 'dzin ma byed rang babs zhog_/'dir ni ngang dang klod dang grol la sogs/_/gnyen po'i rang bzhin dmigs su med pa ste/_/de skad tshig tu go ba sla phyir brjod/_/dran 'dzin gnyen po med pas blo bde 'o/_/'di ltar rtogs nas 'ching grol kun las 'das/_/gdod nas ma skyes nam mkha'i rnal 'byor la/_/phyogs lhung zhen pa'i sprin tshogs dengs pa yin/_/skye med bsam 'das ye grol lta ba ste/_/_/yan ltar byas na lta rgyu med pa lags/_/rang babs lhod chags gang shar sgom pa ste/_/yan ltar byas na sgom rgyu med pa lags/_/spang blang gnyis med 'bras bu'i rang bzhin te/_/yan ltar byas na dpyad rgyu med pa lags/_/ re dogs gnyis med 'bras bu'i rang bzhin te/_/yan ltar byas na 'bras bu med pa lags/_/gang snang sems la brten pa'i chos rnams ni/_/byas kyang chog la rang bzhin bzhag kyang chog_/_/yan ltar byas na bya byed 'das pa lags/_/da ni gzhi rdzogs pad+ma las 'brel rtsal/_/chos zad blo zad 'khrul snang gzhi nas zad/_/thams cad rang zad ye grol mthar phyin pas/_/gzhi bde'i steng du blo bde rgyun mi 'chad/_/'khor 'das 'khrul gzhi rang bzhin rgyun chad do/_/_/gang la chos zad 'od gsal gnyis med ngang /_/'dzin med mtha' grol chos nyid zad pa'i sa/_/gdod ma'i ngang yin bsam yul 'das pa yin/_/de ltar rtogs te sku gsum 'du 'bral med/_/bde chen sa la rgyun du gnas pa yin/_/kye ho gzhi nas dag pa'i chos nyid de/_/mtha' med mtha' dbus dngas pa'i mtsho nang na/_/nyi ma'i dbang po 'od gsal rgyun chad med/_/rang bzhin yid mtshor rtogs pa'i nyi ma shar/_/mi nub stong khams brdal ba kun la khyab/_/ye klong chen por bde klong gcig tu 'khyil/_/gang du 'khrul snang sprul skur thim pa'i tshe/_/sprul sku longs skur longs sku chos skur thim/_/chos sku mtha' grol gdod ma'i klong du thim/_/nang gsal ye shes bum pa'i sku de nyid/_/_/ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad/_/sku gsum sa la rang bzhin lhun grub bo/_/bde chen rol pas gzhan don rgyun mi 'chad/_/nam zhig bdag kyang de 'drar 'gyur bar shog_/'di ni rgyal sras pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis/_/thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'od stong shar ba'i tshe/_/ mkha' 'gro snying tig gsang ba'i don bsdus nas/_/phyi rabs skal ldan smin cing grol bya'i phyir/_/pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis legs par bkod/_/dge ba de yis srid pa'i sems can rnams/_/ma lus phyam cig thams cad byang chub nas/_/gzhi rdzogs 'od gsal snying po'i zhing khams su/_/sku dang ye nam mkha' dri med/ shes 'du 'bral med par shog_/nam mkha' dri med ces bya ba dpal o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma rgyal po'i slob ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dri med 'od zer gyis/_ston gsum me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe/_gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul o rgyan rdzong zhes bya ba'i gnas mchog dam par bkod pa rdzogs so//_//dge'o//

[7.11 man ngag rin chen gser gyi sgrom bu]

@#/_/man ngag rin po gser gyi sgrom bu zhes bya ba bzhuT so/_/ rin chen shog skya'i skor/_/ rgya gar skad du/_rat+na u pa de sha so nA dz+wa d+ha nA ma/_bod skad du/ man ngag rin po che gser gyi sgrom bu zhes bya ba/_dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mgon po gdod nas rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/rang bzhin sems pa mi mnga' zhing /_/'od gsal rin chen gdangs lnga'i sku/_/'gyur ba med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thogs ma'i kun tu bzang po dang /_khams gsum srid pa'i sems can kun/_/ji ltar byung dang 'khrul dang grol/_/rgyal ba'i lung la brten nas bshad/_/de yang gzhi lam 'bras bu las/_/gzhi la ka dag lhun grub ste/_/snang stong 'du 'bral med par gnas/_/rig pa 'od lnga'i klong dkyil na/_/ma bying ma rmongs nang gsal nyid/_/phyi ru ma 'phros bum skur gnas/_/de tshe gang du'ang ma nges pa/_/thog ma'i spyi gzhi zhes bya 'o/_/gdod ma'i mgon po 'od mi 'gyur/_/mes chen zhes kyang de la zer/_/de nas skye med bsam yul 'das/_/thog ma'i ka dag ngang nyid las/_/lhun grub 'od lnga phyir shar bas/_/thugs rje rig pa'i gdangs nyid kyang /_/de dang mnyam du rig ste shar/_/dper na shel gong dag pa la/_/rnam lnga'i 'od dang phra phro'i 'od/_/ji ltar mnyam du shar ba bzhin/_/de nas rig pa yon tan nyid/_/ yul la 'byed cing rtog par shar/_/'od lnga'i gdangs la 'di snyam du/_/'di ltar snang ba'i rang bzhin las/_/bdag nyid byung ngam 'od snang 'di/_/rang las byung zhes dpyod pa na/_/skad cig de la rang rig pas/_/thog ma'i kun tu bzang po ni/_/gzhi thog nyid du byang chub bo/_/de ltar rang 'od shar ba la/_/rang du ma shes gnyis 'dzin mthun/_/de tshe 'dzin pa'i sems de la/_/ rtsa ba'i ma rig zhes bya 'o/_/sems de rags par med pas na/_/mi gsal gsal ba'i bdag nyid can/_/yod min med min zhes bya ste/_/myu gu'i sems zhes de la bya/_/de tshe kun bzang chen po de'i/_/ka dag ngang las sku sprul pa/_/ dgu phrugs rim gyis ston pa yi/_/longs sku sprul sku'i snang ba las/_mi mjed la sogs 'jig rten gyi/_/thog ma'i mgo yang brtsam par mdzad/_/de nas sems can sems nyid des/_/ci yang med par 'khrul pa dang /_/sa gzhi rgya mtsho'i bar chags te/_/rnam shes nam mkha' mtha' yas 'khrul/_/de tshe rgya mtsho 'khrugs par snang /_/de nas gzugs khams yas rim chags/_/de tshe ri dang gling rnams kyang /_/mas rim grub ste 'dod pa'i lha/_/ri rab dag la brten nas byung /_/de tshe sprul sku'i chos sku yang /_/ston pa'i thugs rje 'od zer las/_/rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing khams bzhi/_/'og min rnam snang phyogs bzhir snang /_/de ltar zhing lnga'i ston pa las/_/sprul sku longs sku'i rnam 'phrul te/_/_/snang ba dam pa la sogs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas stong sprul sems can btul/_/_/de dag kun las rnam 'phrul ba/_/sprul pa'i sprul pa zhes bya ste/_/bzo dang skye ba la sogs pa'o/_/de ltar 'khrul pa'i sems can la/_/sangs rgyas snying po snying la gnas/_/rig pa'i ngo bo ka dag la/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal gdangs dang bcas/_/thugs rje 'gags med rig pa gsal/_/zer dang gdangs su 'phro ba'o[(]a[》]gdangs su 'gro ba 'o[) ]/_/ lus kyi rtsa bdun srog rtsar brten/_/de ltar brgyad la rlung gi rtas/_/rig pa snying gi gdangs khur bas/_/rnam par shes pa zhes byar btags/_/sems ni rlung can grong nas rgyu/_/dbang po lnga las phyir thon nas/_/yul 'dzin pa la so sor 'jug_/bag chags sna tshogs sogs pa 'o/_/ye shes snying na gnas pa'i gdangs/_/dung khang khro bo'i dkyil 'khor la/_/rtsa rnams nang na sgrom mar gsal/_/thig le thig phran 'od lngas brgyan/_/de ltar snying nas ye shes gdangs/_/dar dkar rtsa nas rgya mtshor shar/_/sprin med mkha' la snang ba 'o/_/de ni gzhi yi bzhugs tshul lo/_/da ni lam gyi 'khyer tshul la/_khregs chod thod rgal rnam gnyis so/_/de yang shel gyi phra phro ltar/_/sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i sems 'di nyid/_/ye shes gdangs te ngos gzung med/_/snga phyi da lta du yang med/_kha dog dbyibs med mtshan ma med/_/de ltar lta bas thag bcad nas/_/dbang po rab 'bring tha ma yis/_/de nyid nyams su len pa'i tshe/_/tha mas rtog pa rtsad bcad la/_/skye 'gag med pa'i ngang la gzhag_/'bring gis phaT ces rang ngor blta/_/rbad kyis bcad nas phyam gyis gzhag_/rab kyis gang shar ye shes gdangs/_/spang blang 'dzin med rang sar grol/_/thog babs gang shar rang 'gros gtang /_/yangs so che 'o rig pa'i sems/_/sna tshogs snang ba'i yul rnams la/_phyod de bun ne 'dzin pa med/_/gang shar rtog pa rol du chug_/yengs dang ma yengs bsgom du med/_/lta dang mi blta dpyad du med/_/thams cad kun bzang rol par khyer/_/de ltar gzhi rtsa chod pa des/_/lus dang yul gyi rdos bcas nyid/_/'od gsal ngang du grol bya'i phyir/_/bzhugs stangs gsum la gzhi byas te/_/gzigs stangs gsum gyis gnad bkrol nas/_/skyes pa bud med bye brag gis/_/rgya mtsho g.yas g.yon rig pa gdon/_/dbyings kyi ngang du lu gu rgyud/_/'gul 'khrigs med par bzhag pa la/_/mig gtad sems kyis bzung mi bya/_/'od snang chags zhen med pa blta/_/de tshe chu yi sgron ma las/_/phyi dbyings nam mkha' sprin bral la/_/_/nang dbyings rnam dag sgron ma ni/_/'ja' 'am rma bya'i mdongs ltar 'char/_/de nas thig le stong sgron na/_/lnga ldan 'od kyi mu khyud can/_/sum sbrel la sogs shar ba'i dbus/_rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud/_/phra la 'gro 'ong byed pa ni/_/mi 'gul mig gis lta ba dang /_/rlang ni kha nas drangs pa yis/_/ gsal stong skye med lhag shar ba/_/shes rab rang byung sgron ma ste/_/de nyid ngang la rgyun du bzhag_/bying rgod byung na rab gsal te/_/zas gos bsil la lta stangs bstod/_/gnas ni dngas shing mtho sar bsgom/_/nyams ma 'phel na spyod pa bya/_/_/dur khrod lung stong la sogs su/_/smyon pa lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/cir snang dgag sgrub med par spyad/_/mngon zhen dgag sgrub rang sar grol/_/mtshan dus 'od gsal snying la bsdu/_/rang gsal 'od lnga'i pho brang na/_/'od gsal rigs lnga snang ba la/_/ma yengs shes pa skye med bzhag_/gnyid rnams 'od gsal chos skur grol/_/ldang dus snang srid chos sku'i zhing /_/sems can lha dang lha mo'i ngang /_/'gro kun lha yi dkyil 'khor la/_/grags pa'i sgra rnams sngags su shes/_/dran rig rang grol chos nyid ngang /_/snang srid sgyu ma'i lam khyer bya/_/nyal dus gzhi bral gdod ma'i ngang /_/chos kun mnyam pa chen po ru/_/skye med 'od gsal goms par bya/_/ nyi ma'i phyogs nas khru gang sar/_/mig gtad zur la bags kyis khrid/_/de yis 'od snang 'char ba yin/_/mngon sum gong 'phel tshad phebs te/_/phyi nang rdos bcas rtog mtha' zad/_/_/de tshe 'khrul snang longs skur zad/_/ longs sku nyid kyang 'dzin med par/_/ka dag ngang du mya ngan 'da'/_/ji ltar sngon thog nyid kyi gzhi/_/thim la ma rmugs bum pa'i sku/_/nang gsal phyi rgya ma ral ba/_/rang ngo nang bltas thams cad mkhyen/_/rnam pa'i yul rnams phyi rol mkhyen/_/gdul bya gzigs nas sku 'gyed de/_/ngo bo nyid kyi chos sku las/_/lhun grub longs sku rigs lnga'i gdangs/_/de las sna tshogs sprul pa yis/_/'gro ba'i don kun rab rdzogs nas/_/thog ma'i ngang du slar thim 'gyur/_/de ltar rab tu brtson pa yis/_/lo drug phung po lhag med 'grub/_/ brtson 'grus 'bring rnams 'diRa sbyong nas/_/_/chos nyid bar dor mya ngan 'da'/_/de yang skye gnas bar ma dor/_/dam pa'i drung du sems thag bcad/_/dang por thos pas thag bcad de/_/cir snang ye shes lhun grub gdangs/_/byung tshor rnam rtog ye shes dngos/_/yin min rol par ngang gcig ste/_/gzhan snang med de rang snang dngos/_/thams cad ye yin ye shar du/_/ snang sems lta bas thag bcad nas/_/bar du de nyid 'di ltar bsgom/_/nyin dus chos nyid bar do la/_/_/lhun grub 'od lnga'i rtsal sbyong bya/_/_/'jug dang shes pa grol ba'i gnad/_/rnal 'byor pa yis shes par bya/_/nyal dus dbang po'i 'gags tshul dang /_/bar do'i gdams pa dran par bya/_/gnyid dus 'od gsal sems nyid la/_/goms pas gdod ma'i ngo sprod dran/_/rmi lam bar do'i 'char tshul du/_/ngos gzung yang yang rtsal sbyang bya/_/sad dus sngar bzhin gsal gdab bo/_/_/tha mar de nyid goms pa yis/_/dus kun bar do dran pa dang /_/phyogs bzhi gsum gnyis mdun ngos tsam/_/'od kyi snang bas khyab pa dang*/_/sems la dgag sgrub rnam rtog chung /_/'khrul pa'i rmi lam rgyun chad dang /_/cir snang gang shar 'dzin pa med/_/gar gtad ting 'dzin shes pa gnas/_/rtsa bral ka dag rtogs par ldan/_/de ltar goms pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/'chi kha'i bar do gsal gdab ste/_/rang rig gdon la slar gdab bo/_/_/bla ma'am ni rdo rje'i spun/_/_/dam tshig ldan pas dran pa gso/_/bar dor 'char ba'i rang snang la/_/rang snang nyid du shes par mdzod/_/bde bar gshegs zhes lan gsum brjod/_/sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi/_/rang rang la ni thim dus su/_/shes pa mig nas mkha' la blta/_/sngar gyi gdams pa dran par bya/_/rnam shes nam mkha'i ngang du thim/_/de tshe sems rig dbugs dang bral/_/rig gdangs rta yang nam mkhar yal/_/nang dbugs chad de nam mkha' 'dra/_/'dzin pa'i sems nub gzung ba thim/_/phra rags rnam rtog rang nub ste/_/nam mkha' 'od gsal thim pa'i tshe/_/rang bzhin gdod ma'i 'od gsal ni/_/ka dag nam mkha' 'dra ba la/_/lhun grub nyi zla gza' skar ltar/_/nam mkha' khyab pa'i snang ba 'char/_/la la 'di nas grol ba yod/_/'od gsal zung 'jug thim pa'i tshe/_/tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor snang ba ste/_/sgra 'od zer du 'khrigs pa dang /_khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mngon par snang /_/rang snang shes pas grol ba yin/_/de nas zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/rnam snang mi bskyod rin chen 'byung /_/snang mtha' don yod grub pa ste/_/so so'i yab yum sems dpa' dang /_/sems ma sgo ma'i rang bzhin rnams/_/zhag lngar rim gyis 'char ba yin/_/de tshe rang lus 'od gsal gyi/_/snying ga nas ni zer thag byung /_/'od lnga'i tshom bu'i thugs kar 'brel/_/rig pa 'od la 'jug pa ste/_/snang ba de kun rang yin pas/_/ dpag chen mnga' yi gdams pa ni/_/tshom bu'i thugs kar rang rig 'phangs/_/'dres pas mi rtog ting 'dzin 'byung*/_/de la sems gzung rang sa zin/_/skad cig gsum la grol ba yin/_/sprul pa bkye nas don byed do/_/de nas gdod mar rab thim gyur/_/de ltar ma gyur rnal 'byor pa/_/snang ba de kun zer thag la/_/'dus nas rang la thim pa ni/_/'od ni rig par 'jug pa ste/_/de tshe ma pang bu 'jug ste/_/gdams ngag 'di ltar dran par bya/_/rang shar rang snang rang la thim/_/de nyid rang la sems bzung ste/_/mi rtog ting 'dzin mnyam gzhag pas/_/rang grol gzhan snang sprul pa 'gyed/_/ka dag ngang du mya ngan 'da'/_/gdod ma'i sa la mthar phyin no/_/de la nges pa ma rnyed na/_/zung 'jug ye shes la thim tshe/_/ye shes bzhi sbyor snang ba 'char/_/snying ga nas ni nam mkha' la/_/'od kyi nyi zhur rtsegs ma ni/_/mthing ga dkar ser dmar ba'i gdangs/_kha dog mthun pa'i thig les brgyan/_/de tshe rang snang mi 'gyur ba/_/gser gyi thur ma'i gdams ngag ni//'od dang thig ler sems bzung bas/_/ka dag sa la btsan sa zin/_/de la nges pa ma rnyid na/_/ ye shes lhun grub thim pa'i tshe/_/phyogs rnams ston ka'i nam mkha' ltar/_/ snang ba mu khyud lnga dang ldan/_/kun gyi nang na lha yi sku/_/zhi dang khro tshul dpag med snang /_/_/yar la ka dag zad sa mthong /_/mar la rigs drug snang ba mthong /_/bar du 'ja' tshon lha sku mthong /_/de tshe rang snang rang rig pas/_/ dpag chen mda' ltar phyir mi ldog_/'char tshul brgyad dang mngon shes drug_/rjes dran drug gis mthar phyin ni/_/rol pa'i rtsal du thim tshul brgyad/_/de ltar rim gyis snga phyi ru/_/grol ba sngar gyi goms pas bzung /_/skad gcig dang por rang ngo shes/_/gnyis par mi rtog bsam gtan skye/_/gsum par gzhi thog grol ba yin/_/'di la dbang po'i khyad par gyis/_/phyogs bzhi 'od snang rtogs par ldan/_/bco lnga'i nyi zla 'char nub bzhin/_/dbugs chad grol ba dus mnyam mo/_/'bring rnams 'od gsal zung 'jug grol/_/tha ma ye shes lhun grub la/_/nges pa rnyed nas grol ba yin/_/tha mas sprul pa mi 'byin zhes/_/rgyud dang man ngag dag las gsungs/_/ye shes lnga sbyor mi snang ba/_/bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni/_/ka dag grol gzhi ljang gur gnas/_/de nyid mi snang de yi phyir/_/ye shes bzhi sbyor snang bar 'dod/_/de'ang bar dor snang ba la/_/skad cig rang ngo shes tsam gyis/_/grol ba gzhi snang mthong ba dang /_/'od lus yin par shin tu sla/_/dper na rmi lam 'jigs skrag la/_/rmi lam shes pas skad cig la/_/snang ba rang log bde ba bzhin/_/gdod ma'i gzhi la skad cig gis/_/rang gnas ka dag chen por grub/_/dbang po 'bring gi grol lugs so/_/_/tha ma rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing /_/bar do med par grol ba ni/_/tshe 'dir 'od gsal goms gyur nas/_/shes rab rtogs par mi ldan pas/_/rmi lam bzang bar gyur pa de/_/snang srid rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing /_/sems can lha dang lha mo ru/_/'gro 'chag nyal sad snang ba dang /_/spyod lam kun tu dran par bya/_/_khyad par mi gnas rang rig ni/_/skabs su sprul sku'i ston pa nyid/_/bsam pa'i thugs kar 'phangs par bya/_/'chi dus rig pa mig nas ni/_/sprul sku'i zhing dran de ru 'phangs/_/de la goms pa mchog gyur pas/_/ dbugs chad mngon dgar skye ba mnyam/_/'bring dang tha ma'i spyod yul ni/_/ bar do rnams kyang rim shar nas/_/lhun grub nub dang dus mnyam du/_/chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis/_/mngon dga'i zhing du rdzus te skye/_/tha mas srid pa'i bar do nyid/_/nyug tsam shar nas mngon dgar skye/_/yang mthas srid pa'i bar do ru/_/ring zhig lon nas rmi lam bzhin/_/mngon dga'i zhing du skye ba yin/_/de tshe mngon dga' rdo rje'i zhing /_/rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mthong nas/_/chos thos zhe sdang nyid dag ste/_/me long ye shes de yis thob/_/ de nas bar do mi snang bar/_/skad cig rdzus ste dpal dang ldan/_/rin chen 'byung ldan dbang bskur nas/_/nga rgyal dag cing mnyam nyid rtogs/_/de nas pad+ma brtsegs pa ru/_/_/snang ba mtha' yas lung bstan nas/_/'dod chags dag ces sor rtogs thob/_/las rab grub par dbugs phyung nas/_/phrag dog dag byed bya ba grub/_khro bo'i zhing mthong skad cig la//bden pa mthong nas rnam par grol/_/lhun grub ka dag nyid thim nas/_/ka dag nang gsal chos sku la/_/rang sa zin te 'du 'bral med/_/gdul bya gzigs nas sprul pa 'gyed/_/de yang lhun gyis grub par 'byung /_/gdul bya zad nas sprul pa yang /_/mi gnas gdod ma'i ngang du thim/_/de ltar sangs rgyas chos rnams kyang /_/'bad med rang sar grol ba yin/_/ji lta ji ltar sems can gyi/_/bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab ltar/_/de lta de ltar sangs rgyas kyi/_/grol ba'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab/_/la larzab don rgya mtsho'i khog dbub thun mong rgyu 'bras te/_/grangs med bskal pas grol ba dang /_/_/la lar 'bras bu lam byed pas/_/bcu drug skye bas grol ba dang /_/la la tshe gcig grol lo zhes/_/pha ma gnyis su med rgyud du/_/ gsungs shing bstan yang dgongs don tsam/_/sangs rgyas snying po 'od gsal zhing*/_/tshe 'dir rdos bcas mi nub pas/_/yang dag ma yin nges don min/_/ 'dir ni kun tu bzang po yis/_/mchog gsang yang rab dbang po la/_/chos kyi sku yi bstan pa ni/_/bla med rdo rje snying po gsungs/_/de yis tshe 'di'i longs sku'i zhing /_/bgrod nas chos sku mthar phyin 'gyur/_/gzhan rnams sprul sku'i bstan pa ste/_/sems las sangs rgyas grub par rlom/_/'dir ni sems las sangs rgyas med/_/ye shes 'od gsal lam byed pas/_/gdod ma'i gzhi la mthar phyin na/_/gzhi lam 'bras bu 'od gsal te/_/sems ni rigs gdangs rlung ltar zhon/_/sgyu lus zhig tshe 'dor bar 'dod/_/de phyir kun dang 'di mi mtshungs/_/_/dam pa'i snying gi snying po'i lam/_/_/snying tig gsang ba'i man ngag 'di/_/shin tu yang zab kun gyi rtse/_/grol ba rnams kyi mthar phyin to/_/rgyal sras pad+ma'i bka' drin gyis/_/dri med 'od zer rnal 'byor pas/_/ston gsum gangs ri thod dkar du/_/man ngag gser gyi sgrom bu bkod/_/dge bas srid gsum sems can kun/_/'od gsal zhing du grol bar shog_/man ngag rin po che gser gyi sgrom bu zhes bya ba/_dpal o rgyan gyi mkhas pa chen po rang byung pad+ma'i byin rlabs las/_lhun gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa mang du thos pa'i nang nas/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin mngon par mtho ba'i pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis/_gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul du ston gsum me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/dge zhing bkra shis pa lags so//_//

[7.12 tshig don rin po che’i bang mdzod]

@#/_/tshig don rin po che'i bang mdzod bzhugs so/_/ dge'o/_/shog skya'i skor/ rgya gar skad du/_rat+na sam b+ha tra ko sha nA ma/_bod skad du/_tshig don rin po che'i bang mdzod ces bya ba/_dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ma lus rab gzigs shing /_/sku gsum mdzad pa'i phrin las bzang po can/_/kun bzang rgyal ba longs sku rigs lnga'i tshogs/_/rig 'dzin bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag blo'i rnam dpyod lde mig bzang po yis/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig rin chen sgo phye ste/_/tshig don rnam bkra'i 'byor tshogs dpag med kyis/_/skal ldan skye bo'i yid rab tshim par bya/_/ de la 'khor 'das gnyis kyi sngon rol na/_/gshis kyi gnas lugs bstan pa dang gcig_/_/kun tu bzang po'i grol tshul dang gnyis/_khams gsum 'khor ba'i 'khrul tshul dang gsum/_sems can la ye shes kyi gnas tshul dang bzhi/_lam dang sgo gang nas snang tshul dang lnga/_yul gang la snang tshul dang drug_/tshe 'dir ji ltar nyams su blang tshul dang bdun/_bar dor ji ltar 'char tshul dang brgyad/_rang bzhin sprul sku'i snang tshul dang dgu_/grol sa gang du 'bras bu thob tshul dang bcu las/_dang po ni stong gsal 'dus ma byas pa'i ka dag nam mkha' rnam par dag pa lta bu'i ngang nas/_'od gsal lhun gyis grub pa'i snang ba/_nyi zla gza' skar ltar nang gsal ye shes kyi 'od lnga ma 'gags shing*/_thugs rje rig pa'i snying po can du bzhugs te/_rtsa ba'i rgyud rig pa rang shar las/_/_gdod ma ngo bo chos nyid kyis dag pa'i gnas lugs 'di lta ste/_rgya ma chad pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas spros pa dang bral ba'i chos nyid mtha' dang bral ba'i rig pa/_dag pa chen po'i snang ba/_phyogs lhung med pa'i lta ba/_yangs pa/_gsal ba/_mi 'gyur ba/_ye shes mi 'gag pa/_mi 'khrul ba'i chos nyid/_phyi rgya ma ral ba/ nang ye shes kyi 'od lnga ma 'gag pa/_sku dang ye shes kyi ngo bor bzhugs so zhes pa dang /_sgron ma 'bar ba las/_gdod ma'i ka dag chen po la/_/rang bzhin nyid ni 'di lta bu/_/sus kyang ma byas rang gsal bar/_/ye nyid nas ni rang bzhin no zhes so/_/_/de yang ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum du bzhugs te/_nyi zla kha sbyor las/_gzhi gnas kyi ye shes ni gsum ste/_ngo bo ka dag gi ye shes dang /_/rang bzhin lhun grub kyi ye shes dang /_/thugs rje rang snang gi ye shes so/_/zhes so/_/ye shes gsum po de'i ngo bo ni klong gsal las/_/_ngo bo ka dag ye shes ni/_/ma rig rtog pa kun dang bral/_/ rang bzhin lhun grub ye shes ni/_/stong gsal rang mdangs nyid du gnas/_/ thugs rjes kun khyab ye shes ni/_/'gag med snang stong nyid du gnas/_/zhes pa dang /_kun tu bzang po thugs kyi me long las/_chos sku'i ye shes bsam 'das brjod med ngang /_/longs sku'i ye shes kha dog ma 'dres gsal/_/ sprul sku'i ye shes cir yang sgyur du btub/_/ces so/_/de'ang nang gsal ye shes kyi 'od lnga la shes rab srog tu gyur pa'i rlung yan lag bzhi ldan thugs rje 'char byed kyi rnam par gnas te/_lung ye shes mar me'i rgyud las/ yan lag rlung bzhi me stag zer bzhin du/_/rig pa'i klong na ma 'gag gsal ba 'o/_/zhes pas/[ ·]rtsa ba thugs rje rig pa'i cha ni/_srog rlung rtsal stabs skyon yon sna tshogs kyi 'char gzhi ma 'gags pa las/_gyen du rgyu shes rab kyi rta rig pa dang /_thur sel shes rab kyi zer gdangs 'od lnga dang /_me dang mnyam pa smin par byed pa'i stabs can dang /_khyab byed rdzogs par byed pa'i stabs can te/_dbyings su ni ma 'phros/_'phro gzhi ma 'gags pa'i snying por gnas pa'o/_/de ltar na ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum tha dad med de/_thal 'gyur las/_ye shes rang ngor gnas pa las/_/gsum gyi tshul du dbyer med do/_/_/rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das/_/mtha' gzhi'i dri ma rang sangs nyid/_/ces so/_/ gnyis pa ni gdod ma'i gzhi 'od kyi khang pa can/_chos nyid dag pa'i ye gdangs chen po las/_ye shes rlung thugs rje rig pa'i snying po can g.yos pas/_nang gsal phyir shar te/_ka dag gi nam mkha' la lhun grub sku dang ye shes kyi nyi zla gza' skar dang bcas pa/_shel 'od phyir snang ba ltar snang la/ yul 'od gsal gyi snang ba byad dang me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar rang snang rang gdangs chen por thugs rje'i rig pa'i ye shes kyi rang ngo shes pa'i skad cig ma gcig gis bye brag phyed de/_skad cig ma phyi ma de la dang po'i gzhi thog nyid du sangs rgyas te/_skad cig gcig gis bye brag phyed/_/skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/zhes so/_/de'ang skad cig ma la 'gyur ba rang thog gdod ma'i gzhir chod pa nyid/_thal 'gyur las/_sangs rgyas 'khrul par ma gyur pas/_/gzhi nas 'phags pa'i dbang po yis/_/rang snang rang bzhin med shes pas/_/'gyu ba rang thog chod pa 'o/_/zhes so/_/de'i tshe skad cig dang por rig pas ma rig pa'i rtsa ba chad de/_nang gsal nyid du lhun gyis grub par ni/_/_ye shes nam mkha' mnyam rgyud las/_/_de tshe kun bzang chos drug gis/_/gzhi shes ma rig drug bcom nas/_/nyug tsam las ni rig tsam stongs/_/reg tsam byung bas rig 'grib brlag_/sal gyi gsal las mun ngos sangs/_/wal gyis byung bas 'thibs pa med/_/sgro skur bral bas ma rig dang /_/'gyur ba med pas nam mkha' 'dra/_/de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon/_/'khrul pa ma rig log bcom pas/_/lung ma bstan par rang brlag stongs/_/bems rig phyed pas gzhi dang 'phrad/_/de phyir ma rig mun pa sangs/_/ri bo ta lar nyi shar 'dra/_/zhes so/_/ gsum pa ni de ltar gzhi gdod ma'i ngang las rang gdangs phyir shar ba'i tshe/_rang bzhin 'od lnga'i yul la/_thugs rje rig pa'i chas yul de kha dog gis mtshan mar gzung ste/_/dpyod byed 'dzin pa 'phro mthud pa las/_ngo bos gti mug gi cha rang ngo ma shes pas/_rang bzhin 'od du snang ba la thugs rjes sems su 'khrul pas/_lus dang phyi rol gyi yul de rdos bcas dang rtog tshogs kyi phung po 'grub ste klong gsal las/_ye shes nyid las ma rig 'khrul/_/ye shes kha dog 'byung ba lnga/_/'bral ba med de ma rig 'khrul/_/ ces so/_/de'ang 'khor 'das gnyis rgyu ye shes su gcig pa las/_rkyen rig ma rig gis tha dad du snang ba ni lag pa'i mdun rgyab tsam mo/_/shel gcig nyid dkar nag gi yul gnyis kyis so sor snang ba bzhin no/_/de'ang klong gsal las/_ye shes ma rig yul la gzung /_/der 'dzin rlung sems 'dus pa las/_/'byung ba bzhi yi sbubs su tshud/_/der tshud 'byung ba'i skye 'jig las/_/nyon mongs phung po lnga lnga grub/_/lnga 'dus mtshan ma sbyor ba las/_/ nyon mongs lnga dang yid drug dang /_/ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid do/_/_zhes pas/_'od lnga yul du bzung bas/_'gro drug so so'i lus yul dang bcas pa las/_gzugs med yid kyi lus/_/_ming bzhi'i phung po la brten pa dang / gzugs khams 'od kyi lus kha dog lnga ldan la brten pa dang /_'dod khams sha khrag gi lus rdos bcas phung po la brten pa'o/_khyad par du 'dod pa pha ma'i thig le dkar dmar las/_zhag bdun tshan bdun du mer mer po dang / nur nur po dang /_/_ltar ltar po dang /_'khrang 'gyur dang*/_khyab 'jug nya'i rnam pa*lta*bu*dang /_rus sbal gyi rnam pa*lta*bu*nas/_rim gyis lus grub ste/ zla ba bcu na skyes te/_dar la babs pa dang /_na ba dang /_rgas pa dang /_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal la sogs pas 'gro ba so sor 'khor ro/_/ bzhi pa ni de ltar 'khrul dus na'ang sangs rgyas kyi snying po/_sku dang ye shes lnga ldan du gnas te/_klong gsal las/_thog ma mtha' ma bar gsum du/_/sku gsum dbye ba med pa ru/_/sems can kun gyi rgyud la gnas/_/zhes pa dang /_thog ma'i rig rtsal ye shes lnga/_/ma rig 'khrul pas 'byung bar grub/_/des na lus ni sangs rgyas dngos/_/ye shes chen po'i 'byung gnas nyid/_/_lus can kun la bzang ngan med/_/bde gshegs ngo bo 'gro kun la/_/til la mar khus khyab bzhin gnas/_/ma rig grol tshe 'byung ba'i lus/_/lhag med ye shes ngang du bzlog_/sems can rang rgyud rtog tshogs ni/_/bzhi bcu zhe gnyis sangs rgyas te/_/_/phung po 'byung ba yab yum lnga/_/ dug lnga seRa sna thub pa drug_/tshogs brgyad sems dpa' yab yum brgyad/_/sgo bzhi sgo ba yab yum bzhi/_/g.yas g.yon nyi ma zla ba 'o/_/zhes pas/_phung po lnga po 'di yab lnga/_'byung ba lnga ni yum lnga/_rnam shes tshogs brgyad sems dpa' yab yum brgyad/_'byung bzhi bskyed pa'i sgo bzhi sgo ba yab yum bzhi/_dug lnga seRa sna dang drug_/thub pa drug gi rang bzhin du gnas so/_/de yang tsit+ta rin po che'i sbubs su/_snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_/spyi gtsug bde chen 'khor lo dang*/_/mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo dang /_/lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo dang*/_/gsang gnas bde skyong 'khor lo lnga'i dbus na/_ro ma rkyang ma kun d+har ma gsum ka ba ltar gnas pa'i dbu ma'i dbus na 'od rtsa shel sbug can/_phra bar gnas pa'i g.yas g.yon ro rkyang la thig le dkar dmar/_shel sbug can nas don dam ye shes kyi thig le gnas par bzhed do/_/de'ang shel sbug ma'i 'greng bu gnyis chu'i sgron mar zug cing /[ · ]rkyang ma'i sna gnyis kyang dbang po'i dngas ma la zug go_/ de'ang thal 'gyur las/_ro ma rkyang ma kun d+har ma/_/ka ti shel gyi sbu gu can/_/'khor lo lnga yi dbus dag nas/_/dbang po'i sgo la zug par gnas/_/zhes so/_/'khor lo lnga nas rgyu'i thig le yi ge'i tshul du gnas pa la/_'od gsal gyi thig le brtan pa ni snum dang sdong bu la mar me 'bar ba bzhin no/_/rtsa de dag kyang grangs can stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis/_/grangs med ba spu'i grangs dang mnyam pa/_gtso bo gsum mam bzhi ni snying po'i tshul du gnas so//de dag nas rlung yang grangs can nyi khri chig stong drug brgya rgyu ste de nyid las/_rtsa la brten pa'i rlung dag ni/_/nyi khri dang ni stong phrag gcig_/ drug brgya dag tu 'gyu ba ni/_/'gyu ba chen po'i rlung du 'dod/_/ces so/_gtso bo gyen rgyu thur sel/_mnyam gnas gsum ste/_de nyid las/_gyen du rgyu dang thur du sel/_/mnyam gnas dang ni gsum du 'dod/_/ces so/_de dag kyang pho mo ma ning gi rlang gsum du gnas so/_khyad par du 'od gsal gyi gnas bzhi ste/_klong gsal las/_snying dang rtsa dang dung khang dang*/_mig dang bzhi bzhi'i gzhal yas na/_/ye shes chen po de na gnas/_/zhes pa dang /_nor bu phra bkod las/[ · ]rin chen zur brgyad gzhal yas dang /_/'gyu byed rtsa yi gzhal yas dang /_/dung khang b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas dang /_/lta byed mig gi gzhal yas so/_/_/gzhal yas chen po de bzhi na/_/_/gsang sngags kun gyi gsang chen gnas/_/zhes so/_/de'ang snying ga na zhi ba'i sku 'od zer gyi phung por gsal ba'i rang gdangs las/_dung khang na khro bo dang /_rtsa rnams na sgron mar snang bas/_mig la gsal ba ste/_de'ang phra bkod las/_e ma rig pa'i gnas lugs ni/_/rang rang tsit+ta'i dkyil na gnas/_/yab dang yum gyi tshul du gnas/_/yab kyi cha 'dzin thabs kyi sku/_/yum gyi cha 'dzin shes rab sku/_/ 'od dang 'od zer tshul du gnas/_/dbyings dang rig par rab brgyan te/_/ lhun rdzogs thig le chen por gnas/_/de ni zhi ba'i bzhugs tshul lo/_/rang rang mgo la khro bor gnas/_/yab dang yum du mngon par snang /_khro dang khro mo'i tshul 'char zhing /_/ye shes lnga lnga dag dang ldan/_/sku yi ye shes Re Re la/_/_dbu yi ye shes lnga lnga 'o/_/zhes so/_/de'ang phyi ltar na khro bo'i sku[ (]a[》]zhi khro'i sku[) ]/_/nang ltar na mkha' 'gro lnga/_gsang ba ltar na yi ge lnga/_yang gsang ltar na thig le gcig ste klong gsal las/_/_lus la gnas pa'i rig pa yang /_/phyi ltar zhi khro'i rang bzhin la/_/nang ltar DA ki yab yum dang /_/_gsang ba yi ge lnga yin te/_/yang gsang thig le gcig tu gnas/_/zhes so/_/_lnga pa la lam gang nas rgyu ba dang /_sgo gang nas 'char ba gnyis las/_dang po ni snying nas mig tu 'brel ba'i rtsa khrag dang chu ser med pa na yar/_gong gi rig pa'i rang gdangs 'od dang thig le rgya skar gyi nyi zhur ltar gnas te/_klong gsal las/_rig pa lnga yi rang mdangs ni/_/rtsa yi nang na thig le dang*/_/'od zer lta bur gnas pa'o/_/zhes so/_/ gnyis pa rtsa'i sgo mig gnyis su zug pa nas snang ste/_/_seng+ge rtsal rdzogs las/_'gag med gsal ba'i sgo gnyis mdzod/_/dbyings dang lu gu rgyud du gnas/_/zhes pa dang /_snga ma las/_rig pa sku yi rang gdangs 'od/_/ rtsa yi nang nas nyi zer bzhin/_/dbang po'i sgo nas nges thon te/_/sgron ma nam mkha'i mthongs su gsal/_/zhes pa dang /_ye shes snying gi dkyil na gnas/_/dar dkar skud pa lta bu yis/_/rtsa yi lam nas snang bar byed/_/ye shes 'char ba'i sgo nyid ni/_/lus bcud dngas ma kun 'dus pa'i/_/tsa zhes pa'i sgo nas don/_/gnyis kyi cha 'dzin snang ba ston/_khyad par skyon yon dngas 'byed pa'i/_/ba men rwa 'dra 'khyil ba las/_/a 'bras zhes pa dkar nag 'byed/_/rig cing gzugs rnams 'dzin pa dang /_/shes pa'i rang rtsal rdzogs par ston/_/'di las dngos su 'byung ba ste/_/zhes so/_/de ltar gnas pa'i dpe ni/_klong gsal las/_rig pa'i sku ni bum sku 'dra/_/ye shes bum pa'i mar me 'dra/_/thug rje me long ngos ltar gsal/_/longs spyod sku la sku gsung thugs/_/yon tan dang ni phrin las so/_/sku ni snang la rang bzhin med/_/gsung ni 'gag med rig pa'i gsung /_/thugs ni mi rtog chos kyi sku/_/zhes so/_/de'ang rtsa nas mig tu snang ba'i sgron ma ni/_/thugs rje'i zer gdangs de nyid las/_/thugs rje las byung sgron ma nyi zer bzhin/_/sgron ma'i 'od zer stong la thug pa med/_/gnas pa'i 'od ni tsit+ta'i nang na gsal/_/ rang bzhin 'od min nam mkha'i mthong na gsal/_/zhes so/_/sgron ma du zhe na rang shar las/_/_/sgron ma rnam bzhi 'di lta ste/_/thig le stong pa'i sgron ma dang /_/rig pa dbyings kyi sgron ma dang /_/shes rab rang byung sgron ma dang /_/rgyang zhags chu yi sgron ma 'o/_/sems can kun la gnas pa 'o/_/zhes so/_/ drug pa ni rkyen bral gsum la snang ba ste/_/klong gsal las/_rkyen bral gsum la 'char bar 'gyur zhes pas/_dbang po rkyen dang bral ba chu'i sgron ma/_gnas rkyen dang bral ba dngas shing mtho ba/_yul rkyen dang bral ba nam mkha' sprin med pa'o/_/_/de'ang yi ge med pa las/_mig ni nam mkha'i mthongs su blta/_/'od ni phra la 'dril ba 'byung /_/zhes pa dang /_thal 'gyur las/_dbyings ni phyi dang nang du ste/_phyi ni sprin bral nam mkha' 'dzin/_/nang gi sgron ma lam du 'o/_/zhes so/_/bdun pa la dang po ngo sprad pa dang /_snang ba bzhi'i 'char tshul ngos bzung ba/_mtha' brten gyi man ngag gsum las/ dang po ni lus 'dug stangs gsum dang /_gzigs stangs gsum gcun la/_rlung rab tu dal bas dbyings la lta bas te/_de nyid las/_lus ni seng ge glang chen dang*/_/drang srong lta bur gnas par bya/_/mig ni ldog pa zur gyis blta/_/rlung rig dal bas ye shes 'grub/_/ces so/_/de nas yul la shar ba'i rig pa 'di ltar ngo sprad de/_phyir dbyings nam mkha'i stong pa la/_nang dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgron ma 'od khyim gyi nang du/_thig le stong pa'i sgron ma rma bya'i mdongs sam mtshor rdo bor ba lta bu'i nang du/_rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma 'gul bar ltos shig_/de'i tshe rig pa stong gsal dang bral ba'i ye shes shar ba de nyid shes rab rang byung gi sgron ma yin pas ngos zung la sgoms shig_/ces so/_/'di'i dgos pa ni klong gsal las//rgyang zhag las ni gzugs bsdus te/_/rlung gis bskyed cing 'phel bar byed/_/'ong dang 'gro ba'i 'phel 'grib kyis/_/ye shes dag ni sdud par byed/_/thig le stong pas las kun byed/_/'das pa las kyi rlung bzung nas/_/rlung gis bkrag dang gzi mdangs bskyed/_/bsgyur zhing ye shes snang ba ston/_/shes rab rang byung sgron ma yis/_/chos kun mnyam par ro gcig tu/_/bsdus te rang snang 'dzin par byed/_/'dis ni bag chags 'bral rgyun gcod/_/dbyings kyi dngas ma skud pa dang /_/rig pa'i sku rnams 'dzin pa dang /_/gnad gsum bcud du smin pas te/_/'khor ba nyid ni spong bar byed/_/de ltar mig la sgron shar bas/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i gnad bsdus par/_/_/rang snang yul rnams 'dzin pa 'o/_/zhes so/_/ de'ang khregs chod kyis gang shar gyi rtog pa rang grol du nyams su len zhing /_thod rgal gyi nyin mtshan 'od gsal la gnas pas/_tshogs gnyis rdzogs/_sgrib pa gnyis sbyangs/_sku gnyis 'grub ste/_khregs chod kyis sems la sgrib par shes bya'i bud shing bsreg cing /_thod rgal gyis gzung yul rdos yul la sgrib pa nyon mongs pa'i bag chags stong nas gzung 'dzin gnyis med kyi ye shes 'od gsal gdod ma'i ngang du phyin par byed do/_de'ang mu tig phreng ba las/ nyams blangs khregs chod thod rgal lo/_/zhes so/_/ gnyis pa la bzhi las/_dang po chos nyid mngon sum gyi snang ba ni/ thal 'gyur las/_chos nyid mngon sum snang ba ni/_/dbang po'i sgo nas nges thon te/_/sprin med pa yi mkha' la gsal/_/zhes pa dang /_klong gsal las/ rkyen bral mkha' la bla ma yis/_/gzigs stangs gcun cing ngo sprad pas/_/ dbang po'i sgo las sgron ma ni/_/'ja' 'am rma bya'i mdongs lta bu/_/thig le lug rgyud 'brel ba las/_/'gul 'phrig rgyu ba'i rnam par rgyu/_/de ltar gsal ba'i dbyings rig ni/_/nyi ma 'od kyi tshul du gnas/_/zhes so/_/de nyid mthong bas khams gsum du mi ldog ste/_'das rjes las/_mngon sum gnad 'di su mthong ba/_khams gsum ldog pa ma yin no/_/zhes so/_/ gnyis pa nyams gong 'phel gyi snang ba ni/_snga ma las/_nyams kyi snang ba gong 'phel ni/_/ye shes kha dog phyir phyung nas/_/gyen 'greng dang ni rtsibs shar dang /_/thig le sna tshogs sku nyid dang /_/rags par snang ba'i yul las gsal/_/zhes pas/_de'ang snga ma bzhin nyams su blangs pas/ 'od lnga'i snang ba re lde tsam dang /_thig le sran ma tsam dang /_rig pa 'dab chags 'phur ba tsam du snang zhing /_yang nyams su blangs pas 'od kha dog lnga ldan dang gyen 'gring dang /_rtsibs shar dang /_mdung rtse lta bu dang /_mda' lta bu dang /_pad+ma lta bu dang /_/_mchod rten 'dra ba dang /_rdo rje dang /_'khor lo dang /_ral gri dang /_gri gug dang /_mu tig gi dra ba dra phyed lta bu dang /_mig tshags dang /_mig mang ris dang /_nya mig dang /_za 'og gur khyim dang /_ye shes mkhar thabs dang /_nyi zla gza' bral dang /_pad+ma stong ldan 'dra ba la sogs pa snang ba mi 'dra ba grangs med pa 'char ro/_/thig le me long tsam snang zhing /_rig pa'ang ri dwags spang la 'gro ba tsam dang /_bung ba 'khor ba tsam mo/_/yang nyams su blangs pas 'od yul gru tsam dang /_thig le kham phor tsam dang*/_rigs pa ri dwags dal bus 'gro ba tsam mo/_/yang 'od yul khams tsam dang /_stong gsum tsam snang zhing /_thig le 'khar gzhong tsam dang /_bse phur tsam snang ba dang /_rig pa'i bar du sku re re'ang 'char ro/_/ gsum pa rig pa tshad phebs kyi snang ba ni/_thal 'gyur las/_rig pa tshad phebs snang ba ni/_/longs sku mtshan dper gsal ba ste/_/ma nges kha dog 'ja' tshon las/_/rigs lnga yab dang yum du snang /_/de nas lnga lnga zung dang bcas/_/rab tu gsal ba'i thig ler 'brel/_/yab yum sku yi snang ba can/_/'khrul snang zad nas zhing khams so/_/zhes pas/_dang po thig le dang rig pa nang du sku yab yum zung sbrel re dbus na gsal ba las/_de nas phyogs bzhir yab yum bzhi bzhi snang ba'o/_/'di'i tshe phyi yul gyi 'khrul snang zhing khams su grol bas/_'og min longs sku'i pho brang du lhun gyis grub/ nang sgyu lus 'od gsal du grol bas/sha khrag rdos bcas kyi 'byung bzhi nub pas/_skye rgas na 'chi'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las rang grol/_gsang ba rlung sems stong pas nyon mongs rtog tshogs kyi bag chags dbyings su thim pa'o/_/de'ang rdos bcas sha khrag gi phung po dag pas/_snying kha'i zhi ba'i tshom bu nam mkha' la rang gsal ba'o/_/ bzhi pa chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba ni/_/snga ma las/_chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba ni/_/nyams kyi snang ba stong nas ni/_/lus zad dbang po'i yul yang med/_/rtog tshogs 'khrul pa las bral nas/_/brjod gzhi'i tshig dang bral ba'o/_/zhes pas/_phyi nang gi nyams snang du 'dzin pa dang /_rtog tshogs dang bcas pa zad nas 'od kyi nang na lag sor bkram pa tsam las mi mngon te/_'khor 'das kyi 'du shes nub nas/_snang ba ci'i ngo bor yang grub pa med do/_/_/de'i tshe 'gro drug dang nyi zla'i snang ba med do/_/gzung 'dzin gyi 'khrul pa med pas/_chos sku rang dag gi dgongs pa chos nyid zad sar thug pa zhes bya'o/_/_/de nas na bun nam sprin yal ba ltar phung po mi snang baRa gdod ma'i ka dag nam mkha' lta bu'i rang du rang grol lo/_/ gsum pa mtha' rten gyi man ngag ni/_klong gsal las/_de la mtha' rten man ngag bzhi/_/gong ma'i rgyab tu med thabs med/_/ces pa dang /_thal 'gyur las/_/_de la mtha' brten yid ches bya/_/mi 'gul gsum la gzhi bcas pas/_/rlung sems gnad la phebs pa 'o/_/sdod pa gsum gyis tshad gzung bas/_/rmi lam log dang lus ngag yid/_/rtags dang tshad ni nges gzung ba 'o/_/thob pa gsum gyis gzer gtab pas/_/zag bcas phung po mi snang ba 'o/_/zhes pa dang /_mu tig phreng ba las/_/_tshad ni gding bzhi'i rnal 'byor nyid/_/ces pas/_dang po mi 'gul ba gsum la gzhi bca' ba ni/ lus mi 'gul ba bzhugs stangs gsum la slob bo/_/mig mi 'gul ba gzigs stangs gsum la slob bo/_/rlung rig mi 'gul bas ci nas kyang dal ba la slob bo/_/ gnyis pa sdod pa gsum gyi tshad bzung ba ni/_dbyings rig la goms pas/_phyi snang ba bskyod pa'i rlung zad pas/_dbyings rig la 'gro 'ong med par sdod/_nang phung po skyod byed kyi rlung zad pas/_lus g.yo 'gul med par sdod/_gsang ba rtog pa 'gyur byed kyi rlung zad pas/_rnam rtog 'gyur mi srid par sdod pa'o/_/_/skabs 'dir tshad rmi lam gyi gzung ba dang /_rtags lus ngag yid gsum la 'char ba gnyis 'byung ngo*/_/de'ang brtson 'grus rab la rmi lam dbyings su thim/_'bring la 'od gsal du 'char/_tha mas rmi lam zin pa'o/_/rtags lus ngag yid gsum la 'char ba la bcu gnyis las/ dang po ni chos nyid mngon sum gyi rtags gsum ni/_lus rus sbal 'khar gzhong du bcug pa ltar g.yo 'gul med par sdod/_ngag lkugs pa ltar smra snying mi 'dod/_sems mkha' 'gro snyi la zin pa ltar/_rnam rtog gar gtad du sdod pa'o/_/nyams gong 'phel gyi rtags gsum ni/_lus skyes bu nad kyis gdungs pa ltar/_rgyan dang byi dor med pas ngo tsha'i rnam rtog dang bral/_ngag smyon pa'i rang tshig ltar don med smra/_sems rtsi dug gis zin pa ltar/ khams gsum du mi ldog pa'o/_/rig pa tshad phebs kyi rtags gsum ni/_lus glang po che 'dam du tshud pa ltar 'byung ba zang thal/_ngag grul bum gyi phrug gu ltar gzhan gyi yid du 'ong zhing phan thogs pa'o/_/sems 'brum nad byang pa ltar bskyar nas khams gsum du mi ldog par nges pa'o/_/chos nyid zad pa'i rtags gsum ni/_lus dur khrod kyi ro ltar gshed ma lnga brgyas bskor yang nyam mi nga ba dang /_'jigs skrag med/_ngag brag cha ltar gzhan gyi lad mo zlos/_sems bar snang gi na bun ltar skad gcig la mi snang bar sangs rgya'o/_/ gsum pa thob pa gsum gyis gzer gdab pa ni/_'di'i dus su skye ba la rang dbang thob pas/_sems can gyi don bya bar 'dod na/_rang gi lag sor la gtad cing bltas pas/_snang ba de kun rang log ste/_skabs su bems po 'gul zhing sgra thos pas/_snang byed chu'i zla ba lta bu'i lus kyis sems can gyi don byed do/_/de'ang sems can la rig pa bcug pas 'tshang rgya ba dang /_bems po la rig pa bcug pas 'gul zhing sgra 'byin pa dang /_tshe 'pho ba'i sems can la rig pa bcug pas bar dor grol lo/_/'jug pa la rang dbang thob pa ni/_sor mo la rig pa gtad nas rang lugs su bzhag pas/_de nyid la mi snang bar 'tshang rgya'o/_/rlung sems la rang dbang thob pa ni/_mngon par shes pa thogs pa med pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul du ma ston nus pa'o/_/bzhi pa gding bzhi ni/_yar dkon mchog gi yon tan thos kyang re ba dang dogs pa med/_mar rigs drug gi sdug bsngal dang tshe tshad thos kyang re ba dang dogs pa med pa'o/_/_/brgyad pa bar dor ji ltar 'char tshul la bzhi las/_dang po skye gnas kyi bar do la ded dpon gser gling du phyin pa lta bu'i gdams ngag ni/_bla ma'i drung du thos bsam gyi sgro 'dogs bcad nas/_'od gsal gyi snang ba la yid ches par byed do/_/ gnyis pa 'chi kha'i bar do la gsal gdab pa sgeg mo me long lta ba lta bu'i gdams ngag ni/_chos nyid bar dor 'char ba'i rang snang rnams yid la gsal bar gsal 'debs pa'o/_/de'ang 'di'i skabs su sa sa la thim pas lus lji/_/chu chu la thim pas kha sna'i chu phyir 'dzag_/me me la thim pas lus kyi drod sdud/_/rlung la rlung la thim pas yan lag g.yab cing mig gyen la ldog_/_/rlung rnam par shes pa la thim pas dar cig brgyal/_khrag thig gsum snying nang du 'du'o/_/rnam shes nam mkha' la thim pas shes pa stong gsal dbyer med ston gyi nam mkha' 'dra bar 'char ro/_/ gsum pa chos nyid kyi bar do la/_/rang snang la yid ches pas me long du byad gsal ba'am/_/ma pang du bu 'jug pa'i man ngag ni/_/de nas nam mkha' 'od gsal la thim pa'i tshe/_/mig nas thugs rje rgyun gyi zer thag las/_'od gsal gyi snang bas 'jig rten thams cad khyab par 'char te/ thal 'gyur las/_'dir ni chos nyid bar do bshad/_/'chi kha las ni thal ba'i tshe/_/rnam shes nam mkha' dag la thim/_/nam mkha' 'od gsal la thim dus/_/phra rags snang ba kun 'gags te/_/dbang po kun ldan 'od kyi lus/_/lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'gyur/_/de tshe 'od snang du ma bu'i tshe/_/ mkhas pa snang ba mched pa bzung /_/zhes pas/_'od snang mched pas rang snang du shes pas grol lo/_/de nas 'od gsal zung 'jug gi sku la thim pa ni/_skad cig dang po'i khro bo'i snang bas sgra 'od zer gsum du snang ste/_klong gsal las/_/_de tshe sgra 'od zer du 'khrigs/_/sku yi snang bas skrag par byed/_/ces pas/_khro bo'i gzugs 'jigs su rung ba dang /_'od gsal gyi zer mtshon cha'i rnam pa 'dra ba dang*/_hUM dang phaT kyi sgra 'brug stong ldir ba tsam 'ong ba seng ge'i gsob mthong ba ltar mtshang phug nas rig ste/_rang snang du shes pas grol lo/_/de nas zhi ba'i tshom bu'i rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor lnga tshan lnga rim gyis phyogs mthar khyab par brgya stong grangs med pa 'char te/ thal 'gyur las/_'jug cing smin pa'i rlung la yang /_/phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng 'og grub/_/de la phyogs kyi 'od 'dus pas/_/rigs lnga'i sku yang mngon par snang /_/mthing ga dkar ser dmar ljang ni/_/so so'i yum dang bcas par snang /_/so so'i tshom bu rdzogs pa la/_/lnga ldan bcu ldan brgya ldan dang*/_/tshom bu stong dang 'bum phrag ni/_/bsam ngo rang bzhin dag pa yi/_/ brjod kyis mi lang grangs med 'char/_/zhes pas/_rigs lnga'i sku shar ba'i thugs ka nas/_rang gi snying gar zer thag shar ba'i tshe/_gnad gsum gyi gdams ngag dran par bya'o/_/de'ang dang po 'jug pa shes pa'i gnad la gnyis las/_rig pa 'od la 'jug pa ni zer thag 'brel ba'i tshe/_rang bzhin gyi bsam gtan la gnas pas ngos gzung ngo /_/'od rig pa la 'jug pa ni/_snang ba de kun rang la thim pa'i tshe/_ma pang bu 'jug gi gnad dran pas grol lo/_/ gnyis pa grol ba lus kyi gnad ni/_rang lus 'od gsal du yod pa la dang po shes pas grol lo/_/mthar phyin pa ngo shes pa'i gnad ni/_bar snang du ngo shes pas skad cig la nang gsal du grol lo/_/der gding ma thob na/_de nas zung 'jug ye shes la thim pa zhes bya ba ni/_nyi zla kha sbyor las/ rang gi snying ga nas 'od kyi thag pa shin tu phra ba gcig 'char ro/_/de'ang steng gi nam mkha' la gyen du zug par snang ngo /_/de'i dus su rang gis ma yengs par bltas pas/_snang ba de nyid gzhan dang ma 'dres par shin tu rgya che bar 'char te/_de'ang dang po mthing kha'i snam bu'i steng du/_thig le zer dang ldan pa me long kha sbub pa tsam ste/_dper na mu men gyi phor pa kha sbub pa lta bu la/_ ye shes kyi gting gdangs dang ldan pa shin tu gsal la 'tsher ba/_de yang rang bzhin gyi thig le lnga lngas brgyan pa'o/_/de'i mtha' dang dbus med par thig le dang thig phran gyis brgyan par 'char ro/_/yang de'i steng du dkar po'i snam bu'i steng du thig le shin tu gsal zhing dkar ba'i gdangs chags pa/_dper na shel gyi phor pa kha sbub pa lta bu ye shes kyi gting gdangs dang bcas pa 'char ro//yang ser po'i snam bu'i steng du thig le gser gyi phor pa kha sbub pa lta bu 'char ro/_/de'i steng du dmar po'i snam bu la thig le pad+ma rA ga'i phor pa sgrub pa lta bu 'char ro/_/de'i steng du 'od zlum po shin tu gsal ba rma bya'i gdugs ltar 'char ro//de dag kyang ye shes lnga'i snang ba ste/_bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni rtsal ma rdzogs pas mi snang ngo /_/de ni ye shes bzhi sbyor gyi snang ba zhes bya ba ste rdo rje sems dpa' khong seng gi lam zhes bya'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de'i dus su mi 'gyur ba gser gyi thur ma lta bu'i gdams ngag ni snang ba de la ma yengs par rang ngo shes pas blta'o/_/der ni rang grol lo/_/der gdeng ma rnyed na/_ye shes lhun grub rin po cher thim pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma las/_rig pa lhun grub chen po'i sku la thim pa'i tshe/_rang gi snang ba kha dog mthing ga nam mkha' rnam par dag pa'i dkyil lta bu/_tha ma 'od lnga'i mu khyud zlum pos bskor ba ni/_dper na nyi ma 'jas 'khyil ba lta bu dbang po'i khyab tshad du snang ngo /_/de'i steng du 'od zlum po shin tu gsal ba zhig gdugs ltar 'char ro/_/ces so/_/'di'i dus su 'char lugs brgyad 'byung ste/_de'ang rig pa 'di thugs rje ltar shar bas 'khor 'das rgya ma chad/ 'od ltar shar bas snang ba thams cad 'od du gsal/_sku ltar shar bas shes pa kha phyir ma shor/_ye shes ltar shar bas snang ba thams cad zang thal/ gnyis med ltar shar bas rang gi shes pa rtse gcig tu gnas/mtha' grol ltar shar bas shes pa mtha' gang la'ang mi gnas/_ma dag pa srid pa'i sgo ltar shar bas srid pa'i byung khungs mi 'gag_dag pa ye shes kyi sgo ltar shar sa chos nyid ma bu 'brel ba ste/_rin chen spungs pa las/_thugs rje lta bur 'char tshul las/_/_/sems can kun gyi skyabs pa'i gnas/_/_/snang ba rang gsal 'gags med las/_/'od lnga'i gsal byed tshul du snang /_/mkhyen pa'i snang cha ma 'gags pas/_/ye shes dag pa'i sgo nyid du/_/snang ba 'gags med lam ltar shar/_/rang snang lus kun mtha' rdzogs phyir/_/chos rnams kun gyi sku ltar snang /_/shes pa'i ngo bo gcig yin pas/_/gnyis su med pa ltar yang shar/_/de nyid rang sar gnas med pas/_/mtha' grol chen po'i snang ba ni/_/nges med lhun grub gzhi la snang /_/rig pa zang thal tshig rdzogs phyir/_/dag pa ye shes nyid kyi sgo/_/ngo bo nyid dang 'brel ba 'o/_/byung tshul 'gags pa med pa'i phyir/_/sems can rnams kyi byung khungs so/_/ma dag 'khor ba'i sgo ltar yang*/_khyab byed snang ba'i cha las shar/_/zhes so/_de'i tshe phyir mi ldog pa gyad kyi mda' lta bu'i gdams ngag ni/_rang snang rang ngo shes pas grol ba de'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa drug phrag drug 'char te/_dbang po'i mngon par shes pa drug_/sems las su rung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug_/ shes rab la dbang thob pa'i mngon par shes pa drug_/ye shes mthong ba rnam par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa drug_/chos nyid phyin ci ma log par mthong ba'i mngon par shes pa drug_/sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa phyin ci ma log par mthong ba'i mngon par shes pa drug 'char te/_klong gsal las/_de tshe rigs kyi bu de la/_mngon par shes pa drug 'char te/_zhes so/_de tshe yar gzhi'i snang ba ka dag chen po gsal/_thad kar rigs lnga gtso 'khor gyi tshom bu gsal/_mar 'gro ba rigs drug gi skye gnas dang /_las dang sdug bsngal dang tshe tshad la sogs pa gsal lo/_/de ltar mthong ba'i gzhi las grol ba ni/ rjes su dran pa las byung ste/_bla ma dang gdams pa rjes su dran pas rang snang la gnyis su med par spyod/_lta ba rjes su dran pas sngar 'dris kyi mi dang 'phrad pa ltar rang ngo shes so/_/sgom pa rjes su dran pas zhag lngar bsam gtan la gnas/_spyod pa rjes su dran pas rang snang dag pa'i chos nyid la spyod/_lam rjes su dran pas bar do'i chos nyid la dbang bsgyur/_lha rjes su dran pas rang snang dkyil 'khor du grol/_skye gnas rjes su dran pas rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing khams su dbugs 'byin/_mi brjed pa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thob pas sngar ma thob pa'i chos rnams kyang 'char ro/_/de ltar lhun grub rin po cher grol ba'i skad cig gsum pa la/_thim lugs brgyad dus gcig la 'byung ste/_thugs rje thugs rje la thim pa ni/_nyi ma rgas pa'i zer 'dus pa ltar/_rigs drug gi snang cha rang la 'dus pas ma dag pa 'khor ba'i ming med/_'od 'od la thim pas 'ja' tshon nam mkha' la yal ba ltar/_kha dog mtshan ma'i snang ba med pas stong pa ngos bzung dang bral ba'i dbyings su ro gcig_/sku sku la thim pas bum pa'i sku ltar shes bya nang du gsal bas mtshan ma ris can gyi zhal phyag tu ma grub pas rang ngo rnam par dag_/ye shes ye shes la thim pas ma pang du bu zhugs pa ltar chos nyid ma dang bu rig pa gnyis 'dres pas gnyis med gcig tu gyur/_gnyis med gnyis med la thim pas chu bo la chu bo thim pa ltar gdod ma'i ngang du grol bas chos skur ro gcig_/mtha' grol mtha' grol la thim pas nam mkha' la nam mkha' thim pa ltar stong pa la gtad pa'i yul med pas/_/dmigs gtad dang ched 'dzin las 'das/_ma dag pa 'khor ba'i sgo dag pa ye shes kyi sgo la thim pas sbra'i chon thag bsdus pa ltar thig le nyag gcig la 'dus pas sku gsum du 'du 'bral med/_dag pa ye shes kyi sgo ngo bo la thim pas seng ges gangs zin pas/_ya nga bag tsha dang bral ba ltar gdod ma'i gzhi la nang gsal 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dgongs pa la lhun gyis grub pa'o/_/de skad du'ang snga ma las/_rol pa tsam du'ang snga ma las/_rol pa tsam du thim lugs brgyad/_/yon tan tshul du 'di lta bu/_thugs rje nyid ni thugs rje la/_rang gi ngo bo rang thim pas/_dper na nyi ma'i snying po la/_rang gi zer rnams thim pa ltar/_/rang gi gdangs dang bcas pa yis/_/gzigs snang thams cad mya ngan 'da'/_/zhes so/_/de yang dbang po'i khyad par gyis skad cig ma gsum dang zhag lnga dang nyi shu rtsa gcig gis grol bar bshad pa ni/_nyi zla kha sbyor las/_/_de ltar na dbang po ni gsum ste/_rab kyis skad cig ma gsum la grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'bring gis zhag lnga na brtan pa thob pa yang yod de/_tha mas nyi shu rtsa gcig na brtan pa thob par nges pa yin no/_/yang tha rnams ni rang bzhin sprul pa'i sku'i zhing khams su dbugs phyung nas bar do med par sangs rgyas pa yin no/_/zhes so/_/bzhi pa srid pa bar do la las kyi 'phro mthud pa yur ba kha chad la wa 'dzugs pa lta bu'i gdams ngag ni/_de ltar shar yang brtan pa ma thob na/_srid pa'i bar do la phyed snga ma dang phyed phyi ma'i snang bas/_dbang po kun tshang zhing las kyi rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med pas 'gro drug so so'i snang ba la spyod pa rmi lam gyi lus ltar snang ba'i tshe/_rab kyis bden med du shes pas grol/_'bring gis yi dam lha'i bskyed rim sgyu ma lta bus mngal sgo bkag nas zhing dag par skye/_tha mas skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed byas nas mngal sgo bzang po 'dam pa'o/_/de'ang 'gro drug gi mngal sgo drug la/_skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang lha/_nam rmugs pa dang /_skye bo mang po'i dbus mi/_'od kyi 'khor lo lha ma yin/_phug pa dang /_spyil po byol song /_grog po yi dwags/_mun nag char thibs dmyal ba'i skye gnas so/_/de'i tshe ngan pa rnams la gzabs te/_bzang po la pha ma yi dam gyi lha yab yum du gsal btab nas/_zhugs pas mi lus rin po che thob nas zab gdams pa dang 'phrad de 'tshang rgya'o/_/bar do'i grol tshul lo/_/dgu pa rang bzhin sprul sku'i snang tshul ni/_chos 'di'i dbang po yang mtha' rnams srid pa'i bar do la rmi lam gyi cha tsam snang ba las/_chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis/_rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing du skye ba ni rang shar las/_bden pa mthong ba'i gang zag ni/_rtogs pa rgyud la ma skyes kyang /_phyogs bcu sprul pa'i zhing khams su/_gnas nas mthar phyin grol bar 'gyur/_zhes pas/_rmi lam sad pa'i tshul tsam du shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams su rdo rje rigs kyi sprul pa'i zhal mthong /_lho dpal dang ldan pa'i zhing khams su rin chen rigs kyi sprul pas dbang bskur/_nub pad+ma brtsegs pa'i zhing khams su pad+ma rigs kyi sprul pas mngon sum du lung bstan/_byang las rab rdzogs pa'i zhing du las kyi rigs kyi sprul pas bag chags kyi mtha' zad par byas te/_de nyid du khro bo'i zhing snang dur khrod me ri 'bar ba mthong ba tsam gyis grol lo/_/bcu pa ni ye thog dang po'i gzhir grol te/_mu tig phreng ba las/_grol ba nyid ni thog ma 'o/_/zhes pas der grol ba'i tshe/_ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum du gnas te/_ngo bo chos sku ka dag chen po/_rang bzhin lhun grub rang gsal chen po/_thugs rje kun khyab rig stong chen por bzhugs te/_'khor ba'i rgyu ma rig pa dang /_sgrib gnyis cha dang bcas pa'i mun pa sangs/_ye shes kyi mkhyen pa ma lus pa rdzogs te/_rang shar las/ mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i 'khor ba sangs/_/_/ye shes sku nyid don la rgyas// sangs rgyas zhes kyang de la bya/_/zhes so/_/de tshe sems can gyi don du/_chos sku nang gsal chen po las ma g.yos bzhin du sprul sku longs spyod rdzogs \u0f09 sku rnam par snang mdzad dang*/_mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i zhi khro so so'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par 'og min na gsal bas/_sa gnas kyi sems dpa' rnams la snang zhing don byed la/_shAkya thub pa la sogs pa 'gro ba 'dul ba sprul pa'i sku/_longs sku las ma dag pa'i zhing du snang ba ni/_nam mkha'i zla ba las chu zla ltar shar zhing /_so so'i skye bo rnams kyi don byed cing / de las ma dag pa sprul pa'i sku so so gang 'dul du tshangs pa la sogs pa/ 'gro drug phal pa'i gzugs dang /_skye rgas na 'chi dang gzengs dang zam pa dang /_nor bu la sogs par sprul nas/_sems can rnams kyi yid dang mthun par don byed de/_nam gdul bya med pa de'i tshe/_chu snod med pa las zla ba mi snang ba ltar gdod ma'i gzhi nang gsal nyid du lhun gyis grub bo/_/de ltar bdag blo Rin chen bang mdzod las/_/tshig don phun tshogs 'dod dgu'i longs spyod kyis/_/skal ldan skye bo'i tshogs rnam dga' bskyed de/_/lhun grub sa la kun tu bzang por shog_/tshul 'di mkha' 'gro snying tig gsang ba'i lam/_/tshe gcig sangs rgyas sgrub byed theg pa'i mchog_/dgongs gter snying po mi yul 'jig rten du/_/dri med 'od zer bdag gis snang bar byas/_/lhun po rgya mtsho nam mkha' gnas kyi bar/_/chos tshul 'dis kyang 'gro ba'i don byed cing /_/srid pa'i 'khor ba ma lus rab stongs nas/_/gzhi rdzogs gdod ma'i ngang du phyin par shog_/gangs ri thod dkar o rgyan rdzong nyid du/_/'od zer go chas gsol ba btab pa'i ngor/_/pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis legs par bkod/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis lhun gyis grub par shog_/tshig don rin po che'i bang mdzod ces bya ba/_pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis gangs ri thod dkar du ston gsum me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe bkod pa rdzogs so//_//_dge zhing bkra shis/

[7.13 mkha’ ’gro snying tig gi zab don rgya mtsho’i khog dbub don gsal nyi ma’i ’od zer]

@#/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gi man ngag zab don rgya mtsho'i khog dbub sa bcad 'dus don don gsal nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog skya'i skor las/ oM swa sti/_chos spyi mthun gyi khungs btsun yid ches pa'i phyir/_rgyal ba sku gsum rim bzhin 'phro tshul bshad/_don ji bzhin kho thag chod phyir bar do gsum na rim bzhin ngos gzung bshad/_'khrul grol skyon yon gyi shan 'byed phyir gzhi dang gzhi snang las ma dag glo bur 'khrul tshul bstan/_lam mthar zad gzigs snang las 'das te rnam grol gyi yon tan shes bya'i rnam pa rang ngor thob ste btsan sa zin tshul bstan/_rtags yid ches bskyed phyir gnad mngon sum gyis rim bzhin spyod tshul bstan/_mngon sum gyi man ngag gnad du zab phyir kun gyi 'khrul ma myong bar ngo 'phrod de grol ba thob tshul bstan/_de mngon sum rang dbang thob phyir sa brgyad kyi sems dpa' gcig gi khong du chud tshul bstan/[ · ]yul gdul bya spro ba bskyed phyir dgos pa'i rgyu mtshan la bsam ste yi ge bkod tshul bstan/_tshul 'di bzhin dgos la don yin bzhin ma nor ba gal che'o/_/yang sku gsum gyi phyi nang gsang ba'i mdzad pa rnams kyang /_phyi gnyen po'am mthun 'jug gi thabs gtso bor dgongs pa dang /_nang ngo bo ngos gzung che tshul dang /_gsang ba mtshan nyid kyi chos la bzhag ste/_gnad ma 'phyugs pa gal che'o/_/rdzogs so//_// dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zab cing rgya che'i mkhyen rab dpag bsam shing /_/phan bde'i rang bzhin me tog 'bras mang ldan/_/ thugs rje'i bsil grib shin tu rgya che bas/_/'gro blo'i gdung skyob mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dag pa'i mkha' la bdud rtsi'i sprin 'khrigs pas/_/byams pa'i 'brug sgra snying rje'i glog phreng can/_/zhi bde'i chos char shin tu rmad byung bas/_/dge legs bsam 'phel mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yul ring dus nas srid pa'i sems can la/_/zhi ba'i don ston thar par 'dren pa'i lha/_/ bde gshegs rig 'dzin pad+ma thod phreng dang /_/ye shes mtsho rgyal zhabs la gus phyag 'tshal/_/bdag blo'i skye tshal yangs shing rgya che ba/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig dpag bsam rgyas pa'i mthus/_/de yi don 'dril dngos grub ljon pa'i shing /_/zab cing rgya che'i yal 'dab rgyas par spro/_/dpal ldan gangs ri'i tshal na dga' ba'i blo/_/shin tu rmad byung gtsug gi nor bu'i tog_/srid las rnam grol lha yi dpag bsam shing /_/yid mkha'i tshal du yid 'ong bzang dgus brgyan/_/de slad skal ldan byang chub chos 'dod rnams/_/theg mchog snying po'i dngos grub zhing 'dir bstan/_/legs pa'i me tog rin chen char phab cing /_/srid gsum gdung skyob tshe 'dir 'bras bu 'thob/_/theg pa'i nang nas yang rab bla na med/_/'od gsal rdo rje snying po kun gyi rtse/_/ gsang ba las kyang ches gsang rmad byung 'di/_/skal ldan srid pa tha ma'i dam chos lags/_/'di dang su 'phrad myur du grol nges pas/_/'bras bu'i dam chos bdud rtsi chen po 'di/_/o rgyan pad+ma'i zab gter kun gyi mchog_/'di nyid deng sang gdul bya'i yid mkhar babs/_/de phyir don gsal nyi ma'i 'od zer bri/_/ de la 'dir mkhas pa chen po klong chen rab 'byams pas mdzad pa'i zab don rgya mtsho 'di la spyi don gsum ste/_/klad don dang /_gzhung don dang*/ mjug don no/_/dang po la gsum ste/_mtshan dang /_phyag dang /_dam bca'o/_/ phyag la gnyis te/_spyi dang bye brag go_/dam bca' ba la gnyis te/_brtsams tshul dang /_dam bca' dngos so/_/gnyis pa gzhung don la gsum ste/_mtshan nyid bdun gyis gdams pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu bstan pa dang /_/phun sum tshogs pa lngas gleng gzhi'i gdams pa mdor bstan pa/_/_gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum gyi gdams pa rgyas par bshad pa'o/_/dang po la bdun te/_bla ma'i mtshan nyid dang /_slob ma'i mtshan nyid dang /_ji ltar bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_grogs kyi mtshan nyid dang /_yo byad kyi mtshan nyid dang /_gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang /_dus kyi mtshan nyid do/_/dang po la gnyis te/_blang bya dang / dor bya'o/_/gsum pa ji ltar bstan pa la gsum ste/_zang zing dang /_lus ngag yid gsum dang /_sgrub pas mnyes par bya ba'o/_/ spyi don gnyis pa phun sum tshogs pa lngas gleng gzhi'i gdams pa mdor bstan pa la gnyis te/_thun mong gi gling gzhi dang /_thun mong ma yin pa'o/_/dang po la gsum ste/_chos sku dang /_longs sku dang /_sprul sku'i gleng gzhi'o/_/dang po la lnga ste/_gnas dang /_ston pa dang /_'khor dang /_chos dang /_dus so/_/gnyis pa longs sku la lnga ste/_rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho dang /_rdo rje sems dpa'/_rin chen 'byung ldan/_snang ba mtha' yas/ don yod grub pa'o/_/gsum pa sprul sku'i gleng gzhi la gnyis te/_lha yul drug dang /_mi yul du byon tshul drug go_/gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa'i gleng gzhi la gsum ste/_gzhi 'dug tshul gyi phun sum tshogs pa lnga/_lam nyams su blang pa dang /_mthar thug 'bras bu'i phun sum tshogs pa lnga'o/_/bar pa la gnyis te/_gnas pa'i lus kyi dang*/_'char ba'i yul gyis so/_/ spyi don gsum pa gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum gyi gdams pa rgyas par bshad pa la gsum ste/_dang po gzhi'i gnas lugs bstan pa/_bar du lam gyi khyer tshul bstan pa/_tha ma 'bras bu'i grol tshul bstan pa'o/_/dang po la lnga ste/_'khor 'das gang du'ang ma grub pa'i sngon rol na gzhi gshis kyi gnas lugs bstan pa dang /_de las lhun grub kyi 'char tshul bstan pa/_de nyid rig pa thog ma'i kun tu bzang po'i gzhi thog tu ji ltar grol tshul/ rig pa khams gsum gyi sems can 'khor bar ji ltar 'khyams tshul/ sems can gyi khams la gdod ma'i sangs rgyas ji ltar bzhugs tshul bstan ma pa'o/_/dang po la gsum ste/_gdod ma'i gshis kyi 'dug tshul 'khor 'das kyi 'char gzhi byed tshul/_de la rtsod pa spangs tshul lo/_/dang po la gsum ste/ mdor bstan pa/_rgyas par bshad pa/_don bsdu ba'o/_/gnyis pa rgyas par bshad pa la gsum ste/_ngo bo/_/_rang bzhin/_thugs rje'o/_gnyis pa 'khor 'das kyi 'char gzhi byed tshul la gnyis te/_dpe dang /_don no/_de la gnyis te/_ma dag pa dang /_dag pa'o/_/gsum pa rtsod pa spong ba la gsum ste/_snang mi snang yang rtogs nas mi 'thad pa spang pa dang /_gcig dang tha dad la dang / 'khrul ma 'khrul la'o/_/gnyis pa lhun grub kyi 'char tshul la gnyis te/ dngos dang /_ye shes de gang du 'char ba'i dpe nye bar mtshon pa'o/_/dang po la gnyis te/_spyir na dang /_bye brag tu bshad pa'o/_/de la bzhi ste/_lhun grub rin po che'i snang ba dang /_gzhi snang chen po'i 'char lugs dang /_longs sku dang /_sprul sku'i 'char lugs so/_/dang po la bzhi ste/_'char lugs rnam pa drug_/sgo rnam pa gnyis yon tan yod tshul/_byung tshul rnam pa dgu'o/_/bzhi pa sprul sku la gsum ste/_rang bzhin dang /_'gro 'dul dang /_ma dag sprul sku'o/_/gsum pa kun bzang gi grol tshul la gsum ste/_rtogs tshul dang /_ngo bo dang /_don mdzad tshul lo/_/ spyi don bzhi pa ma rig pas sems can gyi 'khrul tshul la gsum ste/ khams gsum du 'khrul tshul mdor bstan pa dang /_bye brag tu lus grub tshul rgyas par bshad pa dang /_kun gzhi la las sog tshul gyi don bsdu ba'o/_/dang po la gsum ste/_'khrul pa phyi ltar bshad pa dang /_nang ltar dang /_gsang ba ltar ro/_/gnyis pa bye brag tu lus grub tshul la gsum ste/_bkod pa lus kyi cha lugs kyis mdor bstan/_gnas pa rtsa thig rlung gsum gyis rgyas par bshad/_gnyis med ye shes chen pos don bsdu ba'o/_/gnyis pa la gsum ste/_rtsa ye shes 'dra ba'i gnas lugs bstan pa/_rlung rin chen 'od 'phro/ khams bde chen rgya mtsho'i gnas lugs so/_/gnyis pa rlung chen 'od 'phro la gsum ste/_rang bzhin ye shes kyi rlung ngos gzung ba/_de'i gdangs las kyi rlung mdor bstan pa/_de'i bye brag dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa'o/_/_dang po la gnyis te/_ngo bo ngos gzung ba dang /_dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa'o/_/gsum pa kun gzhi la las sog tshul la gsum ste/_kun gzhi dang tshogs brgyad kyi dbye ba bstan/_rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi dbye ba bstan/_/las gsum gyi sog tshul brjod pa'o/_/gnyis pa la gsum ste/_dang po 'khor bar grub tshul gyis dang /_bar du las sogs tshul dang /_tha ma 'khrul pa ldog tshul gyis so/_/gsum pa la gsum ste/_dge ba/_mi dge ba/_mi g.yo ba'i las so// bsam gtan bzhi'i sems ji ltar skye tshul/_/_/gol ma gol gyi khyad par bshad tshul/_yang dag pa'i lam du 'gro tshul bshad/_/don lnga pa sems can gyi khams la gdod ma'i sangs rgyas bzhugs tshul la gsum ste/_/ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum gyi bzhugs tshul mdor bstan/_sems ye shes kyi ba bzhugs tshul rgyas par bshad pa/_de nyid 'khor 'das kyi rten byed tshul gyis don bsdu ba'o/_/_/gnyis pa la gsum ste/_snying po ye shes kyi bzhugs tshul/_de'i mdangs sems kyi bzhugs tshul/_de gnyis ji ltar 'phrad cing gyes tshul lo/_/_dang po la gsum ste/_'od gsum gyis ngo bor rgyas par bshad/_phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyis rang bzhin dang /_rlung shes rab sku gsum gyi thugs rje'o/_/gnyis pa la gsum ste/_phyi ltar sku dang sbyar nas zhi khro'i skur gnas tshul/_nang ltar gsung dang sbyar bas 'khor lo lnga nas ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro yi ger grub tshul/_gsang ba thugs dang sbyar nas snying po 'od gsal spros pa dang bral ba'i thig ler gnas tshul lo/_/_/dang po la gsum ste/_gnas dang /_ngo bo dang /_dpe'o/_/ngo bo la gsum ste/_ngo bo sku ru bzhugs tshul/_rang bzhin 'od dang thig ler/_thugs rje sgron mar ro/_/ gnyis pa gdangs sems la gsum ste/_sems gnas khams ngo bo gsum gyis spyir bstan/_ye
