bzhin gyis ma grub pa dang /__nang 'dzin byed kyi shes pa dus gsum rtsa bral du shes pa'i shes rab dang ldan na/__bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu byed do/____/__de'ang 'dod pa dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i 'bras bu che ba man chad du tshogs lam chung 'bring chen po gsum du dran pa nyer bzhag bzhi yang dag par spongs pa bzhi/__rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rdzogs par byed cing /__gzugs med bzhi'i sems kyi rten la sbyor lam mngon du byed de/__de yang drod rtse mo gnyis su dbang po lnga/__bzod pa chos mchog gnyis su stobs lnga rdzogs par byed do/____/__de nas mi che ba'i sems kyi rten la rang rang gi mthong lam du byang chub kyi lam yan lag bdun mngon du byed cing /__mi gdung ba/__gya nom snang /__shin tu mthong ba'i sems kyi rten gsum la sgom lam du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad mngon du byas pa'i mthar/__'og min gyi sems la rang rang gi dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas mngon du byas te stobs bcu/__ mi 'jigs pa bzhi/__chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad/__byams pa chen po/__snying rje chen po rnams mngon du gyur te sangs rgyas byang chub rig pa gsum brnyes par 'dod do/____/__'di dag ni sems lam du byed pa rnams kyi sa mtshams dang /__ting nge 'dzin gyi gnad gal po che ste 'dir rdo rje snying po'i theg par theg pa thams cad kyi don rdzogs par 'chad pas mtho dman gyi khyad par shes pa'i don du bstan pa'o/____/__ don lnga pa sems can gyi khams la gdod ma'i sangs rgyas ji ltar bzhugs pa bstan pa ni/__thal 'gyur las/__lus la ye shes chen po gnas/____/__de nyid ye shes chen po nyid/____/__thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/____/__zhes pa dang /__ brtags gnyis las/__lus la ye shes chen po gnas/____/__rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/____/__lus gnas lus la ma skyes pa'o/____/__zhes pa dang /__sam b+hu Ti las/__ rang lus rdo rje sangs rgyas nyid/____/__rang gi lus la sangs rgyas bzhugs/____/__gzhan nas sangs rgyas bstan du med/____/__ces pa dang /__rgyud bla ma las/__rdzogs sangs sku ni 'phro phyir dang /__rigs yod phyir na 'gro ba kun/____/__rtag tu sangs rgyas snying po can/____/__zhes pa dang /__klong gsal las/__thog ma'i rig rtsal ye shes lnga/____/__ma rig 'khrul pas 'byung bar grub/____/__des na lus 'di sangs rgyas dngos/____/__ye shes chen po'i 'byung gnas nyid/____/__/__lus can kun la bzang ngan med/____/__bde gshegs ngo bos 'gro kun la/____/__til la mar gyis khyab bzhin gnas/____/__ma rig grol tshe 'byung ba'i lus/____/__lhag med ye shes ngang du ldog/ __ces gsungs pa'i tshul gyis gdod ma'i mgon po 'od mi 'gyur ba lus can kun gyi snying gi nang na bzhugs pa'i tshul nges par bya ba la don rnam pa gsum ste/__ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum gyi bzhugs tshul mdor bstan/__sems dang ye shes kyi dbye bas bzhugs tshul rgyas par bshad/__de nyid 'khor 'das kyi rten phyed tshul gyis don bsdu ba'o/____/__/__dang po ni mu tig phreng ba las/__gnas lugs rnam pa mang bshad kyang*/____/__ye shes rnam pa gsum yin no/____/__zhes pa dang*/__sgron ma rnam bkod las/__sems can kun gyi snying nang na/____/__gdod ma'i mgon po 'od mi 'gyur/____/__ sku gsum ye shes gsum nyid do/____/__ye nas lhun gyis grub par gnas/____/__zhes pas/__de yang snying gi nang na kun rdzob rgyu'i thig le nyung 'bru tsam gyis rten byas te/__gdod ma'i mgon po 'od mi 'gyur ba ngo bo ye nas stong pa ka dag chos kyi sku'i ngang la rang bzhin 'od du gsal ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ye shes kyi zer gdangs dang bcas pa'i sbubs na/__thugs rje rig pa'i snying po can sprul pa'i sku thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las/__rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'phro gzhir ma 'gags pa'i 'char gzhi/__gzhi gnas kyi ye shes srog tu gyur pa'i rlung yan lag bzhi dang shes rab lnga'i rten du gyur pa bum nang gi mar me ltar gnas pa'i mdangs las sems dang 'od gsal gyi snang ba sna tshogs su snang ba de/__klong gsal las/__rig pa'i rtsal las ye shes gsum/____/__ngo bo stong pa'i ye shes dang /____/__rang bzhin gsal ba'i ye shes dang /____/__thugs rje kun khyab ye shes so/____/__zhes pa dang /__ phra bkod las/__ye shes rang ngor gnas pa la/____/__gsum gyi tshul du dbyer med do/____/__zhes pas/__de yang snying ga na ye shes gnas pa'i gdangs dung khang na gsal zhing /__de gnyis ka'i zer gdangs rtsa rnams kyi nang na thig le sgron ma'i tshul gyis lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par gnas so/____/__ gnyis pa la snying po ye shes kyi bzhugs tshul/__de'i gdangs sems kyi bzhugs tshul/__de gnyis ji ltar phrad cing gyes pa'i tshul gsum las/__dang po la 'od gsum gyi ngo bo rgyas par bshad/__phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin rgyas par bshad/__rlung shes sku gsum gyi thugs rje rgyas par bshad pa gsum las/__dang po ni klong gsal las/__gdod nas dag pa'i ngo bo la/____/__dmigs su med pa'i chos sku'i 'od/____/__ye nas lhun grub longs sku'i 'od/____/__kun la khyab pas sprul sku'i 'od/____/__ces pas/__ngo bo gdod ma nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa nam mkha' dri ma med pa ltar stong gsal 'dus ma byas pa de la gang du'ang ma grub pas spros pa dang mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba chos kyi sku ye stong rtsa bral/__de lta bu'i don mtha' grol chen po nyid sus kyang ma byas par ye nas lhun gyis grub pas skye med chos nyid kyi longs sku 'gag med chen po de nyid snang srid 'khor 'das thams cad la khyab cing /__snang srid 'khor 'das thams cad kyang ye grol stong pa'i chos nyid/__dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dgongs pa las ma 'das pa de ma skyes lhun rdzogs kyi sprul sku brdal khyab chen po'o/____/__de ltar gzhi nas ma skyes pa'i chos nyid/__ye stong rtsa ba dang bral ba/__byar med lhun rdzogs kyi gnas lugs chen po ni/__chos thams cad kyi ngo bor bzhugs pas rig pa ye shes kyi ngo bor yang stong la spros pa dang bral ba'o/____/__zhes pa'i dgongs pa de yin no/____/__ gnyis pa ni klong gsal las/__lus la gnas pa'i rig pa yang /____/__phyi ltar zhi khro'i rang bzhin la/____/__nang ltar DA ki yab yum mo/____/__gsang ba yi ge'i rang bzhin la/____/__yang gsang thig le nyag gcig go/__zhes pas/__'di la phyi ltar na sku dang sbyar nas zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor gnas tshul/__nang ltar na gsung dang sbyar nas 'khor lo lnga na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro yi ger grub tshul/__gsang ba ltar thugs dang sbyar nas snying gar 'od gsal spros pa dang bral ba'i thig le yod tshul gsum las/__dang po la gnas gang na gnas pa/__de na 'od gsal gyi dkyil 'khor grub tshul/__'di nyid bzhugs pa'i dpe bshad pa dang gsum las/__ dang po ni nor bu phra bkod las/__rin chen zur brgyad gzhal yas dang /____/__'gyu byed rtsa yi gzhal yas dang*/____/__dung khang b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas dang /____/__lta byed mig gi gzhal yas so/____/__gzhal yas chen po de bzhi ni/____/__gsang sngags kun gyi gsang chen gnas/____/__zhes pa dang /__thal 'gyur las/__spyi dang tsit+ta rtsa nang na/____/__ ma bcos dag pa'i chos nyid gnas/____/__zhes pa dang /__klong gsal las/__sems can kun gyi lus kyi nang*/____/__tsit+ta dung khang rtsa nang sgo/____/__de ni rig pa'i gnas yin no/____/__zhes so/____/__ gnyis pa klong gsal las/__ngo bo stong gsal sku ru gnas/____/__rang bzhin gsal stong ti la 'od/____/__thugs rje snang stong sgron mar snang /____/__zhes pas/__'di la ngo bo zhi khro'i skar gnas tshul/____/__rang bzhin 'od dang thig ler gnas tshul/__ thugs rje ye shes kyi sgron mar gnas tshul gsum las/__dang po ni thal 'gyur las/__tsit+ta'i nang na skur gnas te/____/__mdangs kyi sku ni rnam pa lngas/____/__so so'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin/____/__zhes so/__mtshan nyid ji ltar 'dzin pa/__seng ge rtsal rdzogs las/__gsang 'dus rin chen zur brgyad mdzod/____/__rig pa'i ye shes yab yum tshul/____/__don 'khyil b+han d+ha gzhal yas mdzod/____/__rig pa'i ye shes khro skur gnas/____/__zhes pa dang /__phra bkod las/__e ma rig pa'i gnas lugs ni/____/__ rang rang tsit+ta'i dkyil na gnas/____/__yab dang yum gyi tshul du gnas/____/__yab kyi cha 'dzin thabs kyi sku/____/__yum gyi cha 'dzin shes rab sku/____/__'od dang 'od zer tshur du gnas/____/__dbyings dang rig pas rab brgyan te/____/__lhun rdzogs thig le chen por gnas/____/__de ni zhi ba'i bzhugs tshul lo/____/__rang rang mgo la khro bor gnas/____/__ yab dang yum du mngon par snang /__khro dang khro mo'i tshul 'chang zhing /____/__ye shes lnga lnga dag dang ldan/____/__sku yi ye shes re re la/____/__dbu yi ye shes lnga lnga'o/____/__zhes pa dang /__klong gsal las/__rang rig ngo bo skur gnas te/____/__gsal la rang bzhin ma grub pa/____/__snying nang yab yum zhi ba'i tshul/____/__dung khang khro bo'i tshul du gnas/____/__ zhes pas/__da lta rang gi lus la zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor gnyis rang chas su za gi zer khyim ltar bkra lam me nang gsal du bum nang gi mar me ltar gnas te/__ thal 'gyur las/____/__ngo bo ka nas dag pa'i cha/____/__/__stong gsal 'dus pa sku yi gdangs/____/__zhal phyag rdzogs pa bum sku'i tshul/____/__zhes pas/__'di nyid rgyas par bshad pa la/__zhi dang khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gnyis las/____/__thog mar zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rang gi snying /__tsit+ta rin po che'i sbubs na kun rdzob kyi thig le nyung 'bru tsam la brten nas/__'od lnga'i klong na zhi ba'i lha tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bzhugs pa ni/__de yang 'od lnga zang thal la za 'og gi gur khang lta bu'i dbus na/__ rang bzhin gdod ma'i mgon po 'od mi 'gyur ba chos sku kun bzang yab yum chos kyi dbyings spros pa dang bral ba gdod ma'i ka dag chen po'i gdangs kyi ska mthing skya zhal sbyor du bzhugs pa'i ye shes lnga'i gdangs las bar na longs sku rigs lnga yab yum 'ja' tshon lta bur gnas te/__de yang dbus seng ge pad zla nyi mas brgyan pa'i khri la rnam par snang mdzad kun tu zhal/__chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang gdangs mthing ka yab yum nam mkha' dbyings phyug ma dang zhal sbyar nas bzhugs pa ni/__dbus kyi kun bzang yab yum dang dbyer mi phyed la so sor snang ba mar me'i grib ma brtsegs ma ltar zang thal du rnam snang gi dbus na kun bzang yod pa'am/____/__kun bzang gi dbus na rnam snang yod pa ltar bzhugs so/____/__shar du glang po che pad zla nyi ma'i steng du rdo rje mi bskyod pa mA ma kI dang gnyis su med pa/__me long ye shes kyi gdangs las sku mdog dkar por bzhugs so/____/__lhor rta mchog pad zla nyi ma'i steng na rin chen 'byung ldan sangs rgyas spyan ma dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi gdangs las sku mdog ser por bzhugs so/____/__nub tu rma bya pad zla nyi ma'i steng du snang ba mtha' yas gos dkar mo dang gnyis su med pa kun rtogs ye shes kyi gdangs las sku mdog dmar por bzhugs so/__byang du shang shang pad zla nyi ma'i steng du bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi gdangs las don yod grub pa dam tshig sgrol ma dang gnyis su med par sku mdog ljang gur bzhugs so/____/__gtso bo rnams ni 'khor lo dang /__ rdo rje dang /[ ·]rin po che dang /__pad+ma dang /__rgya gram gyis yu ba byas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pas yum la 'khyud pa/__yum rnams ni gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas yab la 'khyud pa/__rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas/__skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/____/__de'i phyi rim 'od lnga'i snang ba la phyogs kyi gtso bo bzhi'i ye shes lnga'i gdangs las grub pa'i sprul pa'i sku sems dpa' sems ma bcu drug/__sgo ba yab yum bzhi/__thub pa drug dang bcas pa 'od gsal chu zla lta bur snang ste/__shar lhor nam mkha'i snying po dang rdo rje sgeg mo/__lho nub tu sa'i snying po dang phreng ba ma/__nub byang du spyan ras gzigs dang glu ma/__byang shar tu kun tu bzang po dang gar ma'o/____/__yang de'i phyi rim gyi shar lhor byams pa dang bdug spos ma/__lho nub tu sgrib pa rnam sel dang me tog ma/__nub byang du 'jam dpal dang snang gsal ma/__byang shar du phyag na rdo rje dang dri chab ma'o/____/__shar sgor khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang sgo ma lcags kyu ma/__lho sgor khro bo gshin rje gshed po dang zhags pa ma/__nub sgor khro bo rta mgrin rgyal po dang lcags sgrog ma/__ byang sgor khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang sgo ma dril bu ma zhal sbyar nas bzhugs so/____/__spyi bo bde ba chen po'i rtsa nang na lha'i thub pa brgya byin dkar po/__ltag pa'i rtsa ba men gyi rwa 'dra ba na lha ma yin gyi thub pa thags bzang ris mthing ga/__ srog pa rtsa shel gyi sbu gu na mi'i thub pa shAkya seng ge ser po/__gsang ba'i rtsa bde ba bskyed pa na byol song gi thub pa seng ge rab brten mthing nag/__lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na yi dwags kyi thub pa kha 'bar d+he ba dmar po/__rkang pa'i rtsa zhags sgor 'khyil ba na dmyal ba'i thub pa a ba glang mgo nag po'o/____/__de thams cad kyang so so'i phyag mtshan rgyan dang bcas pa rdzogs shing sku nyung 'bru tsam la spyan phul thag tsam du bzhugs so/____/__phul thag ni skad rnying pa ste/__'tshams pa zhes bya ba yin pas/__sku de dang 'tshams pa'i spyan yod ces pa'o/____/__de skad du gsang ba rin po che bstan bu'i rgyud las/____/__rang snang 'od gsal 'og min gnas/____/__ye shes zang thal phyi nang med/____/__dbus na sku gnyis 'od dpag med/____/__kun bzang yab yum chos skur gnas/____/__bar na 'ja' tshon longs skur gnas/____/__rnam par snang mdzad kun bzang mo/____/__rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas spyan/____/__rin chen 'byung ldan mA ma kI/____/__snang ba mtha' yas gos dkar mo/____/__don yod grub pa dam tshig sgrol/____/__longs sku yab yum rig lnga yin/____/__phyi nang 'od lnga 'bar ba'i sku/____/__bcu drug sprul pa'i sku yin te/__nam mkha'i snying po lA se ma/____/__ sa yi snying po mA me ma/____/__byams pa dang ni d+hA pe ma/____/__sgrib pa rnam sel puSh+pa ma/____/__ 'jam dpal dang ni A lo ke/____/__spyan ras gzigs dang g+harnye ma/____/__phyag na rdo rje gI rti ma/____/__sems dpa' kun bzang nIrti ma/____/__g.yas pa thabs yin yab tu gsal/____/__g.yon pa shes rab yum du gsal/____/__don la 'od gsal stong pa'i sku/____/__zhes pas tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor du byas na rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum g.yas su shar lho'i sems dpa' gnyis/__g.yon du shar lho'i sems ma gnyis kyis bskor ba'o/____/__lus grub kyi dkyil 'khor la snga ma bzhin 'dod do/____/__don la khyad med de/__da lta 'od lnga'i klong na gtso 'khor gyi tshul du yod pa bar dor tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor du 'char ro/____/__de'ang snying dgongs nas gzhi'i kun tu bzang mo dkar po kun tu bzang po mthing gar gsungs kyang rgyud tshig gcus par mngon te/__thog ma'i ka dag de rin po che gsang ba'i sbubs mthing ga'i klong na de gnyis ka dag chos sku'i rang mdangs su bzhugs pa mjal dgos pas/ gnyis ka mthing skyar 'thad la/_rnam snang yab yum dkar por bshad pa'ang 'khrugs te/_mi bskyod pa mthing ga dang sku mdog yul brje'o/_/de'ang rnam snang ni chos dbyings ye shes kyi gdangs yin pas mthing gar 'thad la/_mi bskyod pa me long ye shes kyi gdangs yin pas dkar por 'thad do/_/'di la lung rig man ngag du ma'i sgrub byed yod de yi ger 'jigs nas ma spros so/_/mtshams kyi lha rnams kyang bde mchog ltar phyed zhal du thob ste ye shes gnyis 'dus kyi gdangs 'jal dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/ gnyis pa khro bo'i bzhugs tshul ni/_/snying ga'i gdangs las klad pa dung khang ste/_b+han d+ha smug nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang rin po cher ye shes 'od kyi rang gdangs rnam lnga 'ja' tshon 'khrugs pa ltar snang ba'i dbus na b+hud+d+ha he ru ka yum b+hud+d+ha kro ti shwa rI ma dang gnyis su med pa smug nag_/shar na badzra he ru ka badzra kro ti shwa rI ma dang gnyis su med pa mthing nag_/lho na rat+na he ru ka rat+na kro ti shwa rI ma dang gnyis su med pa ser nag_/nub na pad+ma he ru ka pad+ma kro ti shwa rI ma dang gnyis su med pa dmar nag_/byang du karma he ru ka karma kro ti shwa rA ma dang gnyis su med pa ljang nag 'jigs su rung ba'o/_/_de dag gi phyi rol gyi shar na ke'u ri ma dkar mo/_lho na tso'u ri ma ser mo/_/_nub na pra mo ha dmar mo/_byang na be ta li nag mo/_shar lho pu ka si/_lho nub tu kasma ri/_nub byang du tsan+d+ha li/ byang shar du sme sha ni/_mtshams kyi phyed zhal lo/_de dag ni gnas kyi ke'u ri ma brgyad do/_/de'i phyi rol gyi shar du seng ha mu kha/_lho na bya gri mu kha/_nub na sri la mu kha/_byang na shwa na mu kha phyogs kyi gtso bo dang mdog mthun no/_/shar lhor kr-i ta mu kha/_lho nub tu kang+ka mu kha/_nub byang du khwa khwa mu kha/_byang shar du hu lu mu kha ste/_yul gyi phra men ma brgyad kyang mtshams kyi phyed zhal lo/_/de'i phyi rol gyi sgo bzhi'i shar na rta gdong lcags kyu ma/_lho na phag gdong zhags pa ma/_nub na seng gdong lcags sgrog ma/_byang na sbrul gdong dril bu ma bzhi yang phyogs kyi mdog can no/_/_/he ru ka drag po'i lha sum cu'i rtsal las/_de'i phyi rol na phyi ltar na rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad/_nang ltar na dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/ srin mo smug nag rdo rje thod khrag 'dzin pa dang /_tshangs pa dmar ser pad+ma 'dzin pa dang /_lha chen dkar ljang rdo rje thogs pa dang*/_gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang /_dga' ba ser mo spu gri thogs pa dang /_gzhon nu dmar po mdung thung 'dzin pa dang /_brgya byin dkar mo rgyu zhags thogs pa dang /_zhi ba dmar mo bum pa thogs pa dang /_bdud rtsi dmar mo pad+ma thogs pa dang /_zla ba dkar mo rdo rje thogs pa dang /_be con ljang nag dbyug to 'phyar ba dang /_srin mo dmar nag thod khrag 'thung ba dang /_za ba ljang nag be con 'dzin pa dang / dga' ba dmar nag khog chen thogs pa dang /_stobs chen dkar mo dbyug tho 'dzin pa dang /_srin mo dmar nag rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa dang /_'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs pa dang /_nor srung ljang gu bum pa 'dzin pa dang /_rlung lha ljang sngon ba dan 'phyar ba dang /_me mo dmar mo gsal shing 'dzin pa dang /_phag mo dmar mo mche zhags sdom pa dang /_rdo rje dmar mo zhing chung 'dzin pa dang / sna chen ljang naMg thod khrag 'thung ba dang*/_chu lha sngon mo sbrul zhags bsnams pa'o/_/de'i phyi rol sgo bzhi na/_rdo rje dkar ser dmar ljang bzhi/_/de ltar khrag 'thung lnga bcu brgyad/_/stong gsal rgyan rnams rdzogs par bzhugs/_/zhib tu ni man ngag snying tig gi dgongs par blta'o//de ltar zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor de dag sku snang la rang bzhin med pa'i bzhugs tshul lo/_/ gsum pa dpe ni bum nang gi mar me lta bu ste 'og tu ston no/_/gnyis pa nang ltar 'khor lo lnga na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro lnga gsung yig 'bru'i tshul du bzhugs pa ni klong gsal las/_nang ltar DA ki yab yum lnga/_/rtsa rnams nang na yi ger gsal/_/de yang gsung gi tshul du 'o/_/zhes pas/_spyi gtsug bde chen gyi 'khor lo na ha dang ra'i yi ge las rdo rje DA ki yab yum dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga pa g.yon thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba yab la stob pa/_yum gyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa gru mo na kha TaM ga ro'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/_/rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu la de dang 'dra ba'i 'khor rnams ye shes lnga'i gdangs las grub pa'o/_/mgrin par ri dang rtsa las rin chen DA ki yab yum ser po rin chen dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/_/rtsa 'dab bcu drug la de dang 'dra ba'i 'khor bcu drug yab yum gyi tshul du gnas so/_/snying gar a dang ma las chos dbyings mkha' 'gro yab yum 'khor lo dang thod pa bsnams pa rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis la de dang 'dra ba'i 'khor ro/_/lte bar ni dang hri:_las pad+ma DA ki yab yum dmar po pad+ma dang thod pa 'dzin pa rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi la de dang 'dra ba'i 'khor gnas so/_/gsang bar sa dang ya las las kyi DA ki yab yum ljang gu rdo rje rgya gram gyi yu ba byas pa'i ral gri dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'dab nyi shu rtsa brgyad la de dang 'dra ba'i 'khor gnas pa'o/_/de rnams pad zla dang nyi ma'i gdan ni rtsa dang thig le dkar dmar mtshon pa'o/_/ro'i gdan ni rtog pa med pa'o/_/_yab yum ni snang stong 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/_/rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rigs te me long lta bu'i ye shes mtshon pa'o/_/_rin po che dang*/_pad+ma dang /_rgya gram ral gri dang*/_'khor lo ni de dag gi rigs dang ye shes lhag ma bzhi mtshon pa'o/_kha TAM ga ni sku gsum mtshon pa'o/_/spyan gsum ni sku gsung thugs kyi thugs rjes sems can la dus gsum du gzigs pa mtshon pa'o/_/mdor na mkha' 'gro lnga ni sku lnga dang ye shes lnga dang 'byung ba lnga mtshon pa ste don la ye shes gyi gdangs lnga'i klong na yi ge'i gzugs gsal la rang bzhin med par yod pa las sangs rgyas dus/_gsung chos kyi 'khor los sems can gyi don 'byung la/da lta 'gro ba'i sgra skad sna tshogs su grags pa'i rgyu byed do/_/ gsum pa gsang ba ltar na ye shes kyi thig le nyag gcig tu bshad pa ni/ de'ang sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad kyi snying gi dbus na ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum gyi rig pa stong gsal 'dus ma byas pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen por lhun gyis grub pa ni/_sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i ye shes chen po de yin no/_/de'ang mdo las/_sems la sems ma mchis te sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o/_/zhes pa dang /_slob dpon chos kyi grags pas/_sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_/dri ma rnams ni glo bur ba/_/zhes pa'i don te sems la sems ma mchis pa ni ngo bo ka dag gi ye shes gdod ma nas dag pa'i chos sku phun sum tshogs pa bstan to//sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o/_/_/zhes pas/_rang bzhin lhun grub kyi ye shes gzugs sku phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/_/'o na don de ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa las sems kyi rang bzhin zhes ci'i phyir brjod ce na/sems ni ye shes kyi rtsal yin pas de skad du btags te/_dper na nyi ma'i rtsal nyi ma'i 'od zer la nyi mar btags nas 'ga' zhig nyi ma dang tshe'i stod du slebs so zhes brjod pa dang tshul mtshungs so/_/ gnyis pa rang bzhin ye shes kyi 'od dang thig ler bzhugs tshul ni/ gong gi zhi khro'i rang mdangs rtsa thams cad kyi nang du 'phros pas 'od dang theg le 'od rtsa'i gdangs las rdo rje lu gu rgyud rtsa'i rnam par phra la breng chags par gsal te/_nor bu phra bkod las/_rtsa rnams nang na thig le'i sku ltar gnas/ che ba'i tshad ni nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/chung ba'i tshad ni rta rnga bcuRa gshags tsam/_/gsal ba'i tshad ni nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'dra/_/_de yang gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjid 'phro/_/'gro dang 'ong dang rang bzhin gnas pa'o/_/zhes pas/_che chung ni da lta lus la gnas pa dang /_phyis bar do shar dus yin la/_'gro 'ong rang bzhin gnas pa ni/_da lta mngon sum blta dus nam mkha'i mthongs su byed pa'o/_/'od dang gzi brjid thams cad du yod pa'o/_/ sku'i mdor na gong du bshad pa'i sku'i gdangs lus kyi rtsa nang na khyab pa dang / bzhugs gnas 'od khyim du snang ba thams cad yin te/_phra bkod las/_'od dang 'od zer tshul du gnas/_/dbyings dang rig pas rab brgyan te/_/lhun rdzogs thig le chen por gnas/_/zhes so/_/gsum pa thugs rje sgron maRa gnas pa ni de ltar sku dang ye shes kyi rang gdangs 'od dang thig ler gsal ba rtsa'i nang nas yar thon te rgyang zhags chu'i sgron mar gnas te snang ba'i go 'byed pa ni rtsal rdzogs las/_'gags med gsal ba'i sgo gnyis mdzad/_/dbyings dang lu gu rgyud du gnas/_/zhes pa dang /_klong gsal las/_rig pa sku yi rang gdangs 'od/_/rtsa yi nang na nyi zer bzhin/_/dbang po'i sgo nas nges 'thon te/_/sgron ma nam mkha'i mthongs su gsal/_/zhes so/_/ji ltar gsal na ka ti shel gyi sbu gu can 'khor lo lnga'i dbus na gnas pa las/_snying nas dung khang du chu'i sgron ma la zug pa las yar gong gi sku dang ye shes kyi gdangs 'od dang thig le lu gu rgyud dang bcas pa rgya skar gyi nyi zhur ltar thal gyis 'char ro/_/de nyid don dam ye shes kyi zer gdangs yin te/_thal 'gyur las/_de yi 'byung byed cis she na/_don dam chos nyid 'byung ba las/_/sgron ma rnam pa bzhi zhes te/_/zhes so/_/de ltar 'char ba'i sgron ma bzhi gang zhe na/_rang shar las/_/sgron ma rnam bzhi 'di lta ste/_/thig le stong pa'i sgron ma dang*/_/rig pa dbyings kyi sgron ma dang /_/shes rab rang 'byung sgron ma dang*/_/rgyang zhags chu yi sgron ma'o/_/ sems can kun la gnas pa'o/_/zhes pas/_rgyang zhags chu yi sgron ma ni mig gi dwangs ma gnyis te/_de las thig le stong pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rma bya'i mdongs lta bu 'char ro/_/de'i gdangs las dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgron ma 'ja' 'am yi ge na ro lta bu 'char ro/_/de'i shes pa'i rtsal gsal stong gnyis med kyi ye shes 'char ba ni shes rab rang byung gi sgron ma'o/_/de nyid kyi ngang las spyi bo nas rtog med kyi sku 'char ro/_/de ltar sgron ma bzhi'i byed las ni/_rgyang zhags chu'i sgron mas ye shes 'char ba'i rten byed de/_de las ye shes kyi rlung gis lam byed do/_/dbyings rnam dag gi sgron mas phyi'i dbyings nam mkha'i sgron ma 'char ba'i yul byed/nang dbyings rnam dag gi sgron mas dwangs ma rnams sdud cing sku gnad gsum bcud du smin pas 'khrul snang stong par byed do/_/ thig le stong pa'i sgron mas ye shes kyi 'phel rgyas pa dang rlung gi gnas byed do/_/rlung gis ye shes kyi bkrag dang gzi mdangs bskyed cing snang ba mi 'dra ba 'dzin pa dang*/ du ma gong nas gong du bsgyur zhing snang bar byed do/_/rlung ni sngar bshad pa'i ye shes srog rlung rig pa'i char gnas pa yin no/_/shes rab rang byung gi sgron mas chos thams cad du ma ro gcig tu sdud pa ste lhun grub kyi ye shes mngon du byed do/_/de'i gnas cha rtog med kyi skas chos nyid ka dag gi ye shes mngon du byed do/_/de'ang klong gsal las/_rgyang zhags las ni gzugs bsdus te/_/rlung gis bskyed cing 'phel bar byed/_/'od dang 'gro ba'i 'phel 'grib kyis/_/ye shes dag ni sdud par byed/_/thig le stong pas las kun byed/_/'das pa las kyi rlung bzung nas/_/rlung gi bkrag dang gzi mdangs bskyed/_/bskyur zhing ye shes snang ba ston/_/shes rab rab byung sgron ma yis/_/chos kun mnyam pa ro gcig tu/_/bsdus te rang snang 'dzin par byed/_/'dis ni bag chags 'brel rgyun gcod/_/dbyings kyi dwangs ma sdud pa dang /_/rig pa'i sku rnams 'dzin pa dang /_gnad gsum bcud du smin pa ste/_'khor ba nyid ni spong bar byed/_/de ltar mig la sgron shar bas/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i gnad bsdus par/_/rang snang yul rnams 'dzin pa'o/_/zhes so/_/ de ltar ngo bo sku/_rang bzhin 'od dang thig le/_thugs rje sgron mar gnas pa'i dpe gsum ni/_klong gsal las/ rig pa'i sku ni bum sku 'dra/_/ye shes bum pa'i mar me 'dra/_/thugs rje me long ngos ltar gsal/_/zhes pas/_sku nang gsal/_'od bar gsal/_thugs rje phyir gsal te/_me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu nang sku dang 'od byad ltar gnas so/_/_mdor na rig pa'i ye shes tsit+ta rin po che'i sbubs dang /_dung khang na ngo bo skur gnas/_rang bzhin 'od du gnas pa'i gdangs 'khor lo lngas thog drangs/_rtsa thams cad kyi nang na gnas pa'i rang mdangs dang /_snying nas mig tu shel sbugs can las thugs rje sgron ma bzhi 'char ba'i rten byed do/_/de'ang sangs rgyas ngo sprod pa'i lung las/_kye kye ston pa thugs rje can/_/sangs rgyas ye shes lus can gyi/_/rten dang gnas dang lam dang sgo/_/rang gi ngo bo gsung du gsol/_/zhes zhus so/_/ston pas bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig_bde bar gshegs pa ye shes kyi lus can brten pa rang gi byang khog stod 'di na brten nas yod do/_gnas pa snying gi nang na gnas so/_/lam ni snying nas mig tu rtsa dar dkar gyi skud pa tsam zhig mnyen la khrag dang chu ser med pa zhig gis sbrel nas yod do/_de ni ye shes kyi lam yin no/_/sgo ni mngon du gyur pa dang /_lkog tu gyur pa'i sgo gnyis so/_/mngon du gyur pa'i sgo gnyis ni mig gnyis yin no/_/lkog tu gyur pa'i sgo gnyis ni rang gi rna ba gnyis yin no/_/rang gi ngo bo dag pa chos kyi sku'i ngo bo stong par bzhugs so/_/snying po gsal bar bzhugs so/_/ye shes zang thal du bzhugs so/_/ngo bo stong par bzhugs pa ni/_rang gi rig pa 'di nyid dngos po'am mtshan ma gang yang ma grub par ngo bo stong par 'dug pa 'di yin no/_/snying po gsal bar bzhugs pa ni/ rig pa rang gi ngo bo ma 'gags par gsal ba sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa yin no/_/ye shes zang thal du bzhugs pa ni/_sangs rgyas snying gi dkyil na sha khrag gi lus kyis gtums kyang ma thum par rang gi mig gi rnam par shes pa la mthong ba ma 'gags par 'od du gsal ba 'di yin no/_/'di kho na ye shes zang thal gyi dgongs pa yin no/_/zhes bka' stsal te/_de dag gis phyi ltar na/_ngo bo sku/_rang bzhin 'od/_thugs rje sgron mar gnas par bstan to/_/ gnyis pa nang ltar na yi ger grub tshul ni/_klong gsal las/_sgyu ma lus kyi rtsa nang na/_rig pa'i ngo bo yi ger grub/_/ces pa dang /_gsang ba ltar na/_phra bkod las/_lhun rdzogs thig le chen por gnas/_/zhes pa dang /_snga ma las/_thams cad rang byung ka dag nyid/_/ces pa'i don sngar bshad zin to/_/ gsum pa rlung ye shes sku gsum gyi thugs rje rgyas par bshad pa la gsum las/_dang po thugs rje'i rig pa rlung lngar gnas te/_rang shar las/ rig pa rlung lnga'i rang bzhin du/_/sems can kun la gnas pa'o/_/zhes so/_/ rig pa nyid ye shes kyi drod dang ma bral bas me dang mnyam pa'i rlung /_rig pa de 'khor 'das kyi srog yin pas srog 'dzin pa'i rlung /_rig pa des 'byung ba'i dwangs snyigs 'byed pa dang /_'khor 'das su 'byed pas dwangs snyigs 'byed pa'i rlung /_rig pa'i ye shes de thams cad la khyab pas kun tu khyab byed kyi rlung /_'khor ba'i srog bcad nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sar bskyel bas snying rje med pa bskal pa las kyi rlung ngo /_/ gnyis pa shes rab lngar yang gnas te/_de nyid las/_de yang rig pa'i ngo bo la/[ · ]shes rab rnam pa lnga dang ldan/_/zhes pas/_rig pa de 'khor 'das gnyis kyi 'byung bzhir byung bas 'byed pa'i shes rab/_de'ang rig pa las ma rig pa de nyid kyi ngo bos thams cad la khyab 'das pas sdud pa'i shes rab/ pas khyab pa'i shes rab/_rig pa de nyid kyi gsal cha las ye shes kyi rlung byung bas bskyod pa'i shes rab/_'khoRa 'das gnyis rig pa ye shes su sgrol bas bsgral ba'i shes rab bam/_de nyid sgro 'dogs gcod pas gcod pa'i shes rab bo/_/ gsum pa sku gsum du yang grub ste/_rang shar las/_rig pa rtog pa med pa chos kyi sku/_/rig pa 'gags pa med pas longs sku yin/_/rig pa cir yang snang ba sprul sku yin/_/zhes so/_gzhan yang thugs rje'i rig pa gsal la ma 'gags pa de nyid sku lnga/_ye shes lnga/_rigs lnga/_'od lnga/_rlung lnga/_shes rab lnga ltar yang gnas te/_klong gsal las/_rang byung rig pa'i rang rtsal las/_/ sku lnga dang ni ye shes lnga/_/rigs lnga 'od lnga rlung ni lnga/_/shes rab lnga la sogs par gnas/_/zhes pas/_thugs rje rig pa'i ye shes rnam pa thams cad du snang ba de ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi ska/_rig pa'i ye shes de rnam par rtog pa'i rlang gis mi bskyod pas mi bskyod rdo rje'i ska/_yid bzhin nor bu ltar rig pa rtogs pa las dgos 'dod 'byung ba rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgra/_rig pa de nyid 'od mtha' yas pa'i snang ba la zhugs shing tshad med pas snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku/ thugs rje ma 'gags pa'i rig rtsal rang shar chen po ste don yod grub pa'i /yang thugs rje'i rig pa de nyid ye nas stong pas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye ngo bo la dri ma med pas gang gi'ang 'char gzhi ma 'gags par gsal bas me long lta bu'i ye shes/_rig pa ltar snang dus nyid nas gang du'ang dbye bar ma grub pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/_rig pa'i ye shes so sor snang ba'i gsal cha ni so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes/_rig pa'i ye shes gang la'ang thogs rdugs med pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so/_/yang rig pa gsal stong de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gshegs shul yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/_rig pa'i ngo bo mi 'gyur brten pas rdo rje'i rigs/_rig pa la yon tan lhun grub tu byung bas rin po che'i rigs/_rig pa'i ye shes la skyon gyis ma gos pas pad+ma'i rigs/_rig pa'i ngo bo de nyid ma rtogs na sangs mi rgya bas las kyi rigs so/_/yang rig pa'i ye shes la gdod ma nas dri ma med pa'i cha nas 'od dkar po/_/_de bzhin du yon tan rdzogs pas ser po/_ma btsal bzhag pas dmar po/_bya rtsol rdzogs pas ljang gu/_mi 'gyur brtan par mthing ga'o/_/rlung lnga dang shes rab lnga bshad zin to/_/yang rig pa'i ye shes la gsum du gsungs te/_klong gsal las/_rig pa'i rtsal las ye shes gsum/_/ngo bo stong pa'i ye shes dang /_/rang bzhin gsal ba'i ye shes dang /_/thugs rje kun khyab ye shes so/_/zhes so/_/yang rig pa'i ngo bo dmigs med/_rang bzhin gsal stong /_thugs rje sna tshogs su 'char bas 'od gsum du byung ba ni/_snga ma las/ dmigs su med pas chos sku'i 'od/_/ma 'gags gsal bas longs sku'i 'od/_/snang ba sna tshogs sprul sku'i 'od/_/ces so/_yang yul can drug tu'ang bshad de/_rig pa'i ye shes 'di la gzugs sna tshogs su shar yang 'dzin pa dang bral bas gzugs snang stong gi yul/_sgra sna tshogs su grags kyang stong grags stong gi yul/_dri sna tshogs la 'dzin pa stong pas dris stong gi yul/_ro sna tshogs myong yang mi 'dzin pas ros stong gi yul/_reg bya sna tshogs la mi 'dzin pas reg stong gi yul/_yid dran rig sna tshogs la rang shar rang grol bas rang grol dus mnyam gyi yul lo/_/dwangs ma lnga dang 'dres pa'i cha nas rig pa ye shes la dwangs ma lngar brjod de/_rig pa nam mkha' lta bur 'dzin pa skyes pas/_ rig pa nam mkha' lta bur 'dzin byed de stong gsal gyi dwangs ma 'dzin byed las rlung byung bas/_rlung gi dwangs ma de rig cing g.yo ba/_rlung las drod byung bas me'i dwangs ma drod la 'dzin byed du shar ba/_me las gzugs dngos su byung bas sa'i dwangs ma gzugs la 'dzin byed du byung ba/_de la drod kyi rlangs pa'i tshul du byung ba'i chu'i dwangs ma/_tshul der 'dzin du byung bas/_de la rgyu'i thig le las lus byung ba la bdag tu 'dzin byed/_de las ye shes mgo mjug tu khyab pa ni thams cad rig pa ye shes kyi rtsal las byung bas ye shes dngos yin no/_/ dag ma dag ni der 'dzin yod med las rig ma rig gi bye brag gis 'khor 'das su byung ba'o/_/lnga tshan du ma'i thugs rje bshad pa'o/_/de ltar ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum tha dad du bshad kyang so sor med de/_thal 'gyur las/ ye shes rang ngor gnas pa la/_/gsum gyi tshul du dbyer med do/_/zhes pas/ chos nyid kyi ngos nas ngo bo zhes bya ste/_stong la spros pa dang bral ba/_chos can gyi ngos nas rang bzhin zhes bya ste/_/_snang la ngos gzung dang bral ba/ zung 'jug gnyis med kyi ngos nas thugs rje zhes bya ste rig stong rtag chad dang bral ba'o/_/ don gnyis pa de'i gdangs sems kyi bzhugs tshul la/_/_sems kyi gnas lugs ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum gyis spyir bstan/_ye shes kyi mdangs yin tshul gyis bye brag tu bshad/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du ji ltar gnas tshul gyis don bsdu ba gsum las/_dang po ni sangs rgyas ngo sprod pa'i lung las/_gsang ba'i bdag po yang nyon cig_/sems kyi rten ni rang gi lus sha khrag gi phung po byang khog stod 'di yin no/_/gnas ni glo ba'i nang na gnas so/_/lam ni glo ba dang mgrin par rtsa gro sogs gi sbu gu tsam gyis sbrel nas yod do/_/de nas yar dbugs rgyu bas sems kyi lam rtsa yin no/_/_sgo ni 'dod pa'i sgo gsum ste sna bug gnyis kha dang gsum yin no/_/'dod pa'i shes pa de nas byung ngo /_/sems rang gi ngo bo rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'o/_/rnam rtog ni dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'di rang yin no/_/zhes so/_/ gnyis pa ni snying ga na ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum gyi rig pa gnas pa'i thugs rje'i rig mdangs snying nas glo bar rtsa sog ma'i sbu gu tsam gyis sbrel ba'i nang na phar song bas/_glo ba na shes pa med pa'i rlung yod pa dang 'dres pas shes pa'am/_rig pa ye shes kyi mdangs kyis byas pa ni mi 'phye 'o mig can lta bu yin la/_gya ma gyur yul sna tshogs la 'gyu ba rlung gis byed pas rta long ba rkang can lta bu ste/_de gnyis sdod gnas glo ba na yod pa'i gdangs glo ba nas sgo lnga la rtsa re zug pa'i nang na phar song nas yul la rtog pa'i rnam rtog tshogs pa shar ro/_/de'ang rlung kho ra'i rang lugs ni 'gyu yang mi rtog ste/ gnyid mthug por song ba'i tshe rlung dang 'dres pa'i rig mdangs snying gar thim pas kun gzhi 'od gsal la thim pa dang /_'od gsal yengs dus rig pa'i gdangs glo ba na phar mi 'jug par mig las thon pas gsal stong gnyis med kyi ye shes/_shes rab rang byung gi sgron mar gyur pa lta bu'o/_/yang rig pa'i rang lugs kyang rlung dang ma 'dres na/_gsal stong rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la gnas te/_bar do'i 'od gsal gyi dus dang /_da lta'i 'od snang la gsal stong du gnas pa lta bu'o/_/des na sems ni rig pa'i rtsal yin te/_klong gsal las/_sems ni dran bsam rig pa'i rtsal/_/snang shes dag tu gyur tshad kun/_/ rig pa nyid las logs na med/_/ces so/_/des na rig pa'i rtsal lam gdangs rlung gi rtas khur nas dbang po la thon nas yul sna tshogs rags pa dang /_phra ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i rtog pa sna tshogs su shar yang /_thugs rje'i ri gdangs kyi cha kha dog tu med pa de rlung gi rang bzhin 'gyu yang*/_kha dog tu med pa dang gnyis 'dres nas phyir 'phro'am/_nang du gnas kyang kha dog med/ dbyibs med/_ngo bo ngos gzung med/_wal gyis byung nas gar song cha med pa ltar song yang de nyid kyi ngo nas gzhal na/_dang por byung sa med/_byung mkhan gyi sems zhes ngos gzung du ma grub/_da lta gang du yang mi gnas/_tha ma gang du yang mi 'gro ba'i chos nyid brtag na med la/_ma brtag na snang snang 'dra mo zhig tu gnas pa ni/_ye shes kyi rtsal rlung dang 'dres pa las sems zhes glo bur du btags kyang sems zhes logs par grub pa med de/_rlung ni ngo bo ngos gzung ye shes kyi rtsal ni ka dag gi ngang las byung la/_ka dag stong nyid spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/de yang sems gar yod du ye shes yod la/_nyi ma dang 'od zer gyi tshul te/_klong gsal las/_/_nyi ma'i 'od zer tshul bzhin du/_/ sems ni ye shes rig pa'i rtsal/_/ye shes med na sems med de/_/zhes so/ des na sems ni thugs rje rig pa'i ye shes kyi rtsal lam mdangs yin no/_/de yang ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum la mdangs gsum yod de/_/_ngo bo'i mdangs stong la spros pa dang bral ba rtog med chos kyi sku/_/_rang bzhin gyi mdangs gsal la ngos gzung med pa rang snang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ thugs rje'i mdangs rig pa sna tshogs su 'phro ba kun khyab sprul pa'i sku'o/_/ med/gsum pa sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ji ltar gnas kyi don bsdu ba ni/ thal 'gyur las/_lus can sems kyi khyab pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas ma yin sems can med/_/ces pa dang /_gsang 'dus las/_rin chen sems las phyir gyur pa'i/_/sangs rgyas med cing sems can med/_/ces pas/_sems snying ga'i ye shes kyi mdangs yin la/_snying ga'i ye shes la zhi ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis tshang ba bzhin/de'i mdangs sems la'ang rtsi yod dgos te/_me long la byad bltas pa ni byad kyi mdangs gnyis pa zhig me long la 'char dgos pa bzhin no/_/des na klong gsal las/_/_sems can rang rgyud rtogs tshogs ni/_/bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sangs rgyas te/_/phung po 'byung ba yab yum lnga/_/dug lnga ser sna thub pa drug/tshogs brgyad sems dpa' yab yum brgyad/_/sgo bzhi sgo ba yab yum bzhi/_/g.yas g.yon nyi ma zla ba 'o/_/zhes pas/_ phung po lnga la yul du rtog pa lnga ni yab lnga/_yul can du rtog pa lnga ni yum lnga/_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog ser sna dag gi rnam par rtog pa drug ni thub pa drug_/kun gzhi'i rnam shes la sogs pa brgyad kyi yul brgyad kyi rtog pa ni sems dpa' brgyad/ yul can brgyad kyi rtog pa ni sems ma brgyad/_khong khro ba dang /_rnam par sdang ba dang /_mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_chags sdang gi kun tu rtog pa'i yul bzhi ni sgo ba yab bzhi/_yul can bzhi ni yum bzhi/_gzung ba dang 'dzin par rtog pa gnyis ni nyi zla ste/_kun bzang yab yum gnyis te bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/_/de yang ngan pa ltar snang yang ye shes kyi rtsal yin pas don la rang ngo shes pa na bzang po yin te/_ye shes kyi gdangs yin pa'i phyir/_dper na rgya mtsho'i dbyings bzang na rlabs kyang bzang dgos pa bzhin no/_/gzhan yang 'da' ka ye shes pas/_sems rtogs na ye shes yin pas sangs rgyas gzhan nas mi btsal ba'i 'du shes rab tu bskyed par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de yang sems kyi gzhi rtsa chod na ye shes yin la ye shes kyi gzhi rtsa chod na gdod ma'i ka dag yin pas/_snang sems thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i zhing khams chen por gnas so/_/mdor na sems ni ye shes kyi rang mdangs rig stong mtha' grol chen por bzhugs so// don gsum pa de gnyis ji ltar 'phrad cing gyes pa'i tshul la gnyis las/_da lta 'phrad tshul ni glo ba nas snying du 'brel ba'i rtsa nang na phar rlung 'gyu bas/_ye shes kyi rtsal glo bar tshur 'ongs pa gnyis dus gcig pas/_rlung gi mdangs snying ga'i 'od gsal dang 'phrad de/_sangs rgyas ngo sprad pa'i lung las da lta 'phrad tshul dris pa'i lan du/_de ltar rig pa 'od lnga'i lus su yod pas/ rang gi snying nang na me re re yod do/_/sems glo ba na yod do/_/glo ba nas snying du rtsa sogs ma'i sbu gu tsam zhig gis sbrel nas yod de/_sems glo ba'i nang nas thon nas rtsa sog ma'i sbu gu tsam de'i nang nas yar dbugs rgyu bas snying gi nang nas yar sku gsum ye shes lnga yod pa dang 'phrad de/_rang gi snying ga'i dkyil du rig pa dbugs kyi rta dang 'phrad pas dbugs med pa'i 'gyu ba zhes bya'o/_/ zhes gsungs pas/_snying du rlung dang ye shes 'phrad dus sgo gzhan bzhi 'gyur ba rags par med de/_rig tsam las g.yo ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/'on kyang dbyings kyi snang bas 'gro 'ong dang bcas pa'i rta snying nang gi rlung dang 'dres pa'i cha des byed pas lus dang dbang po mi 'gul ba'i tshe/ g.yo bas 'od gsal nam mkha' la snang bas mi 'gul ba yin la/_rtog par 'gyus sam mig dang lus 'gul na rlung g.yo bas snang ba rnams kyang 'gro 'ong byed pa'o/_/'o na snang ba rnams rtsa nang gi sgron ma'i gdangs yin mod/_snying nang du rlung dang phrad pa'i g.yo mi g.yor mi 'thad snyam na/_sgron ma rnams snying nang gi gdangs yin la/_de mkha' la snang bas 'thad pa yin no zhes lan btab zin snying gi rlung de mi gnyis pa gyes tshul la gnyis las/_da lta yang 'od gsal gyi ngang la to/_/gzhan yang 'od snang la rtogs pas gsal 'grib legs nyes su spyod pa na yang sems ye shes dang 'phrad pa'o/_/ gsal stong 'dzin med chen poRa gnas dus/_/_glo ba'i nang du phar mdangs 'phros pa snying gnyid du log nas gzhi thog na gnas pas/_rlung kho rang ji ltar 'gyu yang rtog pa med pa'i gnad de yin pas dar cig rgyab gyes so/_/_sgrog thog ma bral bas yang gdangs glo bar 'phros pas rlung dang 'dres te sgo so so la 'phros pas sems mi dran dgu dran gyi rtog pa shar ro/_/tha ma rgyab kyis tshul ni de nyid las/_tha ma rgyab kyis tshul ni rang 'chi ba'i dus su sems glo ba'i nang nas don/_lam gro sog gi bug pa tsam de nas sna bug gnyis kha dang gsum nas ha zer nas dbugs phar la rgyu/_hu zer nas tshur la 'dren no/_/gsang ba'i bdag po srid pa'i ri bo las brgal ba'i dus su 'gyu ba'i rlung nang nas phyir 'dren pa stobs che/_'dus ma byas pas nam mkha' la phyir 'dren pa stobs che/ nang du 'dren pa'i rlung gis phyi'i nam mkha' nas nang du drangs nas tshur 'dus/ thugs rig pa'i ye shes la thim mo/_/phar 'phros 'dus ma byas kyi nam mkha' la thim pas/_rnam par shes pa rlung zhon gyi dgongs pa zhes bya'o/_/tha ma ha zer nas phar la song nas/_hus tshul la mi 'dus pa'i tshe gyes so/_/zhes pas/_'chi ba'i tshe gyen rgyu phyi chad/_thur sel nang du log_/mnyam gnas snying gar thim dus sems kyi rta rlung med pas/_ye shes kyi rtsal nang du thim pas sems dang ye shes rgyab gyes te/_rta long ba rkang can gyis mi 'phye'o mig can bor ba zhes bya'o/_/ de'i tshe ye shes 'ba' zhig nang du gsal ba ni/_mtshan brjod las/_shes pa 'ba' zhig nges gsal ba/_zhes so/_/ don gsum pa de gnyis kyis 'khor 'das kyi rten byed tshul ni/_snga ma de nyid las/_rigs kyi bu sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'khor ba'i rgyu yin no zhes bka' stsal to/_/zhes pas/_sems ni ma rig pa dkar nag gi las bag chags kyi rten byed pas 'khor lo ltar 'khor ba'i rgyu'am ngo bo yin la/_ye shes ni sgrib pa thams cad las 'das te/_thal 'gyur las/_ye shes ye nas 'od gsal bas/_/ma rig pa yis sgrib pa med/_/gdod nas mya ngan 'das pa ste/_/mya ngan 'das pa kun gyi rten/_/zhes so/_de dag gis gzhi'i gnas lugs bstan pa'o/_/ don gsum pa bar du lam gyi 'khyer tshul bstan pa la/_gzhi ma smin pa smin par byed pa'i dbang dang /_smin pa grol bar byed pa'i gdams pa gnyis las/_dang po dbang bskur ba'i yon tan/_ma bskur ba'i skyon/_ji ltar bskur ba'i rim pa/_dbang bskur ba dngos de'i dam tshig dang lnga las/_dang po ni snying gi me long las/_dbang rnams rab tu thob byas na/_/gsang sngags thams cad ma bsgrub 'grub/_/ces pa dang /_klong gsal las/_dbang thob rgyud smin chos sgo phyed/_/gsang sngags don kun 'grub par 'gyur/_/_zhes pas/_gong ma'i byin rlabs 'jug pas gsang sngags kyi snod du rung /_zab mo'i chos sgo phyed pas smin grol gyi lam la dbang la/_gsang sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub pas rang gzhan gyi 'dod dgu 'byung ba'o/_/ gnyis pa ni/_snying gi me long las/_gsang sngags dbang la ma brten 'grub mi 'gyur/_/_/dper na mnyen pa lag skya med pa bzhin/_/zhes pa dang / phyag rgya chen po kha sbyor thig le las/_/dbang ma thob la dngos grub med/_/bye ma btsir yang mar med bzhin/_/zhes pas/_de kho na nyid kyi snod du mi rung / yang dag pa'i byin rlabs mi 'jug_/dngos grub kyi rtsa ba chad pa'o/_/ gsum pa ni thal 'gyur las/_dbang ni rnam pa bzhi yis kyang /_/_skal par ldan pa smin par bya/_/spros bcas nyid dang spros med dang /_/shin tu spros med rab spros med/_/dbye ba bzhi yi tshul gyis ni/_/dad ldan rang rgyud smin par bya/_/zhes pa dang /_klong gsal las/_spros bcas phyi yi bum dbang dang /_/spros med nang gi gsang dbang dang /_/shin tu spros med shes rab ye shes dbang /_/ Rab tu spros med tshig dbang Rin po che/_/snod ldan bu la rim pa bzhin du bskur/_/_zhes pa dang /_mngon sum nyid ni gnad du dbab pa'i phyir/_kun tu spros med khyad par dbang lnga bskur/_zhes pa dang /_btags grol snying po'i rgyud las/_de nas rig pa'i rtsal dbang bskur/_/zhes pas/_dang po spros bcas phyi bum pa'i dbang /_de nas spros med nang gsang ba'i dbang /_de nas shin tu spros med gsang ba shes rab ye shes kyi dbang*/_de nas rab tu spros med yang gsang tshig dbang rin po che/_de nas kun tu spros med bla na med pa rig pa'i rtsal dbang rnams rim pa bzhin du bskur ro/_/_de'ang dbang re bskur nas de'i gdams pa re bstan te/_rtags ma byung gi bar bsgom zhing /_byung nas dbang phyi ma rnams rim pas lo zlas bar du chod par bskur ba dum bu'i lugs dang / dbang rnams zhag sbrel te bar ma chad par gcig steng gcig bskur ba khrigs chags lugs gang ltar byas kyang 'gal ba med do/_/ bzhi pa la/_phyi spros bcas bum pa'i dbang /_nang spros med gsang ba'i dbang /_gsang ba shes rab ye shes kyi dbang /_yang gsang tshig dbang rin po che/_/_bla med rig pa'i rtsal dbang lnga las/_dang po la/_bum dbang ma thob pa thob par bya ba/_thob pa rgyud la brtan pa'i tshul gnyis las/_dang po la sbyor ba dngos gzhi rjes gsum las/_sbyor ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos la bcu gcig ste/ bla ma'i mtshan nyid/_slob ma'i mtshan nyid/_gsol ba gdab pa/_bsnyen pa bya ba/ sa'i cho ga_/sta gon gyi cho ga_/thig gi cho ga_/tshon gyi cho ga_/dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i cho ga_/de nyid mchod pa'i cho ga_/slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga'o/_/dang po dang gnyis pa ni sngar bshad zin to//dgos pa ni dpon slob mtshan nyid dang ldan pas dbang bskur nod par byas na sdug bsngal kun las grol la/ gnyis ka 'phung ste/_klong gsal las/_mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma yis/_/dbang bskur bas ni sdug bsngal grol/_/_mtshan nyid mi ldan bla mas ni/_/dbang bskur byas na gnyis ka 'phung /_/zhes so/_/ mi ldan na gsum pa la spyir gsol ba gdab pa/_sdom pa thun mong pa sbyin pa/_thog ma'i dga' ston bya ba/_sdig pa sbyong ba/_srung 'khor bsgom pa/_dam tshig bsgrag pa/_bka' bzhin bsgrub pa dang bdun las/_dang po ni mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma des/_bla ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de la rab lo gsum/_'bring gnyis/ tha ma gcig nas/_bdag la dbang bskur bar zhu zhes gser gyi maN+Dal phul la gsol ba gdab/_bla mas kyang snod du rung na bya'o zhes zhal gyis bzhes la/ gnyis kas brtag go_/_dgos pa ni dpon slob gyi mtshan nyid brtags pas ngan na 'jog_/bzang na zhugs/_chos la gus pa bskyed pa'o/_/ gnyis pa ni de nas dus la babs pa dang /_drang don gyis dad pa bskyed la/_sngar lam la ma zhugs pa yin na skyabs 'gro thun mong pa nas sems bskyed dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa'i bar theg pa rim dgu'i lta ba dang /_sgom pa dang /_spyod pa dang /_dbang dang /_gdams pa la sogs pa ci rigs su bstan te/_thal 'gyur las/_de nas dbang bskur cho ga yang /_/_nyan thos theg pa nas brtsams te/_/thun mong sdom pa rdzogs par sbyin/_/ces so/_/ gsum pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo bzang po bshams la/_/_kye kye kun bzang rdo rje 'dzin/_/la sogs pas gsol ba gsum gdab pa ni zhu bas skabs dbye ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/bla mas/_kye kye rigs kyi bu mchog khyed rnams kyis zhes pa la sogs pa lan cig brjod pa ni bar chad dris pas 'gyod sems mi skye ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/de nas slob mas/_kye kye ji ltar thugs kyis dgongs mdzad pa/_zhes brjod pa ni spro bar khas len pa ste/_gtong phod che ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/de ltar dga' ston byas pa'i yon tan gyis/_klong gsal las/_dga' ston bar chad sel ba dang /_yon tan kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur/_zhes pa dang /_thal 'gyur las/_'khor dang longs spyod rnams kyi rten/_/lus ngag spyod pas mnyes pa yis/_/bla ma sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor bsten/_/bsten pa de la yon tan ni/_/dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin nor/_/'dod 'jo'i ba dang 'dra ba yi/_/yon tan dpag tu med pa thob/_/ces pas/_dga' ston gyis bla ma mnyes par bya'o/_/skyon ni snga ma de nyid las/ dga' ston tshogs yon med pa na/_/bar chad rkyen ni sna tshogs 'byung*/_/dbang gi rgyal sa zhig pa dang*/_/dngos grub mi thob yi dwags skye/_/zhes so/_/ bzhi pa slob ma rnams yi ge brgya pa'i bsgom bzlas byed du 'jug pa ni/ de nyid las/_sngon 'gro yi ge brgya pa'i bzlas brjod bya/_/zhes so/_/_dgos pa ni rgyud kyi sdig pa bsrabs pas dbang gi snod du rung ba'o/_/ lnga*pa*ni*klong gsal las/_bar chad mi zhugs bsrung bya'i phyir/_hUM gi sbyor bas bsrung mtshams bya/_zhes pas/_slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas slob ma'i snying gar hUM las 'od 'phros pas lus thams cad rdo rje'i go zhub tu gyur par bsam pa'i dgos pa ni/_da lta'i bar chad mi 'jug cing ma 'ongs pa'i bgegs tshar gcod pa'o/_/de ltar ma byas pa'i skyon ni/_de nyid las/_de ltar bsrung bar ma byas na/_/_/bdud dang bar chad rkyen dbang gyur/_/dngos grub byin rlabs 'phrog cing yal/_zhes so/_/ drug pa ni kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_zhes pa la sogs pa lan cig brjod pa ni/_klong gsal las/_/_dam tshig khas len gyur na sbyin/_/ces so/ dgos pa ni dam tshig bsrungs nus pas mi nyams shing gong du 'phel ba'o/_/ bdun pa ni/_kye kye sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis/_zhes pa la sogs pa slob mas khas blangs pas bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub pa ste mthar phyin pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de ltar ma byas pa'i skyon ni snga ma de nyid las/_dam tshig de rnams ma bsrung na/_/dbang gi yon tan mi 'byung zhing /_/nyams pas dmyal ba nyid du lhung /_/zhes so/_/ bzhi pa bsnyen pa bya ba ni slob dpon gyi chos te rigs lnga'i sgrub thabs phyi nang ltar bya'o/_/dgos pa ni bsnyen pa rdzogs pas dbang byin rlabs dang ldan pas slob ma'i rgyud smin nus pa'o/_/ lnga pa ni dkyil 'khor bzheng pa ste/_klong gsal las/_bkra shis rdzas dang sa bzang la/_/rin po che yis legs par rtsig_/rab ni ji ltar 'grub pa la/_/tha ma mda' gang mdung gang tshad/_/ces pas/_rab khru stong la sogs pa'i nges pa med pa'i chen po rgyu yang rin po che la sogs pa'o/_/_'bring 'dom gang / tha ma ni mda' gang pa la bya ba ni rten khyad par can du bsgrub pa'o/_/ba byung dang dri la sogs pa byugs pa ni gtsang bar bya ba'i don te/_ye nas dri ma med pa mtshon pa'o/_/_/de ltar lha mchod cing*bstod*nas/_kun tu bzang po sangs rgyas rigs lnga'i gtso/_la sogs pa brjod pa ni mkhyen par gsol ba ste/_thug thub tu ma 'jug pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/_de'ang rdzogs pa rang byung las/_gsol ba btab pas byin rlabs 'jug_/lha bskyed mchod dang bstod pa yis/_/byin gyis brlab pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de ltar byas par ma gyur na/_/de la byin nyid phebs mi 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/ drug pa ni/_klong gsal las/_rdo rje slob dpon bya ba'i las/_/bum pa lha dang sbyin sreg dang*/_/slob ma sta gon nye bar bya/_/zhes pas/_dang po bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa kha dog lngar bya ba ni/_rigs lnga'i rang bzhin mtshon la bum rdzas nyi shu rtsa lnga ni sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las re re la ye shes lnga lnga ste ye shes nyi shu rtsa lnga mtshon no/_/las bum dkar pos ni bya ba rnams 'grub pa'o/_/de dag tu rigs lnga so so'i lha bsgoms la/_/bzlas pa byas pas dbang gi dus su nye bar mkho ba nyid do/_/lha sta gon du bya ba ni/_maN+Dal gyi steng du bskyed la mchod cing bstod nas/_ho dgongs su gsol la sogs pas gsol ba btab pas bdag dang dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de nas spyin sreg ni thab dang rdzas kun zhi ba ltar byas pas bar chod dang sdig pa zhi ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/de nas slob ma sta gon du bya ba ni/_slob mas/ kye ma dus gsum rgyal ba kun tu bzang //la sogs pas gsol ba btab nas/ bla mas/_kye ma snod dang ldan pa'i bu/_la sogs pa brjod pas dkyil 'khor du gnad thob pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_zhes pa la sogs pas sdom pa blang ba ni sngags kyi rten du rung ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/de nas so shing dor ba ni dngos grub kyi ltas brtag pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de nas chos bshad pas slob ma'i blo dag cing sngags la spro dga' khyad par can skye ba'i dgos pa yod de/_srung skud btags te ku sha byin nas rmi lam brtags pas bar chad dang bral ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/ bdun pa thig gi cho ga ni/_klong gsal las/_thig skud ye shes lnga sgril la/_/ dkyil 'khor steng gi nam mkha' la/_/tshangs thig cha chen dag kyang gdab/_/ skad cig de la lha tshogs bskyed/_/mchod pa dang ni bstod pa bya/_/zhes pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng gi nam mkha' la thig gdab pa ni mkha' 'gro ye shes kyi thig ces bya ba ste ye nas rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rtsa ba'i 'khor lo mtshon pa'o/_/de nas sgo rkyang gi thig rdzogs par gdab pa ni/_dam tshig gi thig ces bya ba ste lus chags pa na gnas pa'i rtsa khams mtshon pa'o/_/brgyad pa tshon gyi cho ga ni/_rin po che la sogs pa'i tshon rtsi la bskyed chog byas pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bri ba ni/_ye shes kyi khams lnga las thams cad grub pa mtshon pa'o/_/dgu pa dkyil 'khor sgrub pa ni/_lha bskyed nas mchod cing bstod la bkra shis kyi bar brjod pa ste dbang bskur ba'i rten du dgos pa'o/_/phur pa brgyad ni sgo mtshams ma brgyad mtshon pa'o/_/ye shes lnga'i dru bu'i dra ba ris ni snying gar ye shes kyi klong na/_ngo bo sku/_rang bzhin 'od/_thugs rje sgron maRa gnas pa mtshon pa'o/_/de nas slob ma rnams bskor ba gsum byas la/_kye khro bo mi bzad 'jigs pa'i sku/_la sogs pa brjod pa ni ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin nang lhun grub kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de nas bla mas dri zhing lan brjod pas snod du rung ba mtshon pa'o/_/bgegs bskrad pa ni bar chad mi 'byung ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/de nas slob mas/_kye kye rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa dang /_la sogs pa brjod pas thar pa chen po'i sgo 'byed pa mtshon pa'o/_/yang kye kye bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /_zhes pa la sogs pas rdo rje slob dpon la gus pas bskyed cing zhu ba 'bul ba'o/_/bla mas/_kye kye khyed ni snod mchog dam pa ste/_zhes pas spro bas gnang ba sbyin pa'o/_/slob mas/ bdag ni 'bras bu gsang sngags kyi/_/_la sogs pas 'dod don la gsol ba'o/_/bla mas/_e ma e ma rigs kyi bu/_la sogs pas dam tshig gi mna' chu blud pas dam la ma 'da' bar byed pa'o/_/de nas ye shes phab pas rgyud byin gyis brlabs pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de nas sgo ma bzhi la gsol ba btab pas ye shes kyi gsang sgo phyed pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/me tog dor bas rang gi las 'brel yod pa'i lha ngos zin pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de nas ston pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis/_la sogs pas mig dar dkrol bas ye shes kyi spyan thob pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de nas dkyil 'khor bstan pas rigs lnga ye shes kyi zhing khams rtogs pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi rnam dag bshad pas lus brten pa dkyil 'khor gcig tu shes shing /_lha'i rnam dag bshad pas rang gi lus la zhi khro'i lha tshogs yod par rtogs nas rang lus 'og min gyi zhing du mthong ste/_bza' btung tshogs kyi yo byad du shes pas myur du sangs rgyas 'grub pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de'ang mdo tsam du brjod na/_dkyil 'khoRa 'jam zhing srubs med pa ni sems can dang sangs rgyas ye shes su gcig pa'o/_/_/me ri ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no/_/stong zhing bdag med pas rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/_/skyon gyis ma gos pas pad+ma'i phyed pa'o/_/'bras dang shes rab dag pa'i nyi zla'i gdan no/_/rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad dag pa'i dur khrodabargyad do/_/sku lnga ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i rtags su pany+tsa rA ga'i rtsig pa lnga'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sa nas skye ba med pa'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i phyir tshad med pa'i sgo bzhi'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dag pas rta babs bzhi'o/_/ byams pa chen po mnga' bas gdugs dang /_sems can la chos kyi sgo tshad med pa ston pas 'khor lo dang /_bdud dang phyir rgol kha bcom zhing rnam par mi rtog pas ri dwags dang /_'phags pa'i longs spyod tshad med pas rgyan rnams pa sna tshogs dang /_srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal bas rgyal mtshan dang /_chos kyi sgra dbyangs mi zad pas ba dan nyi shu rtsa bzhi la dril bu g.yer kha'i phreng ba 'khrol ba dang /_ye shes rnam par dag pas zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa dang /_gdung ba med pas rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_sgrib pa med pas me long gi phreng ba dang ldan pa'o/_/che ba'i yon tan tshad med pas rtsig pa'i steng na rin po che'i pha gu'o/_/'gro ba skyob bas mda' yab bo/_/sa dang lam thams cad mthar phyin pas rtse mo'i rim pa'o/_/dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir gtsang khang du phyur bu'o/_/snying po ye shes lnga dang ldan pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i tog go_/'dod dgu 'byung bas rtse mo rin po ches mtshan pa'o/_/'dod yon lnga mi spang zhing ye shes kyi rol par 'char bas phyi rol 'dod yon gyi snam bu la lha mo bcu drug go_/sku gsum 'du 'bral med pas nang mu khyud rim pa gsum mo/_/rigs lnga'i kha dog lhun gyis grub pa mtshon pa'i phyir dbus dang 'dab ma bzhi mthing la dkar ser dmar ljang ngo*/_/yab yum gnyis su med pa'i pad+ma'i mtshams bzhi mdzes tshon no/_/chos sku mu mtha' dang bral bas bum pa lnga zlum po'o/_/ye shes lnga ldan du yod pas kha dog lnga'o/_/zhi ba la khro bo 'od zer du yod pas kha rgyan dang bcas pa'o/_/gdod ma'i rig pa 'gyur ba med pas de'i gseb na rdo rje yod pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa lnga snang yul du dag pas mgul chings lnga dang ldan pa'o/_/ye shes lnga'i thugs rje kun khyab tu yod pas gzungs thag lnga sgril lo/_/rig pa stong gsal dri ma med pas shel dang me long kha rgyan gyi gseb tu byung ba'o/_/sgron ma bzhi dbyings su 'khyil ba'i rtags su steng gi rma bya'i gdugs so/_/bstan pa mi nub pa'i phyir zur bzhir rgyal mtshan bzhi'o/_/_/snyan pa'i grags pa sgrogs pas phyogs bzhir ba dan bzhi'o/_/dam can mkha' 'gro mnyes pa'i phyir tshogs gtor phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/dbang bskur ba la phun sum tshogs pa lnga ldan tshang ba'i phyir/_gnas dang bla ma la sogs pa'o/_/gnyis pa lha'i dag pa ni dbus rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa so so'i sku mdog lngar byung ba ni nyon mongs pa lnga ma spang gnas su dag cing / ye shes lnga lhun gyis grub pa la/_sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi dgongs pa'i 'dus pa'i rtags so/_/yab lnga ni phung*po*lnga dang*/_yum lnga ni 'byung ba lnga dag la zung sbyor ni 'khor ba zil gyis gnon cing skyon gyis ma gos pa'i bde ba chen por ro gcig pa'o/_/sems dpa' sems ma brgyad ni rnam shes tshogs brgyad dag pa'o/_/sgo ba yab yum bzhi ni dmigs pa med pa'i tshad med pa bzhi'o/_/thub pa drug ni 'gro drug dbyings su 'dren cing /_nyon mongs pa drug dag pa'i rtags so/_/thams cad skyil krung mdzad pa ni/_bdud kyis mi 'phrogs shing dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dgongs pa la bzhugs pa'o/_/rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags so/_/rig stong / gsal stong /_shar stong /_bde stong*/_snang stong zung 'jug gi rtags su rigs lnga'i phyag mtshan so sos mdzes pa'o/_/snang srid sna tshogs ye stong rtsa ba dang bral bas 'khor rnams ni phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa'o/_/bum dbang gi sngon 'gro'o/_/ gnyis pa dngos gzhi la lha dang las kyis 'brel ba'i dbang /_rigs kyi bdag po'i dbang /_'du 'bral med pa kun tu bzang po'i dbang /_ye shes rnam dag chu'i dbang /_de nyid mtshon pa brda'i dbang /_gshis kyi ngo bo don gyi dbang / brtan zhing mthar phyin dam tshig gi dbang dang bdun las/_dang po ni klong gsal las/_maN+Dal yon phul gsol ba gdab/_/me tog gang la phog pa yis/_/rigs sbyong rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur/_/zhes pas/_ slob mas gsol ba btab nas/_/_bla mas me tog gang la phog pa/_zhes pa la sogs pas dbang bskur bas so so'i sngon nas 'brel ba'i lha myur du grub nas dngos grub 'byung ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/gnyis pa ni klong gsal las/_sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang /_/phrin las dag gi dbang bskur bya/_/zhes pas/_slob ma rigs lngar bsams la/_hUM gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag cing /_/la sogs pas dbang bskur bas/_dug lnga dag cing ye shes lnga thob nas/_sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las thams cad la rang dbang thob pa'i nus pa 'jog pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/gsum pa ni/_/_thabs dang shes rab dbyer med cing /_/la sogs pas dbang bskur bas/_thabs shes rab gnyis su med cing /_sku gsum 'du 'bral med pas tshad med bzhi'i sgo nas ye shes lngas sems can gyi don byed pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/bzhi pa ni bum pa'i chu'i dbang bskur bas/_nyon mongs pa lnga dag_/sku lnga dang ye shes lnga thob/_phung po khams dang skye mched lha dang lha mor gsal ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/lnga pa ni/_brda'i dbang bskur bas/_rigs lnga ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rang gnas rtogs pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/drug pa ni de nyid las/_/de ltar brda yi ngo sprod kyang /_/logs na yod pa ma yin te/_/rang gi lus sems 'di la tshang /_/zhes pas/_rang nyid las rig pa'i ye shes lnga tshan du ngo sprad pas sangs rgyas rang la yod par yid ches pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ de'ang sku lnga ye shes lnga rigs lnga rlung lnga shes rab lnga mkha' 'gro lngar ngo sprad pa ni sngar bshad zin to/_/bdun pa ni/_thal 'gyur las/_dbang brtan pa yi dam tshig bshad/_/dbye na brjod kyis mi lang yang*/_/mdor bsdus sku dang gsung dang thugs/_/rnal 'byor lus ngag yid la sbyar/_/zhes pa la sogs pas/_dam tshig gi bsrung mtshams 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams brjod pas sngar gyi sdom pa rnams mi nyams shing brtan la/_yon tan gsar du skye bas dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/dbang dngos gzhi'o/_/ gsum pa rjes la dga' ston bya ba/_bka' bzhin bsgrub pa/_skyon yon bstan pa gsum las/_dang po klong gsal las/_dbang bskur thog ma tha ma ru/_/dga' ston ma byas dngos grub med/_/_/dga' ston chen pos mchod pa yis/_/bla ma dang ni de yi 'khor/_/de bzhin rang gi rdo rje spyan/_/gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dag nas/_/brgya stong grangs med dag la ni/_/tshogs kyi dga' ba sus byas pa/_/ston mo yon dang bcas pa yis/_/rnal 'byor pa rnams mgu byas na/_/legs pa thams cad 'grub pa dang /_/nyes pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/zhes pa dang /_rang shar las/_de ltar man ngag slob dpon la/_/ rang lus dang ni rin chen rdzas/_/shin tu dkon pa dag gis bsten/_/rin chen gser ni rang lus tsam/_/bla ma la yang yon du dbul/_/_man ngag lung gi slob dpon la/_khu bo pha dang ma dang mig_/bu dang chung ma nor gyi mchog_/sgo gsum zol zog med pa yis/_/rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul/_/zhes so/_/de ltar ma byas na snga ma las/_bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang*/_/mched grogs rdo rje spun la sogs/_/tshogs mchod yon gyi ma mnyes na/_/nad mang tshe thung bar chad 'byung /_/thun mong dngos grub med pa dang /_/mchog las ring du song ba dang /_/ tshe 'phos yi dwags skye ba brgyud/_/_ces so/_/dgos pa ni thams cad mnyes pas dngos grub thob pa'o/_/gnyis pa klong gsal las/_bla ma dang ni dbang mchog gi_/gsung dang gzhung las 'gal ba na/_na rag sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/_zhes pas/_bka' bzhin bsgrubs na mngon mtho dang /_/nges legs myur du 'grub pa'o/_/ gsum pa la gnyis las/_de ltar dbang thob pa'i yon tan ni sngar yang bstan la/_khyad par klong gsal las/_dbang thob rigs kyi bu de nyid/_/tshe 'dir bsam pa kun 'grub dang /_/phyi ma mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/zhes so/_/skyon ni de nyid las/_dper na zhing sa gshin po la/_/so nam rim par ma byas na/_/'bras bu smin par mi 'gyur ltar/_/sems la chos nyid gnas gyur kyang /_/dbang gis smin par ma byas na/_/rnal 'byor dngos grub ga la thob/_/ dbang med 'khor ba'i mtha' snyegs te/_/'di phyi'i bde ba thob pa med/_/ces so/_/mdor na thar pa'i grong khyer du myur du 'jug pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de dag gis bum dbang bstan zin to/_/ gnyis pa de nyid rgyud la brten tshul la/_phyi nang gsang ba gsum las/ dang po ni rigs lnga phyi ltar bsgrub pa ste/_klong gsal las/_lus kyi khyab tshad thams cad la/_/_/phung po lnga ni rigs lnga dngos/_khams lnga yum lnga nyid du gnas/_/zhes pas bskyed rdzogs gnyis las/_/dang po skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed la/_stong pa'i ngang las hUM las e raM yaM khaM laM 'phros/_'byung ba lnga rim brtsegs kyi steng du hUM las gzhal yas khang yongs su rdzogs par seng ge glang po rta mchog rma bya shang shang lnga'i steng du pad+ma nyi zla la/_O~M hU~M hU~M traM hrIHaHlnga las 'od 'phros snang srid thams cad lha dang lha mor gyur/_slar 'dus yongs su gyur pa las/_dbus dang phyogs bzhir rigs lnga yab yum dang bcas pa'i mtshams bzhir sems dpa' yab yum brgyad/_phyogs bzhir thub pa drug gi bzhi_/steng 'og gnyis su re re/_sgo bzhir sgo ba yab yum bzhi bskyed pa'i gnas gsum du O~M AHhU~M gsum las 'od 'phros/_ye shes pa spyan drangs la rang la thim par bsgoms te/_O~M dzi na dzi ka_/laM te shwa ra ti hUM/_hUM badzra b+h+raka_/muM d+hartu shwa rI stAM/_swA rat+na d+hika_/maM mo ha ra ti n+taM/[ \u0f00] a ro lig_/ShAM ra ga ra ti NAM/_ha pra dz+nyA dr-ika_/taM badzra ra ti stAM/_hU~M traM hrIHa dzaHhU~M baM hoHsi ti [(]r-ia[>]sid+d+hi[) ]hU~M hU~M zhes pa bzlas pa'i 'od zer snying ga nas 'phros pas/_sems can la phog pas sgrib pa sbyangs nas lha dang lha mor dmigs te ci 'grub zlas so/_/ gnyis pa rdzogs rim ni/_snod bcud thams cad rim gyis bsdus la snying ga'i sa bon mi dmigs pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang de la mnyam par gzhag nas bsngo ba byas la/_/_lus la bde ba/_ngag la nus pa/_sems la rtogs pa phyogs med du 'char/_sgrib pa dag_/rab tshe 'dir/_'bring bar do/_/tha ma rang bzhin sprul pa sku'i zhing du sangs rgya'o/_/gnyis pa nang ltar sgrub pa ni/_klong gsal las/_stong dang snang ba kun bdag nyid/_/yab yum 'khril sbyor gcig gi ngang /_/zhes pas/_bskyid rim ni skad cig dran rdzogs kyis rang nyid kun bzang yab yum mthing gsal rdo rje dril bu 'dzin cing skyil krung gis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bzhugs pa'i spyi bor rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum mgrin par rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum/_snying gar rnam par snang mdzad yab yum/ lte bar snang ba mtha' yas yab yum/_gsang bar don yod grub pa yab yum tshigs brgyad la sems dpa' yab yum brgyad/_yan lag bzhi la sgo ba yab yum bzhi bskyed la/_O~M AHhU~M[ \u0f00] hU~M traM hrIH_aHsid+d+hi pha la hU~M dzaHzhes bzlas so/_/ rdzogs rim ni/_bdag dang snang srid thams cad yenas dag pa'i 'od gsal snang la rang bzhin med pa'i dbang du lus lha/_ngag sngags/_sems stong gsal chos nyid las mi 'da' zhing /_sems can la byams snying rje bskyed pa'o/_/yon tan ni tshe 'dir bsam pa thams cad 'grub cing phrin las thogs pa med pas/_phyi ma la sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pas sems can gyi don byed pa'o/_/ gsum pa gsang ba ltar sgrub pa la thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa gsum las/_dang po ni/_skad cig gis bdag nyid rdo rje phag mo/_dmar mo khro zhal spyan gsum phag zhal mthing gas spyi gtsug brgyan pa/_g.yas gri gug nam mkha' la 'phyar zhing g.yon thod khrag thugs kar 'dzin pa/_zhabs g.yon brkyangs pa'i brla la g.yas bskums pa'i mthe bong btad pa/_gru mo na kha TAM dang me long dril bu'i sgra 'khrol ba/_pad+ma dang nyi zla ro'i steng me ri 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa'i spyi bor/_rdo rje DA ki ma dkar mo g.yas rdo rje yu ba byas pa'i gri gug_/mgrin par rin chen DA ki ma ser mo g.yas rin po ches yu ba byas pa'i gri gug_/snying gar chos dbyings Da ki ma sngon mo g.yas 'khor los yu ba byas pa'i gri gug_/lte bar pad+ma DA ki ma dmar mo g.yas pad+mas yu ba byas pa'i gri gug_/gsang bar las kyi DA ki ma ljang gu g.yas rgya gram gyis yu ba byas pa'i gri gug dang /_g.yon pa kun thugs kar thod pa 'dzin pa/_gru mo na kha TaM ka dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i snying gar rang rang gi sa bon la ha ri ni sa bzhi bzhis bskor ba'i 'od kyis snang srid thams cad lha dang lha mor bsams la rang la bstim zhing*/_O~M a ha ri ni sa bud+d+ha DA ki ni hUM dzaH_de bzhin du badzra/_rat+na/ pad+ma/_karma DA ki ni hUM dzaH_zhes bzlas pas/_snang srid dbang du 'dus par bsgom mo/_/rdzogs rim ni de dag spros bral gyi ngang la bzhag go_/zas nor char bzhin babs/_/dngos grub gang 'dod 'ongs/_/skye bo sprin bzhin 'du'o/_/ gnyis pa shes rab ltar sgrub pa ni/_skad cig dran rdzogs kyis rang nyid rdo rje phag mo gong dang 'dra ba'i spyi bor rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu la rdo rje rigs kyi dpa' bo yab yum/_mgrin par rtsa 'dab bcu drug la rin chen rigs/_snying gar rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis la chos dbyings rigs /_lte bar rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi la pad+ma'i rigs/_gsang bar rtsa 'dab nyi shu rtsa brgyad la las kyi rigs kyi dpa' bo yab yum/_sku mdog phyag mtshan snga ma ltar bsgom la/_rlung kha sbyar te/_lha rnams kyi 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gsum dbang du bsdus/_zas nor gyi char phab par bsgom la/_O~M hrI ma ha ri ni sa ra tsa hri ya tsit+ta hring hring dza dza:_de bzhin du/_O~M bud+d+ha DA ki ni/_badzra/_rat+na/_pad+ma/_karma Du ki ni ra tsa hri ya tsit+ta hring hring dza dzaH/_zhes bzlas pa'i 'od zer lcags kyu lta bus bkug par bsam la bzlas so/_/rdzogs rim ni snang srid gzugs su gyur tshad dpa' bo dpa' mo/_/_/sgra thams cad ha ri ni sa/_dran rig thams cad chos nyid kyi rol par lam du bya'o/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig tu/_/sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms/_/rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig tu/_/chags zhen mi bya sbyin pa gtong /_/pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig tu/_/bud med mi spang bde stong sgoms/_/ las kyi DA ki'i dam tshig tu/_/shugs 'byung rang ga'i spyod pa skyongs/_/de ltar byas pa'i yon tan ni/_/_rdo rje mkha' 'gros zhi ba 'grub/_/rin chen pad+ma las gsum gyis/_/rgyas pa dbang dang mngon spyod 'grub/_/rdo rje phag mo'i dam tshig tu/_/chos nyid bde chen rol pa yis/_/mchog dang thun mong dngos grub 'grub/_/ gsum pa gnyis med ltar sgrub pa ni/_klong gsal las/_stong gsal rig pa'i ye shes lnga/_/thabs shes zung 'jug ngang nyid dngos/_/zhes pas/ gang shar chos nyid kyi rol pa/_thugs phrad shugs 'byung gi spyod pa/_re dogs gnyis med kyi 'bras bu rang shar rang grol chen por lam du bya ba ni/_lta ba'i snying po stong gsal 'gyur med ltos/_/sgom pa'i snying po rang grol 'dzin med skyongs/_/spyod pa'i snying por tshogs drug lhug par zhog_/'bras bu'i snying por re dogs zhig pa yin/_/mu mtha' bral na lta ba'i rgyal po mchog_/gza' gtad bral na sgom pa'i rgyal po mchog_/blang dor rtogs na spyod pa'i rgyal po mchog_/ ye bzhin rtogs na 'bras bu'i rgyal po mchog_/_rtogs su med kyi lta ba'i dmigs gtad shol/_/bsgom du med kyi gang byung gang bder thong /_/spyad du med kyi shug 'byung rtsis gdab med/_/thob tu med kyi ye bzhin lhun gyis grub/_/ 'di yin med kyi ched 'dzin ma byed cig_/gang yin yin gyi spang blang ma byed cig_/_/gza' gtad med kyi re dogs ma byed cig_/yin min med kyi phyogs 'dzin ma byed cig_/sna tshogs yul rnams kun la phar ltos dang /_/snang zhing srid pa thams cad gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/_snang stong grags stong rang bzhin ngo bos stong /_/de gnyis 'byed pa'i sems la tshur ltos dang /_/dran stong rig stong tshor stong bden pas stong /_/ji bzhin gnyug ma ye bzhin chos nyid dang /_/skye med spros bral spros kun zhi ba nyid/_/_ces pa ni snying po ye shes kyi rigs lnga gsang bar sgrub 'o/_/mdor na bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug gi don sgom pa ni bum dbang gi de kho na nyid rgyud la brten pa'o/_/ gnyis pa spros med gsang ba'i dbang la/_gsang dbang ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /_de nyid rgyud la ji ltar brten pa'i thabs gnyis las/_dang po la sngon 'gro_/dngos gzhi/_rjes gsum las/_dang po la dus dang yo byad kyi khyad par/_phyag rgya dbul zhing gsol ba gdab/_byin dbab cing rang lus dkyil 'khor du ngo sprad pa gsum las/_dang po ni dbang bzhi zhag so sor dbye na/_srod la dkyil 'khor gyi lhor gsang dbang /_gung la shes rab ye shes/_tho rangs tshig dbang bskur la/_zhag gcig la byed na sngon 'gro zhag gcig gi song nub srod la dkyil 'khor gyi shar du bum dbang bskur bas lus kyi sgrib pa dag_/zhi ba'i phrin las 'grub/_gung la lhor gsang dbang bskur bas ngag gi sgrib pa dag_/rgyas pa'i phrin las 'grub/_tho rangs nub tu shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas yid kyi sgrib pa dag_/dbang gi phrin las 'grub/_nyi ma rtse shar la byang du tshig dbang bskur bas shes sgrib dag_/drag po'i las 'grub/ sbyor sgrol gyi dgongs pa mthar phyin to/_/ gnyis pa ni gser gyi maN+Dal 'bul ba la sogs pa'o/_/gsum pa ni phyag rgya dbul bas bde chen gsang ba'i dbang myur du thob pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ bzhi pa ni/_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod nyon/_la sogs pas byin phebs nas snod du rung la/_rang lus ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du ngo sprad pas/_gnas lugs kyi dgongs pa rang la yod par go ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/de'ang klong gsal las/_'byung ba'i gdangs las grub pa yi/_/_lus 'di bde gshegs pho brang nyid/_/rigs lnga yab yum lnga yi gnas/_/_phung khams skye mched lha yi sku/_/zhes pas/_rang gi rig pa 'di 'khor 'das gang du'ang ma grub pa'i sngon rol na 'od gsal bde ba chen por bzhugs pa las/_rang ngo ma shes pas rang rig 'byung ba'i sbubs su tshud kyang /_da lta sangs rgyas kyi pho brang dngos yin te/_'khor lo lnga na mkha' 'gro lnga lhun grub tu bzhugs/ thams cad dpa' bo/_khams thams cad dpa' mo/_/skye mched thams cad lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du ye nas gnas so zhes pa'o/_/_slob mas bla ma'i gnas lnga gang rung du me tog dor la bla mas ngo sprad pas ni/_sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi dngos grub gang thog mar 'grub shes de'i dgos pa yod phung po do/_/ gnyis pa dngos gzhi ni/_bla ma yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang sems gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas/_ngag gi sgrib pa dag_/gtum mo tsaN+Da li bsgom pa'i dbang thob pa'o/_/_/de'ang gsang 'dus las/_byang chub sems ni don dam zhes bya ba/_/skal bzang slob ma bzang po'i man ngag thob/_/thal mo sbyar nas me tog 'dzin pa yis/_/bla ma las ni slar yang blang bar bya/_/zhes pa'i don ni/_bla ma chags bral yin na yid kyi rig ma la brten la/_chags can yin na dngos kyi rig ma la brten te/_gsum pa mjug ni/_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_la sogs pas sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa brten par gdams pa ste khams 'phel ba'i rten 'brel phun sum tshogs shing phyi nang gi mkha' 'gro mnyes pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gnyis pa gsang dbang rgyud la ji ltar brten pa la/_thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa gnyis las/_dang po ni sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa dam rdzas rnams brten pa yin no/_/_gnyis pa ni mkha' 'gro'i gtum mo bsgom pa ste/ de'ang stan bde ba la rnam snang gi chos bdun dang ldan pas/_rang nyid rdo rje phag mor bskyed la/_'khor lo lnga'i rtsa 'dab dang /_dbus ro rkyang kun d+har ma gsum gsal btab ste/_rlung ro gsum phyir bus la/_'jam rlung dal bus ring bar nang du drangs pa rtsa gnyis nas dbu mar song bas rgyu ma phus btab pa bzhin song ba'i rlung gis/_lte ba nas gsang bar sbud pa ltar bus pas/_lte ba'i 'og nas aHshad dmar po mar me tsam pa la phog pas me 'bar bas lte ba'i pad+ma DA ki yab yum la phog pas/_sbyor mtshams nas thig le'i rnam pa byung bas gsang bar babs pas/_bde skyong 'khor lo gang bar bsgoms pas gsang ba dang /_lte bar drod skyes pa dang /_'khor lo gong ma rnams su'ang de ltar bsgom/_phyi nang thams cad me 'ur 'ur 'bar bar bsgom la rlung kha sbyar te/_thub thang bzung la gtong dus rdzogs par mi btang bar lhag ma nang du gzung la brngubs pas nang de ltar brtson pas zhag bcu gcig na rtsa kha bye nas khrag du snga ma bzhin dgang / dros/_bde ba g.yos nas/_lus la bde drod me ltar 'bar zhing sems la rtogs pa nam mkha' ltar yangs te dpa' bo mkha' 'gro sprin bzhin 'dus nas dngos grub sna tshogs char bzhin 'bab bo/_/gsang dbang bstan zin to// gsum pa shin tu spros med shes rab ye shes kyi dbang la/_ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /_/_de nyid rgyud la brten pa'i thabs gnyis las/_dang po ni klong gsal las/_yid sgrib dag dang nus ldan phyir/_/de la de yi nub phyogs su/_/dus ni nam phyed dus dag tu/_/gsum pa'i phyag rgya mtshan ldan ma/_khrus byas rgyan gyis spras pa bzhag_/ces pas/_sngon 'gro_/_dngos gzhi/_rjes gsum las/_dang po la yon dbul zhing gsol ba gdab pa/_dam tshig sbyin zhing khas blangs pa/_gdong g.yogs bcings dgrol ye shes dbab pa/_gus pa bskyed nas yum mkha' ngo sprad pa dang bzhi las/_dang po ni maN+Dal phul la/_kye kye bcom ldan bde chen chos kyi dbyings/_la sogs pas gsol ba gdab bo/_/ dgos pa ni zab mo'i de nyid gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/ gnyis pa ni bla mas/_kye ma gsang ba shes rab ye shes kyi/_la sogs pas byin la/_slob mas khas blangs pas dam tshig la gnas pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/gsum pa gdong g.yogs bcings pa ni/_sngar gsang ba ma mthong bar mtshon la/_/_byin phab pas ye shes 'jug cing /_gdong g.yogs phye bas zab mo'i de nyid mthong bar byed pa'o/_/ bzhi pa phyag dang /_bskor ba dang /_me tog gis yum mnyes par byas te/ bla mas yum mkha' ngo sprad pas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang don zab mo'i gnas lugs rtogs pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de'ang klong gsal le'u brgyad pa las/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /_/b+ha ga'i dbyings nas rang byung ste/_/chos rnams kun gyi 'byung gnas nyid/_/b+ha ga gsang sngags kun gyi gnas/_/bde chen ye shes 'byung ba yin/_/'di nyid ma brten thabs gzhan med/_/thabs kyi rgyud kyis grol ba yin/_/bde chen 'di brten grol ba thob/_/ yang dag sangs rgyas 'di las byung /_zhes pas/_gsang sngags kyi lam ni zab mo thabs kyis grol ba yin la/_thabs kyi mchog ni bde ba chen po bsgom pa ste/ de'i 'byung gnas ni yum las 'byung la/_yum gyi lus kyi rang bzhin b+ha ga ye shes kyi mkha' dbyings chen po 'di nyid la gus pas brten par mdzod cig_/ bud med thams cad la dpa' mo'i blos dngos sam yid kyis phyag dang bskor ba la sogs pa gyis shig_/_/de'i ci'i phyir zhe na/_klong gsal las/_bud med brnyas shing mkha' la gshe_/bde dang bral na na rag spyod/_ces gsungs so/ zhes che ba brjod pa yin no/_/ gnyis pa dngos gzhi la/_mkha' gsang bstan zhing byin gyis brlab pa/ sbyor bas bskul zhing bde ba spar ba/_ye shes chen por ngo sprad pa gsum las/ dang po ni yum des/_hUM nga yi b+ha ga gsang chen 'di/_/la sogs pas chos 'byung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skyed byed du mtshon la/_byin gyis brlabs pas tha mal du mi 'gyur ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gnyis pa ni yab yum snyoms par zhugs te dwangs ma gsang bar babs dus/_gang du'ang 'dzin pa med pas bde ba ma phebs kyi bar du spyod cing snyoms par zhugs pas ye shes kyi gnas lugs rtogs pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gsum pa ni gsang bar dwangs ma babs pas rdo rje nor bu nas pad+ma'i khyams su skad cig dang por shor dus/_gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa phra rags thams cad nub ste bde stong lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ngang la mnyam par gnas pa'i don ngo sprad pas/_sdug bsngal thams cad bde bar shar nas bde ba stong bar ngo 'phrod pas 'od gsal bde ba chen po'i ye shes la rgyun du gnas pa'i dgos pa yod do/_de ltar ngos zin nas rang lus thabs ldan nam/_gzhan lus shes rab gang la brten yang dwangs ma ma nyams pas bde stong gi don la ye stong gi rtsis bzung nas bskyangs pas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ngo /_/ gsum pa rjes ni/_las kyi phyag rgya brten du rung ba dang /_yid kyi sgrib pa 'dag pa dang /_srid pa gsum dbang du 'du ba dang /_bde ba chen po'i sku 'grub pas bde stong bsgom la/_de dang mthun pa'i dam rdzas brten cig ces pa'o/_/ gnyis pa de nyid rgyud la ji ltar brten pa'i rim pa la/_sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes rnam pa gsum las/_dang po la phyag rgya brtag pa/_dgug pa/_bsgyur ba/_smin par bya ba bzhi las/_dang po la spyir brtag pa dang /_bye brag tu brtag pa gnyis las/_dang po la gsum las/_bcu gnyis ma ni/_sgyu 'phrul las/ bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan/_/zhes so/_bcu drug ma ni/_mtshan brjod las/_bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can/_/zhes so/_/nyi shu ma ni/_rnam pa nyi shu'i byang chub pa/_/zhes pas/_mchog tu bsngags pa'o/_/ gnyis pa spang bya'i mtshan nyid dang /_brten bya'i mtshan nyid gnyis las/ dang po klong gsal las/_dad dang ngo tsha med pa dang /_rigs dang rang bzhin nyams pa spang /_/zhes pas/_dad pa med pa dang /_ngo tsha dang khrel med pa dang / rigs lnga'i mtshan ltas bzang po nyams pa dang /_rang bzhin ngan la rtsub pa/_sgo gsum rnam par mi dge ba'o/_/yang de nyid las/_rtsa zhig rtsa zha rtsa gud gsum/_/ bde ba med pas spang bar bya/_/zhes pas/_rtsa zhig ni/_bu tsha skyes pa ste rus tshigs byer zhing lhod pa'o/_/zha ba ni nad gcong la sogs pas gtar sreg byas pa'i bde ba'i lam nyams pa'o/_/gud pa ni las drag po dang /_mya ngan dang / zas bcud med brten pa la sogs pas bde ba ster mi nus so/_/yang ma smin yal dang zad pa dang*/_chung dang nyams dang skyon can spang /_zhes pas/_ma smin pa ni khams nar ma rdzogs pa lo bcu man chad pa'o/_/yal ba ni dwangs ma zag nas med pa ste sum cu la sogs pa yan chad do/_/zad pa ni bu tsha skyes pa'am zas med pa la sogs pas khams nyams pa'o/_/chung ba ni khams nyung ba'i bud med kyi ris can bde ba shas chung ba'o/_/nyams pa ni khams zag pa'o/_/skyon can ni nad bu yod pa'o/_/de ltar las kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ma tshang ba spang la tshang ba brten no/_/ gnyis pa la mtshan nyid spyir bstan pa dang /_bye brag tu bshad pa gnyis las/_dang po ni slob dpon gyis rdo rje chu 'dren du gsungs pa/_bu mo yid 'ong dad pa can/_/bde chen rgyun gnas bcu drug yum/_/bongs mtshams so tshags dam pa dang*/_/skra ser nu ma gting phra ma/_/sked phra sha 'jam skad snyan zhing /_/ snying rje blo che rgyud dul zhing*/_/rang la mos shing dri zhim pa/_/_rigs lnga'i mdog la mdangs dang ldan/_/b+ha ga rub cing bde ba che/_/de lta bu la bde ba blang /_/ zhes pa dang /_klong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud las/_/_phyi nang gsang ba'i rtags tshang zhing /_/dri zhim skad snyan yid 'ong mdzes/_/_/bde ba'i mdangs ldan chos la mos/_/_gsang thub shes rab che ba 'o/_/zhes pas/_phyi lus/_nang rtsa/_gsang ba sems kyi rtags gsum tshang ba ste/_de'ang lus 'di lang tsho dar la babs pa/ lo bcu gnyis sam bcu drug nas nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar gong gi skyon dang bral ba'o/_/yon tan ni/_lus rgyas pas rtsa rgyas/_rtsa rgyas pas rlung rgyas/_rlung rgyas pas thig le*rgyas/[ · ]thig le rgyas pas bde ba shin tu rgyas pa'o/_/bde ba rgyas pas rnal 'byor pa'i thig le 'phel zhing bde stong gi yon tan skye ba'o/_/de'ang gzhon nu ma de'i nang gi bde ba'i stobs phyir shar bas gzhan shing yid du 'ong ba'o/_/skra li zhing so legs la yan lag gi sha rgyas pa'o/_/de nyid ga na gnas pa'i yul dang rnal 'byor pa la bkra shis pa'o//de'ang dri zhim pas bde ba mi sun zhing spro la skad snyan pas bde ba la yid 'jug_/sked pa phra bas mnyen zhing bde ba rgyun mi 'chad/_smad kyi zhing rgyas b+ha ga rub pas rtsa btsal sla/_chags pa'i mdangs dang ldan pas bde ba rang dbang med par skye ba'i dgos pa yod do/ mi smra zhing //nang gi rtags ni gsang thub pas gsang spyod gzhan du bde ba'i skad 'byin pas bde ba kha g.yo la/_b+ha ga'i nang na rtsa'i rtse mo ring bas de las rdo rje reg pa tsam gyi bde ba mi bzod pa skye zhing skad 'byin pa'o/_/_gsang ba ni dad pa che zhing chos la mos pas log pa'i lam du mi 'gro/ shes rab che bas bla ma'i brda
