dang gsung sgros phyin ci ma log par go/dam tshig gtsang la dbang thob pas/_gsang spyod la skur ba mi 'debs pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/mdor na klong gsal las/_skyon can spang zhing yon tan ldan pa bsten/ 'bras bu gnas skabs mthar thug phun sum tshogs/_zhes so/_/ gnyis pa rnam grangs bye brag tu bshad pa ni rnam pa drug ste/_pad+ma can dang /_dung can ma dang /_ri mo can dang /_ri dwags can dang /_glang po can ma dang /_sna tshogs ma'o/_/de las pad+ma can rab ni lus ha cang ring ba ma yin/ thung ba ma yin/_byad ha cang bzur ba ma yin/_leb pa ma yin/_sha rtsi ha cang sngo ba ma yin/_ser ba ma yin/_ci nas kyang mdzes pa/_byad dkar la rtsa dmar ba/ skra ser*zhing*li*ba/_skyes pa bas rtsa sna bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi mang ba/_lus la tsan dan gyi dri bro ba/_kha nas uta? la'i dri ldang ba/_lus rgyas zhing sked pa phra ba/ bde ba bskyed pa'i rtsa bzang ba/_rkang lag bya ltar dmar zhing phra ba/_mchu skor cung zad che zhing mchu la pad+ma'i ri mo yod pa/_so legs pa tshags dam pa/_mchu la bung ba 'du ba/_lte ba la pad+ma'i ri mo yod pa/_so la pad ma'i ri mo 'ba' zhig 'dri ba/_lte ba'i 'og na ri mo 'greng bu gsum yod pa/_'og sgo'i rtsa shin tu bzang ba/_smin mtshams su ri mo gsum gyen du 'greng ba/_skra mtshams dang mur gong na dar thod lta bu'i ri mo yod pa/_lce la ral gri lta bu'i ri mo yod pa/_phrag gong ngam sog phrag na g.yung drung 'khyil ba lta bu'i ri mo yod pa/_nu ma phra la 'bur ba/_b+ha ga rub pa/_b+ha ga'i tha ma rus sbal gyi rgyab 'dra zhing spu med pa sha'i sgang mtho bas bde ba che ba/_gzhan gyi blo bcos dka' ba/_gzhan dga' ba bskyed cing byin gyis brlabs par nus pa/_skad thos pa'am/_gzugs mthong pa'am reg pa tsam gyis bde ba ster ba ste/_de nyid gang na bzhugs pa'i yul phyogs tsam bkra shis shing tha mal pa la'ang bde ba ster nus pa'o/_/de'ang mtshan nyid de lta bu dang ldan na khyad par 'phags pa nyid/_ma hA ma ya las/_sgyu ma dag ni thams cad la/_/_bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags/_zhes so/_/pad+ma can 'bring ni/_sha dkar la rus khyim che zhing rags pa/_spyod lam gtsang zhing khong dal ba/_'jig rten gyi bya ba la mkhas shing bu khye'u 'ba' zhig skye ba/ mdzes shing bcos dka' ba'o/_/tha ma ni dkar zhing legs kyang yid 'dzin mi nus pa/_gzugs 'chos shing byi dor la brtson pa'o/_/dgod kha yang zhing gsang mi thub pa mig phra zhing bslu kha yang ba ste spang ngo /_/dung can ma rab ni sha ser la mdog snum pa/_skra rtse 'khyil zhing rtsa dmar ba/_tshig dal la zur mig blta ba/ zur rno zhing shes rab che ba/_spyod lam mkhas la 'dug tshugs legs pa/_sha lus sbom zhing skad gdangs che ba/_skad ngar che zhing sha tshugs 'jam pa ste bzang ba'o/_/_/'bring ni lus mdzes shing mngon chung ba/_rgyab nas bltas na dgye ba snyam zhing mdun nas bltas na dgu ba snyam byed pa/_nang du mgo 'phang dma' ba/ byad kyi gzugs thung la og ko legs pa/_lus 'dres nas snying nye zhing sems gdung ba'o/_/tha ma ni sha ser la mig 'bor che ba/_blo rno la dran pa gsal ba/ 'dug mi tshugs shing 'gro la dga' ba/_lag pa tsab tsub mang ba/_chad mi btsan zhing gzhung ngan pa/_skyes pa la dad pa che ba de mi brten no/_/ri mo can rab ni sha rtsi sngo la byad dkyus dang yan lag ring ba/_mchu skor che zhing sha lus sbom pa/ mig dkyus ring zhing legs pa/_byad lus la sme ba chung ngu yod pa so mnyam pa/ skad snyan zhing yid du 'ong ba/_zhi dal che zhing spyod lam 'jam pa/_bya ba thams cad la khams che ba/_gzugs bzang zhing shes pa mkhas pa/_dbyibs phyed cing smin phrag na rtse gsum lta bu'i gnyer ma gsum gyen la 'greng ba/_de'i gong na thod bcing lta bu'i ri mo gcig gam gsum phred la yod pa'o/_/'bring ni sha sngo sangs la dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_yan lag phra zhing ngag dal ba/_byad gzug bzang zhing gdangs snyan pa/_smin phrag na sme ba gcig gam gsum yod pa'o/_/ tha ma ni sha rtsa nag cing dpral ba ser ba/_mig chung zhing gting mig tu yod pa/ kha yang zhing gtam mang ba/_skyes pa la dad pa che ba ste spang ngo /_/ri dwags can ma ni ri dwags kyi ro stod 'dra ba/_sha rgyas shing nu ma che ba/_ri dwags kyi smad 'dra ba sha rgyas shing b+ha ga rub pa/_dbugs dang nye gnas la gA rtsi bro ba/_sked pa phra zhing 'gros dal ba/_skyes pa la mig mi 'dzums par blta ba skad snyan pa ste/ de'ang shes rab dang dad pa che ba rab/_mos gus dang gdung sems che ba 'bring /_de gang dang yang mi ldan na tha ma ste spang ngo*/_/glang po can rab ni mig dkyus ring la smin phrag yangs pa/_lus mi ring zhing khong dal ba/_gzhan gyi ngag mi gcog pa/_rna ba che zhing yan lag thung ba/_ngo tsha che zhing kha dbang che ba/_spyod lam sgrim po mi shes shing lhod chags pa/_skad snyan la dri zhim pa'o/_/'bring ni byad sngo la gzengs mtho ba'o/_lus khyim legs shing yid du 'ong ba/_khong shas che bas don mi 'chor zhing bslur mi btub pa/_mdo che la ngang ring ba'o/_/tha ma ni rdzun che la khro 'dod pa/_mdog ngan la bzhin mi sdug pa'o/_/mgu sla la 'khon skyen pa/_gdong chung la ser sna che bas spang ngo*/_/sna tshogs can ma ni gong gi mtshan rtags bzang pa 'ga' re dang ldan pa ste/_dung can ma la sogs pa'i rtsa ci rigs su yod pas bde ba ster nus shing /_ri dwags can ma ltar dad pa la sogs pa rab 'bring du phye ba'o/_/ gnyis pa dgug pa ni rdzas dang /_sngags dang /_'khor lo dang / dmigs pa la sogs pa'i man ngag phra mo gzhan nas bshad pa dang mthun la/ khyad par du khams rgyas pas yang yang yid la byas na dbang du bya ba rnams kyi mchog go_/ gsum pa ni drang don gyi chos rnams kyis chos la blo bsgyur ba'o/_/ bzhi pa ni skyabs su 'gro ba nas brtsams te dge bsnyen la sogs pa'i sdom pa sngon du 'gro bas dbang bskur la rgyud smin par bya'o/_/gnyis pa dngos gzhi la/_yab yum lha'i skur bskyed la rang gi thig le sbyang ba/_yum gyi dwangs ma drang ba/_ye shes bzhi dang ngo sprad pa bzhi las/_dang po la gsum/_sems bskyed pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas thob par bya/_de'i ched du bde stong lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes mngon du bya snyam pa/_gnyis pa lha bskyed pa ni yab kyis yum/_yum gyis yab/_/_gnyis kas gnyis su med par bskyed de/ de'ang skad cig dran rdzogs su dpal rta mgrin sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas g.yon gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pas yum la 'khyud pa/ gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i spyi bor ra las rdo rje mkha' 'gro/ par tsa las rin chen mkha' 'gro_/_snying gar a las sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro_/lte bar hrIHlas pad+ma mkha' 'gro_/gsang bar ya las las kyi mkha' 'gro sngar bstan pa'i sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhin bsgom/_de'i pang du rdo rje phag mo dmar mo gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan drug dang ldan pa gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas yab la 'khyud pa'i spyi bo ha las rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang /_mgrin par ri las rin chen mkha' 'gro ma/_snying gar ma las sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma/_lte bar ni las pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma/_gsang bar sa las las kyi mkha' 'gro ma bskyed do/_/de ltar bdag dang yum 'khril sbyor gyi spyi bor slob dpon chen po pad+ma thod phreng mthing nag rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas yum la 'khyud pas pang na yum mkhar chen bza' 'tsho rgyal dmar mo gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas yab la 'khyud pa/_/_gnyis ka'ang rin po che dang rus pas brgyan zhing snyoms 'jug mdzad par bsgom mo/_/ mgrin gsum pa mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab pa ni/_yab kyi rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'i khong seng na hA~M sngon pos bug pa bkag cing /_yum gyi b+ha ga pad+ma dmar po 'dab bzhi'i dbus na phaT sngon pos bug pa bkag par bsam mo// gnyis pa la lnga ste/_thig le dbab pa/_bskyil ba/_bzlog pa/_dgram pa/ ye shes chen por la bzla ba'o/_/dang po dbab pa la mkhas pa lugs mkhan zhun byed pa lta bu ni/_yab yum lha'i sku skya ma'am me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bur snyoms par zhugs la/_dal bus spyod la/_spyi bor bde ba skyes pa dang de gnyis kyi ngang la bde stong chen por phyam la dar cig mnyam par gzhag_/yang spyod la mgrin par mnyam par bzhag_/de bzhin du snying ga dang /_lte bar mnyam par gzhag la/_goms pa shas chung bas de nas yang rim bzhin bzlog cing mnyam par gzhag go_/goms cha dang rlung nus che bas nor bu'i rtsa ba dang bum par bzung la snga ma bzhin bde stong ka dag chen po'i ngang la gzhag go gnyis pa bskyil ba la mkhas pa rdza ma'i them bu bsdam pa lta bu ni/_thig le nor bu'i bum par phab la steng rlung cung zad mnan/_'og rlung drag tu 'then/ rgya mtsho'i ri rab kyi ngos la sbyar/_nyi zla bar snang gi khams su bzlog_/nor bu'i hUM mthing nag dang /_spyi bo'i bla ma yab yum gyi bde ba la sems bzung /_des kyang mi zin pa 'dra na/_gsang rtsa mnan la thur sel gyen du drang zhing /_shes pa ka dag chen por phyam gyis gzhag go_/des mi zin mi srid do/_/goms pa che bas ni de nyid kyi ngang la yun ring du mnyam par gzhag pas/_gnyug ma lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bde stong gi ting nge 'dzin myur du 'byongs so/_/shin tu byang bas de nyid kyi ngang la nyin zhag 'da'o/_/ gsum pa bzlog pa la mkhas pa khron chu gyen la 'dren pa lta bu ni/ gsang bar zin kyang gyen du ma 'drongs na chu dang bsdongs nas 'chor bas/ bde chen 'khor lor drang ba ni/_lus ngag yid kyi gnad gsum las/_lus gnad gling bzhi ri bo'i ngos su bsdu/_sbrul tshang drag la sbyar la/_ne tsho mkhar la bzlog_/nyi zla gyen la bsgril/_dar po che rlung gis bskyod/_'og rlung drag tu 'then la 'khor lo lnga dang a wa d+hu ti rgyu ma phus btab pa lta bu'i nang na yar gsang ba'i thig le hUM gis phreng ba brgyus pa lta bu bsams la/hUM thung gsum bstud mar byung bas/_rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo nas lte bar thig le rnams sbubs mchus chu btung ba bzhin drangs te/_pad+ma mkha' 'gro yab yum la sems bzung ste bde stong gi ngang la dar cig bzhag_/de bzhin du hUM ring dang /_hri ring gis/ snying ga_/mgrin pa/_spyi bo rnams su drangs la snga ma bzhin gzhag go_/_de'ang goms pa rab kyis gsang gnas nas 'drongs so/_/ bzhi pa dgram pa la mkhas pa sbyin shugs can yo long 'gyed pa lta bu ni/ de ltar 'drongs kyang ma khrems na nad du 'gro bas/_rtsa gnas kun tu dgram pa ni seng mo'i bzhed tshul gyis rlung ro lan gsum phyir 'don/_wa mo'i snom tshul gyis lan gsum nang du drangs/_tsha med kyi bskyil tshul gyis steng 'og gi rlung mnan/ri dwags kyi spungs stangs kyis lan gsum gyen du drangs/_stag mo'i skyugs stangs kyis lan gsum nang du 'then/_g.yang mo'i sprugs stangs kyis lan gsum sprugs/_gyi ling gi 'phra tshul gyis lan gsum 'phra'o/_/de dus dmigs pa spyi bo'i thig le skya phru me ba rnams lus dang 'khor lnga'i rtsa 'dab thams cad du khyab par bsam mo/_rjes la lus sems khong glod la ka dag gi ngang la mnyam par gzhag go_/dmigs pa mtshan bcas kyis gang du bsgoms pa'i sar thig le 'khril te nad du 'gro'o/_/_de'ang rlung sems thig le gsum gnad gcig pa'i phyir ro/_/ lnga pa ni de ltar bkram pa'i rjes la lus drang por bsrang ba'am/_gan rkyal du nyal la 'gul bskyod mi bya/_ngag mi brjod/_sems mi bsam par lhod kyis glod pas/_yin lugs spros pa dang bral ba/_blo ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa/ rig pa dgag sgrub las 'das pa/_snang la ngos gzung med pa sems yengs pa'i snang yul lta bu/_stong pa la mtshan ma med pa ngal sos pa'i bde ba lta bu/ 'di yin gyi gza' gtad med pa smyon pa sems yengs pa lta bu/_dran 'dzin gyi gnyen po med pa yul la yengs pa'i shes pa lta bu/_sgo gsum ma bcos lhug pa rgan po nyi ma lde ba lta bu/_tshogs drug rang yul grol ba bu chung lto 'grangs pa lta bu/_gang ltar snang yang bde bar shar ba gzhon nu ma yid sos pa lta bu'i nyams dang rtogs pa skye'o/_/ gsum pa yum gyi dwangs ma drang ba la rtsa btsal ba/_thig le dbab pa/ drang ba/_ye shes chen por la bzla ba dang bzhi las/_dang po ni dben par chags pa'i gtam dang /_'khyud pa dang /_'o bya ba dang /_nu ma mnye ba la sogs pa byas pas/_rtsa bzang ba rnams rnyed la/_de las nus pa chung ba la zhag 'ga' dal du bcug la/_zas bcud can dang chang dang sbrang rtsi mar nag gi byug pa brten zhing /_lto stong la nyi dga' dang g.yer ma'i ril bu btang bas rtsa kha 'byed do/_/de nas phying 'bol rang gi rdo rje dang mnyam pa dar gyis gtums pa la bya rgod kyi tshil bu dang /_'bru mar byugs la phyag rgya'i bshang lam du gzhug cing mkhal khung gnyis su dru bu khu tshur tsam re ska rags srab mos bsdams la rgyab nas rta sga gtad de/_gan rkyal du nyal bas/_mkhal ma gnyis dang bshang lam nang du 'gro'o/_/de gnyis nang du song bas b+ha ga'i g.yas g.yon gnyis su nu ma 'dra ba'i 'bur 'bur gnyis 'ong /_de nas b+ha ga phye nas bltas pas rtsa sna rib rib 'ong ste/_de'ang dung can ma ni rtsa sna 'khyil nas 'ong*/_pad+ma can ni rtsa sna pad+ma 'dra ba'o/_/ri dwags can ma ni ri dwags kyi mjing pa ltar 'ong /_bya gdong ma rtsa sna bya rog gi mchu ltar 'ong /ma ning gi rtsa ni mdud pa can du 'ong / phyir bgrad pa ltar 'ong /_de'ang rtsa sbom na khug chos rtsa ba ra dkar mo'i 'o ma/ sbrang rtsi/_ka ra/[ · ]rtsi mar/_da byid shakhyi tshil rnams sbyar nas rtsa la byugs pas/ rtsa sna ring na sor drug_/'bring sor bzhi/_tha ma sor gsum 'ong ngo /_/ bde byed ma ni rtsa sna gzugs mo byi thur ltar 'ong / rtsa phal pa ni thang khug bkyigs pa'i kha rgya ma chags pa rgyas dus du gnyis pa ni phyag rgya'i thig le 'bebs pa la mkhas pa bung ba rtsi 'tshol ba lta bu ste/_de'ang rtsa sna de rang gi rdo rje'i bug par bcug nas rdo rje yar phul ba ltar/_phying pa mar la 'then nas 'o dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa byas pas phyag pa dum re 'gul zhing mi spyod par bzhag pas thig le rtsa mig tu lud 'ong ngo /_/ gsum pa ni dus kyi chu dang snyugs sbubs lta bu ste/_phyag rgya rab la rtsa'i rtse mo na dwangs ma yod/_'bring la sked pa/_tha ma la gting na yod pas/_drang thabs gsum las rab la rdo rje gsang bar bcug la mi spyod par rig pa skye med kyi ngang la bzhag pas dwangs ma 'drongs so/_/'drongs pa'i rtags su rdo rje mgo 'khyogs pa'am lus sbrid chil ba 'byung ngo*/_/des ma 'drongs na 'bring ni lus kyis 'gul zhing dal bus spyod pas bde ba skye dus glod la drangs/_rtags snga ma bzhin no/_/des kyang ma 'drongs na tha ma la drag tu bskyod cing bde ba yun ring du bzung /_bde ba dus mnyam gyis dus su steng rlung mnan/_'og rlung drag tu 'then rkang lag brkyang la dwangs ma drang ba'i 'khrul 'khor gong ltar bya'o/_/ dmigs pa ni stug sbubs kyis chu 'thung pa ltar 'ub kyis drag par 'then la hU~M drag la rgyun mi 'chad par bgrang ngo /_/_dwangs ma 'drongs pa'i rtags su yum gyi snang ba 'ub kyis btung ba snyam byed cing yum gyi bde ba de 'drog la yal na tshom med par 'drongs so/_/yang na snga ma bzhin rdo rje b+ha ga'i gting du phul bas yum bde ba mi bzod pa skyes dus rang gi lus ma 'chus par drang por byas la/ sems kyi dmigs pa/_/_lus kyi 'khrul 'khor/_ngag gi brjod pa gsum gyis drangs te/_de'ang yum gyi rtsa nang gi snyigs ma sbang ma lta bu'i nang nas dwangs ma chang lta bu de rang gi rdo rje'i gsang lam nas yar la ba thag ltar breng ma chad par drangs la/_spyi bo bde chen gyi 'khor lo la sim sim song bar bsam zhing ngag tu hUM drag la rgyun mi chad par bgrang ngo*/_/lus ni 'og rlung drag tu 'then la mig gyen la bgrad/_rkang pa'i mthe bong gnyis nang du dgug_/gung mo dang srin lag drag tu gshib cing rgyu zhabs sgal pa la drag tu sbyar /_lce ya rkan la sgril zhing yid kyis hUM drag tu brjod nas 'then pas/_yum dran pa med pa dang dru bu ltar 'gro zhing rtsub rtsub pa'am rang dbang med par skad byung na 'drongs pa'i rtags so/_/de nas dal gyis 'phro bcad de yi dam du_ gsal bas yan lag bzhi dang lus thams cad sprugs so/_/de'ang rnal 'byor pa'i rdo rje mgo 'khyogs pa'am tsha chil chil sbrid be ber pa 'ong /_dwangs ma rab tu lon na lus thams cad tsha chil gyis 'gro/_'bring gis lus bde lhan ner 'ong /_tha mas kyang sems bde stong la gnas pa'o/_/phyag rgya'i bkrag 'chor zhing bdag nyid byi ru ltar dmar lam gyis 'gro bas yum gyi lus zungs gso'o/_/ bzhi pa ni bde ba'i rang bzhin grol ba la mkhas pa mkha' la na bun dwangs pa lta bu ste/_bde ba'i ngo bo ji ltar gnas kyang ye stong rtsa bral chen po gdod ma'i ka dag gi ngang du la bzla'o/ bde ba la stong pas rgyas 'debs pa dang*/_bde nyams la chags pa ma yin te/ /de'ang theg pa 'og ma'i bde stong ltar 'dir dang po'i bde ba g.yo ba nas mthar ka dag tu la bzla ba'i bar gdod ma'i gnas lugs ye stong rtsa bral gyi rtogs pa dang ma bral bas/_bde ba la bde ba'i rang bzhin stong par 'dzin pa tsam las kyang 'das ste/_mtha' grol blo 'das chen po'i chags bral du bsgrubs te/_'dod chags kyi 'dzin pa ye stong chen por la bzla'o/_/de'ang rtogs pa ji snyed bde bar bsdus nas/_bde ba 'dzin med du ngo sprad de/_'dzin med ka dag chen por phyam brdal nas ye bde ba'i steng du blo bde rgyun mi 'chad pas gzhi bde ba'i ngo bo lhun grub chos nyid kyi rol par 'char ba la rnal 'byor pa'i skyel so byed do/_/'dir tshigs su bcad pa/_bde chen gnas nas bde gsang nor bu'i rtser/_/nyi ma zla ba skad cig nyid shar ba/_/ri rab lha yi khang pa'i rtser brgyan te/_/gling bzhi'i 'jig rten bde chen 'od kyis 'gengs/_/bde chen gnas nas bde skyong 'khor lo'i bar/_/ dbab pa bzhi las yas brten dga' ba bzhi/_/bsam gtan bzhi ste bde stong chos nyid ngang /_/de bzhin mas bzlog mas brten dga' ba bzhi/_/gzugs med bzhi ste skye med gnyug ma'i don/_/yas brten mas brten thig le'i 'grems sdud brgyad/_/bcu drug byed pa'i thig le brgyad ces bya/_/de dag bar du skye med rnam pa brgyad/_/bcu drug phyed la thig le med pa yin/_/kun kyang gdod nas 'du shes tshor ba 'gog_/rang bzhin ma skyes spros dang bral ba 'di/_/bde stong mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug dgu_/de bzhin rnam thar gsum dang tshad med bzhi/_/bslab gsum pha rol phyin drug smon 'jug gnyis/_/theg pa'i lam rnams lhun gyis grub pas na/_/bde stong shing rta chen po'i lam yin no/_/gang 'di bdag snying dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal/_/mi nub rgyal mtshan nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dzugs/_/phyi rabs rtse gcig sangs rgyas 'dod pa rnams/_/yi ge 'di la rtag tu nan tan mdzod/_/ces pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go_/ bzhi pa ye shes bzhi dang ngo sprad pa ni/_/de yang snyoms par zhugs te spyi bo nas bde ba g.yos mgrin par babs pas/_bde ba'i ngo bor stong par shar ba de dga' ba'i ye shes te/_rnam rtog rags pa rnams spong zhing nyan rang gi grub mtha' rtogs/_bsam gtan dang po'i dga' ba'o/_/de nas snying gar sleb dus mchog dga'i ye shes te/_bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog spang zhing byang chub sems dpa'i grub mtha' rtogs te bsam gtan gnyis pa'i dga' ba'o/_/de nas lte bar slebs dus dga' bral gyi ye shes te phyag rgyar 'dzin pa'i rtog pa spong zhing /_gsang sngags kyi grub mtha' te bsam gtan gsum pa'i dga' ba'o/_/de nas gsang bar slebs dus lhan cig skyes dga'i ye shes te dga' ba gsum du 'dzin pa'i rtog pa mtha' dag spong zhes gsang ba bla na med pa'i grub mtha' rtogs te bsam gtan bzhi pa'i dga' ba'o/_/mdo las/_dge slong bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba lta bu zhes pa'ang 'di dang don gcig go_/yas brten gyi dga' ba bzhi'o/_/de bzhin du gsang ba nas/ lte bar dwangs ma ldog ste/_mnyam par bzhag pa ni/_nam mkha'amatha' yas skye mched do/_/snying gar rnam shes mtha' yas so/_/mgrin par ci yang med pa'o/_/ spyi bor yod med kyi spros pa zhi bas srid rtse'i sems te yod min med min no/ de nas dus gsum skye med kyi ngang la gzhag pa ni 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin no/ de bzhin du 'khor lo gsum du babs dus skye 'gag gnas gsum du ma grub pas/_/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ye shes so/_/de bzhin du 'khor lo bzhir babs pas tshad med pa bzhi las dmigs pa med pa'i tshad med pa bzhi'i ye shes so/_/de bzhin du dwangs ma mi 'dzag pas so so thaRa pa'i sdom pa/_gong du 'phel bas byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa/_ye shes chen pos rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa'o/_/de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs drug rnam par dag pas pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis kyi nang gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go_khams dkar dmar gnyis mi nyams shing 'phel bas smon 'jug gi sems gnyis so/_/mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan du ma'i gang chen mtsho'o/ gsum pa mjug gi don la/_bde ba'i 'char lugs ngos bzung /_'bras bu legs par bstan/_gegs sel rgyas par bshad pa gsum las/_dang po la bco lnga las/_dang po la bde ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang sbyar ba ni/_yab yum lhar bskyed pas tshogs rdzogs pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/_thig le mi nyams pa tshul khrims/_snang ba thams cad bde bar shar ba la bzod pas bzod pa/ sbyor ba byed pa la le lo med pas brtson 'grus so/_/bde stong la sems gnas pas bsam gtan/_bde stong gi don mthar phyin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gnyis pa lam lnga dang sbyar ba ni/_yab yum lhan cig la tshogs te lha'i skur bskyed pa tshogs lam/_yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa sbyor lam/ dga' ba bzhi'i ye shes mthong bas mthong lam/_de'i rjes shes skyong bas sgom lam/_bde stong gi ye shes mngon du gyur pas mi slob pa'i lam mo/_/ gsum pa theg pa dgu dang sbyar ba ni/_dang po lus tha mal du gnas pa lha'i theg pa/_bde ba tha mal du spyod pa phyi ma'i theg pa/_bde ba rang don du spyod pa nyan rang gi theg pa/_bde ba rang rig tu shes pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa/_tha mal gyi lus ngag yid gsum lhar dag pa kri ya'i theg pa/_phyag rgya chen po rtogs pa u pa'i theg pa/_phrin las bzhi 'grub pas yo ga'i theg pa/_phung khams lhar she pa ma hwa'i theg pa/_bde stong dbyer med du rtogs pa a nu'i theg pa/_thams cad yongs grol du rtogs pa a ti'i theg pa'o/_/bzhi pa rgyud sde bzhi dang sbyar ba ni/_dang po'i yab yum lhar bskyed pa bya ba'i rgyud/_snyoms 'jug byed pa spyod pa'i rgyud/_de las bde stong skyes pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud/_/dga' bzhi'i ye shes mtha' phyin pa bla na med pa'i rgyud do/_/lnga pa theg pa gsum dang sbyar ba ni/_rang don du spyod pas nyan rang gi theg pa/_gzhan don du spyod pas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa/_mtha' grol du spyod pas rdo rje'i theg pa'o/_/ drug pa sgrub pa bka' brgyad dang sbyar ba ni/_yab yum lha'i skur gsal ba 'jam dpal sku/_bde ba'i sgra stong par shes pas pad+ma gsung /_ngo bo rig stong du shes pas yang dag thugs/_ngo bo bde stong du shes pas bdud rtsi yon tan/_ngo bo snang stong du shes pas phur pa phrin las/_thams cad stong par rtogs pa ma mo rbod gtong /_thams cad rlung rig gi rtsal du shes pas 'jig rten mchod bstod do/_/_/bdun pa dbang bzhi dang sbyar ba ni/_yab yum lha'i skur bskyed pa bum pa'i dbang /_sbyor ba byed pa gsang dbang /_bde stong gi nyams la gnas pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang /_mthar blo bral ye grol du shes pa tshig dbang rin po che'o/_/_/brgyad pa rigs lnga dang sbyar ba ni/_bde stong gi ngo bo 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje'i rigs/_chags sems dag pas pad+ma'i rigs/_yon tan 'byung bas rin po che'i rigs/_phrin las 'grub pas las kyi rigs/_chos nyid rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so/_/dgu pa yab lnga dang sbyar ba ni/_/_bde stong gi rnam par sbyor ba mdzad pas rnam par snang mdzad/_ngo bo mi 'gyur bas mi bskyod pa/_yon tan 'byung bas rin chen 'byung ldan/_bde ba'i snang ba tshad med pas snang ba mtha' yas/_ye shes bzhi grub pas don yod grub pa'o/_/bcu pa yum lnga dang sbyar ba ni/_b+ha ga dang rdo rje sangs rgyas spyan/_g.yo ba dang spyod pa dam tshig sgrol ma/_spyod pas drod 'byung ba gos dkar mo/_/thig le ma nyams pa mA ma kI/_de thams cad mi rtog pa'i ye shes dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o/_/bcu gcig pa ye shes lnga dang sbyar ba ni/_lha dang ye shes ngo bo gsum gsal bas me long ye shes/_/_bye brag phyed pas sor rtogs ye shes/_ngo bo gcig pas mnyam nyid ye shes/_chos sku rtogs pas chos dbyings ye shes/_phrin las grub pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so/_/ bcu gnyis pa 'byung ba lnga dang sbyar ba ni/_b+ha ga dang rdo rje dngos su grub pas sa/_g.yo bas rlung /_thig le chu/_drod me/_mthar mi rtog pas sngon bzhin gnas pa nam mkha'o/_/ bcu gsum pa sa bcu dang sbyar ba ni/_yab yum phan tshun mthong bas dga' ba skyes pa des drang por rab tu dga' ba/_lha'i skur bskyed pas tha mal gyi dri ma med pa sa gnyis pa dri ma med pa/_sbyor ba byas pas thig le rtsa nang kun la khyab pas sa gsum pa 'od byed pa/_bde ba 'bar bas sa bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba/_gsang bar thig le zin pas sa lnga pa sbyang dka' ba/_zin dus ye shes myong bas sa drug pa mngon du gyur pa/_bzlog cing khrems pas ring du song ste sa bdun pa ring du song ba/_de nas blo bral du gnas pas sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba/ de las bde stong gi nyams su myong ba ni sa dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros/_snang ba gang shar bde stong du grol ba ni sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin no/_/ bcu bzhi pa sku lnga dang sbyar ba ni/_yab yum sbyor ba byed pa sprul pa'i sku/ lha'i skur bskyed pa longs ska/_bde stong gi nyams shar ba chos sku/_ngo bo 'dzin pa las grol ba ngo bo nyid kyi sku/_phrin las mtha' dag 'grub pas mngon par byang chub pa'i sku'o/_/bco lnga pa rgyud sde gsum dang sbyar ba ni/_yab yum bde ba myong ba ma'i rgyud/_thig le bzung 'dren 'grems pa pha'i rgyud/_bde stong gnyis su med pa gnyis su med pa'i rgyud do/_/ gnyis pa 'bras bu bstan*pa*la gnas skabs dang mthar thug gnyis las/_/_dang po la nyams su blangs pa sngon 'byung gi 'bras bu dang /_sprul sku 'byed pa phyis 'byung gi 'bras bu gnyis las/_dang po ni gnas skabs su bde ba la rang dbang thob pas snang srid bde bar 'char/_sdug bsngal chos nyid du grol/_dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro 'du/_grub pa brgyad kyi yon tan thob/_tshe ring nad med longs spyod 'phel/_ci bsam pa thams cad 'grub bo/_/ gnyis pa ni rang gi zab chos dang rigs rgyud khyad par can yun ring du gnas pas 'jig rten na sems can gyi don 'byung na/_sku'i brgyud pa gzung ba gal che ste/_de'ang yum mtshan dang ldan pa la mkhas pa lnga'i sgo nas thig le gtong ste/_sems bskyed khyad par can gyis theg chen gyi lam la mkhas pa/ bde bas phung po skye mched kyi lha mchod pa la mkhas pa/_lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ngos 'dzin pa la mkhas pa/_don gnyis lhun gyis grub pa la mkhas pa/ sprul skus 'gro don mdzad pa la mkhas pa'o/_/'o na thig le nyams na na rag tu ltung bar bshad yod dam snyam na/_bsam pa khyad par can gyis zin na nyes pa med de/_kun tu bzang mo klong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud las/_byang chub sems kyis kun blangs nas/_/gzhan don lhur len sems dpa' yis/_/sprul pa 'dzin la nyes pa med/_/ces so/_/de las gzhan du nyams na nyes pa dpag tu med do/_/ de'ang sbyor ba byed dus su sprul sku der shes rab dang /_snying rje dang /_mthu stobs dang /_tshe dang nor la sogs pa 'phel bar 'dod na/_'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dang /_/_phyag na rdo rje dang /_tshe dpag med dang /_dzam+b+ha la sogs par yab yum gnyis bskyed la/_yum gyi lhums dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yum gyi thig le nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/_yab kyi thig le lha skur byon nas bzhugs par bsam ste/_b+ha ga dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bsam la/_sgo srung gis bar chod bsrung bar bsam ste/_yum grib la gzab/_g.yems mi shor ro/_/zla ba bcu na sprul sku nges par 'byon no/_/der cis she na kun rdzob rgyu'i ba ni/ thig le de stobs rgyas pa'i dus su bsam pa gang ltar btang ba bzhin du 'byung rlung sems dwangs ma gsum gnad gcig pa'i phyir ro/_/ gnyis pa mthar thug gi 'bras bu ni/_tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas te sems can gyi don rlabs po che gang la gang 'dul du 'byung ba'o/_/ gsum pa gegs sel rgyas par bshad pa la/_bye brag gi gegs sel mdor bstan/_spyi'i gegs sel rgyas par bshad/_de gnyis ka'i don bsdu ba gsum las/_dang po la gegs sel dngos dang /_de'i mthun phyogs bshad pa gnyis las/_dang po rang gi thig le'i gegs ni phyag rgya ma dam tshig ma dag na thig le nyams pas ting nge 'dzin mi skye/_gsang sgo 'chol bas gsang sngags kyi che ba nyams/_nyams grib che bas tshe thung zhing nad mang /_lung las 'gal bas mkha' 'gro'i bka' chad 'byung /_gsang ma thub pas bstan pa la gnod pa bskyel/_bskyed rim ma gsal na tha mal du 'gro_/dga' ba bzhi'i ye shes ngos ma zin na sangs rgyas kyi lam du mi 'gro_/thig le nyams na yon tan gang yang mi skye'o/_/_/nyams len gyi gegs ni thig le 'bebs pa'i dus su gzabs zin nas dgos/_rtsa ngan na myur du 'chor bas bzung dus ma shor ba gal che/ myur du ma bzlog na chu'i zla la 'chor bas bzlog dgos/_bzlog nas myur du ma bkram na nad du 'gro bas khrems dgos/_'grems dus dmigs pa bsgom par bshad kyang mtshan bcas su bsgom na der 'khril nas nad du 'gro bas dmigs med ka dag gi ngang la bzhag_/dwangs ma ma khrems par rtsa la byer na 'bras dang rkong po la sogs pa pags pa'i nad du 'gro zhing /_'khor lo lnga'i dbus su 'khyil bas 'khrul snang sna tshogs su 'char/_smad kyi chu sor ltung na grang ba dang chu 'gag 'ong*/_gzhan yang dwangs ma nyams pa dang /_rul pa dang /_skam pa la sogs pa 'byung ngo*/_/_/de yang yum dam tshig ma gtsang ba dang /_/_kha zas dang gdon la sogs pas nyams pa la bshags pa bya/_grib la gzabs drag sngags la sogs pa bzla'o/_/rul ba ni mkhrems pa yin te dgram zhing /_skam pa ni lus stobs nyams pa'o/_/gegs gang byung yang phyi'i stong ra yi dam gyi lhar gsal/_nang gi stong ra dbu ma mda' snyug tsam pa dang /_dong pa tsam pa dang*/_phru ma phus btab pa ltar lus thams cad stong par bsgoms la/_stod du gegs byung na smad du gtum mo bsgoms pas sel zhing /_smad du byung na phyag rgya mtshan ldan brten pas sel lo/_/mgo na na sgril zhing sprugs/_stod na na gsig cing gcu/ gzhu 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya bya/_smad na na skor zhing brdab/_yan lag na na gcu/ mnye/_sprugs/_zhags pa 'phen pa ltar bya'o/_/de dag gi dus su rlung gzung ba gal che'o/_/des kyang ma sos na phyag rgya mtshan dang ldan pa la dmigs pa dang bcas pas dbul lo/_/des sel lo/_/ dang po ni gnyis pa ni rang bzhin dang rkyen gyis 'phel ba gnyis las/ 'byung gzhi'i dwangs ma rgyu'i thig le de tshes gcig nas rim gyis 'phel te/ gsang gnas su khams rgyas 'ongs pas/_de dus gsang gnas bde skyong gi 'khor lo'i rtsa mdud kyi nang du las kyi mkha' 'gro yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas dwangs ma kha dog lnga ldan babs pas gsang ba'i rtsa 'dab nas rim gyis lus thams cad gang bar bsam la/_bde stong gi ngang la bzhag go_/des nad med cing ting 'dzin skye'o/_/yang dwangs ma yar 'phel te tshes bzhi la lte bar rgyas pas lte ba'i rtsa mdud du pad+ma mkha' 'gro snga ma bzhin bsgom mo/_tshes brgyad la snying gar rgyas pas chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa mdud du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro snga ma bzhin bsgom mo/_/tshes bcu gnyis las mgrin par rgyas pas mgrin pa'i rtsa mdud du rin chen mkha' 'gro yab yum sngar bzhin bsgom mo/_/nya'i nyin par spyi gtsug tu rgyas pas bde chen 'khor lor rdo rje mkha' 'gro yab yum snga ma bzhin bsgom mo/_/spyi gtsug tu skra mtheb gang bzhar la til mar gla rtsi tsan dan bsres la byugs shing bsku mnye bya/_des 'byung ba mi 'khrugs so/_/de dus gtar sreg dang byang sems la gnod pa'i las mi bya/_byas na nyams la 'phel 'grib 'ong ngo /_/de nas mar 'phel te tshes bcu dgu la mgrin par rgyas pas rin chen mkha' 'gro snga ma bzhin bsgom mo/_/nyer gnyis la snying gar rgyas pas sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro snga ma bzhin bsgom mo/_/nyer lnga la lte bar rgyas pas pad+ma mkha' 'gro snga ma bzhin bsgom mo/_/gnam gang la gsang ba dang rkang mthil du rgyas pas las kyi mkha' 'gro snga ma bzhin bsgom zhing 'bru maRa sna tshogs pa dang /_sbrang rtsi dang dz+wa ti rnams kyi lde gu rkang mthil du byugs la nyi ma la bsro'o/_des khams rgyas 'byung ba mi 'khrugs dge sbyor 'phel lo/_/dwangs ma rang bzhin gyis 'phel ba la dmigs pa'i kha tshar gdab pa'o/_/gnyis pa la rtsa ba lnga'i sman mar dang /_'bras bu lnga dang /_da byid kyi sha dang /_rtsang pa'i sha dang /_sbrul sha dang /_lug tsher thong gi tshang ra'i sha rnams bur sbrang chu bcad pa la btab ste sgor ba dum re zos na mchog tu 'phel lo/_/phyag rgya mtshan ldan las 'phel bas brten no/_/ gnyis pa la 'du ba bzhi'i gegs sel spyir bstan pa dang /_/_tsha grang gnyis su bsdus nas bye brag tu bshad pa'o/_/dang po ni 'dod chags kyis rkyen byas nas me'i rlung mthu rgyas te tshad pa 'jug_/zhe sdang gis rkyen byas nas rlung mthu rgyas te rlung nad 'jug_/gti mug gis rkyen byas nas sa'i rlung rgyas te bad kan 'jug_/nga rgyal phrag dog gnyis kyis rkyen byas nas chu'i rlung rgyas te grang ba 'jug go_/'byung ba mtho dman gang cha ma snyoms kyang nad du 'gro/_nyin dus gnyid du song bas kyang nad 'jug ste 'byung ba gcig gis dgra gcig gis byas nas nad 'jug cing /_ldang ngo /_mi mthun pa'i zas gos dang /_gdon dang / spyod lam la sogs pas kyang nad 'jug go_/_de'ang pho ba lta bur 'byung bzhi'i dwangs ma 'khrugs te na na/_lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su pad+ma DA ki yab yum dmigs te/_grang ba la me'i rnam pa tsha zhing 'bar ba mar me'i 'od zer lta bu sbyor mtshams nas babs pas lte ba'i rtsa thams cad gang nas na sar byung bas/_pho ba'i me drod skyes par bsam mo/_/grang ba la pad+ma DA ki yab yum gyis sel lo//tshad pa la bde chen 'khor lo nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro las dwangs ma dngul chu'i rnam pa lta bu babs pas sangs sangs zhi bar bsam mo/_/'dus pa'i nad la snying ga nas sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro las dwangs ma babs pas na sa dang /_lus thams cad zho rkyal bzhin khengs pas bde bar phril gyis song nas nad thams cad zhi bar bsgom mo/_/bad kan la pad+ma mkha' 'gro las gtum mo sbar zhing las kyi mkha' 'gro las rlung gi dwangs mas zhi bar bsgom mo/_/rlung la rin chen mkha' 'gro las sa'i dwangs ma ser po'i rgyun babs pas lus khengs nas nad zhi bar bsgoms pas sel lo/_/ gnyis pa ni nad thams cad tsha grang gnyis su 'dus pas de bsal ba'i thabs la/_sngon 'gro skyabs 'gro sems bskyed byas nas sems can thams cad kyi nad tshur blangs te/_sems can thams cad nad med par bde bar bsam/ de nas yi dam gyi lhar bsgoms*la*lus kyi nang*phru ma phus btab pa bzhin yod pa la 'khor lo lnga gsal gdab/_gang na sar nad thams cad nag nyil 'dus par bsgoms la rlung bzung ste gang na ba'i 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro gsal gdab pa las/_grang ba yin na sbyor mtshams nas me'i thig le dmar zhing tsha ba babs pa dang /_lus kyi nang mer 'ur 'bar bas nad de thul gyis tshig par bsgom la/ a tsa ni hrIH_zhes bsdams pa so sor drag tu bzlas pas nad phyir bud par bsam mo/_/tshad pa la thig le dngul chu lta bu bsil zhing grang ba babs pas tshad pa'i nad me'i rnam par bsam pa de 'phral la zhi nas nad ro phyir bud par bsam mo/_/ngag tu a ha ya ma ra zhes pa dril ba'am so sor ngag tu bzlas shing rlung phyir phu'o/_/bad rlung grang ba la me dmigs gzung la rlung thog mar phu la nang du gtso cher gzung /_de las gzhan la grang dmigs kyis bcos so/_/ de'ang 'khor lo re re'i thad kar gang na ba der 'khor lo de'i mkha' 'gro'i dmigs pa bya zhing /_skabs su rlung ma gtogs pa la ha zhes brjod pas nad de phyir rgyang rgyang song nas nam mkha' la thim par bsgom mo/_/rlung la nang du zhi bar bsams la dwangs ma dmar ser gyis lus mer gyis bkangs bas zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni nad 'don rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu 'phags so/_/ gsum pa de gnyis ka'i don bsdu ba ni/_nyon mongs pa'i bsam pa rang rgyud du 'dzin pas 'byung ba'i dngas ma 'khrugs te nad 'byung ba yin te/_nyon mongs pa dug lnga'i rnam rtog gang skyes kyang rang rgyud la mi gtang bar chos nyid kyi ngang du ro mnyam par bya'o/_/des nad gdon bar chad thams cad sel lo/_/ bzhi pa rab tu spros med tshig dbang rin po che la/_ma thob par thob pa bya ba dang /_de rgyud la brten pa'i tshul gnyis las/_dang po la/_sngon 'gro/_dngos gzhi/_rjes gsum las/_dang po ni maN+Dal phul te gsol ba btab pas/_yang dag pa'i don thob pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/thod pa dang me long gis ni mchog 'grub pa'i rten mtshon pa'o/_/dam tshig sbyin nas khas blangs pas gsang sngags rab tu gsang ba'i don nye bar mtshon pa'o/_/ye shes dbab pas snod khyad par can du grub pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gnyis pa la drug las/_dang po gnas la ngo sprad pa ni/_de'i ngang la glod pa ni/_la sogs pas sems nyid spros pa dang bral ba'i gnas lugs mtshon pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/gnyis pa 'gro sa la ngo sprad pa ni/_kye ma kye ma rigs kyi bu/_/la sogs pas 'gro 'ongs med pa'i don rtogs pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gsum pa byung sa la ngo sprad pa ni/_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/_zhes pa la sogs pas/_sems byung sa med par rtogs pas rtsa ba dang bra shas pas rtsa ba dang bral ba'i don rtogs pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ bzhi pa de nas tshogs drug la ngo sprad pa ni/_kye ma rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/_/zhes pa la sogs pas gzugs sogs yul drug_/'dzin mkhan gyi sems drug ye stong rtsa ba dang bral bar rang shar rang grol du rtogs pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ lnga pa de nas nyon mongs rang grol du ngo sprad pa ni/_de sogs dug lnga dug gsum yang /_zhes pa la sogs pas nyon mongs pa rtsa bral ye shes chen por rtogs pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/drug pa de nas lung dang sbyar ba'i spang blang gnyis su med par la bzla ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gsum pa mjug ni/_des ni dag bya gang dag na/_/zhes pa la sogs pas blang dor yon tan gyi skye tshul la sogs pa rtogs pa'i dgos pa yod cing dga' ston gyis tshogs rdzogs pa'o/_/ gnyis pa de nyid rgyud la brten tshul ni khregs chod kyi don bsgom pa ste/ ye nas rtsa ba bral ba'i sems nyid la/_bcos shing bsgyur med rang bzhin shes pas grol/_/smig rgyu mtho yor thag pa sbrul mthong bzhin/_/gang gis ma bslad rang bzhin dag pa'i sems/_/lta sgom med de spyod pas phan ci yod/_/ye grol lhug par rang babs chos nyid la/_/snang dang mthong med bden rdzun mtha' las 'das/_/yod med yin min sems kyi rol pa tsam/_/_snang srid 'khor 'das sgyu ma'i rang bzhin la/_/_/don med bden par bzung bas byis pa bslus/_/sna tshogs chos rnams sems kyi ngang du gcig_/dba' rlabs g.yo ba rgya mtsho'i ngang du gcig_/sems nyid ma bcos gdod ma'i ngang du gcig_/sgra brnyan chu zla stong pa'i ngang du gcig_/de ltar rtogs na 'ching dang grol ba med/_/nam mkha'i pad+mo la ni bung ba 'khor/_/smig rgyu'i thag pas 'gro ba bcings par zad/_/kye ho chos kun gdod nas ma skyes te/_/blang dor re dogs dgag sgrub rtsis las 'das/_/ de la ched 'dzin ma byed gang dgar zhog_/_/ngas ni chos rnams bya rgyu ma rnyed pas/_/byar med gnyug ma bzhi pa'i ye shes yin/_khregs chod don de gza' gtad kun dang bral/_/kun tu bzang po'i dgongs klong yangs pa yin/_/phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyang de bzhin mdzod/_/gnyug ma'i ye shes rang bzhin rdzogs pa che/_/byar med rgyal po lhun rdzogs blo bde ba/_/pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis bstan nas song /_/_zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go/lnga pa bla med rig pa'i rtsal dbang la gnyis las/_de ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang*/_/_de nyid rgyud la brten pa'i tshul dang gnyis las/_dang po la sbyor ba/_dngos gzhi/_rjes gsum las/_dang po maN+Dal phul bas rig pa me long lta bu'i don rtogs pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/gnyis pa la gnyis las/_smin byed rig pa'i rtsal dbang ni/_gnas lngar yi ge bkod pa'i 'phro 'du las bzlas pa bya ba ni/_'khor lo lnga/_sku lnga/_ye shes lngar gsal bas nyon mongs pa lnga dag pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/gnyis pa mngon sum rig pa'i rtsal dbang gis ni 'od gsal snying po'i dkyil 'khor mthong bas chos nyid zad pa'i sa la phyin pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gsum pa rjes dga' ston bya bas bla ma mkha' 'gro mnyes nas dngos grub chen po thob pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gnyis pa de nyid rgyud la brten pa'i tshul ni/_snang ba bzhi'i don la goms par byed pa de 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur bas 'dir ma bkod do/_/_zhar la gter chos kyi dbang la log rtog dgag pa ni/_rang gi blo gros kyi nyi ma dri ma med pa'i mig mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis ljongs shing phyogs lhung gi dra ba mi bzad pas bcings te phrag dog gi me lce bzod par dka' bas pha rol gyi rgyud sreg par byed pa'i skye bo ba glang skyong kha cig na re/_gter ma 'di sa chos dang rdo chos yin pas bla ma brgyud pa med/_byin rlabs kyi bka' chad pas bsgrubs kyang 'bras bu mi 'byung ste/_chos skal chad pas gter ma nyan bya ba yin zer ro/_/_/de'ang slob dpon chos kyi grags pas/_log pa'i lam la mtha' med phyir/_/de dag 'dir ni spro bya min/_/zhes bya ba/_blun po de dag gi lan khyi rnams zug pa snyam yang mi sems pas lan theb mod/_de la brtsad du ci yod/ 'on kyang gter chos la dad pa'i gang zag kha cig dogs par 'gyur bas/_de bsal ba'i phyir bshad pa/_spyir rnying ma la bka' gter gnyis su bzhugs te/ gang gi dbang byed kyang brgyud pa drug tshang dgos shing /_khyad par du gter chos 'di la drug ka tshang bas skal ldan smin par byed do/_drug ni rgyal ba dgongs brgyud/_rig 'dzin brda brgyud/_gang zag snyan brgyud thugs rje byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa/_mkha' 'gro gtad rgya'i brgyud pa/_smon lam dbang bskur gyi brgyud pa'o/_/gter lung chen mo las/_sprul sku'i chos rnams gsungs pa yang /_/sgra tshig don las log pa med/_/_gter yig sprul pa'i sku yin phyir/_/de yi brjod tshig sgra yang yin/_/de nyid go ba don yin no/_/zhes pas/_sprul skus gsungs pa'i snyan brgyud la yang bla ma des gsungs pa slob mas go ba nyams su len pa las med/_gcig tu na gdul bya'i snang ba la sprul pas gsungs pa ltar snang yang /_sangs rgyas sprul sku des chos rang mtshan pa ma gsungs par/_rgyud bla ma las/_ji ltar sgra brnyan gyi ni sgra/_gzhan gyi rnam rig las byung ba/_/rnam rtog med cing gzo med pa/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung /_/gzhan gyi rnam rig las byung ba/_/phyi dang nang na'ang gnas ma yin/_/zhes pa dang shin tu'ang mthun te/_/sangs rgyas sgra med kyang gdul bya'i snang ba la sgra tshig tu go ba ltar/ gter yig la sgra med kyang gter 'don gyi bla ma des dang por tshig don go la/ de gzhan la bstan pas 'bras bu thob pa yin no/_/des kyang dbang bskur bar rigs so/_/yang gter lung las/_chos sku kun tu bzang po la/_/dbang bskur chos bshad bye mkhan med/_/rang sems chos skur shes tsam na/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i dbang lung thob/_/_/brgyud par 'dzin pa rtogs pa yin/_/zhes pas gdod ma'i mgon pos su la'ang ma nyan kyang go chod par byung 'dug_/ci nas kyang bla ma yin zer ba'i nyon mongs par rags la 'dod kha che ba/_ci byed chos shAkya thub pa la dang mi mthun pa cig la zhu dgos pa'i nges pa med pas nyan la/ yang slob dpon med par rang byung gis chos ston pa'o/_/de skad du 'dul ba lung las/_nga la mkhan po gang yang med/_/nga la slob dpon med pas na/_/nga nyid rang byung dge slong yin/_/zhes pas kyang shes so/_/de sku tshe snga ma la slob dpon yod pas go chod mod zer yang /_/_'dir yang tshe snga ma la slob dpon pad+ma la sogs pa'i slob ma yin pas las kyi 'phro yod pas sad pa yin te/ma 'ongs las can gcig dang 'phrad par shog ces pas mtshungs so/_/yang bum dbang rnam par phye ba las/_rgyal ba dgongs pa'i brgyud pa yang 'di la tshang ste/_rgyal ba rigs lngas rim pa bzhin du snod ldan la dgongs pa tsam gyis rig pa'i rtsal dbang thob/_bdag 'dra pad+mas kyang ma 'ongs pa la dgongs nas zab gter dbang bka' dang bcas pa sbas pas/_de sus thon pa la rgyal ba dgongs pa'i bka' yod pa'o//rgyal ba'i gter lung las/_/_rgyal ba dgongs pa gnyis kyi tshul//_dgongs pa babs pa dbang gi mchog_/ces so/_rig 'dzin brda'i brgyud pa yang 'di la tshang ste/_kun tu bzang po nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas su brgyud pa thams cad phyag rgyas brda bstan pa tsam gyis dbang dang dngos grub thob/_bdag 'dra pad+mas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i snod ldan la dbang bskur ba 'di ltar gyis shig_/ces pa'i gter dpe bzhag pas/_slob bus de bzhin du bskur bas byin rlabs dang dngos grub thob ste dbang bka' yod pa yin no/_/rig pa bdun pa'i rgyud las/_brda dang brda mtshon go ba ni/_dbang gi nang nas dbang bka' 'o/_/zhes pas thugs rje byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa'ang 'di la tshang ste/_kun tu bzang po nas rim pa bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa tsam gyis rig pa la dbang thob ste/_bdag 'dra pad+mas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i don du zab gter 'di sbas pas de sus thon pa la byin rlabs zhugs te rig pa'i rtsal dbang thob nas slob bu la'ang byin rlabs kyi dbang bskur nus pas thugs rje byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa'o/_/gter lung las/_gang gi byin rlabs zhugs pa de/_/dbang gi dam pa mchog tu dbang /_/zhes so/_/mkha' 'gro gtad rgya'i brgyud pa yang 'di la tshang ste/_kun tu bzang po nas rim pa bzhin du snod ldan dang ma 'phrad kyi bar du rgyas btab nas/_DA ki ma la gnyer gtad nas snod min srungs la/_snod ldan la gtod gsungs pas/_des rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du gtad pas/_dbang thob nas yang dag par sangs rgyas pa bzhin du/_bdag 'dra pad+mas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i don du gter du sbas nas DA ki ma dang*/_'jig rten gyi lha 'dre la gtad nas/_snod ldan 'di la gter 'di gtod/_snod min len la dbang po snubs/ zhes gtad pas/_gter srung rnams kyis kyang snod dang ldan pa la gtad pas dbang gi lung thob pa yin te/_gter lung gtad rgya ma las/_gtad rgya gang la gtad pa ni//_sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang 'dzin pa/_/zhes so/_/smon lam dbang bskur gyi brgyud pa yang 'di la tshang ste/_chos thams cad smon lam gyis mtha' bsgyur bas smon lam ni sangs rgyas kyi bden pa'i bka' yin te/_bka' 'di mi bslu dbang gi mchog_/ces so/_/bdag 'dra pad+mas kyang gter du gtams tshad la ma 'ongs las can cig dang 'phrad par shog ces smon lam btab pas/_de'i mthus las can cig dang 'phrad nges pa yin te/_las med kyi lag tu mi 'byung ngo /_/dbang gi dam pa smon lam yin te smon lam dbang gis bka' ma chad pa 'di yin no/_/gter lung las/_smon lam dbang ni dbang bskur mchog_/ces gsungs so/_/de ltar brgyud pa drug ldan gyi bka' babs dbang gi chu bo ma nyams pa/_bdag 'dra pad+ma las 'brel rtsal la chu mo glang gi lo la shog ser gter dpe rnams gtad nas mi'i yul du snang bar byas pa'i 'og tu/deng song longs sku'i zhing khams dar cig nyul dus shing mo yos la bla ma yab yum dang / mkha' 'gro du mas dbang gi bka' gtad de gzhan la spel cig par lung bstan pas/_zab chos kyi bstan pa dar ba'i mgo 'dzin pa ni lo'i dus te snod dang spel ba'i dus brtag pa las/_chu mo glang nas shing mo yos kyi bar/_/gter bdag brla sme can gyi snying la gtad/_/me rta'i lo la dkar shog dag la mnan/_/snying gi bu mchog lnga tsam yong gis spel/_/de yang dus gcig ma yin rim pas su/_/_dbang khrid rdzogs nas lo dang zla re'i bar/_/dus gcig mi sbyin rim pa bzhin du bstan/_/ces pa dang*/_spel ba'i lo dus ma tshang 'di spel na/_/_dngos grub mi 'byung sgro skur 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dus la babs tshe rang gis ma bstan na/_/'gro don rgyun chad ltung ba phog ta re/_/'on kyang DA kis lung bstan byung gyur na/_/lo ma them yang dus tshod de kar spel/_/zhes gsungs pa'i don dus la babs shing mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan dang /_cho 'phrul byung tshul rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste 'dir yi ges 'jigs nas ma bris so/_/des na zab gter mi yul du byung dus de nyid gdan 'dren mkhan de slob dpon gyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i las can yin nges pas/_dbang khrid man ngag dang bcas pa'i bka' med par dogs par mi bya'o/_/_gter dpe 'don mkhan de nas rim pa ltar brgyud dgos te/_/bka' babs kyi srol mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de dag gis ma smin pa smin par byed pa'i dbang dngos bstan zin to/_/ lnga pa de'i dam tshig bstan pa ni/_thal 'gyur las/_dbang brten pa yi dam tshig bshad/_/_/dbye na brjod kyis mi lang yang /_/mdor bsdus sku dang gsung dang thugs/_/rnal 'byor lus ngag yid la sbyar/_/zhes pas/_'di la sku gsung thugs gsum las/_dang po la'ang phyi nang gsang gsum las/gsum las/_phyi'i dam tshig tu ma byin pa len pa/_mi tshang bar spyod pa/_srog gcod pa gsum mi bya ste/ byas na phyi'i phyi/_phyi'i nang /_phyi'i gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig nyams par 'gyur te/_rin po che rnam par spungs pa'i rgyud las/_sku yi phyi yi dam tshig la/_/rnam pa gsum du brtag te phye/_/ma byin blangs pas phyi yi yang /_/sku yi dam tshig nyams par 'gyur/_/_/de yi rtags su yan lag nad/_/mi bzod sna tshogs lus la 'byung /_/mi tshang spyad pa nang yin te/_/rtags su dbang po'i nad rnams so/_/ srog gcod pa ni gsang ba ste/_/de yi rtags su don snod nad/_/rnal 'byor pa yis myong ba'o/_/zhes so/_/de dag bskang ba'i cho ga yang /_/dam tshig mchog gi rgyud las/_/rtags dang sbyar ba'i rnal 'byor pas/_/phyi yi phyi la lder tsho dang /_/ ri mo'i las ni lan bdun gyis/_/de yis sdig pa las grol ba'o/_/zhes pas/_/ sngags phyi'i lha'i sku gzugs lan bdun bya'o/_/nang gi nyams na de nyid las/ phyi yi nang la lugs sku bdun/_/rab tu gnas pa rtsol bas bzhengs/_/bla ma mchog la phul bas 'grub/_/_ces pas/_nang gi lha tshogs kyi lugs sku bdun bzhengs pa bla ma la phul bas so/_/gsang ba de nyid las/_phyi yi gsang ba'i rtags byung na/_/rdo rje dang ni dril bu nyid/_/dgu 'am bcu gcig bla ma la'o/_/ des ni nad las grol ba dang*/_/'dod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/dge dang zhi ba'i las 'grub dang*/_/'gro ba rnams ni byams par 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/des na sku'i phyi'i dam tshig tu lus kyi mi dge ba rnams bsrung ste/_rang gzhan lha'i dkyil 'khor du gsal ba las mi 'dar bar bya'o/_/sku'i nang gi dam tshig la gsum las/_gser gyi khang bu brtsegs pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa/_/nang gi phyi ni spun dang yang /_/gang gi pha dang ma nyid dang /_/rang gi lus la mi smad do/_/_nang gi nang nyid phyir na yang /_/theg pa che chung chos rnams la/_/'jug par 'dod dang zhugs pa dang /_/zhugs te gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa'i lus/_/smad cing mtho brtsams rgyan smad na/_/sangs rgyas sku ni brgya phrag bslus/_/nang gi gsang ba rang gi lus/_/lha yi dkyil 'khor yin pa'i phyir/_/sman dang zas la dug bsres zos/_/_/gal te mtshon gyis btab na yang /_/zag pa'i lam med lus brgya blang*/_/de 'og tsha ba'i dmyal ba myong*/_/zhes pas/_de dag spang bar bya'o/_/sku'i gsang ba'i gsum ni/_snga ma las/_sku yi gsang ba'i phyi yi ni/_/rdo rje spun nam sring mo yi/_/lus kyi rgyan la dpyas pa dang /_/mtho btsams lag gi brdeg pa'i tshul/_/gal te gzhan gyis byed bcug na'ang /_/_'dir yang mnar med rgyuRa 'phel 'gyur/_/nang gi shin tu 'dres pa'i mched/_/ku re rtsed mo'i tshul tsam yang*/_/brdeg gam brdeg par brtsam pa'am/_/rmi lam na yang yum la gtses/_/ de ma thag tu ma bshags na/_/'di yang sngar dang sdig mnyam mo/_/gsang ba'i gsang ba bla ma yis/_/sku yi grib ma mi 'gong la/_/bla ma'i spyan lam dag tu yang /_/mtshon cha gzung bar mi bya 'o/_/rkang lag brkyang dang nyal mi bya/_/skyil krung 'dug dang rgyab mi bstan/_/lham dang stan dang bzhon pa dang /_/gdugs sogs sgeg pa'i rgyan rnams spang /_/bla ma'i gzim khang dag la yang*/_/lag pas mtshon nam rdo dag gis/_/brtsam par bya ba ma yin no/_/de dag las ni 'bum 'gyur du/_/bla ma'i gnas khang bshig pa dang /_/sku la brtsams shing sdig byas pa/_/'di yi sdig pa pha mtha' yas/_/gal te bla ma bag med pas/_/ma spyad stong na'ang pha mtha' yas/_/mched spun sku la brnyas byas na/_/'di yi rnam smin brjod mi nus/_/zhes pas legs par bsrung ngo /_/de dag byung na de ma thag tu bshags par bya'o/_/ gnyis pa gsung gi dam tshig ni/_/bkra shis nyi ma 'bum gyis brgyan pa'i rgyud las/_/gsung gi dam tshig khyad par nges byed na/_/skyob pa lnga yi rnal 'byor lam gzud phyir/_/rnam grangs dbye na bkod pa bsam yas kyang /_/nges par bsdu na bsrungs mtshams bcu gnyis so/_/phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum dag las/_/gsum gsum dag ni dbye na dgur 'gyur te/_/_rtsa ba gsum ste bcu gnyis kho na'o/_/zhes pas/_gsung gi phyi'i dam tshig tu rdzun du mi smra ste/_/ 'khor lo rnam par brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/_sngags kyi mos pa spyod pa yis/_/ 'gro ba phal pa dag la yang /_/brdzun gyi tshig ni rang 'dod kyis/_/smra la rtag tu dga' ba la/_/sngags bzlas nus pa mi 'byung zhing*/_/gzhan la smras pa btsun pa min/_/rang gi ngag nyid nyams pa yis/_/'gro ba gzhan gyi lce 'babs 'gyur/_/ ma 'ongs dus na sme sha'i lus/_/byang gi phyogs su myong bar 'gyur/_/de 'og ngan song sdug bsngal yang*/_/rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/phyi'i nang du phra ma mi smra ste/_/de nyid las/_sngags la gzhugs pa'i gang zag dang /_/ gzhan gnyis dbyen 'jug phra ma smra/_/chos smras 'khor rnams mi 'du dang /_/ cis byas log par 'gyur ba dang /_/ma dpyad rnams ni dgrar 'gyur dang /_/ lus la mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang /_/shi 'phos nas ni sder bcas lus/_/de nas ngan song gsum du myong /_/zhes so/_/phyi'i gsang ba gzhan gyi zhe mi bcad de/_/de nyid las/_rtag tu zhe gcod tshig smra ba/_/_/snga ma'i las dang phyi ma'i rtags/_/'gro ba byams bral bshes kyang sdang /_/chos kyi tshig kyang 'chol bar 'gyur/_/shi 'phos rab tu dred pa'i lus/_/de nas ngan song gsum du 'khor/_/ zhes pas spang ngo /_/gsung gi nang gi dam tshig gsum bsdoms te bshad pa ni/ dam tshig rnam par bkod pa'i rgyud las/_/sngags pa sdom la gnas pa yi/_/chos smra rnams dang chos bsgrub dang /_/chos ni bsgom pa'i gang zag la/_/sgro zhing skur ba btab pa dang /_/gshe zhing smad pa'i tshig smras na/_/gzhan gyi mos pa nyams pa dang /_/rang gi rtogs pa nyams pa dang /_/rang gi chos rnams brjed nges te/_/ yid dpyod 'dra min 'chol bar 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/de'ang gzhan la sgro btags na/_/phyi'i dam tshig nyams/_/skur ba btab na nang gi dam tshig nyams/_/gshe zhing smad na gsang ba'i dam tshig nyams pas spong ngo /_/gsung gi gsang ba'i phyi ni/_/_/rdo rje spun sring la gshe skur mi bya zhing /_/nang la bla ma'i phyag rgya dang nye 'khor mi smad/_/gsang ba bla ma la mi smad de/_/phyag rgya gnyis sbyor gyi rgyud las/_/rdo rje mched dang lcam dral la/_/tshig gi smras dang ngag bcag na/_/bskal pa brgya phrag bye bar ni/_/ngan song sdug bsngal drag po myong /_/snga ma byas dang da lta'i rtags/_/rim pas myong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/_snga ma byas pas tshe 'di la/ bar nas tha mar myong ba la/_/yang snga tshe yi stod la ni/_/skyes ma thag tu myong bar 'gyur/_/'di la byas pa'i las mtha' ni/_/_tshe yi zhabs la ngag gi las/_/ 'khor 'das gzhan gyi lce 'bab dang*/_/glo bur dag tu smra rgyun 'gags/_/bla ma'i bu dang chung ma dang /_/_/gang dag nye gnas dag kyang rung /_/bka' las 'das shing ngag 'das na/_/snga ma las ni nyams 'gyur ro/_/zhes so/_/bskang ba ni rdo rje nyi ma las/_gal te rmi lam dag tu yang /_/byung na yid kyis bshags pa bya'o/_/zhes so/_/ gsum pa thugs kyi dam tshig la yang gsum las/_/thugs kyi phyi yi phyi ni/_/snying po'i don rnam par len pa'i rgyud las/_/gang dag sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/sems can gzhan nam rang yang rung /_/gnod par bya ba'i las 'chang na/_/'di ni shu ba can gyi lus/_/grang ba'i reg dang ldan pa yi/_/lus ni stong phrag lnga blangs nas/_/grang ba'i dmyal bar nges par 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/mdor na brnab sems cha dang bcas pa spang ngo /_/phyi'i nang gi gnod sems spang ste/ gnam lcags me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud las/_gal te sems can phal pa la/_/ yul gyur gnod pa'i sems skyes na/_/'gro ba thun mong lus can ni/_/brgya phrag gsum gyi srog bcad pas/_/_/'di yi sdig pa pha mtha' yas/_/gal te bstan pa'i rtags 'dzin pa'i/_/gzugs can rnams la log 'gyur ro/_/sngags la zhugs pa lnga phrag 'gyur/_/_/rdo rje spun sring bdun phrag go_/_/_brgyud pa'i bla ma brgya phrag go_/_/_rang gi bla ma de yi brgya/_/_sngags kyi sgor zhugs dbang thob pa/_/mchog tu rnam smin de ltar ro/_/zhes so/_/phyi'i gsang bar log lta spang ste/_/bkod pa chen po las/_rang ngam gzhan gyi grub mtha' yis/_/chos la smod pa log pa'i lam/_/rtsa ba'i dam tshig las 'das nas/_/bsregs bcad me yi sdug bsngal la/_/yun ring bar du gnas pa'o/_/rang gi grub mthar log lta skyes/_/dmyal ba nyid las thar skabs med/_/ces so/_/thugs kyi nang la gsum las/_/_phyi ni spyod pa log pa/_nang ni sgom pa log pa/_gsang ba lta ba log pa ste/_shel gyi khang bu brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/_lta dang sgom dang spyod pa log_/'di ni lam log chen po ste/_/_sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal gang /_/ 'di yi sems la smin par nges/_/_zhes so/_/thugs kyi gsang ba'i gsum ni/ lta sgom spyod pa snyoms las su gyur pas yid la ma byas pa phyi/_yi dam gyi lha yid la ma byas pa nang /_bla ma dang rdo rje spun sring yid la ma byas pa gsang ba ste/ pad+ma klong yangs las/_su yis yid kyis las 'khyal te/_/yid la bya ba'i chos rnams la/_/_/yid la ma byas nyams pa dang /_/'das dang zhig pa'i las kyi mtha'/_/mnar med sdug bsngal myong ba 'o/_/zhes pa dang /_dam tshig rnam par bkod pa mchog gi sdong po'i rgyud las/_/dam bca' 'da' bar mi bya zhing /_/bla ma'i khas blangs mi bcag go_/_bla ma'i bya ba ma log dang /_/rang gi man ngag sems rnams kun/_/chos las gzhan par mi bya 'o/_/sems can kun gyi don bya zhing /_/rtag tu bla ma la gus dang /_/dam tshig mchog las 'da' mi bya/_/rdo rje dril bu gzung ba dang /_/sngags la 'os pa'i rdzas rnams gzung /_/spyir yang rtsa ba'i dam tshig las/_/gsang bar 'os dang gnyer gtad dang /_/gsang bar khas blangs bstan pa dang*/_/smras dang yid kyis log spyad na/_/'di yang mnar med rgyur 'gyur ro/_/_/dbang las byung ba'i khyad par chos/_/gzhan du mi bsgrags sems la sbyar/_/bla ma'i thugs la gnod pa yi/_/lus sam ngag gam yid dag gis/_/bya ba log pa mi bya 'o/_/de bzhin rdo rje spun zla la/_/_gzhan las khyad par man ngag rnams/_/gzhan la gsang la sems bzhag na/_khyad par dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/_/des na dam las mi 'da'o/_/zhes so/_/de ltar sku gsung thugs las che ba nyi shu rtsa bdun po dang /_de'i nang nas bla ma dang rdo rje spun sring la brten pa rnams lci bas myur bar bshags par bya'o/_/de'ang dam tshig las 'gal ba ni nyin zhag gis bar ma chod pa'i ltung ba dam tshig las phyir gyur pa rnams so/_/nyams pa ni zla bas bar ma chod pa'i ltung ba rnams so/_/'das pa ni los bar ma chod pa'i ltung ba rnams so/_/lo gnyis sam gsum song ba'i ltung ba la ni dam tshig ral ba zhes bya'o/_/lci yang kyang go rim bzhin yod de/_rdo rje nyi ma dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud las/_spyir na dam tshig khyad par las/_/dus la khyad par nges phye ba/_/_dam las 'gal zhes nyes byas gang*/_/zhag gis bar ma chod par ni/_/_dmigs pa'i yul la bshags byas na/_/des ni sor yang chud pa 'o//_nyams zhes zla bas ma chod par/_/'gyod pa drag pos bshags pas so// dam las 'das na lo dag gis/_/bar du ma chod bshags pas so/_/lo ni gnyis nas gsum dag la/_/dam tshig ral ba zhes bya ba/_/mchog tu drag na gso ru rung /_/lo gsum dag las 'das pa ni/_/de nas gsor yang mi rung ste/_/gal te blangs na gnyis ka'i tshig_/nges par sa spyod sdug bsngal la//_rgyun du spyod pa kho na 'o/_/zhes so/_/bskang ba'i thabs ni de nyid las/_'gal na tshogs kyi 'khor los bshags/_/nyams na rang gi bdog pas bskang /_/'das na bu dang chung ma dang /_/nye 'khor lus dang ngag dag dang /_/yid dang bdog par bcas pas bskang /_/ral pa rang gi srog gis bskang /_/de las phyir yang gyur pa na/_/_/nyams pa chen po zhes bya ste/_/gso ba rung ba ma yin no/_/zhes so/_/dam tshig gi sgra don ni/_/rgya gar gyi sgra las/_/sa ma ya zhes pa/_/bod skad du dam tshig ces bya ba ste/_so sor bshad na/_dam tshig rnam bkod las/_sa zhes bya ba bskyed pa la/_/ma zhes bya ba ma nyams na/_/dngos grub thams cad ster ba nyid/_/ya zhes nyams na yas par 'gyur//_zhes pa dang /_dam zhes bya ba bcings pa ste/_/_/de nyid grol na nyams pa ste//_de las 'das na gsor mi rung*/_/tshig ces ya ba de 'das na/_/me yi sdug bsngal myong ba 'o/_/yang na dam pa bsrung ba nyid/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs dag la/_/su yis 'das pa tshig par byed/_/bskal pa brgya phrag dag tu 'o/_/zhes pa dang /_mdor na dam tshig ces bya ba/_/rang sems tshig pa med pa la/_/g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral ba 'o/_/ zhes so//mdor na gsang sngags kyi che ba bla ma las byung bas de mnyes par bya ba ni sngar yang bshad la/_khyad par du dam tshig rnam bkod las/_/dngos grub mchog tu 'dod pa'i mis/_/_/ji skad bla mas gsungs bzhin bsgrub/_/bla ma mchog gis bka' stsal pa/_/gal te nyes pa'i skyon rig na'ang /_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin bya//_de bzhin bla ma'i bya ba la/_/lus kyi sdug bsngal mchog gyur kyang /_/rang gi nus pas 'bad de bya/_/_/bla ma'i thugs ni skad cig kyang /_/ dkrugs par bya ba ma yin no/_/bla ma'i zas dang nor rnams la/_/rang gi srog gi phangs pa bzhin/_/rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsrungs/_/gal te bla ma'i zhing khams su//chos bshad dbang bskur rab gnas dang /_/bsam gtan bsgom par bya ba rnams/_/rjes ma gnang bar mi bya 'o/_/mdor na lus dang ngag yid kyis//_bya ba'i rnam pa gang byed kyang /_/bla mar ma zhus ma gnang bar/_/cung zad tsam yang mi bya 'o/_/gzhan yang dge ba'i las gang yang /_/bla ma la zhus brtsam par bya/_/rnal 'byor spyod lam thams cad du/_/bla ma mchog dang 'bral mi bya/_/ dus gsum zas ni nam za yang*/_/sum char bcad pa'i phud rnams kyis/_/bla ma mchog la dbul bar bya/_/nor dang dkon pa'i rin po ches//_bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la/_/'dod pa med kyang phyogs su dbul/_/ci dang ci yi phud rnams kyis/_/ bla ma mchog la bsngos te dbul/_/mdor na bdag gi bsam pa ni/_/rnam par dag pa zol med pas/_/bla ma'i phyogs su dmigs par bya'o/_/rnam dag mchog tu dge bas ni/_/legs pa'i yon tan thams cad 'thob/_/des na bla ma mnyes par bya'o/_/zhes so/_/de ltar dam tshig bsrung zhing /_bla ma mnyes na yon tan dpag tu med pa nyid de/_/_rdo rje nyi ma'i rgyud las/_/rtsa ba gsum las nges phye ba/_/dgu yi rnam par phye ba las/_/nyi shu bdun gyis dbye ba yis/_/sngags las khyad par snang ba yi/_/dam tshig rnam par bsdus te phye/_/'di las 'gal bar ma byas na/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/tshe 'di nyid la thob par nges/_/ des na sngags pas 'bad pa dang /_/shes bzhin gyis ni zin par bya/_/mchog tu dngos grub 'dod pas ni/_/bla ma bslu bar mi bya zhing /_/mched la brtse gdung rgyun mi gcad/_/ces pa dang /_rdo rje snying po sra ba 'byung gnas kyi rgyud las/ dam tshig sdom pa rnam bshad pa/_/kun kyang rang gi sems las so/_/de yi 'phen pa bla mas shes/_/de phyir sems la 'dris pa'i mis/_/sangs rgyas zhing khams mthong ba dang /_/sku gsum tshad du 'byongs pa dang*/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mngon par 'grub/_/bla ma rtag tu bsten pa'i mis/_/mkha' 'gro'i gzugs rnams mthong ba dang /_/de yi byin rlabs 'jug pa dang /_/dus gsum lung yang ston pa dang /_/skye shi gnyis la dbang thob 'gyur/_/grogs la brtse gdung ldan pa'i mis/_/'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba dang /_/kun gyis snyan par grags pa dang /_/_/de yi byin rlabs 'jug pa dang /_/gzugs can kun kyang byams pa dang /_/rtag tu dam tshig la gnas dang /_/mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'du ba dang /_/ ma bsgrub dngos grub 'byung ba dang /_/ngag la nus pa 'bar ba dang /_/de bzhin mchog dang thun mong gi_/dngos grub thams cad rdzogs par 'grub/_/rtag tu dgon par gnas pa'i mis/_/rlung sems tshad rnams zin pa dang /_/snang ba grogs su 'char ba dang /_/rang gi sems la dbang thob 'gyur/_/bla mar bsnyen bskur byas pa'i mi/_/longs spyod mchog dang ldan pa dang /_/'khor 'das rgyas shing bsod nams ldan/_/'gro ba yongs la_sa rgyal bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu dbang rdzogs thob pa'i mi/_/'gro ba'i gtso bor 'gyur ba dang /_/kun gyis mthong na dga' ba dang /_/ye shes mngon du 'byongs pa dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin rlabs 'gyur/_/rtag tu gtor ma'i las byed pas/_/bsod nams tshogs rnams rdzogs pa dang /_/bar chad med cing las rnams 'grub/_/_'dod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/mkha' 'gro bran bzhin 'khor bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de dag gis smin byed dbang gi rim pa rnams bstan zin to/_/ don gnyis pa smin pa grol bar byed pa'i gdams pa la/_yid ches shing khungs btsun pa'i yan lag tu brgyud pa'i lo rgyus dang /_de las byung ba'i gdams pa dngos gnyis las/_dang po klong gsal las/_skal ldan nges shes bskyed pa'i phyir/_/_brgyud pa'i lo rgyus bshad par bya/_zhes pas/_'di la ma bshad pa'i skyon/_/_bshad pa'i yon tan/_brgyud pa dngos ji ltar bshad pa gsum las/_dang po nyi zla kha sbyor las/_lo rgyus don gyis ma bshad na/_gsang chen nges pa'i bka' 'di la/_yid mi ches pa'i skyon du 'gyur/_zhes so/_/gnyis pa ni snga ma las/_brgyud pa khyad par 'phags pa dang /_/gdams pa zab phyir nges shes skye/_zhes so/_/ gsum pa klong gsal las/_brgyud pa nye zab khungs btsun phyir/_kun tu bzang nas rim pas bshad/_ces pa dang /_'di nyid kyi btags grol snying po las/_ston pa kun bzang yab yum gyis/_/nyid las mi gzhan sems dpa'i snod/_/byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag nyid la/_/btags pas gcig shes chos kun grol/_/_/bcings dang grol ba'i mtha' las 'das/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i byin rlabs kyis/_/rab byung dga' rab thugs la shar/_/sing ha nyid la rgyud gtad pa/_/'bras bu yongs rdzogs btags grol rgyud/_/o rgyan pad+ma nyid la gtad/_/lnga ldan bu la 'di ston cig_/ces gsungs pas/_de nas mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du/bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po yab yum chos sku dri ma dang bral ba ci'i ngo bor yang ma grub pa las/_longs sku mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang gi rnam par bzhengs nas/_chos sku spros pa dang bral ba'i ngang nas 'og min gyi gnas su dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la rang bzhin gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad/_de nyid kyi snang cha las longs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dpal rdo rje sems dpa' byon te/_sprul pa'i sku dga' rab rdo rje la dur khrod me ri 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang chen por tshig sdeb sbyor legs pa'i sgo nas bshad/_des slob dpon chen po shrI sing ha la rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi dur khrod chen por mngon sum rang thog tu phab nas bstan/_des rig 'dzin chen po pad+ma thod phreng rtsal zhes bya ba rdo rje lta bu'i sku skye shi 'das grongs dang bral ba de la dur khrod chen po so sa'i gling du gnas lugs yid dpyod dang phral nas bstan/_des mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi lung bstan zhing gnang ba thob pas yum mkhar chen bza' 'tsho rgyal la/_gzho stod ti sgro brag gi tshogs khang chen por glen sgom yid dpyod dang phral nas/_lnga ldan ye shes kyi snying po Rang gsal mngon sum du gtan la phab nas gsungs/_des mkha' 'gro du mas lung bstan zhing bla ma yab yum gyi_sa dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor pa pad+ma las 'brel rtsal la/_mchims phu rig 'dzin zhi ba sgrub pa'i nags khrod mkha' 'gro rang bzhin gyis 'du ba'i gnas mchog dam par mngon sum 'od gsal gyi dgongs pa dbang gi chu bo ma nyams pa'i ngo sprod gzhi snang 'char tshul dang bcas pa gnad 'phyugs pa med par gsungs so/_/ gnyis pa de las byung ba'i gdams pa la/_brtson 'grus rab tshe 'dir sangs rgyas pa'i gdams ngag_/'bring bar dor 'tshang rgya ba'i gdams ngag_/tha ma rang bzhin sprul pa sku'i zhing du 'tshang rgya ba'i gdams ngag dang gsum las/ dang po la sngon 'gro'i rim pa ji ltar bstan pa'i tshul dang /_dngos gzhi zag pa med pa'i ye shes rgyud la skyed pa'i tshul dang /_rjes snang ba bzhi ji ltar 'char ba'i tshul dang /_mtha' rten gyi man ngag bshad pa'i tshul dang bzhi las/_dang po la thun mong chos spyi'i sngon 'gro_/thun mong ma yin pa rang gi sngon 'gro_/gnas lugs kyi ngo bo khregs chod gdab tshul dang gsum las/_dang po klong gsal las/_byams dang snying rje chos spyi'i lam/_/theg pa chen por 'jug phyir du/_/ zhes pa dang /_'das rjes las/_mi rtag snying rje byang sems sbyang*/_zhes pas/_phyi nang gi sngon du 'gro ba'i thog mar mi rtag pa dang /_byams snying rje byang chub kyi sems gsum sbyong tshul bstan pa la gsum las/_dang po ni phyi dus bzhi'i 'gyur ba la brten nas rang gi tshe mi rtag_/nang 'byung bzhi 'gyur ba la brten nas rang gi tshe mi rtag_/gsang ba skad cig yud tsam thang cig 'gyur ba la brten nas rang gi tshe mi rtag_/skye 'gro du ma rim gyis song ba la brten nas rang gi tshe mi rtag_/'byung bzhi thim tshul bsams pa la brten nas rang gi tshe mi rtag pa rnams bsam par bya ste/_rgya che rol pa las/_srid pa mi rtag ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra/_/_/nye bar len pa'i lus 'di 'jig cing bral/_/dus bzhi mi rtag 'gyur zhing snying po med/_/rgas shing rgud pa 'chi ba'i chos can te/_/thang cig yud tsam skad cig gnas pa med/_/_skyes bu'i tshe 'gro ri gzar 'babs chu 'dra/_/_zhes so/_/ gnyis pa byams pa bsgom tshul ni/_'di ltar 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba na 'khyams pa'i tshe/_pha ma drin can sha stag yin pas 'di thams cad bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang 'phrad par gyur cig snyam pa ste/_snying rje mchog gi mdo las/_byams pa'i rang bzhin srid pa'i sems can la/_/bde ba'i sman shing gcig pu bla med pas/_khyab par gyur ces thugs rje'i sprin tshogs can/_/gnyis med ye shes mchog gis gnas pa lags/_/zhes so/_/ gsum pa snying rje ni/_ngan song gsum po la sogs pa'i sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig snyam pa ste/_bu mo zla mchog gis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_'gro ba sdug bsngal gyur pa'i tshogs mthong nas/_/thugs rjes mi bzod sdug bsngal bral gyur ces/_/_rtag tu phan pa 'ba' zhig sbyor mdzad pa/_/snying rje'i ljon shing de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ zhes so/_/ bzhi pa byang chub kyi sems ni/_de ltar 'khor ba'i sems can 'di dag_/bdag gis skye rga na 'chi bzhi'i chu bo bzhi dang phral nas myur du sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par gyur cig snyam pa ste/_sdong po bkod pa las/_kye rigs kyi bu 'khor ba na rgyu ba'i sems can 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la gnas par gyur cig snyam du/_byang chub kyi sems bla na med cing gzhal du med pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de ltar dpag tu med do zhes so/_/de ltar bsgoms pa'i dgos pa ni/_tshe mi rtag pas 'jig rten gyi bya ba las blo log ste ci byas chos su 'gro ba dang /_byams snying rje byang chub kyi sems gsum gyis theg pa dman pa las blo log ste ci byas gzhan don du 'gyur ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/klong gsal las/_mi rtag snying rje byang sems kyis/_/chos 'jug theg chen lam du 'gro/_/zhes so/_/de ltar ma bsgoms na de las log pa'i skyon yod do/_/ gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa/_rang gi sngon 'gro la phyi lus ngag yid gsum ru shan dbye zhing sngon du 'gro ba/_nang lus ngag yid gsum ru shan dbye zhing sgrib pa sbyang ba/_gsang ba lus ngag yid gsum rnal du dbab cing sor gzhug pa gsum las/_dang po lus ngag yid gsum las/_lus la'ang ru shan dbye ba dang /_sngon 'gro gnyis las/_dang po thal 'gyur las/_'khor 'das ru shan ma phyed na/_/khams gsum lus ngag yid kyis kyang /_/'brel ba chod par mi 'gyur bas/_/'khor 'das ru shan dbye bar bshad/_/ces pas/_/_dang po lus 'di rgyu ma rig pa las bskyed pas dus rgyun du 'khor bar 'khyams te/_da phan chad 'khor ba mi 'khyams par bya ba'i phyir/_lus dang 'khor ba gnyis ru shan dbye ba ni/_'das rjes las/_lus kyi sngon 'gro bya ba'i phyir/_/rigs drug spyod pa sna tshogs spyad/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi spyod pa bya/_/zhes pas/_mi med pa'i ri la phyin te/_da ni sems can thams cad kyi don du/_lus dang 'khor ba ru shan phye la/_lus 'di phyis 'khor bar mi ldog par bya snyam du sems bskyed nas/_de nas dmyal ba tsha grang /_yi dwags bkres skom/_dud 'gro bkol spyod/ mi skye shi/_lha ma yin 'thab rtsod/_lha 'chi 'pho ltung ba'i sdug bsngal rnams yid kyis rang gi rgyud thog tu bsams la/_de dag gis bde sdug gi spyod pa dang /_sgra skad sna tshogs dran tshad bya'o/_/_de nas lus la chags zhen dgag sgrub bkres skom med pa'i nyams 'dug na phyed pa'i rtags yin te de ma byung gi bar du bskyar ro/_/ gnyis pa sngon 'gro dngos ni/_thal 'gyur las/_rdo rje skyil krung dang bcas te/_lus sbyangs sems la phan pa'o/_/zhes pas/_de nas rdo rje skyil krung ni rkang mthil gnyis sprad de lus drang por bsrang /_lag pa gnyis spyi bor ma reg par thal mo sbyar te yar rtse mar rtse gnyis rdo rje rwa gsum pa 'dra ba la nyin mtshan du 'bad do/_/rtags ni lus khol bur na ba dang /_khang rul zhig pa ltar tshugs mi thub cing drod skye ba dang rnam rtog med pa 'byung ngo*/_/de yang yar rtse gsum ni ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum mtshon la/_mar rtse gsum ni sku gsum mtshon zhing /_sked pa gcig tu 'dril ba ni nyams len khregs chod thod rgal gnyis ngo bo gcig pa lam du byed pa mtshon pa'o/_/de ltar lus kyi sngon 'gro byas pa la dgos pa gsum ste/_thun mong /_khyad par/_mthar thug go_/dang po lus kyi sdig pa ma lus par 'dag pa dang /_lus rdo rje me 'bar ba ltar mthong bas lus kyi gdon bgegs dang bar chad zhi ba dang /_lus kyi zhen pa ldog pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gnyis pa de ltar zhen pa log pas phyin chad 'khor bar mi 'jug cing lus sprul pa'i skur grol ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/gsum pa lus de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang gnyis su med par gdod ma'i gnas su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gnyis pa ngag la gnyis las/_dang po ru shan dbye ba ni/_'das rjes las/_ngag gi sngon 'gro bya ba'i phyir/_/rigs drug sgra skad sna tshogs brjod/_/ zhi khro'i sgra dang 'byung ba'i sgra/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gnyis la spyad/_/ces pas/ de'ang ma rig pa las grub pa'i lus la ngag ces pa'i bya ba'i sgra 'di brten pas 'khor bar 'khyams pas/_da phyin chad 'khor bar mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ ngag dang 'khor ba gnyis ru shan phye ba gal che bas/_mi med pa'i sar phyin te da ni sems can gyi don du ngag dang 'khor ba gnyis ru shan dbye la/_phyis mi ldog par bya snyam du sems bskyed nas/_rigs drug gi sgra skad sna tshogs dang /_zhi ba'i gsung dbyangs dang /_khro bo'i gad mo dang /_'byung bzhi'i sgra skad rnam pa sna tshogs yid la dran tshad ngag tu brjod do/_/rtags ni bla ma'i gdams ngag la go ba skyes nas ched du ma gzung bar rang rdol ba dang /_chos kyi tshig don mang po rang rdol du 'byung ngo*/_/de ltar ma byung gi bar du bskyar ro/_/ gnyis pa ngag gi sngon 'gro dngos ni/_thal 'gyur las/_ngag ni hUM zhes gnas pa la/_/rgyas gdab pa dang rtsal sbyang nyid/_/mnyen btsal lam du zhugs pa yis/_/de ltar ngag sbyangs sems la phan/_/zhes pas/_'di la rgyas gdab pa dang rtsal sbyang ba/_mnyen btsal ba/_lam du gzhug pa bzhi las/_dang po rgyas gdab pa la'ang gnyis las/_phyi snang ba la rgyas gdab pa ni/_hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes ring bar brjod pas/_phyi snang ba che chung thams cad hUM che chung du lam lam song bar bsam zhing /_so dang mchu ma reg tsam du bya ste/_rlung dang snang ba shes pa gsum gcig tu gtad la ma yengs par bya'o/_/de nas snang ba thams cad ban bun du song na rgyas thebs pa'i rtags so/_/des ni phyi snang ba rang bzhin med_ par grol ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gnyis pa nang phung po la rgyas gdab pa ni/_yang skyil mo krung byas te phyi'i hUM rnams gcig byung gnyis byung la thams cad lus kyi nang du byung bar bsgom la/_hUM zhes ring bar brjod cing /_hUM rong nge ba snyam byed na rlung bsdams pa gnad yin no/_/des ni nang sha khrag rdos pa'i phung po rang bzhin med par grol ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gnyis pa rtsal sbyang ba la yang gnyis las/_dang po phyi snang ba la rtsal sbyong ba ni/_hU~M mthing nag che chung gang la 'bigs pa'i yul dang mtshams pa/ reg pa tsam gyis phyir thal nang thal du 'gro bar bsams la hUM drag la thung bar brjod nas phyi rol gyi snang ba thams cad khral khrol du khe khol med par dbug go_/_/rtags ni phyi'i snang ba thams cad sang seng khral khrol snang la rang bzhin med pa'i nyams 'byung ngo*/_/de ltar ma byung gi bar du bskyar ro/_/ gnyis pa de ltar byas pas phyi snang ba thams cad bde gsal rang grol 'ja' tshon lta bur 'gro ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/gnyis pa nang phung po la rtsal sbyang ba ni/_hUM mthing nag mtho gang pa rang gi lus la phyir thal nang thal skor tsher med par phug pas seng seng du bsam zhing hUM drag la thung bar brjod pas 'byongs pa'i rtags ni lus kyi sha khol tsher 'phar ba dang khral ma khrol du song ba'i snang ba 'byung ngo*/_/ma byung gi bar du bskyar ro/_/des ni nang phung po'i nad gdon zhi ba dang /_phung po 'od gsal du grol ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gsum pa mnyen btsal ba ni/_/_rang gi mdun du shing la sogs pa'i mtshan ma btsugs la/_hUM zhes brjod pas hUM gi theg pa dru bu ltar dkris shing 'jig pa med pa la shes pa gtad nas/_hUM brjod pas shes pa lhan ne ba 'ong zhing grol ba snyam byed na 'byongs pa'o/_/des ni dmigs pa gang du'ang bsgyur du btub pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/gnyen bshes mthun pas yid bsgyur thub pa bzhin no/_/ bzhi pa lam du 'jug pa ni/_/_hUM mthing ga khru gang pa gcig ri mo'i 'khyogs mtshams srin 'gros lta bu khru re tsam na yod pa la zhugs te/mthong phar 'gron po don gnyer ba bzhin zhugs nas song bar bsams la/_hUM ring bar brjod pas shes pa bde lam pa dang 'bol shig pa 'byung ngo /_/des ni rang gi lus ngag gi lam srol du tshud pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/de ltar hU~M brjod pa thams cad kyi rjes la shes pa bde gsal la mi rtog pa'i ngang la rang babs su yul gyi ri la sogs pa'i bar nas/_mi mthong ba'i sa phyogs dang bcas pa na lhod lhod gnas pa yin pas/_de nyid kyi thog tu dar re mnyam par gzhag cing / de dag gi rjes kyi shes pa ji ltar 'dug kyang rang gi rgyud la bkal la blta'o/_/ de'ang hUM brjod dus rlung sems rtse gcig tu phyi nang gar gtad pa der gzung ba yin pas/_rnam rtog 'gags yul gzhan las che ba ni rten 'brel gyi che ba yin no/_/_/de ltar ngag gi sngon 'gro'am spyod pa byas pa'i dgos pa yang gsum ste/ thun mong /_khyad par/_mthar thug go_/dang po ni ngag gi sdig pa ma lus par 'dag pa dang /_ngag gi bya bas gong gi yon tan rnams thob pa dang /_ngag gi bar chad zhi ba dang*/_ngag gi zhen pa ldog pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gnyis pa ni ngag gi zhen pa log pas phyin chad ngag 'khor ba mi ldog cing ngag longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur grol ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gsum pa ni ngag de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje dang gnyis su med par gdod ma'i ngang du mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/de ltar sngon 'gro ma byas na/_de nyid las ldog pa'i skyon yod do/_/ gsum pa sems kyi sngon 'gro la'ang gnyis las/_dang po ru shan dbye ba ni/_'das rjes las/_yid kyi sngon 'gro bya ba'i phyir/_/rigs drug sdug bsngal blo la blang /_/zhes pas/_sems ni dang po chos sku yin yang yin par ma shes pas 'khor bar 'khyams pa yin te/_da phyin chad 'khor bar mi 'khyams par bya ba'i phyir/_sems dang 'khor ba gnyis ru shan dbye'o/_/_de'ang mi med pa'i lung pa dben par phyin te da ni sems can gyi don du sems 'khor 'das ru phyir mi ldog par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed nas/_rigs drug gi bde sdug thams cad bdag gi rgyud la bkal la nyams su myong ba'i tshul du bsam/_de dag gi rjes kyi shes pa yang rang gi rgyud la bkal la blta'o/_/ 'byongs pa'i rtags su sems gsal la dwangs pa dang /_'khrul ba med pa dang /shan phye la/ brod pa skye ba dang*/_snang ba thams cad dga' bde'i nyams 'bar bar 'byung ngo /_/ma byung gi bar la bskyar ro/_/ gnyis pa sngon 'gro dngos ni/_/thal 'gyur las/_sems ni thog ma byung sa dang /_/bar du gnas dang tha mar 'gro/_/de ltar gsum la brtag dpyad na/_/sems sbyangs sems kyi gnas lugs shes/_/zhes pas/_dang po sems kyi byung sa la brtag pa ni/_sems 'di phyi snod dang nang bcud gang nas byung /_stong pa dang /_snang ba dang /_yod pa dang /_med pa la sogs pa gang nas byung / sems nyid las sems byung ba yin snyam du brtags pas/_de'ang phyi'i ri khang khyim la sogs pa nas byung snyam na/_de'ang rdul phran bzhin du gzhig la brtags pas/_phyi snod nas ma byung /_nang rang gi lus las byung snyam na/_de'ang phyed tshal nas rdul phran gyi bar btsal bas mi rnyed/_stong pa nas ma byung ste/_byung sa ma grub/_snang ba las ma byung ste/_rdul phran du btsal yang mi rnyed de/_yod med gang las byung ba btsal yang ngo bo ma mthong /_sems las sems byung ba med/_byung sa dang byung mkhan gnyis ma grub/_tshol mkhan gyis sems la tshur bltas pas/ ngo bo ngos gzung dang bral te/_byung mkhan gyi sems ma grub pas byung sa'i ngos gzung ma grub par shes te/_byung sa dang rgyu mtshan btsal du ma rnyed pa ni/_sems nyid stong pa ngos gzung dang bral bar gtan la phebs pa yin no/_/de ltar sems la byung sa ma rnyed cing byung mkhan gyi sems ma grub pas/_sems dang por skye ba'i rgyus stong pa yin no/_/des na sems gzhi med rtsa ba dang bral ba chos sku skye ba med pa ngo 'phrod pa yin no/_/ gnyis pa sems kyi gnas sa la brtag pa ni/_sems nyid gar gnas/ phyi nang snod bcud/_lus mgo mjug la sogs par brtags pas/_de dag gang du'ang ma mthong ba de'i tshe/_rtog byed kyi shes pa nyid la tshur bltas pas/_shes pa gsal zhing snang yang rang bzhin ma grub pas/_gzhi med rtsa bral ye stong chen por gtan la phebs so//de ltar na sems la gnas sa ma rnyed cing / mkhan gyi sems la ngos gzung med pas sems bar du gnas pa'i rgyus stong pa yin no/_/des ni sems gsal la rang bzhin ma grub pa longs sku 'gags pa med pa dang ngo 'phrod pa yin no/_/ gnas gsum pa sems kyi 'gro sa brtag pa ni/_sems ni wal gyis byung nas yal gyis song ba snyam byed cing /_tha ma gang du 'gro brtags pas/_phyi nang snod 'gro mkhan gyi bcud snang stong yod med la sogs pa gang du'ang 'gro sa ma rnyed/ sems la brtags pas ngo bo ngos gzung ma mthong ba de'i tshe/_sems skye med blo 'das chen por gtan la phebs so/_/de ltar sems la 'gro sa ma rnyed cing / 'gro mkhan gyi sems la ngos gzung med pas sems tha ma 'gags pa'i rgyus stong pa yin no/_/de ni sems rig stong 'gro 'ong dang bral ba sprul pa'i skur gtan la phebs shing ngo 'phrod pa yin no/_/de ltar sems kyi sngon 'gro 'am/ spyod pa byas pa la dgos pa gsum ste thun mong*/_khyad par/_mthar thug go_/dang po sems kyi sdig pa ma lus par 'dag pa dang /_sems kyi bar chad zhi ba dang / sems kyi mngon zhen ldog pa'i dgos pa yod do/_/ gnyis pa sems der chos skur grol ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/gsum pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje dang gnyis su med par gdod ma'i gzhi thog tu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dgos pa yod do/_/de ltar sems ru shan ma phyed na gong gi yon tan de las ldog pa'i skyon yod do/_/'o na sku gsum thob pa de dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum du mya ngan las 'da' ba de gnyis gcig mod/_khyad par dang mthar thug gi dgos pa zhes tha dad du brjod pa la shes 'dod med do zhe na/_khyad yod de/_lus ngag yid gsum sku gsum du thob pa ni/_phyir gsal 'gro ba la snang ba yin la/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni nang gsal gdod ma'i gzhi thog tu phyin pa'o/_/de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyi spyod pa mthar phyin pa des ni phyi 'khrul pa'i rkyen snang zad par byed pa yin no/ gnyis pa nang lus ngag yid gsum ru shan dbye zhing sgrib pa sbyang ba ni/ klong gsal las/_'khrul rgyu zad par bya ba'i phyir/_/'khor 'das ru shan nang ltar dbye/_/zhes pas/_de'ang gong gi sngon 'gro gsum gyis phyi 'khrul pa'i rkyen snang zad kyang /_nang lus ngag yid gsum gyi 'khrul pa'i rgyu dang sa bon ma zad pas/_de zad par bya ba'i phyir lus ngag yid gsum nang ltar 'khor ba dang ru shan dbye dgos so/_/dbye ba dngos ni 'das rjes las/_lus 'di ma rig rgyus bskyed phyir/_/rigs drug sa bon nyid du gnas/_/rig pa sku gsum dngos yin phyir/_/sku gsum yi ge gsum du shar/_/yi ges rtsal sbyong ru shan dbye/_/zhes so/_/sa bon drug ji ltar gnas na/_klong gsal las/_spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga dang /_/lte ba gsang ba rkang mthil du/_a su nr-itri pre du gnas/_/zhes pas/_sbyang gzhi 'gro ba'i gnas drug tu/_sbyong byed sku gsum gyi yi ges sbyong ba ni/_rang gi lus kyi spyi bor a dkar po la lha'i bag chags dkar mog sgrib pa'i rnam pa can du 'dus par bsam/_de bzhin du mgrin par su ljang ser la lha ma yin gyi bag chags/_snying gar nr-i sngo skya la mi'i bag chags/_lte bar tri dmar nag la dud 'gro'i bag chags/_gsang bar bre ljang gu la yi dwags kyi bag chags/ rkang mthil du du dud kha la dmyal ba'i bag chags rnams 'dus par bsgoms pa'i spyi bor sku'i sa bon O~M dkar po las 'od zer 'phro ba/_mgrin par AHdmar po las 'od zer 'phro ba/_snying gar hUM mthing ga las 'od zer 'phro ba'i 'od kyis sa bon drug lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa/_ma rig 'khrul pa'i bag chags thams cad thul thul tshig par bsams shing bzlas so/_/oM AHhU~M 'bum tsho bdun dbyangs snyan pos glu dang bcas pas bzlas so/_/de'i dus su bdag ji lta ba bzhin sems can thams cad kyi gnas gsum gyi yi ge las me 'bar te/_sa bon drug tshig par bsams shing bzlas so/_/'byongs pa'i rtags su sdig pa zad pa'i rmi lam dang /_mtshan ma sna tshogs pa dang /_lus ngag yid gsum tha mal gyi zhen pa 'gags te shel sgong dag pa ltar sal sal la song ba snyam byed pa'o/_/de ltar ma byung gi bar du bskyar ro/_/'di
