so/___/_gnyis pa klong gsal las/_'degs byed don gyi rlung 'bros pas/___/_ lus ni mi thig sgyid pa skyur/___/_/_yan lag mi 'dus smra ba dka'/___/_mi ldog dbugs ni phyi ru 'phul/___/_bkrag mdangs bskyed pa'i rlung 'bros pas/___/_lus nyams kha snar bal dud chags/___/_sha tsha kha skam gshin dri bsnams/___/_dwangs snyigs 'byed pa'i rlang 'bros pas/___/_bza' btung mi len lus stobs 'chor/___/_ me dang mnyam pa'i rlung bros pas/___/_lus kyi drod ni mtha' nas 'chor/___/_bskal pa las kyi rlung bros pas/___/_lus la zang zing phyad phyod la/___/_rtsa bran khrag ni srog rtsar 'dus/___/_zhes so/___/_ gsum pa klong gsal las/_de tshe snang ba 'di ltar 'du/___/_phyi yi dbang po dran byed rnams/___/_mun sros bzhin du 'ub kyis 'dus/___/_ rig pa snying gi dkyil du 'dus/___/_smra yang mi shes dran pa nyams/___/_de nas lus kyi khrag 'dus nas/___/_srog rtsa'i nang nas snying du brgyab/_kha dang mig ni skya log 'gro/_dbugs ni khru gang tsam du 'chad/___/_de nas khrag thigs gnyis brgyab pas/___/_mgo dgug dbugs ni mda' gang 'chad/___/_de nas khrag thigs gsum brgyab pas/___/_ig cing dbugs ni 'dom gang chad/_de nas phyi dbugs chad pa dang*/___/_rig pa snying dkyil brgyal nas sdod/___/_de nas nang gi dbugs chad nas/_ chos nyid bar do 'char ba yin/___/_zhes pas khrag thigs rnams byung dus rgyal po gdan la bzhugs pa la/_blon pos sgyogs rdo 'phangs pa zhes bya ste/_dbugs ring phyir mda' gang 'dom gang tsam song ba na/_rtsa rbad kyis chad nas/_tha ma snying nang du khrag thigs gsum gyis 'od gsal gyi rtsa gang bar byas dus mi gcig zan za ba'i ring du dran med la brgyal ba'o/___/_de nas a haM gnyis gar 'phrad nas 'od gsal la 'char ro/___/_gsum pa nyi zla kha sbyor las/_bla ma mched dang rdo rje skrun/___/_shes pa'i gsal yang gdab par bya/___/_zhes pas/_de ltar 'byung ba rnams thim par ma gyur tsam la/_bla ma'am rdo rje spun sring dam tshig dang ldan pas/_rna bar smyug ma'am shog bu'i sbubs la mchu btsugs pa'i nang na phar/_ rigs kyi bu ci la yang ma chags shig/_chos nyid bar do la sku dang ye shes kyi zhing khams 'char gyis de rang snang du shes par gyis shig/_bde bar gshegs shig ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o/___/_ gsum pa ni lam 'phrang la dgra byung nas dngangs pa las/_rang gi grogs su shes pas skad cig la 'jigs skrag dang bral nas bde ba'am/_ma bu dang 'phrad pas yid ches lta bu'i dbang po'i bye brag gis gsum las/_tha ma'i rab bum pa chag pa lta bu ni/_de nas rlung rnam par shes pa la thim pas nang dbugs chad/_rnam shes nam mkha' la thim pas dbugs bar snang la yal/_ de'i tshe rig gdangs snying gar 'dus pas lus sems 'brel thag chad/_'od gsal gyi snang ba shar ba'i dus der sems dang ye shes rgyab gyes pas 'khor 'das rgyab gyes te/_'khor ba nyid mya ngan las 'das par grol ba zhes bya'o/___/_ de'i tshe nam mkha' 'od gsal la thim pas skad cig dang po la dbyar ma ston gyi nam mkha' sprin dang bral ba lta bu 'byung ste/_de nyid ngos zin na ka dag gi gzhi la rang grol ba'o/___/_de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes kyi mthongs zhes bya ba tshon sna lnga'i dru bu brkyang pa lta bu mig nas zug par snang ste/_mig thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad kyi thag pa rdo rje sems dpa'i khong seng gi lam la gtad/_rig pa stong gsal 'dus ma byas pa la gtad do/___/_de nyid la ma yengs pas yar gyi zang thal du skad cig la rang grol ba'o/___/_de'i tshe dus ma 'gyur bar snang ba 'gyur nas phyi sa rdo ri brag rtsi shing nags tshal nyi ma zla ba la sogs pa'i snang ba rnams nub/_nang chos nyid 'od gsal gyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa phra la dwangs pa gsal la 'tsher ba/_rang bzhin gyis bkra la nyam nga ba/_phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po mthong ba bzhin me re re shar pas/_'jig rten gyi khams brdal nas 'char ro/___/_de'ang kha dog lnga ldan du snang ba la mnan na nem zhes byed cing /_ bteg na 'phar zhes byed pa snyam pa ste/_thal 'gyur las/_'dir ni chos nyid bar dor bshad/___/_'chi kha las ni thal ba'i tshe/___/_rnam shes nam mkha' dag la thim/___/_nam mkha' 'od gsal la thim dus/___/_phra rags snang ba kun 'gags te/___/_dbang po kun ldan 'od kyi lus/___/_lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'gyur/___/_de'i tshe 'od snang dum bu'i tshe/___/_mkhas pas snang ba mched pa gzung /___/_g.yo ba rlung dag mched pa yis/_kha dog lnga yi 'od zer rnams/___/_ma nges 'ja' tshon ris su snang /___/_zhes pa dang /_nyi zla kha sbyor las/_rang bzhin dag pa'i snang ba 'di lta ste/___/_skyes bu rnams kyi rnam par shes pa 'od gsal la thim pa zhes bya ste/_ dbugs phyi nang gi 'grul thag chad ma thag tu/___/_rang gi dbang po rnams kyi cha las dngos por snang ba med de/___/_yod pa snyam pa'i shes pa ni 'byung ngo /___/_rdos bcas kyi lus ni mi snang ste 'od kyi lus su gsal lo/___/_de'i tshe mthong tshad tsam du 'od zer lnga'i da lar snang ba'o/___/_de yang snang ba'i 'od zer de dag phyi nas bltas na nang gsal zhing /_nang nas bltas na phyi gsal ba la/_so sor ma 'dres par bltas na shin tu phra ba/_'gyur ba 'gul ba 'phrigs pa rab tu 'tsher la lhun sdug pa'o/___/_shin tu rgya che ba dpag cing bsam pa'i dmigs su ma tshud pa/_dpangs mtho la rtse mo yangs ba zhes bya ste/_de nyid thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su bzhugs so/___/_de dag ni kha dog lnga ldan te dkar po rang sa na gsal la 'od zer 'phro ba de bzhin du ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang mthing ga rnams kyang rang sa na gsal la 'od zer 'phro ba ste/_de dag kyang 'byar la ma reg cing ma 'dres par kha dog gsal la shin tu lhun sdug par gnas so/___/_zhes so/___/_de'i tshe snang ba mched pa rnams rang snang du bzung ste rang ngo shes pas skad cig la grol ba'o/___/_/_de yang bar do'i snang ba 'di dag sngar bshad pa'i gdod ma'i gzhi dang /_lhun grub kyi snang ba rnams 'char ba yin pas/_de nyid rang ngo shes pa tsam gyis nang gsal gdod ma'i gzhi la grol ba'o/___/_de nas 'od gsal zung 'jug la thim pa zhes bya ba zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor mngon par snang ba ste/_tha ma'i 'bring seng ge'i gsob mthong ba lta bu'i grol lugs 'byung bas/_ gdangs kyi sku thog mar snang ba ni/_klong gsal las/_de tshe sgra 'od zer du 'khrigs/___/_sku yi snang bas skrag par byed/___/_ces pas/_skad cig ma de la lus bor ba'i gnad kyis lhun grub rang gnas kyi khrag 'thung khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sngar bshad pa de rnams shar ste/_che ba ri rab tsam dang /_'bring ri bo tsam/_chung ba nyung 'bru tsam pa shin tu mang zhing mgo brnyan sna tshogs pas mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs nas rang nyid gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs su rgyug cing /_brdeg par snang ba dang /_'od zer mtshon cha'i snang bas brdeg pa dang zug par snang ngo /___/_ 'od kyi nang nas chos nyid kyi rang sgra 'brug stong ldir ba tsam pas rgyob cig sod cig dang /_zung shig la sogs pa'i sgra skad mi snyan pa sna tshogs pa'i 'od kyis 'jigs so/___/_sgra dang zer gyis skrag go/_de'ang rang snang du ma shes pa rnams la bdud dang gshin rje'i snang ba chen po 'byung ngo*/___/_de'ang lha tshogs de rnams gnas kyang thog gi dung khang na nyung 'bru tsam las med kyang bar dor 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par snang ngo /___/_de nyid rang snang du shes pas skad cig la khrag 'thung gi skur grol nas sangs rgyas pa ni/___/_bla ma'i gdamangs ngag gi rang snang rig pa'i rtsal du ngo shes pas seng ge'i gsob mthong ba lta bur mtshang phug nas rig ste sngar goms pa'i gdams pa 'od gsal ma dang /_/_phyis shar ba bu rang byung gi 'od gsal gnyis ma bu 'dres te/_rang shar rang grol la rang gsal du sngar 'dris kyi mi dang 'phrad pa ltar rang rig rang gsal du rang grol ba'o/___/_ 'di'i ngo sprod ma thob na gang zag bzang po rnams kyang 'di nas ldog ste/_man ngag snying gi dgongs pa las/_kyai gsang ba'i bdag po da lta ngo ma 'phrod na sgom sgrub ji tsam byas kyang 'tshang mi rgya'o/___/_gdams ngag dang ma 'phrad pas 'od kyis 'jigs so/___/_sgras dngangs so/___/_zer gyis skrag go/_gdams pa'i gnad ma shes na sgra 'od zer gsum ngo ma shes pas 'khor bar 'khyams so/___/_zhes gsungs so/___/_de nas tha ma'i tha ma 'bras kyi ljang bu lta bu ni/_rim gyis 'char tshul rnams 'byung ba la grol te/_thal 'gyur las/_'jug cing smin pa'i rlung la yang /___/_phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng 'og grub/___/_de la phyogs kyi 'od 'dus pas/___/_rigs lnga'i sku yang mngon par snang /___/_mthing ga dkar ser dmar ljang ni/___/_so so'i yum dang bcas par snang /___/_so so'i tshom bu rdzogs pa las/___/_lnga ldan bcu ldan brgya ldan la/___/_tshom bu stong dang 'bum phrag ni/___/_bsam ngo rang bzhin dag pa yis/___/_brjod kyis mi langs grangs med 'char/___/_zhes pa dang /_ snga ma'i 'phro las/_yang snga ma de dag sku'i snang ba rang 'char te ska de dag kyang mi che ba/_mi chung ba/_cha mnyam pa/_rgyan dang /_kha dog dang /_bzhugs tshul dang /_ gdan khri dang /_rang rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa ste/_sku de dag kyang lnga lnga'i zung gis khyab pa/_lnga tshan re re la 'od lnga lnga'i mu khyud dang bcas pa/_yab kyi cha 'dzin pa'i rigs dang /_yum gyi cha 'dzin pa'i rigs dang /_sems dpa' dang /_ sems ma'i rigs dang /_dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdzogs par gnas so/___/_ zhes pas zhag lngar snang srid thams cad 'od dang skur 'char te/___/_de'ang zhag dang poRa rnam snang yum dang bcas pa/_shar du mi bskyod pa/_lhor rin chen 'byung ldan/_nub tu 'od dpag med/_byang du don yod grub pa yum dang bcas pa/_sems dpa' brgyad/_sems ma brgyad dang bcas pa/_sgo ba yab yum bzhi dang bcas pa 'char ro/___/_de bzhin du zhag gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa rnams su mi bskyod pa la rigs lngas bskor ba snga ma bzhin 'char ro/___/_rin chen 'byung ldan dang*/_'od dpag med dang /_don yod grub pa rnams la snga ma bzhin bskor ba'i tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor lnga ldan dang /_bcu ldan dang /_ brgya ldan dang /_stong ldan dang /_'bum ldan dang /_grangs med ldan rnams 'char te/_phyogs bcur rigs lnga'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las mdzad pa'i rnam par rol pa rnams la lnga ldan nas grangs med ldan gyi bar sbyar te/_nam mkhas gar khyab par sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams chen pos khyab cing /_rang nyid kyang 'od lus su snang ba'i snying gdang dkyil 'khor de dag gi thugs kar 'od zer lnga'i zer thag sbrel mas 'brel bar snang ngo /_/_de dag thams cad kyang phyi nang kun tu gsal la ltem mer re khyil le ba kha dog so sor gsal zhing ma 'dres pa la/_phra ba/_'gyu ba/_'phrigs pa/_rab tu 'tshir ba/_rgya che ba/_lhun brjid pa/_dpangs mtho ba/_dmigs su mi tshud pa/___/_'od zer mtha' yas pa/___/_ kun tu 'phro ba ste/_klong gsal las/_de ltar snang ba de dag la/_rigs lnga yab yum tshom bur gsal/___/_dpag med grangs las 'das pa la/___/_de dag phyag rgya rgyan dang ldan/___/_gdan khri bzhugs tshul cha snyoms par/___/_lnga lnga'i zung la 'od kyis bskor/___/_yab yum so so'i cha 'dzin pa/_sems dpa' dang ni sems mar bcas/___/_dkyil 'khor chig rdzogs nyid du 'char/___/_zhes so/___/_'di'i dus su dus gsum gnad kyi gdams pa dran par bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa'i gnad/_ grol ba lus kyi gnad/_mthar phyin pa ngo shes pa'i gnad do/___/_dang po rig pa 'od la phar 'jug pa dang /_'od rig pa la tshur 'jug pa gnyis las/_dang po klong gsal las/_de tshe rang gi snying ga nas/_zer thag 'od kyi lu gu rgyud/_tshom bu'i thugs kar 'brel snyam las/___/_de dag thig le rab brgyan pas/___/_shes pa zin pas bsam gtan skye/___/_zhes pa dang /_nyi zla kha sbyor las/_de tshe rang gi snying ga nas 'od shin tu phra ba gcig 'char te/_tshom bu'i 'od zer dang rang gi snying ga'i 'od zer de gnyis 'brel ba'i tshe/_sku de dag thams cad kyi thugs kar brel te 'char ro/___/_de la rang gi shes pa zin te zer thag de la yang thig le phra mo grangs med pa 'char ro/___/_zhes so/___/_ gnyis pa de nas tshom bu'i 'od snang gi sku rnams rang la thim pa ni/_snga ma las/_de nas rang gi snying ga nas/___/_'od zer tshon skad sgril ba gcig/_tshom bu'i thugs kar 'brel bar snang /___/_de nas tshom bu'i ska de rnams/___/_rang la thim pa'i snang ba 'char/___/_zhes pa dang /_nyi zla kha sbyor las/_de nas yang rang gi snying ga nas 'od zer gyi zer thag tshon skud sgril ba tsam zhig 'char te/_de nas sku de dag thams cad rang gi lus la thim pa snyam byed pa'i snang ba 'char te/_de ni 'od rang gi rig pa la tshur 'jug pa zhes bya'o/___/_de'i tshe skyes bu rnams kyis yid ches pa pha ma dang bu tsha 'phrad pa lta bu'i gdams ngag dran par gyis shig/_ces so/___/_ gnyis pa grol ba lus kyi gnad ni/_klong gsal las/_phung po lnga yi gzung 'dzin dwangs/___/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru grol/___/_'byung ba nyon mongs rang grol bas/___/_'od gsal ma bur rig pa grol/___/_ces pas/_de dus su phung po lnga'i bdag tu 'dzin pa rang sar dengs te lus 'od gsal du grol nas/_ chos nyid la gnas shing 'byung ba phra rags las grol bas/___/_snang ba thams cad 'od gsal bde ba chen por grol la/_nyon mongs pa phra rags las grol bas rig pa'i ye shes ma la bu thim du song ba'o/___/_de nas zung 'jug ye shes la thim pa zhes bya ste/_'di'i dus su ye shes bzhi sbyor rdo rje sems dpa' khong seng gi lam 'char ba ni/_rang gi snying ga nas 'od kha dog bzhi'i thag pa steng gi nam mkha' la zug pa'i snang ba 'char te/_nyi zla kha sbyor las/_rang gi snying ga nas 'od kyi zer thag shin tu phra ba zhig 'char ro/___/_de ni steng gi nam mkha' la gyen du zug par snang ngo /___/_de'i dus su rang gis ma yengs par bltas pas snang ba de gzhan dang ma 'dres par snang bas shin tu rgya che bar 'char te/_de yang dang po mthing ga'i snam bus steng du thig le zer dang ldan pa me long kha sbubs pa tsam/_ dper na mu man gyi phor pa kha sbub ba lta bu la ye shes kyi gting mdangs dang ldan pa shin tu gsal la 'tsher ba/_de yang rang bzhin gyi thig le lnga lngas brgyan pa'o/___/_de'i mtha' dang dbus med par thig le dang thig phran gyis brgyan pa 'char ro/_/_yang de'i steng du dkar po'i snam bu'i steng du thig le shin tu gsal ba/_dper na shel gyi phor pa kha sbub pa lta bu'i ye shes kyi gting mdangs dang bcas pa snga ma ltar 'char ro/___/_yang ser po'i snam bu'i steng du dper na gser gyi phor pa kha sbub pa lta bu la gong dang 'dra ba 'char ro/___/_yang de'i steng du dmar po'i snam bu'i steng du dper na pad+ma rA ga'i phor pa kha sbub pa lta bu la gong dang 'dra bar 'char ro/___/_de'i steng du 'od zlum po shin tu gsal ba rma bya'i gdugs lta bur 'char ro/___/_de dag kyang ye shes bzhi'i snang ba ste/_bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rtsal ma rdzogs pas mi snang ngo /___/_de ni ye shes bzhi sbyor gyi snang ba zhes bya ste/_rdo rje sems dpa' khong seng gi lam zhes bya'o/___/_zhes gsungs so/___/_de'i tshe mi 'gyur ba gser gyi thur ma lta bu'i gdams ngag dran par bya'o/___/_ gsum pa de nas mthar phyin pa ngo shes pa'i gnad gsum skye ste/_sngar gyi snang ba de rnams la yid ches pa ma bu 'phrad pa lta bu dran pas/_sngar 'dris kyi mi phyis mthong bas ngo shes te sgro 'dogs chod pa ltar rang snang du ngo shes pas mi 'gyur ba gser gyi thur ma lta bu ste/_de yang sman pa mkhas pas snying chu zhugs pa gser gyi thur mas lam du 'dren pa ltar/_chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam 'gyur ba med par yid ches pas rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin skye'o/___/_de nas phyir mi ldog pa mngal nas skyes pa'i bu'am/_gyad rtsal po che mda' 'phangs pa ltar rig pa lhun grub rin po che'i sku la thim pa'i tshe/___/_ye shes lhun grub rin po cher thim pa zhes bya ste/_rang snang thams cad ston ka'i nam mkha' rnam par dag pa lta bu'i tha ma 'od lnga'i mu khyud zlum pos bskor ba/_dper na nyi ma 'jas 'khyil pa lta bu dbang po'i spyod yul du gyur tshad 'char ro/___/_de'i steng du 'od zlum po kha dog lnga ldan shin tu gsal ba gcig 'char ro/___/_de'i tshe klong gsal las/_lhun grub rig pa'i 'char tshul las/___/_rnam pa brgyad du 'char ba'o/___/_zhes pas/_ de'ang rig pa 'di thugs rje ltar shar bas 'khor 'das rgya ma chad/_'od ltar shar ba snang ba thams cad nang du gsal/_sku ltar shar pas shes pa kha phyir ma shor/_ye shes ltar shar bas snang ba thams cad zang thal/_gnyis med ltar shar bas rang gi shes pa rtse gcig tu gnas/_mtha' grol ltar shar bas mtha' gang la yang mi gnas/_ma dag pa srid pa'i sgo ltar shar bas srid pa'i byung khungs mi 'gags/_dag pa ye shes kyi sgo ltar shar bas chos nyid ma bu 'brel ba'o/___/_/_de'ang snang ba de kun gyi nang na lha'i sku sna tshogs dang /_mar 'gro ba rigs drug gi yul sna tshogs pa snang zhing de dag gi sgra skad sna tshogs su shes pa/_ yar ka dag gi snang ba mthong la/_thad kar sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams tshad med pa mthong bas so/___/_/_de'ang rin po che spungs pa las/_thugs rje lta bu'i 'char tshul las/___/_sems can kun gyi skyabs pa'i gnas/___/_snang ba rang gsal 'gags med las/___/_'od lnga'i gsal byed tshul du snang /___/_mkhyen pa'i snang cha ma 'gags pas/___/_ye shes dag pa'i sgo nyid du/___/_snang ba 'gags med lam ltar shar/___/_rang snang lus kun mtha' rdzogs phyir/___/_chos rnams kun gyi sku ltar snang /___/_shes pa'i ngo bo gcig yin pas/___/_gnyis su med pa ltar yang shar/___/_de nyid rang sar gnas med pas/___/_mtha' grol chen po'i snang ba ni/___/_nges med lhun grub gzhi la snang /___/_rig pa zang thal chig rdzogs phyir/___/_dag pa ye shes nyid kyi sgo/___/_/_ngo bo nyid dang 'brel ba 'o/___/_'byung tshul 'gags pa med pa'i phyir/___/_sems can kun gyi 'byung khungs so/___/_ma dag 'khor ba'i sgo ltar yang /_ khyab byed snang ba'i cha las shar/___/_zhes so/___/_de'i skad cig la mngon par shes pa drug phrag drug kyang 'char te/_klong gsal las/_de tshe rigs kyi bu de la/_ mngon par shes pa drug phrag drug/_ces pas/_dbang po'i mngon par shes pa drug/_sems las su rung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug/_shes rab la dbang thob pa'i mngon par shes pa drug/_ye shes mthong ba rnam par dag pa'i mngon par shes pa drug/___/_chos nyid phyin ci ma log pa'i mngon par shes pa drug/_sangs rgyas kyi gzigs pa phyin ci ma log pa'i mngon par shes pa drug 'char ro/___/_yang skad cig ma de la mngon par shes pa dgu yang 'char te/_de'i tshe rigs kyi bu de la/___/_mngon par shes pa dgu 'char te/___/_zhes pas sku'i gsum ni yar chos kyi sku skye ba med pa shes/_bar longs sku'i tshom bu rang gsal du shes/___/_mar sprul sku dang rigs drug gi skye gnas shes pa'o/___/_gsung gi gsum ni yar chos sku'i gsung brjod med chen por shes/___/_bar longs sku'i gsung gsal gdangs chen por shes/___/_mar sprul sku'i gsung rigs drug gi sgra skad shes pa'o/___/_thugs kyi gsum ni yar chos sku'i thugs ka dag chen por shes/_bar longs sku'i thugs lhun grub chen por shes/_mar sprul sku'i thugs 'khor 'das kyi bsam pa shes pa'o/___/_dngos po gshis kyi 'dug tshul de yang rjes su dran pa bdun las byung ste/_ bla ma rjes su dran pas zab mo'i gdams pa la dbang bsgyur/_gdams pa rjes su dran pas bar dor rang gi chos nyid la dbang bsgyur/_lta ba rjes su dran pas mi 'gyur ba'i gdeng du thag chod/_sgom pa rjes su dran pas rang bzhin gyi bsam gtan la zhag lngar gnas/_spyod pa rjes su dran pas sngar 'dris kyi mi dang 'phrad pa bzhin dag pa'i ye shes la spyod/_lha rjes su dran pas rang snang dkyil 'khor du rang grol/_skye gnas rjes su dran pas dbang po tha ma rnams rang bzhin sprul pa'i sku'i zhing khams su dbugs 'byin pa'o/___/_de nas mi brjed pa'i gzung dang ting nge 'dzin thob pas sngon thos pa'i chos thams cad rgyud la dus gcig tu 'char zhing /_ma dag pa'i snang ba mi skye nges so/___/_de bzhin du sngar ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang 'char bas na chos nyid kyi bar do zhes bya'o/___/_rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin ni rgyud la rang bzhin gyis 'char bas rnam rtog ngan pa thams cad gtan nas mi skye'o/___/_de nas skad cig ma gsum pa la lhun grub kyi sa la nges pa'am gdeng rnyed nas thim lugs brgyad kyang dus gcig la 'byung ste/_rang shar las/_ kye grogs po dag lhun grub kyi snang ba rang nyid kyi stobs su gyur nas/_bden pa mthong ba'i tshe thim lugs brgyad po ngo shes par bya'o/___/_de'ang thugs rje thugs rje la thim pa ni dper na nyi ma nub pa'i 'od zer lta bu'o/___/_ye shes ye shes la thim pa ni dper na ma pang du bu zhugs pa lta bu'o/___/_'od 'od la thim pa ni dper na 'ja' tshon nam mkha' la yal ba lta bu'o/___/_sku sku la thim pa ni dper na bum pa'i sku lta bu'o/___/_gnyis med gnyis med la thim pa ni dper na chu bo la chu bo thim pa lta bu'o/___/_mtha' grol mtha' grol la thim pa ni dper na nam mkha' la nam mkha' thim pa lta bu'o/___/_ma dag pa 'khor ba'i sgo dag pa ye shes kyi sgo la thim pa ni dper na sgra'i chon thag bsdus pa lta bu'o/___/_dag pa ye shes kyi sgo ngo bo'i sgo la thim pa ni dper na seng ges gangs zin pa lta bu'o/___/_zhes pas/_ de'ang lhun grub kyi sa la gdeng rnyed pa'i tshe phyir gsal gyi sku dang ye shes kyi snang ba nang gsal la thim pa ngos 'dzin pa ste/_de'ang thugs rje thugs rje la thim pa ni nyi ma rgas pa'i dus na zer nyi ma la 'dus pa ltar/_rigs drug gi snang ba rang la 'dus nas ma dag pa 'khrul pa'i ming med de mthong snang las 'das so/___/_'od 'od la thim pa ni nam mkha' la 'ja' tshon yal ba ltar 'od dang kha dog mtshan ma'i ris med de/_stong pa ngos gzung dang bral ba'i dbyings su ro gcig go/_sku sku la thim pas bum pa'i sku ltar shes bya nang du gsal bas/_ mtshan ma ris can gyis zhal phyag tu grub pa med pas rang ngo rnam par dag go/_ ye shes ye shes la thim pas ma pang du bu zhugs te chos nyid ma dang bu gnyis gnyis med du 'dres so/___/_gnyis med gnyis med la thim pas chu bo chu bo la thim pa ltar dbyer med spros pa dang bral ba'o/___/_mtha' grol mtha' grol la thim pas nam mkha' la nam mkha' thim pa ltar stong pa la gtad pa'i yul med do/___/_ ma dag pa 'khor ba'i sgo dag pa ye shes kyi sgo la thim pas sgra'i chon thag bsdus pa ltar thig le nyag gcig la 'dus so/___/_dag pa ye shes kyi sgo ngo bo nyid la thim pas seng ges gangs la zin pa ltar ya nga ba dang bral ba'o/___/_rin chen spungs pa las/_rol pa tsam du thim lugs brgyad/_yon tan tshul du 'di ltar ro/___/_thugs rje nyid ni thugs rje la/___/_rang gi ngo bo rang thim pas/___/_dper na nyi ma'i snying po la/___/_rang gi zer rnams thim pa ltar/___/_gzigs snang tha dad mya ngan 'das/___/_zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/___/_de nas ka dag gi sa la grol nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang rgya'o/___/_bar do'i grol tshad ni seng ge rtsal rdzogs las/_zhag lnga dag tu ting 'dzin ni/_zhes pa dang /_sku gdung 'bar ba las/_bar ma do yi chos nyid la/___/_skad cig lnga la grol bar 'gyur/___/_zhes pa dang /_nyi zla kha sbyor las/_de ltar na dbang po ni gsum ste/_rab kyis skad cig ma gsum la grol bar 'gyur ro/___/_'bring zhag lnga na brtan pa thob pa yang yod do/___/_tha ma ni zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig na brtan pa thob par nges pa yin no/___/_'di'i dbang po yang mtha' ni rang bzhin sprul pa sku'i zhing khams su dbugs phyung nas bar do med par 'tshang rgya ba yin no/___/_zhes dang*/_rang shar las/_dbang po'i bye brag gis chos nyid kyi bar do la zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bshad do/___/_zhes so/___/_/_ gsum pa srid pa'i bar do la las kyi 'phro mthud pa yur ba kha chag la wa 'dzugs pa lta bu'i gdams ngag ni/_dper na yur ba kha ral wa btsugs pa chu bar ma chad par 'drongs pa ltar/_'di'i sgom mthong yang khregs chod tsam mam ru shan 'byed pa'i spyod pas lus ngag gi sngon 'gro byed dus tshe'i bar chad pa rnams las bzangs kyi 'phro mthud pas srid pa'i bar do nas 'khor ba'i ru ldog pa'o/___/_de la gsum las/_yang mtha'i rab mngal sgo dgag ste bzlog pa ni/_de yang bar ma doyid kyi lus la dbang po kun tshang bas thogs pa med par 'gro ba ni bya sgro rlung gis khyer ba lta bu phyad phyod ban bun yad yud kun la zhing 'jug pa'i dus su bsam blo gcig btang bas/_da ni shi ba yin par 'dug snyam nas sdug bsngal drag po byung nas shes pa sngar bas bdun 'gyur gyis gsal zhing bar do'i sems can thams cad lus 'tshol du 'gro dus/_pho mo sbyor ba byed pa mthong ba na/_bla ma yi dam du mos pa byas te bde stong gi don la mnyam par bzhag/_yang na zhen log bsgoms pas der mi 'jug go/_de'i dus su lha mi gnyis 'od dkar po/_byol song /_lha min ser po/_dmyal ba yi dwags nag por snang zhing /_lha mi gnyis mgo gyen du bltas nas 'gro ba snyam byed/_lha min byol song mgo 'phred/_dmyal ba yi dwags mthur du bstan nas 'gro ba snyam byed do/___/_de'ang bar dor ji tsam gnas pa'i phyed sngar gyi rnam par snang zhing /_phyed phyi ma'i snang ba 'char ro/___/_de yang lha khang dang skyed mos tshal gyi nang na 'dug pa snyam byed na lhar skye/_de bzhin du 'od kyi 'khor lo lha min dang /_ nang rmugs pa ni mi lus tsam po dang /_skye bo mang po'i dbus na 'dug pa ni mi lus rin po che dang /_spyil po'am sa phug ni byol song dang /_grog po ni yi dwags dang /_mun nag char 'thibs ni dmyal bar skye bas/_de'i gseb tu mi 'gro bar gzabs par bya'o/___/_tha ma'i 'bring gis sgyu ma lta bu'i bskyed rim gyis bzlog pa ni gong gi snang ba de rnams shar ba'i dus su yi dam gyi lhar bsgoms nas bskyed rim gyi ngang la bzhag pas kha cig grol ba yang yod cing /_der mngal nas yi dam yab yum du gsal btab nas bskyed rdzogs bsgoms pa'i byin rlabs kyis rtag tu chos la spyod pa'i rigs su skye'o/___/_tha ma skyabs 'gros bzlog pa ni/_ gong gi snang ba shar ba'i dus su bla ma yi dam phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro byas pas mngal sgo ngan pa rnams khegs te mi lus rin po che dal 'byor gyi chos bco brgyad dang ldan pa'i lus thob nas skye ba de la bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa'i zhabs drung du skyes te/_zab mo'i chos thos nas 'tshang rgya'o/___/_'di ni mngon sum gyi ngo sprod ma thob pa rnams kyi dbang du byas pa'o/___/_thob pa rnams ni rang bzhin sprul pa sku'i zhing du grol bar nges so/___/_ don gsum pa brtson 'grus tha ma rang bzhin sprul pa sku'i zhing khams su dbugs phyung nas 'tshang rgya ba'i gdams ngag ni/_rang shar las/___/_bden pa mthong ba'i gang zag ni/___/_rtogs pa rgyud la ma skyes kyang /___/_phyogs bcur sprul pa'i zhing khams su/___/_gnas nas mthar phyin grol bar 'gyur/___/_zhes pa dang /_ sku gdung 'bar ba las/_'di ni sprul pa'i zhing khams su/___/_dbugs phyung skye ba gcig gis thogs/___/_zhes pa dang /_nyi zla kha sbyor las/_rang dgar 'dzin pa'i bag chags zad/___/_rang bzhin sprul par dbugs phyung nas/___/_bar do med par sangs rgyas rnyed/___/_ces pas/_'di'i dbang po yang mtha' brtson 'grus can tha ma ni mngon sum mthong yang yun du bsgoms pas/_chos nyid bar do ma zin te dbang po kha 'khyal nas srid pa'i bar do'i snang cha tsam du gnas pa las/_rmi lam sad pa'i tshul tsam du rang bzhin sprul pa'i zhing du skye'o/___/_/_de'ang shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba mi 'gyur rdo rje'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa/_rin po che shel las grub pa'i sa gzhi la gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las bkod pa/_sgo bzhi gru bzhi rta babs dag ldan pa/_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang 'khor lo la sogs pas mdzes shing khod snyoms la yid du 'ong bar yan lag brgyad ldan gyi chu 'bab pa/_mchod pa'i lha mo mang pos bkra shis kyi gla len cing 'byung ba bzhi'i gnod pa dang bral ba/_nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yang med cing*/_der snang ba'i ston pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas gdul bya'i sems rgyud 'dul ba'i chos kyi rnga sgra chen po dus bzhir sgrogs pas mdzes pa/_ rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med par snang ba/_rang nyid kyang rdo rje rigs kyi sems dpa' gzhon nu'i gzugs can mchog tu dkar ba'i lus blangs nas ston pa'i zhal mthong ste/_nyon mongs pa zhe sdang bag chags dang bcas pa grol te/_lo brgya nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa snyam byed do/___/_'jig rten gyi khams de yang rang snang rnam par dag pa lhun grub kyi gdangs las shar ba ste/_ theg pa thun mong ba'i rigs lnga'i zhing ltar phyogs ga shed na yod pa ni ma yin no/_de'ang sngar chos nyid kyi bden pa mthong ba'i gnad kyi lhun grub kyi snang ba las shar ba'i rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing de nyid rang snang la snang ba'o/___/_shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su bshad pa ni snying nas shar te mdun gyi 'od gsal gyi mdangs las snang ba na snang ba de yod pas de skad ces bya'o/___/_de bzhin du phyogs gzhan rnams kyang des mtshon te/_snying gi dbus na chos sku kun bzang yab yum gyi gdangs las/___/_bar na rigs lnga 'ja' tshon lta bu de'i gdangs las phyi rol sgrub pa'i zhing dang skur snang ba ste/_rang bzhin sprul pa'i zhing dang /_ 'gro ba 'dul ba sprul pa'i sku dang /_ma dag pa sprul pa'i sku mngon par snang ba yin no/___/_de nas slar yang lho phyogs dpal dang ldan pa gser du snang ba na/_ bkod pa snga ma lta bu las ston pa rin chen 'byung ldan rin chen rigs kyi sems dpa' dpag tu med pa la chos ston par skyes te/_dbang bskur ba thob pas nga rgyal dag nas lo brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga na/_nub pad+ma brtsegs pa'i zhing khams mar gat+ta dang /_mu tig dmar po las grub par ston pa 'od dpag med pad+ma rigs kyi sems dpa' dpag tu med pas bskor bar skyes te/_mngon sum du lung bstan nas nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dag ste/_lo brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga nas byang phyogs las rab grub pa'i 'jig rten in+d+ra nI la'i rang bzhin ljang gu 'tsher ba na rin po che'i gzhal med khang dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i bya skad sna tshogs sgrogs pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin snang bar/_ston pa don yod grub pa las kyi sems dpa' du mas bskor nas bzhugs pas dbugs phyung ste/_phrag dog dang gti mug la sogs pa las dang bag chags ma lus par zad de/_lo brgya nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa las/____/_mdun gyi nam mkha' mi mjed brtsegs pa na/_'jigs pa'i dur khrod me ri 'bar ba khro bo'i zhing khams a la la zhes sgrogs pa mthong ste de nyid la gdod ma'i gzhi thog tu grol bar 'gyur ro/___/_de skad du bkod pa chen po las/_de nas ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba las bzhengs te ched du brjod pa 'di dag brjod do/___/_snyigs ma lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la/___/_gsang ba'i snying po 'di ni mi yul du dag tu snang /___/_de rjes 'dzin pa'i gang zag skal ba can/___/_snying po 'di ni su la snang ba 'gyur/___/_de dag rnams ni mi 'gyur sa la 'da'/___/_gal te snyigs ma tshe thung nad mang bas/___/_snying po'i don 'di gdeng du ma gyur kyang /___/_'di nyid mthong bas dbugs chen nyid 'byin te/___/_ bcu gcig kun tu 'od dang sprul pa'i zhing /___/_rdzus skyes gnas su dag pas mngal gyi rgya dang bral/___/_/_shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba mi 'gyur rdo rje'i zhing /___/_mi bskrod ston pas 'khor gyi shes rgyud 'grol/___/_gdul bya rang snang yon tan bsam mi khyab/___/_dpal dang ldan pa pad+ma brtsegs pa dang /___/_las rab nyid ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i zhing /___/_rin chen 'byung dang pad+ma gar dbang rta/___/_ston pa'i bstan pas shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyang /___/_dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu'i kha dog la/_khod snyoms yid 'ong bya skad sna tshogs sgrogs/___/_dri bsung ngad 'jam lta bas chog mi shes/___/_dbang po tshim byed yon tan kun dang ldan/_kha dog lus rdzogs zas gos dus cig rdzogs/___/_lus kyi rtsol bral rlung bskyed 'gro dang 'dug/_rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa'i nad rnams med/___/_yan lag brgyad ldan ro brgya 'dus pa'i chu/___/_'thungs pas tshim byed reg na lus kyang 'jam/___/_ sa chu me rlung 'byung bas phan gnod bral/___/_bkres dang skom dang tsha grang sdug bsngal med/___/_/_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nyon mongs rnams/___/_skye ba'i rgyu med shes pa bag yangs so/___/_bltas rgod lag bcangs gnyis 'khyud 'dod chags med/___/_chog shes sred bral rtag tu chos la nyan/___/_sgrib gnyis bral nas skye ba gcig gis thogs/___/_mchod pa'i lha mos yid 'ong bkra shis brjod/___/_ gzhal yas khang mdzes sgo bzhi rta babs ldan/___/_shel dang gser dang mar gad in+d+ra nIl/_/_bkra shis gdugs dang 'khor lo rgyal mtshan mdzes/___/_de ltar rang bzhin phyogs bcu sprul pa'i zhing /___/_rang rang ston pas rang rang 'khor rgyud 'dul/___/_mdun gyi nam mkha' mi mjed brtsegs pa na/___/_'jigs pa'i khro gnas dur khrod me ri 'bar/___/_'jigs pa'i sgra dag khro gzugs a la la/___/_ 'di nyid mthong ba tsam gyis der grol 'gyur/___/_skal ldan stobs med snying po'i don 'dzin pa/___/_der ni dbugs phyung skye ba gcig pa ste/___/_lnga brgya dag na nges pa'i sar grol lo/___/_zhes rgya cher gsungs pa yin no/___/_de dag gis dbang po tha ma'i grol tshul te/_lam nyams su len pa'i tshul rnams legs par bstan zin to/___/_ don gsum pa tha ma 'bras bu'i grol tshul bstan pa la gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu/_mthar thug gi 'bras bu/_zhar la yongs su rdzogs pa mjug gi don dang gsum las/___/_dang po sa'i non tshul/_sangs rgyas tshul/_rtags byung tshul gsum las/_dang po rang shar las/_sa zhes bya ba gud na yod pa ma yin te/_ bden pa mthong ba'i gang zag gcig la sa rnams rdzogs nas yod do/___/_de yang ngo sprod bstan pa'i gang zag de dang po bden pa mthong ba'i dus na/_de yang dga' ba skyes pa de ni sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'o/___/_de'ang rang gi snang ba yin par shes pa de ni sa gnyis pa dri ma med pa yin no/___/_de nas de la goms pa de ni sa gsum pa 'od byed pa thob pa yin no/___/_de nas de la goms nas 'od kyi snang ba mthong ba de ni sa bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba'i sa non pa'o/___/_de'i ye shes kyi snang ba mthong ba de la goms nas nyon mongs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis sbyangs nas/_ye shes mthong ba de ni sa lnga pa sbyang dka' ba'i sa non pa'o/___/_de nas 'od las thal ba'i sku mthong ba de ni sa drug pa mngon du gyur pa'i sa non pa'o/___/_de nas goms pa mthar phyin nas nyon mongs pa ring du spangs pa'i tshe sa bdun pa ring du song ba'i sa non pa'o/___/_de nas de'i ngang la yon tan rdzogs pa ni sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba'i sa non pa'o/___/_de nas goms pa mthar phyin nas yon tan de dag las mi g.yo bar gnas pa ni sa dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros kyi sa non pa'o/___/_de nas ye shes kyi snang ba la shes pa zin nas snang ba lhug par shar ba ni chos kyi sprin lta bu mthong nas sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyi sa non pa'o/_/_de ni gang zag bden pa mthong bas dbugs 'di nyid ma bor ba la sa non pa'o/___/_ gang zag dbugs bor ba rnams la 'di ltar sa non pa yin no/___/_'khrul snang gags nas tshom bu'i snang ba ni bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa non pa'o/___/_de yang snang ba de la ma chags par phyi nang gi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa ni sa bcu gnyis ma chags pad+ma can gyi sa non pa'o/___/_thams cad kyi thugs ka nas ye shes kyi zer thag shar nas nam mkha'i mthongs nas 'od kyi tshom bu lnga'i 'khor lo'i tshul du gnas pa ni sa bcu gsum pa 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa non pa'o/___/_de nas ye shes kyi snang ba la gnas pa ni bcu bzhi pa bde ba chen po'i sa non pa'o/___/_de nas lhun grub kyi sa la nges pa rnyed pa ni bco lnga pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sa non pa'o/___/_de nas ka dag gi sa la ye shes lhug par shar nas de'i gong na sa gzhan med pa ni bcu drug pa ye shes bla ma'i sa non pa'o/___/_zhes pa dang /_ klong gsal las/_bden pa mthong ba'i gang zag gis/___/_dang po'i sa nas bcu drug pa'o/___/_rim pas nyams su blangs bas 'byung /___/_gzhan dang sgo bstun gnas skabs kyi/___/_yon tan 'bras bu thob tshul lo/___/_zhes gsungs so/___/_ gnyis pa thun mong pa dang bstun nas sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_/_phung po de nyid rdos bcas yin pas lhag ma dang bcas te bor ma thag tu sangs rgya ba yin no/___/_de'ang theg pa thun mong pa kun gzugs sku lhag bcas yin la/_chos sku lhag med du 'dod pas gzugs sku'i lhag ma bud shing zad pa'i me ltar chos sku'i ngang du lhag ma med par 'dod pa'i rten la mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod la/_'dir yang bar do'i grol tshad yod pa'i lus de spangs ma spang las lhag bcas lhag med ces brda btags pa'o/___/_ gsum pa skyes bu de 'das pa'i tshe bar dor grol ba'i rtags ni/_rtags kyi yi ge gsang ba chen po las/_'od kyi tshad ni 'od du snang ba yin/___/_thig le'i tshad ni gdung du snang ba yin/___/_rlung gi tshad ni phyi nas de bzhin sgra/_dbyings kyi tshad ni sa rnams g.yo ba yin/___/_sku yi tshad ni phyi nang de bzhin sku/___/_'di rnams kyang ni rig pa'i yon tan yin/___/_zhes pas/_'od gsal la brten pa thob pas/_ pur sbyong ba'am bskyal ba'i tshe 'od lnga ldan du snang ba'o/___/_sgron ma la brtan thob pas gdung 'byung ba'o/___/_gzhi'i srog rlung lnga la brtan pa thob pas sgra 'byung ba'o/___/_dbyings la tshad zin pas sa g.yo ba'o/___/_sku la gtan sa zin pas rus pa la sku 'byon pa'o/___/_/_de yang pur sbyong ba'i tshe pur khang gi dbus su 'jal 'khyil ba dang /_dud pa sngon po gyen la 'greng ba dang /_g.yas su 'khyil ba dang /_ me'i 'od dkar la gsal ba dang /_g.yo 'gul med cing me lce'i rigs 'khor lo dang /_rdo rje dang /_rin po che dang /_pad+ma dang /_ral gri dang /_rgya gram dang /_ ut+pal dang /_gri gug la sogs pa phyag mtshan gyi rnam par 'byung ba ni phyir mi ldog par grol ba ste/_btags grol snying po'i rgyud las/_de nyid 'das tshe gdung bzhu bas/___/_'ja' 'od zer dang me 'od dud pa'i rtags/___/_gdung rigs lnga 'am gcig 'byung nges/___/_/_rnal 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags/___/_zhes so/___/_de'ang gdung rigs lnga ni de nyid las/___/_rdo rje rin chen pad+ma'i gdung /___/_las dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung /___/_sha khrag rus pa yan lag dang /___/_'byung 'dus lnga la brten du 'byung /___/_sha rI ram dang chu rI ram/_ba rI ram dang nyi rI ram/_pany+tsa ram dang lnga ldan gdung*/___/_rigs lnga'i gdung ste sku yang 'byung /___/_de rnams sku thob rtags yin te/___/_zhes pas/_sha'i rten du gdung shA rI ram dkar ser rin po che'i gdung ste yang dag gi rten du bzhag pa'o/_khrag gi rten du chu rI ram mthing ga rdo rje'i gdung ste sra zhing mkhregs pas rdo rje'i gdung du bzhag pa'o/___/_ rus pa'i rten du ba rI ram ser po rin po che'i gdung du byon te/_rgyal tshab nyid kyi rten du bzhag pa'o/___/_yan lag gi rten du nya rI ram ljang gu las kyi gdung ste shin tu sra mkhregs las kyi gdung du bzhag pa'o/___/_'byung ba bzhi'i dwangs ma las pany+tsa ram 'byon te kha dog lnga ldan de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung du bzhag pa'o/___/_de dag ni sku thob pa'i rtags so/___/_gsung ni de nyid las/_gsung thob rtags su me 'od sgra/___/_zhes pas/_me 'od 'ja' tshon 'khyil ba lta bu dang /_gyen la 'greng ba dang sgra 'ur 'ur ba'o/___/_thugs ni de nyid las/_'ja' tshon nam mkha' dwangs gsal ba/___/_nges par thugs thob rtags yin no/___/_zhes pas/_snying gi nang na gdod ma'i mgon po'i 'od zer lnga ldan du 'od gsal ba'i lhun grub kyi rtags su 'ja' tshon lnga ldan dang /_ka dag gi rtags su nam mkha' dwangs shing gsal ba'o/___/_de yang sngar gyi gdung lnga po de dag gang las byung na/_de nyid las/_gdung rigs lnga ni 'di las 'byung /___/_mgo dang khrag dang sgal tshigs dang /___/_rkang dang snying las 'byung ba yin/___/_zhes pas/_gdung shA rI ram mgo las 'byung /___/_chu rI ram khrag las 'byung /___/_ba rI ram sgal tshigs las 'byung /___/_nyi rI ram rkang las 'byung /___/_pany+tsa ram snying las 'byung ngo /___/_'bras bu gang thob na de nyid las/___/_rtags la 'bras bu 'di bzhin 'byung /___/_sha rI chu rI ba rI yis/___/_skye med yon tan longs sku thob/___/_nya rI pany+tsa ram gyis ni/___/_sprul pa sku lnga nges par thob/___/_ces pas/_gdung sha rI ram gyis skye med thob/___/_chu rI ram gyis yon tan phel/___/_ba rI ram gyis longs sku thob/___/_nya rI ram gyis sprul sku thob/___/_pany+tsa ram gyis sku lnga thob pa'o/___/_de ltar na 'od dang /_sgra dang /_gdung dang /_sku dang /_sa g.yo ba la sogs pa rtags kun gyis mthong nas bar dor grol ba ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin la/_'od lus su yal ba ni de dag med pas mi mngon pa yin yang*/_lhag ma med pas ka dag gi gzhi la yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin no/___/_de'ang lhag bcas bar dor grol tshad la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zer la de bzhin du sprul pa'i zhing du grol ba yang 'dir bsdu zhing /_lhag med tshe 'dir grol ba la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zer te/_kun tu bzang po gzhi thog tu grol ba ni 'di nyid du 'dus pa yin no/___/_ gnyis pa shes byed kyi lung dgod pa ni/_snying gi me long las/_mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni/_'od dang /_sgra dang /_sku dang /_gdung dang /_sa g.yo ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo /___/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni phung po lhag ma med par sangs rgyas pa'o/___/_zhes so/___/_ gsum pa 'bras bu ni sku gsum 'du 'bral med pas 'gro ba'i don lhun grub tu byed pa ste/_de yang gong du grol kyang rung ste/_sngar gyi snang ba phyir gsal de rnams nang gsal gdod ma'i gzhi la thim nas gzhon nu bum pa'i sku'i gnas lugs la btsan sa zin dgos pa ni/_shel gyi phyir gsal gyi 'od lnga nang gsal du 'dus pa ltar/_thog ma ka dag gi grol gzhi ye shes/_lhun grub rin po che la sems kyi 'char gzhi thugs rje dang lus dang yul gyi 'char gzhi 'od lnga'i ngo bo gdod ma'i gzhi la nang thim du bzhugs pa'i tshe/_thim la ma rmugs pa bum nang gi mar me lta bu gsal la mi rtog pa nyi ma'i snying po lta bu/_rig la ma 'phros pa chos nyid la mnyam par bzhag pa lta bur ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum nang gsal du bzhugs te/_ngo bo stong pas spros pa'i mtha' las 'das/_ rang bzhin gsal bas longs sku'i 'char gzhi ma 'gags/_thugs rje kun khyab tu bzhugs pas gzhan don ngang gis 'byung ba ste/_chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum lhun grub chen por bzhugs so/___/_de'i tshe nyon mongs pa ma lus pa dang /_ 'byung ba'i lus kyi rdos bcas thams cad rang sar sangs shing ngo bo chos skur rgyas pas stong gsal spros pa dang bral/_rang bzhin longs skur rgyas pas sku dang ye shes kyi 'char gzhi byed/_thugs rje phrin las su rgyas pas 'gro don rgyun mi 'chad pa ste/___/_klong gsal las/_ngo bo stong gsal ye shes sku/___/_rang bzhin thugs rje phyogs ris med/___/_dbyer med chen por ye sangs rgyas/___/_zhes so/___/_ de'i tshe nang gsal gzhi gnas kyi ye shes las ngang ngam shugs kyis gzhan don gyi thugs rje 'byung ste/_sgron ma snang byed las/_chos sku'i ye shes gzhi gnas ste/_ shes pa'i cha ni gsal byed la/___/_'dzin pa rags pa'i rtog pa med/___/_ngang ngam shugs kyi thugs rje 'o/___/_gsal zhing shes pa rig dang bcas/___/_cha la 'dres pa med par gnas/___/_zhes so/___/_de ltar gdod ma'i gzhi nang gsal ka dag gi sangs rgyas la ye shes rags pa med la phra bar ma 'dres gsal rig tsam du bzhugs pa'o/___/_de'ang ye shes med na nam mkha' stong pa dang 'dra la chad par 'gyur te/_longs sku dang sprul sku'i 'char gzhi mi 'thad cing /_rags par yod na rtag pa ther zug tu 'gyur ba'i skyon yod de/_de nyid las/_de ltar ye shes cha med na/___/_phyi rol nam mkha' stong pa dang /_khyad par nyid ni yod pa min/___/_de phyir gzhi gnas ye shes khyab/___/_ye shes med na chad pa dang /_khyad par ci yang yod mi 'gyur/___/_rags pa'i ye shes yod gyur na/___/_'on te rtag pa nyid dang mnyam/___/_de phyir shes bya nyid du ni/___/_brtan nas yod pa ma yin te/___/_phra ba'i ye shes nyid du gnas/___/_zhes so/___/_de lta bu'i gnas lugs la zhi ba chos kyi sku/_ gdod ma'i grol sa/_ye thog gzhi'i gnas lugs zer te de'i nang gsal ye shes rin po che'i sku ni stong gsal mtshan ma med la/_longs sku'i 'char gzhi tsam du gsal bas nang gsal du rig pa 'od kyi khang bu can/_ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba la ngo bo nyid kyi sku rang snang du shar yang*/_phyir gsal gdul bya'i snang yul du mtshan ma ris can gyi sku zhal phyag dang bcas par ma grub pas/_chos sku stong gsal kun khyab chen por bzhugs so/___/_de'i gsung ni sgra tshig dang bral ba brjod med ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin no/___/_thugs ni rnam par mi rtogs pa'i chos nyid dran bsam dang bral ba'o/___/_yon tan ni btsan sa zin pas rang phyir mi ldog cing sku dang ye shes kyi rol pa 'gags pa med par bzhugs so/_/_phrin las ni nang gsal du mi 'dzad la phyir gsal gyi 'phro gzhi ma 'gags pas/_ 'gro ba'i don rgyun mi 'chad pa ste/_thal 'gyur las/___/_chos kyi sku yi sku dang gsung /___/_thugs dang yon tanaM phrin las so/___/_sku ni stong dang gsal ba dang /___/_ mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin no/___/_gsung gi sgra tshig ming bral nas/___/_brjod cing gleng gzhi nyid bral lo/___/_thugs ni bsam dang 'gyur med pas/___/_'phro zhing spyod pa rnams las 'das/___/_yon tan phyir mi 'ong dang ldog pa med/___/_dbyings dang ye shes khyad par dang /___/_rang bzhin bcos pa med pa 'o/___/_phrin las ma byung ma skyes byas pa med/___/_shugs 'byung ba dang 'gags pa med/___/_ma byas byed pa med pa 'o/___/_zhes so/___/_de ltar nang gsal gyi dus na sku dang ye shes dang thugs rje'i rol pa rgya mtshor chu bran 'dus pa ltar/_ye mdangs chen po'i ngang du 'dus pa ste/_lung ye shes mar me'i rgya cher 'grel pa mun sel sgron me las/_lhun grub rin po che'i sbubs nas chos kyi sku la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyan rang bzhin rnam dag gi snang ba la shar ba'i dus na rgya mtshor chu bran 'dus pa'am/_lan tshwa chu la thim pa lta bur gyur pas/_rig stong dbyer mi phyed pa'i dus na/_ye shes kyi spyan la sgrib pa med par phyogs med kyi ye shes chen po ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ste/_mi 'dra ba dang mi mthun pa med pas nyag gcig rang gsal 'dzin med du gnas so/___/_zhes gsungs so/___/_mdor na gdod ma'i gzhi ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum po de yin de/___/_thal 'gyur las/_grol sa thag ma gang yin pa'o/___/_zhes pas gong du rgya cher bstan zin pas spros pas chog go/_ gnyis pa de las longs spyod rdzogs sku'i 'char lugs ni/_nang gsal chos sku'i gdangs las 'gro ba 'dul byed du thugs rje g.yos pa las/_rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas chu'i zla ba lta bu mtshan dang dpe byad kyi 'khor lor rang byon te/_ sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor los 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du 'gro ba'i don rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid thal 'gyur las/[ (<]a[>]longs spyod sku la sku gsung thugs/___/_yon tan dang ni phrin las so/___/_sku ni snang la rang bzhin med[)]/_ gsal dang gsal byed rig pas khyab/___/_gsung ni rang byung rang snang dang /___/_spro bsdu snang ba'i 'khor lo 'o/___/_/_thugs ni rgyun chad med gzigs dang /___/_mkhyen pa'i rtsal dang dgongs pa 'o/___/_yon tan mtshan dpe rdzogs pa la/___/_dgongs gsal mngon shes rdzogs pa 'o/___/_phrin las chos kyi 'khor lo las/___/_phyi nang gsang ba rnam spros te/___/_so so'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas dang /___/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang /___/_rang byung ljags las rnam spros te/___/_'khor lo rang gi ngo bos ston/___/_ces so/___/_de'ang sku snang la rang bzhin med pa gsung rang byung gi yi ge drug ljags kyi dbang po las spros pas/_gang la gang 'dul gyi chos sangs rgyas dang sems can kun la khyab par sgrogs pa/_thugs rje ye shes lnga'i mtshan nyid rgyun chad med pas sems can la gzigs pa'o/___/_longs sku la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lnga thad kar rang gi 'khor la gzigs pa'o/___/_de'ang chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis gdod ma'i ngang las mi g.yo bar mdzad/_me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis nang du mkhyen pa ma 'gags par mdzad/_mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis gnyis su med pa'i chos la longs spyod/_so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis phyi nang gi shes bya ma 'dres par mkhyen/_bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis mdzad pa phrin las nam mkha'i mtha' klas par rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/___/_de'ang chos sku ltar nang gsal du med la/_sprul sku ltar phyir gsal rags pa'i yul spyod byed du med kyang*/_thad kar gsal stong gnyis su med pa'i ngang la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs rje rig pa'i char bzhugs so/___/_ye shes 'od kyi sbubs na snang byed chu zla'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba'i ston par gzhi thog nas 'phags pa rang byon pas longs sku zhes bya'o/___/_rgyas par ni sngar bstan pas mi spro'o/_/_ gsum pa de las sprul pa'i sku mngon par snang ba ni/___/_/_longs sku'i gdangs las rang bzhin sprul pa'i skus phyogs bcur las dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa la gnas pa rnams kyi don mdzad la/_de'i gdangs las 'gro ba 'dul ba sprul pa'i skus 'gro ba drug tu thub pa drug gi rnam par sprul te don mdzad pa ni/_'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgyar shAkya thub pa bye ba phrag brgyas sems can gyi don mdzad pa bzhin no/___/_de las ma dag pa'i sprul sku 'gyed pa ni/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_bzo sna tshogs dang /_ lam po che dang /_ljon shing dang /_'bab chu dang /_rdzing dang /_nya bo che dang /_nor bu dang /_pad+ma dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug dang /_brgya byin dang /_bram ze dang /_bu mo dang /_khye'u dang /_ ri dwags dang skyed mos tshal la sogs pa gang la gang mkho zhing gang gis 'dul ba de'i gzugs su sprul nas sems can gyi don rgya che la rgyun mi 'chad cing thabs la mkhas pa'i mdzad pa'o/___/_'o na sngar gyi longs sku dang /_rang bzhin sprul pa'i sku gnyis kas byang chub sems dpa'i sar gnas pa'i don byed pa 'dra'o snyam na/_mi 'dra ste/_sngar gyi longs skus rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par snang ba la chos ston pa ltar snang yang /_gdul bya dang 'dul byed ma yin te/_btags grol las/_nyid las mi gzhan sems dpa'i snod/___/_ces pas/_rang bzhin sprul sku'i sar gnas kyi byang chub sems dpa'i don byed pa'o/___/_de ltar sprul pa'i sku de'i sku ni gdul bya dang mthun par mtshan dpes brgyan pa'am mtshan ma med pa'o/___/_gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs drug cu la sogs pas rang rang gi snang ba dang mthun par chos ston pa'o/___/_ thugs ni phyi rol yul gyi rnam pa spyod pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes te/___/_chos nyid ji lta ba mkhyen nas don dam pa'i chos zab pa zhi ba gcig tu spros pa dang bral bar gsung zhing /_chos can sna tshogs pa ma 'dres par mkhyen nas kun rdzob kyi chos las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /_lam dang 'gro ba'i gnas la sogs pa spang blang du mas 'gro ba 'dul ba'o/___/_yon tan ni mkhyen rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/___/_phrin las ni mdzad pa du mas sems can thar par 'dren pa la lhun grub tu 'byung ba ste/_thal 'gyur las/_sprul pa'i sku yang sku gsung thugs/___/_yon tan phrin las rnam pa lnga/___/_sku ni mtshan dang dpe byad la/___/_gdul bya gang 'dul lus sprul te/___/_gsung ni tshigs sbyor legs pa la/___/_tshangs pa'i dbyang ni yan lag drug/_thugs ni shes bya'i ye shes gnyis/___/_ rang gzhan don gnyis rdzogs par gnas/___/_/_yon tan mkhyen pa rdzogs pa dang /___/_phrin las phyi nang gsang ba yi/___/_mdzad pa ma lus rdzogs pa 'o/___/_phun sum tshogs pa lngar gnas so/___/_zhes so/___/_de'ang gdul bya yod na thams cad du de dang mthun par skad cig la snang la/_med na sprul sku longs skur thim/_longs sku gdod ma'i gzhi chos sku'i ngang du thim nas nang gsal nyid du lhun gyis grub bo/___/_yang gdul bya snang na skad cig la sku gsum mam dgu/_gcig las gcig mched de sems can gyi don rgyun mi 'chad par gdod ma'i kun tu bzang po bzhin mdzad do/___/_mdor na lus ngag yid gsum gyi 'dzin chags rdos pa dang bcas pa sangs nas yon tan phrin las su rgyas te/_sku lnga'i 'dzin pa stongs nas/_thog ma'i gzhi ka dag chen por rang grol te/_rang shar las/_mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i 'khor ba sangs/___/_ye shes sku nyid don la rgyas/___/_sangs rgyas zhes kyang de la bya/___/_zhes so/___/_de ltar sangs rgyas pa'i sku lnga ni/_chos sku spros pa dang bral ba/___/_longs sku mtshan dper gsal ba/___/_sprul sku sna tshogs su snang ba/___/_mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku ni de dag gi chos nyid/___/_ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni dag pa gnyis ldan te/___/_rang bzhin gdod ma nas dri ma med cing glo bur gyi dri ma rang ngo shes pas dag pa'o/___/_mngon par byang chub pa'i sku ni/_dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje'i phrin las 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du mdzad pa'o/___/_de ltar sku lnga'i rang bzhin gdod ma'i gzhi la mthar phyin pa ni rdzogs pa chen po rang bzhin lhun grub kyi 'bras bu gdod ma ka dag gi sa la/_gzhi ji bzhin par sangs rgyas byang chub phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o/___/_ gsum pa yongs su rdzogs pa mjug gi don la/_zab gter gyi phan yon bstan/_gter 'byung gi lo rgyus bshad/_smon lam gyi mjug bsdu ba gsum las/_dang po phan yon bshad/_chos kyi che ba brjod/_lta ba'i tshul bshad pa dang gsum las/_dang po mthong grol khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon/_dge sdig phan gnod dang bral ba'i phan yon/_'di las gzhan gyis mi grol ba'i phan yon/_'brel tshad don dang ldan pa'i phan yon/_mkha' 'gros bu bzhin skyong ba'i phan yon dang lnga las/___/_dang po klong gsal las/_rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud/___/_ mthong ba tsam gyis shes pa dang /___/_shes pa tsam gyis grol bar 'gyur/___/_mngon sum gnad 'di sus mthong ba/_khams gsum ldog pa ma yin no/___/_zhes so/___/_ gnyis pa btags grol las/_rgyud 'di ma rtogs dge ba bcu/___/_spyad kyang 'khor ba las mi grol/___/_de sngar mtshams med lnga spyad kyang /___/_'di 'phrad ngan song ltung mi srid/___/_'di rig g.yo med skyes bu de/___/_bsgom mi dgos te mthong grol 'gyur/___/_zhes pa dang /_don gsal me long las/___/_mngon sum gnad 'di sus mthong ba/___/_chos nyid bar dor 'tshang rgya'o/___/_ci'i phyir 'di ni ye shes dngos/___/_mthong bas shes grol dus mnyam 'gyur/___/_ci'i phyir theg pa gzhan dag gis/___/_lo stong bsgoms kyang 'di mi mthong /___/_'dis ni skad cig nyid la mthong /___/_/_lo stong sdig pa spyad pas kyang /___/_'di nyid lo drug nyams blangs na/___/_lhag ma med par 'tshang rgya'o/___/_ci'i phyir ngo bo cir mthong yin/___/_ rig pa'i ye shes ngo bo la/___/_sdig pa'i skyon gyis gos pa med/___/_dge ba byas kyang phan ma btags/___/_rig pa dge sdig don las 'das/___/_zhes so/___/_ gsum pa btags grol las/___/_pha rol phyin bcu snying po'i rgyud/___/_yang dag rgyud 'di ma rtogs na/___/_dus gsum kun tu sangs mi rgya/___/_dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /___/_'di la btags grol sangs rgyas te/___/_sku lnga 'gro don lhun gyis grub/___/_rang rig rnam dag sa gcig la/___/_theg pa kun 'dus sa lam rdzogs/___/_zhes pa dang /_don gsal las/_e ma skal ldan rigs kyi bu/___/_gnad 'di ma rtogs dge ba bcu/___/_spyad kyang 'khor ba las mi grol/___/_ sngar dus mtshams med lnga byas kyang /___/_'di 'phrad ngan song ltung mi srid/___/_'di dang btags grol gnyis sbrel na/___/_lo drug phung po lhag med 'gro/___/_'di med gang zag ba /_ gzhan spyod pa/___/_/_bskal par nyan bsam bsgoms bsgrubs kyang /___/_ bskal par sangs rgyas re ba med/___/_ci'i phyir mngon sum gnad ma rtogs/___/_ theg gsum rim dgu'i chos rnams kyis/___/_'di nyid don la reg pa med/___/_'di ni kun las khyad par 'phags/___/_zhes so/___/_ bzhi pa de nyid las/_'di dang tshig gis 'brel ba yang /___/_skye ba gsum du mi thogs grol/___/_sgra tsam rna bar thos pa yang /___/_tha mal skye ba 'dis chod 'gyur/___/_mngon sum gnad 'di sus mthong ba/___/_chos nyid bar dor 'tshang rgya'o/___/_zhes pa dang /_snod spel ba'i dus btag pa las/_yang gsang snying thig 'di la sus spyod pa/___/_sngon dus las can skye mtha' min re kan/___/_mngal du mi 'jug tshe gcig sangs rgyas yin/___/_'di nyid bris sam bcangs pas sangs rgyas 'thob/___/_lan cig bka' shog mthong ba thams cad kyang /___/_o rgyan smon lam mthu yis ngan song khegs/___/_dbang thob tsam gyis pad+ma can du skye/___/_nyams su len pas 'bras thob smos ci dgos/___/_'di la spyod tshad o rgyan nga yi sras/___/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang sems yin/___/_zhes so/___/_lnga pa me long las/_ gzhi la shes rab lhun gyis grub/___/_thabs kyis mngon sum skad cig la/___/_ mthong ste grol 'gyur the tshom med/___/_de phyir mkha' 'gro dngos kyi ston/___/_'di la spyod pa'i skyes bu ni/___/_kun bzang yum dang dbye ru med/___/_DA ki lus dang grib mar 'grogs/___/_zhes pas/_'di nyid ston pa'i bla ma de yang /_mkha' 'gro dngos yin pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya zhing mkha' 'gro'i zab chos mkha' 'gro ma yin pas 'chad cing spel bar mi nus pas/_de nyan pa'i snod kyang phal cher mkha' 'gro 'du ba yin te/_grogs la'ang dag snang dang mos gus bskyed pa la 'bad par bya'o/___/_dogs par ma byed cig/_'di ltar bdag kyang sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i mtshan ltas thun mong ma yin pa 'ga' dang ldan pas mkha' 'gro 'du zhing zab gter la dbang ba yin no/___/_ gnyis pa chos kyi che ba brjod pa ni/_dus brtag pa las/_e ma gsang sngags mthar thug snying po'i chos/___/_theg pa rim dgu'i nyams len don rdzogs 'di/___/_kun las khyad 'phags e ma ngo mtshar che/___/_bod yul kun tu gter phran bye ba sbas/___/_gter chen brgya dang nyer brgyad sar sbas kyang /___/_gdams pa'i mthar thug 'di min sbas re kan/___/_zhes pa dang /_me long las/_e ma ho/___/_'di 'dra'i gdams pa rgya bod gnyis na med/___/_kun la ma bstan rang nyid nyams su longs/___/_tshig tsam rlung gi phyogs su zag pa na/___/_tshe yi bar chad byed par the tshom med/___/_'di rang nyid kyis nyams su len pa dang /___/_DA ki nyid la gtad de gter du sbos/___/_las can cig gi don du smon lam thob/___/_ces so/___/_ gsum pa lta ba'i tshul bshad pa ni/_de nyid las/_gang gis 'di nyid lta ba'i dus su yang /___/_tshogs dang gtor ma rgya cher byas la blta/___/_'di yi rlung gi phyogs kyi sems can yang /___/_DA ki rnams kyis byin rlabs bde ba thob/___/_'di la reg pa o rgyan nga dang mnyam/___/_zhes so/___/_ gnyis pa gter 'byung gi lo rgyus bshad pa ni/_rgyal pos slob dpon bod du gdan drangs nas/_dpal bsam yas mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang bzhengs te dga' ston mdzad pa'i dus su/_mchims phur tshogs kyi 'khor lo brgya rtsa brgyad btang ba dang /_rgyal po'i sras mo pad+ma gsal dus las 'das pa la rgyal pos mya ngan mdzad pa la/_slob dpon yab yum gyis thugs gsos te/___/_bu mo'i rnam shes bkug nas dbang bskur te/___/_zab gter gyi sgrom bu spyi bor bzhag nas/_ma 'ongs pa na rang gzhan la phan pa'i smon lam btab nas gter du sbas pa'o/___/_'di la ston pa dang bstan pa phun sum tshogs pas spyir bstan/_bsdu ba po dang gnas phun sum tshogs pa bye brag tu bshad/_ dus dang skal ldan phun sum tshogs pa rgya cher bsngags pa gsum las/_dang po nub phyogs o rgyan gyi yul rang byung pad+ma'i sdong po la rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i slob dpon chen po phad+ma 'byung gnas te/_gzho stod te sgro'i tshogs khang chen mor mkha' 'gro snying thig gi gdams pa gsungs la/_sngon 'byung gi g.ya' ri gong gi brag phug tu grub pa brnyes pa ste/_don gsal las/_o rgyan pad+ma bdag gis su/___/_g.ya' ri gong gi brag phug tu/___/_'di nyid bsgoms pas zag bcas phung po yal/___/_zag med sgyu ma'i phung po la/___/_snang la ma grub skye 'chi bral/___/_'di nyid gang zag spros med kyi/___/_blo can mya ngan 'da' don du/___/_g.ya' ri gong du yi ger btab/___/_rgyud dang gdams pa kun khyer te/___/_/_'gro ba'i don du bod la mchis/___/_zhes so/___/_'di'i dus su snying thig gi gdams pa 'di dus la ma babs pas gter du sped par dgongs pa ni/_de nyid las/_mnga' bdag rgyal po la sogs pa/___/_skal ldan las 'brel mang lags kyang /___/_'di nyid bstan pa'i dus ma babs/___/_bi ma mi tra 'byon dgongs nas/___/_tshig tsam rlung phyogs tsam du yang /___/_'di nyid tshig tsam bshad pa med/___/_phyi rabs skal ldan don byed du/___/_dngas lung ldang lha'i brag la sbed/___/_ces so/___/_ gnyis pa mkhar chen 'tsho rgyal gyis bsdu ba po byas te/_dngas lung khra mo brag la gter du slas pa ni/_de nyid las/_mtsho rgyal khyod la gtad pa ni/_ku su lu yi gdams pa'i skor/___/_dngas lung ljang lta'i brag la sbos/___/_da lta bstan pa'i dus ma babs/___/_zhes so/___/_mkhas pa paN+Di ta'i gdams pa spros pa gal che ba bum thang na yod par/_de nyid las/_bco brgyad rgyud dang gdams par bcas/___/_ma 'ongs skal ldan don du ni/___/_bum thang seng ge'i brag la sbos/___/_ snyigs mar 'gro don rgya cher 'byung /___/_zhes so/___/_ gsum pa yang de nyid las/_tshe lo lnga bcu kha ral dus/___/_/_gsal rje gangs kyi shar phyogs ngos/___/_lcags sgrom lta bu'i yul gyi stod/___/_'brong po nyal 'dra'i spyi stengs su/___/_mkha' 'gro sde lngas byin rlabs pa'i/___/_chu khams 'brug gam sprel yos lo/___/_spre ring theg chen chos la mos/___/_sbas tshul 'khor ba'i cha 'dzin cing /___/_ma 'gags spyod pa sna tshogs skyong /___/_da lta'i lha lcam pad+ma gsal/___/_snyigs ma'i dus su de ltar skye/___/_de dus gdams pa 'di dang 'phrad/___/_ zab mo'i gter dang 'phrad pa'i rtags/___/_snying thig thabs kyi cha yin phyir/___/_de yi dngos su mthong ba'i rtags/___/_brla g.yas pa yi nang logs na/___/_sha sme mkha' 'gro'i spyan 'dra yod/___/_de ltar mtshan rtags rdzogs pa yis/___/_las ldan skye bu de dang 'phrad/___/_de dus 'gro don mi 'byung ste/___/_phyi ma 'gro don brgya log spyod/___/_dri med 'od zer zhes byar grags/___/_gter gyi sgo 'byed bstan pa skyong /___/_lho yi phyogs su nges par 'byung*/___/_ldang lhas bka' yi bya ra gyis/___/_rtags dang ldan pa de la gtod/___/_ces pa dang /_snod dang dus brtag pa las/_nga yi thugs sras shes rab blo dang ldan/___/_DA ki'i spyan mtshan don gyi snying rje can/___/_pad+ma las 'brel rtsal dang 'di 'phrad shog/_de la dad mos 'dud tshad las can yin/___/_ rtag tu 'grogs pa rnams la smos ci dgos/___/_'di la 'brel tshad bde ba can du skye/___/_gang zhig skye ba dman pa'i bud med kyang /___/_'di 'phrad mi lus de yis ngan song khegs/___/_rtag tu 'grogs rnams bde chen mkha' spyod yin/___/_gang zhig sdig spyod smod cing skur 'debs rnams/___/_'di dang dus mtshungs 'khor ba mtha' yod yin/___/_ci'i phyir de yi thugs rjes nges par skyob/___/_ces pa dang /_DA ki'i zhal gdams las/_bdag 'dra o rgyan thugs kyi sras/___/_ma 'gags spyod pa sna tshogs spyod/___/_/_lus la sha sme spyan 'dras mtshan/___/_sgeg par ches la spyod pa rtsing /___/_sbas pa'i rnal 'byor dang 'phrad shog/_de la 'dud byed DA ki'i sras/___/_ rmis ltas tshang ba bzhi 'byung bas/_de la gnad kyi gdams pa gtad/___/_gzhan la tshig gcig brjod na 'phung /___/_sbas pa'i rnal 'byor DA ki'i bu/___/_sha sme spyan 'dras mtshan pa de'i/___/_lus dang grib bzhin DA kis skyob/___/_phrin las dus la ma babs pas/___/_de la 'dud byed shin tu nyung /___/_'di la mos tshad DA ki'i bu/___/_ sprul pa yin par ngas lung bstan/___/_'di la mos byed skyes pa rnams/___/_dpa' bo sde lnga'i sprul pa yin/___/_'di la zab chos lus kyi 'brel/___/_phyi ma de yi gdul byar skyes/___/_skyes pa pho mo gang yang rung /___/_'di dang lhan cig 'grogs pas kyang /___/_ yon tan sna re phyi mar 'thob/___/_pho mo gang yang rung bas su/___/_'di dang rtag tu 'grogs pa des/___/_/_'di nyid 'das pa'i tshul bstan tshe/___/_skyes bu de yi spyi bo nas/___/_g.yu yi bud med rgyan drug can/___/_'ja' tshon lta bu mkhyid gang ba/___/_phyag na me tog dmar po bsnams/___/_phaT kyi sgra 'byin nam mkha' la/___/_bun kyis gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur/___/_de yi snying la las kyi gdung /___/_sngon po sran ma tsam gcig 'byung /___/_las can cig la snang srid dam/___/_gal te DA ki'i gdan 'dren 'gyur/___/_gdung rus gcig la yi ge hrIH'byung 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/___/_'ja' 'od ring bsrel 'byung yang srid/___/_phal cher rtags med sbas tshul 'da'/___/_dgung lo lnga bcu rtsa dgu la/___/_DA ki rnams kyis gdan 'dren 'gyur/___/_de ni dri med 'od zer zhes/___/_ma 'ongs dus na lho ru 'byung*/___/_las can de dang kun 'phrad shog/_ces so/___/_ gsum pa smon lam gyis mjug bsdu ba ni/_klong gsal las/_yid bzhin nor bu'i gsang rgyud 'di/___/_las can rnams dang ma 'ongs 'phrad/___/_ces pa dang /_don khrid las/_e ma ho/_yang gsang snying thig mngon sum man ngag 'di/___/_gang gis reg pa myang 'das dngos la sbyor/___/_theg brgyad a ti thig le skor gsum gyis/___/_/_'di nyid don la reg pa ma yin no/___/_mig stong shes rab grub mtha' mang po dang /___/_rgyud lung man ngag mang yang 'di mi mthong /___/_gzhan dang mi 'dra yang zab mngon sum gnad/___/_'di dngos bstan cing bshad pa ci ma tshang /___/_tshig tsam rlung gi phyogs su brjod pa min/___/_shes rab blo ldan snying rje can dang 'phrad par shog/___/_'di la reg tshad lhag med 'grub par shog/_ces so/___/_de ltar zab cing rgya che'i gang chen mtsho/___/_/_mkha' 'gro snying tig bka' gsang rgya che las/___/_phyi rabs skal ldan rnams kyi don ched du/___/_zab don rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi snying po 'di/___/_gangs ri thod dkar rin chen snying po'i mgul/___/_dri med 'phags pa'i bzhugs gnas o rgyan rdzong /___/_shin tu dben zhing nyams dga' rig 'dzin gnas/___/_lha dang drang srong mang pos brten pa der/___/_dri med 'od zer bdag gis 'di byas pa'i/___/_dge ba ston ka'i zla ltar dkar ba des/___/_'gro kun yid mkha'i mun pa kun bsal nas/___/_lhun grub sa la kun tu bzang por shog/___/_nyi ma zla ba lhun po rgya mtshor bcas/___/_sa chen gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gnas kyi bar/___/_chos tshul 'di yang 'gro ba'i don byed cing /___/_bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan yun du gnas par shog/_lha dang lha min grub pa rig sngags 'chang /___/_dpag med mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams kyis/___/_ sngon bzhin zab mo'i dgongs gter yongs gzung ste/___/_skal ldan rnams la rgyun du snang bar shog/_rgyu 'bras gtsor len blo chung log lta can/___/_bla mar mi gus chos dang nyams len 'chal/___/_skal med rnams kyis dpe tsam mi mthong zhing /___/_ rlung phyogs tsam du tshig tsam mi thos shog/_dad dang snying rje gtong phod yangs pa che/___/_mi gus med cing bla ma ci mnyes byed/___/_phyi ma don gnyer tshe 'di bor ba'i mi/___/_skal ldan snying gi bu dang 'phrad par shog/_kye ho grogs dag snying po'i don mthong nas/___/_rin chen lus 'dis srid mtshor sgrol bzhin du/___/_'jig rten chos la sbyong bar mi khom gyis/___/_nyin mtshan brtson pas chos la spyod par shog/_'gro drug nang nas mi lus rnyed par dkon/___/_de bas chos dang 'phrad de spyod par dkon/___/_de dag kun las snying po 'di 'phrad dkon/___/_dben pa'i gnas su bsam gtan bsgom par shog/_'jig par sla zhing snying po med pa'i lus/___/_lbu ba rdos 'dra myur du mi rtag gis/___/_grogs dag tshe 'di'i bya ba kun spangs la/___/_ chog shes ldan pas nags su bsgom par shog_/_bsags kyang 'jog la 'dus kyang 'bral ba'i chos/___/_nor dang mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun la sogs pa'i/___/_ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin sdug bsngal 'di la gzigs/___/_zhi ba'i nags su bsam gtan bsgom par shog/___/_ji ltar snang ba thams cad gzugs brnyan tsam/___/_ bden pas stongs te brag cha'i sgra dbyangs 'dra/___/_sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur shes byas nas/___/_zab mo'i don la nags su bsgom par shog/_skyes bu'i tshe 'gro ri gza' 'babs chu 'dra/___/_'chi bdag mi sdod nub ri'i grib ma bzhin/___/_skyes pa 'chi zhing 'dus pa 'bras ba'i chos/___/_de ring nyid nas bsams te bsgom par shog/_ da res mi yi srid pa thob dus 'dir/___/_thar pa'i gling du lam sna ma zin na/___/_phyi nas gar 'gro bdag gis ji ltar shes/___/_bde chen lam la btsan sa zin par shog/_de skad phan par smra ba'i ngag 'di ni/___/_snying nas yin gyis 'gro kun brtson par mdzod/___/_rin chen gling nas stong log ma byed par/___/_don zab snying po'i yid bzhin thob par shog/_bdag kyang snyom las le lo'i rang bzhin dang /___/_rang don bslu ba'i gzhan don ltar snang gis/___/_tshe 'dir grol ba'i 'od lus ma 'grub kyang /___/_bar do'i lus la brtan pa thob par shog/_deng nas snga phyi'i skye ba thams cad du/___/_rang byung pad+ma'i mgon dang bcas pa yis/___/_'khor bar mi ldog mya ngan 'da' bar nges/___/_gcig tu 'gro la phan par 'grub par shog/_zab mo'i don mthong ske 'chi'i 'jig bral zhing /___/_bar do'i grol tshad mkha' 'gro'i byin rlabs kyis/___/_bdag gi deng dus rang don bsgrabs zin gyis/___/_da ni ci nas gzhan don byed par shog/_sngon rabs skye ba du mar sbyangs pa'i mthus/___/_zab mo'i don la blo mig rgyas gyur cing /___/_phyi nang grub mtha'i tshul rnams legs par mthong /___/_tshig don ma nor ji snyed ji bzhin bshad/___/_skal ldan bung ba dga' bskyed skyed mos tshal/___/_zab don sbrang rtsi'i snying pos gang ba 'di/___/_legs sbyar me tog 'bras bu 'di smin pas/___/_tshe gcig sangs rgyas 'dod rnams tshul 'di bstan/___/_bdag gi tshe 'dir phan pa rgya chung bas/___/_ring por mi thogs sgyu ma'i lus 'di 'dor/___/_bar do'i yul la zhing snang rgya che bas/___/_ lhun grub sa la btsan sa zin par shog/___/_yang cig sprul pa'i 'od zer rab bkyes nas/___/_thar ba'i gling du 'gro ba 'dren byed cing*/___/_zab mo'i chos gter dpag med snang ba yis/___/_/_'gro ba'i don gnyis lhun gyis grub par shog/_ dpag med dus nas phan pa'i blo mnga' ba/___/_rgyal sras spyod pa dam pa'i rjes zhugs te/___/_mdzad pa 'phrin las nam mkha'i mtha' khyab pas/___/_'gro ba'i don gnyis lhun gyis grub par shog/_mkha' 'gro snying thig gi man ngag zab don rgya mtsho'i sprin zhes bya ba/_o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma yab yum gyis/_byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer zhes bya bas/_gangs ri thod dkar gyi ngos o rgyan rdzong gi gnas mchog dam par ston ka'i zla ba dang po'i me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe/_skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma 'od zer go chas gsol ba btab pa'i ngor/_rgyud lung man ngag du ma'i snying po phyogs gcig tu bsdus nas bkod pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/___/_/___/_dge zhing bkra shis/___/_ bka' drin rjes dran/_ skabs 'dir yang ring mo nas rnam dkar gyi bya ba la ches goms pa'i dad ldan/_sgang mkhar a gnam tshang khyim mi rnam pa'i bdag rkyen la brten nas/_ kun mkhyen chen po'i gsung rab ji rnyed kun phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs te/_ngo mtshar par gyi phyi mor bskrun pa'i legs byas la rjes su yi rang drags pos thugs rje che zhu ba dang chabs cig/_'di las thob pa'i dge ba'i mthus sbyin bdag 'khor bcas gnas skabs nyer 'tshe zhi zhing mthar thug rnam byang bla med 'thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig/_ dge bsngo dang smon lam/_ bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/___/_ thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/___/_ skye rga na 'chi'i rba rlabs 'khrugs pa yi/___/_ srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba sgrol bar shog/_ ces dge bsngo'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa 'di/_ston pa'i skyes rabs las btus so/_/_ dpe skrun pa/_rgyal mo 'brug pa/_ dpe sgrig 'gan 'khur pa/_tshangs po/_ mdun shog mdzes 'god pa/_'gro 'dul rdo rje/_ mes po'i shul bzhag las/_ deb brgya dang bcu gnyis pa/_ @#/___/_kun mkhyen klong chen rab 'byams kyi gsung 'bum bzhugs so/___/_ [(]7[/]26[)] dpal brtsegs bod yig dpe rnying zhib 'jug khang gis bsgrigs/_ krung go'i bod rig pa dpe skrun khang gis bskrun te bkram/_ pe cin kong dbyi par 'debs tshad yod kung sis dpar btab/_ spyi lo 2009lo'i zla 12par par gzhi dang po bsgrigs/_ spyi lo 2009lo'i zla 12par par thengs dang po btab/_ dpar grangs/_0001[—]1500 [ISBN978—7—80253—210—6/B75] gsung 'bum cha tshang [(]deb 126yod [)]la rin sgor/_66000 mes po'i shul bzhag_113 @#/_/kun mkhyen klong chen rab 'byams kyi gsung 'bum bzhugs so/_/ [(]8[/]26[)] dpal brtsegs bod yig dpe rnying zhib 'jug khang nas bsgrigs/ krung go'i bod rig pa dpe skrun khang*/

[8.1 gsang spyod rdo rje lam bstan]

@#/_/gsang spyod rdo rje lam bstan bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog skya'i skor/ gsang spyod rdo rje lam bstan zhes bya ba/_dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rang bzhin byas pa med pa'i ngang nyid las/_/skye med lhun rdzogs snying po'i gdangs shar ba/_/mtha' grol klong yangs rang bzhin rdzogs pa che/_/ rang shar rang sar grol la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig zab mo'i gnad bsdus nas/_/don zab 'gag 'dril nyams su blang bde ba/_/gang dang mi 'dra kun gyis ma rtogs pa/_/ji ltar bdag gis rtogs bzhin bshad kyis nyon/_/_/bde chen gnas 'di stong gsal 'dus ma byas/_/snying dbus gzhon nu bum pa'i skur gsal ba/_/ye shes nyid de nang gsal lhun gyis grub/_/'od lnga'i gdangs las snod bcud snang srid chags/_/snang bas stong ste chu zla'i gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/lhun grub goms pas nam zhig 'od lngar grol/_/de yang rang gnas ka dag rang grol nas/_/mtha' bzhi las 'das sprin med nam mkha' 'dra/_/_/e ma_'o bzhin dang me long gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/bdag gzhan gnyis snang rang gis btags par zad/_/rang bzhin gnyis med gdod nas stong pa'i ngang /_/dgra gnyen dgag sgrub gang yang ma mthong ngo*/_/mi mkhas byis pa dag gis gnyis bzung ste/_/lha dang 'dre zhes goms pas de ltar snang /_/'dod 'jigs mya ngan goms pas der snang bzhin/_/med snang 'khrul pas 'gro ba 'di bslus so/_/gang la phyi rol cir snang rang gi sems/_/snang la gnyis med 'od gsal gdod ma'i ngang*/_/phyi rol ma yin nang gi gzugs brnyan tsam/_/thams cad sku lnga ye shes dag pa'i gdangs/_/lha dang 'drer snang bde chen mkha' 'gro'i zhing /_/rang snang nyid de dngos grub 'byung ba'i gzhi/_/dgag sgrub phan gnod sems kyi rtsal sbyong yin/_/de la dga' bas mchod sbyin brtsam par rigs/_/kye ho bde sdug rkyen rnams rmi lam 'dra/_/rang snang gnyis 'dzin gzugs brnyan shaRa ba la/_/rang ngo ma shes da dung 'khor bar snang*/_/ye stong rtsa bral gdod ma'i ngang 'di la/_/snang stong gnyis med kun brtags cho 'phrul tsam/_/snod bcud snang srid lha dang lha mo'i zhing*/_/gang snang gzugs rnams 'od gsal lha yi sku/_/sgra rnams grags stong sngags kyi dkyil 'khor te/_/rtog pa'i 'phro 'du ye shes rol pa che/_/snang grags snod bcud gnyis med chos sku'i ngang /_/stong la dngos snang rang bzhin gzugs kyi sku/_/gdod nas stong ngo rtsa bral gnyug ma'i ngang /_/ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje'i rol pa ni/_/skye med lhun rdzogs rang bzhin rdzogs pa che/_/ye grol gdod nas dag pa'i chos nyid la/_/blang dang dor med dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med/_/ye stong babs stong rang bzhin gdod nas stong /_/'di zhes mi mtshon tshig gis shes mi nus/_/rten med gzhi grol yongs rdzogs ka dag dang*/_/gang snang gsal stong rang bzhin chu zla 'dra/_/sna tshogs mi gnyis rnam kun stong pa'i gzugs/_/ kun bzang gzhi yi dgongs klong yangs pa ni/_/mi 'gyur lta ba'i khyung chen rtogs pa yin/_/mdor na snang grags snang srid chos rnams kun/_/ngo bo stong la rang bzhin gzugs brnyan tsam/_/thugs rje ma 'gags cir yang shar ba la/_/'di zhes mi 'dzin mtha' grol klong yangs so/_/ji ltar snang ba de ltar stong pa ste/_/chu dang chu zla gnyis su mi phyed bzhin/_/gnyis med don zhes brda tsam btags pa tsam/_/snang rung stong rung rtag rung mi rtag rung /_/gang shar btags pa de ltar shar ba tsam/_/shar nub rnyog bral stong gsal phyam phyam mo/_/'di ltar rtogs nas gnyis 'dzin rang grol te/_/'dzin med phyam gdal ye grol sor gzhag go_/ngang nyid ma skyes kun tu bzang po'i zhing /_/ rtogs pa'i lta ba yangs na mngon du 'gyur/_/pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis bstan nas song /_/gsang spyod rdo rje lam bstan las/_/lta ba rdo rje'i le'u ste dang po'o//_// de nas sgom pa 'od gsal chen po ni/_/lta ba'i don la goms par byed pa ste/_/nyin dus 'od gsal nam mkha'i mthongs su blta/_/sems kyis mi bsam sgom pa bsgom pa min/_/rang bzhin gnyis med chu zla gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/'di zhes mi mtshon gzung 'dzin kun las 'das/_/gdod ma'i ka dag lhun grub mngon du 'gyur/_/des ni 'khrul snang longs skur 'char ba yin/_/mtshan dus bde ba'i mal du bag phab ste/_/rang babs lhod chags gnyid du log pa'i tshe/_/nyin snang 'gags pas tshe 'di 'dor ba dang*/_/ gnyid du 'gro bas 'byung bzhi thim tshul dang /_/ma rig gnyid kyis gzhi yi 'od gsal dang /_/rmi lam sna tshogs bar do'i 'char tshul dang /_/gnyid sad snang bas rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing /_/bgrod nas gang snang rang bzhin dag pa'i zhing /_/sems can lha dang lha mor dran par bya/_/tha mal dran bsam rang rgyud 'dzin pa dor/_/gnyid dang rmi lam gnyid sad snang ba gsum/_/chos sku longs sku sprul skur rtogs byas la/_/zhi gnas lhag mthong zung 'brel rnam gsum gyis/_/bde gsal mi rtog blo 'das chen por nyal/_/de yis gnyid dang rmi lam rgyun chad de/_/gdod ma'i ka dag 'od gsal ngang du gnas/_/ 'di ltar gnyid la nyal lugs rnam pa gsum/_/bde ba'i mal du 'dzin med phyam gdal ba/_/'od gsal chos sku'i ngang du nyal ba yis/_/rmi lam rgyun chad 'khrul pa gzhi thog thim/_/stong pa'i rang bzhin spros dang bral ba yin/_/ de bzhin nang 'od bum pa'i sbubs nyid du/_/ye shes 'od lnga 'dzin med nyal ba yis/_/rmi lam 'od gsal longs sku'i ngang du thim/_/sku dang thig le 'od lnga'i snang ba 'char/_/dag pa'i zhing snang rigs lnga'i snang bar mthong /_/snang ba'i rang bzhin spros dang bral ba yin/_/de bzhin rang lus sprul pa'i 'jig rten na/_/ston pa'i zhabs drung yid kyis rab dmigs te/_/rigs lnga'i sa bon nyid la sems bsdus nyal/_/rmi lam bar snang sprul pa'i skur thim nas/_/mngon dga' la sogs zhing snang sna tshogs 'char/_/phyi dus dag pa'i zhing der grol bar nges/_/sna tshogs gnyis med dag pa'i sprul sku yin/_/ gnyid dang rmi lam sad dus rnam pa gsum/_/gdod nas sku gsum nyid du gnas pa'i tshul/_/ji bzhin gzugs brnyan gnyis pa'i rnam pa la/_/lam du goms pas 'bras bu sku gsum grol/_/de yang goms pa'i gnad ni 'di bzhin sbyang /_/gnyid sad dus na yul rnams sprul sku'i zhing /_/mngon dga' la sogs gsal btab ldang bar bya/_/dus gsum dus rnams kun tu sku gsum zhing /_/'od gsal sku gsum rdzogs pa'i nyams len bya/_/yul sems gnyis med rang snang shes par bya/_/bzhin dang me long lta bu'i lam khyer gyis/_/nyon mongs chags sdang rang snang rang grol zhing*/_/rang shar ye grol nam mkha'i mdud pa ltar/_/rang gi blo yis byas shing bshig pa ltar/_/ gang snang rkyen rnams de ltar shes pas sbyang /_/'di ltar spyod lam dus rnams thams cad du/_/rang snang 'og min rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas zhing /_/phyi nang gsang gsum sgrub pa'i lam khyer bya/_/de yis lhun grub kun tu bzang po'i zhing /_/brtson 'grus rab kyis tshe 'dir 'grub pa ste/_/'bring rnams bar dor 'od gsal gnyis med 'dres/_/tha mas rang bzhin sprul skur grol ba ni/_/goms pa'i gnad 'dis myur du 'grub pa yin/_/mdor na gnyid dus bar do'i gdams pa dran/_/ldang dus rang bzhin sprul sku'i rtsal sbyang bya/_/ nyin dus 'od gsal phyi ru 'dzin pa'i tshe/_/snang sems gnyis med rang grol chen por sbyang /_/mtshan dus 'od gsal nang du 'dzin pa'i tshe/_/sku gsum dbyer med gdod ma'i zad sar bskyal/_/ldang dus rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing snang la/_/sgyu ma rmi lam 'od gsal chen por sbyang /_/chags sdang la sogs nyon mongs gang shar yang /_/'dzin med rang grol gza' gtad bral bar sbyang /_/rkyen rnams sems kyi rtsal sbyong me long ste/_/ji ltar snang ba de ltar 'dzin med sbyang /_/'di ltar phyi nang snang srid chos rnams la/_/sgom par ma gyur rdul tsam yod min pas/_/snang sems gang shar rang grol rtsal sbyang bya/_/'di ni yang zab snying po'i sgom pa ste/_/bying rgod gnyid med zhi lhag zung du 'brel/_/snang stong thabs shes ye nas zung 'jug yin/_/blang dor re dogs dgag sgrub 'das pa'i don/_/pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis bstan nas song /_/gsang spyod rdo rje lam bstan las/_/sgom pa rdo rje'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_// de ltar lta sgom bogs 'byin spyod pa ste/_/deng dang ma 'phel 'gribs dang rkyen thog dbab/_/bde sdug sdug bsngal na tsha ci byung na'ang /_/dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i gnas song ste/_/dam gtsang ngo tsha tshul 'chos rab spangs la/_/gnyis med rang grol lta sgom ngang nyid dang /_/blang dor 'dzin med smyon pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/'gro dang 'dug dang mchongs dang rgyug pa dang /_/smra dang dgod dang ngu dang glu len dang /_/dga' dang mi dga' chags sdang bde sdug dang /_/rigs drug spyod pa mthong thos dran tshad bya/_/rjes la gang shar rang grol rtsal sbyong gis/_/lta sgom don de thog tu phebs sam blta/_/ji srid gnyis 'dzin dgag sgrub ma zhig par/_/brtul zhugs spyod pas brtson pas spyod par bya/_/mtshan dus rang babs bde bar nyal nas kyang /_/dran bsam 'phro 'du'i rnam rtog kun bral te/_/skye med lhun rdzogs gnyug ma'i ngang du nyal/_/_/des ni bdag gzhan dgag sgrub re dogs med/_/dgra gnyen gnyis med gser dang bong ba mnyam/_/rkyen ngan lam bslangs snang ba grogs su 'char/_/lta sgom bogs 'byin rtogs pa nam mkha' 'dra/_/sgom pa rang gsal spyod pa bu chung 'dra/_/_/gza' gtad kun bral ngang gis smon pa 'dra/_/ye grol phyam gdal rang babs rgan po 'dra/_/gzeg dang snyems bral dur khrod mi ro 'dra/_/'dzin med rang grol yul med skye bo 'dra/_/_/bdag gzhan gnyis med 'phags pa'i gang zag 'dra/_/nyon mongs rang grol chu dang rba rlabs 'dra/_/ci smras don med brag cha'i sgra dbyangs 'dra/_/gang la'ang chags med 'dab chags mkha' lding 'dra/_/spang gnyen rang grol sbrul gyi mdud pa 'dra/_/thams cad ye grol mkha' la sprin dengs 'dra/_/de 'dra'i skal bzang bde gshegs rig 'dzin dngos/_/dad brgya'i spyi bos btud nas phyag bya'i 'os/_/yid bzhin nor bu bas kyang ches lhag pa'i/_/bde ba'i 'byung gnas de la skyabs su mchi/ khyad par nad gdon chos 'phrul ci byung yang*/_/nags dang dur khrod mtsho gling skyed mos tshal/_/phug dang khong stong shing gcig drung la sogs/_/'jigs shing nyams nga dben pa'i sa phyogs der/_/bcag dang dkrugs long smyon pa'i spyod pa dang /_/zhib dang nges pa 'jam pos rnam pas nyal/_/snang sems ro gcig sems su thag bcad la/_/sems nyid ma bcos chos sku'i ngang du nyal/_/de yang sngon 'gro byang chub sems bskyed nas/_/snying dbus 'od gsal 'od zer rab 'phros pas/_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rig 'dzin mkha' 'gror bcas/_/snang srid lha 'dre gnod byed spyan drangs la/_/dbus su bla ma rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro dang /_/g.yas su yi dam g.yon du chos skyong dang /_/rgyab tu gnod byed mdun du lan chags mgron/_/dus gsum pha ma rigs drug sems can bsam/_/yid kyis phyag 'tshal sna tshogs mchod pa dang /_/_khyad par rang gi thod pa'i nang nyid du/_/lus 'di bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyur pa las/_/yaM las lung g.yos raM las me 'bar bas/_/thod pa'i bdud rtsi 'dod yon lngar gyur nas/_/rang nyid bye ba phrag stong mang sprul la/_/ nam mkha'i mtha' khyab 'gro la bdud rtsi brims/_/dgyes shing tshims pas tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bsam/_/de bzhin phung po dum brgya dum stong dor/_/gnod byed lan chags gang 'dod sbyin par btang /_/rjes la mgron rnams mi dmigs stong pa'i ngang /_/skye med bsam yul 'das pa'i dbyings la bzhag_/de ltar mchod bya mchod byed rang gi sems/_/sems ni ma skyes ngo bo ngos gzung med/_/thams cad gzhi rdzogs rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra/_/ bsam rdzogs gdod ma'i chos nyid chen por shes/_/dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dgongs par phyin/_/gzhi grol ka dag ngang du la bzla 'o/_/de kun 'gro la gnyis med phan gdags phyir/_/rang bzhin gdod nas dag pas bsngo ba bya/_/'di ni sngon 'gro bsod nams ye shes tshogs/_/bar chad kun sel dngos grub rgya chen 'byung /_/dngos gzhi sems la 'di ltar brtag par bya/_/de ltar yid kyis sna tshogs cir sprul yang /_/thams cad rang gi sems su gcig pa ltar/_/'khor 'das dgag sgrub blang dor re dogs dang /_/snang srid bdag gzhan gnyis snang sna tshogs dang*/_/'drer snang 'drer 'dzin ma lus rang gi sems/_/rmi lam bzhin te mi snang 'khrul pa'i sems/_/sems ni rtsa bral ye stong chos kyi sku/_/gzhi rdzogs kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin te/_/phyogs dang ris med mtha' grol klong yangs so/_/dba' rlabs g.yo ba ri 'dra rgya mtsho'i ngang /_/sna tshogs dgag sgrub rang sems stong pa'i ngang /_/ 'drer snang 'drer 'dzin gnyis med rtsa bral dang /_/thams cad phyam cig rang babs chen po'i ngang /_/mi g.yo mi gnas spros dang bral ba ni/_/gdod ma'i ka dag ngang du gnas pa yin/_/de ltar shes pas snang srid chos skur grol/_/ nad gdon 'drer snang cho 'phrul stong par zhi/_/nam mkha'i sprin rnams g.yo ba dengs pa bzhin/_/shes rab chen pos gnyug ma'i gnas lugs shes/_/ chos nyid sa la rang bzhin lhun gyis grub/_/thabs kyi rim pas 'di ltar shes par bya/_/byams dang snying rje byang chub sems bsgom la/_/'khor ba'i lan chags byang bar mos pa bya/_/bskal par bzhugs zhes dga' bas bkur sti bya/_/de nas mchod sbyin don la gzhag pa'i phyir/_/gdon la gzugs su grub pa yod dam med/_/yon na rdul phran bshig kyang dngos por med/_/gzugs de gzugs med rang gdangs shar ba tsam/_/rang snang 'od gsal me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/rags pa'i gzugs med chu zla'i rnam pa 'dra/_/de yis su la phan gnod byar ci yod/_/rags par yod na dngos su 'khyer gsha' yang /_/gzugs med 'dre la 'jigs skrag
