bltas pas rang bzhin gsal ba:_gang snang cog bzhag la bltas pas:_rig pa mi 'phro bar gnas pa'o:_de nyid goms pas ka dag gi grol gzhi la mthar phyin nas:_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya'o:_e ma ho:_gsang sngags kun gyi mthar thug mngon sum lam:_de don mkha' 'gro snying tig snying phyung nas:_yang zab gnad 'di bdag gi snying la babs:_phyir rab don du yi ger bkod pa yin:_shing mo yos lor tshe yi mthar phyin te:_sa pho 'brug la bum thang dgon gnas 'gro: snying nas snying po'i don la sems pa dag:_yi ge 'di la rtag tu nan tan mdzod:_da ni mi sdod rings par myur du 'gro:_mi rtag dpe yi ngo sprod mngon sum stonaH:_rtag 'dzin zhen pa can rnams snying re rje:_sdug bsngal bde bar mthong ba sems pa skyo:_chos sku rgyal po'i gtan srid ma zin na:_ji ltar byas kyang bde ba'i go skabs med:_snying nas 'chi chos mdzod cig skal ldan dag: gang gis mi phan gcig pur 'gro dus su:_'khyer so ci 'dug sems la da lta ltos:_kye ma kye ma snying pos don sgoms shig:_'khor ba'i gnas las thar ba'i thabs 'tshal lo:_gangs ri thod dkar o rgyan rdzong gnas su:_phyi rabs skal ldan rnams kyi don du bkod:_zab don snying po dri med 'od zer gyis bkod pa rdzogs so:_dge'o:

[8.21 kun 'dus rin po che'i ngo sprod]

@#/_/kun 'dus rin po che'i ngo sprod bzhugs so: shog seraH !_maH_kun 'dus rin po che'i ngo sprod ces bya ba:_dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi yang mes po:_kun tu bzang po gdod ma'i mgon po la:_gus pas btud de tshe gcig grol ba'i lung :_nges pa'i snying po gang yin gsal bar bshad:_de yang rdzogs pa chen po mkha' 'gro snying tig gi zab mo'i gnad ji snyed pa thams cad bsdus na gsum du nges te:_ye thog gzhi las babs tshul:_'khrul dus nyams su blang tshul:_bar dor gzhi thog phyin tshul lo:_dang po la gsum las:_ye thog dang po'i spyi gzhi ni man shel bstan te: ngo sprod spras pa'i rgyud las:[ · ]kun tu bzang po'i snang gsal me long 'di: phyogs mthun dpe yis rang bzhin rtogs par byed:_rtogs pa'i don de snang gsal ngo sprod yin:_rig pa zang thal gnas las man shel 'dra:_rig pa rtog med gsal bas man shel 'dra:_rig pa lhun grub gnas pas man shel 'dra:_rig pa ma 'gags 'char bas man shel 'dra:_zhes gsungs pas: gdod ma'i sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes de nyid:_ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum du gnas te:_shel dwangs la dri ma med cing zang thal ba bzhin du: rig pa la spros pa dang bral zhing ngo bo stong par mtshon:_'od lnga phyir mi gsal yang :_nang du lhun grub tu yod pa bzhin du:_rig pa'i ngang na rang bzhin lhun grub tu 'od ma 'gags pas rang bzhin gsal bar mtshon no: shel kho rang dngas la dkar po dbyer med pas thugs rje 'gags med du 'char ba mtshon no:_de gsum yang tshig gis so sor phye na'ang don ngo bo tha dad med pa bzhin duH:_rig pa stong gsal 'gags med ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum dbyer med du mtshon pa'o:_de lta bu'i gnas lugs ye nas da lta'i bar du 'pho 'gyur med par khyab pa ni sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes:_rgya chad phyogs lhung med pa:_dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya'o:_de las gzhir snang du shar ba:_'khor 'das kyi 'khrul grol du gyur pa'i gzhi ni:_shel nyi ma la phyar nas:_nang 'od tshan pa gnyis su bstan la:_'od lnga shar dus rang snang du rang ngo shes pa'i skad cig la:_phyi 'od nang du sdus pas shel nyid du thim pa gdod ma'i gzhi thog tu grol bas:_kun tu bzang pos dge ba spu tsam yang ma byas par:_skad cig la grol ba yin te: skad cig gcig gis bye brag phyed:_skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas: zhes so:_skad cig gcig gis grol ba ni spang bya'i dri ma med pas:_'joms byed gnyen po med pa'o:_yang phyar la:_gdod ma'i gzhi shel lta bu'i ngang la: rang byung tu rang bzhin gsal ba 'od lnga lta bu'i snang ba dang :_thugs rje ma 'gags pa'i rig pa dkar phra phro ba lta bu gnyis dus gcig ngo bo stong pa'i gdangs shar ba ngo ma shes pa'i cha nas lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa ste:_'khor ba so so'i rgyu byas:_kha dog lnga ldan gyis yul byas: dkar po de kun tu 'tshol ba yid kyi dpe ste:_rang bzhin gyi gdangs la thugs rjes rang ngo ma shes par gzhan du zhen nas 'khrul pas kun tu ngang las rang gdangs brtags pa'i ma rig pa zhes bya ste:_'khor bar 'khrul pa'i rkyen byas nas: rang bzhin gyi gdang 'od lnga yul dang lus su 'khrul:_thugs rje'i gdangs rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug:_kun gzhi'i rnam shes dang bcas te bdun du 'khrul:_ngo bo lung ma bstan kun gzhi 'khrul te rten byed do:_de'ang shes pa phyir 'char dus sgo lnga de la dpyod byed kyi yid nang du gnas dus kun gzhi'i rnam shes gsal la dwangs pa bsam gtan bzhi dang :_mi gsal ba gzugs med du 'khrul zhing las gsog go:_de'ang gzugs sogs yul lnga ni:_mig sogs dbang po lnga la gsal gyis:_shes pa la gsal ba ma yin no:_lus so sor spyod pa ni dbang po ma yin gyis dbang shes so:_des na shes pa la yul lnga shar ba med de:_mig long bas na gzugs mi mthong yang shes pa yod pa bzhin no:_des na dbang po rtog med la gzugs sogs mthong ba'i cha rnams:_rtog med yin par 'thad pa dang bcas pa'o:_yid 'jug pas rtog par song*ba*yang chas dbye la shes par bya'o:_de ltar rig pa mdangs nyal gyis bag chags kyi 'khrul pa sna tshogs su shar te:_shel gyi 'od gnyis bsres la:_dkar dmar sna tshogs kyi steng du 'od dkar po bzhag ste:_rang bzhin gyi snang ba la:_thugs rje rtog par 'khrul pa'i yid kyis nyin mtshan du 'dres pas:_snang ba la der 'dzin du shar bas:_sems kyi ngang nas byung bar ngo sprad do:_de ni de gnyis mi g.yo ba'i dpes gtang gzhag med pa'i chos nyid gcig tu ngo sprad do:_'khrul pa rkyen las byung ba men shel 'od dang 'dra: dngos po sna tshogs snang ba men shel 'od dang 'dra:_snang yang ngo bo 'gyur med men shel 'od dang 'dra:_zad med 'phel ba med pas men shel 'od dang 'dra:_zhes ngo sprad do: gnyis pa 'khrul dus nyams su len thabs la gsum las:_dang po 'khrul dus sems can so so'i skye ba snga phyir brgyud pa'i tshe:_bar do'i ye shes lus la bzhugs pa ni:_mar me mi mo'i khog par bcug la ngo sprad do:_snum dang sdong bu gnyis thig le dkar dmar:_ma rig pa'i ye shes kyi dpe'o:_de nas lus grub ste gnas dus dpe shel:_don snying ga'i ye shes:_rtags sgron mas ngo sprad de:_ye shes snying ga na:_ye shes sum rtsegs glo ba'i rlung dang : ye shes kyi gdangs gnyis 'phrad pas rtsal sems su byung ba'i dpe:_'od lnga'i phyogs gcig nas shar ba'i 'od dkar po la ngo sprad do:_sems dran bsams gzhi'i ngang du thim nas mi g.yo bar gnas pa'i dpe:_dkar po 'od lngar /_thim pa mi 'gul ba la sems ye shes su grol bar mtshon:_yang dkar po sems kyang dpe drug pa yid ces bya:_'od lnga ye shes kyi dpe rang gsal 'gags pa med pa'i gdangs nam mkhar snang ba yin no:_gzhi 'dzin pa'i rig pa snying ga'i thugs rje rang gnas:_mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rig pa de'i rtsal glo bar song bas:_rnam rtog yul la 'phro ba rnams so:_yul snang gi rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud de rig gdangs la rig par btags pa'o:_de'ang snying ga na de ltar rig pa gnas pa'i ngo bo ni don:_rtags su mig mnan na thig le stong pa'i sgron ma 'char bas yid ches so: de dus nyams su blang thabs la gnyis las:_dang po sngon 'gro ni:_sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad kyis rdos bcas rmi lam sgyu mar bsgom pa ni:_da ltar gyi snang ba 'di don med par snang ba mdang gi rmi lam dang 'dra ste:_ngo bor ma grub bo snyam pa dang :_rmi lam yin no:_sgyu ma yin no snyam du skad cig kyang ma yengs par bya ste:_nyal dus snying nang du hwa mthing ga la sems bzung la nyal bas rmi lam du'ang rmi lam sgyu mar 'char shing :_rmi lam zin pa dang :_chags sdang dang :_dgag sgrub:_bya byed:_chos spyod:_'gro 'dug thams cad rmi lam sgyu mar shes pas:_bden zhen dang dgag sgrub mi bya'o:_de la brten nas sgyu ma dang :_mig yor dang :_sgra brnyan dang :_dri za'i grong khyer dang :_sprul pa dang : chu zla dang :_smig rgyu lta bur skad cig kyang ma yengs par bsgoms nas:_nyal dus 'od kyi gong bu snying nang du gsal ba la sems bzung bas:_de ltar 'byongs nas phyi nang gi zhen pa dang :_blang dor dang re dogs gang yang mi 'byung ngo :_dngos gzhi ni mdon sum ngo sprod la:_nyin mtshan du shes rab rang byung gi sgron ma bsgoms pas:_rab kyis lhag med:_'bring gis bar do:_tha mas rang bzhin sprul par grol lo: gsum pa bar dor gzhi thog phyin tshul la gsum las:_dang po 'byung ba bsdus te:_dar cig brgyal ba ni rba rlabs mnan pas ngo sprad do:_de nas sgra 'od zer gsum ni de'i dus su rol mo dang 'od 'char bas ngo sprad do:_de nas sems dang ye shes rgyab gyes te:_ye shes gdangs 'pho ba ni:_shel 'od gnyis so sor phye:_dkar po med 'od lnga snang ba la ngo sprad do:_de nas gdangs 'phos te:_ye shes phyir don pa ni:_mar me mi mo nas don pa la ngo sprad do:_de nas 'od lngas snang srid khyab pa ni:_mig la ther ma bkabs nas 'od snang la ngo sprad do:_de nas zhi khro 'char ba ni:_'dra 'bag dang thang ka la ngo sprad do:_de nas ye shes bzhi sbyor ni:_tshos kyi snam bu brtsegs ma la ngo sprad do:_de nas lhun grub rin po che ni:_nam mkha' la nyi zla gza' skaRa dang :_sa steng na sems can la ngo sprad do:_nam mkha' ka dag:_gza' skar gzhi snang :_sems can rnams 'gro drug tu shar ba'i dpe'o:_grol ba ni ye thog bzhin ngo sprod do:_shin tu gsang ba'i ngo sprod snying tig ma:_dri med 'od zer shar bas bkod pa rdzogs so:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:

[8.22 bar do sbubs 'jug]

@#/_/bar do sbubs 'jug bzhugs so: shog ser skor: !_rgya/yablagaH_bar do sbubs 'jug ces bya ba:_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo:_'od gsal ye shes rang snang ba'i:_ston pa de la phyag 'tshal lo:_bar do'i snang ba 'char ba'i sbubs:_'od gsal gdams pa gsal bar nyon:_thog ma gzhi yi 'od rtsa dang :_gnas skabs lus kyi 'od rtsa dang :_bar do rang snang 'od rtsa dang :_dus der gdams pa'i mtshon tshul lo: dang po la yang rnam pa gsum:_gzhi dang gzhi snang 'khrul tshul lo:_gzhi ni sems nyid gdod ma'i dus:_stong gsal nam mkha' lta bu la:_rang byung ye shes rtsa chen shar:_stong gsal ma 'gags rnam par gsum:_rtsa yi gtso bo gsum yin te:_ngo bor rang bzhin thugs rje 'o:_'di dag brten pa'i rang 'od gsum:_sngo dmar sna tshogs mdog can gsum:_rang 'od ye nas lhun gyis grub:_mi snang 'char gzhir gnas pa ni:_dper na shel gyi rang 'od la: rkyen dang ma 'phrad mi snang bzhin:_de ni gdod ma'i gnas lugs so: gzhi snang gzhi yi ngang nyid las:_ye shes 'od lnga phyiRa shar bas:_thugs rje rig pa'i snying por shar:_de dus rtsa gsum zer thag gam:_shel 'od phyi ru shar ba bzhin:_rang byung ye shes ngang las shar:_mthing ga khyab pa chen po'i rtsa:_chos dbyings ye shes rten du shar:_rnam paRa snang mdzad gtso 'khoRa snang :_dkaRa po gdangs gsal chen po'i rtsa:_me long ye shes rten du shar: mi bskyod rdo rje gtso 'khor snang :_ser po kun tu mnyam byed rtsa:_mnyam nyid ye shes rten du shar:_rin chen 'byung ldan gtso 'khoRa snang :_dmaRa po bde chen rang gsal rtsa:_kun rtog ye shes rten du shar:_snang mtha' gtso 'khor tshul du snang :_ljang gu rdzogs byed ye shes rtsa:_bya grub ye shes rten du shar: don grub gtso 'khor rnam par snang :_de dag thugs kyi ngo bo las:_ye shes bzhi sbyor snang ba shar:_de dus rang rig snang ba las:_'khor 'das ye shar yin pa'i phyir:_lhun grub sbubs su 'gro drug gzugs:_sna tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba:_thugs rje ye shes rtsal las shar:_'brel thag longs sku'i gnas drug nas:_'od zer tshul du byung ba la:_'og tu shar ba nyid du snang : 'di ni grol lugs gnyis ka yi:_gzhi snang chen po zhes bya 'o:_'khrul tshul de dus rang snang duH:_ma rig pas na lhan cig skye:_rang las gzhan bzung kun brtags te:_gnyis kyi thugs rje phyir g.yos pas:_gzung 'dzin cha ru shoRa ma thag:_snang ba gzhan rnams rang log nas:_'gro drug 'khrul par snang ba la:_chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang:_phrag dog skyes pa'i skad cig la:_zhe sdang dmyal ba 'dod chags kyis:_yi dwags gti mug dud 'gro la: nga rgyal lha yin phrag dog gis:_rang snang lha min dag tu 'phangs:_srid par 'khrul nas bde sdug spyod:_de ni 'khrul pa'i byung tshul lo: gnas skabs lus kyi 'od rtsa la:_de ltar 'gro ba'i rang lus la:_rtsa ba'i rtsa gsum gdangs shar bas:_ro rkyang dbu mar shar ba ste:_dug gsum brten cing khams gsum 'khor:_las gsum gsog pa'i rten du chags:_de las rtsa 'dab grangs rnams ni:_nyon mongs dag dang mnyam pa ste:_brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa 'o:_dbu ma'i dbus na 'od kyi rtsa:_rang byung ka ti shel sbug can:_stong gsal rnam pa ma 'gags gsum:_de las 'od lnga'i rtsa 'dab na: dwangs ma'i 'byung lnga dag pa'i rlung :_srog 'dzin mi mnyam khyab byed dang : rdzogs byed ye shes rten can lnga:_ye shes srog 'dzin bde chen drod:_chos kun snying po gdod mar rdzogs:_rang byung yin pa'i cha la brtags:_rags rlung lnga min cha brtags yin:_dwangs ma'i khams lnga zhes bya 'o:_srog 'dzin la sogs rnam lnga 'o: de yi gdangs las rtsa rnams su:_thig le thig phran snang bar gnas: rags pa'i rtsa rnams 'dus byas te:_rlung dang dwangs ma rtog pa rgyu:_'khor pa'i rten gzhi byed pa yin:_'od rtsa dwangs ba 'dus ma byas:_dwangs ma'i khams dang ye shes rlung :_shin tu mi rtog chen por rgyu:_dper na shel 'od dwangs ma bzhin:_khams dang rlung zhes btags byas kyang :_de dag rgyu ba'i skabs med pas:_mi rtog 'ba' zhig ngang la gnas:_'od la bltas pas rags pa yi:_rlung sems dwangs ma rang 'gags nas:_'od rtsa'i ngang la mi g.yo bas:_shes rab rang byung sgron ma 'char:_'di ni mngon sum snying po'i don:_da lta mngon du gyur pa yin:_lus gnas 'od rtsa rnams gsum las: lnga skyes de las ye shes kyi:_rtsa 'dab brgyad khri bzhi stong gi:_chos kyi sgo dang grangs mnyam pas:_ye shes snang ba lam me 'o:_bar do rang snang 'od rtsa ni: rags pa rlung sems snying khar 'dus:_sems dang ye shes rgyab gyes taH 'khor ba'i kun rtog dbyings su nub:_mya ngan 'das pa'i zhing khams shar: de tshe gzhi yi 'od rtsa nyid:_snying nas mig tu 'brel ba las:_rang byung ye shes 'pho ba'i gdangs:_mthing ga khyab pa chen po'i 'od:_ston ka'i nam mkha' sprin bral 'dra:_ka dag snang ba zhes bya 'o: rang ngo shes pas gzhi la phyin:_de nas gzhi snang 'char ba las:_'od gsal rtsa yi gdangs shar bas:_snang ba'i 'od lngas nam mkha' gang :_de nas lhun grub rtsa yi gdangs:_zhi khros nam mkha' kun tu khyab:_de nas ye shes gzhi rtsa las:_ye shes bzhi sbyor snang ba shar:_de nas thugs rje'i 'od rtsa las:_lhun grub 'gro drug snang ba shar:_'di yis rtsa rnams mthar phyin pa'i:_snang ba yin no sa ma ya:_rtsa yi ngo bo ye shes la:_snang ba 'od lnga phra la dwangs:_de yi sbubs*na*snang*ba*yang :_mi 'dra grangs med nam mkha' khyab: gang la snang ba yod gyur pa:_de la rtsa ru ye shes 'dus:_dper na 'khrul snang rtsa 'dab tu:_rlung sems 'dus pa'i snang ba bzhin:_gzhan ngor med kyang rang ngor yod:_'di yang de dang chos mthun no:_rtsa gnas gnad 'di ma shes na:_gzhi lam 'bras bu shes pa med:_de bas gnad 'di sa ma ya:_mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan thob nas bkod:_de dus gdams pa'i mtshon tshul ni: skad cig gsum gyis shes par bya:_de ltar rang snang gang shar yang :skad cig dang por rang snang shes:_gnyis par shes thog phyam mer bzhag:_gsum pa bzhag pa'i ngang der grol: 'di ni gsang chen nges pa'i lam:_snying po'i yang zhun bsdus pa yin: rnal 'byor 'bras bu nges pa'i gnad:_mkha' 'gro snying tig gsang pa 'di: phyi ra_bas skal ldan rnams kyi phyir:_dri med 'od zer bdag gis bkodaH: bar do sbubs 'jug rdzogs so:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:

[8.23 bar do gnad kyi sgron me]

@#/_/bar do gnad kyi sgron me bzhugs pa lags so: rin chen shog ser skor !_gags kha bar do gnad kyi sgron me zhes bya ba:_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo:_kun bzang yab yum zhi khro rdo rje 'chang :_rdo rje sems dpa' dga' rab rdo rje dang :_shrI sid+ha o rgyan yab yum la:_gus pas btud de bar do'i gnad yig bri:_'di la gzhi mtshon tshul du bshad pa: lam dmar khrid du ngo sprad:_'bras bu grol tshul la bzla ba gsum las:_dang po ni dben pa'i gnas su zhi khro'i sku dang :_seng ras dang :_rol mo dang : gtor tshogs la sogs pa legs par bshams:_phyag dang maN+Dal phul la: ngo sprod kyi khang par so sor 'khod pa na:_snga mas ngo sprod kyi gdams pa rnams bag phab:_sos dal la legs par bshad do:_de'ang me long bsgril ba la: 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' gsal byed kyi me long zhes bya ba:_dpe thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba yin pas:_rang gi sems dang ye shes kyi bzhugs tshul: gdod ma'i ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum gyi gnas tshul:_de las kun tu bzang po'i grol tshul:_sems can gyi 'khrul tshul:_da lta snying la ye shes khyab tshul:_de phyis bar dor 'char tshul:_de rnams rim pa bzhin ngo sprad pas:_ma yengs par nyon cig:_thog ma'i dus 'khor 'das gang du'ang ma phye ba'i sngon rol na:_rang rig pa'i gnas lugs ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum du gnas so:_de'ang ngo bo stong pa shel dri ma med pa 'dra ba'i nang na: rang bzhin phyiRa mi gsal kyang :_nang gsal 'od khyim rnam par dag pa'i dbus na:_thugs rje rig pa'i snying po can gzhi gnas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bor bzhugs te:_stong pa rig pa'i snying po can shel gyi nang 'od lnga nang gsal gzhi la lhun grub tu gnas pa ltar bzhugs so:_shel rang bzhin gyis dag pa phyi nang med par gsal bas chos sku ngo shes:_shel gyi nang 'od la brten nas shes rab srog tu gyur pa'i rlung yan lag bzhi ldan las:_shes rab kyi skur gsal lugs ngo shes:_shel gyi 'od gnyis kyis rten gzhi byed pas:_gzhi gnas kyi ye shes ngo shes:_nang 'od sbubs su gnas pas sgron ma bzhi dbyings su 'khyil ba ngo shes so:_de nas phyir 'od sgril ma lnga ldan shar ba dang :_dkar po gnyis dus mnyam du bstan nas:_gzhi de lta bu las lhun grub 'od lnga sku dang ye shes su shar ba'i tshe:_dkar po ltar thugs rje rig pa'i ye shes kyi rang shar du shes pa'i skad cig ma dang pos bye brag byed: gnyis par nang gsal du snga ma bzhin gnas pa ni:_kun tu bzang po gzhi thog tu byang chub pa'i ngo sprad do:_de'i tshe rang snang du ma shes pas bdag nyid gcig pa'i ma rig pas rgyu byas:_'od lnga phyir gsal des yul dang lus kyi 'khrul gzhir gzung ba'i yul byas:_dkar phra phro ltar thugs rje'i rig rtsal yon tan skyon du song bas kun tu 'tshol byed kyi yid du gyur nas:_skad cig gnyis par phyi snang ba la yul du 'dzin byed kyi blo skyes pas gzung 'dzin du 'khrul nas kun tu brtags pa'i ma rig pas bdag gzhan du ma bzung ste: bag chags sna tshogs su bsags pas 'od lnga yul las rdos bcas su grub: thugs rje rig pa las rtog par 'khrul te:_rtog tshogs kyi dra ba lus kyi sbubs su tshud pas:_lus sems gnyis su grub ste:_khams gsum rigs drug tu 'khor ro:_de ltar 'khrul dus na'ang thog ma'i ye shes dbri bsnan med par:_sems can thams cad la rang gsal lhun grub tu gnas te:_snying ga na 'od rtsa shel gyi sbu gu can gyi nang 'od khyim lnga ldan du gsal ba'i dbus na:_phyi ltar na rigs lnga zhi ba'i sku:_nang ltar na mkha' 'gro sde lnga:_gsang ba ltar na thig le gcig tu lhun gyis grub pa ni:_sku gsung thugs su dbyer med gcig tu bzhugs pas 'od gsal lo:_de'i gdangs las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dung khang nas gsal zhing :_rtsa rnams na thig le thig phran du gnas so rtags ni sgron ma gtems la bstan no:_sems ni ye shes kyi rang gdangs glo ba'i rlung dang 'dres pa las sems su grub ste:_rtog tshogs kyi rtsal dang bcas par snang ba'o:_de nas yang nam zhig 'chi ba'i tshe:_rlung phyir 'gro ba gyen rgyu bar snang*la*thimaH:_nang*du* sdud*pa*thur sel snying gar nub:_bar du 5 pa mnyam gnas rang sar yal te:_rang gdangs 'od lnga'i nang du thim dus:_nam mkha' 'od gsal la thim pas:_'od lnga'i snang ba gsal la 'tsher ba snying nang nas nam mkhar shar ba ni:_shel las 'od lngar shar ba 'di dang 'dra'o:_de'i tshe dkar po thugs rje'i rig pas rang ngo shes na de nyid du grol lo:_de nas zung 'jug gi snang ba la sku'i zhing snang dang :_ye shes kyi snang ba la thugs rje'i zer thag dang :_lhun grub kyi snang ba la 'od khyim gyi lha sku snang ba'i tshe:_dkar po ltar thugs rje'i rig pas rang ngo shes pas: dkar po 'od lngar thim pa ltar thugs rje sbrul ba'i ye shes longs skur thim dus:_bsam gtan la dar cig gnas te:_de'ang shel 'od nang du thim pa ltar:_longs sku gdod ma'i ka dag chos sku'i nang du thim ste mi g.yo bar bzhugs so:_de'ang 'od phyir shar bas sprul sku 'od khyim gyi shar lugs ngo shes:_nang du thim pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ngo shes:_mi g.yo bar gnas pas gzhi 'dzin pa'i ye shes rig pa ngo shes:_nang gsal gyis mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye shes ngo shes:_shel gyis snang ba sna tshogs kyi snang lugs ngo shes:_shel rang gi ngo bo stong gsal gyi gnas lugs thig le nyag gcig tu ngo shes so:_mdor na da lta'i lus 'di la sems kyi rgyud brten dus 'khrul snang 'khor bar mtshon pas:_ye shes dang thugs rje'i rtsal gzung 'dzin ma dag par snang ste:_khregs chod kyis sems sbyong thugs rje'i gnas lugs ngo shes par byed dgos:_thod rgal gyis yul dang lus sbyong rang bzhin gyi gnas lugs shes par byed dgos:_thams cad mnyam nyid rdzogs pa chen po'i ngo bo'i gnas lugs sbyong ste ye ji bzhin pa'i rang ngo shes par byed dgos so: gnyis pa lam dmar khrid du ngo sprad pa ni:_nam mkha' dwangs pa'i nyin phyed na sku bkram pa'i mthar tshe 'dzin dang :_me long la sogs pa mdangs can gcal du bkram la:_rdo rje sems dpa'i me long la mig bcug nas bltas pas:_de 'dra ba'i snang ba nam mkhar mthong ba'i tshe:_bar do la 'di ltar 'char bas ngo shes par gyis shig:_ces brjod do:_yang mtshan mo me long dang mar me'i snang bas 'od gsal gyi dkyil 'khor da lta rang la gnas pa:_phyis bar dor 'di bzhin 'char ro:_de ngo shes par gyis shig:_ces so: yang seng ras mig la bkab nas nyi ma la bltas pas:_nyi ma chos sku'i dpe: 'od longs sku'i dpe:_zer sprul sku'i dpe:_de gsum ngo bo gcig pa da lta'i snying dbus na:_ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum 'di bzhin du gnas pas: phyis bar dor 'di bzhin 'char ba ngo shes par gyis shig:_ces so:_de yang de'i tshe nyin gung la slob ma'i rtse'u chung gnyis bsdams la:_rol mo'i sgra dang : me long gi 'od dang :_'ja' tshon gyi zer dang :_zhi khro'i sku dang :_mgo brnyan mi 'dra ba gyon nas:_phaT dang hUM gi sgra 'byin cing mtshon cha bzung bas chos nyid bar do'i sgra 'od zer gsum ngo sprad do:_de yang da lta mngon sum goms pa'i skal ldan gyis:_nam mkhar 'od gsal gyi snang ba la goms par byas shing :_rdo rje lu gu rgyud 'bral ba med par bltas pas:_bar dor rang ngo shes te grol la:_gzhan gyis za 'og gi gur khyim dang :_zhi khro'i snang ba dang :_sgra 'od zer gsum la sogs pa dang :_nyi ma'i 'ja' tshon la bltas te:_rang la 'di ltar gnas pa yin:_lan cig bar dor 'char snyam pa dang :_da lta bar do na 'dug pas bla ma'i gdams ngag dran par bya dgos snyam nas:_snang ba de kun rang snang du shes pas:_der mi rtog pa'i bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag cing rtsal sbyangs pas:_phyis bar dor 'char dus rang ngo shes te grol ba la the tshom med do:_de'ang da lta ske gnas kyi bar do la gdams pas don la yid ches shing :_yang yang bsgoms pas rmi lam du rtsal 'byongs par bya'o: 'chi kha'i bar do la chags zhen thams cad spangs nas:_gdams pa'i don khab mig tu skud pa 'dzud pa ltar:_ma yengs par gsal dung dung pa bya'o: chos nyid kyi bar do la rang rig 'od gsal ba'i snang ba:_sgra 'od zer gsum lwa sogs pa rang snang du shes pas gdod ma'i gzhi la mthar phyin par bya'o: rgya lam zin na srid pa'i bar dor zhing khams dag pa dang :_bla ma dang dkon mchog dran pas skyabs 'gro sems bskyed kyis:_mngal sgo dgag pa dang : 'khor ba las ru bzlog par bya'o:_de'ang 'chi khar shes pa bsgrims te: mig la gtad nas sems nam mkha'i mthongs su 'phangs pa ni:_gnad gal che'o:_gzhan du na chos nyid kyi bar do zin par mi 'gyur ro:_de'ang chos nyid bar do la sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pas:_mya ngan las 'das pa shar zhing:_rang ngo ma shes pas 'khor ba'i snang ba yang mang du shar te:_'khor 'das res mos byas so:_da ni 'khor 'das gnyis ka gdod ma'i zad sa na nang gsal du thim par bya ba la nan tan chen po bya'o:_gsum pa 'bras bu'i grol tshul ni:_shel 'od nang du bsdus pas mtshon te:_ma dag pa'i snang ba dag snang shar bas nub dus:_dag pa'i zhing snang gdod ma'i nang 'od du thim nas btsan sa zin pa'o:_de'i tshe man shel la dri ma med pas:_chos sku spros pa dang bral bar mtshon:_nang 'od lnga ldan du gsal bas longs skur rang snang du gsal ba mtshon:_dkar po phra phro gzhi thim tu yod pas thugs rje sprul pa'i sku 'phro gzhir ma 'gags la:_rags pa med pas phra ba'i ye shes su mtshon te:_ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum dbyer med lhun grub chen por ngo sprad do:_e ma ho:_rang snang ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa la:_ma rig 'khrul pas 'gro drug cir snang yang :_thams cad rang snang gzung 'dzin rmi lam tsam: ye nas ma 'khrul sangs rgyas nyid du mthong :_bar do'i yul la bde chen 'og min gnas:_rang snang dag pas thams cad der grol te:_gdod ma'i gzhi la btsan sa zin par shog:_bar do gnad kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba:_dri med 'od zer gyis:_o rgyan rdzong du bkod pa rdzogs so:_ai:_rgya rgya rgya:_dge'o:_:

[8.24 gnad gsum sgron me]

@#/_/_gnad gsum sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs so: shog ser skoraH: nang_gnad gsum sgron me zhes bya ba:_dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo:_dngos grub yon tan rin chen gter:_kun la gus pas phyag 'tshal te:_gzhi dang gzhi snang 'khrul tshul gyis:_gnad gsum snang ba'i sgron me bshad:_rdo rje rtse mo'i gnas rnam par gzhag pa las:_shin tu dag pa gzhi'i skabs:_gzhi dag pa nang gi skabs:_ma dag 'khrul pa phyi'i skabs rnam par gzhag pa gsum las:_dang po ni chos dbyings rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa:_ngo bor rang bzhin thugs rje gsum dbyer med pa'i de bzhin nyid:_don dam pa'i bden pa rang bzhin chos sku:_nam mkha' lhar stong pa 'dus ma byas pa:_nyi zla ltar gsal la lhun gyis grub pa:_me long ltar dwangs la 'char gzhi ma 'gag pa:_ngo bo stong :_rang gzhin gsal: thugs rje 'char tshul ma 'gags pa'i 'byung gnas chen po:_ka dag lhun grub gnyis su med pa:_ngo bo 'khor 'das gang du'ang ma grub pa:_nang dbyings phra ba'i ye shes kyi ngo bo:_dngos po kha dog gi rigs su ma grub pa'i gsal cha:_lhun grub la sku lnga:_'od lnga:_rlung lnga:_shes rab lnga:_rigs lnga rang chas 'char rung gting gsal du gnas la:_thugs rje rig par ye shes kyi snying po can du gnas pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bzhugs pa ni gdod ma'i nang dbyings lhun grub rin po che'i sbubs:_gzhon nu bum pa sku'i zhing khams:_phyi dang nang so sor phye ba'i ris med pas kun tu yang nang du gyur pa'i de bzhin nyid kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa: stong pa chen po dang :_rang byung rig pa'i ye shes kun tu bzangapo dang dbyer mi phyed pa'i mkha' klong du 'du 'bral med pa:_yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chen po:_'khor 'das la sogs gang du'ang ma grub pa'i rtsal las nang du 'char ba'i dbyings su bzhugs pa ni:_thog ma'i gzhi gnas lugs rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje:_gsang sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba chen mo:_'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i zhing khams:_gzhan rnam par gzhag pa'i skabs so:_'di la chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin chos sku:_dang po'i sangs rgyas:_de bzhin nyid:_don dam pa'i bden pa:_rang byung gi ye shes:_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes:_thog ma med pa'i chos khams dge ba:_lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor:_rang bzhin kun tu bzang po la sogs pa:_mdo rgyud kyi gnad chen po dag las ming du mar grags kyang mthar thug gi gzhi:_thig le nyag gcig rang byung gi ye shes kun byed rgyal po'i lugs la:_gzhan gyi gnas zhes btags pa'o:_gzhan gyi gnas gsal ba'i sgron me rdzogs so: sa ma ya:_rgyargya rgya: don gnyis pa gzhi snang dag pa nang gi skabs ni:_thog ma'i gzhi rang ngo ka nas dag pa:_'char mi 'char gyi tha snyad med kyang :_lhun grub gting gsal phra ba'i ye shes la:_rlung lnga yod pa'i skyod byed kyi rlung gis:_sku dang rigs dang 'od rnams phyir bskyod pas:_gzhi snang lhun grub kyi sbubs: rigs pa'i rtsal las rang shar ba'i dus na:_thugs rje la 'char tshul go ma 'gags pa'i rtsal yod pas:_nang gi snang ba chen po sku dang :_'od dang :_ye shes la sogs 'char tshul drug:_sgo gnyis te lhun grub sgo brgyad kyi gzhi snang chen po:_nam mkha'i dbyings ltar bsam gyis mi khyab par rang shar ba na:_nang gi snang ba ye shes 'od kyi sbubs:_rig pa'i rtsal las shar bas nang zhes bya'o:_'di'i dus na mya ngan las 'das pa'i dag snang :_rigs lnga:_sku lnga:_'od lnga:_gzhal yas khang :_zhing khams dang bcas pa:_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i zhing khams snang ba dang :_de'i rtsal las rang bzhin sprul ba'i sku'i zhing khams rang snang ba thams cad bar snang gi 'ja' tshon nam chu zla 'am:_me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du:_mya ngan las 'das pa'i dag snang shar ro:_de las mnyam du ma dag pa 'khor ba'i sgo las:_'gro drug gi snang ba rmi lam sgyu ma ltar gnas ris dang bcas pa rang snang ste:_'khor ba ngan song rol par ye shar las:_zhes gsung pa'i don med pa'i gsal snang ma dag pa 'khrul snang gi snang ba nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa ye shar gzhi snang la snang dus:_don la 'char tshul gyi snang ba las:_ma dag par mtshan pa med pas:_dag pa 'jig rten pa'am:_rnam dag 'jig rten zhes bshad de: sems sde las:_'di ni rnam dag 'jig rten zhes:_mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yongs su gsungs:_zhes pa dang :_dbang rnam par phye ba las:_'khrul pa'i snang ba chos sku'i rang snang la:_dngos po bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs re 'khrul: zhes pa'i don to:_de ltar nang gi snang ba la 'gro drug yod pas:_phyir 'byung pa'i gnad thams cad de yin no:_phyi rnams kyang nang ltar mjal ba yin te: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang :_zhes pa'ang tshul 'dir 'jug pa'i don du bstan to:_de ltar gzhi snang gi dag ma dag tu snang ba thams cad:_rtsal las tha dad du sgo so sor 'char ba snang yang :_don la bzang ngan med de:_me long gi ngos gcig la shar ba'i:_dag ma dag gi snang ba 'am:_gnyid gcig gi rtsal las:_rmi lam bzang ngan so sor shar dus:_bzang ngan med par ltar: gzhi'i rtsal las gzhi snang du shar tshad:_chos sku'i snang ba med pa gsal snang gi stong gzugs tsam yin no:_'di ni ye shes 'od kyi sbubs:_gzhi snang lhun grub kyi snang ba:_thugs rje rig pa'i rang rtsal:_zhes pa la sogs ming du mar byung yang :_gzhi snang chen po zhes bya'o:_mu tig phred ba las:_'khrul gzhi rnam pa mang bshad kyang :_lhun grub dang ni thugs rje'o:_zhes pa'i don to: 'di'i dus su yar ka dag gi snang ba nam mkha' sprin med pa lta bu:_thad kar 'od gsal gyi snang ba bar snang gi 'ja' tshon lta bu:_mar 'gro drug gi snang ba chu zla smig rgyu lta bu gsum dus gcig la snang ba ni:_chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum gyi gzhi snang ste:_kho bos rang byung pad+ma'i gnas su legs par mthong ba bzhin bkod pa'o:_nang gi gnas rnam par bshad pa'i sgron ma rdzogs so:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya: don gsum pa ma dag 'khrul pa phyi'i skabs ni:_de ltar gzhi snang shar dus thugs rje'i rtsal las:_gzhi snang sku gsum rang snang du shes nas: dag pa ye shes kyi sgo las:_kun tu bzang por ltar grol ba yin la:_ma shes na ma rig pa gsum dang :_rkyen bzhis:_ma dag pa 'khor ba'i sgo las rten 'brel bcu gnyis su 'khrul te:_khams gsum rigs drug snod bcud dang bcas pa so sor 'khor bas rtag tu sdug bsngal la spyod pa ni sems kyi rang snang 'khrul pa 'khor ba'i las dang bag chags thog mtha' med par:_skye ba bzhis brgyud cing mtha' med pa ni:_phyi'i chos zhes bya'o:_de yang thog ma'i ma rig pa:_lung ma bstan kun gzhi la shes pa thams cad kyi 'char gzhi kun gzhi'i rnam shes las:_kha phyir bltas sgo lnga'i shes pa dang :_nang bltas yid shes dang :_nyon yid de:_sems rnam shes tshogs brgyad:_sems byung lnga bcu rtsa gcig:_bag chags dang bcas pa snang dus la:_rnam smin bag chags kyi sbubs sam lus zhes bya'o:_de yang 'dod par sha khrag gi lus:_bsam gtan bzhir rnam smin 'od kyi lus:_gzugs med bzhir bag la nyal yid kyi lus gsum las:_rang re mi rnams la da lta snying ga'i 'od rtsa las:_gzhi rang byung gi ye shes:_gzhi snang so sor rtsa 'dab so so la gnas:_ye shes kyi gzhi snang 'od rtsa nas:_nam mkhar snang la:_'gro drug gi gzhi snang snying ga'i ye shes kyi zer gdangs:_glo ba'i rlung dang 'dres pa:_snying ga'i rtsa brgyad na rnam shes brgyad du gnas pa las:_zer gdangs mgo mjug tu:_'gro drug gi rtsa 'dab so so na khyab par gnas so:_'di dag tu rlung sems 'dus nas 'gro drug gi 'khrul snang 'char ba ni:_ma dag pa 'khor ba'i sgo'i snang ba ste: da lta ni 'o skol mi rnams mi'i rtsa 'dab tu rlung sems 'dus pas:_mi'i yul dang :_gnas rigs so sor snang ba'i gnad thams cad de yin no:_de'i phyir sems dang ye shes sam:_rnam shes dang ye shes phyed par bya ste:_khregs chod thod rgal gnyis su med pa'i dgongs pa la brtson pas nyams su blangs pas: 'di dang bar do rang snang sprul sku'i zhing :_gang rung nas gdod mar grol ba ni mngon sum snying tig nye lam che'o:_'di ni phyi'i gnas kyi sgron me bstan pa'o:_gnad gsum gsal ba'i sgron me mkha' 'gro snying tig gi gdams pa: pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis bkod pa rdzogs so:_sa ma ya:_rgya rgya rgya:_srog sgrub mas srungs shig :_bkra shis:

[8.25 mthong snang rin po che 'od kyi dra ba]

@#/_/mthong snang rin po che 'od kyi dra ba bzhugs so/_/ shog ser/ mthong snang rin po che 'od kyi dra ba zhes bya ba/_bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/sku tshe snga mar zab gter gdan drangs nas/_/da lta nyams len longs sku'i zhing khams nyul/_/ma 'ongs bum thang mdzad pa mthar phyin nas/_/_/mngon par byang chub de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ 'das pa'i dus na rgyal sras pad+ma gsal/_/ma 'ongs gu ru dri med 'od zer te/_/da ltar kun mkhyen tshul khrims bzang po'i blo/_/zab mo'i thugs gter phrin las rgyas mdzad cing /_/'gro don dpag med mdzad pa lhun grub ces/_/mkha' 'gros lung bstan rnam thar mdo tsam bri/_/legs pa'i yon tan rmad du byung bas rab tu brgyan pa'i bla ma dam pa 'di ni sku tshe snga ma'i rabs dpag tu med pa'i sngon rol nas rang byung pad+ma rgyal pos rjes su bzung zhing*/_mkhyen rab dang thugs rje'i 'od zer mtha' yas pas gdul bya'i pad+ma 'dzum pa la mkhas shing /_mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i lam po che'i srol btod pa la snying rje chen po'i shing rtas 'gro ba rnams 'dren zhing*/_rnam par grol ba'i skyed mo'i tshal shin tu nyams dga' bar thar pa chen po'i dus ston la 'god par mdzad pa'i rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa las/_'dir cung zad cig mchims phu rin po che zhi ba sgrub pa'i nags khrod du dpal rdo rje phag mos ji skad gsungs pa bzhin brjod par bya'o/_/ de'ang dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog tu chos skyong ba'i rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan gyis o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas spyan drangs nas gtsug lag khang bzhengs su gsol te/_rab gnas chung ngu'i tshe mchims phur gshegs nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo mdzad pa'i dus su/_btsun mo 'bro bza' byang chub la 'khrungs pa'i sras mo pad+ma gsal zhes bya ba/_lo brgyad lon pa zhig 'das pas/_/_rgyal pos mya ngan mdzad pa na/ slob dpon gyis chos bstan pas/_de'i tshe rgyal pos gser gzhong Rin po ches bkang ba phul nas/_nga'i gtsug lag khang dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ji tsam gnas/_bu mo 'di'i chos skal gang lags la sogs pa zhus pas lan rgyas par gsungs te/_de'i tshe slob dpon gyis rnam shes bkug pas bu mo slar sos te slob dpon dang yab yum sras kun mjal dus dbang bskur te/_gsang mtshan pad+ma las 'brel rtsal du btags/_tshe lo lnga bcu kha ral na zab gter gyis sems can mang po la phan 'dogs shing gu ru dri med 'od zer du lung bstan dus bu mos mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dpe sgrom spyi bor bzhag nas smon lam btab bo/_/de nas skye ba mang zhig gnas/_gsal rje gangs kyi shar phyogs su/_/_spa sgang pa rin chen rdo rje zhes par skyes nas/ dwags po dngas lung khra mo brag nas zab gter gdan drangs te/_ring por ma lon par sku gshegs so/_/chu mo glang nas deng song shing mo yos kyi bar lo sum cu so drug zab gter thon nas song la/_lo bzhir ni gter ston nyid kyis mchod par mdzad cing /_lhag par gteRa chos rnams phyogs kun tu 'thor zhing rgyas so/_/de nas rin chen rdo rje nyid kyi zhus lan gser phreng las/_dar cig longs sku'i zhing khams nyul te bum thang thar pa gling du skye ba bzhes par gsungs pa bzhin du/_longs sku'i zhing nyul ba'i phyir g.yo ru grwa zhes bya ba'i phu stod grong dben rtsa zhes bya bar/_yab slob dpon bstan pa bsrung ba dang*/_yum 'gro bza' mo bsod nams rgyan gnyis kyi sras su 'khrungs te/_lo bdun la yi ge'i 'bri klog dang /_brgyad dang dgu la phur pa dang bde gshegs 'dus pa'i bskyed rdzogs phrin las dang bcas pa mkhyen dus yum 'das so/_/bcu la gu ru'i chos gter sna bo lugs kyi skor phrin las dang bcas pa dang*/_bcu gcig la rgya nag po'i rtsis la thugs sbyong dus yab 'das so/_/dgung lo bcu gsum pa la bsam yas su mkhan po bsam 'grub rin chen dang /_slob dpon kun dga' 'od zer las rab du byung ste 'dul ba la sbyangs pas/_dgung lo bco lnga la gsung ste lo gsum bskyangs so/_/de'i bar du 'dul ba'i las phran [( ]a[》]lung bran[ ) ]rnams dang / theg pa che chung gi chos rnams la lung nod mdzad do/_/bcu dgu la dpal gsang phu ne'u thog tu byon te/_slob dpon chen po bla brang pa chos dpal rgyal mtshan dang*/_gzhon nu rin chen la sogs pa las mtshan nyid kyi theg pa rnams gsan cing /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rgyud bla ma la sogs pa mkhyen par mdzad de/_lo gsum du phyi nang gi chos rnams la thugs sbyong dang lung nod mang po mdzad do/_/de'i dus su slob dpon gzhon nu rgyal po la sogs pa las dbu ma tshig gsal dang 'jug pa la sogs pa gsan nas mkhyen par mdzad do/_/_/gzhan yang lung dang /_rig pa dang /_sgrub sde du ma'i gzhung lugs mang po gsan cing thugs su chud par mdzad do/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga pa la bla ma bkra shis rin chen la sogs pa las dpal 'khor lo bde mchog dang / kyai rdo rje la sogs pa gsang sngags gsar ma'i dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas du ma la thugs sbyangs so/_/de'i dus su khyad par du lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa/_/_lam rim pa lnga pa/_nA ro dang ni gu'i chos drug_/rdzogs chen sems phyogs/_sgyu 'phrul zhi khro/_gcod yul zhi byed la sogs pa la thugs sbyong mdzad do/_nyi shu rtsa bdun pa la dpal ldan chos kyi rje ku ma rA dza dang mjal te/_rdzogs pa chen po gsang ba snying tig gi dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas pa thob cing /_phyis de lo dbang gong ma rgyud lung man ngag dang bcas pa'i gtad rgya babs te/_lo gsum gyi bar sgrub pa mdzad do/_/sum cu rtsa gcig pa la mthar 'byon par bzhed nas snyi phu shugs gseb tu lam 'gron pa gzigs su byon dus/_skal ldan gyi slob ma du mas gsol ba btab nas/_rdzogs pa chen po snying tig gi khrid mdzad dus su/_rnal 'byor pa 'od zer go chas lo ro nas dka' spyad chen pos zhus pa'i mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dpe yongs su tshang ba bla ma la gzigs su phul dus/gzim lam du srog sgrub mas phyag dpe gtad pa rmis so/_/de nas sang phod sum cu rtsa gnyis pa shing mo yos kyi lo dpyid zla 'bring po la mchims phu ri mo can gyi nags su skal ldan gyi rnal 'byor pho mo brgyad la rdzogs pa chen po gsang ba snying tig gi gdams pa btsugs te spros med kyi dbang mdzad dus byin phab pas/_dpal sngags srung chen mo rnal 'byor ma zhig la babs nas 'khrab pa la/_thams cad the tshom du gyur dus bla ma'i gsung gis 'dir mkha' 'gro dngos su babs pa yin pas a'u tsi/nga snang sems ro gcig tu rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin pas bar chad mi 'ong gsungs pa dang /_bla ma la rnal 'byor mas phyag 'tshal te/_/_mchod gtor rnams la bltas nas rma bya ma 'dzom pa la ga re gsungs dus/_yid kyis mos pa byed pa yin mod gsungs pas/_brda'i chos la yid kyis gar 'ong 'di mi dgos gsungs nas bum pa steng gi many+dzi la nas gzhong dang bcas pa bor te bum pa gsum 'brel bar bzhag go_/bla mas cho ga'i rnam bshad zhib mor mdzad dus thal mo sbyar te legs so gsungs shing dbu khugs pa re'ang mdzad do/_/rigs dang zhes pa'i yi ge'i sa chad pas/_min min rigs zer ba yin gsungs so/[ \u0f00] la sogs pa'i yi ge bzlas dus nga'i lad mo gyis zer nas mkha' 'gro'i skad du sngags rnams 'brel la ma 'dres pa'i gdangs snyan po byung ngo /_/_/dngos gzhi'i tshig brgyad kyi skabs su bsgom du med pa'i chad pa'ang gsos te/_blo sgom dang bral na dga' ba la/_sgom blo dang bral na a re skyid/_zer zhing glu blangs so/_/mchod pa ngan pa la'ang 'dis mi 'ongs gsungs shing mchod dbyangs snyan po'ang mdzad de/_tshogs kyi dus su bla ma la bdud rtsi gsol zhal che ba bkang nas drangs dus/_'di mkha' 'gro'i dam rdzas yin pas cis kyang brten dgos gsungs nas lhag ma ma lus par drangs so/_de dus rnal 'byor pa rin chen 'od 'phros/_dpal mgon po mthing nag rgyan cha rdzogs pa'ang mthong ngo /_/de nas nam langs kyi bar mkha' 'gro'i byin rlabs khyad par can byung ngo /_/de nas khrid ma thon gyi bar la rnal 'byor pho mo thams cad nyams 'ur te glu len bro brdungs/_nyin mtshan thams cad du shes pa bde gsal mi rtog pa'i nyams 'bar zhing /_gnyid song ba'i rmi lam med/_ma song ba'i sad rgyu byung ngo /_/de dus nyi shu bzhi la rnal 'byor pa 'od zer go cha yang gcig pu gser zho do'i maN+Dal dang bcas pa bla ma'i drung du phyin nas phul lo/_/de nub rnal 'byor ma gzhan zhig gis bla ma'i drung du skyes pa lo brgyad lon pa phod ka smug nag can rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gsol zhing b+han+d+ha dang phur pa thogs pa mkha' 'gro bzhis bskor ba mthong ngo /_/nyi shu lnga'i nyi ma phyed yol na rnal 'byoRa mas nam mkha'i dkyil na ye shes mgon po mkha' 'gro lngas bskor ba byon pa mthong ngo /_/de dus nam mkha' thams cad mkha' 'gros gang bar snang ngo /_nyi ma nub mtshams su rnal 'byor pa 'od zer mtha' yas kyis gzim chung na bud med lo bco lnga tsam lon pa dkar dmaRa mthing gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'ang mthong ngo /_/yang sngags pa bro brdungs pa dang /_bud med rgyan chas bklubs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_/_khyad par du bud med skra'i lan tshar rting par slebs pa gzugs shin tu ring ba gcig bla ye na 'dug pa dang /_chos ra na skyes pa dkar sangs pa rgyan can lnga bro brdungs pa la 'khor dpag tu med pas sa dang bar snang gang bar mthong ngo /_/byis pa se ral can gsum yang rdzu 'phrul ston pa dang /_bud med dkar mo gser g.yu dar zab kyis brgyan pa zhig /de nub gis bla ma'i dbu thog na rma bya'i gdugs chen po 'dzin pa mthong ngo / tshogs 'khor gyi dus su bud med nag mo gcig gis kyang de bzhin du gdugs 'dzin pa mthong ngo /_/nyin mtshan du rgyal mtshan sna tshogs pa 'dzin mkhan med par rong nger yod pa'i dar gyi 'phan ldir phyar re mthong ngo /_/ de'i nyi ma nub khar rnal 'byor ma zhig gi dngos snang du/_skyes pa ber smug dang rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pas bskor ba bla ye dang bar snang khengs pa la/_mun sros dus dbang khang du 'gro ba mthong nas rnal 'byor mas gar byas so/_/yang rnal 'byor ma zhig gis mi nag po chen po gcig dang /_sngags pa mthing nag mkha' 'gro sde lngas bskor ba glu len pa mang po nam mkha' nas dbang khang du byon pa mthong nas tshogs gtor bshams zer dus/_bla mas gzim chung nas tshogs gtoRa shoms shig gsungs te bshams pas bud med nag mo gcig phye phud nyams zer ba dang /_mi dkar po zhig nga'i gtor ma na sha mi 'dug zer ba la bltas pas dam can gyi gtor ma na sha chad pa slar gsos so/_/dar cig na rta dkar mi dkar can gcig gtor ma 'dod pa la dmar gtor byin pa mi len par song ba jo bo ldang lhar snang ngo /_/bla ma khri la bzhugs dus sa gzhi bar snang mkha' 'gros gang ba kun phyag 'tshal zhing mos pa byed cing /_tshogs gtor gyi mgron rnams thams cad nam mkhar byon pa la tshogs gtor bsngos nas dar cig na srod phyed la rnal 'byor pho mo thams cad kyis thos pa mkha' 'gro'i hU~M sgra dang*/_phaT sgra dang /_bso sgra dang /_'ur sgra dang /_sil chom mang po byung zhing /_glo bur du bag dro 'ur 'ur lus tsha chil chil shes pa skyi zing zing bun bun phyod phyod byung bas/_rnal 'byor pa zhig na re do nub gnam sa ling logs pa sha dum khrag dum byed las che zer nas skrag go_/dar cig na yang rnal 'byor ma zhig gis sa gzhi bar snang thams cad mkha' 'gro'i sprin phung 'thibs te chi li li 'byon pa mthong nas tshogs gtor bsngos so/_/de nas dar cig na rnal 'byor ma ral pa sprugs shing 'dug dus rdo rje phag mo sku mdog mthing nag cig gis nam mkha' khengs pa thim pa snyam byed nas 'khrabs so/_/yong bar yod yong bar yod gsungs pa la/_ci yongs dris pas/_sang gnang la bar chad yong bar yod/_min na yaRa 'gro na mang po yod gsungs pa la/_su byung dris pas/_sman mo mched bdun dkar la gzhon sha chags pa za 'og gi na bza' can gser g.yu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'khoRa sman mo dpag tu med pas bskor ba byung /_da dung 'byung ngo /_/'o de gung rgyal mi nag rta nag can ber nag mdung nag can ral pa g.yas g.yon du 'khyil ba'i la thod yod pa 'khor yang de 'dra ba mang pos bskor ba byung ngo /_/da dung 'byung ngo /_gnyan chen thang lha rta dkar mi dkar can 'khor yang de 'dra ba du mas bskor ba 'dug go gtor ma byin cig gsungs pa la/_/_gtor ma yang phul lo/_/_/rnal 'byor ma'i zhal nas/_nga gsar du 'ongs pa la gtor ma/_mi ster ba e yin gsung dus/_su yin dris pas/_nga snga ma'i yi dam rdo rje phag mo yin zer dus/_rnal 'byor pa 'od zer mtha' yas kyis bud med mthing nag gzhan pas che ba rus pas brgyan pa rin po che dang rus pa'i dra bas brgyan par mthong nas/_khyed rnams kyis 'di cir mthong zer nas bshad do/_/de nas bla mas dris pa/_khyed 'dir ci la byon/_bla ma dam pa sku khams bzang ngam/_rnal 'byor mas smras pa/_do nub dus gnyan pas las can pas las can gyi slob ma nyul du 'ong /_bla ma sku khams bzang zer ro/_'o na da lo bla ma sku chag che ba a'u tsi 'am dris pas sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'phrul la bar chad ga na yod/_gdul bya la dgongs pa yin mod/_bi ma la bod yul du byon pa mi shes sam gsungs/_'o na ji tsam bzhugs/_da nas lug lo phyi ma'i bar bzhugs/_de nas gdul bya dang bstun pas nges pa med/ 'o na nga bla mas gzhan don la bskul de khyed kyis bskul ba lags sam dris pas/_/_'o 'o de ka de ka zer dus/_ngas gcig pur bsdad nas/_'od lus bsgrub bam/_gzhan don byas na sems can la phan thogs yong /_/da ji tsam thub dris pas/_'od lus 'grub kyang sems can la phan 'dogs dgos/ gzhan don 'ur 'ur/_da lo nas bzung ste lo sum cu thub gsungs so/_/de dus rnal 'byor pa 'od zer go cha na re sku tshe ring bar 'dug zhus pas/_bla ma'i zhal nas mkha' 'gro'i 'di la gzab gtad med/_zla ba dang /_zhag la lor brtsi ba'ang srid pas gang yin mi shes gsungs so/_/yang bla mas nga la bka' srung ji tsam yod dris pas/_mang mang bla ma'i thams cad khyed la yod/ khyad par du rdo rje g.yu sgron ma yin zer ro/_/'gro don sa phyogs ga na yod dris pas/_lho nub phyogs na yod/_de yang gra dang grwa phyi dang 'phreng po phyogs na yod/_'o na ngas gzhan la phan nges sam dris pas/_da nas bzung nas 'ur 'ur/_tshe phyi ma de bas kyang 'gro don rgya che gsungs/_/_phyi ma ga na yod dris pas/_lho brag phyogs dang /_mon bod rgya gar gyi mtshams na rgya che rgya che gsungs/_mon bum thang yin nam dris pas/_'o 'o de ka de ka ma nor ma nor gsungs so/_/'o na mkha' 'gro snying tig nas ji skad bshad pa'i dbang khrid da lta gdab tu rung ngam dris pas/_khyed rang gi yin pa la los los zer ro/_/mi rnams kyis zog por 'dzin du mi yong ngam dris pas/_mi'i kha la rgyu mtshan ci yod/_skal ldan rnams nged kyis sdud skal med smra mkhan med kyang mi 'du/_sangs rgyas la'ang skur pa 'debs pa zer ro/_/'o na snying tig gi chos bka' gang du 'byed rdo rje g.yu sgron gyis gnas su 'byed dam dris pas/ 'di na mkha' 'gro rang bzhin gyis 'du bas 'dir 'byed dgos zer ro/_/ bum thang gi gter kha de tshe 'di la thon nam dris pas/ gtsang ba'i slob ma gsum bzhi tsam yod na thon zer ro/ pas/_med sngags pa dkar sangs sha ni bsrab la shin tu mdzes pa zhig 'ong / de dus thon zer ro/_/gter yig dris pas/_de dus lung ston mkhan re yong dri mi dgos gsungs so/_/gter sa'i brag dris pas/_bum thang gi gzhung chu lho nub la babs pa'i lung pa zad du nye ba'i shar ngos kyi brag mtha' pi wang gyen du bslangs pa lta bu'i mgo phyir gyed la song ba'i mgul mtshams na tshur 'ongs pa'i gad mchu'i steng na shing lo stag ma ltar yod pa nas thag pa btags nas 'doms bcu gnyis song ba na brag gru bzhi zo thabs su yod pa'i dkyil smad ser ka gru gsum yod pa na 'dug zer ro/_/nga dang slob dam tshig shin tu /da lta yod dam dris dpon chen po nam mjal dris pas/_lung gsum gyi phu ri gsum gyi mda' brag chung nge ba kha lho nub tu lta ba brag gsum pa de'i g.yas zur gyi 'og tu mjal nas lung ston gsungs so/_/_/bi ma la dang nam mjal dris pas/ mjal zin 'dug pa la zer ro/_/ngas rtogs pa 'di snying tig gi don mthar thug pa yin nam dris pas/_mthar thug go zer ro/_/gter kha gzhan dris pas 'di nas nub byang mtshams na brag ri shin tu mtho ba mdung rtse gyen du gzengs pa 'dra ba'i ngos nas thon te der mi bzhud gsungs so/_/'o na shar phyogs khra mo brag gi gter kha de ngas thon nam mi thon dris pas/_thon zin 'dug pa zer ro/_/rnal 'byor pa 'od zer go chas spa sgang pa rin chen rdo rje de ga na yod dris pas/_spa sgang pa rin chen rdo rje zhes dar cig mi gsal ba las/_slob dpon rin rdor dris pas/_lags lags so de khong yin 'di na bzhugs 'dug pa gsungs nas mdzub mo btsugs so/_/bla mas dris pa/ khong skye ba de'i 'og tu bum thang du skye bar gsungs pa la dag na yin gsungs pas/_skye ba de'i 'og tu longs sku'i zhing dar cig nyul nas bum thang du skye ba las de ka ltar skye ba min/_da lta khyed rang longs sku'i zhing nyul ba yin zer ro/_/da lta longs sku'i zhing nyul ba'i rgyu mtshan gang yin dris pas/_slob dpon rin rdor gyis gter thon dus lo 'gar gsang nas sgrub pa mdzad na rang don du 'od gsal longs sku'i zhing nyul gyis rtsal sbyong dang snying tig gi gzhan la phan 'dogs 'ongs pa la/_ma gsung pas skra tshe tshad du ma phyin par da lta skyes dus 'od gsal 'ja' tshon gyi snang ba sgom zhing nyams su len pa la longs sku'i zhing dar cig nyul bar btags pa yin/_de gzhan gyis dgongs pa len ma shes pa yin/_lung bstan pa gsungs pa de da lta'i tshe 'di la dgongs pa lags zer ro/_/ngas lhag med gar 'grub dris pas/ pur bsgoms na da lta 'grub/_/gzhan don mdzad pas bar dor grol nas sprul pas bum thang du skye ba blangs te/_rdzu 'phrul mang po bstan/_gzhan don byas nas sprul pa de yang mkha' 'gro ma lngas bskor nas ma ga ta rdo rje gdan gyi nub byang o rgyan gyi yul du gshegs nas 'tshang rgya ba'i tshul ston gsungs so/_/slob dpon rin rdor gang la grongs lo du song dris pas/_keg la grongs lo sum cu so gnyis song gsungs so/_/ngas snying tig gang gis phan thogs/ gcig bi ma la'i snying tig dang mkha' 'gro snying tig lo du gnas dris pas/_gnyis kas phan thogs bi ma la rgya che/_bi ma la lo brgya/_mkha' 'gro snying tig lo lnga brgyar gnas/_da lo nas mgo brtsams pa yin zer ro/_/de dus rnal 'byor pho mo rnams kyi tshe dang phan 'dogs kyang lung bstan nas/_dar cig na rnal 'byor pa 'od zer mtha' yas kyi snang ba nga ba la nam mkha'i dkyil nas/_bud med dkar mo za 'og gi na bza' dang dar thod can gser g.yus brgyan pa zhig byung nas bla ma la thim pa mthong dus/_bla ma bzhengs te ngas sngar mi shes pa'i rdo rje'i glu zhig bya'o gsungs mgur bzhengs pa/_lhun grub gdod nas stong pa ka dag dang*/_/bde gshegs kun bzang yab yum la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/sems nyid spros dang bral ba chos nyid dang /_/gti mug rang sar dag pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/rnam snang nang na yod de phyi na med/_/bde gshegs sangs rgyas rigs la gsol ba 'debs/_/skye med bsam yul 'das pa'i gnas lugs nyid/_/rang shar rang ngo shes par byin gyis rlobs/_/rig rtsal 'char gzhi ma 'gags me long dang /_/zhe sdang rang sar grol ba'i ngo bo nyid//mi bskyod nang na yod de phyi na med/_/bde gshegs rdo rje'i rigs la gsol ba 'debs/_/'gyu ba stong gsal 'dzin med gnas lugs nyid//rang shar rang ngo shes par byin gyis rlobs/_/blang dor dgag sgrub med pa mnyam nyid dang /_/nga rgyal rang sar dag pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/rin 'byung nang na yod de phyi na med/_/bde gshegs rin chen rigs la gsol ba 'debs/_/thams cad phyam brdal gnas lugs mnyam pa nyid/_/rang shar rang ngo shes par byin gyis rlobs/_/bde stong dbyings su nub pa kun rtog dang /_/'dod chags rang sar dag pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/_/'od dpag nang na yod de phyi na med//bde gshegs pad+ma'i rigs la gsol ba 'debs/_/bde stong gzung 'dzin nub pa'i gnas lugs nyid/_/rang shar rang ngo shes par byin gyis rlobs/_/rig pa thal byung rang grol bya grub dang /_/phrag dog rang sar dag pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/don grub nang na yod de phyi na med/_/bde gshegs las kyi rigs la gsol ba 'debs/_gang shar shugs 'byung 'gags med gnas lugs nyid/_/rang shar rang ngo shes par byin gyis rlobs/_/dus do nub mar gyi tshes bcu la/_/mkha' 'gros lung bstan mdzad pa'i dus/_/rten 'brel nang du 'dzom pa'i rtags/_/_/dad ldan dam tshig gtsang ba'i rtags/_/_'gro don phyogs med 'byung ba'i rtags/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor brgal ba'i rtags//dga' 'o skyid do dag pa'i zhing /_/'od gsal snod kyi 'jig rten 'di/_/'og min gnas su slebs pa bzhin/_/thams cad lha dang lha mo'i ngang /_/rang rig mya ngan 'das pa snyam/_blang dor dgag sgrub zhig pa snyam/ re dogs 'phrang las 'das pa snyam/_/srid gsum ye nas grol ba snyam//'phro 'du'i rnam rtog 'od lngar nub/_/'od lnga'i snang ba gdod mar nub/_/snang sems gzhi bral chos sku'i ngang /_/tshe 'di yang bde ste phyi ma bde/_/bar dor rang ngo shes pas bde/_/da ni bde nas bde bar 'gro_/glu mchod par 'bul lo dkon mchog gsum/_/thugs dgyes par mdzod cig mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/_/zhes bro brdungs nas dar cig na gnam sgo na yar bud med dmar mo rin po che'i brgyan pa zhig res gsum du snang ba 'gas mthong ba la bsu ba byas pa dang /_bla ma la thim mo/_/dkar mo gcig kyang de bzhin du byon nas thim dus/_sa gzhi bar snang thams cad mkha' 'gros gang bar mthong ngo /_/de'i dus bla ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku phod ka smug nag dang rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gsol nas rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa dkar gsal 'od lnga'i dbus na bzhugs pa la/_res dkar dmar mthing gsum mthong nas rnal 'byor mas cod paN btags te bdud rtsi drangs dus/_thams cad la gtor ma mgo thog tu bzhag nas lung bstan pa dang /_mkha' 'gro'i snang ba byung tshul rnams su la'ang mi bshad pa'i mna' bsgags nas dar cig na/_bud med mthing nag rgyan gyis brgyan pa cig la de 'dra ba dpag tu med pas bskor ba nam mkha' na tshur byon nas bla ma'i sku la thim pa rnal 'byor ma 'gas mthong ngo /_/de nas nam langs su nye ba na thams cad na re nam langs su nye mkha' 'gro yang gyes las che zer ba la/_rnal 'byor ma sngo sangs zhig nyams 'ur nas 'khrab pas/_mkha' 'gro sprin ltar 'thibs pa 'di/_/drin can bla ma'i grub rtags yin/_/chos skyong bla ma bran ltar khol ba 'di/_/drin can bla ma'i phrin las yin/_/'gro drug bu bzhin skyong pa 'di/_/drin can bla ma'i thugs rje yin/_/nyam chung mtho ris 'dren pa 'di/_/drin can bla ma'i byang sems yin/_/ci yod chos phyogs gtong ba 'di/_drin can bla ma'i rnam thar yin/_/zer ro/_/de nas nyi shu drug gi dro khar rnal 'byor ma bla yer nyal dus/_skyes pa lo bco brgyad lon pa phod ka can dang /_bu mo lo bcu drug ma shin tu mdzes pa zhig dang /_mkha' 'gro mang po bar snang la 'cham po mdzad pa mthong nas/_chos gsungs te de rnams nyan cing bla ma longs sku'i cha lugs su mthong ngo /_/mtshan dus rnal 'byor ma 'ga' gzim chung yod dus/ bud med skra'i gos can ral pas gnam sa khebs pa rin po che'i brgyan pa zhig dang*/_/sngags pa dkar po zhig dang /_bka' srung gi rigs mon pa dang*/ a tsa ra'i rnam pa mang po gtor ma len du byon dus/_rnal 'byor pa 'od zer mtha' yas bred de 'di na tshur byung ngo zer ro/_/de nas sang nyi shu bdun khrid 'chad dus/_sngar gyi slob ma dam tshig nyams pa zhig byung bas/_grib kyis thams cad skad 'gags rig pa mig gsal te sang gnang bar chad 'od zer ba de yin par snang ngo /_/do nub srod la bla ma'i drung du bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa dar zab can gnyis bdud rtsi gsol zhal bkang ba 'dren pa 'od zer mtha' yas kyis mthong ngo /_/mkha' 'gro mang pos phyag dang bskor ba yang byed do/_/de dus rnal 'byor ma dkar sangs zhig gis gzim chung du bud med gnyis song ba mthong ngo /_/de'i tho rangs rnal 'byor pho mo thams cad kyis skad ma thon par bla ma la zhus pas/_na rag gi skong bshags mdzad pas/_'phral la nam mkha' dwangs shing grib sangs te/_bla ma'i nam mkha' la pad+ma'i sdong po la paN+Di ta lnga tsam res snang res mi snang zhing /_'dab ma la phra mos brgyan pa mthong nas dga' ston mdzad do/_/de byis pa'i gzugs nyin nyi shu rtsa brgyad la chos gsung dus lho nub nas slob dpon pad+ma dkar gsal za 'og gi ber dang sha ba'i mnyen zhu can mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pas bskoRa ba byon nas bla ma la thim pa rnal 'byoRa ma gsum tsam gyis mthong ngo*/_/de nub srod la rnal 'byor pa 'od zer mtha' yas kyis khong rang bla ma'i drung na gcer bu rus pa dang rin po che'i brgyan nas bla ma'i steng gi nam mkha' la bun bun 'gro bas mchod pa byed par mthong ngo /_/de dus nam mkha'i dkyil na tshur bud med smug nag gsum 'khrab cing /_/nga yong yong bde chen gyi gnas nas yong /_/las can gyi slob ma nyul du yong /_/dam tshig gi gtsang sbra lta ru yong /_/'gro don mdzod cig rigs kyi bu/_/zer ba bla ma dang rnal 'byor pho mo lnga drug tsam gyis mthong zhing /_bla ma yang longs skur snang ngo /_/yang nyi shu dgu'i snga dro rnal 'byoRa ma zhig na re chang bsing ran/ mkha' 'gro mang po 'dus nas 'dug zer ro/_/de nub lung bstan pa'i dga' ston byed pas tshogs gtor shoms shig gsungs pas/_ji ltar bsham zhus pas/bla mas dbus su dpal yon tan tham cad rgyas par byed pa'i dpal gtor chen po gcig_/shar du rdo rje phag mo srog sgrub gnyis la dpal gtor re/_rdo rje g.yu sgron la sman leb gcig_/dmar nag gi gza' bshos phyed tel can gcig_/lha rabs mched dgu'i zlum gtor gcig_/bstan ma bcu gnyis kyi sman leb gcig dang dpal gtor gnyis/_ldang lha'i btsan bshos gcig_/byang gi mgor sngags srung gi dpal gtor gcig_/mkha' 'gro spyi'i zlum gtor gcig_/gza' bdud kyi bshos bu dgu bskor cig_/dam can gyi bshos bu mkhar thabs cig_pe dkar gyi gsang bsang phyi gcig_/nub tu re ma ti mched lnga'i dpal gtor re/_gzhi bdag gi dkar gtor gcig_/ lhor legs ldan/_gdong bzhi pa/_mi thung /_bya rog ma seng ge'i gdong can rnams kyi dpal gtor re'i mthar mgron glo bur pa'i zlum gtor gcig_/ pha tshad du bgegs gtor gcig rnams shoms shig gsungs so/_/de dus bsangs chu ma bran pa dang*/_sha brjed pa dang /_bdud rtsi brjed pa rnams la/ nga'i der ma byung zer dus bltas pas mi 'dug nas gsos so/_/bdud rtsi'i mchod pa'i skabs su mdun gyi nam mkha'i pad sdong las slob dpon pad+ma za 'og gi 'jol ber sha ba'i gnyen zhu can/_rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i g.yas su bi ma la dkaRa po paN+Di ta'i cha byad g.yas po ti thugs kar 'dzin cing*/ g.yon mnyam gzhag can/_mkhur tshos gnyis rgya skegs kyis byugs pa 'dra ba dang /_/_mdun na mkha' 'gro mang pos mi rkang gi gling bu 'bud cing / g.yon du rdo rje phag mo'i sku gcig gis nam mkha' gang ba mkha' 'gro'i cha byad can dang /[ · ]rgyab na tshur sngags pa mang po 'chams shing /_mkha' 'gro gser gyi go shubs can glu gar byed pa mang pos bskor nas bzhugs pa/ rnal 'byor ma zhig gis mthong dus de dag gis bla ma la dbang bskur nas thim pa dang /_bla mas bzhengs te ngas rdo rje'i gla sngar mi shes pa zhig blang ngo gsungs nas bzhengs pa/_dga' 'o skyid do rnal 'byor kun/_/dus do nub 'og min dag pa'i zhing /_/rang lus lha yi pho brang na/_/stong gsal zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor rgyas/_/sangs rgyas phyi na med de nang na yod/_/dus do nub bde chen gyi nyi zla shar/_/ma rig gi mun pa sangs snying 'dod/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skam snying 'dod/_/bdag 'dzin gyi sprin tshogs dengs pa yin/_/chos brgyad kyi mkhar spe zhig pa yin/_/re dogs kyi 'phrang las 'das pa yin/_/ 'di dpal ldan bla ma'i bka' drin yin/_/bla ma phyi na med de nang na yod/_/ ka dag lhun grub kyi bla ma de/_/gsal stong 'dzin med kyi ngang la bzhugs/_/ 'char sgor sna tshogs kyi maN+Dal 'bul/_/rtog med rang mdangs kyi yon chab 'bul/_/rang gsal 'dzin med kyi me tog 'bul/_/rang grol chig chod kyi bdug spos 'bul/_/_/nyin mtshan kha sbyor snang gsal 'bul/_/'dzin med rang shar gyi dri chab 'bul/_/_/dga' bde lhun grub kyi zhal zas 'bul/_/ grags stong skye med kyi sil snyan 'bul/_/phyi sna tshogs yul gyi mchod pa rnams/_/shar grol 'dzin med kyi ngang nas 'bul/_/nang 'byung bzhi lus kyi gtor gzhong du/_/tsit+ta zur brgyad kyi gtor ma la/_/dpa' bo rnam lnga'i gtor rgyan btsugs/_/dwangs ma chen po'i bdud rtsis bran/_/bde gsal 'dzin med kyi mchod pa 'bul/_/gsang ba kun gzhi'i b+han+d+ha ru/_/rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyi sman rag blugs/_/'gyu ba sems kyi dri bsung can/_/ngo bo stong gsal gyi bdud rtsi 'di/_/shar grol dus mnyam gyi skyes bu yis//gzhi rdzogs gdod ma'i lha la 'bul/_/sems dag ye shes kyi nam mkha' la/ mngon sum 'od gsal gyi nyi zla shar/_nyams snang gong 'phel gyi zer gdangs 'phro/_/rig pa tshad phebs kyi dkyil 'khor gang /_/chos dbyings zad pa'i mkha' dbyings su/_/lhun grub 'od gsal gyi zhing khams de/_/ka dag chos zad kyi ngang du thim/_/thim la ma rmugs bum pa'i sku/_/gsal ba 'dzin med rig pa'i gdangs/_/g.yo med chos sku'i ngang la bzhugs/_/gang la gang 'dul gyi 'gro don mdzad/_/'di bya rtsol med pa'i 'bras bu yin/_/ dga' 'o skyid do rdo rje spyan/_/tshe 'di yang bde ste phyi ma bde/_/bar do rang ngo shes pas bde/_/_/lus mi 'gyur ri bo'i dgon pa na/_/sems gcig pur gnas pa'i bsam gtan la/_/yid gcig la ma 'dzin gang bder thong /_/ sems 'phro yang stong la gnas kyang stong /_/gang shar ye shes kyi rol pa yin/_/'di gnyis 'dzin zad na los kyang yin/_/ske med rnam dag gi sems nyid de/_/chos dbyings ye shes kyi rig gdangs yin/_/gnas kyang mi lto gang bder zhog_/bsam mno dgag sgrub kyi 'char gzhi de/_/me long ye shes kyi rigs gdangs yin/_/sems 'phro yang mi lto gang bder thong /_/sems gnyis med mnyam pa'i ngang gcig pa/_/mnyam nyid ye shes kyi rig gdangs yin/_/sems gnas kyang mi lto gang bder zhog_/sems yul la dga' ba'i 'dod chags can/_/kun rtog ye shes kyi rig gdangs yin/_/sems chags kyang mi lto rang ngo ltos/_/sems dgag sgrub thol byung gi rig pa de//bya grub ye shes kyi rig gdangs yin/_/sems 'gyus kyang mi lto gang bder thong /_! rigs lnga lhun rdzogs kyi rig pa 'di/_/ye bzhugs tshul shes pas grol ba yin/_/dpe rmi lam rang ngo shes pa bzhin/_/de klong du gyur na los kyang grol/_/'di lta ba khregs chod kyi gdams pa yin/_/'od gsal lhun grub kyi sgom pa ni/_/_/lus mi g.yo 'od kyi khang bu na/_/_/rtsa dri med shel kyi sbu gu can/_/de rgyang zhags chu yi sgron mar 'brel/_/gnas rin chen rgya mtshoRa 'brel ba'i gdangs/_/phyi sprin bral nam mkha'i dkyil du shar/_/nang ye shes 'od lnga kha dog lnga/_/za 'og ber khyim ris su snang /_/de thig le stong pa'i sgron mas brgyan/_/dbus rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud/_/thig le thig phran 'brel ba ni/_/'dzam bu chu bo'i gser skud la/_rma bya'i mdongs kyis brgyan pa 'dra/ sum bsgrigs 'od kyi snang ba 'di/_/chos nyid mngon sum gyi rang snang yin/_/ de gong du 'phel ba'i snang ba la/_/ye shes mkhar thabs kyi snang ba dang /_/lnga ldan 'od kyi pad+ma stong /_/rtsibs rgyug rin chen dra ba dang /_/'od lnga shel gyi mchod rten mthong /_/thig le stong pa'i khang pa ru/_/thig pa'i sa bon yig 'bru dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phyag mtshan dang /_/yongs rdzogs sku yi snang ba la/_/phyogs mtshams 'od lnga'i zer gdangs 'phro/_rig pa tshad phebs kyi snang ba la/_/_/de rnams lnga lnga zung 'brel mthong /_/gang bltas 'od kyis 'jig rten khyab/_/snying gar zer thag zug pa mthong /_/de tshe rang lus gcig g.yo bas/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams g.yo ba dang /_/rang lus ting 'dzin mnyam gzhag pas/_/thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa dang /_/sku rnams tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/_/chos kyi rnga chen sgrogs pa dang /_/sa dang lam gyi yon tan rdzogs/_/de bzhin rim gyis sa rnams kyi/_/yon tan gong du 'phel ba dang /_/der 'dzin zad pa'i snang ba gnyis/_/mi 'gal gcig tu 'du ba ni/_/_/chos nyid zad pa'i sar phyin te/_/_/rdos bcas lus dang rtog tshogs zad/_/rnam smin las dang bag chags zad/_/ma rig 'khrul gzhi'i sa bon zad/_/snang ba rnams la 'dzin pa zad/_/rdos bcas dag pas 'phel sgo zad/_/rang lus shel gyi khang pa ru/_/'od lnga yul gyi 'phro 'du ltos/_/'od dang rig pa gar 'jug kyang /_lhun grub ka dag ngang du thim/_/ka dag gzhi la btsan sa zin/_/nang gsal sku gsum 'du 'bral med/_/chos sku'i ngang la gzugs sku bzhugs/_/gdul bya'i 'jig rten gang yod du/_/chos sku'i ngang las ma ga_yos par/_/longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i skus/_/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis rgyun mi 'chad/_/tshe 'dir grol ba'i gdams pa yin/_/bar do'i 'phrang la 'gro rtsa na/_/'byung ba rnams ni rim gyis thim/_/'od gsal ba la zhugs pa na/_/rang ngo shes pas gdod mar grol/_/de bzhin tshom bu ye shes dang /_/lhun grub rang ngo shes pas grol/_/rang grol me long mthong ba yin/_/ sku gsum btsan sa zin pa yin/_/sprul pa'i zhing du 'di ltar 'gro/_/_shar mngon dga' mi 'gyur rdo rje'i zhing /_/'di rang snang ston pa'i zhabs drung du/_/ rang shar gyi dam chos nyan dang gcig_/rang grol gyi 'dzin pa zhig dang gnyis/_/lhun grub kyi rang ngo shes dang gsum/_/gzhi rtsa chod pa'i don rtogs nas/_/lho dpal dang ldan par dbang bskur te/_/nub pad+ma brtsegs par lung bstan nas/_/byang las rab grub par dbugs phyung ste/_/gdod ma'i ngang du rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/bzhes dga' 'o skyid do rdo rje'i spun/_/nang 'od lnga'i 'gro ldog shes pa yis/_/phyi 'od gsal gyi nyi zla rgyun du 'char/_/nang rtogs pa'i gzhi rtsa chod pa yis/_/phyi rkyen ngan bde chen gyi grogs su 'char/_/nang dngas ma'i thig le'i rgyas pa yis/_/phyi mkha' 'gro'i sprin phung rgyun du 'du/_/ nang 'od rtsa'i mdud pa grol ba yis/_/phyi gzung 'dzin gyi mdud pa rang sar grol//bde chen 'od gsal gyi sa la 'gro/_/'di dga' 'o skyid do rdo rje'i spun/zhes gsungs pas mkha' 'gro rnams kyang dgyes so/_/de'i sang gnam gang la mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pa rnal 'byor pho mo phal gyis mthong ngo /_/ srod la bud med skra'i lan tshar can nam mkha' khengs pa cig na re nga la gtor ma slong zer ba rnal 'byor pa 'od zer mtha' yas kyis mthong ngo /_/de nas dar cig na phyogs thams cad nas bso sgra 'ur sgra sil chom la sogs pa thams cad kyis thos so/_/dar cig na sngar nyi shu brgyad kyi nyin par gyis snang ba'i mgron rnams byon dus tshogs gtor btang bas/_bud med mthing nag cig rnal 'byor ma zhig gi spyi bo la thim pa rnal 'byor pa rin chen 'od 'phros mthong nas 'khrab bo/_rnal 'byor mas slob dpon pad+ma/_bi ma la mtsho rgyal gsum byon pa mthong ngo /_/de dus g.yu sgron ma dkar mo mched bdun ldem bag dang ldan pa byon nas/_bla ma la phyag 'tshal/_res rnal 'byor ma la thim nas/_nga rdo rje g.yu sgron ma yin nga'i gnas su gshegs par zhu zer ro/_/ bla mas nga khyod kyi gnas su rgyun du sdod dgos gsungs pas/_rgyun du bzhugs na dang dga' ste dgun stod tsam las mi bzhugs pa 'dug zer ro/ khyed nga la 'go ba ci yin dris pas/_gu rus dam la btags nas chos gter gyi phyi la 'brangs pa yin zer ro/_/chos ni pha gi na yod/_'don mkhan ni shi/ 'dir ci byed dris pas/_chos pha gi na yod kyang don 'di na yod khyed tshe 'phos kyang skal ldan tshe ma 'phos pas 'ongs pa yin zer ro/_/bkang srung du yod dris pas/_mang po yod/_khyad par du dpal rdo rje phag mo/_srog sgrub nag mo/_gnod sbyin dmar nag_/rdo rje g.yu sgron ma nga rnams yod/_lha rabs mched dgu_/bstan ma bcu gnyis/_ldang lha rnams kyang yod zer ro/_khrid la mi du 'jug khrid thebs du yod dris pas/_bcu gcig yod dang po gsum gnyan pas mi gsum dang /_bzhi dang lnga rnams rim pa bzhin chug_/lhag ma dgu la bdun bdun mdzod/_lar ni 'di shin du gnyan pas sku tshe la bar chad 'ong nyan yod/_khrid thebs nyung na dga' zer ro/_/nga'i gter shog rnams e yod dris pas/_sib sib nged rnams kyis yid bsgral ba yin mod zer ro/_/de nas dar cig na ngas khyed la dbu ru dngos grub byin pa i dran zer ba la/_bla mas lcog lar sgrub pa byed dus tho rangs shig mkha' 'gro ma gser gyi go zhub can zhig byon nas dbu rgyan bskon pas nyams rtogs bzang po skyes pa de lags sam dris pas/_yin zer ro/_khyed g.yu sgron ma e yin dri pas/_min min rdo rje phag mo yin ngo mi shes sam zer ro/_/ 'di nas thig le gtso bor bshad nas dbang gsum pa rten can du skur ba 'di ji ltar lags dris pas/_de chags can 'jug pa la dgongs pa yin/_chags bral la yid rig tsam gyis bskar ba yin zer ro/_/ngo sprod kyi skabs su rtog pa skye med du 'jog pa dang blo rtsis med du 'jog pa gang yin dris pas/_/_rtog pa la gnyen pos ci byed/_ye grol klong yangs chen mo'i dgongs par ngo sprod cig zer ro/_'o na snying tig 'di bshad pa mang po 'dug pa ngas bshad ci dgos/_/_lung byed pa karma pa dang /_/_rin chen gling pa la sogs pa 'dug pa la brjod pas/_de rnams kyis bshad pa la nged mi dga'/ lung dag rdza la yang yod de des gar chog_/bdag po re yod pas de dgos pa yin mod zer ro/[ · ]rin chen gling pa'i gter rnams ci 'dra yin dris pas/ yin pa yin dag po med zer ro/_/ngas ni khyed ma bsgom na grub pa ci yin dris pas/_/_nga la sgom pa'i lha 'dug gam/_bzlas pa'i sngags 'dug gam/ mchod pa'i yul 'dug gam/_rnal 'byor dam tshig dang rtogs pa ldan pa kun la rgyun du yod pa mi shes sam/_khyed kyi'ang tshe rabs thams cad du nga dang 'du 'bral med pa yin zer ro/_/mchims phur sbas pa'i lha lcam gyi nor yod pa de ci 'dra zhig na 'dug dris pas/_brag lha bshos 'dra ba zhig la rtse mo med pa zhig na 'dug_/da rung dus la ma bab zer ro/_/bi ma la'i gter de ji tsam na 'don dris pas/_da nas lo bco lnga na sngags pa dkar po zhig gis bton nas bsgyur te dar bar byed/_de na zab pa pod bzhi 'dug_khyed rang gi lag tu yod pa 'dug zer ro/_/ de nas zla ba tshes pa'i tshes gcig la rnal 'byor pa 'od zer go cha dpe len du btang nas/_lam du 'ongs dus 'ja' tshon gyi sna dpe la zug cing 'khor ba dang /_khyad par du 'phyug po brag tu slebs pa'i mtshan mo de dang ri mo can gnyis 'ja' tshon kha dog lngas 'brel ba rnal 'byor pho mo kun gyis mthong ngo /_/dge bshes blo rin gyi rmi lam du bud med cig na re/_khong mtha' la bzhud dgongs kyang nged mi gtong dgos par yod zer zhing 'dug pa bshad do/_/tshes dgu la dpe rnams gdan drangs te de nub skong bshags mdzad nas tshogs la rol dus/_mkha' 'gro babs nas/_bla ma dang slob ma gdams par 'dzom zer zhing gar mang po mdzad do/_/de nas tshes bcu la sngar bas kyang mkha' 'gro'i 'du ba rgya che ba rnal 'byor pho mo mang pos mthong zhing /_bcu gcig gi nyin par sngar gyi khrid thon nas khrid mi rnying pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo rnams gyes dus ye shes mtsho rgyal rnal 'byor ma zhig la babs nas/_mkha' 'gro'i rang sgra mang po sgrogs shing srod la me mchod chen po mdzad nas/_la la la dngos grub phra mor byin nas phyogs gcig tu cang smra bar ma byed cig zer nas bzhag_/_/snod thams cad kha phye dngos grub 'bebs pa'i rten 'brel mdzad/_bla ma*la*dngos grub kyi rdzas rnams rim gtad nas 'gro don che zhing longs spyod phul sum tshogs pa 'ong bar 'dug gsungs so/_/dngos grub rnams bla ma'i gzim chung du bskyal nas nam langs so/_/de nas nyi ma shar dus rnal 'byor pho mo gnyis tsam phyir song dus mtshams dam par bcad de mkha' 'gro'i rang sgra sna tshogs sgrogs shing gar mdzad nas/_/_bcu gnyis kyi srod la chos sgo 'byed pa'i thugs dgongs mdzad dus/_ka pA la dang /_me long dang /_bum pas mkha' 'gro'i dbang gi brda rnams rdzogs par mdzad do/_/de dus yum mkha' ngo sprod kyis snang srid 'od snang du 'char ba'i gdams pa bstan to/_/de nub bzhi pa'i ngo sprod sngaRa ma 'khrungs pa bla ma'i thugs la 'khrungs so/_/de dus nam mkha'i skar ma la sogs pa 'di ci yin dris dus/_lhar bsam pa'i bla ma la sogs 'dug ces brjod pas/_kha cig snyam na rdzun du 'dug gang byas kyang chog snyam pa byung zhing /_sgo lnga ka la de bzhin du byas te/_sgra'i skabs su dbyug pa la dril bu brgyus te sa la brdung zhing cir thos ci skad zer la 'ur shod dris pas/_la las snga ma bzhin the tshom du smras so/_/de dus bla ma rang gis gang btags pa de ltar snang bas chos thams cad gtad med du ngo sprod par go'o/_/de dus rnal 'byor mas sems shes te/_dad pa la sogs pa'i sems la zhen dus/_dga' brod bdud la phaT/_snyems byed bdud la phaT/_gnyis 'dzin bdud la phaT/_ces zer zhing 'ar 'ur mang po byas pas thams cad skrag cing rtab rtab tu gyur/_bla mas chos thams cad skad cig gis gza' gtad dang bral ba'i rtsal sbyong du shes te rtogs pa'i me long du mkhyen no/_/ mtshan mo ye shes dbang lta stangs la sogs pa ngo sprod do/_/de bzhin du nyin mo gar byed cing mkha' 'gro'i rang sgra sgrogs pas song nyin tho rangs bla ma gzims dus/_'od gsal la thugs 'byams te yar ka dag gi snang ba/ bar longs sku'i tshom bu/_mar 'gro drug gi 'char tshul/_sgra skad sna tshogs thos pa la thugs kyis rig cing rags pa med pa'i snang ba dang /_de'i skad cig snga ma na dran bsam rgyun chad nas/_snang ba dmar la mthing pa tsam gyi ngang la brgyal ba bzhin 'byams so/_/ de nas lhun grub kyi snang ba la de bas rig pa rags par 'phros te yar ka dag_/bar longs sku/_mar sprul sku'i ngang du 'byams so/_/de nas dar cig na rnal 'byor ma de 'ong ste snga ma'i de ni gdod ma'i ka dag tu nang gsal thim la ma rmugs par bzhugs pa'i ngo sprod yin no/_/brgyal ba zhes bya ste chos nyid kyi ngang du brgyal bas bslang dgos pa yin no/_/phyi ma ni phyir gsal du sprul sku 'gyed tshul dang /_'khrul pa rim gyis snang tshul rags par shar ba'i ngo sprod yin gsungs so/_/de nas nam mkha' thams cad la sngaRa med pa'i 'ja' tshon bka' srung so so'i gzugs 'dra ba mang po byung ba ci yin dris pas de dag yin gsungs so/_/nyi ma shar dus brda don du ma'i ngo sprad mdzad do/_/nyin gung bla ma khri la bzhugs pa la mtsho rgyal gyis gos sum brtsegs pa gsol te/_thams cad kyis yon phul phyag 'tshol de ring bu 'bogs dgos par yod zer nas/_so so nas phyag rten phul dus/_bkra shis dpag tu med pa brjod pas nam mkha' 'ja' tshon gyis khengs pa'i tshe bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen gzhan don rgya cher 'grub pa gdan sar bsko ba la nam mkha' 'di 'dra zhig 'ong ba yin gsungs so/_/bla ma la dngos grub re byin nas ci yin gsungs dus/_dpal 'byor rgya mtsho yin/_gzhan don lhun grub yin zhes pa la sogs pa dang /_grangs du 'dug gsungs pa la 'bum phrag grangs med 'dug ces pa la sogs pas lan btab pas 'gro don phun sum tshogs pa zhig 'byung bar 'dug gsungs so/ ma'i dbu la dbu rgyan gyi dod du mgron tshom lnga bzung ste dar sngon dmar gyi cod paN dpyangs nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa mang pos mnga' gsol cing /_srod la gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba'i rten 'brel mdzad do/_/ngo sprod kyi rjes la mkha' 'gros 'ar 'ur mang po byung bas/_/'di 'dra chos gter gzhan 'byed pa la e yong na gsungs so/_/ngo sprod phyi ma'i nyi ma 'char khar bla mas nub ri mdun ma de'i steng gi nam mkha' la seng+ge'i khri dar zab kyi 'bol gdan can rgyab yol dra ba ris phra mos brgyan pa/_rin po /phyi 'phred bla che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/_steng na rma bya'i gdugs yod pa zhig gzigs pa dang /_rnal 'byor ma na re 'di slob dpon chen po rig 'dzin gyi khri yin/ khyed rang 'di la gnas pa'i brda yin/_da rung ltos shig gsungs nas bltas pas phyogs thams cad 'od lnga'i rang bzhin la/_thig les brgyan pa'i snang ba chen po gzigs pa dang /_sku dang ye shes kyi zhing snang yin gsungs so/_/ de nas bla ma nyin phyed khri la bzhugs dus mkha' 'gro snying tig gi po ti/_zhi khro'i thang ka_/rdo rje sems dpa'i me long rnams dang /_tshe'i bum pa bdud rtsi'i ka pA la phul nas gzhan rnams kyang phyag rten re 'bul du bcug ste/_phyag 'tshal shis pa mang po brjod nas gzhan don mdzad par zhu zhes rjes gnang mdzad do/_/de'i phyi dro bla ma'i gsung gis ngas khrid rim sdeb dgos gsungs nas dpe zhal phye ba dang /_gu ru thugs sgrub kyi cha lugs su byon nas bla ma la thim pa'i g.yas na mtsho rgyal dang /_g.yon na g.yu sgron ma khrid tshig dpod pa rnal 'byor ma zhig gis mthong ngo*/_/de dus khrid rim gnyis kyi gzhung tshan so sor phye nas tho yig tu mdzad do/_/de ltar tshes gcig nas bcu gsum gyi bar nyin zhag drug tu ye shes mtsho rgyal dngos su babs nas mkha' 'gro snying tig gi brda don dpe gsum gyi ngo sprod rdzogs par gtad rgya dang bcas pa bla ma dam pa dri med 'od zer te pad+ma las 'brel rtsal la gnang nas o rgyan du gshegs so/_khrid kyi skabs thams cad du bla ma khri la bzhugs dus o rgyan yab yum byon nas thim par mthong dus/_dmigs pa dang ngo sprod dang brjod tshul ngo mtshar can sngar med cing yi ge na mi gsal ba mang po 'phral la rang rdol du 'byon cing gzi brjid kyang sngon pas che bar snang ngo*/_/de nas tshes bcu bzhi'i snga dro bla ma'i gsung gis de ring nas khrid 'jugs pas thams cad tshogs la mchod gtor shoms shig gsungs nas bshams te bla ma khri la byon dus nam mkha' thams cad 'jas gang dus/_rnal 'byor ma kha cig gi snang ba la/_bla ma la gu ru yab yum dang bi ma la byon nas thim pas bla ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur mthong /_chos gsung dus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chos kyi gsung sgras khyab cing /_mkha' 'gro sprin phung 'thibs pa tsam gyis chos nyan par mthong ngo*/_/de nas bzung ste khrid rgyab ma thon gyi bar du nyin mtshan tshogs kyi 'khor lo/_/mkha' 'gro'i 'du ba 'ja' tshon gyi snang ba dpag tu med pas khyab pa rnal 'byor pa kun gyis mthong ngo*/_/tshes bcu bzhi'i srod dbang gi sngon 'gro mdzad dus bla ma'i dbu thog na rma bya'i gdugs sum brtsegs pa gser gyi tog gis mtshan pa zhig skyes pa gos dang rgyan thams cad seRa por yod pa zhig gis 'dzin cing /_'phan dang rgyal mtshan 'dzin mkhan med pa mang po rang bzhin gyis 'dug pa rnal 'byor pa 'od zer mtha' yas la sogs pa 'ga'i dngos snang mthun par mthong ngo /_/de dus mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pa yang 'dus nas chos nyan no/_/bco lnga'i nyin mo thig mdzad dus thig sna gcig nas bud med dmar mo zhig gis bzung nas 'debs par snang zhing /_do nub kyang mkha' 'gro'i 'du ba dang gdugs dang 'phan lding 'phyaRa ba mthong ngo /_/bcu drug gi nyin mo bla ma gcig pus dkyil 'khor bzhengs dus bud med dar zab kyi gos can gser g.yus brgyan pa zhig gis 'bri grogs byas te phyogs bzhir dus mnyam du 'bri ba mthong ngo*/_/de dus sngon pas mgyogs shing legs par grub pas bla ma'i gsung gis/_sngon bas mkhas la mgyogs par 'dug gsungs so/_/ de nub spros bcas bum dbang rdzogs par mdzad do/_/de nas nub dbang gong ma mdzad par dgongs nas/_sngon 'gro'i skabs su rnal 'byor pho mo bdun tshogs pas/_mkha' 'gro'i rtags glo bur ba byung ste bla ma la shangs khrag byung nas bla ma'i gsung gis/_dbang 'di la gsum las mi tshud pa la bdun 'dug_khyed bzhi phyir song gsung dus/_dbang khang la 'ja' tshon sna lnga zug par mthong ngo /_/dbang bskur dus su mkha' 'gro'i ltas dang snang ba ya mtshan can byung ngo /_/de'i sang nyin nas khrid rgyab ma thon gyi bar du sngon chad yul de na med pa'i bya rog ya mtshan can gnyis nyin re bzhin chos kyi skabs su byung ngo /_/spyod pa ba rnams la skyel bsu yang mdzad do/_/nyi shu dgu'i nam gung la nam gru re ma ti babs nas/_nga la gtor ma mi ster ba e yin ngas dka' las yun ring byas pa la zer dus thams cad skyi zing zing byed cing su yin dris pas/_nga tshos kun na yod/_gtsug tor tshun chad na yod pa la zer ro/_/_/yang dris pas/_nga nam gru re ma ti yin khyed kyi gter bsrungs pas sbyangs zer ro/_/ci yod dris pas/_na bza' dang slob dpon gyi chos gos thod pa dang bcas pa yod do/_/gtod snyam nas yong pa yin/_/ngas sngar khyed la cho 'phrul tsam bstan yang nga ngo ma shes/_kha sang nas thams cad la gtor tshogs bzang po byin nas/_nga la med pas nga kha skyengs nas thams cad 'phrog tu bcug pa yin zer dus zhud chen po byung ngo /_khyed du yod dris pas nged lnga yod zer/_sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dris pas/_nga nam gru ri ma ti nag mo dril rta rkang bzhi zhon pa g.yas ral gri g.yon nad kyi rkyal pa 'dzin pa dang /_'dod khams dbang phyug ma dmaRa mo drel rta rkang gsum chibs pa dang /_rdo rje phra med ma ljang gu dred mo lag pa g.yob pa la zhon pa dang /_rdo rje dbang phyug ma ser mo drel rta rkang gsum pa dang /_/rdo rje las sgron ma dkar mo drel rta rkang gsum dang /_de thams cad phyag mtshan b+han+d+ha dang phur pa thogs pa la/_'dod khams dbang phyug ma shang lang dang nad kyi rkyal pa 'dzin pa yin zer ro/_/gter gyi cho 'phrul dang 'ar 'ur mang po zhag gsum du byas so/_/de nas khregs chod kyi nub mo yang babs nas cho 'phrul ston dus bla mas gsungs pa/_nga nang 'od gsal gyi gter sgo 'byed pa la/_! brag ser ka'i gter gyis dgos pa med/_/nga gter yod kyang cho ga la med kyang chog_/skal ldan yin kyang chog la min kyang chog_/nga chos zad blo zad kyi rnal 'byor la/_khyed gter bsrungs kyi yus che 'tshong mi dgos/_zhes gsungs pas de rnams kyis kyang lan re byas te/_phar lan tshur lan 'ga' mdzad nas/_dus la babs pa dang 'don pa'i zhal bzhes mdzad pas dga'o/_/ de nub o rgyan yab yum mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pas bskor ba byon nas byin gyis brlabs te snga ma la thim pa mthong ngo /_/snga ma'i dbang gi skabs su yang de 'dra ba mthong ngo /_/sang nyin thod rgal ngo sprod dus snga dro'i dro bar kha na nam mkha'i shar nub la mthing shun gyi snam bu brkyang pa lta bu'i snang ba nam mkha' dwangs pa'i kha dog dang mi 'dra ba rgyang grags phyed tsam gyi zhing yod pas thad ka'i nam mkha' chod dus bla ma'i zhal nas/_'od mthing ga khyab pa chen pos 'od bya ba 'di 'dra zhig 'ongs pa yin gsungs dus/_byang shar du 'ja' tshon sngon dang mi 'dra ba'i kha dog lnga ldan shar bas/_'o nang dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgron ma 'di 'dra zhig 'ongs pa yin/_'di na phar ltos dang*/[ · ]thig le stong pa'i sgron ma rang bzhin gyis 'char ba yin gsung dus/_nam mkha' yang sprin gcig tsam yang med par dwangs la byang du dud kha'i snang ba ya mtshan can dang*/_byang shar du lnga ldan dang /_thad kar mthing ga'i snang ba ya mtshan can mthong dus thod rgal ngo sprod mdzad pas/_mkha' 'gro'i snang ba dang /_ltas mang po yang po yang sngon bas lhag par mthong ngo*/_de nub rgyab chos dang rin po che gsang ba'i ngo sprod pas ye shes mtsho rgyal bum pa bsnams nas dbang bskur ba rnal 'byor mas mthong nas/_thams cad la 'ur langs phyag 'tshol zer ro/_de nas sang gnang nyin bar do ngo sprod mdzad dus/_'od gsal sbubs 'jug 'pho ba'i ngo sprod mdzad pas/_mkha' 'gro du ma dgyes dus/_bla ma'i gsung gis/_nga'i chos 'di la mi bas mi ma yin gtsigs che bar 'dug_/don gnyer dang 'dun pa che khyed rang tsho sems la zhogs gsungs so/_/_/ sang nyin khrid kyi skabs su ye shes mtsho rgyal nyi ma'i phyogs nas DA dril dkrol zhing bla ma'i sku la thim pa rnal 'byor pa pa 'ong zer mtha' yas la sogs pa 'gas mthun snang du mthong ngo /_/tshes bcu drug gi nub mo 'od gsal ye shes kyi ngo sprod mdzad pas/_mtha' skor dang bar snang thams cad mkha' 'gros 'khrigs te thal mo spar kha mthong ngo /_/de nas tshes bcu bdun gyi nyi ma nub dus glo bur du bla ma'i gsung gis/_tshogs gtor bzang du shoms/_do nub mkha' 'gro don gyi dbang byed gsung nas mdzad dus/ sngags srung babs nas gar mdzad do/_/bla mas nged mkha' 'gro snying tig de bzhin ston pa yin/_khyed bka' srung dang mkha' 'gro rnams e dga' gsungs pas/_thugs la btags/_gu ru dang ye shes mtsho rgyal de bzhin gsung gzhan ga na yod ngo mtshar che/_sbyir mkha' 'gro thams cad dga'/_o rgyan rdzong na mkha' 'gro ma zhig lhag par gsol ba 'debs shing mnyes nas gda' zer ro/_/de nas dar cig na skyes bu chen po babs te/_do nub las dag dam tshig gtsang bas yong /_khyed kyi gdul bya nyi ma lho nub mtshams na yod zer ro/_/ga na yod dris pas/_'di nas nyi ma gsum tsam phyin pa na snye'i phyogs kyi ri la gu ru'i bzhugs gnas o rgyan rdzong bya ba'i brag phug che ba mkha' 'gro rang bzhin gyis 'du zhing de na rgyun du mkha' 'gro mang po rang bzhin gyis gnas pa yod/_de khyed kyis bzhugs
