gnas yin/_chos dang 'gro don shin tu 'phel/_der gshegs par zhu zer ro/_/'o na nga la slob ma 'gro don byed pa du yod dris pas sum cu 'ongs/_de'i nang nas sems can du ma la phan pa bcu gcig 'ongs/_khyad par can dgu 'ongs zer nas dar cig na khyed tsho bla ma 'di 'dra dang 'phrad pa 'tshengs pa yin zer dus/_thams cad kyis thos par mkha' 'gro'i rang sgra de ri ri ba dang /_sil chom dang 'ur chom mang po byung ngo /_/tshes brgyad kyi phyi dro chos skyong gi gtad rgya byed dus/_srog sgrub mas nga'i sgrub thabs mi klog pa zhu zer ba rnal 'byor ma zhig gis thos so/_/de nas dar cig na nyi ma nub dus bla ma'i gsung gis/_mkha' 'gro snying tig gi dbang khrid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas do nub gzob cig_/ gsung dus chang mi gda' zhus pas/_kha sing nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis dngos grub byin pa yin/_do nub mkha' 'gro bos kyang e yong blta'o sbang rdza la chu rgyob la tshogs shig ngas byin gyis brlab bo gsung nas/_de bzhin btsags pas rdza ma gcig gang byung /_des chog las che zhus pas/_do nub tsam dgos byed pa yin mi 'dang na tshogs shigs gsungs nas btsags pas thams cad chang rgod btsags pa ltar byung nas rnal 'byor pho mo thams cad bzi ba byung dus/_nga dngos pos sprul bsgyur byed pa bya ba yin gsungs nas ku re yang mdzad do/_/de dus g.yu sgron mas nga'i gnas su gshegs par zhu zer nas byung ba la zhal bzhes mdzad pas dga' nas sngon la 'gro bar zhu zer nas song dus/_sngags srung babs_sa nas bzhud dus thugs dkrugs pa zhig 'ong bar 'dug zer ro/_/de nas dar cig na nam gru ma babs te mi bzhud par zhu zer dus/_bla mas khyed mi ma yin rnams la ngas zab chos de 'dra bshad kyang go ba mi 'dug_/dga' mi dga' blo'i cho 'phrul yin mod/_nga yod sar shog zer nas ma gnang bar/_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bskur zhig mdzad pas ngo mtshar che thugs la btags zer ro/_khar sang nas gar phyin dris pas/_'brog tu phud cig sdud du phyin zer ro/_/de dus phyugs nad mang po byung 'dug go_/de nas rnal 'byor pho mo rnams kyis rang rang gi gos dang / rgyan dang rin po che la sogs pa'i maN+Dal phul/_sgrub pa'i dam bca' byas pas/_bla ma'i gsungs gis nga'i chos 'di la gtong phod che zhing sgrub pa la brtson pa mang po 'byung bar 'dug gsungs nas dgyes te 'od gsal sbubs 'jug gi gdams pa shin tu zab pa zhig gsungs so/_/de dus nga'i gdams pa 'di 'dra 'dzam bu gling na dkon pas 'od lus myur tu 'grub pa yod gsungs so/_/de nas tshes bcu gsum la dbang gong ma mdzad dus/_sngar gyi slob ma khams pa zhig gis mi rigs pa'i spyod pas thugs dkrugs dus/ chos 'di la slob ma dam nyams re yong bar 'dug gsungs nas skong bshags cig mdzad de gshegs so/_/'gro khar thugs dkrugs pa zhig 'ongs zer ba de yin par gda'o/_/de nas 'ongs pa'i lam kha 'phyug po brag tu tshogs mdzad dus 'ja' tshon mang po byung zhing mkha' 'gro'i ltas mang po yang byung ngo /_/de nas gshegs pa'i lam du sprin med pa'i nyi ma tsha bas gdungs pa na/_gsol 'debs mdzad pas glo bur du sprin 'dus rlung rab tu mi che ba langs te g.yu sgron mas bsu ba'i snang ba yang byung ste/_mchil mor tshogs mdzad pas mkha' 'gro'i ltas du ma yang byung ngo*/_/de nas shug gseb tu gdan drangs dus/_rnal 'byor ma zhig la mkha' 'gro babs nas zhag drug tu mkha' 'gro'i rang sgra sgrogs shing bla ma o rgyan du gshegs par zhu zer ro// de dus su 'ja' tshon rgyun ma chad par nyin re bzhin byung ngo //de nas gangs ri thod dkaRa du ri khrod btab nas o rgyan rdzong du btags te bzhugs shing /_dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas pa mdzad dus su'ang mkha' 'gro glo bur du babs shing ltas mang po dang nam mkha' 'jas khengs shing /_gzim khang dang nam mkha' 'ja' tshon lnga ldan gyis 'brel ba skabs su byung ba kun gyis mthong ngo /_/de nas dbang khrid rnams grub rting rnal 'byor pa 'od zer go chas sngar gyi mkha' 'gro snying tig gi gdams pa rnams la dbang khrid ngo sprod la sogs pa'i yig cha mdzad par zhus te/_tshogs gtor gyi sbyin bdag byas te/_ston zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad nas sku mtshams mdzad cing /_bcu nas yig cha'i dbu btsugs pas/_nam mkha' 'jas khengs shing mkha' 'gro'i rnam 'gyur dang /_gzims lam du gsol ba 'debs pa'i bud med dang /_skyes pa'i tshogs mang pos phyag 'tshal bskor ba byed cing /_thugs la btags thugs rjes 'dzin par zhu zer ba byung zhing mtshan mo phyogs thams cad du mkha' 'gro'i rang sgra mang po dang /nye 'khor gyi sgom chen pa rnams la'ang cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pa sngar med pa du ma byung ngo*/_/de ltar zla ba dang po dang*/_ston zla gnyis pa'i bar du nyin mtshan du bla ma mkha' 'gro la gsol ba 'debs shing yig cha mdzad dus/_gzhan phan thogs pa'i rten 'brel dang gzims lam dang /_nyams snang dpag tu med pa dang /_nyin re bzhin gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul gzim chung gi steng du 'ja' 'od 'khyil ba dang /_'od kyi snang ba ya mtshan can mang po byung ngo /_/de nas ston gyi zla ba gsum pa'i tshes gcig la yongs su rdzogs par grub pa'i dga' ston mdzad nas/_rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis bkra shis brjod dus nam mkha' 'jas khengs te bkra shis pa'i rtags bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung ngo /_/de 'dra'i bla ma dpal ldan chos kyi rje/_/gu ru'i thugs sras dri med 'od zer ni/_/gang dang gang du bzhugs pa de dang der/_/rang bzhin mkha' 'gro'i 'du ba rgyan mi chad/_/bkra shis dge mtshan du mas rab brgyan cing /_/'gro ba'i don gnyis mdzad la nor bu bzhin/_/sngon rabs dus nas thugs rje'i rlabs che bas/_/mgon du mdzad pa de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/bla ma la gus gtsug gi nor bu bzhin/_/bdog pa kun gyis rtag tu mchod mdzad cing /_/gang la'ang ma chags dngos 'dzin 'khrul pa zhig_/gza' gtad bral ba'i spyod la dgyes mdzad pa/_/'gro ba'i lam ston de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/ rtag tu zhi la yang dag rab gzhol bas/_/rnam g.yeng mi mang spros pa kun las 'das/_/gzhan yang de la sbyor bas legs bskul bas/_/ting 'dzin glang po de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/gong du 'od gsal chu zla stong pa'i ngang /_/ rang yang bzhugs nas 'gro ba 'god par mdzad/_/nyon mongs rtag zhi dben pa'i ri ngogs su/_/drang srong spyod pa kun gyi legs gnas pa'i/_/'phags pa'i brtul zhugs nor bdun gtsor mdzad pa/_/zhi ba'i mdzod brnyes de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/shes bya'i skar tshogs thugs la rab bkra bas/_/ji snyed ji bzhin gzigs pa rnam par dag_/tshig don sna tshogs thabs kyis 'gro 'dul ba/_/mkhas pa'i bla ma de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/rang gzhan gzhungalugs rgya mtsho'i snying po las/_/zab mo'i de nyid gzigs pa mtha' yas pas/_/nges don rgyud sde'i dgongs pa gtsor mdzad pa/_/gsang sngags sdong po de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/sku tshe snga ma'i snga mar legs sbyangs pas/_/ phal cher thos pas don rnams thugs su chud/_/rang byung pad+ma'i dgongs gter rgyas mdzad pa'i/_/bstan pa'i mnga' bdag de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/ 'di yi gzhung lugs zab cing rgya che bas/_/thar par 'gro ba'i shing rta rin chen mchog_/rdo rje snying po'i theg pa gsal mdzad pa/_/rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du 'gro sgrol ba'i/_/thugs rje mnga' ba de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/ji snyed mkhyen kyang da dung legs bshad 'tshol/_/sgom las 'das kyang da dung dben par dgyes/_/nyon mongs brgal yang da dung bag med 'jom/_/rgya mtsho ltar zab de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/lta ba'i rang bzhin nam mkha' yangs pa la/_/ sgom pa'i nyi zla rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/_/spyod pa'i 'od stong 'gyed la klong yangs pa/_/dri med 'od zer de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/snga rabs goms pa'i byin rlabs pad rdzing las/_/skal bzang bung ba'i tshogs rnams dga' mdzad cing /_/dam chos bdud rtsis 'gro kun tshims mdzad pa/_/pad+ma las 'brel rtsal la gus phyag 'tshal/_/thugs rje'i rang bzhin dpag yas gting mtha' med/_/mtha' grol ye babs gzhi rdzogs chen po'i ngang /_/dus gsum dus bzhi dus rnams rgyun chad med/_/klong chen rab 'byams de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/'di yi ma chags gtong ba'i khyad par can/_/chos chen char gyis 'gro ba bsil mdzad gnyis/_/phan tshun 'gran la rab tu zhugs pa'i tshe/_/ 'jig rten chos brgyad rtsad nas bton par 'gyur/_/gang la mi rtog ting 'dzin gru chen dang /_/chos rnams rab 'byed shes rab kha lo sgyur/_/dus dang mthun pa'i ba dan rab g.yo bas/_/thar pa'i skams sar 'gro ba 'dren la brtson/_/dge legs thugs rje'i sprin phung 'khrigs pa las/_byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i char chen rab 'babs pas/_/dad brgya'i pad mtsho ngang gis gang gyur cing /_/phun tshogs lo tog rgyas la mngon sum gyur/_/de 'dra'i mtshungs med chos rje nyi ma ni/_/dri med tshul khrims pad+ma lta bu ste/_/'od zer blo gros bzang po'i las 'brel rtsal/_/mtshan gsum don mthun gyur la gus phyag 'tshal/_/rang gzhan kun gyi don gnyis phun tshogs shing /_/bde legs kun gyi 'byung gnas 'gro ba'i gnyen/_/dam chos kun gyi ye shes bang mdzod ni/_/dus rnams kun tu skye dgu'i bla mar shog_/dad brgya'i chu 'dzin phyogs kyi mthar khyab pas/_/_/snyan pa'i bstod dbyangs sprin gyi rnga sgra can/_/dge legs glog phreng bro gar byed pa yis/_/phan bde'i char chen 'bebs te bsngags par shog_/bsod nams ston ka'i ri bong 'dzin gzugs can/_/ phun tshogs rgyu skar phreng ba'i dbus na mdzes/_/dge tshogs 'od dkar du ma'i snang ba yis/_/zab gter kun+da phyogs bcur rgyas par shog_/'di 'dra'i babs tshul ngo mtshar rmad byung gang /_/skal bzang du ma'i dbang dang bcas pa zhig/dngos su byung yang deng sang dus snyigs pas/_/bdud rigs skye bo'i sgro skur gnas su 'gyur/_/de bas 'di nyid rab tu gsang bar bya/_snying dang 'dra ba gcig la gtod na yang /_/ma spel dam tshigs bka' srung dpang tshugs shig_/chig brgyud bstan la yid ches bskyed phyir gzhag_/tshul 'di gangs ri thod dkar o rgyan rdzong /_/_/'phags pa'i ri ngogs mdzes shing nyams dga' bar/_/phyi rabs skal ldan spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/_/legs sbyar me tog 'bras bu legs smin pas/_/skal ldan bung ba rab tu dga' bar mdzod/_/mthong snang rin po che lo[-\u0f72] re+es bya ba/_dpal o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis snang bar byas pa'i rnal 'byor pa pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis zab gter mngon par 'byung ba'i lo rgyus cha tsam zhig mdor bsdus te rnam par bkod pa 'di re zhig rdzogs so//_//'di rab tu gsang ba'i nan tan du bya'o/_/dge'o//

[8.26 zhal chems dri ma med pa'i 'od]

@#/_/zhal chems dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog ser skor/ zhal chems dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/legs pa'i nyi ma shin tu rmad byung gsal gyur pa/_/thugs rje'i dbang gis sna tshogs rol pa ston mdzad cing /_/mdzad pa'i 'phro 'dus 'gro ba yongs la rjes gzigs nas/_/gdod ma'i gzhi dbyings gzhol bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gis mdzad pa ma lus mthar phyin nas/_skye bo rtag par 'dzin rnams gdul bya'i phyir/_/ grong khyer dam pa shin tu rmad byung ba/_/rtsa mchog grong gshegs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'khor ba'i rang bzhin sngar nas shes zin te/_/'jig rten chos la snying po med pa'i phyir/_/da ni mi rtag sgyu ma'i lus 'dor bas/_/gcig tu phan pa'i gdams ngag bshad kyis nyon/_/tshe 'dir bden par bzung yang bslu bslu 'dra/_/mi rtag snying po med pa'i rang bzhin la/_/yid brtan med ces nges par rtogs byas nas/_/de ring nyid nas dam pa'i chos mdzod cig_/ rtag pa med pa'i mdza' bshes mgron po 'dra/_/re zhig 'dus kyang myur du 'bral bas na/_/sgyu ma'i grogs la chags sems rab spangs te/_/gtan du phan pa dam pa'i chos mdzod cig_/bsags kyang 'jog pa'i nor rdzas sbrang rtsi 'dra/_/rang gis bsags kyang gzhan gyis longs spyod pas/_/rang dbang yod dus bsod nams sbyin pa'i tshogs/_/phyi ma'i lam rgyags da lta grabs mdzod cig_/brtsigs kyang 'jig pa'i khang khyim g.yar po 'dra/_/sdod pa'i dbang med 'gro ba'i gnas skabs yod/_/'du 'dzi'i gnas la chags sred rab spangs te/_/da lta nyid nas dben pa'i gnas brten cing /_/mdza' dang mi mdza' byis pa'i rtsed mo 'dra/_/don med chags sdang 'bar ba'i me dpung can/_/phan tshun 'thab rtsod 'khon 'dzin rab spangs la/_/da lta nyid nas rang gis sems thul cig_/snying po med pa'i bya ba skyu ma 'dra/_/re zhig brtson yang mtha' ma 'bras bu med/_/tshe 'di'i bya bzhag 'jig rten chos spangs la/_/da lta nyid nas thar pa'i lam tshol cig_/dal 'byor lus rnyed rin chen gru bo 'dra/_/sdug bsngal mtsho las sgrol ba'i stobs yod pas/_/le lo snyoms las sgyid lugs sems bor la/_/da lta nyid nas brtson pa'i stobs bskyed cig_/dam pa'i bla ma 'jigs sa'i skyel ma 'dra/_/'khor ba'i dgra las skyob pa'i ded dpon la/_/sgo gsum zol med sri zhu chen po yis/_/da lta nyid nas mchod cing bsten par mdzod/_/zab mo'i gdams pa bdud rtsi'i sman dang 'dra/_/nyon mongs nad rnams gso ba'i mchog yin pas/_/rgyud la brten cing legs par goms pa yis/_/da lta nyid nas klong du 'gyur bar mdzod/_/ bslab gsum rnam dag yid bzhin nor bu 'dra/_/'di phyir bde zhing mthar thug legs pa'i lam/_/byang chub zhi ba dam pa thob pas na/_/da lta nyid nas rgyud la brten par mdzod/_/sna tshogs thos pa rin chen sgron me 'dra/_/gti mug sel zhing thar lam snang bar byed/_/ye shes mig 'byed phan bde'i 'od 'phro bas/_/da lta nyid nas phyogs ris med par mdzod/_/legs par bsam pa gser mkhan mkhas pa 'dra/_/yin min the tshom sgro 'dogs kun gcod pas/_/thos pa'i rang bzhin bsam byung shes rab kyis/_/da lta nyid nas khong du chud par mdzod/_/sgom pa'i rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i ro myong 'dra/_/thos bsam don sgom nyon mongs nad kun zhi/_/spros pa'i mtsho brgal snying po'i pha rol phyin/_/da lta nyid nas nags su bsgom par mdzod/_/lta ba'i rang bzhin dri med nam mkha' 'dra/_/mtho dman rgya chad phyogs lhung kun dang bral/_/ yangs dog med cing smra bsam brjod las 'das/_/da lta nyid nas rtogs pa'i thabs mdzod cig_/sgom pa'i rang bzhin ri bo rgya mtsho 'dra/_/'pho 'gyur med cing dwangs la rnyog pa med/_/rnam g.yeng spros pa'i mtshan ma kun zhi ba|/da lta nyid nas ji bzhin bsgom par mdzod/_/spyod pa'i rang bzhin skye bo mkhas pa 'dra/_/dus su babs dang gang phan gnas skabs shes/_/chags thogs blang dor dgag sgrub sgyu ma'i ngang /_/da lta nyid nas gzung 'dzin grol bar mdzod/_/'bras bu'i rang bzhin ded dpon nor lon 'dra/_/rang nyid 'byor pas gzhan don lhun gyis grub/_/re dang dogs med ngang gis blo bde ba/_/da lta nyid nas thob phyir 'bad par mdzod/_/sems kyi rang bzhin chos dbyings nam mkha' 'dra/_/nam mkha'i rang bzhin sems nyid gnyug ma'i don/_/don la gnyis med mnyam rdzogs chen po ru/_/da lta nyid nas nges par rtogs par mdzod/_/sna tshogs chos rnams me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/snang bas stongs te logs na stong pa med/_/gcig dang tha dad ma brtag nyams dga' bar/_/da lta nyid nas nges par mkhyen par mdzod/_/gzung ba'i yul la 'dzin pa rmi lam 'dra/_/don la gnyis med bag chags gnyis snang ste/_de yang blos btags rang gi ngo bos stong /_/da lha nyid nas gnyis med mkhyen par mdzod/_/'khor 'das rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rtsed mo 'dra/_/bzang ngan snang yang ngo bo mnyam pa nyid/_/thams cad ma skyes nam mkha'i rang bzhin du/_/da lta nyid nas nges par mkhyen par mdzod/_/'khrul snang bde sdug sprul pa'i rang bzhin 'dra/_/dge sdig rgyu 'bras so sor shar dus nas/_/rang bzhin ma skyes ngo bor 'pho 'gyur med/_/da lta nyid nas nges par mkhyen par mdzod/_/ blos btags chos rnams byis pa'i rtsod pa 'dra/_/don la mi gnas rtog pas rab phye nas/_/bzang ngan grub mtha'i phyogs 'dzin so sor zhen/_/da lta nyid nas mnyam nyid mkhyen par mdzod/_/gzhan yang sbyin pa rin chen gter dang 'dra/_/mi zad gong du 'phel zhing 'byor pa'i rgyu/_/tha ma mchog 'bring bsod nams zhing rnams la/_/da lta nyid nas ci 'os sbyin par mdzod/_/tshul khrims dri med shing rta bzang po 'dra/_/mngon mtho nges legs grong khyer bgrod pa'i stegs/_/sdom dang chos sdud sems can don byed rnams/_/da lta nyid nas rgyud la brten par mdzod/_/bzod pa mtsho chen mi 'khrugs mchog dang 'dra//gnod pas mi 'phrog dka' thub nang nas mchog_/sdug bsngal dang len snying rje'i chos sems sogs/_/da lta nyid nas goms shing 'dris par mdzod/_/brtson 'grus me chen phung po 'bar ba 'dra/_/_/mi mthun phyogs bsregs dge la yang dag spro/_/sgyid lugs snyoms las le lo med pa yis/_/ da lta nyid nas thar lam sgrubs par mdzod/_/bsam gtan mi g.yo ri rgyal mchog dang 'dra/_/dmigs pas mi bskyod yul la yengs pa med/_/gang la mnyam gzhag gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa/_/da lta nyid nas rgyud la goms par mdzod/_/shes rab rgya chen nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra/_/gti mug mun sel dam chos snang bar byed/_/thar gling mchog spel nyes pa'i chu gter skems/_/da lta nyid nas gong du 'phel bar mdzod/_/thabs mkhas ded dpon nor bu len pa 'dra/_/sdug bsngal mtsho brgal bde chen gling 'grod nas/_/sku gsum mchog thob don gnyis lhun gyis grub/_/da lta nyid nas thabs kyis gzhan phan mdzod/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon pa'i dpa' bo 'dra/_/nyon mongs dpung 'joms byang chub lam la dgod/_/dge tshogs mthar phyin bar chad med pas na/_/da lta nyid nas rgyud la brten par mdzod/_/smon lam yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'dra/_/'dod dgu lhun grub bde chen ngang gis 'phel/_/zhi la sems gzhol yid la re ba skong /_/da lta nyid nas rlabs chen 'debs par mdzod/_/ye shes mkha' la chu 'dzin 'khrigs par 'dra/_/ting 'dzin gzungs sprin phan bde'i char 'beb pas/_/ 'gro kun dge tshogs lo tog legs par bskrun/_/da lta nyid nas thob phyir 'bad par mdzod/_/thabs dang shes rab bzhon pa bzang po 'dra/_/srid zhir mi ltung rang gzhan don gnyis 'grub/_/lam lnga mthar phyin sku gsum lhun gyis grub/_/da lta nyid nas 'bad pas bsgrub par mdzod/_/byang chub phyogs chos lam bzang chen po 'dra/_/dus gsum 'phags rnams snga phyi'i gshegs shul te/_/dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi sogs sum cu bdun/_/da lta nyid nas bsgom phyir brtson par mdzod/_/gzhan yang byams pa pha ma bzang po 'dra/_/ 'gro drug bu la thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad/_/brtse bas don byed phan pa rtag tu sgrub/_/da lta nyid nas rgyud la goms par mdzod/_/snying rje rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' 'dra/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bdag gi sdug bsngal bzhin/_/bral bar 'dod pa brtson pa'i ya lad can/_/da lta nyid nas rgyud la brten par mdzod/_/dga' ba rigs kyi rje dpon bzang po 'dra/_/gzhan dag dge bas rang nyid blo bde bas/_/ched du bkod pa bzhin du rjes yi rang /_/ da lta nyid nas mchog du goms par mdzod/_/btang snyoms rang bzhin snyoms pa'i sa gzhi 'dra/_/nye ring chags sdang med cing zug ngu bral/_/rtag tu mnyam pa'i ngang nas bde ba che/_/da lta nyid nas rang bzhin goms par mdzod/_/ byang chub sems gnyis ded dpon dam pa 'dra/_/dge kun thar gling 'grod pa'i kha lo ba/_/srid pas mi skyo gzhan don phun sum tshogs/_/da lta nyid nas yang yang bskyed par mdzod/_/mos pa rgya mtsho chu gter chen po 'dra/_/dge bas gang zhig snga phyi ro gcig 'dzin/_/dus kun mi nyams dad pa'i rlabs g.yo ba/_/da lta nyid nas rgyud la brten par mdzod/_/bsngo ba mi zad nam mkha'i mdzod dang 'dra/_/chos dbyings bsngos pas mi nyams gong du 'phel/_/ chos sku ro gcig gzugs sku lhun gyis grub/_/da lta nyid nas 'khor gsum dag par mdzod/_/rjes su yi rang nam mkha'i khams dang 'dra/_/_/bsod nams mtha' yas dmigs med rlom sems bral/_/mi g.yo rang tu dwangs pa'i rnam pa can/_/da lta nyid nas yang yang brten par mdzod/_/gzhan yang dran pa lcags kyu bzang po 'dra/_/sems kyi glang po ma thul myos pa 'dzin//nyes las rab ldog rang bzhin dge la sbyor/_/da lta nyid nas rgyud la brten par mdzod/_/shes bzhin ma yengs mel tshe bzang po 'dra/_/mi dge'i rkun pos glags skabs mi rnyed cing /_/dge ba'i nor mang srung pa zhugs na/_/da lta nyid nas nges par brten par mdzod/_/bag yod lcags ri 'thas bzang [(<]a[>]'obs bzang [)]bskor ba 'dra/_/nyon mongs chom rkun tshogs kyis mi 'phrogs shing /_/las kyi dgra las rgyal ba'i dpung tshogs can/_/da lta nyid nas sems bsrung 'bad par mdzod/_/gzhan yang dad pa zhing sa bzang po 'dra/_/'dod dgu 'byung zhing byang chub lo thog bskrun/_/'di phyir bde zhing rtag tu phan pa sgrub/_/da lta nyid nas gong du 'phel bar mdzod/_/ gtong phod pad+ma'i rdzing bu bzang po 'dra/_/dam pa 'du zhing skye bo dga' ba bskyed/_/bdog pa 'bras bcas longs spyod snying po yod/_/da lta nyid nas gzhan dag dga' bar mdzod/_/snyan par smra ba lha yi rnga sgra 'dra/_/'gro ba'i yid 'dzin mthong na mi mthun med/_/dul ba'i rjes 'gro dga' ba bskyed pas na/_/da lta nyid nas bstod pas mgu bar mdzod/_/zhi ba'i spyod lam drang srong dam pa 'dra/_/mi dge 'gog cing 'gro ba'i dad pa 'phel/_/bcos ma'i tshul spongs rang bzhin dul ba'i ngang /_/da lta nyid nas spyod yul phun tshogs mdzod/_/dam pa'i chos nyid bde gshegs dbang po 'dra/_/kun dang mthun zhing kun las khyad par 'phags/_/_/kun dang cha mthun kun dang mi 'dra bar/_/_/da lta nyid nas rgyud la brten par mdzod/_/dal 'byor lus 'di sgyu ma'i khang bzang 'dra/_/re zhig snang yang nam 'jig nges pa med/_/tshe la long med 'dus kyang 'bral ba'i chos/_/da lta nyid nas yang yang dran par mdzod/_/longs spyod g.yo ba ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra/_/'byor pa'i rang bzhin gang du rgud pa'i chos/_/snying nas snying po med pa'i rang bzhin du/_/da lta nyid nas nges par rtogs par mdzod/_/'gro kun mi rtag snga phyi'i 'gron po 'dra/_/ rgan Rabs sngon song gzhon Rabs phyi nas 'gro/_/_/da lta'i rnams kyang lo brgyar gcig mi lus/_/da lta nyid nas nges par rtogs pa mdzod/_/tshe 'di'i snang ba de ring nyin gang 'dra/_/bar do'i snang ba do nub rmi lam tshul/_/phyi ma'i snang ba sang bzhin myur du 'ongs/_/_/da lta nyid nas dam pa'i chos mdzod cig_/_/de ltar chos kun 'dra ba'i dpes bstan nas/_/yang cig dad ldan rnams la bskul ba ni/_/'dus pa'i tha ma 'bral ba'i chos yin pas/_kho bo mi sdod thar pa'i gling du 'gro_/'khor ba'i chos la yid brton 'ga' med pas/_/ske med chos sku'i gtan srid zin par mdzod/_/'jig rten snang ba sgyu ma'i bslu brid mkhan/_/brdzun pa'i rang bzhin sgeg mo g.yon can 'dra/_/ dge las sems 'gro nyon mongs tshogs 'phel bas/_/ring du spongs te dam pa'i chos mdzod cig_/chog shes med na 'byor yang dbul po ste/_/'jungs pa'i sems la khengs pa'i dus med do/_/chog shes ldan na 'byor pa'i yang rab yin/_/cung zad mchis la'ang bde bas sems gang ngo /_/chang dang bud med nyon mongs 'byung khungs la/_/chags sred 'dun pa'i sems ni rab spangs te/_/drang srong rnams kyi spyod la rab gzhol nas/_/dben pa'i gnas su zhi ba'i don sgoms shig_/nyin mtshan mi dal gcig tu sems dge ba/_/ nyes spangs phan pa mdzad des gsungs bzhin du/_/skad cig ma yengs dam pa'i chos mdzod cig_/'chi khar mi 'gyod ma 'ongs phan pa 'grub/_/yang cig yun ring las smon dag pa yis/_/chos dang dam tshig 'dres pa'i slob ma dag_/'dus kyang 'bral ba'i chos te dpon slob gyes/_/tshong khang 'gron po 'dra bar mkhyen par mdzod/_/snying nas gcig tu phan pa'i gtam smras pa/_/ yul dang longs spyod mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun sogs/_/_/tshe 'di'i rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi kun spangs la/_/zhi ba'i gnas su bsam gtan bsgom par mdzod/_/cis kyang mi phan 'gro ba'i dus byung tshe/_/'chi khar mi 'jigs dam pa'i chos dgos pas/_/bla ma'i man ngag zab don snying po'i chos/_/da lta nyid nas goms shing brtson par mdzod/_/kun gyi nang nas 'od gsal snying po'i chos/_/kun gyi snying po snying thig gsang ba'i don/_/kun las mchog gyur tshe gcig sangs rgyas lam/_/kun bzang bde chen bsgrub la brtson par mdzod/_/gzhan yang zab don bdud rtsi'i snying po can/_/dam pa rnams las brgyud pa'i chos btsal te/_/brtson pa'i stobs kyis gcig pur nyams su longs/_/myur du rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/_/da lta nyid nas bde mchog kun 'grub cing /_/phyi ma'i dus la'ang phan pa dam pa'i chos/_/mthong dang ma mthong che ba'i yon tan can/_/snying po'i don la deng nas brtson par mdzod/_/sprin bral zla ba gang ba'i tshogs gang ba/_/skar ma'i bdag po de yang 'char du nye/_/bla bre gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rol mo'i sgra/_/mkha' 'gro'i tshogs mang lhags pas mdzes gyur cing /_/thugs rje mnga' ba'i mgon po pad+ma'i zhal/_/dbugs 'byin mdzad pa de yi deng bzung bas/_| 'gro ba'i dus babs mgron po lam zhugs bzhin/_/'chi bas dga' ba'i rnyed pa legs grub pa/_/rgya mtsho'i don yongs grub pa'i tshong pa dang*/_/g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i lha dbang dang /_/bsam gtan grub pa'i bde bas ches lhag go_/da ni mi sdod pad+ma las 'brel rtsal/_/'chi med bde chen btsan sa 'dzin du 'gro_/_/tshe zad las zad smon lam 'phan pa zad/_/'jig rten chos zad tshe 'di'i snang ba zad/_/bar do'i yul la zhing snang rgya che bas/_/rang snang ngo bo skad cig rang rig nas/_/gdod ma'i sa la gtan srid zin du nye/_/ rang nyid 'byor pas gzhan nyid blo bde ba/_/sbrul pa'i skye bas thar gling phan pa bsgrub/_/de dus slob ma'i dam pa khyed rnams dang /_/phrad nas chos kyi dga' bas tshim par smon/_/da res tshe 'di'i 'brel ba de las med/_/phyogs med sprang po gang bder shi ba la/_/mya ngan ma byed rgyun du gsol ba thobs/_/ de skad phan par smra ba'i snying gi gtam/_/dad ldan bung ba dga' skyed pad+ma'i sprin/_/legs smras dge bas 'gro ba khams gsum po/_/gdod ma'i sa la mya ngan 'das par shog_/zhal chems dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/_/dri med 'od zer gyis gdams pa rdzogs so//_//bkra shis so/_/

[8.27 zhal chems mthar thug gcig ma]

@#/_/zhal chems mthar thug gcig ma bzhugs so/_/ \u0f00 AHhUM/_rnal 'byor pa sna tshogs rang grol gyis/_skal ldan rnams la gdams pa/_e ma ho/_/mthar thug cig tu dril na 'di ltar yin/_/sus kyang ma byas gdod nas rang byung ba'i/_/sems nyid rgyal po rang bzhin rdzogs pa che/_/rin chen gter 'di rtag tu lta bar gyis/_/mi g.yo gsum ldan rlung rig mkha' la gtad/_/rang las byung ba'i 'od kyi khang bzang na/_/rang rig rgyal po rdo rje lu gu rgyud/_/gsal stong 'dzin med nam mkha'i dkyil du 'char/_/snang la rang bzhin med pa'i ngang la zhog_/dag snang dngos 'di rnam kun stong pa'i gzugs/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu chu yi zla ba 'dra/_/sna tshogs sems 'di 'byung ba rlung dang mtshungs/_/gang shar dran 'dzin ma byed gang dgar thongs/_/sgom du med de rnam kun stong pa'i gzugs/_/gang shar rgyal po lhun rdzogs ngang la rol/_/rang rig rang grol grol ba gzhan nas min/_/bcos bslad ma byed rang bzhin lhug par zhog_/mi 'gyur mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas pa yin/_/'di ltar nyams su len pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/gang la zhen na de yang nges par thongs/_/dmigs gtad zhen pa byung na rnal 'byor min/_/gang shar zhen pa med na ci dgar rol/_/nang gi rang gdangs phyi ru shar ba'i tshe/_/shes nyams snang nyams 'phel 'gribs ci byung yang /_/dgag sgrub ma byed rig pa'i cho 'phrul yin/_/gtad med rgyal po 'dzin med ngang du gyur/_/bzang ngan blang dor thams cad spros pa'i ngang /_/gnyis snang mtshan ma thams cad 'khrul pa'i gzugs/_/rtsol sgrub zhen pa thams cad sgrib phyed nyid/_/re dogs 'ching pa thams cad zhen pa'i rgyu/_/gdod ma'i ngang 'di brjod 'das gzhi rtsa bras/_/spang blang rtsol sgrub re dogs phyogs ris med/_/gnas der gnas na kun kyang chos kyi sku/_/cog bzhag rang grol 'bad med gang gis yul/_/gnas lugs mthong na gzhi rtsa gang yang med/_/ chig chod mthong la sgom pa rdul tsam med/_/snyems dang bral la spyod pa yod ma yin/_khregs chod mthong la dran 'dzin gnyen po med/_/thod rgal mthong la sems 'dzin sgom pa med/_/rnam rtog byung na gang shar rang grol yin/ rtsol skyab ma byed rang babs lhug par zhog_/so ma gnyug ma ma bcos zang thal dang /_/cir snang thams cad chos sku'i zhing du 'char/_/'di nyid bla ma'i gdams ngag kun dril nas/_/phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyi don du bkod/_/'di ltar nyams su longs shig rigs kyi bu/_/sangs rgyas sa la tshegs med bde blag 'gro_/_/sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang /_/ gzhan don lhun grub chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/_/gru chen ngogs la mgron po chas pa bzhin/_/dri med 'od zer thar pa'i gling du 'gro_/sdod pa'i yun med brtson pas sgrubs shig bu/_/dge zhing bkra shis pa gyur cig_/dge'o/_/

[8.28 zhal chems gnad kyi me long]

@#/_/zhal chems gnad kyi me long bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog ser skor/ zhal chems gnad kyi me long du gdams pa/_e ma ho/_/gnas lugs rig pa kun bzang chos kyi sku/_/lhun grub rig pa 'od gsal longs spyod rdzogs/_/'char tshul ma 'gags thugs rje sprul ba'i sku/_/gdod ma'i dbyings su mthar phyin rtogs pas 'dud/_/yang zab rtse mo rdo rje snying po'i don/_/mtha' grol klong yangs dgongs don gsang ba 'di/_/mtha' dril 'ub chub thig le nyag gcig po/_/phyi rabs rnams la gdams pa e ma ho/_/O~M/ rang rig dbang chen dbyings su rdzogs pa'i don/_bla mas mngon bstan rtsal dbang dam tshig ldan/_/'khor 'das sems dang ye shes shan phye la/_/lnga ldan dbyings su lta dgongs la zlos shig_/sma:_rig stong ngo bo ka dag chos zad dang /_/'khor 'das ming med gsal dag chos sku la/_/gzung 'dzin ye grol cog bzhag chos nyid du/_/nang dbyings khregs chod gdod maRa e ma ho/ ak+taM_lhun grub gzhi snang lta stangs gzigs stangs gcun/_/phyi gnad gcun pas nang dbyings chos zad dang /_/snang bzhi tshad phebs gdod ma'i dbyings su grol/_/lhun grub nang dbyings 'gyur med e ma ho/_a:_thams cad dbyings gcig rang byung rig pa'i klong /_/gzhi dang gzhir snang mthar zad gdod ma'i dbyings/_/rang don chos sku 'pho 'gyur med pa la/_/gzhan don gzugs sku gzhi snang rol pa yis/_/thams cad don mdzad phrin las rgyud mi 'chad/_shin tu rnam dag 'bras bu e ma ho/_/gzhi lam 'bras bu thams cad dbyer med ngang /_/rang byung ye shes che ba lnga dang ldan/_/lhun grub rang rdzogs chen po'i don 'di nyid/_/tshe gcig grol ba'i theg mchog e ma ho/_zhal gdams gnad kyi me long gab pa mngon du phyung ba/_sbas pa gsal bar ston pa/_dgongs pa mngon du lta ba/_'phrul gyi me long /_sna tshogs rang grol gyi rnal 'byor pa pad+ma las 'brel rtsal/_dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyis/_mthar thug don gyi snying po lnga phyung ste/_phyi rabs la gdams pa/_sa ma ya/_rgya rgya rgya/ dpal sngags kyi srung ma bshan pa srog sgrub nag mos srungs shig_/dge'o////

[8.29 bde gshegs rigs lnga'i sgrub thabs pad+ma stong ldan]

@#/_/bde gshegs rigs lnga'i sgrub thabs pad+ma stong ldan bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog 'dra'i skor/ bde bar gshegs pa rigs lnga'i sgrub thabs pad+ma stong ldan zhes bya ba/_gdod ma'i mgon po 'od mi 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ngo bo rnam dag chos sku'i nam mkha' la/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal rigs lnga longs spyod rdzogs/_/thugs rje'i sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs phyag 'tshal lo/_/snang srid snod bcud ye nas rigs lnga'i zhing /_/'od lnga lhun rdzogs stong gsal ji bzhin nyid/_/rang gzhan 'gro ba kun gyis sgrub pa yi/_/pad+ma stong ldan rgyas pa'i tshul 'di bshad/_/de la gsum las/_dang po phyi ltar sgrub pa ni/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed nas/_skad cig gis rang gi spyi bor AH: dkar po las 'od 'phros/_rang dang snod bcud thams cad 'od du zhu zhing /_O~M mahA shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa Ad+ma ko \u0f85 haM gis stong pa nyid kyi ngang las/_oM badzra d+harma d+hA rtu Ad+ma ko& haM gis kun la khyab pa'i snying rje bsgoms nas/_oM badzra tsit+ta hU~M gis rang gi sems hU~M du gyur pa las/_'od zer e'i rnam pa grangs med pa 'phros pas/_snang srid thams cad nam mkha' gcig tu gyur pa'i ngang las/_yang hUM de nyid kyi 'od zer yaM baM laM hUM gyi rnam par 'phros pas/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/_rgya mtsho'i steng du gser gyi sa gzhi chus gang ba'i dbus ri rab kyi steng du pad+ma nyi ma dang zla ba'i dbus su rin po che'i gzhal yas khang chen po sgo rta babs dkyil 'khor gyi bkod pa rdzogs pa las/_b+h+ya b+hi shud+d+he dz+nyA na tsakra hU~M gyis stong gsum gyi 'jig rten dang mnyam pa'i dbus su seng ge'i khri/_shar du glang po che/_lhor rta mchog_/nub tu rma bya/_byang du shang shang rnams kyi steng du pad+ma nyi zla'i dbus su/[ \u0f00] hU~M traM hrIH_a las 'od 'phros 'phags pa mchod/_sems can gyi don byas tshur 'dus pas sa bon rnams rim pa bzhin 'khor lo dang /_rdo rje dang / rin po che dang /_pad+ma dang /_ral grir gyur/_mtshams kyi pad zla bzhi'i steng na e baM laM raM yaM las phyag mtshan lngar gyur/_slar yang 'od 'phros snod bcud lha dang lha mor gyur/_'od zer tshur 'dus phyag mtshan las/_dbus su rnam snang yab yum gnyis su med pa/_mthing ga yab kyi phyag g.yas 'khor los yu ba byas pa'i rdo rje dang /_shar du mi bskyod pa dkar po rdo rje g.yas/_lhor rin chen 'byung ldan seRa po rin po ches mtshan pa'i rdo rje g.yas/_nub tu 'od dpag med dmar po pad+mas mtshan pa'i rdo rje g.yas/_byang du don yod grub pa ljang gu ral gris mtshan pa'i rdo rje g.yas/_mer mA ma kI dkar mo/_srin por sangs rgyas spyan ser mo/_rlung du gos dkar mo dmar mo/_dbang ldan du dam tshig sgrol ma ljang guyab rnams kyis g.yon na dril bu dang /_yum rnams g.yas g.yon gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa/_thams cad kyang rdo rje skyil mo krung /_rin po che'i dbu rgyan mgul rgyan/_phyag gdub zhabs gdub la sogs pas brgyan pa/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rnam pa'o/_/yum bzhi'i thugs ka nas dzaHhU~M baM hoH bzhi 'phros pas sgo bzhi'i pad zla nyi ma'i steng du yongs su gyur pa las sgo ma bzhi ste/_dzaHlas shar sgor lcags kyu ma dkar mo lcags kyu 'dzin pa/_hUM las lho sgor zhags pa ma ser mo zhag pa 'dzin pa/ baM las nub sgor lcags sgrog ma dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa/_hoHlas byang sgor dril bu ma ljang gu dril bu 'dzin pa/_thams cad kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang cha lugs su bzhugs pa'o//de thams cad kyi spyo bor \u0f00 dkar po/_mgrin par AHdmar po/ thugs kar hU~M mthing ga'o/_/O~M badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M gis spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram las rdo rje'i dra bas lus thams cad gtams par gyur/de thams cad kyi thugs kar pad+ma nyi zla'i dbus su rang gi sa bon las 'od 'phros pas/_rang rang gi phyogs nas rang dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' byon dzaHhU~M baM hoH_gnyis su med par thim nas/_sku las 'od zer 'phros pas snod bcud thams cad lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du bsams la/_snying ga'i sa bon la rtsa sngags kyis bskor ba las 'od zer 'phro 'dus sems can gyi don byed par bsams la/_O~M dzi na dzi ka laM te shwa ra ti hUM/_hUM badzra d+h+r-i ka muM da tu shwa ri h+'u~M/_swa rat+na d+h+r-ika*maM mo ha ra ti ste/_aM a ro lig l+yaM rA ga ra ti stAM/_ha pra dz+nyA traM ka taM badzra ra ti hU~M/_dzaHhU~M baM hoHsid+d+hi hUM/_zhes ci 'grub bzlas pa'i mthar/_snang srid thams cad lha la bsdu/_lha rnams sa bon/_sa bon mi dmigs pa'i ngang la bzhag nas bsngo ba bya'o/_/des ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa dang /_nus pa thon/_sku gsum du gnas gyur/_dug lnga ye shes lngar grol nas/_rab tshe 'di/_'bring bar do/_tha ma rang bzhin spral sku'i zhing du 'tshang rgya'o/_/rigs lnga phyi ltar sgrub pa rdzogs so/_/gnyis pa nang ltar sgrub pa ni/_skyabs 'gro sems bskyed byas nas/_skad cig gis rang nyid kun bzang yab yum mthing ga 'khril sbyoRa phyag mtshan yab rdo rje dril bu/ yum gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa/_skyil mo krung rin po che dang rus pas brgyan pa'i spyi bor rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum dkar po/_mgrin par rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum ser po/_snying gar rnam par snang mdzad yab yum mthing ga_/lte bar snang ba mtha' yas yab yum dmar po/_gsang bar don: yod grub pa yab yum ljang gu_/phyag mtshan gtso bo yab yum dang 'dra ba'o// yan lag bzhi la sgo ma bzhi sngar bzhin te/_lag pa g.yas pa la lcags kyu ma/_g.yon pa la zhags*pa*ma/_rkang pa g.yas pa la lcags sgrog ma/_g.yon pa la dril bu ma bskyed la/_O~M AHhA~M/_O~M hU~M traM hri aHsi ti pha la hA~M dza:_zhes bzlas zhing /_'ja' tshon lta bu'i sku snang la rang bzhin med pas grags stong du bzlas pa'i mthar/_thams cad snang stong dbyer med 'od gsal gyi ngang nas bsngo ba bya'o/_/_/des ni nyon mongs pa lnga ye shes su gyur te phrin las bzhis sems can gyi don byed cing tshe 'dir grol bar 'gyur ro/_/nang sgrub rdzogs so//_// gsum pa gsang sgrub ni/_rang nyid rta mgrin dpa' bo yum rdo rje phag mo dmar mo 'khril sbyor gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i spyi bor rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu la/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro yab yum dkar mo rdo rje mtshan pa'i gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa rtsa 'dab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i thugs kar ha la a ri ni sas bskor ba/_mgrin pa rtsa 'dab bcu drug la rin chen mkha' 'gro yab yum ser mo rin po ches mtshan pa'i gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i thugs kaRa ri la ha a ni sas bskor ba/_snying gar rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis la sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yab yum sngon mo 'khor los mtshan pa'i gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i thugs kar a la ha ri ni sas bskor ba'o//lte bar rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi la pad+ma mkha' 'gro yab yum dmar mo pad+mas mtshan pa'i gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i thugs kar ni la ha ri a sas bskor ba'o/_/gsang bar rtsa 'dab nyi shu rtsa brgyad la las kyi mkha' 'gro yab yum ljang gu rdo rje rgya gram gyis mtshan pa'i gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i thugs kar sa la a ri ni as bskor ba'o/_/gzhan yang lus kyi phyi nang bar gsum thams cad mkha' 'gro til gyi gong bu kha bye ba tsam gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa dang*/_gru mor kha TAM ga 'dzin par bsams la/_O~M AHhUM hrI ma ha ri ni sa ra tsa hri ya tsit+ta hring hring dzaHdzaH/_oM bud+d+ha badzra raN+Da pad+ma karma DA ki ni ra tsa hri ya tsit+ta hring hring dzaHdzaH_zhes bzlas la/_snang srid dbang du bsdus par bsam mo/_/rjes snang stong skye med kyi ngang nas bsngo ba bya ba ni/_lam bskyed pa'i rim pa ste/_/_dngos grub char bzhin 'bab/_sgo gsum nus pa 'bar/_sems nyid ka dag gi don myur du rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnyis las/_lta ba khregs chod ni/_rang rig mi 'gyur kun tu bzang /_/rig rtsal ma 'gags rigs lnga ste/_/ye shes rang grol sgo ma bzhi/_/gang shar chos nyid rol pa la/_/spang blang dgag sgrub re dogs med/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs bzhin/_/rang las shar zhing rang du grol/_/skye med bsam yul kun las 'das/_/'di yin gza' gtad phyogs ris med/_/thams cad rang grol gnyug ma'i ngang /_/'gyur med gdod ma'i chos sku yin/_/'di ltar snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun/_/sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra bar shes bya ste/_/ngo bo rten med rang bzhin so sor gsal/_/thugs rje 'gags med phyogs Ris 'dzin pa med/_/ji ltar rmi lam grong na skyu ma'i bu/_/sna tshogs bde sdug yul la spyod pa ltar/_/thams cad snang stong gzhi med rtsa ba bral/_/_/ye grol rang grol shar grol ngo bor grol/_/gtad med rgyal po 'dzin med blo bde ba/_/gang snang grogs su 'char ba'i rang bzhin la/_/spang blang 'khrul ba'i byung khungs zad pa yin/_/'di ltar rtogs na snang srid chos sku'i zhing /_/bde chen mi 'gyur 'og min mkha' spyod yin/_/chos rnams ma skyes bsgom du med pa la/_/'di zhes mi mtshon su zhig sgom par byed/_/_/gang ltar btags pa de ltar gzung 'dzin te/_/_/lta sgom spyod pa'i gzeb kyis 'ching ci dgos/_/thams cad rang grol lta ba'i rgyal po mchog_/gtan med gang shar sgom pa'i rgyal po mchog/_blang dor 'dzin med spyod pa'i rgyal po mchog_/re dogs bral na 'bras bu'i rgyal po mchog_/ji ltar snang ste snang rung mi snang rung /_/'di zhes ma 'dzin me long gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/rkyen las skyes pa rang sar ngang gis grol/_/chos nyid rtsa bral stong rung mi stong rung /_/ched kar ma bsgom gnyis med don ma tshol/_/ ye grol sor gzhag gdod ma'i ngang du grol/_/snang dang mi snang stong dang mi stong kun/_/byis pa'i blo yis mtshan mar bzung ba ste/_/yang dag don la 'di zhes ngos gzung med/_/nam mkha' tsam du'ang dper bya'i yul las 'das/_/ bsam brjod spros pa'i yul las ye nas 'das/_/de la sgom na dngos 'dzin 'khrul pa'i blo/_/rtag chad gzeb tu rang nyid 'ching bar zad/_/rtog dang sgom dang dpyod pa'i tshol 'phro zhog/rang bzhag phyam gcig gnyis med chos sku'i ngang /_/da lta'i 'di nyid gdod ma'i gshis kyi don/_/skad cig gang snang de yin blo bde 'o/_/'di ltar rtogs nas ci byas chos nyid ngang /_/rtsa ba bral bas 'bras bu 'byin pa med/_/'khor 'das 'dzin pa kun las grol ba yin/_/pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis bstan nas song /_/zhes pa'o/_/sgom pa lhun grub ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sgo phye ste/_sems dang /_yid dang / dbang po'i lta sgom kun las 'das pa'i ngang las dran bsam gyi rtsol sgrub zhig pas/babs lugs chen mo gdod ma nas gnas pa'o//sna tshogs dran bsam kun las 'das pa'i ngang /_/dag pa'i mkha' la dbyings rig gzer chen btab/_/snang min stong min mu bzhi 'das pa'i don/_/_/lnga ldan 'od gsal don dam snying po ni/_/snang bas stong ste me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/stong pas snang ste chu zla'i rang bzhin nyid/_/sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i gdangs/_/gsang sngags kun gyi yang gsang rdzogs pa che/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gsang ba'i snying po yin/_khyab gdal chen po'i rin chen pho brang du/_/'dzin med mig gi ye shes lcags kyu yis/_/rgya che gzung dka'i dbyings rig gzer btab nas/_/mtha' grol klong yangs chen po'i dgongs par bskyal/_/zab mo'i gnad bsdus bcud kyi snying po 'di/_/dri med 'od zer bdag gis bstan nas song /_/rigs lnga gsang bar sgrub pa rdzogs so/_/ de ltar rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dngos/_/ye nas bdag dang dbye ba med pa la/_/ma rig 'dzin pas srid pa'i dgon par 'khyams/_/sdug bsngal sra 'thibs mun pa'i nags khrod la/_/bdag dang 'gro kun yun ring nyon re mongs/_/de ring bla ma mgon po'i gsung thos nas/_/thams cad rang byung sangs rgyas zhing du snang /_/e ma ya mtshan ngo mtshar blo re bde/_/des na srid pa'i 'khrul pa gzhal sla bas/_/grogs dag tshur nyon skad cig rig pa'i mchog_/de phyir snying po'i don 'di blang bar mdzod/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho tshe 'dis grol ba yin/_/dge ba 'di yis 'gro kun rang grol te/_/gdod ma'i gnas su lhun gyis grub par shog_/_/tshul 'di rgyal sras dri med 'od zer gyis/_/gangs ri thod dkar 'phags pa'i ri ngogs su/_/rin chen shog 'dra'i ngos la legs par bkod/_/skal ldan skye bo'i tshogs kun dga' bar mdzod/_/bde bar gshegs par rigs lnga'i gsang sgrub pad+ma stong ldan zhes bya ba/_mkha' 'gro snying tig gi rnal 'byor pa/_dri med 'od zer gyis ston

[8.30 rigs lnga'i bcud len bdud rtsi thigs pa]

@#/_/rigs lnga'i bcud len bdud rtsi thigs pa bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog 'dra'i skor/ rigs lnga'i bcud len bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba/_dpal don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal ldan ye shes rgya mtsho'i snying po las/_/mkhyen brtse'i chu 'dzin thugs rje'i glog phreng can/_/phan bde'i char gyis 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa/_/bde gshegs rig 'dzin rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig gsang ba'i snying po las/_/zab don bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dir bsdus te/_/phyi rabs skal ldan rnams kyi don ched du/_/dri med 'od zer bdag gis snang bar bya/_/phyi nang 'byung ba thams cad ye shes gdangs/_/ye shes dngos las ye nas grub pas na/_/phyi yi 'byung ba'i bcud lnga la brten nas/_/nang gi 'byung pa rnam lnga'i gsos sman bshad/_dang po sa yi bcud len ni/_/sa tshil rdo tshil khrol bu gsum/_/rnal 'byor pa yi bza' ba'i phyir/_/'di nyid du yang bshad pa bya/_/de las tshil ni/_sngon bskal pa bzang po'i dus na/_sa'i tshil zhag chags pa gad rdzong dang ri ngogs dang thang yangs bzang po la snang ba ste/_rigs lnga'i mdog dang mthun pa la sbrang rtsi'i ro ltar mngar zhing so mi seg pa ste/_rnal 'byor pas blangs la/_dang po phye dang sum cha sum gnyis/_/_de nas phye phyed/_rim gyis sa nyid la slob cing / bdag nyid rin chen mkha' 'gro ser mo g.yas rin po ches mtshan pa'i gri gug dang /_g.yon thod pa khrag gis khengs pa bsnams pa'i lus kyi 'khor lo lnga'i nang na/_ha ri ni sa a rnams dkar ser dmar ljang mthing gar gnas pa la/_mtha' skor du yi ge bzhi bzhis bskor ba'i mgrin pa'i ri ser po la ha a ni sa ser pos bskor ba las bdud rtsi babs pas/_lus thams cad gang bar bsam zhing /_rlung kha sbyar la bsgom zhing*/_O~M ri ha a ni sa sid+d+hi pha la AHhU~M zhes nyer gcig bzlas te phyogs bcu'i bla ma yid dam mkha' 'gro snang srid snod bcud thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang /_tshe dang /_'od zer dang nus mthu rnams rang gi mgrin pa'i yi ge nyed la thim par bsam mo/_/de ltaRa bsgoms nas mthar ba_sngo ba bya'o/_/de'ang mar dum re bcug pas gegs med cing 'byongs rtags shin tu nye'o/_/rtags su lus 'jam zhing gnyer ma med pa dang /_sems gsal zhing ting nge 'dzin 'phel ba dang / ngag nus che zhing byin rlabs dang ldan pa dang /_mkha' 'gro 'du zhing kun gyis mthong na yid du 'ong ba'o/_khyad par du bdud rtsi phor re tsam brten no/_/sngo dang rjen spang /_nyi ma dang me spang /_thig le ma nyams par bya'o/[¸ ]/rdo tshil ni rigs lnga'i kha dog gang yang rung ste/_sa med par phye nas bkrus te khal gcig la nas bre gsum/_gro bre gsum/_bra 'o bre do/_sran ma bre gang rnams dang bsres pa zhib mor rtsi bzhin btags la/_dang por btsos zan du bya ste/ phru ba thod pa'i ngo bor bsam pa'i nang du chu ran par phye dang mnyam du btso'o/_/de nyid O~M AHhU~M bdun gyis bdud rtsir bsams la/_dang por zhag lngar phye dang phyed bsres/_de nas bcur sum cha sum gnyis/_de nas nyi shu rtsa gcig song dus/_phye drug cha re bsres la/_zan dron byas pa mar 'gron bu tsam re bcug nas bdud rtsir bsams la/_rang nyid rin chen mkha' 'gro snga ma bzhin bsgoms te/_zos rting mgrin pa nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun babs pas/ lus sems bde bas rgyas par bsam la sngags de nyid bzlas te/_phyogs bcu'i bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i byin rlabs thams cad rang la babs pas lus khengs par bsam la/[ · ]rlung kha sbyoRa yun ring du bzung nas bsngo ba bya'o/_/dam tshig tu sngo dang rjen dang /_nyi ma dang me spang /_bdud rtsi phor re 'thungs shing /_rtag tu bla ma la gsol ba gdab bo/_/'byongs pa'i rtags su lus la bde ba/_ngag la nus pa/_sems la rtogs pa 'bar zhing /_mkha' 'gro sprin bzhin 'du/_skyes pa bud med 'du/_zas nor gter rdol ba bzhin 'bul du 'ongs/_log 'tsho dang ser sna'i sgrib pa byang nas/_mu ge'i bskal pa las thar/_rtag tu lha'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa la longs spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'di la gegs med do/_/phyis ni ji ltar dga' bas khrol bu dang skyo tsha dang spags pa'am/_thug pa'ang bya'o/_/de nas rdo khrol bur za ba la brtag pa/_bza' ba/_phan yon dang bsrungs mtshams gsum las/_dang po ni sha chen tshil chen/_rus chen dang /_mkhris chen dang /_shi sha dang lnga'o/_/ dang po ni mdog gang yang rung ba la so mi rtse zhing snyi ba'o/_/gnyis pa ni dkar la snyi ba'o/_/gsum pa ni dkar gong*dang me rdo lta bu'o/_/bzhi pa ni g.ya' ma ljang gu lta bu'o/_/lnga pa ni rdo phal pa thams cad do/_/de'ang sha tshim gnyis las gzhan gsum mi brten no/_/rdo de dag ni spa gro stag tshang seng ge phug dang /_kong po dang /_rag sham brag dang /_yar khyer dang /_te sgro brag dkar dang /_lha snyan dbu ri nas phar cung zad phyin pa dang /_phag mo gru dang / byar smad kyi lha ri rgyab dang /_lho brag mkhar chu dang /_'dab smad bya dkar mo dang /_bzad kyi bye ma lung dang /_'phreng po sle'u chung gi 'chil mo dang /_dpal gyi chu bo ri rnams na yod do/_gnyis*pa*la*drug*las/_rdo btu ba ni skyabs 'gro sems bskyed bya ste/_rta mgrin tu bsgoms pa'i sor mo lnga mkha' 'gro lnga/_snod bcud lha dang gzhal yas khang*/_rdo bdud rtsir bsgoms la/_O~M trig yer swA hAs btus la/_de nas bza' thabs dngos ni/_khrol bu de ka bzhin bza'/_zan dron yang de ka dang 'dra/_'gams phye la skyo tsha dang sngags/_skyo tsha'am sngo dang bsres nas tshod ma byed pa'ang nyan no/_/sdor ni gang yang rung / tshwa gdab/_de'ang sha lnga bdud rtsi lngar bsams la/_O~M mu le mu le mahA mu le swAhA/[ \u0f00] gor chun gor chun swAhA/_zhes bzlas la/_rang nyid rta mgrin du gsal bas bza'o/_/gegs sel ni tshe 'di blos btang /_snying rje dang ldan pas/_dang po za ba'i tshe mar mthe bong tsam re rdo za ba'i snga phyir btang /_chu bskol la mar btab la btung /_des gegs mi 'byung nges so/_/phan yon dang bsrungs mtshams ni/_mar nag mi za/_phud gzhan la mi sbyin/_dkon mchog mchod/_gsog 'jog mi bya/_sngags 'dren dus ngag gcad/_thig le ma nyams par bsrung ngo*/_/de'ang rim gyis rdo grangs byas la mar byung dus tshang ngam blta'o/_/phyis mi dgos/_yog tshad zos pas chog_zas kyi sred pa 'chad/_sha skye zhing dkar la snum pa'o/_/shes pa dngas/_dbang po gsal/_ro mchog thon/[ · ]lus la srog chags mi 'byung /_drod skyes/_mkha' 'gro 'du/ mngon shes skye'o/_/de ltar sa yi bcud len byas pa yin/_log 'tsho med cing sgrub pa mtha' ru phyin/_dngos grub nye zhing bla ma'i byin rlabs 'jug_/ mkha' 'gro 'du zhing ci bsam chos bzhin 'grub/_mdor na phan yon dpag tu med pa yin/_sa'i bcud len bdud rtsi yang zhun ces bya ba rdzogs so/_/n+thi/ rgya rgya rgya/ de nas chu'i bcud len ni/_/bdud rtsi dngul chu'i sbyor ba ste/_/rnal 'byor pa yis bza' ba'i phyir/_/'di nyid du yang bshad par bya/_/de yang sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes/_/sngon 'gro rdzas bsag rab gnas ni/_/dngul chu mu zis btul ba ni/_/srang lnga sgog skya de dang mnyam/_/dbang lag nye shing ra mnye ba/_/a ba sbrul sha rtag tu ngu /_/srang re tshogs na shin tu rab/_/gla rtsi shu dag gu gul nag_/li shi tsan dan dkar dmar gnyis/_/star bu shing kun brag zhun dang /_cu gang dzA ti g+hi hang dang /_/rgya tsha rgyam tsha kha ru tsha/_/shing tsha bca' lga pi pi ling /_/se 'bru sug smel a ru ra/_/_/a ka ru ni nag po dang //mgron bu bsregs pa'i thal ba rnams/_/ci 'byor phye maRa rtsi bzhin bya//cong zhi bre phyed dang bsres nas/_/klad par bsdus te yun ring bsna// dngul mdangs rtsig rtsig byung ba dang /_/ril bu lug gi ril ma tsam/_/byas te rin chen snod du blugs/_/tshes bcu nyi shu lnga la sogs/_/mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i dus tshod du/_/tshogs gtor bshams la ril bu rnams/_/mkha' 'gro sde sngar gsal btab la/_/_/ye shes bcug cing mchod bstod bya/_/'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang /_/byang sems bla ma mkha' 'gro yi/_/dngos grub byin rlabs kun bsdus la/_/ril bu'i mkha' 'gror thim par bsam/ \u0f00 a ha ri ni sa sid+d+hi pha la hUM/_'di dang rten 'brel snying po yis/_/me tog dor nas bkra shis brjod/_/tshogs kyi dga' ston rgya cher bya/_/de ni rab tu gnas pa 'o/_/nas ni dkar la bzang ba la/_/gro phye bre gsum skyo tsha byas// gnyis pa dngos gzhi bza' thabs ni/_/tho rangs langs te skyil krung bya// rlung ro lan gsum phyir phul la/_/las dang sdig sgrib dag par bsam/_/de nas ril bu mid nas ni/_/skyabs 'gro sems bskyed ldan pa yis/_/rang nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_/dkar gsal zhal gcig spyan gsum mdzes/_/g.yas g.yon brkyang bskum mi ro gnon/_/gru mor kha ba~M rtse gsum dang /_/phyag gnyis rdo rje gri gug dang /_/thod khrag bkang ba thugs kar 'dzin/_/me long dril bu'i phreng bas brgyan/_/spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga dang*/_/_/lte ba gsang gnas rnam pa lngar/_/dkar ser mthing ga dmar ljang gi_/rtsa 'dab 'khor lo rnam lnga'i dbus/_/ro rkyang dbu ma ka ba bzhin/_/'khor lo lnga na yig 'bru lnga/_/ha ri a ni sa gnas pa'i/_/phyogs bzhir rang gnas 'khor lo bzhi'o// dbu ma sbubs stong yar sne na/_/bde chen 'khor lor haM gnas te/_/lte bar ni dmar me stag 'dra/_/gsang ba'i y-i las rlung byung bas/_/ni las me 'bar haM la phog_/thig le dmar po'i me 'od kyis/_/spyi bo'i gtsug nas rkang mthil bar/_/nad gdon sdig sgrib sha khrag rnams/_/bsregs sbyangs lan ni bdun pa'i rjes/_/haM las bdud rtsi dkar po'i rgyun/_/rkang mthil spyi gtsug gang bar babs/_/phyogs bcu'i bla ma mkha' 'gro dang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/snang srid snod bcud bdun rtsir gyur/_/bdag gi lus la thim pa yis/_/tshe dpal gzi brjid 'od dang ldan/_/byin rlabs dngos grub thob par bsam/_/bde stong dbyer med ngang la gzhag_/rjes ni bsngo bas rgyas gdab bya/_/zhag ni gsum gsum ril bu re/_/nyi nyu rtsa gcig gong du bza'/_/de nas 'byor tshad zos pas chog_/chang zhim phor re btung bar bya/_/ gsum pa rjes la rnam gsum ste/_/rtags dang gegs sel phan yon no/_/rtags ni phyi nang gsang ba ste/_/phyi rtags gnyid chung shes pa gsal/_/lus yang bde drod skye ba 'o/_/nang rtags rmi lam mkha' la 'gro_/chos 'chad skye bos bstod pa dang /_/bsnyen bkur zhabs tog byed pa rmis/_/gsang rtags phyi ru snang ba ni/_/lus ni bcu drug lon pa 'dra/_/rgas nas so 'u skye ba dang /_/mngon par shes pa 'char ba dang /_/mkha' 'gro mtsho la ngang pa bzhin/_/'du zhing dngos grub sna tshogs ster/_/grub pa brgyad kyang 'thob par 'gyur/_/gegs sel gtum mo bsgoms pa dang /_/bla ma la gus gsol ba gdab/_/nad ni tsha grang gang langs kyang /_/de dang mthun pa'i sman gyis gso/_/gdon la snying rje byang sems bsgom/_/des ni gegs med yon tan 'grub/_/spyir na 'di la gegs med de/_/mkha' 'gros gegs sel dngos grub ster/_/gal srid byung yang 'jigs mi dgos/_/zhag grangs them dus gegs las grol/_/dam tshig sngo ngad spang ba dang /_/me dang nyi ma tshwa rnams spang /_/thig le bsrung zhing bde stong bsgom/_/phan yon lus sems bde stong bskyed/_/nad gdon mdze rigs dug rnams zhi/_/mkha' 'gro 'du zhing ci bsam 'grub/_/'chi med tshe yi rig 'dzin thob/_/'di 'dra'i gdams pa yid bzhin 'dra/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig cha rkyen du/_/dri med 'od zer bdag gis bkod/_skal ldan rnams dang 'phrad par shog_/chu'i bcud len bde chen rgya mtsho zhes bya ba rdzogs so/_/s+thi/_rgya rgya rgya/ de nas me yi bcud len ni/_/gtum mo bde drod ye shes gos/_rnal 'byor pa yis bgo ba'i phyir/_/_/'di nyid du yang bshad par bya/_/de'ang skyabs 'gro sems bskyed byas te/_stong pa'i ngang las/_rang nyid rdo rje phag mo pad+ma'i rigs dmar mo/_gcer bu pad+mas yu ba byas pa'i gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa/_dpa' mo'i rgyan rdzogs par bskyed la/_rkang pa skyil krung lag pa mnyam gzhag dang /_rnam snang gi chos bdun dang ldan pas/_spyi bor rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu/_mgrin par bcu drug_/_/snying gar sum cu rtsa gnyis/_lte bar drug cu rtsa bzhi/_gsang bar nyi shu rtsa brgyad bsam pa'i dbus su dbu ma sbubs stong pa'i yar sna tshangs bug_/mar sna gsang gnas su zug pa'i g.yas g.yon gnyis nas ro rkyang gnyis 'khor lo lnga la 'khyud nas klad pa'i steng na tshur byung ste/_smin mtshams nas sna bug gnyis su tshud par bsam/_de gnyis kyi mar sna lte 'og sor bzhi na dbu ma'i nang du tshud par bsam/_rtsa gsum po de mda' smyug tsam pa dmar por bsam/_de nas rlung ro drag po gsum phyir phul la/_sna bug gnyis na tshur 'jam la ring bar nang du drangs la rtsa gnyis nas mar phus btab pa bzhin song bas gsang gnas su dbu ma'i nang du tshud par bsams/_gsang bar sa dmar po zhig kyang bsgom/_de rlung gis bus pas dmar lam gyis byung bas lte ba'i rtsa mdud na pad+ma DA ki yab yum sbyor ba'i gsang gnas las/_bdud rtsi babs pas gsang ba'i rtsa bdud gang bar bsgom zhing /_rlung thub thang du bzung zhing /_cung zad re brngubs la mnan/_yang phyed tsam re dal bus phyir btang la lhag ma gzung / gtong dus sna bug gnyis na phar dal bur song ba'i tshe/_kun d+har ma'i nang nas tshangs pa'i bu gar sngo sangs kyis song bar bsam/_de ltar bsgoms pas gsang gnas su drod phebs te dwangs ma 'chor bar 'dug na/_lte ba nas gtum mo sbar la snying gar snga ma bzhin bsgom/_de nas mgrin par bsgoms pas snying gar drod skyes dus spyi bor sbar la bsgom mo/_/des ni rtsa bye nas dwangs ma rgyas te/_bde drod 'bar bas lus la gos mi dgos snum la dro zhing dwangs/_sems la bde stong lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'char zhing mchog thun mong gi dngos grub chen po thob/_tshe gcig gis rig 'dzin gyi sa non par 'gyur ro/_/bde chen ye shes gtum mo'i me 'od kyis/_/bde gshegs khams rnams ma lus rab rgyas nas/_/bde chen mi 'gyur 'og min gnas mchog tu/_/bde gshegs rnams dang skal pa mnyam par shog_/_/gtum mo me'i bcud len bde drod 'bar ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so/_/spri/_rgya rgya rgya/_de nas rlung gis bcud len ni/_/mngon shes rdzu 'phrul skye ba ste/_/rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/_/'di nyid du yang bshad par bya/_/de la gyen rgyu thur sel/_mnyam gnas gsum ni/_pho mo ma ning gi dbye bas te/_drag ba dang /_'jam pa dang /_mnyam par gnas te/_las kyi rlung btung nas ye shes kyi rlung sbyang ba'i phyir/_dus bzhir rlung gi rim pa bsgom pa ni/_dgun grang ba chu yi dus su me'i rlang dmar zhing dro ba gzung ngo /_/dpyid bad kan sa'i dus na rlung gi rlung 'byed cing 'thor ba ljang khu mnyam par gzung ngo /_/dbyar tsha ba me'i dus su chu'i rlung dkar zhing bsil ba gzung ngo /_/ston smin byed rlung gi dus su sa'i rlung dal 'jam ser po gzung ngo*/_/de yang stan bde ba la 'dug ste/skyabs 'gro sems bskyed byas nas/_rang nyid las kyi mkha' 'gro ljang gu g.yas rgya gram gyis yu ba byas pa'i gri gug dang /_g.yon pa bdud rtsis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa'i/_'khor lo lnga snga ma bzhin gsal btab la rlung ro gsum phyung nas/_rlung rab tu dal ba gsum tshur byung ba ro rkyang gnyis nas dbu mar zhugs/_'khor lo lnga rgyu ma phus btab pa bzhin song /_gsang ba'i sa ljang gu ha ri ni as bskor ba la* gsal stong gnyis med kyi ye shes ske bar bsam zhing thub thang re bzung la phyir dal bus phyed tsam re gtong ngo /_/de yang bum pa can du bskyil ba'o/_/de bzhin du rlung rab tu dal bas phyi nang du mnyam zhing gzung ba ni/_'jam pa ste khong seng can du sba ba'o/_/de bzhin du rlung gi 'gro 'ong shin tu dal bas mi tshor bar byas te/ sems gsal stong gi ngang la 'jog pa ni nam mkha' can du sba ba ste/_ma ning zhes bshad do/_/de gsum gang byed kyang dus bzhi'i rlung gi rjes 'brang bas/ rlung skyon med cing ye shes myur du skye'o/_/langs dus bsngo ba byas la/_lus thams cad dkrugs shing bcus te bskor la mnyam par bya'o/_/de ltar bsgom pas lus yang zhing mgyogs pas rkang mgyogs 'grub/_sems gsal la dwangs pas mngon shes 'grub/_rnam rtog 'gro 'ong chad pas ye shes 'grub/_rtag tu lus sems bde zhing snying po'i don la reg/_rtsa las su rung bas rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung /_rlung las su rung bas mngon shes dang rdzu 'phrul la dbang bsgyur/_mkha' 'gro rang bzhin gyis 'du/_dngos grub sna tshogs 'byung /_myur du gdod ma'i ka dag / gsal stong chen por mya ngan las 'da' 'o/_/de yang 'od gsal dang bsres nas bsgom pa ni mchog tu gces so/_/rlung gi bcud len dpag bsam ljon shing zhes bya ba rdzogs so/_spri/_rgya rgya rgya/_de nas nam mkha'i bcud len ni/_/zag med ye shes bskyed pa ste// rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom pa'i phyir/_/_/'di nyid du yang bshad par bya/_/ dwangs shing mtho ba'i sar song ste/_nam mkha' dwangs pa'i tshe skad cig gis rang nyid sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro mthing ga 'khor los yu ba byas pa'i gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo lnga dang rtsa gsum gsal btab ste/_rlung phyir 'gro dus las dang sdig sgrib nad gdon thams cad sang sang phar song bar bsam zhing /_nang du brngubs dus nam mkha' sngo skya thams cad na ra ra byung ste ro rkyang nas dbu ma dnga'akhor lo lnga gang bas ka dag spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes skyes par bsam ste thub thang nang du mnyam par bzhag_/de bzhin du phyi'i nam mkha' nang gi nam mkha' la thim pas lus kyi nang thams cad sprin med pa'i nam mkha' rnam par dag pa lta bur bsams pa'i ngang la shes pa gsal stong 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes la gzhag go_/de nas phyi'i sa rdo ri brag la sogs snang srid thams cad nam mkha' gcig tu gyur te nang gi nam mkha' rnams par dag pa'i nam mkha'i ngang du thim par bsam zhing mnyam par gzhag go_/skabs su lus dang phyi nang gi snang ba thams cad nam mkha' gcig tu gyur te/_phyi nang gi nam mkha' gnyis 'dres pa ni/_bum pa chag pas bum nang gi nam mkha' dang nam mkha' chen por dbye ba med pa bzhin gsal stong mtha' bral gyi ngang la phyam gyis mnyam par bzhag pas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i don mngon sum du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu'i ngang la mnyam par bzhag pas/_rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nam mkha' ltar chos kyi dbyings spros pa dang bral bar zhi zhing thim nas/ gdod ma ye stong ka dag chen po/_skye med bsam yul las 'das pa'i don mngon 'gyur te/_tshe 'dir rang bzhin kun tu bzang po'i ngang der 'bad rtsol dang bral ba grol ba yang yod do/_/phal cher bar do'i ye shes 'od gsal gyi skad*cig*dang*por*don de nyid goms pa dang /_'dres nas ka dag gi sa la rang grol lo/_/de'ang rnam shes nam mkha' la thim pa'i tshe phyi'i nam mkha' sprin med pa ltar stong gsal gdod nas dag pa'i snang ba 'char la/_nam mkha' 'od gsal la thim pa'i tshe/_phyi'i nam mkha' nang gi nam mkha' dang 'dres pa ltar bde gsal mi rtog pa'i ye shes sngon bas 'phags par 'char ba de nyid/_gzhi'i 'od gsal du rang ngo shes pas da lta sbyangs pa'i 'od gsal bu'i ye shes dang 'dres te gnyis med gcig tu grol lo//de'i tshe phyi nang gi nam mkha' dbye ba med pa ltar lus rdos bcas bor/_sems chos nyid gdod ma'i ye shes su nub/_ye shes 'od gsal spros pa dang bral ba'i ngang /_nang gsal ka dag gi ye shes gcig tu gnas pas chos sku bsal bzhag dang bral ba/_/_phyi nang gi nam mkha' la dbye ba med pa ltar/_dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i ngang du gnas te/_phra ba'i ye shes gsal dwangs gzhi la mi g.yo bar gnas pa tsam las/_phyi nang gi 'dzin pa gang yang med pa'i rang bzhin shel sgong dri ma dang bral ba ltar/_ka dag chos zad kyi gnas lugs gdod ma'i grol gzhi chen po nyid du 'pho 'gyur med par bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe gsal ba'i cha tsam las me long g.ya' dag pa ltar/_sku dang ye shes kyi 'char gzhi phyir gsal du 'byung ba mi 'gags pas/_gzugs sku phun gsum tshogs pa'i snang ba ston la/_nang gsal phra ba thugs rje'i cha tsam las 'gro ba'i gnas dang dbang po dang skye ba la sogs pa mkhyen nas gang la gang 'dul ston pa'i sprul pa 'phrul bas sems can gyi don lhun grub tu byed kyang gdod ma'i ngang nam mkha' lta bu chos sku 'pho 'gyur med pa'i ngang las g.yos pa med do/_de ltar gdod ma'i gnas lugs gsal por bshad pa ste/ legs par bkral na nam mkha' lta bu las gzhan med do/_/zab mo'i chos tshul rgya mtsho thams cad nas/_chos sku nam mkha' lta bur gsungs pa'i don de yin no/_/de ltar gsungs kyang gzhan du brjod pa dag mi gsal zhing go bar dka' la/_'dir go sla zhing gsal por brjod pa'o/_/dbu ma rab tu mi gnas pas de'i tshe ye shes rgyun chad par 'dod pa ni sems sems byung gi spros pa dbyings su zhi ba tsam la dgongs so/_/'dir rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen pos sems sems byung gi spros pa ma lus pa dbyings su zhi bas gdod ma'i ye shes nang gsal phra ba'i rig pa thugs rje'i snying po can du gnas pa las sems can gyi don byed par 'dod do/_/snga mas smon lam gyis don byed pa las thugs rjes don byed par khas mi len no/_/dngos por smra ba ni sangs rgyas dngos por sku dang ye shes grub pa ltar da ltar gyi sems can rang rgyud pa ltar 'dod de/_de dag ni rtag pa'i mthar lhung la/_ye shes rgyun chad nas smon lam gyis don byed pa ni chad pa'i mthar lhung pas/_de gnyis ka bsal te phra ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i cha las stong pa rig pa'i snying po can du lhun gyis grub pa'i don la 'jug pa yin no/_/de'i tshe ngo bo stong pas rtag pa'i mthar ma lhung /_rang bzhin gsal bas chad pa'i mthar ma lhung /_thugs rjes khyab pas sems can gyi don 'bad med lhun grub chen por bzhugs pa yin no/_/'di ni rab tu gsang ba'i snying po mthar thug pa'o/_/nam mkha'i bcud len ye shes gsang skor zhes bya ba rdzogs so/_/ s+thi/_rgya rgya rgya/_de ltar ma dag 'byung ba'i thabs nyid las/_/dag pa'i ye shes bskyed pa gsang ba'i lam/_/rdo rje snying po'i theg pa mthar thug ste/_/ ma lus 'gro kun gnad 'dis grol bar shog_/sa yi bcud len 'byung ba'i lus bzung ste/_/_/chu dang me yis bde chen mchog bskyed nas/_/rlung gis gsal stong nam mkhas mi rtog nyid/_/sku gsum sa la rang bzhin lhun gyis grub/_/'di ni mthar thug nges pa'i snying po ste/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig sbas pa'i sgo phye nas/_/gangs ri thod dkar 'phags pa'i ri ngogs su/_/rin chen shog 'dra'i ngos la legs par bkod/_/dge ba 'di yis bdag dang 'gro ba kun/_/gzhi rdzogs 'od gsal snying po'i zhing khams su/_/ma lus phyam gcig thams cad byang chub nas/_/_/sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med par shog_/rigs lnga'i bcud len bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba/_dpal o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis rjes su bzung ba'i rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis/_ston gsum me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe bkod ba rdzogs so//_/_//'di nyid gsang zhing phangs par bya/_/kun la mi bstan nyams su blangs/_/las 'brel rtsal gyi khyad chos yin/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig man ngag yin/_/dge'o/_/

[8.31 bdud rtsi sprin phung]

@#/_/bdud rtsi sprin phung zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/ shog 'dra'i skor/ bdud rtsi sprin phung zhes bya ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mkhyen rab mkha' la thugs rje'i sprin 'khrigs te/_/bdud rtsi'i char gyis phyogs bcu'i 'gro kun gyi/_/nyon mongs nad rnams ma lus zhi mdzad pa/_/sman pa sngon med de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i phrin las gcig bsdus pa/_/bde gshegs rang byung pad+ma rgyal po yis/_/'dab stong bdag blo'i yid kyi tshal lhung bas/_/skal ldan bung ba rab tu tshim par bya/_/de yang rdo rje'i lus 'di la/_/bde chen longs spyod chos dang sprul/_/ bde skyong 'khor lo lnga yod de/_/mkha' 'gro sde lnga rigs lnga'i gnas/_/ye nas 'od gsal dri ma med/_/rtsa khams yi ge'i tshul du gnas/_/de ni 'byung ba'i byer zug gis/_/'khrugs shing nad rnams 'byung ba na/_/rlung dmigs yi ge'i sbyor ba yis/_/nad rnams 'don par bya ba ni/_/rnal 'byor pa yis 'dir shes bya/_/dang po bde chen 'khor lo ni/_/rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu ste/_/dbus na ha gnas shar du a/_/lho ri nub ni byang du sa/_/de dag rdo rje mkha' 'gro dkar/_/yab yum rdo rje thod khrag bsnams/_/sbyor mtshams dwangs ma babs pa yis/_/mgo dang snying ga'i mtshams su babs/_/tsha grang nad rnams zhi bar bsam/_/rlung ni phyir 'phangs nang du gzung /_/tsha ba'i nad ni dwangs la bsil/_/grang ba bad kan 'dus pa la/_/rab tu tsha bas gang bar bsgom/_/_/rlung yang bad rlung grang ba la/_/thog mar phyir sbur nang du gzung /_/tshad nad la ni gzung mi bya/_/des ni bde chen 'khor lo yi/_/nang gi nad rnams zhi bar byed/_/phyi yi nad ni 'di ltar 'don/_/dmigs pa sngar dang 'dra ba la/_/yi ge bzlas shing 'phangs pa ni/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis gtar bsreg bya/_/gang du na ba khol bur 'don/_/yi ge'i gnas ni 'di lta ste/_/ 'phar ba'i ni rtsa nyi shu gnyis/_/'di dag la sogs phyir ru 'phro/_/spyi bo'i gtsug ni drang po na/_/yi ge a ni gnas pa ste/_/sman skad snyan gyi re thag yin/_/'di gtar rims dang snying nad sel/_/'di nas g.yas ni tshon gang na/_/yi ge ga ni gnas pa ste/_/'di ming b+ho d+he g.yas pa zhes/_/'di gtar gzhog g.yas na la phan/_/_/de g.yon tshon gang gi yin te/_/de ming b+ho d+he g.yon pa zhes/_/_/'di gtar bzhogs yon na la phan/_/de nas sor bzhi mtshogs ma'i steng /_/ki yig gnas te 'di ming ni/_/ral dmigs chen po zhes bya ste/_/'di dag mgo 'khor 'thibs la phan/_/de g.yas tshon gang btsal ba na/_/ku gnas dung rtsa 'khor ma ste/_/'di gtar ldan g.yas nad la phan/_/de g.yon tshon gang klu yin te/_/dung rtsa 'bring bu zhes bya ba/_/'di gtar ldan g.yon nad la phan/_/de nas tshon gang mdun ngos la/_/k+She gnas ral dmigs chung ngu zhes/_/'di gtar mig gi nad la phan/_/de nas g.yas kyi tshon gang na/_/gnas mkhris rtsa ser po yin/_/'di gtar dang ka 'gribs na phan/_/_/de yi g.yon nas tshon gang nas/_/ke gnas mkhris pa'i dung bu zhes/_/'di gter kha kha'i nad la phan/_/de nas dpral ba'i dbus na ke/ 'di ming mkhris rtsa ser dung yin/_/'di gtar chang gi nad la phan/_/_/de g.yas mig gi phug na gyen/_/kor gnas mig rtsa 'greng bu zhes/_'di gtar ling thog la sogs phan/_/g.yon pa phug na ko yin te/_/'di ming mig rtsa 'phar ma zhes/_/'di gtar tshad pa'i nad la phan/_/de nas gyen du tshon gang g.yas/_/ka gnas mig rtsa 'phred nyal zhes/_/_/g.yon gyis 'phrad na kaM gnas te/_/'di gnyis mi gtar tsan dan byugs/_/mig gi nad rnams kun la phan/_/de nas phar bcal rtse gtad g.yas/_/tha gnas klad pa 'khyoms la phan/_/_/rtse gtad g.yon na de bzhin thA/_/_/'di gtar mig ni lug la phan/_/_/mig phug g.yas na yi ge thI/_/mig rtsa lhum bu zhes bya ste/_/'di gtar mig rtsa'i nad la phan/_/g.yon gyi phug na shrI gnas te/_/mig rtsa gang po zhes bya 'o/_/'di gtar mig ni rno bar byed/_/lce steng g.yas phyogs yas rkan gyi/_/dkar ba'i rtsa gnyis dag la ni/_/thu dang thu gnyis 'khrel ma'i tshul/_/'di ming lce rtsa nag po zhes/_/'di gtar lce phug bros la phan/_/rna ba g.yas nas bye gnas te/_/g.yon na rtsa gnas mdzum mos mnan/_/'od ni mngon du snang bar gyur/_/_/mkhur tshos g.yas g.yon ba dang bA/_/'gram zhabs g.yas g.yon bi dang bI/_/rna ba'i tshur 'gram g.yas g.yon na/_/de bzhin bu dang ru gnyis gnas/_/de bzhin phar 'gram g.yas g.yon na/_/bye b+he gnyis ni gnas pa yin/_/rna ba g.yas pa'i steng 'og na/_/ba bE g.yon pa'i steng 'og na/_/bo bO 'gram zur g.yas g.yon na/_/baM bAM lko gzur g.yas g.yon na/_/ma mA lto mgo g.yas g.yon na/_/mi mI lto stong dag na ni/_/mu mU gnyis po de bzhin no/_kha yi mtha' ni g.yas g.yon na/_/meh+ya meh+ya gnyis gnyis gnas pa'o/_/lce yi steng 'og mi l-I'o/_/sna bug g.yas g.yon me me gnyis/_/ya rkan ma rkan dkyil gnyis na/_/maM mAM lta zur g.yas g.yon na/_/tsa tswa ltag khung steng 'og na/_/tsi tsI mjing zur g.yas g.yon na/_/tsu tsu gnyis po de bzhin no/_/mgo bo'i 'bur ni g.yas g.yon na/_/ tseh+ya tseh+ya dpral dbyings g.yas g.yon na/_/tse tse smin ma g.yas g.yon na/_/ tso tso ltag pa'i bdud sgo na/_/yi ge tse ni gnas pa yin/_/rtse'u chung g.yas kyi mgo gnyis kyi/_/phar 'gram tshur 'gram gnyis po na/_/nya nyA de bzhin g.yon gnyis na/_/nyi nyi gnyis ni gnas pa'o/_/'gram zur rus mgo g.yas g.yon na/_/nyu lcu gnyis po de bzhin no/_/mig gi lkog ni g.yas g.yon na/_/nyeh+ya nyeh+ya gnyis po yod pa'o/_/mtshogs ma'i khur ni g.yas g.yon na/_/na nA ya mchu'i dkyil gnyis na/_/ni nI ma mchu'i gnyis po na/_nu nu mkhur tshos g.yon g.yon mgo'i/_/rus pa 'phyar ba gnyis na ni/_/beh+ya beh+ya lce zur g.yas g.yon na/_/ne n+we sna bug g.yas g.yon na/_/no no lce rtse sna rtse na/_/naM nAM lkog tse lto stong mgor/_/b+he b+he sna yi rtse gnyis na/_/b+he b+he gnyis po gnas pa yin/_/rlung sbyor dmigs pa gsal ba yis/_/yi ge bzlas shing phyir la 'don/_/bu ga gzer 'don mda' 'phangs 'dra/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi gtar sreg yin/_/gzhan la dngos su gtar bas phan/_/_/bde chen 'khor lo'i gnad yig go_/_/gnyis pa longs spyod 'khor lo ni/_/rtsa 'dab bcu drug bdag nyid de/_/dbus na ri dang shar na ha/_/lhor a nub ni byang du sa/_/ rin chen mkha' 'gro yab yum lnga/_/rin chen gri gug thod khrag ser/_/sbyor mtshams dwangs ma babs pa yis/_/_/mgrin dbus nas bzung lus kun gang /_/tsha grang nad ku na zhi bar bsam/_/rlung 'phangs tsha grang shes par bya/_/nang gi nad kun zhi bar byed/_/phyi rol yi ge sbyor bas 'don/_/mgrin g.yas gyen rgyug e gnas te/_/'di ming rtse'u chung g.yas pa zhes/_/'di gtar mjing pa rtengs la phan/_/g.yon na o gnas rtse'u chung g.yon/_/'di gtar stod ni bsdams pa phan/_/mgo chag khong nad kun la phan/_/dpung pa g.yas na e gnas te/_glo rtsa yon po zhes bya 'o/_/'di gtar glo ni tsha la phan/_/de bzhin g.yon na a gnas te/_/spyi rtsa then po zhes bya ba/_/'di gtar nad rnams kun la phan/_/dpung pa'i nyid kyi g.yas na a/_dug rtsa yon po zhes bya ba/_/'di gtar dug nad kun la phan/_/g.yon a sbal rtsa nag po zhes/_/'di ltar smyo 'bog brgyal la phan/_/dpung zur g.yas g.yon i i te/_sbal rtsa nag po zhes bya ba/_/'di gtar ske nad kun la phan/_/ g.yon rig ser rtsa thung po ste/_/'di gtar rtsa yi nad rnam sel/_/o O sog pa'i me long dkyil/_/'di ming gO rtsa chen po ste/_/'di bsregs mgo bo 'khyoms la phan/_/dpung pa lung mjug dkyil na o/_/gshen thag g.yas pa zhes bya'o/_/'di bsregs dpung pa byung ba sel/_/g.yon par i gnas 'di bsregs pas/_/pho ba khengs pa'i nad la phan/_/mgrin 'og khung na ri gnas te/_/ltag pa'i dkyil nas e gnas te/_/li ni rtse mchan g.yas g.yon lI/_/ de bzhin mdun gyi e yin no/_/'di kun gtems shing dkrugs pa min/_/yi ge 'di dag gnas_pa yi/_/phyogs nas dbugs bcas bzlas pas 'grub/_/dmigs pa'i me yis bsreg pa ste/_/gzhan la me btsas phan pa yin/_/longs spyod 'khor lo'i gnad yin no/_/gsum pa chos kyi 'khor lo ni/_/rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis dbus/_/a gnas shar ha lho phyogs ri/_/ nub ni byang du sa gnas pa'i/_/sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yab yum mthing /_/ 'khor lo gri gug thod khrag 'dzin/_/sbyor mtshams bdud rtsi'i rgyun babs pas/_/_/lus khengs nad gdon zhi bar bsam/_/rlung gnad la sogs gong bzhin no/_/nang gi nad kun sel bar byed/_/phyi rol yi ge'i sbyor ba ste/_/ snying las gyes pa'i rtsa chen ni/_/phyi rol rnam pa 'di ltar snang /_/lag pa'i gre mang g.yas pa'i gshong /_/yi ge ka yi mjug mo gnas/_/sman skad 'bab bsam gru mgo yin/_/_/'di gtar rigs kyi nad kun sel/_/g.yon pa'i gshong na kha yod de/_/'di ming b+ha la ti ti zhes/_/'di gtar mkhris pa'i nad la phan/_/bad kan nad kun sel bar byed/_/de yi phyi rol g.yas na ga_/_/'di gtar mchin pa'i nad la phan/_/de ming ru thung g.yas pa 'o/_/ g.yon na g+ha gnas ru thung g.yon/_/'di gtar pho ba'i nad la phan/_/lag ngar nang rol dbus na na/_/'di ming mkhris pa'i rgyal mo yin/_/'di gtar mkhris pa'i nad la phan/_/de yi g.yas zur rtsa gnas te/_/mchin rtsa za ma zhes bya ste/_/'di gtar mchin pa'i nad kun sel/_/de yi ro thung nang rol tsha/_/rtsa bran kha kha zhes bya ba/_/'di gtar bad kan nad la phan/_/lag ngar mkhrig ma dpral mtshams zur/_/dz+wa gnas gong rtsa g.yas pa zhes/_/'di gtar glo ba'i nad la phan/_/g.yon na dza gnas gong rtsa g.yon/_/'di gtar lud pa sel la phan/_/mkhrig ma'i rgyab dkyil drang por nya/_/'di ming rgyab rtsa grub mgo zhes/_/'di ltar ro stod nad la phan/_/lag pa'i mtheb mdzub gnyis kyi bar/_/tshon gang bcal ba'i shong bu na/_/Ta gnas snying rtsa dkar mo zhes/_/'di gtar mkhal mkhris snying nad sel/_/rgyab kyi drang por tha gnas te/_/rgyab rtsa chen mo zhes bya ba/_/'di gtar ro rgyab nad la phan/_/mtheb chung ngos kyi phyi zur Ta/_/mchin rtsa khron bu zhes bya ba/_/'di gtar lag pa'i nad la phan/_/mthe bong rgyab kyi drang por d+ha/_/mkhris rtsa g+harje zhes bya ba/_/ 'di gtar mgo bo'i nad la phan/_/mdzub mo'i rgyab na yi ge Na/_/pho ba'i yal ga zhes bya ste/_/'di gtar dug gi nad la phan/_/gung mo'i rgyab na ta gnas te/_/mtsher pa'i yal ga zhes bya'o/_/'di gtar srin gyi nad la phan/_/srin lag rgyab na de bzhin tsa/_/mkhal rtsa yon po zhes bya ba/_/'di gtar mkhal ma'i nad la phan/_/mthe'u chung rgyab na da gnas so/_/pho rtsa yon po zhes bya ba/_/'di gtar pho ba'i nad la phan/_/lag mthil dkyil na d+ha d+ha gnas/_/mchin pa'i rtsa nag ces bya 'o/_/'di gtar pho mchin 'khor la phan/_/mdzub mo'i ngos na 'khor ba ni/_/na gnas snying rtsa 'khor ma ste/_/'di gtar snying mi dga' ba dang /_/snying rlung ldang dub nyid la phan/_/rnal 'byor pa yis bzlas shing 'don/_/nu ma'i steng na pa gnas te/_/de yi g.yon na ba gnas so/_mchan khung g.yas na ba gnas te/_/de bzhin g.yon na b+ha gnas te/_ma ni brang gi lhan sna la/_/pho ba'i steng na la gnas so/_/ya ni rgyab kyi tshigs pa la/_/'di kun phyogs ni gang nar bsreg_/_/rnal 'byor pa yis gtems pas 'grub/_/gtems dang dkrugs dang skyil ba ni/_/phyi rtsa rnams la rab tu gces/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i gnad yin no/_/bzhi pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo ni/_/rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dbus/_/ni dang shar ha lho phyogs ri/_/nub a byang du sa gnas te/_/pad+ma yab yum dmar mdzes 'dzum/_/pad+ma gri gug thod khrag bsnams/_/sbyor mtshams bdud rtsi'i lus khengs te/_/nad gdon sdig sgrib ma lus dag_/rlang gnad la sogs gong dang 'dra/_/phyi rol yi ge'i sbyor ba ni/_/pa pA mkhal khung g.yas dang g.yon/_/sha sha spu nag mtshams na gnas/_/ra ra mkhal ma g.yas g.yon na/_/g.yas su gcud cing g.yon du bor/_/nga pa lte ba'i mdun rgyab na/_/mtheb mdzub gtems pas rlung ni 'gags/_/raM ha lte khung 'og dang steng/_/Tu Tu rgyu 'og g.yas dang g.yon/_/dza dz+wa gnyis kyang de bzhin no/_/Ta TA mkhal khung g.yas dang g.yon/_/'di kun gtems pa ma yin te/_/rab tu bzlas shing sbur ba yis/_/'byung ba rnams ni cha snyoms byed/_/sked pa man chad gang na yang /_/ yi ge bzlas shing spros pa yis/_/'byung ba'i nad rnams rang sar 'dzad/_/ g.yas g.yon yi ge rang gi gnad/_/tsha grang kha dog dkar dmar ro/_/yi ge kun la nges shes bya/_/lte ba sprul pa'i gnad yin no/_/lnga pa bde skyong 'khor lo ni/_/rtsa 'dab nyi shu rtsa brgyad dbus/_/sa dang shar ha lho phyogs ri/_/nub ni byang du a gnas te/_/las kyi mkha' 'gro yab yum ljang /_/rgya gram gri gug thod khrag 'dzin/_/sbyor mtshams byang sems babs pa yis/_/lus khengs nad gdon sdig sgrib dag_/rlung gnad la sogs gong bzhin no/_/phyi rol yi ge'i sbyor ba ni/_/hU ni sbu gu thung la gnas/_/bsregs pas rengs ba'i nad la phan/_/rnal 'byor pa yis dbugs bcas te/_/phyi nas nang du drang bar bya/_/_/u i bshang gci gnyis po sgo/_/k+Sha ni rkub kyi lung na 'o/_/ mdzub mos mnan te rnal 'byor pas/_/dbugs ni gyen la dal gyis drangs/_/nang du yi ge mang por spel/_/lte ba yi ges khengs pa na/_/gtems shing yi ge yid kyis bzlas/_/de ltar goms pas lo gnyis nas/_/zas gos gnyis kyi 'du shes 'gags/_/ra hU brla nang g.yas g.yon na/_/'phar rtsa 'di gnyis mdzub mos btsir/_/sems ni 'bros par 'gyur ba min/_/Ta la rdo rje'i steng 'og na/_/'di gnyis gtems pas thig le 'gags/_/sha ni rdo rje'i rtse mo na/_/mnyes pas 'dod chags sbyong bar byed/_/lus ni gcong gis zin pa na/_/_/'di kun bzlas shing gtems pa yis/_/'dus pa'i nad de drungs nas 'byin/_/ti Ti dpyi mgo g.yas dang g.yon/_/la lA brla khung g.yas dang g.yon/_/mi yi pus mo g.yas dang g.yon/_/'di bsregs sbrid dang 'khums pa 'tsho/_/nya i pus steng g.yas g.yon na/_/'di bsregs mkhal ma'i nad la phan/_/de yang pus mo'i mar mtshan na/_/sor bzhir ngar gdong g.yas pa na/_/yi ge su yi mgo yod de/_/sman skar mcher rtsa nag po zhes/_/'di gtar 'byung ba snyoms pa'i grogs/_/skad 'gags rtsib maRa zug la phan/_/de g.yon so so'i mgo gnas te/_/mcher pa'i gsang chung zhes bya'o/_/'di gtar sgal tshigs 'khrid la phan/_/de nas sor bzhi'i gdong g.yas na/_/yi ge Sha yi mgo gnas te/_/sman skad mkhal ma'i rtsa nag ces/_/ 'di gtar lus ni 'khums padang /_/rkang pa g.yas pa bshal la phan/_/ 'byung ba rab tu mnyam par byed/_/g.yon na she yi mjug yod do/_/chu ser rtsa nag ces bya 'o/_/'di gtar chu ser rgyas pa dang /_/mdze yi nad la rab tu phan/_/byin pa'i dkyil tshad g.yas pa na/_/yi ge'i k+Sha yi mjug yod de/_/ sman skad byin mjug ring po zhes/_/'di gtar mkhal ma 'grams la phan/_/ g.yon na sha gnas byin mjug thung /_/'di gtar sgur ba'i nad la phan/_/ bol gong g.yas na Sha yi mjug_/'di gtar glang thabs nad la phan/_/de bzhin g.yon na k+Sha gnas te/_/glang bu gya gyu zhes bya 'o/_/'di gtar long nad byung na phan/_/long mo'i phyi mtshan g.yas pa na/_/yi ge kha yi mjug yod de/_/_/sman skad byin mjug yon po yin/_/'di gtar mkhal ma'i nad la phan/_/de bzhin g.yon na khaM gnas te/_/mkhal rtsa 'khyud ma zhes bya ba/_/ 'di gtar sked pa 'khyog la phan/_/zha grum nad rnams kun la phan/_/'di kun lnga lnga dbugs dang bcas/_/na sar bton pas phan pa yin/_/yi ge bzlas shing rlung gnad bstun/_/dmigs pa'i nad rnams sreg sbyong gtor/_/ mkha' la rgyangs kyis song bar bsgom/_/des ni nad rnams kun la phan/_/ bde skyong 'khor lo'i gnad yig go_/de ltar phyi nang rtsa nang gi_/yi ge 'di kun bzlas pa ni/_/sbrel dang rkyang pa mgo zhabs can/_/'di kun rnal 'byor pas shes bya/_/'khor lo re la dbang ba yi/_/rtsa yi rnam pa na ba'i tshe/_/ thams cad sbrel te bzlas par bya/_/de yi g.yas dang g.yon dang dbus/_/ tshad ni ji ltar yod pa kun/_/_/ji skad smros bzhin shes par bya/_/de bzhin 'khor lo'i 'og nas ni/_/steng du mched pa'i nad byung na/_/gong gi yi ges brgyan par bya/_/de bzhin 'og tu mched pa na/_/'og gi yi ges gong mar brgyan/_/_/'khor lo lnga char 'khrugs pa na/_/thog ma gang nas nad langs pa'i/_/yi ge'i tshig gis sbyar nas ni/_/rlung dmigs gtems gcud bzlas par bya/_/de bzhin thad ka'i nad byung nas/_/bzlas pa dbugs dang bstun nas ni/_/grangs ni nyi shu rtsa re la/_/gang na'i yi ge bzlas pa'i tshe/_/yi ges 'khor lo khengs pa na/_/gcig la gcig thim lus gnad gzir/_/nad ni phyir sangs song bar bsam/_/de ltar yi ge bzlas pa'i tshe/_/ngag ni lcong lcong grul bum skad/_/'don zhing yan lag bskor bar bya/_/de rjes dbugs ni phyir phyung la/_/grang ba la ni dmar po yis/_/nang du bstim zhing snying la bsdu/_/tsha na dkar bas phyi la 'don/_/'di ltar lan grangs nyi shu gcig_/ bar du lus gnad gzir byas shing /_/rlung dmigs 'jom pas nad kun grol/_/gdon rnams kun gyis glags mi rnyed/_/phyi nang yi ge rtsa rlung gnad/_/thams cad 'dir rdzogs khyad par 'phags/_/phyi nang nad rnams gang la yang*/_/'khor lo lnga yi yi ge rnams/_/rtsa yi grangs dang mnyam pa yi/_/mkha' 'gro yab yum mang po dang /_/ba spu'i grangs dang mnyam pa yi/_/_/dpa' bo dpa' mo grangs med kyis/_/lus kyi phyi nang bar gsum khyab/_/snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang sems des/_/lus gang nad rnams sangs par bsam/_khyad par na sar bdud rtsi babs/_/nad de bde ba chen por gyur/_/sems nyid don dang gnyis med bsre/_/de yang tshad pa'i nad byung na/_/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor mtshams nas/_/bdud rtsi dkar bsil rgyun babs pas//lus khengs tshad nad zhi bar bsgom/_/rlung ni nang du mi gzung bar//phyir 'phangs phyir gzung rab tu bsngags/_/grang ba'i nad la lte ba nas/_/pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i sbyor mtshams nas/_/bdud rtsi dmar gsal me 'bar bas/_/pho ba'i nang nas lus kun khengs/_/tshig cing rdos bcas dag par bsam/_/_/rlung ni nang bzung kha sbyar la/_/_/yi ge yid kyis bzla bar bya/_/bad kan la ni mgrin pa nas/_/rin chen mkha' 'gro'i sbyor mtshams nas/_/bdud rtsi babs pas bad kan byang /_/rlung ni phyir 'don gtum mo bsgom/_/rin chen mkha' 'gro'i yi ge bzlas/_/'khrul 'khor bya zhing yan lag spyod/_/'dus pa'i nad la snying ga yi/_/rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i sbyoRa mtshams nas/_/dwangs ma babs pas lus khengs pas/_/steng 'og rlung ni kha sbyor bsgom/_/de dag kun gyi grogs nyid du/_/_/gsang ba bde skyong 'khor lo nas/_/_/las gyi mkha' 'gro'i rlung byung bas/_/nad gdon gtor bsregs sbrangs par bsgom/_khyad par rlang gi nad byung na/_/gsang bar mkha' 'gro nyi shu brgyad/_/sbyor mtshams rlung gi dwangs ma yis/_/lus khengs bde skyong bde ba rgyas/_/_/mi rtog stong pa'i ngang la gzhag_/'jam rlung gsang bar gzung bar bya/_/de ltar lus gnad 'byung 'khrugs na/_/rlung dmigs yi ges 'don par bya/_/sems gnad snying rlung rnam rtog 'phro/_/dgag sgrub nyon mongs skyes pa'i tshe/_/gang shar ngo bo ngos bzung la/_rang sor bzhag pas rang gis grol/_/gdod nas ma skyes gzhi rtsa bral/_/ye stong ka dag chos kyi sku/_/rgya mtsho las ni rlabs bzhin du/_/sems nyid don dam rgya mtsho las/_/ye shes rba rlabs rang shar bas/_/shar tsam nyid nas gzhi la thim/_/gtad med stong pa'i lam khyer bya/_/gang ltar na yang rang gi sems/_/sems ni stong pa ngos gzung med/_/na sa na mkhan gnyis su med/_/na rgyu chos dbyings stong par grol/_/nam mkhan sems nyid ngang du thim/_/na sa rdul phran tsam du med/_/de ltar bltas te lam khyer bya/_/spyir na ma rig nyon mongs las/_/'byung bzhi 'khrugs te nad du gyur/_/don la gnyis med chu zla tsam/_/ngo bo ngos gzung gnyis su med/_/thams cad ro mnyam chos sku'i ngang /_/snang ba sna tshogs gzigs mor che/_/de ltar mthong ba'i rnal 'byor la/_/sdug bsngal chos nyid stong par grol/_/rkyen rnams bde chen grogs su 'char/_/me la bud shing bsnan pa bzhin/_/gang 'dug 'og min mkha' spyod yin/_/gang shar chos sku'i rol pa yin/_/gang snang rang grol gnyug ma yin/_/rang gzhan dge ba'i phun tshogs chu gter las/_/stong pa'i 'dab stong snying rje'i snying po can/_/gzhan phan dri bsung phyogs bcur ldang ba yis/_/_/ma lus 'gro ba'i don kun sgrub byed yin/_/chos tshul 'di ni theg mchog rin chen mdzod/_/thar par 'gro ba dag gi them skas te/_/gnyis med ye shes gdod ma'i khang bzangs su/_/kun dga'i dus ston rgya cher 'phel byed yin/_/bdag blo'i mkha' la rtogs pa'i chu 'dzin 'khrigs/_/don zab 'brug sgra snying rje'i glog phreng can/_/phan bde'i char rgyun rab tu 'bab pa
