yis/_/dad ldan skye bo'i pad mtsho gang bar shog_/bdag gis legs smon sngon sbyangs ge sar las/_/gzhan phan snying rje'i 'dab ma dkyus ring bas/_/yid mkha'i chu gter rab tu brgyan pa de/_dad ldan skye bo'i bya tshogs brten par shog_/chos tshul rgya mtsho'i rgya mtsho ji srid bar/_/bde chen mchog nas mchog tu 'gro ba kun/_/thar pa gang nas gang du rab 'gro bas/_/yon tan phun tshogs phun tshogs gnyis 'grub ste/_/spangs rtogs mthar phyin mthar phyin sangs rgyas shog_/bdud rtsi'i sprin phung zhes bya ba/_dpal o rgyan gyi mkhas pa chen po mtsho skyes rdo rjes rjes su bzung ba'i rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis gangs ri thod dkar du ston rnams kyi tshe/_rin chen shog 'dra'i ngos la bkod pa rdzogs so/_/

[8.32 chi ba brtag bsla'i man ngag nyi zla gza' bral]

@#/_/'chi ba brtag bslu'i man ngag nyi zla gza' bral bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog 'dra'i skor/ 'chi ba brtag bslu'i man ngag nyi zla gza' bral zhes bya ba/_dpal dus nges pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje'i 'od zer gyis/_/sems can ma lus 'khor ba las sgrol phyir/_/rgyud don man ngag rgya mtsho'i sprin 'phro ba/_/ bde gshegs 'chi med nyi zla'i dbang po rgyal/_/'byung bzhi'i sbubs nang ye shes rig pa'i lha/_/'od lnga'i klong na bzhugs la skye 'chi med/_/de gdangs rlung sems so sor 'bral ba'i dus/_/sha khrag sgyu ma'i phung po 'jig pa ni/_/bdag gzhan don du brtags te bslu bar bya/_/sgyu ma'i nang na mi lus sgyu ma'i mchog_/gang la brten nas don gnyis 'grub 'gyur bas/_/legs bzung brtan pas bdag gzhan dga' bar bya/_/de la dang po 'chi ba brtag pa ni gnyis las/_/thun mong pa ni/_sen mo'i bkrag shor na zla ba dgu na nad kyis btab nas 'chi'o/_/mig gi mtha'i sprin dkar po yal na zla ba lnga na'o/_/ltag pa'i bdud sgo nas skra tshom gcig gyen la langs na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig na'o/_/rkang pa'i long bu phyir log tu gyur na zla gcig na'o/_/skyes bu nad kyis btab pa'i so rnams kyi rtsa bar dreg pa chags na zhag dgu na'o/_/sna zhom na zhag lnga na'o/_/rtag tu yan lag brkyang na zhag bdun na'o/_/mig 'byed 'dzum med par 'bru tshugs su blta na zhag gsum na'o/_/mig gi tshigs 'khrul zhing yud tsam gyen du log log byed na zhag bco lnga na'o/_/'gram sha shong 'bur shor na zhag bcu dgu na'o/_/_/dbugs rtsegs mar rgod na zla ba drug na'o/_/mig nas mchi ma mi thub par 'dzag na zhag*lnga*na'o/_/'gram pa g.yon*pa shong gis song na zhag gcig na'o/_/so 'thams na zhag gsum gyi nyi ma phyed na'o/_/lce'i thog tu thig le nag po sngar med pa byung na zhag gnyis na'o/_/rna ba leb mor 'byar na nam phyed na'o/_/rtsa gnyid log med na zla ba phyed na 'chi bar nges so/_thun mong ma yin pa ni/_rnal 'byor pas rang gi don du brtag par bya'o/_/de yang tshe'i gzugs la brtag pa ni/_sprin med pa'i nam mkha' rab tu dwangs pa'i tshe/_lnga dro'am phyi dro rang gi grib ma'i snying gar mtshan ma btsugs te ma yengs bar bltas pas/_mig sbrid dus nam mkhar cher gyis bltas pa'i tshe/_rang gi gzugs ma tshang bar med par dkar lam gyis mthong na bar chad med pa'o/_/_/dang po chad rtags las dus brtag pa ni/_lag pa'i phyag mtshan phreng ba'am bum pa med na lo bdun na'o/_/lag pa g.yas med na lo lnga na'o/_/_g.yon pa med na gsum na'o/_/rkang pa g.yas pa'i pus mo man chad med na lo gnyis na'o/_/ thams cad med na zla ba brgyad na'o/_/g.yon pa med na lo gcig na'o/_/mgo'i phyed g.yas med na zla ba dgu na'o/_/g.yon med na bdun na'o/_/rke yan chad med na zla ba lnga na'o/_/rke dang bcas pa med na gsum na'o/_phung po'i stod med na zla ba gnyis na'o/_smad med na gcig na'o/_/lus phyed g.yas med na zhag nyi shu rtsa dgu na'o/_/ g.yon med na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig na'o/_/ gnyis pa dbyibs las bslus pas bzlog mi bzlog brtag pa ni/_tshe gzugs gru bzhir 'dug na bslus pas bzlog go_/zlum po dang /_nar po dang /_zla gam yang bzlog pa'o/_/ro gtums pa 'dra ba dang /_gru gsum ni mi bzlog pas yo byad spangs dag bya/_mi chags pa mchog yin no/_/gsum pa kha dog las/_gdon brtag pa ni/_dkar por snang ba dbus nas yal na klu dang rgyal pos gnod pa'o/_/ nag por snang ba g.yas nas yal na bdud dang ma mo'o/_/dmar por snang ba g.yon nas yal na btsan dang rang gi lha dang chos skyong ngo /_/ser por snang ba 'og nas yal na klu btsan dang rgyal 'gong ngo /_/sngon po las rkang pa nas thung ngur yal na klu'am mtsho sman no/_/yang na ban bun du 'dug na khyad par du ma mo dang gshin rje'o/_/ser brang bring ni sa bdag go_khra khyug khyug ni 'che 'dre sna tshogs pa'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags so/_/yang gnam sa gnyis kyi 'brel thag la brtag pa ni/_nyin phyed na kha lhor bltas la gru mo pus mo'i steng du bzhag ste/_lag ngar gyen du bsgrengs pa'i khu tshur smin phrag tu bcangs te/_mig gi zur gyis bltas pas shin tu phra bar 'ong ste/_de nyid na zhag bcu dgu na'o/_/_yang ri rab kyi logs la seng ge zhon pa'i mi babs sam ma babs brtag pa ni/_shar phyogs su chu'i rdzing ngam/_/lteng ka yod pa'i nub ngos la gyang ngam rtsig ngos la chu mdangs yod sar bltas pas/_grib ma zang thal gnyis brtsegs su 'ongs te/_de'i spyi bo'i steng ma med na zhag bcu drug gi nyi ma phyed na'o/_/ yang mtsho'i steng du chu spris yal lam ma yal brtag pa ni/_mtshan mo ngal dub dang*/ chang 'thungs pa dang /_bud med dang 'grogs pa spangs la/_nangs par nyi ma ri rtse la shar dus snod mi dkar mi nag pa'i nang du rang gi chu btang ba la/_shar du phyogs pas bltas pa'i tshe/_nyi zer la rlangs pa sngon dmar du byung na zla ba phyed na'o/_/nag po hral hril ni zhag bcu gcig na'o/_/_dmar po thig le can ni zhag dgu na'o/_/gzhan ni skyon med pa'o/_kha dog las gdon brtag pa snga ma bzhin no/_/yang sa'i grong khyer na dge sbyong gi du ba brtag pa ni/_nyi ma rtse shar la rang gi rnam snang dor ba la bltas pas rlangs pa med na zhag dgu na'o/_/ri rab kyi rtse na mi 'gyur ba'i nyi ma nub ma nub brtag pa ni/_mig btsir bas 'od med na zhag gsum na'o/_/ri rab kyi khong seng na mkha' 'gro'i rang sgra brtag pa ni/_seng ge ltar nyal ba'i rna ba sa la sbyar bas sgra med na zhag lnga'am bdun nam bcu gcig na'o/_/dpag bsam gyi shing la bdud langs sam ma lang brtag ga pa ni/_ltag pa'i sgo na skra nyag bdun gyen la langs na zhag na 'chi bar nges so/_/ gnyis pa 'chi ba bslu ba la gnyis las bsdoms te spyir bslu ba ni/_bla ma dkon mchog mchod cing tshogs bsag_/_/tshe'i sgrub pa bya/_'byung ba'i rten 'brel bya'o/_/de'ang rlung gi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud dang bcas pa'i lte ba dang /_rtsibs la yaM lnga/_de bzhin du me la raM/_chu la khaM/_nam mkha' la aM bkod pa'i mu khyud la A li kA li bkod la/_so so'i kha dog bya/_'byung ba de dag gi lha re bskyed nas yi ge rang gi lo grangs shig lha la bstim la/_'khor lo lnga po de rdza phor so ma kha sbyar du bcug la tshon skud kyis dkris pa dang /_dud 'gro dang mi la sogs pa sems can rigs mi mthun pa du ma la sbrel pa'i ngar zan la mi gzugs khru gang byas la/_mig tu raM/_rna bar yaM/_sna la laM/_lce la khaM/_snying gar e bris la gzhug_/zan nam sa la rang gi glud lo grangs tsam byas la/_sa dkar sa dmar la sogs pas kha bsgyur te/_nag po dang /_dmar po dang /_ser po dang /_dkar po dang /_ljang gu dang /_khra bo byas la phya ba la sogs pa'i steng du bsgrigs la/_rang gi dri ma la sogs dang /_gos ras dang / skra sen dang /_kha sna'i chu rnams dang /_rin po che'i brdar phye/_bal tshon dang dar snas brgyan te/_/_ltas ngan gyi bya sgro mang po btsugs la/_mdun na phar gtor ma so so'i mdog can lo grangs dang*/_chang bu lo grangs tsam byas la/_O~M AHhU~M gis so so'i 'dod dgu 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs te/_namaHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yoH bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tatraM ut+pa te s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na kham gis nam mkha' dang mnyam par spel nas/_'byung po thams cad pa'i sngags kyi 'chi bdag gshin rjes gtso byas pa'i bgegs dang log 'dren rnams la bsngos te/_/_khyer cig khyer cig stobs ldan rnams/_/sred dang lan chags zhen pa dang /_/dran dang bzung dang bsam dang rig_/ glod dang zhi dang grol bar mdzod/_/ces brjod la/_'khor lo lnga dang bcas pa chu bo chen po'i gzhung la bskyal bas lo gsum gyi 'chi bdag thams cad bzlog go_/'di nyid lo gsum gsum na lan re bya'o/_/ gnyis pa bye brag tu bzlog pa ni/_bla ma'am rdo rje'i spun bzhugs na rab/ med na'ang skyes bu mchog las byung ba gcig gis/_'byung ba lnga'i sa bon gyi yi ges mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i sgo sngar dbang bskur la/_dam tshig gi nyams chag bskang ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/_de'ang sen mo'i bkrag med pa la dge slong bdun la ston mo bya/_yon dbul/_sdom pa blang ngo /_/mig gi spris ma yal na tsha tsha lo grangs tsam dkar po la rten 'brel snying pos rab tu gnas pa byas te/_bskor ba bdun byas la chu bo chen por bskyal nas/_gom pa lo grangs phyir ma log gi bar phyi mig mi blta'o/_/ltag pa'i bdud skra langs ba la/_'bru nag po'i zan la ngar ngar glud khrug gang ba byas la/_de'i snying gar rang gi ming dang*/_lung thang gi rdog po lo grangs tsam bcug nas/_rang gi skras de'i skra dang khrag byugs gos dum gyis gril la nag por byas te/_rang gi gnas nas goms pa brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sar dong nag po gru gsum brus par khyer te/_ri lo grangs tsam bzlas te/_bdud nag po khyod 'di khyer cig gal che'o/_/zhes lan gsum brjod nas/_dong du bsgyur te steng du rang gi brun btang nas phyi mig mi blta bar 'bros so/_/long bu log pas nyi ma nub khar kha nub tu bltas te/_gcer bur phyung la/_'phongs su khyi gzhug btsugs te/_mdun du dri chen btang ba nas khams re zos te/_khyi skad lan gsum du 'don no/_/yang so dreg chags pas shar du bltas la[(]a[》]ra'i pags pa gyon la [) ]ra'i skad lan gsum 'don no/_/sna zhom pas chu sna dgu'i khrus bya zhing /_sna'i rtser a dkar po bsam la/_a nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/_/ yan lag brkyang bskum la/_rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi khrus chus bkrus la/_yan lag bzhi snying dang lngar 'byung ba lnga'i sa bon gyi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin rgya skyegs kyis bris la btags na bzlog go_/mig 'bru tshugs su blta ba la/_dge 'dun dang /_byis pa lo grangs tsam la ston mo bya zhing /_gos dmar po gyon no/_/'gram pa'i shong bu la sa'i las su tsha tsha lo grangs/_chu'i las su chu gtor lo grangs/_me'i las su sbyin sreg lo grangs/_rlung gi las su ba dan ljang gu lo grangs phyar/_nam mkha'i las su e lo grangs tsam bzla'o/_/dbugs rgod pas bu ram gyi lde gu la yaM bzlas te za'o/_/sna yo bas sna rtse hU~M dkar po bsam zhing bzla'o/_/mchi ma 'dzag pas mig tu b+haM bsams te bzla'o/_/'gram pa g.yon pa shong bas ky-i bsams shing bzla'o/_/so 'thams pas sna bsams te bzla'o/_/lce'i thig le nag po la hUM bsams te bzla'o/_/rna ba 'byar pa la muM bsams te bzla'o/_/rtsa gnyid log med pas hU~M bsams te bzla'o/_/brang gi lhen sna zhom pas y-imyu bsams te yi ge de dag lo grangs tsam bzlas shing*/_/mtshal dang dri bzangs kyis gnas der bri'o/_/tshe gzugs kyi phyag mtshan med pas bla ma la tshogs brgya rtsa gtong ngo*/_/lag pa g.yas pa med pas ngar glud khru gang ba seng ge'i mgo can kha gdangs pa gcig la/_khyim bya'i spu lo grangs tsam glan nas byang ngos kyi lam srang khar bskyal lo/_/g.yon pa med pas sre mo yi rlid bur/_stag nag khra'i mche ba/_phag nag khra/_khyi nag po'i mche ba gsum bcug pa'i khar rang gi dri chus sbrus pa'i ngar zan brdzangs te chu chen por dor ro/_/rkang pa g.yas pa'i pus mo man chad med na/_nyi ma nub tu nam sros dus seng ldeng ngam rgya shug gi me rang gi lo grangs tsam gtang ngo*/_/ g.yon pa med pas sa dkar po'i glud khru gang byas te snying khar stag pa nag po sor bzhi par lo grangs kyi nyag ga byas te/_btsag byugs pa btsug nas lha khang stong par tho rangs bskyal lo/_/mgo'i g.yas med pas phung shul gyi sa sna dgu dang /_shing nag po'i 'bras bu sbyar te/_ga'u kha sbyar byas par rang gi skra dang*/_gos kyi dum bu dang*/_dri ma dang /_khrag rnams bcug_/glang ma'i byang bu bcu gnyis la lo'i ming bris te/_lo re bzhin lo'i rgyal po 'di khyer cig_/ces pa bris pa bcug la de'i kha bcad pa'i steng du/_tsher ma rigs mi mthun pa mang po blugs la/_nam phyed na gos nag po gyon te dur khrod du bskyal lo/_/mgo'i g.yon med pas 'bru sna nyi shu rtsa lnga'i ngar zan gyi snying gar/_mi rta khyi gsum gyi rus pa bcug ste/_rang gi gos rnyings pas dril te tshes bcu gcig gi nam sros dus gzhan la bskur te/_/lhor gom pa brgyad cu 'das par dong nang*du*bcug*nas/_rang*gi*ming nas bton la/_lan gsum ngu ba'i tshul bstan te sba'o/_/rke yan chad med na shar lhor tsher ma can gyi hom lo grangs byas te/_rim pas bsreg cing raM lo grangs re bzlas so/_rke dang bcas pa med pas lus ro sol gyis byugs la skra spyi bor bcings/shog gu sor bzhi la rang gi lo dang gnam lo'i ming bris pa'i phyogs bzhir 'byung bzhi'i sa bon bris te rang gi sna la btags la tshes dgu'i nam gung la phyogs bzhir rgyug cing /_kha la khyod khyer sa ram tsi zhes 'brel med mang du brjod cing /_shog gu de dur khrod du sba'o/_/stod med pas me btang bar lo bcu gnyis kyi ming byang bsreg go_/smad med pas dur khrod du rus pa sna tshogs pa'i dud pa btang ngo /_/lus kyi g.yas med na tsha tsha lo grangs btab cing /_gtsug tor lo grangs 'don no/_/g.yon med pas gos dmar po gon zhing /_gzungs gra lnga lo grangs 'don no/_/gnam sa'i 'brel thag chad pas gsung rab mang po klog cing dge rtsa grub tshad bya'o/_/seng ge mi babs pas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga lo grangs tsam bya'o/_/dpag bsam gyi ljon shing chag pas 'bras bu gsum dang /_ra mnye ba dang /_dbang lag sbyar ba'i sman mar za'o/_/rlangs pa sngon dmar gyis khams la lo bcu gnyis kyi gzugs byas te 'byung ba'i kha dog gis bsgyur ba re re la/_tsha tsha re re/_ngar glud re re/_stag pa'i hom re byas te nyi ma nub dus byang shar gyi dur khrod du bskyal lo/_/nag po hral hral la 'bru sna tshogs dang /_lcags zangs kyi phye ma phyogs bzhir gtor ro/_/thig le nyung 'bru tsam dmar po la rang gi dri ma sbres pa'i ngar glud lo grangs tsam la gzugs mo byi thur dar dmar po tshon re btags la btsugs te rus pa sna tshogs dang lhan cig shar gyi lam po cher bskyal lo/_/dri chen gyi rlang pa med pas nyi ma mdung gang dus nub tu bltas te/_rta'i skad nus tshad 'don zhing /_rta'i thod pa la 'byung ba'i sa bon bris la phyar ro/_/rna ba'i 'brug med pas snying du y-i bsams te mig gyen la ldog cing*/ gzhan gyis gzungs chu'i khrus spyi bo nas bya'o/_/rna ba'i rlung sgra shar shar zer bas zas sna tshogs tshad kyi gtor ma lo grangs bcu gnyis ming dang bcas pa shing sdong chen po'i rtsar bskyal lo/_/dpag bsam gyi shing lo langs pas tshogs lo grangs tsam gtang*/_tshe sgrub la 'bad bas grol nges so/_de'ang sngar bas dge sbyor sum log tu bya zhing sgom bzlas dang /_bdud rtsi'i bcud len sna tshogs dang /_thig le'i rim gro la brtson pas bzlog par bya'o/_/ de ltar byas nas yang snga ma bzhin blta zhing 'chi ltas bslus sam blta'o/_/de ltar lan gsum gsum thabs de rnams la 'bad pas/zhag gi dus btab pa zla bar nur zhing*/_zla ba lor 'phel te lo yun ring por phyir 'gyangs pas 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa las tshe'i bshol 'debs par byed do/_/_thabs mchog tu gsang ba 'di dag ni/_slob dpon chen po shrI sing has skal ldan gyi don du legs par gsungs pa nyid/_'dir nye bar mkho ba'i cha rkyen du rin chen shog 'dra'i ngos la snang bar byas pa'o/_/de ltar 'chi ba brtag bsla'i man ngag mchog_/nyi zla gza' bral gsang ba'i yi ge 'di/_/o rgyan thugs sras dri med 'od zer gyis/_/_gangs ri thod dkar mgul du legs par bkod/_/phyi rabs skal ldan rnams dang 'di 'phrad de/_/'chi ba las ni slar yang bshol btab nas/_/mkha' 'gro snying tig mngon sum don bsgom zhing /_/ tshe gcig 'od lus mkha' spyod 'grub par shog_/_bdag kyang deng nas dgongs gter zab mo'i don/_/ji snyed ji bzhin mthong ba'i 'od zer gyis/_/blo gsal blo yi pad+mo kha phye ste/_/lhun grub sa la kun tu bzang por shog_/_snying nas snying po don mthong legs pa'i lam/_/'od gsal 'od lnga'i snang ba rgya che bas/_/skal bzang skal ldan rnams kyi don byed cing /_/tshe 'dir tshe gcig sangs rgyas 'grub par shog_/'chi ba brtag bslu'i man ngag rin po che gsang ba'i gter mdzod nyi zla gza' bral zhes bya ba/ pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis/_ston ka'i dus me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe/_o rgyan rdzong gi dben gnas su bkod pa rdzogs so//_//

[8.33 btags grol rgyud kyi man ngag rin chen snying po]

@#/_/btags grol rgyud kyi man ngag rin chen snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog 'dra'i skor/ btags grol man ngag rin chen snying po zhes bya ba/_gdod ma'i mgon po 'od mi 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kun ma skyes mnyam pa'i ngang nyid las/_/sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa yis/_/'gro ba'i don mdzad kun bzang rigs lnga'i tshogs/_/rig 'dzin bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ skal ldan rnams ni 'bad med grol bya'i phyir/_/btags grol rgyud drug chos sku'i ston pas gsungs/_/de nyid bri dang rab gnas dbang bskur bcang*// klag cing bzhu ba'i rim pa legs par bstan/_/dang po bri ba ni mthing shog zur nas zur du sor brgyad pa la/_gser gyi gzab mar dbu gnyis gyen la yod pas/_btags grol rnams dang 'das rjes gsum po bris te/_dar tshon gyis dril lo/_rab tu gnas pa ni/_zla ba rgyas pa'i tshe dben zhing /_nyams dga' bar maN+Dal mda' gang mthing kha dkar ser dmar ljang lnga'i mu khyud bskor la/_de'i nang du rigs lnga'i 'od kyi tshom bu lnga bris pa la so so'i kha dog gis gang bar khyams mthing gas gang /_tshom bu'i mu khyud mthing dmar dkar po'i ra ba gsum gsum gyis bskor ba'i dbus su many+dzi'i steng du rin po che'i snod 'brus bkang ba gcig gi steng du btags grol rnams na bza' dang bcas pa gzhug_/_/dkyil 'khor gyi mthar phyi nang gi mchod pa dang / tshogs gtor bzang du bsham mo/_/de nas bgegs gtor byin la gu gul gyi dud pa dang rol mo'i sgras bgegs rnams rgya mtsho'i mthar bskrad la srung ba'i 'khor los mtshams bcad de/thams cad kyi skyabs 'gro sems bskyed byas la/rang nyid kun bzang yab yum mthing ga rin po che'i rgyan can du bskyed/ye shes pa dgug gzhug mchod bstod cung zad byas la/_rigs lnga'i rtsa sngags rten 'brel snying po dang*bcas*pa*nas bzlas pa yang sta gon du bya'o/_/de nas stong pa'i ngang las bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor pa rnams 'og min gyi zhing dang po'i ston pa dang 'khor du bsams te/_mdun gyi tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gyi phung po gcig tu 'bar ba'i dbus na/_rtsa ba'i bla ma brgyud pas bskor ba rnams dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam pa can mthing ga 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/_byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas bzung ba'i/_shar du mi bskyod par dkar po bdud 'dul gyis rdo rje dang*/_lhor rin chen 'byung ldan seRa po mchog sbyin gyis ut+pa la dang /_nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar po ting nge 'dzin gyis pad+ma dang /_byang du don yod grub pa ljang gu skyabs sbyin gyis rgya gram 'dzin pa/_so so'i yum dang bcas pa bskyed la/ 'od zer gyi phung po gcig tu 'bar bar btags grol de nyid bsam mo/_/de nas rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas dbyangs dang bcas te/_hUM ma lus sems can kun gyi mgon gyur cing*/_/bdud sde dpung bcas mi bzad 'joms mdzad lha/_/dngos rnams ma lus ji bzhin mkhyen gyur pa'i/_/bcom ldan rigs lnga yab yum 'khor bcas gshegs/_zhes pas 'og min nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dang*/bla ma brgyud pa thams cad dang /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mkha' 'gro dpag tu med pa sprin phung gtibs pa bzhin du byon pa la/_me tog bdug spos snang gsal dri/_zhal zas rol mo la sogs pa/_phyi nang mchod pa'i sprin phung gis/_bde gshegs ma lus 'khor bcas mchod/_O~M badzra puSh+pa d+hu pe A lo ke g+han+te nai wi t+ya shab+ta AH hU~M/_oM ye nas 'od gsal chos sku dag pa las/_/sna tshogs gzugs sku mtshan dpe'i gzi 'od can/_/bla ma yi dam rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang /_/mkha' 'gro dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs la bstod/_/O~M badzra aM ku sha dzaH/_badzra pA sha hU~M/_badzra s+pho Ta baM/_badzra pra we sha hoHsa/_btags grol lha'i skur gsal ba la/_gnyis su med par thim/_yang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lngas dbang bskur/_yi ge gsum gyis sku gsung thugs rgyas btab la/_sngar gyi bzlas pa'i me tog gis gtor zhing /_rigs lnga'i rtsa sngags rten 'brel snying po dang bcas pa ba brjod nas/_'bru dang /_sman dang rin po che'i maN+Dal lan gsum phul te/_sa gzhi spos kyis byugs shing me tog bkram/_/ri rab gling bzhi nyi zlas brgyan pa 'di/_/sangs rgyas zhing du dmigs te phul ba yis/_/'gro kun rnam dag zhing la spyod par shog_/O~M badzra re khe A:hUM/_zhes pa dang /_me tog la sogs pa phyi nang gi mchod pas mchod la/_bla ma dang rigs lnga'i bstod pa rgyas par byas te/_me tog gis snyims pa bkang la mgrin gcig tu/_gang 'dir bcom ldan 'das Rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa dang /_/_bla ma dang phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams dgongs su gsol/_che ge mo zhes bgyi bas thog drangs pa'i sems can thams cad smin par mdzad du gsol/_grol bar mdzad du gsol/_gang bar mdzad du gsol/_rgyas par mdzad du gsol/_cher 'phel bar mdzad du gsol/_/_ces pa gsum dang / rgyud dang 'das rjes rnams tshar gcig brjod pa'am/_rgyud kyi snying po tshar bdun brjod la/_bkra shis kyi lha tshogs dpag tu med pas bkra shis brjod par bsam la/_me tog 'thor/_rol mo sgrogs shing mgrin gcig tu/_bde gshegs mi 'gyur sku lnga lhun gyis grub/_/ye shes lnga ldan phrin las phun sum tshogs/_/gdod ma'i mgon po rigs lnga'i bkra shis gang /_/bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir phun tshogs shog_/_/'og min ye shes bde chen rgya mtsho'i zhing //rgyal ba rgya mtsho dpag med tshogs mnga' bas/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis lhun gyis grub pa yi/_/bkra shis dam pa des kyang bde legs shog_/bde chen rig 'dzin bde gshegs 'gro ba'i yab/_/rnam smin tshe dbang phyag rgya lhun gyis grub/_/so so'i sku dang ye shes phun tshogs pa'i/_/bkra shis dam pa des kyang bde legs shog_/dga' rab rdo rje shrI sid+ha dang*/_/o rgyan yab yum mkha' 'gro rgya mtshor bcas/_/dngos grub sna tshogs 'bar ba'i sprin 'phro ba'i/_/bkra shis dam pa des*kyang*bde legs shog_/_/phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/_/'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa/_/zhes pa la sogs pas shis pa rgyas par brjod pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcur bkra shis bdud rtsi dang /_'od zer gyi dra bas 'jig rten thams cad grol te/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la gnas par bsam zhing /_O~M su pra tiSh+Tha badzra ye swA hAs brtan par bya'o/_/de nas rab 'byams rig pa'i rtsal dbang bskur te/_skal ldan de'i gnas lngar/[ \u0f00] hU~M hrIH hrIHaHlnga bsam pa las 'od 'phros/_bdag dang snang srid yi ge dag tu bsams shing /_O~M O~M O~M zhes pa la sogs brgya rtsa Re brjod nas snang srid longs sku'i zhing du bsams la/_bla mas/_e ma skal ldan rigs kyi bu/_/'khor 'das snang srid rang gi sems/_/gdod nas ma skyes rtsa ba bral/_/stong gsal rig stong chos kyi sku/_/gang shar rang grol sbrul mdud bzhin/_/spangs blang gnyis med shes par gyis/_/zhes ngo sprad la/_yang /_e ma skal ldan snying gi bu/_/mig rtse nam mkha'i khams su ltos/_/snang ba sna tshogs 'od gsal zhing /_/thig le dbyings dang lu gu rgyud/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i gsang chen dbang /_/don gyi snying po 'di nyid do/_/zhes pas mngon sum ngo sprad do/_/rgyud kyi glegs bam la/_maN+Dal tshan pa gsum phul nas/_slob ma'i spyi bor O~M bsams la rgyud der bzhag pas/_rgyud las 'od zer byung ba'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sku'i dbang dang byin rlabs thams cad thob par bsams la/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sras gcig pos ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dbang bskar zhing byin gyis brlab tu gsol lo/_/smin par mdzad du gsol lo/_grol bar mdzad du gsol lo/_/gang bar mdzad du gsol lo/_/cher 'phel bar mdzad du gsol lo/_/rgyas par mdzad du gsol lo/_/sku rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dngos grub chen po 'grub par mdzad du gsol lo/_/\u0f00 g+ha dz+ha kA ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa O~M/_zhes brjod nas mgrin par tshig de rnams brjod cing khyad par du gsung rdo rje dang gnyis su med pa'i dngos grub chen po 'grub par mdzad du gsol lo/_/O~M g+ha dz+ha kA ya wAk+ka a b+hi Shi'u AH_zhes pa dang snying gar tshig snga ma bzhin brjod cing /_khyad par du thugs rdo rje dang gnyis su med pa'i dngos grub chen po 'grub par mdzad du gsol lo/_/\u0f00 g+ha dz+ha d+harma kA ya tsit+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/_zhes brjod nas spyi bo'am/_snying ga'am/_mchan khung gang rung du gdags so/_/rjes ni tshogs kyi dga' ba rgya chen po bya'o/_/de nas klog pa ni/_dus ma yin pa'i sgra dang /_sad dang /_ser ba dang /_'brug dang /_sa g.yo ba dang /_'ja' 'od dang /_nyi zla gzas zin pa dang /_mu ge dang /_nad la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung dus/_steng dang /_'og dang /_phyogs bzhi gang du byung ba brtags la/_steng 'og tu byung na/_rang nyid kun bzang yab yum du bsgoms pa'i lce 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad par bsam/_nyi zla gzas zin pa de nyid la sogs pa'i rtags mtshan yang kun bzang yab yum du bsams te/_rgyud drug 'das rjes dang bcas pa tshar gsum mam lnga'am bdun nam/_brgya stong ci 'grub bzlas pa'i 'od zer gyis/_gnod pa'i mtshan ma thams cad zhi zhing /_'jig rten thams cad bde legs phun sum tshogs par bsam mo/_/rjes la snang srid rigs lnga'i zhing du bsam ste bsngo ba bya'o/_/de bzhin du shar dang shar lhor byung na/_bdag dang mtshan rtags de nyid/_mi bskyod pa yab yum du bsam pa'i rang gi lce rdo rjer bsams la/_zhing khams mngon dgar mos pa bya'o/_/lho dang lho nub la rang dang mtshan rtags rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum du bsams pa'i lce rin po cher bsams la/_zhing khams dpal dang ldan par mos pa bya'o/_/nub dang nub byang la 'od dpag med yab yum gyi lce pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa/_zhing khams bde ba can no/_/byang dang byang shar la don yod grub yab yum gyi lce ral grir bsams la/_yul de las rab grub pa'i 'jig rten du bsams la brjod do/_/de'ang mtshan ma gang byung gi phyogs der kha bltas la klog par bya'o/_de'ang mtshan ma de dag 'gro ba gang gis mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_reg pa thams cad sprul pa'i skur sangs rgya'o/_/de nas skal ldan de'am/_gzhan yang rung sde 'das pa'i tshe snying gar btags nas bsregs pas bar dor sangs rgya'o/_/de yang sku thob pa'i rtags su spur khang gi dbus su 'ja' 'khyil ba'am/_/_dud pa sngon po gyen la 'greng ba'am/ g.yas su 'khyil ba dang /_me'i 'od dkar gsal 'khor lo la sogs pa phyag mtshan gyi rnams pa 'byung ngo /_/_/gdung sha rI ram ser po dang /_chu rI ram dkar po dang /_/_ba rI ram dmar po dang /_nya rI ram ljang gu dang /_palcam mthing*ga*la*kha*dog*lnga*ldan*te*rigs lnga'i gdung dang /_sku 'byung ngo /_/gsung gi rtags su 'od khyim gyen 'greng dang /_sgra 'ur ba dang /_thug pa dang sa g.yo ba'o/_/thugs kyi rtags su nam mkha' sprin med cing dwangs la gsal ba dang / 'ja' tshon kha dog sna lnga'i snang ba dpag tu med pa 'byung ngo /_/gzhan yang yi ge dang*/_sku dang*/_ring bsrel du ma 'byung ngo*/_/phan yon ni btags grol snying po'i rgyud las/_e ma 'di ni khyad par 'phags/_/dbang po rnam lnga 'on gyur cing /_/rgan gzhon pho mo dge sdig med/_/bag chags bzang ngan med pa ru/_/'di nyid bcangs pas 'tshang rgya'o/_/tha ma dbugs la slebs kyang grol/_/sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin sras gcig yin/_/zhes pa dang /_rdo rje 'chang gi dus gnad nges pa las/_'di nyid bcangs pa tsam gyis kyang*/_/ sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur pa las/_/the tshom bya bar ci zhig dgos/_/gal te byol song mgul du 'di/_/btags pa tsam gyis de grol nas/_/'gro ba mi rnams smos ci dgos/_/e ma rang byung yi ge 'dis/_/sems can rnams kyi don byed na/_/tshe 'das de yi spyi bo'am/_/mgul du 'di btags bsreg na ni/_/'di nyid grol bar smos ci 'tshal/_/mtshams med lnga po spyad pa yang /_/ nyan thos rnams dang skal ba mnyam/_/lung du ma bstan skye bo rnams/_/byang chub bsams dpa'i sa dang mnyam/_/yid dpyod 'dzin pa'i grub mtha' yang /_/_/rdo rje 'chang dang mnyam par nges/_/'di nyid bcangs pa'i skyes bu de/_/gang na 'dug pa'i yul phyogs tsam/_/ngan song dag nas grol bar 'gyur/_/mchog dang thun mong dngos grub thob/_/rig pa dngos kyi rtags yod pa'i/_/_/skal ldan de la bsreg mi dgos/_/'chi khar 'phrad pas 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes pa la sogs dpag tu med pa gsungs so/_/e ma ho/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje'i byin rlabs las/_/bcangs pa tsam gyis grol ba'i man ngag 'di/_/skal ldan rnams dang rab tu 'phrad nas kyang /_/lhun grub sa la kun tu bzang por shog_/o rgyan thugs sras dri med 'od zer gyis/_/o rgyan zab chos mkha' 'gro snying tig las/_/o rgyan dgongs don ji bzhin bshad pa 'di/_/o rgyan rdzong du phyi rabs don du bkod/_/btags grol man ngag rin chen snying po zhes bya ba/_pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis bkod pa rdzogs so//_//dge'o/_/

[8.34 sreg sbyong 'od kyi snye ma]

@#/_/sreg sbyong 'od kyi snye ma bzhugs so/_/ shog skya'i skor/ sreg sbyong 'od kyi snye ma zhes bya ba/_dpal snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gi rang bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang /_/thugs rje'i me 'od ye shes 'od 'phro bas/_/'gro kun sgrib pa'i bud shing sreg mdzad pa/_/bde gshegs rig 'dzin rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud sde rdzogs pa rang byung las/_/tshe 'das phung po bsreg ste sgrib sbyong don/_/ma nor ji bzhin gsal ba'i rim pa yis/_/pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis legs par bstan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor du/_/ro bsregs te sdig pa sbyang ba la/_sngon 'gro sta gon du bya ba/_dngos gzhi ji ltar sbyang ba/ rjes rus bu bsdu ba gsum las/_dang po la thab rtsig pa/_ro chas 'jug pa/ 5 bsham pa dang gsum las/_dang po ni/_sa'i stegs 'dom do la sogs pa ji ltar 'os pa byas la/_theg chen bzhi btab pa'i dbus su/_me khang gru bzhi pa/_ro de nyid kyi khru skor gyis rmang bting pa'i nang du zlum skor gsum bris pa'i nang ma la rigs lnga yab yum gyi mtshan ma pad 'dab bzhi'i dbus su 'khor lo/_phyogs bzhir rdo rje dang*/_rin po che dang*/_pad+ma dang /_rgya gram rnams bris/_gnyis pa la sems dpa' sems ma yab yum brgyad kyi/ thig le gnyis brtsegs pa kha dog dang mthun pa brgyad bya/_gsum pa la sgo ba yab yum gyi mtshan ma dgod/_zur bzhir zla phyed rdo rje re bri/_nang ma'i mu khyud bzhi mthing ga_/bar pa dmar/_phyi ma dkar pos bkang /_ye shes kyi mu khyud lnga ldan phyi ma la bskor/_de nyid ras la sogs pas bkab nas/_sngar gyi 'phro gyen la rtse khru gang dang mdzub gang rtsigs la/_shing shug pa brla bas mi phra ba/rtse khrur re thab kyi nang du bslang la drang por gshibs de khengs par dgang /_phyogs bzhi'i gseng phug sa thang mtshams la gyen du mkhyid re yod pa'i phyogs su/[ · ]shing gi khong seng /_dpal 'bar 'dzugs yod pa re bya/ mdun gyi bug pa de shing bcug pas shong bar byas la so phag la sogs pas phyi nas gcad/_rtse khru gang gi gong na mdzub gang yod sa bug pa cig byas/ yam shing phra mos zang zing du dgang /_de'i steng nas ro khang khru gang pa zlum po'am gru bzhi par brtsig go_/gnyis pa ni ro'i drung du mchod pa bshams la/ bdag nyid kun bzang yab yum du bskyed la/_mchod bstod byas nas bum par bzlas pa bya/_ro la bsang chu gtor nas/_me tog phog pa'i lhar bskyed te/_rnam shes bkug la bgegs bskrad sdig pa sbyang /_gzungs sngags kyi bum chus bkru zhing /_phar phyin drug dang chu bo bzhi la sogs pa'i tshig bcad brjod nas/_O~M sarba bid badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M gis/_rdo rje khu tshur dang bcas pas byin gyis brlabs la/_rigs lnga'i rtsa sngags tshan pa gsum bris pa'i gcig spyi bo/_gcig mgrin pa gcig snying khar btags la mchod bstod bya'o/_/_/skabs 'dir dbang bskur nas lam bstan lam sbyong byas na'ang shin tu legs shing /_ma byas kyang 'gal ba med do/_/de nas ro khang du bcug ste/_rol mo'i sgras bgegs bskrad la/_shing sgrom mam dur khang rgya phibs ma byed na steng nas bkab/_med na bre'i gzugs gru bzhi pa/_cung zad yangs pa gcig gam/_dang ma'i zhabs mtho gang phug pa bkab/_phyi nas du ba mi 'chor bar dres mas bcings la zhal ba bya'o/_/gsum pa ni mchod pa mdun/_sreg rdzas g.yas/_gtor ma g.yon du bsham mo/_/de'ang mchod pa ni/_mchod yon la sogs pa phyi nang gi mchod pa rnams so/_/sreg rdzas ni yam shing sor bcu gnyis pa mang po dang /_mar dang /_til dang /_yungs kar dang /_zho zan dang 'bras la sogs pa 'bru sna tshogs dang /_ra'i 'o ma'o/_/de rnams kyi yam shing dang mar ma gtogs pa snod gcig tu bsres pa'am/so sor bya'o/_gtor ma ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gcig_/mkha' 'gro'i gcig_/chos skyong gi gcig_/me lha/_bzhi bdag_/rigs drug_/bgegs gtor dang bdun no/_/gnyis pa dngos gzhi la/_/_bdag bskyed pa/_mdun bskyed pa/_mjug bsdu ba dang gsum las/_dang po ni/_srungs 'khor sngon du 'gro bas kun bzang du bskyed la/_ye shes pa bcug_/dbang bskur mchod pa dang bstod pa rgyas par bya'o/_/_/gnyis pa ni/_gang zag mchog la dzA la'i sngags tsam gyis me sbar/_phal pa la/_gson cig dgongs shig rigs kyi bu/_/phung po lnga yi bud shing la/_/rgyal ba rigs lnga'i me sbar ro/_/'byung ba bzhi yi bud shing la/_/lha mo bzhi yi me sbar ro/_/dbang po drug gi bud shing la/_/byang chub sems dpa'i me spar ro/_/_/yul rnams drug gi bud shing la/_/lha mo drug gi me sbar ro/_/nyon mongs lnga yi bud shing la/_/ye shes lnga yi me sbar ro/_/lus ngag yid gsum bud shing la/_/rgyal ba sku gsum me sbar ro/_/sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan du/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis 'grub par shog_/O~M badz+wa dz+wa la raM dz+wa la raM/_zhes pas mdun ngos kyi gseng nas me sbar la/_bsang chu gtor nas thab dang mchod gtoRa sreg rdzas dang bcas pa bsangs nas/_swa b+ha was stong par sbyangs la/_so so'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te/_O~M shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha wa Ar+Ya ko \u0f85 haM/_stong pa'i ngang las/ rin po che'i thabs yangs shing rgya che ba/_sgo bzhi gru bzhi rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa'i dbus su ra skyes kyi steng na raM las me lha dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa g.yas dang po pad+ma/_gnyis pa nor bu'i phreng ba/_g.yon dang po dbyug pa/_gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/_/de nas dbyug gu'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dril bu dang dbyangs kyis/_O~M tshur byon tshur byon 'byung po che/_/me lha drang srong bram ze mchog_/sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes slad du/_/'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol/_/gzi brjid chen po me yi lha/_/'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa po/_/thugs rjes sems can don mdzad pa/_/'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol/_/O~M asne ye ma hA te dza e h+ya hi sa ma ye dzaHdzaH/_zhes pas shar lho nas me lha 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHsa thab kyi dam tshig pa*bskyed*pa*la*bstims*nas/_O~M ag+ni ye pad+ma ka ma la ya stAM gyis gdan phul nas ku sha thobs te/_ku sha 'di ni gtsang zhing dge_/sa las skyes pa'i snying po mchog_/tshangs pa'i lha yang dag pa ste/_/dkon mchog gsum gyis dag byed yin/_/de yis bdag cag 'khor bcas la/_/bgegs rnams med cing zhi bar mdzod/_/ces pas rtse ma nyams par dgram mo/_/de nas/_O~M asne ye swAhAs mar blugs gzar bdun bdun gyis bkang pa'i dgang blugs kha sbyar ba gsum dbul zhing /_O~M asne ye di bya di bya bi shud+d+he mahA shrI ha bya ka bya ba ha na ya che ge mo'i sdog pa dang sgrib pa thams cad shan+ting ku ru ye swAhAs byon zan phul nas/_gtsang zhing gtsang mar sbyar ba yi/_/lha rdzas bzang po'i mchod yon 'di/_/drang srong 'khor dang bcas la 'bul/_/'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM age ye ma hwa te dza any+nyaM pra titsa pA tsa me g+ha sa mu tra sla ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_zhes pa nas rol mo'i bar phul la/_sreg rdzas rnams kyi mar dang yam shing so sor 'bul/_gzhan ma rnams bsres la/_O~M asne ye che ge mo'i sdig pa/_sarba pA paM shan+ting ku ru ye swAhA/_zhes pas nyi shu rtsa gcig re grangs byas la dbul/_de'ang rgyas par byed na sreg rdzas rnams so soRa dbul te/_O~M b+ho d+hi pr-ik+Sha ye swAhAs yam shing dang /_ag+he yes mar/_O~M sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ye swA hAs til/_oM badzra sid d+ha ye swA hAs nyung dkar/_O~M sarba saM b+ha de swA hAs zho zan dang /_'bras la sogs pa so sor 'bul lo/_/ 'og ma rnams la'ang tshul 'dis shes par bya'o/_/de nas mchod pas mchod la/_'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbang mchog gi sras/_/me lha'i rgyal po DA kis dbang bskur bas/_/shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad bsregs/_/'dzin byed me lha nyid la rnam par 'dud/_/tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon po'i sras/_me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog_/'byung po yongs su skyob pa'i phyir/_/thugs rje'i dbang gis sku sprul pa/_/rig sngags sgrub pa'i drang srong tshul/_/nyon mongs bsreg pa'i shes rab 'od/_/bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid 'bar/_/mngon shes rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan/_/thabs kyis sprul pa'i theg pa bcibs/_/rig sngags gsung gi bgrang phreng 'dzin/_/bdud rtsi'i bcud ldan g+hud+d+he bsnams/_/chos kyi bdud rtsi yongs la bsil//nyes pa'i skyon bral tshangs par spyod/_/'jig rten gnas kyang mya ngan 'das/_/zhi ba brnyes kyang thugs rje che/_/de bas bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal/_/zhes pas 'jig rten pa'i me lha mchod cing bstod nas/'jig rten las 'das pa'i me lha mchod*cing bstod pa ni/_lha rnams spyan drangs la gang zag mchog la ro dang lha rnams dbyer med la mchod bstod bya zhing /_phal pa la lha bskyed pa la sreg rdzas dang /_ro'i sha khrag rus pa rnams bdud rtsir bsams la 'bul lo/_/de'ang rgyas pa la dam tshig pa bskyed nas ye shes pa bstim la/_bsdus pa la ye shes pa spyan drangs te/_me lha'i lto bar bzhugs par bsams la mchod pa'o/_/de yang thog mar me lha'i lto ba yangs shing rgya che bar khro bo rta mgrin yab yum du bskyed la/_hUM ye shes bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/_/ma rig 'dod pa'i mun khams thams cad sreg_/zhe sdang gshin rje'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'joms/_/dpa' bo chen po dpa' mtshan stag lpags can/_/log 'dren srin po'i mtha' gnod dgra 'dul ba'i/_/rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo bzhugs so 'tshal/_/log 'dren 'dul ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na/_/'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/_/O~M badzra kro ta h+ya g+hi wa hu lu hu lu sa ma ya dzaHsa spyan drangs pa bstim la/_O~M badzra kro ta h+ya g+hi wa hu lu hu lu/_ag+haM/_pa t+yaM/_puny+dzaM/_d+hA paM/_A lo ke/_g+han+te/_nai wi te/_shab+ha A hU~M gis mchod nas/_/_dbang chen bskal ba'i me ltar gzi brjid 'bar/_/ 'jigs byed chen po ral pa gyen du brdzes/_khro bo'i rgyan rnams ma lus rab rdzogs pa'i/_khro rgyal rta mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ces pa'i rjes la sngags de nyid la/_che ge mo'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa shan+ting ku ru ye swAhA/ btags la/_sreg rdzas rim pas brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa phul ba'i rjes la/_hUM ma lus sems can kun gyi mgon gyur cing /_/bdud sde dpung bcas mi bzad 'dzoms mdzad lha/_/dngos rnams ma lus ji bzhin mkhyen gyur pas/_/bla med dkon mchog gsum po gnas 'dir gshegs/_/O~M na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_/_b+hu d+hA d+harmA saM g+ha sa ma ya dzaHsa spyan drangs la/_rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa khro bo'i mdun du bzhugs nga bzhugs pa la mchod pas mchod nas/_mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa po/_/bsod nams yon tan rgya mtsho'i zhing /_/de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dag pa 'dod chags bral ba'i rgyu/_/dge bas ngan song las sgrol zhing /_/gcig tu don dam mchog gyur pa/_/zhi gyur chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/grol nas grol ba'i lam yang ston/_/bslab pa dag la rab tu gus/_/zhing gi dam pa yon tan ldan/_/dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes pas bstod nas/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya bud+d+ha d+harmA saM g+ha b+h+yoH/_che ge mo'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad shan+ting ku ru ye swAhA/_brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa phul nas/_slar yang mchod cing bstod nas/_khro bo'i lto bar zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la/_spyan drangs te bsti_ma nas/_/_mchod bstod rgyas par byas la/_rnam snang gi rtsa sngags ming spel dang bcas pa stong ngam 'bum/_gzhan rnams rang rang gi sngags rnams kyis brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa phul la/_mchod pa dang bstod pa yang rgyas par byas te/_slar yang khro bo rta mgrin la/_sngar gyi tshul de nyid kyis brgya stong grangs med pa phul la/_mchod bstod byas te bgegs zhi bar gsol ba btab nas/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams la gtang rag gi mchod cing bstod nas/_/bzod par gsol te/_/oM badzra maHsa spyan drangs pa rim pa bzhin gshegs nas/_dam tshig pa bsdu la yang me lha'i lto bar mkha' 'gro chos skyong yul lha gzhi bdag la sogs pa rim par spyan drangs te/_rang rang gi sngags sam/_oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NaM a d+ya nud pan na twa ta oM AHhU~M phaT/_ces sreg rdzas phul la gtor ma yang phul te/_phrin las bcol nas gshegs su gsol la/_slar yang me lha gsal btab nas/_sreg rdzas lhag ma ci 'byor ba bdun la sogs pa phul te/_mchod pa dang gtor ma phul nas phrin las bcol te/_bstod pa byas nas/_bdag gi [(]a[》]don dang gzhan gyi don/_/sgrubs kyis bzhud cig byin za khyod/_/rang gnas dge bar gshegs nas kyang /_/slar yang dus bzhin ci nas byon/_/bdag gi zhes me lha'i phyag rgya bkrol la/_'byung dgos pa thams cad mdzod/_/oM ag+he gats+tsha/[)]/po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin nas bsngo ba byas te/\u0f00 AHhU~M gis bdag nyid bsrungs nas/_gson po don du bkra shis brjod la yon phul dga' ston bya'o/_/_/gsum pa ni me rnams zhi ba'i tshe/_bdag bskyed mdor bsdus pas lag pa gnyis dpung par bsnol te se gol gtogs shing / / nAM badzra sa ma ye dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa rus bu bsdus la/_bum chus bkru zhing sdig sgrib dag par bsam la/_rigs lnga'i rtsa sngags spel tshig dang bcas pa brjod nas/_mchod de gshegs su gsol lo/_de ltar tshe 'das sgrib pa sbyong ba'i thabs/_/ji ltar rgyud las gsungs bzhin sbyar ba yis/_/dge ba dri med ston ka'i zla 'dra des/_/'gro kun rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob par shog_/tshul 'di rgyal sras dri med 'od zer gyis/_/gangs ri thod dkar rin chen snying po'i mgul/_/o rgyan rdzong zhes bya ba'i gnas mchog tu/_/rin chen shog skya'i ngos la legs par bkod/_/sreg sbyong 'od kyi snye ma zhes bya ba/_/pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis ston gsum gangs ri thod dkar du sbyar ba rdzogs so//_//b+ha wan+tu/

[8.35 gzhan phan 'od kyi 'khor lo]

@#/_/gzhan phan 'od kyi 'khor lo bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog dkar gyi skor/ gzhan phan 'od kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/_ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dpal rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shes bya'i mkha' la mkhyen rab sprin tshogs mdzad pa'i klog gi phreng ba can/_/_/thugs rje'i 'brug sgra phyogs kyi mthar khyab phan bde'i char rgyun legs 'bebs pa//'gro ba'i bla ma dkon mchog gsum de skye dgu'i mkha' la mdzes pa yi//bdag gzhan gtsug gi nor bus zhabs mchod yun ring bkra shis byed par shog_/gang 'dir bdag blo'i yid kyi pad+ma la/_/byin rlabs nyin byed zer gyis phog pa yis/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis sgrub la 'dab stong rgyas/_/de slad gzhan phan 'od kyi 'khor lor bshad/_/de'ang 'dir snying po'i rgyud rdzogs pa rang byung gi rjes su 'brangs nas tshe 'das rjes su gzung ba'i cho ga brjod par bya'o/_/ 'di la nub dang po bya ba'i rim pa dang /_lhag ma rnams su bya ba'i rim pa gnyis las/_dang po la sa'i cho ga dang /_sngon 'gro legs par bsham pa dang /_me tog tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor dngos ji ltar mchod pa gsum las/ dang po ni sa'i cho ga bsang sbyangs dgos pa'i phyogs su/_maN+Dal zlum po khru gang pa ba byung dang /_dris byug pa'i dbus su/_O~M pri thaM d+he wIs dri'i thig le dang /_me tog gi tshom bu bkod la/_de'i drung du chu gnyis sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma gsum bshams la/_rang nyid skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed nas/_skad cig gis kun bzang yab yum du bsgoms te/ a mr-i tas bsang zhing /_swab+hA was sbyangs te/_stong pa'i ngang las tshom bu nyid/ pad zla'i steng du paM las sa'i lha mo ser mo bum pa 'dzin par bskyed nas/ lha mo chen mo sa bdag 'jig rten yum/_/rin chen rdzogs dbang mchog gi rgyan gyis brgyan/_/do shal rkang gdub sgra sgrogs sems dpas mchod/_/ mchod yon 'di bzhes 'di ru byin rlob mdzod/_/O~M pra thi de wI sa ma ya dzaHdzaH zhes pas sa bon las 'od 'phros/_sa'i 'og nas lha mo sa bdag klu gnyan gyis bskor ba spyan drangs la dzaHhA~M baM hoHsa bstim/_yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs nas/_dri med yid 'ong bdud rtsi yi/_/lha rdzas dam pa'i mchod yon 'di/_/_/lha mo la ni bdag 'bul gyis/_/sa 'di bdag la gnang du gsol/_/\u0f00 pri tha d+he wI ahU~M pra ti tsa ye swAhA/_tshig des mchod pa lhag ma rnams kyang mchod nas/_skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par du/_/sa dang pha rol phyin rnams la/_/lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/_/shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/_/ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/_/de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las/_/rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/_/bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa che ge mo zhes bya bas/_che ge mo'i don du sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po bzheng gis/_lha mo khyod kyis sa'i phyogs 'di bdag la gnang bar mdzod cig_/ces brjod pas des kyang rig pa 'dzin pa khyod kyis ci dga' bar byos shig_/ces gsungs bar bsams la/_gtor ma dang po de lha mo 'khor bcas la 'bul/_gnyis pa de dkar po'i phyogs la byin nas/ gang dag 'dir gnas lha dang klu/_/gnod sbyin srin po'am gzhan dag la/_/ sa 'di bdag gis slong bar bgyi/_/dkyil 'khor don du stsal du gsol/_/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i bya ba mthar phyin pa'i grogs mdzad du gsol/ces brjod/_gsum pa de nag po'i phyogs la byin nas/_sa phyogs 'dir ni slob dpon bdag_/dkyil 'khor rgyal po sgyu 'phrul ni/_/bzheng gis sa 'dir gnas pa'i bgegs/_/'di ru ma 'dug gzhan du dengs/_/oM sum b+ha ni dang gu gul gyis bdug la/_/O~M badzra mus lha mo 'khor bcas gshegs par bsams te/_/gyo mo dang rus pa la sogs dor nas/_/sa mnyen bzang po la stegs bu gru bzhi pa me long gi ngos ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa/_shar dang byang cung zad gzhol pa'i/_steng dang khor yul tu lag mthil g.yas bskor zhing /_/\u0f00 ha na ha na hU~M phaT kyis 'od zer byung bas ma dag pa sbyangs/_O~M b+hu khang gis sa phyogs thams cad nam mkhar gyur/_O~M me de ni badzra b+ha b+han+d+ha hUM hU~M phaT/_kyis rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur/_oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha phaT kyis bsrung zhing brtan par bya'o/_/sa'i cho ga'o/_/gnyis pa ni srad bu dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur du byas pa'i sna slob dpon gtso bo'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas shar du bltas la/_slob ma mi bskyod pa'i nga rgyal gyis nub tu bltas te/_dza zhes brjod cing gtad nas tshangs thig la sogs pa gdab cing /_cha chen bcu drug rdzogs pa na/_/_/dang po phyed gdab phyi ma gdab/_/gnyis pa cha bzhir bgo byas te/_/gsum pa bzhi pa mi gdab bzhag_/lnga pa dbus dor mtha' gnyis gdab/_/drug pa phyed gdab phyi ma gdab/_/bdun pa cha bzhir bgo byas te/_/ brgyad pa dbus dor mtha' gnyis gdab/_de'ang dbang chog ltar ye shes kyi thig gdab pa'ang byas na legs so/_/de nas lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i tshom bu bkod pa'i mthar mchod gtor bsham mo/_/gsum pa ni bdag nyid bskyed cing mchod bstod byas te/_dkyil 'khor sgrub cing mchod bstod byas pa'i rjes/_ho dgongs su gsol/_/_rgyal ba rigs lnga yab yum khor dang bcas/_/sems dpa' sems ma ma lus bdag la dgongs/_/rgyal ba sras bcas mchod pa dang /_/tshe 'das khyod kyi rjes gzhug phyir/_/bdag ni che ge zhes bgyi bas/_/nangs par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bri/_khyed kyi thugs rjes dgongs mdzod la/_/byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/_/ces mkhyen par gsol bas/_gtso bo'i zhal nas/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can gyi don du dkyil 'khor chen po'i las rtsoms shig_/gsungs par bsam nas/ gtor ma bsngos/_/_bzod par gsol/_bsngo ba byas/_bdag nyid bsrungs nas/_sang me tog tshom bu'i lha rnams la/_mchod bstod mdor bsdus byas te/ badzra mus ye shes pa dkyil 'khor gyi nam mkhar bteg nas dam tshig pa bsdus te/_/_yi ge brgya pa brjod cing tshom bu dang mchod pa rnams re zhig dben par bsdu'o/_/_/gnyis pa nub lhag mar bya ba'i rim pa la/_dkyil 'khor bri zhing sku legs par bsham pa dang /_cho ga dngos ji ltar bya ba gnyis las/_dang po ni/_tshon rnams dbus dang phyogs bzhir rigs lnga'i kha dog bzhin bkod la/_O~M hU~M traM hrIHaHrnams bris te/_rigs lngar bskyed nas ye shes pa bcug_/mchod bstod mdor bsdus byas la/_lha rnams 'od du zhu ba'i tshon ye shes lngar bsams la/_slob dpon gyis shar nas tshon thogs te/ sangs rgyas rigs lnga yi shes gtso/_/kun gyi don rig bya ba'i phyir/_/ye shes lnga yi tshon dgye 'o/_/zhes pas re khA bri'o/_/de'i tshon gyis bri ba ni/_/dbus su 'dab brgyad mu khyud gsum/_/dbus mthing shar dkar lho ser zhing /_/ nub dmar byang ljang shar lho dmar/_/lho nub ljang gu nub byang dkar/_/byang shar ser pos dgang bar bya/_/mu khyud mthing dmar dkar pos bskor/_/gru dang lha snam phyogs mdog la/_/phyogs mtshams thig le gnyis gnyis dgod/_/sgo bzhir thig le re re bya/_/rtsig pa lnga ni nang rim bzhin/_/mthing ga ljang dmar ser dang dkar/_/'dod yon dmar la pha gu ser/_/dra phyed sngo la mda' yab dmar/_/pu shu mdzes tshon zhing khams ljang /_/rta babs mdzes tshon chu srin dmar/_/rdo rje'i rwa ni phyogs kyi mdog_/nyi zla dmar dkar dur khrod brgyad/_/phyogs mtshams pad+ma sna tshogs mdog_/rdo rje mthing*la me ri dmar/_/yang na ye shes rnam lnga'i mdog_/srab mthug med cing snyoms par bri/_/de dag gi khor yug kun tu chu gnyis sngon du 'gro ba'i phyi mchod dang / bdud rtsi sman Rag la sogs pa nang mchod rnams legs par bshams/ bum pa kha rgyan mgul chings ldan pa gnyis kyang sman dang 'bru dang chus bkang la bzhag_/sngon 'gro gtor ma gnyis dang /_gzhan lnga yang bshams/ bye ma sol phor/_ting lo changs bu la sogs pa 'dir dgos pa rnams tshogs par byas la/_yol ba bla bre bris sku la sogs pa'ang dgram mo/_/gnyis pa ni/ thams cad kyi spyod lam bstun la thog mar mchod pa bsang sbyangs ni/_ku shas bsang chu gtor nas/_O~M badzra kro ta h+ya g+hi wa hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/_any+nyaM/ pAt+yaM_puny+dze/_d+hu pe/_A le ke/_g+han+te/_nai wi te/_shab+ta O~M AHhUM yongs su gyur pa las phyi nang gi mchod pa dwangs shing thogs pa med pas sa dang bar snang kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung lta bus gang bar gyur/_tshe las 'das pas gtso byas pa'i sems can thams cad/_bla ma la skyabs su mchi'o/_/sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das zhi khro rab 'byams kyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos thams cad stong zhing bdag med pa yin pa la/_de ltar ma rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad snying re rje/_de dag thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'god par bya/_de'i ched du bcom ldan 'das zhi khro rab 'byams kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bsgom/ sems can thams cad bde ba dang bde ba'i rgyu dang 'phrad par gyur cig sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig_/ dga' ba chen po dang dus rtag tu mi 'bral bar gyur cig_/bde sdug gi rgyu chags sdang thams cad dang bral ba'i btang snyoms chen po la gnas par gyur cig_/oM swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he sarba d+harmA swa b+ha wa bi shud+ho \u0f85haM/_phyi dang nang gi chos thams cad stong pa chen po/_stong pa'i ngang las paM las pad+ma/_a las zla ba/_raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/_hrIHlas 'od 'phros/_sems can gyi don byas/_slar 'dus yongs su gyur pa las/_rang nyid dpa' bo rta mgrin zhal gcig phyag gnyis dbyug tho dang sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'i pang na// rdo rje phag mo dmaRa mo gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas yab la 'khyud pa/ gnyis ka'ang rin po che dang rus pa dang thod pa'i phreng bas rab tu brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa khro bo'i lta stangs chen pos bskal ba'i me ri me dpung gi dbus na bzhugs pa'i lkog mar hrIHlas pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa/_rtsa ba mgrin par zug cing lo 'dab lkog mar rgyas pa'i mdun gyi 'dab ma'i lce'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/_hA~M las rdo rje dkar po nyal thabs su gnas pa 'od du zhu zla ba la thim/_de 'od du zhu lce la thim pas rdo rje'i lcer gyur/_O~M badzra dzi hA lag pa'i mthil gnyis su a a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re'i dbus su hUM hUM las rdo rje dkaRa po rtse lnga pa gyen du 'greng ba re re 'od du zhu ba las zla ba la thim/_zla ba zhu ba lag pa la thim pas rdo rje'i lag par gyur/_oM badzra kro ta h+ya g+hi wa hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/steng 'og phyogs mtshams thams cad rdo rje'i ra ba gur bla bre ye shes kyi me ri me phung 'bar ba'i dal chen por gyur/_hUM rab 'jigs phra men khro mo'i sku/_/ badzra sing ha seng ge'i gdong*/_/badzra bya kri stag gdong ma/_/mthing nag mtshon cha me 'od 'phro/_/_/gti mug dbang bsgyur las mkhan ma/_/steng 'og dgra bgegs mtshams chod cig_/hUM rab 'jigs phra men khro mo'i sku/_/kang ka mu kha bya rog gdong /_/dkar gsal mtshon cha me 'od 'phro/_/_/zhe sdang dbang bsgyur las mkhan ma/_/shar sgo'i dgra bgegs mtshams chod cig_/hUM rab 'jigs phra men khro mo'i sku/_/hu lu mu kha 'ug gdong ma/_/ljang nag mtshon cha me 'od 'phro/_/phrag dog dbang bsgyur las mkhan la/_/byang sgo'i dgra bgegs mtshams chod cig_/hUM rab 'jigs phra men khro mo'i sku//shwa na mu kha khyi gdong ma/_/dmar nag mtshon cha me 'od 'phro/_/'dod chags dbang bsgyur las mkhan ma/_/nub sgo'i dgra bgegs mtshams chod cig_/hUM rab 'jigs phra men khro'i mo'i sku/_/su ra ka seng phag gdong ma/_/ser nag mtshon cha me 'od 'phro/_/nga rgyal dbang bsgyur las mkhan ma/_/lho sgo'i dgra bgegs mtshams chod cig_/oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hA~M/_/O~M gr-i h+Na gr-i h+'a hA~M/_O~M gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hUM/_O~M a*na*ya ho/_/_b+ha ga wan bid+ya ra tsa tsa ya hU~M phaT/ phyogs mtshams steng 'og thams cad rdo rje me ri'i rwa ba gnyis pas 'bar bar gyur/_hUM ye shes bskal ba me ltar bar ba'i 'od/_/ma rig 'dod pa'i mun khams thams cad bsregs/_/zhe sdang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad 'joms/_/dpa' bo chen po dpa' mtshan stag lpags can/_/log 'dren srin po'i mtha' gnon dgra 'dul ba/_/rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo bzhugs so 'tshal/_/log 'dren 'dul ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na/_/'gro ba'i don du mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/_/steng gi nam mkhar khro bo dbang chen dpag tu med pa byon/_/O~M ma hA ko ta sa pA ri wA ra/_/ahU~M pa t+yaM puSh+pa d+d+ha paM A lo ke g+han+te ni wi t+ya shab+ta AHhUM/_dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa bdag la gnyis su med par thim/_/ hUM chos nyid stong pa gnyis med ngang nyid las/_/'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi spong zhing/_/thams la mkhas pas 'jigs byed skur ston pa/_khro chen 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ye shes zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang /_/sku yi cha lugs byed rngam stabs can/_/gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba'i sgras/_/ma rungs dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/lhag pa'i ye shes rol pa ston mdzad cing /_/bsdigs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs phyag na bsnams/_/nyon mongs dug chen rtsad nas 'joms mdzad pa'i/_/sbrul gdug rgyan gyis brgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/hUM bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/_/dpa' bo'i stangs stabs brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/_/nyi zla 'bar ba'i spyan gyis sdang mig gis/_/bgegs dpung sreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar gzi brjid 'bar/_/glog stong 'gyu 'dra'i khro gnyer mche ba gtsigs/_/rngam ba'i nga ro 'brug sgra stong sgrogs shing /_/khro rgyal bgegs tshogs 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/hUM dbang chen bskal ba'i me ltar gzi brjid 'bar//dbu skra kham seRa spyan gsum sdang mig bgrad/_/mche ba gtsigs shing brkyang bskum 'jigs pa'i sku/_/dpal chen yab yum gnyis la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/hUM nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs/_/lus ngag yid gsum gnod pa'i bgegs/_/bar chad 'byung po thams cad kun/_/'di ru ma 'dug gzhan du dengs/_/nga ni dpal chen rta mgrin rgyal/_/rdo rje 'dzin byed 'bar ba'i sku/_/nga yi bka' las 'das gyur na/_/thal ba'i rdul bzhin brlag par 'gyur/_O~M shrI badzra ha ya g+hi wa ra tsa hri ya ha ri ni sa rak+Sha u tsa ta ya hUM phaT/_bgegs thams cad rgya mtsho'i mthar byer nas/_ye shes kyi me phung gcig tu 'bar bar gyur/_O~M badzras twa sa ma ya/_ma nu pA la ya/_sarba sa twa twe no pa tiSh+Tha TAM g+ho me b+ha wa/_su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/_su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/_u nu rak+to me b+ha wa/_sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/_sarba karma su tsa me/_tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/_ha ha ha ha ho b+ha ga wAn/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_badzra ma me muny+tsa/_badzI b+ha wa/_ma hA sa ma ya sa twa A/_O~M yo ga shub+h+yoHsarba d+harmA swa b+hA wa bi shud+ho \u0f85haM/_phyi nang gi chos thams cad stong pa'i ngang las/_paM las pad+ma/_a las zla ba/_raMlas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/_hUM mthing nag las 'od 'phros/_sems can gyi don byas/_tshur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las/_rang nyid rang bzhin gzhi'i kun tu bzang po/_mthing ga zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu thugs kar bsnol ba/_e las chos nyid kun tu bzang mo sngon mo gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas yab la 'khyud pa gnyis ka'ang rdo rje'i skyil mo krung rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i thugs kar pad+ma dang nyi zla'i dbus su/_rdo rje sngon po'i lte ba la hA~M gis mtshan pa'i rwa lnga la/O~M hA~M traM hrIHaHsa mtshan pa'i phyi rol du A li bcu drug dang*/_kA li rnams mar me'i phreng ba ltar 'od gsal ba'o/_/_/lag pa'i mthil gnyis su a hUM/_a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re'i steng du hUM/_hUM gis mtha' skor gnyis na phar/_a A/_i I/ u U/_r-i r-I/_l-i l-I/_e ai/_o au/_aM aH_mchog tu dkar zhing 'od gsal ba rnams kyis gang bar gyur/_sor mo rnams la a tsan+d+ra maN+Dal g.yas pa'i sor mo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng /_rigs lnga yab kyi sa bon rim ba bzhin du/_O~M hU~M traM hrIH_a las rnam par snang mdzad/_mi bskyod pa/_rin chen 'byung ldan/_'od dpag med/_don yod grub pa/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/_rdo rje thugs ma/_rdo rje dbang bskur ma/_rdo rje mtshon cha ma/_rdo rje rkun mo rnams/_phan tshun lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin/_sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa 'dra'o/[ \u0f00] hU~M traM hrI AH_e raM laM taM yaM/_lha rnams phan tshun dgyes shing snyoms par zhugs par gyur/_hUM kun tu bzang po bde gshegs rigs lnga'i gtso/_/ye shes mchog gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/_/rang bzhin dbyings nas thugs rje'i rnam 'phrul gyis/_/yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol/_/ye shes pa steng gi nam mkhar byon pa la/_O~M phyi nang gsang ba bla na med pa yis/_/mchod pa'i sprin phung rab 'byams rgya mtsho rnams/_/ma lus blo yis blangs te gus 'bul gyis/_/thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_ngang nyid chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang /_/thugs rje'i rnam 'phrul sna tshogs ston mdzad cing /_/'gro ba'i don gnyis lhun gyis grub pa'i lha/_/kun bzang yab yum gnyis la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/dzaHhUM baM hos bdag la gnyis su med par thim/[ \u0f00] AHhU~M gis sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlab/_O~M bud+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa zla'i steng gi rdo rje dang /_sngags rnams las 'od zer byung bas/_snod bcud thams cad lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du gyur/_tshe las 'das pa'i sdig pa thams cad sbyangs/_'od zer gyi 'phro 'dus sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho ston par dmigs te bzlas pa bgyi 'tshal/_/\u0f00 hU~M traM hrIH aH_a A i I/_u U/_r-i r-I/_l-i l-I/ e ai/_o au/_aM a:_ka kha ga g+ha nga*/_tsa tsha dza dz+ha bstod bgyi 'tshal/[ \u0f00] AHhU~M phyi nang gi mchod sprin sa dang bar snang gang bar gyur/ hUM phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i 'jig rten na/_/mchod yon ji snyid yod pa dang /_/ bdag gis gus par bshams pa 'di/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la 'bul/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta aHN+haM pra titsA p+'a tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_hUM phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i 'jig rten na/_/me tog ji snyed yod 'di/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la 'bul/_/\u0f00 badzra A lo ke AH:hU~MhUM/_hUM phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i 'jig rten na/_/dri chab ji snyed yod pa dang /_/bdag gis gus par bshams pa 'di/_/rgyal ba rgya 'bul/_/O~M badzra nai wi te AHhUM/_/hU~M phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i 'jig rten na/_/sil snyan ji snyed yod pa dang /_/bdag gis gus par bshams pa 'di/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la 'bul/_/\u0f00 badzra shab+ta AHhU~M/_hU~M snod bcud snang srid 'jig rten kun/_/rdo rje gzugs sgra dri dang ro/_/reg bya'i tshogs su kun sprul te/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la mchod/_/O~M badzra ma hA pU tsa AHhUM/_hUM gsang ba'i lha mo yid 'ong ma/_/so so'i gzugs mdzes rig ma yis/_/sku gsum bde chen rgyas mdzad ma/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la mchod/_/oM badzra d+he ba ta AHhUM/_hU~M rang bzhin gdod ma'i mgon po ni/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi yab/_/sangs rgyas kun las sngar sangs rgyas/_/lhun gyis grub la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ma skyes chos dbyings byang chub sems/_/thog mtha' med pa'i mkha' klong nas/_/dus sum rgyal ba skyed mdzad ma/_/kun tu bzang mor phyag 'tshal bstod/_/rang bzhin chos sku dag pa'i ngang /_/_/sna tshogs thabs mkhas thugs rje yis/_/ rigs lnga ye shes lngar ston pa/_/lha yi lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bum pa bsgrub pa la 'jug par ba gyi/_/oM AHhUM/[ \u0f00] sa b+hA wa shud+d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+hA wa shud+d+he \u0f85haM/_stong pa'i ngang las paM las pad+ma/_A las zla ba/_raM las nyi ma'i steng du/_b+haM b+haM las rnam par rgyal ba dang /_las thams cad pa'i bum pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin/_yangs shing rgya che ba/_lto ba ldir ba zhabs zhum pa/_mchu 'phyangs ba/_mgrin pa phra ba dpag bsam shing gis kha brgyan pa/ lha'i gos pany+tsa li kas mgrin pa dkris la/_phyi bum pa'i dbyibs can la/ nang lha'i gzhal med khang du gnas pa'i/_nam par rgyal ba'i bum par dbus su seng+ge'i khri/_shar du glang po che/_lhor rta/_nub tu rma bya/_byang du shang shang gi steng rnams su pad+ma dang zla ba'i dbus su/_de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga so so'i sku mdog dang /_phyag mtshan yum dang bcas pa rdzogs par gyur/_las thams cad pa'i bum par pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dbus su dpa' bo rta mgrin yab yum khro bo'i rgyan cha lugs chen po gsal bar gyur/_O~M badzra sa ma ya dzaH_ye shes pa byon/_dzaHhA~M baM hoH:_gnyis su med par thim/_O~M AHhUM/_sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlab/_O~M bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa O~M/_badzra/_rat+na/_pad+ma/_karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa A/_de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lngas dbu brgyan/_bdag gi sa snying ga nas 'od zer gzungs thag la 'khril te song bas rnam par rgyal ba'i lha rnams la phog_bde ba'i sgras bskul/_snyoms par zhugs pa'i sbyor mtshams nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun babs par bsams la bzla bar bgyi/_oM hU~M tAM hrIHA/ a A/_i I/_u U/_r-i r-I/_l-i l-I/_e ai/_o au/_aM aH_ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/_Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/_ta tha da d+ha na/_pa pha ba b+ha ma/_ya ra la wa sha Sha sa ha k+Sha:_slar yang las thams cad pa'i bum pa snga ma bzhin dmigs te bzlas pa re bgyi/_O~M badzra kro ta h+ya g+hi wa hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/[ \u0f00] sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ye shrI hUM:_mchod yon me tog bdug spos dang /_snang gsal dri chab zhal zas dang /_rol mo la sogs mchod pa'i sprin/_ji snyed kun gyis rgyal ba mchod/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta ar+dz+ny+'a pa t+yaM puSh+pa d+ha pe A lo ke g+han+te nai wi te shab+ta A hU~M/_O~M AHhUM/_gdod nas rang byung sku lnga lhun gyis grub/_/phung po gnas gyur ye shes lnga yi dngos/_/bde gshegs yab yum dbang chen yab yum la/_/gnyis med 'du 'bral med pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/ oM badzra maH_ye shes pa gshegs/_O~M AHhUM dam tshig pa zhu ba las byung ba'i bum pa'i chur gyur/_mdun bskyed kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par bgyi/ O~M badzra kro ta h+ya g+hi wa hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/[ \u0f00] shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha \u0f85 haM/_phyi dang nang gi chos thams cad stong pa chen po/_O~M swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha wa shud+d+he \u0f85haM/_stong pa'i ngang las/_hA~M yaM hA~M las rlang gi dkyil 'khor ljang gu gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu mchog ma ba dan la yaM gis mtshan pa hUM raM hU~M las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa raM gyis mtshan pa hU~M baM hUM las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po baM gyis mtshan pa/_hUM laM hUM las sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ser po laM gyis mtshan pa/_hUM suM hUM las ri'i rgyal po'i ri rab kyi steng du/_hU~M baM hU~M las sna tshogs pad+ma yangs shing rgya che ba'i dbus su/_hUM a hU~M las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/_hUM raM hUM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/_hU~M hU~M hU~M las sna tshogs rdo rje shar dkar/_lho ser/_nub dmar/_byang ljang*/_lte ba mchog tu mthing ga'i dbus su/_hUM b+haM hA~M las 'od 'phros/_phyi snod kyi 'jig rten la phog_/ma dag pa thams cad sbyangs/_'og min gyi zhing khams shin tu nyams dga' bar gyur/_slar 'dus b+haM yongs su gyur pa las/thar pa chen po'i gzhal yas khang pa sgo bzhi gru bzhi rtsig pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyang nang nas rim pa bzhin/_mthing ga/_ljang gu_dmar po/_ser po/_dkar po rnams kyi steng na rin po che'i pha gu ser po la/_nor bu'i dra ba/_dril bu g.yer kha/_rnga ma'i chun po/_dar gyi lda ldi la sogs pa 'phyangs pa/_de'i steng na rdo karma shi la las grub pa'i mda' yab rin po che'i rnam par spel ba'i steng na/_rin po che'i drwa mig_/gseng ma'i pU shus yongs su bskor ba/_rtsig pa rnams kyi phyi rol 'dod yon gyi snam bu la/_lha mo bcu drug gis mchod rdzas du ma thogs nas gzhal yas khang pa'i lha rnams la mchod pa'i sprin gyi 'od zer chen po 'gyed pa/_sgo rnams kyi steng ka ba bzhi bzhis bteg pa'i rta babs bang rim bzhi bzhi dang ldan pa rnams la/_rin po che'i gdugs/_chos kyi 'khor lo/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i ri dwags/_lha'i gos/_rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan/_yid du 'ong ba'i 'phan/_zla ba rlang gis bskyod pa/_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can la sogs pas brgyan pa'i/_nang ka ba chen po brgyad kyis bteg pa'i steng /_rdo rje'i gdung bzhis mig mangs ris su phug pa'i dbus/ phyur bu rab tu mtho ba'i rtse mo dang phyogs bzhi'i rta babs phyur bu rnams kyi rtse mo thod pa dang /_rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che'i tog gis mdzes pa'i kha khyer bzhi bzhi la/_ba dan nyi shu rtsa bzhi thod pa la 'phyangs pa'i gser gyi dril bu g.yer khas bres pa/_phyi mchod rten rtse lnga pa la nang lha'i gzhal yas khang pa phyi nas bltas na nang gsal ba/_nang nas bltas na phyi gsal ba/_ye shes rin po'i che'i ngo bo las grub pa/_'od zer chen po rab tu 'bar bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyi rol na/_dur khrod chen po brgyad kyis bskor ba/_me brgyad dang chu brgyad/_shing brgyad dang sprin brgyad/_grub thob kyi slob dpon brgyad/_zhing skyong gi mkha' 'gro brgyad la sogs pas mtshan pa/_rdo rje'i rwa ba dang /_me ri me phung gis bskor ba'i gzhal med khang chen po'i dbus su/[ \u0f00] saM O~M las seng+ge'i khri/_hUM ga hU~M las shar du glang po che'i khri/_tAM tha tswa las lhor rta mchog gi khri/_hI maM hrI las nub tu rma bya'i khri/_a gaM a las byang du shang shang gi khri rnams kyi steng du/_paM las pad+ma/_a las zla ba/_raM las nyi ma'i steng du/_dbus nas phyogs bzhir rim pa bzhin/[ \u0f00] hU~M hU~M traM hrIH_a/_e baM laM raM yaM las 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po rab tu 'phros pas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu snang bar byas so/_/snang bar byas pas sems can thams cad kyi las dang sgrib pa sbyangs te/lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du gyur/_slar 'dus aM e yongs su gyur pas dbus su bcom lda na 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/_mthing ga zhal gcig phyag gnyis rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis mdzes shing /_yab kyi phyag g.yas 'khor los yu ba byas pa'i rdo rje dang g.yon dril bu 'dzin pa/ yum gyi phyag gnyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas/_mnyam par sbyor ba'i thugs kar pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dbus su \u0f00 gyi mthar/_hU~M tAM hrIH_as bskor ba las 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'o/_/hUM baM yongs su gyur pa las shar du mi bskyod pa dang mA ma kI dkar mo/_yab kyi g.yas rdo rjes yu ba byas pa'i rdo rje dang /_thugs kar pad zla nyi ma'i dbus su hU~M gi mthar/_O~M tAM hrIHas bskor ba/_tAM l-i las lho rin chen 'byung ldan dang sangs rgyas spyan ma ser mo yab kyi g.yas rin po ches yu ba byas pa'i rdo rje dang*/_thugs kar tAM gi mthar hU~M O~M hrIHas bskor ba/_hrIHraM las nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dang gos dkar mo dmar mo yab kyi g.yas pad+mas yu ba byas pa'i rdo rje dang /_thugs kar hri'i mthar hU~M tAM \u0f00 as bskor ba/_a y-i las byang du don yon grub pa dang dam tshig sgrol ma ljang gu_/yab kyi g.yas rgya gram gyis yu ba byas pa'i rdo rje ral gri dang /_thugs kar a'i mthar hU~M traM hrIHoM gyis bskor ba/_sa bon de dag thams cad kyi mtha' A li dkar po dang /_kA li dmar pos bskor ba/_yab thams cad kyi phyag g.yon dril bu 'dzin pa/_yum thams cad kyi phyag na gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa/_rdo rje'i skyil mo krung rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa'o/_de dag gi zur gyi grwa nang ma bzhir pad+ma dang nyi zla'i steng du hU~M traM hrIH_a gnyis gnyis las/_'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas shar lho/ hA~M hA~M las nam mkha'i snying po dkar po ral gri dang dril bu 'dzin pa/_yum rdo rje sgeg mo dkar mo me long 'dzin pa dang sbyor ba tAM tAM las lho nub tu sa'i snying po ser po rin po che'i myu gu dang dril bu 'dzin pa/_phreng ba ma ser mo rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang sbyor ba/_hri hri las nub byang du spyan Ras gzigs dmar po pad+ma dang dril bu 'dzin pa/_glu ma dmar mo pi wang 'dzin pa dang sbyor ba/_a a las byang shar du kun tu bzang po ljang gu_/rin po che'i snye ma dang dril bu 'dzin pa/_gar ma ljang gu rdo rje 'dzin pa dang sbyor ba'o/ yang phyi rol gyis grwa bzhir/_pad+ma dang nyi zla'i dbus su/_hA~M traM hrIH_a gnyis gnyis las/_mer hUM hUM las byams pa dkar po klu shing dang dril bu 'dzin pa/ bdug spos ma dkar mo 'dug spos kyi khang pa 'dzin pa dang sbyor ba/_tAM tAM las srin por sgrib pa rnams sel ser po po ti dang dril bu 'dzin pa/_me tog ma ser mo me tog gi za ma tog 'dzin pa dang sbyor ba/_hri hri las rlung du 'jam dpal dmar po ral gri dang dril bu 'dzin pa/_snang gsal ma dmar mo mar me'i kong bu 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba/_a a las dbang ldan du phyag na rdo rje ljang gu rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa/_dri chab ma ljang gu dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa dang sbyor ba/_de thams cad kyang sems dpa'i skyil mo krung rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i thugs kar rang rang gi sa bon gyis mtshan pa'o/_/de dag gi sku'i rtsal las shar gyi snam bu la thag bzang ris mthing gwa go cha 'dzin pa/_lhor shAkya thub pa ser po 'khar gsil dang lhung bzed 'dzin pa/_nub tu seng+ge rab brten mthing ga po ti 'dzin pa/_byang du kha 'bar d+he ba dmar po rin po che'i sgrom bu 'dzin pa/_steng du brgya byin dkar po pi wang 'dzin pa/_'og tu a ba glang mgo nag po me chu bsnams pa rnams pad zla'i steng na bzhengs pa'i tshul gyis sprul pa'i sku'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o/_/ sgo bzhir pad+ma dang nyi zla'i steng du/_dzaHhUM baM hoH:_gnyis gnyis las shar du dza dza las khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang sgo ma lcags kyu ma dkar mo lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang sbyor ba/_hUM hUM las lho sgor khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po dang*/_sgo ma zhags pa ma ser mo zhags pa 'dzin pa dang sbyor ba/_baM baM las nub sgor khro bo rta mgrin rgyal ba dang /_sgo ma lcags sgrog ma dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang sbyor ba/_ho ho las byang sgor khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang sgo ma dril bu ma ljang gu dril bu 'dzin pa dang sbyor ba/_de dag thams cad kyang khro bo'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing thugs kar rang rang gi sa bon gyis mtshan pa/_/_khro bo'i stangs stabs kyis me ri me phung 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa'o/_/de dag gi sku'i gdangs las/_steng na khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor me ri me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus na shin tu 'jigs su rung ba me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar/_skad cig dran rdzogs kyis snang la rang bzhin med par bsam mo/_/rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgyas se gol dpung par bsnol te gtogs nas/_hUM ma lus sems can kun gyi mgon gyur cing /_/_/bdud sde dpung bcas mi bzad 'joms mdzad lha/_/dngos rnams ma lus ji bzhin mkhyen gyur pa'i/_/bcom ldan 'khor bcas gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol/_hUM dus gsum bla ma kun bzang chos kyi rje/_/nyon mongs lnga dag phung po gnas gyur pa'i/_/sku gsum lnga ldan rigs lnga yab yum gtso/_/'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/_/\u0f00 gu ru badzra hU~M traM hrIHa/_sa ma ya dza dza/_bla ma dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad byon par bsam//hA~M sgyu ma chu zla ye shes gzhal yas khang /_/skyon bral pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs/_/O~M pad+ma sUr+ya tsan+d+ra ka ma la ye hUM/_chu dang thang skyes me tog yid 'ongs rnams/_/dngos 'byor ting 'dzin dag pa'i mchod sprin gyis/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_a gar sihA tsan+dan la sogs pa/_/dngos 'byor ting 'dzin dag pa'i mchod sprin gyis/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hA pe pU tsa me g+ha sa mu dra spra ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_rin chen snang gsal nyi zla'i 'od 'phro ba/_/dngos 'byor ting nge 'dzin dag pa'i mchod sprin gyis/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke pU tsa me g+ha sa ma dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_rang bzhin lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba'i dri/_/dngos 'byor ting 'dzin dag pa'i mchod sprin gyis//bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta g+han+te pU tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_kha dog dri ldan ro brgya ldan pa'i zas/_/dngos 'byor ting 'dzin dag pa'i mchod sprin byas/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta ni wi te pU tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_sil snyan dril chen rnams dkrol tshangs pa'i dbyangs//dngos 'byor ting 'dzin dag pa'i mchod sprin byas/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta shab+ta pU tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_gzhan yang phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod sprin ni/_dngos 'byor ting 'dzin dag pa'i mchod sprin gyis/_/bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha la 'bul/_/thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/oM sarba pU tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_sku gsung thugs nyid ye nas kun tu bzang /_/sku lnga ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i lha/_/thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/_/bla ma kun bzang rigs lnga'i tshogs la bstod/_/O~M badzra aM ku sha dza:_ye shes pa rnams dam tshig pa'i dal du byon/_/O~M badzra pA sha hUM/_so so'i spyi bor byon/_/O~M badzra s+pho Ta baM/_gnyis su med par thim/_/_O~M badzra pra be sha ya hoH_dgyes shing brtan par gyur/_de thams cad kyi spyi bor oM/_mgrin par AH:_thugs kar hUM gis mtshan par gyur/_O~M bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/_O~M badzra a b+hi Shi ny+tsa hUM/_O~M rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/_O~M pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsA hrIH_O~M karma a b+hi Shi'u a/_de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lngas bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs nas/_ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/_/lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/_/lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/_/de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka te sa ma ya shrI hU~M gis dbang bskur bas rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan par gyur/_oM AHhU~M/ lha rdzas las grub pa'i mchod pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pas sa dang nam mkha' kun tu khyab par gyur/_hUM phyogs bcur rab 'byams rgyal ba'i zhing khams na/_/me tog sprin phung nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa/_/dngos dang yid kyis rnams sprul ji snyed kun/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la gus pas mchod/_/O~M badzra puSh+pa AHhU~M/_phyogs bcu rab 'byams rgyal ba'i zhing khams na/_/bdug spos sprin phung nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa/_/dngos dang yid kyis rnam sprul ji snyed kun/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la gus pas mchod/_O~M badzra d+hu pe AHhU~M/_phyogs bcu rab 'byams rgyal ba'i zhing khams na/_/snang gsal sprin phung nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa/_/dngos dang yid kyis rnam sprul ji snyed kun/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la gus pas mchod/_/O~M badzra A lo ke AHhUM/_phyogs bcu rab 'byams rgyal ba'i zhing khams na/_/dri chab sprin phung nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa/_/dngos dang yid kyis rnam sprul ji snyed kun/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la gus pas mchod/_/O~M badzra g+han+de AHhUM/_phyogs bcu rab 'byams rgyal ba'i zhing khams na/_/zhal zas sprin phung nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa/_/_/dngos dang yid kyis rnam sprul ji snyed kun/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la gus pas mchod
