tshogs la gus pas mchod/_/O~M badzra shab+ta AHhUM/_bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la/_/_/'khor lo rin chen 'di phul bas/_/srid pa'i 'khor lo rgyun chad nas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog_/O~M sarba ta thA ga ta tsakra rat+na pU tsi te [(]a[>]pU dzi te[) ]AH:hA~M/_bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la/_/nor bu rin chen 'di phul bas/_/bkres shing phongs pa rgyun chad de/_/'byor pa phun su tshogs par shog_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma Ni rat+na pU tsi te[(\u0fbe]a[>]pU dzi te[) ]AHhUM/_bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la/_/btsun mo rin chen 'di phul bas/_/ma rig mun pa rgyun bcad de/_/shes rab dbyings kyi don rtogs nas/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel par shog_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta wa ti rat+na pU tsi te [(]a[>]pU dzi te[) ]AHhU~M/_bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la/_/blon po rin chen 'di phul bas/_/phyi nang gsang gsum theg gsum ldan/_/bsam yas bstan pa rab 'dzin cing /_/yon tan thams cad ldan par shog_/\u0f00 sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA ta rat+na pU tsi te [(]a[>]pU dzi te[) ]AHhU~M/_bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la/_/glang po rin chen 'di phul bas/_/lta ngan rnams ni rab bsal te/_/bla med theg par rab zhon nas/_/thams cad mkhyen grong bgrod par shog_/\u0f00 sarba ta thA ga ta_ hasti rat+na pU tsi te [(]a[>]bA dzi te[) ]pA:hUM/_bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la/_/rta mchog rin chen 'di phul bas/_/srid pa'i gzeb las nges grol te/_/rdzu 'phrul mchog gi shugs thob nas/_/sangs rgyas zhing du bgrod par shog_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta tu raM ga a shwa thA rat+na pU tsi te [(\u0fbe ]a[>]pU dzi te[) ]oM AHhUM/_bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la/_/_/dmag dpon rin chen 'di phul bas/_/_/nyon mongs dgra las rgyal gyur nas/_/phas kyi rgol ba tshar bcad de/_/snyems bral mchog ni thob par shog_/\u0f00 sarba ta thA ga ta Shar+sha rat+na pU tsi te [(\u0fbe ]a[ >]pU dzi te[) ]AHhUM/_/hU~M snod bcud snang srid sna tshogs yid 'ong gzugs/_/rdo rje gzugs ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la mchod par bgyi/_/thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/O~M badzra rU pa pra ti dza hUM/_/snod bcud snang srid sna tshogs yid 'ong sgra_/rdo rje sgra ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la mchod par bgyi/_/thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/O~M badzra shab+ta hUM/_/snod bcud snang srid sna tshogs dri zhim spos/_/rdo rje dri ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la mchod par bgyi/_/thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol//oM badzra g+han+de hU~M/_snod bcud snang srid sna tshogs ro ldan zas/_/rdo rje ro ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho tshogs la mchod par bgyi/_/ thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/O~M badzra nai wi te hUM/_snod bcud snang srid sna tshogs bde ba'i ro/_/rdo rje reg ma'i tshogs su kun sprul te/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la mchod par bgyi/_/thugs rjes tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/O~M badzra pad+me hUM/_oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na/_/rdo rje'i rin chen bla na med/_/rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pas/_/rdo rje las kun byed par 'gyur/_/O~M badzra lA s+ye hUM/_/\u0f00 badzra mA le hU~M/_oM badzra g+harti hrI/ \u0f00 badzra nIrti A/_O~M badzra d+hU pe hU~M/_O~M badzra puSh+pa hU~M/_O~M badzra A lo ke hrIH_O~M badzra g+han+de A/_O~M badzra sa ta su saM kra ha/_oM badzra rat+na ma na ta ri raM/_oM badzra pad+ma ka ya ni/_O~M badzra karma a rong b+ha we/_hUM gsang mchog sku yi bde chen rig ma ni/_/sku mdog dkar mdzes me long pad+ma bsnams/_/shin tu yid 'ong bde gshegs dgyes mdzad ma/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs kun mnyes gyur cig_/O~M badzra a d+har she AHhA~M/_gsang mchog gsung gi bde chen rig ma ni/_/sku mdog dmar mdzes rnga zlum sgra sgrogs ma/_/shin tu yid 'ong bde gshegs dgyes mdzad ma/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs kun mnyes gyur cig_/ \u0f00 badzra mu rany+dze AHhUM/_gsang mchog thugs kyi bde chen rig ma ni/_/sku mdog mthing mdzes pi wang sgra sgrogs ma/_/shin tu yid 'ong bde gshegs dgyes mdzad ma/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs kun mnyes gyur cig_/O~M badzra wi ni AHhUM/_/gsang mchog yon tan bde chen rig ma ni/_/sku mdog seRa mdzes gling bu'i sgra sgrogs ma/_/shin tu yid 'ong bde gshegs dgyes mdzad ma/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs kun mnyes gyur cig_/O~M badzra waM se AHhU~M/ gsang mchog phrin las bde chen rig ma ni/_/sku mdog ljang mdzes rdza rnga'i sgra sgrogs ma/_/_/shin tu yid 'ong bde gshegs dgyes mdzad ma/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs kun mnyes gyur cig_/oM badzra me d+he [(]a[>]nr-i taM[)]ke AhU~M/ rtsa brgyad stong sbyar bdud rtsi a mr-i ta/_/dug lnga gnas sgyur ye shes bsgrub pa'i rdzas/_/_/ro mchog yon tan kun dang ldan pa ni/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la mchod par bgyi/_/\u0f00 AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa A mr-i ta khA hi/_bde gshegs rgyal ba rgya mtsho ni/_/yab yum gnyis med mkha' gsang las/_/'khril sbyor byang chub sems kyis mchod/_/bde ba'i ro mnyam mchod par bzhes/_/O~M AHhU~M/_b+ho d+hi tsit+ta gu h+ya pU tsa [(]a[》]pU dza[)]me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_sna tshogs chos rnams ma skyes mnyam pa'i ngang /_/snang srid 'khor 'das sgyu ma'i mchod sprin ni/_/chos sku stong pa mtshan med smon pa med/_/gdod nas rnam dag zhi ba'i dbyings su 'bul/_/oM sarba d+harma kA ya AHhUM/_chos nyid ye shes mnyam pa'i ngang /_/rang bzhin yon tan lhun gyis grub/_/thugs rje yid bzhin nor bu 'dra/_/phyag 'tshal gdod ma'i mgon po la/_/chos dbyings ye shes ngo bo nyid/_/nyon mongs gti mug rnam sbyong zhing /_/nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par dag_/phyag 'tshal rnam snang yab yum la/_/me long ye shes ngo bo nyid/_/nyon mongs zhe sdang rnam sbyong zhing /_/chu yi khams ni rnam par dag_/ phyag 'tshal mi bskyod yab yum la/_/mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid/_/nyon mongs nga rgyal rnam sbyong zhing /_/sa yi khams ni rnam par dag_/phyag 'tshal rin 'byung yab yum la/_/kun rtog ye shes ngo bo nyid/_/nyon mongs 'dod chags rnam sbyong zhing /_/me yi khams ni rnam par dag_/_/phyag 'tshal snang mtha' yab yum la/_/bya grub ye shes ngo bo nyid/_/nyon mongs phrag dog rnam sbyong zhing /_/rlung gi khams ni rnam par dag_/phyag 'tshal don grub yab yum la/_/bcu drug ye shes ngo bo nyid/_/gzung 'dzin sgrib pa rnam sbyong zhing /_/ rnam shes tshogs brgyad rnam par dag_/phyag 'tshal sems dpa' yab yum la/_/tshad med ye shes ngo bo nyid/_khams bzhi'i dri ma rnam sbyong zhing /_/'byung bzhi'i sgo ni rnam par dag_/phyag 'tshal sgo ba yab yum la/_/pha rol phyin drug ngo bo nyid/_/'gro drug bag chags rnam sbyong zhing /_/tshogs drug rnam shes rnam par dag_/phyag 'tshal thub pa drug la'o/_/zhi las ye shes rnam 'phros pa/_/'jigs gzugs khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/lnga bcu rtsa brgyad 'bar ba'i sku/_/phyag 'tshal dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la/_/sa dang ye shes zhing khams na/_/'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das tshul/_/dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad na/_/bzhugs pa'i 'gro ba kun la bstod/_/\u0f00 AHhUM/_gtor ma'i snod yangs shing rgya che bar bcud ye shes kyi bdud rtsi ri dang rgya mtshor mnyam pas gang bar gyur/_O~M AHhA~M i daM g+hi na bA ling ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/_mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya chen po 'di/_bla ma bde gshegs rigs lnga zhi khro rab 'byams kyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la 'bul lo/_/tshe las 'das pa'i sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing dag nas myur du mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgya bar mdzad du gsol/_O~M a*ha*ri*ni*sa*b+ha*liM ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ mkha' 'gro dpa' bo dpa' mo dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad la 'bul lo/_/_/tshe las 'das pa'i sa dang lam gyi bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma naM a d+ya nud paSh+pa na twad oM AHhU~M phaT swAhA/_yul lha gzhi bdag gi tshogs thams cad la 'bul lo/_/tshe las 'das pa'i sgrib pa sbyong ba la bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_O~M a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma naM a t+yA nud pan na twad O~M AHhU~M phaT swAhA:_'gro ba rigs drug gnod byed lan chags bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas pa la 'bul lo/_/tshe las 'das pa la lan chags pa thams cad khyer nas gnod pa dang 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig_/O~M a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma ni a d+ya nut+pan na tod oM AHhU~MphaT swA haH_dus las 'das pa'i gtsor byas bar do na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la 'bul lo/_/bar do'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral nas myur du sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par gyur cig_/na mo bdag gis bsam pa'i stobs dang ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyin stobs dang /_/chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs rnams kyis/_/don rnams gang dag bsam pa kun/_/de dag thams cad ci rigs pa/_/thogs pa med par 'byung 'gyur shog_/sdig pa ci yang mi bya ste/_/dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad/_/rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/_/chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/_/gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med/_/gzung du med cing brjod du med/_/rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung /_/ngo bo gnyis med gnas med pa/_/ de ltar chos rnams shes gyis la/_/sems can don ni mnyam med byos/_/ 'on kyang skyob ba'i sras su skye/_/de ltar chos dang zang zing gi sbyin pas tshogs gnyis rdzogs/_sgrib pa gnyis byang ste/_myur du sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par gyur cig_/ces brjod nas skabs 'dir/_bdag nyid dkyil 'khor du dbang blang ngo /_/tshe 'das la dbang bskur te/_sgrib pa sbyong ba'i thog mar rten bskyed pa la thugs gtad par zhu/_O~M badzra kro ta h+ya g+hi wa hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/_O~M swa b+ha wa bi shud+d+ha& sarba d+harma swa b+ha wa bi shu d+ho&haM/_stong pa'i ngang las pad+ma dang /_zla ba'i steng du/_nr-i yongs su gyur pa las/_tshe 'das de nyid kyi phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs pa gson gyi dus na ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du yong bar gyur/_lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas na mo rje btsun rtsa ba dang brgyud par bcas pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bden pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi byin rlabs kyi bden pa dang /_gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi rgyal po khro bo rnams kyi bden pa dang /_gzungs sngags kyi rgyal mo khro mo rnams kyis bden pa dang /_chos nyid rang bzhin gyi rnam par dag pa'i bden pa dang /_kun rdzob rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i bden pa dang / bcom ldan 'das zhi khro rab 'byams kyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa'i bden pa dang /_bden pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/_'jig rten 'di nas pha rol du tshe las 'das pa che ge mo zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par shes pa las kyi dbang gis khams gsum 'gro ba rigs drug skye gnas rnam pa bzhi/_srid pa bar ma do/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i char gtogs pa/_gang na gnas kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la rten 'di la mchis par gyur cig_/oM DAk+ki dza hUM/_zhes lan gsum brjod nas/_rnam shes 'od kyi rnam pa nam mkhar bsams la/_O~M sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM a pa na ye hUM/ sdig pa sbyangs te/_dzaHhU~M baM hos rten la bstim/_/oM sarba pA paM b+hi shwa d+ha ni hUM/_/oM sarba bid tra thA/_O~M badzra pA Ni bi po ta ya sarba a pa ya b+han+d+ha ni/_pra mo k+Sha ya sarba a pa ya g+han+de b+h+ya/_sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya tra thA/_oM badzra b+han+d+hu tra thA/_oM sarba bid badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/_rnam par shes pa a dkar po dri ma med pa sbyangs du rung bar gyur/_/thog mar gtor ma bskor zhing zhi bas sbyong ba ni/_/O~M sarba sarba bi g+haM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yoH/_bi shwa mu khe b+h+ya/_sarba tad khaM/_ut+pa te s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM/_tshe las 'das pa'i sdig pa sbyong ba la bar du gcod pa'i bgegs rnams gtor ma 'dis brdan par gyis la song zhig_/ces pa gsum dang /_ting lo dang chang bus bskor zhing /_suM b+ha ni/_ting lo 'dis snang ba gyis changs bu 'dis lam rgyags gyis la song zhig_/ces pas zhi drag phyed ma dang /_gu gul gyis bdug cing rdo rje dril bu gsil la/_hA~M ye shes bskal pa'i me la sogs pas khro bo mang po byon par bsam la/_hA~M 'jigs pa'i hUM sgra nges sgrogs shing /_/bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms mdzad pa/_/dngos grub ma lus stsol ba'i lha/_/bgegs kyi dgra la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/oM suM b+ha nis bgegs rnams rgya mtsho'i mthar bskrad/_O~M badzra dz+wa la a na la ha na/_ma thA da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT kyis me ris mtshams bcad par gyur/_rten gyi g.yas su me/_g.yon du chu/_mdun du til bzhag nas/_snying ga'i sdig sgrib kaM nag po'i rnam pa sna sgor sdig pa rwa can du gyur pa/_mtheb srin gyis til la thim pa g.yas g.yon gyi ye shes kyi me dang chur bor bas dag par bsam zhing /[ \u0f00] badzra DA ki kha kha khA hi khA hi/_sarba pA paM da ha na b+ha smin ku ru ye swAhA/_che ge'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad shan+ting ku ru ye swAhA/_sngags bzlas pa'i bye mas brab pas sdig sgrib thams cad dag par bsam zhing /[ \u0f00] dzi na dzi ka laM te sha ra te ste/_hUM badzra b+hai ka muM d+hartu shwa ra ti stAM/_swA rat+na d+h+r-i ka maM mo ha ra ti ste/_aM a ro lika/_paM ra ga ra ti stAM/_hA pra dz+nyA d+h+r-i ka taM badzra ra ti NAM/_O~M hU~M traM hrIHAH_dzaHhU~M baM ho/_O~M sarba pA paM da ha na badzra hU~M phaT/oM sarba pa paM bishwa d+ha ni badzra hA~M phaT/_oM sarba karma a wa ra Na b+hasmiM ku ru hU~M phaT/_O~M b+h+yoH b+hi na sha ya/_a wa ra Na ni hU~M phaT/[ \u0f00] b+h+yoH bi sho d+ha ya a wa ra Na ni hU~M phaT/_O~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ta ka ta ka ha na ha na a wa ra Na ni hU~M phaT/[ \u0f00] hU~M sa*ra*sa*ra*pra sa ra pra sa ra a war Na ni hU~M phaT/[ \u0f00] hU~M phaT/ sarba a wa ra Na ni bi pho Ta ya hU~M phaT/[ \u0f00] b+hi ta *b+hi ta sarba a wa ra Na ni hU~M phaT/_O~M tra tha tra tha sarba a wa ra Na ni hU~M phaT/[ \u0f00] tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha sarba a wa ra Na ni hU~M phaT/_O~M da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he dun hU~M phaT/_O~M pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ga te he dun hU~M phaT/_O~M ma tha ma tha sarba raya ga he he dun hU~M phaT/_tshe las 'das pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad shan+ting ku ru ye swAhA/_lha'i ngos su me long la khrus gsol zhing /_/ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/_/de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar/_/lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/_/de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol/_O~M sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka te sa ma ya shrI hU~M/ 'di ni khrus mchog dpal dang ldan/_/thugs rje'i chu ni bla na med/_/byin rlabs ye shes chu yin te/_/ci 'dod dngos grub stsol bar mdzod/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka te sa ma ye shrI hUM/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang de sras la/_/rin chen bum pa mang po spos kyi chu/_/yid 'ong legs par gang bas glu dang ni/_/rol mor bcas pa du mas sku khrus gsol/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka te sa ma ye shrI hUM/_de dag sku la mtshungs pa med pa'i gos/_/gtsang la dri rab bgos pas sku phyi'o/_/de nas de la kha dog legs bsgyur ba'i/_/na bza' shin tu dri zhim dam pa 'bul/_/\u0f00 hUM traM hrI a/_kA ya b+hi sho d+ha na ye swA hA/_zhes gsol ba'i chu las bum du blugs par rnam rgyal gyi chu'ang bsres nas/_ming byang la bkru zhing /_/'di ni sbyin pa'i rang bzhin chu/_/ser sna'i dri ma sbyong mdzad cing /_/gtong ba dri yis legs bgos chu/_khrus legs mdzad kyi khrus bgyi 'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims rang bzhin chu/_khrims 'chal dri ma sbyong mdzad cing /_/tshul khrims dri yis legs bgos chu/_khrus legs mdzad kyi khrus bgyi 'o/_/'di ni bzod pa'i rang bzhin chu/_khong khro'i dri ma sbyong mdzad cing /_/bzod pa dri yis legs bgos chu/_khrus legs mdzad kyi khrus bgyi 'o/_/'di ni brtson 'grus rang bzhin chu/_/le lo'i dri ma sbyong mdzad cing /_/ brtson 'grus dri yis legs bgos chu/_khrus legs mdzad kyi khrus bgyi'o/_/ 'di ni bsam gtan rang bzhin chu/_/rnam g.yeng dri ma sbyong mdzad cing / bsam gtan dri yis legs bgos chu/_khrus legs mdzad kyi khrus bgyi 'o/_/ 'di ni shes rab rang bzhin chu/_/shes 'chal dri ma sbyong mdzad cing /_/shes rab dri yis legs bgos chu/_khrus legs mdzad kyi khrus bgyi 'o/_/chu bo drug gis khrus byas pas/_/bag chags rnam drug sbyong mdzad cing /_/gang la nyes pa mi mnga' ba/_khrus legs mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/dri chu drug gis khrus byas pas/_/dri ma rnam drug sbyong mdzad cing /_/rgya chen yon tan drug ldan pa'i/_khrus legs mdzad la nyes mi mnga'/_/dri ma rnam drug dag pa yis/_/yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod don du/_/dad pas bdag gis khrus bgyi'o/_/oM hU~M traM hrIHa/_che ge mo'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs drug zhi nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/_/'di dag tshe 'das dug gsum ste/_/bcom ldan sangs rgyas dug mi mnga'/_/sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcom mo/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/_/'di dag tshe 'das dug gsum ste/_/skyob pa'i dam chos dug mi mnga'/_/dam chos bden pas dug bcom mo/_/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/_/'di dag tshe 'das dug gsum ste/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun dug mi mnga'/_/_/dge 'dun bden pas dug bcom mo/_/che ge mo'i nyon mongs pa dug lnga dug gsum thams cad dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pas shan+ting ku ru ye swAhA/_yang 'byung ba bzhis bkru zhing /_/sa ni dug gi pha yin te/_/sa ni dug gi ma yang yin/_/bden pa'i bden tshig 'di brjod pas/_/ dug gsum sa yi nang du song /_/chu ni dug gi pha yin te/_/chu ni dug gi ma yang yin/_/bden pa'i bden tshig 'di brjod pas/_/dug gsum chu yi nang du song /_/me ni dug gi pha yin te/_/me ni dug gi ma yang yin/_/bden pa'i bden tshig 'di brjod pas/_/dug gsum me yi nang du song /_/rlung ni dug gi pha yin te/_/rlung ni dug gi ma yang yin/_/bden pa'i bden tshig 'di brjod pas/_/dug gsum rlung gi nang du song*/_/\u0f00 hUM traM hrIHa/_che ge mo'i 'byung ba'i dug thams cad 'byung ba bzhi'i nang du shAn+ting ku ru ye zhig 'gro ba rnams/_/thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing*/_/chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/_khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten/_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/gang phyir bde la mnga' mdzad des/_khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/_/thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/_/bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des/_khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'khor bar 'gro ba yi/_/sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing /_/gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des/_khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos rnams mngon sum gyur/_/gtsang zhing bkru ba mi mnga' la/_/_/gsum gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des/_khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa/_/phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cig_/don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des/_khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/_/nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos te/_/sems can rab dga' mdzad pa des/_khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/byang chub snying por gshegs pa na/_/sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing /_/bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/_/_khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung zhing /_/thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des/_khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/yid 'phrog gang zhig mu stegs byed/_/thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing /_tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pas des/_khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/_/ brgya byin tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang /_/'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/_khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang /_/lha rnams kun gyi bsam pa yis/_khyed kyi 'dod don gang yin pa'i/_/don de de ring 'grub gyur cig_/rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog_/rkang bzhi khyed chag bde legs shog_khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog_/phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog_/nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/_/nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing /_/nyin mtshan kun tu bde legs shog_khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog_/tshe las 'das pa che ge mos gtso byas pa'i skye dgu thams cad mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal zhing shin tu bkra shis par gyur cig_/ces brjod nas byang bu 'dzin pas/_'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu tshe las 'das pas gtso byas pa'i sems can thams cad/_gang gi drin gyi bde chen nyid/_/skad cig nyid la 'char ba gang /_/bla ma rin chen lta bu'i sku/_/rdo rje 'chang zhabs pad la 'dud/_/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/_/slob dpon la ni bdag skyabs mchi/_/dang por me tog phog pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la 'dud/_/phyogs bcu dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i rtsa ba dang brgyud par bcas pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams dang /_yid dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o/_/bde gshegs rgyal ba kun bzang rigs lnga'i gtso/_/sems dpa' sems ma sgo skyong thub pa drug_/ zhi khro rab 'byams dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la/_/gus pas phyag 'tshal skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang*/_/byang chub lcam dral lha dang lha mo'i tshogs/_/rdo rje pho nya mkha' 'gro shug 'gror bcas/_/gus pas phyag 'tshal skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/rgyal sras nyan thos rang sangs rgyas pa'i tshogs/_/rgyun zhugs phyir 'ong phyir mi 'ongs pa dang /_/ slob dang mi slob bsod nams zhing rnams la/_/gus pas phyag 'tsha' skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/thog med dus nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir/_/ma rig dbang gis 'khrul zhing 'khyams pa'i tshe/_/lus ngag yid kyis sdig pa ci bgyis pa/_/ma lus da lta so sor bshags par bgyi/_/nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa che la sogs/_/_/so so'i bstan pa rgya mtsho'i 'dul khrims las/_/ 'gal zhing nongs pa'i dngos po ci mchis pa/_/ma lus da lta so soRa bshags par bgyi/_/shes dang spyad dang dang du blangs la sogs/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga rtsa ba yan lag bcas/_/bsrungs mtshams dus las yal ba mchis so 'tshal/_/ma lus da lta so sor bshags par bgyi/_/mdor na nyes ltung sdig pa'i tshogs kun bshags/_/dge la yi rang 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/_/ mya ngan mi 'da' rtag par gsol ba 'debs/_/'gro ba'i don du sangs rgyas 'grub par shog_/ces pas phyag 'tshal nas/_de nas tshe 'das kyis dbang zhu ba'i yon du maN+Dal phul la/_sa gzhi spos kyis byugs shing me tog bkram/_/ri rab gling bzhi nyi zlas brgyan pa 'di/_/sangs rgyas zhing du dmigs te phul ba yis/_/'gro kun rnam dag zhing la spyod par shog_/\u0f00 badzra re khe AHhU~M zhes pa dang /_e ma dus gsum rgyal ba kun tu bzang /_/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dgongs su gsol/_/tshe 'das khyed kyi rjes su 'jug_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro dang /_/so thar byang sems dam tshig rnams/_/thar pa'i grong du 'jug bya'i phyir/_mgon pos bdag la gnang du gsol/_/ces brjod par bsam nas me tog dor ba'i lan du/_e ma snod dang ldan pa'i bu/_/gsang sngags cho ga khyed la bstan/_/'das dang ma byon da ltar gyis/_/sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kyang /_/gsang sngags cho ga 'di mkhyen pas/_/kun kyang sangs rgyas thob pa yin/_/kun bzang rgyal ba rigs lnga yis/_/bdud kyi dpung yang 'di yis bcom/_/de ltar khyod kyis thob bya'i phyir/_/'di yi rjes su kun zhugs mdzod/_/ces brjod nas sdom pa byin/_/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dgongs/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang /_/zhi ba chags bral dam pa'i chos rnams dang /_/tshogs mchog 'phags pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la/_/bdag ni gus pas skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/ kun bzang rigs lnga'i lha tshogs la/_/'di bzung bla med byang chub bar/_/ gus pa'i yid kyis skyabs su mchi/_/dpa' bo dpa' mo chos skyong bcas/_/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la/_/bdag ni gus pas skyabs su mchi/_/ bla ma kun bzang sbyan snga ru/_/lus ngag yid kyis gzhan rnams la/_/gnod pa las ldog dge ba bsgrub/_/dge tshul dge slong byang chub sems/_/so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la/_/bdag ni rgyun du gnas shing bsrung /_/zhes pa gsum dang /_/ho bla ma kun bzang dgongs su gsol/_/'di bzung byang chub ma thob bar/_/'gro drug sems can thams cad la/_ma dang bu yi 'du shes kyis/_/ ma brgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang /_/ma grol dgrol dang dbugs dbyung phyir/_/smon pa'i byang chub sems bskyed de/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba thams cad kyang*/_/sdom pa la ni gnas pa ltar/_'di bzung 'khor ba ma stongs par/_/bla med 'jug pa'i byang chub sems/_/tshe 'das bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/_/ pha rol phyin drug slob cing bsgrub/_/brtson 'grus bdag gis thams cad bsgral/_/kun don tshul khrims gsum rtag bsrung /_/bdag gis sems bskyed sdoms gzung nas/_/ma grol dgrol dang ma brgal bsgral/_/dbugs dbyung mya ngan 'das la 'god/_/ces pa gsum dang /_sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kun/_/tshe 'das la ni dgongs su gsol/_/deng nas byang chub snying po'i bar/_/dkon mchog gsum ni mi gtang ngo /_/rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig tu/_/rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang /_/byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/_/rin chen rigs kyi dam tshig tu/_/ sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/_/pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig tu/_/theg pa gsum dang chos rnams bshad/_/las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig tu/_/'gro ba'i don la brtson par bya/_/yar mchod gus shing mar la brtse/_/rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig bsrung /_/rtsa ba bzhi las 'da' mi bya/_/zhes pa gsum gyis rjes la/ gdong g.yogs yid kyis bcings la gsol ba btab pa/_kye khro bo mi bzad 'jigs pa'i sku/_/mtshon cha sna tshogs phyag na bsnams/_/bdag cag 'khor ba las bsgral phyir/_/_khyed kyis gnang ste gtong du gsol/_/ces pa dang / khyed su yin ci byed dris la/_/_bdag ni skal ldan rigs kyi bu gcig po lags/_dpal rigs kyi bdag po la dbang zhu/_zhes lan smras par bsams la/_bgegs bskrad/_yang /_kye rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa dang /_/bla ma yid dam mkha' 'gro dgongs/_/sgo ba chen po khyed rnams kyis/_/sgo phye thar pa'i grong bstan 'tshal/_/zhes pa gsum dang /_bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dang*/_/dkyil 'khor lha tshogs spangs na ni/_/skyob ba gzhan nas mi mnga' bas/_khyed kyi thugs rjes bdag la stsol/_/zhes pa gsum dang*/_e ma khyod ni snod mchog dam pa ste/_khyod 'dod pa ni bdag gis sprin/_/zhes dang / bdag ni 'bras bu gsang sngags kyi/_/dngos grub bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis/_/ smin cing grol bar 'dod pas na/_/thugs rjes bdag la gnang bar mdzod/_/gsum gyi rjes la/_e ma e ma rigs kyi bu/_khyod ni las zad 'khrul ba zhig_/rigs kyi bu mchog khyod yin pas/_/ngas khyod kun bzang rigs lnga yi/_/dkyil 'khor 'jug cing ye shes dbab/_/dngos grub thams cad khyod kyis thob/_/dngos grub dkyil 'khor 'di dag ni/_/ma mthong ba la smras pa na/_/dam tshig nyams te dmyal bar ltung /_/rigs lnga ye shes rnam pa lnga/_khyod kyi snying la zhugs pa ste/_/'di smras ye shes lha dang bral/_/'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig chu/_/dam tshig nyams na sregs par byed/_/bsrung na dngos grub thams cad thob/_/dam tshig bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung*/_/oM a mr-i ta dam las ma 'da' swA hA/_khyod kyis ston pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas nga yin pas/ bka' bsgo ba las ma 'da' zhig_/'das na rdo rje'i dmyal bar skyes nas thon pa'i dus med do/_/zhes pas bdud rtsi 'thor nas/_bla ma dang yi dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs/_tshe 'das kyi snying nang du thim par bsams la/[ \u0f00] badzra pra be sha ya pra be sha ya hUM hUM/_zhes pas rol mo dkrol lo/_/tshe 'das gsol ba 'debs par bsams nas/_kye shar sgo srung ba'i sgo ba lcags kyu ma/_shar gyi sgo 'di phyes la ni/_/tshe 'das yi dam lha dang sprod/_/kye lho sgo srung ba'i sgo ba zhags pa ma/_/lho yi sgo 'di phyes la ni/_/tshe 'das yi dam lha dang sprod/_/nub sgo srung pa'i sgo ba lcags sgrog ma/_/nub kyi sgo 'di phyes la ni/_/tshe 'das yi dam lha dang sprod/_/byang sgo srung ba'i sgo ba dril bu ma/_/byang gi sgo 'di phyes la ni/_/tshe 'das yi dam lha dang sprod/_/ces brjod nas me tog dor te/_kye bde gshegs rigs lnga'i pho brang du/_/'brel ba'i me tog 'di dor bas/_/'brel ba gang yod lha dang bdag 'phrad shog_/O~M puSh+pa si ti [(<]a[>]sid+d+hi[) ]stAM/_zhes dor nas/_ston pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis/_khyod kyi ma rig 'khor ba'i mig_/ye shes spyan du dbye ba ltar/_/de bzhin khyod kyis 'gro ba rnams/_/ye shes spyan du 'byed par shog_/O~M tsak+Shu swAhA/_zhes yid kyis gdongs g.yogs phyes la/_e ma tshe 'das rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni sdig pa kun las grol/_/dkyil 'khor chen po 'di la ltos/_/lus ngag yid kyis dad pa bskyed/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/_/ dngos grub thams cad khyod kyis thob/_/_/dam tshig sngags la brtson par gyis/_/kye rigs kyi bu rdul tshon gyi dal 'di ni rten lha'i gzhal yas khang ste/ phung po khams dang skye mched mtshon/_de na bzhugs pa'i lha ni/_rang gi sems Rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas su bzhugs par dran par gyis shig_/ces brjod nas/_yang maN+Dal phul te/_/kun bzang yab yum ye shes dbang /_/bdag la bskur bar mdzad du gsol/_/ces gsum brjod dus/_me tog gang la phog pa 'di/_/_/sngon nas khyod kyi yi dam lha/_/rtag tu bsgom dang bsgrub par gyis/_/\u0f00 badzra puSh+pa si ti [(]a[》]sid+d+hi[) ]stAM/_zhes pas me tog bcings la/ tshe 'das rdo rje sems dpar bsams la/_bum pa spyi bor 'dzin pas/_hUM gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag cing /_/nyon mongs zhe sdang sbyong byed pa'i/_/me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/_/dpal ldan sku yi dbang bskur ro/_/O~M badzra a b+hi Shi'u hUM/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod la chu 'di gtad cing*bkrus pa tsam gyis/ lus kyi sgrib pa thams cad dag nas 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i dbang thob pa yin no/_khyod kyi gzugs kyi phung po rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du sangs rgyas te/_chu'i khams mA ma kI'i rang bzhin du gnas 'gyur nas/_zhe sdang me long lta bu'i ye shes su grol te/_sangs rgyas rdo rje rigs kyi sku 'gyur ba med pa thob nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa dang /_snang ba mtha' yas su bsams te rdo rje bzung nas/_hUM 'du shes phung po rnam dag cing /_/nyon mongs 'dod chags sbyong byed pa'i/_/so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis/_/dpal ldan gsung gi dbang bskur ro/_/oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH:_'o rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lag tu rdo rje 'di gtad pa tsam gyis/_'dir ngag gi sgrib pa dag nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang thob pa yin no/_/'du shes kyi phung po snang ba mtha' yas nyid du sangs rgyas te me'i khams kyang gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin du dag nas/_'dod chags so sor rtog pa'i ye shes nyid du grol te/_sangs rgyas pad+ma rigs kyi gsung 'gags med pa'i chos kyi sgra dbyangs thob nas 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/ zhes pa dang /_rnam snang du bsams nas ming 'dogs par mos shing /_hUM rnam shes phung po rnam dag cing /_/nyon mongs gti mug sbyong byed pa'i/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/_/dpal ldan thugs kyi dbang bskur ro/_/O~M bud+d+ha ab+hi Shiny+tsa O~M/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod la ming che ge mo zhes bya ba btags pa tsam gyis/_'dir yid kyi sgrib pa dag nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi dbang thob pa yin no/_/rnam par shes pa yang rnam par snang mdzad du sangs rgyas te/_nam mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings phyug mar dag nas/_gti mug chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su grol te/_sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs 'khrul pa med pa chos kyi sku thob nas 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa dang /_rin 'byung du bsams nas dbu rgyan thogs nas/ hUM tshor pa'i phung po rnam dag cing /_nyon mongs nga rgyal sbyong byed pa'i/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/_/dpal ldan yon tan dbang bskur ro/_/O~M rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod la dbu rgyan 'di bskon pa tsam gyis/_'dir lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa dag nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dbang thob pa yin no/_/tshor ba'i phung po rin chen 'byung ldan nyid du sangs rgyas te/_sa'i khams kyang sangs rgyas spyan du dag nas/_nga rgyal mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su grol te/_sangs rgyas rin chen rigs kyi yon tan thams cad mkhyen pa thob nas/_'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_zhes pa dang /_/don grub tu bsams nas dril bu 'dzin pas/_hUM 'du byed phung po rnam dag cing /_/nyon mongs phrag dog sbyong byed pa'i/_/bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis//dpal ldan phrin las dbang bskur ro/_/_/O~M karma a b+hi Shi'u a/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod la dril bu 'di gtad pa tsam gyis 'dir lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa ma lus pa dag nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbang thob pa yin no/_/'du byed kyi phung po yang don yod grub par sangs rgyas te/_rlung gi khams kyang dam tshig sgrol mar dag nas/_phrag dog bya ba grub pa'i ye shes su grol te/_sangs rgyas don yod grub pa'i phrin las thogs pa med pa 'grub nas 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa dang / kun tu bzang por bsams te/_rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas/[ \u0f00] AHhU~M thabs dang shes rab dbyer med cing /_/snang stong dbyer med 'di zung la/_/stong nyid snying rje'i snying po yis/_/kun bzang rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis/_/'gro kun rjes su 'dzin par mdzod/_/'o rigs kyi bu khyod la rdo rje dang dril bu 'di gtad pa tsam gyis/_'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa bon thebs nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin kun tu bzang po rig pa'i rtsal dbang thob pa yin no/_/rang gi sems skye ba med pa chos kyi skur sangs rgyas te/_'di ltar snang ba thams cad_ ma spangs gnas su dag nas/_sku gsum 'bral ba med pas 'gro ba'i don dpag tu med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ zhes pa dang /_rnam rgyal gyi bum pa 'dzin pas/_hUM rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das/_/mA ma kI yi phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/snang ba mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das/_/gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/_/kun tu bzang mo'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/rin chen 'byung ldan bcom ldan 'das/_/sangs rgyas spyan ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/don yod grub pa bcom ldan 'das/_/dam tshig sgrol ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/_/gnyis med byang chub sems kyi chus/_/rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur ro/_/oM AHhU~M gu ru d+he wa DA ki ni si ti[ (]a[》]sid+d+hi[) ] pha la hUM/[ \u0f00] hU~M traM hrIH_aHha ri ni sa a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ sid+d+hi pha la hU~M A/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod la dbang thams cad brtan par byed pa bum pa'i dbang 'di bskur ba tsam gyis/_snod bcud lha dang gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin phung po khams dang skye mched lha dang lha mor gnas gyur pa yin pas/phyi nang snod bcud thams cad la brnyas pa byas na ltung bar 'gyur bas dag snang dang mos pa gyis la mchod pa dang bstod pa la dga' ba dang ngo shes par gyis shig_/ces pa dang /_rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan bstan la/_'o rigs kyi bu khyod la rigs lnga'i sku 'di bstan pa tsam gyis/_ye shes lnga'i ngo bor sangs rgyas pa yin no/_/de yang nyon mongs pa rang bzhin gyis dag cing ye shes lnga rgyas pas/_rang bzhin gyi don gnyis lhun gyis grub pa'i brda yin no/_/zhes pa dang /_de ltar brda yi ngo sprod kyang /_/logs na yod pa ma yin te/_/rang gi lus sems 'di la tshang /_/'khor 'das rig pa'i ye shes te//sku lnga ye shes lhun gyis grub/_/sangs rgyas gzhan du ma 'tshol cig_/ ces pa dang /_e ma tshe 'das bu nyon cig_/_/thun mong skyabs 'gro nas brtsams pa'i/_/so thar byang sems bslab bya dang*/_/rig 'dzin sngags kyi dam tshig kun/_/byang chub ma thob bar du ni/_/srog gi phyir yang ma gtang zhig_/dam tshig nyams na bskal pa ru/_/ngan song gsum nas thar mi srid/_/ de phyir srungs shig rigs kyi bu/_'o khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi dbang thams cad rdzogs par thob pa yin pas dad pa dang dam tshig thams cad legs par bsrungs ba la brtson par mdzod cig_/ces brjod nas/_shin tu dben zhing skal ba mchog rab dang ldan pa la dbang lhag ma'ang bskur zhing /_thun mong pa thams cad de nas maN+Dal phul lo/_/bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la/_/deng nas byang chub snying po'i bar/_/lus dang longs spyod kun gyis mchod/_khyed kyi rjes su gzung mdzod la/_/srid pa'i rgyal mtsho las brgal mdzod/_/ces gtang rag phul ba dang /_slar yang mchod cing bstod pa/_kha dog dbyibs legs yid 'ongs rgyan phreng ldan/_/phyogs dus kun na gzugs mchog ci mchis pa//mos blos rten gyi lha la mchod par bgyi/_/bzhes shig bla med thar lam grub par mdzod/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta rU pa ka ma gu Na pU tsi te AHhU~M/ phyogs dus kun na zin dang ma zin pa'i/_/yon tan tshig mchog sgra snyan yid 'ongs ldan//mos blos rten gyi lha la mchod par bgyi/_/bzhes shig bla med thar lam grub par mdzod/_/O~M sarba ta thA ga ta shab+ta ka ma gu Na pA tsi te AHhA~M/ phyogs dus kun na tsan dan sbrul snying dang /_/a gar nag sogs dbang po tshims byed dri/_/mos blos rten gyi lha la mchod par bgyi/_/bzhes shig bla med thar lam grub par mdzod/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta g+han+te ka ma gu Na pA tsi ti AHhUM/_phyogs dus kun na bcud dang ror ldan pa'i/_/lus sems brtas byed ro mchog ci mchis kun/_/mos blos rten gyi lha la mchod par bgyi/_/ bzhes shig bla med thar lam grub par mdzod/_/O~M sarba ta thA ga ta rA sa ka ma gu Na pU tsi te A:hU~M/_phyogs dus kun na 'jam mnyen 'khril chags pa'i/_/reg bya'i khyad par lus sems tshims byed rnams/_/mos blos rten gyi lha la mchod par bgyi/_/bzhes shig bla med thar lam grub par mdzod/_/O~M sarba ta thA ga ta pad+me ka ma gu Na pU tsaM te [(]a[》]pU dzi te[) ]AHhUM/_ye nas rnam dag chos sku dag pa las/_/sna tshogs thabs kyi gzugs skur rnam sprul zhing*/_/'gro ba'i don gnyis lhun gyis grub mdzad pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes brjod nas/_nub tha ma la 'dir byang bu'i rnam shes nam mkhar hU~M du bsam la 'og tu me sbar te/_/gson cig dgongs shig rigs kyi bu/_/_/phung po lnga yi bud shing la/_/rgyal ba rigs lnga'i me sbar ro//'byung ba bzhi yi bud shing la/_/lha mo bzhi yi me slar ro/_/rnam shes brgyad kyi bud shing la/_/byang chub sems dpa'i me sbar ro/_/skye mched drug gi bud shing la/_/thub pa drug gi me sbar ro/_khams dang phung po'i bud shing la/_khro bo ye shes me sbar ro/_/lus ngag yid gsum bud shing la/_/rgyal ba'i sku gsum me spar ro/_/sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan pa/_/'gro ba'i don du 'grub par shog_/_/ces bsregs nas/_dkon mchog rin chen dpal zhing du/_/dkon mchog rin chen las byung ba/_/dkon mchog rin chen 'od zer gyis/_/rin chen phreng ba rnam dag pa/_/tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam/_/mthong ba'i lam dang sgom pa'i lam/_/_/bla na med pa'i khyad par lam/_/_byang chub bar chad med pa'i lam/_/rnam par grol ba'i lam dag la/_/brten nas sdig pa kun sbyangs nas/_/'phags pa'i lam der 'gro bar shog_/O~M rad ne rad ne/_/rad na sa ma b+hA we/_rad na mA la/_rad na ki bi shud+d+he/_sho d+ha ya/_sarba pA paM swAhA/_pad+mo 'dam gyis ma gos ltar/_srid gsum dri mas ma gos pa'i/_/srid pa'i pad+mo las byung ba'i/_/bde ba can du skye bar shog_/oM pad+me pad+me pad+ma saM b+ha we/_su khaM b+ha ra b+ha ya/_g+ha tsha ru swAhA/_rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der/_pad+mo dam pa shin tu mdzes las skyes/_/snang ba mtha' yas rgyal bas mngon sum du/_/lung bstan pa yang tshe 'das der thob shor/_ces me tog 'thor bas/_nub phyogs pad+ma brtsegs pa rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing du skyes te/_ston pa 'od dpag med 'khor bcas mchod cing lung bstan nas/_/slar yang steng gi nam mkha' drin lan gyi tshul gyis me tog gi 'char 'bebs shing /_ched du brjod pa/_e ma sangs rgyas ye sangs rgyas/_/e ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs/_/gang phyir ngan song bdag cag sbyangs/_/byang chub spyod pa nyid la bzhag_/sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med/_/chos dang 'dra ba'i skyob pa med/_/dge 'dun 'dra ba'i zhing med do/_/ sngags dang 'dra ba'i 'dren pa med/_/e ma sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/_/ sangs rgyas mdzad pa ya mtshan che/_zhes brjod nas slar bde ba can du song ste sangs rgyas par gyur/_de nas skabs 'dir tshogs kyi dga' ba byas la/ \u0f00 AHhUM/_mchod pa'i sprin phung nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur/_/chu dang thang las skyes pa yi/_/lha rdzas dam pa'i me tog 'di/_/me long ye shes brnyes la 'bul/_/tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_oM badzra puSh+pa AHhUM/_lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba yi/_/bdug spos dam pa 'di dag ni/_/mnyam nyid ye shes brnyes la 'bul/_/tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_oM badzra d+ha pe AHhU~M/ mun pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad cing /_/phyogs kun snang ba'i mar me 'di/_/kun rtog ye shes brnyes la 'bul/_/_/tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_oM badzra A lo ke AHhU~M/_lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba yi/_/dri yi mchod pa 'di dag ni/_/bya grub ye shes brnyes la 'bul/_/tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/O~M badzra g+han+te AHhUM/_kha dog dri dang ro ldan pa'i/_/zhal zas mchog gi bshos gtsang 'di/_/chos dbyings ye shes brnyes la 'bul/_/tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol/_/O~M badzra ni wi te AHhUM/_rgyal ba rgya mtsho sras bcas la/_/snang srid 'dod yon mchod pa'i sprin/_/bdud rtsi bde chen bla na med/_/ye shes mchog gi mchod par bgyi/_/oM ma mr-i ta pU tsa sarba AHhU~MhUM/_hU~M zhi ba lhun gyis grub pa yi/_/rang bzhin rnam dag dkyil 'khor du/_/phung po nyon mongs gnas gyur pa'i/_/bde gshegs bzhi bcu gnyis la 'dud/_/che mchog gdod nas rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/gar dgu'i rol par rab dgyes shing /_/sna tshogs rnams par 'phrul pa'i bdag_khrag 'thung lnga bcu brgyad la 'dud/_/zhing dang dur khrod nye ba'i zhing /_/gnas rnams la ni rab rgyu zhing /_/ mkha' 'gro dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs/_/kun la rang bzhin gus phyag 'tshal/_/zhes pas bstod la/_sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/_/de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig_/ston mchog dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa/_/sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir bde legs shog_/sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/_/de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig_/ zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa/_/chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir ba de legs shog_/sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/_/de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig_tshogs kyi mchog rab lha mis mchod 'os pa/_/ dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir bde legs shog_/ces pas me tog 'thor la/_gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas/_/legs byas 'di la nyes gyur gang /_/de kun lus can skyabs gyur pa/_/bla ma mgon pos bzod par mdzod/_/gang yang bdag cag rtsod pa'i dus/_/snyigs ma'i dus kyi sems can du gyur pa lags pas/_/gzhung bzhin du yo byad ma tshogs pa dang /_/ma 'byor pa ci mchis pa thams cad bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis bzod pa chen po mdzad du gsol/_gang yang bdag cag las dang po pa'i sems can du gyur pas/_ting nge 'dzin la dbang ma thob ste/_bying ba dang /_rgod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis cho ga nyams shing lhag chad 'gal 'khrul nor ba'i skyon dngos po ci mchis pa de dag bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis bzod pa chen po mdzad du gsol lo/_/O~M badzra sa twa sa ma yA/_ma nu pA la ya/_sarba sa twa twe no pa tiSh+Tha Di N+ho me b+ha wa/_su twa Sh+yo me b+ha wa/_su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/_a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/_sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/_sarba karma su tsa me/_tsit+taM shri ya#ku ru hUM/_ha ha ha ha ho/_b+ha wAn/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_badzra ma me muny+tsa/_badzrI b+ha wa/_mahA sa ma ya sa twa AH:_zhes brjod nas bsngo ba bya ba ni/_phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang zhi khro rab 'byams kyi dal thams cad tshe las 'das pa la dgongs su gsol/ pa 'das pas dus gsum du bsags pa'i dge rtsa thams cad dang gang yang bdag cag gi tshe las 'das pa'i don du/_dkon mchog mchod cing dbang bskur/_'byung po la gtor ma byin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu tshe las 'das pa che ge mos thog drangs/_nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa'i sems can thams cad dang / thun mong gcig tu byas te/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgud pa thams cad dang bral zhing /_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan te/_lha dang mi'i mchog rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang myur du thob par gyur cig_/de ma thob kyi bar du yang rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i sbyin pa gtong nus par gyur cig_/srid par skye ba la 'dun pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul khrims bsrung nus par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa bsgom nus par gyur cig dge ba'i chos ma lus pa myur du sdud pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam nus par gyur cig_/gzugs med pa'i khams rnam par gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam pa 'jog nus par gyur cig_/thabs snying rje chen po dang ma bral ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don rtogs shing khong du chud par gyur cig_/de ltar gyur nas kyang sems can gyi don du rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par gyur cig_/de ma thob kyi bar du yang /_bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du phyin par gyur cig_/de yang mtho ris yon tan bdun dang ldan pa skyon gang yang med pa nyid thob par gyur cig_khyad par du bla ma yang dag pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthun pa'i zhabs drung du skye bar gyur cig_/de dag las theg pa chen po'i chos zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos thob par gyur cig_/de'i don nyams su blangs nas sa dang lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas/_sku bzhi ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i dpal kun tu bzang po'i go 'phang rin po che myur du thob par gyur cig_/ces pa gsum brjod nas/_/_gson pa'i don du bsngo ba/_yang / phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang yi dam dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad bdag cag rnams la dgongs su gsol/_gang yang bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la brten nas/_rgyu sbyor ba yon gyi bdag pos gtso byas nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa'i sems can thams cad kyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang myur du thob par gyur cig_/de ma thob kyi bar du tshe 'di nyid la yang /_nad dang gdon dang bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi zhing /_mthun pa'i rkyen thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig_/dge ba rgya chen gyur pa 'di yis ni/_/'gro ba'i nang du sangs rgyas rang byung shog_/sngon gyis rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bsgral ba'i/_/skye bo'i tshogs rnams bdag gis sgrol bar shog_/sangs rgyas sku gsum brnyes pa'i byin rlabs dang /_/chos nyid mi 'gyur bden pa'i byin rlabs dang /_/dge 'dun mi phyed 'dus pa'i byin rlabs kyis/_/bdag gis ji ltar bsngos bzhin 'grub par shog_/ces brjod nas/_oM AHhU~M gis sku gsung thugs bsrungs nas nub tha ma la/_O~M khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzod/_/rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/_/sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang*/_/slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/_/O~M badzra mus ye shes pa gshegs/_dam tshig pa dzaHhU~M baM hos bdag la thim par gyur/_de nas a kA ros byang shar nas rdo rje srin 'gros su byas te/_rdul tshon bsdus la/_las kyi rjes mi mngon par byas nas/_tshom bu lnga bkod nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang /_bkra shis kyi lha tshogs dpag tu med pas shis pa brjod par bsams la me tog 'thor/ rol mo'i sgra sgrogs shing mgrin gcig tu/_O~M phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/_/'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa/_/sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/_/bkra shis dang po des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shog_/de yi nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba/_/'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/_/chos kyi dam pa skyed dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/_/bkra shis gnyis pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug_/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas/_/tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/_/bkra shis gsum pa des kyang der 'dir bde legs shog_/bsod nams ri bo bzhin du brtan pa dang /_/brgyud 'dzin nyi zla bzhin du gsal ba dang /_/snyan pas nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa yi//gsum po des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu zhi ba dang /_/mi mthun gnod pa'i phyogs las grol ba dang /_/ 'dod pa 'grub cing phun sum tshogs gyur pa'i/_/bzhi po des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/lo brgya thub cing ston brgya mthong ba dang /_/tshe ring nad med bde legs phun sum tshogs/_/theg pa mchog la nges par 'byung gyur pa'i/_/lnga po des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/sbyin pa gtong zhing tshul khrims srung ba dang /_/bzod pa sgom bzhin brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_/ mnyam par 'jog cing gnas lugs rtogs gyur pa'i/_/drug po des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mi bskyod pa/_/rin chen 'byung ldan snang ba mtha' yas dang*/_/don yod grub bcas rigs lnga'i bkra shis gang*/_/bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/bde chen rnam dag chos dbyings gang chen mtsho/_/mkha' 'gro rigs lnga ye shes sprin 'phro ba//snang srid rnam dag lha dang lha mo'i zhing*/_/bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/_/O~M su pra tiSh+Tha badzra ye swAhA/_zhes pas/_me tog gtor la bkra shis su bya'o/_/snying po'i rtsa rgyud rdzogs pa rang byung las/_ji ltar gsungs bzhin de yi don bsdus nas/_phyi rabs skal ldan rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir/_/gangs ri thod dkar mgul du legs par bkod//bdag blo dri med nam mkha' yangs pa las/_/mang du thos pa'i 'od zer stong 'phro bas/_/blo gsal pad+ma rab tu kha phye nas/_/dad ldan rnams la las 'brel rtsal du snang /_/dge ba de yis bdag dang 'gro ba kun/_/ma lus bde 'byung bde gshegs dbang po'i gnas/_/rang bzhin gdod ma'i gling du phyin gyur te//rang gzhan don gnyis lhun gyis 'grub gyur shog_/gzhan phan 'od kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/_o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi thugs kyi 'od zer blo'i pad+mor phog pas kha bye ba'i rnal 'byor pa pad+ma 'brel rtsal gyis/_ston gsum me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe/_gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul o rgyan rdzong gi dben gnas dam par bkod pa rdzogs so/_/b+ha wan tu/_bkra shis//_//

[8.36 phyag rgya bzhi mchod 'od kyi 'khor lo'i gnad yig]

@#/_/phyag rgya bzhi mchod 'od kyi 'khor lo'i gnad yig bzhugs so/_/ shog skya'i skor/ phyag rgya bzhi mchod ces bya ba/_rdo rje gar mkhan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ mdzes shing yid 'ong lta bas mi ngoms shing*/_/phyi nang mchod sprin 'od zer rab 'phro bas/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs kun mnyes mdzad ma/_/mchod pa'i lha mo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyi nang gsang ba bla na med pa yi/_/phyag rgya'i gar gyis rgyal ba mchod pa'i phyir/_/rgyud don man ngag rgya mtsho'i bcud bsdus nas/_/phyi rabs don du bdag gis gsal bar bshad/_/de la dang po phyi'i mchod pa lag pa byin gyis brlabs pa ni/_dzI ha dang mnyam du lag pa gnyis pus mo'i steng du mthe bong nang du bkugs la bkan pa'o/_/ha ya g+hi bas mtshams gcad pa ni sdigs mdzub rgyab sprad pa'i mdzub mo gnyis sbreng / mthe'u chung gnyis sbrel nas steng 'og phyogs mtshams su ston pa'o/_/sum b+ha nis mtshams gcad pa'ang sngags tshar gcig dum bu bzhir byas pa phyogs mtshams dang /_gcig phyed kyis steng /_phyed kyis 'og tu phyag rgya snga mas mtshams gcad do/_/yi ge brgya pa ni rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu ma chad par dkrol ba'o/_/sor mo byin gyis brlabs pa ni/_skyil krung gi steng du ting nge 'dzin ltar bkan la/_rim pas reg cing /_O~M hU~M traM hrIHaHzhes pa'o/_gnas lngar dbang bskur ba ni/_b+hud+d+ha a b+hi Shi'u la sogs pa rim par brjod pas go rim bzhin/_thal mo sbyar ba spyi gtsug_/de nyid las gung mo rdo rje 'dra bar gshibs/_mthe bong mthe'u chung brkyang ba dpral bar/_de nyid las mdzub mo dang srin lag rin po che 'dra bar bkug ste/_rna ba g.yas kyi steng du/_mthe bong mthe'u chung gshibs la brkyang /_gzhan rnams so sor pad 'dab rgyas pa ltar rgyab tu thal mo sbyar ba rgya re ltar bsnol te/_rna ba g.yon pa'i thog tu bzhags pa'o/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i mchod pa yang /_any+nyaM la thal sbyar gyi mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis zlum por bkug_/gung mo sor bzhag_/ srin lag mthe'u chung nang du blta ba'o/_/puSh+pa khu tshur bkan la me tog 'thor ba bzhin no/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo dang mthe bong sbyar bas spos rengs 'dzin pa ltar ro/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe bong gnyis mar me'i sdong bu ltar sgreng ngo*/_/thal sbyar gyi mdzub mo gnyis dang /_mthe bong gnyis zlum por bkug gzhan rnams sor bzhag nas dri'i dung chos lta bu'o/_/rdo rje thal mo kha sbub la brkyang pa/_slar log ste bshos 'bul ba'i tshul lo/_/rdo rje se gol bsnol nas so sor gtog go_/rdo rje thal mo lnga la/_'dod yon lnga 'am me long gi phyag rgya'o/_/rig ma la pad skor byas nas bsnol te nu ma g.yas g.yon gyi steng du 'jog pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod kyi pad+ma karma la ni me tog 'bul ba bzhin no/_/aM ku sha ni rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa las/ mdzub mo g.yon brkyangs pa'i steng du/_g.yas lcags kyu ltar rtse bkug pa'o/_/pA sha hA~M ni de nyid las zhags pa ltar mdzub mo'i rtse bkug pa'o/_/pho Ta baM ni de nyid las mtheb mdzub kyi nang du gcig bcug pa lcags sgrog ltar sbrel lo/_/pra be sha ho ni/_rdo rje khu tshur gyi mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la bsdams pa'o/_/_/me long bstan la khrus gsol lo/_/_/'khor lo ni lag pa gnyis mkhrig ma bsnol te rgyab sbyar sor mo rnams bsnol te 'khyud/_mthe bong gnyis lag mthil du dgug go_/nor bu ni thal sbyar gyi mthe bong dang / mdzub mo rin po che'i mig ltar zlum por bkug la gzhan rnams kha sbyar ba'o/_/btsun mo ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i gung mo gnyis rtse sprad de sgreng ba'i logs la mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba gcer ba'o/_/blon po ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i gung mo mthe bong mthe'u chung rnams gshibs te sgreng*/_srin mdzub bsnol te rdo rje rtse gsum pa ltar bya ba'am/_khu tshur gyi mdzub mos gter ston pa lta bu'o/_/glang po ni g.yas glang po'i sna ltar brkyangs pa'i gru mo nas g.yon pa'i lag mthil gyis bteg pa'am de gnyis go bzlog pa'o/_/rta mchog ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i gung srin gnyis brkyang mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te mthe bong gnyis rna ba ltar brkyang /_mdzub mo gnyis bsnol ba'o/_/dmag dpon ni g.yon pa'i khu tshur sbubs can gyi nang nas g.yas pas gong mdzub ral gri ltar bsgrengs pa'i mthe bos srin mtheb mnan la ral gri shubs nas 'byin pa lta bu'o/_/gzugs ma ni g.yas pa'i thal mo phyir snying ga nas me long ltar bstan pa'am me tog 'thor ba ltar ro/_/sgra ma ni pi wang sgreng ba'am ting shag dkrol ba ltar ro/_/dri ma ni g.yon pa'i snyims pa nas g.yas pa'i mtheb mdzub kyis dri'i phye ma 'gyed pa'i tshul lo/_/ro ma ni bshos 'degs pa ltar ro/_/reg ma ni mtheb mdzub gung srin rtse sprad mthe'u chung bsgreng la/gos 'bul ba'i tshul lo/_/sgeg mo brgyad mchod las/_lA s+ya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dkur brten nas g.yon du cung zad 'gying ba'o/_/mA le ni rdo rje thal mo gnyis nang nas thur ldog g.yo bas breng ba 'dogs pa ltar ro//g+hirti ni pi wang sgreng ba'i tshul du'o/_/narti ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi spyi bor gar byed pa'i tshul lo/_/d+hu pe ni/_thal sbyar tshigs bcag pa bdug spos kyi khang pa ltar ro/_/puSh+pa ni me tog 'thor ba'i tshul lo/_/A lo ke ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis mthe bong gnyis mar me ltar sgreng ba'o/_/g+han+te ni sngar bstan pa'i dung chos kyi tshul lo/_/de'ang /_O~M ring po ring po glur blang zhing /_rgyas pa la brgyad po re re'i snga phyir tshigs bcad dang /_sa twa su sang+ka ha la sogs pa'i sngags brjod la/_'bring la phyi sgeg bzhi la de lta bu gcig_/nang sgeg bzhi la de lta bu gcig dang gnyis so/_/bsdus pa la chun gcig gis byed pa'o/_/sku'i rig ma ni/_thal mo snying ga nas phyir me long ltar ro/_/gsung ni rnga zlum brdung pa ltar/_g.yon pa cung zad gyen la phyogs/_g.yas pa'i sor mo g.yob pa'o/_/ thugs ni pi wang sgreng ba ltar/_g.yon gyen du bsgrengs pa'i mthe bos/_gung srin mnan mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung brkyang /_g.yas pa'ang de bzhin byas pas sgreng ba'o/_/yon tan ni gling bu 'bud pa ltar/_phyag rgya de nyid kha'i drung nas byed pa'o/_/phrin las ni phyag rgya de nyid snying ga nas phyir bstan la Re mos kyi rnga brdung ba ltar bya'o/_/_/bdud rtsi g.yon pa'i mtheb mdzub sbyar gzhan brkyang pa kha bkan te/_dung chos ka pA la lta bu nas g.yas pa'i mtheb srin gyis blangs te gyen du 'thor ba'i tshul lo/_/'khril sbyor ni/_rdo rje khu tshur g.yo bas snying gar bsnol ba'o/_/bla na med pa phyag rgya chen po'i mchod pa ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i nam mkha' mtshon pas pad skor cher bskyod pa'o//'dir bstod pa'i skabs su rdo rje dril bu'i 'jog mtshams tshig rkang pa gnyis gnyis su/_rigs lnga spyi dang thun mong gi phyag rgyas bya'o/_/de'ang pad skor g.yo bas rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol nas g.yas pa'i rdo rje thal mo nang nas phyir ldog cing /phyi nas nang du ldog pas 'phred la cung zad g.yo zhing gyen du gsor ro/_/dbyangs ni khugs pa re dang stun nas/_rigs lnga so sor phyag rgya dang spel lo/_/byang chub mchog ni g.yon pa'i khu tshur du/_g.yas pa'i mdzub mo'am mthe bas sgreng ba'o/_/bdud 'dul ni g.yas pa'i pus mo la rdo rje thal mo kha sbub pa'o/_/mchog sbyin ni de nyid bkan pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin ni mnyam bzhag bkan pa'o/_/skyabs sbyin ni g.yon mnyam gzhag g.yas snying ga nas thal mo phyir bstan pa'o/_/sgeg mo ni khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/_/phreng ba ma ni phreng ba 'dogs pa'i tshul lo/_/glu ma ni pi wang sgreng ba'o/_gar ma ni rdo rje khu tshur sbi bor gar byed pa'o/_/gzhan bzhi ni sngar gyi bdug spos la sogs bzhi dang 'dra'o/_/sgo ma bzhi yang sngar gyi dang 'dra'o/_/gzhan dag ni phyag rgya med pas rigs lnga spyi dang thun mong gi dril thabs spel ba'o/_/rnam shes dgug pa ni rdo rje khu tshur las g.yon pa'i mdzub mo dang /_g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung sbrel te mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bkug pa'o/_/sho d+ha ni sdig pa sbyong ba ni rdo rje khu tshur pad skor du byed pa'o/_/bstim pa ni sgo ma bzhi'o/_/ sarba pA paM bi shwa d+ha ni la rdo rje bsdams pa'i gung mo gnyis mnyam pas mtha' bzhi rtse sprad pas mnyes pa'o/_/_/badzra ban+d+ha tra thA la/_rdo rje bsdams pa phral ba'o/_/oM sarba bid badzra a d+hi la sogs la rdo rje khu tshur gyis spyi bo la sogs par gtugs par bsam pa'o/_/\u0f00 badzra dz+wa la la sogs pa la sor mo rgyab sprad de me 'bar ba ltar ro/_/gtor ma ni mtheb skyu gsum lan gsum bshams la rten la bskor ba'o/_/sreg pa ni mtheb srin gyis til lam nyung kar blangs pa rten gyi sna bug nas 'byin pa ltar byas la/_bsnol te g.yas g.yon gyi me dang chur 'dor ba'o/_/bye ma ni g.yas pas cung zad re brab pa'o/ khrus ni nub dang po rnams su me long gi ngos la bkru zhing /_tha mar ming byang dngos la snum bskus te bkru'o/_/shis pa brjod pa ni ku sha'i rtses las bum nas rten la tshigs bcad kyi mtshams su chu blangs la gtor ba'o/ sas ming byang la gtor ro/_/chu ni chus so/_/me ni mes yul ba re bya'o/_/rlung ni rlung g.yab kyis bya'o/_/phyag ni byang bu la sogs pa de nyid bu la sogs pas bzung la 'tshal ba'o/_/maN+Dal ni dbus dang phyogs bzhir re re ste tshom bu lnga bkod la dbul lo/_/'jug pa dang dbang gi skabs su tshe 'das nyid yod par dmigs te/_rten de la yang dbang bskur zhing bum chus 'thor ba dang bkru'o/_/gtang rag gi skabs su snga ma'i phyag rgyas bya'o/_/de yang lus lhar gsal bas phyag rgya bya/_ngag sngags su gsal bas sngags rnams bzlas/_sems ting nge 'dzin gsal bas so so'i skabs dang bstun la bya'o/ khyad par du mchod pa gang la babs pa'i lha mor bsam pa'i/_snying ga dang lag pa las 'od zer gyi rtse las/_mchod pa'i lha mo dpag tu med pa 'phros nas bla ma dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha la mchod par bsam mo/_/de nas bzod par gsol dus snyims pa me tog dang bcas pa'o/_/bsngo ba ni thal mo snying khar sbyar ba'o/_/bkra shis ni me tog 'thor zhing rol mo sgrogs pas tshigs bcad re'i mtshams su brjod pa'o/_/mchod par byin dbab pa ni rol mo 'bud dkrol cher byed pa'o/_/ming byang bri ba ni/_stod du O~M hA~M traM hrIHA/_na mo phyogs bcu dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i rtsa ba dang brgyud par bcas pa'i bla ma rnams dang /_zhi khro rab 'byams kyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la zhes bris pa'i sor gcig gis ma reg pa'i mjug tu/_'jig rten 'di nas pha rol du tshe las 'das pa ming dang rus che ge zhes bya ba phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o/_/sdig pa sbyang du gsol/_lam bstan du gsol/ bar do'i 'phrang las bsgral du gsol/_myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol lo/_/zhes bris pa'i rgyab tu gzugs bris pa'i snying gar nr-i bris la/_skyes pa la mda' bud med la 'phang la btags pa dri gos dkyil 'khor gyi zur gcig tu gzug go_/byang bu sreg dus gang ras glo la dril te tshwa tshwa'i nang du gzhug cing /_thal ba rdul tshon dang lhan cig 'jim pa'i gseb tu btang la tshwa tshwa btab bo/_/nub tha ma la zas mang po O~M AHhU~M gis 'dod yon lngar byin gyis brlabs la/_gos ldum dang lhan cig phyogs dus kun la sogs pa'am/_rdo rje gzugs ma la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa tsam bya'o/_/dri gos ni bshig go_/'dir de tsam las gzhan pa'i zas gtad med pas mi bya'o/_/dpon slob kun kyang sngags dang*/_phyag rgya dang /_/_ting nge 'dzin gcig pas/_cho ga lding shar la mgrin gcig tu bya'o/_/des ni ting nge 'dzin gsal zhing chad lhag med pas kun gyi yid du 'ongs pa yin no/_/de ltar phyag rgya bzhi mchod gnad yig 'di/_/gangs ri rin chen ra ba'i sked tshal du/_/dri med 'od zer bdag gis legs par bkod/_/dge ba de yis 'gro kun grol bar shog_/bsod nams sprin gyis gzhol ba'i bla bre las/_/ye shes char chen rab tu 'bab pa yis/_/phyag rgya gar gyi glog phreng 'gran pa bzhin/_/lhan cig skye dgu'i 'dab bskyod dga' bar shog_/'di 'dra'i tshul la bdag 'dra'i blo mig rgyas/_/mang po'i dbus na bzang po'i grags dkar can/_/mkhas mchog chos rje'i mchog gi bdud rtsi las/_/_legs 'ongs don de ma 'ongs don du bkod/_/rang bzhin sngon nas sbyangs pa'i dkyil 'khor las/_/tshe 'dir lan re thos pas 'od stong rgyas/_/gzhan phan chu skyes rab tu 'dzum pa yis/_/skal bzang rkang drug ldan rnams dga' bar mdzod/_/phyag rgya bzhi mchod ces bya ba gzhan phan 'od kyi 'khor lo'i gnad yig pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis/_ston gsum gangs ri thod dkar du sbyar ba rdzogs so//_//

[8.37 mchod rten rab gnas rin chen drwa ba]

@#/_/mchod rten rab gnas rin chen drwa ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/ shog skya'i skor/ mchod rten rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga rin chen drwa ba zhes bya ba/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gi thugs rje shin tu rmad byung ba/_/dgung zla'i 'od las ches dkar rab 'phro bas/_/ma rig mun sel 'gro kun mtshan mo'i mig_/thar gling snang bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bde legs phun tshogs kyis/_/rang gzhan don gnyis ma lus bsgrub bya'i phyir/_/mchod rten rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni/_/dri med 'od zer bzang pos snang bar byas/_/'dir rang ngam gzhan gyi don du tshwa tshwa bzheng par 'dod na/_gtor ma byin nas sa blangs te/_O~M badzra kha na kha na hU~M gis rin po che'i sa gzhir byin gyis brlabs la/_O~M badzra mu ka ra a ko tra yA hU~M gis brkos nas 'jim par g.yos la/_de'ang tshe 'das pa'i ched yin na/ rus pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/_de'i dbus su a dkar po las bdud rtsi babs pas sdig pa dag par mos shing rigs lnga'i sngags zlos shing /_dri bzang po'i chus bkrus pa'i mthar O~M pra mar d+ha na ye swA hAs sgrib pa dag par bsams la zhib par brdungs te/_'jim pa dang bsres la/ pad zla'i steng du 'jim pa'i phung po de nyid h+'uM las rin po che'i phung por bsams la/_skad cig gis bdag nyid kun bzang yab yum du bsams pa'i thugs ka'i 'od zer 'og min gyi rnam par snang mdzad la phog pas/ de'i thugs ka nas 'od zer byung bas 'jim pa la phog pas ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du bsams la/_g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung mthe bong gis mnan nas gan rkyal du bzhag pa'i steng du/_g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du byas la kha sbrab la/_O~M na mo b+ha ga wa te be+e ro tsa na pra b+ha ra dza yAH_ta thA ga ta ya/_ar ha te saM myag saM b+hud+d+ha ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM suk+Sha me suk+ku me/_sa ma ye sa ma te/_shan te d+han+te/_a na ya a laM b+he/_ta raM b+he/_ya sho ba ti/_mahA te dza nir ku la ni rA b+ha ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta hrid da ya/_a ng+hi tiSh+Tha na/_a d+hi tiSh+Tha te swAhA/_zhes bdun brjod nas/_na maHsa man+ta/_b+hud+d+ha nan/_O~M badzra A yu she swA hAs 'jim pa snyoms par bcad pa'i nang du/_O~M AHhU~M la sogs pa'i gzungs gzhug ni/_O~M badzra d+harma d+hANu g+haN+he ye swA hA sa gzhug go_/oM badzra dzod b+ha wa swA hAs 'bi 'bi byas la/ oM badzra A ra dze wa ra dze swA hAs snum bskus la/_O~M d+harma d+hArtu gar+b+he ye swA hAs kol phor du bcug la/_O~M badzra mud ka ra a ko tra ye swA hwas kol phor brdung nas/_O~M badzra d+harma ra te swA hAs phyung la/_O~M sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma kA ya ma hA su kha/_badzra su ra te sa ma ya stAM gyis chos skur bsams pa'i ngang las/_O~M sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ho kA ya sti gyis longs skur byon te/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta nir ma kA ya sa ma ya stAM gyis sprul skus sems can gyi don byed par bsams la bre mthun par bsgrigs te gdab bo/_/de dag gi mdun du mchod pa lnga dang / gtor ma gsum bshams la/_'bru'i snod gnyis kyang sta gon du bya'o/_/de nas gtor ma 'og ma gnyis bgegs dang gzhi bdag la bsngos te bka' bsgo byas la/_/_rang nyid kun bzang yab yum du dmigs la mchod bstod byas la/_snod kyi nas gcig la rigs lnga'i sngags dang /_rten 'brel snying po bzlas so/_/de nas/_oM swa b+ha wa shud+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha wa shud+ho \u0f85haM/_stong pa'i ngag las paM las pad+ma/_a las zla ba/_raM las nyi ma'i steng du/_hUM las rin po che'i mchod rten/_gdan khri ri rab bum pa bre 'khor lo bcu gsum/ gdugs char khebs tog dang bcas pa'i bum pa ma gtogs pa shar dkar/ lho ser/_nub dmar/_byang ljang*bum pa mthing ga'i dbus su seng ge'i khri/ shar du glang chen/_lhor rta mchog_/nub du rma bya/_byang du shang shang gi khri'i steng du pad+ma dang nyi zla'i dbus su/_O~M hU~M traM hrIHaHlnga las/_rigs lnga yab yum du bskyed la/_ye shes pa gzhug dbang bskur/[ \u0f00] AHhU~M gis sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlabs la/_langs te me tog 'thor zhing /_phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag dgongs su gsol/_ji srid nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi khams rnams mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la ma gzhag gi bar du/_brtan par bzhugs su gsol/_bye brag tu yang sku gsung thugs kyi rten 'di dag la yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gnod pa ma byung gi bar du bzhugs nas/_gang gis mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_reg pa thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'god pa'i phrin las mdzad du gsol/[ \u0f00] su pra tiSh+Tha badzra ye swA hA/_O~M hU~M traM hrIHAH_oM ye d+harma he tu pra b+ha wa he dun+te shAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e wa~M bA dI ma hA shra ma Na ye swA hA/_zhes me tog 'thor nas/_oM na mo b+ha ga wa te rad na ke tu rA dza yA/_ta thA ga ta ya/ ar ha te saM myag sam bud+d+ha ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM rad ne rad ne ma hA rad ni/_rad na bi dza ye swA hAs bskor ba bya zhing /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bton nas/ mchod pa'i sprin phung chen por bsams te/_'jig rten 'di 'am gzhan dag na/_/me tog ji snyid yod pa dang*/_/bdag gis gus par bshams pa 'di/_/ mgon po sras dang bcas la 'bul/[ \u0f00] badzra puSh+pa AHhUM/_de bzhin du mchod pa lhag ma'ang 'gres mthun par 'bul/_'gro ba'i bla ma gcig po lum par bltams/_/ser skya'i grong khyer gcig tu gnas mdzad cing /_/yon tan rin chen bye bas brgyan pa yi/_/bde gshegs mchod rten rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/_/ma ga ta yi byang chub shing gi drung*/_/_/chu bo ne+e rany+dzu ra zhes bya ba'i/_/ 'gram bzhugs mchod rten yon tan rgya che bas/_/byang chub rten du gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ka shi ka yi wA rA na sI ru/_chos kyi 'khor lo rnam grol rmad byung bas/_/nyon mongs sgrib kun rnam par sbyangs mdzad pa'i/_/ye shes mchod rten bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mnyan du yod par gzhan stobs tshar bcad nas/_/dze ta'i tshal du cho 'phrul chen po yis/_/sa gsum dgongs pa mchog tu bsgrubs mdzad pa/_/mu stegs pham mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/_/grong khyer dam pa mchog ni gsal ldan du/_/lha rnams gshegs te bla na med pa yi/_/zhabs la tshangs dbang cod pan gyis mchod pa/_/sum cu'i lhas mchod mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun dbyen bsdum snga gyur te/_ston pa'i nyan thos rab 'dum pa/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal/_/byams pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/_/sku tshe'i 'du byed btang ba las/_/slar yang sku tshe byin brlabs shing /_/rnam grol yangs pa can gyi tshal/_/byin rlabs mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/_/ku sha'i grong du 'gro ba rnams/_/dge ba la ni sbyor mdzad cing /_/_/'gran med gyad rnams bzung ba'i tshal/_/mchod rten myang 'das phyag 'tshal lo/_/shAka thub mchod rten brgyad po dang /_/phyogs bcu gzhan dang gzhan rnams na/_/bzhugs pa'i mchod rten kun la 'dud/_/gzhi la rtag tu spyis phyag 'tshal/_/zhes brjod nas me tog bkram ste/_/bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad/_/mchod rdzas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol lo/_/ 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa khyed rnams la/_/thugs mkhyen pa'i ye shes/_brtse ba'i thugs rje/_mdzad pa'i phrin las/_/skyob pa'i nus mthu la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba lags pas/_phan bde'i 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byin gyis brlab tu gsol lo/_/bstan pa'i rtsa lag bla ma yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen pa rnams kyi sku tshe dang*/_/thugs dam dang /_/rtogs pa dang /_phrin las la bar du gcod pa mi 'byung zhing gong nas gong du 'phel bas/_'gro ba'i don rgya chen po 'grub par mdzad du gsol lo/_/bdag cag chos sgrub pa po rnams kyi/_chos spyod bcu'i sgrub pa la bar du gcod pa mi 'byung zhing gong nas gong du 'phel zhing rgyas par mdzad du gsol lo/_/sbyin pa'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa la gnod cing 'tshe ba'i bar du gcod pa zhi nas/_ci bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad chos ldan du 'grub par mdzad du gsol lo/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang lo phyug rtag tu legs shing /_phyi 'khrugs dang /_nang 'khrugs dang /_mtha' dmag dang /_sad ser dang /_mu ge dang /_gnod 'tshe thams cad med cing bde legs phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol lo/_/ci bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad chos ldan du 'grub par mdzad du gsol lo/_/zhes pa gsum gyis me tog 'thor ro/_/tshe 'das kyi yin na che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di'i sa dang lam gyi bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi nas myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas bar mdzad du gsol lo/_/zhes brjod do/_/de nas gtor ma de nyid/ dpa' mgon dam pa chos skyong ba'i srung ma rnams la/_a kA ros bsngos la/ rten 'di la phyi nang gi gnod pa dang 'tshe ba la sogs pa thams cad med par mdzad du gsol lo/_/zhes brjod nas/_bkra shis kyi lha tshogs dpag tu med pas rdo rje'i glas shes pa brjod par bsams la/_me tog 'thor zhing mgrin gcig tu/_phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/_/'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa/_/sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/_/bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba/_/'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/_/chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la rtag tu zhi byed pa/_/bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/ dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug_/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas/_/tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/_/bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/rgyal ba sras bcas bsod nams mthu dag dang /_/lha rnams kun gyis legs par gsungs pa dang /_/gsang sngags rig sngags rnams kyi mthu stobs dang / bden par smra ba rnams kyi bden tshig gis/_/bsod nams ri bo bzhin du brtan pa dang*/_/brgyud 'dzin nyi zla bzhin du gsal ba dang /_/snyan pas nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa ste/_/gsum po des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu zhi ba dang /_/mi mthun gnod pa'i tshogs las grol ba dang /_/mthun pa 'grub cing phun sum tshogs pa ste/_bzhi po des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/lo brgya thub cing ston brgya mthong ba dang*/_/tshe ring nad med bde legs phun sum tshogs/_/theg pa mchog la nges par 'byung 'gyur pa'i/_/lnga po des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/ sbyin pa gtong zhing tshul khrims srung ba dang*/_/bzod pa sgom zhing rtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_/mnyam par 'jog cing gnas lug rtogs gyur pa'i/_/drug po des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog_/rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mi bskyod pa/_/rin chen 'byung ldan snang ba mtha' yas dang /_/don yod grub bcas rigs lnga'i bkra shis gang /_/_/bkra shis dam pa deng 'dir bde legs shog_/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhag gyur tam/_/sa'am 'on te bar snang 'khod kyang rung /_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing /_/nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod par shog_/oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra ye swA hAs brtan par byas te/_gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas/_/legs spyad 'di la nyes byas gang /_/gang phyir lus can skyabs gyur pa/_/de kun mgon pos bzod par mdzod/_/bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/_/thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/_/skye rgas na 'chi'i rba klong 'khrugs pa yi/_/srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par shog_/ces brjod la stan la 'khod la dga' ston bya'o/_/_/gangs ri'i ngos la bdud rtsi'i chu babs pas/_/yid 'ong bya tshogs mang po dga' ba ltar/_/bdag blo'i legs bshad pad+ma'i gangs can mtsho'i/_/rigs ldan skye bo'i ngang pa dga' bar mdzod/_/ 'di ni rgyan don snying papo'i dgongs pa bzhin/_/dri med 'od zer deng sang shar ba yis/_/mkha' 'gro'i snying tig zab mo'i cha can du/_/o rgyan rdzong zhes bya ba'i gnas su bkod/_/dge ba 'di yis srid pa'i sems can rnams/_/'od gsal snying po'i de nyid legs gzigs nas/_/sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa yis/_/gdod ma'i gnas su lhun gyis grub par shog_/ mchod rten rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga rin chen dra ba zhes bya ba pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis ston gsum gangs ri thod dkar du bkod pa rdzogs so//_//dge legs so//_//mang+ga laM/

[8.38 rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ye shes dri med]

@#/_/rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ye shes dri med ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog skya'i skor/ dpal ldan ye shes 'khor lo can/_/kun bzang rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang /_/rig 'dzin rnams la phyag 'tshal te/_/rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bshad/_/de'ang sku gzugs zin nas rab tu gnas pa ni/_lugs ma yin na stod du sangs rgyas/_/_bar du chos dang dge 'dun/_smad du chos skyong dang gnod sbyin gyis gzungs bcug_/zhabs ra bsdams/_ras bris la sogs pa'i rgyab tu bris la/_bgegs bskrad/_de bzhugs pa'i mdun du mchod pa bshams la/_rang nyid kun bzang yab yum du bsgom ste mchod pa dang bstod pa byas nas/_'bru la rigs lnga'i rtsa sngags dang rten 'brel snying po bzlas te/ sta gon du byas nas/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed la/_swa b+hA was stong pa'i nga pas/_rten de lha gang yin pa de nyid yi dam rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bskyed la ye shes pa spyan drangs te/_mchod cing bstod nas bstim ste/_rigs lngas dbang bskur/_yi ge gsum gyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs te/ rab gnas kyis brtan par bzhugs pa'i tshig brjod nas/_rigs lnga'i sngags dang /_rten 'brel snying pos me tog phul/_maN+Dal gyi mnga' dbul ba ni/_maN+Dal 'bul ba'i tshig gis dbyangs dang bcas pa dang /_mchod pas mnga' dbul ba ni/_me tog la sogs pa phyi nang gi mchod pa dang /_bstod pas mnga' dbul ba ni/_rigs lnga'i bstod pa dang /_shis pas mnga' dbul ba ni/_bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa mang po brjod do/_/de thams cad kyang rgyas par dbyangs dang /_rol mo'i sgras mnga' dbul cher byed rnam pa yin no/_/gtor ma btang nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab nas rab tu gnas pa'i dga' ston rgya chen po bya'o//de yang glegs bam rab tu gnas na/ yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas dang po pu ti dang /_g.yon dang po pad+ma/_'og ma gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba/_rin po che'i rgyan can/_rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas bskor bar bskyed nas 'og min nas de 'dra ba'i ye shes pa bcug ste/ dbang bskur la sogs snga ma bzhin bya'o/_/khrus chu dang /_bkod ma'i chu mig rab tu gnas na/_/_de nyid lha'i khrus kyi rdzing bu bzang pos brgyan par bsams la/_rten 'brel snying pos me tog 'thor zhing bkra shis brjod de/ khang pa dang skyed mos tshal la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang dang /_lha'i nags tshal bstim la/_rab tu gnas te bkra shis brjod par bya'o/_/mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i sku ni/_de nyid kyi sngags dang bskyed chog byas nas/_sbyin sreg dang nang mchod dang /_bdud rtsis mchod pas mnyes par byas la/_rab tu gnas pa ni man ngag yin no/_/'dir mdor bsdus te gsal bar phye bas legs par bstan to/_/de ltar snying tig bka' gsang rgya che las/_rdzogs pa rang byung rgyud don rab bsdus te/_phyi rabs skal ldan rnams kyi don ched du/_/ye shes dri med bzang pos 'di bkod pas/_/'gro kun rnam dag rgyal ba'i zhing khams su/_/sgrib bral rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par shog_/de ltar don gsal yid 'ong cho ga 'di/_/o rgyan thugs sras dri med 'od zer gyis/_/ston gsum me tog 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe/_/gangs ri thod dkaRa mgul du legs par bkod/_/tshig don pad+ma'i nags tshal dga' ba 'dis/_/skal ldan bung ba rab tu tshim par shog_/rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ye shes dri med ces bya ba mkha' 'gro snying tig gi rnal 'byor pa pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis/_ston ka'i dus me tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe sbyar ba rdzogs so//_//

[8.39 mthong snang rin chen gser gyi dra ba]

@#/_/mthong snang rin chen gser gyi dra ba bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog skya'i skor/ mthong snang Rin chen gseRa gyi dra ba zhes bya ba/_/_dpal snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gi rang bzhin bde gshegs kun gyi dngos/_/pad+ma rgyal zhes mngon spyod ma 'khrul pa'i/_/'gro ba'i bla ma de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/_/grub pa'i rim pas mthong ba'i snang tshul brjod/_/de la bskyed rdzogs thun mong gi mthong snang ba dang /_'od gsal mchog gi mthong snang gnyis las/_dang po la grub pa'i mthong snang ni/_rnal 'byor pa rab mngon sum/_'bring la nyams snang /_tha ma la rmi lam du snang ste/_de yang bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i sgrub pa gang yin yang /_dam can 'du bas mkha' 'gro'i rtags 'byung nges te/_mkha' 'gro'i gzugs dang sgra skad sna tshogs pas lung bstan cing /_dngos grub ster ba dang /_bde gsal rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye ba dang /_gsal snang mngon shes lta bu 'byung ba dang /_gnyid 'od gsal bde ba chen por 'char ba dang /_gzhan snang 'gyur bar nus pa dang /_rang snang dga' bder 'bar ba dang /_nyon mongs pa chos nyid du grol bar snang ba ni mngon sum dang nyams su myong ba'i snang ba'o/_/rmi lam du mchog gi rtags su shel gyi mchod rten la 'dzegs shing bskor ba byed pa dang /_dkyil 'khor 'dri zhing mthong ba dang /_rang nyid sangs rgyas par mthong ba dang /_rang gis rang gi ro khur nas skyel ba dang*/_zhing khams bzang por phyin nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phrad pa dang /_sngon ma thos pa'i chos zab mo thos pa dang /_bya dang ri dwags ya mtshan can mthong ba dang /_nyi zla'i steng du skyil krung bca' ba dang /_rtag tu nam langs shing nyi ma shar ba rmi ba dang /_rdzing dang zam pa 'dzugs pa dang /_bdag nyid gru'i kha lo byas te chu'i pha rol tu phyin pa rmis na/_'khor ba las thar pa'i lam sna zin te/_nges par grol ba'i ltas so/_/thun mongs la nad zhi ba'i ltas su lus las rnag khrag thon pa dang /_gdon 'thon pa'i ltas su gzhan las rgyal ba dang*/_sdig sgrib dag pa'i ltas su nyi zla shar ba dang /_gos dkar po gon pa dang /_khrus byed pa dang /_ri rtse la phyin pa dang*/_nam langs pa'o/_tshe 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i rtags su 'bru'i phung po dang /_lo thog legs po dang /_nyi zla shar ba'o/_/shes rab rgyas pa'i rtags su me tog 'thu ba dang /_yi ge 'bri klog dang /_dkar gsum 'thung ba dang /_me 'bar ba dang /_nyi zla shar ba dang /_ral gri rnyed pa'o/_/grags pa rgyas pa'i rtags su dung 'bud pa dang / rnga brdung ba dang /_dar po che phyar ba dang /_kun gyis bstod pa rmi'o/_/nor rgyas pa'i rtags su/_rin po che'i char 'bab pa dang /_gter 'dru ba dang /_lo thog legs pa dang /_khang bzangs longs spyod ldan pa rmi'o/_/'khor 'dab rgyas pa'i rtags su skye bo mang po'i dbus na 'dug pa dang /_ba glang la sogs pa mang po skyong ba rmi'o/_/'gro ba dbang du 'du pa'i rtags su bud med mang pos phyag 'tshal zhing nor 'bul ba dang /_zhal slob dang skye bo mang pos bstod pa'o/_/mkha' 'gro ma 'dus pa'i rtags su/_bud med mang pos phyag 'tshal rgyan 'dogs bstod pa'o/_/dpa' bo 'dus pa'i rtags su skye bo'i tshogs dang /_dmag gi tshogs 'dus te phyag 'tshal zhing nor 'bul ba rmi'o/_/bgegs drag po tshar gcod pa'i rtags su/_gzhan bsad cing brdung ba dang /_me dpung 'bar ba dang /_rgya mtsho skam pa dang /_chu chen po 'phral la 'bab 'phro chad pa dang /_sems can phra mo mang po bsregs pa dang /_rgyal ba'i sgra sgrogs pa rmi'o/_/ma grub pa'i rtags la bud med mtshan ma ston pa rmis na/_mo rgyud ma grub pas spog pa'i las bya/_skyes pa gcer bur byung na pho rgyud 'khu bas gzir ba'i las bya/_'thab rtsod byed na mkha' 'gro 'khrugs pas skong bshags bya/_sprang po byung na ma bskang bas me tshogs dang gtor tshogs bya/_mdze pho byung na grib yod pas khrus dang gtsang sbra byed/_mun nag char 'thibs byung na dam tshigs nyams pas skong bshags bya/_nyi zla nub na tshe thung bas tshe sgrub bya/_bza' btung thob khar gzhan gyis khyer bar rmis sam gnyid sad na/_za khar 'jug pa'i bgegs la mnan pa bya/_mtshon cha chag pa dang rno med na sngags la chad lhag byung bas gso bar bya/rol mo la skad med pa rmis na bskyed rdzogs ma dag pas gsal la dag par gsal gdab/_ngu bred dang cho nges byed par rmis na srung ma ma mgu bas skong bshags dang gtor tshogs bya/_gzhan gyis 'dod pa byung na/_gzhan gyi gtor tshogs kyis ma khengs pas tshogs gtor rgya chen po gtang /_rang nyid kun gyi gral gsham na 'dug pa rmis na/_'jig rten gyi lha 'dre ma 'chun pas dmigs pa rgya bskyed/_mi gtsang ba'i 'dab rdzab kyi khrod du 'dug pa rmis na grib yod pas khrus dang skong bshags bya/_gos ngan pa gon pa rmis na bsod nams dman pas tshogs bsag_/ri nas thur du 'gro ba rmis na bar chad dang skal pa ngan pas dge sbyor la 'bad cing brtson 'grus bskyed/_sa rub cing nyi zla nub pa dang /_rgud pa dang /_gos dmar po gon nas mchod rten dmar po la 'dzegs pa dang /_gcer bur bong bu la zhon pa dang /_nub tu bltas nas nyams mi dga' bzhin du nyi ma nub khar 'gro ba rmis na/_'chi rtags yin pas 'chi bslu dang tshe sgrub la 'bad par bya'o/_/'di dag ni mdo tsam ste/ mdor na rmi lam gang yang sad dus shes pa mi dga' na nges par zhan la/ shes pa mi bde ba med na bag chags su shes par bya'o/_/de'ang srod la sngar 'das pa dang*/_bgegs kyi cho 'phrul gyi rmi lam gzhi che/_gung la bag chags dang da lta'i snang ba shas che/_tho rangs ma 'ongs pa dang lhas lung ston pa'i phyir/_mngon shes kyi rnam pa dang /_chos mthun pas tho rangs la brtag pa yin no/_/ngan pa rnams la so so'i gnyen po rnams dang bden med kyi rtsal sbyangs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag thun mong gi mthong snang bzang ngan rnams rnal 'byor pas shes par bya ba phyir du smos pa ste/_khong du chud par bya'o/_/don gnyis pa 'od gsal mchog gi mthong snang la gnyis las/_rang rigs pa'i mthong snang la'ang bzang po ni/_gnas lugs kyi don la sbyangs pas na/_sems can la snying rje chen po 'bad med du skye ba dang /_bla ma la gdung ba mchog tu skye ba dang /_'dod yon la dgos med skye ba dang /_chags sdang gi 'dzin pa je chung la 'gro ba dang /_rang sems la g.yo zog gi rnam pa mi 'byung ba dang /_snying nas 'chi ba mi rtag pa skye ba dang /_blo sna btsan thabs su thung la skyo shas gting nas skye ba dang /_'jig rten gyi snang ba sgyu mar mthong ba dang /_snang srid slob dpon du 'char ba dang*/_ci byas gzhan la phan pa dang /_kun gyis mthong na dga' ba dang /_dad mos rgyun chad med pa dang / nyon mongs pa chos nyid du 'char ba dang /_chos min gyi bsam pa rgyud la mi 'byung ba dang /_/bde gsal mi rtog pa rang babs su skye ba dang /_gang shar rang grol du mthong ba dang /_the tshom gyi
