'dzin pa mi skye ba dang /_bla ma'i gdams ngag la yid ches skye ba dang /_chos kyi tshig don sngar mi shes pa rgyud la 'char ba dang /_thams cad blo bral du shes pa la sogs pa'o/_ngan pa ni nyams su blangs pa'i tshe na/_de dag las ldog pa rgyud la 'char zhing /_khyad par du gnas dang yul dang /_gnyen bshes la chags sdang skye zhing /_rdzas dang yo byad la sogs gang rung la/_chags zhen je cher gyur pa dang /_dug lnga je rags la song bas mthun mjug dang /_chags sdang 'bad med 'byung ba dang /_gcig pur 'dug kyang sems nyon mongs pas g.yengs shing bya byed 'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang /_bla ma'i gdams ngag la yid mi ches pas spros bcas kyi dge sbyor la gtso bor 'don pa dang /_blo sna mang zhing rnam rtog je rags la 'gro ba dang /_dgag sgrub dang 'gyur ldog mang zhing 'grogs tshad chos min la 'god pa dang /_kha lta*nyams len 'dzol bas sems la rdul tsam yang ma phan pa la sogs te/_mdor na chos dang mi mthun pa kun la rang gnas shing gzhan yang 'god pa rnams so/_/de dag la bla ma dam pa btsal nas nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por gang 'gyur brten nas/_rang sems 'dul ba mchog tu zab bo/_/gnyis pa 'od lnga phyi'i mthong snang ni/_lus ngag yid gsum gyi gnad rnams legs par gcun te bsgoms pas thig le stong pa'i sgron ma mtheb mdzub kyi rtsol ba dang bral yang*/_snang dus nang du gzung 'dzin gyi rtsa gnyis 'od du song bas 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las grol te/_rtsol sgrub las 'das pa'i don khong du chud pa'i ltas so/_/de dus shi yang skye ba gnyis nas sangs rgya'o/_/de nas dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgron ma smin mtshams nas bral te 'od lnga'i snang ba dum bu la khru gang tsam pa kha dog lnga ldan gyi nang 'od zlum mu khyud ris mar por snang dus/_nang du ye shes kyi snang bas dug lnga dang sgo lnga'i 'dab 'od du song bas 'khor 'das rgyab gyes te phyi ma mngal gyi grong khyer du mi 'jug pa'i rtags so/_/de dus shi yang sprul skur skye bas 'gro drug tu mi skye'o/_/de'ang mngon dga' la sogs par rdzus te skye/ lo lnga brgya na sangs rgya ba'o/_/de nas 'od lnga'i snang ba gyen la 'greng ba dang / rtsibs shar dang /_mdung rtse dang /_mda' lta bu dang /_re lde tsam du snang dus na/_nang du sprul pa'i zhing gi bag chags 'dzin pa'i rtsa bdun gyi rtsa gnyis re 'od du song bas dbyings rig 'dus te bar dor sangs rgya ba'o/_/de'ang snang ba'i 'od gsal mdun ngos tsam par gzhal yas khang par shar ba'i gnad kyis so/_/_/de'ang de dus shi na bar do gsum pa lhun grub la grol lo/_/ dbyings snang la Rin po che'i dra ba dra phyed dang /_mig mangs ris dang /_mig tshags lta bu dang /_za 'og ber khyim dang /_mchod rten dang /_lcags kyu dang / mdung rtse dang /_mda' dang /_nya mig gi rnam pa lta bu shar dus nang du longs sku'i cha 'dzin pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa'i rtsa lnga brgya 'od du song bas ye shes bzhi sbyor gyi snang ba la sangs rgyas te srid pa'i bar do med do//de'ang chos nyid las srid pa'i bar do rang log ste/_dbyings kyi rgyan rdzogs pa'i phyir ro/_/dbyings snang gis lung pa 'gags pa ni/_nang du sgrib byed gnyis snang gi rtsa bzhi brgya 'od du song ste/_rnam rtog yul gyi zhen pa dang bral bas 'di dus shi yang*/_/zung 'jug gi snang ba la sangs rgyas pa'i rtags so/_/ dbyings rig nyin mtshan med par 'dres te snang dus/nang du sku gsum snang tshul gyi rten 'brel byed pa'i rtsa sum stong 'od du song bas 'od gsal gyi snang ba la sangs rgya'o/_/de'ang 'khor 'das gnyis su med par grol ba'i gnad kyis so/_de dag gi tshe thig le yang sran ma'i rdog po tsam las bse phub tsam gyi bar du 'phel lo/_/de'i tshe lus la gnyer ma med cing zas skom mi dgos pa dang /[ · ]rang snang las 'bral mi phod pa dang /_bar snang la 'gro ba dang*/ 'khrul pa'i gtam mi 'byung ba'o/_/de nas thig le re re'i nang du rigs lnga'i sku rkyang pa re shar ba dang /_yab yum zung 'brel du shar dus/_phung po 'od gsal du grol dus/_'byung bzhi'i gnod pa med pas skye shi las 'das te/ nang rtsa ma lus pa 'od du song nas rdos bcas su mi snang bar chu'i zla ba lta bur snang ngo /_/de dus sku gsum gyi zhen pa chod de/_longs sku'i zhing la da lta spyod pa'o/_/de'ang longs sku'i zhing la gnyis te/_mthar thug sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_gnas skabs rnal 'byor pa'i zhing ngo*/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni sangs rgyas nas longs skur bzhengs dus na'o/_/rnal 'byor pa la gnyis las/_tshad du phyin pa mngon sum gyis snang ba nas/_gong 'phel gyi snang ba rdzogs pa tshun chad do/_/phyin pa ni rig pa tshad phebs te/_'di dag la longs sku'i zhing nyul ba zhes bya ste gong nas gong du 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi sar brtan pa thob dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/sangs rgyas nas longs sku'i zhing brtan pa zhes bya ste/_mi 'gyur zhing mthar thug pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas 'od kyi nang na lag sor bkram pa tsam las mi mngon pas na phyi nang gi 'khrul snang zad de/ sems can gyi don du 'pho ba'i skur pad+ma lta bur 'byung zhing kha cig gdod ma'i sar grol nas sprul pas don mdzad pa'o/_/_/de'ang phyi snang ba'i 'od gsal las/_nang rigs pa'i 'od gsal 'byongs te/_gsang ba chos nyid kyi 'od gsal du grol bar byed pas na chos tshul 'di ni kun las khyad par 'phags so/_/e ma ho/_yang gsang snying po mkha' 'gro snying tig las/_/ mthong snang sna tshogs gser gyi dra ba can/_/gang gis goms shing bsgrubs las mngon du snang /_/'di yang rang rig goms pa'i cho 'phrul tsam/_/snang srid snod bcud dag dang ma dag kun/_/grib ma gzugs la shar ba chos nyid dang /_/'od gsal gdangs las so sor snang na yang /_/rang byung ye shes zugs gzhan 'pho 'gyur med/_/dag dang ma dag grim ma ji bzhin yang /_/ gdod ma'i ngang las shar der mtha' yang grol/_/'khor 'das snang rtags shin tu dag pa'i tshe/_/gdod ma'i sar phyin rmi lam sad pa 'dra/_/bzang ngan gnyis med mnyam rdzogs blo bde 'o/_/gangs ri thod dkar rin chen snying po'i mgul/_/yo rgyan rdzong du d+di med 'od zer gyis/_/phyi rabs don du snang bar byas pa yin/_/mthong snang rin chen gser gyi dra ba rdzogs so//_// dge'o//_//

[8.40 rdo rje g.yu sgron ma'i sgrub thabs zla ba 'dod 'jo]

@#/_/rdo rje g.yu sgron ma'i sgrub thabs zla ba 'dod 'jo bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog 'dra/ rdo rje g.yu sgron ma'i sgrub thabs zla ba 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba/_slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yid bzhin re ba kun 'grub cing /_/'dod dgu'i bsam pa rdzogs mdzad pa/_/ye shes mtsho rgyal la btud de/_/rdo rje g.yu sgron sgrub thabs bshad/_/'di la phyi nang gsang ba gsum/_/phyi ltar sman btsun mched lnga la/_/nang ltar yid 'ongs lha mo lnga/_/ gsang bar mkha' 'gro lnga yin pas/_/sku gsung thugs yin 'di ltar bsgrub/_/dang po phyi ltar sgrub pa ni/_/yid dang mthun pa'i gangs ri'am/_/ nags ri spang ri skyed mos tshal/_/dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas nyid du/_/ maN+Dal pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i steng/_/sman mo'i gzugs dang me long mda'/_/dar sna lngas brgyan gzhag par bya/_/_/mtha' skor dkar gsum mngar gsum dang /_/me tog la sogs mchod pa bshams/_/de nas rang nyid skad cig gis/_/pad+ma 'byung gnas bsgom byas la/_/mdun du gangs ri skyed mos tshal/_/dbus na rin chen khang bzang ste/_/de nang rin chen khri steng du/_/rdo rje g.yu sgron dkar gsal ni/_/_/dar dkar na bza' gser g.yus brgyan/_/ phyag g.yas yid bzhin nor bu ste/_/g.yon du dngul dkar me long 'dzin/_/ dar thod me long phreng rgyan can/_/'dzum bcas phyed krung 'od zer 'phro/_/ phyogs bzhir mched bzhi gtso mo 'dra/_/kun kyang bcu drug na tshod la/_/sgeg mdzes dgyes pa'i tshul du bsgom/_/snying ga'i 'od zer rab 'phros pas/_/ gnam sman gangs ri lha yi gnas/_/sprin dkar dag pa'i pho brang nas//ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs bstim/_dngos dang yid kyis mchod byas la/_/ sngags 'di ma yengs bzlas par bya/_/oM badzra pra mo ha hring hring swA hA/_/bdag nyid pad+ma'i 'od zer ni/_/phog pas de dag sku gsung thugs/_/dgyes pas rin chen char 'bebs shing /_/'dod dgu'i bsam pa bsgrub par bsam/_/ rjes la dkar gsum mngar gsum gyi/_/gtor ma 'bru gsum byin brlabs la/_/O~M badzra pra mo ha b+ha liM ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/_zhes pa lnga 'am bdun gyis dbul/_/bstod pa 'di yang brjod par bya/_/rdo rje g.yu sgron shin tu mdzes pa'i sku/_/dkar gsal gangs ri'i ngos la nyi shar 'dra/_/_/sgrub pa po la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/_/mched lnga 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/sngon tshe slob dpon pad+ma'i spyan lnga ru/_/ji ltar zhal bzhes thugs dam dran mdzod la/_/_rnal 'byor bdag la dgyes pa'i zhal bzang ston/_/ bcol pa'i phrin las myur du 'grub par mdzod/_/ces brjod dgyes pas don 'grub bsam/_/ thun mtshams spyod lam ci bder bya/_/de ltar zhag bdun bsgrubs pa yis/_/rmi lam sngar bas 'gyur zhing dga'/_/bud med 'du dang zas ster dang /_/phyag dang bskor ba byed pa rmi/_/dngos grub zas nor sprin bzhin 'du/ khyad par bud med bzang mo dang /_/yul mi mang po 'du ba yin/_/'dod don thun mong dngos grub thob/_/de ni phyi ltar sgrub pa'o/_s+thi/_rgya rgya rgya//_// gnyis pa nang ltar sgrub pa ni/_/gnas dang dkyil 'khor sngon bzhin te/_khyad par za 'og khug ma ru/_/shel dang byi ru g.yu chung gzhug_/bla rdo lha mo mched lnga ni/_/dmar mdzes me long pad+ma bsnams/_/dar zab rin chen sna tshogs brgyan/_/phyed krung 'dzum bcas 'od zer 'phro/_/_/tshangs pa lha yi 'jig rten nas/_/ye shes spyan drangs gnyis med bstim/_/mchod dang bstod pas mnyes byas la/_/bdag nyid nyi ma 'od zer gyi/_/thugs ka'i 'od kyis bskul ba yis/_/'jig rten skye bo zas nor bcas/_/skad cig dbang gis sdud par bsam/_/O~M hrI badzra pra mo ha hring hring sdus sdus a kar sha ya khug dzaH/_sgom dang bzlas pa'i 'od zer gyis/_/stong gsum 'od dmar gcig gyur nas/_/rang la thim zhing 'dus par bsam/_/lha mo mched lnga'i 'od zer las/_/sprul pa'i lha mo dpag med 'phros/_/thams cad dbang bsdus bkug par bsam/_khyad par gang dmigs bsgrub bya ni/_/skad gcig bkug nas dbang gyur bsam/_/rjes la ci 'byor gtor mas mchod/_/_/bstod pa 'di yang brjod par bya/_/tshangs pa lha yi 'jig rten na/_/lha mo me tog man d+hA ra/_/_/dpag med lha yi bstod pa ni/_/_/'jig rten gsum dbang mdzad pa mo//mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal/_/ji ltar bdag gis bsams pa bzhin//'dod dgu'i re ba 'grub par mdzod/_/ces brjod thun mtshams ci bder gnas/_/rmi lam skye bo dpag med 'du/_/nyi zla'i steng gnas lha yul 'gro/_/bud med 'du dang gter 'don rmi/_/dngos su gang dmigs dbang du 'du/_/kun gyi yid 'phrog skye bo 'du/_/dbang gi dngos grub rgya chen thob/_/de ni nang ltar sgrub pa'o/_sgri/_rgya rgya rgya//_/ gsum pa gsang bar sgrub pa ni/_/dben zhing yid dang rjes mthun par/_/maN+Dal 'dab bzhi dkar ser dmar/_/ljang dang lte ba mthing ga'i steng /_/thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba'i steng /_/me long chos 'byung sum brtsegs nang /_/d+hI ha ri ni sa lo ka sarba sid+d+hi pha la khug dzaH_zhes pa dang ni phyi rol la/_/yul dang skye bo'i spel tshig bri/_/de nyid mkha' 'gro lngar bskyed de/_/hrIH las dbus su DA ki ma/_/dmar nag spyi gtsug rin chen tog_/phag zhal mche gtsigs gcer bu la/_/g.yas g.yon gri gug thod khrag 'dzin/_/ g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang rus pas brgyan/_/gru mo kha TAM mtshan pa la/_/ phyogs bzhir ha ri ni sa las/_/gtso mo 'dra ba'i 'khor bskyed do/_/kun gyi snying khar pad zla dang*/_/_/nyi steng hrIHdmar tsheg drag can/_/ha ri ni sas bskor ba las/_/'od zer 'phro ba bsgom par bya/_/rang nyid pad+ma thod phreng ni/_/mthing nag 'jigs pa'i 'od zer gyis/_/'og min ye shes bkug la bstim/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod/_/_/sngags 'di ma yengs bzlas par bya/_/O~M shrI ha ri ni sa lo ka sid+d+hi a kar+Sha ya khug khug sdus sdus dza dza tsit+ta hring hring /_bdag gi snying ga'i 'od zer gyis/_/mkha' 'gro la phog bskul ma thag_/mkha' 'gro'i 'od zer rab 'phros pas/_/'jig rten skye bo'i zas nor dang /_/gang dmigs bsgrub bya bkug par bsam/_/yang cig 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis/_/'dzam gling khyom khyom mer mer la/_/rgyal po la sogs bkug par bsam/_/yang cig 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis/_/nam mkha' rgya mtsho rnga lpags la/_khor yug rnga chen gcig gyur pa/_/nyi zla'i rnga yog gis brdungs pas/_/bdag gi grags pa'i rnga sgra yis/_/'jig rten gsum po kun grags nas/_/g.yo ldeg med zhing khyom pa yis/_/bdag gi dbang du 'dusapar bsam/_/sngags dang ting 'dzin ma yengs pas/_/zhag bdun bar du bsgrub par bya/_/rmi lam khrom du skye bos bstod/_/zas nor char 'bab mkha' la 'gro/_/gter dang rin chen rnyed pa dang /_dung 'bud rnga chen brdung ba rmi/_/dngos su 'gro kun dbang du 'du/_/che btsun thams cad 'du ba dang*/_/zas nor gter ni rdol ba bzhin/_/phyogs rnams kun nas 'du ba yin/_/de ltar grub pa'i rtags byung nas/_/me long yi ge bdud rtsis bkru/_/thod pa'i bdud rtsi'i 'od zer gyis/_/'jig rten gsum po 'od du zhu//thod pa'i nang thim dmigs nas ni/_/bdag nyid btung bas dngos grub thob/_/gsang sgrub yid bzhin nor bu 'di/_/sgom dang bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/_/thams cad 'du zhing zas nor 'phel/_/_/ci bsam 'grub dang chos 'phel lo/_de ltar bsgrubs pa'i dam tshig tu/_/chags zhen mi bya sbyin par gtang*/_/bla ma la gus dam tshig bsrung /_/rig pa ngar bskyed brtul zhugs bya/_/gtum mo sbar zhing bde stong bsgom/_/des ni myur du 'grub pa yin/_sgri/ rgya rgya rgya//_// yang gsang bla na med pa 'di/_/rang nyid pad+ma'i thugs ka ru/_/hrI dang ha ri ni sa las/_/mthing nag bde chen phag mo ni/_/phag zhal gcig ste spyan gsum bsgrad/_/gri gug thod pa ka TaM 'dzin/_/gar byed 'od zer dpag med 'phro/_/phyogs bzhir de 'dra'i 'khor bzhi bsams/_/kun gyi thugs ka'i nyi zla las/_shrI dang ha ri ni sa bsam/_/de la 'od 'phros snod bcud bsdus/_/ slar 'dus snying ga'i hri la thim/_/steng 'og rlung ni kha sbyar te/_spro bsdu'i dmigs pa sngar bzhin las/_/_khyad par sna bug g.yas pa nas/_/rlung ni lcags kyu zhags pa yis/_/_/thams cad 'od zhu tshur 'dus nas/_/sna bug g.yon nas snying gar thim/_/lus khengs bde dang stong par bsgom/_/rjes la chos kun rang gi sems/_/sems nyid ye stong spros dang bral/_/ma skyes nam mkha'i rang bzhin du/_/mi bsgom mi bskyed rang sar gzhag_/mnyam nyid ye shes gdod ma'i ngang /_/rtsa ba bral ba'i rang bzhin du/_/ye shes rlung gis mthar phyin te/_/bde chen sa la mya ngan 'das/_/'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste/_/mchog gi go 'phang myur du thob/_/snga ma gsum ni bskyed pa ste/_/thun mong dngos grub char bzhin 'bab/_/de ltar bsgom shes rnal 'byor la/_/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa kun/_/ji ltar bskyed rim bsgoms kyang 'dra/_/snying po'i rdzogs rim kha lo bas/_/legs bsgyur thar pa'i grong du 'gro/_/gzhan yang 'khor 'das mnyam pa nyid/_/ji ltar bsgoms kyang blo las 'das/_/de ltar rtogs te 'khor bar grol/_/de phyir rdo rje g.yu sgron gyi/_/bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim gnyis kyi/_/thar lam 'bras bur rab sbyin pas/_/skal ldan rnams dang 'phrad par shog_/shin tu yang zab mkha' 'gro'i gnad/_/bde chen dngos grub gnyis stsol ba/_/de 'dra rgyal sras pad+ma'i lugs/_/gang de dri med 'od zer gyis/_/gcig tu bsdus pa zab mo'i /ston gsum gangs ri thod dkar ru/_/legs sbyar dge bas 'gro ba kun/_/rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob par shog_/_/'di ni rtsa gnas 'khor lo las/_/yi ge bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/skal bzang don du gsal bar byas/_/gnad 'dis myur du 'grub pa yin/_/dpal rdo rje g.yu sgron ma'i sgrub thabs zla ba 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba/_o rgyan chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis/_ston gsum me don/ tog dang 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe/_gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul o rgyan rdzong gi gnas su sbyar ba rdzogs so//_dge'o//_//

[8.41 gza' bdud gsang sgrub]

@#/_/gza' bdud gsang sgrub bzhugs so/_/ rin chen shog 'dra/ gza' bdud rA hu la'i gsang sgrub dug gi spu gri zhes bya ba/_slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/drag gtum mi bzad 'bar ba'i sku/_/che mchog he ru ka dpal la/_/btud de zab chos rgyab brten du/_/reg chod dug gi spu gri bri/_/'di la rdzas dmigs sngags gnad gsum/_/_/rdzas ni pha wang long bu yi/_/ngos bzhir tri bzhi ra khrag bris/_/ gseRa gangul zangs lcags gzi rnying dang /_/bde gshegs ring bsrel bcas pa ni/_/'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/_/rtsibs la hUM bzhi mu khyud la/_/O~M badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha na hUM phaT/_che ge mos gza' rgod brtod la non par gyur cig swA hwa/_zhes bris lte bar rang ming dang /_/grub par gyur cig ces pa bri/_/de lta'i 'khor lo bri byas la/_/'khor lo dar nag gril la bcangs/_/des ni 'tshe dogs mi byed cing /_/_/lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'brang /_/de nas brag nag 'jigs pa'i sar/_/phung shul sa blangs 'brub khung bca'/_/ro sol byugs par ling ga ni/_/dgra gzugs dpral bar de yi rus/_/snying gar ming bris g.yas g.yon du/_/ka ta n+taM ste b+ha ya mu kha taM yA/ zhes bris pra tshil gril la gzhug_/bshos bu dgu skor nang du yang /_/ling ga ra khrag bris la gzhug_/de nyid 'brub khung steng du gzhag_/_/dmar gtor khrag snas brgyan par bya/_/de la gza' yi gzugs bris gzug_/de nas rang nyid skad cig gis/_/ye shes gza' mchog dud kha la/_/dbu dgu g.yas gsum dkar ljang la/_/g.yon gsum dmar ljang dbus ma gsum/_/mthing nag du ba'i rnam pa la/_/_/spyi gtsug sgra_ gcan bya rog gdong /_/_/phyag bzhi g.yas g.yon dang po na/_/_/chu srin zhags pa ral gri bsnams/_/'og mas mda' gzhu rgyab tu 'gengs/_/smad sbrul mig gis lus khengs bsgoms/_/ thugs ka'i k+Sha nag 'od 'phros pas/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thugs ka nas/_/ye shes gza' mchog spyan drangs bstim/_/mdun gyi brub khung nam mkha' la/_/gza' bdud chen po 'jigs pa'i sku/_/nam mkha' gang bar sngar bzhin bsgom/_/chun par dka' na tshon gang bsgom/_/hrI shag ru raM na ga tsit+ta traM/_ma ma yong za/_'gram ha hi/_yo ge sha la dza dzaH/_zer/_de ltar 'bod sngags nyer gnyis kyis/_/rgyu phyogs ye shes spyan drangs bstim/_/dmar gtor ling ga bcas pa de/_/dgra bor bsam la sngags de la/_/b+ha ling ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/_zhes pa btags la dbul bar bya/_/de nas sngags rgod nyer gnyis pa/_/zhag 'dun bar du bzlas par bya/_/de tshe brnye a tsa ra/_/dngos sam rmi lam nyid du 'ong /_/thag 'tsheg 'od 'byung sgo brdung sogs/_/cho 'phrul sna tshogs ci byung yang /_/sems yin sems nyid nam mkha' 'dra/_/ gdod nas skye med ngang la gzhag_/'jigs skrag mi bya bsgom bzlas bya/_/de nas zhag ni bcu bzhi ru/_/dgra bo yod na gsod sngags bzlas/_/\u0f00 a kro te ka hri shag ru raM/_ma ma yong za/_'gram ha he ke sha la che ge mo'i snying la rbad dza dza/_zhes bzlas dgra bo bsad dang gzir/_/rdul phran cha shas tsam med par/_/gza' mchog khros pas zos par bsam/_/de ltar zhag grangs nyeRa gcig tu/_/lta ba ma yengs sgom bzlas brtson/_/thang lhod med par bsgrim lte bsgrub/_/de yis su yin pha rol sgrol/_/ji ltar 'gor yang zla ba gcig_/ nges par 'grub par gdon mi za/_/de nas las sbyor bstan pa ni/_/dgu stong nyi ma nub mtshams la/_/rang kha lho nub mtshams bltas la/_/skyer pa se ba gru gsum du/_/'brub khung steng rtsig gza' bskyed la/_/me sbar ling ga sbyin bsreg bya/_/gtor ma dbul zhing gtor zor 'phangs/_/thal ba rgya gram 'og tu mnan/_/_/gnas de rang gi gzhi yin na/_/sgrub pa thon pa'i shul de ru/_/ bong dug thar nu spyang tsher dang /_/gu gul nag pos 'brub khung bkru/_/rtsi sman sna tshogs bsres pa'i sa/_/rin po che yi bsres byugs la/_/'brub khung nang du bcug la gzhag_/de yis dug phyung bkra shis so/_/gzhan gnas las kyi rjes bsdu'o/_/yang gcig brtod la gnon pa ni/_/sbrul dang ra rog sha khrag dang /_/nya sha ra tshil pha wang rdo/_/rta nag ra nag khyi nag gi_/snying khrag dkar gsum rtsi sman bcas/_/rta nag thod pa'i nang du gzhug_/rta thod maN+Dal gra ru gzhag_/des ni brtod la non par 'gyur/_/yang cig shi sa bstan pa ni/_/O~M badzra tsaN+Da mahA to Sha na hU~M phaT/_na te pa ti kha dza ke beng ru ru gyi mi sha ya O~M/ myags thum ril rbad yA/_rang srog rang gis gcod pa'i tshul/_/las rnams 'grub par the tshom med/_/skabs su bzlas pas myur du 'grub/_/yang cig zhud kha blang ba ni/_/_/zhud de rtags med dam nyams na/_/bskang bshags mchod pa dag gis mchod/_/'o ma rtsi sman gu gul dkar/_/ra mchin til nag phud kyis mchod/_/des ni myur du 'grub pa yin/_/'jig rten mchod cing bstod pas 'grub/_/de phyir bskang gso mchod gtor ni/_/dus gnyen brgyad dang rgyun du bya/_khyad par nyi shu dgu la 'o/_/des ni the tshom med par 'grub/_/rgyal sras pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis/_/phyogs bzhi'i zab gter chen po bzhi/_/yang zab gza' yi gsang sgrub sbas/_/de dag kun gyi yang zab gnad/_/chig dril dug gi spu gri ni/_dri med 'od zer bdag gis bkod/_/phyi rabs bstan pa bsrung bar shog_/ji ltar bdag gis sgrub pa yi/_/gnad rnams bcud kyi snying po dril/_/'di bas zab pa gzhan med pas/_/gsang zhing sba bas bcang bar bya/_/snying dang 'dra ba'i man ngag 'dis/_/bdag gi zab gter bsrung bar shog_/gza' bdud rwa hu la'i gsang sgrub/_/dug gi spu gri zhes bya ba/_/dpal o rgyan gyi slob dpon pad+mas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis/_/ston gsum gangs ri thod dkar du bkod pa rdzogs so//_//dge'o/_/

[8.42 drang srong gi bstod pa]

@#/_/drang srong gi bstod pa'o/_/ de nas drang srong chen po la bstod pa 'di gsungs so/_/hrIH_khyab mjug chen po sgra gcan 'dzin/_/'jigs pa'i lus la 'bar ba'i klong /_/ 'jig rten khams kyi drag rtsal can/_/sprul pa chen po mi bsrun pa/_/gnam lcags thog gi bdag po ste/_/skyin thang ser ba 'bebs pa'i gtso/_/drang srong chen po rdzu 'phrul can/_/ri rab steng du lha yi gtso/_/rgya mtsho'i steng du klu yi bdag_/bar snang khams su bskyod tsa na/_/lha srin sde brgyad rnams dang bsdongs/_/lus gcig mgo dgu srid gsum gtso/_/mgo gcig lha srin khros pa'i zhal/_/nyi ma zla ba grib mas gnon/_/gcig ni bzhad cing dgod pa'i zhal/_/dgyes pas bka' yi bya ra mdzad/_/gcig ni khros pa srin po'i gdong /_/gdugs pa'i dgra bgegs zas su za/_/gcig ni rngam zhing za byed gdong /_/gnam lcags me yi thogs chen 'bebs/_/gcig ni 'jigs byed ma rungs pa/_/tsha grang 'thab pa'i skan sgra sgrogs/_/gcig ni 'khrugs byed 'jigs pa'i zhal/_/g.yo 'gul chen po'i ser ba 'bebs/_/_/gcig ni gtum byed ye shes zhal/_/mngon shes nus mthu thogs med ston/_/gcig ni las rnams rdzu 'phrul gdong /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa srung bar byed/_/gcig ni zhi ba lha yi zhal/_/sgrub pa po la dngos grub ster/_hrIHkhyod ni chos skyong chen po ste/_/steng gi phyogs na bya rog zhal/_/dkon mchog dbu 'phang bstod par byed/_/rwa yi mda' gzhu bsnams pa ni/_/sdang byed dgra bo sgrol ba'i rtags/_/chu srin zhags pa bsnams pa ni/_/sa bdag klu gnyan 'dul ba'i rtags/_/sku la mig gis gang ba ni/_/phyogs bcur bstan pa skyong ba'i rtags/_khyod ni bdud 'dul chen po ste/_dpal ldan mgon po'i las mkhan mchog_/re ma ti yi pho nya che/_/e ka tsa ti'i bka' sdod de/_/he ru ka yi sprul pa nyid/_/rdo rje 'chang gis dbang bskur nas/_/dkyil 'khor bcug cing dam la btags/_/sring mo gdong mo mched bzhir bcas/_/king kang rngam pa'i las byed ma/_/cho 'phrul 'gyed cing bstan pa bsrungs/_/b+ha ling gtor ma 'di bzhes la/_/bstan pa bshig pa'i dgra bo la/_/thog ser dbab pa'i dus la babs/_/bstan pa bsrung ba'i las mdzod cig_/_/bcol pa'i phrin las grub par mdzod/_/ces gsungs so/_/'di khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud nas drang srong chen po la bstod pa gsungs pa rdzogs so//_// gza' sgrub pa'i gnad yig_/_/rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo//'di sgrub pa'i gnad yig ni/_/gdams ngag gnad thems shin tu gces//rdzas gnad dmigs gnad sngags gnad do/_/_/rdzas ni blo rdo man ngag bzhin/_/ dmigs pa rang nyid rA hu la/_/'jigs pa'i thugs ka k+Sha nag las/_/'od 'phros phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kya/_/thugs ka nyid nas ye shes kyi/_/ gza' bdud spyan drangs bdag la bstim/_/mdun gyi nam mkhar 'brub khung dbus/_/gza' bdud tshon gang gzhung bzhin bskyed/_/'bod sngags nyeRa gcig bzlas pa yis/_/rgyu ba'i phyogs nas gza' byung nas/_/de nyid la ni thim par bsam/_/gtor ma dbul zhing thun rdzas mchod/_/bstod nas 'bod sngags zhag bdun bzlas/_/_/hrI sha_ga ru raM/_nA ga tsit+ta traM/_/_ma ma yong za/ 'gram ha hi/_yo gi sha la dza dza:_de ltar bzlas pas dngos su 'ongs/_/gang 'dod bcol la 'jigs mi bya/_/de nas bsad sngags bzlas pa ni/_/ dmigs pa sngar bzhin 'bod sngags bzlas/_/gtor mchod bstod rjes 'di bzlas so/_/O~M a kro te ka hrI shag ru raM/_ma ma yong za/_'gram ha hi kA la dza dza:_de ltar zhag bdun bar du bsgrubs/_/de nas sngar bzhin gtor ma'i rjes/_/bsad sngags ming dang spel la bsgrub/_/de ltar zhag grangs nyi shu gcig_/song rjes ling ga bsregs pa yi/_/thal ba mnan la gtoRa zor 'phangs/_/des ni the tshom med pa yin/_/shin tu gsang nas bsgrub pa gces/_/klong chen rab 'byams bdag gis ni/_/gter kha du ma'i gnad mthong zhing /_/bla ma'i man ngag bcud dril nas/_/skal ldan don du bris pa yin/_/gnad 'di gzhan la ma bstan cig_/zab/_s+t+r-i_rgya rgya rgya

[8.43 gnod sbyin dmar nag gi sgrub pa me rlung 'khyil ba]

@#/_/gnod sbyin dmar nag gi sgrub pa me rlung 'khyil pa bzhugs so/_/ shog 'dra'i skor/ dngos grub kun gyi rin chen gter/_/pad+ma thod phreng rtsal la 'dud/_/ gnod sbyin dmar nag sgrub pa yi/_/rim pa me rlung 'khyil ba bshad/_/'di la sgrub pa'i rim pa mang yang*/_brten na bkra shis la/_rbad na mthu che ba dril sgrub gsang ba yang gsang yin pas/_de la rten bca' ba/_bsgrub par bya ba/_las phran tshegs bstan pa gsum las/_dang po ni rang gi sgrub khang du stegs bu mda' gang 'brub khung dang bcas pa'i zur bzhir/_'om bu'i mda' bzhi la za 'og dang /_bya rgod kyi sgro can/_dar sna dang rin po che sna tshogs pa mgul du btag pa gzugs/_maN+Dal gyi steng gi nam mkhar 'dzin gtoRa spod dang zas sna dang Rin po ches brgyan pa'i nang du/_'khor dang 'byor pa spel cig_/bgegs dang bar chad srungs shig_/'gal byed cham la phob cig_/ces pa gser gyis bris te gzhug_/de la gnod sbyin gyi tsa ka li gzugs/_/de nyid rgyun du mi gshegs par gzhag go_/'phral gtor ci rigs pa maN+Dal gyi zur du bsham mo/_/rgyun du mi 'bral ba blo rdo'i man ngag la/_dar dmar po'am shog gu la gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bris pa'i lto bar mu khyud rim pa bzhir bskor ba'i phyi ma la/_mthu ser gyi dngos grub stsol cig bris/_de'i nang ma la mi nor zas gsum si ti [(<]a[》]sid+d+hi[) ]pha la ho bri/_de'i nang ma la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la/_e he ma ru tse dgra bgegs thams cad sha tAM mA ra ya phaT bri/_lte ba la drag po'i dngos grub dang /_mi nor zas gsum gyi dngos grub rtsol cig bris pa'i dbus su k+Sha dang /_hri kha sprad pa mtshal gyis gzab mar bri/_dri bzang dang sman sna byugs la/_rdo pha wang long bu'i ngos drug gi gsum la hrI gsum/_gsum la k+Sha gsum bris te/_rab gnas byas nas gril te zangs khab dang bcas pa dar dmar pos gril ba la tshon skud sna lngas re re dkris te/_bya pho mtsha' lu'i snying nang du bcug pa de phyir khug tu bcug la lus la bcang*ngo*/_des ni snying nye bkra shis zas nor dang 'khor 'dab 'phel/_ci bgo ba nyan/_lus dang grib ma ltar 'ong ngo /_/ gnyis pa sgrub pa ni/_sngon 'gro bdag nyid lhar gsal bas/_dngos gzhi gnod sprin bskyed cing sngags bzlas pa/_rjes bstod bskul bya ba dang gsum las/_dang po ni rang nyid pad+ma drag sgrub gang rung du bsgoms nas thugs sngags ci 'grub bzlas so/_/dngos gzhi ni mdun gyi bar snang la gnod sbyin dmar nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/_zangs kyi bya khyung dmar po bcibs pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po ral gri/_'og ma gri gug_/g.yon dang po dgra snying dang bdud zhags/_'og ma b+han+d+ha khrag gis bkang ba 'dzin pa/_ral pa dmar ser gyen du brdzes shing spyan gsum pa/_zhal gdangs pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ thal chen dang zhag gi tshom bu can/_mi lpags kyi g.yang gzhis stod g.yogs pa/_stag gi pags pas smad dkris pa/_me'i tshwa tshwa dang thog ser 'phro ba/ gdong mo bzhi dang lha srin sde brgyad dang /_sha za stong gis bskor bar bsams la/_tshil chen gyi dud pa btang /_thod rnga dang rol mo dkrol nas/ hUM b+h+yoH/_sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la/_/_/he chen brdal ba'i dur khrod du/_/ bsad khrag rba klong dkyil 'khor nas/_/gnod sprin phung byed mthu rtsal can// chibs su zangs kyi bya khyung bcibs/_/'khor du sha za stong gis bskor/_/ gnod sbyin chen po sku bskyod cig_/shan pa dmar nag dam la shog_/e he rma ru tse g+ha na hri tri/_/_gy-i b+h+yoH sha raM b+h+yoH/_phu ru dza g+hi ga_/ha la 'gran ta ya dzaHdza/ zhes pa nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod pas/_lho phyogs kyi dur khrod nas/_rten bskyed pa de la thogs med du byon nas thim par bsams la/_sngags de'i mthar b+ha ling ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/_zhes pa btags pa bdun gyis gtor ma phul nas/ srog gi snying po bzlas pa ni/_e haM shaM tri taM rtsal tri ra gaM sa ma ya dzaHdzaH/_nA ga rA dza kro ta ni/_tri kha thun tri la thun a b+hi shu nA ga rA dza dzaHdzaH/_tri kha thun b+h+yoH/_dgra bgegs mA ra ya rbad/_ces ci 'grub bzlas rjes bstod bskul bya ba ni/_gtor ma sngar bzhin phul la rol mo dbyangs dang bcas pas 'di skad do/_/e he rma ru tse b+h+yoH/_gling bzhi srid pa'i pho brang nas/_phung byed dmar nag gshegs su gsol/_/slob dpon pad+ma'i spyan snga ru/_/bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa'i/_/gnod sbyin chen po gshegs su gsol/_/phyag dang zhabs gnyis bsil mdzad la/_/pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs/_/gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa la/_/dwangs ba'i yid kyis phyag 'tshal zhing /_/phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul/_/'gal 'khrul nyams chag thams cad bshags/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol/_/dgyes pa'i zhal bzang dus 'dir ston/_/bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod/_/ces mchod bstod bya'o/_/de ltar zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig mtshams bcad de bsgrubs pas/ dngos sam rmi lam du rol mo'i sgra dang /_'od dang skye bo mang po 'du ba dang / dpon sku dang /_zhang blon dang /_dge bshes dang /_ban bon gyi tshogs rnams bdag la 'dud pa dang /_nor dang 'bru'i gter rnyed pa ni 'grub pa'i rtags so/_/sngon du sgrub pa'i las 'di kho na gal che'o/_/phyis nas gang 'dod pa 'grub pa yin pas sgrub pa la 'bad par bya'o/_/gsum pa las phran tshegs sgrub pa la/_dgra bsad pa dang /_ngag mnan pa dang /_ser ba dbab pa dang / cho 'phrul gtong ba dang /_sri'u gso ba/_nor sgrub pa dang drug las/_dang po bsad pa ni/_brag dmar gyi phug pa la sogs par/_sa stegs mda' gang gru gsum pa ro sol gyis byugs par/_dgra bo'i ling ga bris te/_dzas mtha' bskor nas/_dgug gzhug bya ste/_khyi thod lcags kyi 'khor khang du bsams par bcug nas/_bdag dang gnod sbyin gyi sgom bzlas sngar dang 'dra ba las/ sngags ni/_e he rma ru tse/_g+hu na hri tri/_b+haM b+h+yoH/_sha raM b+h+yoH/_phu ru dza g+hig_/ha la 'gran ta ya/_gyin ta rbad sod/_su ru snying tse/_a pa laM che ge mo mA ra ya sod/ ra rgyug_ srog la rgyug_/sha la rngam/_dbugs la rngubs/_khrag la 'jibs/ tsig tsig srog la yaM yaM/_zhes bzlas nas/_bstod ba'i rjes la/_gnod sbyin chen po ma rungs pa/_/sha za khrag 'thung stong gis bskor/_/lha srin sde brgyad dmag dpung bcas/_/dgra bo'i steng du da rgyug cig_/rbad kyang phrin las mi byed na/_/_/dam tshig nyams par mi 'gyur ram/_/da dung dgra bo mi gsod na/_/gnod sbyin khyod la ci byung gi_/da lta nyid du sod la shog_/sha zo khrag 'thung snying rtsa phyung /_/bsad rtags don snying khyer la shog_/_/ces rbad la/ bsad sngags de lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye nyung nag dug sna'i thun dang bsdebs la/_ling ga brab pas/_rdul phran du song bar bsam mo/_/de ltar zhag bdun bsgrubs pas rmi lam du don snying 'byin pa dang /_lings byed pa dang /_shing gcod pa la sogs pa rmis dus grub pas/_/ling ga mtshon gyis gtubs la me nang du gnod sbyin bskyod pa'i zhal du phul nas thal ba lam rgya gram gyi 'og tu mnan pas/_las zla ba mi 'gyangs bar 'grub bo/_/de ltar byas kyang ma grub na/_/gnad la dbab pa ni/_gnod sbyin gyi gzugs srog sngags dang bcas pa bris te/_dgug gzhug byas nas/_te lo 'am/_phag thod du bcug la/_rang gi mal 'og tu dong gru gsum brus pa'i nang ro sol byugs/ ro thal bting nas thod pa de gzhag_/sa tshon sna lngas steng g.yogs/_rdo rje rgya gram bris pa'i g.yam pas kha bcad la/_dong lcags khang du bsams pas gnod sbyin bka' nyan par bsam zhing /_rang nyid lhar gsal bas drag sngags bzlas pas/_dgra rtags byung ba dang /_thod pa phyung la sku bton te 'o mas bkrus la bzod par gsol te/_las sbyor byas pas 'grub bo/_/des kyang ma grub na/_sngags kyi sgrom bya ba ni/_oM ka kha ga g+ha nga /_he b+ho rma ru tse g+ha na hri tri tsit+ta hring hring dza/_zhes bzlas pas rtags byung ba dang /_e he rma ru tse g+hu na hrI tri/_hU~M b+h+yoH shaM raM b+h+yoH/_phu ru dza g+hig hal pa 'gran ta yA/_gyin ta rbad sod/_su ru snying tse/_a pa laM mA ra ya sod/_sarba sha tAM che ge mo mAr ya rbad/ ces sngar gyi bsad sngags kyis brab la/_srog gnon gyi las byas pas mi 'grub mi srid do/_/_/ngag gnon ni dug shog la dgra'i ling ga lce lto bar drangs pa'i dbus su rdo rje rgya gram bris pa'i rwa bzhi la/_O~M nan/_A nan/_hUM nan/_stAM b+ha ya nan/_lte bar shr-i bri/_lce'i tha mar che ge mo'i lus ngag yid gsum ste b+ha ya nan bris te/_dug khrag gis byugs la dgug bzhugs byas la/_skud pa phyir bkal gyi tshon skud kyis dkris te/_khyi thod dam lkugs pa'i thod par bcug la/_dug sna dang /_nyung nag gi thun gyis brab cing /_rtsa sngags kyi sham du/_O~M laM nr-i dza/_dgra bo che ge mo'i lus ngag yid gsum ste b+ha ya nan/_a laM mr-i dza hU~M laM mr-i dza/_nA ga sha ya hUM phaT/_ces bzlas te/_nyin mo thun gyis brab/_mtshan mo rang gi mal 'og tu dong gru gsum brus par bcug nas ro g.yam gyis kha bcad bcad la zhag gsum bsgrub nas/_ling ga mal 'og nas phyung ste tshwa tshwa nag po'i zhabs su bcug nas lha khang rnyings pa'i them 'og tu mnan pas/_dgra'i nus pa nyams/_ngag lkugs kho rang gi byad kha kho rang la log nas brlag par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni sngags pa nang 'gras na bya'o/_/ser ba dbab pa ni/_'brub khung gru gsum du/_ro sol dang /_thal chen byugs la/_ra dmar rgya'am wa thod du mu zi nag po/_lcags phye/_dngul rdo/[ ·]nyung nag[ · ]sngo sna/_ser srung gzhi bdag dang bcas pa'i ming bris pa rnams bcug la/_mun par mtshams bcad nas thun gyis brab cing /_e b+h+yoH rma ru tse/_b+hu na d+hIH tri/_phro g+haM b+h+yoH shaM ril su ru phro/_g+hig hril g+han ta phro/_gyin ta su ru/_a pa la phro/_raM raM tri thun/_phro nyig hril rmar stag ling shar lding b+ho/ 'ur ba pr-i pr-i seng 'ur/_dkar thog ling /_dkar bran bcug_/gal bun bun longs/_kA la kA la/_baM hril hril/_shar shar phob ya/_zhes bzlas shing rtags ma byung gi bar du bsgrub/_de nas/_O~M ka kha ga g+ha nga /_he b+ho/_e rma ru tse/_b+hU na shrI tri/_rak+Sha ba sha kha rag dun tri/_tha tri du mA ra ya/_rag sha kha 'dar u thA gzir gzir yA/_lo thog sngon po drongs/_pi pi shar shar/_kha drag rtsa dmar po lang lang /_spur ya/_dam nyams yul du raM raM/_ril ril/_phrom phrom/_king kang drag tu phob ya/_srin pho mo long /_khyug khyug_/'ur 'ur/_hril hril/_shar shar/_b+tso b+h+yoH/_phob phob/_ces bzlas pas/_skam 'brug glog dmar sgrub khang du 'byung zhing rmi lam du rtsas ma brnga ba dang /_gnam sa 'pho 'gyur byed pa dang*/_'ja' 'od 'khyil ba dang /_nyi zla lhungs pa la sogs pa 'ong ngo /_/de nas thun dong gi thod pas nam mkha' ma mthong bar byas la/ dgra'i 'ong sa dang ri zur dang /_yul lha'i rten yod sar thun re sbas nas/ dus gnyan la ser thun 'ong bar 'phangs/_gtor ma btang nas/_b+tso gnod sbyin chen po drag rtsal can/_/sde brgyad kun gyi dmag dpon mdzad/_/srin mo gdong mo mched bzhir bcas/_/ki kang snga ma'i las mdzad kun/_/dam nyams yul du king kang phob/_/gnod sbyin chen po zor ba'i gdong /_/dus la bab bo sa ma ya/_/dgra bo'i lo thog drungs nas phyung /_/thog ser sdang ba'i dgra la phob/_/'bru dang sngo rnams bcud bsdus la/_/rnal 'byor sgrub mchog bdag la stsol/[ ·]ces rbad cing dul mo brdabs pas de'i mod la 'bab nges so/_/cho 'phrul gtong ba ni/_gnod sbyin gyi gzugs spra tshil la las byas pa'i mgo la srin bya'i sgro gzug_/snying khar dgra'i ling ga la/_khyim du ltas ngan sna tshogs dang /_smyo 'bog thong zhig ces pa bris la gzhug_/de wa'i thod par bcug la/_e b+tso ma ru tse/_ra rgyug sham rgyug_/'phrul ting ling ka ni/_d+ha ma dzu ti su tri mun tri/_tre lO kya/_sha ma bu tri/_shad shad b+h+yoH/_ltas ngan sna tshogs dgra la thong /_zhes bzlas pa zhag lngar bsgrubs nas/_dgra po'i grong mthong ba'i ri zur du sbas te/_sa dmar spar gang gtor la/_grong 'dir mi 'di'i khyim du song zhig_/ces lam bstan pas/_'od dang /_me stag dang /_rdo char dang /_smyo 'bog dang /_khang pa rdib pa la sogs pa yong ngo /_babs byed na thod pa nas ling ga bton nas spos chus bkru'o/_/sri 'u gso ba ni/_ma bu'i mal gyi steng du rten gtor la/_mda' 'ug sgro ma'i mgul du gnod sbyin gyi sku dang dar leb rgan btags pa btsugs nas phul/_bstod bskul byas nas/ bu chung 'di srungs shig bya zhing /_gnod sbin gyi skra bris nas/_rtsa sngags bris te dril nas bu chung la btags/_rdzas bsrung la/_gla rtsi shing kun/_mu zi nag po/_za 'og_/spyang brun/_bdud rtsi/_stag gi sder mo/_bya rog gi mgo_/ske tshe/ brag dreg_/rgya tshil/_thal chen/_shi skra/_sgog skya/_sle tres/_ba spru/_rta bon pa/ byi la'i brun rnams rta chil dang bsres la/_phye ma'i thum po lus la btags/ bu chung nyog na de rnams kyi dud pas bdug_/dus bzang la gtor ma btang bas sos nges so/_/nor sgrub pa ni/_sgrub khang du maN+Dal dmar po zla gam gyi steng du/_gtor ma sgrub thabs bzhin bshams/_dar dmar la gnod sbyin gyi sku zhal gcig phyag gnyis phyed skyil can/_g.yas lcags kyu/_g.yon ne'u le 'dzin pa/_/_dar zab dang rin po che'i rgyan gyis spras pa/_pad+ma dang bum pa'i steng na dmar gsal khro 'dzum du bzhugs pa bris pa'i rgyab tu rtsa sngags la mi nor zas gsum gyi dngos grub stsol cig bris pa'i nang du/_rdo pha wang long bu la gser ram pad+ma rak+tas tri drug bris pa la/_rab gnas byas pa de dar zab kyis gril la thod pa mtshan ldan 'bru dang rin po ches bkang ba/_de'i nang du bzhag pa de dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zangs gzhong du gzhug la mchod pas mtha' bskor te/_rang nyid pad+ma'i bsgom bzlas byas rjes/_thod pa rin po che'i gzhal yas khang du bsam pa'i nang du gnod sbyin bris pa ltar bskyed la ye shes pa bstim/_gtor ma btang /_bstod pa byas nas/_rang gi snying ga'i hUM las 'od 'phros/_gnod sbyin gyi thugs ka'i hrIHla phog pas/'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi nor longs spyod thams cad bsdus par bsam la/e he b+ho rma ru tse/_rad na si ti [(<]a[>]sing+g+ha[) ]dza/_g+hu na hri hri/_rad na si ti [(]a[>]sid+na[) ]hUM/_g+haM b+h+yoH/_sh-i rad na si ti dza hUM/_su ru si ti dza hUM/_su ru si ti [(]a[>]sid+d+hi[) ]dza/_g+hig si ti hA~M/_g+ha na ta rad na si ti[(]a[〉]sid+d+hi[) ] dza/ gyin ta a tri nra si ti [(]a[>]sid+d+hi[) ]dza hUM/_a pa lam/_pa shaM ku ru si ti [(<]a[>]sid+d+hi[) ]hU~M dza/_zhes bzlas pas/_/_rin po che'i char babs pa dang / nor rnyed pa dang /_khrom 'du ba dang /_rnga brdung ba dang /_/dung 'bud pa dang*/ 'bru dang longs spyod sdud pa rmi'o/_de nas/_e b+ho rma ru tse a tri nr-i dza/_si ti [(]a[>]sid+d+ha[)]zab mo'i gdams pa bdud rtsi'i sman dang 'dra/_/nyon mongs nad rnams gso ba'i mchog yin pas/_/rgyud la brten cing legs par goms pa yis/_/da lta nyid nas klong du 'gyur bar mdzod/_/pha la rad na kha te hUM dza/_'gul 'gul ma ma hring hring /_ma ma kha shi baM/_a kar sha ya dza/_a kar sha ya hring /_mi 'gram khyogs/_mi snying sgul/_nr-i srog rtsa bring bring /_rbu ril/_y-i y-i/_yid kyi dbang po khug dza/_mi nor zas gsum bdag gi dbang du bsdus shig_/ces pa zhag bdun bzlas pas/_'khor dang 'byor ba phun sum tshogs pa rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rten gyi bla rdo de lus la gdags so/_/'du ba nyung na bla rdo brdar cing /_me'i nang du gnod sbyin bsams te sbyin sreg bya/_gtor ma btang nas/_/_b+tso byang phyogs gnod sbyin gter gyi bdag_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdzes pa'i sku/_/chibs su bya rgyal khyung la bcibs/_/sku mdog dmar po 'od zer can/_/rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras/_/phyag g.yas lcags kyus zas nor 'gugs/_/phyag g.yon ne'i les zas nor ster/_/'khor du gnod sbyin stong gis bskor/_/gter bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la/_/mchod tshogs b+ha ling gtor ma 'bul/_/_/lha 'dre mi gsum dbang du sdus/_/zas nor longs spyod char du phob/_/ci bsam 'grub pa'i dngos grub zhu/_/zhes rol mo dang bcas pa byas pas bsam pa 'grub bo/_/de ltar gnod sbyin dmar nag sgrub pa yi/_/rim pa gsal bar bshad des bsod nams kyis/_/ma lus re ba yid bzhin rdzogs pa'i dpal/_/yon tan 'byor ba mtha' yas yongs gang shog_/gnod sbyin dmar nag gi gsang sgrub me rlung 'khyil pa zhes bya ba/_rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis bkod pa rdzogs so//_//bkra shis/

[8.44 shan pa srog sgrub nag mo'i gsang sgrub]

@#/_/shan pa srog sgrub nag mo'i gsang sgrub bzhugs so/_/ shog 'dra'i skor/ shan pa srog sgrub nag mo'i gsang sgrub dug mda' nag mo zhes bya ba/_'jigs pa'i ma mo 'bum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shan pa smug nag mi bsrun ma/_/skra yi lan bus nam mkha' khyab/_/sgrol ging chen mo la btud de//de yi gsang sgrub bshad par bya/_/brag nag srin mo khros 'dra 'am/_/ nags rong mon mo khros 'dra bar/_/stegs bu khru gang la sogs par/_/ro sol dug khrag chag chag gdab/_/dbus su gru gsum mu khyud dmar/_/phyi rim rtsibs bzhi mthing nag ste/_/de phyir thod phreng rdo rje'i phreng /_/sgo dang rta babs ldan par bri/_/de mtha' me ri 'bar ba 'o/_/steng du khams sa'i dgra gzugs kyi/_/snying gar ling ga bcug pa'i steng /_/ma mo'i dpal gtor zur gsum la/_/dgra yi ling ga gzugs par bya/_/dpral bar rus la snying gar ming /_/'doms su bla dwags bris pa yi/_/_/tha ma bsad pa'i sngags kyis bskor/_/gzhan yang bla ma chos skyong dang*/_/yul lha gzhi bdag gtor ma bsham/_/de nas stong pa'i ngang nyid las/_/gnam sa mi dmigs mun pas 'khrigs/_/'jigs pa'i lcags khang sgo med du/_/me yi 'od stong 'bar ba'i gnas/_/dgra bgegs mi thar btson dong gsal/_rang nyid pad+ma thod phreng rtsal/_/'jigs byed khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsam/_/mdun gyi dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa ru/_/gsod byed nag mo chu gri bsnams/_/glo snying zhal gsol khrag 'dzag cing /_spyan gsum ral pas gnam sa khyab/_/mche gtsigs mtshon cha'i mi 'od 'phro/_/_/srid pa'i rlung zhon nad rims gtong /_/sma ra dmar ser 'bar bar bsgom/_/g.yas na sha za lce spyang gdong /_/ro la zhon nas dgra snying za/_g.yon na nag mo wa gdong ma/_phyag gnyis zhags pa gri gug thogs/_/mdun na nag mo 'ug gdong ste/_/rgyab na srid pa'i sha za 'bum/_/mtshon cha sna tshogs zor 'phen bsam/_/thun ni nyung nag gri khrag gis/_/ling ga brab pas ma mo yis/_/dgra bo bsad par bsam nas ni/_/ sngags 'di ma yengs bzlas shing brab/_/O~M khyi kha le nag mos sod/_srog ma tri sod/_snying kha khya [(]a[>]kha[) ]baM/_ya ya sod/_tsa wa bi ri mu sod g+ha ya sod/_Ni ya sod/_rak+mo tsit+ta rbad/_de ltar zhag bdun song rjes la/_/rtags ni dgra la sna tshogs 'byung /_/de nas sngags de'i mjug de la/_/rag mo rag mo ma gzir nan/_khams khug drongs che ge mo'i tsit+ta la rbad sod ya/_de bzlas rang la tshig pa za/_/rmugs dang rgyag snying 'dod pa dang /_/rmi lam bud med mtshan ma ston/_/de tshe 'og ma gcig pu bzla/_/de nas glo snying mgo khyer nas/_/lan gsum byung dus gtor zor 'phangs/_/'brub khung tsher ma'i me sbar la/_/ma mo 'khor bcas kha gdangs bskyed/_/ling ga dgra dngos bsams la 'bul/_/de yis the tshom med par 'grub/_/gal te 'gyangs shing rtags med na/_/'bod rbad mtha' nas ldog byas la/_/bsad sngags drag [(]a[》]btags[)]la bsgrub par bya/_/sod mos nag le kha khyi O~M/_srog ma tri sod/_snying kha kha b+haM/_ya yA sod/_tsa ba bi ri mu sod/_g+ha ya sod/_Ni ya sod/_rag mo tsit+ta rbad rbad tsi mo rag_/sarba duny+nyaM che ge mo sha traM mA ra ya rbad/ de yis nges par 'grub pa yin/_/des kyang 'grub par ma gyur na/_/'bod rbad mgo gsham ldog pa la/_/bsad sngags rbad sngags btags la bsgrub/_/ de yis the tshom med pa yin/_/gzhan yang 'grub par dka' ba na/_u ne u ne hUM phaT/_de ni sngags kyi mgor btags shing /_myags thum ral rbad/_a a/ i I/_u U/_'di ni sham bu btags la bzlas/_/de yis gsod cing cho 'phrul 'byung /_/rtsa ba'i sgrub thabs bstan pa'o/_/de yi gnad yig ni/_rdzas gnad na chung nal phrug gam/_lug nag bya nag snying nang du/_dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bri/_/rtsibs brgyad mu khyud gsum pa la/_/rtsibs la rtsa sngags bri bar bya/_/mu khyud ma mo'i spyi sngags bri/_/lte bar ma b+h+yoH gzab tu bri/_/rgyab tu rten 'brel snying po bri/_/rab gnas byas la lus la bcangs/_/skabs su klad la bskor zhing brdab/_/_/de yis bran bzhin las byed 'gyur/_/dus gnad rgyu dus bstan pa ni/_/tshes gcig skya rengs dang po nas/_/nyi shar yan chad gtso mo rgyu/_/'byung ba shing gi khams yin no/_/nyi ma dros nas nyin phyed bar/_/g.yas kyi srog gcod rgyu dus te/_/'byung ba me yi khams yin no/_/ grib chung lhags nas bya gdang bar/_/g.yon gyi srog gcod rgyu dus te/_/ 'byung ba lcags kyi khams yin no/_/sa srod nam phyed tshun chad la/_/mdunagyi srog gcod rgyu dus te/_/'byung ba chu yi khams yin no/_/nyi shar phyed yol sa sros nas/_/nam phyed yol dus rnams su ni/_/gtso 'khor srung mar bcas pa rgyu/_/'byung ba sa yi khams yin no/_khams gshed gnad yig bstan pa ni/_/ sgrub dus 'brub khung ling ga la/_/rang nyid tshes gcig gtso mo'i dus/_/shing las grub pa'i gtso mor bskyed/_/ling ga shing gi phur pas mnan/_dgra bo dgug gzhug ling ga sa/_/shar phyogs kha bltas rtsa sngags mthar//che ge mo'i srog las mA ra ya thun b+h+yoH/_rag mo Ni sha ku ru lu thaM rbad/_rag mo kha la tsa thun b+h+yoH/[ · ]rak+ta thun rbad/_tsa la tsa la thun b+h+yoH/_rtsa tsit+ta rbad/_snying la dun/ rag mo kha la tsa thun b+h+yoH/_ti tha baM ril sa ma ya thun b+h+yoH/_dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya thun b+h+yoH/_zhes bzlas shing gi phur pa gdab/_g.yas kyi ma mo rgyu dus su/_/rang nyid me las ma mo'i sku/_/ling ga lcags su bskyed byas te/_/drag po'i me 'gal thun gyis brab/_/thun sngags ram du bsgyur la bzlas/_/ g.yon gyi ma mo rgyu dus su/_/rang nyid lcags kyi ma mor bskyed/_/ling ga shing las grub par bskyed/_/mi bsad mtshon lcags drag thun gdab/_/thun sngags su du bsgyur la bzlas/_/mdun gyi ma mo rgyu dus su/_/rang nyid chu yi ma mor bsgom/_/ling ga me las grub par bskyed/_/drag thun dug chus brab par bya/_/thun sngags baM du bsgyur la bzlas/_/dus gzhan rnams su gzhung bzhin bya/_/_/rgyu ba'i phyogs dang bstun pa ru/_kha lta /_na zor ma chad gces/_dgra bo'i khams de rgyus yod na/_/rgyun du de yi gshed thun brab/_/rgyu dus lus sbrid skyi zing 'jigs/_/nges pa'i dus yin bstun par bya/_/_/mo mo'i ngan sngags gshor la gtad/_/gnad kyi yang snying mthar thug yin/_/cho 'phrul gnad yig bstan pa ni/_/ma traM snying khar brub khung bca'/_/dbus su gtor ma ling ga gzhag_/sha'am snying ngam rus pa la/_/phung sa khrag sbyar lce spyang mgo_/dmar mo lag na ltas ngan ni/_/spre'u 'ug pa la sogs thogs/_/de yi snying khar k+Sha yi ge_/tha mar ltas ngan thong zhig bri/_/gshin rje wa gdong nag mo yi/_/gzugs bya snying khar yi ge bri/_/srog gcod sha za nag mo ni/_/'ug gdong yi ge phyag mtshan 'dra/_/ma traM mgo zur gnod sbyin mo/_/g.yas zur gshin rje g.yon zur du/_/bdud mo'i gzugs gzhag gtong ma'i rtser/_/lha mo'i gzugs bris gzugs par bya/_/rtsa ba'i sngags la 'di btags bzlas/_/he tsa dun po ba la/_de bzlas rang la cho 'phrul 'ongs/_/de nas ma traM lha dang gzugs/_/dgra yod phyogs su kha bsgyur la/_/rgyab nas thun gyis brab bya zhing /_/gang la rbad sngags btags byas nas/_/'di la 'di btags bzlas pa bya/_che ge mo tsa he dang phaT ya/_zhes bzlas bskur zhing sngags kyis gzir/_gal te ma nyan ldog la bzlas/_des ni dgra la ltas ngan ni/_/ji ltar rbad pa de ltar 'ongs/_/snga ma'i las mjug mnan pa ni/_/sgrub pa thon dus sngar brtsams pa'i/_/ling ga sbyin sreg gong bzhin bya/_/thun gyis ling ga 'brub khung gzhug_/drag po'i thun brab g.yam pas bkab/_/klu yi thebs dus ling ga dang /_dri chen drod ma yal ba dang /_/dkar gsum mngar gsum sbal nag khrag_/rdza yi ga'u kha sbyar ni/_/dgra bo'i khams gshed kha dog can/_/de nang rdzas dang sdig pa gzhug_/ga 'u'i steng la rdo rje ni/_/rgya gram lte bar che ge nan/_/rwa bzhir O~M nan AHnan dang /_/hUM nan stAM b+ha nan bris la/ pha wang brun dang dme pho'i chus/_/byugs la dgra bo'i khams de brtags/_/ shing khams yin na klu gnas sar/_/mnan zhing sa tshon sna lngas bskor/_/me khams yin na chu mig rtsar/_/sa khams shing gcig drung du mnan/_/chu khams sa gnyan sba bar bya/_/de ltar mnan pa'i 'bras bu ni/_/rab la mnan dus de ru 'chi/_/'bring la zla ba gcig yin te/_/tha ma zla ba gsum na nges/_/phyi dus zla ba bzhi nges yin/_/de tshe rtags ni ma byung na/_/sa der lha 'dre med pas na/_/sgrub pa mi dgos thun drug go_/lan gsum bskyar la mnan par bya/_/de yang gnyen sa gsum bzhir bya/_/de yis the tshom med par 'grub/_/ dang po sgrub pa gcig thems nas/_/rtag tu sgrub pa byed mi dgos/_/nyin zhag phrugs gcig thun drug ni/_/byas nas mnan pa gcig pus 'grub/_/'di ltar dang po sgrub pa de/_/_/lan cig grub nas nam dgos dus/_/nyin zhag gcig gis thun drug 'bad/_las mjug mnan pas 'grub pa yin/_/de yang klu gnyan gnas sa ni/_/nges par dgos pas de ru byed/_/de yis myur du 'grub par yin/_/_/sgrub par byed pa'i dus su yang /_/_/skabs su dmaRa gtor btang byas la/_/'jigs pa'i skul 'dis bskul bar bya/_/b+tso mkha' 'gro nag mo mi bsrun ma/_/sha za khrag mig srin mo'i gdong /_/'jigs pa'i gzugs can mkha' 'gro'i gtso/_/sku mdog nag mo char sprin mdog_/phyag na gsod pa'i mtshon cha bsnams/_/chibs su srid pa'i rlung la bcibs/_/ ral pa mtshon cha sha ra ra/_/gcer bu mi lpags stod la dkris/_/mi yi glo snying zhal du ni/_/dmar mo khrag 'dzag rgyun du gsol/_/zhal nas khrag 'dzag kyu ru ru/_/spyan gsum khro gnyer mche ba gtsigs/_/sma ra mtshon cha me ltar 'a bar/_/shangs nas 'tshubs ma mtshon char 'gyed/_/kha spu mtshon cha me ltar 'bar/_/mi mgo rlon pa'i do shal can/_/gsod byed ma mo chen mo la/_/dgra bo'i sha khrag gtor ma 'bul/_/g.yas na gsod byed sha za mo/_/dmar mo sha za ce spyang gdong /_/ro la zhon nas sha la za/_/rkan brdab dgra bo'i mig 'bras 'brul/_/lcags sder mtshon chas dgra snying 'byin/_/_/dmar mo khrag 'dzag zhal du gsol/_/g.yon na nag mo wa yi gdong /_/pa spu mtshon cha spu gri'i so/_/reg pa tsam gyis mgo lus bregs/_/phyag na zhags pa gri gug thogs/_/lus chings srog rtsa dmar po chod/_/_/sha za khrag 'thung keng rus mur/_/mdun na srog gcod sha za stong /_/nag mo 'ug gdong gnam lcags sder/_khrag gi ral pa mtshon cha'i sder/_/mtshon sder dgra yi snying la 'debs/_/gnam lcags mchu yis srog rtsa gcod/_/skad cig stong gsum nyul byed ma/_/rkan rdeb srid gsum snying khrag 'brul/_/stong gsum za zhing srid gsum 'thung /_/sha za khrag 'thung 'bum gyis bskor/_/_/sha za dpon g.yog 'khor dang bcas/_/'dir byon nag mo las mkhan ma/_/dgra bo'i sha khrag gtor ma 'bul/_/dgra bo sgrol ba'i dus la babs/_/rgyal ba'i bka' las ma 'da' bar/_/dam nyams sha zo khrag la 'thung /_/bcol pa'i phrin las myur du sgrubs/_/zhes pas bstod cing bskul bar bya/_/skabs su mo rgyud gnad 'bebs bzlas/_kha thaM mu kha thaM/_ma rag sha khu/_ma ril ma ril ma mo b+tso/_/_'dis ni mo rgyud las la khol/_/_/zhag re brgya rtsa bzlas pas 'grub/_/kun gyi zab don gnad dril nas/_/dug mda' nag mo gtan la phabs/_/e ma snying tig gsang ba'i bka'/_/yang zab bsrung ba'i don byed shan pa srog sgrub nag mo'i gsang sgrub/du/_/shan pa nag mo'i sgrub thabs 'di/_/ston gsum gangs ri thod dkaRa du/_/dri med 'od zer bdag gis bkod/_/dge bas bstan pa 'phel bar shog/shan pa srog sgrub nag mo'i sgrub thabs dug mda' nag mo zhes bya ba/ pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul o rgyan rdzong du bkod pa rdzogs so/_/b+ha wan+tu//_//

[8.45 mkha' 'gro yang tig gi them byang dpag bsam ljon shing]

@#/_/mkha' 'gro yang tig gi them byang dpag bsam ljon shing bzhugs pa lags so/_/ them byang dpag bsam ljon shing zhes bya ba/_dpal don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zab cing rgya che ska lnga lhun gyis grub/_/yon tan phrin las 'dod ster rol pa can/_/_/rang byung chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas la/_/bdag gzhan dus rnams kun tu phyag 'tshal lo/_/de yi yum chen mkhar chen mtsho rgyal ni/_/rdo rje phag mo sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/_/mkha' 'gro dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs bcas la/_/dus rnams kun tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/zab cing rgya che dkar shog sdong po la/_/gdams khrid snying po shog 'dra'i yal 'dab rgyas/_/yang zab shog ser me tog 'bras bu can/_/mkha' 'gro yang tig dngos grub ljon shing spro/_/de la dbang gi ma bu'i grangs bstan pa/_/sngon 'gro yid ches khungs btsun shes bya'i phyir/_/gter 'byung lo rgyus rin chen sgron me dang /_/nyams chag sdig sgrib dam tshig skong dang ni/_/dngos grub kun 'byung mkha' 'gro'i brda dbang dang /_/dngos gzhi dbang bzhi byin rlabs bla ma'i dbang /_/rgyud la smin grol nus pa 'jug phyir te/_/rig pa'i rtsal dbang snang srid chos skur 'char/_/mkha' 'gro'i don dbang dngos grub chu bo 'grub/_/_/rdo rje slob dpon gzhan phan phrin las mchog_/_/bstan pa'i srog shing gzug phyir gzhan bka' dang /_/gtad rgya'i byin rlabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud/_/bka' bsgos ma sring dam can las la khol/_/de yi cha lag legs par bstan pa yang /_/rang nyid dbang dang gdams pa dag bya'i phyir/_/bdag 'jug pad+ma klong yangs bzang po dang /_/lag len bstan phyir tshogs mchod rgya mtsho'i sprin/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs ldan/_/de ltar ma dgu bu ni rnam pa drug_/rtsa ba'i sde tshan rnam pa bzhir bsdus pas/_/rin chen dbang gi phreng ba legs par tshang /_/de dag rnams ni zab cing rgya che bas/_/rin chen dkar shog ngos la legs par mnan/_/ bka' yi rgyas btab phyi rabs don du bstan/_/smin cing grol bar byed pa bskyed rdzogs te/_/de yi gdams ngag ma bu'i grangs bstan pa/_/gsang sngags zab mo byin rlabs bla ma'i lam/_/de phyir gsol 'debs dri med zla rgyas dang /_/bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun rnam pa gnyis su bstan/_/lam la 'jug pa'ang rim pas bslab pa'i phyir/_khrid du bsdebs te nyams su blang ba ni/_/ dang po'i babs tshul cig char 'jug pa'i phyir/_/nor bu'i lugs te phreng ba rtsar brgyus 'dra/_/skal ldan skyes bu khrid tshar gcig thob pas/_/mkha' spyod grol phyir nyi zla gza' skar lugs/_/de dag rim pa mi 'gyur gzer gdab phyir/_/zab mo rab 'byed don gyi chings su bstan/_/ji ltar khrid tshul rab tu rgyas pa ni/_/rin chen gser phreng skal ldan snying po'i bcud/_/dbang khrid sngon du tshogs chen rdzogs bya'i phyir/_/rig pa khyad par can gyi tshogs bsags dang /_/de ltar ma gsum bu ni rnam pa bzhis/_/rim bgrod khrid kyi yi ge tshang bar bstan/_/'di dag yang zab gnad de dkon pas na/_/rin chen shog 'dra'i ngos la legs par btab/_/dbang khrid dag gi rgyab chos bstan pa ni/_/stong pa khrigs chod chos sku lam khyer dang /_/snang ba thod rgal gzugs sku lam du byed/_/de dag cha rkyen zab don sna tshogs gsum/_/so sor phye nas go rim nges pa'i don/_/dum dang ma bu'i grangs su bstan pa lags/_khregs chod rgyab yig nam mkha' skor gsum las/_/nam mkha' rab 'byams lta ba bya rtsol med/_/nam mkha' klong yangs sgom pa blo las 'das/_/nam mkha' dri med spyod pa blang dor med/_/gdod ma'i ngang du gnyis med la bzla 'o/_/thod rgal rgyab yig 'od gsal gnad bzhi la/_/gser gyi sgrom bus gnad rnams mdor dril zhing /_/rin chen mdzod kyi dbye ba rgyas par bshad/_rgya mtsho sprin gyis shin tu rgya che ba/_/rnam grangs ma lus yongs su rdzogs par bstan/_/sa bcud bsdus don nyi ma'i 'od zer yang yod/_de yi bogs 'byin gnad bsdus gces pa'i 'gag_/gsang spyod rdo rje lam bstan snying dang 'dra/_/de ltar ma dang bu gnyis sde tshan bdun/_/rin chen shog skyar bkod nas snang bar byas/_/de dag kun gyi snying po'i bcud phyung ba/_/zab mo'i yang zab mkha' 'gro snying gi snying /_/snying la babs pas snying gi khrag lta bu/_/shin tu yang zab bstan par phangs na yang /_/mkha' 'gro'i bkas gnang skal ldan snying gi bu/_/phyi rabs 'ga' tsam 'byung zhes lung bstan pas/_/de yi don phyir ma bu'i grangs bstan pa/_/shin tu spros pa med pa'i gang zag rnams/_/smin byed dbang dang grol byed khrid bstan pa/_/nges don snying po ra ba gsang yi ge dang /_/rgyal sras bla ma'i dngos grub thob byed pa/_/byin rlabs thugs sgrub shin tu zab mo dang*/_/tshe gcig rig 'dzin lam la gnas byed pa/_/rig 'dzin mchog sgrub rab tu gsang ba dang /_/mchog dang thun mong dngos grub myur bsgrub pa/_/mkha' 'gro'i bskyed rim yid bzhin nor bu dang rdzogs rim rlung drug rdo rngo'i chings yang yod/_/rlung las 'od gsal skad cig 'grub byed pa/_/rlung sbyor ye shes dra ba dam pa dang /_khams kyis 'chi med 'od gsal rab 'grub phyir/_/zab lam bde chen rgya mtsho zhes bya dang /_/gsang ba zab mo'i rdzogs rim mngon byung ba/_ye shes 'od gsal 'khor lo'i rim pa dang /_/gdod ma'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_/gzhi snang ngo sprod rab tu gsang ba dang /_/mngon sum snying po'i bcud phyung dril ba ni/_/'od gsal sbubs 'jug snying gi man ngag dang /_/snang rig ye shes mngon du 'byin byed pa/_/sgron ma bzhi skor mig ltar gsal ba dang /_/gang yang lam gyur 'od gsal mdor gcig pa/_/'khrul snang gzhi grol rab tu gces pa dang /_/bag chags nyon mongs myur du 'gog byed pa/_/rmi lam 'od gsal sbubs 'jug gdams pa dang*/_/sems nyid gsang ba'i rang bzhin mngon phyung ba/_/gdod ma'i dbyings snang ngo sprod gsang ba dang /_/gang dang mi 'dra gnad rnams mthar thug pa/_/zab don gnad kyi lde mig gsang ba dang /_/ mngon sum don la yid ches ma nor lam/_/'od gsal pra khrid ri chen gsal ba dang /_/nyin mtshan bar do'i gces pa kun dril ba/_/gsang lam ngo sprod snying po'i mthar thug dang /_/nor dang 'phyugs med gnad rnams dril ba'i 'gag_/zab don snying po man ngag gsang ba dang /_/dpe don rtags kyi ngo sprod gsal ba'i lam/_/kun 'dus rin chen gsang ba'i ngo sprod dang /_/ shin tu yang zab snying po'i bcud dril ba/_/bar do sbubs 'jug man ngag snying po dang /_/nyams len gnad kyi gdams pa mthar thug pa/_/bar do gnad kyi sgron me zhes bya dang gnad gsum sgron me yang yod/_/zab gter babs lugs ngo mtshar yid ches don/[ · ]mthong snang rin chen 'od kyi dra bas bstan/_/phyi rabs don du zab mo'i snying gtam tshul/_/zhal chems dri med 'od kyis legs par gdamasazhal chems gnad kyi me long dang mthar thug gcig ma yang yod/_/de ltar ma bcu bu ni bcu bzhi yis/_/mkha' 'gro'i gdams pa shog seRa snying po tshang /_/ gnad kyi yang gnad mchog tu gsang ba'i gnad/_/ches gsang rmad du byung ba'i snying po 'di/_/gang dang mi 'dra kun gyis mi rtogs pa/_/bla ma mkha' 'gro'i thugs bcud snying po 'di/_/bdag gi snying ste rab tu phangs pas rin chen shog ser ngos la bkod pa ni/_/bla ma'i bka' rgya mkha' 'gro'i gter rgya dang /_/bka' srung dam rgya bden pa'i smon lam rgya/_/zab mo'i gnad rgya rgya lngas rgyas btab nas/_/snying dang 'dra ba'i bu mchog skal che ba/_/ bla ma la gus shes rab snying brtser ldan/_/sgrub la brtson zhing dam tshig gtsang ba dang*/_tshe 'di blos btang mkha' 'gro'i mtshan rtags can/_/rang dang 'dra ba gcig nas gcig brgyud bya/_/mang por mi spel des kyang gcig la brgyud/_/de yang lo gsum bar du brtags nas sbyin/_/bla ma mkha'a'agros lung bstan ma byung na/_/rdzogs par mi sbyin snying la sa mA ya/_/gnad res kyang ni tshe gcig grol ba'i chos/_/rin chen shog ser kho bo'i snying gi snying // phyi rabs skal ldan dam pas gces par zung /_/'di 'dra'i gdams pa yang gsang snying po'i don/_/lo gsum nyams blangs 'od lus 'grub byed pa/_/ 'dzam bu'i gling na dkon pa'i rin po che/_mkha' 'gro'i gsang tshig dam pa yin pas na/_/gcig pur nyams longs sgrub pa mtha' ru skyol/_/rang 'tshengs gzhan 'tshengs thams cad rdzogs sangs rgya/_/de phyir snying bas gces par 'di zung la/_/_/yang mdzod dmar po'i nang du rgyas thob cig_/ rigs lnga'i gsang sgrub pad+ma stong ldan la/_/phyi nang gsang ba yang gsang bzhis tshang/_/de yis gtso bor rang bzhin sprul sku 'grub/_/rigs lnga'i bcud len bdud rtsi'i thigs pa la/_/snying po lnga dang gces pa'i gnad lnga ste/_/yang zab chig dril legs par bstan pa ni/_/sa yi bcud len bdud rtsi yang zhun dang /_/chu yi bcud len bde chen rgya mtsho dang /_/me yi bcud len bde drod rang 'bar dang /_/rlung gi bcud len dpag bsam ljon shing dang /_/nam mkha'i bcud len ye shes gsang 'khor te/_/mchog dang thun mong dngos grub myur du 'grub/_/gegs sel nad 'don bdud rtsi sprin phung la/_/'khor lo lnga yis phyi nang bar chad sel/_/'chi ba brtags bslu nyi zla gza' bral la/_/dum bu gnyis kyis rnal 'byor don chen 'grub/_/btags grol man ngag rin chen snying po yis/_/de nyid don shes rang gzhan phan pa 'grub/_/bcu drug phran bu ma bzhi sde tshan lngar/_/rin chen shog 'dra'i ngos la bkod pa yin/_/de dag rnams kyi cha rkyen yan lag tu/_/rgyud gzhan dag la bltos pa med pa'i phyir/_/gzhan don phrin las sgrub pa'i rim pa yang*/_/ sreg sbyong cho ga 'od kyi snye ma yis/_/_/tshe 'das sku gdung ji ltar bzhu ba bstan/_/gzhan phan 'od kyi 'khor lo bzang po yis/_/_/bar do'i 'gro ba rnams la phan gdags bshad/_/de yi gnad yig phyag rgya bzhi mchod kyis/_/ lag len gnad yig ma tshang kha skong bstan/_/mchod rten rab gnas rin chen dra ba yis/_/tshwa tshwa'i sgo nas tshogs bsag sgrib sbyong bstan/_/rab gnas cho ga ye shes dri med kyis/_/sku gsung thugs rten rab tu gnas pa bshad/_/ mthong snang gser gyi dra ba mig lta bus/_/nyams rtogs gnad dang babs tshul la/_/ngo mtshar yid ches rmad byung bskyed pa bstan/_/de ltar ma gsum bu gsum sde tshan drug_/rin chen dkar shog bzang po'i ngos la mnan/_/phyi rabs skal ldan dam pa'i rigs can rnams/_/rang gzhan don du spyod cig sa ma ya/_/de ltar zab chos snying po'i bstan pa 'di/_/mi nub bsrung phyiRa drag sngags mtshon cha yang*/_/bka' bsrung sgrub sde so so'i rgyud gzhung las/_/yang zab gnad rnams btus te bstan pa ni/_/slob dpon gsang yum rdo rje g.yu sgron mas/_/rnal 'byor bsam pa yid bzhin bsgrubs pas na/_/de yi sgrub thabs zla ba 'dod 'jo la/_/phyi nang gsang gsum mchog tu zab pa'i gnad/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po 'dra ba bshad/_/ 'jig rten khams na rdzu 'phrul mthu rtsal can/_/kun gyi mchog gyur drang srong chen po ste/_/snying nye bkra shis dngos su mthu rtsal 'byung /_/de phyir de 'dra kun las 'phags pas na/_/_/slob dpon chen po'i bka' bsrung gtso bo yin/_/de yi gsang sgrub dug gi spu gri bstan/_khyad par gza' bdud khyab mjug mig dmar ni/_/sngon byung slob dpon mched yin drag rtsal can/_/ snang srid sil bur gtong ba'i mthu mnga' ba/_/chos 'di'i bka' bsrung gnyen po gsang ba ste/_/de yi sgrub thabs me rlung 'khyil pa bstan/_/kun dang mi 'dra gsang ba'i ma mo ni/_/kun tu bzang mo'i thugs kyi sprul pa ste/_/e ka tsa ti khros pa'i rnam 'phrul mchog_/srog sgrub nag mo shan pa mi bskrun ma/_/ chos 'dis phyir na lus dang grib ma bzhin/_/'bral ba med pa rgyun du bsrungs bas na/_kun bzang mkha' 'gro ma mo nyid sprul nas/_/zab chos skyong mdzad gter srung mnga' gsol ba/_/slob pon chen pos bka' bsgos bzhag pa'i phyir/_/mchog tu gnyan zhing sgrub pa po la brtse/_/de phyir de yi sgrub thabs gsang ba ni/_/dug mda' nag po zhes bya rab tu bkod/_/'di dag rnams ni 'jigs pa'i gnam lcags 'dra/_/dam tshig ldan la sgrub thag shin tu nye/_/chos 'di'i yi ge gang yod 'di gnas pas/_/ma bsgrubs kyang ni rtag tu srung skyob byed/_/de phyir mchod gtor rgyun du bya ba gces/_khyad par dus gnyan bskang gso mchod par bya/_/tshe dang nor phyug snyan grags skye bo 'du/_/gegs rnams med cing bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub/_/phran gsum bu ste ma bzhi sde tshan bzhi/_/rin chen shog 'dra'i ngos la legs par bkod/_/ de ltar yang zab chos kyi rnam grangs kun/_/yongs su dril ba'i chings kyi gal mdo la/_/rin chen dkar shog ma bu bcu dgu yang /_/rtsa ba'i sde tshan bcu bdun dag tu bsdus/_/rin chen shog 'dra ma bu sum cu yang /_/rtsa ba'i sde tshan bcu drug dag tu bsdus/_/rin chen shog ser ma bcu bu bcu gsum/_/so sor dbye na nyi shu rtsa gsum mo/_/them byang gnyis dang bsdams pas bdun cu gsum/_/mkha' 'gro yang tig gsang ba'i debs su bstan/_/phyi rabs snying gi bu gcig ma gtogs pa/_/gzhan la mi bstan mkha' 'gro'i bka' rgya yod/_/e ma ho/_rang byung sprul sku pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis/_/bod yul dbus su zab gter sbas pa la/_/lho ru bskyed rdzogs 'dril ba sdong po'i skor/ nub tu gsal ba me tog kha bye 'dra/_/byang du rgyas pa yal 'dab chen po la/_/ shar du legs smin 'bras bu bcud du dril/_/dbus su zug pa rtsa ba'i skor lnga las/_/'di ni mthar thug 'bras bu'i gter kha ste/_/dgongs gter snying po snying tig mngon sum lam/_tshe gcig 'bras bu 'od lus 'grub par byed/_/de phyir 'di 'dra'i zab gter gzhan na med/_/deng song tshe lo lnga bcu kha ral dus/_/snga ma'i tshe la dngas lung brag ngos nas/_chu mo glang lor shog ser sgo phye ste/_/_/rjod byed tshig gi cha tsam dbang bar byas/_/deng song thod rgal longs sku'i zhing nyul dus/_/shing mo yos la mchims phur dgongs gter babs/_/brjod bya'i don rnams ma lus snying la shar/_/bla ma mkha' 'gros dngos su byin brlabs pas/_/tshig don 'dres med gsang ba'i yi ge rnams/_/rgyal sras bla ma nyid dang mtshungs pas na/_/yi ge 'di rnams gces pas snying la phur/_/dge ba 'di yis ma lus 'gro ba kun/_/tshe gcig 'od lus dam pa rab 'grub nas/_/phyam gcig rang bzhin gdod ma'i sar grol te/_/rang gzhan don gnyis lhun gyis grub par shog_/mkha' 'gro yang tig gi them byang dpag bsam ljong shing zhes bya ba/_/rang byung pad+mas dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dri med 'od zer gyis/_gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul du bkod pa rdzogs so/_/them byang gnyis las/_'di ni mthar thug gi bu la sbyin pa'o/_/de'ang snod phal pa la dang po na yod pa bzhin shog ser rnams las sde tshan bdun ma gtogs pa/_thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mi sprin te bka' rgya yod/_rab mchog snying gi bu gcig la 'di na yod pa thams cad/_them byang 'di rdzogs par sbyin/_yi ge 'di'i nang na yod pa'i chos skor rnams la 'dra min dang bcos bslad byed pa byung na/_dam tshig gi chad pas dmyal bar lhung zhing /_bka' srung gis srog dang phrol cig/gza' rA hu la/_gnod sbyin dmar nag_/rdo rje g.yul sgron/_srog sgrub nag mo rnams la gtad pas/_thub par srung shig sa ma ya/_bkra shis/ dge'o//_// bka' drin rjes dran/ skabs 'dir yang ring mo nas rnam dkar gyi bya ba la ches goms pa'i dad ldan/_sgang mkhar a gnam tshang khyim mi rnam pa'i bdag rkyen la brten nas/ kun mkhyen chen po'i gsung rab ji rnyed kun phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs te/_ngo mtshar par gyi phyi mor bskrun pa'i legs byas la rjes su yi rang drags pos thugs rje che zhu ba dang chabs cig_/'di las thob pa'i dge ba'i mthus sbyin bdag 'khor bcas gnas skabs nyer 'tshe zhi zhing mthar thug rnam byang bla med 'thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig_/ dge bsngo dang smon lam/ bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/_/ thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/_/ skye rga na 'chi'i rba rlabs 'khrugs pa yi/_/ srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba sgrol bar shog_/ ces dge bsngo'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa 'di/_ston pa'i skyes rabs las btus so/_/ dpe skrun pa/_rgyal mo 'brug pa/ dpe sgrig 'gan 'khur pa/_tshangs po/ mdun shog mdzes 'god pa/_'gro 'dul rdo rje/ \u0f7asa po'i shul bzhag las/ deb brgya dang bcu gsum pa/ @#/_/kun mkhyen klong chen rab 'byams kyi gsung 'bum bzhugs so/_/ [(]8[/]26[)] dpal brtsegs bod yig dpe rnying zhib 'jug khang gis bsgrigs/ krung go'i bod rig pa dpe skrun khang gis bskrun te bkram/ pe cin kong dbyi par 'debs tshad yod kung sis dpar btab/ spyi lo 20_0_9_lo'i zla 1_2_par par gzhi dang po bsgrigs/ spyi lo 2 0_9_lo'i zla 12par par thengs dang po
